quotes.quote: There is hardly a pioneer's hut which does not contain a few odd volumes of Shakespeare. I remember that I read the feudal drama of Henry V for the first time in a log cabin.
quotes.author: Alexis de Tocqueville

quotes.quote: I imagined calling in to my own radio show. Yeah hi, I'm a werewolf, and I'm stuck in a cabin in the woods with another werewolf and a werewolf hunter.
quotes.author: Carrie Vaughn

quotes.quote: Home isn't a place, it's a feeling.
quotes.author: Cecelia Ahern

quotes.quote: If I could live forever, and you would be with me, I'd choose a house for all seasons in a mountain greenery.
quotes.author: D. Morgan

quotes.quote: Because when you stop and look around, this life is pretty amazing.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: How to Overthrow the System, brew your own beer, kick in your Tee Vee, kill your own beef, build your own cabin and piss off the front porch whenever you bloody well feel like it.
quotes.author: Edward Abbey

quotes.quote: Wilderness is not a luxury but a necessity of the human spirit.
quotes.author: Edward Abbey

quotes.quote: But if the book is good, is about something that you know, and is truly written, and reading it over you see that this is so, you can let the boys yip and the noise will have that pleasant sound coyotes make on a very cold night when they are out in the snow and you are in your own cabin that you have built or paid for with your work.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: There is more to life than increasing its speed.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: There are elements of intrinsic beauty in the simplification of a house built on the log cabin idea.
quotes.author: Gustav Stickley

quotes.quote: But to the slave mother New Year's day comes laden with peculiar sorrows. She sits on her cold cabin floor, watching the children who may all be torn from her the next morning and often does she wish that she and they might die before the day dawns.
quotes.author: Harriet Ann Jacobs

quotes.quote: I did not wish to take a cabin passage, but rather to go before the mast and on the deck of the world, for there I could best see the moonlight amid the mountains. I do not wish to go below now.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: I believe that there is a subtle magnetism in Nature, which, if we unconsciously yield to it, will direct us aright.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Seated by her side in the narrow cabin, pressing cold compresses to her forehead and holding her while she vomited, he felt profoundly happy and desired her with unjust intensity.
quotes.author: Isabel Allende

quotes.quote: If you are holding out for universal popularity, I'm afraid you will be in this cabin for a very long time.
quotes.author: J. K. Rowling

quotes.quote: Lincoln was not great because he was born in a log cabin, but because he got out of it.
quotes.author: James Truslow Adams

quotes.quote: It’d been a long time since they’d been together, but as close as they were physically, they'd never been so far apart in every other way.
quotes.author: Jennifer Faye

quotes.quote: This morning I shot six holes in my freezer. I think I've got cabin fever.
quotes.author: Jimmy Buffett

quotes.quote: The world's big and I want to have a good look at it before it gets dark.
quotes.author: John Muir

quotes.quote: In every walk with nature, one receives far more than he seeks.
quotes.author: John Muir

quotes.quote: Although it may not be a castle, a motor home is usually the functional equivalent of a hotel room, a vacation and retirement home or a hunting and fishing cabin.
quotes.author: John Paul Stevens

quotes.quote: Let us listen to the voices of our Forebears. In the smoky cabin, souls that wish us well are murmuring.
quotes.author: Leopold Sedar Senghor

quotes.quote: I had daydreams and fantasies when I was growing up. I always wanted to live in a log cabin at the foot of a mountain. I would ride my horse to town and pick up provisions. Then return to the cabin, with a big open fire, a record player and peace.
quotes.author: Linda McCartney

quotes.quote: The birds looked upon me as nothing but a man, quite a trifling creature without wings and they would have nothing to do with me. Were it not so I would build a small cabin for myself among their crowd of nests and pass my days counting the sea waves.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.quote: Examples are cited by soldiers, of men who have seen the cannon pointed, and the fire given to it, and who have stepped aside from the path of the ball. The terrors of the storm are chiefly confined to the parlor and the cabin.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Cabin Fifteen does that to everyone," Annabeth warned. "If you ask me, this place is even more dangerous than the Ares cabin. At least with Ares, you can learn where the land mines are.
quotes.author: Rick Riordan

quotes.quote: We mortals cross the ocean of this world Each in his average cabin of a life. The bests not big, the worst yields elbowroom.
quotes.author: Robert Browning

quotes.quote: For the forest takes away from you all excuse to die. There is nothing here to cabin or thwart your free desires. Here all impudence of the brawling world reach you no more.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: It is a little planet, but how beautiful it is.
quotes.author: Robinson Jeffers

quotes.quote: Perhaps the truth depends on a walk around the lake.
quotes.author: Wallace Stevens

quotes.quote: This cabin, Mary, in my sight appears, built as it has been in our waning years. A rest afforded to our weary feet. Preliminary to the last retreat.
quotes.author: William Cowper

quotes.quote: Make me a willow cabin at your gate, and call upon my soul within the house. Write loyal cantons of contemned love and sing them loud even in the dead of night.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: The path of a cosmonaut is not an easy, triumphant march to glory. You have to get to know the meaning not just of joy but also of grief, before being allowed in the spacecraft cabin.
quotes.author: Yuri Gagarin

quotes.quote: The quiet rhythmic monotone of the wall of logs fills one with the rustic peace of a secluded nook in the woods.
quotes.author: Gustav Stickley

quotes.quote: It is good to know that out there, in a forest in the world, there is a cabin where something is possible, something fairly close to the sheer happiness of being alive.
quotes.author: Sylvain Tesson

quotes.quote: The cabin of a small yacht is truly a wonderful thing; not only will it shelter you from a tempest, but from the other troubles in life, it is a safe retreat.
quotes.author: Francis Herreshoff

quotes.quote: A cabin with plenty of food is better than a hungry castle.
quotes.author: Irish Sayings

quotes.quote: A log cabin symbolized the embrace between civilization and nature, humans literally wrapping the trees around them as they might draw on a coat and hat.
quotes.author: Gene Logsdon

quotes.quote: Cafe society is as old as the hills. Starbucks and its imitators are the coffee face of the new man in a hurry.
quotes.author: Ian Anderson

quotes.quote: CafÃ© is like trying to cure obesity by requiring clothing manufacturers to make smaller sizes.
quotes.author: Bob Lutz

quotes.quote: A cup of coffee â€“ real coffee â€“ home-browned, home ground, home made, that comes to you dark as a hazel-eye, but changes to a golden bronze as you temper it with cream that never cheated, but was real cream from its birth, thick, tenderly yellow, perfectly sweet, neither lumpy nor frothing on the Java:Â such a cup of coffee is a match for twenty blue devils and will exorcise them all.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: Coffee is a hug in a mug.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Up to a thousand milligrams of caffeine is considered safe for most people, which translates into about 10 cups of coffee a day.
quotes.author: Michael Greger

quotes.quote: Even bad coffee is betterâ€¦ than no Coffee at all.
quotes.author: David Lynch

quotes.quote: Coffee, the finest organic suspension ever devised.
quotes.author: Star Trek: Voyager

quotes.quote: The second cup of coffee is never as good as the first.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: As long as there was coffee in the world, how bad could things be?
quotes.author: Cassandra Clare

quotes.quote: If it ain't caffeinated, it ain't coffee!
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Most of the people don't know that one of the great qualities of caffeine is it allows you to absorb nutrients, and it does it quickly, and so when it does it quickly, you focus, and when you focus, you think you have energy.
quotes.author: Manoj Bhargava

quotes.quote: Coffee smells like freshly ground heaven.
quotes.author: Jessi Lane Adams

quotes.quote: Coffee makes us severe, and grave, and philosophical.
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

quotes.quote: Adventure in life is good; consistency in coffee even better.
quotes.author: Justina Chen

quotes.quote: Caffeine dehydrates the brain and body.
quotes.author: Daniel G. Amen

quotes.quote: Widespread caffeine use explains a lot about the twentieth century.
quotes.author: Greg Egan

quotes.quote: Coffee makes dreams come true.
quotes.author: Keith Wynn

quotes.quote: Coffee smiles us into the day.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: Caffeine restricts blood flow to the brain.
quotes.author: Daniel G. Amen

quotes.quote: Coffee is a beverage that puts one to sleep when not drank.
quotes.author: Alphonse Allais

quotes.quote: Good Coffee â€“ Cheaper than Prozac!
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Coffee is a lot more than just a drink; it's something happening. Not as in hip, but like an event, a place to be, but not like a location, but like somewhere within yourself. It gives you time, but not actual hours or minutes, but a chance to be, like be yourself, and have a second cup.
quotes.author: Gertrude Stein

quotes.quote: Coffee makes grisly mornings bearable.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: Coffee is a way of stealing time which should by rights belong to your older self.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: Caffeine isn't a drug, it's a vitamin!
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: You can survive up to three weeks without food. You can only survive for three days without water. No one knows how many days you can survive without caffeine.
quotes.author: Andrew Shaffer

quotes.quote: Certainly the caffeine in coffee, whether it's Starbucks or generic coffee, is somewhat of a stimulant. But if you drink it in moderation, which I think four or five cups a day is, you're fine.
quotes.author: Howard Schultz

quotes.quote: No coffee can be good in the mouth that does not first send a sweet offering of odor to the nostrils.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: There's nothing sweeter than a cup of bitter coffee.
quotes.author: Rian Aditia

quotes.quote: What goes best with a cup of coffee? Another cup.Â
quotes.author: Henry Rollins

quotes.quote: Coffee is a language in itself.
quotes.author: Jackie Chan

quotes.quote: Coffee is the best thing to douse the sunrise with.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: Caffeine is a euphemism for 'Anxiety' wrapped in increased alertness.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: Where does all the caffeine go that's taken out of coffee and tea? Companies sell it to soda companies to add to their soft drinks.
quotes.author: Alicia Alvrez

quotes.quote: When God evaluated his creation, he deemed coffee trees, along with all else, to be 'very good.' Many people throughout history have enjoyed coffee — even in a fallen world where neither coffee nor our taste buds are at their best.
quotes.author: Randy C. Alcom

quotes.quote: Only Irish coffee provides in a single glass all four essential food groups: alcohol, caffeine, sugar, and fat.
quotes.author: Alex Levine

quotes.quote: Caffeine is the gateway drug. I don't need drugs to make my life tragic.
quotes.author: Eddie Vetter

quotes.quote: Being addicted to nicotine. / And that crave to taste, / That morning cup of coffee. / Filled to the brim with caffeine.
quotes.author: Lawrence S. Pertillar

quotes.quote: Did I curl my toes under my feet / Threading my fingers ‘round the scolding cup / My yellow molars grinding to the beat / Of meds-a-glee and gluttonous caffeine ups?
quotes.author: Nick Hertzog

quotes.quote: Your addiction has skyrocketed, / starting to doubt I can save you, / saying it's affection but the caffeine has affected your brain / your cranky behavior has left me puzzled.
quotes.author: Sean 45

quotes.quote: I stare into your dark abyss / watch milk and water intermix / anticipating caffeine’s kicks. / What a bouquet! you never miss! / you have the power to revive/ bringing all my senses alive.
quotes.author: Rachel Fawcett

quotes.quote: I'm still stuck in this office for another 40 years or so. / My breath tastes of coffee and my smile is fake / I've had so much caffeine that my hands are beginning to shake / I'm sick of this job, I'm sick of this place.
quotes.author: Butter Field

quotes.quote: Coffee... The caffeine in your morning coffee stops an enzyme called amylase from working correctly, which is located in your mouth and gut and breaks down starchy carbs.
quotes.author: Eddie Hall

quotes.quote: I don't usually drink caffeine so that when I need it, it actually does something.
quotes.author: Anna Kendrick

quotes.quote: We have too many poisons in our diets now, like sugar and caffeine.
quotes.author: Jasmine Guinness

quotes.quote: I take vitamins when I wake up. One of them I need to take is to wake up my brain. It has some caffeine in it, and it stimulates my brain and I'm literally not a person without it.
quotes.author: Melody Hobson

quotes.quote: Caffeine is a good thing.
quotes.author: Manoj Bhargava

quotes.quote: I don't like coffee but I need caffeine.
quotes.author: Preet Bharara

quotes.quote: I sipped my own coffee, heavy on the sugar and cream, trying to make up for the late work the night before. Caffeine and sugar, the two basic food groups.
quotes.author: Laurell K. Hamilton

quotes.quote: I went out of the kitchen to make coffee — yards of coffee. Rich, strong, bitter, boiling hot, ruthless, depraved. The life blood of tired men.
quotes.author: Raymond Chandler

quotes.quote: The fresh smell of coffee soon wafted through the apartment, the smell that separates night from day.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: I don't see the point in caffeine without coffee. Or coffee without caffeine, for that matter.
quotes.author: Robyn Schneider

quotes.quote: Take the broken pieces of your life, bake a master cake out of it. Don't stand still like a lake; keep flowing like a stream!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Cakes are special. Every birthday, every celebration ends with something sweet, a cake, and people remember. It's all about the memories.
quotes.author: Buddy Valastro

quotes.quote: Happiness is like a cake: have too much of it and you get sick of it.
quotes.author: Karl Pilkington

quotes.quote: Life is a cake and love is the icing on top of it. Without love, it becomes difficult to swallow life.
quotes.author: Mehek Bassi

quotes.quote: Love is when you have a really amazing piece of cake, and it's the very last piece, but you let him have it.
quotes.author: E. Lockhart

quotes.quote: Literature is a cake with many toys baked inside and even if you find them all, if you don't enjoy the path that leads you to them, it will be a hollow accomplishment.
quotes.author: Camron Wright

quotes.quote: So if I have two pieces of cake, do I have twice as good an experience as the first piece of cake? One of the things I've found in life is that the first piece of cake is the best.
quotes.author: David Frum

quotes.quote: Cakes have such a terrible habit of turning out bad just when you especially want them to be good.
quotes.author: Lucy Maud Montgomery

quotes.quote: Where there is cake, there is hope. And there is always cake.
quotes.author: Dean Koontz

quotes.quote: A party without cake is really just a meeting.
quotes.author: Julia Child

quotes.quote: But of course you can have your cake and eat it, too if you decide to to bake a second cake. And you may well find that baking two cakes does not take twice the work of baking one.
quotes.author: Robert Kuttner

quotes.quote: Cake is happiness! If you know the way of the cake, you know the way of happiness! If you have a cake in front of you, you should not look any further for joy!
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.quote: Success is not like a cake that needs to be divided. It's more like a heap of stones a cairn. If someone is successful, they add a stone to the cairn. It gets very high and can be seen from all over the world. That's how I see it.
quotes.author: Maeve Binchy

quotes.quote: Cake baking has to be, however innocently, one of the great culinary scams: it implies effort, it implies domestic prowess; but believe me, it's easy.
quotes.author: Nigella Lawson

quotes.quote: If I was made of cake i'd eat myself before somebody else could.
quotes.author: Emma Donoghue

quotes.quote: I was a fat child and loved cake, perhaps because it was the only sweet thing in my life.
quotes.author: Andre Rieu

quotes.quote: A bad review is like baking a cake with all the best ingredients and having someone sit on it.
quotes.author: Danielle Steel

quotes.quote: My policy on cake is pro having it and pro eating it.
quotes.author: Boris Johnson

quotes.quote: My idea of baking is buying a ready make cake mix and throwing in an egg.
quotes.author: Cilla Black

quotes.quote: Having a birthday cake squashed into your face by young kids? Delicious. I always don a Santa suit at Christmas. Remaining childish is a tremendous state of innocence.
quotes.author: John Lydon

quotes.quote: I've always told my children that life is like a layer cake. You get to put one layer on top of the other, and whether you frost it or not is up to you.
quotes.author: Ann Richards

quotes.quote: The great thing about cake is it doesn't feel like work. You forget about work. Kids, adults, they all get the same look in their eye when they're decorating cakes. That's the magic right there.
quotes.author: Duff Goldman

quotes.quote: I drink diet coke so I can eat regular cake.
quotes.author: Gabriel Iglesias

quotes.quote: Having cakes as a business certainly changes things for me I don't now sit at home doing a cake for the fun of it anymore. But it's an extremely happy and pleasureable business to run because people are generally buying cakes for celebrations.
quotes.author: Jane Asher

quotes.quote: I like birthday cake. It's so symbolic. It's a tempting symbol to load with something more complicated than just happy birthday! because it's this emblem of childhood and a happy day.
quotes.author: Aimee Bender

quotes.quote: Writing's a lot like cooking. Sometimes the cake won't rise, no matter what you do, and every now and again the cake tastes better than you ever could have dreamed it would.
quotes.author: Neil Gaiman

quotes.quote: A cake is a very good test of an oven: if it browns too much on one side and not on the other, it's not your fault you need to have your oven checked.
quotes.author: Delia Smith

quotes.quote: Cakes are healthy too, you just eat a small slice.
quotes.author: Mary Berry

quotes.quote: If the theory turns out to be right, that will be tremendously thick and tasty icing on the cake.
quotes.author: Brian Greene

quotes.quote: You cannot have a cake and eat it too. Either you eat it, or you have it.
quotes.author: Zygmunt Bauman

quotes.quote: The icing on the cake is when other people enjoy your vision and support what you do.
quotes.author: Cise Star

quotes.quote: It's a piece of cake until you get to the top. You find you can't stop playing the game the way you've always played it.
quotes.author: Richard M. Nixon

quotes.quote: Cake for later, cake as a way of life.
quotes.author: Laini Taylor

quotes.quote: There's nothing better than cake but more cake.
quotes.author: Harry S. Truman

quotes.quote: The easiest way to make a fruit cake is to buy a darkish cake, then pound some old, hard fruit into it with a mallet. Be sure to wear safety glasses.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: I like to serve chocolate cake, because it doesn't show the dirt.
quotes.author: Phyllis Diller

quotes.quote: Let's face it, a nice creamy chocolate cake does a lot for a lot of people; it does for me.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: A great empire, like a great cake, is most easily diminished at the edges.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Because the sweeter the cake, the more bitter the jelly can be.
quotes.author: Lady Gaga

quotes.quote: You know you're getting old when the candles cost more than the cake.
quotes.author: Bob Hope

quotes.quote: Making cake is one of the easiest things in the world.
quotes.author: Paul Hollywood

quotes.quote: The cake had a trick candle that wouldn't go out, so I didn't get my wish. Which was just that it would always be like this, that my life could be a party just for me.
quotes.author: Janet Fitch

quotes.quote: Every cake stupendously enthusiastic about consecrating the child's birthday; irrefutably deserved to be kissed by a profoundly enlightening and poignantly glistening candle.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: Cups and cakes, oh what good things mother makes!
quotes.author: Christopher Guest, Harry Shearer, Michael Mc Kean, Rob Reiner

quotes.quote: The wedding cake is not all icing.
quotes.author: Margaret Lewis, Mira Smith

quotes.quote: The process of making a wedding cake is complex on its own, from designing, mis-en-place, baking, frosting, structuring, decorating, to delivering.
quotes.author: Ron Ben-Israel

quotes.quote: That cake tasted good. But the cake in the garbage tasted better. It was the best cake I ever ate.
quotes.author: Loretta Ellsworth

quotes.quote: If the cake fits, eat it!
quotes.author: Gordon Korman

quotes.quote: The most dangerous food is wedding cake.
quotes.author: James Thurber

quotes.quote: Not always the fanciest cake that's there Is the best to eat!
quotes.author: Margaret Elizabeth Sangster

quotes.quote: Calculus required continuity, and continuity was supposed to require the infinitely little; but nobody could discover what the infinitely little might be.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: The invention of the differential calculus marks a crisis in the history of mathematics. The progress of science is divided between periods characterized by a slow accumulation of ideas and periods, when, owing to the new material for thought thus patiently collected, some genius by the invention of a new method or a new point of view, suddenly transforms the whole subject on to a higher level.
quotes.author: Alfred North Whitehead

quotes.quote: Calculus is the outcome of a dramatic intellectual struggle which has lasted for twenty-five hundred years.
quotes.author: Richard Courant

quotes.quote: The calculus is the story this the Western world first told itself as it became the modern world.
quotes.author: David Berlinski

quotes.quote: The theory which follows is entirely based on a calculus of pleasure and pain; and the object of economics is to maximize happiness by purchasing pleasure, as it were, at the lowest cost of pain.
quotes.author: William Stanley Jevons

quotes.quote: In the horrifying calculus of self-deception, the greater the pain we inflict on others, the greater the need to justify it to maintain our feelings of decency and self-worth.
quotes.author: Carol Tavris

quotes.quote: Non- Euclidean calculus and quantum physics are enough to stretch any brain; and when one mixes them with folklore, and tries to trace a strange background of multi-dimensional reality behind the ghoulish hints of Gothic tales and the wild whispers of the chimney-corner, one can hardly expect to be wholly free from mental tension.
quotes.author: H.P. Lovecraft

quotes.quote: Every one who understands the subject will agree that even the basis on which the scientific explanation of nature rests is intelligible only to those who have learned at least the elements of the differential and integral calculus, as well as analytical geometry.
quotes.author: Felix Klein

quotes.quote: The theory of probabilities is basically only common sense reduced to a calculus. It makes one estimate accurately what right-minded people feel by a sort of instinct, often without being able to give a reason for it.
quotes.author: Pierre-Simon Laplace

quotes.quote: Geometric calculus consists in a system of operations analogous to those of algebraic calculus, but in which the entities on which the calculations are carried out, instead of being numbers, are geometric entities which we shall define.
quotes.author: Giuseppe Peano

quotes.quote: If one looks at the different problems of the integral calculus which arise naturally when one wishes to go deep into the different parts of physics, it is impossible not to be struck by the analogies existing.
quotes.author: Henri Poincare

quotes.quote: The calculus of probabilities, when confined within just limits, ought to interest, in an equal degree, the mathematician, the experimentalist, and the statesman.
quotes.author: Francois Arago

quotes.quote: All phenomena are equally susceptible of being calculated, and all that is necessary, to reduce the whole of nature to laws similar to those which Newton discovered with the aid of the calculus, is to have a sufficient number of observations and a mathematics that is complex enough.
quotes.author: Nicolas de Caritat

quotes.quote: One good thing about teaching calculus is that you develop a hardened attitude towards repeating yourself.
quotes.author: Philip J. Hanlon

quotes.quote: The true logic for this world is the calculus of probabilities, which takes account of the magnitude of the probability.
quotes.author: James Clerk Maxwell

quotes.quote: The calculus of utility aims at supplying the ordinary wants of man at the least cost of labour.
quotes.author: William Stanley Jevons

quotes.quote: The calculus is the greatest aid we have to the application of physical truth in the broadest sense of the word.
quotes.author: William Fogg Osgood

quotes.quote: Calculus, the electrical battery, the telephone, the steam engine, the radio all these groundbreaking innovations were hit upon by multiple inventors working in parallel with no knowledge of one another.
quotes.author: Steven Johnson

quotes.quote: There is a calculus, it turns out, for mastering our subconscious urges. For companies like Target, the exhaustive rendering of our conscious and unconscious patterns into data sets and algorithms has revolutionized what they know about us and, therefore, how precisely they can sell.
quotes.author: Charles Duhigg

quotes.quote: The whole apparatus of the calculus takes on an entirely different form when developed for the complex numbers.
quotes.author: Keith Devlin

quotes.quote: The true logic of this world is in the calculus of probabilities.
quotes.author: James Clerk Maxwell

quotes.quote: In the moral calculus of currently prevailing state capitalism, profits and bonuses in the next quarter greatly outweigh concern for the welfare of one's grandchildren, and since these are institutional maladies, they will not be easy to overcome. While much remains uncertain, we can assure ourselves, with fair confidence, that future generations will not forgive us our silence and apathy.
quotes.author: Noam Chomsky

quotes.quote: Calculus is the most powerful weapon of thought yet devised by the wit of man.
quotes.author: Wallace B. Smith

quotes.quote: Calculus works by making visible the infinitesimally small.
quotes.author: Keith Devlin

quotes.quote: We must not allow the clock and the calendar to blind us to the fact that each moment of life is a miracle and mystery.
quotes.author: H. G. Wells

quotes.quote: Ethics and equity and the principles of justice do not change with the calendar.
quotes.author: D. H. Lawrence

quotes.quote: Calendars and clocks exist to measure time, but that signifies little because we all know that an hour can seem as eternity or pass in a flash, according to how we spend it.
quotes.author: Michael Ende

quotes.quote: I've been on a calendar, but I've never been on time.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: More software projects have gone awry for lack of calendar time than for all other causes combined.
quotes.author: Brooks

quotes.quote: Too many people, when they get old, think that they have to live by the calendar.
quotes.author: John Glenn

quotes.quote: My death will not be penciled in on someone's calendar.
quotes.author: Richelle Mead

quotes.quote: Death keeps no calendar.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: Stop walking with a ‘calendar’. It’s capable of ruining your fate, by showing you the date & limiting your courage, by reminding you of your age.
quotes.author: Sujit Lalwani

quotes.quote: There is no crime in the cynical American calendar more humiliating than to be a sucker.
quotes.author: Max Lerner

quotes.quote: The battle for our hearts is fought on the pages of our calendar.
quotes.author: Bob Goff

quotes.quote: You have to calendar time for yourself even if you have no idea what you're going to do with it.
quotes.author: Susie Bright

quotes.quote: Most modern calendars mar the sweet simplicity of our lives by reminding us that each day that passes is the anniversary of some perfectly uninteresting event.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: The calendar is intolerable to all wisdom, the horror of all astronomy, and a laughing stock from a mathematician's point of view.
quotes.author: Roger Bacon

quotes.quote: There is nothing so intractable as a calendar.
quotes.author: Margery Sharp

quotes.quote: No other date on the calendar more potently symbolizes all that our nation stands for than the Fourth of July.
quotes.author: Mac Thornberry

quotes.quote: The calendar was a mathematical progression with arbitrary surprises.
quotes.author: Paul Scott

quotes.quote: Don't be fooled by the calendar. There are only as many days in the year as you make use of.
quotes.author: Charles Richards

quotes.quote: Every time you tear a leaf off a calendar, you present a new place for new ideas and progress.
quotes.author: Charles Kettering

quotes.quote: Dates in Calendar are closer than they appear! Time is what keeps everything from happening at once. Keep a diary, and someday it'll keep you.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: The calendar has a magic that makes us imagine a memory can be resurrected and revived, but nothing returns.
quotes.author: Naguib Mahfouz

quotes.quote: The calendar and the clock are all set by football season and the offseason.
quotes.author: Tom Coughlin

quotes.quote: Tomorrow is only found in the calendar of fools.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.quote: To capture a California sunset in South Pasadena is to hold an angel's wings with bated breath.
quotes.author: Ace Antonio Hall

quotes.quote: Do Re Mi California is a garden of Eden, a paradise to live in or see, But believe it or not, you won't find it so hot If you ain't got the do re mi
quotes.author: Woody Guthrie

quotes.quote: Ninety-five percent of all brussels sprouts come from California.
quotes.author: Danny Meyer

quotes.quote: Best way to live in California is to be from somewhere else.
quotes.author: Cormac Mccarthy

quotes.quote: California is full of homesick people.
quotes.author: Judy Van Der Veer

quotes.quote: California is where you get to start over.
quotes.author: Tracy Chevalier

quotes.quote: Whatever starts in California unfortunately has an inclination to spread.
quotes.author: Jimmy Carter

quotes.quote: California is a place where they shoot too many pictures and not enough actors.
quotes.author: Walter Winchell

quotes.quote: We only have two kinds of weather in California, magnificent and unusual.
quotes.author: James M. Cain

quotes.quote: California is where you can't run any farther without getting wet.
quotes.author: Neil Morgan

quotes.quote: If they can't do it in California, it can't be done anywhere.
quotes.author: Taylor Caldwell

quotes.quote: When California was wild, it was the floweriest part of the continent.
quotes.author: John Muir

quotes.quote: You haven't lived until you've died in California.
quotes.author: Mort Sahl

quotes.quote: It's a scientific fact that if you stay in California you lose one point of your IQ every year.
quotes.author: Truman Capote

quotes.quote: All creative people should be required to leave California for three months every year.
quotes.author: Gloria Swanson

quotes.quote: There is science, logic, reason; there is thought verified by experience. And then there is California.
quotes.author: Edward Abbey

quotes.quote: California deserves whatever it gets. Californians invented the concept of life-style. This alone warrants their doom.
quotes.author: Don DeLillo

quotes.quote: California is going to be quite good for the Democrats. But the rest of the country is a draw.
quotes.author: Stuart Rothenberg

quotes.quote: Everything is just better in California - the wine, the food, fruits and vegetables, the comforts of living. Even the instrumentalists are generous and curious. Everything is wonderful.
quotes.author: Beth Anderson

quotes.quote: In California, they don't throw their garbage away â€“ they make it into TV shows.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: Life in California is beautiful.
quotes.author: Oscar Nunez

quotes.quote: California is a fine place to live if you happen to be an orange.
quotes.author: Fred Allen

quotes.quote: There's nothing wrong with Southern California that a rise in the ocean level wouldn't cure.
quotes.author: Ross MacDonald

quotes.quote: California is an unbelievable state.
quotes.author: Drew Barrymore

quotes.quote: There are so many different challenges California has; it's the greatest state in the greatest country in the world. Hasta la vista, baby!
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.quote: Southern California, where the American Dream came too true.
quotes.author: Lawrence Ferlinghetti

quotes.quote: The men of California are thriftless, proud, and extravagant, and very much given to gaming; and the women have but little education, and a good deal of beauty, and their morality, of course, is none of the best.
quotes.author: Richard Henry Dana Jr

quotes.quote: Satan from one of his elevations, showed mankind the kingdom of California, and they entered into a compact with him at once.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: California can and does furnish the best bad things that are obtainable in America.
quotes.author: Hinton R. Helper

quotes.quote: The attraction and superiority of California are in its days. It has better days, and more of them, than any other country.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: All scenery in California requires distance to give it charm.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: These Californian scoundrels are invariably lighthearted; crime cannot overshadow the exhilaration of the outdoor life; remorse and gloom are banished like clouds before this perennially sunny climate. They make amusement out of killing you.
quotes.author: Clarence King

quotes.quote: When a tree takes a notion to grow in California, nothing in Heaven or on earth will stop it.
quotes.author: Lilian Leland

quotes.quote: Yes, I have walked in California, / And the rivers there are blue and white. / Thunderclouds of grapes hang on the mountains,/ Bears in the meadows pitch and fight.
quotes.author: Vachel Lindsay

quotes.quote: I met a Californian who would / Talk California—a state so blessed, / He said, in climate, none had ever died there / A natural death.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: The classic account of the titanic social conflicts that have shaped California as a unique state-nation on the Pacific.
quotes.author: Mike Davis

quotes.quote: California has not grown or evolved so much as it has been hurtled forward, rocket-fashion, by a series of chain-reaction explosions.
quotes.author: Carey McWilliams

quotes.quote: It was, of course, the discovery of gold that got California off to a flying start, and set in motion its chain-reaction, explosive, self-generating pattern of development.
quotes.author: Carey McWilliams

quotes.quote: Most of the western states have been peopled by steady influx of settlers from two or three older states...But California was settled by a sudden rush of adventurers from all parts of the world. This mixed multitude, bringing with it a variety of manners, customs and ideas, formed a society more mobile and unstable, less governed by fixed beliefs and principles.
quotes.author: Lord Bryce

quotes.quote: From afar, the red-tile groups of Southern California appear to reflect a regional affinity for Spanish style and heritage.
quotes.author: Phoebe S. Kropps

quotes.quote: California was, all things considered, just another American place, and sometimes, even worse than that.
quotes.author: Kevin Starr

quotes.quote: California holds in its bosom resources that no other country can boast of compromised in so small a territory— its mineral wealth, its agricultural capacity, its geographical position conspire to make it in time one of the most favored lands.
quotes.author: Felix Paul Wierzbicki

quotes.quote: California is a place where...people comt to make their fortunes...where beautiful women are discovered in drug stores , and a man can turn a mouse into an empire.
quotes.author: M.G. Lord

quotes.quote: California is a place where...the mind is troubled by some...suspicion that things had better work here, because here,beneath that immense bleached sky, is where we run out of continent
quotes.author: Joan Didion

quotes.quote: The people are unreal. The flowers are unreal, they don't smell. The fruit is unreal, it doesn't taste of anything. The whole place is a glaring, gaudy, nightmarish set, built upon the desert.
quotes.author: Ethel Barrymore

quotes.quote: For years, California's major export to the rest of the country has not been its fruits and vegetables; it has been craziness. It comes in many forms— bad TV shows, bad architecture, junk foods, auto-worship and creepy life-styles... You name it: If it babbles and its eyeballs are glazed, it probably comes from California.
quotes.author: Mike Royko

quotes.quote: California , here I come, too. / With a coffee pot and skillet / And I'm coming to you. / Nothing's left in Oklahoma. / And if apples, nuts, and oranges / And if Santa Claus is real / Come on to California / Eat and eat till you're full.
quotes.author: Flora Robertson

quotes.quote: California represents the high-water mark of Spanish expansion in North America: it was the last and the northernmost settlement of Spain on the continent.
quotes.author: James J. Rawls

quotes.quote: Political corruption, social greed, and Americanized quasi-socialism can ruin even the most wonderful places. California proved that.
quotes.author: Tiffany Madison

quotes.quote: There are no real Californians. There are only people who live there and people who don't.
quotes.author: Laura Kalpakian

quotes.quote: My California sunrise, there’s a real mist in the air. I think of the mountains. You can smell the farm fields. You can smell the dirt and the lights and the whole sun.
quotes.author: Jon Pardi

quotes.quote: You are consumed by the worry that it might rain even though you live in California.
quotes.author: Lidia Longorio

quotes.quote: Emotions are like a passing rainstorm: if you live in Southern California, you may never have to experience one.
quotes.author: John Alejandro King

quotes.quote: I just realized some things make me happier, and the good weather in California makes me happier.
quotes.author: Edward Abbey

quotes.quote: In California the only way to look like you are getting older is to look like you are getting younger...if you can move your forehead over the age of forty, then people become very suspicious.
quotes.author: Matt Haig

quotes.quote: To be calm when you've found something going on.
quotes.author: Cat Stevens

quotes.quote: Developing concern for others, thinking of them as part of us, brings self-confidence, reduces our sense of suspicion and mistrust, and enables us to develop a calm mind.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Retain a calm heart, sit like a turtle, walk swiftly like a pigeon, and sleep like a dog.
quotes.author: Li Ching-Yuen

quotes.quote: By listening with calm and understanding, we can ease the suffering of another person.
quotes.author: Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: Panic causes tunnel vision. Calm acceptance of danger allows us to more easily assess the situation and see the options.
quotes.author: Simon Sinek

quotes.quote: A man of calm is like a shady tree. People who need shelter come to it.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: Be still and calm, don't fear your past but use it for our future!
quotes.author: Nitesh Nishad

quotes.quote: Every calm and quiet place is the true temple of the wise man!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Remaining calm in times of desperation makes way for opportunity.
quotes.author: Simon Sinek

quotes.quote: If the mind is calm, your spontaneity and honest thoughts appear. You become more spontaneous.
quotes.author: Chademeng Tan

quotes.quote: Stay calm inside! You will then see that outside storms of life, even the most terrible ones, will turn into soft winds.
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: You're so calm and quiet, you never say. But there are things inside you. I see them sometimes, hiding in your eyes.
quotes.author: Tracy Chevalier

quotes.quote: Be calm in arguing; for fierceness makes error a fault, and truth discourtesy.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: Slow down. Calm down. Don't worry. Don't hurry. Trust the process.
quotes.author: Alexandra Stoddard

quotes.quote: It stood calm against the suburban storm raging around it. The thunder screamed across the sky; it slapped the clouds into a heated turmoil that flew towards the south.
quotes.author: J.D. Stroube

quotes.quote: Learn to be calm and you will always be happy.
quotes.author: Paramahansa Yogananda

quotes.quote: To be calm is the highest achievement of the best of what you have.
quotes.author: Harbhajan Singh Yogi

quotes.quote: Calm mind brings inner strength and self-confidence, so that's very important for good health.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Set peace of mind as your highest goal, and organise your life around it.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Calm's not life's crown, though calm is well.
quotes.author: Matthew Arnold

quotes.quote: When our mind is calm, we're better able to find peace of mind and live a joyful life.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Remember to keep the mind calm in difficult moments.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: I like a calm life where nobody bothers me.
quotes.author: Mariano Rivera

quotes.quote: A calm mind is good for our physical health, but it also enables us to see things more realistically.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Keep a cool surface. Calm. Detached. As inside a part of you has been shattered.
quotes.author: Amy Ephron

quotes.quote: Remain calm, serene, always in command of yourself. You will then find out how easy it is to get along.
quotes.author: Paramahansa Yogananda

quotes.quote: When everything around you is crazy, it is ingenious to stay calm.
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Those who act with few desires are calm, without worry or fear.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: Power is so characteristically calm, that calmness in itself has the aspect of strength.
quotes.author: Edward Bulwer-Lytton

quotes.quote: Calm can solve all issues.
quotes.author: Pope Shenouda Iii

quotes.quote: When the mind is calm, how quickly, how smoothly, how beautifully you will perceive everything.
quotes.author: Paramahansa Yogananda

quotes.quote: When we speak of a calm state of mind or peace of mind, we shouldn't confuse that with an insensitive state of apathy. Having a calm or peaceful state of mind doesn't mean being spaced out or completely empty. Peace of mind or a calm state of mind is rooted in affection and compassion and is sensitive and responsive to others.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: It's calm under the waves in the blue of my oblivion.
quotes.author: Fiona Apple

quotes.quote: A calm hour with God is worth a whole lifetime with man.
quotes.author: Robert Murray M'Cheyne

quotes.quote: Calm self-confidence is as far from conceit as the desire to earn a decent living is remote from greed.
quotes.author: Channing Pollock

quotes.quote: Let the mind calm down and the heart start to open. Then everything will be very obvious.
quotes.author: Sri Sri Ravi Shankar

quotes.quote: There is a calm for you where men and women Unroll the chill precision of moving feet.
quotes.author: Allen Tate

quotes.quote: Learn to calm down the winds of your mind, and you will enjoy great inner peace.
quotes.author: Remez Sasson

quotes.quote: He who remains calm while those around him panic probably doesn't know what's going on.
quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.quote: When adversity strikes, that's when you have to be the most calm. Take a step back, stay strong, stay grounded and press on.
quotes.author: LL Cool J

quotes.quote: Absolute calm is not the law of ocean. And it is the same with the ocean of life.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Be a calm beholder of what is happening around you.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: Never be in a hurry, do everything quietly and in a calm spirit. Do not lose your inner peace for anything whatsoever, even if your whole world seems upset.
quotes.author: Francis de Sales

quotes.quote: Being relaxed, at peace with yourself, confident, emotionally neutral loose, and free-floating these are the keys to successful performance in almost everything.
quotes.author: Wayne W. Dyer

quotes.quote: By staying calm, you increase your resistance against any kind of storms.
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Keeping grounded and keeping focused and keeping calm and thankful, that comes from God.
quotes.author: Lenny Kravitz

quotes.quote: Be calm in the face of all common disgraces.
quotes.author: Gordon Lightfoot

quotes.quote: Within each of us, there is silence. A silence as vast as the universe. And when we experience that silence, we remember who we are.
quotes.author: Gunilla Norros

quotes.quote: Quiet mind, quiet soul.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Eat, sleep, eat. Exist slowly, softly, like these trees, like a puddle of water.
quotes.author: Jean Paul Sartre

quotes.quote: Be the calm eye of the storm where nothing phases you, focus on your center to remain balanced, let your life flow like a stream of wind.
quotes.author: Jay Woodman

quotes.quote: Rule number one is, don't sweat the small stuff. Rule number two is, it's all small stuff.
quotes.author: Robert Eliot

quotes.quote: Deep within us all, there is an amazing inner sanctuary of the soul, a holy place, a Divine Centre, a speaking voice, to which we may continuously return. Eternity is at our hearts, pressing upon our time-torn lives, warming us with intimations of an astounding destiny, calling us home unto itself.
quotes.author: Thomas R. Kelly

quotes.quote: Store up reservoirs of calm and content and draw on them at later moments when the source isn't there, but the need is very great.
quotes.author: Rupert Brooke

quotes.quote: I feel calm in calm colors. I don't want people to watch the way I dress. I want people to watch the way I play.
quotes.author: Seve Ballesteros

quotes.quote: Calm soul of all things! Make it mine / To feel amid the city's jar, / That there abides a peace of thine, / Man did not make, and cannot mar! / The will to neither strive nor cry, / The power to feel with others give! / Calm, calm me more! nor let me die / Before I have begun to live.
quotes.author: Matthew Arnold

quotes.quote: The house was quiet and the world was calm. / The reader became the book; and the summer night / Was like the conscious being of the book / The house was quiet and the world was calm.
quotes.author: Wallace Stevens

quotes.quote: Everything passes, and as I flow with this river of highs and lows, I become calm.
quotes.author: Ruthie Albert

quotes.quote: Becoming calm, even in the midst of turmoil, is a choice. All will be well. In time.
quotes.author: Karen Casey

quotes.quote: See how God writes history. No technical knowledge is required; only a calm day and a calm mind.
quotes.author: John Muir

quotes.quote: Don't think there are no crocodiles just because the water is calm.
quotes.author: Malay proverb

quotes.quote: In calm water, every ship has a good captain.
quotes.author: German Proverb

quotes.quote: It is very much better sometimes to have a panic feeling beforehand, and then be quite calm when things happen than to be extremely calm beforehand and to get into a panic when things happen.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: They sicken of the calm, who know the storm
quotes.author: Dorothy Parker

quotes.quote: Have patience, O my sorrow, and be still. / You asked for the night: it falls: it is here. / A shadowy atmosphere enshrouds the hill, / to some men bringing peace, to others care.
quotes.author: Charles Boudalaire

quotes.quote: Most days start with calm / Chaos often intervenes / Return to the calm.
quotes.author: Larry Stallings

quotes.quote: I follow not such a direction / That leads towards nothing. / I knock not such a door / That opens not / Thus, / Far away, from frustration / I stay calm / And enjoy peace.
quotes.author: Ehsan Sehgal

quotes.quote: As I walked further in the illuminated woods / I met myself sitting under the sky / While embracing the dark in counting the stars / Calm overcame the Chaos!!
quotes.author: Krutika Deshpande

quotes.quote: Always ask yourself: 'What will happen if I say nothing?'
quotes.author: Kamand Kojouri

quotes.quote: The ideal of calm exists in a sitting cat.
quotes.author: Jules Renard

quotes.quote: Gentleness is strength under control. It is the ability to stay calm, no matter what happens.
quotes.author: Elizabeth George Speare

quotes.quote: Indeed, she often wondered if she were dead, or dying from the inside out, and that was the root of her calm, the reason she could surrender her character.
quotes.author: Gregory Maguire

quotes.quote: When the odds are hopeless when all seems to be lost, then is the time to be calm, to make a show of authority – at least of indifference
quotes.author: Ian Fleming

quotes.quote: The nature of the world is to be calm and enhance and support life, and evil is an absence of the inclination of matter to be at peace.
quotes.author: Gregory Maguire

quotes.quote: The ability to stay calm and focused in the midst of change is what distinguishes great leaders from those just collecting a paycheck.
quotes.author: Todd Stocker

quotes.quote: When you can no longer count the peaceful moments in your day, and life becomes a wonderful place of clear thoughts and calm. You know things are as right as they should be.
quotes.author: Ron Baratono

quotes.quote: Before something happens in the realm of calmness, we do not feel the calmness; only when something happens within it do we find the calmness.
quotes.author: William Golding

quotes.quote: A camel makes an elephant feel like a jet plane.
quotes.author: Jackie Kennedy

quotes.quote: Do not free a camel of the burden of his hump; you may be freeing him from being a camel.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Just like a caravan of camels walking in the desert, be durable against the adversities of life and walk with decisive steps.
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: On horseback you feel as if you're moving in time to classical music; a camel seems to progress to the beat of a drum played by a drunk.
quotes.author: Walter Moers

quotes.quote: As a camel beareth labour, and heat, and hunger, and thirst, through deserts of sand, and fainteth not; so the fortitude of a man shall sustain him through all perils.
quotes.author: Akhenaton

quotes.quote: I tell you the truth, it is hard for a rich man to enter the kingdom of heaven. Again I tell you, it is easier for a camel to go through the eye of a needle than for a rich man to enter the kingdom of heaven.
quotes.author: Jesus Christ

quotes.quote: A camel that always moves with the camel caravan cannot discover the beauties of the unknown oases!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: It is easier to make a camel jump a ditch than to make a fool listen to reason.
quotes.author: Turkish Proverb

quotes.quote: The difference between camels and men; a camel can work a week and not drink; a man can drink a week and not work.
quotes.author: Julian Tuwim

quotes.quote: I have absolutely no empathy for camels. I didn't care for being abused in the Middle East by those horrible, horrible, horrible creatures. They don't like people. It's not at all like the relationship between horses and humans.
quotes.author: Rachel Weiz

quotes.quote: The camel has his virtues - so much at least must be admitted; but they do not lie upon the surface.
quotes.author: Amelia Blanford Edwards

quotes.quote: As a camel kneels before his master to have him remove his burden at the end of the day, so kneel each night and let the Master take your burden.
quotes.author: Corrie ten Boom

quotes.quote: No camel route is long, with good company.
quotes.author: Turkish Proverb

quotes.quote: Life is like a camel; you can make it do anything except back up.
quotes.author: Marcelene Cox

quotes.quote: The camel has evolved to be relatively self-sufficient. On the other hand, the camel has not evolved to smell good. Neither has Perl.
quotes.author: Larrry Wall

quotes.quote: The covetous man is like a camel with a great hunch on his back; heaven's gate must be made Higher and broader, or he will hardly get in.
quotes.author: Thomas Adams

quotes.quote: The Arab and the camel are inseparable. It's been said that an Arab would give up his wife rather than give up his camel. Personally, I haven't got a camel, but I think it's a great idea.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.quote: Passion in a dromedary doesn't go so deep; a camel when it's mating never sobs itself to sleep.
quotes.author: Noel Coward

quotes.quote: Good advice once was worth a camel; now that it is free of charge, no one takes it.
quotes.author: Lebanese Proverb

quotes.quote: A film is never really good unless the camera is an eye in the head of a poet.
quotes.author: Orson Welles

quotes.quote: The camera makes you forget you're there. It's not like you are hiding but you forget, you are just looking so much.
quotes.author: Annie Leibovitz

quotes.quote: They say the camera never lies. It lies every day.
quotes.author: Cesar Romero

quotes.quote: One should really use the camera as though tomorrow you'd be stricken blind.
quotes.author: Dorothea Lange

quotes.quote: The camera makes everyone a tourist in other people's reality, and eventually in one's own.
quotes.author: Susan Sontag

quotes.quote: A movie camera is like having someone you have a crush on watching you from afar - you pretend it's not there.
quotes.author: Tom Stoppard

quotes.quote: The camera is the slave to the actor.
quotes.author: John Cassavetes

quotes.quote: The camera relieves us of the burden of memory. It surveys us like God, and it surveys for us. Yet no other god has been so cynical, for the camera records in order to forget.
quotes.author: John Berger

quotes.quote: The camera cannot lie, but it can be an accessory to untruth.
quotes.author: Harold Evans

quotes.quote: The older you get, the farther from the camera you need to be.
quotes.author: Heather Locklear

quotes.quote: The camera can photograph thought. It's better than a paragraph of sweet polemic.
quotes.author: Dirk Bogarde

quotes.quote: The camera points both ways. In expressing the subject you also express yourself.
quotes.author: Freeman Patterson

quotes.quote: The camera is one of the greatest liars of our time.
quotes.author: John Gunther

quotes.quote: A camera exposes more than just an image. It also exposes the photographer.
quotes.author: Steve Coleman

quotes.quote: If you think it, the camera will see it.
quotes.author: Wes Craven

quotes.quote: The camera is as subjective as we are.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Only the camera seems to be really capable of describing modern life.
quotes.author: Alexander Rodchenko

quotes.quote: The camera is interested in what you are thinking as opposed to just what you are doing or saying.
quotes.author: Ajay Naidu

quotes.quote: Your camera is the best critic there is. Critics never see as much as the camera does. It is more perceptive than the human eye.
quotes.author: Douglas Sirk

quotes.quote: Cameras get in the way of seeing.
quotes.author: Le Corbusier

quotes.quote: The camera is a mirror with a memory, but it cannot think.
quotes.author: Arnold Newman

quotes.quote: Looking into the camera creates a special eye and soul contact.
quotes.author: Chiara Ferragni

quotes.quote: When you are a photographer, you work all the time, because your eye is the first camera.
quotes.author: Patrick Demarchelier

quotes.quote: You know, the camera is not meant just to show misery.
quotes.author: Gordon Parks

quotes.quote: The camera can be the most deadly weapon since the assassin's bullet. Or it can be the lotion of the heart.
quotes.author: Norman Parkinson

quotes.quote: The single most important component of a camera is the twelve inches behind it.
quotes.author: Ansel Adams

quotes.quote: The camera is no more an instrument of preservation, the image is.
quotes.author: Berenice Abbott

quotes.quote: The thrill of being in front of a camera remains exactly the same.
quotes.author: Julie Andrews

quotes.quote: The camera is the eye of history.
quotes.author: Mathew Brady

quotes.quote: The camera is a fluid way of encountering that other reality.
quotes.author: Jerry Uelsmann

quotes.quote: The camera could be a very powerful instrument against discrimination, against poverty, against racism.
quotes.author: Gordon Parks

quotes.quote: There is an aggression implicit in every use of the camera.
quotes.author: Susan Sontag

quotes.quote: You see the world much better through a camera.
quotes.author: Louis Malle

quotes.quote: The camera basically is a license to explore.
quotes.author: Jerry Uelsmann

quotes.quote: Gather wood, build a fire, stay up all night with the fire and stars. / Have a little blackberry brandy as you telescope to bring the stars closer in. / The sound of the fire, the smell of the fire, / The light and heat of the fire will help you, heal you. / A campfire's Paleolithic experience we can all still have.
quotes.author: Antler

quotes.quote: We had come a far piece into a strange land, a trail lit by lonely campfires and gunfire and the wishing we did by day and by night. Now we rode back to plant roots to the land and with luck, to leave sons to carry on a more peaceful life, in what we hoped would be a more peaceful world.
quotes.author: Louis L'Amour

quotes.quote: Forest fires a real threat— both to the environment and to those enjoying the wilderness— so always use caution when building fires in the outdoors.
quotes.author: Robin Donovan

quotes.quote: To extinguish a campfire, stir the coal and ashes with a long stick to spread them out and expose their surfaces to the air; then slowly pour water over the coals, keeping your face and hands away from the rising steam until the fire is completely extinguished.
quotes.author: Robin Donovan

quotes.quote: The campfire is the most important part of camping. It's far more than just a source of heat or light. It's the heart of civilization. All other activities revolve around the fire.
quotes.author: David Lubar

quotes.quote: The onlookers watched as the fire snapped and popped, observing the flames encircle the logs. Bits of blue and green intertwined with the blazing orange and yellow. The smoke rose high above the campfire, lifting glowing embers.
quotes.author: Ann White Lombardi

quotes.quote: Young people knew what had happened to the world because their elders communicated it to them around the campfire.
quotes.author: Rick Steber

quotes.quote: No special effect can ever come close to the power and impact of human imagination. A story, told or read around a campfire, will keep alive our time-honored traditions of oral history.
quotes.author: Rick Steber

quotes.quote: The first campfire didn't exist until something nearly human shambled over and camped near it.
quotes.author: Buck Tilton

quotes.quote: Build a campfire only when environmental conditions allow it. The danger of wildfire must be low, and you can find out if it is by checking land management agencies.
quotes.author: Buck Tilton

quotes.quote: A campfire of dead wood will blaze for a few minutes with those plants, and new growth will require, literally, centuries to reach maturity, die and fall.
quotes.author: Buck Tilton

quotes.quote: Before men ever dreamed of shelter, campfires were their homes. Here they gathered and made their first plans for communal living, for tribal hunts and raids. Here for centuries they dreamed vague dreams and became slowly aware of the first faint glimmerings and nebulous urges that eventually were to widen the gulf between them and the primitive darkness from which they sprang.
quotes.author: Sigurd Olson

quotes.quote: If you can survive camping with someone, you should marry them on the way home.
quotes.author: Yvonne Prinz

quotes.quote: The best wilderness campfire builders 'leave no trace.'
quotes.author: Melody A. Carlson

quotes.quote: Dying embers of a campfire, / Mostly smoking, choking out the last bit of orange / Heat as the moon makes a final exit from the sky / He flies into a reborn sun.
quotes.author: Mario William Vitale

quotes.quote: Once all the power goes out, there will still be human beings standing together around a campfire, playing acoustic guitars.
quotes.author: Jim James

quotes.quote: Spring is beautiful, and summer is perfect for vacations, but autumn brings a longing to get away from the unreal things of life, out into the forest at night with a campfire and the rustling leaves.
quotes.author: Margaret Elizabeth Sangster

quotes.quote: Whatever form it takes, camping is earthy, soul enriching and character building, and there can be few such satisfying moments as having your tent pitched and the smoke rising from your campfire as the golden sun sets on the horizon--even if it's just for a fleeting moment before the rain spoils everything.
quotes.author: Pippa Middleton

quotes.quote: Remember, a good marriage is like a campfire. Both grow cold if left unattended.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quotes.quote: You don't have to say everything to be a light. Sometimes a fire built on a hill will bring interested people to your campfire.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: Technology is the campfire around which we tell our stories.
quotes.author: Laurie Anderson

quotes.quote: It's easier to throw sticks on the campfire than to try to restart it when it goes out.
quotes.author: Cynthia Lewis

quotes.quote: The whole campfire idea freaked Piper out. It made her think of that huge purple bonfire in the dreams, and her father tied to a stake. What she got instead was almost as terrifying: a sing-along.
quotes.author: Rick Riordan

quotes.quote: In any arrangement that hinges upon the fulcrum of trust there exists the leverage potential for crime.
quotes.author: Sean Terrence Best

quotes.quote: We're never alone. As soon as we step outside the campfire glow, our Muse lights on our shoulder like a butterfly. The act of courage calls for infallibly that deeper part of ourselves that supports and sustains us.
quotes.author: Steven Pressfield

quotes.quote: Fire's the sun, unwindin' itself out o' the wood.
quotes.author: David Mitchell

quotes.quote: Who has smelled the woodsmoke at twilight, who has seen the campfire burning, who is quick to read the noises of the night?
quotes.author: Rudyard Kipling

quotes.quote: When your down on your luck and you've lost all your dreams theres nothing like a campfire and a can of beans.
quotes.author: Tom Waits

quotes.quote: In the heat of her hands I thought, This is the campfire that mocks the sun.
quotes.author: Jeanette Winterson

quotes.quote: You get guys around a campfire, and they start telling their stories. That's the fellowship that they want to be in.
quotes.author: John Eldredge

quotes.quote: Light a campfire and everyone's a storyteller.
quotes.author: John Geddes

quotes.quote: The echoes of beauty you've seen transpire, Resound through dying coals of a campfire.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: We now no longer camp as for a night, but have settled down on earth and forgotten heaven.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Do not collaborate with someone you would not go camping with.
quotes.author: Dan Poynter

quotes.quote: I went camping for 33 days, and now everybody seems to care.
quotes.author: Colleen Haskell

quotes.quote: Somebody told me it was frightening how much topsoil we are losing each year, but I told that story around the campfire and nobody got scared.
quotes.author: Jack Handey

quotes.quote: Camping is nature's way of promoting the motel business.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: I think camping is one of those things where if you're forced into it as a child, you'll probably hate it as an adult.
quotes.author: Jeremy Irvine

quotes.quote: A lot of parents pack up their troubles and send them off to summer camp.
quotes.author: Raymond Duncan

quotes.quote: My camping days are over, but I might consider glamping.
quotes.author: Christine Feehan

quotes.quote: It always rains on tents. Rainstorms will travel thousands of miles, against prevailing winds for the opportunity to rain on a tent.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: The fire is the main comfort of the camp, whether in summer or winter.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: When homeless people go camping, how do they know?
quotes.author: Dana Gould

quotes.quote: She had the loaded handbag of someone who camps out and seldom goes home, or who imagines life must be full of emergencies.
quotes.author: Mavis Gallant

quotes.quote: A perfect day would be to get into the car, drive out to Yosemite and go camping.
quotes.author: Michael Steger

quotes.quote: The ultimate camping trip was the Lewis and Clark expedition.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: Some national parks have long waiting lists for camping reservations. When you have to wait a year to sleep next to a tree, something is wrong.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: Camping is not a date; it's an endurance test. If you can survive camping with someone, you should marry them on the way home.
quotes.author: Yvonne Prinz

quotes.quote: The rite of passage of learning to build a fire that will burn all night with one match is not an insignificant one in my husband's family, and I grew up camping and backpacking. I love to camp.
quotes.author: Sarah Wayne Callies

quotes.quote: Canoe plus waterfall equals I don't go camping anymore.
quotes.author: Demetri Martin

quotes.quote: I go camping with my boyfriend having nothing other than ourselves and the birds to talk with is most relaxing.
quotes.author: Jamie Luner

quotes.quote: I've been camping and stuff, but if you left me in the woods I'd probably just curl up and cry until someone found me.
quotes.author: Norman Reedus

quotes.quote: I grew up camping with my family. We took so many trips. We had an RV, actually, when we were growing up. We did a ton of camping trips and went across the country.
quotes.author: Kirsten Lepore

quotes.quote: The glories of a mountain campfire are far greater than may be guessed.... One can make a day of any size, and regulate the rising and setting of his own sun and the brightness of its shining.
quotes.author: John Muir

quotes.quote: If you're not in New York, you're camping out.
quotes.author: Thomas E. Dewey

quotes.quote: Light a campfire and everyone's a storyteller.
quotes.author: John Geddes

quotes.quote: A great many people, and more all the time, live their entire lives without ever once sleeping out under the stars.
quotes.author: Alan S. Kesselheim

quotes.quote: How is it that one match can start a forest fire, but it takes a whole box of matches to start a campfire?
quotes.author: Christy Whitehead

quotes.quote: The stars were better company anyway. They were very beautiful, and they almost never snored.
quotes.author: David Eddings

quotes.quote: Wilderness is not a luxury but a necessity of the human spirit.
quotes.author: Edward Abbey

quotes.quote: The echoes of beauty you've seen transpire, Resound through dying coals of a campfire.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: The camp is the space that is opened when the state of exception begins to become the rule.
quotes.author: Giorgio Agamben

quotes.quote: The fire is the main comfort of the camp, whether in summer or winter.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: I go to nature to be soothed and healed, and to have my sense put in order.
quotes.author: John Burroughs

quotes.quote: Walk away quietly in any direction and taste the freedom of the mountaineer. Camp out among the grasses and gentians of glacial meadows, in craggy garden nooks full of nature’s darlings.
quotes.author: John Muir

quotes.quote: In a well-ordered universe camping would take place indoors.
quotes.author: Morgan Matson

quotes.quote: You don’t have to say everything to be a light. Sometimes a fire built on a hill will bring interested people to your campfire.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: Money can’t buy happiness, but it can buy a camper, which is kind of the same thing
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Now I see the secret of making the best person, it is to grow in the open air and to eat and sleep with the earth.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.quote: In a cool solitude of trees, where leaves and birds a music spin, mind that was weary is at ease, new rhythms in the soul begin.
quotes.author: William Kean Seymour

quotes.quote: I haven't been to sleep for over a year. That's why I go to bed early. One needs more rest if one doesn't sleep.
quotes.author: Evelyn Waugh

quotes.quote: When I'm worried and I can't sleep, I count my blessings instead of sheep. And I fall asleep counting my blessings.
quotes.author: Bing Crosby

quotes.quote: You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: Without enough sleep, we all become tall two-year-olds.
quotes.author: JoJo Jensen

quotes.quote: Life is something that happens when you can't get to sleep.
quotes.author: Fran Lebowitz

quotes.quote: Insomnia is an indication, not a chaos. Its like ache. Youre not going to provide a patient ache medicine without figuring out whats reasoning the pain.
quotes.author: Judith Owens

quotes.quote: The last refuge of the insomniac is a sense of superiority to the sleeping world.
quotes.author: Leonard Cohen

quotes.quote: At night when I can't sleep, I play blackjack online until I get tired or I lose my money.
quotes.author: Nicky Hilton

quotes.quote: His insomnia was so bad, he couldn't sleep during office hours.
quotes.author: Arthur Baer

quotes.quote: When we lost I couldn't sleep at night. When we win I can't sleep at night. But when you win, you wake up feeling better.
quotes.author: Joe Torre

quotes.quote: A little insomnia is not without its value in making us appreciate sleep, in throwing a ray of light upon that darkness.
quotes.author: Marcel Proust

quotes.quote: I'm so tired, but I can't sleep. Standing on the edge of something much too deep.
quotes.author: Sarah McLachlan

quotes.quote: O sleep, O gentle sleep, Nature's soft nurse, how have I frightened thee, 1710. That thou no more will weigh my eyelids down, And steep my senses in forgetfulness?
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Not being able to sleep is terrible. You have the misery of having partied all night. Without the satisfaction.
quotes.author: Lynn Johnston

quotes.quote: Insomnia is a gross feeder. It will nourish itself on any kind of thinking, including thinking about not thinking.
quotes.author: Clifton Fadiman

quotes.quote: When you have insomnia, you're never really asleep, and you're never really awake.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: Why can I never go back to bed? Who's is the voice ringing in my head? Where is the sense in these desperate dreams? Why should I wake when I'm half past dead?
quotes.author: Emilie Autumn

quotes.quote: I can't sleep. There is a woman stuck between my eyelids. I would tell her to get out if I could. But there is a woman stuck in my throat.
quotes.author: Eduardo Galeano

quotes.quote: Can't connect, I haven't slept, am I crazy? Fall so deep and I can't sleep, I'm slipping into hazy.
quotes.author: Kaskade

quotes.quote: A good cop can't sleep because he's missing a piece of the puzzle. And a bad cop can't sleep because his conscience won't let him.
quotes.author: Ellie Burr

quotes.quote: Sleeplessness is a desert without vegetation or inhabitants.
quotes.author: Jessamyn West

quotes.quote: Most of us can't sleep when we're starting to fall in love, same thing as we can't sleep when that love started to fade.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Legend says, when you can't sleep at night, it's because you're awake in someone else's dream.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The worst thing in the world is to try to sleep and not to.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: If you can't sleep, then get up and do something instead of lying there worrying. It's the worry that gets you, not the lack of sleep.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: I only sleep with people I love, which is why I have insomnia.
quotes.author: Emilie Autumn

quotes.quote: Dear mind, please stop thinking so much at night, I need to sleep.
quotes.author: Kushand Wizdom

quotes.quote: I've always envied people who sleep easily. Their brains must be cleaner, the floorboards of the skull well swept, all the little monsters closed up in a steamer trunk at the foot of the bed.
quotes.author: David Benioff

quotes.quote: Nothing cures insomnia like the realization that it's time to get up.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Sleeping is so hard when you can't stop thinking.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Canadians are more polite when they are being rude than Americans are when they are being friendly.
quotes.author: Edgar Friedenberg

quotes.quote: Canada will be a strong country when Canadians of all provinces feel at home in all parts of the country, and when they feel that all Canada belongs to them.
quotes.author: Pierre Trudeau

quotes.quote: Canada is one of the most impressive countires in the world.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: Canada is a really big melting pot of cultures, so we ended up with a giant mosaic of different music.
quotes.author: Alessia Cara

quotes.quote: Without Montreal, Canada would be hopeless.
quotes.author: Anthony Bourdain

quotes.quote: Make no mistake. Canada is not a bilingual country. In fact it is less bilingual today than it has ever been.
quotes.author: Stephen Harper

quotes.quote: Canada is the only country in the world that knows how to live without an identity.
quotes.author: Marshall McLuhan

quotes.quote: Canada was built on dead beavers.
quotes.author: Margaret Atwood

quotes.quote: Canada has two emblems - the beaver and the maple.
quotes.author: John W. Dawson

quotes.quote: The fact is, Canada needs investment, particularly in infrastructure.
quotes.author: Justin Trudeau

quotes.quote: Canada has always been there to help people who need it.
quotes.author: Justin Trudeau

quotes.quote: Canadians are the people who learned to live without the bold accents of the natural ego-trippers of other lands.
quotes.author: Marshall McLuhan

quotes.quote: Canadian nationalism is a subtle, easily misunderstood but powerful reality, expressed in a way that is not to state directed - something like a beer commercial or the death of a significant Canadian figure.
quotes.author: Paul Kopas

quotes.quote: Canada is the homeland of equality, justice and tolerance.
quotes.author: Kim Campbell

quotes.quote: Canada is not really a place where you are encouraged to have large spiritual adventures.
quotes.author: Robertson Davies

quotes.quote: Canada has great natural resources, and its people have the spirit and ability to develop them.
quotes.author: Charles E. Wilson

quotes.quote: Canadian pride may not rest on our sleeves, but it resides deeply in our hearts.
quotes.author: Steve Miller

quotes.quote: Canada is founded upon principles that recognize the supremacy of God and the rule of law.
quotes.author: Stockwell Day

quotes.quote: Canada is a balloon-puncturing country. You are not really allowed to be an icon unless you also make an idiot of yourself.
quotes.author: Margaret Atwood

quotes.quote: Canada is not a country for the cold of heart or the cold of feet.
quotes.author: Pierre Trudeau

quotes.quote: Canada is a great country, one of the hopes of the world.
quotes.author: Jack Layton

quotes.quote: A Canadian is sort of like an American, but without the gun.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Canada, more than any nation, will be affected by rising sea levels from global warming.
quotes.author: David Suzuki

quotes.quote: Canada is like a loft apartment over a really great party.
quotes.author: Robin Williams

quotes.quote: Canada is free and freedom is its nationality.
quotes.author: Wilfrid Laurier

quotes.quote: It is wonderful to feel the grandness of Canada in the raw.
quotes.author: Emily Carr

quotes.quote: Canada is a country so square that even the female impersonators are women.
quotes.author: Richard Benner

quotes.quote: Canadians do not like heroes, and so they do not have them.
quotes.author: George Woodcock

quotes.quote: Canada is the greatest nation in this country.
quotes.author: Allan A. Lamport

quotes.quote: The cool thing about being famous is traveling. I have always wanted to travel across seas, like to Canada and stuff.
quotes.author: Britney Spears

quotes.quote: Canada, as you know, is a major important nation boasting a sophisticated, cosmopolitan culture that was tragically destroyed last week by beavers.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: It's never felt more Canadian to be Canadian than it does now.
quotes.author: Douglas Coupland

quotes.quote: Canada's climate is nine months winter and three months late in the fall.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Canada is a broad land broad in mind, broad in spirit, and broad in physical expanse.
quotes.author: Harry S. Truman

quotes.quote: Canada is a place of infinite promise. We like the people, and if one ever had to emigrate, this would be the destination, not the U.S.A. The hills, lakes, and forests make it a place of peace and repose of the mind, such as one never finds in the U.S.A.
