quotes.author: John Maynard Keynes

quotes.quote: Canada is either an idea or it does not exist. It is either an intellectual undertaking or it is little more than a resource-rich vacuum lying in the buffer zone just north of a great empire.
quotes.author: John Ralston Saul

quotes.quote: Canada is the essence of not being. Not English, not American, it is the mathematic of not being. And a subtle flavour - we're more like celery as a flavour.
quotes.author: Mike Myers

quotes.quote: In Canada, nobody is ever overthrown because nobody gives a damn.
quotes.author: Mordecai Richler

quotes.quote: God has made Canada one of those nations which cannot be conquered and cannot be destroyed, except by itself.
quotes.author: Norman Angell

quotes.quote: Canadians have an abiding interest in surprising those Americans who have historically made little effort to learn about their neighbour to the North
quotes.author: Peter Jennings

quotes.quote: A Canadian is somebody who knows how to make love in a canoe.
quotes.author: Pierre Berton

quotes.quote: Canada is a country whose main exports are hockey players and cold fronts. Our main imports are baseball players and acid rain.
quotes.author: Pierre Trudeau

quotes.quote: Canada is the only country founded on the relentless pursuit of the rodent.
quotes.author: Preston Manning

quotes.quote: We don't come to Canada for our health. We can think of other ways of enjoying ourselves.
quotes.author: Prince Philip

quotes.quote: Canada appears content to become a second-tier socialistic country, boasting ever more loudly about its economy and social services to mask its second-rate status.
quotes.author: Stephen Harper

quotes.quote: Canada is like an old cow. The West feeds it. Ontario and Quebec milk it. And you can well imagine what it's doing in the Maritimes.
quotes.author: Tommy Douglas

quotes.quote: There are no limits to the majestic future which lies before the mighty expanse of Canada with its virile, aspiring, cultured, and generous-hearted people.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: There can be no dedication to Canada's future without a knowledge of its past.
quotes.author: John Diefenbaker

quotes.quote: Cancer is a word, not a sentence.
quotes.author: John Diamon

quotes.quote: We have two options, medically and emotionally: give up or fight like hell.
quotes.author: Lance Armstrong

quotes.quote: Cancer affects all of us, whether you're a daughter, mother, sister, friend, coworker, doctor, or patient.
quotes.author: Jennifer Aniston

quotes.quote: Cancer can take away all of my physical abilities. It cannot touch my mind, it cannot touch my heart, and it cannot touch my soul.
quotes.author: Jim Valvano

quotes.quote: You can be a victim of cancer, or a survivor of cancer. It's a mindset.
quotes.author: Dave Pelzer

quotes.quote: Cancer didn't bring me to my knees, it brought me to my feet.
quotes.author: Michael Douglas

quotes.quote: Cancer changes your life, often for the better. You learn what's important, you learn to prioritize, and you learn not to waste your time. You tell people you love them. My friend Gilda Radner used to say, 'If it wasn't for the downside, having cancer would be the best thing and everyone would want it.' That's true. If it wasn't for the downside.
quotes.author: Joel Siegel

quotes.quote: Cancer is a journey, but you walk the road alone. There are many places to stop along the way and get nourishment - you just have to be willing to take it.
quotes.author: Emily Hollenberg

quotes.quote: My cancer scare changed my life. I'm grateful for every new, healthy day I have. It has helped me prioritize my life.
quotes.author: Olivia Newton-John

quotes.quote: Cancer is not a death sentence, but rather it is a life sentence; it pushes one to live.
quotes.author: Marcia Smith

quotes.quote: So if there is a purpose to the suffering that is cancer, I think it must be this: it's meant to improve us.
quotes.author: Lance Armstrong

quotes.quote: Women agonize over cancer; we take as a personal threat the lump in every friend's breast.
quotes.author: Martha Weinman Lear

quotes.quote: All too often, we forget about the patient's emotional fight while they're physically fighting their diagnosis. But cancer is a disease of the body, mind, and soul.
quotes.author: Chris Prestano

quotes.quote: When the Japanese mend broken objects, they aggrandize the damage by filling the cracks with gold. They believe that when something's suffered damage and has a history, it becomes more beautiful.
quotes.author: Barbara Bloom

quotes.quote: Courage is not the absence of fear, but rather the judgement that something else is more important than fear.
quotes.author: Ambrose Redmoon

quotes.quote: Cancer is so limited. It cannot cripple love. It cannot shatter hope. It cannot corrode faith. It cannot destroy peace. It cannot kill friendship. It cannot suppress memories. It cannot silence courage. It cannot invade the soul. It cannot steal eternal life. It cannot conquer the spirit.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The most important thing in illness is never to lose heart.
quotes.author: Nikolai Lenin

quotes.quote: One important thing to know is you're still the same person during it. You're stripped down near zero. But it seems that most people come out at the other end feeling more like themselves than ever before. I'm more eager than ever to do what I did. I want to do everything.
quotes.author: Kylie Minogue

quotes.quote: I always look on the positive side and in a weird way just thought of it as another adventure. Not for a single second did it go through my head that I was going to die.
quotes.author: Caroline Monk

quotes.quote: Cancer is really hard to go through and it's really hard to watch someone you love go through, and I know because I have been on both sides of the situation.
quotes.author: Cynthia Nixon

quotes.quote: Having cancer does make you try to be better at everything you do and enjoy every moment. It changes you forever. But it can be a positive change.
quotes.author: Jaclyn Smith

quotes.quote: I'm stronger than I thought I was. My favorite phrase has been 'This too shall pass.' I now understand it really well.
quotes.author: Robin Roberts

quotes.quote: Whenever you read a cancer booklet or website or whatever, they always list depression among the side effects of cancer. But, in fact, depression is not a side effect of cancer. Depression is a side effect of dying.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: You can see a person's whole life in the cancer they get.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: You may have to fight a battle more than once to win it.
quotes.author: MotivationalQuotes.info

quotes.quote: I always say that candy is the perfect studio food - it keeps your energy going.
quotes.author: Nick Cannon

quotes.quote: My guilty pleasure is definitely candy! Skittles are my favorite.
quotes.author: Sara Sampaio

quotes.quote: If you take a candy bar in the short run, it gives you a burst of energy, but after a while, it just makes you fat.
quotes.author: Ben Bernanke

quotes.quote: There's no denying that candy is comfort food and it's affordable.
quotes.author: Dylan Lauren

quotes.quote: I always saw candy as art.
quotes.author: Dylan Lauren

quotes.quote: I think people always want candy, whether you're a kid or an adult.
quotes.author: Dylan Lauren

quotes.quote: I could not be arm candy to a hero.
quotes.author: Pooja Bhatt

quotes.quote: You're never too old to be for free candy.
quotes.author: Kathy Debiec

quotes.quote: Don't be eye candy, be soul food.
quotes.author: Truida Genis

quotes.quote: The sweet taste of candy calms my soul.
quotes.author: Cresila Pinero

quotes.quote: Keep calm and love candy.
quotes.author: Handy Shandy

quotes.quote: If you want to grow up to be a big, strong pea, you have to eat your candy.
quotes.author: Amy Krouse Rosenthal

quotes.quote: Where there is chocolate there is hope.
quotes.author: Marge Howe Wagner

quotes.quote: When no understands you chocolate is there.
quotes.author: Sadiya Hafisi

quotes.quote: Candy is natures way of making up for Mondays.
quotes.author: Rebecca Gober

quotes.quote: Candy bar nostalgia puts us all on the same page.
quotes.author: Bee Wilson

quotes.quote: Inside the tin of sweets are four jewels, like candy drops. Look at them closely...and stories spill out.
quotes.author: Jun Mochizuki

quotes.quote: He took that candy bar from his back pocket, and he gave that dying soldier his chocolate.
quotes.author: Joe Guillotin

quotes.quote: As we long for sure recruits, candy with sugar our choice fruits.
quotes.author: Henry Vaughan

quotes.quote: Out of mush-mushy candy floss romances which only led to shattering of the heart into infinite pieces.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: I run to meet her like a kid with a dollar to the corner candy.
quotes.author: Candy Kisses

quotes.quote: Here lies the powder and perfume, the pretty clothes are scattered 'round the rock, and it's so like candy.
quotes.author: Elvis Costello

quotes.quote: You're like candy, the world sweetest friend, you taste better now than you did back then.
quotes.author: Jessie Hill

quotes.quote: It's not that chocolates are a substitute for love. Love is a substitute for chocolate. Chocolate is, let's face it, far more reliable than a man.
quotes.author: Miranda Ingram

quotes.quote: Chocolate makes everyone smile-even bankers.
quotes.author: Ben Strohecker

quotes.quote: Eating chocolate can have significant influences on mood, generally leading to an increase in pleasant feelings and a reduction in tension.
quotes.author: Peter Rogers

quotes.quote: Chemically speaking, chocolate really is the world's perfect food.
quotes.author: Michael Levine

quotes.quote: Chocolate is cheaper than therapy and you don't need an appointment.
quotes.author: Catherine Aitken

quotes.quote: Chocolate is a perfect food, as wholesome as it is delicious, a beneficent restorer of exhausted power. it is the best friend of those engaged in literary pursuits.
quotes.author: Baron Justus Von Liebig

quotes.quote: Reminiscent of childhood memories, luxury, sweetness and sensuality, chocolate is more than just a food--it is therapy.
quotes.author: Christelle Le Ru

quotes.quote: Chocolate: the poor mans' champagne.
quotes.author: Daniel Worona

quotes.quote: Chocolate says "I'm sorry" so much better than words.
quotes.author: Rachel Vincent

quotes.quote: Chocolate is an antidepressant, which is especially useful as you start to gain weight.
quotes.author: Jason Love

quotes.quote: Chocolate is ground from the beans of happiness.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: Candy is dandy but liquor is quicker.
quotes.author: Ogden Nash

quotes.quote: All I really need is love, but a little candy now and then doesn't hurt!
quotes.author: Charles Schulz

quotes.quote: I want to have a good body, but not as much as I want dessert.
quotes.author: Jason Love

quotes.quote: Once in a young lifetime one should be allowed to have as much sweetness as one can possibly want and hold.
quotes.author: Judith Olney

quotes.quote: A dessert without cheese is like a beautiful woman with only one eye.
quotes.author: Anthelme Brillat-Savarin

quotes.quote: Candy is childhood, the best and bright moments you wish could have lasted forever.
quotes.author: Dylan Lauren

quotes.quote: Cotton candy is the most amazing form of caramelization ever invented by man.
quotes.author: Jose Andres Puerta

quotes.quote: Candy is my fuel. Ice cream, too.
quotes.author: Jane Smiley

quotes.quote: You can tell a lot about a fellow's character by his way of eating jellybeans.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: There's nothing as cozy as a piece of candy and a book.
quotes.author: Betty MacDonald

quotes.quote: The library is like a candy store where everything is free.
quotes.author: Jamie Ford

quotes.quote: Always serve too much hot fudge sauce on hot fudge sundaes. It makes people overjoyed, and puts them in your debt.
quotes.author: Judith Olney

quotes.quote: After eating chocolate you feel godlike, as though you can conquer enemies, lead armies, entice lovers.
quotes.author: Emily Luchetti

quotes.quote: Fruit only angers my need for chocolate.
quotes.author: Jason Love

quotes.quote: All the candy corn that was ever made was made in 1911.
quotes.author: Lewis Black

quotes.quote: Anyone who uses the phrase 'easy as taking candy from a baby' has never tried taking candy from a baby.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A lot of people like lollipops. I don't like lollipops. To me, a lollipop is hard candy plus garbage. I don't need a handle. Just give me the candy.
quotes.author: Demetri Martin

quotes.quote: Cottage cheese solves nothing. Chocolate can do it all.
quotes.author: Rhoda

quotes.quote: Life is short. Eat dessert first.
quotes.author: Jacques Torres

quotes.quote: It's a floor cleaner and a dessert topping.
quotes.author: Jane Curtin

quotes.quote: Dessert is probably the most important stage of the meal, since it will be the last thing your guests remember before they pass out all over the table.
quotes.author: William Powell

quotes.quote: I doubt whether the world holds for anyone a more soul-stirring surprise than the first adventure with ice cream.
quotes.author: Heywood Broun

quotes.quote: Research tells us fourteen out of any ten individuals likes chocolate.
quotes.author: Sandra Boynton

quotes.quote: Without ice cream, there would be darkness and chaos.
quotes.author: Don Kardong

quotes.quote: If the only way we judged hunger was how full the stomach is, no one would ever have dessert.
quotes.author: Mark Friedman

quotes.quote: Thus the public use of reason and freedom is nothing but a dessert, a sumptuous dessert.
quotes.author: Johann G. Hamann

quotes.quote: Stressed spelled backwards is desserts. Coincidence? I think not!
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: One of the secrets of a happy life is continuous small treats.
quotes.author: Iris Murdoch

quotes.quote: Seize the moment . Remember all those women who waved off the dessert cart on the Titanic.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: Strength is the capacity to break a chocolate bar into four pieces with your bare hands and then eat just one of the pieces.
quotes.author: Judith Viorst

quotes.quote: With one foot in the canoe, and one foot on shore, you are sure to fall into the river.
quotes.author: Tuscarora proverb

quotes.quote: A canoe does not know who is king. When it turns over, everyone gets wet.
quotes.author: Malagasy Proverb

quotes.quote: Canoes, too, are unobtrusive; they don't storm the natural world or ride over it, but drift in upon it as a part of its own silence. As you either care about what the land is or not, so do you like or dislike quiet things--sailboats, or rainy green mornings in foreign places, or a grazing herd, or the ruins of old monasteries in the mountains. . . . Chances for being quiet nowadays are limited.
quotes.author: John Graves

quotes.quote: As one goes through life, one learns that if you don't paddle your own canoe, you don't move.
quotes.author: Katharine Hepburn

quotes.quote: The way of a canoe is the way of the wilderness, and of a freedom almost forgotten.
quotes.author: Sigurd F. Olson

quotes.quote: Paddling a canoe is a source of enrichment and inner renewal.
quotes.author: Pierre Trudeau

quotes.quote: Refuse to accept the belief that your professional relevance, career success or financial security turns on the next update on the latest technology. Sometimes it's good to put the paddle down and just let the canoe glide.
quotes.author: Simon Mainwaring

quotes.quote: Women are like canoes, full of soup. At first everyone is suspicious but then everyone wants one.
quotes.author: Dylan Moran

quotes.quote: Voyager upon life's sea, To yourself be true, And whatever your lot may be, Paddle your own canoe.
quotes.author: Sarah T. Bolton

quotes.quote: There's no mastery to be had. You love the attempt. You don't master a story any more than you master a river. You feel lucky to canoe down it.
quotes.author: Garrison Keillor

quotes.quote: The rule of the universe is that others can do for us what we cannot do for ourselves, and one can paddle every canoe except one's own.
quotes.author: C.S Lewis

quotes.quote: Travel by canoe is not a necessity, and will nevermore be the most efficient way to get from one region to another, or even from one lake to another anywhere. A canoe trip has become simply a rite of oneness with certain terrain, a diversion off the field, an art performed not because it is a necessity but because there is value in the art itself.
quotes.author: John McPhee

quotes.quote: A family, like a canoe, must be steered or paddled, or it won't take you where you want to go
quotes.author: William J Doherty

quotes.quote: What sets a canoeing expedition apart is that it purifies you more rapidly and inescapably than any other. Travel a thousand miles by train and you are a brute; pedal five hundred on a bicycle and you remain basically a bourgeois; paddle a hundred in a canoe and you are already a child of nature.
quotes.author: Pierre Trudeau

quotes.quote: Wherever there is a channel for water, there is a road for the canoe.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Originality is unexplored territory. You get there by carrying a canoe - you can't take a taxi.
quotes.author: Alan Alda

quotes.quote: You can't fire a cannon, from a canoe!
quotes.author: Charles Poliquin

quotes.quote: Every man paddles his own canoe.
quotes.author: Frederick Marryat

quotes.quote: So long as we think dugout canoes are the only possibility-all that is real or can be real-we will never see the ship, we will never feel the free wind blow.
quotes.author: Sonia Johnson

quotes.quote: This world is but a canvas for our imagination.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: A blank canvas...has unlimited possibilities.
quotes.author: Stephanie Perkins

quotes.quote: An empty canvas is full only if you want it to be full.
quotes.author: Robert Rauschenberg

quotes.quote: Let the future remain uncertain, for that is the canvas to receive our desires.
quotes.author: Brian Herbert

quotes.quote: A canvas is an arena in which to act.
quotes.author: Jackson Pollock

quotes.quote: You are an artist. The canvas is your life. Make something worth staring at.
quotes.author: Cheryl Richardson

quotes.quote: The canvas upon which the artist paints is the spectator's mind.
quotes.author: Okakura Kakuzō

quotes.quote: A truly poetic canvas is an awakened dream.
quotes.author: Rene Magritte

quotes.quote: It's so fine and yet so terrible to stand in front of a blank canvas.
quotes.author: Paul Cezanne

quotes.quote: The painter knew the mirror lied. And the canvas told the truth.
quotes.author: Thomas Lloyd Qualls

quotes.quote: Today is a new canvas, paint it with all your favorite colors.
quotes.author: Anum Sattar

quotes.quote: When the face in the mirror doesn't please you, turn it into a canvas.
quotes.author: Tablo

quotes.quote: The value of a canvas depends almost entirely on your mental attitude, not on your moral attitude; depends on what kind of a man you are, the way you observe.
quotes.author: Charles Webster Hawthorne

quotes.quote: The canvas is a court where the artist is prosecutor, defendant, jury and judge. Art without a trial disappears at a glance.
quotes.author: Philip Guston

quotes.quote: If you look into the past of the successful painter you will find square miles of canvas behind him.
quotes.author: Charles Webster Hawthorne

quotes.quote: The canvas has an idiotic stare and mesmerises some painters so much that they turn into idiots themselves.
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.quote: Every canvas that can awaken us more exquisitely and accurately to the infinite and various surface of our experience does that much to sharpen life, and thereby render it more alive.
quotes.author: Alton Tobey

quotes.quote: It seems strange that some artists fear a blank canvas, when it has been a major contributory factor to great paintings.
quotes.author: David Luiz

quotes.quote: To paint is to know how to put nothing on canvas, and have it look like something when you stand back.
quotes.author: Robert Henri

quotes.quote: An empty canvas is a living wonder. Far lovelier than certain pictures.
quotes.author: Wassily Kandinsky

quotes.quote: A great artist can paint a great picture on a small canvas.
quotes.author: Charles Dudley Warner

quotes.quote: Every canvas is a journey all its own.
quotes.author: Helen Frankenthaler

quotes.quote: Cover the canvas at the first go, then work at it until you see nothing more to add.
quotes.author: Camille Pissarro

quotes.quote: When you give an artist a canvas, you shouldn't tell him exactly how much paint to put on it, or exactly how sharp the images should be. You should let the artist get going.
quotes.author: Reed Hundt

quotes.quote: The important thing is to remember what most impressed you and to put it on canvas as fast as possible.
quotes.author: Pierre Bonnard

quotes.quote: Colors live a remarkable life of their own after they have been applied to the canvas.
quotes.author: Edvard Munch

quotes.quote: Painting a line across canvas with a brush is similar to the motion of a wave breaking.
quotes.author: Mary Heilmann

quotes.quote: Now will never leave. It is always here. Like a clear canvas, it awaits our painting.
quotes.author: Swami Satchidananda

quotes.quote: The payment of the worker is not determined by the value of his product.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Capitalism has brought with it progress, not merely in production but also in knowledge.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Capitalism has neither the capacity, nor the morality, nor the ethics to solve the problems of poverty.
quotes.author: Fidel Castro

quotes.quote: For capitalism, war and peace are business and nothing but business.
quotes.author: Karl Marx

quotes.quote: Too much capitalism does not mean too many capitalists, but too few capitalists.
quotes.author: G. K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Capitalism itself is not to be condemned. And surely it is not vicious of its very nature, but it has been vitiated.
quotes.author: Pope Pius XI

quotes.quote: Under capitalism the more money you have, the easier it is to make money, and the less money you have, the harder.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Capitalism is at its liberating best in a noncapitalist environment. The crypto-businessman is the true revolutionary in a Communist country.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: Capitalism God's way of determining who is smart and who is poor.
quotes.author: Ron Swanson

quotes.quote: Capitalism is the only society in human history in which neither tradition nor conscious direction supervises the total effort of the community; it is the only society in which the future, the needs for tomorrow, are entirely left to an automatic system.
quotes.author: Robert Heilbroner

quotes.quote: Capitalism means that a few people will do very well, and the rest will serve the few.
quotes.author: Michael Moore

quotes.quote: Capitalism works better from every perspective when the economic decision makers are forced to share power with those who will be affected by those decisions.
quotes.author: Barney Frank

quotes.quote: Capitalism is about the mutual creation of wealth rather than the pillaging of it.
quotes.author: Ted Malloch

quotes.quote: Capitalism might be defined, if we wish to be scientific, as a form of economic organization motivated by the pursuit of profit within a price structure.
quotes.author: Carroll Quigley

quotes.quote: Capitalism is not an economic system, but a world-outlook, or rather, a part of a whole world-outlook.
quotes.author: Francis Parker Yockey

quotes.quote: Capitalism is a social system based on the recognition of individual rights, including property rights, in which all property is privately owned.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: The inherent vice of capitalism is the unequal sharing of blessings; the inherent virtue of socialism is the equal sharing of miseries.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Capitalism attacks and destroys all the finer sentiments of the human heart; it ruthlessly sweeps away old traditions and ideas opposed to its progress, and it exploits and corrupts those things once held sacred.
quotes.author: Daniel De Leon

quotes.quote: Capitalism is the extraordinary belief that the nastiest of men, for the nastiest of reasons, will somehow work for the benefit of us all.
quotes.author: John Maynard Keynes

quotes.quote: Capitalism has given people both the liberty and the incentive to create, produce, and trade, thereby generating prosperity.
quotes.author: Johan Norberg

quotes.quote: Capitalism is a system for determining objective value.
quotes.author: Matt Taibbi

quotes.quote: Capitalism does not permit an even flow of economic resources. With this system, a small privileged few are rich beyond conscience, and almost all others are doomed to be poor at some level. That's the way the system works. And since we know that the system will not change the rules, we are going to have to change the system.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: Capitalism needs to function like a game of tug-of-war. Two opposing sides need to continually struggle for dominance, but at no time can either side be permitted to walk away with the rope.
quotes.author: Pete Holiday

quotes.quote: Capitalism is like the law of the jungle with a few rules. There isn't another system that works for our society but left unchecked, capitalism can have a dehumanising effect.
quotes.author: Mohsin Hamid

quotes.quote: A basic principle of modern state capitalism is that costs and risks are socialized to the extent possible, while profit is privatized.
quotes.author: Noam Chomsky

quotes.quote: The ideology of capitalism makes us all into connoisseurs of liberty of the indefinite expansion of possibility.
quotes.author: Susan Sontag

quotes.quote: Capitalism has destroyed our belief in any effective power but that of self interest backed by force.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Capitalism is being attacked not because it is inefficient or misgoverned but because it is cynical. And indeed a society based on the assertion that private vices become public benefits cannot endure, no matter how impeccable its logic, no matter how great its benefits.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: Capitalism has defeated communism. It is now well on its way to defeating democracy.
quotes.author: David Korten

quotes.quote: Capitalism is war; socialism is peace.
quotes.author: Karl Liebknecht

quotes.quote: Capitalism offers you freedom, but far from giving people freedom, it enslaves them.
quotes.author: Ian Mckellen

quotes.quote: Capitalism inevitably and by virtue of the very logic of its civilization creates, educates and subsidizes a vested interest in social unrest.
quotes.author: Joseph Schumpeter

quotes.quote: Capital has its rights, which are as worthy of protection as any other right.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: These capitalists generally act harmoniously and in concert, to fleece the people.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Capitalism is the legitimate racket of the ruling class.
quotes.author: Al Capone

quotes.quote: The most eloquent eulogy of capitalism was made by its greatest enemy. Marx is only anti-capitalist in so far as capitalism is out of date.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: Watching capitalism gun down democracy. It had this funny effect on me.
quotes.author: Ani DiFranco

quotes.quote: Money demands that you sell, not your weakness to men's stupidity, but your talent to their reason.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: Government 'help' to business is just as disastrous as government persecution. The only way a government can be of service to national prosperity is by keeping its hands off.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: Advocates of capitalism are very apt to appeal to the sacred principles of liberty, which are embodied in one maxim. The fortunate must not be restrained in the exercise of tyranny over the unfortunate.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Despite what many Americans think, most Soviets do not yearn for capitalism or Western-style democracy.
quotes.author: Dan Rather

quotes.quote: Capitalism and the market are presented as synonymous, but they are not. Capitalism is both the enemy of the market and democracy.
quotes.author: David Korten

quotes.quote: Under capitalism each individual engages in economic planning.
quotes.author: George Reisman

quotes.quote: Capital is a result of labor, and is used by labor to assist it in further production. Labor is the active and initial force, and labor is therefore the employer of capital.
quotes.author: Henry George

quotes.quote: Capitalism has always been a failure for the lower classes. It is now beginning to fail for the middle classes.
quotes.author: Howard Zinn

quotes.quote: The forces of a capitalist society, if left unchecked, tend to make the rich richer and the poor poorer.
quotes.author: Jawaharlal Nehru

quotes.quote: Publicity is the life of this culture in so far as without publicity capitalism could not survive and at the same time publicity is its dream.
quotes.author: John Berger

quotes.quote: Capitalism is the astounding belief that the most wickedest of men will do the most wickedest of things for the greatest good of everyone.
quotes.author: John Maynard Keynes

quotes.quote: If allowed to run free of the social system, capitalism will attempt to corrupt and undermine democracy, which is after all not a natural state.
quotes.author: John Ralston Saul

quotes.quote: Capitalist production, therefore, develops technology, and the combining together of various processes into a social whole, only by sapping the original sources of all wealth the soil and the laborer.
quotes.author: Karl Mark

quotes.quote: The need of a constantly expanding market for its products chases the bourgeoisie over the whole surface of the globe. It must nestle everywhere, settle everywhere, establish connections everywhere.
quotes.author: Karl Marx

quotes.quote: Capital is dead labour, which, vampire-like, lives only by sucking living labor, and lives the more, the more labour it sucks.
quotes.author: Karl Marx

quotes.quote: Capital is money, capital is commodities. By virtue of it being value, it has acquired the occult ability to add value to itself. It brings forth living offspring, or, at the least, lays golden eggs.
quotes.author: Karl Marx

quotes.quote: Capital is reckless of the health or length of life of the laborer, unless under compulsion from society.
quotes.author: Karl Marx

quotes.quote: Capitalism gave the world what it needed, a higher standard of living for a steadily increasing number of people.
quotes.author: Ludwig Von Mises

quotes.quote: The development of capitalism consists in everyone having the right to serve the consumer better or more cheaply.
quotes.author: Ludwig Von Mises

quotes.quote: Capital as such is not evil, it is its wrong use that is evil. Capital in some form or other will always be needed.
quotes.author: Mohandas Gandhi

quotes.quote: What breaks capitalism, all that will ever break capitalism, is capitalists. The faster they run the more strain on their heart.
quotes.author: Raymond Williams

quotes.quote: Capitalism works better than it sounds, while socialism sounds better than it works.
quotes.author: Richard M. Nixon

quotes.quote: The cure for capitalism's failing would require that a government would have to rise above the interests of one class alone.
quotes.author: Robert Heilbroner

quotes.quote: The historical debate is over. The answer is free-market capitalism.
quotes.author: Thomas Friedman

quotes.quote: We are not just here to manage capitalism but to change society and to define its finer values.
quotes.author: Tony Benn

quotes.quote: Democracy for an insignificant minority, democracy for the rich that is the democracy of capitalist society.
quotes.author: Vladimir Lenin

quotes.quote: Fascism is capitalism in decay.
quotes.author: Vladimir Lenin

quotes.quote: Capitalism is a purely cultic religion, perhaps the most extreme that ever existed.
quotes.author: Walter Benjamin

quotes.quote: Socialism is a philosophy of failure, the creed of ignorance, and the gospel of envy, its inherent virtue is the equal sharing of misery.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: In the democratic western countries so-called capitalism leads a saturnalia of "freedom," like a bastard brother of reform.
quotes.author: Wyndham Lewis

quotes.quote: I'm a Capricorn, and they flower late.
quotes.author: Marianne Faithfull

quotes.quote: I very seldom compromise. I am a Capricorn.
quotes.author: Carolina Herrera

quotes.quote: Capricorns like to stay in one place. I have to go to work in places like New York, but basically, I don't want to go anywhere. One time, I got a trip around the world for doing something on television, and the travel agent was so excited, I gave her the tickets.
quotes.author: Charles Nelson Reilly

quotes.quote: You can tell a lot about someone's personality if you know his star sign -Jesus, born on 25 December, fed the five thousand, walked on water -typical Capricorn.
quotes.author: Harry Hill

quotes.quote: If you love a Capricorn, take care to tell Capricorn how you feel on a regular basis; this sign fears rejection and will open up slowly if not encouraged. If you are expressive, you will find Capricorn surprisingly passionate.
quotes.author: K.C. Jones

quotes.quote: But I thought I'd never see the day when you'd go with a Capricorn.
quotes.author: Helen Verbit

quotes.quote: I'm a Capricorn and I'm mad loyal - mad loyal! - and I will always look for the good in people.
quotes.author: Jeannie Mai

quotes.quote: Capricorn: A night owl, she is usually serious, a lone dreamer of great dreams. What ultimately makes her so fascinating and distinguished is her inborn courage, ambition, persistence, and capacity to make her fantasies real.
quotes.author: Judith Bennett

quotes.quote: A Capricorn would rather struggle in silence than, admit a weakness and ask for help.
quotes.author: Megan Scott

quotes.quote: It's a good thing Capricorns are able to deal with crushing disappointment.
quotes.author: Kyle Anderson

quotes.quote: Me? I'm a Capricorn. Everybody knows that Capricorns don't believe in the horoscope!
quotes.author: Officer Pete Malloy

quotes.quote: Naturally, I'm a Virgo, we believe in astrology. And you're Capricorn so you don't.
quotes.author: Katia

quotes.quote: A thousand nights, I've spent alone / Solitaire, to the bone / But I don't mind, I'm my own best friend / From the beginning, to the end / My life, my heart, black night, my star / Capricorn / Capricorn / December's child, the only one / What I do, is what I've done / I realize, I get so cold / When I was young I was already old / My life, my heart, black night, my star / Capricorn / Capricorn / Capricorn / Capricorn / Go!
quotes.author: Edward Alan Clarke

quotes.quote: Capricorn / Man of war / Honour bright / The long midnight / In the hour before / You lose your head / The thief will paint / The sunlight red / Sunlight red / Deep blue sea / Witnessed by / Flocks of ships / As they sail by / In a tower of strength / The sabre frail / Will take the brig / And raise the sail
quotes.author: John Lees

quotes.quote: Like a beacon in the cold dark night / A star is born / Told ya everything would turn out right / A star is born / Just when everything was all at sea / The boy made history / The bottom line / He sure can shine / His rising sign is / Capricorn / He knew "how to" / He had a clue / Telling you a star is born
quotes.author: Alan Menken

quotes.quote: I, like the Earth this season, mourn in black, / My Sun is gone so far in's zodiac, / Whom whilst I 'joyed, nor storms, nor frost I felt, / His warmth such fridged colds did cause to melt. / My chilled limbs now numbed lie forlorn; / Return; return, sweet Sol, from Capricorn; / In this dead time, alas, what can I more / Than view those fruits which through thy heart I bore?
quotes.author: Anne Bradstreet

quotes.quote: Now when the cheerless empire of the sky / To Capricorn the Centaur Archer yields, / And fierce Aquarius stains the inverted year; / Hung o'er the farthest verge of Heaven, the sun / Scarce spreads through ether the dejected day.
quotes.author: James Thomson

quotes.quote: And I heard them say "Home!" and I knew them / For souls of the felled / On the earth's nether bord / Under Capricorn, whither they'd warred, / And I neared in my awe, and gave heedfulness to them / With breathings inheld.
quotes.author: Thomas Hardy

quotes.quote: Just over Capricorn / This same Big Ben was born, / A feeble lizard; / But with the years came strength, / And twenty feet of length— / The most part gizzard.
quotes.author: James Brunton Stephens

quotes.quote: Relentlessly achieve Capricorn! Even if you feel like there is nothing else you can do, strive to master something new anyway! In the end, you will find yourself with a long list of accomplishments and overcomes challenges that will mark your name, and these things you have done should bring you joy in the later years of your life because you decided that you would never quit. We are all rooting for you!
quotes.author: Bellatuscana

quotes.quote: Capricorn is born with a keen awareness of this Earthly limitation and is thus determined to make things happen during its lifetime. They’re known for their serious focus, especially in youth.
quotes.author: Elisabeth Grace

quotes.quote: When their image is good, so are they.
quotes.author: Janet Amid

quotes.quote: We wear a lot of labels in our lives, and it's so very easy to be defined by them. We have grown somehow accustomed to thinking of ourselves as a size eight or a size fourteen, as a capricorn or a taurus, as single or in love.
quotes.author: Ally Carter

quotes.quote: Goats are fierce, independent, at the beck of no man. Everyone, even the king, respects the goat.
quotes.author: P.J. Hetherhouse

quotes.quote: There is no need, Capricorn finally began, raising his voice, "for me to explain to most of you why the three prisoners you see there are to be punished. For the rest, it is enough for me to say it is for treachery, loose talk, and stupidity. One may argue, of course, over whether or not stupidity is a crime deserving of death. I think it is, for it can have exactly the same consequences as treachery.
quotes.author: Cornelia Funke

quotes.quote: The Capricorn man is very physical and passionate, but not emotional (on the outside). Deep inside he yearns for love but this takes a long time to become reality, he is very reluctant to place trust in another person. Show him how much you admire him and earn trust gradually over time. He is very faithful, probably the most faithful of all zodiac signs. Underneath his secretive mysterious nature is a romantic streak with a strong sensual side, this side is completely hidden and once unlocked, you'll be amazed at the transformation this man has undergone! Patience and trust is key with a Capricorn man, he has so much to offer the right woman who will wait for him.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Lady Capricorn, he understood, was still keeping open bed.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: One of the advantages of being Captain is being able to ask for advice without necessarily having to take it.
quotes.author: James T. Kirk

quotes.quote: A good director has to be a captain - he has to work with a lot of people every day.
quotes.author: Melanie Laurent

quotes.quote: You are like a captain navigating a ship... You must give the right orders, thoughts and images to your subconscious which controls and governs all your experiences.
quotes.author: Joseph Murphy

quotes.quote: If the highest aim of a captain were to preserve his ship, he would keep it in port forever.
quotes.author: St. Thomas Aquinas

quotes.quote: It matters not how strait the gate, How charged with punishments the scroll; I am the master of my fate: I am the captain of my soul.
quotes.author: William Ernest Henley

quotes.quote: We are the captains of our own ships sailing the sea of life, but in times of a stormy weather, you will discover true friends when they don't hesitate to be a lighthouse.
quotes.author: Dodinsky

quotes.quote: I prefer to sail in a bad ship with a good captain rather than sail in good ship with a bad captain.
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: A frightened captain makes a frightened crew.
quotes.author: Lister Sinclair

quotes.quote: There can be only one Captain to a ship.
quotes.author: Thomas John Barnardo

quotes.quote: You are the captain of your own ship; don't let anyone else take the wheel.
quotes.author: Michael Josephson

quotes.quote: I am the captain of my destiny, I do not abandon the ship in hard times. But, I do have sense enough not to go down with the ship.
quotes.author: Cesare Pavese

quotes.quote: Our great captain's captain.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: A man without religion or spiritual vision is like a captain who finds himself in the midst of an uncharted sea, without compass, rudder and steering wheel. He never knows where he is, which way he is going and where he is going to land.
quotes.author: William J. H. Boetcker

quotes.quote: A brave captain is as a root, out of which, as branches, the courage of his soldiers doth spring.
quotes.author: Philip Sidney

quotes.quote: Be the captain of your ship. Breathe and be grateful.
quotes.author: Michael Lomenda

quotes.quote: Part of being a captain is knowing when to smile, make the troops happy even when it's the last thing in the world you want to do. Because they're your troops and you have to take care of them.
quotes.author: Captain Sisko

quotes.quote: In calm water, every ship has a good captain.
quotes.author: Grover Cleveland

quotes.quote: The captain of a ship is not chosen from those of the passengers who comes from the best family.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: When the storm brews and the waves swell, only an experienced captain can control the ship and save it.
quotes.author: Mata Amritanandamayi

quotes.quote: The captain of a ship can run a great ship, but he can't do anything about the tides.
quotes.author: Matthew Norman

quotes.quote: A man may own a ship, but unless he is captain of a crew he goes where the ship goes.
quotes.author: Josephine Tey

quotes.quote: The hallmark of a great captain is the ability to win the toss, at the right time.
quotes.author: Richie Benaud

quotes.quote: A captain who does not know where he wants to sail, there is no wind on Earth that will bring him there.
quotes.author: Ami Ayalon

quotes.quote: No captain can do very wrong if he places his ship alongside that of the enemy.
quotes.author: Horatio Nelson

quotes.quote: With a good captain, a rough ocean turns into a calm lake; with a bad captain, a calm lake turns into a rough ocean!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: A ship at sea is its own world. To be the captain of a ship is to be the unquestioned ruler of that world and requires all of the leadership skills of a prince or minister.
quotes.author: Col. Corazon Santiago

quotes.quote: I am the captain of my soul.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: When you are captain, you are never speaking for yourself.
quotes.author: Brian O'Driscoll

quotes.quote: A good captain is not made from calm seas.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: You are the captain of your ship that never comes in.
quotes.author: Daniel Lee

quotes.quote: In case signals cannot be seen or clearly understood, no captain can do wrong if he places his ship alongside that of an enemy.
quotes.author: Robert Southey

quotes.quote: O Captain! My Captain! our fearful trip is done, / The ship has weathered every rack, the prize we sought is won. / O Captain! My Captain! Exult O shores, and ring O bells! But I with mournful tread / Walk the deck my Captain lies, / Fallen cold and dead. / O captain! My Captain!
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.quote: When the opposing captain is down, you need to keep your foot on him.
quotes.author: Graeme Smith

quotes.quote: What is a captain supposed to do— go out on the field before the game and decide whether to kick or receive?
quotes.author: Graig Nettles

quotes.quote: A storyteller is like a ship's captain. He takes the passengers places where they might laugh or cry, but they always safe.
quotes.author: Michael Parent

quotes.quote: Monarchy is like a sleek craft, it sails along well until some bumbling captain runs it into the rocks.
quotes.author: Fisher Ames

quotes.quote: He is one of those people with an aura about him— you could just feel him. I think he's one of those great figures we see running through history; he's definitely got the gift of leadership.
quotes.author: Tony Fitzpatrick

quotes.quote: The ship's company will remember that I am your captain, your judge, and your jury. You do your duty, and we may get along. Whatever happens you do your duty.
quotes.author: Charles Laughton

quotes.quote: Here, if you don't want to be a director, it's like a captain who doesn't want to be a major.
quotes.author: Josh Greenfield

quotes.quote: Great honor is due to those officers who remain true despite the example of their treacherous associates; but the greatest honor and most important fact of all is the unanimous firmness of the common soldiers and common sailors.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: I was a sidelines child : never class president, never team captain, never the one with the most valentines in my box.
quotes.author: Lois Lowry

quotes.quote: My fate cannot be mastered; it can only be collaborated with and thereby, to some extent, directed. Nor am I the captain of my soul; I am only its noisiest passenger.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: The day you hear someone call me captain will be the day I buy a boat.
quotes.author: Guy Lafleur

quotes.quote: I'm not driven by killer ambition. I'm not a workaholic. I'm a good team player. I don't have to ba captain, but I do want to play on a winning team.
quotes.author: Jane Pauley

quotes.quote: When I lost my rifle, the Army charged me 85 dollars. That is why in the navy the captain goes down with the ship.
quotes.author: Dick Gregory

quotes.quote: A sailor is an artist whose medium is the wind.
quotes.author: Webb Chiles

quotes.quote: To delight in war is a merit in the soldier, a dangerous quality in the captain and a positive crime in the statesman.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.quote: It is in following Christ as our captain that we can win in our personal lives, families, churches, and communities.
quotes.author: Tony Evans

quotes.quote: There is so much to sailing a ship. There's about a thousand different lines on a brig ship, and knowing what each one of those does, it takes a long time, and that's why you have these cabin boys that start on the ship, and they learn throughout the years, and that's why it takes so long to captain one.
quotes.author: Tom Holland

quotes.quote: Life without God is like an aircraft without a Captain. Anytime, it is bound to crash.
quotes.author: Gift Gugu Mona

quotes.quote: Every leader is a boss but every boss is not a leader.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: When the world asks you to walk, don't listen, just sit! When the world asks you to sit, don't listen, just walk! The captain of your own ship is you, not the world!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat Ildan

quotes.quote: Never trust the captain who has never taken any education from the School of Storms!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat Ildan

quotes.quote: It is not the ship so much as the skillful sailing that assures a prosperous voyage.
quotes.author: George William Curtis

quotes.quote: The seas may be rough , but I am the Captain! No matter how difficult, I will always prevail.
quotes.author: Captain Jack Sparrow

quotes.quote: Any damn fool can navigate the world sober. It takes a really good sailor to do it drunk.
quotes.author: Sir Francis Chichester

quotes.quote: The captain is supposed to go down with the ship unless the first mate knocks him out and throws him in a lifeboat.
quotes.author: Neal Shusterman

quotes.quote: One cannot seize, and capture one's love, to impose its will.
quotes.author: Ehsan Sehgal

quotes.quote: Eyes can only capture objects that already seen in mind. And mind can only see things that already written in heart.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: The mind doesn’t carry anything on its own, but it captures everything from outside, and stretches them into different experience, impressions or dreams of a person.
quotes.author: Roshan Sharma

quotes.quote: Capture the moment. It is your only sacred-memory.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: You must capture and keep the heart of the original and supremely able man before his brain can do its best.
quotes.author: Andrew Carnegie

quotes.quote: Creating value isn't enough - you also need to capture some of the value you create.
quotes.author: Peter Thiel

quotes.quote: Capturing the moments of today that will wow your hearts tomorrow.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Any moment which is not captured is lost in the events of time.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Capture your youth, while you can.
quotes.author: Anthony Liccione

quotes.quote: Things have to be believable, not in a literal, photographic sense, but in an emotional sense - capturing the essence of the situation.
quotes.author: Michael Foreman

quotes.quote: The power of the writer is to capture the thoughts live and present them as they appeared in his mind.
quotes.author: Bangambiki Habyarimana

quotes.quote: Choose a job you love, and you will never have to work a day in your life.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: It's not what you achieve, it's what you overcome. That's what defines your career.
quotes.author: Carlton Fisk

quotes.quote: I think everyone should experience defeat at least once during their career
quotes.author: Lou Holtz

quotes.quote: If the career you have chosen has some unexpected inconvenience, console yourself by reflecting that no career is without them.
quotes.author: Jane Fonda

quotes.quote: I've come to realize your career is all about the choices you make. Every single one matters.
quotes.author: Demi Lovato

quotes.quote: Find out what you like doing best and get someone to pay you for doing it.
quotes.author: Katherine Whitehorn

quotes.quote: I want to look back on my career and be proud of the work, and be proud that I tried everything.
quotes.author: Jon Stewart

quotes.quote: I feel ups and downs are a part of one's career, and this totally depends on how you take it. You can either be knocked down by the negative things, or you can take it in a positive way and learn from it.
quotes.author: Deepika Padukone

quotes.quote: If you're offered a seat on a rocket ship, don't ask what seat! Just get on.
quotes.author: Sheryl Sandberg

quotes.quote: People don't choose their careers; they are engulfed by them.
quotes.author: John Dos Passos

quotes.quote: For many people a job is more than an income - it's an important part of who we are. So a career transition of any sort is one of the most unsettling experiences you can face in your life.
quotes.author: Paul Clitheroe

quotes.quote: Your career is like a garden. It can hold an assortment of life's energy that yields a bounty for you. You do not need to grow just one thing in your garden. You do not need to do just one thing in your career.
quotes.author: Jennifer Ritchie Payette

quotes.quote: Your work is to discover your work and then with all your heart to give yourself to it.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: The word career is a divisive word. It's a word that divides the normal life from business or professional life.
quotes.author: Grace Paley

quotes.quote: A political career brings out the basest qualities in human nature.
quotes.author: James Bryce

quotes.quote: Think not of yourself as the architect of your career but as the sculptor. Expect to have to do a lot of hard hammering and chiseling and scraping and polishing.
quotes.author: BC Forbes

quotes.quote: In a person's career, well, if you're process-oriented and not totally outcome-oriented, then you're more likely to be success. I often say 'pursue excellence, ignore success.' Success is a by-product of excellence.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: To be successful, the first thing to do is fall in love with your work.
quotes.author: Sister Mary Lauretta

quotes.quote: Each man has his own vocation; his talent is his call. There is one direction in which all space is open to him.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: By working faithfully eight hours a day you may eventually get to be a boss and work twelve hours a day.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: You never stop earning when you do what you love.
quotes.author: Asha Tyson

quotes.quote: Analyzing what you haven't got as well as what you have is a necessary ingredient of a career.
quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.quote: A career is wonderful, but you can't curl up with it on a cold night.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: The first essential in a boy's career is to find out what he's fitted for, what he's most capable of doing and doing with a relish.
quotes.author: Charles M. Schwab

quotes.quote: The darkest day in a man's career is that wherein he fancies there is some easier way of getting a dollar than by squarely earning it.
quotes.author: Horace Greeley

quotes.quote: I'm a great believer in luck, and I find that the harder I work, the more I have of it.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: Never continue in a job you don't enjoy. If you're happy in what you're doing, you'll like yourself, you'll have inner peace. And if you have that, along with physical health, you'll have more success than you could possibly have imagined.
quotes.author: Roger Caras

quotes.quote: If you don't wake up in the morning excited to pick up where you left your work yesterday, you haven't found your calling yet.
quotes.author: Mike Wallace

quotes.quote: The secret of joy in work is contained in one word - excellence. To know how to do something well is to enjoy it.
quotes.author: Pearl Buck

quotes.quote: The true measure of a career is to be able to be content, even proud, that you succeeded through your own endeavors without leaving a trail of casualties in your wake.
quotes.author: Alan Greenspan

quotes.quote: What is it that you like doing? If you don't like it, get out of it, because you'll be lousy at it.
quotes.author: Lee Iacocca

quotes.quote: Find a job you like and you add five days to every week.
quotes.author: Jackson Brown, Jr.

quotes.quote: Vocation is the place where your deep gladness meets the world's deep need .
quotes.author: Frederick Buechner

quotes.quote: The product of the head, heart and hand is a thing to be loved.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Make yourself necessary to the world and mankind will give you bread.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Perform your long and heavy task with energy, treading the path to which Fate has been pleased to call you.
quotes.author: Alfred Victor Vigny

quotes.quote: Find a place inside where there's joy, and the joy will burn out the pain.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: Three Rules of Work: Out of clutter find simplicity; from discord find harmony; in the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Don't be offended when people don't seem to get you. Not everyone recognizes brilliance.
quotes.author: Linda Poindexter

quotes.quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started. The secret of getting started is breaking your complex overwhelming tasks into small manageable tasks, and then starting on the first one.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: The price one pays for pursuing any profession, or calling, is an intimate knowledge of its ugly side.
quotes.author: James Arthur Baldwin

quotes.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Take your work seriously and yourself lightly.
quotes.author: Bob Nelson

quotes.quote: You have a calling which exists only for you and which you can fulfill.
quotes.author: Dr. Naomi Stephan

quotes.quote: A career is like a house: it's made of many bricks, and each brick has the same value, because without any one of them, the house would collapse.
quotes.author: Andrea Bocelli

quotes.quote: Do more than is required. What is the distance between someone who achieves their goals consistently and those who spend their lives and careers merely following? The extra mile.
quotes.author: Gary Ryan Blair

quotes.quote: Work is either fun or drudgery. It depends on your attitude. I like fun.
quotes.author: Colleen C. Barrett

quotes.quote: Dwell in possibility.
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.quote: You're not in competition with other women. You're in competition with everyone.
quotes.author: Tina Fey

quotes.quote: You're going to see ups and downs your whole career.
quotes.author: Tony Parker

quotes.quote: The only people who think children are carefree are the ones who've forgotten their own childhood.
quotes.author: Orson Scott Card

quotes.quote: You don't always need a plan. Sometimes you just need to breathe, trust, let go, and see what happens.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: There's power in looking silly and not caring that you do.
quotes.author: Amy Poehler

quotes.quote: Nowhere can man find a quieter or more untroubled retreat than in his own soul.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Make the most of your carefree young life as you can.
quotes.author: Anne Frank

quotes.quote: Taking time to do nothing often brings everything into perspective.
quotes.author: Doe Zantamata

quotes.quote: The laughter of the aphorism is sometimes triumphant, but seldom carefree.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: Find a way to relax that takes you to a joyful level, a level that quiets the nerves and allows thoughts to be calm.
quotes.author: Byron Pulsifer

quotes.quote: It was a carefree period and we took to it like genuine lowlife.
quotes.author: Ralph Steadman

quotes.quote: He who lives in harmony with himself lives in harmony with the universe.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Being single is nice, drama free, and carefree but it's nice to feel happy with someone you love once in a while.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Being relaxed, at peace with yourself, confident, emotionally neutral loose, and free-floating these are the keys to successful performance in almost everything.
quotes.author: Wayne W. Dyer

quotes.quote: There is an untroubled harmony in everything, a full consonance in nature; only in our illusory freedom do we feel at variance with it.
quotes.author: Fyodor Tyutchev

quotes.quote: Withdraw to the untroubled quietude deep within the soul, and refresh yourself.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: A carefree letting go of oneself, not a caution, but a wise blindness.
quotes.author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quotes.quote: Live with no excuses and love with no regrets.
quotes.author: Montel

quotes.quote: Let the night take you. Let the stars evaporate into your dreams. Let sleep be the only comfort for you to believe.
quotes.author: Anthony Liccione

quotes.quote: Doing what you like is freedom. Liking what you do is happiness.
quotes.author: Frank Tyger

quotes.quote: The more relaxed you are, the better you are at everything: the better you are with your loved ones, the better you are with your enemies, the better you are at your job, the better you are with yourself.
quotes.author: Bill Murray

quotes.quote: When you are relaxed and you hear what you know is the truth, regardless of your experience, you love. You love the truth. You love hearing, knowing, responding to the truth, because all of that is really you.
quotes.author: John de Ruiter

quotes.quote: He who can be carefree yet mindful at the same time, has found the secret of living in enlightened peace.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Nonchalant putts count the same as chalant putts.
quotes.author: Henry Beard

quotes.quote: Nonchalance is the ability to remain down to earth when everything else is up in the air.
quotes.author: Earl Wilson

quotes.quote: A life of peace, purity and refinement leads to a calm and untroubled old age
quotes.author: Cicero

quotes.quote: Being free brings a lightness, a carefree surrender to all that is happening around you, and, above all, an acceptance of reality.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Be carefree yet careful: While you should work on overcoming unnecessary worrying, have a healthy fear of danger and sensibly guard yourself from harm. Overcoming worry does not mean putting yourself in danger, but in having a calm attitude in dealing with difficulties and accepting what cannot be changed.
quotes.author: Zelig Pliskin

quotes.quote: While looking foward, let go of the past, be carefree and life will be a blast.
quotes.author: Anthony Torres

quotes.quote: Those who are close to the wise are granted a carefree, cheerful mind. Look how the lion brought relief to all of the wild animals.
quotes.author: Tibetan Saying

quotes.quote: By appearing relaxed and carefree, you not only make other people feel welcome and valuable, but you also radiate the message, 'Of course, I don't look busy. I did it right the first time.'
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: If you need to start by focusing on how your attitude appears, then appear relaxed and carefree, as if you have time to stop and listen to others.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: It is said that unsophistication makes a man empty and that emptiness makes him carefree.
quotes.author: Gibran

quotes.quote: When we understand the meaning of life and death, we no longer need to be afraid of deluded. It is at this point that our lives can truly be carefree.
quotes.author: Hsing Yun

quotes.quote: If you're carefree and open from within, you can fit in anywhere, anyway, without having to go to dramatic extremes or make shocking statements.
quotes.author: Erik Pema Kunsang

quotes.quote: The point is to be free not to be crazy.
quotes.author: Erik Pema Kunsang

quotes.quote: Carefree means being wide open from within, not constricted.
quotes.author: Tsoknyi Rinpoche

quotes.quote: Carefree doesn't mean careless. It is not that you don't care about others, not that you don't have compassion or are unfriendly.
quotes.author: Tsoknyi Rinpoche

quotes.quote: If you're not carefree you keep on bumping up against things.
quotes.author: Tsoknyi Rinpoche

quotes.quote: Everyone knows that dating in your thirties is not the happy-go-lucky free-for-all it was when you were twenty-two.
quotes.author: Helen Fielding

quotes.quote: The essence of the Reagan era has been a combination of unexampled slap happy greed at home and squalid, surreptitious violence overseas.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: Creative geniuses are a slap-happy lot, Treat them with respect.
quotes.author: James Michener

quotes.quote: in the back of my mind, I hear my conscious call / the pull the tease of a romance gone wild / feeling as carefree as a little child / snapshot moments of my past / having so much fun with a hope that it would last.
quotes.author: Mario William Vitale

quotes.quote: Carefree to be, as a bird that sings; / To go my own sweet way; / To reck not at all what may befall, / But to live and to love each day.
quotes.author: Robert William Service

quotes.quote: With cruel winter I am better satisfied, / I love the snows; when in the moonlight / A sleigh ride swift and carefree with a friend. / Who, warm and rosy 'neath a sable mantle, / Burns, trembles as she clasps your hand.
quotes.author: Alexander Sergeyevich Pushkin

quotes.quote: We are all born the innocent / We were born to run carefree / You will live on in the hearts of men / Constantly
quotes.author: Aaron D. Sprinkle

quotes.quote: She said 'love of my life now I finally see / A carefree way wasn't meant for me / The pain I feel you just can't understand / You'd think it as fire, pull away your hand / But love of my life / When you told me today / That my place was gone in your carefree way / I realized...'
quotes.author: John C. Popper

quotes.quote: Childhood should be carefree, playing in the sun; not living a nightmare in the darkness of the soul.
quotes.author: Dave Pelzer

quotes.quote: If you were a bird and lived on high, / You'd lean on the wind when the wind came by, / You'd say to the wind when it took you away: / That's where I wanted to go today!
quotes.author: A.A. Milne

quotes.quote: Never ever worry about your looks, because it neither matters to those who love you and to those who don't love you. So, what's the need of worrying?
quotes.author: Neha Chaudhary

quotes.quote: I wish I had not spent my hours worrying over another nickel for the carousel but instead running barefoot through the fields of yellow bonnets.
quotes.author: Lisa Wingate

quotes.quote: I can be a goofball sometimes. I love having a good time and being carefree.
quotes.author: Spencer Boldman

quotes.quote: A lot of times when you're young and carefree, you don't realize, when you tip over the edge, how difficult it is to climb back in.
quotes.author: Joe Cocker

quotes.quote: An ideal world inhabited b carefree people is nothing more than a utopia.
quotes.author: Eraldo Banovac

quotes.quote: I love kids—they're so carefree and always put a smile on my face.
quotes.author: Jordan Burroughs

quotes.quote: When I was a kid, those were carefree days without much pressure.
quotes.author: Patty Smith

quotes.quote: A good character is the only guarantee of everlasting carefree happiness.
quotes.author: Seneca The Younger

quotes.quote: Life is glorious when it is happy. Days are carefree when they are happy.
quotes.author: Isaac Asimov

quotes.quote: A life of unremitting caution, without the carefree or even, occasionally the careless— may turn out to be half a life.
quotes.author: Anna Quindlen

quotes.quote: Caregivers of those with a traumatic brain injury had their blood pressure recorded at certain time of day at meals and during other activities. The blood pressure of the people who had adopted the pets went down dramatically.
quotes.author: Karen Allen

quotes.quote: To care for those who once cared for us is one of the highest honors.
quotes.author: Tia Walker

quotes.quote: Sometimes our work as caregivers is not for the faint of heart. But, you will never know what you are made of until you step into the fire. Step bravely!
quotes.author: Deborah A. Beasley

quotes.quote: Being a caregiver for your child is part of the job description of being a mammal.
quotes.author: Mayim Bialik

quotes.quote: One goal of the mindful caregiver is to find ways to not feel dis-eased in the caregiving process.
quotes.author: Nancy L. Kriseman

quotes.quote: Embracing a healing presence requires you to just be in the moment together.
quotes.author: Nancy L. Kriseman

quotes.quote: Some caregivers want to reciprocate the care they themselves received as children.
quotes.author: Ariel Gore

quotes.quote: Parents are the designated caregivers and are best suited for being able to raise children.
quotes.author: Gordon Neufeld

quotes.quote: Caregiving often calls us to lean into love we didn't know possible.
quotes.author: Tia Walker

quotes.quote: When you're a caregiver, you need to realize that you've got to take care of yourself, because, not only are you going to have to rise to the occasion and help someone else, but you have to model for the next generation.
quotes.author: Naomi Judd

quotes.quote: It is so important as a caregiver not to become so enmeshed in the role that you lose yourself. It's neither good for you nor your loved one.
quotes.author: Dana Reeve

quotes.quote: If caregivers are not healthy, mentally well-balanced and spiritually sound, then those for whom they care will suffer.
quotes.author: Leeza Gibbons

quotes.quote: Caregivers attract caregivers and live in a community of love. They are energized by their caring, fulfilled, and they love life. Caretakers attract caretakers and live in the company of resentful victims who see themselves as misused and are fatigued from constant giving with no return.
quotes.author: Gary Zukav

quotes.quote: In the heart or every caregiver is a knowing that we are all connected. As I do for you, I do for me.
quotes.author: Tia Walker

quotes.quote: There are only four kinds of people in the world. Those who have been caregivers. Those who are currently caregivers. Those who will be caregivers, and those who will need a caregiver.
quotes.author: Rosalyn Carter

quotes.quote: My caregiver mantra is to remember: The only control you have is over the changes you choose to make.
quotes.author: Nancy L. Kriseman

quotes.quote: Caregiving is a constant learning experience.
quotes.author: Vivian Frazier

quotes.quote: There will come a time when your loved one is gone, and you will find comfort in the fact that you were their caregiver.
quotes.author: Karen Coetzer

quotes.quote: Caregiving leaves its mark on us. No matter what we do to prepare ourselves, the hole left behind looms large.
quotes.author: Dale L. Baker

quotes.quote: Doctors diagnose, nurses heal, and caregivers make sense of it all.
quotes.author: Brett H. Lewis

quotes.quote: During the 24/7 grind of being a carer, it’s all too easy to forget the fact that the person you’re doing so much for is, and is obliged to be, more resourceful than you in many respects.
quotes.author: Naoki Higashida

quotes.quote: Offering care means being a companion, not a superior. It doesn’t matter whether the person we are caring for is experiencing cancer, the flu, dementia, or grief. If you are a doctor or surgeon, your expertise and knowledge comes from a superior position. But when our role is to be providers of care, we should be there as equals.
quotes.author: Judy Cornish

quotes.quote: Being a caregiver can be a thankless job. And while most of you don't become caregivers out of a need to be recognized, validating all you do and have done deserves recognition and appreciation.
quotes.author: Nancy L. Kriseman

quotes.quote: Being a caregiver teaches you hot to dance in the rain.
quotes.author: Nancy L. Kriseman

quotes.quote: As a mindful caregiver, your goal is to communicate with intention and compassion.
quotes.author: Nancy L. Kriseman

quotes.quote: The modern caregiver lived until age 90. He had helped everyone he could women and children, the poor and hungry. He nursed the sick until the wee hours.
quotes.author: W. T Jackson

quotes.quote: Caregiving can equate to coasting on the peak of love for those for whom we care.
quotes.author: Dr. Eboni Ivory Green

quotes.quote: Caregiving has no second agendas or hidden motives. The care is given from love for the joy of giving without expectation, no strings attached.
quotes.author: Gary Zukav

quotes.quote: Family is not an important thing. It's everything.
quotes.author: Michael J. Fox

quotes.quote: Caregiving leaves its mark on us. No matter what we do to prepare ourselves the hole left behind looms large.
quotes.author: Dale L. Baker

quotes.quote: The closest thing to being cared for is to care for someone else.
quotes.author: Carson McCullers

quotes.quote: One goal of the mindful caregiver is to find ways to not feel â€˜dis-eased' in the caregiving process.
quotes.author: Nancy L. Kriseman

quotes.quote: Sometimes in life all we need is a caring hand to pull us back on our feet.
quotes.author: Lynwood Agee

quotes.quote: When people cared about each other, they always found a way to make it work.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: Caring for our seniors is perhaps the greatest responsibility we have. Those who walked before us have given so much and made possible the life we all enjoy.
quotes.author: John Hoeven

quotes.quote: To care for those who once cared for us is one of the highest honors.
quotes.author: Tia Walker

quotes.quote: Perspective is an incredibly powerful tool. It tempers how we receive information, and guides what we choose do with it.
quotes.author: T.A. Sorensen

quotes.quote: It is so important as a caregiver not to become so enmeshed in the role that you lose yourself. It's neither good for you nor your loved one.
quotes.author: Dana Reeve

quotes.quote: A caregiving warrior; finds the strength to care-on when others appear to care-less.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Caring about others, running the risk of feeling, and leaving an impact on people, brings happiness.
quotes.author: Harold Kushner

quotes.quote: This is something caregivers have to understand: You have to ask for help. You have to realize that you deserve to ask for help. Because you need to keep on working on your own life.
quotes.author: Gail Sheehy

quotes.quote: Caregiving is a constant learning experience. Most of us are untrained and learning as we go. Remain positive and stay on your path.
quotes.author: Vivian Frazier

quotes.quote: The more we genuinely care about others the greater our own happiness & inner peace.
quotes.author: Allan Lokos

quotes.quote: People who care about each other enjoy doing things for one another. They don't consider it servitude.
quotes.author: Ann Landers

quotes.quote: The simple act of caring is heroic.
quotes.author: Edward Albert

quotes.quote: Care does not need powerful eyes or a cute voice or a lovely face. It always needs a beautiful, responsible heart with affection forever.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: There are only four kinds of people in the world - those who have been caregivers, those who are caregivers, those who will be caregivers and those who will need caregivers.
quotes.author: Rosalynn Carter

quotes.quote: Caring for veterans shouldn't be a partisan issue. It should an American one.
quotes.author: Jennifer Granholm

quotes.quote: Without a sense of caring, there can be no sense of community.
quotes.author: Anthony J. D'Angelo

quotes.quote: Being a caregiver for your child is part of the job description of being a mammal.
quotes.author: Mayim Bialik

quotes.quote: Caring - about people, about things, about life - is an act of maturity.
quotes.author: Tracy McMillan

quotes.quote: Things done well and with a care, exempt themselves from fear.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Caring is beyond race. Either people care about you, or they don't.
quotes.author: James McBride

quotes.quote: Some caregivers want to reciprocate the care they themselves received as children.
quotes.author: Ariel Gore

quotes.quote: Caregiving often calls us to lean into love we didn't know possible.
quotes.author: Tia Walker

quotes.quote: I will always welcome joyfully any opportunity that comes my way to be of service to you
quotes.author: Vincent de Paul

quotes.quote: The more we feel concern for others and seek their well-being, the more friends we will have and the more welcome we will feel.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: There are moments in life, when the heart is so full of emotion / That if by chance it be shaken, or into its depths like a pebble / Drops some careless word, it overflows, and its secret, / Spilt on the ground like water, can never be gathered. together.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: There is no fool like a careless gambler who starts taking victory for granted.
quotes.author: Hunter S. Thompson

quotes.quote: The next time you lose your temper, better use torch light and find it so that you won’t be careless with your temper again.
quotes.author: Vincent Okay Nwachukwu

quotes.quote: I hate careless flattery, the kind that exhausts you in your efforts to believe it.
quotes.author: Wilson Mizner

quotes.quote: The more careless, the more modish.
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

quotes.quote: Careful minds build durable buildings; careless minds build rotten buildings!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: When is a revival needed? When carelessness and unconcern keep the people asleep.
quotes.author: Billy Sunday

quotes.quote: More matches are lost through carelessness at the beginning than any other cause.
quotes.author: Harry Vardon

quotes.quote: I let myself be lured into long spells of senseless and sensual ease... Tired of being on the heights, I deliberately went to the depths in search of new sensations... I grew careless of the lives of others. I forgot that every little action of the common day makes or unmakes character, and that therefore what one has done in the secret chamber, one has some day to cry aloud from the house-top. I ceased to be lord over myself. I was no longer the captain of my soul, and did not know it. I allowed displeasure to dominate me. I ended in horrible grace.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: I've grown careless; there's sin in my life, and I must make it right.
quotes.author: George Sweeting

quotes.quote: Sorrows blurred around their edges, like a careless woman's lipstick.
quotes.author: Jean Thompson

quotes.quote: The paradox of courage is that a man must be a little careless of his life even in order to keep it.
quotes.author: Gilbert Chesterton

quotes.quote: Live and lie reclined / On the hills like Gods together, careless of mankind.
quotes.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quotes.quote: So careful of the type she seems, / So careless of the single life.
quotes.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quotes.quote: They were careless people, Tom and Daisy—they smashed up things and creatures and then retreated back into their money or their vast carelessness, or whatever it was that kept them together, and let other people clean up the mess they had made.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: That's the wise thrush; he sings each song twice over, / Lest you should think he never could recapture / The first fine careless rapture!
quotes.author: Robert Browning

quotes.quote: Careless she is with artful care, / Affecting to seem unaffected.
quotes.author: William Congreve

quotes.quote: Thousands, careless of the damning sin, / Kiss the book's outside who ne'er look within.
quotes.author: William Cowper

quotes.quote: I like people who are young, bright, happy, careless and original. I do not like them sensible, and I do not like them old.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: I delight in the society of people much younger than myself. I like those who may be called idle or careless. I recognise no social distinctions at all of any kind; and to me youth, the mere fact of youth, is so wonderful that I would sooner talk to a young man for half-an-hour than be—well, cross-examined in Court.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: I spend my life tryin' not to be careless. Women and children can be careless but not men.
quotes.author: Don Vito Corleone

quotes.quote: Alert at the beginning, careless at the end.
quotes.author: Roman Proverb

quotes.quote: Carelessness is a great enemy.
quotes.author: Japanese Proverb

quotes.quote: It must be done rapidly, with careless care, so it doesn't look like work.
quotes.author: Peter Arno
