quotes.quote: We find two great gangs of political speculators, who alternately take possession of the state power and exploit it by the most corrupt ends -- the nation is powerless against these two great cartels of politicians who are ostensibly its servants, but in reality dominate and plunder it.
quotes.author: Friedrich Engels

quotes.quote: The corporate government is heavily influenced by the utility company cartel.
quotes.author: Steven Magee

quotes.quote: Intellectually and compassionately explaining the reason freedom works is required for credibility.
quotes.author: Ron Paul

quotes.quote: The Christians had a better chance against the lions than the American consumer has against the OPEC cartel
quotes.author: Ed Markey

quotes.quote: The economic miracle that has been the United States was not produced by socialized enterprises, by government-unon-industry cartels or by centralized economic planning. It was produced by private enterprises in a profit-and-loss system. And losses were at least as important in weeding out failures, as profits in fostering successes. Let government succor failures, and we shall be headed for stagnation and decline.
quotes.author: Milton Friedman

quotes.quote: Regrettably, to deactivate an entire cartel also proved to be a difficult task for my father and with all the enemies he had, even more.
quotes.author: Juan Pablo Escobar

quotes.quote: Cartels have spread and will spread as long as the world lacks an effective mechanism by which balanced expansion may be achieved without a resulting disruption of prices.
quotes.author: Benjamin Graham

quotes.quote: We must not tolerate oppressive government or industrial oligarchy in the form of monopolies and cartels.
quotes.author: Henry A. Wallace

quotes.quote: See, if you look at the drug war from a purely economic point of view, the role of the government is to protect the drug cartel. That's literally true.
quotes.author: Milton Friedman

quotes.quote: People really feel that, when they go to the gas pump now, that the oil cartel is holding them by the legs and tipping them upside down and shaking money out of their pockets.
quotes.author: Ed Markey

quotes.quote: Never underestimate the effectiveness of a straight cash bribe.
quotes.author: Claud Cockburn

quotes.quote: If cash comes with fame, come fame; if cash comes without fame, come cash.
quotes.author: Jack London

quotes.quote: For better or worse, cash is the oxygen of your business, and you can't last long in any environment without it.
quotes.author: Neil Blumenthal

quotes.quote: In times of crisis, cash is king.
quotes.author: Ricardo Salinas Pliego

quotes.quote: Never underestimate the value of cold cash.
quotes.author: Gregory Nunn

quotes.quote: Cash imposes a huge burden. We don't understand it, as it is not immediately visible. It is a huge burden on society.
quotes.author: Arundhati Bhattacharya

quotes.quote: Either you sit on the pile of cash, or you continue to grow.
quotes.author: Gautam Adani

quotes.quote: Physical money, whether it's checks or cash or credit card, are digitizing in front of us.
quotes.author: Dan Schulman

quotes.quote: CashÂ in must exceedÂ cashÂ out.
quotes.author: Robert Heller

quotes.quote: Cash-payment is not the sole nexus of man with man.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: HoldÂ cashÂ when opportunities are not presenting themselves.
quotes.author: Seth Klarman

quotes.quote: There's nothing wrong withÂ cash. It gives you time to think.
quotes.author: Robert Prechter

quotes.quote: CashÂ combined with courage in a time of crisis is priceless.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: CashÂ is the one gift everyone despises and no one turns down.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: CashÂ is king. Get every drop ofÂ cashÂ you can get and hold onto it.
quotes.author: Jack Welch

quotes.quote: Control yourÂ cash. Stick to your core business. Know your numbers.
quotes.author: Marcus Lemonis

quotes.quote: When bills come due, onlyÂ cashÂ is legal tender. Don't leave home without it.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: Never take your eyes off theÂ cashÂ flow because it's the life blood of business.
quotes.author: Richard Branson

quotes.quote: The only issueÂ cashÂ presents you is the independence of not stressing about funds.
quotes.author: Johnny Carson

quotes.quote: The moreÂ cashÂ that builds up in the treasury, the greater the pressure to piss it away.
quotes.author: Peter Lynch

quotes.quote: There's nothing that will change someone's moral outlook quicker thanÂ cashÂ in large sums.
quotes.author: Larry Flynt

quotes.quote: Havin'Â cashÂ is highly addictive, especially when you're used to havin' money to live with.
quotes.author: Prodigy

quotes.quote: Nothing beats a littleÂ cashÂ in a bear market, of course, and the oldest form ofÂ cashÂ is gold.
quotes.author: James Grant

quotes.quote: CashÂ is cold comfort under these circumstances. But make no mistake about it; It is some comfort.
quotes.author: Georgette Mosbacher

quotes.quote: When people talk aboutÂ cashÂ being king, it's not king if it just sits there and never does anything.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: CashÂ is always the deciding factor in such matters of moral politics; nothing ever gets done unless motivated by commerce or greed.
quotes.author: Jasper Fforde

quotes.quote: If a little does not go, muchÂ cashÂ will not come.
quotes.author: PROVERBS

quotes.quote: Profits are an opinion,Â cashÂ is a fact.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: We wonder, what if we got rid of cash? After all, cash is what keeps terrorists, drug dealers and gun dealers in business.
quotes.author: Erin Burnett

quotes.quote: There's nothing wrong with cash. It gives you time to think.
quotes.author: Robert Prechter

quotes.quote: Cash is the one gift everyone despises and no one turns down.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: Cash is very easy to hide. It's easy to hoard. It's easy to move, especially these large bills.
quotes.author: Kenneth Rogoff

quotes.quote: It's a cash and carry world. Sometimes you pay a little. Mostly it's a lot. Sometimes, it's everything you have.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: Cash is always the deciding factor in such matters of moral politics; nothing ever gets done unless motivated by commerce or greed.
quotes.author: Jasper Fforde

quotes.quote: When you live on cash, you understand the limits of the world around which you navigate each day. Credit leads into a desert with invisible boundaries.
quotes.author: Anton Chekhov

quotes.quote: Certainly, it's very easy to fall in love with cash. If you're going to make all your decisions based on cash, you're going to have a pretty naffy career.
quotes.author: Mark Ruffalo

quotes.quote: People are chasing cash, not happiness. When you chase money, you're going to lose. You're just going to. Even if you get the money, you're not going to be happy.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.quote: Control your cash. Stick to your core business. Know your numbers.
quotes.author: Marcus Lemonis

quotes.quote: When people talk about cash being king, it's not king if it just sits there and never does anything. There are times when cash buys more than other times, and this is one of the other times when it buys a fair amount more, so we use it.
quotes.author: Howard Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: The only issue cash presents you is the independence of not stressing about funds.
quotes.author: Johnny Carson

quotes.quote: Revenue is vanity profit is sanity but cash is king.
quotes.author: D. Frodsham

quotes.quote: In the business world, everyone is paid in two coins: cash and experience. Take the experience first; the cash will come later.
quotes.author: Harold Geneen

quotes.quote: Don't let your mouth write a check that your tail can't cash.
quotes.author: Bo Diddley

quotes.quote: The happy man counts his blessings; the unhappy one counts his cash.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Pay as you go, unless you are going for good.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Nowadays when a woman furnishes her home in Early American Style, it probably means she has paid for in cash.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Credit buying has divided America into two classes; those who have all the latest appliances, and those who pay cash.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Cold cash has a way of making the approach a little warmer.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: It is not how much money a man has. It's what he does with it that counts.
quotes.author: J.Paul Getty

quotes.quote: The only money that counts in life is the money that you earn.
quotes.author: Vincenzo Berghella

quotes.quote: Wisdom is not like money, to be tied up and hidden.
quotes.author: Akan Wisdom

quotes.quote: All the money in the world doesn't mean a thing if you don't have time to enjoy it.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: To pursue morality in the best sense means you ain't going to make as much money as you could be otherwise made, even if you're rich.
quotes.author: Michael Eric Dyson

quotes.quote: Giving is not always about money. All of us, regardless of the size of our incomes or bank accounts, have a wealth of inner resources we can share with others.
quotes.author: Roderick Terry

quotes.quote: To give real service you must add something which cannot be bought or measured with money, and that is sincerity and integrity.
quotes.author: Donald A. Adams

quotes.quote: Money doesn't always bring happiness. People with ten million are no happier than people with nine million.
quotes.author: Hobart Brown

quotes.quote: You can not make excuses and money at the same time.
quotes.author: Dean Naylor

quotes.quote: A person's treatment of money is the most decisive test of his character, how they make it and how they spend it.
quotes.author: James Moffatt

quotes.quote: Time and money spent in helping men do more for themselves is far better than mere giving.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: Attitude is more important than the past, than education, than money, than circumstances, than what people do or say.
quotes.author: Charles Swindoll

quotes.quote: Money is like a sixth sense, without which you cannot make a complete use of the other five.
quotes.author: Geoff Tibballs

quotes.quote: Advertising may be described as the science of arresting the human intelligence long enough to get money from it.
quotes.author: Stephen Leacock

quotes.quote: Money is better than poverty, if only for financial reasons.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: Real happiness is when you marry a girl for love and find out later she has money.
quotes.author: Bob Monkhouse

quotes.quote: If there's no money in poetry, neither is there poetry in money.
quotes.author: Robert Graves

quotes.quote: The gods are those who either have money or do not want it.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.quote: A man is seldom so harmlessly occupied as when he is making money.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Money can't buy happiness, but neither can poverty.
quotes.author: Leo Rosten

quotes.quote: Never invest your money in anything that eats or needs painting.
quotes.author: Billy Rose

quotes.quote: A rich man is nothing but a poor man with money.
quotes.author: W.C. Fields

quotes.quote: If you want to know what God thinks of money, just look at the people he gave it to.
quotes.author: Dorothy Parker

quotes.quote: No one can earn a million dollars honestly.
quotes.author: William Jennings Bryan

quotes.quote: Money isn't the most important thing in life, but it's reasonably close to oxygen on the 'got to have it' scale.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: It is better to live rich than to die rich.
quotes.author: Samuel Jackson

quotes.quote: I don't like money, actually, but it quiets my nerves.
quotes.author: Joe Louis

quotes.quote: We divided ourselves among caste, creed, culture and countries but what is undivided remains most valuable: a mere smile and the love.
quotes.author: Santosh Kalwar

quotes.quote: Caste is a state of mind. It is a disease of mind. The teachings of the Hindu religion are the root cause of this disease. We practice casteism and we observe Untouchability because we are enjoined to do so by the Hindu religion. A bitter thing cannot be made sweet. The taste of anything can be changed. But poison cannot be changed into nectar.
quotes.author: B.R. Ambedkar

quotes.quote: Develop a sense of the brotherhood of man. Look upon each person as your own brother. There is only one caste, the caste of humanity. All of us belong to the human race, so everyone is equal. Therefore, love each one equally.
quotes.author: Sathya Sai Baba

quotes.quote: I have no color prejudices nor caste prejudices nor creed prejudices. All I care to know is that a man is a human being, and that is enough for me; he can't be any worse.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Caste is not a physical object like a wall of bricks or a line of barbed wire which prevents the Hindus from co-mingling and which has, therefore, to be pulled down. Caste is a notion; it is a state of the mind.
quotes.author: B.R. Ambedkar

quotes.quote: The caste systems of sex and race are interdependent and can only be uprooted together.
quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

quotes.quote: Caste is not just a division of labour, it is a division of labourers.
quotes.author: Bhimrao Ramji Ambedkar

quotes.quote: Caste may be bad. Caste may lead to conduct so gross as to be called man’s inhumanity to man. All the same, it must be recognized that the Hindus observe caste not because they are inhuman or wrong-headed. They observe caste because they are deeply religious.
quotes.author: B.R. Ambedkar

quotes.quote: We have not ended racial caste in America; we have merely redesigned it.
quotes.author: Michelle Alexander

quotes.quote: The military caste did not originate as a party of patriots, but as a party of bandits.
quotes.author: Henry Louis Mencken

quotes.quote: Indian leaders are saying, You don't understand our caste system. It's really a lovely thing. People are very happy about it and so on. I don't think that's quite fair.
quotes.author: NT Wright

quotes.quote: I cannot believe there is caste system in society; I cannot believe people are judged on the basis of their prosperity.
quotes.author: Saina Newal

quotes.quote: Caste has killed a public spirit. Caste has destroyed the sense of public charity. Caste has made public opinion impossible. Virtue has become caste-ridden and morality has become caste-bound.
quotes.author: Thus Spoke Ambedkar

quotes.quote: Many characters in the novel are representative of types that exist in India. He represents the caste system in India with an air of superiority, the caste system in India and the people thinking that western things are better.
quotes.author: Anita Desai

quotes.quote: Pity and need Make all flesh kin. There in no caste in blood.
quotes.author: Edwin Arnold

quotes.quote: Caste is the status of a human community in the society not the identity of any person in the society
quotes.author: Jagadeesh Kumar

quotes.quote: The caste system, in all its various forms, is always based on identifiable physical characteristics - sex, color, age.
quotes.author: Roxanne Dunbar Ortiz

quotes.quote: This caste system had grown by the practice of the son always following the business of the father.
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: Class - or the economic status of individuals - is evident in all societies, some very well stratified by a rigid caste system determined by birth.
quotes.author: F. Sionil Jose

quotes.quote: A man's home may seem to be his castle on the outside; inside is more often his nursery.
quotes.author: Clare Boothe Luce

quotes.quote: You can't very well live in a castle while your kin is on the poor side of town and barely have enough food. Some want you to get to the top and rely on you making it for them, too.
quotes.author: Martha Reeves

quotes.quote: The castle in the heights I thought I could not aspire to could so easily be mine now that I don't need it, I've already got my own paradise.
quotes.author: Jay Woodman

quotes.quote: Our castle would crumble before us but that doesn't mean it can't be rebuilt, rebuilt for real, this time without the errors and a little more caution.
quotes.author: Chirag Tulsiani

quotes.quote: A man's home is his wife's castle.
quotes.author: Alexander Chase

quotes.quote: Instead of building castles against your enemies, build bridges for them to come to you!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Everybody is equally weak on the inside, just that some present their ruins as new castles and become kings.
quotes.author: Simona Panova

quotes.quote: Fame is like a castle. Castles are beautiful to dream and wonderful to watch, but too encircled to live in!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: If you are going to build something in the air it is always better to build castles than houses of cards.
quotes.author: Georg C. Lichtenberg

quotes.quote: Building air castles is a harmless business as long as you don't attempt to live in them.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.quote: Our castle is not imposing, but is well built, and surrounded by a very fine garden. I live in the bailiff's house.
quotes.author: Franz Schubert

quotes.quote: There are no rules of architecture for a castle in the clouds.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: There is no castle so strong that it cannot be overthrown by money.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: Living in a castle is objectively romantic.
quotes.author: Lev Grossman

quotes.quote: You make kingdoms and castles on your own.
quotes.author: Stephan Jenkins

quotes.quote: It is as easy to create a castle as a button. It's just a matter of whether you're focused on a castle or a button.
quotes.author: Esther Hicks

quotes.quote: To know your ruling passion, examine your castles in the air.
quotes.author: Richard Whately

quotes.quote: Do not build a castle around one act of kindness; do not build an empire around one act of cruelty.
quotes.author: Paul Bamikole

quotes.quote: How strange and beautiful it looked in the late afternoon light! I can still recapture that first glimpse - see the sheer grey stone walls and towers against the pale yellow sky, the reflected castle stretching towards us on the brimming moat, the floating patches of emerald-green water-weed.
quotes.author: Dodie Smith

quotes.quote: Our excited voices only made the castle seem more silent.
quotes.author: Dodie Smith

quotes.quote: Everyone thinks that I have it all. But it's so empty living behind these castle walls. These castle walls.
quotes.author: Christina Aguilera

quotes.quote:
No turning back cus I'm the king of the castle, the king of the castle
In my mind I'm your majesty.
quotes.author: Jeleel

quotes.quote: Well go get your shovel and we'll dig a deep hole. To bury the castle, bury the castle.
quotes.author: Paramore

quotes.quote: Tell the world I'm saying goodbye. You ask me why. I'm building castles in the sky.
quotes.author: Trey Songz

quotes.quote:
A castle stands ’neath western skies
Gold shields its roof have studded;
The evening sun behind it dies
Midst cloud banks so newly ruddied.
That castle by no hand is wrought:
quotes.author: Bernhard Severin Ingemann

quotes.quote:
Castle, built of marble that was cut and reared with pain
By the poor and starving wretches who were serfs on that domain—
All the jewel-studded windows shone at sunset like a fire,
And a diamond was flashing from the needle of the spire.
quotes.author: Henry Lawson

quotes.quote: A castle built of yore, where once lurked horse and horseman.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Castle is the name given to some of those gigantic rocks, from which the idea of architecture would seem to have originated; though it is remarkable, that most mighty edifices have always been the work of flat countries.
quotes.author: Letitia Elizabeth Landon

quotes.quote: Bright burn the fires in the castle hall. Brightly the fire-dogs stand; But cold is the body and cold the heart of my Lady of Castle Grand.
quotes.author: Paul Laurence Dunbar

quotes.quote: Most people call my style of dress slovenly, I call it extreme casual. If I didn't have a mother and a sister for the times I do have to get dressed, I would be absolutely lost.
quotes.author: Joshua Jackson

quotes.quote: Don't take the casual approach to life. Casualness leads to casualties.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: I look like a casual, laid-back guy, but it's like a circus in my head.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: Whether she's casual or red carpet, she's put together.
quotes.author: Monica Mitro

quotes.quote: Black magic operates most effectively in preconscious, marginal areas. Casual curses are the most effective.
quotes.author: William S. Burroughs

quotes.quote: The tendency of the casual mind is to pick out or stumble upon a sample which supports or defies its prejudices, and then to make it the representative of a whole class.
quotes.author: Walter Lippmann

quotes.quote: She can kill with a smile. She can wound with her eyes. She can ruin your faith with her casual lies. And she only reveals what she wants you to see. She hides like a child, but she's always a woman to me.
quotes.author: Billy Joel

quotes.quote: A human being becomes human not through the casual convergence of certain biological conditions, but through an act of will and love on the part of other people.
quotes.author: Italo Calvino

quotes.quote: Photos convey a point in time, so for casual snapshots I say wear the trends so you have fun images to look back at.
quotes.author: George Katsiopoulos

quotes.quote: I know too well how slowly we edge along sideways to every thing good & brilliant in our lives & how casually and unobservedly we make all our most valued acquaintances.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: In the past it never occurred to me that every casual remark of mine would be snatched up and recorded. Otherwise I would have crept further into my shell.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The Internet has made me very casual with a level of omniscience that was unthinkable a decade ago. I now wonder if God gets bored knowing the answer to everything.
quotes.author: Doudlas Coupland

quotes.quote: When you grow up in a family of languages, you develop a kind of casual fluency, so that languages, though differently colored, all seem transparent to experience.
quotes.author: David Antin

quotes.quote: I don't think fine dining is dying, but I think those rare occasions when you really want the fanciness are diminishing... I think a lot of people are going to find simpler, more casual ways to enjoy an experience.
quotes.author: Mario Batali

quotes.quote: Children are not casual guests in our home. They have been loaned to us temporarily for the purpose of loving them and instilling a foundation of values on which their future lives will be built.
quotes.author: Dr. James Dobson

quotes.quote: A casual stroll through the lunatic asylum shows that faith does not prove anything.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: The dreary flies, lazy and casual, Stick to the ceiling, buzz along the wall. O heart, the spider shuffles from the mould Weaving, between the pinks and grapes, his pall.
quotes.author: Allen Tate

quotes.quote: It's naivety to think that we can just change someone's lifetime belief system using some casual conversations. It cannot happen!
quotes.author: Assegid Habtewold

quotes.quote: I take my fun very seriously, whether it's playing the drums or acting in comedy bits. The need to be disciplined about it, and not take it lightly, and not be too casual, is something I take deeply to heart.
quotes.author: Max Weinberg

quotes.quote: As one knows the poet by his fine music, so one can recognize the liar by his rich rhythmic utterance, and in neither case will the casual inspiration of the moment suffice. Here, as elsewhere, practice must precede perfection.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: I hate a messy kitchen and my more casual husband has come to recognize it's more pleasant for him to clean up after himself rather than deal with me hating a messy kitchen.
quotes.author: Emily Yoffe

quotes.quote: I know I have this kind of teaching element in me, but I don't want to become a 'teacher of theater' because that would formalize something that I'd much rather keep casual.
quotes.author: Richard Griffith

quotes.quote: Every single moment of reality instantly turns into memories; reality can not be caught; we can only catch memories.
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: The truth is a snare: you cannot have it, without being caught. You cannot have the truth in such a way that you catch it, but only in such a way that it catches you.
quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: Catch, then, O catch the transient hour; Improve each moment as it flies!
quotes.author: St. Jerome

quotes.quote: An aware individual stays awake from within to catch such signals and utilizes them to delineate their perception of the world.
quotes.author: Dr Prem Jagyasi

quotes.quote: Do not try to catch the happiness because happiness is not a thing you can catch, it is a thing you can create with your own mind only!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: When you catch a glimpse of your potential, that's when passion is born.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: and when he catches me off guard and says 'i love you' i catch him off guard and say 'i need your help.
quotes.author: David Levithan

quotes.quote: Perfection is not attainable, but if we chase perfection we can catch excellence.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: The Constitution only gives people the right to pursue happiness. You have to catch it yourself.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Life is all memory, except for the one present moment that goes by you so quickly you hardly catch it going.
quotes.author: Tennessee Williams

quotes.quote: There are many things in life that will catch your eye, but only a few will catch your heart...pursue those.
quotes.author: Michael Nolan

quotes.quote: If you chase perfection, you often catch excellence.
quotes.author: William Fowble

quotes.quote: To catch a husband is an art; to hold him is a job.
quotes.author: Simone De Beauvoir

quotes.quote: One does not meet oneself until one catches the reflection from an eye other than human.
quotes.author: Loren Eiseley

quotes.quote: If you believe your catcher is intelligent and you know that he has considerable experience, it is a good thing to leave the game almost entirely in his hands.
quotes.author: Bob Feller

quotes.quote: I've learned that you shouldn't go through life with a catcher's mitt on both hands; you need to be able to throw something back.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: I don't want to embarrass any other catcher by comparing him to Johnny Bench.
quotes.author: Sparky Anderson

quotes.quote: No baseball pitcher would be worth a darn without a catcher who could handle the hot fastball.
quotes.author: Casey Stengel

quotes.quote: You have to have a catcher because if you don't you're likely to have a lot of passed balls.
quotes.author: Casey Stengel

quotes.quote: A catcher and his body are like the outlaw and his horse. He's got to ride that nag till it drops.
quotes.author: Johnny Bench

quotes.quote: The catcher is in the middle of everything. He sees it best.
quotes.author: Johnny Bench

quotes.quote: A catcher must want to catch. He must make up his mind that it isn't the terrible job it is painted, and that he isn't going to say every day, Why, oh why with so many other positions in baseball did I take up this one.
quotes.author: Bill Dickey

quotes.quote: A good catcher is the quarterback, the carburetor, the lead dog, the pulse taker, the traffic cop and sometimes a lot of unprintable things, but no team gets very far without one.
quotes.author: Miller Huggins

quotes.quote: You can tell he cares more about catching than he does hitting, and you really respect that in a catcher.
quotes.author: Robert Fick

quotes.quote: When a catcher has to use his thumb to give signs, that means the pitcher has more than four pitches.
quotes.author: Tim McCarver

quotes.quote: The wind always seems to blow against catchers when they are running.
quotes.author: Joe Garagiola

quotes.quote: As a catcher, you can't be afraid. You gotta make fast decisions.
quotes.author: Joe Garagiola

quotes.quote: The great thing about catchers is that they do a lot of different things, and they're basically overlooked.
quotes.author: Roger Angell

quotes.quote: The catcher is a groundhog. He's a guy squatting down, digging for the ball in the dirt, and sweating under a pile of uncomfortable protective gear while his knees creak.
quotes.author: Joe Garagiola

quotes.quote: A bad catcher can make a great staff average. And a good catcher can make an average staff great.
quotes.author: Robby Wine

quotes.quote: It is all too common forÂ caterpillars to become butterflies and then to maintain that in their youth they had been little butterflies. Maturation makes liars of us all.
quotes.author: George E. Vaillant

quotes.quote: A caterpillar builds a coffin, a butterfly remembers a cocoon
quotes.author: Pochassic

quotes.quote: As theÂ caterpillarÂ undergoes transformation within the cocoon before emerging as a butterfly; likewise, life experiences shape character.
quotes.author: Lorna Jackie Wilson

quotes.quote: When a caterpillar spins its cocoon, it goes through a transformative process and then emerges as a butterfly. Similarly, when we go through a practice of meditation and prayer, we loosen our egoic grip on a sense of self that is separate from the Whole and become vehicles of the emergent evolutionary paradigm of love, peace , compassion, wisdom, harmony and oneness that seeks expression on the planet.
quotes.author: Michael Beckwith

quotes.quote: A caterpillar who seeks to know himself would never become a butterfly.
quotes.author: Andre Gide

quotes.quote: Just when the caterpillar thought â€œI am incapable of moving,â€ it became a butterfly.
quotes.author: Annette Thomas

quotes.quote: There is nothing in a caterpillar that tells you it's going to be a butterfly.
quotes.author: R. Buckminster Fuller

quotes.quote: As the caterpillar chooses the fairest leaves to lay her eggs on, so the priest lays his curse on the fairest joys.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: Adding wings toÂ caterpillars does not create butterflies. It creates awkward and dysfunctionalÂ caterpillars. Butterflies are created through transformation.
quotes.author: Stephanie Pace Marshall

quotes.quote: If a caterpillar doesn't know its future has wings, it hardly experiences itself as land-bound.
quotes.author: Robert Kagan

quotes.quote: Why do the caterpillar and the ant have to be enemies? One eats leaves, and the other eats caterpillars. Oh, I see now.
quotes.author: Jack Handey

quotes.quote: Caterpillar sheds it's skin to find a butterfly within.
quotes.author: Donovan

quotes.quote: When a caterpillar bursts from its cocoon and discovers it has wings, it does not sit idly, hoping to one day turn back. It flies.
quotes.author: Kelseyleigh Reber

quotes.quote: It is in being the caterpillar that you become the butterfly.
quotes.author: John Harricharan

quotes.quote: In nature a repulsive caterpillar turns into a lovely butterfly. But with human beings it is the other way round: a lovely butterfly turns into a repulsive caterpillar.
quotes.author: Anton Chekhov

quotes.quote: As theÂ caterpillarÂ undergoes transformation and emerges as a butterfly; likewise, character undergoes transformation through experiences, aspirations and beliefs. How will you emerge?
quotes.author: Lorna Jackie Wilson

quotes.quote: TheÂ caterpillarÂ dies so the butterfly could be born. And, yet, theÂ caterpillarÂ lives in the butterfly and they are but one. So, when I die, it will be that I have been transformed from theÂ caterpillarÂ of earth to the butterfly of the universe.
quotes.author: John Harricharan

quotes.quote: When a caterpillar looks in the mirror, he sees a butterfly.Â
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.quote: Just when the caterpillar thought the world was over, she became a butterfly.
quotes.author: Barbara Haines Howett

quotes.quote: Caterpillars are nature's own vegetarians.
quotes.author: Anthony T. Hincks

quotes.quote: Everybody knows what a caterpillar is, and it doesn't look anything like a butterfly.
quotes.author: Lynn Margulis

quotes.quote: The caterpillar does all the work, but the butterfly gets all the publicity.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: We are like caterpillars contemplating pupation.
quotes.author: Terence McKenna

quotes.quote: We kill all the caterpillars, then complain there are no butterflies.
quotes.author: John Marsden

quotes.quote: Caterpillars can fly, if they just lighten up.
quotes.author: Scott J. Simmerman Ph.D.

quotes.quote: A caterpillar must endure a season of isolation before it turns into a butterfly. Embrace the time you have alone, it will only make you stronger.
quotes.author: Steven Aitchison

quotes.quote: Why is a caterpillar wrapped in silk while it changes into a butterfly? So the other caterpillars can't hear the screams. Change hurts
quotes.author: Rory Miller

quotes.quote: What the caterpillar calls the end of the world the master calls a butterfly.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: The Caterpillar cannot understand the butterfly.
quotes.author: Timothy Leary

quotes.quote: TheÂ caterpillarÂ turns to liquid before turning into a butterfly. Liquid. Thus washing away any speck of hisÂ caterpillarÂ self as he lies completely vulnerable to his environment in his chrysalis shell. One good solid gust of wind and theÂ caterpillars boned.
quotes.author: The Hippie

quotes.quote: Catfish has a nice firm texture and mild flavor.
quotes.author: Tom Douglas

quotes.quote: The catfish is plenty good enough fish for anyone.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: The only thing you can do to makeÂ catfishÂ edible is fry them.
quotes.author: Blake Shelton

quotes.quote: Catfish's mild taste adapts well to a wide array of flavors, especially strong assertive ones, which is why you used to see it 'blackened' Cajun style on so many restaurant menus - a trick which soon became a tired cliche.
quotes.author: Tom Douglas

quotes.quote: It is absurd for a man to kill an elephant. It is not brutal, it is not heroic, and certainly it is not easy. It is just one of those preposterous things that men do like putting a dam across a great river, one tenth of whose volume could engulf the whole of mankind without disturbing the domestic life of a single catfish.
quotes.author: Beryl Markham

quotes.quote: A dream of life comes to me, like a catfish dancing on the end of the line.
quotes.author: Bruce Springsteen

quotes.quote: My husband calls me 'catfish.' He says I'm all mouth and no brains.
quotes.author: Dolly Parton

quotes.quote: The South, to me, is fried chicken and catfish caviar that's grits and good looking women.
quotes.author: Erk Russell

quotes.quote: We have sat on the riverbank and caught catfish with pin hooks. The time has come to harpoon a whale.
quotes.author: John Hope

quotes.quote: She'd also called me brave unless she was talking to the catfish.
quotes.author: Percy Jackson

quotes.quote: What's the difference between a politician and a catfish? One is a wide mouthed, bottom feeding, slime sucker and the other is a fish.
quotes.author: Preston Manning

quotes.quote: I wonder if there are any catfish in this pond? It seems like a perfect place for them.
quotes.author: Richard Brautigan

quotes.quote: If I go down in for anything in history, I would like to be known as the person who convinced the American people that catfish is one of the finest eating fishes in the world.
quotes.author: Willard Scott

quotes.quote: One catfish does not make a creek, nor one hero a nation. The waves do not make the sea, but the sea furnishes forth the waves.
quotes.author: William Cowper Brann

quotes.quote: The cat could very well be man's best friend but would never stoop to admitting it.
quotes.author: Doug Larson

quotes.quote: There is something about the presence of a cat... that seems to take the bite out of being alone.
quotes.author: Louis J. Camuti

quotes.quote: Cats come and go without ever leaving.
quotes.author: Martha Curtis

quotes.quote: A cat bitten once by a snake dreads even rope.
quotes.author: Arab Proverb

quotes.quote: The cat is mighty dignified until the dog comes by.
quotes.author: Southern Folk Saying

quotes.quote: I have studied many philosophers and many cats. The wisdom of cats is infinitely superior.
quotes.author: Hippolyte Taine

quotes.quote: Keep an eye on the cat and another on the frying pan.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: All cats love fish but fear to wet their paws.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: What greater gift than the love of a cat?
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: If only cats grew into kittens.
quotes.author: Robert A. M. Stern

quotes.quote: No matter how much cats fight, there always seem to be plenty of kittens.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Time spent with cats is never wasted.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: Lettin' the cat outta the bag is a whole lot easier 'n puttin' it back in.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: Cats are designated friends.
quotes.author: Norman Corwin

quotes.quote: A cat is the only domestic animal I know who toilet trains itself and does a damned impressive job of it.
quotes.author: Joseph Epstein

quotes.quote: Cats are smarter than dogs. You can't get eight cats to pull a sled through snow.
quotes.author: Jeff Valdez

quotes.quote: Cats never strike a pose that isn't photogenic.
quotes.author: Lillian Jackson Braun

quotes.quote: A cat that jumps on a hot stove will never jump on a hot stove again. Neither will it jump on a cold stove.
quotes.author: Michael Cameron

quotes.quote: Cats know how to obtain food without labor, shelter without confinement, and love without penalties.
quotes.author: W.L George

quotes.quote: As every cat owner knows, nobody owns a cat.
quotes.author: Ellen Perry Berkeley

quotes.quote: Cats are always elegant.
quotes.author: John Weitz

quotes.quote: A cat can purr its way out of anything.
quotes.author: Donna Mccrohan

quotes.quote: Cats are at home everywhere where one feeds them.
quotes.author: German Proverb

quotes.quote: Happy is the home with at least one cat.
quotes.author: Italian Proverb

quotes.quote: A cat pent up becomes a lion.
quotes.author: PROVERBS

quotes.quote: You cannot look at a sleeping cat and feel tense.
quotes.author: Jane Pauley

quotes.quote: Cats are connoisseurs of comfort.
quotes.author: James Herriot

quotes.quote: Cats are intended to teach us that not everything in nature has a function.
quotes.author: Garrison Keillor

quotes.quote: Cats will outsmart dogs every time.
quotes.author: John Grogan

quotes.quote: Scalded cats fear even cold water.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: One of the ways in which cats show happiness is by sleeping.
quotes.author: Cleveland Amory

quotes.quote: Cats are connoisseurs of comfort.
quotes.author: James Herriot

quotes.quote: Who will not feed the cats must feed the mice and rats.
quotes.author: German Proverb

quotes.quote: The quiet cat catches the mouse.
quotes.author: Japanese Proverb

quotes.quote: It is better to feed one cat than to feed many mice.
quotes.author: Norweigan Proverb

quotes.quote: He has a good pledge of the cat who has her skin.
quotes.author: French Proverb

quotes.quote: Cats can obviously rise to considerable mental heights, at least when they want to satisfy their lower instincts.
quotes.author: Akif Pirincci and Rolf Degen

quotes.quote: Cats are rather delicate creatures and they are subject to a good many different ailments, but I never heard of one who suffered from insomnia.
quotes.author: Joseph Wood Krutch

quotes.quote: Cat said, 'I am not a friend, and I am not a servant. I am the Cat who walks by himself.'
quotes.author: Rudyard Kipling

quotes.quote: It is a very inconvenient habit of kittens...that whatever you say to them, they always purr.
quotes.author: Lewis Carroll

quotes.quote: Cats invented self-esteem.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: All cats were at first wild, but were at length tamed by the industry of mankind; it is a Beast of prey, even the tame one, more especially the wild, it being the opinion of many nothing but a diminutive Lyon.
quotes.author: William Salmon

quotes.quote: Scratching, petting, or rubbing to a cat is a sign of unending, in fact unendable, infancy.
quotes.author: Roger Caras

quotes.quote: The cat is not in the long run anxious to please.
quotes.author: T.O.Beachcroft

quotes.quote: Cats have a sense of humor, as is shown in their extreme love of play. A middle-aged cat will often play as unreservedly as a kitten, though he knows perfectly well it is only a game.
quotes.author: William Lyon Phelps

quotes.quote: The cat which is a solitary beast is single-minded and goes its way alone, but, the dog, like his master, is confused in his mind.
quotes.author: H.G. Wells

quotes.quote: Movement is terribly important to a cat...Nothing works quite so well as an object of jumpable size moving away. For cats, that is virtually impossible to resist.
quotes.author: Roger Caras

quotes.quote: Cats seem to go on the principle that it never does any harm to ask for what you want.
quotes.author: Joseph Wood Krutch

quotes.quote: Confront a cat with something he has never seen before and his first reaction will almost invariably be one not of fear but of curiosity.
quotes.author: Michael Joseph

quotes.quote: Cat sentimentality is a human thing. Cats are indifferent, their minds can't comprehend the concept 'I shall die,' they just go on living.
quotes.author: Gavin Ewart

quotes.quote: Cats have a consuming passion for watching human beings.
quotes.author: Akif Pirincci and Rolf Degen

quotes.quote: The cat lives alone. He has no need of society. He obeys only when he wishes, he pretends to sleep the better to see and scratches everything he can scratch.
quotes.author: Francois Rene

quotes.quote: A cat is not merely diverted by everything that moves but is convinced that all nature is occupied exclusively with catering to her diversion.
quotes.author: Francois Auguste Paradis de Moncrif

quotes.quote: Cats are autocrats of naked self-interest.
quotes.author: Camille Paglia

quotes.quote: When I play with my cat, who knows whether she isn't amusing herself with me more than I am with her?
quotes.author: Montaigne

quotes.quote: Cats, no less liquid than their shadows, / Offer no angels to the wind. / They slip, diminished, neat, through loopholes / Less than themselves.
quotes.author: A.S.J. Tessimond

quotes.quote: Cats seem to go on a principle that it never does any harm to ask for what you want.
quotes.author: Joseph Wood Krutch

quotes.quote: Cats, I always think, only lump into your lap to check if you are cold enough, yet, to eat.
quotes.author: Anne Enright

quotes.quote: If a fish is a movement embodied, given shape, then a cat is a diagram and pattern of subtle air.
quotes.author: Doris Lessing

quotes.quote: No cat purrs unless someone is around to listen.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Marshall Thomas

quotes.quote: Cat: A deceitful animal and when enraged extremely spiteful.
quotes.author: Noah Webster

quotes.quote: A home without a cat and a well-fed, well-petted, and properly-revered cat may be a perfect home, perhaps, but how can it prove its title?
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: People like pets to possess the same qualities they do. Cats are irresponsible and recognize no authority, yet are completely dependent on others for their material needs. Cats cannot be made to do anything useful. Cats are mean for the fun of it. In fact, cats possess so many of the same qualities as people that it is often hard to tell the people and the cats apart.
quotes.author: PJ O'Rourke

quotes.quote: If the cat waits for long hours, silent beside the crack of the wainscot, it is for pure pleasure. Cats do not keep the mice away; it is my belief that they preserve them for the chase.
quotes.author: Oswald Barron

quotes.quote: Anyone who has lived on terms of comparative equality with a cat knows that he will show his intelligence fifty times a day. To be sure this intelligence is usually of the variety called selfish.
quotes.author: Carl Van Vechten

quotes.quote: A fool and his money are quickly parted.
quotes.author: J. Bridges

quotes.quote: A watched pot never boils.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A word once let out of the cage cannot be whistled back again.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: Always be prepared.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Be careful what you ask for; you may get it.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Be careful what you wish for.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Be ever vigilant but never suspicious.
quotes.author: English (on vigilance)

quotes.quote: Because we focused on the snake, we missed the scorpion.
quotes.author: Egyptian (on caution and care)

quotes.quote: Better the devil you know than the one you don't
quotes.author: R. Taverner

quotes.quote: Better to be safe than sorry.
quotes.author: Samuel Lover

quotes.quote: Beware a rickety wall, a savage dog and a quarrelsome person.
quotes.author: Iranian (on caution and care)

quotes.quote: Beware the door with too many keys.
quotes.author: Portuguese (on vigilance)

quotes.quote: Beware the fury of a patient man.
quotes.author: John Dryden

quotes.quote: Beware the Greeks bearing gifts.
quotes.author: Virgil

quotes.quote: Beware the person with nothing to lose.
quotes.author: Italian (on prudence)

quotes.quote: Buyer beware.
quotes.author: Latin Proverb "Caveat emptor"

quotes.quote: Choose your neighbors before you buy your house.
quotes.author: Hausa (West African) (on planning)

quotes.quote: Creditors have better memories than debtors.
quotes.author: English (on business)

quotes.quote: Do not allow sins to get beyond creeping.
quotes.author: Hawaiian (on the conduct of life)

quotes.quote: Don't be caught flat
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Don't sail out farther than you can row back.
quotes.author: Danish (on prudence)

quotes.quote: Easy does it.
quotes.author: T. Taylor

quotes.quote: Eggs have no business dancing with stones.
quotes.author: Haitian (on prudence)

quotes.quote: Eternal vigilance is the price of liberty.
quotes.author: John Philpot Curran

quotes.quote: Fear the Greeks bearing gifts.
quotes.author: Virgil

quotes.quote: Fine feathers don't make fine birds.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: Fish don't get caught in deep water.
quotes.author: Malay (on caution and care)

quotes.quote: Forewarn'd, forearm'd.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Great good nature without prudence is a great misfortune.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: He that scatters thorns, let him not go barefoot.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Hear reason or she will make you feel her.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: If you are going a long way, go slowly.
quotes.author: Ilocano (Filipino) (on journeys)

quotes.quote: If you buy what you don't need, you steal from yourself.
quotes.author: Swedish (on thrift)

quotes.quote: If you call one wolf, you invite the pack.
quotes.author: Bulgarian (on caution and care)

quotes.quote: Ill weeds grow fast.
quotes.author: John Heywood

quotes.quote: It's an ill wind that blows no good.
quotes.author: John Heywood

quotes.quote: It's but little good you'll do a
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: Keep no more cats than will catch mice.
quotes.author: J. Dare

quotes.quote: Look before you leap.
quotes.author: John Heywood

quotes.quote: Measure a thousand times; cut once.
quotes.author: Turkish (on caution and care)

quotes.quote: Mind your p's and q's.
quotes.author: English Proverb

quotes.quote: Never reveal the bottom of your purse or the depth of your mind.
quotes.author: Italian (on caution and care)

quotes.quote: Nothing seems expensive on credit.
quotes.author: Czech (on indebtedness)

quotes.quote: Once a word is spoken, it flies, you can't catch it.
quotes.author: Russian Proverb

quotes.quote: Once bitten, twice shy.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: One must not play on the nose of a sleeping bear.
quotes.author: German (on prudence)

quotes.quote: One thing leads to another.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Only a fool tests the water with both feet.
quotes.author: African Proverb

quotes.quote: Out of the frying pan, into the fire.
quotes.author: John Heywood

quotes.quote: Penny wise, pound foolish.
quotes.author: Robert Burton

quotes.quote: Pick your poison.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Sleep tight, don't let the bedbugs bite.
quotes.author: Colonial American Saying

quotes.quote: Sleeping people can't fall down.
quotes.author: Japanese (on caution and care)

quotes.quote: Tap even a stone bridge before crossing it.
quotes.author: Korean (on vigilance)

quotes.quote: The crab that walks too far, falls into the pot.
quotes.author: Haitian (on caution and care)

quotes.quote: The hardest person to awaken is the person already awake.
quotes.author: Tagalog (Filipino)(on vigilance)

quotes.quote: The honey is sweet but the bee has a sting.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: The prudent embark when the sea is calm
quotes.author: Maori (on prudence)

quotes.quote: The second word makes the quarrel.
quotes.author: Japanese Proverb

quotes.quote: Walls have ears.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: When in doubt, do nothing.
quotes.author: George John Whyte-Melville

quotes.quote: Whoever has a tail of straw should not get too close to the fire.
quotes.author: Latin American (on caution and care)

quotes.quote: You never know what lies right around the corner.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Distrust and caution are the parents of security.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Caution is the eldest child of wisdom.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Choose your friends with caution. Plan your future with purpose, and frame your life with faith.
quotes.author: Thomas S. Monson

quotes.quote: It is a good thing to learn caution by from the misfortunes of others.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: Be slow of tongue and quick of eye.
quotes.author: Miguel de Cervantes

quotes.quote: Caution is the lower story of prudence.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: Every step of life shows much caution is required.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: The scars of others should teach us caution.
quotes.author: St. Jerome

quotes.quote: Among mortals second thoughts are wisest.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: Caution is the confidential agent of selfishness.
quotes.author: Woodrow Wilson

quotes.quote: Caution comes too late when we are in the midst of evils.
quotes.author: Walter Scott

quotes.quote: Caution always, but when a man acts he should act suddenly and with decision.
quotes.author: Louis L'Amour

quotes.quote: And let us with Caution indulge the supposition that morality can be maintained without religion.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: Caution is the path to mediocrity. Gliding, passionless mediocrity is all that most people think they can achieve.
quotes.author: Frank Herbert

quotes.quote: A little caution outflanks a large cavalry.
quotes.author: Otto von Bismarck

quotes.quote: One of the rules of caution is not to be too cautious.
quotes.author: Bahya ibn Paquda

quotes.quote: It requires as much caution to tell the truth as to conceal it.
quotes.author: It requires as much caution to tell the truth as to conceal it.

quotes.quote: More caution and perhaps more restraint are necessary in breaking a fast than in keeping it.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Deliberate with caution, but act with decision and yield with graciousness, or oppose with firmness.
quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.quote: Throw caution to the wind and just do it.
quotes.author: Carrie Underwood

quotes.quote: Of all forms of caution, caution in love is perhaps the most fatal to true happiness.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: What thou seest, speak of with caution.
quotes.author: Solon

quotes.quote: Caution, though very often wasted is a good risk to take.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.quote: What we call the wisdom that comes with age is usually simple caution.
quotes.author: Jessica Zafra

quotes.quote: We are what we pretend to be, so we must be careful what we pretend to be.
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.quote: Be careful who you trust, the devil was once an angel.
quotes.author: Ziad K. Abdelnour

quotes.quote: Be careful who you call your friends. I’d rather have four quarters than one hundred pennies.
quotes.author: Al Capone

quotes.quote: Be careful the environment you choose for it will shape you; be careful the friends you choose for you will become like them.
quotes.author: W. Clement Stone

quotes.quote: Be careful not to compromise what you want most for what you want now.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: ‎Be careful not to keep your eyes glued to detail. Stand far enough away to get a perspective of the whole.
quotes.author: Jean Webster

quotes.quote: If you are after truth, leave your cave!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Never forget where you came from. That's what I think when I walk into a cave.
quotes.author: Demetri Martin

quotes.quote: If there hadn't been women we'd still be squatting in a cave eating raw meat, because we made civilization in order to impress our girlfriends.
quotes.author: Orson Welles

quotes.quote: I'd rather live in a cave with a view of a palace than live in a palace with a view of a cave.
quotes.author: Karl Pilkington

quotes.quote: To make any future that we dreamt up real requires creative scientists, engineers, and technologists to make it happen. If people are not within your midst who dream about tomorrow - with the capacity to bring tomorrow into the present - then the country might as well just recede back into the cave because that's where we're headed.
quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quotes.quote: The sun to me is dark / And silent as the moon / When she deserts the night / Hid in her vacant interlunar cave.
quotes.author: (Samson Argonistes) John Milton

quotes.quote: Behold! human beings living in a underground den ... Like ourselves ... they see only their own shadows, or the shadows of one another, which the fire throws on the opposite wall of the cave.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: I have spent hours kicking myself for not fighting past Dad's reserve, for not going into that cave where he lived and rooting him out.
quotes.author: William Plummer

quotes.quote: The right hon Gentleman...has retired into what may be called his political Cave of Adullam—and he has called about him every one that was in distress and every one that was discontented.
quotes.author: John Bright

quotes.quote: Dullness is always an irresistible temptation for brilliancy, and stupidity is the permanent Bestia Trionfans that calls wisdom from its cave.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Could curses kill, as doth the mandrake's groan. / I would invent as bitter searching terms, / As curst, as harsh, and horrible to hear, / Delivered strongly through my fixed teeth, / With full as many signs of deadly hate, / As lean-faced envy in her loathsome cave. / My tongue should stumble in mine earnest words.
quotes.author: (Henry VI) William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: The old man of the Earth stooped over the floor of the cave, raised a huge stone from it, and left it leaning. It disclosed a great hole that went plumb-down. "That is the way," he said. "But there are no stairs." "You must throw yourself in. There is no other way."
quotes.author: George Macdonald

quotes.quote: There have always been times when children wished for superhuman powers. Cave children probably pretended to be superhunters, just as children today pretend about being superstrong or superfast.
quotes.author: Fred Rogers

quotes.quote: Live in the midst of the battle of life. Anyone can keep calm in a cave or when asleep. Stand in the whirl and madness of action and reach the Center. If you have found the Center, you cannot be moved.
quotes.author: Vivekananda

quotes.quote: Few people believe their inherent mind is Buddha. Most will not take this seriously, and therefore are cramped. They are wrapped up in illusions, cravings, resentments, and other afflictions, all because they love the cave of ignorance.
quotes.author: Fenyang Shanzhao

quotes.quote: Few understand the power of thought. If a man goes into a cave, shuts himself in, and thinks one really great thought and dies, that thought will penetrate the walls of that cave, vibrate through space and at last permeate the whole human race.
quotes.author: Vivekananda

quotes.quote: Welcome out of the cave, my friend. It's a bit colder out here, but the stars are just beautiful.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: In a place where comfort shouldn't be / I found comfort and tranquility / I found friends that mean so much to me, / In a place I never thought I'd be. / The cave's never / Coming down on me. / The cave really / Means so much to me / Cause the cave, it only gives / I'm glad the cave is where I live.
quotes.author: Richard Barbieri

quotes.quote: I feel no sympathy, / You live inside a cave! / You barely get by, the rest of us are trying, / There's no need to apologize, / I've got no time for feeling sorry!
quotes.author: Hayley Williams

quotes.quote: In an opal dream cave I found a fairy: / Her wings were frailer than flower petals, / Frailer far than snowflakes. / She was not frightened, but poised on my finger, / Then delicately walked into my hand. / I shut the two palms of my hands together / And held her prisoner. / I carried her out of the opal cave, / Then opened my hands. / First she became thistledown, / Then a mote in a sunbeam, / Then--nothing at all. / Empty now is my opal dream cave.
quotes.author: Katherine Mansfield

quotes.quote: The frame of the cave leads to the frame of man.
quotes.author: Stephen Gardiner

quotes.quote: One just principle from the depths of a cave is more powerful than an army.
quotes.author: Jose Marti

quotes.quote: Born in a cellar, and living in a garret.
quotes.author: Samuel Foote

quotes.quote: Everywhere you hang your hat is home. Home is the bright cave under the hat.
quotes.author: Lance Morrow

quotes.quote: The cave you fear to enter holds the treasure you seek.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: We are always searching for a cave to fit in.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: Lightning doesn't strike through a cave.
quotes.author: Goitsemang Mvula

quotes.quote: One is never got out of the cave, one comes out of it.
quotes.author: Simone Weil

quotes.quote: We think there is endless time to live but we never know which moment is last. So share, care, love, and celebrate every moment of life.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Celebrate life in all its glory - challenge yourself to let the routine sing, and the new dance.
quotes.author: Maximillian Degenerez

quotes.quote: If we celebrate life with all its contradictions, embrace, experience, and ultimately live with it, a chance exists for a spiritual life filled not only with pain and untidiness, but also with joy, community, and creativity.
quotes.author: Derrick Jensen

quotes.quote: Once you start celebrating the little victories in life, you will realize just how infinite they truly are.
quotes.author: Alicia Emamdee

quotes.quote: While we are living in the present, we must celebrate life every day, knowing that we are becoming history with every work, every action, every deed.
quotes.author: Mattie Stepanek

quotes.quote: At the end of the day, the fact we have the courage to still be standing is reason enough to celebrate.
quotes.author: Meredith Grey

quotes.quote: A simple celebration, a gathering of friends; here is wishing you great happiness, a joy that never ends.
quotes.author: Zahid Abas

quotes.quote: The more you praise and celebrate your life, the more there is in life to celebrate.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Celebrate Life. Care for others and share whatever you have with those less fortunate than you. Broaden your vision, for the whole world belongs to you.
quotes.author: Sri Sri Ravi Shankar

quotes.quote: Being alive everyday is an enough blessing to celebrate everyday.
quotes.author: Terry Mark

quotes.quote: The meaning of life is not celebrating your birth, it is celebrating your work.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: You may never get back this life, so do something in this lifetime worthy of celebration.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: Life is worth celebrating and worth living even though we're all headed to the same hole at the end of the day.
quotes.author: Wayne Coyne

quotes.quote: Life is short, and it is up to you to make it sweet.
quotes.author: Sarah Louise Delany

quotes.quote: Happiness requires that we celebrate the positive sides of life. Peace requires that we accept both the positive and the negative outcomes of life and move on.
quotes.author: Terry Mark

quotes.quote: Celebrating your achievements and applauding your triumphs is a sure way to refuel your enthusiasm and keep yourself motivated for your future endeavours.
quotes.author: Roopleen

quotes.quote: Sometimes it seems, we are so diminished by our own shortcomings we are unable to celebrate the success of others.
quotes.author: Carlos Wallace

quotes.quote: Just celebrate the life you had, not the life you could've had.
quotes.author: Magic Johnson

quotes.quote: Celebrate Life. To truly live, Celebrate each day of Life. Let each day be a Festival of Joy.
quotes.author: RVM

quotes.quote: Achievements are precious and timeless, just like the precious metal platinum. And what better way to celebrate milestones in your life than with precious platinum.
quotes.author: Vijender Singh

quotes.quote: Live life when you have it. Life is a splendid gift-there is nothing small about it.
quotes.author: Florence Nightingale

quotes.quote: Every time someone in your life dies, you realize you're not invincible and you have to wonder if we're celebrating life or if we're mourning a death.
quotes.author: Emily Bett Rickards

quotes.quote: Being single is about celebrating and appreciating your own space that you're in.
quotes.author: Kelly Rowland

quotes.quote: Life has meaning only in the struggle. Triumph or defeat is in the hands of the Gods. So let us celebrate the struggle!
quotes.author: Stevie Wonder

quotes.quote: It is no bad thing celebrating a simple life.
quotes.author: J. R. R. Tolkien

quotes.quote: It is not our differences that divide us. It is our inability to recognize, accept, and celebrate those differences.
quotes.author: Audre Lorde

quotes.quote: Celebrating faith over reason is merely a way of denying what is, in favor of embracing any whim that strikes your fancy.
quotes.author: Terry Goodkind

quotes.quote: You can choose to focus on the surprises and pleasures, or the frustrations. And you can choose to appreciate the smallest scraps of experience, the everyday moments, or to value only the grandest, most stirring ones. Ultimately, the real question is whether you want to be happy.
quotes.author: Chris Hadfield

quotes.quote: From the Christian prophets and disciples to the prohibition of wine in the world's second largest religion, Islam, their stories include wine as a joyous part of celebrating life.
quotes.author: Kate Feduccia

quotes.quote: Write it on your heart that everyday is the best day of the year.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Like fireworks, this universe is a celebration and you are the spectator contemplating the eternal Fourth of July of your absolute splendor.
quotes.author: Francis Lucille

quotes.quote: Greet each day with your eyes open to beauty, your mind open to change, and your heart open to love.
quotes.author: Paula Finn

quotes.quote: Stop worrying about the potholes in the road and celebrate the journey!
quotes.author: Barbara Hoffman

quotes.quote: Each day of your life, as soon as you open your eyes in the morning, you can square away for a happy and successful day!
quotes.author: George Matthew

quotes.quote: If you are not playful you are not alive.
quotes.author: David Hockney

quotes.quote: It is not only the happy moments that should be talked about, but every moment. All the moments that make up a human being have to be written about, talked about, painted, danced, in order to really talk about life.
quotes.author: Rita Dove

quotes.quote: The whole world is an art gallery when you're mindful. There are beautiful things everywhere--and they're free.
quotes.author: Charles Tart

quotes.quote: Stop sitting there with your hands folded, looking on, doing nothing: Get into action and live this full and glorious life now. You have to do it now.
quotes.author: Eileen Caddy

quotes.quote: Take the reins of your life in your hands everyday. Get up and put a smile on your face, and feel grateful for this gift that is your life.
quotes.author: Susan L. Taylor

quotes.quote: Find ecstasy in life; the more sense of living is joy enough.
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.quote: Our wonder-filled journey can either be spent celebrating the scenery along the route or grieving the path not taken. The potential for excellence in out lives is in each of us.
quotes.author: Sherry Voila

quotes.quote: Life is the gift / Of my God / He gave me / And when he would that / He will take it back.
quotes.author: Ehsan Sehgal

quotes.quote: Life is as sacrosanct as the Omnipotent Creator; go and wholesomely lead it.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: Life is a vivid rainbow; the more you profusely absorb it; the more it stupendously inundates your despicably collapsing existence; with an unsurpassable kaleidoscope; of beauty; color; and amiably charming humanity,
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: Celebrating the life no matter who you are / If you've been working hard give yourself a round of applause / Bravo bravo bravo.
quotes.author: Claude Kelly

quotes.quote: Tired of being cramped up in the house / We were simply celebrating life / Off from work today so it's alright.
quotes.author: Mike City

quotes.quote: Do you remember celebrating life each day? / Do you remember thinking special is your way / And now you’re not that careless and brave.
quotes.author: Ilya Popov

quotes.quote: Be the celebrators, celebrate! Already there is too much—the flowers have bloomed, the birds are singing, the sun is there in the sky—celebrate it! You are breathing and you are alive and you have consciousness, celebrate it!
quotes.author: Osho

quotes.quote: Dance madly as if all of life is meant for dancing and celebrating.
quotes.author: Osho

quotes.quote: Whichever season you’re in, rejoice and celebrate your life as you might not experience it twice.
quotes.author: Joan Ambu

quotes.quote: Smile even though you have nothing to celebrate. Celebrate the fact that you can smile. Some people don't have nearly half of what you have and they are smiling just because they can.
quotes.author: Germany Kent

quotes.quote: Each day offers a reason to celebrate. Find it and experience true bliss.
quotes.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quotes.quote: Celebrate your own life, you are your own light
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: God gave us the gift of life; it is up to us to give ourselves the gift of living well. Give ourselves the gift of living well
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: I think what we owe each other is a celebration of life and to replace fear and hopelessness with fearlessness and joy.
quotes.author: Vandana Shiva

quotes.quote: In life, one has a choice to take one of two paths: to wait for some special day-or to celebrate each special day.
quotes.author: Rasheed Ogunlaru

quotes.quote: Life is what you celebrate. All of it. Even its end.
quotes.author: Joanne Harris

quotes.quote: When you cry and weep, when you are miserable, you are alone. When you celebrate, the whole existence participates with you. Only in celebration do we meet the ultimate, the eternal. Only in celebration do we go beyond the circle of birth and death.
quotes.author: Rajneesh

quotes.quote: Every day is a good day. There is something to learn, care and celebrate.
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: One thing that I can say is that I think it's important that there's some sort of celebration of beautiful women that isn't just exploitive.
quotes.author: Emily Ratajkowski

quotes.quote: Celebration happens when the mind unites with the spirit.
quotes.author: Sri Sri Ravi Shankar

quotes.quote: Each something is a celebration of the nothing that supports it.
quotes.author: John Cage

quotes.quote: Love can make a great celebration out of your life - but only love, not lust, not ego, not possessiveness, not jealousy, not dependence.
quotes.author: Rajneesh

quotes.quote: Any celebration meal to which guests are invited, be they family or friends, should be an occasion for generous hospitality.
quotes.author: Julian Baggini

quotes.quote: Celebration comes when the common features of life are redeemed.
quotes.author: Richard J. Foster

quotes.quote: Celebration is my attitude, unconditional to what life brings.
quotes.author: Rajneesh

quotes.quote: When you jump for joy, beware that no one moves the ground from beneath your feet.
quotes.author: Stanislaw J.Lec

quotes.quote: Celebration has many different outfits but she always wears the same beautiful dancing shoes.
quotes.author: Mary Anne Radmacher

quotes.quote: Celebration is a confrontation, giving attention to the transcendent meaning of one's actions.
quotes.author: Abraham Joshua Heschel

quotes.quote: The people you save won't celebrate you. They'll gather the wood and cheer while you burn.
quotes.author: Julie Berry

quotes.quote: To live is to be marked. To live is to change, to acquire the words of a story, and that is the only celebration we mortals really know.
quotes.author: Barbara Kingsolver

quotes.quote: Every choice we make can be a celebration of the world we want.
quotes.author: Frances Moore Lappe

quotes.quote: The more you praise and celebrate your life, the more there is in life to celebrate.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Without true celebration discipline is obnoxious.
quotes.author: Adi Da Samraj

quotes.quote: Perfect is very boring, and if you happen to have a different look, that's a celebration of human nature, I think. If we were all symmetrical and perfect, life would be very dull.
quotes.author: Natalie Dormer

quotes.quote: Celebration is the hymn and sacred dance.
quotes.author: Jonathan Lockwood Huie

quotes.quote: Art is a celebration of life, intended by the artist to put the spectator in touch with the divine.
quotes.author: Joseph Plaskett

quotes.quote: If you can't celebrate your success, appreciate your failure. Since life is all about celebration and appreciation.
quotes.author: M.F. Moonzajer

quotes.quote: I prefer just being with people I like. That's my way of celebrating.
quotes.author: Michael Jackson

quotes.quote: Every moment of your life is either a test or a celebration.
quotes.author: David Deida

quotes.quote: Celebrations infuse life with passion and purpose. They summon the human spirit.
quotes.author: Terrence E. Deal

quotes.quote: Everything in this creation is a sign of celebration.
quotes.author: Sri Sri Ravi Shankar

quotes.quote: If you want to celebrate a happy occasion, Do it by helping those who are in need.
quotes.author: Mohith Agadi

quotes.quote: Celebration is an act of impressing sadistic someone residing in you.
quotes.author: Santosh Kalwar

quotes.quote: I will follow is a celebration of life. Sometimes when you lose something, you understand its value more than when you had it. The same is true for life.
quotes.author: Salli Richardson

quotes.quote: Today is a day for celebration, no matter what your religion or your culture. Learn to celebrate today: celebrate the fact that you are alive, that you are breathing, that you have friends, family, angels and spirit guides in your life.
quotes.author: Margaret Neylon

quotes.quote: Start out by celebrating the best in the situation because it allows us to fall in love with it, which connects us to our passion and emancipates the energy.
quotes.author: Dewitt Jones

quotes.quote: Take the time to celebrate stillness and silence and see the joy that the world can bring, simply.
quotes.author: Tony Curl

quotes.quote: Live a life of discipline and live a life of celebration.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: The celebration you cannot practice it or anything. It's a moment when the excitement of your goal make you react to the moment.
quotes.author: Peter Bondra

quotes.quote: Celebration is best done in the company of others who can rejoice with us over God's goodness.
quotes.author: Max Anders

quotes.quote: The meaning of life is not celebrating your birth, it is celebrating your work.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: Creativity is a celebration of one's grandeur, one's sense of making anything possible.
quotes.author: Joseph C Zinker

quotes.quote: There's always been a celebration of what is that moment, whoever I am at that moment in my life. [It] is a very real way of looking at beauty.
quotes.author: Charlize Theron

quotes.quote: The man who takes to drink when his wife leaves him should be careful not to overdo the celebration.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Sometimes when a man takes a day off to celebrate, he needs another day off to get over it.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Some people's idea of a celebration is to enjoy a Christmas they'll never forget and a New Year's they can't remember.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: When an alcoholic wants to celebrate an occasion, does he go out and get sober.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Celebration is forgetting oneself.
quotes.author: Amma

quotes.quote: The basis of all celebration is the faith that the self inside of me and conciousness behind the universe are one and the same.
quotes.author: Amma

quotes.quote: When we are always enthusiastic, happy and surrendered to God, life becomes a blissful celebration.
quotes.author: Amma

quotes.quote: Just as we celebrate birthdays, let death and dying become a time of great celebration and bliss.
quotes.author: Amma

quotes.quote: Life is what you celebrate. All of it. Even its end.
quotes.author: Joanne Harris

quotes.quote: I prefer just being with people I like. That's my way of celebrating.
quotes.author: Michael Jackson

quotes.quote: To live is to be marked. To live is to change, to acquire the words of a story, and that is the only celebration we mortals really know.
quotes.author: Barbara Kingsolver

quotes.quote: Celebration is an active state, an act of expressing reverence or appreciation.
quotes.author: Abraham Joshua Heschel

quotes.quote: Every meal should be a small celebration.
quotes.author: Marion Cunningham

quotes.quote: One should never, but never, pass by an opportunity to celebrate.
quotes.author: J. malouf

quotes.quote: It was one of those puzzling facts of life that women either celebrated a happy event or solved their problems with a shopping spree.
quotes.author: E. A. Bucchianeri

quotes.quote: At any wedding or other big celebration, there'll be a moment, especially once the wine starts flowing, when a santuri or bouzouki sounds.
quotes.author: Christopher Bonanos

quotes.quote: Most cultures have ceremonies to celebrate milestones in a man's life.
quotes.author: Hart Hanson

quotes.quote: A celebration. Tonight's the night for a real celebration.
quotes.author: Guy Trosper

quotes.quote: We havin' a celebration, love to stay high.
quotes.author: Lil Wayne

quotes.quote: Life is a celebration. Consider everything that makes you happy as a gift from God and say, 'Thank you.
quotes.author: Francis Lucille

quotes.quote: Celebrate and just get used to celebrating more and more.
quotes.author: Francis Lucille

quotes.quote: The day you start to admit you are responsible for your actions, is the day your real life begins. Celebrate it.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Each day offers a reason to celebrate. Find it and experience true bliss.
quotes.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quotes.quote: To celebrate, you must step into your innate jovial nature.
quotes.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quotes.quote: Connect with the fun, jubilant, inner child who loves to celebrate.
quotes.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quotes.quote: Connect with the fun, jubilant, inner child who loves to celebrate.
quotes.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quotes.quote: Celebrate the ordinary and extraordinary.
quotes.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quotes.quote: There is always something to celebrate, even if it's simply cleansing rain.
quotes.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quotes.quote: Get yourself a special journal to record one thing to celebrate each day.
quotes.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quotes.quote: I celebrate my spirit with joy and playful abandon.
quotes.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quotes.quote: A spirit infused with joy feels goods, and you can choose to celebrate it.
quotes.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quotes.quote: Be joy and celebrate joy.
quotes.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quotes.quote: You can choose to celebrate joy in your spirit and thereby heal your body.
quotes.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quotes.quote: Choose to celebrate your spirit to maximize your bliss.
quotes.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quotes.quote: Celebrate your spirit by loving and feeding it joy.
quotes.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quotes.quote: I was choosing to consciously spread joy and celebrate the fun of life, and so can you.
quotes.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quotes.quote: Celebration and laughter are two of the richest gifts of life.
quotes.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quotes.quote: To celebrate someone else’s life, we need to find a way to look at it straight on, not from above with judgment or from below with envy.
quotes.author: Sharon Salzberg

quotes.quote: If our sex life were determined by our first youthful experiments, most of the world would be doomed to celibacy. In no area of human experience are human beings more convinced that something better can be had only if they persevere.
quotes.author: P.D. James

quotes.quote: If we were the last two people alive on earth, we'd make celibacy the new national pasttime.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The celibate practices celibacy, but his heart is filled with pride.
quotes.author: Granth Sahib

quotes.quote: Celibacy is not natural to men or to women; all bodily needs require their legitimate satisfaction, and celibacy is a disregard of natural law.
quotes.author: Annie Besant
