quotes.quote: Celibacy is not just a matter of not having sex. It is a way of admiring a person for their humanity, maybe even for their beauty.
quotes.author: Timothy Radcliffe

quotes.quote: Celibacy is the worst form of self-abuse.
quotes.author: Peter De Vries

quotes.quote: The church may hold whatever it holds with regard to clerical celibacy.
quotes.author: William P. Leahy

quotes.quote: Honestly, celibacy isn't hard. It's the gasers that sell you broken promises and try to get you off of God's plan offering nothing.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: In the name of celibacy, sex has been repressed for centuries and you have become just full of sexuality. Rather than transcending it you are boiling within.
quotes.author: Rajneesh

quotes.quote: Celibacy goes deeper than the flesh.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: Even supposing there were some spiritual advantage in celibacy, it ought to be completely voluntary
quotes.author: Richard Whately

quotes.quote: Celibacy is the essence of vulgarity.
quotes.author: Robert Green Ingersoll

quotes.quote: Maintaining a celibate relationship is hard thats why standards must be set and God has to be centered.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Celibacy doesn't make you enlightened, otherwise every nun or priest in Buddhism or Christianity would be enlightened. People who don't date and can't get any action would be enlightened.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: The vow of celibacy is a matter of keeping one's word to Christ and the Church. a duty and a proof of the priest's inner maturity; it is the expression of his personal dignity.
quotes.author: Pope John Paul II

quotes.quote: Try to force celibacy upon yourself and your dreams will become sexual, they will have a quality of sexuality.
quotes.author: Rajneesh

quotes.quote: Celibacy is a great help, inasmuch as it enables one to lead a life of full surrender to God.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Most people that commit to a life of celibacy weren't leaving that much on the table in the first place.
quotes.author: Dov Davidoff

quotes.quote: In this modern world, the celibacy of the medieval learned class has been replaced by a celibacy of the intellect which is divorced from the concrete contemplation of the complete facts.
quotes.author: Alfred North Whitehead

quotes.quote: Celibacy is the most extreme of sexual perversions, after all.
quotes.author: Ada Palmer

quotes.quote: As to marriage or celibacy, let a man take which course he will, he will be sure to repent.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: Everyone agrees the celibacy rule is just a Church law dating from the 11th century, not a divine command.
quotes.author: Hans Kung

quotes.quote: It is better to lock up your heart with a merciless padlock, than to fall in love with someone who doesn't know what they mean to you.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: The ideal state for a philosopher, indeed, is celibacy tempered by polygamy.
quotes.author: H L Mencken

quotes.quote: On the higher plane the soul is sexless, and those who wish to rise higher than the physical plane must eliminate the idea of sex.
quotes.author: Virchand Gandhi

quotes.quote: One, who feels like dying only while asking for sex, can conquer this world.
quotes.author: Dada Bhagwan

quotes.quote: Marriage has many pains, but celibacy has no pleasures.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Celibacy is not a matter of compulsion. Someone is accepted as a priest only when he does it of his own accord.
quotes.author: Pope Benedict XVI

quotes.quote: A celibate, like the fly in the heart of an apple, dwells in a perpetual sweetness, but sits alone, and is confined and dies in singularity.
quotes.author: Jeremy Taylor

quotes.quote: Marriage may often be a stormy lake, but celibacy is almost always a muddy horse pond.
quotes.author: Thomas Love Peacock

quotes.quote: Cell phones are so convenient that they're an inconvenience.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: Technology offers us a unique opportunity, though rarely welcome, to practice patience.
quotes.author: Allan Lokos

quotes.quote: A smartphone is an addictive device which traps a soul into a lifeless planet full of lives.
quotes.author: Munia Khan

quotes.quote: Cell phones are not a sign of power, they're a sign of subservience.
quotes.author: Doug Pappas

quotes.quote: Home is where the heart is, but today, the phone is where the heart is!
quotes.author: Rachitha Cabral

quotes.quote: Cell phones are the latest invention in rudeness.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: Mobile phones are misnamed. They should be called gateways to human knowledge.
quotes.author: Ray Kurzweil

quotes.quote: Cell phone: a private convenience that has become a public nuisance.
quotes.author: Richard E. Turner

quotes.quote: Cell phone dependency is now called compulsive communicating. Chain dialers call continually to get another fix
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Cell phone radiation changes the shape of brain proteins, causing them to clump together and form pathological protein fibrils like those found in Alzheimer's and Parkinson's disease patients.
quotes.author: Microwave News

quotes.quote: Your cell phone has already replaced your camera, your calendar and your alarm clock. Don't let it replace your family.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: As long as you have a cell phone you're never alone.
quotes.author: Stanley Victor Paskavich

quotes.quote: People are very protective of their cell phones, how it's used, where it's used and how much it costs. It has become a very personal issue for a whole lot of people in this country.
quotes.author: Steve Largent

quotes.quote: Cell phones tend to bring us more inside of our lives whereas movies offer a chance to escape, so there are two competing forces.
quotes.author: Steven Spielberg

quotes.quote: The cell phone has become the adult's transitional object, replacing the toddler's teddy bear for comfort and a sense of belonging.
quotes.author: Margaret Heffernan

quotes.quote: Cell phones these days keep getting thinner and smarter people the opposite.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: A mobile phone needs a manual in the way that a teacup doesn't .
quotes.author: Douglas Adams

quotes.quote: Cell phones, mobile e-mail, and all the other cool and slick gadgets can cause massive losses in our creative output and overall productivity.
quotes.author: Robin S. Sharma

quotes.quote: You know, a cell phone's like a guy; if you don't plug him in every night, charge him good, you got nothing at all.
quotes.author: Catherine Coulter

quotes.quote: It's easier for a rich man to ride that camel through the eye of a needle directly into the Kingdom of Heaven, than for some of us to give up our cell phone.
quotes.author: Vera Nazarian

quotes.quote: I finally realized that people are prisoners of their phones... that's why it's called a "cell" phone.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: My cell phone is my best friend. It's my lifeline to the outside world.
quotes.author: Carrie Underwood

quotes.quote: Right, my phone. When these things first appeared, they were so cool. Only when it was too late did people realize they are as cool as electronic tags on remand prisoners.
quotes.author: David Mitchell

quotes.quote: To be happy in this world, first you need a cell phone and then you need an airplane. Then you're truly wireless.
quotes.author: Ted Turner

quotes.quote: Apparently we love our own cell phones but we hate everyone else's.
quotes.author: Joe Bob Briggs

quotes.quote: I'm old fashioned with my cell phone. I like that human contact and I think it's important.
quotes.author: Giovanni Ribisi

quotes.quote: But I'm acutely aware that the possibility of fraud is even more prevalent in today's world because of the Internet and cell phones and the opportunity for instant communication with strangers.
quotes.author: Armistead Maupin

quotes.quote: Email, instant messaging, and cell phones give us fabulous communication ability, but because we live and work in our own little worlds, that communication is totally disorganized.
quotes.author: Marilyn vos Savant

quotes.quote: Three objects were considered essential across all participants, cultures and genders: keys, money and mobile phones.
quotes.author: Jan Chipchase

quotes.quote: Give the people in your life the gift of your presence by putting down your mobile device.
quotes.author: Kate Northrup

quotes.quote: Our phones fall, we panic. Our friends fall, we laugh.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Smart phones and social media expand our universe. We can connect with others or collect information easier and faster than ever.
quotes.author: Daniel Goleman

quotes.quote: The greatest musical instrument given to a human being is the voice.
quotes.author: Dayananda Saraswati

quotes.quote: Even in classical music, the cello doesn't get a lot of respect because the piano and the violin get it all.
quotes.author: Luka Sulic

quotes.quote: It's easy to play any musical instrument: all you have to do is touch the right key at the right time and the instrument will play itself.
quotes.author: Johann Sebastian Bach

quotes.quote: A cello was there 400 years ago and will still be here in 400 years.
quotes.author: Thomas Bangalter

quotes.quote: The cello is the most perfect instrument aside from the human voice.
quotes.author: Zuill Bailey

quotes.quote: Playing the cello did feel nicely neolithic, or at least a civilized way to process the primitive.
quotes.author: Eric Siblin

quotes.quote: The Cello is like a beautiful woman who has not grown older, but younger with time, more slender , more supple , more graceful.
quotes.author: Pablo Casals

quotes.quote: It is the closest instrument to the human voice, and the things you can do on the cello there are endless possibilities.
quotes.author: Stjepan Hauser

quotes.quote: Oh, a man with a guitar is nothing compared to a man with a cello! Girls really like the way that we handle our instruments.
quotes.author: Eicca Toppinen

quotes.quote: A cello can sound like so many instruments, but it's only one, you know, like a guitar; it has percussive qualities. It can sing like the violin, you know, like a voice.
quotes.author: Luka Sulic

quotes.quote: Instruments sound sweetest when they are touched softest.
quotes.author: John Lyly

quotes.quote: We are so excited to be touring and showing audiences the versatility of the cello.
quotes.author: Stjepan Hauser

quotes.quote: You need to tune your instrument, which is your body and your mind, and your soul.
quotes.author: Abby Brammell

quotes.quote: A cello on a winter night in the midst of a frozen cityâ€”that was what his voice sounded like.
quotes.author: Tiffany Reisz

quotes.quote: People don't think of cello as a rock instrument, really, and we want people to know all the possibilities that the cello can offer.
quotes.author: Luka Sulic

quotes.quote: No, but a cello is the perfect string bass for an accordion. Works with it beautifully.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Moon

quotes.quote: The cello is a hero because of its register - its tenor voice. It is a masculine instrument, whereas the violin is feminine because of its soprano pitch. When the cello enters in the Dvorak Concerto, it is like a great orator.
quotes.author: Mstislav Rostropovich

quotes.quote: The cello is such a melancholy instrument, such an isolated, miserable instrument.
quotes.author: Ritchie Blackmore

quotes.quote: People tend to eat through the cello. They tend to take out the things that make it beautifully cello-y sometimes.
quotes.author: Julia Kent

quotes.quote: The only people without problems live in the cemetery.
quotes.author: August Eugene Mansker

quotes.quote: The fence around a cemetery is foolish, for those inside can't come out and those outside don't want to get in.
quotes.author: Arthur Brisbane

quotes.quote: When the leaves fall, the whole earth is a cemetery pleasant to walk in. I love to wander and muse over them in their graves. Here are no lying nor vain epitaphs.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: My belief in ghosts swings with the wind. But my belief that the cemetery felt happy and not sad-I've never changed my mind about that.
quotes.author: Carol Plum-Ucci

quotes.quote: I am a cemetery by the moon unblessed.
quotes.author: Charles Baudelaire

quotes.quote: Every man should keep a fair-sized cemetery in which to bury the faults of his friends.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: Cemetery, n. an isolated suburban spot where mourners match lies, poets write at a target and stone cutters spell for a wager.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: People think too historically. They are always living half in a cemetery.
quotes.author: Aristide Briand

quotes.quote: Military cemeteries in every corner of the world are silent testimony to the failure of national leaders to sanctify human life.
quotes.author: Yitzhak Rabin

quotes.quote: The cemetery is filled with indispensable men.
quotes.author: Charles De Gaulle

quotes.quote: He who rejects change is the architect of decay. The only human institution which rejects progress is the cemetery.
quotes.author: Harold Wilson

quotes.quote: Being president is a lot like running a cemetery. You've got a lot of people under you and nobody's listening.
quotes.author: Bill Clinton

quotes.quote: The past was but the cemetery of our illusions one simply stubbed one's toes on the gravestones.
quotes.author: Émile Zola

quotes.quote: Cemeteries are interesting. They're worth visiting and they're worth studying. If we take the time to listen to what the stories might tell us, we have a lot to learn.
quotes.author: Richard Veit

quotes.quote: Everyone, deep down within, carries a small cemetery of those he has loved.
quotes.author: Romain Rolland

quotes.quote: The cemetery is full of indispensable people.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: The cemetery is an open space among the ruins, covered in winter with violets and daisies. It might make one in love with death, to think that one should be buried in so sweet a place.
quotes.author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quotes.quote: Cemeteries are full of unfulfilled dreams, countless echoes of 'could, have' and 'should have'. Countless books unwritten, countless songs unsung. I want to live my life in such a way that when my body is laid to rest, it will be a well needed rest from a life well lived, a song well sung, a book well written, opportunities well explored, and a love well expressed.
quotes.author: Steve Marabol

quotes.quote: The cemetery is full of people who thought they could change themselves tomorrow.
quotes.author: Boonaa Mohammed

quotes.quote: A cemetery saddens us because it is the only place of the world in which we do not meet our dead again.
quotes.author: Francois Mauriac

quotes.quote: The only place where you can find equality is in the cemetery.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Our cemeteries are full of people who prayed to live.
quotes.author: Annie Laurie Gaylor

quotes.quote: The cemetery of the victims of human cruelty in our century is extended to include yet another vast cemetery, that of the unborn.
quotes.author: Pope John Paul II

quotes.quote: The prime goal of censorship is to promote ignorance, whether it is done via lying and bowdlerized school texts or by attacking individual books.
quotes.author: Felice Picano

quotes.quote: There is a fine line between censorship and good taste and moral responsibility.
quotes.author: Steven Spielberg

quotes.quote: Censorship reflects a society's lack of confidence in itself.
quotes.author: Potter Stewart

quotes.quote: Without censorship, things can get terribly confused in the public mind.
quotes.author: William Westmoreland

quotes.quote: Censorship, like charity, should begin at home, but, unlike charity, it should end there.
quotes.author: Clare Boothe Luce

quotes.quote: The fact is that censorship always defeats its own purpose, for it creates, in the end, the kind of society that is incapable of exercising real discretion.
quotes.author: Henry Steele Commager

quotes.quote: The only valid censorship of ideas is the right of people not to listen.
quotes.author: Tommy Smothers

quotes.quote: We have a natural right to make use of our pens as of our tongue, at our peril, risk and hazard.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: I am thankful for all the complaining I hear about our government because it means we have freedom of speech.
quotes.author: Nancie J. Carmody

quotes.quote: Books won't stay banned. They won't burn. Ideas won't go to jail. In the long run of history, the censor and the inquisitor have always lost. The only weapon against bad ideas is better ideas.
quotes.author: Alfred Whitney Griswold

quotes.quote: Let children read whatever they want and then talk about it with them. If parents and kids can talk together, we won't have as much censorship because we won't have as much fear.
quotes.author: Judy Blume

quotes.quote: It's not just the books under fire now that worry me. It is the books that will never be written. The books that will never be read. And all due to the fear of censorship.
quotes.author: Judy Blume

quotes.quote: Censorship laws are blunt instruments, not sharp scalpels. Once enacted, they are easily misapplied to merely unpopular or only marginally dangerous speech.
quotes.author: Alan Dershowitz

quotes.quote: Our liberty depends on the freedom of the press, and that cannot be limited without being lost.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: All censorships exist to prevent anyone from challenging current conceptions and existing institutions. All progress is initiated by challenging current conceptions, and executed by supplanting existing institutions. Consequentlythe first condition of progress is the removal of censorship.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: If all printers were determined not to print anything till they were sure it would offend nobody, there would be very little printed.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Where they have burned books, they will end in burning human beings.
quotes.author: Heinrich Heine

quotes.quote: Information is the currency of democracy.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: If large numbers of people believe in freedom of speech, there will be freedom of speech, even if the law forbids it. But if public opinion is sluggish, inconvenient minorities will be persecuted, even if laws exist to protect them.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: The books that the world calls immoral are books that show the world its own shame.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: We all know that books burn, yet we have the greater knowledge that books cannot be killed by fire. People die, but books never die. No man and no force can put thought in a concentration camp forever. No man and no force can take from the world the books that embody man's eternal fight against tyranny of every kind.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: What is freedom of expression? Without the freedom to offend, it ceases to exist.
quotes.author: Salman Rushdie

quotes.quote: Imagine books and music and movies being filtered and homogenized. Certified. Approved for consumption. People will be happy to give up most of their culture for the assurance that the tiny bit that comes through is safe and clean. White noise.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: Every burned book or house enlightens the world; every suppressed or expunged word reverberates through the earth from side to side.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: An idea that is not dangerous is unworthy of being called an idea at all.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: There is nothing more frightening than active ignorance.
quotes.author: Goethe

quotes.quote: I hope people realize that banning the truth, as well as fiction, is proof that ignorance is dangerous to freedom.
quotes.author: Jen

quotes.quote: You have not converted a man because you have silenced him.
quotes.author: John Morley

quotes.quote: One cannot and must not try to erase the past merely because it does not fit the present.
quotes.author: Golda Meir

quotes.quote: Did you ever hear anyone say, 'That work had better be banned because I might read it and it might be very damaging to me'?
quotes.author: Joseph Henry Jackson

quotes.quote: There is more than one way to burn a book. And the world is full of people running about with lit matches.
quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

quotes.quote: A word to the unwise. Torch every book. Char every page. Burn every word to ash. Ideas are incombustible. And therein lies your real fear.
quotes.author: Ellen Hopkins

quotes.quote: Censorship is the child of fear and the father of ignorance.
quotes.author: Laurie Halse Anderson

quotes.quote: Banning books is just another form of bullying. It's all about fear and an assumption of power. The key is to address the fear and deny the power.
quotes.author: James Howe

quotes.quote: Yes, books are dangerous. They should be dangerous--they contain ideas.
quotes.author: Pete Hautman

quotes.quote: Censors tend to do what only psychotics do: they confuse reality with illusion.
quotes.author: David Cronenberg

quotes.quote: Censorship ends in logical completeness when nobody is allowed to read any books except the books nobody reads.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Censorship is never over for those who have experienced it. It is a brand on the imagination that affects the individual who has suffered it, forever.
quotes.author: Nadine Gordimer

quotes.quote: Right now I think censorship is necessary; the things they're doing and saying in films right now just shouldn't be allowed. There's no dignity anymore and I think that's very important.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: One of the curious things about censorship is that no one seems to want it for himself. We want censorship to protect someone else; the young, the unstable, the suggestible, the stupid. I have never heard of anyone who wanted a film banned because otherwise he might see it and be harmed.
quotes.author: Edgar Dale

quotes.quote: Obviously, the danger is not in the actual act of reading itself, but rather, the possibility that the texts children read will incite questions, introduce novel ideas, and provoke critical inquiry.
quotes.author: Persis M. Karim

quotes.quote: Without free speech no search for truth is possible... no discovery of truth is useful... Better a thousandfold abuse of free speech than denial of free speech. The abuse dies in a day, but the denial slays the life of the people, and entombs the hope of the race.
quotes.author: Charles Bradlaugh

quotes.quote: Freedom of speech means that you shall not do something to people either for the views they have, or the views they express, or the words they speak or write.
quotes.author: Hugo L. Black

quotes.quote: The ultimate form of censorship is assassination.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: When the conspiracy of lies surrounding me demands of me to silence the one word of truth given to me, that word becomes the one word I wish to utter above all others.
quotes.author: Andre P. Brink

quotes.quote: The burning of an author's books, imprisonment for opinion's sake, has always been the tribute that an ignorant age pays to the genius of its time.
quotes.author: Joseph Allen

quotes.quote: The intellectually stifling results of censorship -- while deplorable in any setting -- would be all the more abominable if allowed to exist within the college environment.
quotes.author: William M. Anderson

quotes.quote: The spectacle of a judge pouring over the picture of some nude, trying to ascertain the extent to which she arouses prurient interests, and then attempting to write an opinion which explains the difference between that nude and some other nude has elements of low comedy.
quotes.author: Thurman Arnold

quotes.quote: Thought that is silenced is always rebellious. Majorities, of course, are often mistaken. This is why the silencing of minorities is necessarily dangerous. Criticism and dissent are the indispensable antidote to major delusions.
quotes.author: Alan Barth

quotes.quote: As to the evil which results from censorship, it is impossible to measure it, because it is impossible to tell where it ends.
quotes.author: Alan Barth

quotes.quote: Censorship is the tool of those who have the need to hide actualities from themselves and from others. Their fear is only their inability to face what is real, and I can't vent any anger against them; I only feel this appalling sadness. Somewhere in their upbringing, they were shielded against the total facts of our existence.
quotes.author: Charles Bukowski

quotes.quote: We live in oppressive times. We have, as a nation, become our own thought police; but instead of calling the process by which we limit our expression of dissent and wonder ‘censorship,’ we call it ‘concern for commercial viability.
quotes.author: David Mamet

quotes.quote: Censorship feeds the dirty mind more than the four-letter word itself.
quotes.author: Dick Cavett

quotes.quote: Censorship feeds the dirty mind more than the four-letter word itself.
quotes.author: Dick Cavett

quotes.quote: The censor's sword pierces deeply into the heart of free expression.
quotes.author: Earl Warren

quotes.quote: When a critic sets himself up as an arbiter of morality, a judge of the matter and not the manner of a work, he is no longer a critic; he is a censor.
quotes.author: Edward Albee

quotes.quote: The first thing dictators do is finish free press, to establish censorship. There is no doubt that a free press is the first enemy of dictatorship.
quotes.author: Fidel Castro

quotes.quote: If in other lands the press and books and literature of all kinds are censored, we must redouble our efforts here to keep them free
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Assassination is the extreme form of censorship.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Censorship ends in logical completeness when nobody is allowed to read any books except the books that nobody can read.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: All the papers that matter live off their advertisements, and the advertisers exercise an indirect censorship over news.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: The sooner we all learn to make a decision between disapproval and censorship, the better off society will be... Censorship cannot get at the real evil, and it is an evil in itself.
quotes.author: Granville Hicks

quotes.quote: Censorship is to art as lynching is to justice.
quotes.author: Henry Louis Gates

quotes.quote: Censorship always defeats it own purpose, for it creates in the end the kind of society that is incapable of exercising real discretion.
quotes.author: Henry Steele Commager

quotes.quote: Censorship is telling a man he can't have a steak just because a baby can't chew it.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Censorship is the height of vanity.
quotes.author: Martha Graham

quotes.quote: Censorship is never over for those who have experienced it. It is a brand on the imagination that affects the individual who has suffered it, forever.
quotes.author: Noam Chomsky

quotes.quote: Censorship is never over for those who have experienced it. It is a brand on the imagination that affects the individual who has suffered it, forever.
quotes.author: Noam Chomsky

quotes.quote: Where there is official censorship it is a sign that speech is serious. Where there is none, it is pretty certain that the official spokesmen have all the loud-speakers.
quotes.author: Paul Goodman

quotes.quote: Censorship reflects a society's lack of confidence in itself. It is a hallmark of an authoritarian regime.
quotes.author: Potter Stewart

quotes.quote: It didn't come from the Government down. There was no dictum, no declaration, no censorship, to start with, no! Technology, mass exploitation, and minority pressure carried the trick, thank God.
quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

quotes.quote: Literature should not be suppressed merely because it offends the moral code of the censor.
quotes.author: William O. Douglas

quotes.quote: A CEO is a board of directors personified.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: Any executive, any CEO should not have 1 management style. Your management style needs to be dictated by your employee.
quotes.author: Keith Robois

quotes.quote: CEOs need to produce continuous growth in sales and profits. Yet they must also invest in sustainability and social responsibility, which then leave them less money for financing their growth.
quotes.author: Philip Kotler

quotes.quote: Some CEO's feel like if the 'opt out of social' they are somehow protected. That is just crazy.
quotes.author: Sandy Carter

quotes.quote: Another key role the CEO plays is to focus efforts.
quotes.author: Scott D. Anthony

quotes.quote: Strategy is not really a solo sport even if you're the CEO.
quotes.author: Max McKeown

quotes.quote: Every CEO of a social network should be required to use the default privacy settings for all of their accounts on the service.
quotes.author: Anil Dash

quotes.quote: When the CEO makes a decision, people don't come back on it.
quotes.author: Carlos Ghosn

quotes.quote: Any enterprise CEO really ought to be able to ask a question that involves connecting data across the organization, be able to run a company effectively, and especially to be able to respond to unexpected events. Most organizations are missing this ability to connect all the data together.
quotes.author: Tim Berners-Lee

quotes.quote: Clearly, as a CEO, you have other functions that are managed by other people.
quotes.author: Al-Waleed bin Talal

quotes.quote: CEOs the world over are fond of pointing to their workforce and saying Our people are our greatest asset. And yet today, only two out of ten people think their assets are being well used at work.
quotes.author: Marcus Buckingham

quotes.quote: We also believe candour benefits us as managers. The CEO who misleads often in public eventually misleads himself in private.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: A CEO needs to build their own team.
quotes.author: Ross Levinsohn

quotes.quote: The chief executive officer is also the chief sales officer. He or she is responsible for the success of the company and making a profit. The closer the CEO is to the everyday selling process, bringing in business, the more successful the company will become.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Gitomer

quotes.quote: For any CEO that is skeptical at all: you have to create a social enterprise today!
quotes.author: Angela Ahrendts

quotes.quote: Don't live like a CEO when you're still a sandwich artist.
quotes.author: Sophia Amoruso

quotes.quote: The role of the CEO is to enable people to excel, help them discover their own wisdom, engage themselves entirely in their work, and accept responsibility for making change.
quotes.author: Vineet Nayar

quotes.quote: Every time you make the hard, correct decision you become a bit more courageous, and every time you make the easy, wrong decision you become a bit more cowardly. If you are CEO, these choices will lead to a courageous or cowardly company.
quotes.author: Ben Horowitz

quotes.quote: Being a CEO still means sitting across the table from big institutional investors and showing your leadership and having them believe in you.
quotes.author: Christie Hefner

quotes.quote: A leadership culture is one where everyone thinks like an owner, a CEO or a managing director. It's one where everyone is entrepreneurial and proactive.
quotes.author: Robin S. Sharma

quotes.quote: No CEO examining books today understands what the hell is going on.
quotes.author: Charlie Munger

quotes.quote: Leaders get out in front and stay there by raising the standards by which they judge themselves and by which they are willing to be judged.
quotes.author: Frederick W. Smith

quotes.quote: CEOs who can hire properly, that's the most important part of the job. The CEO's job is really to hire the right team and execute the vision second.
quotes.author: Bill Maris

quotes.quote: Any CEO who cannot clearly articulate the intangible assets of his brand and understand its connection to customers, is in trouble.
quotes.author: Charlotte Beers

quotes.quote: The CEO's role in raising a company's corporate IQ is to establish an atmosphere that promotes knowledge sharing and collaboration.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: It's not about having a specific set time; both personal and professional lives are 24/7. It's simply, more about making the right allocation to each one and recognizing that it's going to be different every single day.
quotes.author: Ellen Kullman

quotes.quote: There is something only a CEO uniquely can do, which is set that tone, which can then capture the soul of the collective. And it's culture.
quotes.author: Satya Nadella

quotes.quote: A CEO's behavior has a huge impact on managers down the line.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: More often than not, a C.E.O is merely a puppet whose strings are pulled by a board of directors.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: Being a president is being a CEO, essentially.
quotes.author: Geraldo Rivera

quotes.quote: Remember, before they promoted to the chair of CEO, they were the best employees of their companies.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: The oat is the Horatio Alger of cereals, which progressed, if not from rags to riches, at least from weed to health food.
quotes.author: Waverley Root

quotes.quote: The Breakfast of Champions isn't cereal, it's the competition!
quotes.author: David Lee Roth

quotes.quote: Pay attention, don't let life go by you. Fall in love with the back of your cereal box.
quotes.author: Jerry Seinfeld

quotes.quote: Like religion, politics, and family planning, cereal is not a topic to be brought up in public. It's too controversial.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: In life, as in breakfast cereal, it is always best to read the instructions on the box.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: Why, if there is alphabet soup, do we not have punctuation cereal?
quotes.author: Mary Norris

quotes.quote: Sometimes you actually get caught in the web of things where people are talking about what kind of breakfast cereal you like.
quotes.author: Josh Homme

quotes.quote: Cereal eating is almost a marker for a healthy lifestyle. It sets you up for the day, so you don't overeat.
quotes.author: Bruce Barton

quotes.quote: There's a little bit of magic in every box!
quotes.author: Adam Rex

quotes.quote: You don`t get mood swings from eating cornflakes.
quotes.author: O.J. Simpson

quotes.quote: Cereal production in the rain-fed areas still remains relatively unaffected by the impact of the green revolution, but significant change and progress are now becoming evident in several countries
quotes.author: Norman Borlaug

quotes.quote: Remember the days when you let your child have some chocolate if he finished his cereal? Now, chocolate is one of the cereals.
quotes.author: Robert Orben

quotes.quote: Do you know what breakfast cereal is made of? It's made of all those little curly wooden shavings you find in pencil sharpeners!
quotes.author: Roald Dahl

quotes.quote: You know you've made it to the big time when you're on a cereal box.
quotes.author: Mike Schultz

quotes.quote: I pore over every word on the cereal box at breakfast, often more than once. You can ask me anything about shredded wheat.
quotes.author: Chris Van Allsburg

quotes.quote: Don't eat breakfast cereals that change the color of your milk.
quotes.author: Michael Pollan

quotes.quote: The myths connected with individual sanctuaries and ceremonies were merely part of the apparatus of the worship; they served to excite the fancy and sustain the interest of the worshipper no one cared what he believed about its origin.
quotes.author: William Robertson Smith

quotes.quote: Ceremonies are important. But our gratitude has to be more than visits to the troops, and once-a-year Memorial Day ceremonies. We honor the dead best by treating the living well.
quotes.author: Jennifer Granholm

quotes.quote: A graduation ceremony is an event where the commencement speaker tells thousands of students dressed in identical caps and gowns that individuality is the key to success.
quotes.author: Robert Orben

quotes.quote: Ceremony and ritual spring from our heart of hearts those who govern us know it well, for they would sooner deny us bread than dare alter the observance of tradition.
quotes.author: F. Gonzalez-Crussi

quotes.quote: Ceremonies are the first thing to be attended to in the practice of government.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: The real ceremony begins where the formal one ends, when we take up a new way, our minds and hearts filled with the vision of earth that holds us within it, in compassionate relationship to and with our world.
quotes.author: Linda Hogan

quotes.quote: The purpose of any ceremony is to build stronger relationship or bridge the distance between our cosmos and us. The research that we do as Indigenous people is a ceremony that allows us a raised level of consciousness and insight into our world. Through going forward together with open minds and good hearts we have uncovered the nature of this ceremony.
quotes.author: Shawn Wilson

quotes.quote: Ceremony is necessary as the outwork and defense of manners.
quotes.author: Lord Chesterfield

quotes.quote: Ceremony is really a protection, too, in times of emotional involvement, particularly at death. If we have a social formula to guide us and do not have to extemporize, we feel better able to handle life.
quotes.author: Amy Vanderbilt

quotes.quote: Marriage- a ceremony in which rings are put on the finger of the lady and through the nose of the gentleman.
quotes.author: Herbert Spencer

quotes.quote: The only way we'll know where we're going is to look at the past and to remember who we were through ceremonies and rituals.
quotes.author: Laura Esquivel

quotes.quote: We must learn which ceremonies may be breached occasionally at our convenience and which ones may never be if we are to live pleasantly with our fellow man.
quotes.author: Amy Vanderbilt

quotes.quote: Ritual will always mean throwing away something: destroying our corn or wine upon the altar of our gods.
quotes.author: G. K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Ceremony was but devised at first to set a gloss on faint deeds, hollow welcomes, recanting goodness, sorry ere 'Tis shown; but where there is true friendship, there needs none.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: A wedding is a ceremony at which two persons undertake to become one, one undertakes to become nothing, and nothing undertakes to become supportable.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: Few people have ever seriously wished to be exclusively rational. The good life which most desire is a life warmed by passions and touched with that ceremonial grace which is impossible without some affectionate loyalty to traditional form and ceremonies.
quotes.author: Joseph Wood

quotes.quote: Ceremony and great professing renders friendship as much suspect as it does religion.
quotes.author: William Wycherley

quotes.quote: The modern habit of doing ceremonial things unceremoniously is no proof of humility; rather it proves the offender's inability to forget himself in the rite, and his readiness to spoil for every one else the proper pleasure of ritual.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: A certain degree of ceremony is a necessary outwork of manners, as well as of religion; it keeps the forward and petulant at a proper distance, and is a very small restraint to the sensible and to the well bred part of the world.
quotes.author: Lord Chesterfield

quotes.quote: Ceremony is an invention to take off the uneasy feeling which we derive from knowing ourselves to be less the object of love and esteem with a fellow creature than some other person is. It endeavours to make up, by superior attentions in little points, for that invidious preference which it is forced to deny in the greater.
quotes.author: Charles Lamb

quotes.quote: Every ceremony or rite has a value if it is performed without alteration. A ceremony is a book in which a great deal is written. Anyone who understands can read it. One rite often contains more than a hundred books.
quotes.author: George Gurdjieff

quotes.quote: Ceremony is the smoke of friendship.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: It also called upon traditional people in the Four Directions to strengthen the healing ceremonies and asked people to heed the warnings of Mother Earth.
quotes.author: Dennis Banks

quotes.quote: Award ceremonies are strange because you're sitting next to someone you've never met; you're celebrating with a total stranger.
quotes.author: Aneurin Barnard

quotes.quote: Ceremonies are different in every country, but true politeness is everywhere the same.
quotes.author: Oliver Goldsmith

quotes.quote: Ceremony leads her bigots forth, prepared to fight for shadows of no worth. While truths, on which eternal things depend, can hardly find a single.
quotes.author: William Cowper

quotes.quote: Certainty always produces questions, uncertainty statements. It is a balancing law of nature.
quotes.author: Djuna Barnes

quotes.quote: The quest for certainty in forecasting outcomes can be the enemy of progress.
quotes.author: Nate Silver

quotes.quote: Certainty ends inquiry.
quotes.author: Jacob Bronowski

quotes.quote: When we find our core certainty within, then we no longer look for certainty outside.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: The one unchangeable certainty is that nothing is certain or unchangeable.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: The certainty within our spirit made the dream reality.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Just because someone seems to have more certainty, doesn't mean they're right.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: It is the essence of certainty to be established only with reservations.
quotes.author: Maurice Merleau-Ponty

quotes.quote: Life is ever evolving. The only certainty is change.
quotes.author: Allison McAtee

quotes.quote: The only certainty about following the crowd is that you will all get there together.
quotes.author: Mychal Wynn

quotes.quote: The demand for certainty is one which is natural to man, but is nevertheless an intellectual vice.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: People who need certainty are unlikely to make good entrepreneurs.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: Certainty is usually a sign of pathology.
quotes.author: B.W. Powe

quotes.quote: Nothing consoles and comforts like certainty does.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: Certainty is the mother of quiet and repose, and uncertainty the cause of variance and contentions.
quotes.author: Edward Coke

quotes.quote: Certainty is a cruel mindset. It hardens our minds against possibility.
quotes.author: Ellen Langer

quotes.quote: What is certainty but the refuge of those whose faith is not strong enough to entertain doubt.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: Certainty sees things in restrictive, protective, aggressive ways, and thus isn't seeing at all.
quotes.author: Jerry Saltz

quotes.quote: Certainty, not data, is knowledge.
quotes.author: L. Ron Hubbard

quotes.quote: Certainty is the most vivid condition of ignorance and the most necessay condition for knowledge.
quotes.author: Kedar Joshi

quotes.quote: Doubt is long-winded. Certainty is brief.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: Certainty is no guarantor of correctness.
quotes.author: Margaret Heffernan

quotes.quote: The lack of faith is not doubt. It is certainty.
quotes.author: Abigail Van Buren

quotes.quote: Incompetence is certainty in the absence of expertise. Overconfidence is certainty in the presence of expertise.
quotes.author: Malcolm Gladwell

quotes.quote: Certainty is missing the point entirely.
quotes.author: Anne Lamott

quotes.quote: Certainty is the enemy of change.
quotes.author: Salvador Minuchin

quotes.quote: To believe with certainty, we must begin with doubting.
quotes.author: Stanislaw Leszczynski

quotes.quote: Logic is the foundation of the certainty of all the knowledge we acquire.
quotes.author: Leonhard Euler

quotes.quote: Certainty a strange Ferris wheel of a statement!
quotes.author: John Allen Paulos

quotes.quote: Such certainty is beautiful, but uncertainty is more beautiful still.
quotes.author: Wislawa Szymborska

quotes.quote: Certainty without power can be interesting, even amusing. Certainty with power can be dangerous.
quotes.author: Donald Rumsfeld

quotes.quote: Certainty generally is illusion, and repose is not the destiny of man.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Jr.

quotes.quote: People prefer the certainty of misery to the misery of uncertainty.
quotes.author: Virginia Satir

quotes.quote: Certainty abolishes hope, and robs us of renewal.
quotes.author: Neil Postman

quotes.quote: Tolerance grows only when faith loses certainty; certainty is murderous.
quotes.author: Will Durant

quotes.quote: It is the certainty that you are about to recover, that brings results, not the hope.
quotes.author: Emile Coue

quotes.quote: Facts matter not at all. Perception is everything. It's certainty.
quotes.author: Stephen Colbert

quotes.quote: Certainty is the mother of repose, and therefore the common law aims at certainty.
quotes.author: Philip Yorke

quotes.quote: The only certainty is that nothing is certain.
quotes.author: Pliny the Elder

quotes.quote: We often call a certainty a hope, to bring it luck.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Bibesco

quotes.quote: Certainty is a closing of the mind. To create something new you must have doubt.
quotes.author: Milton Glaser

quotes.quote: One of the few certainties in life is that persons of certainty should certainly be avoided.
quotes.author: Willy Russell

quotes.quote: What men want is not knowledge, but certainty.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: The certainty that everything has already been written annuls us, or renders us phantasmal.
quotes.author: Jorge Luis Borges

quotes.quote: Not doubt, certainty is what drives one insane.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Moral certainty is never more than probability.
quotes.author: Giovanni Battista Beccaria

quotes.quote: It's good to have some certainty in life, even if it's only that I'm in deep trouble.
quotes.author: Ashleigh Brilliant

quotes.quote: Certainty is an unrealistic and unattainable ideal.
quotes.author: William Lane Craig

quotes.quote: It is far better to foresee even without certainty than not to foresee at all.
quotes.author: Henri Poincare

quotes.quote: Our own physical body possesses a wisdom which we who inhabit the body lack. We give it orders which make no sense.
quotes.author: Henry Miller

quotes.quote: Every man is the builder of a Temple called his body, nor can he get off by hammering marble instead.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: There is deep wisdom within our very flesh, if we can only come to our senses and feel it.
quotes.author: Elizabeth A. Behnke

quotes.quote: Learning too soon our limitations, we never learn our powers.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: Surely a man needs a closed place wherein he may strike root and, like the seed, become. But also he needs the great Milky Way above him and the vast sea spaces, though neither stars nor ocean serve his daily needs.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: A trembling in the bones may carry a more convincing testimony than the dry documented deductions of the brain.
quotes.author: Llewelyn Powers

quotes.quote: What we feel and think and are is to a great extent determined by the state of our ductless glands and viscera.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: The body is a big sagacity, a plurality with one sense, a war and a peace, a flock and a shepherd.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Each of the seven chakras are governed by spiritual laws, principles of consciousness that we can use to cultivate greater harmony, happiness, and wellbeing in our lives and in the world.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: The chakra is a doorway. These are doorways that lead you into other dimensions. But you have to focus on them to the exclusion of everything else.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: When you focus on a chakra, it's very easy to bring subtle physical energies into your consciousness.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: Chakras are organizational centers for the reception, assimilation, and transmission of life-force energy. They are the stepping stones between heaven and earth.
quotes.author: Anodea Judith

quotes.quote: There are many other chakras, or nadis as they are also called. There are chakras in the hands, fingertips, feet and a number of other areas.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: The chakras are very intelligent they are like the software of the whole computer body.
quotes.author: Dharma Mittra

quotes.quote: The power chakra is the navel center. The center of balance is the heart chakra; it's the center of our being. The third eye is the center of wisdom, the Agni chakra.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: Your heart chakra is not in your physical body. It is in your subtle physical body, but it comes in contact with your physical body in this location.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: The chakras are specialized energy centers which connect us to the multidimensional universe. The chakras are dimensional portals within the subtle bodies which take in and process energy of higher vibrational nature so that it may be properly assimilated and used to transform the physical body.
quotes.author: Richard Gerber

quotes.quote: The chakras or force-centers are points of connection at which energy flows from one body of a man to another all these wheels are perpetually rotating, and into the hub or open mouth of each a force from a higher world is always flowing.
quotes.author: Charles Webster Leadbeater

quotes.quote: Beyond my body my veins are invisible.
quotes.author: Antonio Porchia

quotes.quote: Tis in ourselves that we are thus or thus. Our bodies are our gardens to which our wills are gardeners.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: In the chakras, it's the heart chakra, anahata, the central chakra, three above and three below, which symbolizes happiness and love, psychic oneness, spiritual understanding.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: Chakras are mystical energy centers that exist within the human aura. Tremendous occult power resides in a person's chakras. Siddha masters draw upon that power during meditation, store it within themselves, and later use it to perform miracles.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: There are also places of power that reference the fourth and fifth chakras, which are places of balance, and places of power that reference the sixth and seventh chakras, which are places of wisdom.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: The body is the vehicle, consciousness the driver. Yoga is the path, and the chakras are the map.
quotes.author: Anodea Judith

quotes.quote: The crown chakra is located several inches above the head, but it is not connected. The crown chakra, also known as the thousand-petal lotus of light, references the planes of light, of enlightenment.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: Opening your chakras and allowing cosmic energies to flow through your body will ultimately refresh your spirit and empower your life.
quotes.author: Barbara Marciniak

quotes.quote: Choice is born out of opposites, and the duality of the second chakra is forever challenging us to make choices in a world of opposing sides, of positive and negative energy patterns. Every choice we make contributes a subtle current of our energy to our universe, which is responsive to the influence of human consciousness.
quotes.author: Caroline Myss

quotes.quote: The way you overcome shyness is to become so wrapped up in something that you forget to be afraid.
quotes.author: Lady Bird Johnson

quotes.quote: When you touch the celestial in your heart, you will realize that the beauty of your soul is so pure, so vast and so devastating that you have no option but to merge with it. You have no option but to feel the rhythm of the universe in the rhythm of your heart.
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: Within each of us is a light, awake, encoded in the fibers of our existence. Divine ecstasy is the totality of this marvelous creation experienced in the hearts of humanity.
quotes.author: Tony Samara

quotes.quote: To bring body and mind into a harmonious balance, it is necessary to open the chakras. Blocked energy hubs, when either closed or only slightly opened, can bring about physical and psychic dysfunction or insensitiveness.
quotes.author: Athanasios Karta Singh

quotes.quote: Breath control and power of will allow the Kundalini to rise higher and to come to the higher-seated chakras slowly and continuously.
quotes.author: Athanasios Karta Singh

quotes.quote: Yoga has a sly, clever way of short-circuiting the mental patterns that cause anxiety.
quotes.author: Baxter Bell

quotes.quote: A snake is always dangerous when it is coiled, as is an un-awakened Kundalini. Kundalini coils are opened through seven energy centers which are called the Chakras.
quotes.author: Bhairavi

quotes.quote: The ultimate consciousness is the Purush residing inside the head as the inactive store of energy. The libidinal energy Prakriti resides at the base of the spine in the form of a coiled snake called Kundalini.
quotes.author: Bhairavi

quotes.quote: When you succeed in awakening the Kundalini, so that it starts to move out of its mere potentiality, you necessarily start a world which is totally different from our world. It is the world of eternity.
quotes.author: Cal Jung

quotes.quote: Yoga observes and maintains that the restraint of bodily and mental dispositions is a prerequisite to understand the real identity of soul or atman.
quotes.author: Dr. Vishnulok Bihari Srivastava

quotes.quote: Yoga is nothing if it is not perfect harmony of the body, senses, mind and intellect, reason, consciousness, and self. When all these are integrated that is true yoga.
quotes.author: BKS Iyengar

quotes.quote: Make no mistake, without Hinduism, India has no future.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Hinduism is the soil into which India's roots are stuck and torn out of that she will inevitably wither as a tree torn out from its place.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: If India's own children do not cling to her faith, who shall guard it? India alone can save India and India and Hinduism are one.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: In Hinduism, men probe the mystery of God and express it with a rich fund of myths and penetrating philosophy.
quotes.author: Second Vatican Ecumenical Council

quotes.quote: In Hinduism, death is not viewed as the end of life but as a change in the journey of your atman or soul.
quotes.author: Maxie LaBouche

quotes.quote: Hinduism is the most tolerant creed because it is non-proselytizing and it is as capable of expansion today as it has been found to be in the past.
quotes.author: Gandhi

quotes.quote: Hinduism is not an exclusive religion. In it, there is room for the worship of all the prophets of the world. It is not a missionary religion in the ordinary sense of the term. Hinduism tells everyone to worship God according to his own faith or dharma, and so it lives at peace with all religions.
quotes.author: Gandhi

quotes.quote: Hinduism is not a religion...it is a way of life. Many who do not practice formal religion are nearer to this way of life than some who do.
quotes.author: Gandhi

quotes.quote: The Presence of the demon keeps the chakra from doing its job, but that challenge also forces us to bring more awareness to that job, so eventually, we can do it better.
quotes.author: Anodea Judith

quotes.quote: The person with strong Indu chakra develops an extraordinary power of attraction, leadership, and decisiveness.
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: It is up to us, how we explore the great wonders in our body, its life force, and subtle centers we call 'CHAKRAS'. We can either deny that they exist or learn to understand, work, and awaken them in order to live a more fulfilling life on planet Earth.
quotes.author: Raju Ramanathan

quotes.quote: Chakras don't die at the death of body and mind, because they are subtler than the body and the mind. They have a direct link with the immortal soul.
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: The chakras are not only vortexes of energy, they are also centers for psychic reception.
quotes.author: Catherine Carrigan

quotes.quote: Keeping the energy centers we call chakras open and balanced is absolutely essential to being intuitive and also being healthy and fully alive.
quotes.author: Catherine Carrigan

quotes.quote: You can relieve pain and suffering by learning to take better care of your chakras.
quotes.author: Catherine Carrigan

quotes.quote: Your body’s chakras are the key to your health and a happy life.
quotes.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quotes.quote: I send energy to my root chakra when my bare feet touch the earth.
quotes.author: Rachel Rose

quotes.quote: What we feel and think and are is to a great extent determined by the state of our ductless glands and viscera.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: When you focus on a chakra, it's very easy to bring subtle physical energies into your consciousness.
quotes.author: Frederick Lindemann

quotes.quote: Start meditating with your eyes open, focusing as a warm-up, then focus on a chakra, then just let go and merge. Don't sit there and think or move into sleepy states of awareness, but move into high-powered states of attention.
quotes.author: Frederick Lindemann

quotes.quote: Accept the challenges so that you can feel the exhilaration of victory.
quotes.author: George S. Patton

quotes.quote: Our ability to handle life's challenges is a measure of our strength of character.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: Problems are not stop signs, they are guidelines.
quotes.author: Robert H. Schuller

quotes.quote: Challenges are meant to be met and overcome.
quotes.author: Liu Xiang

quotes.quote: Challenges make you discover things about yourself that you never really knew.
quotes.author: Cicely Tyson

quotes.quote: Life's challenges are not supposed to paralyze you, they're supposed to help you discover who you are.
quotes.author: Bernice Johnson Reagon

quotes.quote: Only by contending with challenges that seem to be beyond your strength to handle at the moment you can grow more surely toward the stars.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: It isn't the mountain ahead that wears you out; it's the grain of sand in your shoe.
quotes.author: Robert W. Service

quotes.quote: The most rewarding things you do in life are often the ones that look like they cannot be done.
quotes.author: Arnold Palmer

quotes.quote: Troubles are often the tools by which God fashions us for better things.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: To be tested is good. The challenged life may be the best therapist.
quotes.author: Gail Sheehy

quotes.quote: I have always grown from my problems and challenges, from the things that don't work out, that's when I've really learned.
quotes.author: Carol Burnett

quotes.quote: The greatest challenge to any thinker is stating the problem in a way that will allow a solution.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: To be successful you must accept all challenges that come your way. You can't just accept the ones you like.
quotes.author: Mike Kafka

quotes.quote: There is nothing like a challenge to bring out the best in man.
quotes.author: Sean Connery

quotes.quote: Embrace each challenge in your life as an opportunity for self-transformation.
quotes.author: Bernie S. Siegel

quotes.quote: You have to meet all of the challenges, big and small. Because how you start is how you finish.
quotes.author: Bernie Mac

quotes.quote: Challenge is a dragon with a gift in its mouth. Tame the dragon and the gift is yours.
quotes.author: Noela Evans

quotes.quote: There is no challenge more challenging than the challenge to improve yourself.
quotes.author: Michael F. Staley

quotes.quote: You will face your greatest opposition when you are closest to your biggest miracle.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: A challenge only becomes an obstacle when you bow to it.
quotes.author: Ray Davis

quotes.quote: Challenges in life can either enrich you or poison you. You are the one who decides.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: If you compared your troubles, or challenges, with those of others, you would surely find that there are those whose troubles make yours look like minor inconveniences.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: When faced with a challenge, look for a way, not a way out.
quotes.author: David Weatherford

quotes.quote: How you respond to the challenge in the second half will determine what you become after the game, whether you are a winner or a loser.
quotes.author: Lou Holtz

quotes.quote: Accept the challenges of life and you'll continue to find that winning is the spirit of living . . . it's merely a state of mind.
quotes.author: Mychal Wynn

quotes.quote: Challenges cannot possibly be good or bad. Challenges are simply challenges.
quotes.author: Carlos Castaneda

quotes.quote: Challenges are gifts that force us to search for a new center of gravity. Don't fight them. Just find a new way to stand.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: The challenges in our lives are there to STRENGTHEN our CONVICTIONS. They are NOT there to run us over.
quotes.author: Nick Vujicic

quotes.quote: Sometimes the darkest challenges, the most difficult lessons, hold the greatest gems of light.
quotes.author: Barbara Marciniak

quotes.quote: Hardships often prepare ordinary people for an extraordinary destiny...
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: A new challenge keeps the brain kicking and the heart ticking.
quotes.author: E.A. Bucchianeri

quotes.quote: Only those who never step, never stumble.
quotes.author: Richard Paul Evans

quotes.quote: Only by seeking challenges can we hope to find the best in ourselves.
quotes.author: Robert Rodriguez

quotes.quote: If you take each challenge one step at a time, with faith in every footstep, your strength and understanding will increase.
quotes.author: James E. Faust

quotes.quote: The next time you face a challenge, remember that the cost of success is far cheaper than the price of failure.
quotes.author: Tsem Tulku Rinpoche

quotes.quote: Never back down from a real challenge. They give the best lessons in life.
quotes.author: Lil Wayne

quotes.quote: We cannot solve our problems with the same thinking we used when we created them.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Every problem has in it the seeds of its own solution. If you don't have any problems, you don't get any seeds.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: There is no such thing as a problem without a gift for you in its hands. You seek problems because you need their gifts.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: Every problem is a gift - without problems we would not grow.
quotes.author: Anthony Robbins

quotes.quote: Our problems are man-made, therefore they may be solved by man. And man can be as big as he wants. No problem of human destiny is beyond human beings.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: One should never impose one's views on a problem; one should rather study it, and in time a solution will reveal itself.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: No problem is so formidable that you can't walk away from it.
quotes.author: Charles M. Schulz

quotes.quote: Never underestimate your problem or your ability to deal with it.
quotes.author: Robert H. Schuller

quotes.quote: Problems in relationship occur because each person is concentrating on what is missing in the other person.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: The greatest and most important problems of life are all fundamentally insoluble. They can never be solved but only outgrown.
quotes.author: Carl Gustav Jung

quotes.quote: Be thankful for problems. If they were less difficult, someone with less ability might have your job.
quotes.author: James A. Lovell

quotes.quote: Avoiding problems you need to face is avoiding the life you need to live.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: All problems become smaller if you don't dodge them but confront them.
quotes.author: William F. Halsey, Sr.

quotes.quote: Most of the challenges in life are the ones we create for ourselves.
quotes.author: Rick Berman

quotes.quote: The challenge, is to improve yourself. To enrich yourself. Enjoy it.
quotes.author: Christian Tod

quotes.quote: Our very strength incites challenge. Challenge incites conflict. And conflict... breeds catastrophe.
quotes.author: Christopher Markus

quotes.quote: It's time to get to work / I challenge you to work / There's no secret about this / You reap what you sow
quotes.author: Youssou N'Dour

quotes.quote: For spirit thrives where darkness comes to challenge you / Be more than words / Be more than strength and kind / Be love and blind / To those who come to you
quotes.author: William Hugh Cashion

quotes.quote: It's the eye of the tiger / It's the thrill of the fight / Rising up to the challenge / Of our rival
quotes.author: Frank Sullivan

quotes.quote: Listen as your day unfolds / Challenge what the future holds / Try and keep your head up to the sky
quotes.author: Des'ree Weekes

quotes.quote: When you grasped the question / Did you miss the meaning? / When you met your challenge / Did you go out fighting? / We will discover / Ripeness twice over?
quotes.author: Ian Stephen Mcculloch

quotes.quote: Thousands of lives wasting away / People living from day to day / It's a challenge just staying alive
quotes.author: Norman Whitfield

quotes.quote: Colored in pastures of chance / Dancing leaves cast spells of challenge / Amused but real in thought / We fled from the sea whole
quotes.author: Alan White

quotes.quote: Faced with a challenge of finding right and wrong / In a brand new world that recognizes none / It's hard for me to believe in all my travels / I'm the only one
quotes.author: Farris

quotes.quote: Another journey for me / Another challenge to win / I'm here again to complete / My mission impossible / I'm not ready to die / The fear's become my ally
quotes.author: Marco Pastorino

quotes.quote: The more that you think you ain't getting to the end / Focus on the challenge / And it will begin
quotes.author: Talib Matin

quotes.quote: We're fighting tooth and nail / Our backs may be against the wall / But there's no way we can fail / Rising to the challenge / Take our chances with both hands
quotes.author: John Lynton Gallagher

quotes.quote: If you rise for every challenge, if you run to catch your dreams / That star that you keep reaching for is closer than it seems
quotes.author: Tony Haselden

quotes.quote: But balance is good / The world isn't fair / The challenge is great / It's bitter and sweet / Just balance the hate
quotes.author: Carlos Coleman

quotes.quote: Live for the challenge, only make me stronger / One more reason to turn up on them
quotes.author: Kehlani

quotes.quote: Find your challenge, suffer miles / Colors gray, he brings them out / Don't mind the challenge, suffer miles / A little shallow, if I don't say
quotes.author: Peter Loeffer

quotes.quote: Cause there's a passion / Moving at the speed of light / We're fighting the challenge / Of troubles deep inside
quotes.author: Michelle Williams

quotes.quote: They take the challenge to their hearts / Challenging preconceived ideas / Saying goodbye to long standing fears
quotes.author: Howard Jones

quotes.quote: Shallow dreams undone / Fruitless and unsung / No challenge towers so steep / Seven horses deep
quotes.author: Ian Mcnabb

quotes.quote: But at my heels there’s a strong wind that blows / I’ll celebrate the highs and learn from the lows, / And face the challenges of life, / With my shoulders back and my head held high
quotes.author: Andrew Oxspring

quotes.quote: Which challenges itself as honors born, / And is not like the sire: honors thrive, / When rather from our acts we them derive, / Than our fore-goers
quotes.author: Shaks. All's Well

quotes.quote: Challenges are what make life interesting; overcoming them is what makes life meaningful.
quotes.author: Joshua Maxine

quotes.quote: Challenges come in every size, shape, and form we can imagine. Some are seasonal. And the challenges of this life just keep coming like a waves on the seashore.
quotes.author: Bill Hybels

quotes.quote: Because it's hard, it does not mean it is not worth doing. / The difficult we do immediately. / The impossible takes a little longer. / Accept bold and audacious challenges.
quotes.author: Horatius

quotes.quote: It is wisdom to brazen out challenges and deal with the problem directly to fling down the gauntlet of difficulties.
quotes.author: Ifeanyi Enoch Onuoha

quotes.quote: No matter the challenges you are going through, great people went through and came out of it. You are coming out a success; you are a success.
quotes.author: Ifeanyi Enoch Onuoha

quotes.quote: No matter the intensity of your challenges in this life, increase your curiosity find a way out of the challenging circumstance.
quotes.author: Ifeanyi Enoch Onuoha

quotes.quote: When you face the adversity of challenging experiences head on, you develop the skills, abilities, and strength, to face other adversities in the future.
quotes.author: James A. Murphy

quotes.quote: The adversity and challenges you experience are just a part of your life, a part of your personal growth.
quotes.author: James A. Murphy

quotes.quote: From the day we take our first breath, life is all about the challenges we experience, and the lessons we need to learn from them.
quotes.author: James A. Murphy

quotes.quote: Life is always throwing challenges at us, and as students, it's up to us to learn the lesson from every one of them.
quotes.author: James A. Murphy

quotes.quote: The more we face our challenges and the more we overcome the bigger one's, the easier life gets, the easier life becomes for us. It's because of our past challenges; that we have the skills, knowledge, and tools to our current challenges.
quotes.author: James A. Murphy

quotes.quote: No one searches for adversity. Bad experiences are simply part of life. The likelihood that you will encounter adversity at some point in your lifetime comes with a 100 percent guarantee.
quotes.author: Eileen S. Lenson

quotes.quote: When we are faced with numerous decisions, problems, and challenges, the refusal to give up, and instead, to persist even when facing continued discouragement and ongoing problems, helps us achieve the goals we want.
quotes.author: Eileen S. Lenson

quotes.quote: To every life there are challenges and some happenings, which may come up as one continues the journey of making life worth it and achieving said tasks and goals.
quotes.author: Edward Kwarteng

quotes.quote: Being mindful of your state gives you the power to prove something against the challenges in your life.
quotes.author: Edward Kwarteng

quotes.quote: Challenges are less if we hold on to the power to resist the frustrations of our life.
quotes.author: Edward Kwarteng

quotes.quote: One way or the other, one can also overcome life and its challenges by aspiring to use the power, knowledge and wisdom given them from above.
quotes.author: Edward Kwarteng

quotes.quote: Those challenges you are battling with in your life have their main sources and you need to deal with them fast whenever they approach you.
quotes.author: Edward Kwarteng

quotes.quote: One of our greatest challenges is to allow hard, painful, and tear-filled experiences to be our teacher in the classroom of life.
quotes.author: Bill Crowder

quotes.quote: Life is hard and what you do with your difficult life experiences will determine how you turn out in the end.
quotes.author: Franca Lawrence

quotes.quote: There will always be problems and challenges as long as we live.
quotes.author: Franca Lawrence

quotes.quote: Challenges and obstacles exist because we are called to learn something new to achieve goals.
quotes.author: Tony Fahkry

quotes.quote: But if we understand the underlying reason of our challenges, we can move through them with less discomfort.
quotes.author: Tony Fahkry

quotes.quote: Accepting your challenges opens the door to major breakthroughs, and the hidden opportunities surrounding them.
quotes.author: Tony Fahkry

quotes.quote: Success is due to our stretching to the challenges of life. Failure comes when we shrink from them.
quotes.author: John C Maxwell

quotes.quote: The key to accepting challenges lies in engaging your inner resolve and personal fortitude.
quotes.author: Tony Fahkry

quotes.quote: Acknowledging your challenges means to welcome what is taking place in your life, instead of pushing it away hoping it will resolve itself; it seldom does.
quotes.author: Tony Fahkry

quotes.quote: Life's challenges are not supposed to paralyze you; they are supposed to help you discover who you are and what you are made of.
quotes.author: Spence Finlayson

quotes.quote: Life is not about waiting for the storm to pass; it's about learning to dance in the rain.
quotes.author: Spence Finlayson

quotes.quote: Facing those challenges can be difficult, as it often requires a great deal of self-reflection and introspection.
quotes.author: Don Mann

quotes.quote: Knowledge and experience can play a critical role in identifying obstacles, allowing us to better understand and evaluate the challenges we face at any given time.
quotes.author: Don Mann

quotes.quote: Life has a beautiful way of teaching lessons through the challenges you face.
quotes.author: Jennifer Pullara

quotes.quote: Challenges are part of life and can redefine who you are.
quotes.author: Jennifer Pullara

quotes.quote: Those who are unprepared to handle challenges and adversity will become frustrated, discouraged, and are likely to give up long before their goals are achieved.
quotes.author: Donna Daisy

quotes.quote: When adversity occurs, you always have a choice. You can become helpless and give up, believing that nothing you do will make a difference. Or, you can choose to become empowered by acquiring the mindset, the lifestyle, and the skills.
quotes.author: Donna Daisy

quotes.quote: One of the biggest challenges we all face in our lives is continuing to work toward our goals when life throws obstacles in our paths, or when we just get discouraged.
quotes.author: Donna Daisy

quotes.quote: We also need a strong belief in our ability to respond effectively to life's challenges.
quotes.author: Donna Daisy

quotes.quote: Journalism is the ability to meet the challenge of filling space.
quotes.author: Rebecca West

quotes.quote: Absolutely nothing in this world gives you more satisfaction than knowing you're on the road to success and achievement.
quotes.author: John A. Andrews

quotes.quote: Whenever a problem presents itself, we view it as a challenge and we either go through it, over it, under it or around it.
quotes.author: John A. Andrews

quotes.quote: As a leader, one of the greatest challenges you may face is how to convey your message to the people looking to you for guidance.
quotes.author: Monica L. Wofford

quotes.quote: Accept bold and audacious challenges.
quotes.author: Vincenzo Berghella

quotes.quote: Because it's hard, it does not mean it is not worth doing.
quotes.author: Vincenzo Berghella

quotes.quote: The difficult we do immediately. The impossible takes a little longer.
quotes.author: Vincenzo Berghella

quotes.quote: The hurrier I go, the behinder I get.
quotes.author: David Allen

quotes.quote: Things rarely get stuck because of lack of time. They get stuck because of doing of them has not been defined.
quotes.author: David Allen

quotes.quote: Individual commitment to a group effort - that is what makes a team work, a company work, a society work.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: If you fail to plan, you plan to fail.
quotes.author: Vincenzo Berghella

quotes.quote: Work is fun, and there is no fun like work.
quotes.author: Noel Coward

quotes.quote: Hard work and good deeds are reward enough.
quotes.author: Elisa Medhus

quotes.quote: It's amazing what two can accomplish if you do not care who gets the credit.
quotes.author: Jason K. Baxter

quotes.quote: The problem is not that there are problems. The problem is expecting otherwise and thinking that having problems is a problem.
quotes.author: Theodore Rubin

quotes.quote: Challenges are what make life interesting; overcoming them is what makes life meaningful.
quotes.author: Joshua J. Marine

quotes.quote: Most of the important things in the world have been accomplished by people who have kept on trying when there seemed to be no hope at all.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: What is to give light must endure burning
quotes.author: Viktor Frankl

quotes.quote: Every problem has a gift for you in its hands.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: Don't get stuck thinking that your life can't and won't change for the better.
quotes.author: Jon Gordon

quotes.quote: Don't go through life focusing on your problems with your head down. Instead keep your eyes open and your head up.
quotes.author: Jon Gordon

quotes.quote: Complainers talk about problems.
quotes.author: Jon Gordon

quotes.quote: Instead of complaining about problems, look for solutions.
quotes.author: Jon Gordon

quotes.quote: Focus on the positive and help overcome negativity.
quotes.author: Jon Gordon

quotes.quote: He did not see his problems. He only saw all these people who could use his help.
quotes.author: Bob Weinstein

quotes.quote: The challenge is not to be perfect. It's to be whole.
quotes.author: Jane Fonda

quotes.quote: Childcare is a challenge for almost all employed parents.
quotes.author: Ann C. Crouter

quotes.quote: Every problem is an opportunity in disguise.
quotes.author: Jason K. Baxter

quotes.quote: To any problem, you can choose to ignore or to cure.
quotes.author: John Taylor

quotes.quote: The best way to solve any problem is to remove its cause.
quotes.author: John Taylor Wood

quotes.quote: As tides of life rise and fall, life is constant, like the waves crashing upon the shore. Persistence is the key in high and low times.
quotes.author: James A. Murphy

quotes.quote: We must also look into our feelings of grief and loss. When we accept that everything is constantly changing, when we accept the inevitability that people and animals die, we can deal with pain in a much better fashion.
quotes.author: Aaron Soltys

quotes.quote: Embrace your grief and your sadness felt towards those that have passed and remember them with love.
quotes.author: Aaron Soltys

quotes.quote: Replace your grief with love and appreciation. That is truly what any who have departed from our lives would wish for us.
quotes.author: Aaron Soltys
