quotes.quote: You are more powerful than your circumstances. They don't define you. You do.
quotes.author: Jon Gordon

quotes.quote: The story you tell yourself defines the life you live and the actions you take. It's important to tell yourself a positive story.
quotes.author: Jon Gordon

quotes.quote: Sometimes life is hard. How do you hang on when things seem hopeless? You can tackle your problems as you would climb a mountain.
quotes.author: Andrew Matthews

quotes.quote: Through hard times. It puts your life into perspective. It will get you back on track.
quotes.author: Andrew Matthews

quotes.quote: Fruitful times are waiting those who are patient in the hard times.
quotes.author: Jonathan H. Wilson

quotes.quote: Those who do not have worthy struggles in their lives never enjoy the pleasure of celebrating a hard-won victory.
quotes.author: Eric Greitens

quotes.quote: Life can be challenging and sad... but music is the easy part.
quotes.author: St. Vincent

quotes.quote: If there is no challenging of the sinful heart, there is no gospel preaching.
quotes.author: Darrin Patrick

quotes.quote: The further you get away from yourself, the more challenging it is. Not to be in your comfort zone is great fun.
quotes.author: Benedict Cumberbatch

quotes.quote: Magic lies in challenging what seems impossible.
quotes.author: Carol Moseley Braun

quotes.quote: Keep challenging yourself to think better, do better, and be better.
quotes.author: Robin Sharma

quotes.quote: As for what's the most challenging aspect of teaching, it's convincing younger writers of the importance of reading widely and passionately.
quotes.author: Chang-Rae Lee

quotes.quote: The most challenging part of being a boss is that nobody will tell you if your work is suffering.
quotes.author: Bill Williams

quotes.quote: One of the more challenging things in life is not being the guy who does the cheating, but not saying anything about it and going along with it.
quotes.author: Dale Murphy

quotes.quote: Sustaining true friendship is a lot more challenging than we give it credit for.
quotes.author: Mariella Frostrup

quotes.quote: The goal you set must be challenging. At the same time, it should be realistic and attainable, not impossible to reach. It should be challenging enough to make you stretch, but not so far that you break.
quotes.author: Rick Hansen

quotes.quote: The challenging times will bring you closer together in marriage.
quotes.author: Bill Rancic

quotes.quote: Challenging the meaning of life is the truest expression of the state of being human.
quotes.author: Viktor E. Frankl

quotes.quote: It's challenging to find an identity as a young person if you don't have the sustenance of love, because you're being shipped around.
quotes.author: Mary J. Blige

quotes.quote: The most challenging part of being a dad is self-restraint. So often your instinct is to teach and tell. I am constantly reminding myself to listen to them.
quotes.author: Michael Chiklis

quotes.quote: Writing is challenging work because it's so easy to get consumed with how it's going, what's going to happen to it, who's going to like or not like it. You want to get all of that stuff out of your head and just let the work flow.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: It's hard to balance everything. It's always challenging.
quotes.author: Vera Wang

quotes.quote: Dreams can often become challenging, but challenges are what we live for.
quotes.author: Travis White

quotes.quote:
Maturity is about Challenging yourself and Improving!
And then taking that experience to help othersâ€¦
quotes.author: Tsem Tulku

quotes.quote: Challenging the integrity of the non-proliferation regime is a matter which can affect international peace and security.
quotes.author: Mohamed ElBaradei

quotes.quote: Love is a complicated emotion because you can learn something or hear something that goes against what you have come to know personally. It can be very challenging to what you believe.
quotes.author: Aja Naomi King

quotes.quote: Opportunities to find deeper powers within ourselves come when life seems most challenging.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: Challenging someone is good. You need to do it. Sometimes they don't even realize you're doing it, like when you joke with a goalie, 'What's wrong today? You losing it?
quotes.author: Sidney Crosby

quotes.quote: We don't develop courage by being happy every day. We develop it by surviving difficult times and challenging adversity.
quotes.author: Barbara De Angelis

quotes.quote: The only thing as challenging as getting tangled in the underbrush of relationship is trying to write about it.
quotes.author: Thomas Moore

quotes.quote: Friction and misunderstandings often occur when communicating across generations. It gets even more challenging when working across virtual settings.
quotes.author: Raymond Arroyo

quotes.quote: Dreams have always expanded our understanding of reality by challenging our boundaries of the real, of the possible.
quotes.author: Henry Reed

quotes.quote: We are living in very challenging times. Pressured in the workplace and stressed out at home, people are trying to make sense of their lives.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: Digitization is certainly challenging the old ways of doing things, whether that's in publishing or politics. But it's not the end. In many ways, it is just the beginning.
quotes.author: Heather Brooke

quotes.quote: Me, as a person, I grow. I'm like a chameleon. You know? That is a gift and a curse for me. But more so a gift, because it never puts me in a box.
quotes.author: Kendrick Lamar

quotes.quote: It's a new challenge to see how people can change your look. I like words like transformation, reinvention, and chameleon. Because one word I don't like is predictable.
quotes.author: Naomi Campbell

quotes.quote: The thing about chameleoning your way through life is that it gets to where nothing is real.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: We are like chameleons, we take our hue and the color of our moral character, from those who are around us.
quotes.author: John Locke

quotes.quote: Reality has changed chameleonlike before my eyes so many times that I have learned, or am learning, to trust almost anything except what appears to be so.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: We are chameleons, and our partialities and prejudices change place with an easy and blessed facility, and we are soon wonted to the change and happy in it.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: There are, of course problems with being a chameleon. For one, its emotional cost is high. Being unmasked and consequently disgraced and rejected is always possible. For another, managing impressions and pretending to be what one is not is a perilous affair.
quotes.author: Bernard Rosen

quotes.quote: Being a successful chameleon is not easy. It takes concentration and luck, because a chameleon's path is strewn with mines. One misstep and all is over. Chameleons are always at risk. They cannot afford to lower their guard, even for a second. Skeptical adversaries may at any moment rip off their masks; a slip of the tongue may reveal their true intentions; someone may call the chameleon's bluff, and suddenly the game is up.
quotes.author: Bernard Rosen

quotes.quote: A chameleon does not leave one tree until it is sure of another.
quotes.author: Arabian Proverb

quotes.quote: The chameleon changes color to match the earth; the earth doesn't change color to match the chameleon.
quotes.author: West African Proverb

quotes.quote: When the log was struck by lightning, the chameleon was hit too.
quotes.author: Burmese Proverb

quotes.quote: All over Africa, the chameleon is respected and feared. And here and there people haven't yet forgiven him for his responsibility for man's immortality. According to the legend, God decided, one day, to make man immortal, and sent the chameleon to tell man the good news. Then God changed his mind, and sent along another lizard with instructions to call off man's immortality — unless the chameleon had already arrived. But the chameleon was so poky that the other lizard got there long ahead of him, and this is how man lost his chance at immortality. Some people are still annoyed about it.
quotes.author: Oden Meeker

quotes.quote: It is only the superficial qualities that last. Man's deeper nature is soon found out.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: We all know the story of the unfortunate chameleon which turned brown when placed on a brown rug, and turned red when placed on a red rug, but who died a tragic death when they put him on a Scotch plaid.
quotes.author: Franklin Delano Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Deceive more slyly than Ulysses could, / And, like a Sinon, take another Troy. / I can add colours to the chameleon, / Change shapes with Proteus for advantages, / And set the murderous Machiavel to school. / Can I do this, and cannot get a crown? / Tut, were it farther off, I'll pluck it down.
quotes.author: (Henry VI) William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: The nation's image has become more like a chameleon—accepting whatever trend marketers concoct. Gone are the days of reverencing a holy God in the church or within ourselves. Yet the Bible tells us, "Happy is the man who is always reverent" (Proverbs 28:14 NKJV).
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Too many so-called Christians are like the little chameleon which adapts its coloration to that of its surroundings. Even a critical world is quick to recognize a real Christian and just as quick to detect a counterfeit.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: For beauty is intangible, vague, ill to be defined; She hath the coat of a chameleon, changing while we watch it.
quotes.author: Martin Farquhar Tupper

quotes.quote: Now Earl of Guile, and Lord Forlorn, thou goes, / Quitting thy Prince, to serve his Spanish foes, / No faith in plaids, no trust in Highland trews, / Camelion-like, they change to many hues.
quotes.author: Alexander Craig of Rose-Craig

quotes.quote: Too many milieux injure an adaptable sensibility. There was once a chameleon whose owner, to keep it warm, put it on a gaudy Scottish plaid. The chameleon died of fatigue.
quotes.author: Jean Cocteau

quotes.quote: I was always an unusual girl. My mother told me I had a chameleon soul, no moral compass pointing due north, no fixed personality; just an inner indecisiveness that was as wide and as wavering as the ocean.
quotes.author: Lana Del Rey

quotes.quote: Chameleons aren't that bad. Kind of taste like chicken.
quotes.author: Chef Leo

quotes.quote: Humans are the only species that can lie. Except for maybe chameleons. Ooh, and possums. They play dead.
quotes.author: Nick Brady

quotes.quote: The race of man is known for its mutability, we can change our moods, our faces, our lives, to suit what ever situation confronts us. Adapt and survive. Even among the most changeable of living things, man is quick silver, more chameleon like than the chameleon, no matter what the cost to others, or himself.
quotes.author: Control Voice

quotes.quote: That is not a woman. It's a chameleon. Whatever you see is what she wants you to see. And if she smiles at you, it's because she wants you dead. That isn't someone who's ever been anywhere she didn't want to be.
quotes.author: Jennifer Goines

quotes.quote: I never saw you arrive / Though you're always around / Making your day / Close to the ground / Around with the pigs / Feeding on what's left behind / Adapt your colors to my mind / Chameleon / Fooling all those who are blind / Chameleon / Adapt your colors / Chameleon.
quotes.author: Bastiaan F. Frank Harthoorn

quotes.quote: Chameleon - what's your color today / Chameleon - this ain't your color to stay / Chameleon - blows the way the wind blows / Chameleon - goes where everyone goes / What's the new thing this week / Is it because you're weak / Is it acceptance you seek / You don't have to be a freak / Freak / Chameleon - what's the look right now / Chameleon - I know you'll change somehow / Chameleon - I didn't recognize you / Chameleon - because you look like a fool.
quotes.author: Bernie Taupin

quotes.quote: Chameleon, like you see the slithering ones / If you don't blend in you're in danger / Which face saves face it's a slippery slope / And you can't fight back on your own.
quotes.author: Clark Alan Baechle

quotes.quote: As the Chameleon, who is known / To have no colours of his own, / But borrows from his neighbour's hue / His white or black, his green or blue, / And struts as much in ready light, / Which credit gives him upon sight, / As if the rainbow were entail / Settled on him and his heirs-male.
quotes.author: Matthew Prior

quotes.quote: A dragon-fly with beauteous wing / Is hov'ring o'er a silv'ry spring; / I watch its motions with delight,-- / Now dark its colours seem, now bright; / Chameleon-like appear, now blue, / Now red, and now of greenish hue. / Would it would come still nearer me, / That I its tints might better see.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: The body of chameleon changed color with surrounding foliage, / its serrations stood erect when tickled by red brick, / as it glared devilishly at innocuous bunch of radiating insects. / I punctured its silhouette with needle arrow, / captured more of its species with meticulous proficiency, / adorned my slender neck with a garlands of dead chameleon.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: We take our colors, chameleon-like, from each other.
quotes.author: Nicolas Chamfort

quotes.quote: The chameleon, who is said to feed upon nothing but air, has of all animals the nimblest tongue.
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

quotes.quote: Everybody in life is a chameleon.
quotes.author: Melanie Chisholm

quotes.quote: Chameleons feed on light and air: Poets food is love and fame.
quotes.author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quotes.quote: Champagne is one of the elegant extras in life.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: Pleasure without Champagne is purely artificial.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Champagne... the wine of kings, the king of wines.
quotes.author: Guy De Maupassant

quotes.quote: Don't die with a bottle of champagne in your fridge.
quotes.author: Rufus Sewell

quotes.quote: There is nothing like champagne to ensure sweet dreams.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Forsythe Hailey

quotes.quote: Champagne is the only wine that enhances a woman's beauty.
quotes.author: Madame de Pompadour

quotes.quote: Champagne had the taste of an apple peeled with a steel knife.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: Champagne is the one thing that gives me zest when I feel tired.
quotes.author: Brigitte Bardot

quotes.quote: Champagne. In victory one deserves it, in defeat one needs it.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: Champagne is the wine of civilization and the oil of government.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Champagne offers a minimum of alcohol and a maximum of companionship.
quotes.author: David Niven

quotes.quote: You can have too much champagne to drink but you can never have enough.
quotes.author: Elmer Rice

quotes.quote: Champagne, if you are seeking the truth, is better than a lie detector. It encourages a man to be expansive, even reckless, while lie detectors are only a challenge to tell lies successfully.
quotes.author: Graham Greene

quotes.quote: Champagne is the only drink that leaves a woman still beautiful after drinking it.
quotes.author: Madame de Pompadour

quotes.quote: Too much of anything is bad, but too much Champagne is just right.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: A single glass of champagne imparts a feeling of exhilaration. The nerves are braced; the imagination is stirred, the wits become more nimble.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Of all wines, Champagne is the one that is the anytime drink, the panacea for all ills, the best bottle for any occasion and absolutely the only solution when there is something to celebrate.
quotes.author: Serena Sutcliffe

quotes.quote: There comes a time in every woman's life when the only thing that helps is a glass of champagne.
quotes.author: Bette Davis

quotes.quote: The thing about champagne,you say, unfoiling the cork, unwinding the wire restraint, is that is the ultimate associative object. Every time you open a bottle of champagne, it's a celebration, so there's no better way of starting a celebration than opening a bottle of champagne. Every time you sip it, you're sipping from all those other celebrations. The joy accumulates over time.
quotes.author: David Levithan

quotes.quote: Champagne with its foaming whirls/As white as Cleopatra's pearls.
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.quote: If you're given champagne at lunch, there's a catch somewhere.
quotes.author: Richard Lyons

quotes.quote: Champagne makes you feel like it's Sunday and better days are just around the corner.
quotes.author: Marlene Dietrich

quotes.quote: Not only does one drink champagne, but one inhales it, one looks at it, one swallows it ...And one drinks it.
quotes.author: Edward VII

quotes.quote: Champagne and orange juice is a great drink. The orange improves the champagne. The champagne definitely improves the orange.
quotes.author: Philip the Apostle

quotes.quote: Drinking champagne after making love is like taking a bath in chilled pearls.
quotes.author: Anistatia R. Miller

quotes.quote: Always keep a bottle of Champagne in the fridge for special occasions. Sometimes, the special occasion is that you've got a bottle of Champagne in the fridge.
quotes.author: Hester Browne

quotes.quote: Pink Champagne is about having fun and letting go, and living your life to the fullest!
quotes.author: Ariana Grande

quotes.quote: Champions keep playing until they get it right.
quotes.author: Billie Jean King

quotes.quote: True champions aren't always the ones that win, but those with the most guts.
quotes.author: Mia Hamm

quotes.quote: Great champions have an enormous sense of pride. The people who excel are those who are driven to show the world and prove to themselves just how good they are.
quotes.author: Nancy Lopez

quotes.quote: We knew that you don't get to be world champions without a struggle.
quotes.author: Eric Cantona

quotes.quote: There have been great champions in every generation.
quotes.author: Andy Roddick

quotes.quote: Champions all get kicked when they're down.
quotes.author: Apolo Ohno

quotes.quote: What does it take to be a champion? Desire, dedication, determination, concentration and the will to win.
quotes.author: Patty Berg

quotes.quote: To be a champion, you have to learn to handle stress and pressure. But if you've prepared mentally and physically, you don't have to worry.
quotes.author: Harvey Mackay

quotes.quote: The vision of a champion is bent over, drenched in sweat, at the point of exhaustion, when nobody else is looking.
quotes.author: Mia Hamm

quotes.quote: Once a champion, always a champion.
quotes.author: Ferdinand Marcos

quotes.quote: A true champion will fight through anything.
quotes.author: Floyd Mayweather, Jr.

quotes.quote: A champion is someone who gets up, even when he can't.
quotes.author: Jack Dempsey

quotes.quote: You become a champion by fighting one more round. When things are tough, you fight one more round.
quotes.author: James J. Corbett

quotes.quote: If you're a champion, you have to have it in your heart.
quotes.author: Chris Evert

quotes.quote: To be champion requires more than simply being a strong player; one has to be a strong human being as well.
quotes.author: Anatoly Karpov

quotes.quote: A champion needs a motivation above and beyond winning.
quotes.author: Pat Riley

quotes.quote: To be a champion you must act like one, act like a champion.
quotes.author: Lou Ferrigno

quotes.quote: Being champion is all well and good, but you can't eat a crown.
quotes.author: Althea Gibson

quotes.quote: I was born to be champion of the world.
quotes.author: Roberto Duran

quotes.quote: A champion owes everybody something. He can never pay back for all the help he got, for making him an idol.
quotes.author: Jack Dempsey

quotes.quote: The mark of a great player is in his ability to come back. The great champions have all come back from defeat.
quotes.author: Sam Snead

quotes.quote: The breakfast of champions is not cereal, it's the opposition.
quotes.author: Nick Seitz

quotes.quote: Champions aren't made in gyms. Champions are made from something they have deep inside them-a desire, a dream, a vision. They have to have the skill, and the will. But the will must be stronger than the skill.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: Be very strong... be very methodical in your life if you want to be a champion.
quotes.author: Alberto Juantorena

quotes.quote: Champions are propelled by desire, not compelled by fear.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: If you are going to be a champion, you must be willing to pay a greater price.
quotes.author: Bud Wilkinson

quotes.quote: A true champion is not judged by how much he or she is admired, but by how well they can stand at the face of adversity.
quotes.author: John Cena

quotes.quote: Champions do not become champions when they win the event, but in the hours, weeks, months and years they spend preparing for it. The victorious performance itself is merely the demonstration of their championship character.
quotes.author: Alan Armstrong

quotes.quote: To be a great champion you must believe you are the best. If you're not, pretend you are.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: You know what a champion is? A champion is someone who's ready when the gong rings - not just before, not just after - but when it rings.
quotes.author: Jack Dempsey

quotes.quote: Everyone has the fire, but the champions know when to ignite the spark.
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: To be a champion, compete; to be a great champion, compete with the best; but to be the greatest champion, compete with yourself.
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.quote: A champion is one who is remembered. A legend is one who is never forgotten.
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.quote: Amateurs quit when they are tired. Champions quit only when they have won.
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.quote: It doesn't matter how far down you fall as long as you can still look up and see the stars.
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.quote: True champions, like the sun, cannot be eclipsed for long.
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.quote: Everyone falls, the only difference is champions get up.
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.quote: Champions, like seeds, only gain strength when you bury them.
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.quote: Champions realize that defeat - and learning from it even more than from winning - is part of the path to mastery.
quotes.author: Rasheed Ogunlaru

quotes.quote: Champions are made in the dark before they are revealed in light.
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.quote: Champions have different mentality they have a stronger self belief.
quotes.author: Sandeep Kakkar

quotes.quote: To be a champion, you don't need power you need training
quotes.author: Dr.P.S. Jagadeesh Kumar

quotes.quote: Champions never sleep, the eternal spirit keep them alert and awake.
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: It is not over. Champions extend their limits and make things happen.
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: I need to remain humble, stay disciplined and keep training. That's how I will continue to be a champion.
quotes.author: Andy Ruiz Jr.

quotes.quote: But tomorrow is the most perpetually true champion; is the most indomitably optimistic of them all.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: See the champion of summer wake, little armies in field and wake.
quotes.author: Edith Nesbit

quotes.quote: Thither the fate-marked champion bent his way, by purling streams to lose the heal of day.
quotes.author: Thomas Chatterton

quotes.quote: Through the thick braked the astonished champion sees a weeping damsel bending on her knees.
quotes.author: Thomas Chatterton

quotes.quote: The champion thus desist discourteous knight, why dost thou shamefully misuse thy might.
quotes.author: Thomas Chatterton

quotes.quote: Down to the ground the champion's gauntlet flew, i dare thy fury, and i'll prove it to.
quotes.author: Thomas Chatterton

quotes.quote: The field is safely granted by their guide, this said, the champion for his armor cried.
quotes.author: Torquato Tasso

quotes.quote: Then were the people amazed and they called for the champion of champions.
quotes.author: Andrew Paton Baterson

quotes.quote: Loud sand the lunatic his song of the champions of valour until he was sighted and captured by fleet-footed keepers.
quotes.author: Andrew Paton Baterson

quotes.quote: And if she lose her champion true, tell heaven not despair.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Upon his foe the other champion flew, with equal courage, and with equal ire.
quotes.author: Torquato Tasso

quotes.quote: You champions bold, with me that escaped have so many dangers, and such hard assays, whom still your God did keep, defend and save.
quotes.author: Torquato Tasso

quotes.quote: When with a clumsy, lucky clout he knocked the champion out.
quotes.author: Robert William Service

quotes.quote: Renowned champion full of wrestling art, and made for victory in every part.
quotes.author: William Strode

quotes.quote: And thou shalt rise, summon'd with champion sound , antaeus-like, more strong from underground.
quotes.author: William Strode

quotes.quote: When you color me, color me black commanding, cultivated compassionate, a champion.
quotes.author: Dolores M. Johnson

quotes.quote: While the brown ale he quaffed, loud then the champion laughed.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: The champion of all necks which feel the yoke, as once she stood sublime in every land.
quotes.author: Wilfrid Scawen Blunt

quotes.quote: You would say I was a champion who knows how to defend, and she left me with the feeling - most unpleasant, I aver that the whole world would despise me is it hadn't been for her.
quotes.author: Ella Willer Wilcox

quotes.quote: With brains and honesty, some five and twenty long years as champion of all that's good.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: The cloistered brethren's thunderous chaunt, the errant champion's song, the shifting of the crowns and thrones, the tangle of the strong.
quotes.author: Gilbert Keith Chesterton

quotes.quote: What when a stoud unbending champion awes envy and malice to their native sty?
quotes.author: John Keats

quotes.quote: For whatever it's worth, never fall a victim of the struggle. And when it so happens remain a soldier and a champion.
quotes.author: DON SANTO

quotes.quote: I needed a Champion. So, I became one! Fulfill the requirements of your own requirements.
quotes.author: Nicky Verd

quotes.quote: Winning is great, sure, but if you are really going to do something in life, the secret is learning how to lose. Nobody goes undefeated all the time. If you can pick up after a crushing defeat, and go on to win again, you are going to be a champion someday.
quotes.author: Wilma Rudolph

quotes.quote: Inches make champions.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: If you expect the best, you will be the best. Learn to use one of the most powerful laws in this world; change your mental habits to belief instead of disbelief. Learn to expect, not to doubt. In so doing, you bring everything into the realm of possibility.
quotes.author: Dr. Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: Champions invariably have fervent philosophical beliefs. Philosophy, in its simplest terms, means 'the love of wisdom.'
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: The mind is the limit. As long as the mind can envision the fact that you can do something, you can do it, as long as you really believe 100 percent.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.quote: I dream, therefore I become.
quotes.author: Cheryl Renee Grossman

quotes.quote: Victorious warriors win first and then go to war, while defeated warriors go to war first then seek to win.
quotes.author: Sun-tzu

quotes.quote: The will to win is important, but the will to prepare is vital.
quotes.author: Joe Paterno

quotes.quote: Far better it is to dare mighty things, to win glorious triumphs, even though checkered by failure, than to take rank with those poor spirits who neither enjoy much nor suffer much, because they live in the grey twilight that knows not victory nor defeat.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Only those who dare to fail greatly can ever achieve greatly.
quotes.author: Robert Francis Kennedy

quotes.quote: Winners take chances. Like everyone else, they fear failing, but they refuse to let fear control them.
quotes.author: Nancy Simms

quotes.quote: I hated every minute of training, but I said, 'Don't quit. Suffer now and live the rest of your life as a champion.'
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: I've missed more than 9,000 shots in my career. I've lost almost 300 games. 26 times, I've been trusted to take the game winning shot and missed. I've failed over and over and over again in my life. And that is why I succeed.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.quote: Gold medals aren't really made of gold. They're made of sweat, determination, and a hard-to-find alloy called guts.
quotes.author: Dan Gable

quotes.quote: Be not afraid of greatness. Some are born great, some achieve greatness, and others have greatness thrust upon them.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Some people say I have attitude - maybe I do... but I think you have to. You have to believe in yourself when no one else does, that makes you a winner right there.
quotes.author: Venus Williams

quotes.quote: I'm convinced that about half of what separates the successful entrepreneurs from the non-successful ones is pure perseverance.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Pain is temporary. It may last a minute, or an hour, or a day, or a year, but eventually it will subside and something else will take its place. If I quit, however, it lasts forever.
quotes.author: Lance Armstrong

quotes.quote: If you aren't going all the way, why go at all?
quotes.author: Joe Namath

quotes.quote: I became a good pitcher when I stopped trying to make them miss the ball and started trying to make them hit it.
quotes.author: Sandy Koufax

quotes.quote: Talent may get you on the field but it's effort & attitude that will keep you there.
quotes.author: Ken Griffey Jr.

quotes.quote: I really think a champion is defined not by their wins but by how they can recover when they fall. I have fallen several times. Each time I get up and dust myself off .
quotes.author: Serena Williams

quotes.quote: The champion, Jess Willard, had about as much chance in this fight as a dish-faced chimpanzee in a beauty contest.
quotes.author: Arthur 'Bugs' Baer

quotes.quote: If Larry Holmes is the people's champion, then asparagus is the people's vegetable.
quotes.author: Bernie Lincicome

quotes.quote: I've been knocked down more than any heavyweight champion in history, but I consider that a compliment, because I must have got up more than any heavyweight champion.
quotes.author: Floyd Patterson

quotes.quote: Every child deserves a champion – an adult who will never give up on them, who understands the power of connection and insists that they become the best that they can possibly be.
quotes.author: Rita Pierson

quotes.quote: There is nothing like training and preparation. You have to train your mind as much as your body.
quotes.author: Venus Williams

quotes.quote: There's no avoiding persistence.
quotes.author: Jal Tucher

quotes.quote: Every champion was once a contender who refused to give up.
quotes.author: Rocky Balboa

quotes.quote: I'm guilty of giving people more chances than they deserve but when I'm done, I'm done.
quotes.author: Turcois Ominek

quotes.quote: Chances don't approach you, it's you who approach chances.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: Chances are anywhere else, all you need to do is to grab them because they don't always show up.
quotes.author: Carl Lomer Abia

quotes.quote: A wise man turns chance into good fortune.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: Chance can allow you to accomplish a goal every once in a while, but consistent achievement happens only if you love what you are doing.
quotes.author: Bart Conner

quotes.quote: Chance favors only those who court her.
quotes.author: Charles Nicolle

quotes.quote: Chance fights ever on the side of the prudent.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: Chance is the providence of adventurers.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: Nobody owes anybody a living, but everybody is entitled to a chance.
quotes.author: Jack Dempsey

quotes.quote: Chance is a word void of sense; nothing can exist without a cause.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Chance is always powerful. Let your hook always be cast; in the pool where you least expect it, there will be fish.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.quote: Where observation is concerned, chance favors only the prepared mind.
quotes.author: Louis Pasteur

quotes.quote: Chance is the fool's name for Fate.
quotes.author: Fred Astaire

quotes.quote: He who leaves nothing to chance will do few things poorly, but he will do few things.
quotes.author: Edward F. Halifax

quotes.quote: There is no such thing as chance or accident the words merely signify our ignorance of some real and immediate cause.
quotes.author: Adam Clarke

quotes.quote: Chance happens to all, but to turn chance to account is the gift of few.
quotes.author: Edward Bulwer-Lytton

quotes.quote: There is no such thing as no chance.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: One chance is all you need.
quotes.author: Jesse Owens

quotes.quote: Those who trust to chance must abide by the results of chance.
quotes.author: Calvin Coolidge

quotes.quote: Chance never helps those who do not help themselves.
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.quote: Chance corrects us of many faults that reason would not know how to correct.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: To talk of luck and chance only shows how little we really know of the laws which govern cause and effect.
quotes.author: Hosea Ballou

quotes.quote: No man ever became wise by chance.
quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quotes.quote: Chance governs all.
quotes.author: John Milton

quotes.quote: Unless a man has trained himself for his chance, the chance will only make him ridiculous.
quotes.author: W. Matthews

quotes.quote: If chance will have me king, why, chance may crown me.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: It is safer to accept any chance that offers itself, and extemporize a procedure to fit it, than to get a good plan matured, and wait for a chance of using it.
quotes.author: Thomas Hardy

quotes.quote: Bad chances were better than no chances.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: Notions of chance and fate are the preoccupations of men engaged in rash undertakings.
quotes.author: Cormac Mccarthy

quotes.quote: We ought never to trust to chance but when we cannot find a better surety.
quotes.author: Norman Macdonald

quotes.quote: You get as many chances as you want; as many as you dare to make for yourself.
quotes.author: EDWARD BLOOR

quotes.quote: Life is too precious to be left to chance.
quotes.author: Walter Moers

quotes.quote: How slight a chance may raise or sink a soul!
quotes.author: Philip James Bailey

quotes.quote: No conqueror believes in chance.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: If the sun comes up, I have a chance.
quotes.author: Venus Williams

quotes.quote: Chance determines our lives in important ways.
quotes.author: Gerhard Richter

quotes.quote: Chance has never yet satisfied the hope of a suffering people.
quotes.author: Marcus Garvey

quotes.quote: Chance favors those in motion.
quotes.author: James Austin

quotes.quote: Chances are like lightning: they never hit the earth at the same spot twice. So when a chance comes your way, grab it cause it may never come again.
quotes.author: Unkown

quotes.quote: Just keep taking chances and having fun.
quotes.author: Garth Brooks

quotes.quote: Beware of missing chances; otherwise it may be altogether too late some day.
quotes.author: Franz Liszt

quotes.quote: Taking Chances almost always makes for happy endings.
quotes.author: Barbara Corcoran

quotes.quote: If I had not try and taken chances, I would have miss many opportunities in life.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Whom chance often passes by, it finds at last.
quotes.author: Albanian Proverb

quotes.quote: Never miss a good chance to shut up.
quotes.author: American Proverb

quotes.quote: Blind chance sweeps the world along.
quotes.author: Albanian Proverb

quotes.quote: He who waits for a chance may wait for a long time.
quotes.author: Nigerian Proverb

quotes.quote: He who takes no chances wins nothing.
quotes.author: Danish Proverb

quotes.quote: You have to make the most of the chances that come your way. You have to strike while the iron is hot.
quotes.author: Spanish Proverb

quotes.quote: A person who misses a chance and the monkey who misses its branch -- both cannot be saved.
quotes.author: Indian Proverb

quotes.quote: A wise man adapts himself to circumstances, as water shapes itself to the vessel that contains it.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: As the sun's shadow shifts, so there is no permanence on earth.
quotes.author: Afghan (on permanence and change)

quotes.quote: We can't be afraid of change. You may feel very secure in the pond that you are in, but if you never venture out of it, you will never know that there is such a thing as an ocean, a sea. Holding onto something that is good for you now, may be the very reason why you don't have something better.
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.quote: To improve is to change; to be perfect is to change often.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: A little axe can cut down a big tree.
quotes.author: Jamaican (on permanence and change)

quotes.quote: When we are no longer able to change a situation, we are challenged to change ourselves.
quotes.author: Victor Frankl

quotes.quote: A rolling stone gathers no moss.
quotes.author: John Heywood

quotes.quote: Progress is impossible without change, and those who cannot change their minds cannot change anything
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: At high tide, fish eat ants; at low tide, ants eat fish.
quotes.author: Thai (on permanence and change)

quotes.quote: People who wait for changes to occur on the outside before they commit to making changes on the inside will never make any changes at all.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: The wheel of change moves on, and those who were down go up and those who were up go down.
quotes.author: Jawaharlal Nehru

quotes.quote: He who rejects change is the architect of decay. The only human institution which rejects progress is the cemetery.
quotes.author: Harold Wilson

quotes.quote: A year's care; a minute's ruin.
quotes.author: Filipino Proverb

quotes.quote: You must be the change you wish to see in the world.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: An hour may destroy what an age was building.
quotes.author: English (on permanence and change)

quotes.quote: Everyone thinks of changing the world, but no one thinks of changing himself.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: Things change. And friends leave. Life doesn't stop for anybody.
quotes.author: Stephen Chbosky

quotes.quote: Without accepting the fact that everything changes, we cannot find perfect composure. But unfortunately, although it is true, it is difficult for us to accept it. Because we cannot accept the truth of transience, we suffer.
quotes.author: Shunryu Suzuki

quotes.quote: The only people who like change are wet babies.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: A decision made at night may be changed in the morning.
quotes.author: Samoan (on permanence and change)

quotes.quote: The art of life is a constant readjustment to our surroundings.
quotes.author: Kakuzo Okakaura

quotes.quote: Life is like the moon: now full, now dark.
quotes.author: Polish (on permanence and change)

quotes.quote: The winds of heaven change suddenly; so do human fortunes.
quotes.author: Chinese (on permanence and change)

quotes.quote: When the moon is full, it begins to wane.
quotes.author: Japanese (on permanence and change)

quotes.quote: You must welcome change as the rule but not as your ruler.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: Change is inevitable. except from a vending machine.
quotes.author: Robert C. Gallagher

quotes.quote: When you are through changing, you are through.
quotes.author: Bruce Barton

quotes.quote: You can avoid having ulcers by adapting to the situation: If you fall in the mud puddle, check your pockets for fish.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: All change is not growth, as all movement is not forward.
quotes.author: Ellen Glasgow

quotes.quote: After you've done a thing the same way for two years, look it over carefully. After five years, look at it with suspicion. And after ten years, throw it away and start all over.
quotes.author: Alfred Edward Perlman

quotes.quote: Change is the law of life and those who look only to the past or present are certain to miss the future.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: Everything comes to pass, nothing comes to stay.
quotes.author: Matthew Flickstein

quotes.quote: Persist as resolutely as you persist in eating.
quotes.author: Maori (on permanence and change)

quotes.quote: We all have big changes in our lives that are more or less a second chance.
quotes.author: Harrison Ford

quotes.quote: Things do not change; we change.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Change is hard because people overestimate the value of what they have and underestimate the value of what they may gain by giving that up.
quotes.author: James Belasco and Ralph Stayer

quotes.quote: People don't resist change. They resist being changed!
quotes.author: Peter Senge

quotes.quote: It is not the strongest or the most intelligent who will survive but those who can best manage change.
quotes.author: Charles Darwin

quotes.quote: Change your thoughts and you change your world.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: Pleasures are transient – honors immortal
quotes.author: Greek Proverb

quotes.quote: The leopard does not change his spots.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Come what may, time and hour runs through the roughest day.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Any plan is bad that cannot be changed.
quotes.author: Italian (on planning)

quotes.quote: Change is inevitable. Change is constant.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: All good things must come to an end.
quotes.author: H.H. Riley

quotes.quote: Off with the old and on with the new.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Nothing remains constant except change itself.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The change is for a cause.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed, citizens can change the world. Indeed, it is the only thing that ever has.
quotes.author: Margaret Mead

quotes.quote: The world as we have created it is a process of our thinking. It cannot be changed without changing our thinking.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Yesterday I was clever, so I wanted to change the world. Today I am wise, so I am changing myself.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: It’s only after you’ve stepped outside your comfort zone that you begin to change, grow, and transform.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: Nothing is so painful to the human mind as a great and sudden change.
quotes.author: Mary Wollstonecraft Shelley

quotes.quote: Life is a series of natural and spontaneous changes. Don't resist them; that only creates sorrow. Let reality be reality. Let things flow naturally forward in whatever way they like.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: The only way that we can change is if we learn.
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.quote: For what it’s worth: it’s never too late or, in my case, too early to be whoever you want to be. There’s no time limit, stop whenever you want. You can change or stay the same, there are no rules to this thing. We can make the best or the worst of it.
quotes.author: Eric Roth

quotes.quote: Even if you cannot change all the people around you, you can change the people you choose to be around.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: Don't just change, transform.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: Change will not come if we wait for some other person, or if we wait for some other time. We are the ones we've been waiting for. We are the change that we seek.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: When we least expect it, life sets us a challenge to test our courage and willingness to change; at such a moment, there is no point in pretending that nothing has happened or in saying that we are not yet ready.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: They always say time changes things, but you actually have to change them yourself.
quotes.author: Andy Warhol

quotes.quote: You never change your life until you step out of your comfort zone; change begins at the end of your comfort zone.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: Incredible change happens in your life when you decide to take control of what you do have power over instead of craving control over what you don't.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Those who cannot change their minds cannot change anything.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: The present changes the past. Looking back you do not find what you left behind.
quotes.author: Kiran Desai

quotes.quote: We are not trapped or locked up in these bones. No, no. We are free to change. And love changes us. And if we can love one another, we can break open the sky.
quotes.author: Walter Mosley

quotes.quote: You're always you, and that don't change, and you're always changing, and there's nothing you can do about it.
quotes.author: Neil Gaiman

quotes.quote: We are taught you must blame your father, your sisters, your brothers, the school, the teachers - but never blame yourself. It's never your fault. But it's always your fault, because if you wanted to change you're the one who has got to change.
quotes.author: Katharine Hepburn

quotes.quote: And that is how change happens. One gesture. One person. One moment at a time.
quotes.author: Libba Bray

quotes.quote: I alone cannot change the world, but I can cast a stone across the waters to create many ripples.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: Some changes look negative on the surface but you will soon realize that space is being created in your life for something new to emerge.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: Change the way you look at things and the things you look at change.
quotes.author: Wayne W. Dyer

quotes.quote: It's never too late to change your life for the better. You don't have to take huge steps to change your life. Making even the smallest changes to your daily routine can make a big difference to your life.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: Believe something and the Universe is on its way to being changed. Because you've changed, by believing. Once you've changed, other things start to follow. Isn't that the way it works?
quotes.author: Diane Duane

quotes.quote:
You never change things by fighting the existing reality.
To change something, build a new model that makes the existing model obsolete.
quotes.author: Buckminster Fuller

quotes.quote: One day spent with someone you love can change everything.
quotes.author: Mitch Albom

quotes.quote: You cannot change what you are, only what you do.
quotes.author: Philip Pullman

quotes.quote: I wanted to change the world. But I have found that the only thing one can be sure of changing is oneself.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: You cannot change anyone, but you can be the reason someone changes.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: Things change, people change, but that doesn't mean you should forget the past.
quotes.author: GAIL CARSON LEVINE

quotes.quote: Work and struggle and never accept an evil that you can change.
quotes.author: Andre Gide

quotes.quote: Once you've chosen a man, don't try to change him,'I wrote with more confidence. 'It can be done. More important - don't let him try to change you.
quotes.author: Diana Gabaldon

quotes.quote: The gospel says God will change us because he loves us.
quotes.author: EiichiroOda

quotes.quote: I can't say whether things will get better if we change; what I can say is that they must change if they are to get better.
quotes.author: Georg Christoph Lichtenberg

quotes.quote: Things can change in a day.
quotes.author: Arundhati Roy

quotes.quote: One cannot be too careful with words, they change their minds just as people do.
quotes.author: Jose Samarago

quotes.quote: The people who are crazy enought to think they can change the world are the ones who do.
quotes.author: Walter Isaacson

quotes.quote: The people who are crazy enought to think they can change the world are the ones who do.
quotes.author: Walter Isaacson

quotes.quote: Don't waste your energy trying to change opinions.
quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.quote: We don't ask you to believe in our ability to bring change, rather, we ask you to believe in yours.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: Every morning we get a chance to be different. A chance to change. A chance to be better.
quotes.author: Nicole Williams

quotes.quote: Some people will always fear change. But we can't indulge them.

quotes.quote: You have been blessed with immeasurable power to make positive changes in your life.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Change your life today. Don't gamble on the future, act now, without delay.
quotes.author: Simone De Beauvoir

quotes.quote: We can either try to change everything or just make the most of whatever time we have.
quotes.author: Ally Condie

quotes.quote: In fact, once he is motivated no one can change more completely than the man who has been at the bottom.
quotes.author: Malcolm X

quotes.quote: She was reaching the limits of how much its possible to change a man.

quotes.quote: I change too quickly: my today refutes my yesterday.

quotes.quote: Our heads are round so thought can change direction.
quotes.author: Allen Ginsberg

quotes.quote: Change isn't always for the best.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: There is no intelligence where there is no need of change.

quotes.quote: Everything is relative in this world, where change alone endures.

quotes.quote: When obstacles arise, you change your direction to reach your goal; you do not change your decision to get there.

quotes.quote: A person can't change all at once.

quotes.quote: Living things tend to change unrecognizably as they grow.

quotes.quote: People can't live with change if there's not a changeless core inside them.

quotes.quote: If you want to change the way people respond to you, change the way you respond to people.
quotes.author: Timothy Leary

quotes.quote: If we don't change, we don't grow. If we don't grow, we aren't really living.
quotes.author: Gail Sheehy

quotes.quote: God, grant me the serenity to accept the things I can't change, the courage to change the things I can, and the wisdom to know the difference.
quotes.author: Serenity Prayer

quotes.quote: If you don't like something, change it, if you can't change it, chage your attitude.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Change your thoughts, change your life.
quotes.author: James Allen

quotes.quote: We change the kind of person we are, and we change the kind of world we live in.
quotes.author: Rabbi Harold Kushner

quotes.quote: To change our realities, we also have to change our myths.
quotes.author: Riane Eisler

quotes.quote: To improve is to change; to be perfect is to change often.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Progress is impossible without change, and those who cannot change their minds cannot change anything.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Change your life today. Don't gamble on the future, act now, without delay.
quotes.author: Simone De Beauvoir

quotes.quote: Strong character is brought out by change, weak ones by permanence.
quotes.author: Jean Paul

quotes.quote: Change your thoughts and you change your world.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: Learn to adjust yourself to the conditions you have to endure, but make a point of trying to alter or correct conditions so that they are most favorable to you.
quotes.author: William Frederick Book

quotes.quote: A wise man adapts himself to circumstances, as water shapes itself to the vessel that contains it.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: Each of us has the opportunity to change and grow until our very last breath. Happy creating.
quotes.author: M.F. Ryan

quotes.quote: Adaptability is not imitation. It means power of resistance and assimilation.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: It is not the strongest or the most intelligent who will survive but those who can best manage change.
quotes.author: Charles Darwin

quotes.quote: It doesn't matter where you are, you are nowhere compared to where you can go.
quotes.author: Bob Proctor

quotes.quote: Never too old, never too bad, never too late, never too sick to start from scratch once again.
quotes.author: Bikram Choudhury

quotes.quote: Getting over a painful experience is much like crossing monkey bars. You have to let go at some point in order to move forward.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Each person's task in life is to become an increasingly better person.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: Man cannot discover new oceans unless he has the courage to lose sight of the shore.
quotes.author: Andre Gide

quotes.quote: When in doubt, choose change.
quotes.author: Lily Leung

quotes.quote: All great changes are preceded by chaos.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Sometimes good things fall apart so better things can fall together.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: And that is how change happens. One gesture. One person. One moment at a time
quotes.author: Libba Bray

quotes.quote: No matter who you are, no matter what you did, no matter where you've come from, you can always change, become a better version of yourself.
quotes.author: Madonna

quotes.quote: If we change, we don't grow. If we don't grow, we aren't really living.
quotes.author: Gail Sheeshy

quotes.quote: Unless you are prepared to give up something valuable you will never be able to truly change at all, because you'll be forever in the control of things you can't give up
quotes.author: Andy Law

quotes.quote: Change has a bad reputation in our society. But it isn't all bad not by any means. In fact, change is necessary in life to keep us moving ... to keep us growing ... to keep us interested . ... Imagine life without change. It would be static ... boring ... du
quotes.author: Dr. Dennis O'Grady

quotes.quote: Every generation needs a new revolution.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: Neither a wise man nor a brave man lies down on the tracks of history to wait for the train of the future to run over him.
quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quotes.quote: He that will not apply new remedies must expect new evils; for time is the greatest innovator.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: If you wait, all that happens is you get older.
quotes.author: Larry McMurtry

quotes.quote: Be the change that you wish to see in the world.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: What I like most about change is that it's a synonym for hope . If you are taking a risk, what you are really saying is, I believe in tomorrow and I will be part of it.
quotes.author: Linda Ellerbee

quotes.quote: Incredible change happens in your life when you decide to take control of what you do have power over instead of craving control over what you don't.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: I wanted to change the world. But I have found that the only thing one can be sure of changing is oneself.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxle

quotes.quote: When people are ready to, they change. They never do it before then, and sometimes they die before they get around to it. You can't make them change if they don't want to, just like when they do want to, you can't stop them.

quotes.quote: Don't wish it was easier, wish you were better. Don't wish for less problems, wish for more skills. Don't wish for less challenges, wish for more wisdom.

quotes.quote: Only I can change my life. No one can do it for me.

quotes.quote: Change is the constant, the signal for rebirth, the egg of the phoenix.
quotes.author: Christina Baldwin

quotes.quote: We all have big changes in our lives that are more or less a second chance.
quotes.author: Harrison Ford

quotes.quote: The only way you can sustain a permanent change is to create a new way of thinking, acting, and being.
quotes.author: Jennifer Hudson

quotes.quote: Turbulence is life force. It is opportunity. Let's love turbulence and use it for change.
quotes.author: Ramsay Clark

quotes.quote: There is nothing like returning to a place that remains unchanged to find the ways in which you yourself have altered.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: To change the name and not the letter, is a change for the worst, and not for the better.
quotes.author: Robert Chambers

quotes.quote: Each of us has the opportunity to change and grow until our very last breath. Happy creating.
quotes.author: M. F. Ryan

quotes.quote: If you wish to be happy, think not of what is to come nor of that which you have no control over but rather of the now and of that which you are able to change.

quotes.quote: One cause of misery is the inability to change.

quotes.quote: Nothing happens until the pain of staying the same outweighs the pain of change

quotes.quote: We must be willing to let go of the life we planned so as to have the life that is waiting for us.

quotes.quote: Your life does not get better by chance, it gets better by change.

quotes.quote: Our lives improve only when we take chances and the first and most difficult risk we can take is to be honest with ourselves.

quotes.quote: We delight in the beauty of the butterfly, but rarely admit the changes it has gone through to achieve that beauty.

quotes.quote: A scholar who loves comfort is not fit to be called a scholar.

quotes.quote: I cannot say whether things will get better if we change. What I can say is they must change if they are to get better.

quotes.quote: The world will change for the better when people decide they are sick and tired of being sick and tired of the way the world is, and decide to change themselves.

quotes.quote: Men make history and not the other way around. In periods where there is no leadership, society stands still. Progress occurs when courageous, skillful leaders seize the opportunity to change things for the better.

quotes.quote: To change and to change for the better are two different things.

quotes.quote: We must become the change we want to see.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: You can change all things for the better when you change yourself for the better.

quotes.quote: The most powerful thing you can do to change the world is to change your own beliefs about the nature of life, people, reality, to something more positive.

quotes.quote: But we can always assume that we all have the right and responsibility to choose to improve our condition in life. And that choice is the main trait of intelligence in a human being.

quotes.quote: There is nobody who totally lacks the courage to change.

quotes.quote: I was fortunate to find other ways to serve and be of use and to try my best to bring a positive change to the world. And I'm still trying.
quotes.author: Gore

quotes.quote: Knowledge is power, and if you're looking for the power to change, you have to make yourself knowledgeable. This is a message I try to continually share with children and hope that it takes hold and they go out and learn how to change the world in a positive way.
quotes.author: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar

quotes.quote: Change is inevitable. In a progressive country, change is constant.

quotes.quote: No great improvements in the lot of mankind are possible until a great change takes place in the fundamental constitution of their modes of thought.

quotes.quote: If you know what you want to achieve in life, then you are more inspired to change for the better.
quotes.author: Philip Vang

quotes.quote: A wise man changes his mind, a fool never will.
quotes.author: Spanish Proverb

quotes.quote: Don’t be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
quotes.author: John D. Rockefeller

quotes.quote: There is nothing wrong with change if it is in the right direction.

quotes.quote: The thing that lies at the foundation of positive change, the way I see it, is service to a fellow human being.

quotes.quote: In order to design a future of positive change, we must first become an expert at changing our minds.

quotes.quote: I have always wanted to be a catalyst for bringing about positive change, inspiring others to choose goodness.

quotes.quote: I learned to take those experiences that were difficult in my life and in the adversity that I had overcome to use it for a positive change.

quotes.quote: At any given moment we have two options: to step forward into growth or step back into safety.

quotes.quote: When the winds of change blow, some people build walls and others build windmills.

quotes.quote: The art of progress is to preserve order amid change and to preserve change amid order.

quotes.quote: We can’t be afraid of change. You may feel very secure in the pond that you are in, but if you never venture out of it, you will never know that there is such a thing as an ocean, a sea.
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.quote: It is not the strongest or the most intelligent who will survive but those who can best manage change.
quotes.author: Charles Darwin

quotes.quote: The art of life is a constant readjustment to our surroundings.
quotes.author: Kakuzo Okakaura

quotes.quote: All fixed set patterns are incapable of adaptability or pliability. The truth is outside of all fixed patterns.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: A wise man adapts himself to circumstances, as water shapes itself to the vessel that contains it.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: Each of us has the opportunity to change and grow until our very last breath. Happy creating.
quotes.author: M.F. Ryan

quotes.quote: Never too old, never too bad, never too late, never too sick to start from scratch once again.
quotes.author: Bikram Choudhury

quotes.quote: It doesn't matter where you are, you are nowhere compared to where you can go.
quotes.author: Bob Proctor

quotes.quote: Nobody can go back and start a new beginning, but anyone can start today and make a new ending.

quotes.quote: By changing nothing, nothing changes.

quotes.quote: Getting over a painful experience is much like crossing monkey bars. You have to let go at some point in order to move forward.

quotes.quote: Change is the law of life. And those who look only to the past or present are certain to miss the future.

quotes.quote: Since we cannot change reality, let us change the eyes which see reality.

quotes.quote: When we are no longer able to change a situation - we are challenged to change ourselves.

quotes.quote: Everyone thinks of changing the world, but no one thinks of changing himself.

quotes.quote: To improve is to change; to be perfect is to change often.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: To exist is to change, to change is to mature, to mature is to go on creating oneself endlessly
quotes.author: Henri Bergson

quotes.quote: When you're finished changing, you're finished.

quotes.quote: The reasonable man adapts himself to the world; the unreasonable man persists in trying to adapt the world to himself. Therefore, all progress depends on the unreasonable man.

quotes.quote: By nature man hates change; seldom will he quit his old home till it has actually fallen around his ears.

quotes.quote: Change your life today. Don't gamble on the future, act now, without delay.

quotes.quote: He who rejects change is the architect of decay. The only human institution which rejects progress is the cemetery.

quotes.quote: If you don't like something change it; if you can't change it, change the way you think about it.

quotes.quote: All changes, even the most longed for, have their melancholy; for what we leave behind us is a part of ourselves; we must die to one life before we can enter another.

quotes.quote: They must often change, who would be constant in happiness or wisdom.

quotes.quote: Those who expect moments of change to be comfortable and free of conflict have not learned their history.

quotes.quote: The wheel of change moves on, and those who were down go up and those who were up go down.

quotes.quote: Life is a series of natural and spontaneous changes. Don't resist them; that only creates sorrow. Let reality be reality. Let things flow naturally forward in whatever way they like
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: There are two primary choices in life: to accept the conditions as they exist or accept the responsibility for changing them

quotes.quote: The secret of change is to focus all of your energy, not on fighting the old, but on building the new

quotes.quote: When you're trying to motivate yourself, appreciate the fact that you're even thinking about making change. And as you move forward, allow yourself to be good enough.

quotes.quote: Consider how hard it is to change yourself and you'll understand what little chance you have in trying to change people.

quotes.quote: We must become the change we wish to see in the world.

quotes.quote: Seek the rapids, not the calm of the lake. Take the calm to reflect and prepare for the rapids. If we face permanent white water, we will see the need for and experience change.

quotes.quote: All meaningful and lasting change starts first in your imagination and then works its way out. Imagination is more important than knowledge.

quotes.quote: There are two kinds of fools: One says, This is old therefore it is good. The other one says, This is new therefore it is better.

quotes.quote: Most of the change we think we see in life is due to truths being in and out of favor.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: The world goes up and the world goes down, the sunshine follows the rain; and yesterday's sneer and yesterday's frown can never come over again.
quotes.author: Charles Kingsley

quotes.quote: Strong character is brought out by change, weak ones by permanence.
quotes.author: Jean Paul

quotes.quote: Man's duty is to improve himself; to cultivate his mind; and, when he finds himself going astray, to bring the moral law to bear upon himself.
quotes.author: Immanuel Kant

quotes.quote: To change who you are, change who you think you are.
quotes.author: Jonathan Lockwood Huie

quotes.quote: You never find yourself until you face the truth.
quotes.author: Pearl Bailey

quotes.quote: It is not change that causes anxiety; it is the feeling that we are without defenses in the presence of what we see as danger that causes anxiety.
quotes.author: Robert Kegan and Lisa Laskow Lahey

quotes.quote: The important thing is this: to be ready at any moment to sacrifice what you are for what you could become.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: We must become the change we wish to see in the world.
quotes.author: Mahatma Ghandi

quotes.quote: I alone cannot change the world, but I can cast a stone across the waters to create many ripples.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: If you want to change the world, pick up your pen and write.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: You really can change the world if you care enough.
quotes.author: Marian Wright Edelman

quotes.quote: Everyone thinks of changing the world, but no one thinks of changing himself.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: If there is no transformation inside of us, all the structural change in the world will have no impact on our institutions.
quotes.author: Peter Block

quotes.quote: Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed citizens can change the world; indeed, it's the only thing that ever has.
quotes.author: Margaret Mead

quotes.quote: Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: I tried to change the world, but I was outnumbered.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Making one person smile can change the world. Maybe not the whole world, but their world.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: We have it in our power to change the world over.
quotes.author: Thomas Paine

quotes.quote: I wanted to change the world. But I have found that the only thing one can be sure of changing is oneself.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: As one person I cannot change the world, but I can change the world of one person.
quotes.author: Paul Shane Spear

quotes.quote: Change your thoughts and you change your world.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: Be what you are. Do what you love. Speak what you feel. Don't hide your humanity. Celebrate it. Embrace it. That is how you change the world.
quotes.author: Vironika Tugaleva

quotes.quote: I can't change you and you can't change me, but together we can work to change the world.
quotes.author: Germany Kent

quotes.quote: When you inspire one person you have already changed the world.
quotes.author: Sabina Nore

quotes.quote: To change the world, one has to ignore its residents.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: We can change the world one thought at a time, one child at a time, one family at a time, one community at a time, one city, one state and one country at a time.
quotes.author: Bryant McGill

quotes.quote: The ones who are crazy enough to think that they can change the world, are the ones who do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: If you think we can't change the world, It just means you're not one of those that will.
quotes.author: Jacque Fresco

quotes.quote: Yesterday I was clever, so I wanted to change the world. Today I am wise, so I am changing myself.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: No matter what people tell you, words and ideas can change the world.
quotes.author: Robin Williams

quotes.quote: I choose to believe I can and will change the world with my words and thoughts.
quotes.author: Rod Williams

quotes.quote: Things don't have to change the world to be important.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: In order to change the world, you have to get your head together first.
quotes.author: Jimi Hendrix

quotes.quote: Every great dream begins with a dreamer. Always remember you have within you the srength, the patience and the passion to reach for the stars to change the world.
quotes.author: Harriet Tubman

quotes.quote: God is calling you to change the world one life at a time and one small step at a time. Begin today where you are.
quotes.author: Dillon Burroughs

quotes.quote: If you don't like the way the world is, you change it. You have an obligation to change it. You just do it one step at a time.
quotes.author: Marian Wright Edelman

quotes.quote: It is not great men who change the world, but weak men in the hands of a great God.
quotes.author: Brother Yun

quotes.quote: I'm not saying I'm gonna change the world, but I guarantee that I will spark the brain that will change the world.
quotes.author: Tupac Shakur

quotes.quote: Your voice can change the world.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: The world can only change from within.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: Can we change the world? No, but hell, we can all try.
quotes.author: Rupert Murdoch

quotes.quote: I can't change the world. I have to to fix me.
quotes.author: Nijou Phillips

quotes.quote: I am not here to change the world. I am changing the world because I am here.
quotes.author: Lisa Wilson

quotes.quote: Let the world change you and you can change the world.
quotes.author: Che Guevara

quotes.quote: We can change the world and make it a better place. It is in your hands to make a difference.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: If your life changes, we can change the world, too.
quotes.author: Yoko Ono

quotes.quote: The only way we can change our world is to take responsibility for our part in it.
quotes.author: Rachael Bermingham

quotes.quote: If you're changing the world, you're working on important things. You're excited to get up in the morning.
quotes.author: Larry Page

quotes.quote: Changing the world is not easy, but its pursuit will change you profoundly.
quotes.author: Leroy Hood

quotes.quote: People can care about changing the world. But what gets them to act is pressure and social reward.
quotes.author: Joe Green

quotes.quote: We change the world not by what we say or do, but as a consequence of what we have become.
quotes.author: David R. Hawkins

quotes.quote: My friends, love is better than anger. Hope is better than fear. Optimism is better than despair. So let us be loving, hopeful and optimistic. And we'll change the world.
quotes.author: Jack Layton

quotes.quote: Let us pick up our books and our pens. They are our most powerful weapons. One child, one teacher, one book, and one pen can change the world.
quotes.author: Malala Yousafzai

quotes.quote: Vision without action is merely a dream. Action without vision just passes the time. Vision with action can change the world.
quotes.author: Joel A. Barker

quotes.quote: I still believe that if your aim is to change the world, journalism is a more immediate short-term weapon.
quotes.author: Tom Stoppard

quotes.quote: Choose your corner, pick away at it carefully, intensely and to the best of your ability and that way you might change the world.
quotes.author: Charles Eames

quotes.quote: We think it is complicated to change the world. Change comes little by little. Nothing worthwhile can happen in one generation.
quotes.author: Andrew Young

quotes.quote: None of us has the power to make someone else love us. But we all have the power to give away love, to love other people. And if we do so, we change the kind of person we are, and we change the kind of world we live in.
quotes.author: Rabbi Harold Kushner

quotes.quote: Let the streams of life flow in peace. / Turn from violence. / Learn to think for a long time how to change the world / How to make it better to live in.
quotes.author: Quetzalcoatl

quotes.quote: How lovely to think that no one need wait a moment: we can start now, start slowly changing the world! How lovely that everyone, great and small, can make a contribution toward introducing justice straightaway.
quotes.author: Anne Frank

quotes.quote: If you want to change the way people respond to you, change the way you respond to people.
quotes.author: Timothy Leary

quotes.quote: We do not need magic to change the world, we carry all the power we need inside ourselves already; we have the power to imagine better.
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling

quotes.quote: The way to change the world is through individual responsibility and taking local action in your own community.
quotes.author: Jeff Bridges

quotes.quote: Policies are the rules of the world we live in. Changing the world means changing the rules.
quotes.author: Makani Themba-Nixon

quotes.quote: Your thoughts, your evolving answers to the important questions are what will give you interesting lives, make you interesting people capable of changing the world
quotes.author: Amy Tan

quotes.quote: The world does need changing, society needs changing, the nation needs changing, but we never will change it until we ourselves are changed.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Oh, you, you may not see it now / But I believe that time will tell / How you, you are changing the world / One little heartbeat at a time.
quotes.author: Steven Chapman

quotes.quote: Far away, away, fading distant lights / Leaving us all behind, lost in a changing world / And you know that these are the days of our lives remember.
quotes.author: Anthony George Banks

quotes.quote: And now it feels like we just can't stop anymore / Even if we tried / We're not changing the world / We're making it right / Whatever you want in this only life / Can we just be proud tonight / 'Cause again we cross the starting line.
quotes.author: Bert Andre Poncet

quotes.quote: I say the world is changing / Not today, nor yesterday / Everyone's eyes are open / They can see clear, ooh.
quotes.author: Mark ANthony Myrie

quotes.quote: Restless / I am so restless / And this changing world / Leaves me speechless.
quotes.author: Bernard Sumner

quotes.quote: To live to feel the earth in motion / I can see there's much hope in changing this world / But no one's listening / We've been living our lives so long in denial / Like whispers to the wind.
quotes.author: Daniel Winter Bates

quotes.quote: As you discover changing times / You must have the strength to endure / As you discover changing world / You can't be guessing, you must be for sure / In these ever-changing times / You must learn to stand up on your own.
quotes.author: Bernard Taylor

quotes.quote: This changing world, this changing scene / Where is it taking us, what does it mean / As long as we're certain of each other / We know we don't have to be afraid / These changing times we rise above / We have no time for them, we have our love / And love is the only thing that still remains the same / Through all this changing world.
quotes.author: Dana Suesse

quotes.quote: I believe it’s time that women truly owned their superpowers and used their beauty and strength to change the world around them.
quotes.author: Janelle Monae

quotes.quote: You can make things happen. You're in control of change.
quotes.author: Dyllan McGee

quotes.quote: Remember, each one of us has the power to change the world.
quotes.author: Yoko Ono

quotes.quote: The ones who are crazy enough to think that they can change the world are the ones who do.
quotes.author: John McAfee

quotes.quote: The way to change the world is through individual responsibility and taking local action in your own community.
quotes.author: Jeff Bridges

quotes.quote: I'm not going to change the world. You're not going to change the world. But we can help - we can all help.
quotes.author: Cristiano Ronaldo

quotes.quote: I think we can only ultimately change the world by example and by fearlessly embracing what could happen.
quotes.author: Genesis P-Orridge

quotes.quote: No one person can change the world, but one and one and one add up.
quotes.author: Sylvie Guillem

quotes.quote: It's certainly my honor to be able to, hopefully, change the world a tiny bit, one mind at a time.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: You're going to change the world? Well, go ahead and try. You'll give it up at a certain point and change yourself instead.
quotes.author: Philip Johnson

quotes.quote: I am crazy and bold enough to think that I CAN change the world - one poem, one book, one heart at a time...
