quotes.author: Adiela Akoo

quotes.quote: Chaos in nature is immediately challenging and forces a good artist to impose some type of order on his or her perception of a site.
quotes.author: Wolf Kahn

quotes.quote: Every chaos has an order hidden in it. What we see as a chaos, is actually driven by a very disciplined and dedicated order of things. What we need to do is focus on the stuff before us, make our way through this chaos, and that order will sort itself out for us.
quotes.author: Sapan Saxena

quotes.quote: Chaos in the world brings uneasiness, but it also allows the opportunity for creativity and growth.
quotes.author: Tom Barrett

quotes.quote: The more chaos there is, the more science holds on to abstract systems of control, and the more chaos is engendered.
quotes.author: William Irwin Thompson

quotes.quote: Chaos magic is the idea that a particular set of beliefs serves as an active force in the world. In other words, we choose what and how we believe, and our beliefs are tools that we then use to make things happen or not.
quotes.author: Sophia Amoruso

quotes.quote: Chaos is inherent in all compounded things. Strive on with diligence.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: Chaos at the bottom means order at the top. Order at the bottom means chaos at the top.
quotes.author: Stephen K. Hayes

quotes.quote: Chaos is peaceful when you stand quietly & watch we are eternal observers, reflecting both tiny & vast, singing infinitely within.
quotes.author: Jay Woodman

quotes.quote: Chaos is what we've lost touch with. This is why it is given a bad name. It is feared by the dominant archetype of our world, which is Ego, which clenches because its existence is defined in terms of control.
quotes.author: Terence McKenna

quotes.quote: Chaos is not the lack of order, it is merely the absence of order, that the observer is used to.
quotes.author: Mamur Mustapha

quotes.quote: Chaos claims the unwary or the incomplete. A true man may flinch away its embrace, if he is stalwart, and he girds his soul with the armour of contempt.
quotes.author: Dan Abnett

quotes.quote: Chaos is the only thing that honestly wants you to grow. The only friend who really helps you be creative.
quotes.author: Dan Wieden

quotes.quote: Chaos half-loosed cannot be long controlled; it is all or nothing.
quotes.author: Dean Koontz

quotes.quote: Chaos is a name for any order that produces confusion in our minds.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.quote: Chaos is a condition of the mind, not of the world.
quotes.author: Marty Rubin

quotes.quote: Fighting is pure chaos, and to be a good fighter you simply have to be prepared mentally and physically to handle that chaos.
quotes.author: B.J. Penn

quotes.quote: The chaos can act as a magnifier of quantum fluctuations so that they can produce sizable effects in the world around us. But we know that that can happen often.
quotes.author: Murray Gell-Mann

quotes.quote: I'm trying to make order out of chaos, trying to find some way of rationalising the horrific things that people do or the way the world is.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: Chaos in the midst of chaos isn't funny, but chaos in the midst of order is.
quotes.author: Steve Martin

quotes.quote: Chaos is the enemy of Order but the enemy of Chaos is also the enemy of Order.
quotes.author: Norman Spinrad

quotes.quote: Chaos is everywhere and artists, to fashion art and live truthfully, have no choice but to invite this unwanted guest right into the studio.
quotes.author: Eric Maisel

quotes.quote: It's a lack of clarity that creates chaos and frustration. Those emotions are poison to any living goal.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Chaos does not mean total disorder. Chaos means a multiplicity of possibilities. Chaos is from the ancient Greek words that means a thing that is birthed from the void. And it was about that which is possible, not about disorder.
quotes.author: Jok Church

quotes.quote: Chaos is rejecting all you have learned, chaos is being yourself.
quotes.author: Emile M. Cioran

quotes.quote: Chaos is merely order waiting to be deciphered.
quotes.author: Jose Saramago

quotes.quote: The chaos we see in nature are the limitations of our perceptions, when we view the world with the eyes of nature, all we shall see are perfection.
quotes.author: Aniekee Tochukwu Ezekiel

quotes.quote: Chaos is the first condition. Order is the first law. Continuity is the first reflection. Quietude is the first happiness.
quotes.author: James Stephens

quotes.quote: Freedom is just Chaos, with better lighting.
quotes.author: Alan Dean Foster

quotes.quote: Chaos often breeds life, when order breeds habit.
quotes.author: Henry Adams

quotes.quote: Chaos furnishes the building blocks for order, and order breaks down to replenish chaos.
quotes.author: Betty Brooks

quotes.quote: Chaos and Order are not enemies, only opposites. Chaos and Order combined equal balance.
quotes.author: Richard Garriott

quotes.quote: The battlefield is a scene of constant chaos. The winner will be the one who controls that chaos, both his own and the enemies.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: Chaos demands to be recognized and experienced before letting itself be converted into a new order.
quotes.author: Hermann Hesse

quotes.quote: A great deal of the chaos in the world occurs because people don't appreciate themselves.
quotes.author: Chogyam Trungpa

quotes.quote: Darkness is the only place, where chaos and peace always met and fell in love with each other.
quotes.author: Akshay Vasu

quotes.quote: Chaos is found in greatest abundance wherever order is being sought. It always defeats order, because it is better organized.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: Chaos is roving through the system and able to undo, at any point, the best laid plans.
quotes.author: Terence McKenna

quotes.quote: If the chaos is overwhelming, I start making lists. To write it down puts it in perspective.
quotes.author: Renee Lawless

quotes.quote: Chaos should be regarded as extremely good news!
quotes.author: Chogyam Trungpa

quotes.quote: Of course, chaos can lead to failure and extinction. But so can order. Far more nations, people, and ideas die of atrophy than die from revolution. Both order and chaos are necessary ingredients for long run success - for sustainability.
quotes.author: John Ikerd

quotes.quote: In Chaos Magic, beliefs are not seen as ends in themselves, but as tools for creating desired effects.
quotes.author: Peter J. Carroll

quotes.quote: Chaos is nothing more than beauty about to dance.
quotes.author: A.D. Posey

quotes.quote: Chaos and destruction do tend to take away a person's dating possibilities.
quotes.author: Veronica Roth

quotes.quote: We live in a rainbow of chaos.
quotes.author: Paul Cezanne

quotes.quote: Chaos is the score upon which reality is written.
quotes.author: Henry Miller

quotes.quote: Chaos was the law of nature; Order was the dream of man.
quotes.author: Henry Adams

quotes.quote: Chaos is impatient. It's random. And above all it's selfish. It tears down everything just for the sake of change, feeding on itself in constant hunger. But Chaos can also be appealing. It tempts you to believe that nothing matters except what you want.
quotes.author: Rick Riordan

quotes.quote: Chaos is perhaps at the bottom of everything.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.quote: You must have chaos within you to give birth to a dancing star.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Chaos has come to be associated with the study of anything complex, but, in fact, the mathematical techniques are directly applicable only to simple systems that appear to be complex.
quotes.author: Neil Gershenfeld

quotes.quote: In the midst of chaos, there is also opportunity.
quotes.author: Sun-tzu

quotes.quote: It's a cruel and random world, but the chaos is all so beautiful.
quotes.author: Hiromu Arakawa

quotes.quote: In all chaos there is a cosmos, in all disorder a secret order.
quotes.author: Carl Gustav Jung

quotes.quote: One man's idea of perfect order is another man's chaos.
quotes.author: Dean Koontz

quotes.quote: We negotiate with chaos for some sense of satisfaction.
quotes.author: Ani DiFranco

quotes.quote: Let chaos reign, then rein in chaos.
quotes.author: Andy Grove

quotes.quote: Introduce a little anarchy, upset the established order, and everything becomes chaos. I’m an agent of chaos, and you know the thing about chaos? It's fair.
quotes.author: Heath Ledger

quotes.quote: The imagination is the power that enables us to perceive the normal in the abnormal, the opposite of chaos in chaos.
quotes.author: Wallace Stevens

quotes.quote: We adore chaos because we love to produce order.
quotes.author: M. C. Escher

quotes.quote: Where no plan is laid, where the disposal of time is surrendered merely to the chance of incident, chaos will soon reign.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: When the mind withdraws into itself and dispenses with facts it makes only chaos.
quotes.author: Edith Hamilton

quotes.quote: I believe that life is chaotic, a jumble of accidents, ambitions, misconceptions, bold intentions, lazy happenstances, and unintended consequences, yet I also believe that there are connections that illuminate our world, revealing its endless mystery and wonder.
quotes.author: David Moranis

quotes.quote: Chaotic people often have chaotic lives, and I think they create that. But if you try and have an inner peace and a positive attitude, I think you attract that.
quotes.author: Imelda Staunton

quotes.quote: By building relations we create a source of love and personal pride and belonging that makes living in a chaotic world easier.
quotes.author: Susan Lieberman

quotes.quote: Every passion borders on the chaotic, but the collector's passion borders on the chaos of memories.
quotes.author: Walter Benjamin

quotes.quote: A schedule defends from chaos and whim. It is a net for catching days. It is a scaffolding on which a worker can stand and labor with both hands at sections of time.
quotes.author: Annie Dillard

quotes.quote: Everybody's a mad scientist, and life is their lab. We're all trying to experiment to find a way to live, to solve problems, to fend off madness and chaos.
quotes.author: David Cronenberg

quotes.quote: When the moon / Of your mind becomes / Clouded over with confusion, / You are searching / Around for the light outside.
quotes.author: Hozoin Gakuzengo Inye

quotes.quote: Blue sky and fine weather can abruptly change to tremulous lightning and rolling thunder. Violent winds and angry rains can abruptly change to serene moonlight and a clear sky. Has the universe ever ceased its workings? Has the universe ever been impeded? Human nature is also like this.
quotes.author: Hong Zicheng

quotes.quote: Viewed from the summit of reason, all life looks like a malignant disease and the world like a madhouse.
quotes.author: Johann Von Goethe

quotes.quote: There is nothing stable in the world—uproar's your only music.
quotes.author: John Keats

quotes.quote: There are some enterprises in which a careful disorderliness is the true method.
quotes.author: Herman Melville

quotes.quote: I have a great belief in the fact that whenever there is chaos, it creates wonderful thinking. I consider chaos a gift.
quotes.author: Septima Clark

quotes.quote: To have order, you must have randomness, because where you have no randomness order cannot manifest itself.
quotes.author: Alan Watts

quotes.quote: Contrary to what we tend to assume, the normal state of the mind is chaos.
quotes.author: Mihaly Csikszentmihalyi

quotes.quote: In the chaos there is the burgeoning of creative quantum leaps of major phase transitions. Therefore, not only embrace the chaos but also embrace the uncertainty in the inherent chaos.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Confusion is the welcome mat at the door of creativity.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: Life is nothing without a little chaos to make it interesting.
quotes.author: Amelia Atwater-Rhodes

quotes.quote: Chaos is a friend of mine. It's like I accept him; does he accept me?
quotes.author: Bob Dylan

quotes.quote: Our real discoveries come from chaos, from going to the place that looks wrong and stupid and foolish.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: I finally figured out that not every crisis can be managed... As much as we want to keep ourselves safe, we can't protect ourselves from everything. If we want to embrace life, we also have to embrace chaos.
quotes.author: Susan Elizabeth Phillips

quotes.quote: Chaos contains information that can lead to knowledge—even wisdom.
quotes.author: Toni Morrison

quotes.quote: Chaos and disorder is like a pebble in my shoe or loose hair under my shirt collar.
quotes.author: Warren Miller

quotes.quote: Disorder is the condition of the mind's fertility; it contains the mind's promise, since its fertility depends upon the unexpected, it depends rather on what we do not know... than what we know.
quotes.author: Paul Valery

quotes.quote: All genius is a conquering of chaos and mystery.
quotes.author: Otto Weininger

quotes.quote: Character cannot be developed in ease and quiet. Only through experience of trial and suffering can the soul be strengthened, ambition inspired, and success achieved.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Character is like a tree and reputation like a shadow. The shadow is what we think of it; the tree is the real thing.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Character contributes to beauty. It fortifies a woman as her youth fades. A mode of conduct, a standard of courage, discipline, fortitude, and integrity can do a great deal to make a woman beautiful.
quotes.author: Jacqueline Bisset

quotes.quote: The best index to a person's character is how he treats people who can't do him any good, and how he treats people who can't fight back.
quotes.author: Abigail Van Buren

quotes.quote: It is curious that physical courage should be so common in the world and moral courage so rare.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Nearly all men can stand adversity, but if you want to test a man's character, give him power.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Out of suffering have emerged the strongest souls; the most massive characters are seared with scars.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: Weakness of attitude becomes weakness of character.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: When you find a man you wish to marry, Tessa, remember this: You will know what kind of man he is not by the things he says, but by the things he does.
quotes.author: Cassandra Clare

quotes.quote: You cannot dream yourself into a character; you must hammer and forge yourself one.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Be your character what it will, it will be known, and nobody will take it upon your word.
quotes.author: Lord Chesterfield

quotes.quote: Reputation is for time; character is for eternity.
quotes.author: J. B. Gough

quotes.quote: Our character is but the stamp on our souls of the free choices of good and evil we have made through life.
quotes.author: John C. Geikie

quotes.quote: The true measure of an individual is how he treats a person who can do him absolutely no good.
quotes.author: Ann Landers

quotes.quote: Personality can open doors, but only character can keep them open.
quotes.author: Elmer G. Letterman

quotes.quote: A person reveals his character by nothing so clearly as the joke he resents.
quotes.author: Georg Christoph Lichtenberg

quotes.quote: The measure of a man's real character is what he would do if he knew he would never be found out.
quotes.author: Thomas B. Macaulay

quotes.quote: Reputation is what men and women think of us. Character is what God and the angels know of us.
quotes.author: Thomas Paine

quotes.quote: If you create an act, you create a habit. If you create a habit, you create a character. If you create a character, you create a destiny.
quotes.author: Andre Maurois

quotes.quote: A man never discloses his own character so clearly as when he describes another's.
quotes.author: Jean Paul

quotes.quote: Character is destiny.
quotes.author: Heraclitus

quotes.quote: Character is the indelible mark that determines the only true value of all people and all their work.
quotes.author: Orison Sweet Marden

quotes.quote: Character is doing the right thing when nobody's looking. There are too many people who think that the only thing that's right is to get by, and the only thing that's wrong is to get caught
quotes.author: J.C. Watts

quotes.quote: Character is much easier kept than recovered.
quotes.author: Thomas Paine

quotes.quote: To know what is right and not do it is the worst cowardice.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Any fool can criticize, condemn, and complain but it takes character and self control to be understanding and forgiving.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: Character, in the long run, is the decisive factor in the life of an individual and of nations alike.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Character - the willingness to accept responsibility for one's own life - is the source from which self respect springs.
quotes.author: Joan Didion

quotes.quote: I choose my friends for their good looks, my acquaintances for their good characters, and my enemies for their good intellects.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Character is the sum total of all our everyday choices.
quotes.author: Margaret Jensen

quotes.quote: It's easier to build strong children than to repair broken men.
quotes.author: Frederick Douglass

quotes.quote: People do not seem to realize that their opinion of the world is also a confession of character.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: I have no regrets in my life. I think that everything happens to you for a reason. The hard times that you go through build character, making you a much stronger person.
quotes.author: Rita Mero

quotes.quote: It is in the character of very few men to honor without envy a friend who has prospered.
quotes.author: Aeschylus

quotes.quote: It is not what he had, or even what he does which expresses the worth of a man, but what he is.
quotes.author: Henri Frederic Amiel

quotes.quote: Character is that which reveals moral purpose, exposing the class of things a man chooses or avoids.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Talents are best nurtured in solitude. Character is best formed in the stormy billows of the world.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Circumstances do not make a man, they reveal him.
quotes.author: Dr. Wayne W. Dyer

quotes.quote: Men of genius are admired, men of wealth are envied, men of power are feared; but only men of character are trusted
quotes.author: Alfred Adler

quotes.quote: Ability can take you the top, but it takes character to keep you there.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Our character is what we do when we think no one is looking.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown

quotes.quote: In the end you should always do the right thing even if it's hard.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: Forming characters! Whose? Our own or others? Both. And in that momentous fact lies the peril and responsibility of our existence.
quotes.author: Elihu Burritt

quotes.quote: Character is higher than intellect.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Character is simply habit long continued.
quotes.author: Plutarch

quotes.quote: A man is but the product of his thoughts. What he thinks, he becomes.
quotes.author: Mohandas K. Gandhi

quotes.quote: Excellence is not a singular act, but a habit. You are what you repeatedly do.
quotes.author: Shaquille Oneal

quotes.quote: You can easily judge the character of a man by how he treats those who can do nothing for him.
quotes.author: James Miles

quotes.quote: I have a dream that my four little children will one day live in a nation where they will not be judged by the color of their skin, but by the content of their character.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King

quotes.quote: Character is determined more by the lack of certain experiences than by those one has had.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Be more concerned with your character than your reputation, because your character is what you really are, while your reputation is merely what others think you are.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: Character is just another word for having a perfectly disciplined and educated will. A person can make his own character by blending these elements with an intense desire to achieve excellence. Everyone is different in what I will call magnitude, but the capacity to achieve character is still the same.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: Winning takes talent, to repeat takes character.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: It is not by muscle, speed, or physical dexterity that great things are achieved, but by reflection, force of character, and judgment.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: Human greatness does not lie in wealth or power, but in character and goodness. People are just people, and all people have faults and shortcomings, but all of us are born with a basic goodness.
quotes.author: Anne Frank

quotes.quote: Character is power.
quotes.author: Booker T. Washington

quotes.quote: Character is made of duty and love and sympathy, and, above all, of living and working for others.
quotes.author: Robert Green Ingersoll

quotes.quote: Industry, thrift and self-control are not sought because they create wealth, but because they create character.
quotes.author: Calvin Coolidge

quotes.quote: This character is not interesting. I'm not gonna act like the original is the best written character, but you felt her pain, you understood her anger, and you cheered for her when things went right because she allowed you to see her most fragile moments.
quotes.author: Doug Walker

quotes.quote: Just because you are a character doesn't mean that you have character.
quotes.author: Quentin Tarantino

quotes.quote: Vice leads to difficulty, virtue to reward. Bad characters come to bad ends.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: It is not true that drink alters a man's character. It may reveal it more fully.
quotes.author: John Osborne

quotes.quote: There's no place in business for a man of character. His sincerity could ruin the world!
quotes.author: Frank Tashlin

quotes.quote: The jails are full of fearless characters.
quotes.author: Arthur Miller

quotes.quote: Money destroys your character.
quotes.author: Sibylle Durian

quotes.quote: The actor Ryan Reynolds was such a Deadpool fan that he spent years and years to get a faithful version of the character brought to the big screen. And guess what? It seems what made people like him now still makes people like him now!
quotes.author: Doug Walker

quotes.quote: I have all these characters inside my head and they want to live.
quotes.author: John August

quotes.quote: A spy has no character; he merely assumes one.
quotes.author: Ronald Millar

quotes.quote: That money had you too too excited / Them cars had you way out your character
quotes.author: Dwayne Carter

quotes.quote: That jewelry got you way out your character / Them girls got you way out your character
quotes.author: Dwayne Carter

quotes.quote: Two characters in search of a country song / Just make believe, but so in love
quotes.author: Merritt Stephin Raymond

quotes.quote: Two characters been listening all night long / For voices from Nashville above
quotes.author: Merritt Stephin Raymond

quotes.quote: To me he's a fabulous character / (He's near and I glow) / A fabulous character / (And I love him so)
quotes.author: Sarah Vaughan

quotes.quote: Hate me all you want / Call me out for fun / I ain't compromising character, I bet that's what you want
quotes.author: Nueve

quotes.quote: Don't break character / You've got a lot of heart / Is this real or just a dream? / Rise up like the sun / Labor 'til the work is done
quotes.author: Brandon FLowers

quotes.quote: She said be gentle boy / You show a lack of character / There is no other way this girl is so all about me / I'm sorry I can't help the way
quotes.author: Chad Everett Gilbert

quotes.quote: Yes I know her when I see her anywhere / Her attitude and character always gone clear
quotes.author: Miguel Orlando Collins

quotes.quote: As for my character. I believe I behave responsibly. I'm not overly susceptible to girls.
quotes.author: Floyd Dell

quotes.quote: A credible reputation is often considered another name for good character.
quotes.author: Joseph A. Bailey

quotes.quote: Character becomes good or bad based upon whether people decide to fashion their decisions and choices around or around hate.
quotes.author: Joseph A. Bailey

quotes.quote: If someone's character and reputation are fit together like interlocking rings, the part that interlocks is called personality.
quotes.author: Joseph A. Bailey

quotes.quote: Your character is who you personally are.
quotes.author: Joseph A. Bailey

quotes.quote: Whatever we do to make us 'be better' (such as through peace and happiness) - and not just 'feel better' - represents a good character trait.
quotes.author: Joseph A. Bailey

quotes.quote: Good character was founded on a person's proper interactions with people in things such as harmony, fair play and doing what is in the best interest of all concerned.
quotes.author: Joseph A. Bailey

quotes.quote: Good character traits are called virtues, and bad ones are called vices.
quotes.author: Christopher Panza

quotes.quote: Most people would like to be admirable and not deplorable.
quotes.author: Christopher Panza

quotes.quote: Having a good character means that you're driven to behave in virtuous ways in situations that call for virtuous responses.
quotes.author: Christopher Panza

quotes.quote: A person of good character is unlikely to do something unethical, immoral or illegal.
quotes.author: Susan K. Maciak

quotes.quote: Good character is having the will power to avoid behavior that would embarrass or reflect negatively on you.
quotes.author: Susan K. Maciak

quotes.quote: A person's reputation most often comes from his or her character.
quotes.author: Susan K. Maciak

quotes.quote: Honesty, integrity and courage are all examples of good character.
quotes.author: Susan K. Maciak

quotes.quote: No magic is required to build a positive personality.
quotes.author: Peter Goldie

quotes.quote: Suppressing one's anger is a sign of good character.
quotes.author: Maulana Wahiduddin Khan

quotes.quote: A responsible person always sets a good example for others.
quotes.author: Maulana Wahiduddin Khan

quotes.quote: A responsible person always sets a good example for others.
quotes.author: Bruce Glassman.

quotes.quote: Setting a good example is mostly about having your actions reflect on you character-instead of just words.
quotes.author: Bruce Glassman.

quotes.quote: The key to success lies in having a strong personality.
quotes.author: Peter Goldie

quotes.quote: The personality trait is also a key determinant of good leadership.
quotes.author: Peter Goldie

quotes.quote: Charisma is the transference of enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Ralph Archbold

quotes.quote: The number one quality is charisma. You have to be able to connect with the audience. That is that magic "it" factor that designates a star from someone who is just never going to be a star.
quotes.author: Stephanie McMahon

quotes.quote: Charm is always genuine; it may be superficial but it isn't false.
quotes.author: P.D. James

quotes.quote: Charisma's good every night. Something special is always about to happen. You've got to believe it.
quotes.author: Jim Thome

quotes.quote: Places have charisma, in short, as much as people do.
quotes.author: Pico Iyer

quotes.quote: Charisma is the result of effective leadership, not the other way around.
quotes.author: Warren Bennis

quotes.quote: Charisma becomes the undoing of leaders. It makes them inflexible, convinced of their own infallibility, unable to change.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: Charm was a scheme for making strangers like and trust a person immediately, no matter what the charmer had in mind.
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.quote: Charisma is not so much getting people to like you as getting people to like themselves when you're around.
quotes.author: Robert Breault

quotes.quote: Charm is more than beauty.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Charm is a product of the unexpected.
quotes.author: Jose Marti

quotes.quote: Charisma is the fancy name given to the knack of giving people your full attention.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: Charm is the ability to make someone think that both of you are quite wonderful.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: But charisma only wins people's attention. Once you have their attention, you have to have something to tell them.
quotes.author: Daniel Quinn

quotes.quote: Charm is a glow within a woman that casts a most becoming light on others.
quotes.author: John Mason

quotes.quote: Charisma is not just saying hello. It's dropping what you're doing to say hello.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: Charisma will sustain a relationship only in the way that strong coffee first thing in the morning will sustain a career.
quotes.author: Elliot Perlman

quotes.quote: Charisma is a sparkle in people that money can't buy. It's an invisible energy with visible effects.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: Charisma seems to be more about the intoxicating quality that you have on other people, as opposed to presence, which is more about the self in relation to others, and how you feel you represented yourself in a situation, and how you were able to engage. So it's less about how others see you and more about how you see yourself.
quotes.author: Amy Cuddy

quotes.quote: Charisma is the ability to influence without logic.
quotes.author: Quentin Crisp

quotes.quote: Charisma is the fragrance of soul.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: Consider the idea that charisma can be as much a liability as an asset. Your strength of personality can sow the seeds of problems, when people filter the brutal facts from you.
quotes.author: James C. Collins

quotes.quote: Lack of charisma can be fatal.
quotes.author: Jenny Holzer

quotes.quote: Charm is the ability to insult people without offending them; nerdiness the reverse
quotes.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

quotes.quote: Authentic power is the real deal. You can't inherit it, buy it, or win it. You also can't lose it. You don't need to build your body, reputation, wealth, or charisma to get it.
quotes.author: Gary Zukav

quotes.quote: Charisma is a sign of the calling. Saints and pilgrims are defiantly moved by it.
quotes.author: B. W. Powe

quotes.quote: Charm is an intangible. Chutzpah, charm, charisma, that kind of thing, you can't buy it.
quotes.author: Colm Feore

quotes.quote: Charisma is the numinous aura around a narcissistic personality. It flows outward from a simplicity or unity of being and a composure and controlled vitality. There is gracious accommodation, yet commanding impersonality. Charisma is the radiance produced by the interaction of male and female elements in a gifted personality. The charismatic woman has a masculine force and severity. The charismatic man has an entrancing female beauty. Both are hot and cold, glowing with presexual self love.
quotes.author: Camille Paglia

quotes.quote: Your charisma and charm can make your moments more memorable for amazing first impressions.
quotes.author: Susan C. Young

quotes.quote: Charm which means the power to effect work without employing brute force is indispensable to women. Charm is a woman's strength just as strength is a man's charm.
quotes.author: Havelock Ellis

quotes.quote: Charm is a way of getting the answer yes without having asked any clear question.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: Charisma is a sparkle in people that money can't buy. It's an invisible energy with visible effects.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: The moment you think you have charisma, you are finished.
quotes.author: Riccardo Muti

quotes.quote: How can you have charisma? Be more concerned about making others feel good about themselves than you are making them feel good about you.
quotes.author: Dan Reiland

quotes.quote: Charm is the quality in others that makes us more satisfied with ourselves.
quotes.author: Henri Frederic Amiel

quotes.quote: Charisma is a fancy name given to the knack of giving people your full attention.
quotes.author: Robert Breault

quotes.quote: Charm is a way of getting the answer yes without having asked any clear question.Charm isâ€¦ a way of getting the answer yes without having asked any clear question.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: Charisma without character is postponed calamity.
quotes.author: Peter Ajisafe

quotes.quote: Charisma is the gift from above where a leader knows from inside himself what to do.
quotes.author: Max Weber

quotes.quote: People that trust wholly to others’ charity, and without industry of their own, will always be poor.
quotes.author: William J. Temple

quotes.quote: No one has ever become poor by giving.
quotes.author: Amme Frank

quotes.quote:
He who wished to secure the good of others,
Has already secured his own.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: If you haven’t any charity in your heart, you have the worst kind of heart trouble.
quotes.author: Bob Hope

quotes.quote: All we need is to build human relations with our deeds. That‘s only thing that lasts forever.
quotes.author: Nana Patekar

quotes.quote: No one has ever become poor by giving.
quotes.author: Anne Frank

quotes.quote: Charity sees the need, not the cause.
quotes.author: Anonymous/ German Proverb

quotes.quote: He who has no charity deserves no mercy.
quotes.author: Anonymous/ English Proverb

quotes.quote: When you have more than you need, build a longer table not a higher fence.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Where there is charity and wisdom, there is neither fear nor ignorance.
quotes.author: Francis of Assisi

quotes.quote: To give up yourself without regret is the greatest charity.
quotes.author: Bodhidharma

quotes.quote: The small charity that comes from the heart is better than the great charity that comes from the head.
quotes.author: Ivan Panin

quotes.quote: He who wished to secure the good of others, has already secured his own.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: In necessary things, unity; in doubtful things, liberty; in all things, charity.
quotes.author: Anne Baxter

quotes.quote: You have not lived today until you have done something for someone who can never repay you.
quotes.author: John Bunyan

quotes.quote: Wishing good, merely, is a lukewarm charity; but doing good is divine.
quotes.author: James Lendall Basford

quotes.quote: It's not how much we give but how much love we put into giving.
quotes.author: Mother Theresa

quotes.quote: What we do for ourselves dies with us. What we do for others and the world remains and is immortal.
quotes.author: Albert Pine

quotes.quote: Charity is a supreme virtue, and the great channel through which the mercy of God is passed onto mankind.
quotes.author: Conrad Hilton

quotes.quote: We can't help everyone, but everyone can help someone.
quotes.author: Dr. Loretta Scott

quotes.quote: The life of a man consists not in seeing visions and in dreaming dreams, but in active charity and in willing service.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: Do not give, as many rich men do, like a hen that lays her egg and then cackles.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: If you can't feed a hundred people, then feed just one.
quotes.author: Mother Theresa

quotes.quote: That charity which longs to publish itself ceases to be charity.
quotes.author: Eliza Cook

quotes.quote: All we need is to build human relations with our deeds. Thatâ€˜s only thing that lasts forever.
quotes.author: Nana Patekar

quotes.quote: There is no exercise better for the heart than reaching down and lifting people up.
quotes.author: John Holmes

quotes.quote: No act of kindness, no matter how small, is ever wasted.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: True charity is the desire to be useful to others with no thought of recompense.
quotes.author: Emanuel Swedenborg

quotes.quote: People that trust wholly to others' charity, and without industry of their own, will always be poor.
quotes.author: William J. Temple

quotes.quote: Bounty always receives part of its value from the manner in which it is bestowed.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: He who has never denied himself for the sake of giving, has but glanced at the joys of charity.
quotes.author: Anne Swetchine

quotes.quote: It is when you give of yourself that you truly give.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: A bone to the dog is not charity. Charity is the bone shared with the dog, when you are just as hungry as the dog.
quotes.author: Jack London

quotes.quote: Charity brings to life again those who are spiritually dead.
quotes.author: Thomas Aquinas

quotes.quote: Charity isn't about pity, it is about love.
quotes.author: Mother Theresa

quotes.quote: Charity is the root of all good works.
quotes.author: Saint Augustine

quotes.quote: When we give cheerfully and accept gratefully, everyone is blessed.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Charity is injurious unless it helps the recipient to become independent of it.
quotes.author: John D. Rockefeller Jr

quotes.quote: As the purse is emptied, the heart is filled.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Every good act is charity. A man's true wealth hereafter is the good that he does in this world to his fellows.
quotes.author: Moliere

quotes.quote: While earning your daily bread, be sure you share a slice with those less fortunate.
quotes.author: Jackson Brown Jr.

quotes.quote: Charity begins at home, but should not end there.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: If you haven't any charity in your heart, you have the worst kind of heart trouble.
quotes.author: Bob Hope

quotes.quote: Words are charms. It's like a song you didn't even know you knew.
quotes.author: Ian Frazier

quotes.quote: Charm â€” which means the power to effect work without employing brute force â€” is indispensable to women. Charm is a woman's strength just as strength is a man's charm.
quotes.author: Havelock Ellis

quotes.quote: Charm is the true gift of the Fairies.
quotes.author: Charles Perrault

quotes.quote: Charm was the luxury of those who still believed in the essential rightness of things. In purity and picket fences.
quotes.author: Denise Lehane

quotes.quote: Charm is the ability to make someone else think that both of you are pretty wonderful.
quotes.author: Kathleen Winsor

quotes.quote: Charm is a glow within a woman which casts a most becoming light on others.
quotes.author: John Mason Brown

quotes.quote: Charm lies in complete forgetfulness of self.
quotes.author: Margery Wilson

quotes.quote: Charm is simply the art of being pleasing.
quotes.author: Patti Page

quotes.quote: Charm is a product of the unexpected.
quotes.author: Jose Marti

quotes.quote: Charm is the next best asset after looks and brains - and can almost make up for looks.
quotes.author: Helen Gurley Brown

quotes.quote: If you can charm everyone it means you don't care about anyone in particular.
quotes.author: Christopher Hitchens

quotes.quote: There are charms made only for distant admiration.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: The charm, one might say the genius of memory, is that it is choosy, chancy, and temperamental: it rejects the edifying cathedral and indelibly photographs the small boy outside, chewing a hunk of melon in the dust.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Bowen

quotes.quote: Charm should be on the surface. It has no hidden use.
quotes.author: Ivy Compton-Burnett

quotes.quote: The charm of knowledge would be small indeed, were it not that there is so much shame to be overcome on the way to it.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Charm is the quality in others that makes us more satisfied with ourselves.
quotes.author: Henri Frederic Amiel

quotes.quote: The one charm of marriage is that it makes a life of deception absolutely necessary for both parties.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Charm, in most men and nearly all women, is a decoration.
quotes.author: E. M. Forster

quotes.quote: Charm of personality is a divine gift that sways the strongest characters and sometimes even controls the destinies of nations.
quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.quote: Charm is often despised but I can never see why. No one has it who isn't capable of genuinely liking others, at least at the actual moment of meeting and speaking. Charm is always genuine; it may be superficial but it isn't false.
quotes.author: P.D. James

quotes.quote: Charm never made a rooster.
quotes.author: Dean Acheson

quotes.quote: Charm might be described as enlightened self-interest, a development of one's best self. In the simplest possible terms, I think genuine charm is an unmotivated interest in others.
quotes.author: Arlene Francis

quotes.quote: Charm and perfection hardly cooperate. Charm premises little mistakes which one would like to cover.
quotes.author: Catherine Deneuve

quotes.quote: The charm of the best courages is that they are inventions, inspirations, flashes of genius.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Charm is a cunning self-forgetfulness.
quotes.author: Christina Stead

quotes.quote: Charm is that extra quality that defies description.
quotes.author: Alfred Lunt

quotes.quote: Charm is the enchanted dart, light and subtle as a hummingbird. But it is deceptive in one thing: like a sense of humor, if you think you've got it, you probably haven't.
quotes.author: Laurel Lea

quotes.quote: Charm is always genuine; it may be superficial but it isn't false.
quotes.author: P. D. James

quotes.quote: Charm is more valuable than beauty. You can resist beauty but you can't resist charm.
quotes.author: Audrey Tautou

quotes.quote: Charm is to a woman what perfume is to a flower.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Charm is more than beauty.
quotes.author: Yiddish Proverb

quotes.quote: Charm is a way of getting the answer yes without asking a clear question.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: There is no personal charm so great as the charm of a cheerful temperament.
quotes.author: Henry Van Dyke

quotes.quote: Charm was a scheme for making strangers like and trust a person immediately, no matter what the charmer had in mind.
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.quote: Charm is an odorless perfume, which cannot be anchored in the chemists' test tube. It is a permeation, a radiation. It emanates from the climate of a warm human spirit, which not only contains light, but gives it off.
quotes.author: Fannie Hurst

quotes.quote: Civility is a charm that attracts the love of all men.
quotes.author: George Horne

quotes.quote: With charm you've got to get up close to see it; style slaps you in the face.
quotes.author: John Cooper Clarke

quotes.quote: The picture will have charm when each color is very unlike the one next to it.
quotes.author: Leon Battista Alberti

quotes.quote: Charm is the ability to make others forget that you look as you do.
quotes.author: Jean-Paul Belmondo

quotes.quote: Charm and nothing but charm at last grows a little tiresome. It's a relief then to deal with a man who isn't quite so delightful but a little more sincere.
quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: The one charm about the past is that it is the past. But women never know when the curtain has fallen.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Charms strike the sight, but merit wins the soul.
quotes.author: Alexander Pope

quotes.quote: Charming people live up to the very edge of their charm, and behave as outrageously as the world lets them.
quotes.author: Logan Pearsall Smith

quotes.quote: Charm almost baffles definition, yet it is quickly recognized by the world.
quotes.author: Grevillea Kleiser

quotes.quote: Charm is a glow within a woman that casts a most becoming light on others.
quotes.author: John Mason Brown

quotes.quote: Charm is what some have until they begin to believe it.
quotes.author: Simone De Beauvoir

quotes.quote: No one has it who isn't capable of genuinely liking others, at least at the actual moment of meeting and speaking. Charm is always genuine; it may be superficial but it isn't false.
quotes.author: P. D. James

quotes.quote: Charm is the ability to be truly interested in other people.
quotes.author: Richard Avedon

quotes.quote: There is no personal charm so great as the charm of a cheerful temperament.Â
quotes.author: Henry Van Dyke

quotes.quote: Charm is more than beauty.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: Charm was a scheme for making strangers like and trust a person immediately, no matter what the charmer had in mind.
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.quote: Charm is to a woman what perfume is to a flower.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Charm is a kind of margin to the human personality.
quotes.author: Pius Ojara

quotes.quote: Charm is simply a matter of being yourself. Your uniqueness is your power.
quotes.author: Keith Ferrazzi

quotes.quote: Charm: the quality in others that makes us more satisfied with ourselves.
quotes.author: Henri Frederic Amiel

quotes.quote: Charisma is not so much getting people to like you as getting people to like themselves when you're around.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: Charm, in most men and nearly all women, is a decoration.
quotes.author: E.M. Forster

quotes.quote: Charm is a product of the unexpected.Â
quotes.author: Jose Marti

quotes.quote: All charming people have something to conceal, usually their total dependence on the appreciation of others.
quotes.author: Cyril Connolly

quotes.quote: Charm is the difference between a rote recitation of "God bless you" when someone sneezes, and a genuine interest in the person's health.
quotes.author: Michael Levine

quotes.quote: Charm is an innate quality of mind and heart, and an expression of a beautiful attitude toward life. Courtesy can be cultivated, but charm is largely an unconscious possession.
quotes.author: Grenville Kleiser

quotes.quote: Charm is more valuable than beauty. You can resist beauty, but you can't resist charm.
quotes.author: Audrey Tatou

quotes.quote: Charm is not to be bought in jars or bottles. Nor is beauty. Both must come from within.
quotes.author: Robert Collier

quotes.quote: Charm is a woman's strength just as strength is a man's charm.
quotes.author: H. Havelock Ellis

quotes.quote: Being charming means connecting with others on their level.
quotes.author: R.A. Delmonico

quotes.quote: Charisma is not just saying hello. It's dropping what you're doing to say hello.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: Charm is the ability to make someone think that both of you are quite wonderful.Â
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Charm is an intangible. Chutzpah, charm, charisma, that kind of thing, you can't buy it. You either have it or you don't.
quotes.author: Colm Feore

quotes.quote: Charm is captivating. Just as the petals of a flower unfold and open to the warmth and light of the sun, so do we unfold and open to the enchantment of charm. Charm acts as the Great Attractor, drawing us toward its magnetic source.
quotes.author: Thokoza

quotes.quote: Charm is a way of getting the answer yes without ever having asked a clear question.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: Charm is even less definable than dispensable.
quotes.author: John Simon

quotes.quote: Charm is being so exquisitely buoyant and full of life, keeping the magnet within you so surcharged with the joy of life, that even poor features are lost sight of in the bewitching attraction of the whole.
quotes.author: Robert Collier

quotes.quote: An ounce of charm is worth a pound of lure.
quotes.author: American Proverb

quotes.quote: Charisma is the most powerful weapon of a man.
quotes.author: Jordi Balaguer

quotes.quote: There are charms made only for distance admiration.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Charm is the quality which makes one desire to linger upon one's pilgrimage, that cries to the soul to halt, to rest, to be content.
quotes.author: Arthur C. Benson

quotes.quote: Charm has a magical quality that defrosts, disarms, delights and fascinates. It is not a sudden gush of sweetness that can be turned off and on like a faucet. It is woven subtly into the fabric of the personality. Like a silver thread, it glistens. It shines.
quotes.author: Ann Landers

quotes.quote: A man of such obvious and exemplary charm must be a liar.
quotes.author: Anita Brookner

quotes.quote: There's a difference between beauty and charm. A beautiful woman is one I notice. A charming woman is one who notices me.
quotes.author: John Erskine

quotes.quote: Dear to a heart of a girl is her own beauty and charm.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.quote: The charms of a passing woman are generally in direct proportion to the swiftness of her passing.
quotes.author: Marcel Proust

quotes.quote: When a girl ceases to blush, she has lost the most powerful charm of her beauty.
quotes.author: Gregory I

quotes.quote: It's a sort of bloom on a woman. If you have it, you don't have to need anything else;and if you don't have it, it doesn't much matter what else you have.
quotes.author: J.M. Barrie

quotes.quote: Age, like distance, lends a double charm.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.quote: There are a few women whose charm survives their beauty.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: Whatever it is that makes a person charming, it needs to remain a mystery. Once the charmer is aware of mannerism or characteristic that others find charming, it ceases to be a mannerism and becomes an affectation. And Good Lord, there is nothing less charming than affectations.
quotes.author: Rex Harrison

quotes.quote: American youths are pale and precocious, or sallow, and supercilious, but American girls are pretty and charming—little oases of pretty unreasonableness in a vast desert of common sense.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: The strange thing about American civilization is that the women are most charming when they are away from their own country, the men most charming when they are at home.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Let us be grateful to the people who make us happy; they are the charming gardeners who make our souls blossom.
quotes.author: Marcel Proust

quotes.quote: Some are born with charm, some learn it, and others try to buy it. The naturalness of charm is lost with too much purpose. False charm, like cheap perfume, is quickly detected.
quotes.author: Alfred Henry

quotes.quote: A genuine charm is being in yourself, with enthusiasm! Yet sharing a fair consideration for others.
quotes.author: Alfred Henry

quotes.quote: A gracious charm has the knack of finding charm in others. A steady charm is found in patient courtesy. A tactful charm is seen in the gallantry it takes to let others do at least half of the talking.
quotes.author: Alfred Henry

quotes.quote: Charm strikes the sight but merit wins the soul.
quotes.author: Alexander Pope

quotes.quote: Without charm, there can be no fine literature, as there can be no perfect flower without fragrance.
quotes.author: Arthur Symons

quotes.quote: A charming woman... doesn't follow the crowd. She is herself.
quotes.author: Loretta Young

quotes.quote: It is absurd to divide people into good and bad. People are either charming or tedious.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: There is an element of seduction in shoes that doesn't exist for men. A woman can be sexy, charming, witty or shy with her shoes.
quotes.author: Christian Louboutin

quotes.quote: We are born charming, fresh, and spontaneous and must be civilized before we are fit to participate in society.
quotes.author: Judith Martin

quotes.quote: Falling out of love is chiefly a matter of forgetting how charming someone is.
quotes.author: Iris Murdoch

quotes.quote: Charming women can true converts make, We love the precepts for the teacher's sake.
quotes.author: George Farquhar

quotes.quote: When a man spends his time giving his wife criticism and advice instead of compliments, he forgets that it was not his good judgment, but his charming manners, that won her heart.
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.quote: An ideal wife is one who remains faithful to you but tries to be just as charming as if she weren't.
quotes.author: Sacha Guitry

quotes.quote: Innocence is thought charming because it offers delightful possibilities for exploitation.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: When people are taken out of their depths they lose their heads, no matter how charming a bluff they may put up.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: I am always surrounded by very, very charming men, very intelligent men with a great sense of humor who always keep me entertained and pampered.
quotes.author: Deepika Padukone

quotes.quote: If you look up 'charming' in the dictionary, you'll see that it not only has references to strong attraction but to spells and magic. Then again, what are liars if not great magicians?
quotes.author: Deb Caletti

quotes.quote: The idea of being charming and really nasty at the same time is a really difficult thing to do.
quotes.author: Jesse Spencer

quotes.quote: Chase after the truth like all hell and you'll free yourself, even though you never touch its coattails.
quotes.author: Clarence Darrow

quotes.quote: Chasing the external to achieve joy is a death trap for personal development.
quotes.author: Bryant McGill

quotes.quote: People are chasing cash, not happiness. When you chase money, you're going to lose. You're just going to. Even if you get the money, you're not going to be happy.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.quote: Living in a constant chase after gain compels people to expend their spirit to the point of exhaustion.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Chase after the truth like all hell and you'll free yourself, even though you never touch its coat tails.
quotes.author: Clarence Darrow

quotes.quote: Chasing money to please society.
quotes.author: Pallav Gautam

quotes.quote: Chase your passion, not your pension.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: You have to chase your dreams, no matter what. The impossible just takes a little longer. One stroke at a time, one step at a time, the impossible is easy to achieve.
quotes.author: Tori Murden

quotes.quote: Everyone chases a bit of what they say life is about: money, desire. But when you stop chasing, you realise life is a rhythm and it's very peaceful, very quiet. You see, it's quite a miracle.
quotes.author: Nick Nolte

quotes.quote: Chase after the truth like all hell and you'll free yourself, even though you never touch its coat-tails.
quotes.author: Clarence Darrow

quotes.quote: Never chase a lie. Let it alone, and it will run itself to death.
quotes.author: Lyman Beecher

quotes.quote: Go out and chase your dreams no matter how crazy it looks.
quotes.author: Shanice Williams

quotes.quote: Keep God first, chase your dreams, and everything will pay off.
quotes.author: Jacob Latimore

quotes.quote: Pursue your goals with all your heart, might, mind and strength. You are doomed to failure if you pursue them in a vacillating manner.
quotes.author: Robert D. Hales

quotes.quote: Chasing a person doesn't give you value or build values in you. You earn your value by chasing morality and practicing dignity.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: Chase down your passion like it's the last bus of the night.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: Chase your dreams with all your strength, soul and spirit.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: If you pursue happiness, you are an ordinary person. If happiness pursues you, you are an extraordinary person. Do not chase happiness; let it chase you.
quotes.author: Petar Dunov

quotes.quote: Never give up on a dream just because of the time it will take to accomplish it. The time will pass anyway.
quotes.author: Earl Nightingale

quotes.quote: Chase excellence, success will follow.
quotes.author: Rajkumar Hirani

quotes.quote: To chase the glowing hours with flying feet.
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.quote: It's really hard to chase a lofty dream.
quotes.author: Brett Young

quotes.quote: Pursue great things. You are destiny for greatness.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Chase your dreams. Don't wait till the dreams come true.
quotes.author: Greyson Chance

quotes.quote: He'll get tired of chasing someone who doesn't chase back!
quotes.author: Billy Ray Cyrus

quotes.quote: He who chases two rabbits, catches none.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Chasing money to please society.
quotes.author: Pallav Gautam

quotes.quote: Chase after the truth like all hell and you'll free yourself, even though you never touch its coat-tails.
quotes.author: Clarence Darrow

quotes.quote: Don't waste your time chasing things that will never be beneficial to your future.
quotes.author: April Mae Monterrosa

quotes.quote: There's always something funny about men chasing women.
quotes.author: David Spade

quotes.quote: Chasing a person doesn't give you value or build values in you. You earn your value by chasing morality and practicing dignity.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: The way of the consumerist culture is to spend so much energy chasing happiness that it has none left to be happy.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: If you chase perfection, you often catch excellence.
quotes.author: William Fowble

quotes.quote: Chase excellence, success will follow.
quotes.author: Rajkumar Hirani

quotes.quote: Chase away sorrow by living.
quotes.author: Melissa Marr

quotes.quote: Go out and chase your dreams no matter how crazy it looks.
quotes.author: Shanice Williams

quotes.quote: Don't chase people. Be yourself, do your own thing and work hard.
quotes.author: Will Smith

quotes.quote: Chase your passion, not your pension.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: Two things you will never have to chase: True friends & true love.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: You will never find time for anything. You must make it.
quotes.author: Charles Buxton

quotes.quote: If you chase something too desperately, it eludes you.
quotes.author: Steve Coogan

quotes.quote: Never chase love, affection, or attention. If it isn't given freely by another person, it isn't worth having.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: A man is like a cat; chase him and he will run - sit still and ignore him and he'll come purring at your feet.
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.quote: Never chase a lie. Let it alone, and it will run itself to death.
quotes.author: Lyman Beecher

quotes.quote: Stop chasing what your mind wants and you'll get what your soul needs.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: It's insecurity that is always chasing you and standing in the way of your dreams.
quotes.author: Vin Diesel

quotes.quote: Enthusiasm is the mother of effort, and without it nothing great was ever achieved.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Far and away the best prize that life has to offer is the chance to work hard at work worth doing.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: People are chasing cash, not happiness. When you chase money, you're going to lose. You're just going to. Even if you get the money, you're not going to be happy.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.quote: If you're spending your entire early 20s chasing the next party,what are you running away from?
quotes.author: Demi Lovato

quotes.quote: Once in a while it really hits people that they don't have to experience the world in the way they have been told.
quotes.author: Alan Keightley

quotes.quote: Chasing profits and building a long-term profit model are two different things.
quotes.author: Lewis Howes

quotes.quote: You can always chase a dream but it will not count if you never catch it.
quotes.author: Malcolm X

quotes.quote: When you stop chasing the wrong things you give the right things a chance to catch you.
quotes.author: Lolly Daskal

quotes.quote: Stop looking for permission to pursue your dreams! They are your dreams and you don't need a co-signer to chase them!
quotes.author: Eric Thomas

quotes.quote: Never give up on a dream just because of the time it will take to accomplish it. The time will pass anyway.
quotes.author: Earl Nightingale

quotes.quote: The only thing that stands between you and your dream is the will to try and the belief that it is actually possible.
quotes.author: Joel Brown

quotes.quote: Focus on your dream and do everything in your power. You have the power to change your life circumstances.
quotes.author: Nick Vujicic

quotes.quote: Follow your dreams, believe in yourself and don't give up.
quotes.author: Rachel Corrie

quotes.quote: You have to chase your dreams, no matter what. The impossible just takes a little longer. One stroke at a time, one step at a time, the impossible is easy to achieve.
quotes.author: Tori Murden

quotes.quote: The best way to make your dreams come true is to wake up.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: There is only one thing that makes a dream impossible to achieve: the fear of failure.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Throw your dreams into space like a kite, and you do not know what it will bring back, a new life, a new friend, a new love, a new country.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.quote: Dreams are renewable. No matter what our age or condition, there are still untapped possibilities within us and new beauty waiting to be born.
quotes.author: Dale Turner

quotes.quote: Reach high, for stars lie hidden in your soul. Dream deep, for every dream precedes the goal.
quotes.author: Pamela Vaull Starr

quotes.quote: Cherish your vision and your dreams as they are the children of your soul, the blueprints of your ultimate achievements.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams and live the life you have imagined.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: If you can imagine it, you can achieve it. If you can dream it, you can become it.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.quote: Don't keep your dreams in your eyes, they may fall as tears. Keep them in your heart so that every heartbeat may remind you to convert them into reality.
quotes.author: Nishan Panwar

quotes.quote: Realize you can chase your dreams with just believing. Don't be afraid to believe in some magic; if proof not in front in of you, follow your gut.
quotes.author: Chris Wyse

quotes.quote: Chase your dreams. Don't wait til the dreams come true.
quotes.author: Greyson Chance

quotes.quote: Dreams come true. Without that possibility, nature would not incite us to have them.
quotes.author: John Updike

quotes.quote: Believe in your dreams, no matter how impossible they seem.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: Every great dream begins with a dreamer. Always remember, you have within you the strength, the patience, and the passion to reach for the stars to change the world.
quotes.author: Harriet Tubman

quotes.quote: Follow your heart and chase your dreams until you catch them. Negative people who say you cant do something are only speaking for themselves.
quotes.author: Jake Pitts

quotes.quote: Stay true to yourself, yet always be open to learn. Work hard, and never give up on your dreams, even when nobody else believes they can come true but you. These are not cliches but real tools you need no matter what you do in life to stay focused on your path.
quotes.author: Phillip Sweet

quotes.quote: Pretend your dream to be a realistic entity that belongs to you but exists somewhere in cyber space. Then find a reasoning, logic and scientific solution to make the dream a reality.
quotes.author: Samuel Adoquei

quotes.quote: Dare to live the life you have dreamed for yourself. Go forward and make your dreams come true.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: It was the man's dream, and his inspiring attempt to make them come true that remain important.
quotes.author: Francis Ford Coppola

quotes.quote: Be willing to be uncomfortable. Be comfortable being uncomfortable. It may get tough, but it's a small price to pay for living a dream
quotes.author: Peter McWilliams

quotes.quote: You have to dream before your dreams can come true.
quotes.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quotes.quote: Those who dream by day are cognizant of many things which escape those who dream only by night.
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.quote: Go out and chase your dreams no matter how crazy it looks.
quotes.author: Shanice Williams

quotes.quote: If you can dream it, you can do it.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: Dreams feel real while we're in them. It's only when we wake up that we realize something was actually strange.
quotes.author: Leonardo DiCaprio

quotes.quote: So many of our dreams at first seem impossible, then they seem improbable, and then, when we summon the will, they soon become inevitable.
quotes.author: Christopher Reeve

quotes.quote: Let your dreams outgrow the shoes of your expectations.
quotes.author: Ryunosuke Satoro

quotes.quote: One of the characteristics of the dream is that nothing surprises us in it. With no regret, we agree to live in it with strangers, completely cut off from our habits and friends.
quotes.author: Jean Cocteau

quotes.quote: Faith is not desire. Faith is will. Desires are things that need to be satisfied, whereas will is a force. Will changes the space around us.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Don't let go of your dreams. If you have determination and belief in your dreams, you will succeed in spite of your desire to let go.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Keep your heart open to dreams. For as long as there's a dream, there is hope, and as long?as there is hope, there is joy in living.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The work goes on, the cause endures, the hope still lives and the dreams shall never die.
quotes.author: Edward Kennedy

quotes.quote: Follow your dreams, work hard, practice and persevere. Make sure you eat a variety of foods, get plenty of exercise and maintain a healthy lifestyle.
quotes.author: Sasha Cohen

quotes.quote: Keep your dreams alive. Understand to achieve anything requires faith and belief in yourself, vision, hard work, determination, and dedication. Remember all things are possible for those who believe.
quotes.author: Gail Devers

quotes.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Once in a while it really hits people that they don't have to experience the world in the way they have been told.
quotes.author: Alan Keightley

quotes.quote: Dreams pass into the reality of action. From the action stems the dream again and this interdependence produces the highest form of living.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.quote: There is light within your reach. You have to go deep and find it
quotes.author: Avijeet Das

quotes.quote: Don't let your dreams become your regrets, chase them, go after them.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: You will never find time for anything. You must make it.
quotes.author: Charles Buxton. M

quotes.quote: It's not enough just to dream of your ideas. You've got to take action to bring about their creation.
quotes.author: Doreen Virtue

quotes.quote: You see, the human mind is the last, great unexplored continent on Earth. It contains riches beyond our wildest dreams. It will return anything we want to plant.
quotes.author: Earl Nightingale

quotes.quote: Never stop dreaming, wake up and chase your dreams.
quotes.author: Gift Gugu Mona

quotes.quote: The whole secret of a successful life is to find out what is one’s destiny to do, and then do it.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: Never be ashamed There's some who will hold it against you, but they are not worth bothering with.
quotes.author: J. K. Rowling

quotes.quote: It is better to risk starving to death than surrender. If you give up on your dreams, what's left.
quotes.author: Jim Carrey

quotes.quote: I can’t change the directions of the wind, but I can adjust my sails to always reach my destination.
quotes.author: Jimmy Dean

quotes.quote: To be a human being is to be in a state of tension between your appetites and your dreams, and the social realities around you and your obligations to your fellow man.
quotes.author: John Updike

quotes.quote: Don't give up on your dreams, or your dreams will give up on you.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: When you reach an obstacle, turn it into an opportunity. You have the choice. You can overcome and be a winner, or you can allow it to overcome you and be a loser. The choice is yours and yours alone. Refuse to throw in the towel. Go that extra mile that failures refuse to travel. It is far better to be exhausted from success than to be rested from failure.
quotes.author: Mary Kay Ash

quotes.quote: Remember to celebrate milestones as you prepare for the road ahead.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: I have lots of things to prove to myself. One is that I can live my life fearlessly.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: The most important journey of our lives doesn't necessarily involve climbing the highest peak or trekking around the world. The biggest adventure you can ever take is to live the life of your dreams.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Love what you do and do what you love. Don't listen to anyone else who tells you not to do it. You do what you want, what you love. Imagination should be the center of your life.
quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

quotes.quote: The only thing worse than starting something and failing is not starting something.
quotes.author: Seth Godin

quotes.quote: Try to make sense of what you see and wonder about what makes the universe exist. Be curious, and however difficult life may seem, there is always something you can do, and succeed at. It matters that you don’t just give up.
quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

quotes.quote: If you are working on something that you really care about, you don’t have to be pushed. The vision pulls you.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Believe you can and you’re halfway there.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Be strategic and resilient in the pursuit of your dreams.
quotes.author: Tiffany D. Jackson

quotes.quote: I don't focus on what I'm up against. I focus on my goals and I try to ignore the rest.
quotes.author: Venus Williams

quotes.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal it is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: The combination of cheaper and more widespread broadband and increased mobile usage is turning us all into independent viewers.
quotes.author: Shawn Amos

quotes.quote: What we obtain too cheap, we esteem too lightly; it is dearness only that gives everything its value.
quotes.author: Thomas Paine

quotes.quote: I pity the man who wants a coat so cheap that the man or woman who produces the cloth will starve in the process.
quotes.author: Benjamin Harrison

quotes.quote: Cheap is the love that has a price.
quotes.author: Ljupka Cvetanova

quotes.quote: The pain is not about having cheap people around real pain is the fact that there are some people with a price to start with.
quotes.author: Sameh Elsayed

quotes.quote: It is always cheaper to do the job right the first time.
quotes.author: Phil Crosby

quotes.quote: Words are cheap. The biggest thing you can say is 'elephant'.
quotes.author: Charlie Chaplin

quotes.quote: Cheaper does not always equal better.
quotes.author: Amber Hurdle

quotes.quote: The cheaper the crook, the gaudier the patter.
quotes.author: Dashiell Hammett

quotes.quote: Being crazy of someone might seem cheap, but what if your life is priceless without that person.
quotes.author: M.F. Moonzajer

quotes.quote: People who are frugal understand the value of a dollar and make informed and thoughtful decisions. People who are cheap try to spend as little money as possible.
quotes.author: Frank Sonnenberg

quotes.quote: There's no such thing as a cheap laugh.
quotes.author: Louis C. K.

quotes.quote: That who sold the expensive for no price, bought the cheap with the highest price.
quotes.author: Raja Rayshouny

quotes.quote: If the price is very cheap then it's almost certainly a fake.
quotes.author: David Russell

quotes.quote: Never sell yourself cheap even when others are selling themselves cheaper than you are willing to sell yourself.
quotes.author: Edmond Mbiaka

quotes.quote: After a while you realize that putting your actions where your mouth is makes you less likely to have to put your money where your mouth is.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: It costs a lot of money to look this cheap.
quotes.author: Dolly Parton

quotes.quote: Freedom has cost too much blood and agony to be relinquished at the cheap price of rhetoric.
quotes.author: Thomas Sowell

quotes.quote: Real happiness is cheap enough, yet how dearly we pay for its counterfeit.
quotes.author: Hosea Ballou

quotes.quote: Many great opportunities are not cheap; but some cheap opportunities are so great.
quotes.author: Iveta Cherneva

quotes.quote: I could smell an arrogance, it was my cheap fragrance.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: Words rich in meaning can be cheap in sound effects.
quotes.author: Dejan Stojanovic

quotes.quote: Mathematics is the cheapest science. Unlike physics or chemistry, it does not require any expensive equipment. All one needs for mathematics is a pencil and paper.
quotes.author: Polya George

quotes.quote: Never use the word “cheap”. Today everybody can look chic in inexpensive clothes (the rich buy them too). There is good clothing design on every level today. You can be the chicest thing in the world in a T-shirt and jeans — it’s up to you.
quotes.author: Karl Lagerfeld

quotes.quote: Life is so cheap, just we have to pay high cost to survive.
quotes.author: Rashid Jorve

quotes.quote: Cheap mentality can't afford my trust.
quotes.author: Brajesh Kumar Singh

quotes.quote: I buy expensive suits. They just look cheap on me.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: As a man sow, shall he reap, and I know that talk is cheap. But the heat of the battle is as sweet as the victory.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.quote: Even if you believe a creator god invented the laws of physics, would you so insult him as to suggest that he might capriciously and arbitrarily violate them in order to walk on water, or turn water into wine as a cheap party trick at a wedding?
quotes.author: Richard Dawkins

quotes.quote: We can do things the cheap way, the simple way, for the short-term and without regard for the future. Or, we can make the extra effort, do the hard work, absorb the criticism and make decisions that will cause a better future.
quotes.author: Mike Rounds

quotes.quote: Fast food is popular because it's convenient, it's cheap, and it tastes good. But the real cost of eating fast food never appears on the menu.
quotes.author: Eric Schlosser

quotes.quote: When Henry Ford made cheap, reliable cars people said, 'Nah, what's wrong with a horse?' That was a huge bet he made, and it worked.
quotes.author: Elon Musk

quotes.quote: In order to be rated as good as a good man in the field of her earnings, she must show herself better than he. She must be more steady, or more trustworthy, or more skilled, or more cheap in order to have the same chance of employment.
quotes.author: Florence Kelley

quotes.quote: Cheating is not the American way. It is small, while we are large. It is cheap, while we are richly endowed. It is destructive, while we are creative. It is doomed to fail, while our gifts and responsibilities call us to achieve. It sabotages trust and weakens the bonds of spirit and humanity, without which we perish.
quotes.author: Terrence McNally

quotes.quote: Love is a special word, and I use it only when I mean it. You say the word too much and it becomes cheap.
quotes.author: Ray Charles

quotes.quote: In Japan, Taiwan, and South Korea, the government in a matter of years has put a lot of energy behind recycling food waste as livestock feed. It's environmentally friendly, it provides cheap livestock feed for the farmers in those parts of the world, and it avoids sending the food waste to landfill.
quotes.author: Tristram Stuart

quotes.quote: I have never envied a costly funeral; a cheap one will take you to the same place!
quotes.author: Menander

quotes.quote: Freedom is precious—defend it—it is not cheap, nor easy, nor neutral. It is dear and hard and real—take sides for freedom or you will lose it.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: It's nature's way of making water better; and it's dirt cheap compared with Coke and Pepsi.
quotes.author: Morris J. Siegel

quotes.quote: Nothing is as cheap as a hit no matter how much it cost.
quotes.author: Walter Wanger

quotes.quote: Don't ever do cheap songs.
quotes.author: Frank Sinatra

quotes.quote: Cheap editions of great books may be delightful, but cheap editions of great men are absolutely detestable.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: O the mind, mind has mountains; cliffs of fall / Frightful, sheer, no-man-fathomed. / Hold them cheap / May who ne'er hung there. / 'No worst, there is none.
quotes.author: Gerard Manley Hopkins

quotes.quote: Pile it high, sell it cheap.
quotes.author: John Cohen

quotes.quote: The reason you start painting yourself... is that you are a model; a cheap model. I mean you've always got yourself!
quotes.author: David Hockney

quotes.quote: My movies cost less than a director's salary on an average film. When you work as cheap as I do, the studio hands you the money and tells you to go off with your friends and have fun.
quotes.author: Chris Guest

quotes.quote: Netbooks aren't better than anything. They're just cheap laptops.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Make not thy friend too cheap to thee, nor thyself too dear to him.
quotes.author: James Howell

quotes.quote: No entertainment is so cheap as reading, nor any pleasure so lasting.
quotes.author: Lady Mary Montagu

quotes.quote: My theory has always been, that if we are to dream, the flatteries of hope are as cheap, and pleasanter, than the gloom of despair.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: Never buy what you do not want, because it is cheap; it will be dear to you.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: If you want to say it with flowers, a single rose says: "I'm cheap!"
quotes.author: Delta Burke

quotes.quote: You'd be surprised how expensive it costs to look this cheap.
quotes.author: Steven Tyler

quotes.quote: Skills are cheap. Passion is priceless.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.quote: Always laugh when you can. It is cheap medicine.
quotes.author: Lord Byron
