quotes.quote: Ideas are cheap. Ideas are easy. Ideas are common. Everybody has ideas. Ideas are highly, highly overvalued. Execution is all that matters.
quotes.author: Casey Neistat

quotes.quote: Memories are like mulligatawny soup in a cheap restaurant. It is best not to stir them.
quotes.author: P. G. Wodehouse

quotes.quote: The more people rationalize cheating, the more it becomes a culture of dishonesty. And that can become a vicious, downward cycle. Because suddenly, if everyone else is cheating, you feel a need to cheat, too.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: The first and worst of all, fraud is to cheat one's self. All sin is easy after that.
quotes.author: Pearl Bailey

quotes.quote: Someone who thinks the world is always cheating him is right. He is missing that wonderful feeling of trust in someone or something.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: Cheating is easy. There's no swank to infidelity. To borrow against the trust someone has placed in you costs nothing at first. You get away with it, you take a little more and a little more until there is no more to draw on. Oddly, your hands should be full with all that taking but when you open them there's nothing there.
quotes.author: Jeanette Winterson

quotes.quote: Integrity is not a conditional word. It doesn't blow in the wind or change with the weather. It is your inner image of yourself, and if you look in there and see a man who won't cheat, then you know he never will.
quotes.author: John D. MacDonald

quotes.quote: It is impossible for a man to be cheated by anyone but himself.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: He who purposely cheats his friend, would cheat his God.
quotes.author: Johann Kaspar Lavater

quotes.quote: I would prefer even to fail with honor than to win by cheating.
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.quote: Cheating in school is a form of self-deception. We go to school to learn. We cheat ourselves when we coast on the efforts and scholarship of someone else.
quotes.author: James E. Faust

quotes.quote: One of the more challenging things in life is not being the guy who does the cheating, but not saying anything about it and going along with it.
quotes.author: Dale Murphy

quotes.quote: The sure way to be cheated is to think one's self more cunning than others.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: It is better to suffer wrong than to do it, and happier to be sometimes cheated than not to trust.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: To cheat oneself out of love is the most terrible deception; it is an eternal loss for which there is no reparation, either in time or in eternity.
quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: Tis my opinion every man cheats in his own way, and he is only honest who is not discovered.
quotes.author: Susannah Centlivre

quotes.quote: When people cheat in any arena, they diminish themselves-they threaten their own self-esteem and their relationships with others by undermining the trust they have in their ability to succeed and in their ability to be true.
quotes.author: Cheryl Hughes

quotes.quote: Those who cheat on their partners who are loyal to them; don't deserve them. It is a trashy attitude to disrespect a person who is loyal in a relationship, by cheating on him or her.
quotes.author: Ellen J. Barrier

quotes.quote: Each man takes care that his neighbor shall not cheat him. But a day comes when he begins to care that he does not cheat his neighbor. Then all goes well -he has changed his market -cart into a chariot of the sun.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: It is helpful to think of people as having two fundamental motivations: the desire to see ourselves as honest, good people, and the desire to gain the benefits that come from cheating - on our taxes or on the football field.
quotes.author: Dan Ariely

quotes.quote: It is the nature of ambition to make men liars and cheats, to hide the truth in their breasts, and show, like jugglers, another thing in their mouths.
quotes.author: Sallust

quotes.quote: If you succeed in cheating someone, don't think that the person is a fool. Realize that the person trusted you much, more than you deserve.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Cheating is a sin, but honest cunning is simply prudence. It is a virtue. To be sure, it has a likeness to roguery, but that cannot be helped. He who has not learned to practice it is a fool.
quotes.author: Giacomo Casanova

quotes.quote: But human nature dictates that there will always be cheaters. That's inevitable. Where there's money involved and glory, there are going to be people that cheat, and there will always be ways to cheat.
quotes.author: David Millar

quotes.quote: People have a moral standard about what they will do and will not do. At the end of the day someone who cheats has a lower moral standard than someone who does not. And they will cheat in other areas of life as well.
quotes.author: Carl Lewis

quotes.quote: Some people have the innate ability to cheat artfully during dating, interviews....Once they're in, they completely change and become so different that they leave you wondering whether you have ever met them before.
quotes.author: Assegid Habtewold

quotes.quote: You didn't just cheat on me; you cheated on us. You didn't just break my heart; you broke our future.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: A person consistently cheating himself only can dupe others
quotes.author: Anuj Somany

quotes.quote: Doubtless the pleasure is as great Of being cheated as to cheat.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.quote: We have to distrust each other. It is our only defense against betrayal.
quotes.author: Tennessee Williams

quotes.quote: If another woman steals your man, there's no better revenge than to let her keep him. Real men can't be stolen.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Cheating on anyone is deeper than people realize, it destroys their outlook on love, their future relationships and peace within themselves.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Cheating is the most disrespectful thing one human being can do to another. If you aren't happy in a relationship, end it before starting another one.
quotes.author: Abhishek Tiwari

quotes.quote: A real man doesn't have time to cheat because that man is too busy providing all of which a good woman deserves.
quotes.author: Ritu Ghatourey

quotes.quote: If you can't be committed to another person, at least be committed to the concept of character and don't cheat.
quotes.author: Jerry Springer

quotes.quote: Cheating is often more efficient.
quotes.author: Jeri Ryan

quotes.quote: He that will cheat at play, will cheat you any way
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: Old age and treachery will overcome youth and skill.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: The truly scary thing about undiscovered lies is that they have a greater capacity to diminish us than exposed ones.
quotes.author: Cheryl Hughes

quotes.quote: One must not cheat anybody, not even the world of one's triumph.
quotes.author: Franz Kafka

quotes.quote: A liar deceives himself more than anyone, for he believes he can remain a person of good character when he cannot.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: Do unto others what you want them to do to you. Don't deceive if you don't want to be deceived. Don't cheat if you don't want to be cheated. Relationship is mutual. This is the golden rule for all great connections!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: If you are stupid enough to cheat, then definitely dumb enough to get caught.
quotes.author: Aman Jassal

quotes.quote: Cheating was easy, but impossible to go back to.
quotes.author: Dean Osborne

quotes.quote: Where cheating is, there's mischief there.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: If he loves you he will not screw up what you have by cheating.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Adultery means cheating.
quotes.author: Ryan Murphy

quotes.quote: I could love you better / Better than you once knew / And if you're cheating, cheat on, yeah / 'Cause cheating's just a thing you do / It's just a thing you do
quotes.author: Emily Phillips

quotes.quote: You are the one who's creeping / You are the one who's cheating / But if you're heart is beating / Bring it on, bring it to me.
quotes.author: Curtis Mayfield

quotes.quote: Your cheating heart will make you weep / You'll cry and cry and try to sleep / But sleep won't come the whole night through / Your cheating heart will tell on you
quotes.author: Hank Williams

quotes.quote: When tears come down like falling rain / You'll toss around and call my name / You'll walk the floor the way I do / Your cheating heart will tell on you
quotes.author: Hank Williams

quotes.quote: You know that I love you but I'm not the cheating kind / I'm faced with a heartache at love's cheating line
quotes.author: Penny Joy Moyer

quotes.quote: Don't let me cross over love's cheating line / You belong to another and you'll never be mine
quotes.author: Penny Joy Moyer

quotes.quote: I know one step closer, would be heaven divine / Don't let me cross over love's cheating line
quotes.author: Penny Joy Moyer

quotes.quote: Have you got cheating on your mind, on your mind / Something's wrong between us / That your laughter cannot hide / And you're afraid to let your eyes meet mine
quotes.author: James Glaser

quotes.quote: Cheat me once, you ought to be ashamed; cheer me twice, I ought to be ashamed.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Doubtless the pleasure is as great of being cheated, as to cheat.
quotes.author: Sarah Josepha Buell Hale

quotes.quote: Love is a game in which one always cheats.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: It was all a mistake / Now I've got yo fight to win your love back / I give this all it would take / Never meant to cheat behind your back.
quotes.author: Ola Josiah

quotes.quote: If you cheat now out of revenge, you might do things you could regret later.
quotes.author: Francisco Bujan

quotes.quote: When you cheat, you first say 'No' to your existing couple and 'Yes' to a new connection.
quotes.author: Francisco Bujan

quotes.quote: Cheating is anything that you would not do in front of your mate.
quotes.author: Tonja Ayers

quotes.quote: Emotional cheating can occur without physical cheating and is also harder to detect when no physical acts are taking place.
quotes.author: Tonja Ayers

quotes.quote: A cheating mate who has an emotional connection with another person ordinarily leaves their partner feeling betrayed when their emotional relationship is revealed.
quotes.author: Tonja Ayers

quotes.quote: Not all men actually cheat; but as much as men cheat, so do women cheat.
quotes.author: Chidi Asika-Enahoro

quotes.quote: Many men succumb faster to temptation when they are married than committted women do even if they are desired.
quotes.author: Chidi Asika-Enahoro

quotes.quote: A serial cheater could be with Ms.Universe or Mr.Universe, and he will still have wandering eyes.
quotes.author: Chidi Asika-Enahoro

quotes.quote: Most times, serial cheaters cheat with persons that are not as attractive or even in the same intellectual or social league as their life partners.
quotes.author: Chidi Asika-Enahoro

quotes.quote: Most people do not set out to cheat; their personal dissatisfaction gets the best of them.
quotes.author: Chidi Asika-Enahoro

quotes.quote: Some men cheat because they want to see how much women they can get.
quotes.author: Michael A. Bernard

quotes.quote: Some cheat because they cannot control themselves.
quotes.author: Michael A. Bernard

quotes.quote: Others cheat because they don't trust their partner so they go out and cheat.
quotes.author: Michael A. Bernard

quotes.quote: Men cheat because it's in a man's sinful nature to cheat.
quotes.author: Renee' Lambert

quotes.quote: The act of cheating and not getting caught increases their self-confidence.
quotes.author: Renee' Lambert

quotes.quote: Some men cheat because they have a problem with commitment and intimacy.
quotes.author: Renee' Lambert

quotes.quote: Some men cheat because of the fear of getting old.
quotes.author: Renee' Lambert

quotes.quote: Cheating with younger woman makes them feel young again and makes them think they can have any young woman they want.
quotes.author: Renee' Lambert

quotes.quote: Chatting with one of his female friends is not cheating.
quotes.author: Francisco Bujan

quotes.quote: A light flirt is not cheating.
quotes.author: Francisco Bujan

quotes.quote: Cheating is not a fantasy, it is an action.
quotes.author: Francisco Bujan

quotes.quote: Cheating is a very specific action, it involves intimacy.
quotes.author: Francisco Bujan

quotes.quote: It is true that sometimes, men do cheat.
quotes.author: Francisco Bujan

quotes.quote: Men are more likely than women to cheat with someone who is less attractive than their current partner.
quotes.author: Kevin Rasberry

quotes.quote: Women cheat up while men are more opportunistic when it comes to cheating.
quotes.author: Kevin Rasberry

quotes.quote: Women are more prone to having emotion affairs.
quotes.author: Kevin Rasberry

quotes.quote: Men are less likely to consider leaving their partners after cheating.
quotes.author: Kevin Rasberry

quotes.quote: Men are more likely than women to repeatedly cheat on a spouse or partner.
quotes.author: Kevin Rasberry

quotes.quote: Cheating can be tricky. You can notice it from jump, or you may not see any changes at all.
quotes.author: Sierra N. Smith

quotes.quote: A typical man will cheat, because for some reason he thinks that he can get away with it.
quotes.author: Sierra N. Smith

quotes.quote: When a man is not ready to commit to you, he will most likely cheat.
quotes.author: Sierra N. Smith

quotes.quote: Some men will basically cheat because he is no longer satisfied in his current relationship with you.
quotes.author: Sierra N. Smith

quotes.quote: All things being equal, the more individual free time people have the more likely they are to cheat.
quotes.author: C.V. Conner

quotes.quote: People with a dismissing style of attachment, are more likely to cheat.
quotes.author: C.V. Conner

quotes.quote: As problems emerge in a relationship, people are more likely to cheat.
quotes.author: C.V. Conner

quotes.quote: Infidelity is more common in relationships where people feel misunderstood, under appreciated and where fighting and bickering is common.
quotes.author: C.V. Conner

quotes.quote: Some people, due to their position in society, their beliefs about gender roles, and their cultural upbringing, believe that it is their right to cheat on their partners.
quotes.author: C.V. Conner

quotes.quote: Men are more prone to cheating, definitely.
quotes.author: Blu Cantrell

quotes.quote: Cheaters must get some credit before they can cozen, and all falsehood, if not founded in some truth, would not be fixed in any belief.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: So long there are women around, a cheater will cheat against his promise.
quotes.author: Anthony Liccione

quotes.quote: If you marry a man who cheats on his wife, you'll be married to a man who cheats on his wife.
quotes.author: Ann Landers

quotes.quote: A guy who'd cheat on his wife would cheat at cards.
quotes.author: Texas Guinan

quotes.quote: Divorced men are more likely to meet their car payments than their child support obligations.
quotes.author: Susan Faludi

quotes.quote: Those who cheat on their partners who are loyal to them; don't deserve them. It is a trashy attitude to disrespect a person who is loyal in a relationship, by cheating on him or her.
quotes.author: Ellen J. Barrier

quotes.quote: He that will cheat at play, will cheat you any way.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: He who stands for nothing will fall for anything.
quotes.author: Alexander Hamilton

quotes.quote: Some guys will cheat on their girlfriends and sleep like a baby at night but feel guilty when they go to another barber.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Once a cheater, always a repeater.
quotes.author: Melissa Edwards

quotes.quote: Men are not intelligent when it comes to cheating, but they're wise enough to choose a woman who will put up with it.
quotes.author: Michael Baisden

quotes.quote: Having two women one who can't know about the other, and one who must be trusted not to destroy his life is clearly difficult for him.
quotes.author: Jennifer Harrison

quotes.quote: If you are stupid enough to cheat, then definitely dumb enough to get caught.
quotes.author: Aman Jassal

quotes.quote: Sometimes there a hundred lies behind a smile and not a single truth behind a tear.
quotes.author: Saahil Prem

quotes.quote: You didn't just cheat on me; you cheated on us. You didn't just break my heart; you broke our future.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Men cannot survive without cheating, it is in their nature.
quotes.author: M.F. Moonzajer

quotes.quote: In your mind you are cheating somebody, but in reality you are cheating yourself.
quotes.author: Cyc Jouzy

quotes.quote: If he will cheat on her that means he will cheat on you.
quotes.author: Lyfe Jennings

quotes.quote: He who purposely cheats his friend, would cheat his God.
quotes.author: Johann Kaspar Lavater

quotes.quote: Never be unfaithful to a lover, except with your wife.
quotes.author: P. J. O'Rourke

quotes.quote: No lover, if he be of good faith, and sincere, will deny he would prefer to see his mistress dead than unfaithful.
quotes.author: Marquis De Sade

quotes.quote: It's better to be unfaithful than faithful without wanting to be.
quotes.author: Brigitte Bardot

quotes.quote: My affections are easily swayed and I can be very unfaithful.
quotes.author: Dusty Springfield

quotes.quote: All men make mistakes, but married men find out about them sooner.
quotes.author: Red Skelton

quotes.quote: Once a cheater, always a cheater. If they cheat with you, they'll cheat on you.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: There's only two people in your life you should lie to... the police and your girlfriend.
quotes.author: Jack Nicholson

quotes.quote: Basically it's the core story. About a guy having an affair with the mother of the girl he falls in love with.
quotes.author: Buck Henry

quotes.quote: By a lie, a man... annihilates his dignity as a man.
quotes.author: Immanuel Kant

quotes.quote: Eighty percent of married men cheat in America. The rest cheat in Europe.
quotes.author: Jackie Mason

quotes.quote: For me, narrative prose is a legal wife, while drama is a posturing, boisterous, cheeky and wearisome mistress.
quotes.author: A Chekhov

quotes.quote: If you can’t be better than your competition, just dress better.
quotes.author: Anna Wintour

quotes.quote: And, my brothers, it was real satisfaction to me to waltz-left two three, right two three-and carve left cheeky and right cheeky, so that like two curtains of blood seemed to pour out at the same time, one on either side of his fat filthy oily snout in the winter starlight.
quotes.author: Anthony Burgess

quotes.quote: Take motherhood: nobody ever thought of putting it on a moral pedestal until some brash feminists pointed out, about a century ago, that the pay is lousy and the career ladder nonexistent.
quotes.author: Barbara Ehrenreich

quotes.quote: The most courageous act is still to think for yourself. Aloud.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: Welcome back, my cheeky wee monkeys.
quotes.author: Craig Ferguson

quotes.quote: Just because I’m cheeky, doesn’t mean I’m not serious.
quotes.author: David Hockney

quotes.quote: A woman is like a tea bag. You never knew how strong she is until she gets in hot water.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: A fit, healthy body, that is the best fashion statement.
quotes.author: Jess C. Scott

quotes.quote: She said 'I love you' as if it were a secret, and an immense one.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: My personality is up and down, sassy and cheeky.
quotes.author: Katy Perry

quotes.quote: Life is short. Smile while you still have teeth.
quotes.author: Mallory Hopkins

quotes.quote: It is better to keep your mouth closed and let people think you're stupid, than to open it and remove all doubt.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Smile at each other, smile at your wife, smile at your husband, smile at your children, smile at each other, it doesn't matter who it is and that will help you to grow up in greater love for each other.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa of Calcutta

quotes.quote: I'm probably a bit of a cheeky grandson, like my brother as well. We both tend to take the mickey a bit too much.
quotes.author: Prince William

quotes.quote: Do you believe in love at first sight, or should I have to walk by again?
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I’m sorry, my fault, I forgot you are an idiot.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Sweet as sugar hard as ice. Hurt me once, I’ll kill you twice.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I walk around like everything is fine, but deep down, inside my shoe, my sock is sliding off.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I don’t dress up for boys. I dress up to stare at my reflection as I walk by store windows.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Don't let them get you down. Be cheeky. And wild. And wonderful.
quotes.author: Astrid Lindgren

quotes.quote: If someone is being very cheeky, it can be quite fun to deal with that situation.
quotes.author: John Bercow

quotes.quote: Leave any problem alone for long enough and it will solve itself.
quotes.author: Nell Dixon

quotes.quote: When you come out of the storm, you won't be the same person who walked in. That's what this storm's all about.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: Life could be so bad. Situation might be so hard but the Knowledge that you have GOD is something that cheers you up.
quotes.author: Azgraybebly Josland

quotes.quote: After every storm the sun will smile; for every problem there is a solution, and the soul's indefeasible duty is to be of good cheer.
quotes.author: William R. Alger

quotes.quote: A painter should begin every canvas with a wash of black, because all things in nature are dark except where exposed by the light.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: Our greatest glory is not in ever failing, but in rising every time we fail.
quotes.author: Bill Cosby

quotes.quote: The sun never stops shining, sometimes you just have to look beyond the clouds to see it.
quotes.author: Arjun Loveable

quotes.quote: Count your age by friends, not years. Count your life by smiles, not tears.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: Hope, smiles from the threshold of the year to come, whispering 'it will be happier.
quotes.author: Alfred Tennyson

quotes.quote: You will succeed if you persevere; and you will find joy in overcoming obstacles.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: If at first you don't succeed, think how many people you've made happy.
quotes.author: H. Duane Black

quotes.quote: Life is too short to spend even one day in misery.
quotes.author: Ravi Melwani

quotes.quote: If you paint in your mind a picture of bright and happy expectations, you put yourself into a condition conducive to your goal.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote:
The talent for being happy is appreciating and liking what you have,
instead of what you don't have.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: You never fail until you stop trying.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Only in the darkness can you see the stars.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama XIV

quotes.quote: Keep your face to the sunshine and you cannot see a shadow.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: When you have exhausted all possibilities, remember this: You haven't.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.quote:
If you look into your own heart, and you find nothing wrong there,
what is there to worry about? What is there to fear?
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Failure should be our teacher, not our undertaker. Failure is delay, not defeat. It is a temporary detour, not a dead-end. Failure is something we can avoid only by saying nothing, doing nothing, and being nothing.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: Stop thinking you're not good enough. You are beautiful & way stronger than you realize. Stand up for yourself, don't just let people tear you down, because soon enough...You'll start tearing yourself down.
quotes.author: Mckenzie Hassler

quotes.quote: Every positive attempt was as a result of encouragement, every encouragement leads to success.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: For every dark night, there is a brighter day.
quotes.author: Harriet Morgan

quotes.quote: There are many things evil people can take from you. However, they can never steal your ability to laugh and laugh loud.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: Sometimes God puts us down so that we can learn how to stand again after a fall.
quotes.author: Shubhanshu Tiwari

quotes.quote: For every minute you are angry you lose sixty seconds of happiness.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Very little is needed to make a happy life; it is all within yourself, in your way of thinking.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Joy is what happens to us when we allow ourselves to recognize how good things really are.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: I do not believe this darkness will endure.
quotes.author: J.R.R. Tolkein

quotes.quote: A storm may bring its darkness, but you can bring your own sunshine.
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.quote: Smile, even if it's fake. Laugh, even if you hurt. Don't let anyone get to you, you're beautiful regardless of what anyone says to you.
quotes.author: Ghaidaa

quotes.quote: Five Ups of life: Buckle up, Start up, Keep it up, Don't give up, Cheer up.
quotes.author: Vikrmn

quotes.quote: Life is too short for us to dwell on sadness. Cheer up and live life to the fullest.
quotes.author: Dexter Monterde

quotes.quote: You'll never change your life until you change something you do daily. The secret of your success is found in your daily routine.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: You are prettiest when you're happy. Don't waste time being sad.
quotes.author: Hussein Nishah

quotes.quote: I say to myself that I shall try to make my life like an open fireplace, so that people may be warmed and cheered by it and so go out themselves to warm and cheer.
quotes.author: George Matthew Adams

quotes.quote: I don't think of all the misery but of the beauty that still remains.
quotes.author: Anne Frank

quotes.quote: Nothing is permanent in this wicked world, not even our troubles.
quotes.author: Charlie Chaplin

quotes.quote: Don't judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds that you plant.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: Brighten someone else's day with your smile. Take the effort, walk the mile. While your depressed and feeling blue. Someone else will make the effort with you.
quotes.author: Melchor Lim

quotes.quote: There are no failures - just experiences and your reactions to them.
quotes.author: Tom Krause

quotes.quote: Be strong, because things will get better. It may be stormy now, but it never rains forever.
quotes.author: Arashi

quotes.quote: Laugh now, cry later.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: Have the will to be well, to be happy, and to live in joy.
quotes.author: Ernest Holmes

quotes.quote: Do not think of todays failures, but of the success that may come tomorrow.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: No matter what looms ahead, if you can eat today, enjoy today, mix good cheer with friends today enjoy it and bless God for it.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: Try and fail, but don't fail to try.
quotes.author: Stephen Kaggwa

quotes.quote: Never give up, for that is just the place and time that the tide will turn.
quotes.author: Harriet Beecher Stowe

quotes.quote: When you don't see your life moving in right direction, don't worry take left :). Cheer up and keep walking.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Let us be of cheer, remembering that the misfortunes hardest to bear are those which never come.
quotes.author: Amy Lowell

quotes.quote: We are very near the end, but have not and will not lose our good cheer.
quotes.author: Robert Falcon Scott

quotes.quote: The sky is everywhere, it begins at your feet.
quotes.author: Jandy Nelson

quotes.quote: Stop feeling sorry for yourself and you will be happy.
quotes.author: Stephen Fry

quotes.quote: If you can't you must, and if you must you can.
quotes.author: Anthony Robbins

quotes.quote: If you are still breathing maybe it is not such a bad day after all.
quotes.author: Darren E. Laws

quotes.quote: The best of healers is good cheer.
quotes.author: Pindar

quotes.quote: Enjoy the little things and be joyful,for one day you may look back and realize they were actually the things that mattered!
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Do you really want to be happy? You can begin by being appreciative of who you are and what you've got.
quotes.author: Benjamin Hoff

quotes.quote: Sometimes, in order to cheer up it's nice to see there are others who are worse off or at least feel the same as you do.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: There is no investment you can make which will pay you so well as the effort to scatter sunshine and good cheer through your establishment.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Cheer up, the worst is yet to come.
quotes.author: Philander Johnson

quotes.quote: The best way to cheer yourself is to try to cheer someone else up.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: The unselfish effort to bring cheer to others will be the beginning of a happier life for ourselves.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Never bend your head. Hold it high. Look the world straight in the eye.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: When things are at their blackest, I say to myself, 'Cheer up, things could be worse.' And sure enough, they get worse.
quotes.author: Robert Asprin

quotes.quote: If you've got nothing to dance about, find a reason to sing.
quotes.author: Melody Carstairs

quotes.quote: People will always throw stones in your path. What will happen depends on what you make out of it â€“ a wall or a bridge! So cheer up and move on.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Nothing is permanent in this wicked world, not even our troubles.
quotes.author: Charles Chaplin

quotes.quote: Be of good cheer. The future is as bright as your faith.
quotes.author: Thomas S Monson

quotes.quote: Instead of cursing the darkness, light a candle.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Life is too short for us to dwell on sadness. Cheer up and live life to the fullest.
quotes.author: Dexter Monterde

quotes.quote: You'll never find a rainbow if you're looking down.
quotes.author: Charlie Chaplin

quotes.quote: Stop searching the world for treasure, the real treasure is in yourself.
quotes.author: Pablo

quotes.quote: Cheer up. You never know - maybe something awful will happen tomorrow.
quotes.author: John Waters

quotes.quote: Go as far as you can see and you will see further.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Five Ups of life: Buckle up, Start up, Keep it up, Don't give up, Cheer up.
quotes.author: Vikrmn

quotes.quote: There are many things evil people can take from you. However, they can never steal your ability to laugh and laugh loud.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Cheer up sweet beautiful girl! You are going to love again, and it will be magnificent.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Cheer up when the night comes, because mornings always give you another chance.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Wherefore, be of good cheer, and do not fear, for I the Lord am with you, and will stand by you.
quotes.author: Thomas S. Monson

quotes.quote: Be of good cheer. Do not think of today's failures, but of the success that may come tomorrow. You have set yourselves a difficult task, but you will succeed if you persevere; and you will find joy in overcoming obstacles.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: There is always someone better off than you, and there is always someone worse off than you.
quotes.author: C.L. Hall

quotes.quote: Rise and rise again until lambs become lions.
quotes.author: Robin Hood

quotes.quote: Believe there is a great power silently working all things for good, behave yourself and never mind the rest.
quotes.author: Beatrix Potter

quotes.quote: No matter what looms ahead, if you can eat today, enjoy today, mix good cheer with friends today, enjoy it and bless God for it.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: Stand up and walk. Move on. After all, you have perfect legs to stand on.
quotes.author: Hiromu Arakawa

quotes.quote: If you look the right way, you can see that the whole world is a garden.
quotes.author: Frances Hodgson Burnett

quotes.quote: Know that you cannot create great new beginnings until you sincerely celebrate the endings that precede them.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: After every storm the sun will smile; for every problem there is a solution, and the soul's indefeasible duty is to be of good cheer.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Cheer up for pleasant feelings count, they won't counter progress and productivity.
quotes.author: Constance Chuks Friday

quotes.quote: If more of us valued food and cheer and song above hoarded gold, it would be a merrier world.
quotes.author: J. R. R. Tolkien

quotes.quote: When I get sad, I stop being sad and start being awesome instead.
quotes.author: Barney Stilson

quotes.quote: You can't stay in your corner of the forest waiting for others to come to you. You have to go to them sometimes.
quotes.author: A. A. Milne

quotes.quote: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
quotes.author: A. Einstein

quotes.quote: Happiness is the meaning and the purpose of life, the whole aim and end of human existence.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Do you really want to be happy You can begin by being appreciative of who you are and what you've got.
quotes.author: Benjamin Hoff

quotes.quote: Love is a good thing on a bad day when the last thing you want is to be cheered up.
quotes.author: Chad Sugg

quotes.quote: You'll find that life is still worthwhile if you just smile.
quotes.author: Charlie Chaplin

quotes.quote: For there is no friend like a sister in calm or stormy weather; To cheer one on the tedious way, to fetch one if one goes astray, to lift one if one totters down, to strengthen whilst one stands.
quotes.author: Christina Rossetti

quotes.quote: Stories never really end even if the books like to pretend they do. Stories always go on. They don't end on the last page, any more than they begin on the first page.
quotes.author: Cornelia Funke

quotes.quote: Remember that sometimes, not getting what you want is a wonderful stroke of luck.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Make every day special. Own it. Enjoy it. Bask in the glory of life. Appreciate the gift of your own life.
quotes.author: Donna Fargo

quotes.quote: Often we can help each other most by leaving each other alone at other times we need the hand-grasp and the word of cheer.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Do not stop thinking of life as an adventure. You have no security unless you can live bravely, excitingly, imaginatively unless you can choose a challenge instead of competence.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The man who radiates good cheer, who makes life happier wherever he meets it, is always a man of vision and faith.
quotes.author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox

quotes.quote: The world is like a mirror frown at it, and it frowns at you. Smile and it smiles, too.
quotes.author: Herbert Samuel

quotes.quote: Let us be of good cheer, however, remembering that the misfortunes hardest to bear are those which never come.
quotes.author: James Russell Lowell

quotes.quote: A hard beginning maketh a good ending.
quotes.author: John Heywood

quotes.quote: Count your age by friends, not years. Count your life by smiles, not tears.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: Facing it, always facing it, that's the way to get through. Face it.
quotes.author: Joseph Conrad

quotes.quote: If you can't run, you crawl. If you can't crawl you find someone to carry you.
quotes.author: Joss Whedon

quotes.quote: Very little is needed to make a happy life; it is all within yourself, in your way of thinking.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: I always cheer up immensely if an attack is particularly wounding because I think, well, if they attack one personally, it means they have not a single political argument left.
quotes.author: Margaret Thatcher

quotes.quote: A poet is a nightingale, who sits in darkness and sings to cheer its own solitude with sweet sounds.
quotes.author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quotes.quote: Wherever the invitation of men or your own occasions lead you, speak the very truth, as your life and conscience teach it, and cheer the waiting, fainting hearts of men with new hope and new revelation.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: In the central place of every heart, there is a recording chamber so long as it receives messages of beauty, hope, cheer and courage, you are young.
quotes.author: Samuel Ullman

quotes.quote: Cheer up every person you interact with including yourself.
quotes.author: Sark

quotes.quote: Life is not a problem to be solved, but a reality to be experienced.
quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: Whatever you see you gotta keep a sense of humor you gotta be able to smile through all the bullshit.
quotes.author: Tupac Shakur

quotes.quote: Each age has deemed the new born year the fittest time for festal cheer.
quotes.author: Walter Scott

quotes.quote: After every storm the sun will smile for every problem, there is a solution, and the soul’s indefeasible duty is to be of good cheer.
quotes.author: William R. Alger

quotes.quote: You must take life the way it comes at you and make the best of it.
quotes.author: Yann Martel

quotes.quote: Cheerfulness and contentment are great beautifiers, and are famous preservers of good looks.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: Laughing cheerfulness throws the light of day on all the paths of life.
quotes.author: Jean Paul

quotes.quote: The most certain sign of wisdom is cheerfulness.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: And so of cheerfulness, or a good temper—the more it is spent, the more of it remains.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Be cheerful—the problems that worry us most are those that never arrive.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: You find yourself refreshed in the presence of cheerful people. Why not make an honest effort to confer that pleasure on others?
quotes.author: Lydia M. Child

quotes.quote: Cheerfulness keeps up a kind of daylight in the mind, filling it with a steady and perpetual serenity.
quotes.author: C.N Douglas

quotes.quote: A healthy and wholesome cheerfulness is not necessarily impossible to any occupation.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Repose and cheerfulness are the badge of the gentleman — repose in energy.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Cheerfulness is health; its opposite, melancholy, is disease
quotes.author: Thomas Haliburton

quotes.quote: The most manifest sign of wisdom is continued cheerfulness.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: Cheerfulness is the atmosphere in which all things thrive.
quotes.author: Jean Paul Richter

quotes.quote: Nothing is more beautiful than cheerfulness in an old face
quotes.author: Jean Paul Richter

quotes.quote: Cheerfulness in most cheerful people, is the rich and satisfying result of strenuous discipline.
quotes.author: Edwin Percy Whipple

quotes.quote: Cheerfulness greases the axles of the world.
quotes.author: H.W. Byles

quotes.quote: Cheerfulness removes the rust from the mind, lubricates our inward machinery, and enables us to do our work with fewer creaks and ;groans. If people were universally cheerful, probably there wouldn't be half the quarreling or a tenth part of the wickedness.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The cheerful live longest in years, and afterwards in our regards. Cheerfulness is the off-shoot of goodness.
quotes.author: Christian Nestell Bovee

quotes.quote: The path to cheerfulness is to sit cheerfully and to act and speak as if cheerfulness were already there.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: Cheerfulness is a very great help in fostering the virtue of charity. Cheerfulness itself is a virtue.
quotes.author: Lawrence G. Lovasik

quotes.quote: The man who radiates good cheer, who makes life happier wherever he meets it, is always a man of vision and faith.
quotes.author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox

quotes.quote: Courage and cheerfulness will not only carry you over the rough places in life, but will enable you to bring comfort and help to the weak-hearted and will console you in the sad hours.
quotes.author: William Osler

quotes.quote: Cheerfulness is as natural to the heart of a man in strong health as color to his cheek; and wherever there is habitual gloom there must be either bad air, unwholesome food, improperly severe labor, or erring habits of life.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.quote: Cheerfulness prepares a glorious mind for all the noblest acts.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Ann Seton

quotes.quote: Cheerfulness is like money well expended in charity; the more we dispense of it, the greater our possession.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Cheerfulness is the best promoter of health and is as friendly to the mind as to the body.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.quote: Cheerfulness is an offshoot of goodness and of wisdom.
quotes.author: Christian Nestell Bovee

quotes.quote: If there is a virtue in the world at which we should always aim, it is cheerfulness.
quotes.author: Edward Bulwer-Lytton

quotes.quote: Let cheerfulness on happy fortune wait.
quotes.author: John Dryden

quotes.quote: If cheerleaders are so easy, why aren't you with one?
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: There are two types of people in this world, cheerleaders, and those who wish they were.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Football players throw a 3 pound ball in the air, but cheerleaders throw a 100 pound girl in the air and catch her.
quotes.author: John P. Harley

quotes.quote: It takes a little more to make a champion, but it takes a lot more to make a cheerleader.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: If football/basketball is so awesome, why does it take cheerleaders to excite the crowd?
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: There is no halftime for cheerleaders.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Simply because we do not run across goal lines, slam dunk basketballs, or hit home runs, doesn't mean we can't change the score.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Cheerleaders know that pyramids were not built in Egypt.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Cheerleaders rock cause we know how to roll.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A good cheerleader is not measured by the height of her jumps but by the span of her spirit.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Flying is the second best thrill to cheerleaders; being caught is the first.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: You know you're a cheerleader when you have to kick, yell and scream to get what you want.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Wimps lift Weights, Cheerleaders lift People.
quotes.author: Stephanie

quotes.quote: Cheerleaders are simply a jump above the rest.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: It's hard to be humble when you can jump, stunt, and tumble!
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Sportsmanship starts and ends with the cheerleader.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A cheerleader is a dreamer that never gives up.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Cheerleaders are angels - we're the only humans who can fly.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: How can anyone govern a nation that has two hundred and forty six different kinds of cheese?
quotes.author: Charles De Gaulle

quotes.quote: Good cheese needs good companions.
quotes.author: James Beard

quotes.quote: Never commit yourself to a cheese without having first examined it.
quotes.author: T. S. Eliot

quotes.quote: A slice of pie without cheese is like a kiss without a squeeze.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: Each sort of cheese reveals a pasture of a different green, under a different sky.
quotes.author: Italo Calvino

quotes.quote: Cheese, like oil, makes too much of itself.
quotes.author: Jerome K. Jerome

quotes.quote: What happens to the hole when the cheese is gone?
quotes.author: Bertolt Brecht

quotes.quote: Cheese, wine, and a friend must be old to be good.
quotes.author: Cuban Proverb

quotes.quote: The misers cheese is wholesomest.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: An aristrocracy is like cheese. The older it is the higher it becomes.
quotes.author: David Lloyd George

quotes.quote: It is for the inconsistent, unsteady disciples whose cheese is falling off their cracker.
quotes.author: Brennan Manning

quotes.quote: Beauty is a valuable asset, but it is not the whole cheese.
quotes.author: Ginger Rogers

quotes.quote: Give me a good sharp knife and a good sharp cheese and I’m a happy man.
quotes.author: George R. R. Martin

quotes.quote: Wine and cheese are ageless companions,like aspirin and aches, or June and moon,or good people and noble ventures.
quotes.author: M. F. K. Fisher

quotes.quote: A cheese may disappoint. It may be dull, it may be naive, it may be oversophisticated. Yet it remains cheese, milk's leap toward immortality.
quotes.author: Clifton Fadiman

quotes.quote: Cheese for dessert is rather like Paradise lost in that everyone thinks he ought to like it, but still you don't notice too many people actually curling up with it.
quotes.author: Peg Bracken

quotes.quote: Cheese has always been a food that both sophisticated and simple humans love.
quotes.author: M. F. K. Fisher

quotes.quote: A meal without cheese is like a beautiful woman who lacks an eye.
quotes.author: Jean Anthelme Brillat-Savarin

quotes.quote: The quicker you let go of old cheese, the sooner you find new cheese.
quotes.author: Spencer Johnson

quotes.quote: My whole family is lactose intolerant and when we take pictures we can't say cheese.
quotes.author: Jay London

quotes.quote: A dessert without cheese is like a beauty with only one eye.
quotes.author: Jean Anthelme Brillat-Savarin

quotes.quote: The early bird gets the worm, but the second mouse gets the cheese.
quotes.author: Jeremy Paxman

quotes.quote: When cheese gets its picture taken, what does it say?
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: Nobody has ever measured, even poets, how much a heart can hold.
quotes.author: Zelda Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: Love is the joy of the good, the wonder of the wise, the amazement of the gods.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: You make me smile,you make me laugh, you are the one who cheers me up. When I am down you pick me up and when I frown you turn it upside down.
quotes.author: Sarahi Gonzalez

quotes.quote: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: You and you alone make me feel that I am alive. Other men it is said have seen angels, but I have seen thee and thou art enough.
quotes.author: George A. Moore

quotes.quote: When you trip over love, it is easy to get up. But when you fall in love, it is impossible to stand again.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Love is too strong a word to say it too early, but it has too beautiful a meaning to say it too late.
quotes.author: Kurt Cornish

quotes.quote: I would rather share one lifetime with you than face all the ages of this world alone.
quotes.author: Liv Tyler

quotes.quote: Your smile is like a sunrise, it sets the clouds on fire. But just being with you, is what I always admire.
quotes.author: Francine Chiar

quotes.quote: I finally understood what true love meant. Love meant, that you care for another person's happiness more than your own, no matter how painful the choices you face might be.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: Affection is when you see someone's strengths; love is when you accept someone's flaws.
quotes.author: Bonnie Franklin

quotes.quote: Love is the triumph of imagination over intelligence.
quotes.author: Henry Louis Mencken

quotes.quote: If you live to be 100, I hope I live to be 100 minus one day, so I never have to live without you.
quotes.author: Ernest H. Shephard

quotes.quote: I loved her against reason, against promise, against peace, against hope, against happiness, against all discouragement that could be.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: Love is the longing for the half of ourselves that we have lost.
quotes.author: Milan Kundera

quotes.quote: My creed is love and you are its only tenet.
quotes.author: John Keats

quotes.quote: To love or have loved, that is enough. Ask nothing further. There is no other pearl to be found in the dark folds of life.
quotes.author: Les Miserables

quotes.quote: And think not that you can direct the course of love, for love, if it finds you worthy, directs your course.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: I wanna be your girlfriend more than an electron wants to attach to a proton.
quotes.author: Emma Stone

quotes.quote: If ever there is a tomorrow when we're not together there is something you must always remember.
quotes.author: A. A. Milne

quotes.quote: Like you're trying to fight gravity on a planet that insists that love is like falling and falling is like this.
quotes.author: Ani DiFranco

quotes.quote: So it's not gonna be easy. It's gonna be really hard. We're gonna have to work at this every day, but I want to do that because I want you. I want all of you, forever, you and me, every day.
quotes.author: Ryan Gosling

quotes.quote: There is always some madness in love. But there is also always some reason in madness.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Be my love, be my life, be my happiness, be my wife, be my sadness, be my tear, be my sorrow, be my fear, be my everything, not now nor later. But from yesterday till forever.
quotes.author: John Lee Delan

quotes.quote: With our love, we could save the world.
quotes.author: George Harrison

quotes.quote: Love looks not with the eyes, but with the mind.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: If I can be with you in my dreams, I would sleep forever.
quotes.author: Joekidia Raynet

quotes.quote: When I see you, my heart beats a little faster. My stomach feels a little lighter and my smile shines a little brighter.
quotes.author: Rashida Rowe

quotes.quote: Don't forget I'm just a girl, standing in front of a boy, asking him to love her.
quotes.author: Julia Roberts

quotes.quote: Marrying for love may be a bit risky, but it is so honest that God can't help but smile on it.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.quote: Multiply it by infinity and take it to the depths of forever, and you will still have barely a glimpse of what I'm talking about.
quotes.author: Anthony Hopkins

quotes.quote: It doesn't matter if the guy is perfect or the girl is perfect as long as they are perfect for each other.
quotes.author: Sean Maguire

quotes.quote: Happiness is anyone and anything at all, that's loved by you.
quotes.author: Charlie Brown

quotes.quote: Love has no age, no limit; and no death.
quotes.author: ohn Galsworthy

quotes.quote: I never forgot, not for one day. I knew I'd find you in the end. It's our destiny.
quotes.author: Slumdog Millionaire

quotes.quote: Falling in love with you was never my intention. but it became my addiction.
quotes.author: Abhishek Tiwari

quotes.quote: Better never to have met you in my dream than to wake and reach for hands that are not there.
quotes.author: Otomo No Yakamochi

quotes.quote: Love me when I least deserve it, because that's when I really need it.
quotes.author: Swedish Proverb

quotes.quote: I love you right up to the moon—and back.
quotes.author: Sam McBratney

quotes.quote: I love you, not only for what you are, but for what I am when I am with you. I love you, not only for what you have made of yourself but for what you are making of me.
quotes.author: Roy Croft

quotes.quote: May I ask your name, my lady? Or perhaps angels have no names, only beautiful faces.
quotes.author: Heath Ledger

quotes.quote: Cause I know there is strength in the differences between us and I know there is comfort where we overlap.
quotes.author: Ani DiFranco

quotes.quote: Love me and the world is mine.
quotes.author: David Reed

quotes.quote: I asked you here tonight because when you realise you want to spend the rest of your life with somebody, you want the rest of your life to start as soon as possible.
quotes.author: Graeme Simsion

quotes.quote: I just want something sugary and sweet. A really romantic treat. The only thing I can think of is when our lips meet.
quotes.author: Francine Chiar

quotes.quote: I think I'd miss you even if we never met.
quotes.author: Nick Mercer

quotes.quote: Life is not the amount of breaths you take; it's the moments that take your breath away.
quotes.author: Will Smith

quotes.quote: No, I mean I like you very much. Just as you are.
quotes.author: Bridget Jones

quotes.quote: I can drive you crazy without a drivers license.
quotes.author: Abhishek Tiwari

quotes.quote: I love you. You annoy me more than I ever thought possible, but I want to spend every irritating minute with you.
quotes.author: Scrubs

quotes.quote: As far as he was concerned, he would rather have a root canal than tune his car radio to one of those stations that played cheesy love ballads.
quotes.author: Joe Beam

quotes.quote: He had always believed that so-called romantic love was a myth created by Hollywood, Hallmark, and Harlequin romance novels.
quotes.author: Joe Beam

quotes.quote: The Love Path is the way of genuine love. It is our map to building a healthy life of romantic attachment.
quotes.author: Joe Beam

quotes.quote: Real love, of course, is not possessive or demanding. It gives freedom, then delights in the growth of the other person.
quotes.author: Joe Beam

quotes.quote: Throughout human history, romantic love has been the anomaly, not the norm, and truly cheesy love where men claim, 'You will always be in my heart' did not occur until the mid 1990's when Celine Dion started belting out some easy listening classics.
quotes.author: Eric Burnett

quotes.quote: Because of the cheesy love story of Pocahontas and John Smith, it is easy to discount this movie as pure Disney fluff.
quotes.author: Eric Burnett

quotes.quote: I define love thus: the will to extend one's self for the purpose of nurturing one's own or another's spiritual growth.
quotes.author: M. Scott Peck

quotes.quote: To love and be loved is to feel the sun from both sides.
quotes.author: David Viscott

quotes.quote: Romantic love is not only a necessary illusion, it is a desirable deception. It is one of the most powerful and most effective forms of soul-making.
quotes.author: Thomas Moore

quotes.quote: Romantic love is a mental illness. But it's a pleasurable one. It's a drug. It distorts reality and that's the point of it. It would be impossible to fall in love with someone that you really saw...What starts love is your ability to stupefy and blind yourself to the point of being able to fall in love.
quotes.author: Fran Lebowitz

quotes.quote: You come to love not by finding the perfect person, but by seeing an imperfect person perfectly.
quotes.author: Sam Keen

quotes.quote: In real love, you want the other person's good. In romantic love, you want the other person.
quotes.author: Margaret Anderson

quotes.quote: I judge how much a man cares for a woman by the space he allots her under a jointly shared umbrella.
quotes.author: Jimmy Cannon

quotes.quote: Romance, like the rabbit at the dog track, is the elusive, fake and never attained reward which for the benefit and amusement of our masters, keeps us running and thinking in safe circles.
quotes.author: Beverly Jones

quotes.quote: As a perfume doth remain in the folds where it hath lain, so the thought of you, remaining deeply folded in my brain, will not leave me; all things leave me: you remain.
quotes.author: Arthur Symons

quotes.quote: When you were a tadpole and I was a fish, in the Paleozoic time, and side by side on the ebbing tide, we sprawled through the ooze and slime... My heart was rife with the joy of life, for I loved you even then.
quotes.author: Langdon Smith

quotes.quote: Oh, the days dwindle down / To a precious few... / And these few precious days / I'll spend with you.
quotes.author: Maxwell Anderson

quotes.quote: Let us go then, you and I, / When the evening is spread out against the sky / Like a patient etherized upon a table.
quotes.author: T.S. Eliot

quotes.quote: How do I love thee? Let me count the ways. / I love thee to the depth and breadth and height / My soul can reach, when feeling out of sight / For the ends of Being and ideal Grace... / I love thee with the breath, / Smiles, tears, of all my life!— and, if God choose, I shall but love thee better after death.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

quotes.quote: Men always want to be a woman's first love. That is their clumsy vanity. We women have a more subtle instinct about things.What we like is to be a man's last romance
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: We were together. I forget the rest.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.quote: So, I love you because the entire universe conspired to help me find you.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Because of you, I can feel myself slowly, but surely, becoming the me I have always dreamed of being.
quotes.author: Tyler Knott Gregson

quotes.quote: Lips that have tasted the salt of tears always give the sweetest kiss.
quotes.author: C.J. Carlyon

quotes.quote: I fell in love the way you fall asleep; slowly, and then all at once.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: Love does not consist in gazing at each other, but in looking outward together in the same direction.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: I love you and that's the beginning and end of everything.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: Come sleep with me: We won't make love, love will make us.
quotes.author: Julio Cortazar

quotes.quote: Being with you never felt wrong. It's the one thing I did right. You're the one thing I did right.
quotes.author: Becca Fitzpatrick

quotes.quote: When you came, you were like red wine and honey, and the taste of you burnt my mouth with its sweetness.
quotes.author: Amy Lowell

quotes.quote: Although the skills aren't hard to learn, finding the happiness and finding the satisfaction and finding fulfillment in continuously serving somebody else something good to eat, is what makes a really good restaurant.
quotes.author: Mario Batali

quotes.quote: I think every chef, not just in America, but across the world, has a double edged sword – two jackets, one that's driven, a self-confessed perfectionist, thoroughbred, hate incompetence and switch off the stove, take off the jacket and become a family man.
quotes.author: Gordon Ramsay

quotes.quote: Chefs are leaders in their own little world.
quotes.author: Eric Ripert

quotes.quote: As chefs, we cook to please people, to nourish people.
quotes.author: Jose Andres

quotes.quote: Japanese chefs believe our soul goes into our knives once we start using them. You wouldn't put your soul in a dishwasher!
quotes.author: Masaharu Morimoto

quotes.quote: I would much rather be a chef who remembers I am a cook then a cook that thinks I am a chef.
quotes.author: Richard Peterson

quotes.quote: Often, admiring a chef and getting to know him is like loving goose liver and then meeting the goose.
quotes.author: George Lang

quotes.quote: A good cook is like a sorceress who dispenses happiness.
quotes.author: Elsa Schiaparelli

quotes.quote: A good cook is the peculiar gift of the gods. He must be a perfect creature from the brain to the palate, from the palate to the finger's end.
quotes.author: Walter Savage Landor

quotes.quote: I think the most wonderful thing in the world is another chef. I'm always excited about learning new things about food.
quotes.author: Paul Prudhomme

quotes.quote: Anybody can make you enjoy the first bite of a dish, but only a real chef can make you enjoy the last.
quotes.author: Francois Minot

quotes.quote: I call all chefs cooks. They're all cooks. That's what we do, we cook. You're a chef when you're running a kitchen.
quotes.author: Tom Colicchio

quotes.quote: The duty of a good cuisinier is to transmit to the next generation everything he has learned and experienced.
quotes.author: Fernand Point

quotes.quote: We may live without poetry, music and art; We may live without conscience, and live without heart; We may live without friends; we may live without books; But civilized man cannot live without cooks.
quotes.author: Edward Bulwer-Lytton

quotes.quote: The discovery of a new dish does more for the happiness of mankind than the discovery of a star.
quotes.author: Anthelme Brillat-Savarin

quotes.quote: A burnt and experienced hands are more important than the vessels in the kitchen.
quotes.author: Nikita Dudani

quotes.quote: To me, there's no great chef without a great team.
quotes.author: Daniel Boulud

quotes.quote: Being involved, learning firsthand and observing the craft and absorbing all you can, makes it easier to define what you want. It will also ultimately make you a better Chef. Culinary school, or even a single class, is a great bet too.
quotes.author: Giada De Laurentiis

quotes.quote: No one is born a great cook, one learns by doing.
quotes.author: Julia Child

quotes.quote: If you want to become a great chef, you have to work with great chefs. And that's exactly what I did.
quotes.author: Gordon Ramsay

quotes.quote: Techniques are not the most difficult to teach. The attitudes chefs take are much more important.
quotes.author: Alain Ducasse

quotes.quote: Until I discovered cooking, I was never really interested in anything.
quotes.author: Julia Child

quotes.quote: I think all chefs who pursue great flavor have good ethics.
quotes.author: Dan Barber

quotes.quote: If you're not the one cooking, stay out of the way and compliment the chef.
quotes.author: Michael Strahan

quotes.quote: I would love to date a chef. I'd probably get really fat, but I don't care.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Olsen

quotes.quote: In any restaurant of this caliber, the chefs are in the same position, building relationships.
quotes.author: Thomas Keller

quotes.quote: No great pastry chef has sweet teeth.
quotes.author: Morley Safer

quotes.quote: Chef' doesn't mean that you're the best cook, it simply means 'boss.'
quotes.author: Tom Colicchio

quotes.quote: You're getting to know who the great chefs are through their books.
quotes.author: Thomas Keller

quotes.quote: Consistency is what every great chef strives for.
quotes.author: Steven Knight

quotes.quote: I prefer to eat food cooked by a proper chef.
quotes.author: Steven Knight

quotes.quote: A chef fighting is absurd!
quotes.author: Shôtarô Ishinomori

quotes.quote: Commander, let me tell you something. In the kitchen, no one defies the chef. The only thing they say is, "Oui, chef!
quotes.author: Shôtarô Ishinomori

quotes.quote: At any time Chef says something positive, you kind of take that in and hold it, even if it is for a split second, you know, before he yells at you.
quotes.author: Sharon Trojan Hollinger

quotes.quote: A chef must lead.
quotes.author: Steven Knight

quotes.quote: A good chef never reveals his secrets.
quotes.author: Mick Garris

quotes.quote: Don't rush the chef when he's making a stew.
quotes.author: Hart Hanson

quotes.quote: When chefs consider seafood, they don't consider trout seafood at all.
quotes.author: Bengt Anderson

quotes.quote: A chef without self-confidence is like a car without wheels.
quotes.author: Christine Hall

quotes.quote: The chef is responsible for all kitchen operations, including ordering, supervision of all stations, and development of menu items.
quotes.author: The Culinary Institute of America

quotes.quote: The sous chef is second in command, answers to the chef, may be responsible for scheduling, fills in for the chef, and assists the station chefs(or line cooks)as necessary.
quotes.author: The Culinary Institute of America

quotes.quote: The roast chef is responsible for all roasted foods and related jus or other sauces.
quotes.author: The Culinary Institute of America

quotes.quote: The grill chef is responsible for all grilled foods. This position may be combined with that of rotisseur.
quotes.author: The Culinary Institute of America

quotes.quote: The fry chef is responsible for all fried foods. This position may be combined with the rotisseur position.
quotes.author: The Culinary Institute of America

quotes.quote: I was lucky to have grown up in a poor family. If I had been rich, I might have become a lawyer. But I was poor, and God made me to be a chef.
quotes.author: Michel Richard

quotes.quote: Working in the kitchen is my soul and my life, And I love it. I'm not there because people expect to see me; I am there because I want to be.
quotes.author: Heinz Beck

quotes.quote: There are many people who claim to be good cooks, just as there are many people who, after having repainted the garden gate, take themselves to be painters.
quotes.author: Ferdinand Point

quotes.quote: We don't remember the exact age when I told my mother I wanted to be a cook, but she still keeps a cooking coat she made for me when I was only nine.
quotes.author: Joan Roca

quotes.quote: The more I cook, the more I realize that a chef should not shy away from mundane things like making a lemon vinaigrette. A chef should take pleasure in them.
quotes.author: Marc Vetri

quotes.quote: As a chef you are likely to feel a lot of pressure, working from early morning to late at night and not really getting paid for it, but you keep doing it because you love it.
quotes.author: Kobe Desramaults

quotes.quote: Every chef has a love-hate dish, the dish that made it into the first review, the one that customers call ahead for, the dish, therefore, the chef will never be able to take off the menu.
quotes.author: Suzanne Goin

quotes.quote: The traditional path to becoming a chef is not schooling but working.
quotes.author: Leslie Bilderback

quotes.quote: For centuries, a chef became a chef by working his or her way up from the bottom.
quotes.author: Leslie Bilderback

quotes.quote: A chef who doesn't attend culinary school must somehow seek out broader culinary knowledge on his own. The best of them actively hunt for it.
quotes.author: Leslie Bilderback

quotes.quote: Knowing how to cook is one thing, but if you are exposed to the how and why of a recipe, you can apply that information to other recipes, troubleshoot, and eventually create something entirely your own.
quotes.author: Leslie Bilderback

quotes.quote: The student who thought he knew more than the teacher is the worker who butts heads with the chef.
quotes.author: Leslie Bilderback

quotes.quote: A chef's day is very long-especially for a head chef and even more for one who has an ownership stake in the business.
quotes.author: Susan Meyer

quotes.quote: A chef at an average-sized restaurant might arrive at nine or ten in the morning to make sure the necessary produce, meats, and other foods were delivered overnight.
quotes.author: Susan Meyer

quotes.quote: If there are problems, the chef might have to call the restaurant's suppliers to complain.
quotes.author: Susan Meyer

quotes.quote: In a typical restaurant, the pastry chef might be in charge of baking bread for the restaurant, as well as preparing the best part of any meal: the dessert. From ice cream and custard to tarts and cakes, these specially trained chefs know their way around sugar and flour.
quotes.author: Susan Meyer

quotes.quote: What makes most cooking both fun and challenging is that the chef must use a degree of instinct to season something just right.
quotes.author: Susan Meyer

quotes.quote: A personal chef must possess, or cultivate, certain traits in order to be successful. If you have a passion for cooking and truly desire to be a personal chef, any of these traits can be learned and developed.
quotes.author: Carla Rowley

quotes.quote: A successful personal chef must love to cook and bring life to their food.
quotes.author: Carla Rowley

quotes.quote: A good personal chef always listens to the customer's wants and needs and does their absolute best to provide an outstanding meal for each client.
quotes.author: Carla Rowley

quotes.quote: A personal chef must be creative and develop their own recipes and dishes to fit the client's individual preferences and needs.
quotes.author: Carla Rowley

quotes.quote: The best way to learn to cook and refine your skills as a chef is practice often.
quotes.author: Carla Rowley

quotes.quote: Every once in a while a chef comes along whose personality and clarity of vision to help to revitalize people's interest in cuisine.
quotes.author: Gordon Ramsay

quotes.quote: Chefs must know how to create different kinds of sauces, doughs, and marinades.
quotes.author: Josh Gregory

quotes.quote: A chef is responsible for coming up with the recipes that are on the menu.
quotes.author: Josh Gregory

quotes.quote: Every man who receives a liberal education now counts chemistry among the most indispensable objects of his studies.
quotes.author: Antoine Francois Fourcroy

quotes.quote: Every aspect of the world today even politics and international relations, is affected by chemistry.
quotes.author: Linus Pauling

quotes.quote: I have always believed that chemistry can't be created between two people. You either have it or you don't. The script can only enhance it.
quotes.author: Deepika Padukone

quotes.quote: Green chemistry is replacing our industrial chemistry with nature's recipe book. It's not easy, because life uses only a subset of the elements in the periodic table. And we use all of them, even the toxic ones.
quotes.author: Janine Benyus

quotes.quote: Chemistry must become the astronomy of the molecular world.
quotes.author: Alfred Werner

quotes.quote: This isn't just chemistry. It's the whole periodic table.
quotes.author: Kelly Moran

quotes.quote: Chemistry is necessarily an experimental science: its conclusions are drawn from data, and its principles supported by evidence from facts.
quotes.author: Michael Faraday

quotes.quote: Sometimes we fall in love with somebody who will probably never love us, for reasons having nothing to do with us but with their own mindset, their chemistry.
quotes.author: Helen Fisher

quotes.quote: Chemistry is a trade for people without enough imagination to be physicists.
quotes.author: Arthur C. Clarke

quotes.quote: Chemists do not usually stutter. It would be very awkward if they did, seeing that they have at times to get out such words as methylethylamylophenylium.
quotes.author: William Crookes

quotes.quote: If you go very deeper you will see that you are not in freedom you are in cage made by chemistry and science.
quotes.author: Deyth Banger

quotes.quote: Chemistry is you touching my arm and it setting fire to my mind.
quotes.author: Nayyirah Waheed

quotes.quote: Our cells engage in protein production, and many of those proteins are enzymes responsible for the chemistry of life.
quotes.author: Randy Schekman

quotes.quote: Experimental science hardly ever affords us more than approximations to the truth; and whenever many agents are concerned we are in great danger of being mistaken.
quotes.author: Humphry Davy

quotes.quote: Today chemists can artificially make hundreds of thousands of organic compounds, most of which are not duplicated in nature.
quotes.author: George W. Stocking

quotes.quote: To think is to practice brain chemistry.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: I guess chemistry is just another word for love.
quotes.author: Scott Thompson

quotes.quote: Chemistry can be a good and bad thing. Chemistry is good when you make love with it. Chemistry is bad when you make crack with it.
quotes.author: Adam Sandler

quotes.quote: The chemistry of dissatisfaction is as the chemistry of some marvelously potent tar. In it are the building stones of explosives, stimulants, poisons, opiates, perfumes and stenches.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: The country which is in advance of the rest of the world in chemistry will also be foremost in wealth and in general prosperity.
quotes.author: William Ramsay

quotes.quote: Chemistry is a gibberish of Latin and German; But in Leibig's hands it becomes a powerful language.
quotes.author: Jakob Grimm

quotes.quote: Chemistry wasn't something you could just create anyway; it was either there or it wasn't.
quotes.author: Jennifer E. Smith

quotes.quote: The question undoubtedly is, or soon will be, not whether or no we shall employ notation in chemistry, but whether we shall use a bad and incongruous, or a consistent and regular notation.
quotes.author: William Whewell

quotes.quote: Chemistry is the unclean part of physics. Chemistry is the dirty part of physics.
quotes.author: Peter Reiss

quotes.quote: Chemie ist nicht nur, wenn es stinkt und kracht. Chemistry is not just, when it stinks and bangs.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Chemistry has been termed by the physicist as the messy part of physics, but this is not the reason why the physicists should be allowed to make a mess of chemistry when they invade it.
quotes.author: Frederick Soddy

quotes.quote: The meeting of two personalities is like the contact of two chemical substances: if there is any reaction, both are transformed.
quotes.author: C.G. Jung

quotes.quote: Together, we form a necessary paradox; not a senseless contradiction.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: We would be glad to have your friend come here to study Chemistry here and not Agricultural Chemistry, nor any other special kind of chemistry. We teach Chemistry.
quotes.author: Ira Remsen

quotes.quote: Chemistry is like the maid occupied with daily civilization; She is busy with fertilizers, medicines, glass, insecticides for she dispenses the recipes.
quotes.author: Jean Jacques

quotes.quote: Chemistry is the melodies you can play on vibrating strings.
quotes.author: Michio Kaku

quotes.quote: With monads and diads, and pentads and triads, my brain has been addled completely; And what's really meant by â€˜something-valent, is a question I give up discretely.
quotes.author: John Cargill Brough

quotes.quote: Life is a chemical reaction, it only requires balancing!
quotes.author: Priyavrat Gupta

quotes.quote: Chemistry, unlike other sciences, sprang originally from delusions and superstitions, and was at its commencement exactly on a par with magic and astrology.
quotes.author: Thomas Thomson

quotes.quote: Those distinct substances, which concretes generally either afford, or are made up of, may, without very much inconvenience, be called the elements or principles of them.
quotes.author: Robert Boyle

quotes.quote: Better things for better living through Chemistry.
quotes.author: Carol Westbrook

quotes.quote: Chemistry begins in the stars. The stars are the source of the chemical elements, which are the building blocks of matter and the core of our subject.
quotes.author: Peter Atkins

quotes.quote: We think there is color, we think there is sweet, we think there is bitter, but in reality there are atoms and a void.
quotes.author: Democritus

quotes.quote: But I think my mistakes became the chemistry for my miracles. I think that my tests became my testimonies.
quotes.author: T. D. Jakes

quotes.quote: We define organic chemistry as the chemistry of carbon compounds.
quotes.author: August Kekule

quotes.quote: Chemistry is the study of the effects of heat and mixture, with a view of discovering their general and subordinate laws, and of improving the useful arts.
quotes.author: Joseph Black

quotes.quote: Opposites generally create intense chemistry. There are more chances of fireworks when different people are together than similar personalities.
quotes.author: Sonam Kapoor

quotes.quote: Few scientists acquainted with the chemistry of biological systems at the molecular level can avoid being inspired.
quotes.author: Donald Cram

quotes.quote: Chemistry dissolves the goddess in the alembic, Venus, the white queen, the universal matrix, down to the molecular hexagons and carbon-chains.
quotes.author: Kathleen Raine

quotes.quote: The physical chemists never use their eyes and are most lamentably lacking in chemical culture. It is essential to cast out from our midst, root and branch, this physical element and return to our laboratories.
quotes.author: Henry Edward Armstrong

quotes.quote: The internal machinery of life, the chemistry of the parts, is something beautiful. And it turns out that all life is interconnected with all other life.
quotes.author: Richard P. Feynman

quotes.quote: Chemistry ought to be not for chemists alone.
quotes.author: Miguel de Unamuno

quotes.quote: Organic chemistry is the study of organs; inorganic chemistry is the study of the insides of organs.
quotes.author: Max Shulman

quotes.quote: A beautiful blonde is chemically three-fourths water, but what lovely surface tension!
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: One of the things a boy learns with a chemistry set is that he'll never get another.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Sex appeal is a matter of chemistry, but you don't have to be a chemist to find the formula.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Biology is the search for the chemistry that works.
quotes.author: Shirley Williams

quotes.quote: Chemistry is the branch of science that deals with the composition and structure of matter and the changes that matter undergoes.
quotes.author: Richard Myers

quotes.quote: Chemistry, like all branches of science, is a method that attempts to simplify and organize.
quotes.author: Richard Myers

quotes.quote: Chemistry has always existed. The formulation of the earth and the development of life involved innumerable chemical processes.
quotes.author: Richard Myers

quotes.quote: Chemistry is often called the central science. It derives this name because of its importance to all the other sciences.
quotes.author: Richard Myers

quotes.quote: Chemistry is a key to human progress. It is one of the oldest and the most productive sciences in improving human life.
quotes.author: Kirral Singh

quotes.quote: Chemistry touches many other fields. It makes a major contributions to agriculture, biochemistry, computer science, engineering, environmental sciences and many others.
quotes.author: Kirral Singh

quotes.quote: Biochemistry and molecular biology are on the borderline with medicine and biology. These help in unravelling the chemistry of life and disease in development of new medicines to improve health care.
quotes.author: Kirral Singh
