quotes.quote: Chemistry is central in our economic well-being. Recovering of our mineral resources, manufacturing of petrochemicals and various sources or energy are made possible through applications of chemistry.
quotes.author: Kirral Singh

quotes.quote: Knowledge of chemistry is essential not only for obtaining food, shelter, and clothing and in healthcare, but also for an understanding of t he world around us.
quotes.author: Kirral Singh

quotes.quote: People have exerted unprecedented control over everything in the world, thanks to chemistry.
quotes.author: Wansen Zhu

quotes.quote: Chemical elements make up everything in the world, including life.
quotes.author: Wansen Zhu

quotes.quote: It is hard to imagine what our life would be without the numerous developments chemistry has provided in the past and is still providing for our everyday life.
quotes.author: Choon H. Do

quotes.quote: The discoveries of chemistry should be evident in various pieces of equipment frequently used every day.
quotes.author: Choon H. Do

quotes.quote: The speed of the progressing of chemistry in connection with biology, physics, and engineering and its effects becomes faster and greater than ever before and will lead to better life for future generation.
quotes.author: Choon H. Do

quotes.quote: Chemistry, as everything else in our life, is not perfect. There is always a risk, which may cause some problem.
quotes.author: Choon H. Do

quotes.quote: We need chemicals and therefore it is necessary to understand chemistry for not only our existence sustenance but also improvement of our future.
quotes.author: Choon H. Do

quotes.quote: Chemistry is the science that uses the properties and behavior of atoms to understand matter. So chemistry is the study to all the stuff in the world.
quotes.author: Thomas R. Rybolt Ph.D.

quotes.quote: Understanding something about atoms and ions, molecules, and chemical reactions will help you learn about the chemistry of you everyday life.
quotes.author: Thomas R. Rybolt Ph.D.

quotes.quote: Chemistry, on the other hand, is that part of natural knowledge whose task it is to investigate events.
quotes.author: Dr. Lassar-Cohn

quotes.quote: Chemistry, like the rest of science, affects our lives in all sorts of ways.
quotes.author: John S. Holman

quotes.quote: Chemistry is about what things are made of, and how we can change them
quotes.author: John S. Holman

quotes.quote: By the turn of the century, chemists were industriously employing the new theories and techniques of organic and inorganic chemistry to create new products and new medicines.
quotes.author: Cathy Cobb

quotes.quote: The chemistry of coal is still not fully understood, despite a long standing economic incentive
quotes.author: Carl Sagan

quotes.quote: On Titan the molecules that have been raining down like manna from heaven for the last 4 billion years might still be there largely unaltered deep-frozen awaiting the chemists from Earth.
quotes.author: Carl Sagan

quotes.quote: The meeting of two personalities is like the contact of two chemical substances: if there is any reaction, both are transformed.
quotes.author: Carl Gustav Jung

quotes.quote: Time after time, chemists have found molecules behaving in exactly the same way, when conditions governing them are the same.
quotes.author: Virginia L. Mullin

quotes.quote: A true scientist would neve put away a dirty test tube or falsify a report.
quotes.author: Virginia L. Mullin

quotes.quote: Chemistry teaches how different chemicals react with each other, so that you can tell in advance what will happen when you mix certain chemicals together.
quotes.author: Virginia L. Mullin

quotes.quote: Chemistry teaches us much about different kinds of matter and how they behave.
quotes.author: Virginia L. Mullin

quotes.quote: Physical science is the study of matter and energy. Chemistry is one of the physical sciences.
quotes.author: Virginia L. Mullin

quotes.quote: Chemistry is, well technically, chemistry is the study of matter. But I prefer to see it as the study of change.
quotes.author: Vince Gilligan

quotes.quote: I recently read that love is entirely a matter of chemistry. That must be why my wife treats me like toxic waste.
quotes.author: David Bissonette

quotes.quote: There will be no advances in the generation, deployment, and conservation of energy without chemistry to provide its material infrastructure.
quotes.author: Peter Atkins

quotes.quote: Closely allied with the contribution of chemists to the alleviation of disease is their involvement at a molecular level.
quotes.author: Peter Atkins

quotes.quote: Biology became chemistry half a century ago when the structure of DNA was discovered.
quotes.author: Peter Atkins

quotes.quote: Make the most of your regrets; never smother your sorrow, but tend and cherish it till it comes to have a separate and integral interest. To regret deeply is to live afresh.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: No amount of money can bring back those moments you treasure.
quotes.author: Malika E Nura

quotes.quote: Cherish the beautiful memories for sometimes these are the blessings that you are left with.
quotes.author: Trudy Vesotsky

quotes.quote: Cherish your tears and their reasons, they will be the light of your smile, your inner peace and reconciliation.
quotes.author: Tariq Ramadan

quotes.quote: Let us cherish the hope that the day is not far distant when we will be in the midst of this next adventure.
quotes.author: Ernest Lawrence

quotes.quote: Cherish your human connections your relationships with friends and family.
quotes.author: Barbara Bush

quotes.quote: Cherish every moment you have with your parents, you never know what's going to happen.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Learning to cherish others is the best solution to our daily problems, and it is the source of all our future happiness and good fortune.
quotes.author: Kelsang Gyatso

quotes.quote: Cherish those who proven their love. It's a lot easier for someone to be nice to you on a beautiful day when the sun is shining, but in a heavy storm is where you learn who truly cares.
quotes.author: Ritu Ghatourey

quotes.quote: Cherish sunsets, wild creatures and wild places. Have a love affair with the wonder and beauty of the earth.
quotes.author: Stewart Udall

quotes.quote: Cherish your health, family, friends, and vocation for none of these things are permanent.
quotes.author: Joe Sacco

quotes.quote: Cherish that which is within you, and shut off what which is without; for much knowledge is a curse.
quotes.author: Zhuangzi

quotes.quote: Cherish the relationships that you have with others. Do this because the relationships that you have with others will be the strongest testament to your life when you are gone.
quotes.author: Anurag Prakash Ray

quotes.quote: You have to cherish things in a different way when you know the clock is ticking, you are under pressure.
quotes.author: Chadwick Boseman

quotes.quote: Then cherish pity, lest you drive and angel from your door.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: Cherish the memories, treasure the bonding, give importance to the one who make your life worthwhile; assure each other that you will be there, no matter how far one will go, the tie will be stronger forever.
quotes.author: Chermed

quotes.quote: Cherish each hour of this day for it can never return.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.quote: Cherish your visions. Cherish your ideals. Cherish the music that stirs in your heart, the beauty that forms in your mind, the loveliness that drapes your purest thoughts. For out of them will grow all delightful conditions, all heavenly environment, of these, if you but remain true to them, your world will at last be built
quotes.author: James Allen

quotes.quote: Cherish your own emotions and never undervalue them.
quotes.author: Robert Henri

quotes.quote: And so, with a boundless heart should one cherish all living beings.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: People who don't cherish their elderly have forgotten whence they came and whither they go.
quotes.author: Ramsey Clark

quotes.quote: Cherish those who seek the truth but beware of those who find it.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Cherish and take of what you value. Happiness is fragile. Appreciate every moment and do everything you to protect it.
quotes.author: Harlan Coben

quotes.quote: We have one life and we should cherish it and make it the best we can.
quotes.author: David Morrissey

quotes.quote: Cherish the others in your life. Cherish your freedom to be yourself.
quotes.author: Jay Woodman

quotes.quote: Cherish those who you have in your life because you never know when they wont be around anymore.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Preserve and cherish the pale blue dot, the only home we've ever known.
quotes.author: Carl Sagan

quotes.quote: Cherish every person and all opportunities. Have no fears, no doubts and no regrets. Focus on what you can give, not on what you can get.
quotes.author: Pooja Ruprell

quotes.quote: Cherish the moment and the time in which you live.
quotes.author: Fennel Hudson

quotes.quote: Cherish every moment with those you love at every stage of your journey.
quotes.author: Jack Layton

quotes.quote: Cherish the moments for they too become memories.
quotes.author: L. Kaliski

quotes.quote: To cherish what remains of the Earth and to foster its renewal is our only legitimate hope of survival.
quotes.author: Wendell Berry

quotes.quote: Cherish the beauty and cherish the pain, both will give you experience and you will never be the same.
quotes.author: Nikki Rowe

quotes.quote: Cherish all your happy moments; they make a fine cushion for old age.
quotes.author: Booth Tarkington

quotes.quote: Cherish your visions and your dreams as they are the children of your soul, the blueprints of your ultimate achievements.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: Cherish every moment and every person in your life, because you never know when it will be the last time you see someone.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Go cherish your soul; express companions; set your habits to a life of solitude; then will the faculties rise fair and full within.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: I mean, I just... I don't share best friends. I was taught to cherish my best friend.
quotes.author: Thomas Sanders

quotes.quote: I want my gifts to be remembered and cherished long after the holidays.
quotes.author: David Angell

quotes.quote: Nothing is cherished quite so much as the gift of laughter.
quotes.author: David Angell

quotes.quote: In sickness or in health, to love and to cherish, til death do us part.
quotes.author: Dominic Minghella

quotes.quote: When you find love, you hold on to it and cherish it because there is nothing finer, and it may never come again.
quotes.author: Michael Jacobs

quotes.quote: It's a crummy world, Orwell. You gotta cherish miracles.
quotes.author: Howard Rodman

quotes.quote: Your zing will come, cherish it my love, love mommy.
quotes.author: Peter Bayham

quotes.quote: Take this as token of my love. Cherish it always, as I cherish my half. Upon this I pledge my heart to you forever.
quotes.author: Shari Goodhartz

quotes.quote: In Japan, we cherish the young but also honour the dead.
quotes.author: Anne Valery

quotes.quote: My service to the crown has always been a cherished privilege.
quotes.author: J.M. DeMatteis

quotes.quote: Loving them doesn't make them perfect. You just try to cherish them, overlook their flaws.
quotes.author: Misha Green

quotes.quote: With this ring, I vow my love. And I promise always to cherish and protect you.
quotes.author: Kurt Sutter

quotes.quote: That young lady's face is a lotus flower that can make muddy waters clear. Cherish her.
quotes.author: Hye-Sun Ku

quotes.quote: Protecting what we cherish most as men is the reason why we formed this pirate crew.
quotes.author: Eiichiro Oda

quotes.quote: Solidarity and steadfastness. We are the union of the divine. And we shall cherish equilibrium and peace.
quotes.author: Michael Kingston

quotes.quote: I'll never be on my own / Dreams turn to tears / She buries my fears / And I will cherish this love ever more
quotes.author: Will.I.Am

quotes.quote: Let's take a walk together near the ocean shore / Hand in hand you and I / Let's cherish every moment we have been given / The time is passing by
quotes.author: Bell Robert Earl

quotes.quote: Cherish the love we have, we should cherish the life we live / Cherish the love, cherish the life, cherish the love / Cherish the love we have, for as long as we both shall live
quotes.author: Bell Robert Earl

quotes.quote: I do cherish you / For the rest of my life / You don't have to think twice / I will love you still
quotes.author: Hill Dan

quotes.quote: All I am, all I'll be / Everything in this world / All that I'll ever need / Is in your eyes / Shining at me
quotes.author: Hill Dan

quotes.quote: Cherish all your happy moments: they make a fine cushion for old age.
quotes.author: Booth Tarkington

quotes.quote: There are three ingredients in the good life: learning, earning and yearning.
quotes.author: Christopher Morley

quotes.quote: The way to love anything is to realize that it might be lost.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Love is the wisdom of the fool, and the folly of the wise.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: It's the nature of women not to love when we love them, and to love when we love them not.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Love brings light to darkness; it reaches through, sees and follows through.
quotes.author: John A. Andrews

quotes.quote: Love is going the second mile. It does not judge; it forgives, building bridges between nations and failed relationships.
quotes.author: John A. Andrews

quotes.quote: If you grasp this fact that loving starts with you, the way you love will have merit.
quotes.author: John A. Andrews

quotes.quote: If love isn't flowing its dying, and like the stream without its source, one cannot give something which he does not first possess.
quotes.author: John A. Andrews

quotes.quote: Cherish every moment you have left, because it has a great value. Share it with a special person, and it'll become even more special.
quotes.author: Vincenzo Berghella

quotes.quote: Consider that great love relationships and life goals are risky: if you lose, cherish the lesson anyway.
quotes.author: Vincenzo Berghella

quotes.quote: They say love is blind. Love can see very well, in fact it has the best eyesight.
quotes.author: Vincenzo Berghella

quotes.quote: Real love, I've learned, is a very, very strong form of forgiveness.
quotes.author: Vincenzo Berghella

quotes.quote: There is only one kind of love, but there are a thousand of imitations.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: Love is an act of faith and whoever is of little faith is also of title love.
quotes.author: Erich Fromm

quotes.quote: Only when you learn to love everyone equally will true freedom emerge.
quotes.author: Sri Mata Amritanandamayi Devi

quotes.quote: We live for and long for real love. We are born and die searching for such love. Children, love each other and unite in this pure love.
quotes.author: Sri Mata Amritanandamayi Devi

quotes.quote: Pure love is the best medicine for the modern world. This is what is lacking in all societies.
quotes.author: Sri Mata Amritanandamayi Devi

quotes.quote: Love creates feelings of oneness and unity among people.
quotes.author: Sri Mata Amritanandamayi Devi

quotes.quote: Where there is love there is life.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Let your love show. Let it transform. Let it bring unity. Let it work for the good of everyone.
quotes.author: Helen Clement

quotes.quote: I every person in the world could tap into the kindness that lies within him- or herself, it would be a much better life for everyone.
quotes.author: Stephen Post

quotes.quote: As for the rest of the world, I think we all need a little extra love and compassion.
quotes.author: Stephen Post

quotes.quote: A woman's happiness is in throwing everything away to live for love.
quotes.author: Ai Yazawa

quotes.quote: Love is often involved in our highest highs and our deepest lows.
quotes.author: Richard Templar

quotes.quote: We do not know the true value of our moments until they have undergone the test of memory.
quotes.author: Georges Duhamel

quotes.quote: Part of my ancestry is Cherokee. And in that tradition, you become an adult when you're 52.
quotes.author: Alice Walker

quotes.quote: I'm proud of being part Cherokee, and I think it's time all us Indians felt the same way.
quotes.author: Loretta Lynn

quotes.quote: The Trail of Tears has a great deal of meaning for every person of American Indian ancestry, whether they are Cherokee or not. For me, it has always stood for what is best and worst about the history of the United States.
quotes.author: Joseph Bruchac

quotes.quote: As a Cherokee, I can attest to the fact that Native Americans have been on the losing side of history. Our rights have been infringed upon, our treaties have been broken, our culture has been stolen, and our tribes have been decimated at the hands of our own United States government.
quotes.author: Markwayne Mullin

quotes.quote: I came from a family that was pretty insularly Cherokee. We kept to ourselves - the white people were there, and we were here, and it was practically a segregated kind of thing.
quotes.author: Wes Studi

quotes.quote: The Cherokee will fight. We'll fight. Where does that leave you?
quotes.author: John Hawkins

quotes.quote: Yad's right! We've got enough trouble without barkin' up the shins of the whole Cherokee Nation!
quotes.author: John Hawkins

quotes.quote: Once we Cherokees were like the Apaches. We feasted when the hunting was good. We starved when it was bad.
quotes.author: James R. Webb

quotes.quote: Before you judge a person you have to walk in their moccasins and live in their lodge for a month.
quotes.author: Buddy Hannah

quotes.quote: Cherokee fought hard. They made their run (in the fourth quarter), and they were right there. But we battled through.
quotes.author: Doug Lipscomb

quotes.quote: The Cherokee used to fear that taking a photo would make them lose their souls. Over exposure and desensitization is pretty close to losing one's soul. So they were right to quite an extent.
quotes.author: Sabine Shah

quotes.quote: Native people such as the Cherokees are just as human and complex and real as Americans are, and our nation needs to respect American Indian cultures and traditions.
quotes.author: Joseph Bruchac

quotes.quote: Individually and collectively, Cherokee people possess an extraordinary ability to face down adversity and continue moving forward.
quotes.author: Wilma Mankiller

quotes.quote: When you were born, you cried and the world rejoiced. Live your life so that when you die, the world cries and you rejoice.
quotes.author: Indian Proverb

quotes.quote: We are now about to take our leave and kind farewell to our native land, the country that the Great Spirit gave our Fathers, we are on the eve of leaving that country that gave us birth...it is with sorrow we are forced by the white man to quit the scenes of our childhood... we bid farewell to it and all we hold dear.
quotes.author: Charles Hicks

quotes.quote: All Cherokee music has been made to where it resorts back to gospel, to our Creator.
quotes.author: Kathy Sierra

quotes.quote: By peace our condition has been improved in the pursuit of civilized life.
quotes.author: John Ross

quotes.quote: You're being childish, like your Cherokee grandparents who shot arrows at the first locomotive. The wealth is under the ground, not on top of it.
quotes.author: Frank S. Nugent

quotes.quote: I am a warrior of the Cherokee Nation! Nobody owns me!
quotes.author: Jason L. Blair

quotes.quote: Cherokee princess, I'm sorry, but there's no such thing as princesses among Native people.
quotes.author: Roseanne Barr

quotes.quote: No, I am. Cherokee. Do you know, I can even tell when it's going to rain.
quotes.author: Adrian Edmondson

quotes.quote: You see, these mountain boys got injun blood in them. Cherokee. This would explain why they're animalistic in their nature.
quotes.author: Nick Cave

quotes.quote: You see, eh, when I was growing up on a ranch, my uncle and I, eh, he was half Cherokee, we had to pull about a hundred head o' cattle out of the mud on horseback.
quotes.author: James L. Brooks

quotes.quote: It's a Cherokee rose. The story is that when American soldiers were moving Indians off their land on the trail of tears the Cherokee mothers were grieving and crying so much 'cause they were losing their little ones along the way from exposure and disease and starvation.
quotes.author: Frank Darabont

quotes.quote: Well, actually, I'm one-eighth Cherokee. It's the best thing I've ever done. I mean, you know, I find art comes natural to our people, don't you?
quotes.author: Sterlin Harjo

quotes.quote: They took the whole Cherokee nation / Put us on this reservation / Took away our ways of life / The tomahawk and the bow and knife
quotes.author: John Loudermilk

quotes.quote: Cherokee people, Cherokee tribe / So proud to live, so proud to die
quotes.author: John Loudermilk

quotes.quote: My sweet Indian warrior / One day I'll hold you / In my arms fold you / Oh, Cherokee / Brave Indian warrior
quotes.author: Sascha Konietzko

quotes.quote: I am an American Indian, / My tribe is Cherokee / My forefathers loved this land / They left it here for me
quotes.author: Johnny Cash

quotes.quote: You take a black Irish temper and some solemn Cherokee / A Southern sense of humour and you got someone like me
quotes.author: Dipiero

quotes.quote: The early travelers among the Cherokees were not long discovering that in spite of their ambitions, their greatest weakness was a lack of tribal cohesion.
quotes.author: Robert Sparks Walker

quotes.quote: Cherokee literacy teaches us something important about Cherokee modes of communication and self-expression while enriching our cross-cultural understanding of what means to read and write.
quotes.author: Margaret Clelland Bender

quotes.quote: Cherokee history has been marked by a number of migrations that have resulted in, among other things, the formation of different tribes from the same original people.
quotes.author: Robert J. Conley

quotes.quote: Cherokee people lived in villages. The men were hunters. They were also warriors. The women were farmers. They were also head of their homes.
quotes.author: Kelly Rodgers

quotes.quote: Cherokee men and women had equal power in the tribe.
quotes.author: Kelly Rodgers

quotes.quote: Today, tribal members live in different places. Some still speak their own languages. They dance. They tell stories. They have a rich culture. And it is one they are happy to share with others.
quotes.author: Kelly Rodgers

quotes.quote: The Cherokee Pathe was the most famous of the Indian paths which served as early avenues of commerce.
quotes.author: Thomas E. Mails

quotes.quote: The climate factor of Cherokee country had a rhythmic or cynical nature that was a strong influence on Cherokee culture and led to a complex mythology and ritual performance.
quotes.author: Thomas E. Mails

quotes.quote: Plants and wildlife were essential to the Cherokees and played a central role in mythology and lore.
quotes.author: Thomas E. Mails

quotes.quote: The Cherokee language was soft and beautiful, with the charming melody of the tongues of southern Europe.
quotes.author: Thomas E. Mails

quotes.quote: Cherokee towns were deeply connected. Each person belonged to one of seven clans.
quotes.author: Danielle Smith-Llera

quotes.quote: Yet many Cherokee remember their traditions throughout the year. Remembering how their ancestors lived helps them guide them in their daily lives today.
quotes.author: Danielle Smith-Llera

quotes.quote: The Cherokee believe that people must live peacefully with nature.
quotes.author: Danielle Smith-Llera

quotes.quote: The Cherokee had always talked about their history and beliefs but never wrote them down.
quotes.author: Danielle Smith-Llera

quotes.quote: The Cherokee grew most of the food they ate. Women planted and harvested corn, beans, and squash. They called theses foods the 'three sisters.' Men fished and hunted for game, such as deer and fowl.
quotes.author: Anne M. Todd

quotes.quote: Cherokee boys trained to become hunters and warriors. Boys worked to improve their condition and build their strength.
quotes.author: Anne M. Todd

quotes.quote: The Cherokee have a rich and diverse background.
quotes.author: Anne M. Todd

quotes.quote: The Cherokee is probably the largest and most important tribe in the United States, having their own National Government and numbering at any time in their history.
quotes.author: James Mooney

quotes.quote: Many beliefs, particularly stories passed down over generations, are considered sacred and are deeply rooted in the Cherokees Nation's way of life.
quotes.author: Cassie M. Lawton

quotes.quote: The Cherokee also believed that the eagle had magical powers, and the eagle dance (also called the victory dance) was pretty important to their of life.
quotes.author: Cassie M. Lawton

quotes.quote: The religion of the Cherokee people was not based on the idea of a separate God. Instead, they felt a divine presence in everything around them--animals, plants, ground, and sky.
quotes.author: Cassie M. Lawton

quotes.quote: As with many Native American tribes, the Cherokee held their own religious and tribal beliefs and customs. Many of these traditions remain important to the Cherokee today. There were rituals, ceremonies, and stories devoted to every aspect of life.
quotes.author: Cassie M. Lawton

quotes.quote: The Cherokee lived in in a beautiful area that embraced land both east and westof the Appalachians. The land was well-suited for them. It includes villages, crop fields, game fields, and hunting grounds.
quotes.author: William R. Reynolds Jr

quotes.quote: Both the Cherokee men and women typically wore their coarse black hair long. It sometimes has an auburn hue.
quotes.author: William R. Reynolds Jr

quotes.quote: Cherokee civilly lived in a matriilneal society, and the children were born into the clan of the mother.
quotes.author: William R. Reynolds Jr

quotes.quote: In the old days, there was peace and harmony in the mountains where our people (the Cherokee) lived, struggled for survival, and raised the young ones. There was respect for the elders, and they were honored in our ceremonies.
quotes.author: Oscar Rogers

quotes.quote: You are not Cherokee because you have a BIA [Bureau of Indian Affairs] enrollment card. You have to live and be the culture that is based on a unique heritage.
quotes.author: J. T. Garrett

quotes.quote: You have to know what it means to gift with the sacred tobacco and how to give thanks to the Great One each day. It is a way of life with values that are uniquely Cherokee.
quotes.author: J. T. Garrett

quotes.quote: The Cherokee elders have taught us that there is healing in calmness and strength in humility.
quotes.author: J. T. Garrett

quotes.quote: Look at the cherry blossoms! Their color and scent fall with them, Are gone forever, Yet mindless The spring comes again.
quotes.author: Ikkyu

quotes.quote:
Come see the cherry trees of a water constellation
and the round key of the rapid universe,
come touch the fire of instantaneous blue,
come before its petals are consumed.
quotes.author: Pablo Neruda

quotes.quote: In the cherry blossom's shade there's no such thing as a stranger.
quotes.author: Kobayashi Issa

quotes.quote: Due to their short bloom time, Sakura blossoms are a metaphor for life itself: beautiful yet fleeting. You'll realize when you're as old as me to hang on to the good times because they won't last forever.
quotes.author: Shannon Mullen

quotes.quote: We celebrate the cherry tree not for its efficiency but for its effectiveness - and for its beauty. Its materials are in constant flow, and all those thousands of useless cherry blossoms look gorgeous. Then they fall to the ground and become soil again, so there's no problem
quotes.author: William McDonough

quotes.quote: Break open A cherry tree And there are no flowers; But the spring breeze Brings forth myriad blossoms.
quotes.author: Ikkyu Sojun

quotes.quote: Ah, if in this world there were no such thing as cherry blossoms, perhaps then in springtime our hearts would be at peace.
quotes.author: Ariwara no Narihira

quotes.quote: The significance of the cherry blossom tree in Japanese culture goes back hundreds of years. In their country, the cherry blossom represents the fragility and the beauty of life. It's a reminder that life is almost overwhelmingly beautiful but that it is also tragically short.
quotes.author: Homaro Cantu

quotes.quote: Are we to look at cherry blossoms only in full bloom, the moon only when it is cloudless? To long for the moon while looking on the rain, to lower the blinds and be unaware of the passing of the spring - these are even more deeply moving. Branches about to blossom or gardens strewn with flowers are worthier of our admiration.
quotes.author: Yoshida Kenko

quotes.quote: Flowers enshrine my heart between their petals; that's why my heartbeats love them so much.
quotes.author: Munia Khan

quotes.quote: The cherry blossom tree is truly a sight to behold, especially when it is in full riotous bloom. There are several varieties of the cherry blossom tree, and while most of them produce flowering branches full of small pinkish-hued flowers, some of them produce actual cherries.
quotes.author: Homaro Cantu

quotes.quote: What a strange thing! to be alive beneath cherry blossoms.”
quotes.author: Kobayashi Issa

quotes.quote: And so the spring buds burst, and so I gaze, And so the blossoms fall, and so my days ...
quotes.author: Onitsura

quotes.quote: I wouldn't mind if life left me... wingless burnt to cinders ripped by storms scattered...like weeds celestially wounded without cherry blossoms to perish with but I would cry with head held in my hands if it left me...unfulfilled.
quotes.author: Sanober Khan

quotes.quote: “Light as feathers, as fleeting as Zephyr, one moment they breathed pink, the next they faded. Cherry blossoms were as much an inspiration for beautiful verse as they were a reminder of life's fickleness, she thought.”
quotes.author: Alice Poon

quotes.quote: As the cherry blossoms bloom, festive picnics called hanami usher in the spring with elaborate spreads of miso salmon, mountain vegetables, colorful bento, and fresh mochi turned pink with sakura petals.”
quotes.author: Matt Goulding

quotes.quote: Since ancient times, the Japanese have heralded the arrival of the cherry blossoms because they symbolize the ephemeral beauty of life.
quotes.author: Victoria Abbott Riccardi

quotes.quote: “Donated by Japan, cherry blossoms grace the paths where a wall once stood in Berlin. Walls divide. Flowers unite.”
quotes.author: Khang Kijarro Nguyen

quotes.quote: Loveliest of trees, the cherry now Is hung with bloom along the bough.
quotes.author: A. E. Housman

quotes.quote: Between our two lives there is also the life of the cherry blossom.
quotes.author: Matsuo Basho

quotes.quote: I have a pretty good memory, but memories are time beings, too, like cherry blossoms or ginkgo leaves; for a while they are beautiful, and then they fade and die.
quotes.author: Ruth Ozeki

quotes.quote: If I were asked to explain the Japanese spirit, I would say it is wild cherry blossoms glowing in the morning sun!
quotes.author: Motoori Norinaga

quotes.quote: If there were no cherry blossoms in this world How much more tranquil our hearts would be in spring.
quotes.author: Ariwara no Narihira

quotes.quote: [W]hen the mind is really absent, in that silence, in that unlimited space, your potential starts glowing, radiating, flowering. Suddenly you are full of cherry blossoms, a new presence, a new fragrance.
quotes.author: Rajneesh

quotes.quote: It is spring time now! While the world looks for a new war to fight, you look for a cherry blossom to watch! Let the stupid seeks the violence; you seek the elegance!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: From all these trees, in the salads, the soup, everywhere, cherry blossoms fall.
quotes.author: Matsuo Basho

quotes.quote: On a moonlit night, after a snowfall, or under cherry blossoms, it adds to our pleasure if, while chatting at our ease, we bring forth the wine cups.
quotes.author: Yoshida Kenko

quotes.quote: the Japanese school year begins in spring ... so mothers can send off their children as cherry blossoms fall from the branches.
quotes.author: Cathy Davidson

quotes.quote: It may just be because I get homesick, but I have concluded Washington's cherry blossoms are just plain overrated.
quotes.author: Newt Gingrich

quotes.quote: The work of preservation demands that the feelings playing about in one's guts not be turned into action. Just watch their passing like cherry blossoms.
quotes.author: Maxine Hong Kingston

quotes.quote: Looking about I see no cherry blossoms And no crimson leaves A straw-thatched hut by a bay In the autumn dusk.
quotes.author: Fujiwara no Teika

quotes.quote: Looking about I see no cherry blossoms And no crimson leaves A straw-thatched hut by a bay In the autumn dusk.
quotes.author: Fujiwara no Teika

quotes.quote: Outside it's a perfect spring night. We stand on the sidewalk in front of our apartment building, and Henry takes my hand, and I look at him, and I raise our joined hands and Henry twirls me around and soon we're dancing down Belle Plaine Avenue, no music but the sound of cars whoosing by and our own laughter, and the smell of cherry blossoms that fall like snow on the sidewalk as we dance underneath the tress.
quotes.author: Audrey Niffenegger

quotes.quote: The first time I saw a fingerbowl was at the home of my benefactress. [...] The water had a few cherry blossoms in it, and I thought it must be some clear sort of Japanese after-dinner soup and ate every bit of it, including the crisp little blossoms.
quotes.author: Sylvia Plath

quotes.quote: As I caress the pink cherry blossom of the tree which has been keeping me for one third of a century safe
quotes.author: Nobody Nose

quotes.quote: I feel as though as I touch those cherry-blossom petals Cup the budding cherry flowers in my hands I am slowly, yet lovingly stroking Brigid's silky pretty face.
quotes.author: Nobody Nose

quotes.quote: Cherry plum blossom in an old tin jug — Oh, it is lovely, beautiful and fair, With sun on it and little shadows mixed All in among the fragrant wonder there.
quotes.author: Lesbia Harford

quotes.quote: Cherry plum blossom on the workroom bench Where we can see it all our working hours. In all my garden days of ladyhood, I never met girls who so loved sweet flowers.
quotes.author: Lesbia Harford

quotes.quote: These exuberant festivals celebrate the ethereal and glorious springtime blooming of the ancient cherry blossom tree and its role today as an instrument of diplomacy, landscape enhancement and eternal sign of spring and romance.
quotes.author: Ann McClellan

quotes.quote: Cherry blossoms are explored as symbols in Japanese art and artifacts, and in images of Japonism found in Western art.
quotes.author: Ann McClellan

quotes.quote: Cherry Blossoms Say Spring looks at the life cycle of a cherry tree, the history behind the gift of the Japanese cherry trees to our nation's capital, and the association of cherry trees and spring. Vibrant scenes from the Cherry Blossom Festival and the flood of visitors to the Tidal Basin are balanced with shots of the natural beauty of these trees.
quotes.author: Jill Esbaum

quotes.quote: One of the legends suggesting why the cherry trees' blossoms are so exquisite and ephemeral says that the fairy Ko-no-hana-sakuya-hime, the "maiden who causes trees to bloom," hovers low in the spring sky, awakening the sleeping trees with her delicate breath.
quotes.author: Ann McClellan

quotes.quote: The ornamental cherry trees' blossoms called sakura, are as closely associated with the image of Japan held by the rest of the world as is Mount Fuji.
quotes.author: Ann McClellan

quotes.quote: The cherry blossoms have a spiritual meaning for the Japanese people.
quotes.author: Ann McClellan

quotes.quote: As the poet Motoori famously expressed it: If one should ask you concerning the spirit of a true Japanese, point to the wild cherry blossom glowing in the sun.
quotes.author: Ann McClellan

quotes.quote: The cloud-like effect of the cherry trees in bloom on Mount Yoshino has inspired poets and common folk in Japan for over a thousand years.
quotes.author: Ann McClellan

quotes.quote: Cherry blossom is falling Cherry blossom is on its way out Hear a new word is calling It hears me too and it wants me to shout it out.
quotes.author: Nitzer Ebb

quotes.quote: Cherry blossom cherry blossom It's the air that we breathe How have we forgotten what it means to be
quotes.author: Haelos

quotes.quote: Cherry blossom I can't let you go I'm not an expert But I know you're like gold You pop up Shine bright Then you hit the road
quotes.author: Jon Vinyl

quotes.quote: I don't want to be shy Can't stand it anymore I just want to say Hi To the one I love Cherry blossom girl
quotes.author: Air

quotes.quote: I hiked out to the country On a path of self discovery But all I found was a cherry blossom tree as I believe in harming melodies hypnotized by a silent breeze The of this cherry blossom tree
quotes.author: Imaginary Cities

quotes.quote: So cross me cherry blossom tree For you have witnessed it all You've seen the world change suddenly At it's height and at it's fall
quotes.author: Imaginary Cities

quotes.quote: Yeah you should taste her majesty My lil' cherry blossom Just like a crow, it cut my throat
quotes.author: Paolo Nutini

quotes.quote: What's your story baby? No control of what I am saying Winter leaves still make me believe No vendettas, just a cherry blossom tree.
quotes.author: Manic Street Preachers

quotes.quote: Sad bright eyes Are cherry blossoms Your true love Will never wake up
quotes.author: Communique

quotes.quote: It looks like rain in Cherry Blossom Lane The sunshine of your smile's no longer there It looks like rain in Cherry Blossom Lane Your golden voice no longer fills the air
quotes.author: Guy Lombardo

quotes.quote: Chess is the gymnasium of the mind.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: Age brings wisdom to some men, and to others chess.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Chess is a fairy tale of 1001 blunders.
quotes.author: Savielly Tartakower

quotes.quote: Chess is the only game greater than its players.
quotes.author: Tim Rice

quotes.quote: The most powerful weapon in Chess is to have the next move.
quotes.author: David Bronstein

quotes.quote: The pawns are the soul of chess.
quotes.author: Philidor

quotes.quote: Chess, like love, like music, has the power to make men happy.
quotes.author: Tarrasch

quotes.quote: Chess is the art of analysis.
quotes.author: Mikhail Botvinnik

quotes.quote: What would Chess be without silly mistakes?
quotes.author: Kurt Richter

quotes.quote: Chess is like war on a board.
quotes.author: Bobby Fischer

quotes.quote: Chess makes man wiser and clear-sighted.
quotes.author: Vladimir Putin

quotes.quote: Chess demands total concentration.
quotes.author: Bobby Fischer

quotes.quote: In Chess, just as in life, today's bliss may be tomorrow's poison.
quotes.author: Assaic

quotes.quote: You can only get good at Chess if you love the game.
quotes.author: Bobby Fischer

quotes.quote: Life is too short for chess.
quotes.author: Byron

quotes.quote: Chess is a good mistress, but a bad master.
quotes.author: Gerald Abrahams

quotes.quote: Those who say they understand Chess, understand nothing.
quotes.author: Robert Hubner

quotes.quote: The essence of Chess is thinking about what Chess is.
quotes.author: David Bronstein

quotes.quote: A bad day of Chess is better than any good day at work.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The only thing chess players have in common is chess
quotes.author: Lodewijk Prins

quotes.quote: Chess is not for the timid.
quotes.author: Irving Chernev

quotes.quote: That's what Chess is all about. One day you give your opponent a lesson, the next day he gives you one.
quotes.author: Bobby Fischer

quotes.quote: Many have become Chess Masters, no one has become the Master of Chess.
quotes.author: Siegbert Tarrasch

quotes.quote: Chess is a sea in which a gnat may drink and an elephant may bathe.
quotes.author: Indian Proverb

quotes.quote: When you see a good move, look for a better one.
quotes.author: Dominic Lawson

quotes.quote: Chess is a forcing house where the fruits of character can ripen more fully than in life.
quotes.author: Edward Morgan Foster

quotes.quote: All that matters on the chessboard is good moves.
quotes.author: Bobby Fischer

quotes.quote: Chess is the struggle against error.
quotes.author: Johannes Zukertort

quotes.quote: Chess is life and every game is like a new life.
quotes.author: Eduard Gufeld

quotes.quote: Chess is as much a mystery as women.
quotes.author: Purdy

quotes.quote: On the chess-board lies and hypocrisy do not survive long.
quotes.author: Em. Lasker

quotes.quote: Chess is the art which expresses the science of logic.
quotes.author: Mikhail Botvinnik

quotes.quote: Of chess it has been said that life is not long enough for it, but that is the fault of life, not chess.
quotes.author: William Napier

quotes.quote: Chess, like love, is infectious at any age.
quotes.author: Salo Flohr

quotes.quote: It [chess] is eminently and emphatically the philosopher's game.
quotes.author: Paul Morphy

quotes.quote: Chess is an infinitely complex game, which one can play in infinitely numerous and varied ways.
quotes.author: Vladimir Kramnik

quotes.quote: When the chess game is over, the pawn and the king go back to the same box.
quotes.author: Irish Saying

quotes.quote: There are more adventures on a chessboard than on all the seas of the world.
quotes.author: Pierre Macorlan

quotes.quote: Excellence at Chess is one mark of a scheming mind.
quotes.author: Sir Arthur Conan Doyle

quotes.quote: Every chess master was once a beginner.
quotes.author: Chernev

quotes.quote: Chess is a curse upon a man.
quotes.author: H. G. Wells

quotes.quote: Chess is played with the mind and not with the hands!
quotes.author: Renaud and Kahn

quotes.quote: Chess is above all, a fight!
quotes.author: Emanuel Lasker

quotes.quote: In Chess, as it is played by masters, chance is practically eliminated.
quotes.author: Emanuel Lasker

quotes.quote: Chess is a terrific way for kids to build self image and self esteem.
quotes.author: Saudin Robovic

quotes.quote: Chess is mental torture.
quotes.author: Garry Kasparov)

quotes.quote: Chess is not relaxing; it's stressful even if you win.
quotes.author: Jennifer Shahade

quotes.quote: You cannot play at Chess if you are kind-hearted.
quotes.author: French Proverb

quotes.quote: When in doubt... play Chess!
quotes.author: Tevis

quotes.quote: Chess can be described as the movement of pieces eating one another.
quotes.author: Marcel Duchamp

quotes.quote: In which the game of chess as a game of science and mathematical invention is addressed.
quotes.author: Ruy López

quotes.quote: Chess is a powerful reducing agent. It can reduce a whole battlefield or city or planet down to sixty-four squares. And yet, within that simplistic frame, chess retains its active quality; like a snow globe, it shrinks things down, but retains its dynamic essence.
quotes.author: Ruy López

quotes.quote: If a ruler does not understand chess, how can he rule over over a kingdom?
quotes.author: King Khusros II

quotes.quote: Chess games will always end up being a draw unless one side makes a mistake.
quotes.author: Susan Polgar

quotes.quote: Winning has little to do with brilliance; plenty of smart people play chess poorly.
quotes.author: Susan Polgar

quotes.quote: Triumph on the board comes from having practiced the tactical skills necessary to deal with the obstacles that opponents create.
quotes.author: Susan Polgar

quotes.quote: In the fields of finance or chess, regardless of how well you prepare strategy and plan your moves, if the odds don't roll in your favor, you lose.
quotes.author: Susan Polgar

quotes.quote: In chess, the fear of a potential loss outweighs the thrill of winning to such a degree that tournament participants often or accept a draw even if they have a superior position - just to be on the safe side.
quotes.author: Susan Polgar

quotes.quote: I'd rather have a pawn than a finger.
quotes.author: Reuben Fine

quotes.quote: The world of chess is more than simply wooden pieces and wooden problems.
quotes.author: John C. Knudsen

quotes.quote: The chessboard is the world, the pieces are the phenomena of the Universe, the rules of the game are what we call the laws of Nature, the player on the other sideis hidden from us.
quotes.author: Thomas Huxley

quotes.quote: Not all artists may be chess players, but all chess players are artists.
quotes.author: Marcel Duchamp

quotes.quote: Excellence at chess is one mark of a scheming mind.
quotes.author: Sherlock Holmes

quotes.quote: There are two classes of men; those who are content to yield to circumstances and who play whist; and those who aim to control circumstances and who play chess.
quotes.author: Mortimer Collins

quotes.quote: Chess is war overboard. The object is to crush the opponent's ego.
quotes.author: Bobby Fischer

quotes.quote: Chess, like love, like music, has the power to make men happy.
quotes.author: Siegbert Tarrasch

quotes.quote: A game of chess is divided into three stages: the first, when you hope you have the advantage, the second when you believe you have an advantage, and the third.. when you know you're going to lose.
quotes.author: Saviely Tartakower

quotes.quote: Those who say they understand chess, understand nothing.
quotes.author: Robert Huebner

quotes.quote: Chess is a foolish expedient for making idle people believe they are doing very clever, when they are only wasting their time.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: The essence of chess is thinking about what chess is.
quotes.author: David Bronstein

quotes.quote: There is no remorse like the remorse of chess.
quotes.author: H.G. Wells

quotes.quote: Chess is an egotistical game, and all its protagonists hold conceits of some kind or other, else there would be no pint in playing.
quotes.author: Charles Warburton

quotes.quote: In chess, as in life, it is ironic that catastrophe strikes just at the moment when all seems secure.
quotes.author: Irving Chernev

quotes.quote: It takes two great men, contending with one another under the utmost personal responsibility, to produce one great game.
quotes.author: Emanuel Lasker

quotes.quote: There are no heroes in chess.
quotes.author: Cory Evans

quotes.quote: There just isn't enough televised chess.
quotes.author: David Letterman

quotes.quote: Remember, dear, chess is a danger to family life.
quotes.author: Chess Fever

quotes.quote: There was a time when chess was simply a game, a hobby for leisure hours. In our days it has become an art in which the virtuosi create real works of art, games which are then disseminated by press, radio and television to millions of fans who get aesthetic pleasure from them. In many countries the game has become one aspect of a nation's culture.
quotes.author: Alexander Kotov

quotes.quote: Chess is a substitute for life itself.
quotes.author: David Spanier

quotes.quote: For a game it is too serious, for seriousness too much of a game.
quotes.author: Moses Mendlelssohn

quotes.quote: The object of the game of chess is to checkmate the king.
quotes.author: John C. Knudsen

quotes.quote: A mastery of emotion is an essential ingredient to the mastery of chess.
quotes.author: Charles Warburton

quotes.quote: During a chess competition a chess master should be a combination of a beast of prey and a monk.
quotes.author: Alexander Alekhine

quotes.quote: When two fiercely aggressive masters clash, the struggle is unusually short and violent.
quotes.author: Irving Chernev

quotes.quote: The boy doesn't have a clue about chess, and there's no future at all for him in this profession.
quotes.author: Mikhail Botvinnik

quotes.quote: The game today for most leaders can better be compared to chess--a game in which strategy matters; a game in which individual pieces have unique abilities that drive unique contributions; a game in which heightened focus and a deeper level of thinking are required to win.
quotes.author: Mark Miller

quotes.quote: Chess teaches logic, patience, and planning, and it rewards those who learn to discipline their minds.
quotes.author: Garry Kasparov

quotes.quote: Chess is also an excellent tool for examining the consequences of one's actions and the decisions that led to them.
quotes.author: Garry Kasparov

quotes.quote: To play chess on a truly high level requires a constant stream of exact, informed decisions, made in real time and under pressure from you opponent.
quotes.author: Garry Kasparov

quotes.quote: Chess requires a synthesis of some very different virtues, all of which are necessary to good decisions: calculation, creativity, and a desire for results.
quotes.author: Garry Kasparov

quotes.quote: Chicago still remains a Mecca of the Midwest- people from both coasts are kind of amazed how good life is in Chicago, and what a good culture we've got. You can have a pretty wonderful artistic life and never leave Chicago.
quotes.author: Harold Ramis

quotes.quote: Chicago is a great place because you can experience theatre, film, television, anything and everything, so for an actor it's exciting. The doors are kind of open.
quotes.author: Charlie Barnette

quotes.quote: Chicago is where the whole idea of community policing began. It remains the - the best and the most comprehensive approach we have in changing the everyday conditions that breed crime and violence - and then breed mistrust. We have more work to do. We need better training to live up to the values and the principles of community policing.
quotes.author: Rahm Emanuel

quotes.quote: Chicago is partly a fairy tale because it's inside one person's head, so that part of it's made up and the rest of it is reality.
quotes.author: Colleen Atwood Quotes

quotes.quote: Chicago is an October sort of city even in spring.
quotes.author: Nelson Algren

quotes.quote: Chicago is a city of contradictions, of private visions haphazardly overlaid and linked together. If the city was unhappy with itself yesterday-and invariably it was-it will reinvent itself today.
quotes.author: Pat Colander

quotes.quote: Chicago is a sort of journalistic Yellowstone Park, offering haven to a last herd of fantastic bravos.
quotes.author: Ben Hecht

quotes.quote: Going to Chicago was like going out of the world.
quotes.author: Muddy Waters

quotes.quote: Chicago will give you a chance. The sporting spirit is the spirit of Chicago.
quotes.author: Lincoln Steffens

quotes.quote: Loving Chicago is like loving a woman with a broken nose.
quotes.author: Nelson Algren

quotes.quote: Chicago has a strange metaphysical elegance of death about it.
quotes.author: Claes Oldenburg

quotes.quote: Chicago is incredibly gracious. People here have so much pride.
quotes.author: Giuliana Rancic

quotes.quote: Chicago is constantly auditioning for the world, determined that one day, on the streets of Barcelona, in Berlin's cabarets, in the coffee shops of Istanbul, people will know and love us in our multidimensional glory, dream of us the way they dream of San Francisco and New York.
quotes.author: Mary Schmich

quotes.quote: It was Chicago with its World's Fair which vivified the national desire for civic beauty.
quotes.author: Daniel Burnham

quotes.quote: Chicago is the Great American City, and it was really great to live there during a time of economic expansion and opportunity and growth. I felt like I was living at the center of the world. Unlike New York, no one expects you to be a professional writer.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: Chicago is not the most corrupt American city. It's the most theatrically corrupt.
quotes.author: Studs Terkel

quotes.quote: The best food is in Chicago. There are great restaurants everywhere, from fancy places to burger joints.
quotes.author: Steve Carell

quotes.quote: In Chicago, you have an absence of strong family units, and that absence gets filled by gangs. You have a failure in the school system, after-school programs and other social programs to help keep kids off the streets. Amnesty International speaks to that in some way, by keeping these issues in the forefront.
quotes.author: Lupe Fiasco

quotes.quote: Chicago is one city. We shall work as one people for our common good and our common goals.
quotes.author: Harold Washington

quotes.quote: Chicago is known for good steaks, expensive stores and beautiful architecture.
quotes.author: Bob Barr

quotes.quote: Chicago is the product of modern capitalism, and, like other great commercial centers, is unfit for human habitation.
quotes.author: Eugene V. Debs

quotes.quote: Chicago seems a big city instead of merely a large place.
quotes.author: A J Liebling

quotes.quote: Chicago kept industry, attracted new business, became the center for convention trade and transportation.
quotes.author: Jane Byrne

quotes.quote: Chicago was a town where nobody could forget how the money was made. It was picked up from floors still slippery with blood.
quotes.author: Norman Mailer

quotes.quote: Chicago is a world-class city filled with amazing people with big ideas.
quotes.author: W. Kamau Bell

quotes.quote: Chicago's one of the rare places where architecture is more visible.
quotes.author: Frank Gehry

quotes.quote: In most places in the country, voting is looked upon as a right and a duty, but in Chicago it's a sport. In Chicago not only your vote counts, but all kinds of other votes--kids, dead folks, and so on.
quotes.author: Dick Gregory

quotes.quote: Chicago has disappointed her enemies and astonished the world.
quotes.author: Erik Larson

quotes.quote: Chicago is not a very fashion-driven place. Nobody says, 'Oh, you've got to come see these fabulous people!' Nobody cares.
quotes.author: Mike Nichols

quotes.quote: Do you eat chicken because you are familiar with the scientific literature on them and have decided that their suffering doesn't matter, or do you do it because it tastes good?
quotes.author: Jonathan Safran Foer

quotes.quote: And believe me, a good piece of chicken can make anybody believe in the existence of God.
quotes.author: Sherman Alexie

quotes.quote: What came first, The chicken or the egg? I don't care, I eat both
quotes.author: Gouse Pasha

quotes.quote: When life gives you 100 reasons to cry show life that you have a chicken biryani to smile
quotes.author: Gouse Pasha

quotes.quote: People will hate you, rate you, shake you, but chicken breast will never cheat you.
quotes.author: Gouse Pasha

quotes.quote: Frying chicken always makes me feel a little better about life.
quotes.author: Gouse Pasha

quotes.quote: I like chicken a lot because chicken is generous - that is to say, it's obedient. It will do whatever you tell it to do.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: I have a painting where somebody's holding a chicken, and underneath the chicken is somebody's head.
quotes.author: Jean-Michel Basquiat

quotes.quote: One of the greatest birds I've ever had is called a 'Turducken.' A chicken inside of a duck inside of a turkey. That's one that I love. I've done it a couple times.
quotes.author: Guy Fieri

quotes.quote: No one likes rubbery chicken.
quotes.author: Guy Fieri

quotes.quote: Bantam chickens are smaller versions of bigger chickens are also called miniature; they are like the big chicken in every way except that they are smaller.
quotes.author: Rachel Smith

quotes.quote: There are more chickens in the worlds that any other kind of bird.
quotes.author: Rachel Smith

quotes.quote: From the original centers, chickens, as other livestock species underwent domestication and migration processes.
quotes.author: Timothy Nthaziyake Pearson Gondwe

quotes.quote: Chick survival or mortality was mostly age related, with high mortality of chicks observed during the first five weeks of age.
quotes.author: Timothy Nthaziyake Pearson Gondwe

quotes.quote: Charles Darwin was convinced from his studies that the red jungle fowl was the only ancestor of the domestic chicken.
quotes.author: Joseph Barber

quotes.quote: Broiler chicken breeds selected for fast growth, large appetites, higher muscle mass and a greater efficiency for converting feed into weight gain.
quotes.author: Joseph Barbera

quotes.quote: Cockerel is often used to describe an immature male chicken, a male less than one year of age or a male of any age.
quotes.author: Joseph Barbera

quotes.quote: One genetic study suggests that all modern chickens may have descended from chickens domesticated in Thailand.
quotes.author: Joseph Barbera

quotes.quote: Healthiness of chicken could be trace to the way it is cooked.
quotes.author: Aaron Katherine

quotes.quote: Freshness of chicken affects its health benefits, likewise fried chicken has no health benefits.
quotes.author: Aaron Katherine

quotes.quote: Fresh chicken has lots of trace minerals that enhance immune system.
quotes.author: Aaron Katherine

quotes.quote: They are known as the 'bird that give's birth everyday' and have been around since ancient times.
quotes.author: Rachel Smith

quotes.quote: If you have a rural property, you may have an outbuilding that can be converted into a chicken house.
quotes.author: Christine Heinrichs

quotes.quote: Chicken are birds, so they are covered with feathers, like most birds.
quotes.author: Rachel Smith

quotes.quote: Bigger birds do better in the cold. jersey Giants, at 13 ponds for a rooster, 10 pounds for a hen, don't mind the cold.
quotes.author: Christine Heinrichs

quotes.quote: Chickens typically manage cold weather as well, insulated as they are.
quotes.author: Christine Heinrichs

quotes.quote: Chicken bones have been found in South America by paleontologists which have been dated to a century before Christopher Columbus arrived.
quotes.author: David Scrivener

quotes.quote: I did not become a vegetarian for my health, I did it for the health of the chickens.
quotes.author: Isaac Bashevis

quotes.quote: The key to everything is patience. You get the chicken by hatching the egg, not by smashing it.
quotes.author: Arnold H. Glasgow

quotes.quote: The chicken is gone, but you can still smell it, But, it's nothing like it was.
quotes.author: James Reed

quotes.quote: It takes a tough man to make a tender chicken.
quotes.author: Frank Perdue

quotes.quote: Global chicken meat consumption in 2005 was estimated to be 54.99 million tons.
quotes.author: Theerachai Haitook

quotes.quote: Recent discoveries have confirmed one of the other suggestions made since the 1920's, that chicken were brought across the Pacific, island by island, by another group of early Native Americans, Polynesians, in ancient times.
quotes.author: David Scrivener

quotes.quote: The world's leading countries in poultry meat consumption were USA, China, EU, Brazil and Mexico.
quotes.author: Theerachai Haitook

quotes.quote: Chicken feathers on the neck expand and raise stiff in a cock-fight.
quotes.author: Jesse D. Dagoon

quotes.quote: Every child should be taught that useful work is worship and that intelligent labor is the highest form of prayer.
quotes.author: Robert Green Ingersoll

quotes.quote: Of course, we knew that this meant an attack on the union. The bosses intended gradually to get rid of us, employing in our place child labor and raw immigrant girls who would work for next to nothing.
quotes.author: Rose Schneiderman

quotes.quote: Child labor and poverty are inevitably bound together and if you continue to use the labor of children as the treatment for the social disease of poverty, you will have both poverty and child labor to the end of time.
quotes.author: Grace Abbott

quotes.quote: 180 million kids are engaged in the worst forms of child labour. Put it all together and it is not only morally unacceptable, but politically dangerous.
quotes.author: Juan Somavia

quotes.quote: We must ensure that while eliminating child labor in the export industry, we are also eliminating their labour from the informal sector, which is more invisible to public scrutiny and thus leaves the children more open to abuse and exploitation.
quotes.author: Carol Bellamy

quotes.quote: If we can't begin to agree on fundamentals, such as the elimination of the most abusive forms of child labor, then we really are not ready to march forward into the future.
quotes.author: Alexis Herman

quotes.quote: It's a collective truth that slavery is wrong, that child labor is wrong, that gross inequality is wrong. God didn't send it.
quotes.author: Dar Williams

quotes.quote: One finds fortunes built on slave labor, indentured labor, prison labor, immigrant labor, female labor, child labor, and scab labor backed by the lethal force of gun thugs and militia. â€˜Old money' is often little more than dirty money laundered by several generations of possession
quotes.author: Michael Parenti

quotes.quote: After all, despite the economic advantage to firms that employed child labor, it was in the social interest, as a national policy, to abolish it - removing that advantage for all firms.
quotes.author: Barry Commoner

quotes.quote: Child labor becomes a label of condemnation in spite of its ancient function as the quickest, most reliable way to human independence.
quotes.author: John Taylor Gatto

quotes.quote: Amid attempts to protect elephants from ivory poachers and dolphins from tuna nets, the rights of children go remarkably unremarked.
quotes.author: Anna Quindlen

quotes.quote: You can't regulate child labor. You can't regulate slavery. Some things are just wrong.
quotes.author: Michael Moore

quotes.quote: Child labor perpetuates poverty, unemployment, illiteracy, population growth, and other social problems.
quotes.author: Kailash Satyarthi

quotes.quote: Child labour may be distasteful to westerners, but does boycotting goods made with child labour improve or exacerbate the lot of third world children? Trusting the market to regulate may not ultimately be in our interest.
quotes.author: Noreena Hertz

quotes.quote: Getting inside the mind of a terrorist wasn't difficult at all. Even as children, human beings fabricate elaborate revenge fantasies. We're not a particular species. Check out popular video games.
quotes.author: Alan Dean Foster

quotes.quote: What's wrong with saying that when school's out, you can hire kids as young as twelve or thirteen?
quotes.author: Newt Gingrich

quotes.quote: When you use your brain, it's a violation of the child labor law.
quotes.author: Joe E. Lewis

quotes.quote: Finding out that handmade rugs are often made by mere children was so shocking to me— I could not imagine what those youngsters have to go through every day.
quotes.author: Brenda Knight

quotes.quote: The golf links lie so near the mill / That almost every day / The laboring children can look out / And watch the men at play.
quotes.author: Sarah N. Cleghorn

quotes.quote: Children require guidance and sympathy far more than instruction.
quotes.author: Anne Sulivan

quotes.quote: There should be severe child labor and factory inspection laws.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Labor Day is a glorious holiday because your child will be going back to school the next day. It would have been called Independence Day, but that name was already taken.
quotes.author: Bill Dodds

quotes.quote: Work is not the course, but drudgery is.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: Even when we talked about child labor, we were frowned upon. But then you know that you have to speak the truth irrespective of the repercussions.
quotes.author: Asma Jahangir

quotes.quote: All the problems of the world - child labor, corruption - are symptoms of a spiritual disease: lack of compassion.
quotes.author: Bill Vaughan

quotes.quote: Yes to trade, but trade that ensures that these other countries that trade with us aren't engaging in child labor.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: A lot of work still remains but I will see the end of child labor in my lifetime.
quotes.author: Kailash Satyarthi

quotes.quote: We passed the Children's Bureau bill calculated to prevent children from being employed too early in factories.
quotes.author: William Howard Taft

quotes.quote: It is more important to let a child's imagination develop than it is to labor to inculcate in him or her some correct ethical point of view.
quotes.author: Padraic Colum

quotes.quote: Forcing the muse to let thoughts flow; equals to pushing a child, into labor. -
quotes.author: Aniruddha Sastikar

quotes.quote: Labor unions are the worst thing that ever struck the earth because they take away a man's independence.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: Labor is service and service is life. And when we serve something more than ourselves, we feel alive.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: We all labor against our own cure, for death, is the cure of all diseases.
quotes.author: Thomas Browne Sr.

quotes.quote: The best way to make children good is to make them happy.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Our heritage and ideals, our code and standards the things we live by and teach our children are preserved or diminished by how freely we exchange ideas and feelings.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: Don't just teach your kids to read, teach them to question what they read. Teach them to question everything.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: Caring for children has always been one of the deepest and most satisfying things that a human being does, and yet it is hard to keep a healthy attitude toward it in our competitive, outcome-oriented society.
quotes.author: Alison Gopnik

quotes.quote: Only where children gather is there any real chance of fun.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: Child-care costs are now the largest family expenditure in much of America, even exceeding the cost of housing.
quotes.author: Donald Trump

quotes.quote: We are now at a point where we must educate our children in what no one knew yesterday, and prepare our schools for what no one knows yet.
quotes.author: Margaret Mead

quotes.quote: Teaching kids to count is fine, but teaching them what counts is best.
quotes.author: Bob Talbert

quotes.quote: The most important thing that parents can teach their children is how to get along without them.
quotes.author: Frank A. Clark

quotes.quote: Teach children what to think and you limit them to your ideas. Teach children how to think and their ideas are unlimited.
quotes.author: Sandra Parks

quotes.quote: One of the best things we can do for our country, for advancing our children, is to upgrade our child care system.
quotes.author: Lois Frankel

quotes.quote: It is easier to build strong children than to repair broken men.
quotes.author: Frederick Douglass

quotes.quote: Caring for children is a dance between setting appropriate limits as caretakers and avoiding unnecessary power struggles that result in unhappiness.
quotes.author: Charlotte Sophia Kasl

quotes.quote: A child is a beam of sunlight from the Infinite and Eternal, with possibilities of virtue and vice, but as yet unstained.
quotes.author: Lyman Abbott

quotes.quote: Putting babies as young as two weeks into child care for the first year of their life, for 60 hours a week, will cause their brains damage.
quotes.author: Mem Fox

quotes.quote: Child care can almost bankrupt a family, even a two-parent household in which both parents are working. That keeps a parent from being at ease and it really stifles the social and economic growth of a family. Women are hit hard across the board, but particularly in homes where the mother is the head of the household and the only wage-earner. It hurts her, and it hurts her children.
quotes.author: Nina Turner

quotes.quote: The problem in child care, which really all of us are going to have to think hard on, is that there is no really great solution that we can come up with for ages zero to three.
quotes.author: Edward Zigler

quotes.quote: Most people assume that women are responsible for households and child care. Most couples operate that way - not all. That fundamental assumption holds women back.
quotes.author: Sheryl Sandberg

quotes.quote: Teachers do the noble work of educating our children. And we can't thank them enough for the hard work they put in every day to ensure a bright future for all of us.
quotes.author: Denise Juneau

quotes.quote: Child care is an invisible part of the economy.
quotes.author: Ellen Galinsky

quotes.quote: Defining child care primarily as women's sphere reinforces the devaluing of women and prevents their equal access to power.
quotes.author: Mary Frances Berry

quotes.quote: Children have to be educated, but they have also to be left to educate themselves.
quotes.author: Ernest Dimnet

quotes.quote: The reason child care is such a loaded issue is that when we talk about it, we are always tacitly talking about motherhood. And when we're talking about motherhood we're always tacitly assuming that child care must be a very dim second to full-time mother care.
quotes.author: Anna Quindlen

quotes.quote: It's not a nice-to-have - it's a must-have. It's time we stop treating child care as a side issue, or a women's issue, and treat it like the national economic priority that it is for all of us.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: Raising children uses every bit of your being your heart, your time, your patience, your foresight, your intuition to protect them, and you have to use all of this while trying to figure out how to discipline them.
quotes.author: Nicole Ari Parker

quotes.quote: Just as men must give up economic control when their wives share the responsibility for the family's financial well-being, women must give up exclusive parental control when their husbands assume more responsibility for child care.
quotes.author: Augustus Y. Napier

quotes.quote: Children seldom misquote. In fact, they usually repeat word for word what you shouldn't have said.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Children need models rather than critics.
quotes.author: Joseph Joubert

quotes.quote: Every child deserves a champion an adult who will never give up on them, who understands the power of connection and insists that they become the best that they can possibly be.
quotes.author: Rita Pierson

quotes.quote: The child supplies the power but the parents have to do the steering.
quotes.author: Benjamin Spock

quotes.quote: For parents - women in particular - good quality, affordable childcare is vital.
quotes.author: Nicola Sturgeon

quotes.quote: Every working family in America knows how hard it is today to find affordable childcare or early childhood education.	Every working family in America knows how hard it is today to find affordable childcare or early childhood education.
quotes.author: Bernie Sanders

quotes.quote: To achieve our goals of educating bold and ambitious children, we must invest in enriching, quality early child care and learning.
quotes.author: Stacey Abrams

quotes.quote: Along with a livable wage, many parents are desperate for quality affordable child care.
quotes.author: Kirsten Gillibrand

quotes.quote: Paid child care would make child care more efficient, allowing more children to be cared for by fewer adults, and thus free up parents to work more.
quotes.author: Michael Shellenberger

quotes.quote: Child care should be convenient, affordable, and available in every neighborhood.
quotes.author: London Breed

quotes.quote: Child care is very important, so I want to put dollars there, and I want to make sure we get the policies right.
quotes.author: Marl Esper

quotes.quote: None of his peers wanna share the role Of the childcare provider But they hit a nigga blunt and share salive You ain't a rider and you hustlin' backwards
quotes.author: Talib Kweli

quotes.quote: I could see it gleaming from the back of my dinner ware your eye cream sprayed all over little bear you could reconsider definition of childcare 14 shapes and you pick the giant square
quotes.author: Dance Gavin Dance

quotes.quote: To take children seriously is to value them for who they are right now rather than adults-in-the-making.
quotes.author: Alfie Kohn

quotes.quote: Child-care arrangements substituted for individualized maternal care - a few women were responsible for caring for all children too young to work, and women as a group felt accountable for one another's children.
quotes.author: Black Feminist Thought

quotes.quote: Child Care - twenty-five percnet of working parents with young children use day-care facilities, almost double that of a decade ago.
quotes.author: Raymond McHenry

quotes.quote: Plan ahead start thinking about childcare options and cost as far in advance as you can
quotes.author: V J Smith

quotes.quote: Your most important contribution to the future health of your child will be the attention you give to your own diet during pregnancy and to proper nutrition for your baby after he is born.
quotes.author: Robert S. Mendelsohn

quotes.quote: Even when freshly washed and relieved of all obvious confections, children tend to be sticky.
quotes.author: Fran Lebowitz

quotes.quote: Children make your life important.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: There is a garden in every childhood, an enchanted place where colors are brighter, the air softer, and the morning more fragrant than ever again.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Lawrence

quotes.quote: Childhood is the fiery furnace in which we are melted down to essentials and that essential shaped for good.
quotes.author: Katherine Anne Porter

quotes.quote: If you carry your childhood with you, you never become older.
quotes.author: Tom Stoppard

quotes.quote: Childhood is the kingdom where nobody dies. Nobody that matters, that is.
quotes.author: Edna St. Vincent Millay

quotes.quote: The older I grow the more earnestly I feel that the few joys of childhood are the best that life has to give.
quotes.author: Ellen Glasgow

quotes.quote: How dear to this heart are the scenes of my childhood, when I found recollection presents them to view!
quotes.author: Samuel Woodworth

quotes.quote: Old age lives minutes slowly, hours quickly; childhood chews hours and swallows minutes.
quotes.author: Malcolm De Chazal

quotes.quote: There was a place in childhood that I remember well, and there a voice of sweetest tone bright fairy tales did tell.
quotes.author: Samuel Lover

quotes.quote: Childhood means simplicity. Look at the world with the child's eye - it is very beautiful.
quotes.author: Kailash Satyarthi

quotes.quote: Childhood is like a mirror, which reflects in afterlife the images first presented to it. The first thing continues forever with the child. The first joy, the first sorrow, the first success, the first failure, the first achievement, the first misadventure paint the foreground of his life.
quotes.author: Samuel Smiles

quotes.quote: Childhood has its secrets and its mysteries; but who can tell or who can explain them!
quotes.author: Max Muller

quotes.quote: Memories of childhood were the dreams that stayed with you after you woke.
quotes.author: Julian Barnes

quotes.quote: What one loves in childhood stays in the heart forever.
quotes.author: Mary Jo Putney

quotes.quote: Childhood is the light of our life,we must keep it safe within our hearts.
quotes.author: Marinela Reka

quotes.quote: Childhood is the most beautiful of all life's seasons.
quotes.author: Jerry Smith

quotes.quote: There is always one moment in childhood when the door opens and lets the future in.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: The childhood shows the man, as morning shows the day.
quotes.author: John Milton

quotes.quote: Childhood is a promise that is never kept.
quotes.author: Ken Hill

quotes.quote: Childhood is a short season.
quotes.author: Helen Hayes

quotes.quote: When you finally go back to your old hometown, you find it wasn't the old home you missed but your childhood.
quotes.author: Sam Ewing

quotes.quote: Childhoods never last. But everyone deserves one.
quotes.author: Wendy Dale

quotes.quote: A happy childhood...is the worst possible preparation for life.
quotes.author: Kinky Friedman

quotes.quote: There is no land like the land of your childhood.
quotes.author: Michael Powell

quotes.quote: Childhood is like being drunk. Everyone remembers what you did, except you.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: How one handles success or failure is determined by their early childhood.
quotes.author: Harold Ramis

quotes.quote: There are things about your childhood you hold into, because they were so much part of you. The places you went, the people you knew.
quotes.author: The Wonder Years

quotes.quote: We see how early childhood experiences are so important to lifelong outcomes, how the early environment literally becomes embedded in the brain and changes its architecture.
quotes.author: Andrew S. Garner

quotes.quote: Sometimes, it’s better to bunk a class and enjoy with friends, because today, when I look back, marks never make me laugh, but memories do.
quotes.author: A.P.J. Abdul Kalam

quotes.quote: If you want your children to be intelligent, read them fairy tales. If you want them to be more intelligent, read them more fairy tales.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Growing apart doesn't change the fact that for a long time we grew side by side our roots will always be tangled. I'm glad for that.
quotes.author: Ally Condie

quotes.quote: While we try to teach our children all about life, our children teach us what life is all about.
quotes.author: Angela Schwindt

quotes.quote: Even if people are still very young, they shouldn't be prevented from saying what they think.
quotes.author: Anne Frank

quotes.quote: I had always thought that once you grew up you could do anything you wanted stay up all night or eat ice cream straight out of the container.
quotes.author: Bill Bryson

quotes.quote: Children have one kind of silliness, as you know, and grown-ups have another kind.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Whoever said that childhood is the happiest time of your life is a liar, or a fool.
quotes.author: Carlos Ruiz Zafon

quotes.quote: Growing old is mandatory, growing up is optional.
quotes.author: Chili Davis

quotes.quote: Children see magic because they look for it.
quotes.author: Christopher Moore

quotes.quote: Childhood should be carefree, playing in the sun, not living a nightmare in the darkness of the soul.
quotes.author: Dave Pelzer

quotes.quote: Adults are just obsolete children and the hell with them.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: It takes courage to grow up and become who you really are.
quotes.author: E.E. Cummings

quotes.quote: Anybody who has survived his childhood has enough information about life to last him the rest of his days.
quotes.author: Flannery O’Connor

quotes.quote: We may not be able to prepare the future for our children, but we can at least prepare our children for the future.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt
