quotes.quote: It is easier to build strong children than to repair broken men.
quotes.author: Frederick Douglass

quotes.quote: What was wonderful about childhood is that anything in it was a wonder. It was not merely a world full of miracles, it was a miraculous world.
quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: We could never have loved the earth so well if we had no childhood in it.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: Summer will end soon enough, and childhood as well.
quotes.author: George R.R. Martin

quotes.quote: There is always one moment in childhood when the door opens and lets the future in.
quotes.author: Graham Greene

quotes.quote: We must teach our children to dream with their eyes open.
quotes.author: Harry Edwards

quotes.quote: Childhood is the most valuable thing that’s taken away from you in life, if you think about it.
quotes.author: Heather O’Neill

quotes.quote: The fundamental condition of childhood is powerlessness.
quotes.author: Jane Smiley

quotes.quote: Childhood is measured out by sounds and smells and sights, before the dark hour of reason grows.
quotes.author: John Betjeman

quotes.quote: For in every adult there dwells the child that was, and in every child there lies the adult that will be.
quotes.author: John Connolly

quotes.quote: You know children are growing up when they start asking questions that have answers.
quotes.author: John J. Plomp

quotes.quote: Children need models rather than critics.
quotes.author: Joseph Joubert

quotes.quote: You are the bows from which your children as living arrows are sent forth.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: Children are likely to live up to what you believe of them.
quotes.author: Lady Bird Johnson

quotes.quote: To every child I dream of a world where you can laugh, dance, sing, learn, live in peace and be happy.
quotes.author: Malala Yousafzai

quotes.quote: Children must be taught how to think, not what to think.
quotes.author: Margaret Mead

quotes.quote: A cousin is a little bit of childhood that can never be lost.
quotes.author: Marion C. Garretty

quotes.quote: An idyllic childhood is probably illusion.
quotes.author: Martha Grimes

quotes.quote: Every time you miss your childhood, ride on a bicycle!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: All of us are products of our childhood.
quotes.author: Michael Jackson

quotes.quote: What is it about childhood that never lets you go, even when you're so wrecked it’s hard to believe you ever were a child?
quotes.author: Mitch Albom

quotes.quote: There can be no keener revelation of a society’s soul than the way in which it treats its children.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: Pretty much all the honest truth telling there is in the world is done by children.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.quote: The best way to make children good is to make them happy.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Everything is ceremony in the wild garden of childhood.
quotes.author: Pablo Neruda

quotes.quote: When we are children we seldom think of the future. This innocence leaves us free to enjoy ourselves as few adults can. The day we fret about the future is the day we leave our childhood behind.
quotes.author: Patrick Rothfuss

quotes.quote: In my childhood I led the life of a sage, when I grew up I started climbing trees.
quotes.author: Philip Roth

quotes.quote: When I was a kid, I had two friends, and they were imaginary and they would only play with each other.
quotes.author: Rita Rudner

quotes.quote: Don’t handicap your children by making their lives easy.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: A child seldom needs a good talking to as much as a good listening to.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: In the happiest of our childhood memories, our parents were happy, too.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: I cannot think of any need in childhood as strong as the need for a father’s protection.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: It's never too late to have a happy childhood.
quotes.author: Tom Robbins

quotes.quote: Children are one third of our population and all of our future.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Children learn more from what you are, than what you teach.
quotes.author: W.E.B. DuBois

quotes.quote: Don't grow up too fast, darling. Age is inevitable, but if you nurture a childlike heart, you'll never ever grow old.
quotes.author: Beth Hoffman

quotes.quote: It is the childlike mind that finds the kingdom.
quotes.author: Charles Fillmore

quotes.quote: See the world through the eyes of your inner child. The eyes that sparkle in awe and amazement as they see love, magic and mystery in the most ordinary things.
quotes.author: Henna Sohail

quotes.quote: The most creative people have this childlike facility to play.
quotes.author: John Cleese

quotes.quote: Never lose the childlike wonder. Show gratitude... Don't complain; just work harder... Never give up.
quotes.author: Randy Pausch

quotes.quote: There’s a huge difference between being childlike and being childish. When we embrace joy and look at the world with fresh eyes we’re being childlike. When we demand instant gratification and a guarantee that everything will be ok, we’re only being childish.
quotes.author: Seth Godin

quotes.quote: It is the childlike part of us that produces works of the imagination. When we were children time passed so slow with us that we seemed to have time for everything.
quotes.author: William Morris

quotes.quote: You can be childlike without being childish. A child always wants to have fun. Ask yourself, 'Am I having fun?'
quotes.author: Christopher Meloni

quotes.quote: So runs my dream, but what am I? An infant crying in the night An infant crying for the light And with no language but a cry.
quotes.author: Alfred Tennyson

quotes.quote: I have lived a great deal among grown-ups. I have seen them intimately, close at hand. And that hasn’t much improved my opinion of them.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: I think you have to keep a childlike quality to play music or make a record.
quotes.author: Beck

quotes.quote: I can't think of anything that excites a greater sense of childlike wonder than to be in a country where you are ignorant of almost everything.
quotes.author: Bill Bryson

quotes.quote: I think there's a part, just a part of comedians, that is still childlike.
quotes.author: Bob Newhart

quotes.quote: Childlike surrender and trust, I believe, is the defining spirit of authentic discipleship.
quotes.author: Brennan Manning

quotes.quote: It's fun telling you tall Texas tales. You always look like a little girl who's hearing Cinderella for the first time.
quotes.author: Edna Ferber

quotes.quote: It takes a childlike heart to feel the promptings of the Spirit, to surrender to those commands, and to obey. That is what it takes to be nourished by the good word of God.
quotes.author: Henry B. Eyring

quotes.quote: I, also, would like to look and smile, sit and walk like that, so free, so worthy, so restrained, so candid, so childlike and mysterious. A man only looks and walks like that when he has conquered his Self. I also will conquer my Self.
quotes.author: Hermann Hesse

quotes.quote: It is the mark of a great man that he puts to flight all ordinary calculations. He is at once sublime and touching, childlike and of the race of giants.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: You can’t confuse childlike faith with childish thinking.
quotes.author: John F. Macarthur Jr.

quotes.quote: The best actors, I think, have a childlike quality. They have a sort of an ability to lose themselves. There's still some silliness.
quotes.author: Kenneth Branagh

quotes.quote: Acting is a childlike thing. To act well, you have to be childlike in order to free yourself.
quotes.author: Laurence Fishburne

quotes.quote: The process I go through in the art and the architecture, I actually want it to be almost childlike. Sometimes I think it's magical.
quotes.author: Maya Lin

quotes.quote: Apart from the fact that your physical ability starts to decline, I also think someone in their fifties being childlike becomes a little sad. You've got to be careful.
quotes.author: Rowan Atkinson

quotes.quote: There is nothing more pure and beautiful than a person who always speaks truthfully with a childlike heart.
quotes.author: Suzy Kassem

quotes.quote: My childlike qualities sometimes lead me to jump into projects without thinking of the consequences.
quotes.author: Howie Mandel

quotes.quote: It's very rare that you can be in a career for as long as I have and still feel like you're constantly learning and coming at it from an almost childlike perspective.
quotes.author: Timothy Olyphant

quotes.quote: I think, a lot of time, when I'm making art, I'm trying to get into a state of childlike play, where I'm not self-conscious; I'm not worried about what the outcome is going to be. I'm just having fun.
quotes.author: Lisa Hanawalt

quotes.quote: You're quirky ... and yet conventional. Innocent but worldly. Reserved yet outgoing. Candid yet guarded. Trendy but also practical. And childlike while still managing to be mature. It's like ... you're the perfect contradiction.
quotes.author: Linda Kage

quotes.quote: The world, after all, was still a place of bottomless horror. It was by no means a place of childlike simplicity where everything could be settled by a simple then-and-there decision.
quotes.author: Osamu Dazai

quotes.quote: As you get older you're told to be sensible, but it's important for writing if you're a comic that you're able to still access that childlike thing.
quotes.author: Tim Vine

quotes.quote: I've always tried to retain that childlike wonder.
quotes.author: Rolf Harris

quotes.quote: I like crazy, childlike, candy bar-filled cakes with gooey caramel, chocolate-covered nuts, marshmallows, and the like.
quotes.author: Ron Ben-Israel

quotes.quote: If you want children to keep their feet on the ground, put some responsibility on their shoulders.
quotes.author: Abigail Van Buren

quotes.quote: I continue to believe that if children are given the necessary tools to succeed, they will succeed beyond their wildest dreams!
quotes.author: David Vitter

quotes.quote: Children or babies learn to mimic the vibration of the adults who surround them long before they learn to mimic their words.
quotes.author: Abraham Hicks

quotes.quote: Children must be taught how to think, not what to think.
quotes.author: Margaret Mead

quotes.quote: If you want to see what children can do, you must stop giving them things.
quotes.author: Norman Douglas

quotes.quote: A child can ask a thousand questions that the wisest man cannot answer.
quotes.author: Jacob Abbott

quotes.quote: Children are the hands by which we take hold of heaven.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: Children aren't coloring books. You don't get to fill them with your favorite colors.
quotes.author: Khaled Hosseini

quotes.quote: Our children are the only possessions we can take to heaven.
quotes.author: Croft M. Pentz

quotes.quote: Children will not remember you for the material things you provided but for the feeling that you cherished them.
quotes.author: Richard L. Evans

quotes.quote: Children are the living messages we send to a time we will not see.
quotes.author: John W. Whitehead

quotes.quote: Children are the anchors of a mother's life.
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.quote: Children show me in their playful smiles the divine in everyone.
quotes.author: Michael Jackson

quotes.quote: Children require guidance and sympathy far more than instruction.
quotes.author: Anne Sullivan

quotes.quote: Children learn to smile from their parents.
quotes.author: Shinichi Suzuki

quotes.quote: All children are artists. The problem is how to remain an artist once he grows up.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: Children are like wet cement. Whatever falls on them makes an impression.
quotes.author: Dr. Haim Ginott

quotes.quote: Children learn more from what you are, than what you teach.
quotes.author: W. E. B. Du Bois

quotes.quote: Children are unpredictable. You never know what inconsistency they're going to catch you in next.
quotes.author: Franklin P. Jones

quotes.quote: Your children are spiritual beings who come through you, not for you.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: Children can feel, but they cannot analyse their feelings; and if the analysis is partially effected in thought, they know not how to express the result of the process in words.
quotes.author: Charlotte Bronte

quotes.quote: Stay a child while you can be a child.
quotes.author: Stephen Sondheim

quotes.quote: Children are the keys of paradise.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: Children, they're the same everywhere. Greedy little creatures but the best listeners in the world - any world. The very best of all.
quotes.author: Cornelia Funke

quotes.quote: Every child you encounter is a divine appointment.
quotes.author: Wess Stafford

quotes.quote: Children are very wise intuitively; they know who loves them most, and who only pretends.
quotes.author: V.C. Andrews

quotes.quote: Children have never been very good at listening to their elders, but they have never failed to imitate them.
quotes.author: James A. Baldwin

quotes.quote: Children have such an innocent view of their world and surroundings; every thought is a garden full of wonder.
quotes.author: C.J. Heck

quotes.quote: Children need love, especially when they do not deserve it.
quotes.author: Harold Hulbert

quotes.quote: All children start their school careers with sparkling imaginations, fertile minds, and a willingness to take risks with what they think.
quotes.author: Ken Robinson

quotes.quote: Children have to be educated, but they have also to be left to educate themselves.
quotes.author: Ernest Dimnet

quotes.quote: Children are not unforgiving. You can punish them and they will hug you in a few minutes.
quotes.author: T. D. Jakes

quotes.quote: Healthy children will not fear life if their elders have integrity enough not to fear death.
quotes.author: Erik Erikson

quotes.quote: Children make your life important.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: Children begin by loving their parents; after a time they judge them; rarely, if ever, do they forgive them.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Children aren't happy with nothing to ignore, and that's what parents were created for.
quotes.author: Ogden Nash

quotes.quote: Little children are still the symbol of the eternal marriage between love and duty.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: Children will often rise or fall according to the expectations of loved ones in their lives.
quotes.author: Leta B.

quotes.quote: Children naturally believe without question and absorb knowledge at an incredible rate; since there is no other frame of reference; they believe their parental reality, true or false.
quotes.author: David W. Earle

quotes.quote: Children are our most valuable resource.
quotes.author: Herbert Hoover

quotes.quote: Old men can make war, but it is children who will make history.
quotes.author: Ray Merritt

quotes.quote: Children are supposed to help hold a marriage together. They do this in a number of ways. For instance, they demand so much attention that a husband and wife, concentrating on their children, fail to notice each other's faults.
quotes.author: Richard Armour

quotes.quote: Children with disabilities are stronger than we know, they fight the battles that most will never know.
quotes.author: Misti Renea Neely

quotes.quote: If a child can't learn the way we teach, maybe we should teach the way they learn.
quotes.author: Ignacio Estrada

quotes.quote: Children who are treated as if they are uneducable almost invariably become uneducable.
quotes.author: Kenneth Clark

quotes.quote: Children are educated by what the grown-up is and not by his talk.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: Children are completely egoistic; they feel their needs intensely and strive ruthlessly to satisfy them.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: Children make you want to start life over.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: Children are likely to live up to what you believe in them.
quotes.author: Lady Bird Johnson

quotes.quote: The deeds of the children are a testament to the upbringing they received from their parents.
quotes.author: Christopher Paolini

quotes.quote: In the end, it's not what you do for your children but what you've taught them to do for themselves.
quotes.author: Ann Landers

quotes.quote: It doesn't matter who my father was, it matters who I remember he was.
quotes.author: Anne Sexton

quotes.quote: Those who educate children well are more to be honored than they who produce them for these only gave them life, those the art of living well.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: If you can give your child only one gift, let it be enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Bruce Barton

quotes.quote: Your children will become what you are so be what you want them to be.
quotes.author: David Bly

quotes.quote: Listen to the desires of your children. Encourage them and then give them the autonomy to make their own decision.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: Children do learn what they live. Then they grow up to live what they've learned.
quotes.author: Dorothy Nolte

quotes.quote: I think, at a child's birth, if a mother could ask a fairy godmother to endow it with the most useful gift, that gift should be curiosity.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: We may not be able to prepare the future for our children, but we can at least prepare our children for the future.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Play is often talked about as if it were a relief from serious learning. But for children play is serious learning. Play is really the work of childhood.
quotes.author: Fred Rogers

quotes.quote: It is easier to build strong children than to repair broken men.
quotes.author: Frederick Douglass

quotes.quote: Play is the highest expression of human development in childhood for it alone is the free expression of what is in a child's soul.
quotes.author: Friedrich Frobel

quotes.quote: Don’t just teach your children to read. Teach them to question what they read. Teach them to question everything.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: If you want your children to improve, let them overhear the nice things you say about them to others.
quotes.author: Haim Ginott

quotes.quote: All things in this world must be seen with the morning dew of them, must be seen with youthful, early open, hopeful eyes.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Children are the world's most valuable resource and its best hope for the future.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: There is frequently more to be learned from the unexpected questions of a child than the discourses of men.
quotes.author: John Locke

quotes.quote: It's not only children who grow. Parents do too.
quotes.author: Joyce Maynard

quotes.quote: Childhood means simplicity. Look at the world with the child's eye it is very beautiful.
quotes.author: Kailash Satyarthi

quotes.quote: Never help a child with a task at which he feels he can succeed.
quotes.author: Maria Montessori

quotes.quote: Being considerate of others will take your children further in life than any college degree.
quotes.author: Marian Wright Edelman

quotes.quote: Children are happy because they don't have a file in their minds called All the Things That Could Go Wrong.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: The best way to make children good is to make them happy.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: A child's world is fresh and new and beautiful, full of wonder and excitement.
quotes.author: Rachel Carson

quotes.quote: A child's life is like a piece of paper on which every person leaves a mark.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: Don't worry that children never listen to you worry that they are always watching you.
quotes.author: Robert Fulghum

quotes.quote: Receive the children in reverence, educate them in love, and send them forth in freedom.
quotes.author: Rudolf Steiner

quotes.quote: The kids who need the most love will ask for it in the most unloving ways.
quotes.author: Russell Barkley

quotes.quote: The most important thing a father can do for his children is to love their mother.
quotes.author: Theodore Hesburgh

quotes.quote: Our greatest national resource is the minds of our children.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: Kids go where there is excitement. They stay where there is love.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: It is a wise father that knows his own child.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Each day of our lives we make deposits in the memory banks of our children.
quotes.author: Charles R. Swindoll

quotes.quote: Your children will see what you're all about by what you live rather than what you say.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: Parents have become so convinced that educators know what is best for their children that they forget that they themselves are really the experts.
quotes.author: Marian Wright Edelman

quotes.quote: It shouldn't matter how slowly a child learns as long as we are encouraging them not to stop.
quotes.author: Robert John Meehan

quotes.quote: You can teach a student a lesson for a day; but if you can teach him to learn by creating curiosity, he will continue the learning process as long as he lives.
quotes.author: Clay P. Bedford

quotes.quote: Children have to be educated, but they have also to be left to educate themselves.
quotes.author: Ernest Dimnet

quotes.quote: A child's learning is a function more of the characteristics of his classmates than those of the teacher.
quotes.author: James S. Coleman

quotes.quote: If you want your children to improve, let them overhear the nice things you say about them to others.
quotes.author: Dr. Haim Ginott

quotes.quote: A child looks up at the stars and wonders. Great fathers put a child on his shoulders and helps them to grab a star.
quotes.author: Reed Markham

quotes.quote: Teaching kids to count is fine, but teaching them what counts is best.
quotes.author: Bob Talber

quotes.quote: Every student can learn, just not on the same day, or the same way.
quotes.author: George Evans

quotes.quote: I think someone should explain to the child that it's OK to make mistakes. That's how we learn. When we compete, we make mistakes.
quotes.author: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar

quotes.quote: Never help a child with a task that they feel they can complete themselves.
quotes.author: Maria Montessori

quotes.quote: The important thing is not so much that every child should be taught, as that every child should be given the wish to learn.
quotes.author: John Lubbock

quotes.quote: Soon the child learns that there are strangers, and ceases to be a child.
quotes.author: Max Muller

quotes.quote: I think of discipline as the continual everyday process of helping a child learn self-discipline.
quotes.author: Fred Rogers

quotes.quote: To endure is the first thing that a child ought to learn, and that which he will have the most need to know.
quotes.author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

quotes.quote: A child, when it begins to speak, learns what it is that it knows.
quotes.author: John Hall Wheelock

quotes.quote: Teach your child to hold his tongue; he'll learn fast enough to speak.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: The child learns more of the virtues needed in modern life-of fairness, of justice, of comradeship, of collective interest and action-in a common school than can be taught in the most perfect family circle.
quotes.author: Charlotte Perkins Stetson Gilman

quotes.quote: The more that you read, the more things you will know. The more you learn, the more places you'll go!
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: Children are like wet cement. Whatever falls on them makes an impression.
quotes.author: Dr. Haim Ginott

quotes.quote: Children need to be challenged and pushed, not to the point where they give up but to the point where they think: Wow, look at me go!
quotes.author: Robert John Meehan

quotes.quote: Do not train children to learn by force and harshness, but direct them to it by what amuses their minds, so that you may be better able to discover with accuracy the peculiar bent of the genius of each.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Expecting all children the same age to learn from the same materials is like expecting all children the same age to wear the same size clothing.
quotes.author: Madeline Hunter

quotes.quote: If a child can't learn the way we teach, maybe we should teach the way they learn.
quotes.author: Ignacio Estrada

quotes.quote: It's not what is poured into a student, but what is planted.
quotes.author: L. Conway

quotes.quote: The object of teaching a child is to enable him to get along without his teacher.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: The hardest job kids face today is learning good manners without seeing any.
quotes.author: Fred Astaire

quotes.quote: What a child can do today with assistance, she will be able to do by herself tomorrow.
quotes.author: Lev S. Vygotsky

quotes.quote: A watched child never learns.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: Don't limit a child to your own learning, for he was born in another time.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.quote: Every child has a different learning style and pace. Each child is unique, not only capable of learning but also capable of succeeding.
quotes.author: Robert John Meehan

quotes.quote: The beautiful thing about learning is nobody can take it away from you.
quotes.author: B. B. King

quotes.quote: If they can't learn the way we teach, we teach the way they learn.
quotes.author: Ole Ivar Lovaas

quotes.quote: Warmth is the vital element for the growing plant and for the soul of the child.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: If children are apparently unable to learn, we should assume that we have not as yet found the right way to teach them.
quotes.author: Marie Clay

quotes.quote: The best candy shop a child can be left alone in, is the library.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: The art of teaching is the art of assisting discovery.
quotes.author: Mark Van Doren

quotes.quote: Children who are respected learn respect. Children who are cared for learn to care for those weaker than themselves. Children who are loved for what they are cannot learn intolerance. In an environment such as this, they will develop their own ideals, which can be nothing other than humane, since they grew out of the experience of love.
quotes.author: Alice Miller

quotes.quote: If we taught babies to talk as most skills are taught in school, they would memorize lists of sounds in a predetermined order and practice them alone in a closet.
quotes.author: Linda Darling-Hammond

quotes.quote: Children want the same things we want. To laugh, to be challenged, to be entertained, and delighted.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: The greatest sign of success for a teacher is to be able to say, "The children are now working as if I did not exist."
quotes.author: Maria Montessori

quotes.quote: Get over the idea that only children should spend their time in study. Be a student so long as you still have something to learn, and this will mean all your life.
quotes.author: Henry L. Doherty

quotes.quote: Education is an admirable thing, but it is well to remember from time to time that nothing that is worth knowing can be taught.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Education is the ability to listen to almost anything without losing your temper or your self-confidence.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: The soul is healed by being with children.
quotes.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

quotes.quote: Children must be taught how to think, not what to think.
quotes.author: Margaret Mead

quotes.quote: It is time for parents to teach young people early on that in diversity there is beauty and there is strength.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: It is paradoxical that many educators and parents still differentiate between a time for learning and a time for play without seeing the vital connection between them.
quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.quote: My idea of education is to unsettle the minds of the young and inflame their intellects.
quotes.author: Robert M. Hutchins

quotes.quote: A child educated only at school is an uneducated child.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.quote: Teach a child how to think, not what to think.
quotes.author: Sidney Sugarman

quotes.quote: I suppose it is because nearly all children go to school nowadays and have things arranged for them that they seem so forlornly unable to produce their own ideas.
quotes.author: Agatha Christie

quotes.quote: Learning is never done without errors and defeat.
quotes.author: Vladimir Lenin

quotes.quote: Education would be much more effective if its purpose was to ensure that by the time they leave school every boy and girl should know how much they do not know and be imbued with a lifelong desire to know it.
quotes.author: William Haley

quotes.quote: The secret in education lies in respecting the student.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Every child is an artist. The problem is how to remain an artist once we grow up.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: Every act of conscious learning requires the willingness to suffer an injury to one's self-esteem. That is why young children, before they are aware of their own self-importance, learn so easily. And why old persons, especially if vain or important, cannot learn at all.
quotes.author: Thomas Szasz

quotes.quote: How is it that little children are so intelligent and men so stupid? It must be education that does it.
quotes.author: Alexandre Dumas

quotes.quote: If we are to teach real peace in this world, and if we are to carry on a real war against war, we shall have to begin with the children.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Children learn more from what you are than what you teach.
quotes.author: W. E. B. Du Bois

quotes.quote: It is easier to build strong children than to repair broken men.
quotes.author: Frederick Douglass

quotes.quote: Children do learn what they live. Then they grow up to live what they've learned.
quotes.author: Dorothy Nolte

quotes.quote: If a child lives with acceptance and friendship, he learns to find love in the world
quotes.author: Dorothy Nolte

quotes.quote: Each day of our lives we make deposits in the memory banks of our children.
quotes.author: Charles R. Swindoll

quotes.quote: Education is not the filling of a pail, but the lighting of a fire.
quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

quotes.quote: It is the supreme art of the teacher to awaken joy in creative expression and knowledge.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: All you gotta do is chill out… Let go of control and chill out… Let it be, Trust.
quotes.author: Esther Hicks

quotes.quote: Loosen up. Relax. Except for rare life-and-death matters, nothing is as important as it first seems.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.

quotes.quote: If you relax your mind, it can begin working for you.
quotes.author: Bryant McGill

quotes.quote: Be patient. Relax and trust. Let go. Then, let go some more.
quotes.author: Melody Beattie

quotes.quote: Your mind will answer most questions if you learn to relax and wait for the answer.
quotes.author: William S. Burroughs

quotes.quote: It's really important to have balance, spend some time in nature, go to a few parties, enjoy my friends and really chill out.
quotes.author: Joakim Noah

quotes.quote: Loosen up, and everybody around you will loosen up.
quotes.author: Sam Walton

quotes.quote: Whenever in doubt, turn off your mind, relax, float downstream.
quotes.author: Timothy Leary

quotes.quote: Relax, ease back in your seats and let the music take you wherever it does.
quotes.author: John Denver

quotes.quote: Relax and calm your mind. Forget about yourself and follow your opponent's movement.
quotes.author: Yip Man

quotes.quote: We should all relax about life because you don't have a clue as to what's really going on.
quotes.author: Barry Sonnenfeld

quotes.quote: The ability to relax and be mindfully present in the moment comes naturally when we are grateful.
quotes.author: Louise Hay

quotes.quote: Life is vital and we should relax a little and enjoy it as we only have one life as far as I'm aware.
quotes.author: Murray Mexted

quotes.quote: When a man wants to relax, he will slob out and really relax. Or he will pursue a hobby - anything from building models to watching sport.
quotes.author: Julie Burchill

quotes.quote: Relax. Just relax and have fun doing what you're doing. Don't worry so much about being results oriented. Just commit yourself to the moment.
quotes.author: John Goodman

quotes.quote: Chill out, relax and have an open mind.
quotes.author: George Noory

quotes.quote: Never mind of what your enemy thinks of you, relax and think a head of him.
quotes.author: Auliq Ice

quotes.quote: It is necessary to relax your muscles when you can. Relaxing your brain is fatal.
quotes.author: Stirling Moss

quotes.quote: It is in human nature to relax, when not compelled by personal advantage or disadvantage.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: China is a great country with a great culture, populated by fascinating, industrious and talented people.
quotes.author: Vladimir Putin

quotes.quote: ChinaÂ is a civilization pretending to be a nation.
quotes.author: Michael A. Ledeen

quotes.quote: ChinaÂ is on a march toward rule of law and democracy.
quotes.author: Chen Guangcheng

quotes.quote: ChinaÂ has set its cultural industries as pillar industries.
quotes.author: Wang Jianlin

quotes.quote: ChinaÂ is the most repressive censorship regime on the Internet.
quotes.author: John Palfrey

quotes.quote: ChinaÂ is the greatest mystifying and stupefying fact in the modern world.
quotes.author: Lin Yutang

quotes.quote: China is very important. The future growth of China, China's influence is bound to rise.
quotes.author: Manmohan Singh

quotes.quote: China's development benefits other countries.
quotes.author: Li Keqiang

quotes.quote: China is on a march toward rule of law and democracy.
quotes.author: Chen Guangcheng

quotes.quote: China has set its cultural industries as pillar industries.
quotes.author: Wang Jianlin

quotes.quote: China is the greatest mystifying and stupefying fact in the modern world.
quotes.author: Lin Yutang

quotes.quote: China is a vast, disparate country; there is no alternative to strong central power.
quotes.author: Lee Kuan Yew

quotes.quote: China is growing very quickly and is clearly becoming an important player in the world economy.
quotes.author: Ben Bernanke

quotes.quote: China is in its own category - too big to ignore, too repressive to embrace, difficult to influence, and very, very proud.
quotes.author: Madeleine Albright

quotes.quote: China is a keen observer of trends elsewhere in the world, and it's going to give our own innovators a run for their money.
quotes.author: Wayne Pacelle

quotes.quote: China is at a different stage of development, human rights are violated here much more often. And still, we see improvements even here.
quotes.author: Ai Weiwei

quotes.quote: China is more prosperous than before. The people have better lives but they are not happy and confident because the scars are still there.
quotes.author: Jung Chang

quotes.quote: China is one of the greatest cultures on Earth, and it is one of those countries that suffered immensely from colonialist horrors and humiliation.
quotes.author: Andre Vltchek

quotes.quote: China attaches great importance to the utilization of renewable resources, making it one of the important moves to promote economic and social development.
quotes.author: Hu Jintao

quotes.quote: China is clearly going to be the number one economic power and it is already full of potential.. with lots of population and the buying power increasing by the day.
quotes.author: Bernard Arnault

quotes.quote: China has been committed to the independent foreign policy of peace and has developed friendship and cooperation with all countries on the basis of the Five Principles of Peaceful Coexistence.
quotes.author: Hu Jintao

quotes.quote: China has great potentials; the people are hard-working and focused. But they have to close the gap as far as the pace of the game is concerned. Football in the future will get faster and faster.
quotes.author: Berti Vogts

quotes.quote: Externally China desires independence, internally she seeks to maintain her existence as a nation; China therefore strives to loose the bonds that bind her people, and to complete the establishment of a new State.
quotes.author: Chiang Kaishek

quotes.quote: China seems unpredictable because it has a distinct culture and social system. It is still a mystery to other parts of the world, even though the veil of China has been lifted many times as a result of globalization.
quotes.author: Ai Weiwei

quotes.quote: China is a sleeping giant if you just take a look at their experience regarding all kinds of sport, not football though, and the number of people that love sports. Chinese are eager to hit new shores and they are ambitious.
quotes.author: Berti Vogts

quotes.quote: China hasn't only existed for one day. Now, the whole nation has become richer and it's become a problem. The problem is universal. The factor is big. Everybody has to rethink the balance of the world and the whole landscape.
quotes.author: Ai Weiwei

quotes.quote: As China is about adaptation, not transformation, it is unlikely to change the world dramatically should it ever assume the global driver's seat. But this does not mean that China won't exploit that world for its own purposes.
quotes.author: Ivan Krastev

quotes.quote: China's own recent history proves that when it opens itself, there is nothing its people cannot accomplish. A more open China will lead to a more prosperous and stable China.
quotes.author: Gary Locke

quotes.quote: China is a developing country with a huge population, and also a developing country in a crucial stage of reform. In this context, China still faces many challenges in economic and social development. And a lot still needs to be done in China, in terms of human rights.
quotes.author: Hu Jintao

quotes.quote: Chinese food tries to engage the mind, not just the palate. To provoke the intellect.
quotes.author: Nicole Mones

quotes.quote: The urge for Chinese food is always unpredictable: famous for no occasion, standard fare for no holiday, and the constant as to demand is either whim, the needy plebiscite of instantly famished drunks, or pregnancy.
quotes.author: Alexander Theroux

quotes.quote: If you want to take pictures of Chinese food, you have to taste real Chinese food. The flavors soak into your tongue, go into your stomach. The stomach is where your true feelings are. And if you take photos, these true feelings from your stomach can come out, so that everyone can taste the food just by looking at your pictures.
quotes.author: Amy Tan

quotes.quote: The Chinese food arrives. Delicious saliva fills his mouth. He really hasn't had any since Texas. He loves this food that contains no disgusting proofs of slain animals, a bloody slab of cow haunch, a hen's sinewy skeleton; these ghosts have been minced and destroyed and painlessly merged with the shapes of insensate vegetables, plump green bodies that invite his appetite's innocent gusto. Candy.
quotes.author: John Updike

quotes.quote: When it comes to Chinese food I have always operated under the policy that the less known about the preparation the better. A wise diner who is invited to visit the kitchen replies by saying, as politely as possible, that he has a pressing engagement elsewhere.
quotes.author: Calvin Trillin

quotes.quote: I love Chinese food, like steamed dim sum, and I can have noodles morning, noon and night, hot or cold. I like food that's very simple on the digestive system - I tend to keep it light. I love Japanese food too - sushi, sashimi and miso soup.
quotes.author: Shilpa Shetty

quotes.quote: The key to eating real Chinese food is don't ask what it is,
quotes.author: Catherine Roberts

quotes.quote: Everybody, even those that don't like Chinese food, knew that you had to eat the cookie for the fortune to come true. And so he did.
quotes.author: Justin Swapp

quotes.quote: I'm not a machine. I get really motivated, then I fall off the wagon and want to eat Chinese food and sit on my couch and gain five or 10 pounds!
quotes.author: Shemar Moore

quotes.quote: I ate some pretty funky, authentic Chinese food in Hong Kong. There was an egg from some bird that's not a chicken. I can't remember what it was, but it was green and brown and not very tasty.
quotes.author: John Legend

quotes.quote: Scientists have proven beyond a shadow of a doubt that there is life after death -- though they say it's virtually impossible to get decent Chinese food.
quotes.author: David Lettermen

quotes.quote: One can watch hours and hours of TV without actually losing interest, but, as with Chinese food, one is rarely left with much residue of nourishment.
quotes.author: Frederic Raphael

quotes.quote: I'm doing activations with companies you would never think of. Not to say this in a braggadocious way, but I'm not putting myself in a box. The only thing that goes in a box is Chinese food and your sneakers - not me.
quotes.author: Karen Civil

quotes.quote: We might be shifting away from a Eurocentric view of the United States into something that's much more multicultural, multinational, and Chinese food is just one slice of that.
quotes.author: Jennifer Lee

quotes.quote: People always think of Chinese food as the go-to ethnic food when everything else is closed during the holidays, but Indian is a nice alternative. Plus - Indians? Thanksgiving? Kinda makes sense...
quotes.author: Erin Gibson

quotes.quote: But I think it's going to be kind of one of these Chinese food kind of deals: a little while later, the market is going to kind of forget it and it's going to be hungry for good news again.
quotes.author: Bernie Schaeffer

quotes.quote: It is an impressively arrogant move to conclude that just because you don't like something, it is empirically not good. I don't like Chinese food, but I don't write articles trying to prove it doesn't exist.
quotes.author: Tina Fey

quotes.quote: A chiropractor accomplished in three weeks what the army doctors haven't been able to do in two years.
quotes.author: George Kennedy

quotes.quote: The spine is the lifeline. A lot of people should go to a chiropractor but they don't know it.
quotes.author: Jack Lalanne

quotes.quote: The nervous system holds the key to the body's incredible potential to heal itself.
quotes.author: Sir Jay Holder

quotes.quote: Chiropractic makes me feel a few inches taller each time I come out.
quotes.author: Christie Brinkley

quotes.quote: Chiropractic works in harmony with the basic healing forces of the body, whereas the allopathic, western medical establishment doesn't have nearly as holistic a vision.
quotes.author: John Robbins

quotes.quote: I will sell Chiropractic, serve Chiropractic, and save Chiropractic if it will take me twenty lifetimes to do it. I will promote it within the law, without the law, in keeping with the law or against the law in order to get sick people well and keep the well from getting sick.
quotes.author: B. J. Palmer

quotes.quote: It is more important to know what sort of person has a disease than to know what sort of disease a person has.
quotes.author: Hippocrates

quotes.quote: Chiropractic is health insurance. Premiums small. Dividends large!
quotes.author: B. J. Palmer

quotes.quote: Medicine is about disease and what makes people die. Chiropractic is about life and what makes people live.
quotes.author: B. J. Palmer

quotes.quote: Chiropractic gives me the flexibility I need to keep in the game.
quotes.author: Venus Williams

quotes.quote: The spine as a whole operates as a functional unit. Each vertabra can affect its neighbor and one portion of the spine may affect or damage other areas of the body.
quotes.author: Don Davis

quotes.quote: Look well to the spine for the cause of disease.
quotes.author: Hippocrates

quotes.quote: Since I've been in chiropractic, I've improved by leaps and bounds both mentally and physically.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.quote: Chiropractic is founded upon different principles than those of medicine.
quotes.author: D.D. Palmer

quotes.quote: While other professions are concerned with changing the environment to suit the weakened body, chiropractic is concerned with strengthening the body to suit the environment.
quotes.author: B. J. Palmer

quotes.quote: The game of life requires the edge that chiropractic care provides.
quotes.author: Jerry Rice

quotes.quote: Do not forget that chiropractors did not treat diseases. They adjust causes, whether acquired, spontaneous, or the result of accident.
quotes.author: D.D. Palmer

quotes.quote: Chiropractic embraces the science of life, the knowledge of how organisms act in health and disease, and also the art of adjusting the neuroskeleton.
quotes.author: Daniel David Palmer

quotes.quote: There is no effect without a cause. Chiropractors adjust causes. Others treat effects.
quotes.author: B J Palmer

quotes.quote: Chiropractic is a wonderful means of natural healing!
quotes.author: Bob Hope

quotes.quote: Chiropractic just makes you feel so much better. When I walk out of the clinic, I feel like I'm about three inches taller and everything's in place. And as long as I see the chiropractor, I feel I'm one step ahead of the game.
quotes.author: Tom Brady

quotes.quote: Chiropractic is a science just so far as it is specific.
quotes.author: Daniel D Palmer

quotes.quote: Regular chiropractic adjustments go hand in hand with good health.
quotes.author: Peter Fonda

quotes.quote: The treatments themselves do not â€˜cure' the condition, they simply restore the body's self-healing ability.
quotes.author: Leon Chaitow

quotes.quote: People can see the premature wear and tear on their car's tires that occurs if the wheels are misaligned, yet the same holds true for the human body if the spine is misaligned.
quotes.author: Robert Blaich

quotes.quote: The doctor of the future will give no medicine but will interest the patient in the care of the human frame, in diet, and in the cause and prevention of disease.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.quote: The master of your body did not run off and leave you masterless.
quotes.author: B.J. Palmer

quotes.quote: The person who takes medicine must recover twice, once from the disease and once from the medicine.
quotes.author: William Osler, M.D.

quotes.quote: Medicine is the study of disease and what causes man to die. Chiropractic is the study of health and what causes man to live.
quotes.author: B. J. Palmer

quotes.quote: In the future, Chiropractic will be valued for its preventative qualities as much as for relieving and adjusting the cause of ailments.
quotes.author: B. J. Palmer

quotes.quote: The art of medicine consists of amusing the patient while Nature cures the disease.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Life is the expression of tone. In that sentence is the basic principle of Chiropractic.
quotes.author: Daniel D. Palmer

quotes.quote: Chiropractors correct abnormalities of the intellect as well as those of the body.
quotes.author: Daniel D. Palmer

quotes.quote: Get knowledge of the spine, for this is the requisite for many diseases.
quotes.author: Hippocrates

quotes.quote: If it were not for chiropractic, I would not have won the gold medal.
quotes.author: Dan O'Brien

quotes.quote: Chiropractic care is the only real, long-lasting relief that I have found for my neck pain due to an old injury.
quotes.author: James Arness

quotes.quote: Medical men have searched the world for remedies, desiring an antidote. Chiropractors find the cause in the person ailing.
quotes.author: B J Palmer

quotes.quote: Computer lab taking med school courses. Guess who just became a chiropractor in the Philippines?
quotes.author: Bryan Moore

quotes.quote: I think you've had enough, Mr. Peterson. My chiropractor says I can't carry you home anymore.
quotes.author: Matt Groening

quotes.quote: I warn you, I'm a chiropractor! I will use my skills negatively!
quotes.author: Bruce Jay Friedman

quotes.quote: Well, since you still haven't told me what exactly it is that you do, I'm gonna go with yoga instructor or chiropractor.
quotes.author: Amy Sherman-Palladino

quotes.quote: My back is just killing me. I don't know what I've done to it. I've had it x-rayed, I've been to my chiropractor, I had a shiatsu massage, I've been.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: Deciding to become a Chiropractor is a huge decision and the decision is usually made because you want to help others, while at the same time succeeding as a professional.
quotes.author: Holly Genskay

quotes.quote: As a Chiropractor you must educate your patients regarding their health, but I feel they will take you more seriously if they know what schooling you've been through.
quotes.author: Holly Genskay

quotes.quote: As a Chiropractor you must educate your patients regarding their health.
quotes.author: Holly Genskay

quotes.quote: Commonly, chiropractor provides organic home based treatments and prevention methods to promote healthy and cost effective treatments.
quotes.author: Danny Rimpson

quotes.quote: Chiropractor is simplistic and prefers natural methods to counter the illness.
quotes.author: Danny Rimpson

quotes.quote: Chiropractor is quite affordable as alternative medicines are greatly benefiting and you can pay directly to your chiropractor or from medical insurance.
quotes.author: Danny Rimpson

quotes.quote: Licensed chiropractor undergoes extensive study of minimal of six years and thus they are trustworthy and can give you the best of treatments and prevention methods.
quotes.author: Danny Rimpson

quotes.quote: Chiropractor not only treats you, but also helps you to lead quality life and that to without spending that much money.
quotes.author: Danny Rimpson

quotes.quote: A chiropractor could treat a child for asthma, ear infections, or autism and bill the government for the 'adjustment' he made to the child's spine.
quotes.author: Paul Benedetti

quotes.quote: An animal chiropractor practices chiropractic care on animals, although the practitioner may or may not also be a veterinarian and may or may not be a chiropractor who was specially trained to work on animal patients.
quotes.author: Lisa Preston

quotes.quote: Daniel David Palmer(1845) examined the practice of using magnets and osteopathy in patient treatment and developed the idea of chiropractic-names for the greek root words chiro meaning 'hand' and praxis meaning 'doing'.
quotes.author: Lisa Preston

quotes.quote: Each career in physical therapy is unique and built on a combination of factors.
quotes.author: Trisha Hawkins

quotes.quote: A physical therapist will never become wealthy. You will never become famous. You will however, live life as a completed person because of the unique opportunity to serve others as a physical therapist.
quotes.author: Stephen J. Carp

quotes.quote: Physical Therapy and community Services, presents the role of the physical therapist as a servant-leader toward the sick, poor, and impaired.
quotes.author: Stephen J. Carp

quotes.quote: Before physical therapists complete their training education, they will have gone through clinical training in a variety of settings, including hospitals, nursing homes, clinics, and schools.
quotes.author: Teppo Harasymiw

quotes.quote: As patients weaken, it may become necessary for physical therapist to manipulate limbs to prevent loss of mobility.
quotes.author: Teppo Harasymiw

quotes.quote: Physical therapists provide services that help restore function, improve mobility, relieve pain, and prevent or limit permanent disabilities.
quotes.author: Bernice R. Krumhansl

quotes.quote: Fitness and fitness wellness global outcomes are the cumulative effects that physical therapy has upon the fitness and fitness wellness of the patient/client.
quotes.author: Fair

quotes.quote: Physical Therapist Practice are certainly helpful for a patient/client who presents with impaired body composition and body composition wellness.
quotes.author: Fair

quotes.quote: Like physical therapy, occupational therapy often includes physical movement, such a stretching and relaxing.
quotes.author: Marcia Amidon Lusted

quotes.quote: Being a physical or occupational therapy aide does not require higher education, only a high school diploma.
quotes.author: Marcia Amidon Lusted

quotes.quote: There is a vast difference between treating the effects and adjusting the cause.
quotes.author: DD Palmer

quotes.quote: Look well to the spine for the cause of disease.
quotes.author: Hippocrates

quotes.quote: Patient Evaluations of Low-Back Pain Care'.Chiropractors are now accepted as a legitimate healing profession by the public and by an increasing number of physicians.
quotes.author: The Manga Report

quotes.quote: Chiropractic treatment was more effective than hospital outpatient management, mainly for patients with chronic or severe back pain.
quotes.author: British Medical Journal

quotes.quote: The age of chivalry is past. Bores have succeeded to dragons.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: Some say that the age of chivalry is past, that the spirit of romance is dead. The age of chivalry is never past, so long as there is a wrong left undressed on earth.
quotes.author: Charles Kingsley

quotes.quote: The motto of chivalry is also the motto of wisdom; to serve all, but love only one.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: We direct the destinies of a mighty continent. Our resources are unlimited: our means unbounded. If we be true to ourselves, the glory of other nations, in comparison to ours, shall resemble but a tale from the days of chivalry.
quotes.author: John Tyler

quotes.quote: There is another side to chivalry. If it dispenses leniency, it may with equal justification invoke control.
quotes.author: Freda Adler

quotes.quote: The institution of chivalry forms one of the most remarkable features in the history of the Middle Ages.
quotes.author: Horatio Alger

quotes.quote: Chivalry is one of the great civilizing forces, taming men and introducing social graces and nuance to what would otherwise be a brutish social world.
quotes.author: Heather Mac Donald

quotes.quote: Chivalry is dead.
quotes.author: Sienna Miller

quotes.quote: Chivalry isn't dead. It's just no longer gender-based.
quotes.author: Letitia Baldrige

quotes.quote: We take so many of our freedoms for granted nowadays - I can travel where I like, I can do any job I want - but I think chivalry has been lost a little bit.
quotes.author: Michelle Dockery

quotes.quote: The word Chivalry is derived from the French cheval, a horse.
quotes.author: Thomas Bulfinch

quotes.quote: The age of chivalry has gone; the age of humanity has come.
quotes.author: Charles Summer

quotes.quote: To risk life to save a smile on a face of a woman or a child is the secret of chivalry.
quotes.author: Dejan Stojanovic

quotes.quote: “What if custom is wrong? demanded the part of her that believed in the code of chivalry. A knight must set things right.”
quotes.author: Tamora Fierce

quotes.quote: Lo! I must tell a tale of chivalry , for large white plumes are dancing in mine eye.
quotes.author: John Keats

quotes.quote: Health to grantas chivalry, wisely finding day by day.
quotes.author: Charles Kingsley

quotes.quote: And corresponded not with chivalry, that he a woman should desire to kill.
quotes.author: Ludovico Ariosto

quotes.quote: Where the banners of chivalry heavily swing over the pinnacled tomb of the warrior king.
quotes.author: Richard Harris Barham

quotes.quote: That fading chivalry displays no more her pomp and stately tournaments of yore!
quotes.author: William Lisle Bowles

quotes.quote: I said should be a tale of gone-by chivalry. My task is done , the tale is told.
quotes.author: Letitia Elizabeth London

quotes.quote: The long year's meed and due, the bud homage grafted on chivalry.
quotes.author: Edith Nesbitt

quotes.quote: And touched my thoughts with beauty, while the poor world, wise with bitter guile outlived its chivalry.
quotes.author: Agnes Louise Storrie

quotes.quote: Where in the days of chivalry, each knight and baron brave in military pride shone in the brass and burning steel of war.
quotes.author: Hugh Henry Brackenridge

quotes.quote: And silk octavos bound in brown and red, that tales of love and chivalry unfold.
quotes.author: Zora Bernice May Cross

quotes.quote: Give his ashes never a sigh one of many who perished not in vain as a type of chivalry.
quotes.author: Adam Lindsay Gordon

quotes.quote: Die, to die for you foremost in rivalry heroes to dig my grave that were true chivalry.
quotes.author: Wilfrid Scawen Blunt

quotes.quote: Thou art avenged by the bow chivalry name of romance thou art henceforth but a name weapon that none can withstand.
quotes.author: Francis Turner Palgrave

quotes.quote: He never heard of chivalry he longs for heroic times.
quotes.author: Joyce Kilmer

quotes.quote: The craven soul who feared to die with all the glow of chivalry and old heroic fire.
quotes.author: William Schwenk Gilbert

quotes.quote: The restless, deep, dividing sea that flows and foams from shore to shore calls to its sunburned chivalry push out, set sail, explore!
quotes.author: Henry Van Dyke

quotes.quote: They used to call it chivalry but now they calls it dirt.
quotes.author: Clarence Michael James Stanislaus Dennis

quotes.quote: You worship decorations you believe that chivalry redeems the war's disgrace.
quotes.author: Siegrried Sassoon

quotes.quote: I thought to do a deed of chivalry an act of worth which happy in her sight who was my mistress should recorded be.
quotes.author: William Schwenk Gilbert

quotes.quote: They who were brave to act and rich enough their action to forget, who having filled their day with chivalry.
quotes.author: Emma Lazarus

quotes.quote: O chivalry of hope with the cloudy host of the infidel and the holy earth reclaim.
quotes.author: Katharine Lee Bates

quotes.quote: The distant siren-song of the green island in the eastern sea is not the lay for this new chivalry.
quotes.author: Emma Lazarus

quotes.quote: A gentleman is someone who does not what he wants to do, but what he should do.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: More than a code of manners in war and love, Chivalry was a moral system, governing the whole of noble life.
quotes.author: Barbara Tuchman

quotes.quote: He who defends with love will be secure. Heaven will save him, and protect him with love.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Chivalry is the most delicate form of contempt.
quotes.author: Albert Guerard

quotes.quote: Every man I meet wants to protect me. I can't figure out what from.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: Chivalry is not just a fancy word with a neat meaning; it's a way of life.
quotes.author: Vaughn Ripley

quotes.quote: The only thing I want more than you, is to do right by you.
quotes.author: Angela N. Blount

quotes.quote: Chocolate causes certain endocrine glands to secrete hormones that affect your feelings and behavior by making you happy. Therefore, it counteracts depression, in turn reducing the stress of depression. Your stress-free life helps you maintain a youthful disposition, both physically and mentally. So, eat lots of chocolate!
quotes.author: Elaine Sherman

quotes.quote: Chocolate is a perfect food, as wholesome as it is delicious, a beneficent restorer of exhausted power...it is the best friend of those engaged in literary pursuits.
quotes.author: Baron Justus Von Liebig

quotes.quote: It's not that chocolates are a substitute for love. Love is a substitute for chocolate. Chocolate is, let's face it, far more reliable than a man.
quotes.author: Miranda Ingram

quotes.quote: Chocolate makes everyone smile-even bankers.
quotes.author: Ben Strohecker

quotes.quote: Eating chocolate can have significant influences on mood, generally leading to an increase in pleasant feelings and a reduction in tension.
quotes.author: Peter Rogers

quotes.quote: Hot fudge fills deep needs.
quotes.author: Susan Isaacs

quotes.quote: Chemically speaking, chocolate really is the world's perfect food.
quotes.author: Michael Levine

quotes.quote: Chocolate is cheaper than therapy and you don't need an appointment.
quotes.author: Catherine Aitken

quotes.quote: Chocolate is a perfect food, as wholesome as it is delicious, a beneficent restorer of exhausted power. it is the best friend of those engaged in literary pursuits.
quotes.author: Baron Justus Von Liebig

quotes.quote: Reminiscent of childhood memories, luxury, sweetness and sensuality, chocolate is more than just a food--it is therapy.
quotes.author: Christelle Le Ru

quotes.quote: More than any other food, chocolate delights and enchants ... chocolate tantalizes and it comforts. Chocolate has soothed fretful children and welcomed tired travelers; mountain climbers have saved their last piece of chocolate to celebrate reaching new heights; suitors have given chocolate to show the depth of their devotion. Chocolate has been used as a stimulant, an aphrodisiac, and [even] a form of currency.
quotes.author: Neva Beach

quotes.quote: Chocolate knows no boundaries; speaks all languages; comes in all sizes; is woven through many cultures and disciplines ... it impacts mood, health, and economics, and it is a part of our lives from early childhood through the elderly years.
quotes.author: Herman A. Berliner

quotes.quote: Chocolate: the poor mans' champagne.
quotes.author: Daniel Worona

quotes.quote: Remember the days when you let your child have some chocolate if he finished his cereal? Now, chocolate is one of the cereals.
quotes.author: Robert Orben

quotes.quote: Chocolate says "I'm sorry" so much better than words.
quotes.author: Rachel Vincent

quotes.quote: After eating chocolate you feel godlike, as though you can conquer enemies, lead armies, entice lovers.
quotes.author: Emily Luchetti

quotes.quote: Chocolate is an antidepressant, which is especially useful as you start to gain weight.
quotes.author: Jason Love

quotes.quote: Chocolate is ground from the beans of happiness.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: Researchers have discovered that chocolate produces some of the same reactions in the brain as marijuana. The researchers also discovered other similarities between the two but can't remember what they are.
quotes.author: Matt Lauer

quotes.quote: Carefully prepared chocolate is as healthful a food as it is pleasant; that it is nourishing and easily digested; that it does not cause the same harmful effects to feminine beauty which are blamed on coffee, but is on the contrary a remedy for them.
quotes.author: Jean-Antheleme Brillat-Savarin

quotes.quote: Caramels are only a fad. Chocolate is a permanent thing.
quotes.author: Milton Snavely Hershey

quotes.quote: The superiority of chocolate, both for health and nourishment, will soon give it the same preference over tea and coffee in America which it has in Spain.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: Look, there's no metaphysics on earth like chocolates.
quotes.author: Fernando Pessoa

quotes.quote: A little chocolate is like a love affair - an occasional sweet release that lightens the spirit. A lot of chocolate is like marriage - it seems so good at first but before you know it you've got chunky hips and a waddle-walk.
quotes.author: Linda Solegato

quotes.quote: Chocolate is the first luxury. It has so many things wrapped up in it: deliciousness in the moment, childhood memories, and that grin-inducing feeling of getting a reward for being good.
quotes.author: Mariska Hargitay

quotes.quote: When you select the right kind of chocolate it is like giving your insides a hug. Everyone needs a chocolate hug.
quotes.author: Jean Kelsey

quotes.quote: Chocolate is like medicine - but as with medicine, the key is the proper dose. Don't overdo it.
quotes.author: Grandpa Jones

quotes.quote: Biochemically, love is just like eating large amounts of chocolate.
quotes.author: John Milton

quotes.quote: Chocolate is nature's way of making up for Mondays.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Giving chocolate to others is an intimate form of communication, a sharing of deep, dark secrets
quotes.author: Milton Zelma

quotes.quote: Chocolate...is not something you can take or leave, something you like only moderately. You don't like chocolate. You don't even love chocolate. Chocolate is something you have an affair with.
quotes.author: Geneen Roth

quotes.quote: The taste of chocolate is a sensual pleasure in itself, existing in the same world as sex...For myself, I can enjoy the wicked pleasure of chocolate...entirely by myself. Furtiveness makes it better.
quotes.author: Ruth Westheimer

quotes.quote: There is a simple memory aid that you can use to determine whether it is the correct time to order chocolate dishes; Any month whose name contains the letter A, E, or U is the proper time for chocolate.
quotes.author: Sandra Boynton

quotes.quote: Other things are just-food. But chocolate's chocolate.
quotes.author: Patrick Skene Catling

quotes.quote: All I really need is love, but a little chocolate now and then doesn't hurt.
quotes.author: Lucy Van Pelt

quotes.quote: I never met a chocolate I didn't like.
quotes.author: Deanna Troi

quotes.quote: Don't wreck a sublime chocolate experience by feeling guilty. Chocolate isn't like premarital sex. It will not make you pregnant. And it always feels good.
quotes.author: Lora Brody

quotes.quote: Research tells us 14 out of any 10 individuals like chocolate.
quotes.author: Sandra Boynton

quotes.quote: Nothing can match chocolate for drama, dazzle, and deep-down allure.
quotes.author: Nancy Baggett

quotes.quote: Some say women are addicted to chocolate. I say we're merely loyal.
quotes.author: Cathy Guisewite

quotes.quote: Chocolates make otherwise normal people melt into strange states of ecstasy.
quotes.author: John West

quotes.quote: Chocolate is more than food but less than a drug.
quotes.author: R.J. Huxtable

quotes.quote: I am not a strict vegan, because I'm a hedonist pig. If I see a big chocolate cake that is made with eggs, I'll have it.
quotes.author: Grace Slick

quotes.quote: Strength is the capacity to break a chocolate bar into four pieces with your bare hands and then eat just one of the pieces.
quotes.author: Judith Viorst

quotes.quote: There are two kinds of people in the world: those who love chocolate, and Communists.
quotes.author: Leslie Moak Murray

quotes.quote: An annoying habit...like the people who take nonfattening sweetness in their coffee and order chocolate mousse.
quotes.author: Marilyn Sharp

quotes.quote: Dancing is exercise, sleeping in is good for you, and a little bit of chocolate every now and then never killed anyone.
quotes.author: Bradley Trevor Greive

quotes.quote: A chocolate city is no dream / It's my piece of the rock and I dig you CC / God bless Chocolate City and its vanilla suburbs.
quotes.author: George Clinton

quotes.quote: Just the very act of unwrapping chocolate can drive s wild.
quotes.author: Sarah Arak

quotes.quote: Self-discipline implies some unpleasant things to me, including staying away from chocolates.
quotes.author: Oleg Kiselev

quotes.quote: A good night sleep or a ten-minute bawl, or a pint of chocolate ice cream, or all three together, is good medicine.
quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

quotes.quote: I think the combination of chocolate and lemon is so refreshing. In England, I even tasted a yogurt flavored with chocolate and lemon. Sounds weird, tastes great.
quotes.author: Dieter Shorner

quotes.quote: Chocolate is the world's favorite flavor. There is a mystery, excitement, and wickedness associated with chocolate you'll find in no other food.
quotes.author: Tish Boyle and Timothy Moriarty

quotes.quote: Chocolate was all that was necessary for breakfast because after eating chocolate, one needed no further meat, bread, or drink.
quotes.author: Henry Stubbe

quotes.quote: Food is required to give us energy, and chocolate is relatively energy-dense, meaning it is high in calories for a small portion size.
quotes.author: S.T. Beckett

quotes.quote: Chocolate is often associated with many religious and national holidays and festive celebrations, where it is traditionally given as a gift to loved ones and friends.
quotes.author: Adrianna Morganelli

quotes.quote: NIce memories are like chocolate; you can't survive on them alone. as they aren't very filling, but they make life sweeter.
quotes.author: Janine Weger

quotes.quote: Chocolate is happiness that you can eat.
quotes.author: Ursula Kohaupt

quotes.quote: Life is like chocolate; you should enjoy it piece for piece and let it slowly melt on your tongue.
quotes.author: Nina Sandmann

quotes.quote: Chocolate is a gift of love to yourself.
quotes.author: Sonja Blumenthal

quotes.quote: Chocolate is comfort without words.
quotes.author: Ursula Kohaupt

quotes.quote: There is nothing better than a friend unless it is a friend with chocolate.
quotes.author: Linda Grayson

quotes.quote: A man is too apt to forget that in this world he cannot have everything. A choice is all that is left him.
quotes.author: Harry Mathews

quotes.quote: Choice strengthens all.
quotes.author: Neal Prescot

quotes.quote: Every choice moves us closer to or farther away from something. Where are your choices taking your life What do your behaviors demonstrate that you are saying yes or no to in life
quotes.author: Eric Allenbaugh

quotes.quote: Every choice you make has an end result.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Every day brings new choices.
quotes.author: Martha Beck

quotes.quote: Life presents many choices, the choices we make determine our future.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: And in life, it is all about choices we make. And how the direction of our lives comes down to the choices we choose.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: In every single thing you do, you are choosing a direction. Your life is a product of choices.
quotes.author: Dr. Kathleen Hall

quotes.quote: I discovered I always have choices and sometimes it's only a choice of attitude.
quotes.author: Judith M. Knowlton

quotes.quote: Fundamentally, we are a product of choice, not nature (genes) or nurture (upbringing, environment).
quotes.author: Stephen R. Covey

quotes.quote: No one else can ever make your choices for you. Your choices are yours alone. They are as much a part of you as every breath you will take, every moment of your life.
quotes.author: Dr. Shad Helmstetter

quotes.quote: If you were given only one choice: To choose or not to choose, which would you choose
quotes.author: Dr. Shad Helmstetter

quotes.quote: The choices we make in the heat of emotion would be better if left for some other day.
quotes.author: Dr. Shad Helmstetter

quotes.quote: The strongest principle of growth lies in human choice.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: If you limit your choices only to what seems possible or reasonable, you disconnect yourself from what you truly want, and all that is left is a compromise.
quotes.author: Robert Fritz

quotes.quote: It is our choices that show what we truly are far more than our abilities.
quotes.author: Professor Dumbledore

quotes.quote: Some choices we live not only once but a thousand times over, remembering them for the rest of our lives.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: The choices that we make aren't always perfect but it's ok... It's part of the journey.
quotes.author: Hayley Williams

quotes.quote: Nobody ever did, or ever will, escape the consequences of his choices.
quotes.author: Alfred A. Montapert

quotes.quote: If you are just safe about the choices you make, you don't grow.
quotes.author: Heath Ledger

quotes.quote: Look for your choices, pick the best one, then go with it.
quotes.author: Pat Riley

quotes.quote: Eighty percent of all choices are based on fear. Most people don't choose what they want; they choose what they think is safe.
quotes.author: Dr. Phil McGraw

quotes.quote: You can't make your choices based on what critics think. You have to make your choices based on what's honest for you.
quotes.author: Nicolas Cage

quotes.quote: No matter what your choices are, you truly have no control about what people think of you.
quotes.author: Neve Campbell

quotes.quote: But you've got to make choices, and you're not going to be right all the time.
quotes.author: Earl Butz

quotes.quote: Our lives are fashioned by our choices. First we make our choices. Then our choices make us.
quotes.author: Anne Frank

quotes.quote: The choices we make about the lives we live determine the kinds of legacies we leave.
quotes.author: Tavis Smiley

quotes.quote: Hopefully your choices can come from a deep sense of who you are.
quotes.author: Fred Rogers

quotes.quote: One choice can transform you. One choice can destroy you. Once choice will define you.
quotes.author: Veronica Roth

quotes.quote: You have choices to make about what you do with the rest of your life.
quotes.author: Darren L. Johnson

quotes.quote: Choices, the greatest power we have, Choices, the path which is destiny, Choices, the result which is you....
quotes.author: Joshua Fernandez

quotes.quote: Choices are made in brief seconds and paid for in the time that remains.
quotes.author: Paolo Giordano

quotes.quote: Choices are the hinges of destiny.
quotes.author: Edwin Markham

quotes.quote: Each choice we make causes a ripple effect in our lives. When things happen to us, it is the reaction we choose that can create the difference between the sorrows of our past and the joy in our future.
quotes.author: Chelle Thompson

quotes.quote: We can try to avoid making choices by doing nothing, but even that is a decision.
quotes.author: Gary Collins

quotes.quote: The right choice is hardly ever the easy choice.
quotes.author: Rick Riordan

quotes.quote: You have two choices in life...Choice one is to be the same and be like everyone else...Choice two is to be yourself and be a difference-maker.
quotes.author: Jazlyn Roehl

quotes.quote: While we are free to choose our actions, we are not free to choose the consequences of our actions.
quotes.author: Stephen R.Covey

quotes.quote: In the long run, we shape our lives, and we shape ourselves. The process never ends until we die. And the choices we make are ultimately our own responsibility.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The difficulty in life is the choice.
quotes.author: George Moore

quotes.quote: For what is the best choice, for each individual is the highest it is possible for him to achieve.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: It's choice not chance-that determines your destiny.
quotes.author: Jean Nidetch

quotes.quote: We cannot lead a choiceless life. Every day, every moment, every second, there is a choice. If it were not so, we would not be individuals.
quotes.author: Ernest Holmes

quotes.quote: Choice means saying no to one thing so you can say yes to another.
quotes.author: Dan Millman

quotes.quote: We must make the choices that enable us to fulfill the deepest capacities of our real selves.
quotes.author: Thomas Merton

quotes.quote: I believe that we are solely responsible for our choices, and we have to accept the consequences of every deed, word, and thought throughout our lifetime.
quotes.author: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross

quotes.quote: The self is not something ready-made, but something in continuous formation through choice of action.
quotes.author: John Dewey

quotes.quote: A man has free choice to the extent that he is rational.
quotes.author: St. Thomas Aquinas

quotes.quote: Too much freedom inhibits choice. Constructive narrowness clarifies choice.
quotes.author: Darby Bannard

quotes.quote: You are at a choice-point in every moment of each circumstance, each activity, spoken word and thought.
quotes.author: Dr. Michael Beckwith

quotes.quote: The moment of choice has come—to go forward or to go withdraw into solitude. The decision must be in complete accord with one's innermost being.
quotes.author: Yi Jing

quotes.quote: The power of conscious choice / is your profit-earning capital / Pay attention! / Watch over that moment of power.
quotes.author: Jalaluddin Rumi

quotes.quote: Know to choose well. Most of life depends thereon. It needs good taste and correct judgment, for which neither intellect nor study suffices.
quotes.author: Baltasar Gracian y Morales

quotes.quote: When you have to make a choice and don't make it, that is in itself a choice.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: Destiny is not a matter of chance, but of choice, not something to wish for but to attain.
quotes.author: William Jennings Bryan

quotes.quote: We have to believe in free will. We've got no choice.
quotes.author: Isaac Bashevis Singer

quotes.quote: The history of free men is never really written by chance but by their choice—their choice.
quotes.author: Dwight Eisenhower

quotes.quote: It is the ability to choose which makes us human.
quotes.author: Madeleine L'Engle

quotes.quote: Mankind's greatest gift, also its greatest curse, is that we have free choice. We can make our choices built from love or from fear.
quotes.author: Elisabeth Kubler Ross

quotes.quote: Every intersection in the road of life is an opportunity to make a decision.
quotes.author: Duke Ellington

quotes.quote: We do not choose the day of our birth nor may we choose the day of our death, yet choice is the sovereign faculty of the mind.
quotes.author: Thornton Wilder

quotes.quote: The choice may have been mistaken, the choosing was not. You have to move on.
quotes.author: Stephen Sondheim

quotes.quote: We either make ourselves miserable or we make ourselves strong. The amount of work is the same.
quotes.author: Carlos Castaneda

quotes.quote: Creative choice is your birthright. Please own it.
quotes.author: John Bradshaw

quotes.quote: By choosing we learn to be responsible. By paying the price of our choices we learn to make better choices.
quotes.author: Marsha Sinetar

quotes.quote: A door must be either shut or open.
quotes.author: English Proverb

quotes.quote: To be or not to be; that is the question.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Any customer can have a car painted any color that he wants as long as it's black.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: Two roads diverged in a wood, and I— / I took the one less traveled by, / And that has made all the difference.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: White shall not neutralize the black nor good / Compensate bad in man, absolve him so: / Life's business being just the terrible choice.
quotes.author: Robert Browning

quotes.quote: There is a time when we must firmly choose the course we will follow, or the relentless drift of events will make the decision.
quotes.author: Herbert V. Prochnow

quotes.quote: God always gives his very best to those who leave the choice with him.
quotes.author: James Hudson Taylor

quotes.quote: Every day the choice between good and evil is presented to us in simple ways.
