quotes.author: William Edwyn Robert Sangster

quotes.quote: Every act is an act of self-sacrifice. When you choose anything you reject everything else— just as when you marry one woman you give up all the others.
quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Even children learn in growing up that 'both' is not an admissible answer to a choice of 'Which one?'
quotes.author: Paul A. Samuelson

quotes.quote: People who are free to choose may choose wrongly. This is the age-old paradox. Sin is the other side of freedom's coin. A world without sin would be a world without choice.
quotes.author: Charles Handy

quotes.quote: Attitude is a choice. Happiness is a choice. Optimism is a choice. Kindness is a choice. Respect is a choice. Whatever choice you make makes you. Choose wisely.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: In order to be good, a man must be in a certain state when he acts and must act by choice for the sake of the acts themselves.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Incontinence is not a vice for it is contrary to choice while vice flows from choice.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: I am an optimist...I choose to be. There is a lot of darkness in our world, there is a lot of pain and you can choose to see that or you can choose to see the joy. If you try to respond positively to the world, you will spend your time better.
quotes.author: Tom Hiddleston

quotes.quote: Life presents many choices, the choices we make determine our future.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: In every single thing you do, you are choosing a direction. Your life is a product of choices.
quotes.author: Dr. Kathleen Hall

quotes.quote: I discovered I always have choices and sometimes it's only a choice of attitude.
quotes.author: Judith M. Knowlton

quotes.quote: It is about choices we make. And how the direction of our lives comes down to the choices we choose.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: The strongest principle of growth lies in human choice.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: There are two primary choices in life; to accept conditions as they exist, or accept the responsibility for changing them.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: Choice means saying no to one thing so you can say yes to another.
quotes.author: Dan Millman

quotes.quote: Every choice you make has an end result.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: I believe that we are solely responsible for our choices, and we have to accept the consequences of every deed, word, and thought throughout our lifetime.
quotes.author: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross

quotes.quote: Look for your choices, pick the best one, and then go with it.
quotes.author: Pat Riley

quotes.quote: It's choice'not chance-that determines your destiny.
quotes.author: Jean Nidetch

quotes.quote: Every choice moves us closer to or farther away from something. Where are your choices taking your life? What do your behaviors demonstrate that you are saying yes or no to in life?
quotes.author: Eric Allenbaugh

quotes.quote: We cannot lead a choiceless life. Every day, every moment, every second, there is a choice. If it were not so, we would not be individuals.
quotes.author: Ernest Holmes

quotes.quote: Nobody ever did, or ever will, escape the consequences of his choices.
quotes.author: Alfred A. Montapert

quotes.quote: Every morning when I get up, the first thing I decide is:What do I want?Misery? Blisfullness?What am I going to choose today?And it happens that I always choose blissfulness.It is my choice, it is my life.
quotes.author: Abdullah

quotes.quote: It is our choices that show what we truly are far more than our abilities.
quotes.author: Professor Dumbledore

quotes.quote: Once you have started seeing the beauty of life, ugliness starts disappearing. If you start looking at life with joy, sadness starts disappearing. You cannot have heaven and hell together, you can have only one. It is your choice.
quotes.author: Osho

quotes.quote: If you limit your choices only to what seems possible or reasonable, you disconnect yourself from what you truly want, and all that is left is a compromise.
quotes.author: Robert Fritz

quotes.quote: You are your choices.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: If you are just safe about the choices you make, you don't grow.
quotes.author: Heath Ledger

quotes.quote: The key choices you make-apart from the natural talent you already have-will set you apart from others who have talent alone.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: Life is a matter of choices, and every choice you make makes you.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: It's up to you today to start making healthy choices. Not choices that are just healthy for your body, but healthy for your mind.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: When you have to make a choice and don't make it, that is in itself a choice.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: Once you make a choice, you have no choice.
quotes.author: Anna Chin-Williams

quotes.quote: We can try to avoid making choices by doing nothing, but even that is a decision.
quotes.author: Gary Collins

quotes.quote: We must make the choices that enable us to fulfill the deepest capacities of our real selves.
quotes.author: Thomas Merton

quotes.quote: Always go with the choice that scares you the most, because that's the one that is going to require the most from you.
quotes.author: Caroline Myss

quotes.quote: Choice is strength. Having choice is also freedom.
quotes.author: Coulter Watt

quotes.quote: May your choices reflect your hopes, not your fears.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: In this life we have to make many choices. Some are very important choices. Some are not. Many of our choices are between good and evil. The choices we make, however, determine to a large extent our happiness or our unhappiness, because we have to live wi
quotes.author: James E. Faust

quotes.quote: The choices we make in life have unlimited possibilities.
quotes.author: Rem Saverem

quotes.quote: Make your important choices in lifebased on your values and your long-term objectivesrather than on a need for approval.
quotes.author: Jonathan Lockwood Huie

quotes.quote: I make my own choices.I decide what I will and will not do.I am proud of my independence.
quotes.author: Jonathan Lockwood Huie

quotes.quote: But you've got to make choices, and you're not goingto be right all the time.
quotes.author: Earl Butz

quotes.quote: You have two choices: to control your mind or to let your mind control you.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: This is a good plan for life in general. If you have two choices, choose the harder.
quotes.author: Paul Graham

quotes.quote: We seal our fate with the choices we make.
quotes.author: Gloria Estefan

quotes.quote: There are no easy choices. Easy choices are long gone.
quotes.author: Alan Greenspan

quotes.quote: Choices are the hinges of destiny.
quotes.author: Pythagoras

quotes.quote: Your choices today determine your tomorrow and you make your life through the power of choice.
quotes.author: Kathy Smith

quotes.quote: The need to make wise choices encompasses every area of our lives.Since we have time for only a limited amount of stuff, we need to choose wisely what stuff we're going to allow to take up that time. Since we have only a limited amount of time to spend
quotes.author: Elaine St. James

quotes.quote: Choice is a divine teacher, for when we choose we learn thatnothing is ever put in our path without a reason.
quotes.author: Iyanla Vanzant

quotes.quote: Choices can change our lives profoundly. The choice to mend a broken relationship, to say "yes" to a difficult assignment, to lay aside some important work to play with a child, to visit some forgotten person--these small choices may affect many lives et
quotes.author: Gloria Gaither

quotes.quote: Choices determine character.
quotes.author: Brandon Mull

quotes.quote: What happens if your choice is misguided,You must try to correct itBut what if it's too late' What if you can't'Then you must find a way to live with it.
quotes.author: Libba Bray

quotes.quote: Choose well. Your choice is brief, and yet endless.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: No choice is also a choice.
quotes.author: Yiddish Proverb

quotes.quote: Sometimes the wrong choices bring us to the right places.
quotes.author: Nathan Pyles

quotes.quote: But until a person can say deeply and honestly, "I am what I am today because of the choices I made yesterday," that person cannot say, "I choose otherwise.
quotes.author: Stephen R. Covey

quotes.quote: 'Right' choices can be for the wrong reasons; one can ignore a potent higher reality.
quotes.author: Alfred Henry

quotes.quote: Men are free to decide their own moral choices, but they are also under the necessity to account to God for those choices.
quotes.author: Aiden Wilson

quotes.quote: Be ready to protect me because I have chosen to obey your laws.
quotes.author: Psalm 119:173

quotes.quote: It is our choices that show what we truly are far more than our abilities.
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling

quotes.quote: Be careful about the environment you choose for it shapes you; be careful about the friends you choose for you will become like them.
quotes.author: W. Clement Stone

quotes.quote: Life is the sum of your choices.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: Full maturity is achieved by realizing that you have choices to make.
quotes.author: Angela Baron McBride

quotes.quote: We are given one life, and the decision is ours whether to wait for circumstances to make up your mind, or whether to act, and in acting, to live.
quotes.author: Omar Nelson Bradley

quotes.quote: Accept that you are where you are and what you are because of your own choices and decisions.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Think of your life as a series of choices. For every past action, you made a choice, whether or not you were conscious of making one.
quotes.author: Madonna Gauding

quotes.quote: Knowing that you're choosing all your actions brings clarity, responsibility, and accountability to your life.
quotes.author: Madonna Gauding

quotes.quote: The entire world depends upon our individual choices.
quotes.author: Duane Elgin

quotes.quote: One's philosophy is not best expressed in words; it is expressed in the choices one makes...in the long run, we shape our lives and we shape ourselves. The process never ends until we die. And the choices we make are ultimately our responsibility.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Take care to do what you like or you will be forced to like what you do.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: The power of conscious choice is your profit-earning capital. Pay attention! Watch over that moment of power.
quotes.author: Jalaluddin Rumi

quotes.quote: Know to choose well. Most of life depends thereon. It needs good taste and correct judgment, for which neither intellect nor study suffices.
quotes.author: Baltasar Gracian y Morales

quotes.quote: Free choice is one of the highest of all the mental processes.
quotes.author: Maria Montessori

quotes.quote: I think that our power of conscious origination is where free will comes in...We are originally choosing between the good and the less good, whether aware of it or not.
quotes.author: Alfred North Whitehead

quotes.quote: Every intersection in the road of life is an opportunity to make a decision.
quotes.author: Duke Ellington

quotes.quote: You have brains in your head. You have feet in your shoes. You can steer yourself in any direction you choose. You're on your own. And you know what you know. And YOU are the guy who'll decide where to go.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: We have free will, but our free will lies in our choice of thoughts.
quotes.author: Emmet Fox

quotes.quote: Decide what you want. Decide what you are willing to exchange for it. Establish your priorities and go to work
quotes.author: H.L. Hunt

quotes.quote: The history of free men is never really written by chance but by choice— their choice.
quotes.author: Dwight Eisenhower

quotes.quote: It is the ability to choose which makes us human.
quotes.author: Madeleine L'Engle

quotes.quote: Mankind's greatest gift, also its greatest curse is that we have free choice. We can make our choices built from love or from fear.
quotes.author: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross

quotes.quote: The choice may have been mistaken, the choosing was not. You have to move on.
quotes.author: Stephen Sondheim

quotes.quote: We either make ourselves miserable or we make ourselves strong. The amount of work is the same.
quotes.author: Carlos Castaneda

quotes.quote: Creative choice is your birthright. Please own it.
quotes.author: John Bradshaw

quotes.quote: By choosing we learn to be responsible. By paying the price of our choices we learn to make better choices.
quotes.author: Marsha Sinetar

quotes.quote: Inaction is also a decision, a policy with consequence. The wish to keep out of it all is entirely understandable, but it is every bit as much a decision as acting.
quotes.author: Tony Blair

quotes.quote: The choice must always be made, if not one of the lesser evil, at least of the greater, not the perfect good.
quotes.author: James Madison

quotes.quote: Not deciding is really one of the two choices that are available.
quotes.author: Marilynne Robinson

quotes.quote: When I look back through all the years: / At all the laughter and also the tears. / There is just one thing that will always / hold true. / If I had to do it over again, / I would still choose you.
quotes.author: Linda Parks Owens

quotes.quote: Someday we all learn / Life is about choice / Sometimes we yearn / Without rejoice.
quotes.author: M. Useless

quotes.quote: If you stop where you are, / you’ll die where you stand / Those choices you make / —to forever command.
quotes.author: Kurt Philip Behm

quotes.quote: Then the singing enveloped me. It was furry and resonant, coming from everyone's very heart. There was no sense of performance or judgment, only that the music was breath and food.
quotes.author: Anne Lamott

quotes.quote: Sing, then. Sing, indeed, with shoulders back, and head up so that song might go to the roof and beyond to the sky. Mass on mass of tone, with a hard edge, and rich with quality, every single note a carpet of colour woven from basso profundo, and basso, and baritone, and alto, and tenor, and soprano, and also mezzo, and contralto, singing and singing, until life and all things living are become a song.
quotes.author: Richard Llewellyn

quotes.quote: We cannot listen to one voice above all others. We must listen to a choir of voices if we are to understand the individual tunes.
quotes.author: Anthony T.Hincks

quotes.quote: O, Voice of Man, organ of most lovely might.
quotes.author: Richard Llewellyn

quotes.quote: The first time I sang in the church choir; two hundred people changed their religion.
quotes.author: Fred Allen

quotes.quote: Where words leave off, music begins.
quotes.author: Heinrich Heine

quotes.quote: Music, once admitted to the soul, becomes a sort of spirit, and never dies.
quotes.author: Edward Bulwer Lytton

quotes.quote: Music has always been a matter of Energy to me, a question of Fuel. Sentimental people call it Inspiration, but what they really mean is Fuel. I have always needed Fuel. I am a serious consumer. On some nights I still believe that a car with the gas needle on empty can run about fifty more miles if you have the right music very loud on the radio.
quotes.author: Hunter S. Thompson

quotes.quote: Music touches us emotionally, where words alone can't.
quotes.author: Johnny Depp

quotes.quote: Where words fail, music speaks.
quotes.author: Hans Christian Andersen

quotes.quote: Higher, higher, burning fire, making music like a choir!
quotes.author: William Hjortsberg

quotes.quote: You know, it was a toss up whether I go in for diamonds or sing in the choir. The choir lost.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: I really like when a rap song uses a choir. It makes me feel really happy with all those ladies' voices coming and then the guy's rapping. I think it's awesome.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Meriwether

quotes.quote: The most important thing that music teachers can do for their pupils is to inspire and encourage an emotional response not just for music but more importantly for all aspects of life.
quotes.author: Ethan Hawke

quotes.quote: The role of music in our culture is most crucial, because music is the art most sacredly capable of helping us get in touch with the deepest passions and compassion, and deepest understanding of ourselves.
quotes.author: Ethan Hawke

quotes.quote: Musicals were the most popular commodity in the early 30s and they were cranked out at an incredible rate. Most of them really weren't very good. But, if audiences suffered, they didn't complain. The real victims were the dramatic actors. The studio pushed nearly everyone.
quotes.author: Jack Haley Jr.

quotes.quote: You don't choose music, it chooses you. You don't play to choose music, music chooses to play you.
quotes.author: Murray Lerner

quotes.quote: Here am I with you in a world of blue / And we're dancing to the tango we loved when first we met / While the music plays, we recall the days.
quotes.author: Cole Porter

quotes.quote: When our love was a tune that we couldn't soon forget / As I kiss your cheek, we don't have to speak / The violins, like a choir, express the desire / We used to know not long ago.
quotes.author: Cole Porter

quotes.quote: Chestnuts roasting on an open fire / Jack Frost nipping at your nose / Yule-tide carols being sung by a choir / And folks dressed up like Eskimos.
quotes.author: Melvin H. Mel Torm

quotes.quote: Without him / Choir without him / There'd be no sun to warm me in / To grow the tree / That soon will be a moon above us / For you and for me
quotes.author: Arthur Altman

quotes.quote: All God's creatures got a place in the choir / Some sing low and some sing higher / Some sing out loud on a telephone wire / Some just clap their hands, or paws, or anything they've got now
quotes.author: Bill Staines

quotes.quote: The holly bears a blossom / As white as lily flower / And Mary bore sweet Jesus Christ / To be our sweet Savior / O the rising of the sun / And the running of the deer / The playing of the merry organ / Sweet singing of the choir
quotes.author: Lalo Schifrin

quotes.quote: The holly bears a berry / As red as any blood / And Mary bore sweet Jesus Christ / To do poor sinners good / O the rising of the sun / And the running of the deer / The playing of the merry organ / Sweet singing of the choir
quotes.author: Lalo Schifrin

quotes.quote: The holly bears a prickle / As sharp as any thorn / And Mary bore sweet Jesus Christ / On Christmas Day in the morn / O the rising of the sun / And the running of the deer / The playing of the merry organ / Sweet singing of the choir
quotes.author: Lalo Schifrin

quotes.quote: I was looking for a breath of life / A little touch of heavenly light / But all the choirs in my head sang no / To get a dream of life again / A little of vision of the start and the end / But all the choirs in my head sang no.
quotes.author: Florence Leontine Mary Welch

quotes.quote: If I'm preaching to the choir / Raise your hands a little higher / If you wanna sing along to a Saturday night revival song
quotes.author: Heather Lynn Morgan

quotes.quote: Oh, may I join the choir invisible / Of those immortal dead who live again / In minds made better by their presence; live
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: What sudden blaze of song / Spreads o'er th' expanse of Heaven? / In waves of light it thrills along / Th' angelic signal given / 'Glory to God!' from yonder central fire / Flows out the echoing lay beyond the starry choir.
quotes.author: John Keble

quotes.quote: The choir of Angels caught the word / Nor yet their silence broke / But when they heard the sign where Christ should be / In sudden light they shone and heavenly harmony.
quotes.author: John Keble

quotes.quote: Emphasis on music education in the church and religious education through music.
quotes.author: Avery T. Sharp

quotes.quote: Throughout the ages, people have wanted to sing in a communal context. This desire apparently stems from a deeply rooted human instinct.
quotes.author: Melvin P. Unger

quotes.quote: The term choir is often used synonymously with chorus. Both designate ensembles performing vocal music.
quotes.author: Melvin P. Unger

quotes.quote: Choirs were small by modern standards: in the late Medieval era, cathedral choirs usually numbered under 20 singer.
quotes.author: Melvin P. Unger

quotes.quote: In order that the choir may be most effective, the choir members must understand this priestly function: to encourage and to usher in a spiritual atmosphere conductive for worship, to glorify God, and to edify God's people.
quotes.author: LuVonia Whittley

quotes.quote: Music plays a great role in the church service. This was true when the Jewish people worshiped Jehovah in the tabernacles and temples.
quotes.author: LuVonia Whittley

quotes.quote: Choir members should have two main understandings: and awareness of basic vocal skills and, most importantly, a desire to perfect the church's music ministry through praise and worship.
quotes.author: LuVonia Whittley

quotes.quote: A choir member's greatest challenge is being able to demonstrate the ability to prioritize, electing always to answer first to the call of one's church and pastor.
quotes.author: LuVonia Whittley

quotes.quote: May many souls be encouraged and many choir members come to a greater resolve to give God their greatest service.
quotes.author: LuVonia Whittley

quotes.quote: Music creates imagery, refraction, and communicates to us through sound and rhythm.
quotes.author: Gloria J. McCall

quotes.quote: Music is an old familiar language of the soul that constructs scenarios within the mind, relays concepts within the soul and activates the emotions.
quotes.author: Gloria J. McCall

quotes.quote: The choir is a teaching ministry that results in evangelism.
quotes.author: Gloria J. McCall

quotes.quote: Music prepares the listener for the spoken Word. For many believers, a song has directly influenced them in knowing God.
quotes.author: Kenneth W. Osbeck

quotes.quote: Making music together changes people from merely a collection of individuals into a unified congregation or choir.
quotes.author: Kenneth W. Osbeck

quotes.quote: Church music, then, is a functional art. It is meant to serve the purposes of God and His church.
quotes.author: Kenneth W. Osbeck

quotes.quote: The choir members should be the most spiritual, loyal, and thoroughly trained of all the church's musicians.
quotes.author: Kenneth W. Osbeck

quotes.quote: Gospel choirs provide a wonderful opportunity to introduce students to another truly American art form that is an integral part of African American culture.
quotes.author: Barbara A. Brinson

quotes.quote: The ability to read music is not some mysterious talent, nor is it totally dependent upon a great deal of technical musical knowledge. For the most part adequate skill will be acquired unconsciously with experience.
quotes.author: Kenneth W. Osbeck

quotes.quote: All of us have assumed the responsibility of a children's choir hope that through the medium of music the children will grow in Christian character, learn to be reverent, learn to become leaders in the worship services, learn to sing great Christian truths through hymns and anthems.
quotes.author: Jean Ashworth Bartle

quotes.quote: It is best not to rebuild an exiting choir but to dissolve it and start anew.
quotes.author: Lindsay Terry

quotes.quote: All the choir of heaven and furniture of earth in a word, all those bodies which compose the frame of the world, have not any subsistence without a mind.
quotes.author: George Berkeley

quotes.quote: Group singing is cheaper than therapy, healthier than drinking, and certainly more fun than working out. It is the one thing in life where feeling better is pretty much guaranteed.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Preaching to the choir actually arms the choir with arguments and elevates the choir's discourse. There's a reason the right does it and does it well and triumphs.
quotes.author: Dan Savage

quotes.quote: A choir is made up of many voices, including yours and mine. If .one by one all go silent then all that will be left are the soloists. Don't let a loud few determine the nature of the sound. It makes for poor harmony and diminishes the song.
quotes.author: Vera Nazarian

quotes.quote: The choir has become a huge international success. Their concerts are an incredible experience. They use dancers and drummers, and the vocals are profoundly beautiful and uplifting.
quotes.author: Kathy Hotchner

quotes.quote: The family of God is the choir, and God is their audience.
quotes.author: Keith Getty

quotes.quote: The honor choir experience is much different than what you get at school.
quotes.author: Mark Schlerf

quotes.quote: A choir of seedlings arching their necks out of rotted tree stumps, sucking life out of death. I am the forest's conscience, but remember, the forest eats itself and lives forever.
quotes.author: Barbara Kingsolver

quotes.quote: All the choir of heaven and furniture of earth in a word, all those bodies which compose the frame of the world have not any subsistence without a mind.
quotes.author: George Berkeley

quotes.quote: The choir is not disbanded. We will continue to rehearse, and we will continue to honor our contractual obligations because we're paid for every performance.
quotes.author: Walter Turnbull

quotes.quote: Choose a challenge instead of competence.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Choose to be happy, because you always have the choice.
quotes.author: Auliq Ice

quotes.quote: It is easy to give up than to endure. Always choose the latter.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: All is context. Choose yours carefully, where you have a choice.
quotes.author: Mike Young

quotes.quote: Choose to experience peace rather than conflict.
quotes.author: Gerald Jampolsky

quotes.quote: If we choose the wrong road, we choose the wrong destination.
quotes.author: Dallin H. Oaks

quotes.quote: One can choose one's attitude in any given set of circumstances.
quotes.author: Viktor E. Frankl

quotes.quote: Choose what is best, and habit will make it pleasant and easy.
quotes.author: Plutarch

quotes.quote: Words are confessions of your actions. Choose them wisely.
quotes.author: Anum Sattar

quotes.quote: Choose your love, Love your choice.
quotes.author: Thomas S. Monson

quotes.quote: Choose to be pro-active, assertive and self-defining.
quotes.author: Bryant H. McGill

quotes.quote: We have to pick and choose between good and a little bit better.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: Whatever choice you make makes you. Choose wisely.
quotes.author: Roy Bennett

quotes.quote: Choose to be a love-finder rather than a faultfinder.
quotes.author: Gerald Jampolsky

quotes.quote: Choose a career you love and you will never have to go to work.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: Choose your friends carefully. Your enemies will choose you.
quotes.author: Yasser Arafat

quotes.quote: Sometimes you have to choose between a bunch of wrong choices and no right ones. You just have to choose which wrong choices feels the least wrong.
quotes.author: Colleen Hoover

quotes.quote: We can only choose whether we will feel and not what we will feel.
quotes.author: Sam Keen

quotes.quote: You can choose what you do, you cant choose what you like to do.
quotes.author: Gretchen Rubin

quotes.quote: Everything really is beautiful if you choose to see it that way.
quotes.author: Seal

quotes.quote: In times of weakness, choose to put yourself under God's control.
quotes.author: Stormie Omartian

quotes.quote: You can't choose your potential, but you can choose to fulfill it.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Every time you choose to love, you have also just chosen to die.
quotes.author: Richard Rohr

quotes.quote: Purpose is the quality we choose to shape our lives around.
quotes.author: Richard Leider

quotes.quote: God chooses what we go through. We choose how we go through it.
quotes.author: Tiana

quotes.quote: Words can inspire and words can destroy. Choose yours well.
quotes.author: Robin Sharma

quotes.quote: Never choose the easy path. Choose the one that has morals.
quotes.author: Nishan

quotes.quote: If peace is really what you want, then you will choose peace.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: Always choose the hardest way, on it you will not find opponents.
quotes.author: Charles De Gaulle

quotes.quote: Nobody should have to choose between a cold heart and a dead heart.
quotes.author: Nenia Campbell

quotes.quote: Choose positive attitude over a negative attitude.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: When you choose to perceive Love over fear, life begins to flow.
quotes.author: Gabrielle Bernstein

quotes.quote: Choose life, choose to be happy and make somebody smile.
quotes.author: Ray S. Jones

quotes.quote: Life is an Attitude. It's what you Choose to Believe, ALWAYS.
quotes.author: Wayne W. Dyer

quotes.quote: We choose our joys and sorrows long before we experience them.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: If we choose, we can live in a world of comforting illusion.
quotes.author: Noam Chomsky

quotes.quote: The way we choose to see the world creates the world we see.
quotes.author: Barry Neil Kaufman

quotes.quote: Choose people who lift you up.
quotes.author: Michelle Obama

quotes.quote: Create your own fears; choose to fear living an average life.
quotes.author: Ehab Atalla

quotes.quote: Authors do not choose a story to write, the story chooses us.
quotes.author: Richard Denney

quotes.quote: Our greatest freedom is the freedom to choose our attitude.
quotes.author: Viktor E. Frankl

quotes.quote: Choose your friends carefully. They are a reflection of you.
quotes.author: Jim George

quotes.quote: Choose between yesterday and tomorrow.
quotes.author: Skarleth Hdz

quotes.quote: Choose being kind over being right and you'll be right every time.
quotes.author: Richard Carlson

quotes.quote: The girl who chooses to be modest, chooses to be respected.
quotes.author: Howard W. Hunter

quotes.quote: You must choose to live by enouragement rather than by expectations.
quotes.author: Stephen Kendrick

quotes.quote: When you choose a habit, you also choose the end of that habit.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Sometimes you don't choose the material; the material chooses you.
quotes.author: James D. Houston

quotes.quote: Happiness is a choice. Choose to be happy and you will be.
quotes.author: Tia Mowry

quotes.quote: The story you choose to tell isn't always the story you believe.
quotes.author: Nova Ren Suma

quotes.quote: When in doubt, always choose love and gratitude.
quotes.author: Hal Elrod

quotes.quote: In a choice between love and fear, choose love.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: Choose love not in the shallows but in the deep.
quotes.author: Christina Rossetti

quotes.quote: We do not choose love. It claims each man as it will.
quotes.author: Spartacus

quotes.quote: Remember that you don't choose love; love chooses you. All you really can do is accept it for all its mystery when it comes into your life. Feel the way it fills you to overflowing then reach out and give it away.
quotes.author: Kent Nerburn

quotes.quote: Balance is only meaningful when we choose Love as the center of gravity!
quotes.author: Phil 'Philosofree' Cheney

quotes.quote: Choose love and don't ever let fear turn you away from your playful heart.
quotes.author: Jim Carrey

quotes.quote: Choose love and joy as much as you can in each moment and watch your life transform.
quotes.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quotes.quote: The hardest times to choose love become the very times that you can most grow spiritually.
quotes.author: Gary Zukav

quotes.quote: There is abundant testimony that if we choose love rather than self, we gain immeasurably.
quotes.author: Federico Fellini

quotes.quote: Live with an open mind and an open heart. Always choose love over fear and kindness over cruelty.
quotes.author: Laurence Overmire

quotes.quote: You have to choose love. In the most difficult of time to shift the paradigm to that which is love.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: There is no fear when you choose love. The more you choose love, the more love is in your life. It gets easier and easier.
quotes.author: Melissa Etheridge

quotes.quote: The only things that last are love and hate. The only one that matters is love: Choose love. Hate erodes. Love nourishes.
quotes.author: Na'ama Yehuda

quotes.quote: The way we can allow ourselves to do what we need to, no matter what others may say or do, is to choose love and defy fear.
quotes.author: Martha Beck

quotes.quote: If you do not know what you feel, then it is difficult to choose love; it is better to fall. Then you do not have to be responsible for your actions.
quotes.author: Bell Hooks

quotes.quote: If one day you have to choose between the world and love, remember this: If you choose the world you’ll be left without love, but if you choose love, with it you will conquer the world
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Those who choose love – daring to feel to the depths of being, accepting responsibility for their actions, and seeking a purpose in life – will find that the world of significant living will unfold its cleverly concealed presence.
quotes.author: Barbara Marciniak

quotes.quote: All your life, you will be faced with a choice. You can choose love positivity and gratitude that things aren't worse or hate negativity and bitterness that things aren't better ...I choose love positivity and gratitude that things aren't worse.
quotes.author: Johnny Cash

quotes.quote: To choose love and jump in not knowing, with a lot of unknowns, is a brave act.
quotes.author: Mara Brock Akil

quotes.quote: Do not forget duty. But choose love when you can.
quotes.author: Cinda Williams Chima

quotes.quote: If everyone chose love, this world would be magnificent. Always choose love.
quotes.author: Betsy Landin

quotes.quote: All your life, you will be faced with a choice. You can choose love or hate…I choose love.
quotes.author: Johnny Cash

quotes.quote: I believe that every single event in life happens in an opportunity to choose love over fear.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: The people who inspire me most are those who are willing to see the world from a loving perspective. People who perceive obstacles as opportunities and problems as spiritual assignments. People who choose love.
quotes.author: Gabrielle Bernstein

quotes.quote: It matters whether you see yourself as someone who is capable of effecting change or whether you see yourself as someone whose voice does not count. It matters whether you treat yourself with reverence or with carelessness. Every bit of work you do on yourself matters. Every time you choose love, it matters.
quotes.author: Geneen Roth

quotes.quote: The men who have succeeded are men who have chosen one line and stuck to it.
quotes.author: Andrew Carnegie

quotes.quote: Big things are built one brick at a time. Victories are achieved one choice at a time. A life well lived is chosen one day at a time.
quotes.author: Lysa Terkeurst

quotes.quote: God is resplendently reflected in the souls of His chosen ones, and these pure souls, these images of God, like the transparent glass, shine forth like gold in the sun, like diamonds of the purest water, but they shine for God and the angels, not revealing their brightness to men, although at times, by God's ordering, they do shine even for them, by the light of their faith, their virtues, when necessary, similar to a candle put on a candlestick in a room, and lighting the room with all those who are in it.
quotes.author: John of Kronstadt

quotes.quote: The Lord loves all people, but He loves those who seek Him even more. To his chosen ones the Lord gives such great grace that for love they forsake the whole earth, the whole world, and their souls burn with desire that all people might be saved and see the glory of the Lord.
quotes.author: Silouan the Athonite

quotes.quote: On that bright and cloudless morning when the dead in Christ shall rise. And the glory of His resurrection share. When His chosen ones shall gather o their home beyond the skies. And the roll is called up yonder I'll be there.
quotes.author: James Milton Black

quotes.quote: In regard to intellect and true virtue, every nation is on a par with the rest, and God has not in these respects chosen one people rather than another.
quotes.author: Baruch Spinoza

quotes.quote: We have an idea that we Americans are God's chosen people, that God loves us more than any other people, and that we are God's blessed. I tell you that God doesn't love us any more than He does the Russians.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: You have been chosen, and you must therefore use such strength and heart and wits as you have.
quotes.author: J. R. R. Tolkien

quotes.quote: Good books, like good friends, are few and chosen; the more select, the more enjoyable.
quotes.author: Louisa May Alcott

quotes.quote: Yeah, I wasn't chosen to be first. I was just chosen to command that flight. Circumstance put me in that particular role. That wasn't planned by anyone.
quotes.author: Neil Armstrong

quotes.quote: The director respects what they've hired you for and chosen you for: to do the part and respect what you're doing.
quotes.author: Robert De Niro

quotes.quote: God has always worked wonders through his prophets to increase the faith of His chosen people or to correct their disobedience.
quotes.author: Mother Angelica

quotes.quote: Holiness of life is not the privilege of a chosen few - it is the obligation, the call, and the will of God for every Christian.
quotes.author: Mother Angelica

quotes.quote: When you have a fruitful relationship with someone, and you've both chosen to work together, then it can spawn really good things.
quotes.author: Tobias Forge

quotes.quote: I am honored to be chosen for this collaboration; I grew up watching Disney and using Beats headphones. Now I get to represent them both - it's unreal.
quotes.author: Lil Yachty

quotes.quote: I guess when someone tells you something they they usually guard, you feel privileged, not because you know something no-one else knows, but because you feel chosen. You feel like that person wants her life to intersect with yours. I think that's what felt best about it.
quotes.author: Markus Zusak

quotes.quote: It is not love if you are chosen by someone after you became one of the choices for them.
quotes.author: Nitya Prakash

quotes.quote: God is gathering a small number of chosen people who will live at the edge of one time shifting to another time. These are the people who will make history.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: The longest journey is the journey inwards. Of him who has chosen his destiny, Who has started upon his quest for the source of his being.
quotes.author: Dag Hammarskjold

quotes.quote: Happiness is purely a chosen state of being available to all, at all times. I choose to be happy, because I am.
quotes.author: Raphael Zernoff

quotes.quote: I think being nice and being safe is unfair to yourself when you have big dreams as a woman. I think you have to prepare yourself that not everyone in this world has the same personality... The one thing I've chosen to be great at in my life is singing - so why not be proud that I'm great at it?
quotes.author: Jessie J

quotes.quote: I regret those times when I've chosen the dark side. I've wasted enough time not being happy.
quotes.author: Jessica Lange

quotes.quote: In avoiding specific goals he had avoided specific limitations. For the time being the world, life itself, could be his chosen field.
quotes.author: Richard Yates

quotes.quote: Having chosen this foolishness, I was a free being. How could the world ever stop me, how could I betray myself, if I was not afraid?
quotes.author: Annie Dillard

quotes.quote: The human being is single, unique, and unrepeatable, someone thought of and chosen from eternity, someone called and identified by name.
quotes.author: Pope John Paul II

quotes.quote: But I know who I am, and I've chosen the things that are important to me. I think the best decisions I make about what to do in my life come when I'm being true to both of those things
quotes.author: April White

quotes.quote: The one God has chosen unconditionally he keeps invincibly. Being and staying a believer is decisively of sovereign grace.
quotes.author: John Piper

quotes.quote: Life is nothing if not a random motion of coincidences and quirks of chance; it never goes as planned or as foretold; frequently one gains happiness from being obliged to follow an unchosen path or misery from following a chosen one.
quotes.author: Louis de Bernieres

quotes.quote: To be chosen as the Beloved of God is something radically different. Instead of excluding others, it includes others. Instead of rejecting others as less valuable, it accepts others in their own uniqueness. It is not a competitive, but a compassionate choice.
quotes.author: Henri J.M. Nouwen

quotes.quote: For people in thrall to 'mortality', the good life means perpetual striving. For Taoists it means living effortlessly, according to our natures. The freest human being is not one who acts on reasons he has chosen for himself, but one who never has to choose. Rather than agonizing about alternatives he responds effortlessly to situations as they arise. He lives not as he chooses but as he must.
quotes.author: John Gray

quotes.quote: Christ is the clue to all that is.
quotes.author: Lesslie Newbigin

quotes.quote: Christ has not only spoken to us by his life but has also spoken for us by his death.
quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: Christ has made of death a narrow starlit strip between the companionships of yesterday and the reunions of tomorrow.
quotes.author: William Jennings Bryan

quotes.quote: Christ is glorified in you when he is more precious to you than all that life can give or death can take.
quotes.author: John Piper

quotes.quote: Jesus Christ, the condescension of divinity, and the exaltation of humanity.
quotes.author: Phillip Brooks

quotes.quote: Following Christ is a wild adventure full of risk, frustration, excitement, and setbacks. It is not an evening stroll in a planned community along a well-manicured path.
quotes.author: Larry Crabb

quotes.quote: Christ took our hell so that we might take His heaven.
quotes.author: Donald Barnhouse

quotes.quote: Jesus Christ turns life right-side-up, and heaven outside-in.
quotes.author: Carl F. H. Henry

quotes.quote: Christ has no velvet crosses.
quotes.author: Samuel Rutherford

quotes.quote: Without Christ there is no hope.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.quote: Christ, because of who He is, can look death in the face.
quotes.author: Alistair Begg

quotes.quote: If you believe in an unseen Christ, you will believe in the unseen Christlike potential of others.
quotes.author: Anthony Burgess

quotes.quote: If Christ is not divine, every impulse of the Christian world falls to a lower octave, and light and love and hope decline.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: To pretend to trust Christ to save you from sin while you are still determined to continue in it is making a mockery of Christ.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.quote: Jesus Christ accomplished everything that God the Father started at the creation, and that includes total health.
quotes.author: Rod Parsley

quotes.quote: When Christ was born, so was our hope.
quotes.author: Max Lucado

quotes.quote: Jesus Christ was God's revenue officer.
quotes.author: Billy Sunday

quotes.quote: Christ's humanity occasions our divinity.
quotes.author: Scott Cairns

quotes.quote: Jesus Christ is the Father of Fatherless.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Christ is worth all, or he is worth nothing.
quotes.author: George Whitefield

quotes.quote: Christ became one of us to redeem all of us.
quotes.author: Max Lucado

quotes.quote: Christ not only died for all: He died for each.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Christ is the prince of Reformers and Radicals.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Christ is born into the world through each of us.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: Without Christ, not one step; with Him, anywhere!
quotes.author: David Livingstone

quotes.quote: The name of Christ excludes all merit of our own.
quotes.author: John Calvin

quotes.quote: Christ came to take away our sins, not our minds.
quotes.author: William Sloane Coffin

quotes.quote: The Life of Christ determines everything about us.
quotes.author: David Platt

quotes.quote: The life of Christ was a life of humble simplicity, yet how infinitely exalted was his mission. Christ is our example in all things.
quotes.author: Ellen G. White

quotes.quote: He who has Christ has all he needs and needs no more.
quotes.author: Jonathan Edwards

quotes.quote: Christ is never fully valued, until sin is clearly seen. We must know the depth and malignity of our disease, in order to appreciate the great Physician.
quotes.author: J. C. Ryle

quotes.quote: Christ is the master; the Scriptures are only the servant.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: Christ is our temple, in whom by faith all believers meet.
quotes.author: Matthew Henry

quotes.quote: Jesus Christ was an extremist for love, truth and goodness.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: Christ is not valued at all, unless he is valued above all.
quotes.author: Augustine of Hippo

quotes.quote: Jesus Christ is our spring board to promotion and prosperity.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: Christ alone makes possible everything you are as a Christian.
quotes.author: Jim George

quotes.quote: Christ wants us to have a child's heart but a grown-up's head.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Christ's blood is the great sovereign remedy for sin-sick souls.
quotes.author: John Owen

quotes.quote: Christ did not die to give people a career but to save the lost.
quotes.author: Reinhard Bonnke

quotes.quote: Christ died for the truth.
quotes.author: Jim Caviezel

quotes.quote: Christ rises above all things.
quotes.author: A. B. Simpson

quotes.quote: Christ used death to destroy death.
quotes.author: Matt Maher

quotes.quote: Jesus Christ had a sense of destiny.
quotes.author: T. B. Joshua

quotes.quote: Christ moves along the pots and pans.
quotes.author: Teresa of Ávila

quotes.quote: Christ is the Lesson as well as the Teacher.
quotes.author: Darvin Pruitt

quotes.quote: Jesus Christ is the only God who has a date in history.
quotes.author: Dorothy L. Sayers

quotes.quote: Jesus Christ is not just 'my personal Savior'. He is Lord.
quotes.author: John F. MacArthur

quotes.quote: When all you have is God, you have all you need.
quotes.author: Dennis Fisher

quotes.quote:
Our Lord has written the promise of the resurrection,
not in books alone, but in every leaf in spring-time.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote:
God has given us two hands, one to receive with
and the other to give with.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: God sends no one away empty except those who are full of themselves.
quotes.author: Dwight L. Moody

quotes.quote: A dog barks when his master is attacked. I would be a coward if I saw that God's truth is attacked and yet would remain silent.
quotes.author: John Calvin

quotes.quote: The Christian life is a life of paradox's. We must give to receive, realize we are blind to see, become simple to be wise, suffer for gain, and die to live.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Christian life consists of faith and charity.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: If a man cannot be a Christian in the place he is, he cannot be a Christian anywhere.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: We must be global Christians with a global vision because our God is a global God.
quotes.author: John Stott

quotes.quote: The Christian life is not slightly better, but completely different.
quotes.author: Clarence Sexton

quotes.quote: God loves each of us as if there were only one of us.
quotes.author: Augustine

quotes.quote: I believe in Christianity as I believe that the sun has risen. Not only because I see it, but because I see everything by it.
quotes.author: C S Lewis

quotes.quote: I like your Christ, I do not like your Christians. Your Christians are so unlike your Christ.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: What the Christian sees as important, the world looks at with contempt, and what the world considers important, the Christian considers utterly meaningless.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Fiery trials make golden Christians.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.quote: If you are a Christian, you are not a citizen of this world trying to get to heaven; you are a citizen of heaven making your way through this world.
quotes.author: Dr. Vance Havner

quotes.quote: We are more wicked than we ever feared, yet more loved than we ever dream.
quotes.author: Mark Driscoll

quotes.quote: Christianity is not a theory or speculation, but a life; not a philosophy of life, but a living presence.
quotes.author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quotes.quote: What the world requires of the Christians is that they should continue to be Christians.
quotes.author: Samuel Adams

quotes.quote: Let God's promises shine on your problems.
quotes.author: Corrie ten Boom

quotes.quote: No two Christians will ever meet for the last time.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Nothing shall be lost that is done for God or in obedience to Him.
quotes.author: John Owen

quotes.quote: The Christian on his knees sees more than the philosopher on tiptoe.
quotes.author: D.L. Moody

quotes.quote: The measure of a Christian is not in the height of his grasp but in the depth of his love.
quotes.author: Clarence Jordan

quotes.quote: The story of every great Christian achievement is the history of answered prayer.
quotes.author: E. M. Bounds

quotes.quote: Expect great things from God, attempt great things for God.
quotes.author: William Carey

quotes.quote: I had rather be in hell with Christ, than be in heaven without him.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: I have a great need for Christ; I have a great Christ for my need.
quotes.author: Spurgeon

quotes.quote: God is most glorified in us when we are most satisfied in Him.
quotes.author: John Piper

quotes.quote: A Bible that's falling apart usually belongs to someone who isn't.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.quote: When you understand that life is a test, you realize that nothing is insignificant in your life.
quotes.author: Rick Warren

quotes.quote: God proved His love on the Cross. When Christ hung, and bled, and died, it was God saying to the world, 'I love you.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Going to church doesn't make you a Christian any more than going to the garage makes you a car.
quotes.author: Laurence J. Peter

quotes.quote: To be a Christian without prayer is no more possible than to be alive without breathing.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: The purpose of Christianity is not to avoid difficulty, but to produce a character adequate to meet it when it comes. It does not make life easy; rather it tries to make us great enough for life.
quotes.author: James L. Christensen

quotes.quote: A Christian is a keyhole through which other folk see God.
quotes.author: Robert E. Gibson

quotes.quote: God loves us the way we are, but too much to leave us that way.
quotes.author: Leighton Ford

quotes.quote: No Christian can be a pessimist, for Christianity is a system of radical optimism.
quotes.author: R. Inge

quotes.quote: To be like Christ is to be a Christian.
quotes.author: Daniel Webster

quotes.quote: Our greatest strength comes from dependence on our strong God.
quotes.author: Bill Crowder

quotes.quote: Whatever makes men good Christians, makes them good citizens
quotes.author: Daniel Webster

quotes.quote: The Christians who did most for the present world were precisely those who thought most of the next.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: You might as well try to hear without ears or breathe without lungs, as to try to live a Christian life without the Spirit of God in your heart.
quotes.author: Dwight L. Moody

quotes.quote: The greater your knowledge of the goodness and grace of God on your life, the more likely you are to praise Him in the storm.
quotes.author: Matt Chandler

quotes.quote: God never said that the journey would be easy, but He did say that the arrival would be worthwhile.
quotes.author: Max Lucado

quotes.quote: Being a Christian is like being a pumpkin. God lifts you up, takes you in, and washes all the dirt off of you...Then He carves you a new smiling face and puts His light inside you to shine for all the world to see.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: You are the only Bible some unbelievers will ever read.
quotes.author: John Macarthur

quotes.quote: God will meet you where you are in order to take you where He wants you to go.
quotes.author: Tony Evans

quotes.quote: Being a Christian is more than just an instantaneous conversion - it is a daily process whereby you grow to be more and more like Christ.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: A real Christian is the one who can give his pet parrot to the town gossip.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Life is wasted if we do not grasp the glory of the cross, cherish it for the treasure that it is, and cleave to it as the highest price of every pleasure and the deepest comfort in every pain. What was once foolishness to us a crucified God must become our wisdom and our power and our only boast in this world.
quotes.author: John Piper

quotes.quote: Christ literally walked in our shoes and entered into our affliction.
quotes.author: Tim Keller

quotes.quote: The LORD your God is in your midst, a mighty one who will save. He will rejoice over you with gladness. He will quiet you by his love. He will exult over you with loud singing.
quotes.author: Zephaniah 3:17

quotes.quote: Worry does not empty tomorrow of its sorrows, it empties today of its strength.
quotes.author: Corrie ten Boom

quotes.quote: A woman's heart should be so hidden in God that a man has to seek Him just to find her.
quotes.author: Max Lucado

quotes.quote: He said ‘Love...as I have loved you.' We cannot love too much.
quotes.author: Amy Carmichael

quotes.quote: I used to ask God to help me. Then I asked if I might help Him. I ended up by asking God to do His work through me.
quotes.author: Hudson Taylor

quotes.quote: Gather the riches of God’s promises. Nobody can take away from you those texts from the Bible which you have learned by heart.
quotes.author: Corrie ten Boom

quotes.quote: To be a Christian means to forgive the inexcusable, because God has forgiven the inexcusable in you.C.S. Lewis
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: We are all woven together in the great web of humanity, and whatever we can do to benefit and uplift others will reflect in blessing upon ourselves.
quotes.author: Ellen Gould White

quotes.quote: Let all bitterness, and wrath, and anger, and clamor, and evil speaking, be put away from you, with all malice.
quotes.author: Ephesians 4:31

quotes.quote: Be faithful in small things because it is in them that your strength lies.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: Remember who you are. Don't compromise for anyone, for any reason. You are a child of the Almighty God. Live that truth.
quotes.author: Lysa Terkeurst

quotes.quote: Faith does not eliminate questions. But faith knows where to take them.
quotes.author: Elisabeth Elliot

quotes.quote: Whoever is spared personal pain must feel himself called to help in diminishing the pain of others. We must all carry our share of the misery which lies upon the world.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: Always, everywhere God is present, and always He seeks to discover Himself to each one.
quotes.author: A.W.Tozer

quotes.quote: And I am sure of this, that he who began a good work in you will bring it to completion at the day of Jesus Christ.
quotes.author: Philippians 1:6

quotes.quote: God does not give us everything we want, but He does fulfill His promises, leading us along the best and straightest paths to Himself.
quotes.author: Dietrich Bonhoeffer

quotes.quote: God's work done in God's way will never lack God's supplies.
quotes.author: Hudson Taylor

quotes.quote: Good works do not make a good man, but a good man does good works.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: I've learned from experience that the greater part of our happiness or misery depends on our dispositions and not on our circumstances.
quotes.author: Martha Washington

quotes.quote: If you can't fly, then run, If you can't run, then walk, If you can't walk, then crawl, but whatever you do, you have to keep moving forward.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: Our greatest fear should not be of failure but of succeeding at things in life that don't really matter.
quotes.author: Francis Chan

quotes.quote: No one can make you feel inferior without your permission.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Start your child's day with love and encouragement and end the day the same way.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: The hunger for love is much more difficult to remove than the hunger for bread.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: The thief comes only to steal and kill and destroy. I came that they may have life, and have it abundantly.
quotes.author: John 10:10

quotes.quote: The ultimate measure of a man is not where he stands in moments of comfort and convenience, but where he stands at times of challenge and controversy.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: The will of God will not take us where the grace of God cannot sustain us.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: We are all faced with a series of great opportunities brilliantly disguised as impossible situations.
quotes.author: Chuck Swindoll

quotes.quote: This is the day that LORD has made, let us rejoice and be glad in it.
quotes.author: Psalm 118:24

quotes.quote: Bring the fattened calf and kill it. Let's have a feast and celebrate.
quotes.author: Luke 15:23

quotes.quote: May the Lord make your love increase and overflow for each other and for everyone else, just as ours does for you.
quotes.author: 1 Thessalonians 3:12

quotes.quote: Dear friend, I pray that you may enjoy good health and that all may go well with you, even as your soul is getting along well.
quotes.author: 3 John 1:2

quotes.quote: May he grant according to your heart's desire and fulfill all your plans!
quotes.author: Psalm 20:4

quotes.quote: Rejoice in the Lord always. I will say it again. Rejoice!
quotes.author: Philippians 4:4

quotes.quote: God bless you and keep you, God smile on you and gift you, God look you full in the face and make you prosper.
quotes.author: Numbers 6:24-26

quotes.quote: Give thanks in all circumstances, for this is the will of God in Christ Jesus for you.
quotes.author: 1 Thessalonians 5:18

quotes.quote: God, whom I serve with my whole heart in preaching the gospel of his Son, is my witness how constantly I remember you in my prayers at all times and I pray that now at last by God's will the way may be opened for me to come to you.
quotes.author: Romans 1:9-10

quotes.quote: Thanks be to God for his inexpressible gift!
quotes.author: 2 Corinthians 9:15

quotes.quote: On your special day, I pray that God will continue to warm your heart and lift your spirits while granting you peace and serenity on this very special day of yours.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Celebrate life. Celebrate happiness. Celebrate your birthday. Celebrate that God gives all this to you.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: God couldn't be everywhere. So he sent a few of his chosen angels on earth. You are one of them. Happy Birthday.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Once a year we celebrate the gift of life that Lord has given us. Happy Birthday to the brightest star in our life.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: May God grant strength for every challenge, fulfillment in every adventure and blessings all year long. Happy Birthday.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: May Lord bless you abundantly because a sweetheart like you deserves the best! Have a glorious and memorable Birthday!
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: May the Almighty Bless you with many more birthdays to come. May each birthday be better than the previous one. Happy Birthday to you.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: I've read the last page of the Bible. It's all going to turn out all right.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Never lose an opportunity for seeing anything that is beautiful; For beauty is God's handwritingâ€“a wayside sacrament. Welcome it in every fair face, in every fair sky, in every fair flower, And thank God for it as a cup of His blessing.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo

quotes.quote: To pray rightly, you must make God your hope, stay, and all. Right prayer sees nothing substantial or worth being concerned about except God.
quotes.author: John Bunyan

quotes.quote: God has a purpose behind every problem. He uses circumstances to develop our character. In fact, he depends more on circumstances to make us like Jesus than he depends on our reading the Bible.
quotes.author: Rick Warren

quotes.quote: The moment you say and believe that you are a Christian, meaning you believe Jesus Christ is your personal Lord and Savior, it is a commitment.
quotes.author: Ken Black

quotes.quote: Faith is a living and unshakable confidence. a belief in God so assured that a man would die a thousand deaths for its sake.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: Reflect on the goodness of the Lord and His faithfulness you. Remember how he communicates with your spirit â€“ it may be through inspirational music, the chirping of birds, the taste of a succulent fruit, or a touch from a loved one.
quotes.author: Hannah Grace

quotes.quote: Take courage. We walk in the wilderness today and in the Promised Land tomorrow.
quotes.author: Dwight L. Moody

quotes.quote: Don't pray when you feel like it. Have an appointment with the Lord and keep it. A man is powerful on his knees.
quotes.author: Corrie ten Boom

quotes.quote: The fruit of wisdom is Christlikeness, peace, humility and love. And, the root of it is faith in Christ as the manifested wisdom of God.
quotes.author: J. I. Packer

quotes.quote: Stop looking for solutions to problems and start looking for the right path.
quotes.author: Andy Stanley

quotes.quote: God never said that the journey would be easy, but He did say that the arrival would be worthwhile.
quotes.author: Max Lucado

quotes.quote: He who lays up treasures on earth spends his life backing away from his treasures. To him, death is loss. He who lays up treasures in heaven looks forward to eternity; he's moving daily toward his treasures. To him, death is gain.
quotes.author: Randy Alcorn

quotes.quote: Good works do not make a good man, but a good man does good works.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: The Christian life is not a constant high. I have my moments of deep discouragement. I have to go to God in prayer with tears in my eyes, and say, 'O God, forgive me,' or 'Help me.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: For what is seen is temporary, but what is unseen is eternal.
quotes.author: Jeri Smith-Ready

quotes.quote: You must ask God to give you power to fight against the sin of pride which is your greatest enemy - the root of all that is evil, and the failure of all that is good. For God resists the proud.
quotes.author: St. Vincent de Paul

quotes.quote: God does not give us everything we want, but He does fulfill His promises, leading us along the best and straightest paths to Himself.
quotes.author: Dietrich Bonhoeffer

quotes.quote: The greater your knowledge of the goodness and grace of God on your life, the more likely you are to praise Him in the storm.
quotes.author: Matt Chandler

quotes.quote: Jesus tends to his people individually. He personally sees to our needs. We all receive Jesus' touch. We experience his care.
quotes.author: Max Lucado

quotes.quote: Never forget that God is your friend. And like all friends, He longs to hear what's been happening in your life. Good or bad, whether it's been full of sorrow or anger, or even when you're questioning why terrible things have to happen.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: To fall in love with God is the greatest romance; to seek him the greatest adventure; to find him, the greatest human achievement.
quotes.author: Saint Augustine

quotes.quote: Faith and reason are like two wings on which the human spirit rises to the contemplation of truth; and God has placed in the human heart a desire to know the truth- in a word, to know himself- so that, by knowing and loving God, men and women may also come to the fullness of truth about themselves.
quotes.author: Pope John Paul II

quotes.quote: Remember who you are. Don't compromise for anyone, for any reason. You are a child of the Almighty God. Live that truth.
quotes.author: Lysa Terkeurst

quotes.quote: God restores everything. When I submit the broken pieces of my life to Him, He restores me to a beauty far more than what I prayed for.
quotes.author: James Jason

quotes.quote: Missions is God finding those whose hearts are right with Him and placing them where they can make a difference for His kingdom.
quotes.author: Henry Blackaby

quotes.quote: If you can see it, you can achieve it. God helps those who helps themselves. Power is in the act of humility.
quotes.author: Patricia Amis

quotes.quote: Patience is a form of faith. It says, "I trust God. I believe that God is bigger than this problem.
quotes.author: Rick Warren

quotes.quote: If you're a Christian you can't have an "I'm better than" attitude toward anyone because everybody is somebody for whom Jesus died.
quotes.author: Andy Stanley

quotes.quote: God has not changed; and His ear is just as quick to hear the voice of real prayer, and His hand is just as long and strong to save; as it ever was.
quotes.author: R.A. Torrey

quotes.quote: Once we recognize our need for Jesus, then the building of our faith begins. It is a daily, moment-by-moment life of absolute dependence upon Him for everything.
quotes.author: Catherine Marshall

quotes.quote: Faith is a reality and it reaches out to facts that are more solid, more real, more substantial, and more eternal than anything registered by our physical senses.
quotes.author: John Phillips

quotes.quote: Ask for forgiveness from the person, if they are available, and ask forgiveness from God, who is always available. Then forgive yourself!
quotes.author: Joe Allen and David Donaldson

quotes.quote: Faith is a powerful force, and it speaks the language of the spirit. When you are possessed with the spirit of faith it changes the way you see things, and how you speak about them.
quotes.author: David Odunaiya

quotes.quote: Never be afraid to trust an unknown future to a known God.
quotes.author: Corrie ten Boom

quotes.quote: We may speak about a place where there are no tears, no death, no fear, no night; but those are just the benefits of heaven. The beauty of heaven is seeing God.
quotes.author: Max Lucado

quotes.quote: If God called us to a task, He will then qualify us for the job.
quotes.author: Jack Hyles

quotes.quote: Faith is taking the first step even when you don't see the whole staircase.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: Forgiveness brings us closer to those who have hurt us and helps them to experience the forgiveness and love of Jesus through us who forgives them.
quotes.author: Omoakhuana Anthonia

quotes.quote: Remember as you go about your day that you may be the only Jesus some of your friends, neighbors, and family will ever see.
quotes.author: Wanda E. Brunstette

quotes.quote: God's purposes and plans will not fail. Before you spend all your prayer time telling Him about yours, ask about His.
quotes.author: Louie Giglio

quotes.quote: God not only sees where you are, He sees where you can be.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.quote: Your potential is the sum of all the possibilities God has for your life.
quotes.author: Charles Stanley

quotes.quote: Faith is not an assurance that everything is going to be okay; it is the assurance that God is in control.
quotes.author: Heather Zempel

quotes.quote: When we lose one blessing, another is often most unexpectedly given in its place.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: The glory of Christianity is to conquer by forgiveness.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: If you believe in a God who controls the big things, you have to believe in a God who controls the little things. It is we, of course, to whom things look 'little' or 'big'.
quotes.author: Elisabeth Elliot

quotes.quote: Walking by faith will cause all of us to recognize that as children of God we are just pilgrims and strangers down here on this earth.
quotes.author: J. Vernon McGee

quotes.quote: Either we will spend our lives trying to take care of ourselves or we will let go and let God take care of us as we put our faith and trust in Him.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyers

quotes.quote: Give me the love that leads the way the faith that nothing can dismay the hope no disappointments tire the passion that'll burn like fire let me not sink to be a clod make me thy fuel, Flame of God.
quotes.author: Amy Carmichael

quotes.quote: Show me your hands. Do they have scars from giving? Show me your feet. Are they wounded in service? Show me your heart. Have you left a place for divine love?
quotes.author: Fulton Sheen

quotes.quote: When the Gospel of Jesus Christ is presented with authority—quoting from the very Word of God—He takes that message and drives it supernaturally into the human heart.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: A commitment to living with God requires learning in order to make right decisions.
quotes.author: Robert H. Ashby

quotes.quote: A Godly life is always the best advertisement for Christianity.
quotes.author: Geoffrey B. Wilson

quotes.quote: A rib... loaves and fish... some spit... God can do a lot with a little.
quotes.author: Mark Hart

quotes.quote: A woman's heart should be so hidden in God that a man has to seek Him just to find her.
quotes.author: Max Lucado

quotes.quote: Aim at heaven and you will get earth thrown in. Aim at earth and you get neither.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: All attempts, then, for mortification of any lust, without an interest in Christ, are vain.
quotes.author: John Owen

quotes.quote: All the way to Heaven is Heaven, because He is the way.
quotes.author: Saint Catherine of Siena

quotes.quote: Always, everywhere God is present, and always He seeks to discover Himself to each one.
quotes.author: A. W. Tozer

quotes.quote: And it's as He reveals Himself to you that you discover sincere contentment, the reason for your existence, and hope for your future.
quotes.author: Charles Stanley

quotes.quote: And my life is only stress free because I know that I have a God who loves me more than anything and that one day I will spend eternity with Him.
quotes.author: Whitney Sparks

quotes.quote: Anything big enough to occupy our minds is big enough to hang a prayer on.
quotes.author: George Macdonald

quotes.quote: Apart from the cross, there is no other ladder by which we may get to heaven.
quotes.author: St. Rose of Lima

quotes.quote: As a huge dam converts the power of a mighty river to create electricity and put it to work, so you can convert the golden river of God's goodness into spiritual electricity to help light the world.
quotes.author: Wilfred A. Peterson

quotes.quote: But the key to understanding the role of faith is this: faith is the only mechanism that gives us the peace and joy in our heart and the closeness to our loving God.
quotes.author: Tom Fay

quotes.quote: Christianity is not a philosophy or a religion or a kind of spirituality. It is a person, and that person crawled up onto the cross for you.
quotes.author: Dave Sloan

quotes.quote: There is a book, who runs may read, / Which heavenly truth imparts; / And all the love its scholars need, / Pure eyes and Christian hearts.
quotes.author: John Keble

quotes.quote: As we go to the cradle only in order to find the baby, so we go to the Scriptures only to find Christ.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: The Christian with social concern must champion all those who need champions, not just those whose championing is currently popular.
quotes.author: Os Guinness

quotes.quote: God cares, God is concerned. And since God is concerned his people have an obligation to be concerned too.
quotes.author: Foy Valentine

quotes.quote: If a man cannot be a Christian where he is, he cannot be a Christian anywhere.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: To be a Christian is a great thing, not merely to seem one. And somehow or other those please the world most who please Christ least.
quotes.author: St. Jerome

quotes.quote: It would scarcely be necessary to expound doctrine if our lives were radiant enough. If we behaved like true Christians, there would be no pagans.
quotes.author: John XXIII

quotes.quote: Christianity can be condensed into four words: admit, submit, commit and transmit.
quotes.author: Samuel Wilberforce

quotes.quote: There is no more profound or more dangerous enemy to Christianity than anything which shrinks it and makes it narrow.
quotes.author: Abbé Henri Huvelin

quotes.quote: To hold on to the plow while wiping our tears—this is Christianity.
quotes.author: Watchman Nee

quotes.quote: Christianity is not a collection of truths to be believed, of laws to be obeyed. Christianity is a person, one who loved us so much, one who calls for our love. Christianity is Christ.
quotes.author: Oscar Romero

quotes.quote: The most deeply felt obligation on earth is that which the Christian feels to imitate the Redeemer.
quotes.author: Albert Barnes

quotes.quote: If Christ lives in us, controlling our personalities, we will leave glorious marks on the lives we touch. Not because of our lovely characters, but because of his.
quotes.author: Eugenia Price

quotes.quote: You and I were created to tell the truth about God by reflecting his likeness. That is normality. How many lies have you told about God today?
quotes.author: Ian Thomas

quotes.quote: Nobody ever outgrows scripture; the book widens and deepens with our years.
quotes.author: Charles H. Spurgeon

quotes.quote: In lifting the Lord will lift you, in the promotion the Lord will promote you, but the day you lift yourself up, that's the way your journey down will start.
quotes.author: Pastor Ezekiel Ojo

quotes.quote: The more you love the Scriptures, the firmer will be your faith. There is little backsliding when people love the Scriptures.
quotes.author: D. L. Moody

quotes.quote: You cannot be in the presence of God and be bored at the same time.
quotes.author: Mark Batterson

quotes.quote: Though afflicted, tempest-tossed, / Comfortless awhile thou art, / Do not think thou canst be lost— / Thou art graven on my heart. / All thy wastes I will repair, / Thou shalt be rebuilt anew; / And in thee it shall appear / What a God of love can do.
quotes.author: John Newton

quotes.quote: Everyone would like to behave like a pagan, with everyone else behaving like a Christian.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: Jesus did not go around "being good"; He went around "doing good" and releasing all who were oppressed. What has He anointed you to do?
quotes.author: Lisa Bevere

quotes.quote: Drop the last year into the silent limbo of the past. Let it go, for it was imperfect, and thank God that it can go.
quotes.author: Brooks Atkinson

quotes.quote: Do you know why it's hard for a rich man to go to Heaven? Because in his mind he's already there!
quotes.author: Eshon Burgundy

quotes.quote: There is no one who is insignificant in the purpose of God.
quotes.author: Alistair Begg

quotes.quote: We never grow closer to God when we just live life. It takes deliberate pursuit and attentiveness.
quotes.author: Francis Chan

quotes.quote: God loves each of us as if there were only one of us.
quotes.author: Saint Augustine

quotes.quote: Life is wasted if we do not grasp the glory of the cross, cherish it for the treasure that it is, and cleave to it as the highest price of every pleasure and the deepest comfort in every pain. What was once foolishness to us—a crucified God—must become our wisdom and our power and our only boast in this world.
quotes.author: John Piper

quotes.quote: This is our time on the history line of God. This is it. What will we do with the one deep exhale of God on this earth? For we are but a vapor and we have to make it count. We’re on. Direct us, Lord, and get us on our feet.
quotes.author: Beth Moore

quotes.quote: When I have learned to love God better than my earthly dearest, I shall love my earthly dearest better than I do now.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: What therefore God hath joined together, let not man put asunder.
quotes.author: Myrtle Fillmore

quotes.quote: Have a good and godly marriage that shows the world Christ's love through how you sacrificially love and serve one another.
quotes.author: John Stange

quotes.quote: Marriage is such a beautiful relationship and a gift from God. It's God's design, created between a man and a woman.
quotes.author: Whitney Meade

quotes.quote: Only when marriage and family exist for God's glory and not to serve as replacement idols are we able to truly love and be loved. Remember, neither your child nor your husband (or wife) should be who you worship, but instead who you worship with.
quotes.author: Mark Driscoll

quotes.quote: Christian marriage is that sacrament which builds up the community of the Church and of society. Marriage has been inscribed in creation's design by God, and, by his grace, countless Christian men and women have lived married life fully.
quotes.author: Pope Francis

quotes.quote: No matter how many rules we make for ourselves, rules don't create godly relationships. Only leaning on our faithful Father and longing to please Him with everything we do will set the stage for a beautiful romance!
quotes.author: Eric Ludy

quotes.quote: God has set the type of marriage everywhere throughout the creation. Every creature seeks its perfection in another. The very heavens and earth picture it to us.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: Let the wife make the husband glad to come home, and let him make her sorry to see him leave.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: A good marriage is the union of two good forgivers.
quotes.author: Ruth Bell Graham

quotes.quote: Christians need to identify the thief of their peace, joy and fulfillment, in life and especially in their most important relationship, marriage.
quotes.author: Tonia Woolever
