quotes.quote: Christian marriage is marked by discipline and self-denial. Christianity does not therefore depreciate marriage, it sanctifies it.
quotes.author: Dietrich Bonhoeffer

quotes.quote: As God by creation made two of one, so again by marriage He made one of two.
quotes.author: Thomas Adams

quotes.quote: There is no greater happiness for a man than approaching a door at the end of a day knowing someone on the other side of that door is waiting for the sound of his footsteps.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: Unfaithfulness in marriage is indicative of unfaithful hearts toward God.
quotes.author: Adam Copenhaver

quotes.quote: In Christian marriage, love is not an option. It is a duty.
quotes.author: R. C. Sproul

quotes.quote: Oh I know it well, love is patient, love is kind. It does not envy, it does not boast, it is not proud.
quotes.author: Hillary Clinton

quotes.quote: God, the best maker of all marriages, Combine your hearts into one.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: To make a marriage work, the big three are: Change. Forgiveness. Surrendering to God and being filled with the Holy Spirit.
quotes.author: Richard Massafra

quotes.quote: The best love is the kind that awakens the soul and makes us reach for more, that plants a fire in our hearts and brings peace to our minds.
quotes.author: Noah Calhoun

quotes.quote: Fix your eyes on Jesus and the plans he has for your life. Look ahead, and run after him with all your heart. Then look around. Whoever has kept up with you, marry that person.
quotes.author: Debra Fileta

quotes.quote: Scripture says, in all labor there is profit and nowhere is this more true than in the marriage relationship.
quotes.author: Wayne A. Mack

quotes.quote: There is no more lovely, friendly and charming relationship, communion or company than a good marriage.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: I want my life and my marriage to look less like the world and more like Christ.
quotes.author: Marquis Clarke

quotes.quote: God created marriage. No government subcommittee envisioned it. No social organization developed it. Marriage was conceived and born in the mind of God.
quotes.author: Max Lucado

quotes.quote: A good marriage isn't something you find; it's something you make.
quotes.author: Gary L. Thomas

quotes.quote: Every happily married person I interviewed on my trip was grateful for his or her spouse, thanking God daily for one another.
quotes.author: Fawn Weaver

quotes.quote: If you are married, I encourage you to pray for your marriage.
quotes.author: Sharon Jaynes

quotes.quote: More marriages might survive if the partners realized that sometimes the better comes after the worse.
quotes.author: Doug Larson

quotes.quote: Healthy people will marry healthy people because you will always end up with the person whom you believe you deserve.
quotes.author: Debra Fileta

quotes.quote: If say 90% of Christian marriages were intact, people would be writing about it.
quotes.author: Randy Carlson

quotes.quote: They slipped briskly into an intimacy from which they never recovered.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: Couples often live out years of falsehood trying to protect and save a relationship, all the while destroying any chance of real relationship.
quotes.author: Henry Cloud

quotes.quote: Many marriages would be better if the husband and the wife clearly understood that they are on the same side.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: The individuals who take the oath of marriage are joined by God into an indissoluble union.
quotes.author: Cleveland McDonald

quotes.quote: When a Christian marriage does fail, it is usually because one or both partners are so backslidden they do not respond to the Holy Spirit's workings.
quotes.author: Cleveland McDonald

quotes.quote: Christian marriage, when rightly perceived, offers the greatest potential for growth and fulfillment. A husband who loves his wife as Christ loved the church will encourage that wife to become all that the will of God desires for her.
quotes.author: Cleveland McDonald

quotes.quote: Both partners may be religious and attend church regularly and theirs may be called a Christian marriage, but it cannot be that in reality if they are not born again.
quotes.author: Cleveland McDonald

quotes.quote: Always life demands that sense be made of the questions; marriage demands that the spouses make sense of them together; Christian marriage demands that they make sense of them in the light of their shared Christian faith.
quotes.author: Michael G. Lawler

quotes.quote: Young people need to realize there are no perfect prospective mates but if they will attempt to choose a compatible mate carefully, in the will of God, then work to make the many adjustments and compromises that are needed, they can have a successful Christian marriage with God's help and blessing.
quotes.author: Cleveland McDonald

quotes.quote: In Christian marriage, even more than in any other marriage, the answer to the age old question of when are two people marries is simple: a lifetime after they exchange consent.
quotes.author: Michael G. Lawler

quotes.quote: Christian marriage is adequately described only when it is positioned as participating actively in the process of God loving humanity.
quotes.author: David Michael Thomas

quotes.quote: All things considered, the most important part of Christian marriage is its spiritual dimension which, while often overlooked, has a long-standing tradition in Christian thought.
quotes.author: David Michael Thomas

quotes.quote: For this reason, a man shall leave his father and mother and be joined to his wife and the two shall become one flesh. So they are no longer two, but one flesh. therefore what God has joined together, let no one separate.
quotes.author: Matthew 19:5-6

quotes.quote: Successful marriage is always a triangle, a man, a woman ,and God.
quotes.author: Cecil Myers

quotes.quote: Church teachers were practically unanimous in teaching that the ministers of the sacrament are the contracting parties themselves, the nuptial blessing being an accessory.
quotes.author: G.H. Joyce

quotes.quote: Holy men and women have used many mutual caresses in their marriage, truly loving but chaste caresses, tender but sincere.
quotes.author: Francois de Sales

quotes.quote: The voice that breathed o'er Eden, / That earliest wedding-day. / The primal marriage blessing, / It hath not passed away.
quotes.author: John Keble

quotes.quote: Like everything which is not the involuntary result of fleeting emotion but the creation of time and will, any marriage, happy or unhappy, is infinitely more interesting than any romance, however passionate.
quotes.author: W.H. Auden

quotes.quote: Any mature, spiritually sensitive view of marriage must be built on the foundation of mature love rather than romanticism.
quotes.author: Gary Thomas

quotes.quote: He ordained marriage, and turning to him is the only way you can be sure that your marriage will succeed.
quotes.author: Aaron Jacob

quotes.quote: The state of marriage is one that requires more virtue and constancy than any other.
quotes.author: Francis de Sales

quotes.quote: It is a perpetual exercise of mortification...In spite of the bitter nature of its juice, you may be able to draw and make the honey of the holy life.
quotes.author: Francis de Sales

quotes.quote: For as a young man marries a young woman, so shall your sons marry you, and as the bridegroom rejoices over the bride, so shall your God rejoice over you.
quotes.author: Isaiah 62:5

quotes.quote: Marriage is a total commitment and a total sharing of the total person with another person until death.
quotes.author: Wayne Mack

quotes.quote: Marriage is about putting away selfishness and taking on the concept of teamwork.
quotes.author: Jim George

quotes.quote: Men, you'll never be a good groom to your wife unless you're first a good bride to Jesus.
quotes.author: Tim Keller

quotes.quote: In sharp contrast with our culture, the Bible teaches that the essence of marriage is a sacrificial commitment to the good of the other. That means that love is more fundamentally action than emotion.
quotes.author: Tim Keller

quotes.quote: Many conflicts in a marriage result from living to please self instead of living to please the Lord. These conflicts can be resolved and are actually opportunities for spiritual growth when dealt with in a biblical manner.
quotes.author: John C. Broger

quotes.quote: When a man and a woman give themselves to each other in an act of marital love, they can know the love of Christ as no one else can know it.
quotes.author: J. Vernon McGee

quotes.quote: The Christian is not one who has gone all the way with Christ. None of us has. The Christian is one who has found the right road.
quotes.author: Charles L. Allen

quotes.quote: Christianity is the companion of liberty in all its conflicts, the cradle of its infancy, and the divine source of its claims.
quotes.author: Alexis de Tocqueville

quotes.quote: Christianity is not a theory or speculation, but a life; not a philosophy of life, but a life and a living process.
quotes.author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quotes.quote: The measure of a Christian is not in the height of his grasp but in the depth of his love
quotes.author: Clarence Jordan

quotes.quote: No egoism is so insufferable as the Christian with regard to his soul.
quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: The glory of Christianity is to conquer by forgiveness.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: The Christian life has been nothing more and nothing less than a daily dependence on and a rediscovery of God's grace.
quotes.author: Tullian Tchividjian

quotes.quote: Christianity, with its doctrine of humility, of forgiveness, of love, is incompatible with the state, with its haughtiness, its violence, its punishment and its wars.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: Christianity is the oxygen of the moral world.
quotes.author: Eliza Cook

quotes.quote: Christians ought not to slander God by looking as if they were at an everlasting funeral.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: Christianity provides a unified answer for the whole of life.
quotes.author: Francis Schaeffer

quotes.quote: Christianity has made of death a terror which was unknown to the gay calmness of the Pagan.
quotes.author: Ouida

quotes.quote: Christianity has not been tried and found wanting; it has been found difficult and not tried.
quotes.author: K Chesterton

quotes.quote: Christianity has enriched the erotic meal with the appetizer of curiosity and spoiled it with the dessert of remorse.
quotes.author: Karl Kraus

quotes.quote: The Christianity which is shared is the Christianity which is convincing.
quotes.author: Lynn Harold Hough

quotes.quote: All Christian language about the future is a set of signposts pointing into a mist.
quotes.author: N.T. Wright

quotes.quote: One can be a full-fledged Christian and at the same time, enjoy the reality of a universal spiritual truth.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Lesser

quotes.quote: A Christian should use these arts to the glory of God, not just as tracts, mind you, but as things of beauty to the praise of God. An art work can be a doxology in itself.
quotes.author: Francis A. Schaeffer

quotes.quote: The true strength of the Christian is the power of truth and love, which leads to the renunciation of all violence. Faith and violence are incompatible.
quotes.author: Pope Francis

quotes.quote: Christianity has no ceremonial. It has forms, for forms are essential to order; but it disdains the folly of attempting to reinforce the religion of the heart by the antics of the mind.
quotes.author: George Croly

quotes.quote: The Christian in the one whose imagination should fly beyond the stars.
quotes.author: Francis A. Schaeffer

quotes.quote: A Christian man is a man who is within himself, who puts out good vibes.
quotes.author: Ozzy Osbourne

quotes.quote: When our words are connected with the mind of Christ, they are powerful and life changing.
quotes.author: Vicki Edwards

quotes.quote: The truth is the real Christian experience is truly about repenting every day because there is no Christian that doesn't sin.
quotes.author: Stephen Baldwin

quotes.quote: Christianity is the root of all democracy, the highest fact in the rights of men.
quotes.author: Novalis

quotes.quote: Christianity is a lifestyle. And being a Christian is more than a label.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.quote: The paradox in Christian truth is invariably due to the fact that it is the truth that exists for God. The standard of measure and the end is superhuman; and there is only one relationship possible: faith.
quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: Christianity is either relevant all the time or useless anytime. It is not just a phase of life; it is life itself.
quotes.author: Richard Halverson

quotes.quote: The trouble with some of us is that we have been inoculated with small doses of Christianity which keep us from catching the real thing.
quotes.author: Leslie Weatherhead

quotes.quote: Christianity takes for granted the absence of any self-help and offers a power which is nothing less than the power of God.
quotes.author: A. W. Tozer

quotes.quote: Christianity, if false, is of no importance, and if true, of infinite importance. The only thing it cannot be is moderately important.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: In Christianity neither morality nor religion come into contact with reality at any point.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Christianity is simply the ideal form of manhood represented to us by Jesus Christ.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: Christianity preaches the infinite worth of that which is seemingly worthless and the infinite worthlessness of that which is seemingly so valued.
quotes.author: Dietrich Bonhoeffer

quotes.quote: Christianity might be a good thing if anyone ever tried it.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: If a man cannot be a Christian in the place where he is, he cannot be a Christian anywhere.
quotes.author: Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: Christianity is the opposite: it's about grace; it says God loves you simply because you're his child.
quotes.author: Vince Antonucci

quotes.quote: Christianity is the highest perfection of humanity.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Christianity is one beggar telling another beggar where he found bread.
quotes.author: D.T. Niles

quotes.quote: A spiritual Christian therefore is one whose spirit is led by God's Spirit. Perhaps their speech does convey truth, but without the quickening of the Holy Spirit even truth is of small advantage.
quotes.author: Watchman Nee

quotes.quote: Spreading Christianity abroad is sometimes an excuse for not having it at home.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: To be a Christian means to forgive the inexcusable because God has forgiven the inexcusable in you.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Christianity makes suffering contagious.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: The Christian faith is a grand cathedral with divinely pictured windows.
quotes.author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quotes.quote: The Christian ideal has not been tried and found wanting. It has been found difficult; and left untried.
quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: How natural that the errors of the ancient should be handed down and, mixing with the principles and system which Christ taught, give to us an adulterated Christianity.
quotes.author: Olympia Brown

quotes.quote: Christianity's goal is not escape from this world. It loves this world and seeks to change it for the better.
quotes.author: Marcus J. Borg

quotes.quote: A Christian is a man who feels repentance on Sunday for what he did on Saturday and is going to do on Monday.
quotes.author: Thomas Ybarra

quotes.quote: Christianity is art and not money. Money is its curse.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: A Christianity which will not help those who are struggling from the bottom to the top of society, needs another Christ to die for it.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: Christmas is not as much about opening our presents as opening our hearts.
quotes.author: Janice Maeditere

quotes.quote: Christmas is not a time or a season but a state of mind. To cherish peace and good will, to be plenteous in mercy, is to have the real spirit of Christmas.
quotes.author: Calvin Coolidge

quotes.quote: Christmas gift suggestions: to your enemy, forgiveness. To an opponent, tolerance. To a friend, your heart. To a customer, service. To all, charity. To every child, a good example. To yourself, respect.
quotes.author: Oren Arnold

quotes.quote: Are you willing to believe that love is the strongest thing in the world stronger than hate, stronger than evil, stronger than death and that the blessed life which began in Bethlehem nineteen hundred years ago is the image and brightness of the Eternal Love? Then you can keep Christmas.
quotes.author: Henry Van Dyke

quotes.quote: Christmas, my child, is love in action. Every time we love, every time we give, it's Christmas.
quotes.author: Dale Evans

quotes.quote: It is Christmas every time you let God love others through you...yes, it is Christmas every time you smile at your brother and offer him your hand.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: The very purpose of Christ's coming into the world was that He might offer up His life as a sacrifice for the sins of men. He came to die. This is the heart of Christmas.
quotes.author: Rev. Billy Graham

quotes.quote: At Christmas, all roads lead home.
quotes.author: Marjorie Holmes

quotes.quote: Best of all, Christmas means a spirit of love, a time when the love of God and the love of our fellow men should prevail over all hatred and bitterness, a time when our thoughts and deeds and the spirit of our lives manifest the presence of God.
quotes.author: George F McDougall

quotes.quote: Christmas is a bridge. We need bridges as the river of time flows past. Today's Christmas should mean creating happy hours for tomorrow and reliving those of yesterday.
quotes.author: Gladys Tabor

quotes.quote: Christmas is forever, not for just one day,for loving, sharing, giving, are not to put awaylike bells and lights and tinsel, in some box upon a shelf.The good you do for others is good you do yourself.
quotes.author: Norman W Brooks

quotes.quote: I wish we could put up some of the Christmas spirit in jars and open a jar of it every month.
quotes.author: Harlan Miller

quotes.quote: A lovely thing about Christmas is that it's compulsory, like a thunderstorm, and we all go through it together.
quotes.author: Garrison Keillor

quotes.quote: My idea of Christmas, whether old-fashioned or modern, is very simple: loving others. Come to think of it, why do we have to wait for Christmas to do that?
quotes.author: Bob Hope

quotes.quote: Christmas is a necessity. There has to be at least one day of the year to remind us that we're here for something else besides ourselves.
quotes.author: Eric Sevareid

quotes.quote: At its best, Christmas is a mirror in which we see reflected the very best life can be. Where we see ourselves moved by generosity, inspired by hope, and uplifted by love, not only for ourselves but for the whole evolving universe.
quotes.author: Bruce Sanguin

quotes.quote: Christmas day is a day of joy and charity. May God make you very rich in both.
quotes.author: Phillips Brooks

quotes.quote: Christmas is a spirit that flows from one heart to another. It is more precious than rubies and better than gold.
quotes.author: Agnes M. Pharo

quotes.quote: Christmas is a time to expand our giving encompassing the friendless and needy ... near and far. Christmas is sharing.
quotes.author: Patricia Clafford

quotes.quote: The Christmas spirit--love--changes hearts and lives.
quotes.author: Pat Boone

quotes.quote: Christmas is doing a little something extra for someone.
quotes.author: Charles Schulz

quotes.quote: Christmas! The very word brings joy to our hearts. No matter how we may dread the rush, the long Christmas lists for gifts and cards to be bought and given - -when Christmas Day comes there is still the same warm feeling we had as children, the same warmth that enfolds our hearts and our homes.
quotes.author: Joan Winmill Brown

quotes.quote: It is Christmas in the heart that puts Christmas in the air.
quotes.author: W. T. Ellis

quotes.quote: Love came down at Christmas, Love all lovely, Love Divine; Love was born at Christmas; Star and angels gave the sign.
quotes.author: Christina Rossetti

quotes.quote: When we were children we were grateful to those who filled our stockings at Christmas time. Why are we not grateful to God for filling our stockings with legs?
quotes.author: Gilbert Keith Chesterton

quotes.quote: Christmas - that magic blanket that wraps itself about us, that something so intangible that it is like a fragrance. It may weave a spell of nostalgia. Christmas may be a day of feasting, or of prayer, but always it will be a day of remembrance ? a day in which we think of everything we have ever loved.
quotes.author: Augusta E. Rundel

quotes.quote: Christmas in Bethlehem. The ancient dream: a cold, clear night made brilliant by a glorious star, the smell of incense, shepherds and wise men falling to their knees in adoration of the sweet baby, the incarnation of perfect love.
quotes.author: Lucinda Franks

quotes.quote: Christmas is not just a time for festivity and merry making. It is more than that. It is a time for the contemplation of eternal things. The Christmas spirit is a spirit of giving and forgiving.
quotes.author: J. C. Penney

quotes.quote: For centuries men have kept an appointment with Christmas. Christmas means fellowship, feasting, giving and receiving, a time of good cheer, home.
quotes.author: W. J. Tucker

quotes.quote: It is the personal thoughtfulness, the warm human awareness, the reaching out of the self to one's fellow man that makes giving worthy of the Christmas spirit.
quotes.author: Isabel Currier

quotes.quote: Love is what's in the room with you at Christmas if you stop opening presents and listen.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Christmas can be the best of time of the worst of times. Christmas is what we make of it. We can celebrate Christmas better than we do. If we call ourselves Christians, we must. The challenge of Christmas is the challenge of life itself. We need to embrace it fully and glorify God in and through it.
quotes.author: James A. Hopwood

quotes.quote: Christmas is my favorite season of the year. I love the carols, and the decorations, and the sense of expectancy, and the infectious spirit of love and goodwill that seems to touch even the grouchiest of souls.
quotes.author: James A. Hopwood

quotes.quote: Many of the things that make Christmas joyous for most of us have nothing to do with celebrating the birth of Jesus. Yet Christmas without these things would not be the Christmas that we know and cherish.
quotes.author: James A. Hopwood

quotes.quote: Everyone wants a joyous Christmas, but people disagree on what makes Christmas joyful. If you want a joyful Christmas, you have to invent it for yourself and fend off those who want to impose their political agendas on you.
quotes.author: James A. Hopwood

quotes.quote: Nobody is going to hand you a simpler Christmas. If you want a more meaningful holiday, you have to make it yourself.
quotes.author: James A. Hopwood

quotes.quote: The very name of Christmas suggests, somehow, a special mystical feeling. This festive holiday has been celebrated from the earliest time of recorded history. Of course, the reason for this festive season is to commemorate the birth of Jesus Christ.
quotes.author: Ban Breathnoch

quotes.quote: Christmas is the most culturally pervasive and successful feast of all time. Christian feast of the birth of Jesus--but also in ancient, pre-Christian, pagan tradition.
quotes.author: Christian Rätsch

quotes.quote: Christmas has a magic that is difficult to grasp and even more difficult to explain. The Christmas feast might be the most successful example of a mass ritual that has overstepped every international, ethnic, religious, cultural, and political border. It is popular with people all over the world.
quotes.author: Christian Rätsch

quotes.quote: Each culture interpreted, incorporated, and applied the elements of Christmas in its own way into its own rituals and celebrations. It brings together traditions, ideas, and customs from all over the world and from all times.
quotes.author: Christian Rätsch

quotes.quote: Christmas is no mere traditional folk ritual. It expresses itself as a constantly developing collage of diverse elements, all of which have their own history and legends.
quotes.author: Christian Rätsch

quotes.quote: Whether you are interested in the true background of Christmas or not, the way in which it is celebrated today clearly takes meaning from the larger concept of a 'feast of love' celebrated not only by the early Christians, but also by the pagan ancients.
quotes.author: Christian Rätsch

quotes.quote: Christmas is the season for giving. I always enjoy sharing the gift of music with friends, family, students and their parents during this special time.
quotes.author: Dennis Alexander

quotes.quote: A colorfully decorated, fragrant tree, lit with strings of twinkling lights--the most important and enduring symbol of Christmas, the major annual festival in the Christian world.
quotes.author: Bernd Brunner

quotes.quote: The search for the first Christmas tree is a quixotic quest. Trees have always been part of human life, both practically and symbolically.
quotes.author: Bernd Brunner

quotes.quote: Christmas was considered a magical time in which the normal rules of everyday life--indeed, even the rules of nature--were suspended.
quotes.author: Bernd Brunner

quotes.quote: Christmas and New Year were both times of transition; they were full of joyful uncertainty and hope for the fertility of the people, the animals, and the fields. The tree had an established place in the life of the community--the girls of the village encircled it, singing and dancing around it.
quotes.author: Julie Salamon

quotes.quote: Christmas tree was something quite exotic. It nourished their desire for a piece of nature, for an open landscape where the wind blew and the air was sweet.
quotes.author: Julie Salamon

quotes.quote: Christmas trees are usually drawn from the timber stands in the local region. More often than not this means either fir or spruce trees.
quotes.author: Julie Salamon

quotes.quote: The Christmas tree --with its forest fragrance and freshness--has come to represent the Yule season. It is the mainstay of both indoor and outdoor holiday decorations.
quotes.author: United States. Food Safety and Quality Service

quotes.quote: Today, selecting the perfect Christmas tree is one of the highlights of many families' pre-holiday preparations.
quotes.author: United States. Food Safety and Quality Service

quotes.quote: Christmas is a day of happiness and excitement.
quotes.author: Herbert Henry Wernecke

quotes.quote: Christmas is about giving gift to loved ones. It is one time of the year even the emotionally most inexpressive can send a sentimental Christmas card.
quotes.author: Pedro Hernandez

quotes.quote: Gift-giving has become an important part of celebrating Christmas. Christmas gifts have become an important key to the doorway to Christmas and happiness-sharing that lies behind the door.
quotes.author: Pedro Hernandez

quotes.quote: Christmas is all about sentimentality. Traditions. Christmas programs. Christmas trees. Ornaments. Christmas door wreaths. They are all meant to make you feel all gooey and goose-bumpy for the festive season.
quotes.author: Pedro Hernandez

quotes.quote: A great sentimental Christmas gift does not necessarily imply an expensive gift. But a great sentimental Christmas gift requires a lot of thought and care.
quotes.author: Pedro Hernandez

quotes.quote: A glittering Christmas tree, trimmed for the holiday season, is a joyful sight.
quotes.author: Jacqueline Farmer

quotes.quote: Christmas trees make us feel happy and uplifted.
quotes.author: Jacqueline Farmer

quotes.quote: A smile can always be seen on even the most selfish and bitter person when viewing a well designed Christmas tree.
quotes.author: James Hewitt

quotes.quote: Christmas trees remind us of better times yet to come.
quotes.author: James Hewitt

quotes.quote: Christmas tree is often explained as a Christianization of the ancient Pagan idea. To Pagans the evergreen tree represents a celebration of the renewal of life.
quotes.author: James Hewitt

quotes.quote: Christmas tree came to be used as a Christian symbol to help with the celebration of Jesus Christ's birthday.
quotes.author: James Hewitt

quotes.quote: One thing we never seem to outgrow is our love of the Christmas season and all the memories it brings--the excitement of wide-eyed children, crackling fires, and twinkling lights; the special time spent with our families baking cookies, choosing the tree, wrapping presents, and celebrating the greatest gift of all--the Savior's birth.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown

quotes.quote: On Christmas Eve, many people attend candlelight church services and children go to bed early to wait for Santa Claus. Children wake up early to open Christmas presents on Christmas morning, then everyone eats a big feast of their favorite Christmas food.
quotes.author: Carole Marsh

quotes.quote: We decorate our homes for this wonderful season. A large evergreen tree proudly stands in the main family room. Beautiful rainbow colored lights seem to dance to the tune of Christmas carols.
quotes.author: Theresa Ann

quotes.quote: Every Christmas the tree is brought into the center of the house.
quotes.author: Martin Cox

quotes.quote: Christmas trees are good for the environment. They remove dust and pollen from the air and are even a habitat for animals.
quotes.author: Carole Marsh

quotes.quote: It seemed like the little Christmas tree wasn't so little after all. It seemed to grow taller and wider with all the decorations on it.
quotes.author: Paatricia Erickson

quotes.quote: Bringing the past and the present together with a tradition that was timeless to those who had grown up with Christmas tree.
quotes.author: Fred Neuschel

quotes.quote: Christmas trees had broken through religious, ethnic, and economic barriers and had become an accepted symbol of the season for all strains of Christianity.
quotes.author: Fred Neuschel

quotes.quote: Christmas tree will eventually be, emphasizing that it is a symbol of those who went before Christ, waiting.
quotes.author: Anne Neuberger

quotes.quote: Of all the special decorations with which we adorn our homes for the festive season of Christmas, the most popular is the Christmas tree.
quotes.author: Rev. Cecil Andrew Newell

quotes.quote: Yet, the beautiful trees which we make a central feature of our Christmas celebration can be used as lovely symbols of Jesus and his coming to our world at the first Christmas.
quotes.author: Rev. Cecil Andrew Newell

quotes.quote: It's hard to describe exactly what makes the perfect Christmas tree. The physical requirements are straightforward enough. The tree must stand tall and straight.
quotes.author: Julie Salamon

quotes.quote: Christmas truly in the most wonderful time of the year. God's most important gift to the word. If ever there was a time to celebrate, this is it.
quotes.author: Brian Bird

quotes.quote: Christmas is a season of celebrating the birth of our Savior and a time of sharing gifts with those we cherish and love.
quotes.author: Jack Countryman

quotes.quote: Christmas is not a time nor a season, but a state of mind. To cherish peace and goodwill, to be plenteous in mercy, is to have the real spirit of Christmas.
quotes.author: Calvin Coolidge

quotes.quote: Blessed is the season, which engages the whole world in a conspiracy of love.
quotes.author: Hamilton Wright Mabi
Ada V. Hendricks

quotes.quote: Christmas is hard to forget.
quotes.author: Hugh Downs

quotes.quote: Remember, if Christmas isn't found in your heart, you won't find it under a tree.
quotes.author: Charlotte Carpenter

quotes.quote: There is no ideal Christmas; only the one Christmas you decide to make as a reflection of your values, desires, affections, traditions.
quotes.author: Bill McKibben

quotes.quote: Christmas is the day that holds all time together.
quotes.author: Alexander Smith

quotes.quote: Gifts of time and love are surely the basic ingredients of a truly merry Christmas.
quotes.author: Peg Bracken

quotes.quote: Wish this christmas eve brings for you the gifts of happiness, good health & joy!
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Christmas... is not an external event at all, but a piece of one's home that one carries in one's heart.
quotes.author: Freya Stark

quotes.quote: The best of all gifts around any Christmas tree: the presence of a happy family all wrapped up in each other
quotes.author: Bill Vaughan

quotes.quote: A little smile, a word of cheer, A bit of love from someone near, A little gift from one held dear, Best wishes for the coming year. These make a merry christmas!
quotes.author: John Greenleaf Whittier

quotes.quote: Christmas Eve, a perfect night to express affection for your family, to forgive those who failed you and to forget past mistakes.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Twas the night before Christmas, when all through the house, not a creature was stirring, not even a mouse.
quotes.author: Clement Clark Moore

quotes.quote: It is Christmas in the heart that puts Christmas in the air.
quotes.author: W. T. Ellis

quotes.quote: It is Christmas every time you let God love others through you.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: It is Christmas in the heart that puts Christmas in the air.
quotes.author: William Thomas Ellis

quotes.quote: Its Christmas Eve! Its the one night of the year when we all act a little nicer, we smile a little easier, we cheer a little more. For a couple of hours out of the whole year, we are the people that we always hoped we would be.
quotes.author: Bill Murray

quotes.quote: I will honour Christmas in my heart, and try to keep it all the year.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: Christmas Eve was a night of song that wrapped itself about you like a shawl. But it warmed more than your body. It warmed your heart...filled it, too, with melody that would last forever.
quotes.author: Bess Streeter Aldrich

quotes.quote: Bless us Lord, this Christmas with quietness of mind. Teach us to be patient and always to be kind.
quotes.author: Helen Steiner Rice

quotes.quote:
What Eve is like the Christmas Eve?...
In any land,
A day so grandâ€”
So pure as Christmas Day.
quotes.author: Louis Charles

quotes.quote: Christmas Eve ought to be a very joyful evening to us in all its associations, in all the truths which it naturally brings to the soul.... A man's soul is to be as the heavens were on the night when the shepherds looked up and saw them full of angels as well as stars
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: A child's anticipation / As he peers beneath the tree, / And finds the gift he asked for / when he sat on Santa's knee.
quotes.author: Catherine Janssen Irwin

quotes.quote: Finns feast on Christmas Eve; salt fish and potatoes at midnight for the Portuguese, while Germans like their roast goose on Christmas Day.
quotes.author: Suzanne B. Cole

quotes.quote: In Norway Julenisse, the Christmas elf, gifts all children on Christmas Eve.
quotes.author: Suzanne B. Cole

quotes.quote: May the Christmas morning make us happy to be thy children, and Christmas evening bring us to our beds with grateful thoughts, forgiving and forgiven, for Jesus' sake. Amen
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: On Christmas eve the bells were rung; / On Christmas eve the mass was sung; / That only night in all the year, / Saw the stole priest the chalice rear.
quotes.author: Sir Walter Scott

quotes.quote: Christmas is a time when everybody wants his past forgotten and his present remembered.
quotes.author: Phyllis Diller

quotes.quote: Peace on earth and mercy mild are still possible. On Christmas eve, all things are possible.
quotes.author: Gregg Easterbrook

quotes.quote: The principal advantage of the non-parental lifestyle is that on Christmas Eve you need not be struck dumb by the three most terrifying words that the government allows to be printed on any product:'Some assembly required.'
quotes.author: John Leo

quotes.quote: It's Christmas Eve! It's the one night of the year when we all act a little nicer, we smile a little easier, we cheer a little more. For a couple of hours out of the whole year, we are the people that we always hoped we would be. It's a miracle. It's really a sort of a miracle. Because it happens every Christmas Eve. And if you wate that miracle, you're gonna burn for it, I know what I'm talking about.
quotes.author: Bill Murray

quotes.quote: He Loved spending Christmas Eve with his parents; they still fussed over the tree, and the unwrapping of the presents, making him feel like a child again, safe and innocent.
quotes.author: M.J. Zagoria

quotes.quote: There was the holy hush in the gray twilight that comes only on Christmas Eve. There were the big flakes of snow that fell as they never fall except on Christmas Eve.
quotes.author: John Fox Jr

quotes.quote: It is Christmas eve / so the elves pack up the sleigh / ready for Santa Claus / to make a Merry Christmas Day.
quotes.author: Katy Renaud

quotes.quote: Merry merry Christmas / Santa comes tonight, / With his eight reindeer / ready for their flight.
quotes.author: Katy Renaud

quotes.quote: Christmas Eve. The final crescendo in the grand approach to Christmas. In our house, no other day is like it. The excitement grows as the day goes on, passing like a virus from children to the adults and back again.
quotes.author: J.H. Alexander

quotes.quote: Christmas Eve is the most special day just the way it is.
quotes.author: J.H. Alexander

quotes.quote: Good fellows are laughing and drinking / (To-night no heart should grieve), / But I am of old days thinking, / Alone, on Christmas Eve.
quotes.author: Victor James Daley

quotes.quote: A lovely thing about Christmas is that it's compulsory, like a thunderstorm, and we all go through it together.
quotes.author: Garrison Keillor

quotes.quote: Christmas is a necessity. There has to be at least one day of the year to remind us that we're here for something else besides ourselves.
quotes.author: Eric Sevareid

quotes.quote: I love Christmas, not just because of the presents but because of all the decorations and lights and the warmth of the season.
quotes.author: Ashley Tisdale

quotes.quote: Christmas is a time when you get homesick - even when you're home.
quotes.author: Carol Nelson

quotes.quote: The magic of Christmas never ends and its greatest gifts are family and friends. You can never truly enjoy Christmas until you can look up into the Father's face and tell him you have received his Christmas gift.
quotes.author: John R. Rice

quotes.quote: Christmas is, of course, the time to be home - in heart as well as body.
quotes.author: Gary Moore

quotes.quote: Christmas waves a magic wand over this world, and behold, everything is softer and more beautiful.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: Love came down at Christmas; / Love all lovely, love divine; / Love was born at Christmas, /Stars and angels gave the sign.
quotes.author: Christina Rosetti

quotes.quote: I love the Christmastide, and yet, / I notice this, each year I live; / I always like the gifts I get, / But how I love the gifts I give!
quotes.author: Carolyn Wells

quotes.quote: The sharpest memory of our old-fashioned Christmas eve is my mother's hand making sure I was settled in bed.
quotes.author: Paul Wengle

quotes.quote: Kissing underneath the tree / I don't need no presents girl / You're everything I need / Let me give you all of me / Together on this Christmas Eve
quotes.author: Jerrol Wizzard

quotes.quote: I'm riding home on Christmas Eve / Rolling along with a tumble weed / Winter wind, cold and strong / Still it pushes me along
quotes.author: Douglas B Green

quotes.quote: The say the beast, Christmas Eve / Can't even speak, so they believe / I know I heard in an old coyote's throat / A trembling sound lonesome note
quotes.author: Douglas B Green

quotes.quote: Calls me home, Christmas Eve / Christmas Eve / As a rightful home / On Christmas Eve
quotes.author: Douglas B Green

quotes.quote: I'm looking for you on Christmas Eve / All over the world, the angels see / But I'm feeling lost, can you save me / I'm looking for you on Christmas Eve
quotes.author: Gwen Stefani

quotes.quote: Walking with you in a winter's snow / Kissing underneath the mistletoe / People smiling everywhere we go / It's Christmas eve and they can see we're in love
quotes.author: Maria Christensen

quotes.quote: Ooh, you make the season bright / With the lights reflected in your eyes / All my dreams are comin' true tonight / It's Christmas Eve and I can see we're in love
quotes.author: Maria Christensen

quotes.quote: Meet me under the mistletoe / Midnight Christmas Eve / Your sweet kiss is the first gift / I'd like to receive / The presents that we bought / Will have to wait beneath the tree / Meet me under the mistletoe / Midnight Christmas Eve
quotes.author: Mark Abramson

quotes.quote: Grandma got run over by a reindeer / Walking home from our house Christmas Eve / You can say there's no such thing as Santa / But as for me and grandpa we believe
quotes.author: Randy Brooks

quotes.quote: You'll be rocking with a stocking on your head / So the cold won't get to you / On Christmas eve you can believe / That wishes do come true
quotes.author: Charlie Midnight

quotes.quote: Oh, when the snow comes down / Oh in Tinseltown / On Christmas eve / You will believe / When the snow comes down / In Tinseltown
quotes.author: Charlie Midnight

quotes.quote: Let it snow, let it snow, let it snow, let it snow / I'll keep you warm tonight / Through the good times and bad / Happy and sad / I'm still holding on / I know what I have / And all that I want is Christmas eve with you
quotes.author: Peer Astrom

quotes.quote: It's not just the gifts / Under my tree / The best things in life / Are totally free / And waiting for me is Christmas eve with you / Is Christmas eve with you
quotes.author: Peer Astrom

quotes.quote: Somewhere in the forest / The snow was three feet deep / Two allied soldiers walking / Trying not to freeze / Far from home on Christmas Eve
quotes.author: Harley Allen

quotes.quote: And they sat by the fire and the talked all night long / Sang Christmas hymns and showed pictures of home / In the middle of a great war, bitter enemies / Found peace on Earth on Christmas Eve
quotes.author: Harley Allen

quotes.quote: This is a night to remember / A sweet celebration of love / It's a holiday of dreams / In warm reds and greens / And a star that keeps shining above / Christmas Eve
quotes.author: Engelbert Humperdinck

quotes.quote: This is a night to remember, Christmas Eve / Children, Santa, mistletoe and moonlight. / A feeling of joy everywhere / And the song in the night / Being sung clear and bright / Is a moment for lovers to share
quotes.author: Engelbert Humperdinck

quotes.quote: Laughter, holly, snowflakes and sleigh bells / Dreamers who travel the skies / As we sail on the glow / Of a fire burning glow / There's a lifetime of love in your eyes / This is a night to remember, Christmas Eve
quotes.author: Engelbert Humperdinck

quotes.quote: For here in this city of lights / This evening awakens / The dreams that it might / The winter it conjures / The spells it will weave / The snow gently covers / the ground / Christmas eve
quotes.author: Al Pitrelli

quotes.quote: It's Christmas and you're not here, / The snow is falling down, like my tears. / I see your presents by the tree, / I can't believe you're not with me / On Christmas, Christmas eve.
quotes.author: Mark Hudson

quotes.quote: There's candle in the window / There's a legend we believe / Santa, here's our plea / You can bet that he wouldn't miss a Christmas Eve
quotes.author: Carpenter

quotes.quote: There's a stocking on the fireplace / There are presents to receive / And there's mistletoe where is Romeo / Steals a kiss on Christmas Eve
quotes.author: Carpenter

quotes.quote: All this holiday contemptment / All this love should never leave / We'd be doing right if we made each night / More like Christmas eve
quotes.author: Carpenter

quotes.quote: A good old country Christmas that's what it's gonna be / With all the family gathered round our pretty Christmas tree / We'll open up our presents Christmas Eve about midnight / We'll have a good old country Christmas alright
quotes.author: Loretta Lynn

quotes.quote: Just a little Christmas tree / Lookin' sorta sad and lonely just like me / No one seems to care / They just went away and left it standing there / All alone on Christmas Eve
quotes.author: Artie Wayne

quotes.quote: I gave you my heart under the Christmas tree / I gave you my love, don't make a fool out of me / No, I can't wait to see you Christmas eve
quotes.author: Alyssa Reid

quotes.quote: In our church's tradition, Christmas is not confined to the weeks leading up to December 25, ending on the day itself when the stores are finally closed for a rest.
quotes.author: Catherine Upchurch

quotes.quote: In our tradition, Christmas is a season that begins on Christmas Eve and, for Roman Catholics, extends through the feast of the Baptism of the Lord.
quotes.author: Catherine Upchurch

quotes.quote: The Christmas season includes the feasts of St. Stephen and St. John and the Holy Innocents and the Holy Family.
quotes.author: Catherine Upchurch

quotes.quote: The heighten our appreciation of Christmas as a season, we focus on three New Testament passages in this book, passages that reveal the wonder and hope contained in a child's simple birth in Bethlehem centuries ago, and his birth in our hearts each day.
quotes.author: Catherine Upchurch

quotes.quote: The Christmas season is a time we many show there love toward another.
quotes.author: Dr. Joseph Roosevelt Rogers

quotes.quote: Allow Jesus to be the center of your Christmas Celebration.
quotes.author: Dr. Joseph Roosevelt Rogers

quotes.quote: Christmas is traditionally a time when many people will travel for great distances to fellowship with loved ones-giving gifts.
quotes.author: Dr. Joseph Roosevelt Rogers

quotes.quote: The Christmas story did not begin in Bethlehem,, instead the origin of this great act of kindness began in a Garden, called Eden after the fall of man.
quotes.author: Dr. Joseph Roosevelt Rogers

quotes.quote: Christmas belongs to children and to the child in all of us.
quotes.author: Carroll Stuhlmueller

quotes.quote: If Christmas speaks to the child in all of us, it is not because the day and the feast are childish but because they are close, as children are, to the wellsprings of life.
quotes.author: Carroll Stuhlmueller

quotes.quote: What happened at our baptism happens again this Christmas. We are born. Rather, Jesus is born within us and as a result all the riches of his godhead come to rest within us.
quotes.author: Carroll Stuhlmueller

quotes.quote: The season of our brightest festival / To celebrate the sun's awakening. / Then in the kitchen stands the Christmas tree.
quotes.author: Burt Porter

quotes.quote: The Christmas candles turn the angel chimes / That circle a resounding endless ring / To spin us back to other Christmas times.
quotes.author: Burt Porter

quotes.quote: Christmas hath a beauty / Lovelier than the world can show: / For Christmas bringeth Jesus, / Brought for us so low.
quotes.author: Christina Rossetti

quotes.quote: Although sometimes things past seem done and gone / On Christmas Eve all Christmases are one.
quotes.author: Burt Porter

quotes.quote: This Christmas when we gather by the tree / With food and drink and gifts by candlelight / There'll be another member of our family / To share the love we give upon this night.
quotes.author: Burt Porter

quotes.quote: And like small fallen stars of fantasy / The Christmas lights gleam on the dooryard tree.
quotes.author: Burt Porter

quotes.quote: Christmas Season is the best by far / We are all trying to follow that star / Showing love is what it is really about / Christmas Magic never wears out.
quotes.author: Edward J. McCoul

quotes.quote: The joy inside is possible to hide / all because of the Magical Yuletide / Everything is looking gay and bright / decked with all the Colorful Christmas Lights!
quotes.author: Edward J. McCoul

quotes.quote: Santa's timeless flight soon begins. It is Christmas Magic all over again. Santa traverses Christmas Eve Sky / faster than a reindeer's blinking eye!
quotes.author: Edward J. McCoul

quotes.quote: Christmas is all the fun you can stand / a surreal mystical wonderland / even a child can understand!
quotes.author: Edward J. McCoul

quotes.quote: Christmas Day Morning is the best / It is the build up from all the rest / That is when the Christmas Show is brought into our homes all aglow!
quotes.author: Edward J. McCoul

quotes.quote: It's Christmas Eve! It's... it's the one night of the year when we all act a little nicer, we... we... we smile a little easier, we... w-w-we... we... we cheer a little more.
quotes.author: Mitch Glazer

quotes.quote: It's Christmas Eve, everyone's going home to be with their families.
quotes.author: Bruce Helford

quotes.quote: Our hearts grow tender with childhood memories and love of kindred, and we are better throughout the year for having, in spirit, become a child again at Christmas-time.
quotes.author: Laura Ingalls Wilder

quotes.quote: Were I a philosopher, I should write a philosophy of toys, showing that nothing else in life need to be taken seriously, and that Christmas Day in the company of children is one of the few occasions on which men become entirely alive.
quotes.author: Robert Lynd

quotes.quote: For me, the spirit of Christmas means being happy and giving freely. It's a tradition for all the kids in the family to help mom decorate the tree. Christmas is all about family, eating, drinking and making merry.
quotes.author: Malaika Arora Khan

quotes.quote: From home to home, and heart to heart, from one place to another. The warmth and joy of Christmas, brings us closer to each other.
quotes.author: Emily Matthews

quotes.quote: Christmas is a holiday that we celebrate not as individuals nor as a nation, but as a human family.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: Christmas is the day that holds all time together.
quotes.author: Alexander Smith

quotes.quote: Time was with most of us, when Christmas Day, encircling all our limited world like a magic ring, left nothing out for us to miss or seek; bound together all our home enjoyments, affections, and hopes; grouped everything and everyone round the Christ.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: Mankind is a great, an immense family. This is proved by what we feel in our hearts at Christmas.
quotes.author: Pope John XXIII

quotes.quote: Christmas is the season of joy, of holiday greetings exchanged, of gift-giving,and of families united.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: Happy, happy Christmas, that can win us back to the delusions of our childhood days, recall to the old man the pleasures of his youth, and transport the traveler back to his own fireside and quiet home!
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: A lovely thing about Christmas is that it's compulsory, like a thunderstorm, and we all go through it together.
quotes.author: Garrison Keillor

quotes.quote: Christmas time is cherished family time. family time is sacred time.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The best of all gifts around any Christmas tree: the presence of a happy family all wrapped up in each other.
quotes.author: Burton Hillis

quotes.quote: Christmas is, of course, the time to be home, in heart as well as body.
quotes.author: Garry Moore

quotes.quote: It is in the heart that puts Christmas in the air.
quotes.author: W. T. Ellis

quotes.quote: My idea of Christmas, whether old-fashioned or modern, is very simple: loving others. Come to think of it, why do we have to wait for Christmas to do that?
quotes.author: Bob Hope

quotes.quote: Christmas is a time when you get homesick—even when you’re home.
quotes.author: Carol Nelson

quotes.quote: Christmas is most truly Christmas when we celebrate it by giving the light of love to those who need it most.
quotes.author: Ruth Carter Stapleton

quotes.quote: The best present on Christmas is spending some good time with family realizing the importance of love sharing things that give you real joy Christmas is the time to enjoy so have fun with your family Merry Christmas and a Happy new year!
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: For many, Christmas is also a time for coming together. But for others, service will come first.
quotes.author: Queen Elizabeth II

quotes.quote: Christmas, my child, is love in action
quotes.author: Dale Evans

quotes.quote: My fondest memories of Christmas include our family traditions of putting treasured ornaments and lights on the tree.
quotes.author: June Cotner

quotes.quote: I loved baking with my mother, singing and listening to Christmas music, and laughing at family gatherings.
quotes.author: June Cotner

quotes.quote: Family gatherings are filled with the love and memories of Christmases from my childhood.
quotes.author: June Cotner

quotes.quote: Let's have a merry Christmas and the most wonderful New Year, as we continue on through life, with the family we hold dear.
quotes.author: Noreen Braman

quotes.quote: The best Christmas gift of all is the presence of a happy family all wrapped up with one another.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: But when you look back on all the Christmases in your life, you'll find you've created family traditions and lasting memories.
quotes.author: Caroline Kennedy

quotes.quote: MY Christmas wish would be to have an entire week off. To spend it with my family and just curl up and watch Christmas movies when it's snowing outside.
quotes.author: David Hasselhoff

quotes.quote: Your children need your presence more than your presents.
quotes.author: Jesse Jackson

quotes.quote: I love presents, but since I've gotten older, I haven't really wanted anything. Christmas is about family.
quotes.author: Jacob Latimore

quotes.quote: I love Christmas. A time to slow down and enjoy life and be with my family and friends.
quotes.author: Mary Jo Putney

quotes.quote: Christmas is a season of joy, of holiday greetings exchanged, of gift-giving, and of families united.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent

quotes.quote: Christmas always sucked when I was a kid because I believed in Santa Claus. Unfortunately, so did my parents. So I never got anything.
quotes.author: Charlie Viracola

quotes.quote: Yes it is Christmas every time you smile at your brother and offer him your hand.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: The mother with her hair hanging down her back smiles and glances here and there., and the father looks up and down at me, quiet and pleased...for I am the Christmas tree.
quotes.author: Fritz Peters

quotes.quote: It ties us together as we share Holiday moments / and create homemade memories / by the fire of family love and special friendship.
quotes.author: June Cotner

quotes.quote: We're having the same old thing for Christmas dinner this year...relatives.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: During the holiday season, Christmas specifically, it can be hard to be away from family and friends.
quotes.author: Monica Johnson

quotes.quote: Christmas is a day of meaning and traditions, a special day spent in the warm circle of family and friends.
quotes.author: Margaret Thatcher

quotes.quote: My parents, my whole life, combined my birthday with Christmas, and you know how frustrating that is for a child--especially as I was born in July.
quotes.author: Rita Rudner

quotes.quote: The worst part of Christmas is dinner with the family, when you realize how mutated and cripples is the gene stock from which you sprang.
quotes.author: Byron Rogers

quotes.quote: This is the holiday you're with the family / We put aside our differences and let it be / Oh, oh how much fun it is to give and to receive / This time of year, love is all we need, oh.
quotes.author: James Elmer Smith

quotes.quote: Music has always been a part our family Christmas / And my favourite memory from making this collection of songs / Was sitting beside my dad, listening to this last one play / Over and over and over.
quotes.author: Traditional

quotes.quote: Christmas is love, it's in the songs we're singing / Christmas is love, it's families comin' home / Christmas is love, it's on the children's faces / Christmas is love.
quotes.author: Gerald L. Taylor

quotes.quote: It's an old time Christmas / Family and friends 'round the tree / It's an old time Christmas / Like the ones in my memory.
quotes.author: Stewart Harris

quotes.quote: A good old country Christmas that's what it's gonna be / With all the family gathered round our pretty Christmas tree / We'll open up our presents Christmas Eve about midnight / We'll have a good old country Christmas alright.
quotes.author: Loretta Lynn

quotes.quote: At Christmas, all roads lead home.
quotes.author: Marjorie Holmes

quotes.quote: For centuries men have kept an appointment with Christmas. Christmas means fellowship, feasting, giving and receiving, a time of good cheer, home.
quotes.author: W.J. Tucker

quotes.quote: I find that it’s the simple things that remind you of family around the holidays.
quotes.author: Amy Adams

quotes.quote: Christmas is a time when kids tell Santa what they want and adults pay for it. Deficits are when adults tell the government what they want and their kids pay for it.
quotes.author: Richard Lamm

quotes.quote: Christmas is for children. But it is for grown-ups too. Even if it is a headache, a chore, and nightmare, it is a period of necessary defrosting of chill and hide-bound hearts.
quotes.author: Lenora Mattingly Weber

quotes.quote: It's not what's under the Christmas tree that matters, it's who's around it.
quotes.author: Charlie Brown

quotes.quote: Some Christmas tree ornaments do more than glitter and glow, they represent a gift of love given a long time ago.
quotes.author: Tom Baker

quotes.quote: Now I'm an old Christmas tree, the roots of which have died. They just come along and while the little needles fall off me replace them with medallions.
quotes.author: Orson Welles

quotes.quote: The Christmas tree, twinkling with lights, had a mountain of gifts piled up beneath it, like offerings to the great god of excess.
quotes.author: Tess Gerritsen

quotes.quote: Tree decorating with cats. O Christmas tree, O christmas tree, your Ornaments are history!
quotes.author: Courtney VanSickle

quotes.quote: He who has not christmas in his heart will never find it under a tree.
quotes.author: Roy L. Smith

quotes.quote: Taking down the Christmas tree makes it feel official: time to get back to joyless and cynical.
quotes.author: Greg Fitzsimmons

quotes.quote: Glittering tinsel, lights, glass balls, and candy canes dangle from pine trees.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: Christmas tree stands are the work of the devil and they want you dead.
quotes.author: Bill Bryson

quotes.quote: Never worry about the size of your Christmas tree. In the eyes of children, they are all 30 feet tall.
quotes.author: Larry Wilde

quotes.quote: I was only kicking down the Christmas tree to get the star on top.
quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

quotes.quote: Moving between the legs of tables and of chairs, rising or falling, grasping at kisses and toys, advancing boldly, sudden to take alarm, retreating to the corner of arm and knee, eager to be reassured, taking pleasure in the fragrant brilliance of the Christmas tree.
quotes.author: T. S. Eliot

quotes.quote: A Christmas tree, the perfect gift for a guy. The plant is already dead.
quotes.author: Jay Leno

quotes.quote: Christmas trees don't grow on trees; they need rainbows, lumberjacks, and Leprechauns on unicorns playing jock jams on glockenspiels.
quotes.author: Ryan Ross

quotes.quote: There's no experience quite like cutting your own live Christmas tree out of your neighbor's yard.
quotes.author: Dan Florence

quotes.quote: The smell of pine needles, spruce and the smell of a Christmas tree, those to me, are the scents of the holidays.
quotes.author: Blake Lively

quotes.quote: Freshly cut Christmas trees smelling of stars and snow and pine resin, inhale deeply and fill your soul with wintry night.
quotes.author: John Geddes

quotes.quote: The Christmas tree is the dot on the i.
quotes.author: Frank Taylor

quotes.quote: A Christian should resemble a fruit tree with real fruit, not a Christmas tree with decorations tied on.
quotes.author: John Stott

quotes.quote: Lots of people were activating phones under the Christmas tree.
quotes.author: Peter Ritcher

quotes.quote: I grew up with a Christmas tree, I'm going to stay with a Christmas tree.
quotes.author: Thomas Menino

quotes.quote: I never thought it was such a bad little tree. It's not bad at all, really. Maybe it just needs a little love.
quotes.author: Linus Van Pelt

quotes.quote: The earth reminded us of a Christmas tree ornament hanging in the blackness of space. As we got farther and farther away it diminished in size. Finally it shrank to the size of a marble, the most beautiful marble you can imagine.
quotes.author: James Irwin

quotes.quote: I lit up like a christmas tree.
quotes.author: Hazel Grace

quotes.quote: I don't know what I believe. I guess that makes me a christmas tree agnostic.
quotes.author: Stephanie Perkins

quotes.quote:
If my Valentine you won't be,
I'll hang myself on your Christmas tree.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: The Christmas tree is a symbol of love, not money. There's a kind of glory to them when they're all lit up that exceeds anything all the money in the world could buy.
quotes.author: Andy Rooney

quotes.quote: Nothing ever seems too bad, too hard or too sad when you've got a Christmas tree in the living room. All those presents under it, all that anticipation. Just a way of saying there's always light and hope in the world.
quotes.author: Nora Roberts

quotes.quote: The best of all gifts around any Christmas tree: the presence of a happy family all wrapped up in each other.
quotes.author: Bill Vaughan

quotes.quote: Freshly cut Christmas trees smelling of stars and snow and pine resin - inhale deeply and fill your soul with wintry night.
quotes.author: John J. Geddes

quotes.quote: November, I'll give thanks that you belong to me. December, you're the present beneath my Christmas tree.
quotes.author: Neil Sedaka

quotes.quote: Our task is to stand tall in God's love, secure in our place, sparkling in kindness, surrounded by his goodness, freely giving to all who come our way. You, me, and the Christmas tree. Picked, purchased, and pruned.
quotes.author: Max Lucado

quotes.quote: The best Christmas trees come very close to exceeding nature. If some of our great decorated trees had been grown in a remote forest area with lights that came on every evening as it grew dark, the whole world would come to look at them and marvel at the mystery of their great beauty.
quotes.author: Andy Rooney

quotes.quote: Christmas can be celebrated in the school room with pine trees, tinsel and reindeers, but there must be no mention of the man whose birthday is being celebrated. One wonders how a teacher would answer if a student asked why it was called Christmas.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: Not everyone who sells Christmas trees believes in Santa Claus.
quotes.author: Matt Barr

quotes.quote:
Yes, a Christmas tree is something we cannot do without. Because a tree with all the trimmings...
Up the mountain, follow me! I'll find one soon, you'll see! You'll see I'll find the perfect Christmas tree!
quotes.author: Stan Berenstain

quotes.quote: I may be biased, but even without all of these fancy decorations, Christmas trees are special. Cause they remind us this is the season, that we should all love one another.
quotes.author: John Loy

quotes.quote: Ah Christmas, the most beautiful time of the year. Pretty decorations, friendly people, festive holiday dress. And all that lovely music. But perhaps the most beautiful thing about Christmas is the Christmas tree itself, all it up decorated for the holidays.
quotes.author: John Loy

quotes.quote: I don't really like artificial Christmas trees. I like real ones. They smell amazing; that's kind of the whole point.
quotes.author: Ryan Murphy

quotes.quote: The lights don't seem so bright this year; / It's hard for me to see / The smile that made my Christmas bright / Has gone away from me
quotes.author: Jimmy L Webb

quotes.quote: Christmas trees can be adorned in so many different ways. With ornaments that shimmer like snowflakes. Or shine like tiny snugs. With strands of popcorn and cranberries, with ribbons and lace. With tinsel it's glitters like delicate icicles. But of course the shining glory of a Christmas tree is what's on top, the star.
quotes.author: John Loy

quotes.quote: But Christmas trees are so bright and fun and pretty.
quotes.author: Paul Dini

quotes.quote: What's a Christmas tree without tinsel and pretty silver and gold decorations? Can't really call it a Christmas tree now, can you? And think of all the fun and joy that would be lost on Christmas morning, if all the young folks didn't get to see that sparkling, happy tree.
quotes.author: Romeo Muller

quotes.quote: Those are for the Christmas tree. Everyone is wishing you a merry Christmas. Decorating, celebrating, Merry Christmas. Happy Christmas.
quotes.author: Eun-sook Kim

quotes.quote: Don't you love Christmas? Anything goes wrong in the world, Christmas makes it go away. Decorations, carols, tree.
quotes.author: David E. Kelley

quotes.quote: I've knocked up a land enchanted, Christmas trees freshly planted. And the reason for my smile- The overtime made it worthwhile! Holly, mistletoe, big fir trees And once again a splendid reason To celebrate the festive season, Christmas time is here!
quotes.author: Jeremy Lloyd

quotes.quote: Your boughs are green in summer's glow / And do not fade in winter's snow / O Christmas Tree, O Christmas Tree / You stand in verdant beauty
quotes.author: Ernst Anschuetz

quotes.quote: For every year, the Christmas Tree / Brings to us all both joy and glee
quotes.author: Ernst Anschuetz

quotes.quote: Each bough doth hold its tiny light / That makes each joy the spark through light / O Christmas Tree, O Christmas Tree / Thy candles shine out brightly
quotes.author: Ernst Anschuetz

quotes.quote: The first thing at Christmas that's such a pain to me / Is finding a Christmas tree
quotes.author: Bob Rivers

quotes.quote: The only place you wanna be / Is underneath my Christmas tree / Light me up put me on top, let's falalalalalalala
quotes.author: Nick Dresti

quotes.quote: Promise you will be / Nobody else's little Christmas tree / I'll make you sparkle, just you wait and see / My little Christmas tree
quotes.author: Mickey Rooney

quotes.quote: O Christmas tree / Thy leaves are so unchanging / Not only green when summer's here / But also when 'tis cold and drear
quotes.author: George H Strait

quotes.quote: Oh, I'm the happiest Christmas tree / Christmas day, wait and see / I'll be laughing happily
quotes.author: Cathy Lynn

quotes.quote: Rockin' around the Christmas tree at the Christmas party hop / Mistletoe hung where you can see every couple tries to stop / Rockin' around the Christmas tree let the Christmas spirit ring / Later we'll have some pumpkin pie and we'll do some caroling
quotes.author: Johnny Marks

quotes.quote: One little Christmas tree can light up a home / So one little child can find a toy / One little Christmas tree can light up a home / So one little heart can find some joy
quotes.author: Jeff Hanna

quotes.quote: Everybody around the world / Wherever you may be / Don't Forget, The love / Under the Christmas tree
quotes.author: Albert Hammond

quotes.quote: Oh, how he quivered with fright because / There, right beside him, was Santa Claus / Asking him if he'd be his Christmas tree
quotes.author: Ron Goodwin

quotes.quote: And her thin little arms were stretched to you / With a yearning joy that they never knew. / She woke from the darkest dark to see / Like a heavenly vision, that Christmas Tree.
quotes.author: Robert William Service

quotes.quote: To night the children meet with glee / To view the fruits on Christmas Tree, / And when its beauties we behold / We're very sorry we are old.
quotes.author: James McIntyre

quotes.quote: Everywhere, everywhere, Christmas tonight! / Christmas in lands of the fir-tree and pine, / Christmas in lands of the palm-tree and vine
quotes.author: Phillips Brooks

quotes.quote: Would pay in cities for good trees like those, / Regular vestry-trees whole Sunday Schools / Could hang enough on to pick off enough. / A thousand Christmas trees I didn’t know I had!
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: The meaning of Christmas be / You want it to be a time for the wee / But it's not just presents under a tree / Jesus was born / On this day
quotes.author: Robert Curran

quotes.quote: A colorfully decorated, fragrant tree, lit with strings of twinkling lights--the most important and enduring symbol of Christmas, the major annual festival in the Christian world.
quotes.author: Bernd Brunner

quotes.quote: Christmas and New Year were both times of transition; they were full of joyful uncertainty and hope for the fertility of the people, the animals, and the fields. The tree had an established place in the life of the community--the girls of the village encircled it, singing and dancing around it.
quotes.author: Julie Salamon

quotes.quote: Christmas tree was something quite exotic. It nourished their desire for a piece of nature, for an open landscape where the wind blew and the air was sweet.
quotes.author: Julie Salamon

quotes.quote: Christmas trees are usually drawn from the timber stands in the local region. More often than not this means either fir or spruce trees.
quotes.author: Julie Salamon

quotes.quote: The Christmas tree --with its forest fragrance and freshness--has come to represent the Yule season. It is the mainstay of both indoor and outdoor holiday decorations.
quotes.author: United States. Food Safety and Quality Service

quotes.quote: Today, selecting the perfect Christmas tree is one of the highlights of many families' pre-holiday preparations.
quotes.author: United States. Food Safety and Quality Service

quotes.quote: A glittering Christmas tree, trimmed for the holiday season, is a joyful sight.
quotes.author: Jacqueline Farmer

quotes.quote: Christmas trees make us feel happy and uplifted.
quotes.author: Jacqueline Farmer

quotes.quote: A smile can always be seen on even the most selfish and bitter person when viewing a well designed Christmas tree.
quotes.author: James Hewitt

quotes.quote: Christmas trees remind us of better times yet to come.
quotes.author: James Hewitt

quotes.quote: Every Christmas the tree is brought into the centre of the house.
quotes.author: Martin Cox

quotes.quote: Christmas tree is often explained as a Christianization of the ancient Pagan idea. To Pagans the evergreen tree represents a celebration of the renewal of life.
quotes.author: James Hewitt

quotes.quote: Christmas tree came to be used as a Christian symbol to help with the celebration of Jesus Christ's birthday.
quotes.author: James Hewitt

quotes.quote: We decorate our homes for this wonderful season. A large evergreen tree proudly stands in the main family room. Beautiful rainbow colored lights seem to dance to the tune of Christmas carols.
quotes.author: Theresa Ann

quotes.quote: Christmas trees are good for the environment. They remove dust and pollen from the air and are even a habitat for animals.
quotes.author: Carole Marsh

quotes.quote: It seemed like the little Christmas tree wasn't so little after all. It seemed to grow taller and wider with all the decorations on it.
quotes.author: Paatricia Erickson

quotes.quote: Bringing the past and the present together with a tradition that was timeless to those who had grown up with Christmas tree.
quotes.author: Fred Neuschel

quotes.quote: Christmas trees had broken through religious, ethnic, and economic barriers and had become an accepted symbol of the season for all strains of Christianity.
quotes.author: Fred Neuschel

quotes.quote: Christmas tree will eventually be, emphasizing that it is a symbol of those who went before Christ, waiting.
quotes.author: Anne Neuberger

quotes.quote: Of all the special decorations with which we adorn our homes for the festive season of Christmas, the most popular is the Christmas tree.
quotes.author: Rev. Cecil Andrew Newell

quotes.quote: Yet, the beautiful trees which we make a central feature of our Christmas celebration can be used as lovely symbols of Jesus and his coming to our world at the first Christmas.
quotes.author: Rev. Cecil Andrew Newell

quotes.quote: It's hard to describe exactly what makes the perfect Christmas tree. The physical requirements are straightforward enough. The tree must stand tall and straight.
quotes.author: Julie Salamon

quotes.quote: Living in the past is like choosing to cling to a chronic illness.
quotes.author: Asa Don Brown

quotes.quote: Positive self-talk is to emotional pain as pain pill is to physical pain.
quotes.author: Edmond Mbiaka

quotes.quote: Those who become mentally ill often have a history of chronic pain.
quotes.author: Gene Tierney

quotes.quote: Pain is always emotional. Fear and depression keep constant company with chronic hurting.
quotes.author: Siri Hustvedt

quotes.quote: One in six people suffer depression or a chronic anxiety disorder. These are not the worried well but those in severe mental pain with conditions crippling enough to prevent them living normal lives.
quotes.author: Polly Toynbee

quotes.quote: The demon that you can swallow gives you it's power, and the greater life's pain, the greater life's reply.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: You don't know pain until you're staring at yourself in the mirror with tears streaming down your face and you're begging yourself to just hold on and be strong.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Chronic pain shatters productive lives. Chronic pain almost always is accompanied by depression, anxiety, frustration, fatigue, isolation, and lowered self-esteem.
quotes.author: Jed Diamond

quotes.quote: Behind every beautiful thing, there's some kind of pain.
quotes.author: Bob Dylan

quotes.quote: Pain is temporary. It may last a minute, or an hour, or a day, or a year, but eventually it will subside and something else will take its place. If I quit, however, it lasts forever.
quotes.author: Lance Armstrong

quotes.quote: Out of suffering have emerged the strongest souls; the most massive characters are seared with scars.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: We must embrace pain and burn it as fuel for our journey.
quotes.author: Kenji Miyazawa

quotes.quote: Of pain you could wish only one thing: that it should stop. Nothing in the world was so bad as physical pain. In the face of pain there are no heroes.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: Chronic pain or other challenges are invitations; gifts that challenge us to learn how to manage the mind.
quotes.author: Cheryl Richardson

quotes.quote: My pain may be the reason for somebody's laugh. But my laugh must never be the reason for somebody's pain.
quotes.author: Charlie Chaplin

quotes.quote: What a person did when they were in pain said a lot about them.
quotes.author: Veronics Roth

quotes.quote: It's a complete physical, mental and emotional assault on your body.
quotes.author: Jamie Wingo

quotes.quote: Pain is not the same as suffering. Left to itself, the body discharges pain spontaneously, letting go of it the moment that the underlying cause is healed. Suffering is pain that we hold on to. It comes from the mind's mysterious instinct to believe that pain is good, or that it cannot be escaped, or that the person deserves it.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: There is a great deal of pain in life and perhaps the only pain that can be avoided is the pain that comes from trying to avoid pain.
quotes.author: R.D. Laing

quotes.quote: If your body is screaming in pain, whether the pain is muscular contractions, anxiety, depression, asthma or arthritis, a first step in releasing the pain may be making the connection between your body pain and the cause. Beliefs are physical. A thought held long enough and repeated enough becomes a belief. The belief then becomes biology.
quotes.author: Marilyn Van Derbur

quotes.quote: Pain will come with time, but time will heal the pain.
quotes.author: Anthony Liccione

quotes.quote: If you can sit with your pain, listen to your pain and respect your pain, in time you will move through your pain.
quotes.author: Bryant McGill

quotes.quote: Pain is when you're slowly dying on the inside and you're way too weak to speak about it so you keep silent and suffer alone.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: God uses chronic pain and weakness, along with other afflictions, as his chisel for sculpting our lives. Felt weakness deepens dependence on Christ for strength each day. The weaker we feel, the harder we lean. And the harder we lean, the stronger we grow spiritually, even while our bodies waste away. To live with your â€˜thorn' uncomplainingly, that is, sweet, patient, and free in heart to love and help others, even though every day you feel weak, is true sanctification. It is true healing for the spirit. It is a supreme victory of grace.
quotes.author: J. I. Packer

quotes.quote: The body cannot take chronic terror; it must defend itself by refusing to harbor the spirit that wants to soar through it and experience life to the fullest.
quotes.author: Carmen Aguirre

quotes.quote: That's the thing about pain, it demands to be felt.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: You feel your strength in the experience of pain.
quotes.author: Jim Morrison

quotes.quote: Avoiding our pain is needlessly exhausting. Pain can not be killed. When we attempt to bury our pain, it rises up from the grave of our emotions, haunting us, until we acknowledge its presence. We can heal our pain when we allow it to move through us.
quotes.author: Jaeda Dewalt

quotes.quote: Generally speaking, chronic pain and other physical and mental disorders have been categorized as 'silent disorders' in the workplace simply because most employees are afraid of the consequences if employers find out.
quotes.author: Wayne Hochwarter

quotes.quote: Pain may create misery, pain may give you sorrow. It may trouble you today, but will be gone tomorrow.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Chronic pain can be very lonely. It can have a shame-based quality.
quotes.author: Jennifer Grey

quotes.quote: Consciousness is the chronic pain of life, and all higher organisms suffer it every waking moment.
quotes.author: David Marusek
