quotes.quote: If you keep your heart open, that same pain can become a purifying pain, a strengthening pain. If we choose forgiveness over bitterness, that pain can heal instead of hurt. Instead of a pain that divides, it can be a pain that binds. Instead of a pain that breaks us down, it can be a pain that builds us up.
quotes.author: Seth Adam Smith

quotes.quote: Find a place inside where there's joy, and that will burn out the pain.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: Many of us spend our whole lives running from feeling with the mistaken belief that you cannot bear the pain. But you have already borne the pain. what you have not done is feel all you are beyond the pain.
quotes.author: Saint Bartholomew

quotes.quote: It is easier to find men who will volunteer to die, than to find those who are willing to endure pain with patience.
quotes.author: Julius Caesar

quotes.quote: He who learns must suffer. And even in our sleep pain that cannot forget falls drop by drop upon the heart, and in our own despair, against our will, comes wisdom to us by the awful grace of God.
quotes.author: Aeschylus

quotes.quote: Pain is weakness leaving the body.
quotes.author: Chesty Puller

quotes.quote: The most painful thing is losing yourself in the process of loving someone too much, and forgetting that you are special too.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: Some old wounds never truly heal, and bleed again at the slightest word.
quotes.author: George R. R. Martin

quotes.quote: If pain could have cured us we should long ago have been saved.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.quote: Pain is inevitable. Suffering is optional.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: I imagine one of the reasons people cling to their hates so stubbornly is because they sense, once hate is gone, they will be forced to deal with pain.
quotes.author: James A. Baldwin

quotes.quote: The weaker we feel, the harder we lean on God. And the harder we lean the stronger we grow.
quotes.author: Joni Eareckson Tada

quotes.quote: Many of us spend our whole lives running from feeling with the mistaken belief that you can not bear the pain. But you have already borne the pain. What you have not done is feel all you are beyond that pain.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: There are wounds that never show on the body that are deeper and more hurtful than anything that bleeds.
quotes.author: Laurell K. Hamilton

quotes.quote: The great art of life is sensation, to feel that we exist, even in pain.
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.quote: If you are distressed by anything external, the pain is not due to the thing itself, but to your estimate of it, and this you have the power to revoke at any moment.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: The soft-minded man always fears change. He feels security in the status quo, and he has an almost morbid fear of the new. For him, the greatest pain is the pain of a new idea.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King

quotes.quote: Take chances, make mistakes. That's how you grow. Pain nourishes your courage. You have to fail in order to practice being brave.
quotes.author: Mary Tyler Moore

quotes.quote: Be patient and tough someday this pain will be useful to you.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.quote: To heal our wounds, we need courage to face them.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: The essence of generosity is letting go. Pain is always a sign that we are holding on to something usually ourselves.
quotes.author: Pema Chodron

quotes.quote: Pain any pain emotional, physical, mental has a message. The information it has about our life can be remarkably specific, but it usually falls into one of two categories. We would be more alive if we did more of this and Life would be more lovely if we did less of that. Once we get the pain's message, and follow its advice, the pain goes away.
quotes.author: Peter McWilliams

quotes.quote: It has been said, time heals all wounds. I do not agree. The wounds remain. In time, the mind, protecting its sanity, covers them with scar tissue and the pain lessens. But it is never gone.
quotes.author: Rose Kennedy

quotes.quote: It's easy to look at people and make quick judgments about them, their present and their past, but you'd be amazed at the pain and tears a single smile hides. What a person shows to the world is only one tiny facet of the iceberg hidden from sight. And more often then not, it's lined with cracks and scars that go all the way to the foundation of their soul.
quotes.author: Sherrilyn Kenyon

quotes.quote: It's no good trying to keep up old friendships. It's painful for both sides. The fact is, one grows out of people, and the only thing is to face it.
quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: Fat men take a cushion with them wherever they go.
quotes.author: George R. R. Martin

quotes.quote: It's funny how a chubby kid can just be having fun, and people call it entertainment!
quotes.author: Garth Brooks

quotes.quote: The hardest exercise for most of us fat people is that one where we push our chairback from the dinner table.
quotes.author: Dolly Parton

quotes.quote: Forget about calories - everything makes thin people thinner, and fat people fatter.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: Also, chubby people can never truly pull off ethereal the same way skinny people can never be jolly.
quotes.author: Mindy Kaling

quotes.quote: Every fat person says it's not their fault, that they have gland trouble. You know which gland? The saliva gland. They can't push away from the table.
quotes.author: Jesse Ventura

quotes.quote: To call yourself 'plus size' is just a euphemism for being fat. Life is much easier when you're thinner. Big is not beautiful, of course a job comes down to how you look.
quotes.author: Katie Hopkins

quotes.quote: You can be fat and love yourself. You can be fat and have a great damn personality. You can be fat and sew your own clothes. But you can't be fat and healthy.
quotes.author: Susan Powter

quotes.quote: Nobody loves a fat girl, but oh how a fat girl can love.
quotes.author: Jim Croce

quotes.quote: You can be fat and still be sexy. It all depends on how you feel about yourself.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Taylor

quotes.quote: Each individual woman's body demands to be accepted on its own terms.
quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

quotes.quote: Fat is merely stored energy. It is a physical state, nothing more and nothing less. It implies zero about your value as a person in this world.
quotes.author: Jillian Michaels

quotes.quote: Inside every fat man, there's a thin man trying to get out.
quotes.author: Anthony Horowitz

quotes.quote: Outside every fat man there was an even fatter man trying to close in.
quotes.author: Kingsley Amis

quotes.quote: The reason fat people are happy is that the nerves are well protected.
quotes.author: Luciano Pavarotti

quotes.quote: When you get fat, you get a new personality. You can't help it. Complete strangers ascribe it to you.
quotes.author: Hilary Mantel

quotes.quote: A fat person lives shorter but eats longer.
quotes.author: Stanislaw Jerzy Lec

quotes.quote: To lose confidence in one's body is to lose confidence in oneself.
quotes.author: Simone De Beauvoir

quotes.quote: We feel it's unacceptable to be fat, when it has nothing to do with who the person actually is.
quotes.author: Gwyneth Paltrow

quotes.quote: Thin people are beautiful, but fat people are adorable.
quotes.author: Jackie Gleason

quotes.quote: If you grow up fat, you have to try harder.
quotes.author: Kevin Smith

quotes.quote: If you are fat, no matter what you wear, nothing is going to make you sexier.
quotes.author: Stone Cold Steve Austin

quotes.quote: The only way you get that fat off is to eat less and exercise more.
quotes.author: Jack Lalanne

quotes.quote: A diet that is high in fat, sugar and salt makes it really hard for a body to function efficiently.
quotes.author: Tamra Davis

quotes.quote: Even if you're fat, one thing always fits: shoes.
quotes.author: Mimi Pond

quotes.quote: A thin man can squeeze into a fat body, yet you can only squeeze a fat man to become thin.
quotes.author: Benny Bellamacina

quotes.quote: He who makes fun of a short and fat man's weight is much less cruel than he who makes fun of his height.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: A fat stomach never breeds fine thoughts.
quotes.author: St. Jerome

quotes.quote: Fat people who want to reduce should take their exercise on an empty stomach and sit down to their food out of breath. Thin people who want to get fat should do exactly the opposite and never take exercise on an empty stomach.
quotes.author: Hippocrates

quotes.quote: Fat is a way of saying no to powerlessness and self-denial.
quotes.author: Susie Orbach

quotes.quote: Fat is your friend. The brain thrives on a fat-rich, low-carbohydrate diet.
quotes.author: David Perlmutter

quotes.quote: Excess body fat alters the levels of the hormones insulin, leptin, and estrogen, and these factors are believed to be responsible for the acceleration of pubertal timing by obesity.
quotes.author: Joel Fuhrman

quotes.quote: Gratuitous fat jokes always hurt, no matter what.
quotes.author: Josh Peck

quotes.quote: Bigger women have more fat to live on. They can put out more effort.
quotes.author: Heidi

quotes.quote: Pasta doesn't make you fat. How much pasta you eat makes you fat.
quotes.author: Giada De Laurentiis

quotes.quote: Statistically, skinny women die younger than fat women. Why? Because fat women are killing them.
quotes.author: Joy Behar

quotes.quote: I thank God for creating gay men. Because if it wasn't for them, us fat women would have no one to dance with.
quotes.author: Roseanne Barr

quotes.quote: No fashion has ever been created expressly for the lean purse or for the fat woman: the dressmaker's ideal is the thin millionaires.
quotes.author: Katharine Fullerton Gerould

quotes.quote: I found there was only one way to look thin. Hang out with fat people.
quotes.author: Rodney Dangerfield

quotes.quote: Whenever you interview fat people, you feel bad, because you know you're not going to hire them.
quotes.author: James D. Watson

quotes.quote: If your face is swollen from the severe beatings of life, smile and pretend to be a fat man.
quotes.author: Nigerian Proverb

quotes.quote: The second day of a diet is always easier than the first. By the second day you're off it.
quotes.author: Jackie Gleason

quotes.quote: Imprisoned in every fat man a thin one is wildly signalling to be let out.
quotes.author: Cyril Connolly

quotes.quote: I love fat people. Every fat person says it's not their fault, that they have gland trouble. You know which gland? The saliva gland.
quotes.author: Jesse Ventura

quotes.quote: The only thing that anyone can diagnose, with any certainty, by looking at a fat person, is their own level of stereotype and prejudice toward fat people.
quotes.author: Marilyn Wann

quotes.quote: Fat people are brilliant in bed. If I'm sitting on top of you, who's going to argue?
quotes.author: Jo Brand

quotes.quote: There are worse things than being fat, and one of them is worrying about it all the time.
quotes.author: Peg Bracken

quotes.quote: Take care of your body. It's the only place you have to live.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: It's okay to be fat. So you're fat. Just be fat and shut up about it.
quotes.author: Roseanne Barr

quotes.quote: A fat stomach sticks out too far. It prevents you from looking down and seeing what is going on around you.
quotes.author: Norman Reilly Raine

quotes.quote: Embrace your curves and who you are. I feel proud if young girls look up to me and say, "I'm curvy, and I'm proud of it now".
quotes.author: Kim Kardashian

quotes.quote: If you say you're fat, all of a sudden people like you!
quotes.author: Valerie Bertinelli

quotes.quote: To all the girls that think you’re fat because you’re not a size zero, you’re the beautiful one, its society who’s ugly.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: With his chubby face and his grumpy expression, he looked like a Buddha who'd achieved enlightenment and wasn't thrilled about it.
quotes.author: Rick Riordan

quotes.quote: The True Church can never fail. For it is based upon a rock.
quotes.author: T.S. Eliot

quotes.quote: In the Church, considered as a social organism, the mysteries inevitably degenerate into beliefs.
quotes.author: Simone Weil

quotes.quote: The Church is the one institution that exists for those outside it.
quotes.author: William Tyndale

quotes.quote: Teenagers who do not go to church are adored by God, but they don't get to meet some of the people who love God back.
quotes.author: Anne Lamott

quotes.quote: I never weary of great churches. It is my favorite kind of mountain scenery. Mankind was never so happily inspired as when it made a cathedral.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: I like the silence of a church, before the service begins better than any preaching.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: A good church is a Bible-centered church. Nothing is as important as this--not a large congregation, a witty pastor, or tangible experiences of the Holy Spirit.
quotes.author: Alistair Begg

quotes.quote: The Church must be intelligible to the simple as well as to the shrewd.
quotes.author: Robert Hugh Benson

quotes.quote: The Church is not a gallery for the better exhibition of eminent Christians, but a school for the education of imperfect ones.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: He who does not have the church as his mother, does not have God as his father.
quotes.author: Augustine of Hippo

quotes.quote: Church attendance is as vital to a disciple as a transfusion of rich, healthy blood to a sick man.
quotes.author: Dwight L. Moody

quotes.quote: For where God built a church, there the Devil would also build a chapel.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: Those who would renegotiate the boundaries between church and state must therefore answer a difficult question: why would we trade a system that has served us so well for one that has served others so poorly?
quotes.author: Sandra Day O'Connor

quotes.quote: The operation of the Church is entirely set up for the sinner; which creates much misunderstanding among the smug.
quotes.author: Flannery O'Connor

quotes.quote: The Church has always been willing to swap off treasures in heaven for cash down.
quotes.author: Robert G. Ingersoll

quotes.quote: The Reformation did not directly touch the question of the true character of God's church.
quotes.author: John Nelson Darby

quotes.quote: The church is so subnormal that if it ever got back to the New Testament normal it would seem to people to be abnormal.
quotes.author: Vance Havner

quotes.quote: In a church of my own we're perfect together I recognize you in the stained glass.
quotes.author: Heather Nova

quotes.quote: You can be committed to Church but not committed to Christ, but you cannot be committed to Christ and not committed to church.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: Nothing doth so much keep men out of the Church, and drive men out of the Church, as breach of unity.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: The style of God venerated in the church, mosque, or synagogue seems completely different from the style of the natural universe.
quotes.author: Alan Watts

quotes.quote: We need to avoid the spiritual sickness of a church that is wrapped up in its own world: when a church becomes like this, it grows sick.
quotes.author: Pope Francis

quotes.quote: There is one grand, all-comprehending church; and if I am a Christian, I belong to it, and no man can shut me out of it.
quotes.author: William E.Channing

quotes.quote: I think the church and the religion right now have a lot more to be worried about than SLAYER.
quotes.author: Kerry King

quotes.quote: It would be far better to be of no church than to be bitter of any.
quotes.author: William Penn

quotes.quote: There has never been a meaningful life built on easy street.
quotes.author: John Paul Warren

quotes.quote: I believe there are too many practitioners in the church who are not believers.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: The old cathedrals are good, but the great blue dome that hangs over everything is better.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: The nearer the Church the further from God.
quotes.author: Lancelot Andrewes

quotes.quote: Many come to bring their clothes to church rather than themselves.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: The perfect church service,would be one we were almost unaware of. Our attention would have been on God.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: The Church must be forever building, for it is forever decaying within and attacked from without.
quotes.author: T.S. Eliot

quotes.quote: A glorious Church is like a magnificent feast; there is all the variety that may be, but every one chooses out a dish or two that he likes, and lets the rest alone: how glorious soever the Church is, every one chooses out of it his own religion, by which he governs himself, and lets the rest alone.
quotes.author: John Selden

quotes.quote: It's about time we quit playing church in these services that start at eleven o clock sharp and end at twelve o clock dull.
quotes.author: Vance Havner

quotes.quote: Leave the matter of religion to the family altar, the church, and the private school, supported entirely by private contributions. Keep the church and state forever separate.
quotes.author: Ulysses S. Grant

quotes.quote: Don't give your money to the church. They should be giving their money to you.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: Churchgoers are like coals in a fire. When they cling together, they keep the flame aglow; when they separate, they die out.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: No church can be prospered in which all the ministration comes from the pulpit.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: Some keep the Sabbath going to church; I keep it staying at home, with a bobolink for a chorister, and an orchard for a dome.
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.quote: Church was doing what he often did when dropped - lying on his back with all four legs in the air, pretending to be dead in order to induce guilt in his owners.
quotes.author: Cassandra Clare

quotes.quote: The blood of the martyrs is the seed of the church.
quotes.author: Tertullian

quotes.quote: I do not believe in the creed professed by the Jewish Church, by the Roman Church, by the Greek Church, by the Turkish Church, by the Protestant Church, nor by any church that I know of. My own mind is my own church.
quotes.author: Thomas Paine

quotes.quote: Your body is the church where Nature asks to be reverenced.
quotes.author: Marquis De Sade

quotes.quote: Bombs have kill-radiuses; churches should have love-radiuses--anyone within twenty miles of a church should know it.
quotes.author: Tyler Edwards

quotes.quote: I think if the church did what they were supposed to do we wouldn't have anyone sleeping on the streets.
quotes.author: Michael W. Smith

quotes.quote: Every day people are straying away from the church and going back to God.
quotes.author: Lenny Bruce

quotes.quote: The church is precisely that against which Jesus preached -- and against which he taught his disciples to fight.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: There is no one true church, no one chosen people.
quotes.author: Terry Tempest Williams

quotes.quote: The church has been so seduced by psychological counseling for so long that anything that seems at odds with the current counseling practices is usually considered a consequence of ignorance.
quotes.author: T.A. McMahon

quotes.quote: One hundred religious persons knit into a unity by careful organization do not constitute a church any more than eleven dead men make a football team. The first requisite is life, always.
quotes.author: A. W. Tozer

quotes.quote: The day we find the perfect church, it becomes imperfect the moment we join it.
quotes.author: Charles H. Spurgeon

quotes.quote: There is no heresy or no philosophy which is so abhorrent to the church as a human being.
quotes.author: James Joyce

quotes.quote: Wherever we see the Word of God purely preached and heard, there a church of God exists, even if it swarms with many faults.
quotes.author: John Calvin

quotes.quote: Yes, I see the Church as the body of Christ. But, oh! How we have blemished and scarred that body through social neglect and through fear of being nonconformists.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King

quotes.quote: The root of almost every schism and heresy from which the Christian Church has suffered, has been because of the effort of men to earn, rather than receive their salvation; and the reason preaching is so commonly ineffective is, that it often calls on people to work for God rather than letting God work through them.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.quote: Church is the only place where someone speaks to me and I do not have to answer back.
quotes.author: Charles De Gaulle

quotes.quote: A church is a place in which gentlemen who have never been to heaven brag about it to persons who will never get there.
quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

quotes.quote: We sing in a church, why can we not dance there?
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: It is one of the ironies of the ministry that the very man who works in God's name is often hardest put to find time for God. The parents of Jesus lost Him at church, and they were not the last ones to lose Him there.
quotes.author: Vance Havner

quotes.quote: Clearly the person who accepts the Church as an infallible guide will believe whatever the Church teaches.
quotes.author: Thomas Aquinas

quotes.quote: Prayer is a strong wall and fortress of the church; it is a goodly Christian weapon.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: What the Church needs to-day is not more machinery or better, not new organizations or more and novel methods, but men whom the Holy Ghost can use men of prayer, men mighty in prayer. The Holy Ghost does not flow through methods, but through men. He does not come on machinery, but on men. He does not anoint plans, but men, men of prayer.
quotes.author: E. M. Bounds

quotes.quote: The glory of the gospel is that when the church is absolutely different from the world, she invariably attracts it.
quotes.author: Martyn Lloyd-Jones

quotes.quote: The Church is the only society that exists for the benefit of those who are not its members.
quotes.author: William Temple

quotes.quote: Going to church doesn't make you a Christian any more than going to a garage makes you an automobile.
quotes.author: Billy Sunday

quotes.quote: The church is a hospital for sinners, and not a museum for saints.
quotes.author: Vance Havner

quotes.quote: We do not want a church that will move with the world. We want a church that will move the world.
quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: You never have to advertise a fire. Everyone comes running when there's a fire. Likewise, if your church is on fire, you will not have to advertise it. The community will already know it.
quotes.author: Leonard Ravenhill

quotes.quote: When there's something in the Bible that churches don't like, they call it 'legalism.'
quotes.author: Leonard Ravenhill

quotes.quote: Christianity means a lot more than church membership.
quotes.author: Billy Sunday

quotes.quote: A church can be unified in one of two ways. You can freeze together, as the Church of the Frozen Chosen; or you can melt together with the fire of the Holy Spirit.
quotes.author: John Hagee

quotes.quote: Distance does not decide who is your brother and who is not. The church is going to have to become the conscience of the free market if it's to have any meaning in this world - and stop being its apologist.
quotes.author: Bono

quotes.quote: The chief danger of the Church today is that it is trying to get on the same side as the world, instead of turning the world upside down. Our Master expects us to accomplish results, even if they bring opposition and conflict. Anything is better than compromise, apathy, and paralysis. God, give to us an intense cry for the old-time power of the Gospel and the Holy Ghost!
quotes.author: A. B. Simpson

quotes.quote: It is a shame when the church itself is a cemetery, where the living sleep above the ground, as the dead do beneath.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: We cannot believe that the church of God is already possessed of all that light which God intends to give it; nor that all Satan's lurking places have already been found out.
quotes.author: Jonathan Edwards

quotes.quote: The coziness between church and state is good for the state and bad for the church.
quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Each generation of the church in each setting has the responsibility of communicating the gospel in understandable terms, considering the language and thought-forms of that setting.
quotes.author: Francis Schaeffer

quotes.quote: Miracles are the swaddling clothes of infant churches.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: Most of us spend the first six days of each week sowing wild oats; then we go to church on Sunday and pray for a crop failure.
quotes.author: Fred Allen

quotes.quote: The Gates of Hell shall not prevail against it.
quotes.author: Benjamin Rush

quotes.quote: Stop going to church everywhere and start belonging to church somewhere.
quotes.author: Matt Chandler

quotes.quote: Most professing Christians do not realize that the central concepts and practices associated with what we call "church" are not rooted in the New Testament, but in patterns established in the post-apostolic age.
quotes.author: Jon Zens

quotes.quote: The whole gospel for the whole person, great theology, but in practice little more than a slogan in many churches.
quotes.author: Ben Patterson

quotes.quote: Churches are always in transition in this changing culture. Our greatest hope beyond launching new works is seeing churches come back alive with growth and vigor.
quotes.author: Dr. Ronnie W. Floyd

quotes.quote: Civilization will not attain to its perfection until the last stone from the last church falls on the last priest.
quotes.author: Émile Zola

quotes.quote: Where God hath a temple, the devil will have a chapel.
quotes.author: Robert Burton

quotes.quote: People go to church for the same reasons they go to a tavern: to stupefy themselves, to forget their misery, to imagine themselves, for a few minutes anyway, free and happy.
quotes.author: Mikhail Bakunin

quotes.quote: The church is God's vineyard.
quotes.author: H. BULLINGER

quotes.quote: We believe that there is one church of God, catholic and universal, and dispersed throughout the whole world; this church is the kingdom, the body, the spouse of Christ; Christ alone is Prince of this kingdom, the head of this body, the Bridegroom of this spouse.
quotes.author: BISHOP J. JEWELL

quotes.quote: Just as you must eat, drink, and breathe to live, you must read the Bible, pray, and be involved in a church to stay spiritually alive and vital. You never will outgrow these things.
quotes.author: Greg Laurie

quotes.quote: The church must share in the secular problems of ordinary human life, not dominating, but helping and serving.
quotes.author: Dietrich Bonhoeffer

quotes.quote: God loves each of us as if there were only one of us.
quotes.author: St. Augustine

quotes.quote: God never said that the journey would be easy, but He did say that the arrival would be worthwhile.
quotes.author: Max Lucado

quotes.quote: God’s work done in God’s way will never lack God’s supplies.
quotes.author: Hudson Taylor

quotes.quote: God will meet you where you are in order to take you where He wants you to go.
quotes.author: Tony Evans

quotes.quote: Let God’s promises shine on your problems.
quotes.author: Corrie ten Boom

quotes.quote: He is no fool who gives what he cannot keep, to gain what he cannot lose.
quotes.author: Jim Elliot

quotes.quote: Remember who you are. Don’t compromise for anyone, for any reason. You are a child of the Almighty God. Live that truth.
quotes.author: Lysa Terkeurst

quotes.quote: If you can’t fly, then run, If you can’t run, then walk, If you can’t walk, then crawl, but whatever you do, you have to keep moving forward.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: Our greatest fear should not be of failure but of succeeding at things in life that don’t really matter.
quotes.author: Francis Chan

quotes.quote: If God is your partner, make your plans BIG!
quotes.author: D.L. Moody

quotes.quote: You are the only Bible some unbelievers will ever read.
quotes.author: John Macarthur

quotes.quote: We gain strength, and courage, and confidence by each experience in which we really stop to look fear in the face...we must do that which we think we cannot.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: God does not give us everything we want, but He does fulfill His promises, leading us along the best and straightest paths to Himself.
quotes.author: Dietrich Bonhoeffer

quotes.quote: Relying on God has to start all over everyday, as if nothing has yet been done.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: The best thing about the future is that it comes only one day at a time.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Your potential is the sum of all the possibilities God has for your life.
quotes.author: Charles Stanley

quotes.quote: The best and most beautiful things in this world cannot be seen or even heard, but must be felt with the heart.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: We are all faced with a series of great opportunities brilliantly disguised as impossible situations.
quotes.author: Chuck Swindoll

quotes.quote: Be faithful in small things because it is in them that your strength lies.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: Faith does not eliminate questions. But faith knows where to take them.
quotes.author: Elisabeth Elliot

quotes.quote: Whoever shall introduce into public affairs the principles of primitive Christianity will change the face of the world.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: I'm completely in favor of the separation of Church and State. My idea is that these two institutions screw us up enough on their own, so both of them together is certain death.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: A lot of church members who are singing "Standing On The Promises" are just sitting on the premises.
quotes.author: Sr. Monique Rysavy

quotes.quote: Do you know the three times that most people are in church? When they are hatched, matched and dispatched.
quotes.author: Lowell B. Yoder

quotes.quote: The Church knew what the psalmist knew: Music praises God. Music is well or better able to praise him than the building of the church and all its decoration; it is the Church's greatest ornament.
quotes.author: Igor Stravinsky

quotes.quote: In the Church of Jesus Christ there can and should be no non-theologians.
quotes.author: Karl Barth

quotes.quote: The purpose of separation of church and state is to keep forever from these shores the ceaseless strife that has soaked the soil of Europe with blood for centuries.
quotes.author: James Madison

quotes.quote: All national institutions of churches, whether Jewish, Christian, or Turkish, appear to me no other than human inventions, set up to terrify and enslave mankind, and monopolize power and profit.
quotes.author: Thomas Paine

quotes.quote: A church is a place in which gentlemen who have never been to heaven brag about it to persons who will never get there.
quotes.author: H.L. Menchen

quotes.quote: Is it faith to understand nothing, and merely submit your convictions implicitly to the Church?
quotes.author: John Calvin

quotes.quote: When any government, or any church for that matter, undertakes to say to its subjects, This you may not read, this you must not see, this you are forbidden to know, the end result is tyranny and oppression no matter how holy the motives.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: Going to church doesn't make you any more a Christian than going to the garage makes you a car.
quotes.author: Laurence J. Peter

quotes.quote: Hypocrites in the Church? Yes, and in the lodge and at the home. Don't hunt through the Church for a hypocrite. Go home and look in the mirror. Hypocrites? Yes. See that you make the number one less.
quotes.author: Billy Sunday

quotes.quote: If I could believe the Quakers banned music because church music is so damn bad, I should view them with approval.
quotes.author: Ezra Pound

quotes.quote: The churches must learn humility as well as teach it.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Jesus promised his disciples three things -- that they would be completely fearless, absurdly happy, and in constant trouble.
quotes.author: F.R. Maltby

quotes.quote: The question confronting the Church today is not any longer whether the man in the street can grasp a religious message, but how to employ the communications media so as to let him have the full impact of the Gospel message.
quotes.author: Pope John Paul II

quotes.quote: Sailors ought never to go to church. They ought to go to hell, where it is much more comfortable.
quotes.author: H.G. Wells

quotes.quote: We should always be disposed to believe that that which appears white is really black, if the hierarchy of the Church so decides.
quotes.author: Saint Ignatius of Loyola

quotes.quote: The teaching of the church, theoretically astute, is a lie in practice and a compound of vulgar superstitions and sorcery.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: The Institutional Church (ecclesia) has killed only two kinds of people: Those who do not believe in the teachings of Jesus Christ, and those who do.
quotes.author: Will Durant

quotes.quote: The Church is like a great ship being pounded by the waves of life’s different stresses. Our duty is not to abandon ship, but to keep her on her course.
quotes.author: St. Boniface

quotes.quote: Remember that nothing is small in the eyes of God. Do all that you do with love.
quotes.author: St. Therese of Lisieux

quotes.quote: Who except God can give you peace? Has the world ever been able to satisfy the heart?
quotes.author: St. Gerard Majella

quotes.quote: If obedience does not give you peace it is because you are proud.
quotes.author: Venerable Jose Escriva

quotes.quote: Hell is full of the talented, but Heaven of the energetic.
quotes.author: St. Jeanne de Chantal

quotes.quote: Heaven is filled with converted sinners of all kinds, and there is room for more.
quotes.author: St. Joseph Cafasso

quotes.quote: The Saints had no hatred, no bitterness. They forgave everything.
quotes.author: St. John Vianney

quotes.quote: Christ has not only spoken to us by his life, but has also spoken for us by his death.
quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: Our old history ends with the cross; our new history begins with the resurrection.
quotes.author: Watchman Nee

quotes.quote: A dead Christ I must do everything for; a living Christ does everything for me.
quotes.author: Andrew Murray

quotes.quote: The work of the church is not survival. She exists to fulfill the Great Commission.
quotes.author: Brother Andrew

quotes.quote: The world and it's people are my church.
quotes.author: R. Alan Woods

quotes.quote: People don't come to church for preachments, of course, but to daydream about God.
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.quote: The church saves sinners, but science seeks to stop their manufacture.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Smoking is indispensable if one has nothing to kiss.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: I am sure there are many things better than a good cigar, but right now, I can't think of what they might be.
quotes.author: Richard Carleton

quotes.quote: By the cigars they smoke, and the composers they love, ye shall know the texture of men's souls.
quotes.author: John Galsworthy

quotes.quote: Cigars are no safe alternative act.
quotes.author: Ed Markey

quotes.quote: A cigar has a fire at one end and a fool at the other.
quotes.author: Horace Greely

quotes.quote: Only fine cigars are worth smoking and only men who smoke fine cigars are worth kissing.
quotes.author: Joan Collins

quotes.quote: Given the choice between a woman and a cigar, I will always choose the cigar.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.quote: A cigar ought not to be smoked solely with the mouth, but with the hand, the eyes, and with the spirit.
quotes.author: Zino Davidoff

quotes.quote: Everything looks nicer when you win. The girls are prettier. The cigars taste better. The trees are greener.
quotes.author: Billy Martin

quotes.quote: Fuller's cigar in the night was a beacon warning carefree, frivolous people away. It was plainly a cigar smoked in anger.
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.quote: It has always been my rule never to smoke when asleep, and never to refrain when awake.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Tobacco is the passion of honest men and he who lives without tobacco is not worthy of living.
quotes.author: Moliere

quotes.quote: If your wife doesn't like the aroma of your cigar, change your wife.
quotes.author: Zino Davidoff

quotes.quote: A cigar is as good as memories that you have when you smoked it.
quotes.author: Raul Julia

quotes.quote: A woman is just a script, but a cigar is a motion picture.
quotes.author: Samuel Fuller

quotes.quote: No one can tell me what is a good cigar for me. I am the only judge. People who claim to know say that I smoke the worst cigars in the world. They bring their own cigars when they come to my house.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: If I had taken my doctor's advice and quit smoking when he advised me to, I wouldn't have lived to go to his funeral.
quotes.author: George Burns

quotes.quote: Cigars must be smoked one at a time, peaceably, with all the leisure in the world. Cigarettes are of the instant, Cigars are for eternity.
quotes.author: Guillermo Cabrera Infante

quotes.quote: A woman is only a woman, but a good cigar is a smoke.
quotes.author: Rudyard Kipling

quotes.quote: The cigar is the perfect complement to an elegant lifestyle.
quotes.author: George Sand

quotes.quote: Sometimes a cigar is just a smoke and a coincidence is just a coincidence.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: Eating and sleeping are the only activities that should be allowed to interrupt a man's enjoyment of his cigar.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: And said to myself, as I lit my cigar, supposing a man had the wealth of the Czar Of the Russias to boot, for the rest of his days, On the whole do you think he would have much to spare If he married a woman with nothing to wear?
quotes.author: William Allen Butler

quotes.quote: I love my cigar too, but I take it out of my mouth once in a while.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.quote: With a cigar like in life, you got to have some length, and some girth.
quotes.author: D. L. Hughley

quotes.quote: Cigars are society. They are the food you eat and the bed where you sleep. They are the clothes you wear and the shoes on your feet. Cigars are, at the very least, responsible for everything you and I have.
quotes.author: Mark McGinty

quotes.quote: Right now, we want to run in the Cigar mile if he is 100 percent.
quotes.author: Tim Ritchey

quotes.quote: Our country has plenty of five-cent cigars, but the trouble is they charge fifteen cents for them.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: You better take advantage of the good cigars. You don't get much else in that job.
quotes.author: Thomas P. O'Neill

quotes.quote: By the cigars they smoke, and the composers they love, ye shall know the texture of men's souls.
quotes.author: John Galsworthy

quotes.quote: A youth with his first cigar makes himself sick; a youth with his first girl makes other people sick.
quotes.author: Mary Wilson Little

quotes.quote: A woman is an occasional pleasure but a cigar is always a smoke.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.quote: A cigar is a sort of thing, not exactly a pleasure, but the crown and outward sign of pleasure.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: I always smoked cigars. I've smoked cigars with everybody in show business.
quotes.author: Al Hirt

quotes.quote: I think cigars are just a tremendous addition to the enjoyment of life.
quotes.author: Rush Limbaugh

quotes.quote: A good smoker, like a good lover, always takes his time with a cigar.
quotes.author: Guillermo Cabrera Infante

quotes.quote: Smoking Cigars is like falling in love. First, you are attracted by its shape; you stay for its flavor, and you must always remember never, never to let the flame go out!
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Cigar smoking by it's very nature is much more reflective than interactive.
quotes.author: Michael Douglas

quotes.quote: A cigar numbs sorrow and fills the solitary hours with a million gracious images.
quotes.author: George Sand

quotes.quote: A pipe gives a wise man time to think and a fool something to stick in his mouth.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: I have made it a rule never to smoke more than one cigar at a time. I have no other restriction as regards smoking.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: I smoke cigars because at my age if I don't have something to hang on to I might fall down.
quotes.author: George Burns

quotes.quote: A good cigar is as great a comfort to a man as a good cry to a woman.
quotes.author: E.G. Bulwer-Lytton Darnley

quotes.quote: I just smoked a Cohiba the other day. It was great. You have to appreciate everything that cigar is.
quotes.author: Daisy Fuentes

quotes.quote: Sometimes a cigar is just a smoke and a story's just a story.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: I never can understand how anyone can not smoke – it deprives a man of the best part of life. With a good cigar in his mouth a man is perfectly safe, nothing can touch him, literally.
quotes.author: Thomas Hahn

quotes.quote: I smoke in moderation. Only one cigar at a time.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Any cigar smoker is a friend, because I know how he feels.
quotes.author: Alfred De Musset

quotes.quote: If smoking cigars is not permitted in heaven, I won''t go.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Love is an exploding cigar we willingly smoke.
quotes.author: Lynda Barry

quotes.quote: A good Cuban cigar closes the doors to the vulgarities of the world.
quotes.author: Franz Liszt

quotes.quote: On a cold morning in winter, a Toscan cigar fortifies the soul.
quotes.author: Stendhal

quotes.quote: I never can understand how anyone can not smoke it deprives a man of the best part of life. With a good cigar in his mouth a man is perfectly safe, nothing can touch him, literally.
quotes.author: Thomas Mann

quotes.quote: A big cigar in a young face requires the best of both.
quotes.author: Malcolm Forbes

quotes.quote: My rule of life prescribed as an absolutely sacred rite smoking cigars.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Sometimes a cigar is just a cigar.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: I have only one moral precept. Never smoke more than five cigars at a time.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: I would rather smoke one cigar than hear two sermons.
quotes.author: Robert Green Ingersoll

quotes.quote: A cigarette is the only consumer product which when used as directed kills its consumer.
quotes.author: Gro Harlem Brundtland

quotes.quote: In old movies, the cinematography is a thousand times better than anything today. Writing, a thousand times better.
quotes.author: John Kricfalusi

quotes.quote: Cinematography is infinite in its possibilities... much more so than music or language.
quotes.author: Conrad Hall

quotes.quote: Cinematography is so much about instinct and intuition - you want the same range of experience going into behind the camera as what you see in front of it. Your life experience will come through the lens.
quotes.author: Rachel Morrison

quotes.quote: You make the movie through the cinematography - it sounds quite a simple idea, but it was like a huge revelation to me.
quotes.author: Nicolas Roeg

quotes.quote: I like movies where you can come back and re-watch them and admire the cinematography 25 years later.
quotes.author: Rob Zombie

quotes.quote: Cinematography speaks to everything that women do inherently well: It's multitasking, it's empathy, and it's channeling visuals into human emotion.
quotes.author: Rachel Morrison

quotes.quote: A lot of cinematography is intuition. It's an art, not a formula.
quotes.author: Reed Morano

quotes.quote: What sets us apart is our drive to have the best cinematography. We work hard to get shots that nobody else has.
quotes.author: Steve Winter

quotes.quote: The future of cinematography belongs to a new race of young solitaries who will shoot films by putting their last penny into it and not let themselves be taken in by the material routines of the trade.
quotes.author: Robert Bresson

quotes.quote: I think people just see cinematography as being about photography and innovative shots and beautiful lighting. We all want our movies to look great visually, to be beguiling and enticing, but I think that what really defines a great cinematographer is one who loves story.
quotes.author: Seamus MacGarvey

quotes.quote: Eventually, I think cinematography for every culture is a way to explore different stories, different ways of also delivering a story.
quotes.author: Violante Placido

quotes.quote: I don't really believe in the mystery of cinematography - what happens in the camera is what the cinematographers create and all that nonsense.
quotes.author: Roger Dea

quotes.quote: The cinematography is as much involved with the physicality of the scene, so a lot of our shots are hand-held. I felt the cinematographer needed to be the fourth-character with the same drive as the actors.
quotes.author: J. Robert Spencer

quotes.quote: Not all pictures but some pictures you're like, 'Wow, I wish I could be there' or you feel like you are there. I don't know what it is about cinematography.
quotes.author: Scoot McNairy

quotes.quote: I believe that filmmakers have to internalize the story and subtext so well that all of the departments can start to speak to each other - that music can speak to cinematography, that can speak to writing and back again.
quotes.author: Shane Carruth

quotes.quote: The incredible cinematography makes 'A Walk to Beautiful' almost like a poem; there is a tenderness on display that seems to emanate from the camera. There is also great sensitivity to the women whose stories are being told - never did I have a sense of the subjects being exploited.
quotes.author: Abraham Verghese

quotes.quote: Some directors don't get involved in the cinematography and are just about story, but I'm definitely more tactile than that in terms of my involvement in the minutiae.
quotes.author: Cary Fukunaga

quotes.quote: Cinematography is a writing with images in movement and with sounds.
quotes.author: Robert Bresson

quotes.quote: Eventually, I think cinematography for every culture is a way to explore different stories, different ways of also delivering a story.
quotes.author: Violante Placido

quotes.quote: And the best films feel like a fist punching you in the solar plexus and all elements of the filmmaking process - the acting, the design, the cinematography, the music, is all working to one end.
quotes.author: Ethan Hawke

quotes.quote: A circle is the reflection of eternity. It has no beginning and it has no end - and if you put several circles over each other, then you get a spiral.
quotes.author: Maynard James Keenan

quotes.quote: Circle are praised, not that abound, In largeness, but the exactly round.
quotes.author: Edmund Waller

quotes.quote: A circle is the longest distance to same point.
quotes.author: Tom Stoppard

quotes.quote: The circle of the return to birth can only remain open, but this is a chance, a sign of life, and a wound.
quotes.author: Jacques Derrida

quotes.quote: Until he extends his circle of compassion to include all living things, man will not himself find peace.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: You will never outperform your inner circle.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: All truth is crooked, time itself is a circle.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Describe a circle, stroke its back and it turns vicious.
quotes.author: Eugene Ionesco

quotes.quote: The circle of our understanding is a very restricted area.
quotes.author: T. S. Eliot

quotes.quote: It's unfair of a circle to accuse the angle of being sharp.
quotes.author: Multatuli

quotes.quote: A circle is a round straight line with a hole in the middle.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: The circle is the fundamental geometry of open human communication.
quotes.author: Harrison Owen

quotes.quote: All things from eternity are of like forms and come round in circle.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Don`t turn around in circles for making circles do not equate making progress.
quotes.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

quotes.quote: Circles, like the soul, are neverending and turn round and round without a stop.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Life is a full circle, widening until it joins the circle motions of the infinite.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.quote: In a narrow circle the mind grows narrow. The more one expands, the larger their aims.
quotes.author: Friedrich Schiller

quotes.quote: Draw a circle, not a heart, around the one you love because a heart can break but a circle goes on forever.
quotes.author: Danny Kaye

quotes.quote: There is an imaginary circle drawn around every human being, over which no government should be able to step.
quotes.author: John Stuart Mill

quotes.quote: The spiral is a spiritualized circle. In the spiral form, the circle, uncoiled, has ceased to be vicious; it has been set free.
quotes.author: Vladimir Nabokov

quotes.quote: Everybody's got a different circle of competence. The important thing is not how big the circle is. The important thing is staying inside the circle.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: The limited circle is pure.
quotes.author: Franz Kafka

quotes.quote: In measuring a circle, one begins anywhere.
quotes.author: Charles Fort

quotes.quote: The circle of divine love has not remained closed.
quotes.author: Kallistos Ware

quotes.quote: Could it be that my circle is largely black and that it is why I am influential in black circles but not in white circles?
quotes.author: Louis Farrakhan

quotes.quote: Who runs in circles never gets far.
quotes.author: Thornton Burgess

quotes.quote: Dark circles are my charisma though.
quotes.author: Seungri

quotes.quote: We are all joined in a circle of stories.
quotes.author: Linda Joy Myers

quotes.quote: If you cut corners you just keep on going in circles.
quotes.author: Grant Stoelwinder

quotes.quote: Life is a nonstop circle; learn to live it from the first round.
quotes.author: Lucero Isaac

quotes.quote: Giving never moves in a straight line - it always moves in circles.
quotes.author: Robert H. Schuller

quotes.quote: Life is a circle. The end of one journey is the beginning of the next.
quotes.author: Joseph M. Marshall III

quotes.quote: A circle may be small, yet it may be as mathematically beautiful and perfect as a large one.
quotes.author: Isaac D'Israeli

quotes.quote: Life is sort of a circle. You come back to a lot of the interests that you had early in life.
quotes.author: Eric Kandel

quotes.quote: Suppose time is a circle, bending back on itself. The world repeats itself, precisely, endlessly.
quotes.author: Alan Lightman

quotes.quote: A great deal of beauty is rapture. A circle is a necessity. Otherwise you would see no one. We each have our circle.
quotes.author: Gertrude Stein

quotes.quote: This is not a full circle. It's life carrying on. It's the next breath we all take. It's the choice we make to get on with it.
quotes.author: Alexandra Fuller

quotes.quote: Don't compare yourself with anyone else. The world is full of runners, so you'll probably see one every time you circle the block or your favorite park. Some will be thinner than you, some smoother-striding, some faster. But don't let this get you down. There's only one runner who really counts: you. Running is your activity. Make it work for you, and don't worry about anyone else.
quotes.author: Amby Burfoot

quotes.quote: All life goes in a circle, around and around, you started at one place, and then came right back to it again.
quotes.author: Ann Petry

quotes.quote: Create around one at least a small circle where matters are arranged as one wants them to be.
quotes.author: Anna Freud

quotes.quote: It's the circle of life, and it moves us all, through despair and hope, through faith and love, 'till we find our place, on the path unwinding.
quotes.author: Elton John

quotes.quote: Trust is hard to come by. That's why my circle is small and tight. I'm kind of funny about making new friends.
quotes.author: Eminem

quotes.quote: Blessed is he who talks in circles, for he shall become a big wheel.
quotes.author: Frank Dane

quotes.quote: Time was not passing it was turning in a circle.
quotes.author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

quotes.quote: Every limit is a beginning as well as an ending.
quotes.author: George Eliot.

quotes.quote: Time will generally lessen the interest of every attachment not within the daily circle.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: When people show loyalty to you, you take care of those who are with you. It's how it goes with everything. If you have a small circle of friends, and one of those friends doesn't stay loyal to you, they don't stay your friend for very long.
quotes.author: John Cena

quotes.quote: The whole universe is based on rhythms. Everything happens in circles, in spirals.
quotes.author: John Hartford

quotes.quote: There must be a positive and negative in everything in the universe in order to complete a circuit or circle, without which there would be no activity, no motion.
quotes.author: John Mcdonald

quotes.quote: If we hope to go anywhere or develop ourselves in any way, we can only step from where we are standing. If we don't really know where we are standing. We may only go in circles
quotes.author: Jon Kabat-Zinn

quotes.quote: Life is like a circle and you have to know when to move on. Success and failure are a part and parcel of it.
quotes.author: Prosenjit Chatterjee

quotes.quote: The circle of our understanding is a very restricted area.
quotes.author: T. S. Eliot.

quotes.quote: Life comes full circle.
quotes.author: Tracey Gold

quotes.quote: Mankind is not a circle with a single center but an ellipse with two focal points of which facts are one and ideas the other.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: First a warning, musical; then the hour, irrevocable. The leaden circles dissolved in the air.
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.quote: O, swear not by the moon, the fickle moon, the inconstant moon, that monthly changes in her circle orb, Lest that thy love prove likewise variable
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Man is not the creature of circumstances, circumstances are the creatures of men. We are free agents, and man is more powerful than matter.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: Circumstances are the rulers of the weak; they are but the instruments of the wise.
quotes.author: Samuel Lover

quotes.quote: The great advantage of being human is that we can employ rational thought and resolve to change our circumstances.
quotes.author: Mariella Frostrup

quotes.quote: Circumstances give in reality to every political principle its distinguishing color and discriminating effect. The circumstances are what render every civil and political scheme beneficial or noxious to mankind.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: Circumstances sometimes require, that rights the most unquestionable should be advanced with delicacy.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: You can blame circumstances, but backsliding always begins in the heart.
quotes.author: Aiden Wilson Tozer

quotes.quote: Your character should always be stronger than your circumstances.
quotes.author: Dave Willis

quotes.quote: Circumstances may cause interruptions and delays, but never lose sight of your goal.
quotes.author: Mario Andretti

quotes.quote: Circumstances do not determine state of being; state of being determines circumstances.
quotes.author: Darryl Anka

quotes.quote: There's no doubt that relationships do suffer when circumstances change profoundly.
quotes.author: Marian Keyes

quotes.quote: Bad circumstances have a way of ruining things that would otherwise be pleasant.
quotes.author: Daniel Handler

quotes.quote: Our circumstances answer to our expectations and the demand of our natures.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: The peculiar circumstances of the moment may render a measure more or less wise, but cannot render it more or less constitutional.
quotes.author: John Marshall

quotes.quote: Every circumstance in life, no matter how crooked and distorted and ugly it appears to be, if it is reacted to in love and forgiveness and obedience to your will can be transformed.
quotes.author: Hannah Hurnard

quotes.quote: Circumstances are the seeds of literature.
quotes.author: Salvador De Madariaga

quotes.quote: It is our relation to circumstances that determines their influence upon us.
quotes.author: Christian N. Bovee

quotes.quote: If you are not consciously directing your life, you will lose your footing and circumstances will decide for you.
quotes.author: Michael Beckwith

quotes.quote: Circumstances do not determine a man, they reveal him.
quotes.author: James Lane Allen

quotes.quote: Constrained circumstances can bring the best out of you.
quotes.author: Cameron Mackintosh

quotes.quote: It is difficult to think of any circumstances where learning may be said to be impossible.
quotes.author: Michael Joseph Oakeshott

quotes.quote: Physical circumstance will not cause happiness. Or if it does, there is the fear of loss. Now you are a slave to it. You have become bound to it.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: A positive attitude gives you power over your circumstances instead of your circumstances having power over you.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.quote: To know all about anything is to know how to deal with it under all circumstances.
quotes.author: William Kingdon Clifford

quotes.quote: In difficult circumstances always act on first impressions.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: Do not let circumstances control you. You change your circumstances.
quotes.author: Jackie Chan

quotes.quote: Circumstances are beyond human control, but our conduct is in our own power.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: One does not plan and then try to make circumstances fit the plans. One tries to make plans fit the circumstances.
quotes.author: George S. Patton

quotes.quote: The range of circumstances in which it is possible to presuppose the presence of a combination is very limited. The presence of such circumstances is the reason for the genesis of the idea in the master's brain.
quotes.author: Emanuel Lasker

quotes.quote: The circumstances of others seem good to us, while ours seem good to others.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: The circumstances of human society are too complicated to be submitted to the rigor of mathematical calculation.
quotes.author: Marquis de Custine

quotes.quote: Circumstances can be very important. Find the right people to work with.
quotes.author: Steve Lacy

quotes.quote: You can't let your current circumstances dictate what kind of choices you make.
quotes.author: Kelly Clark

quotes.quote: You are not your circumstances. You are your possibilities. If you know that, you can do anything.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Don't allow circumstance to hold you back- even negative ones. You don't have to let your circumstances define you. You can define yourself, and the best way to find yourself is through education.
quotes.author: Mary Hatwood Futrell

quotes.quote: Circumstances which we have resented, situations which we have found desperately difficult, have all been the means in the hands of God of driving the nails into the self-life which so easily complains.
quotes.author: Alan Redpath

quotes.quote: Your present circumstances don't determine where you can go; they merely determine where you start.
quotes.author: Nido Qubein

quotes.quote: To be in circumstances that are working upon us, that from time to time place us in front of great natural Things - that is all we need.
quotes.author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quotes.quote: The circumstances of your life have uniquely qualified you to make a contribution. And if you don't make that contribution, nobody else can make it.
quotes.author: Rabbi Harold Kushner

quotes.quote: Circumstances in the world of politics contribute substantially to whether or not you can be successful.
quotes.author: Willie Brown

quotes.quote: Circumstances are seldom right. You never have the capacities, the strength, the wisdom, the virtue you ought to have. You must always do with less than you need in a situation vastly different from what you would have chosen.
quotes.author: Charlton Ogburn

quotes.quote: Under certain circumstances there are few hours in life more agreeable than the hour dedicated to the ceremony known as afternoon tea.
quotes.author: Henry James

quotes.quote: Whatever life we have experienced, if we can tell our story to someone who listens, we find it easier to deal with our circumstances.
quotes.author: Margaret J. Wheatley

quotes.quote: Circumstances will never determine your amount of happiness. Circumstances only highlight who you already are.
quotes.author: Dan Miller

quotes.quote: We can let circumstances rule us, or we can take charge and rule our lives from within.
quotes.author: Earl Nightingale

quotes.quote: The greater part of our happiness or misery depends upon our dispositions, and not upon our circumstances.
quotes.author: Martha Washington

quotes.quote: Hope is the power of being cheerful in circumstances that we know to be desperate.”
quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Happiness has to do with your mindset, not with outside circumstance.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Worry is most often a prideful way of thinking that you have more control over life and its circumstances than you actually do.
quotes.author: June Hunt

quotes.quote: Faithfulness imparts God's reason for all circumstances. No matter what the world says, losing is no longer an option.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: A failure is not always a mistake, it may simply be the best one can do under the circumstances. The real mistake is to stop trying.
quotes.author: B. F. Skinner

quotes.quote: There are no extraordinary men... just extraordinary circumstances that ordinary men are forced to deal with.
quotes.author: William Halsey

quotes.quote: To become mindfully aware of our surroundings is to bring our thinking back to our present moment reality and to the possibility of some semblance of serenity in the face of circumstances outside our ability to control.
quotes.author: Jeff Kober

quotes.quote: The key to abundance is meeting limited circumstances with unlimited thoughts.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: Never under any circumstances take a sleeping pill and a laxative on the same night.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: Circumstances rule men; men do not rule circumstances.
quotes.author: Herodotus

quotes.quote: Achievement is not always success, while reputed failure often is. It is honest endeavor, persistent effort to do the best possible under any and all circumstances.
quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.quote: My faith helps me understand that circumstances don't dictate my happiness, my inner peace.
quotes.author: Denzel Washington

quotes.quote: There's always going to be the circumstances you can't plan for. There's always the unexpected relevance and the serendipity.
quotes.author: Jason Silva

quotes.quote: Man is the creature of circumstances.
quotes.author: Robert Owen

quotes.quote: True consistency, that of the prudent and the wise, is to act in conformity with circumstances and not to act always the same way under a change of circumstances.
quotes.author: John C. Calhoun

quotes.quote: Nothing gives one person so much advantage over another as to remain always cool and unruffled under all circumstances.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: Happiness is an attitude of mind, born of the simple determination to be happy under all outward circumstances.
quotes.author: J. Donald Walters

quotes.quote: Everything can be taken from a man but one thing: the last of human freedoms - to choose one's attitude in any given set of circumstances, to choose one's own way.
quotes.author: Viktor E. Frankl

quotes.quote: A happy person is not a person in a certain set of circumstances, but rather a person with a certain set of attitudes.
quotes.author: Hugh Downs

quotes.quote: The people who get on in this world are the people who get up and look for the circumstances they want and if they can't find them, make them.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: The ideal man bears the accidents of life with dignity and grace, making the best of circumstances.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Not a sentence or a word is independent of the circumstances under which it is uttered.
quotes.author: Alfred North Whitehead

quotes.quote: Even under the most difficult circumstances you can have creative flexibility.
quotes.author: Anne M. Mulcahy

quotes.quote: It's not your circumstances that shape you, it's how you react to your circumstances.
quotes.author: Anne Ortlund

quotes.quote: We are not creatures of circumstance; we are creators of circumstance.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: Don't let circumstances distress you. Rather, look for the will of God for your life to be revealed in and through those circumstances.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Happiness is not in our circumstances, but in ourselves. It is not something we see, like a rainbow, or feel, like the heat of the fire. Happiness is something we are.
quotes.author: John B. Sheerin

quotes.quote: The circumstances we ask God to change are often the circumstances God is using to change us.
quotes.author: Max Lucado

quotes.quote: Joy is not dependent on circumstances; it is your own. It is not a titillation produced by things; it is a state of peace, of silence-a meditative state. It is spiritual.
quotes.author: Osho

quotes.quote: We can let the circumstances of our lives harden us so that we become increasingly resentful and afraid, or we can let them soften us, and make us kinder. We always have the choice.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Next to a circus there ain't nothing that packs up and tears out faster than the Christmas spirit.
quotes.author: Kin Hubbard

quotes.quote: I have become rather like King Midas, except that everything turns not into gold but into a circus.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Something about the circus stirs their souls, and they ache for it when it is absent.
quotes.author: Erin Morgenstern

quotes.quote: If you can't ride two horses at once, you shouldn't be in the circus.
quotes.author: James Maxton

quotes.quote: The circus comes as close to being the world in microcosm as anything I know. In a way, it puts all the rest of show business in the shade.
quotes.author: E. B. White

quotes.quote: Circus a place where horses, ponies and elephants are permitted to see men, women and children acting the fool.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: Give them bread and circuses and they will never revolt.
quotes.author: Juvenal

quotes.quote: Every country gets the circus it deserves. Spain gets bullfights. Italy gets the Catholic Church. America gets Hollywood.
quotes.author: Erica Jong

quotes.quote: A national political campaign is better than the best circus ever heard of, with a mass baptism and a couple of hangings thrown in.
quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

quotes.quote: A circus is like a mother in whom one can confide and who rewards and punishes.
quotes.author: Burt Lancaster

quotes.quote: Two things only the people actually desire. Bread and circuses.
quotes.author: Juvenal

quotes.quote: Politicians were like talking dogs in a circus. The fact that they existed was uncommonly interesting, but no sane person would actually believe what they said.
quotes.author: Alan Furst

quotes.quote: Time is a circus, always packing up and moving away.
quotes.author: Ben Hecht

quotes.quote: Nobody should try to play comedy unless they have a circus going on inside.
quotes.author: Ernst Lubitsch

quotes.quote: In a world full of lions and tigers entertaining the masses, have you ever seen a wolf performing in a circus?
quotes.author: Akilnathan Logeswaran

quotes.quote: The circus is the only fun you can buy that is good for you.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: All I say is, if you cannot ride two horses you have no right in the circus.One day the good times had to keep on rolling, and all of life's horseshit would turn to circuses.
quotes.author: Christopher Moore

quotes.quote: If you surround yourself with clowns, don't be surprised when your life resembles a circus.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Life is a circus ring, with some moments more spectacular than others.
quotes.author: Janusz Korczak

quotes.quote: The circus arrives without warning. No announcements precede it. It is simply there, when yesterday it was not.
quotes.author: Erin Morgenstern

quotes.quote: Just cause you got the monkey off your back doesn't mean the circus has left town.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: Nothing is what one thinks it is. Cloth is stone and circus is an art. There are no certainties.
quotes.author: Walter Moers

quotes.quote: Despair is the constant companion of the clown.
quotes.author: Angela Carter

quotes.quote: For a long time, I debated about whether I would make movies or join the circus and work as a clown.
quotes.author: Denis Lavant

quotes.quote: The circus itself is my personal ideal entertainment venue.
quotes.author: Erin Morgenstern

quotes.quote: The most important political office is that of the private citizen.
quotes.author: Louis D. Brandeis

quotes.quote: Citizen participation is a device whereby public officials induce nonpublic individuals to act in a way the officials desire.
quotes.author: Daniel Patrick Moynihan

quotes.quote: It's important for the citizens of this country and the citizens of the world to know there were more American citizens on that flight than citizens from any other country.
quotes.author: James Hall

quotes.quote: The good citizen need not of necessity possess the virtue which makes a good man.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: The best principles of our republic secure to all its citizens a perfect equality of rights.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: As long as ordinary citizens are as corrupt as the politicians in their daily lifestyle, the country will continue to suffer.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: The most important thing an institution does is not to prepare a student for a career but for a life as a citizen.
quotes.author: Frank Newman

quotes.quote: If a man be gracious and courteous to strangers, it shows he is a citizen of the world.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: There is much more to being a patriot and a citizen than reciting the pledge or raising a flag.
quotes.author: Jesse Ventura

quotes.quote: Our citizens deserve the best and they're not getting the best right now. There are some things that are suffering because you just can't give it your entire effort. This is not really the way we want to do this.
quotes.author: Sonia Brock

quotes.quote: Every citizen has to figure out what kind of government he or she wants.
quotes.author: Stephen Breyer

quotes.quote: The citizens begin by giving up some part of the constitution, and so with greater ease the government change something else which is a little more important, until they have undermined the whole fabric of the state.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Every good citizen makes his country's honor his own, and cherishes it not only as precious but as sacred. He is willing to risk his life in its defence and is conscious that he gains protection while he gives it.
quotes.author: Andrew Jackson

quotes.quote: Every good citizen should be willing to devote a brief time during some one day in the year, when necessary, to the making up of a listing of his income for taxes to contribute to his Government, not the scriptural tithe, but a small percentage of his net profits.
quotes.author: Cordell Hull

quotes.quote: The humblest citizen of all the land, when clad in the armor of a righteous cause, is stronger than all the hosts of error.
quotes.author: William Jennings Bryan

quotes.quote: Healthy citizens are the greatest asset any country can have.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: When the citizens at large administer the state for the common interest, the government is called by the generic name a constitution.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: The decisions of citizens either in matters of private business or political life of the nation, are directly related to the prevailing value system of the nation.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: Citizens in a democracy need diverse sources of news and information.
quotes.author: Bernie Sanders

quotes.quote: To require a citizen to sign a loyalty oath is to destroy some of the loyalty he could otherwise claim, since any subsequent loyal behavior may then be attributed to the oath.
quotes.author: B. F. Skinner

quotes.quote: A citizen should render to the state all the services he can as soon as the sovereign demands them.
quotes.author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

quotes.quote: Citizenship is a tough occupation which obliges the citizen to make his own informed opinion and stand by it.
quotes.author: Martha Gellhorn

quotes.quote: To be a citizen in a democracy, a human being must be given a healthy start.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: To be a good citizen, it's important to be able to put yourself in other people's shoes and see the big picture. If everything you see is rooted in your own identity, that becomes difficult or impossible.
quotes.author: Eli Pariser

quotes.quote: It is a duty of every citizen to pray for those who are authority and the nation; so that each one of us may live a peaceful and quiet lives in sacredness.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: As citizens, we all have an obligation to intervene and become involved it's the citizen who changes things.
quotes.author: Jose Saramago

quotes.quote: A knowledgeable citizen is a powerful citizen because knowledge is power! Make your nation a powerful one. Keep reading to acquire more knowledge! Let books be your friends; never disappoint them by not studying them frequently!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: The first requisite of a good citizen in this republic of ours is that he shall be able and willing to pull his own weight.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Every good citizen adds to the strength of a nation.
quotes.author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quotes.quote: Citizens are all equal in politics: we each have one vote.
quotes.author: Elayne Boosler

quotes.quote: The great mass of our citizens require only to understand matters rightly, to form right decisions.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: Good citizenship and defending democracy means living up to the ideals and values that make this country great.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: One good teacher in a lifetime may sometimes change a delinquent into a solid citizen.
quotes.author: Philip Wylie

quotes.quote: The citizen who criticizes his country is paying it an implied tribute.
quotes.author: J. William Fulbright

quotes.quote: The citizen giving a statement to the government is not greeted in any way by the government, and the government is giving a notice to the public not to be greeted in any way by the citizen.
quotes.author: Enock Maregesi

quotes.quote: It is the duty of every citizen according to his best capacities to give validity to his convictions in political affairs.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Strengthening our identity is one way or reinforcing people's confidence and sense of citizenship and well-being.
quotes.author: David Blunkett

quotes.quote: A citizenship of wholesale delegation and abdication to public and private power systems, such as prevails now, makes such periodic checks as elections little more than rituals.
quotes.author: Ralph Nader

quotes.quote: Citizenship is an attitude, a state of mind, an emotional conviction that the whole is greater than the part. and that the part should be humbly proud to sacrifice itself that the whole may live.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: The test of good citizenship is loyalty to country.
quotes.author: Bainbridge Colby

quotes.quote: Citizenship is a tough occupation which obliges the citizen to make his own informed opinion and stand by it.
quotes.author: Martha Gellhorn

quotes.quote: The first requisite of a good citizen in this republic of ours is that he shall be able and willing to pull his own weight.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: There can be no daily democracy without daily citizenship.
quotes.author: Ralph Nader

quotes.quote: Citizenship means every four years you put a mark somewhere and you go home and let other guys run the world. It's a very destructive ideology.
quotes.author: Noam Chomsky

quotes.quote: It is the duty of every citizen according to his best capacities to give validity to his convictions in political affairs.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Active citizenship begins with an envisioning of the desired outcome and a conscious application of spiritual principles.
quotes.author: Dennis Kucinich

quotes.quote: Citizenship consists in the service of the country.
quotes.author: Jawaharlal Nehru

quotes.quote: We can never get a re-creation of community and heal our society without giving our citizens a sense of belonging.
quotes.author: Patch Adams

quotes.quote: We are citizens of the world. The tragedy of our times is that we do not know this.
quotes.author: Woodrow Wilson

quotes.quote: It is not always the same thing to be a good man and a good citizen.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Every good citizen makes his country's honor his own, and cherishes it not only as precious but as sacred. He is willing to risk his life in its defense and its conscious that he gains protection while he gives it.
quotes.author: Andrew Jackson

quotes.quote: Citizenship comes first today in our crowded world. No man can enjoy the privileges of education and thereafter with a clear conscience break his contract with society. To respect that contract is to be mature, to strengthen it is to be a good citizen, to do more than your share under it is noble.
quotes.author: Isaiah Bowman

quotes.quote: Citizenship is what makes a republic; monarchies can get along without it
quotes.author: Mark Twain
