quotes.quote: In your serenity there is a clarity, strength and correctness that is beyond the petty scuffles of the moment — a greater truth.
quotes.author: Bryant McGill

quotes.quote: There's no clarity. There was never meant to be clarity.
quotes.author: Charles Bukowski

quotes.quote: Clarity and truth will be plenty, if I can only achieve them.
quotes.author: Octavia E. Butler

quotes.quote: Clarity equals victory.
quotes.author: Shane Kuhn

quotes.quote: Clarity is the counterbalance of profound thoughts.
quotes.author: Luc de Clapiers Marquis de Vauvenargues

quotes.quote: The natural mind is full of purity and clarity, to preserve it is paramount.
quotes.author: Daniel Kempe

quotes.quote: Moments of moral clarity are rare in life, and they are exceedingly precious.
quotes.author: Susan Neiman

quotes.quote: Whatever else you may need to get clarity, you must start with open eyes.
quotes.author: Susan Neiman

quotes.quote: Self-praise is for losers. Be a winner. Stand for something. Always have class, and be humble.
quotes.author: John Madden

quotes.quote: Show class, have pride, and display character. If you do, winning takes care of itself.
quotes.author: Bear Bryant

quotes.quote: There is no class so pitiably wretched as that which possesses money and nothing else.
quotes.author: Andrew Carnegie

quotes.quote: Class is considerate of others. It knows that good manners is nothing more than a series of petty sacrifices.
quotes.author: Ann Landers

quotes.quote: Class never tries to build itself up by tearing others down. Class is already up and need not strive to look better by making others look worse.
quotes.author: Ann Landers

quotes.quote: There is a working class - strong and happy - among both rich and poor: there is an idle class - weak, wicked, and miserable - among both rich and poor.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.quote: Society is composed of two great classes — those who have more dinners than appetite, and those who have more appetite than dinners.
quotes.author: Sébastien-Roch Nicolas

quotes.quote: The modern world belongs to the half-educated, a rather difficult class, because they do not realize how little they know.
quotes.author: William R. Inge

quotes.quote: Capitalism has always been a failure for the lower classes. It is now beginning to fail for the middle classes.
quotes.author: Howard Zinn

quotes.quote: There is always more misery among the lower classes than there is humanity in the higher.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Class is an aura of confidence that is being sure without being cocky. Class has nothing to do with money. Class never runs scared. It is self-discipline and self-knowledge. It's the sure-footedness that comes with having proved you can meet life.
quotes.author: Ann Landers

quotes.quote: There are three classes of men; lovers of wisdom, lovers of honor, and lovers of gain.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: I believe, if we take habitual drunkards as a class, their heads and their hearts will bear an advantageous comparison with those of any other class.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: It is almost as difficult to keep a first class person in a fourth class job, as it is to keep a fourth class person in a first class job.
quotes.author: Paul H. Dunn

quotes.quote: Let the others have the charisma. I've got the class.
quotes.author: George Bush

quotes.quote: There is only one class in the community that thinks more about money than the rich, and that is the poor.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Each class of society has its own requirements; but it may be said that every class teaches the one immediately below it; and if the highest class be ignorant, uneducated, loving display, luxuriousness, and idle, the same spirit will prevail in humbler life.
quotes.author: Source Unknown

quotes.quote: Upper classes are a nation's past; the middle class is its future.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: There is nothing to which men cling more tenaciously than the privileges of class.
quotes.author: Leonard Woolf

quotes.quote: The danger is not that a particular class is unfit to govern: every class is unfit to govern.
quotes.author: Lord Acton

quotes.quote: Class is entirely intangible, and the way it affects things isn't subject to scientific analysis, and it's not supposed to be real but it's pervasive and powerful. See; just like magic.
quotes.author: Jo Walton

quotes.quote: There’s class warfare, all right. But it’s my class, the rich class, that’s making war, and we’re winning.
quotes.author: Warren Buffet

quotes.quote: I'm a working-class person, working with class.
quotes.author: Karl Lagerfeld

quotes.quote: All mankind is divided into three classes: those that are immovable, those that are movable, and those that move.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: The enemy of society is middle class and the enemy of life is middle age.
quotes.author: Orson Welles

quotes.quote: Braininess is not attractive unless combined with some signs of elegance; class.
quotes.author: Alice Munro

quotes.quote: The fears of one class of men are not the measure of the rights of another.
quotes.author: George Bancroft

quotes.quote: True terror is to wake up one morning and discover that your high school class is running the country.
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.quote: While there is a lower class, I am in it, while there is a criminal element, I am of it, and while there is a soul in prison, I am not free.
quotes.author: Eugene V. Debs

quotes.quote: The distinctions separating the social classes are false; in the last analysis they rest on force.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: I learned early that class is universally admired. Almost any fault, sin or crime is considered more leniently if there’s a touch of class involved.
quotes.author: Frank W. Abagnale

quotes.quote: Sociologists call the process of the melting pot “social mobility.” One of America’s characteristics has always been the lack of a rigid class structure. It has traditionally been possible for people to move up the social and economic scale.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: For the ruling class, in general, politics is a question of aesthetics: a way of seeing themselves, of seeing the world, of constructing a personality. For us it was life or death.
quotes.author: Édouard Louis

quotes.quote: They had far more in common than either realised. One was born Catholic, the other Protestant. One was born Irish, the other British. But neither was the greatest difference between them. One was born rich and the other poor.
quotes.author: Joseph O'Connor

quotes.quote: The middle class were invented to give the poor hope; the poor, to make the rich feel special; the rich, to humble the middle class.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: We cannot have a just society that applies the principle of accountability to the powerless in the principle of forgiveness to the powerful.
quotes.author: Christopher Hayes

quotes.quote: A social democratic party without deep roots in the working class movement would quickly fade into an unrepresentative intellectual sect.
quotes.author: Roy Jenkins

quotes.quote: I couldn't help where I was born. I just wanted to be near my mother at the time.
quotes.author: George Bush

quotes.quote: In the 1990s, one billion middle-class people will be created in the world. And when people achieve middle class, they want to live like Americans.
quotes.author: Clark A. Johnson

quotes.quote: The prettiest sight in this fine pretty world is the privileged class enjoying its privileges.
quotes.author: James Stewart

quotes.quote: The most perfect political community is one in which the middle class is in control, and outnumbers both of the other classes.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: The history of all hitherto existing society is the history of class struggles.
quotes.author: Karl Marx and Friedrich Engels

quotes.quote: Being an MP is the sort of job all working class parents want for their children - clean, indoors and no heavy lifting.
quotes.author: Diane Abbott

quotes.quote: When I want to distinguish clearly the aristocratic class from the Philistines proper or middle class, I name the former, in my own mind the Barbarians.
quotes.author: Matthew Arnold

quotes.quote: An insular country, subject to fogs and with a powerful middle class, requires grave statesmen.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: To me, the term 'middle-class' connotes a safe, comfortable, middle-of-the-road policy. Above all, our language is 'middle-class' in the middle of our road. To drive it to one side or the other or even off the road, is the noblest task of the future.
quotes.author: Christian Morgenstern

quotes.quote: The world is divided into people who do things and people who get the credit. Try, if you can, to belong to the first class. There's far less competition.
quotes.author: Dwight Morrow

quotes.quote: The middle class is the backbone of England. In intellectual circles that's been absolutely unsayable.
quotes.author: Joanna Trollope

quotes.quote: I'll go through life either first class or third, but never in second.
quotes.author: Noel Coward

quotes.quote: At the bottom, people tend to believe that class is defined by the amount of money you have. In the middle, people grant that money has to do with it, but think education and the kind of work you do almost equally important. Never the top, people perceive that taste, values, ideas, style, and behaviour are indispensable criteria of class, regardless of money or occupation or education.
quotes.author: Paul Fussell

quotes.quote: There are only two classes in society: those who get more than they earn, and those who earn more than they get.
quotes.author: Holbrook Jackson

quotes.quote: In class society everyone lives as a member of a particular class, and every kind of thinking, without exception, is stamped with the brand of a class.
quotes.author: Mao Tsetung

quotes.quote: The social energy which maintains the class structure produces perverted culture in its three chief forms: mere upper-class culture, or ostentation, mere middle-class culture, or vulgarity, and mere lower-class culture, or squalor.
quotes.author: Northrop Frye

quotes.quote: The middle class is always a firm champion of equality when it concerns a class above it; but it is the inveterate foe when it concerns elevating a class below it.
quotes.author: Orestes A. Brownson

quotes.quote: Us middle class never have to worry about having old furniture to point out to our friends. We buy it on payments, and before it's paid for, it's plenty antique.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: An intelligent class can scarce ever be, as a class, and never, as a class, indolent. The excited mental activity operates as a counterpoise to the stimulus of sense and appetite.
quotes.author: Edward Everett

quotes.quote: A nation composed of all classes should be governed by no one class exclusively. All should be included, and none excluded. Thus aggrieved classes would be rendered impossible.
quotes.author: Frederick Douglass

quotes.quote: There's a lot to be said for the Lords.
quotes.author: A. P. Herbert

quotes.quote: The Stately Homes of England, / How beautifully they stand, / To prove the upper classes / Have still the upper hand.
quotes.author: Noel Coward

quotes.quote: Spurn not the nobly born / With love affected, / Nor treat with virtuous scorn / The well-connected.
quotes.author: W. S. Gilbert

quotes.quote: I am a well-known elitist. I don't even own a pair of trainers. If I did, I am sure they would be very fragrant.
quotes.author: Lord Gowrie

quotes.quote: An aristocracy in a republic is like a chicken whose head has been cut off: it may run about in a lively way, but in fact it is dead.
quotes.author: Nancy Mitford

quotes.quote: Television is what made It's a Wonderful Life the classic it is today.
quotes.author: Leonard Maltin

quotes.quote: A classic is classic not because it conforms to certain structural rules, or fits certain definitions It is classic because of a certain eternal and irrepressible freshness.
quotes.author: Ezra Pound

quotes.quote: A classic is a book that doesn't have to be written again.
quotes.author: W. E. B. Du Bois

quotes.quote: A classic is a book that has never finished saying what it has to say.
quotes.author: Italo Calvino

quotes.quote: A classic is something that everybody wants to have read and nobody wants to read.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Classic literature is still something that hangs in the air like a song.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Classic is our daring, classic our cowardice. Classic is our cruelty, classic our charity.
quotes.author: Robert Ardrey

quotes.quote: There is but one way left to save a classic; to give up revering him and use him for our own salvation.
quotes.author: José Ortega y Gasset

quotes.quote: It is the nature of those books we call classics to wait patiently on the shelf for us to grow into them.
quotes.author: Erica Jong

quotes.quote: There are a thousand ways of playing a good classic. If it were effective, I would play Hamlet on a trapeze.
quotes.author: Orson Welles

quotes.quote: I just want to make a classic. Classic is the standard. I'm just trying to make music that will last a lifetime.
quotes.author: Yelawolf

quotes.quote: Classics are constantly being re-imagined and transformed, and the originals are none the worse for it; they endure.
quotes.author: Robert Gottlieb

quotes.quote: A classic is a book that survives the circumstances that made it possible yet alone keeps those circumstances alive.
quotes.author: Alfred Kazin

quotes.quote: A classic is a work which persists as a background noise even when a present that is totally incompatible with it holds sway.
quotes.author: Italo Calvino

quotes.quote: A classic is a classic for a reason. Let's try to create new classics. The idea of repeating ourselves drives me a little crazy.
quotes.author: Gina Prince-Bythewood

quotes.quote: The classics are only primitive literature. They belong to the same class as primitive machinery and primitive music and primitive medicine.
quotes.author: Stephen Leacock

quotes.quote: You look up after many years and you find that a film has become a classic because it's meaningful to people and alive, decade after decade.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: A classic is like a hidden treasure. Its core is buried under so many layers of varnish that it can be reached only by patience and infiltration.
quotes.author: Jean-Louis Barrault

quotes.quote: All the ancient classic fairy tales have always been scary and dark.
quotes.author: Helena Bonham Carter

quotes.quote: Classic art was the art of necessity: modern romantic art bears the stamp of caprice and chance.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: When you re-read a classic you do not see in the book more than you did before. You see more in you than there was before.
quotes.author: Clifton Fadiman

quotes.quote: The classic literature is always modern.
quotes.author: Edward Bulwer-Lytton

quotes.quote: To be a classic, a novel should be original.
quotes.author: Ruth Rendell

quotes.quote: A great song will be great forever – it’s timeless and classic in that way.
quotes.author: Kacey Musgraves

quotes.quote: Classics stay alive because a great actor or a great director wants to do them.
quotes.author: Scott Rudin

quotes.quote: Classic fairy tales do not deny the existence of heartache and sorrow, but they do deny universal defeat.
quotes.author: Greenhaven Press

quotes.quote: Classics can be phenomenal when done right. A simple roast chicken dish could be the best thing you ever eat.
quotes.author: Joe Bastianich

quotes.quote: The classics tell us that, in relationships, the one between teacher and student comes second only to the one between parent and child.
quotes.author: Lisa See

quotes.quote: Classic means standard as opposed to Romantic: form before meaning as opposed to meaning before form. It grows from inside out, while Romantic grows from outside in.
quotes.author: Ned Rorem

quotes.quote: Rock and roll keeps you in a constant state of juvenile delinquency.
quotes.author: Eddie Spaghetti

quotes.quote: In the end, the love you take is equal to the love you make.
quotes.author: Paul Mccartney

quotes.quote: By the eighties, a lot of radio stations had started playing sixties music. They called it Classic Rock, because they knew we'd be upset if they came right out and called it what it is, namely middle-aged-person nostalgia music.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: Rock and roll is not a musical genre; it is a communal spirit.
quotes.author: Gail Buckland

quotes.quote: Rock and Roll has no beginning and no end for it is the very pulse of life itself.
quotes.author: Larry Williams

quotes.quote: Rock and roll is a nuclear blast of reality in a mundane world where no-one is allowed to be magnificent.
quotes.author: Kim Fowley

quotes.quote: Heavy metal drives me bonkers, it makes me want to vomit, heavy metal really is a pile of puke.
quotes.author: Ian Gillan

quotes.quote: Rock and roll is a single, monolithic beast, manufactured solely for profit and the shattering of refined eardrums.
quotes.author: Robert Palmer

quotes.quote: The ability for a woman to orally satisfy somebody in a rock band, that's important to a rock â€˜n' roll musician.
quotes.author: Chad Kroeger

quotes.quote: Classic Rock radio gave us our longevity.
quotes.author: George Thorogood

quotes.quote: Love is mysterious and rad, like Steve Perry from Journey.
quotes.author: Diablo Cody

quotes.quote: You see, rock and roll isn't a career or hobby - it's a life force. It's something very essential.
quotes.author: The Edge

quotes.quote: I am Classic Rock Revisited. I revisit it every waking moment of my life because it has the spirit and the attitude and the fire and the middle finger. I am Rosa Parks with a Gibson guitar.
quotes.author: Ted Nugent

quotes.quote: Rock and roll is commitment. Rock and roll is passion and spirit.
quotes.author: Mick Fleetwood

quotes.quote: Rock and Roll is simply an attitude. You don't have to play the greatest guitar.
quotes.author: Johnny Thunders

quotes.quote: Rock'n'roll will never go away completely because it's so fundamentally attractive.
quotes.author: Alex Turner

quotes.quote: Every rock song is some variation of 'Pull down your pants'
quotes.author: Bruce Springsteen

quotes.quote: I have something to say: it's better to burn out, than to fade away.
quotes.author: Clancy Brown

quotes.quote: Classic rock' is never a label that we've given ourselves it's one of the many labels that's been imposed on us.
quotes.author: Ian Gillan

quotes.quote: I listened to classic rock and roll, and punk rock. 'Goon Squad' provides a pretty accurate playlist of my teenage years, though it leaves out 'The Who,' which was my absolute favorite band.
quotes.author: Jennifer Egan

quotes.quote: Living is Easy with Eyes Closed.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: Rock'n'roll starts between the legs and goes through the heart, then to the head. As long as it does those three things, it's a great rock song.
quotes.author: John Mellencamp

quotes.quote: Rock and roll ain't nothing but jazz with a hard backbeat.
quotes.author: Keith Richards

quotes.quote: When all is one and one is all, that's what it is To be a rock and not to roll.
quotes.author: Led Zeppelin

quotes.quote: It's better to burn out, than to fade away.
quotes.author: Neil Young

quotes.quote: But my everyday music is classic rock. It's what I relate to the most and where my heart is.
quotes.author: Nicole Richie

quotes.quote: I'm hugely inspired by music. I am a big listener of 60's and 70's classic rock. And i really just love the overall freedom of that time, of the late 60's and 70's. I love that you had so many different ways of expressing yourself, fashion was really one of them, the idea of clashing didn't exist, and people were using clothes as an opportunity to express who they were. That is inspiring to me - you could mix textiles, fabrics, you were 100% who you were, and that's where my main inspiration comes from.
quotes.author: Nicole Richie

quotes.quote: God bless classic rock. It's been very good to me; I'll tell you that.
quotes.author: Steve Lukather

quotes.quote: Classical music is an unbroken, living tradition that goes back over 1,000 years, and every one of those years has had something unique and powerful to say to us about what it's like to be alive.
quotes.author: Michael Tilson Thomas

quotes.quote: A love of classical music is only partially a natural response to hearing the works performed, it also must come about by a decision to listen carefully, to pay close attention, a decision inevitably motivated by the cultural and social prestige of the art.
quotes.author: Charles Rosen

quotes.quote: But classical music is not entertainment, and I feel viciously strong about that. Classical music is forever. Entertainment is something that is here today, and may be gone tomorrow.
quotes.author: Van Cliburn

quotes.quote: A good deal of classical music is, today, the opium of the good citizen.
quotes.author: George Steiner

quotes.quote: Everybody loves classical music they just don't know about it yet.
quotes.author: Benjamin Zander

quotes.quote: What is classical music if not the epitome of sensuality, passion, and understated erotica that popular music, even with all of its energy and life, cannot even begin to touch?
quotes.author: Lara St. John

quotes.quote: Music has always been transnational; people pick up whatever interests them, and certainly a lot of classical music has absorbed influences from all over the world.
quotes.author: Yo-Yo Ma

quotes.quote: If classical music is the state of the art, then the arts are in a sad state.
quotes.author: Frank Zappa

quotes.quote: The realm of classical music is so vast - not only in terms of style but of era, age and the purposes for which it was composed - it is an enormous art form.
quotes.author: David Finckel

quotes.quote: Classical music is a wonderful 1200 year-old tradition that witnesses everything that it has meant and what it means right now to be human.
quotes.author: Michael Tilson Thomas

quotes.quote: Even in classical music, the cello doesn't get a lot of respect because the piano and the violin get it all.
quotes.author: Luka Sulic

quotes.quote: But those musics do not address the larger kind of architecture in time that classical music does, whatever each one of us knows that classical music must mean.
quotes.author: Michael Tilson Thomas

quotes.quote: If you're alive, you have all the experience necessary to understand classical music.
quotes.author: Michael Tilson Thomas

quotes.quote: Because in classical music cello is not regarded as a popular choice, it's always playing the long, boring notes.
quotes.author: Luka Sulic

quotes.quote: The tradition of classical music and the opera is such that it used to be the place where social intercourse could take place between all parts of society: politicians, industrialists, artists, citizens, etc. That tradition, I think, still exists, but it's much, much more diluted.
quotes.author: Yo-Yo Ma

quotes.quote: Classical music's ability to translate emotional themes is fantastic.
quotes.author: Alan Price

quotes.quote: Classical music, fortunately or not, unfolds in time. It's not like a picture you can stare at for 10 seconds or 10 hours. You need the minimum amount of education and training, and society needs to find a way to study music - not only the performances, but how to compose, how to understand why Mozart was great at what he did.
quotes.author: Carlo Grante

quotes.quote: Classical music is a special taste like Greek language or pre-Columbian archeology, not a common culture of reciprocal communication and psychological shorthand.
quotes.author: Allan Bloom

quotes.quote: The basic difference between classical music and jazz is that in the former the music is always graver than its performance - whereas the way jazz is performed is always more important than what is being played.
quotes.author: Andre Previn

quotes.quote: Classical music requires an immense amount of concentration, and I don't know if I would've been that committed to that particular life.
quotes.author: Questlove

quotes.quote: Classical music gradually lost popularity because it is too complicated: you need twenty-five or thirty skilled musicians just to hum it properly. So people began to develop regular music.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: Life, like classical music, is full of difficult passages that are conquered as much through endurance and determination as through any particular skill.
quotes.author: Sheri L. Dew

quotes.quote: And what classical music does best and must always do more, is to show this kind of transformation of moods, to show a very wide psychological voyage. And I think that's something that we as classical musicians have underestimated.
quotes.author: Michael Tilson Thomas

quotes.quote: Listening to classical music is a journey not a state; it's an activity not a meditation.
quotes.author: Armando Iannucci

quotes.quote: It's not that people don't like classical music. It's that they don't have the chance to understand and to experience it.
quotes.author: Gustavo Dudamel

quotes.quote: You cannot go wrong by learning classical music because it trains the ear.
quotes.author: Kiesza

quotes.quote: Classical music is one of the best things that ever happened to mankind. If you get introduced to it in the right way, it becomes your friend for life.
quotes.author: Yo-Yo Ma

quotes.quote: The peculiar characteristic of classical music is that it is really better than it sounds.
quotes.author: Edgar Wilson Nye

quotes.quote: I feel that classical music should be a more recognizable part of everyone's entertainment. It has been my hope that through live concerts, motion pictures, recordings, international competitions, and interesting public forums, a larger group of people will learn to love classical music and attend live concert performances.
quotes.author: Jose Iturbi

quotes.quote: Classical music is the kind we keep thinking will turn into a tune.
quotes.author: Kin Hubbard

quotes.quote: Classical music can rock you!
quotes.author: Ji-Hae Park

quotes.quote: Classical music is always a really great way for me to get my chops to where I want them to be.
quotes.author: Lucia Micarelli

quotes.quote: Jazz will be the classical music of the future.
quotes.author: Dizzy Gillespie

quotes.quote: The human attitude of which classical music is the expression is always the same; it is always based on the same kind of insight into life and strives for the same kind of victory over blind change. Classical music as gesture signifies knowledge of the tragedy of the human condition, affirmation of human destiny, courage, cheerful serenity.
quotes.author: Hermann Hesse

quotes.quote: Classical music is far from boring - it has all the blood, energy, the sinister dark side, rhythm that rock music has, and all the refined, subtle sensuality that one can ask for.
quotes.author: Yuja Wang

quotes.quote: The classical music is soothing and stimulating, good for thinking.
quotes.author: Rolonda Watts

quotes.quote: Classical music has become rarefied, like a maiden aunt that nobody wants to talk to.
quotes.author: Charles Hazlewood

quotes.quote: Classical music is a genre of music. It's no more complex or less complex than pop music or R&B. The elitism is weird.
quotes.author: Theo Hutchcraft

quotes.quote: Contrary to popular opinion, classical music does not have to be enjoyed amid exclusive circles, there need not be any snobbishness attached to it. It's there for everyone. I play for the people.
quotes.author: Andre Rieu

quotes.quote: Obviously there are pieces of classical music that are some of the most beautiful music ever written, for me anyway is a lot of classical or contemporary music, so it's a different kind of space that you enter when you're listening to it.
quotes.author: Bryce Dessner

quotes.quote: My goal in the classroom was always to make sure they were having so much fun that they didn't realize they were learning.
quotes.author: Rick Riordan

quotes.quote: When you're educated, it allows you to be more worldly. It's more than just what happens in a classroom.
quotes.author: Jalen Rose

quotes.quote: Go out and do your drills that you do to try to get better. You lift your weights, try to take things from the classroom to grass, try to get better every day.
quotes.author: Julian Edelman

quotes.quote: The classroom was a jail of other people’s interests. The library was open, unending, free.
quotes.author: Ta-Nehisi Coates

quotes.quote: Classrooms have rarely been identified as the places where the greatest of human dramas unfold—the drama of igniting the human spirit, ennobling the human heart, and enriching the human experience.
quotes.author: IBM TV Commercial

quotes.quote: I've come to the frightening conclusion that I am the decisive element in the classroom. It is my personal approach that creates the climate. It is my daily mood that creates the weather. As a teacher, I possess a tremendous power to make a child's life miserable or joyous. I can be a tool of torture or an instrument of inspiration.
quotes.author: Haim Ginott

quotes.quote: I entered the classroom with the conviction that it was crucial for me and every other student to be an active participant, not a passive consumer... education that connects the will to know with the will to become.
quotes.author: Bell Hooks

quotes.quote: In an effective classroom, students should not only know what they are doing, they should also know why and how.
quotes.author: Harry Wong

quotes.quote: Events in our classrooms today will prompt world events tomorrow.
quotes.author: J.Lloyd Trump

quotes.quote: The future of the world is in my classroom today, a future with the potential for good or bad.
quotes.author: Ivan Welton Fitzwater

quotes.quote: A student of life considers the world a classroom.
quotes.author: Harvey Mackay

quotes.quote: The seeds of the Argument Culture can be found in our classrooms, where a teacher will introduce an article or an idea... setting up debates where people learn not to listen to each other because they're so busy trying to win the debate.
quotes.author: Deborah Tannen

quotes.quote: I thought the best teachers were the ones who could cram as much knowledge into students' heads as possible. Quickly, I discovered that the secret is to engage students so they leave your classroom asking even more questions.
quotes.author: Eric Langhorst

quotes.quote: The best classroom-management system is a great, engaging lesson. Take the time to plan carefully so that your students will enter your classroom every day wondering, "What exciting surprises does s/he have in store for me today?
quotes.author: Jason Kamras

quotes.quote: By understanding that school was the best place for some of my children, I became committed to making my classroom a place where students feel safe as well as creating an environment that provided joy to those with unfortunate lives.
quotes.author: Betsy Rogers

quotes.quote: Students need to be prepared to enter each classroom with the attitude that they are going to learn something that day.
quotes.author: Lee J. James

quotes.quote: Most teachers have little control over school policy or curriculum or choice of texts or special placement of students, but most have a great deal of autonomy inside the classroom. To a degree shared by only a few other occupations, such as police work, public education rests precariously on the skill and virtue of the people at the bottom of the institutional pyramid.
quotes.author: Tracy Kidder

quotes.quote: Good classroom management has much more to do with class than it does with management.
quotes.author: Todd Whitaker

quotes.quote: With good classroom management you may still not have learning, but without good classroom management you never will.
quotes.author: Todd Whitaker

quotes.quote: I have learned more in the streets than in any classroom.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: Look at your life as your main career and your divine classroom.
quotes.author: Judith Orloff

quotes.quote: The philosophy of the school room in one generation will be the philosophy of government in the next.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Classrooms don't need tech geeks who can teach; we need teaching geeks who can use tech.
quotes.author: David Geurin

quotes.quote: It's significant to realize that the most creative environments in our society are not the ever-changing ones. The artist's studio, the researcher's laboratory, the scholar's library are kept deliberately simple so as to support the complexities of the work in progress. They are deliberately kept predictable so the unpredictable can happen.
quotes.author: Lucy Calkins

quotes.quote: Who walks in the classroom cool and slow? / Who calls the English teacher Daddy-O? Charlie Brown, Charlie Brown / He's a clown, that Charlie Brown/ He's gonna get caught, just you wait and see / Why's everybody always pickin' on me?
quotes.author: Jerry Leiber

quotes.quote: Ring, ring goes the bell / The cook in the lunch room's ready to sell / You're lucky if you can find a seat / You're fortunate if you have time to eat / Back in the classroom, open your books / Keep up the teacher don't know how mean she looks.
quotes.author: Chuck Berry

quotes.quote: Structure comes / from the classroom / Imagery comes / from experience / And it’s hard / to structure / What you can’t / —see.
quotes.author: Kurt Philip Behm

quotes.quote: There are some lessons you can never find in a classroom, hence you need to learn from every person and every situation that you encounter.
quotes.author: Gugu Mona

quotes.quote: A classroom atmosphere that promotes reading does not come from the furniture and its placement as much as it comes from the teacher's expectation that students will read.
quotes.author: Donalyn Miller

quotes.quote: There's a difference between trying to control students and establishing control of your classroom. Rules are about compliance. Procedures are about coherence.
quotes.author: David Ginsburg

quotes.quote: The classroom should be an entrance into the world, not an escape from it.
quotes.author: John Ciardi

quotes.quote: Classroom is just a place to examine and to identify your classroom performance, not your life's success.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: She had a flair for doing things in a very elegant way. At the same time, you felt like you were right there in her living room. She paid attention to people so that she was seeing to it everyone's little needs and egos were met.
quotes.author: Harold Brooks

quotes.quote: The only real elegance is in the mind; If you've got that, the rest really comes from it.
quotes.author: Diana Vreeland

quotes.quote: A girl should be two things: classy and fabulous.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: A truly elegant taste is generally accompanied with excellency of heart.
quotes.author: Henry Fielding

quotes.quote: The beauty of a woman is not in the clothes she wears, the figure that she carries, or the way she combs her hair. The beauty of a woman is seen in her eyes, because that is the doorway to her heart, the place where love resides. True beauty in a woman is reflected in her soul. It's the caring that she lovingly gives, the passion that she shows and the beauty of a woman only grows with passing years.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: Being classy is a culmination of being yourself, being positive, and doing good in all the places you can by all the means you can. Clothes, hair, music, film....none of these things a classy person makes.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Elegance is the only beauty that never fades.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: Showing a great amount of skin when you dress up isn't the way to find prince charming. Prince charming likes his gifts wrapped.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Your clothes should be tight enough to show you're a woman but loose enough to show you're a lady.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: A sensible woman can never be happy with a fool.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: Beauty alone is not impressive. Put an Attitude to be attractive and add Brain to be sophisticated.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Classy is when a woman has everything to flaunt but chooses not to show it.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I love luxury. And luxury lies not in richness and ornateness but in the absence of vulgarity. Vulgarity is the ugliest word in our language. I stay in the game to fight it.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: I'm not a risk taker. I don't do plunging necklines or really short skirts. I try to stay as classy as possible and provide a little mystery.
quotes.author: Kristen Bell

quotes.quote: I don't understand how a woman can leave the house without fixing herself up a little - if only out of politeness. And then, you never know, maybe that s the day she has a date with destiny. And it s best to be as pretty as possible for destiny.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: There is in every true woman's heart, a spark of heavenly fire, which lies dormant in the broad daylight of prosperity, but which kindles up and beams and blazes in the dark hour of adversity.
quotes.author: Washington Irving

quotes.quote: You create beauty with your attitude,you make an impression with your behaviour,you make statements with your elegance & scream out with your actions
quotes.author: Sophia Elemara

quotes.quote: Be the kind of woman that makes other women want to be you.
quotes.author: Topaz

quotes.quote: A woman with a voice is by definition a strong woman. But the search to find that voice can be remarkably difficult.
quotes.author: Melinda Gates

quotes.quote: Classy women never lose their dignity.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I am a marvelous housekeeper. Every time I leave a man I keep his house.
quotes.author: Zsa Zsa Gabor

quotes.quote: You know, people want to honor me, and on the one hand I just don't want to be a poster child; but on the other, I want to do something classy and great, something where the residuals will go to the cause.
quotes.author: Carly Simon

quotes.quote: Simplicity is the ultimate form of sophistication.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: There are so many pressures that are put upon young women. Whatever we can do to alleviate that and help women feel beautiful about who we are inside, which is the only beauty there truly is, is so nice. Let's get down and dirty. Let's be a real girl.
quotes.author: Drew Barrymore

quotes.quote: The whisper of a pretty girl can be heard further than the roar of a lion.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: A woman is the full circle. Within her is the power to create, nurture and transform.
quotes.author: Diane Mariechild

quotes.quote: Women have to harness their power-it's absolutely true. It's just learning not to take the first no. And if you can't go straight ahead, you go around the corner.
quotes.author: Cher

quotes.quote: I always thought that people told you that you're beautiful--that this was a title tat was bestowed upon you. I think that it's time to take this power into our own hands and to say, 'You know what I'm beautiful. I just am. And that's my light. I'm just a beautiful woman.
quotes.author: Margaret Cho

quotes.quote: A woman with a well-stocked toy drawer isn't dependent on anyone and is unlikely to hurl herself at a lowlife just for nooky.
quotes.author: Arianne Cohen

quotes.quote: I know who I am. I am not perfect. I am not the most beautiful woman in the world. But I'm one of them.
quotes.author: Mary J. Blige

quotes.quote: No matter what a woman looks like, if she's confident, she's sexy.
quotes.author: Paris Hilton

quotes.quote: Being jealous of a beautiful woman is not going to make you more beautiful.
quotes.author: Zsa Zsa Gabor

quotes.quote: It's not vanity to feel you have a right to be beautiful. Women are taught to feel we're not good enough, that we must live up to someone else's standards. But my aim is to cherish myself as I am.
quotes.author: Elle Macpherson

quotes.quote: Chic is a borrowed adjective, but there is no English word to take the place of elegant, which was destroyed utterly by the reporter or practical joker who said 'elegant dresses'.
quotes.author: Emily

quotes.quote: One wants to be very something, very great, very heroic; or if not that, then at least very stylish and very fashionable.
quotes.author: Harirett Beecher Stowe

quotes.quote: Even during the hardest economic times, my mother made sure that my sister and I had four things that she believed were essential to our later success; good shoes, a firm quality mattress, a top pediatrician, and a therapist.
quotes.author: Harriet Goldhor Lerner

quotes.quote: I never thought I'd land in pictures with a face like mine.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: My own life has been much more than a fairy tale. I've had my share of difficult moments, but whatever difficulties I've gone through, I've always gotten the prize.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: If you think of how those women dressed, the kind of refinement, the kind of elegance. That's really the inspiration for these clothes.
quotes.author: Calvin Klein

quotes.quote: There are few women whose charm survives their beauty.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: It's a sort of bloom on a woman. If you have it, you don't need to have anything else; and if you don't have it, it doesn't much matter what else you have.
quotes.author: J.M. Barrie

quotes.quote: I always dreamt of the day I would have enough closets-- big ones. some people dream of having a big swimming pool, with me it's closets.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: There is also more to a woman than simply being labels as 'elegant'. Let elegance be one of the many good quality you possess.
quotes.author: Eunice Long

quotes.quote: To be elegant is first of all to know oneself, and to know oneself well requires a certain amount of reflection and intelligence.
quotes.author: Genevieve Antoine Dariaux

quotes.quote: It all begins by embracing and developing the inner self, because true elegance starts from within.
quotes.author: Eunice Long

quotes.quote: As a woman you need to be impeccably dressed at all times. This is because style goes way beyond the aesthetic appeal--it is also about intellectualization.
quotes.author: Penny Schultz

quotes.quote: We can win life's trials without losing ourselves. And we don't need to put on an earrings or lipstick to prove it. You can win your battles without losing your own personal elegance, whatever that means to you.
quotes.author: Heather Hansen

quotes.quote: Elegance is personal, and it's based upon your goals and needs. Only you can know what choices you need to make to find your elegance, and those choices will change with time and circumstance.
quotes.author: Heather Hansen

quotes.quote: Elegance is a state of mind. It is how you perceive yourself and therefore it's how the rest of the world sees you.
quotes.author: Jenny Warden

quotes.quote: Being elegant and looking expensive is a matter of three things: confidence, good taste, and a bit of mystery. Not about money; you don't need to have any designer's clothes to be elegant
quotes.author: Amy Cuddy

quotes.quote: Well-behaved women seldom make history.
quotes.author: Laurel Thatcher Ulrich

quotes.quote: You educate a man; you educate a man. You educate a woman; you educate a generation.
quotes.author: Brigham Young

quotes.quote: I’m tough, I’m ambitious, and I know exactly what I want. If that makes me a bitch, okay.
quotes.author: Madonna

quotes.quote: A man’s face is his autobiography. A woman’s face is her work of fiction.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: A guy wants a classy girl who is smart and has goals – someone that he wouldn’t be afraid to bring home to his parents.
quotes.author: Victoria Justice

quotes.quote: If a man whistles at you, don’t respond. You’re a lady, not a dog.
quotes.author: Adele

quotes.quote: Elegance is when the inside is as beautiful as the outside
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: A transition to clean energy is about making an investment in our future.
quotes.author: Gloria Reuben

quotes.quote: Bold clean energy action is needed to stave off a climate hostile to human life.
quotes.author: Ray Metcalfe

quotes.quote: Clean energy is hippy power. But its also cowboy power, it's rancher power, it's Appalachian power.
quotes.author: Van Jones

quotes.quote: There is a form of clean energy, renewable and absolutely free that too often underestimate: human warmth.
quotes.author: Corina Abdulahm-Negura

quotes.quote: Our universe is a sea of energy – free, clean energy. It is all out there waiting for us to set sail upon it.
quotes.author: Robert Adams

quotes.quote: Climate change is severely impacting the health of our planet and all of its inhabitants, and we must transition to a clean energy economy that does not rely on fossil fuels.
quotes.author: Leonardo DiCaprio

quotes.quote: By looking at climate change as a clean energy generation problem, we're setting ourselves up not to solve it.
quotes.author: Alex Steffen

quotes.quote: As the saying goes, the Stone Age did not end because we ran out of stones; we transitioned to better solutions. The same opportunity lies before us with energy efficiency and clean energy.
quotes.author: Steven Chu

quotes.quote: We want a plan for a clean energy future...an end to global warming...Moms know about sustainable energy. After all, mother's love is an unending supply and it keeps kids healthy.
quotes.author: Julianne Moore

quotes.quote: We need to invest in clean energy technologies. We need to rush them to market while rebuilding our energy networks intelligently. And it's imperative that we push toward a cultural shift away from energy waste to respectful conservation with fierce commitment that will carry us to the other side.
quotes.author: Jayni Chase

quotes.quote: It's very important that we expand our use of clean energy and make a long-term commitment to it.
quotes.author: Julia Roberts

quotes.quote: We tend to overlook the fact that a mature clean energy economy in fact will give an opportunity to ordinary people to earn more money as clean energy workers/entrepreneurs - and save more money, through conservation and energy efficiency.
quotes.author: Van Jones

quotes.quote: Clean energy is about offering people the opportunity to do what's right for themselves and the people they love. It's about reducing the pollution that makes people sick. It's about helping the low-income families struggling to pay their gas and electricity bills.
quotes.author: Gloria Reuben

quotes.quote: Huge advances in clean energy technology are happening all the time. Solar and wind are booming. New ways to generate energy from our windows, the paint on our walls, and even our bike paths are being invented all the time. Technology is moving forward, but it needs to be moving forward faster.
quotes.author: Katharine Hayhoe

quotes.quote: We presently have the technology ... fuel cells, solar cells, hydrogen ... the opportunities are amazing for clean energy.
quotes.author: Denis Hayes

quotes.quote: Progressives always like clean energy ideas. But conservatives should like this agenda, too.
quotes.author: Van Jones

quotes.quote: Environmentalists and clean energy champions should stop telling people that we are working for "sustainability," which nobody understands.
quotes.author: Van Jones

quotes.quote: A low-carbon, clean energy economy can be an engine of growth for decades to come.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: We can have enough clean energy to power every home.
quotes.author: Hillary Clinton

quotes.quote: Clean energy independence should be an area of common ground.
quotes.author: Van Jones

quotes.quote: Housekeeping is like being caught in a revolving door.
quotes.author: Marcelene Cox

quotes.quote: Cleaning your house while your kids are still growing up is like shoveling the walk before it stops snowing.
quotes.author: Phyllis Diller

quotes.quote: A clean house will result in peace in the Middle East as well.
quotes.author: Melina Marchetta

quotes.quote: The objective of cleaning is not just to clean, but to feel happiness living within that environment.
quotes.author: Marie Kondo

quotes.quote: When all else fails, cleaning house is the perfect antidote to most of life's ills.
quotes.author: Sue Grafton

quotes.quote: The poet is at the disposal of the night. His role is humble, he must clean house and await its due visitation.
quotes.author: Jean Cocteau

quotes.quote: They cooked and washed dishes and scrubbed and mopped and dusted and wiped and cleaned the apartment from crack to crevice back to crack.
quotes.author: Matthew Aaron Goodman

quotes.quote: My idea of housework is to sweep the room with a glance.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: We are used to cleaning the outside house, but the most important house to clean is yourself - your own house - which we never do.
quotes.author: Marina Abramovic

quotes.quote: There is no need to do any housework at all. After the first four years the dirt doesn't get any worse.
quotes.author: Quentin Crisp

quotes.quote: Cleaning anything involves making something else dirty, but anything can get dirty without something else getting clean.
quotes.author: Laurence J. Peter

quotes.quote: Housework is what a woman does that nobody notices unless she hasn't done it.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: When it comes to housework the one thing no book of household management can ever tell you is how to begin. Or maybe I mean why.
quotes.author: Katharine Whitehorn

quotes.quote: More important than a clean house is a close family.
quotes.author: Ann Voskamp

quotes.quote: We learn the process of emptying out, cleaning house, both within and without.
quotes.author: Brenda Shoshanna

quotes.quote: Cleaning up with children around is like shoveling during a blizzard.
quotes.author: Margaret Culkin Banning

quotes.quote: We are used to cleaning the outside house, but the most important house to clean is yourself - your own house - which we never do.
quotes.author: Marina Abramovic

quotes.quote: The objective of cleaning is not just to clean, but to feel happiness living within that environment.
quotes.author: Marie Kondo

quotes.quote: Cleaning anything involves making something else dirty, but anything can get dirty without something else getting clean.
quotes.author: Laurence J. Peter

quotes.quote: Cleaning your house while your kids are still growing up is like shoveling the walk before it stops snowing.
quotes.author: Phyllis Diller

quotes.quote: Cleaning with children in the house really is like brushing your teeth while eating Oreos.
quotes.author: Joleigh Little

quotes.quote: Housework is like cleaning fish. No matter how often you do it, it still stinks.
quotes.author: Thelma Harper

quotes.quote: At worst, a house unkept cannot be so distressing as a life unlived.
quotes.author: Rose Macaulay

quotes.quote: You don't get anything clean without getting something else dirty.
quotes.author: Cecil Baxter

quotes.quote: If you can't clean up after yourself.. There's no need for you to mess things up.. And expect another person to clean up behind you.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Our house is clean enough to be healthy, and dirty enough to be happy.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A man thinks all dust stays outdoors.
quotes.author: Ernest Vincent Wright

quotes.quote: Sweeping only moves the dust somewhere else.
quotes.author: Marty Rubin

quotes.quote: A spotless house is a sign of a misspent life.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A new broom sweeps clean, but the old broom knows the corners.
quotes.author: Irish Saying

quotes.quote: Cleanliness is next to impossible.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Cleaning and organizing is a practice not a project.
quotes.author: Meagan Francis

quotes.quote: Excuse the mess, but we live here.
quotes.author: Roseanne Barr

quotes.quote: Dogs do not grasp the concept of house cleaning.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: A clean house is the sign of a boring person.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Sometimes clean feels empty. A bit of clutter and dirt gladdens the heart and affirms a life in progress.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: Nothing inspires cleanliness more than an unexpected guest.
quotes.author: Radhika Mundra

quotes.quote: We dream of having a clean house — but who dreams of actually doing the cleaning?
quotes.author: Marcus Buckingham

quotes.quote: Cleaning your house while your kids are still growing is like shoveling the walk before it stops snowing.
quotes.author: Phyllis Diller

quotes.quote: A recurring cleaning will make you a happy person.
quotes.author: Maid Sailors

quotes.quote: Laughter and tears are both responses to frustration and exhaustion. I myself prefer to laugh, since there is less cleaning up to do afterward.
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.quote: One shouldn't clean more than necessary; as unsurpassable amount of cleaning; leads to scraping away the oils of nature; the rudiments of color which add loads of vibrancy to life.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: In the daytime when sweeping and dusting and cleaning were quite at an end, he would sit very still on the doorstep.
quotes.author: Katherine Mansfield

quotes.quote: In the same manner, with all their washing and cleaning they've dirtied. All the troughs of the village, and all the fountains have sullied.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: She prides herself on her cleaning habits.
quotes.author: Pearl Jam

quotes.quote: Cleaning my soul. Flame on burn desire.
quotes.author: Luther Vandross

quotes.quote: Please, I'd rather not see us both get caught with cleaning up that could take years.
quotes.author: Dwight Yoakam

quotes.quote: Cleaning up the world for you and me.
quotes.author: SHeDAISY

quotes.quote: Cleaning up the mess you left behind.
quotes.author: Zero 7

quotes.quote: Cleaning sweat and tears from your face . Living down on your knees.

quotes.quote: Better keep yourself clean and bright; you are the window through which you must see the world.

quotes.quote: Don't call the world dirty because you forgot to clean your glasses.

quotes.quote: Cleanliness is not next to godliness nowadays, for cleanliness is made an essential and godliness is regarded as an offence.

quotes.quote: In every aspect of life, purity and holiness, cleanliness and refinement, exalt the human condition. Even in the physical realm, cleanliness will conduce to spirituality.

quotes.quote: The objective of cleaning is not just to clean, but to feel happiness living within that environment.

quotes.quote: Being green and clean is not just an aspiration but an action.

quotes.quote: Clean out a corner of your mind and creativity will instantly fill it.

quotes.quote: For cleanness of body was ever esteemed to proceed from a due reverence to God, to society, and to ourselves.

quotes.quote: Cleanliness may be defined to be the emblem of purity of mind.

quotes.quote: Cleanliness is the scourge of art.

quotes.quote: Cleaning and organizing is a practice not a project.

quotes.quote: What separates two people most profoundly is a different sense and degree of cleanliness.

quotes.quote: Cleanliness becomes more important when godliness is unlikely.

quotes.quote: The cleanliness is essential to conducting nano-scale research.

quotes.quote: Cleanliness makes it easier to see the details.

quotes.quote: Cleanliness is very important. If you let kids make a total mess in the kitchen and then leave, you're not really teaching them anything.

quotes.quote: Maintain a clean and strong character.

quotes.quote: Cleanliness Is Next to Godliness.

quotes.quote: Cleanliness in the cat world is usually a virtue put above godliness.

quotes.quote: Cleanliness is to some a virtue, to some necessity, to others a luxury.

quotes.quote: Cleanliness as well in our garments as in our dwellings, prevents the pernicious effects of bad smells and contagious vapors.

quotes.quote: Cleanliness keeps up a free perspiration, renews the air, refreshes the blood, and even animates and enlivens the mind.

quotes.quote: Cleanliness has a powerful influence on the health and preservation of the body.
quotes.author: W. Aspinwall

quotes.quote: Emptiness is loneliness and loneliness is cleanliness and cleanliness is godliness.

quotes.quote: For the cleanliness and the power the first in the nation to prove who they are.
quotes.author: Bone Thugs-N-Harmony

quotes.quote: Cleanliness only comes in small doses, bodily whole, but my head's in a mess
quotes.author: Depeche Mode

quotes.quote: In a world full of cleanliness and you know all that other madness.
quotes.author: Method Man

quotes.quote: She embrace cleanliness with ah humble profile
quotes.author: Sizzla

quotes.quote: To clean up this place of your scourge. If cleanliness is next to godliness.
quotes.author: Clutch

quotes.quote: I'll give you cleanliness, while I'll make it rain.
quotes.author: De Staat

quotes.quote: To keep the air fresh among words is the secret of verbal cleanliness.
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: Neatness and cleanliness is not a function of how rich or poor you are but that of mentality and principle.
quotes.author: Ikechukwu Izuakor

quotes.quote: Environmental cleanliness begins with each individual desire to be clean.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Cleanliness is a mindset – a positive habit that keeps the body, mind, and environment happy, healthy, simple, neat, and delightful.

quotes.quote: Nothing inspires cleanliness more than an unexpected guest.

quotes.quote: There are two types of cleanliness: organic cleanliness and chemical cleanliness. Often chemical cleanliness is toxic and harmful. Natural or organic cleanliness focus on maintaining harmony with nature.

quotes.quote: Godliness is the root of cleanliness.

quotes.quote: God loves cleanliness. The environment must be kept clean.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Let your hands be clean; God loves clean hands and no wonder cleanliness is next to Godliness.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Culture of cleanliness will influence the hygine, health, asthetics and natural setting of the nation, which is a new age currency of a country.
quotes.author: Vishwas Chavan

quotes.quote: Cleanliness beings with purity of your own mind, thoughts and heart.
quotes.author: Vishwas Chavan

quotes.quote: Living in filth is dark doom. The light of awaken leads to cleanliness.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Accept only as much ‘cleanliness’ that it won't cause you to worry if it became dirty. Maintain ‘cleanliness’ such that and only to the point that it does not burden you into bondage.

quotes.quote: Neatness and cleanliness is not a function of how rich or poor you are but that of mentality and principle.
quotes.author: Ikechukwu Izuakor

quotes.quote: Cleanliness and order are not matters of instinct; they are matters of education and like most great things you must cultivate a taste for them.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: If we only knew how many times our seemingly clever comment cut straight into the heart of the person with whom we have just spoken, it is we who would bleed.

quotes.quote: You can tell whether a man is clever by his answers. You can tell whether a man is wise by his questions.

quotes.quote: No one wants to know how clever you are. They don't want an insight into your mind, thrilling as it might be. They want an insight into their own.

quotes.quote: Men are only clever at shifting blame from their own shoulders to those of others.

quotes.quote: He who knows others is clever; He who knows himself has discernment.

quotes.quote: The greatest fools are ofttimes more clever than the men who laugh at them.

quotes.quote: Never stay up on the barren heights of cleverness, but come down into the green valleys of silliness.

quotes.quote: Beware the clever man that makes the wrong look right

quotes.quote: I am neither especially clever nor especially gifted. I am only very, very curious.

quotes.quote: No man is clever enough to know all the evil he does.

quotes.quote: One of the lessons of history is that nothing is often a good thing to do and always a clever thing to say.

quotes.quote: Clever gimmicks of mass distraction yield a cheap soulcraft of addicted and self-medicated narcissists.

quotes.quote: The obstinacy of cleverness and reason is nothing to the obstinacy of folly and inanity.

quotes.quote: Clever tyrants are never punished.

quotes.quote: Patience and tenacity are worth more than twice their weight of cleverness.

quotes.quote: The cleverest of all, in my opinion, is the man who calls himself a fool at least once a month

quotes.quote: A clever, ugly man every now and then is successful with the ladies, but a handsome fool is irresistible.

quotes.quote: Don't be too clever for an audience. Make it obvious. Make the subtleties obvious also.

quotes.quote: What clever man has ever needed to commit a crime? Crime is the last resort of political half-wits.

quotes.quote: It's the people who try to be clever who never are; the people who are clever never think of trying to be.

quotes.quote: Cleverness is serviceable for everything, sufficient for nothing.

quotes.quote: An inefficient virus kills its host. A clever virus stays with it.

quotes.quote: A clever arrangement of bad eggs will never make a good omelet.

quotes.quote: To be clever enough to get a great deal of money, one must be stupid enough to want it

quotes.quote: If you're not very clever you should be conciliatory.

quotes.quote: A clever, imaginative, humorous request can open closed doors and closed minds

quotes.quote: Cleverness isn't always true nor is the truth always clever

quotes.quote: Education without values, as useful as it is, seems rather to make man a more clever devil

quotes.quote: Clever and attractive women do not want to vote; they are willing to let men govern as long as they govern men
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Being clever was when you looked at how things were and used the evidence to work out something new.
quotes.author: Mark Haddon

quotes.quote: Be aware. Be Curious. Be Clever. Innovation is Something to be Reckoned with.
quotes.author: Daniel C. Tomas

quotes.quote: Behind every clever man is an even cleverer woman.

quotes.quote: The height of cleverness is in one's ability to be very clever without seeming clever at all.

quotes.quote: There is a world of difference between being clever and being right.

quotes.quote: Think of something clever, witty or profound, keep it short and people may quote you.

quotes.quote: Justice fails because victims used to be too kind and criminals too clever.

quotes.quote: Clever people will recognize and tolerate nothing but cleverness.

quotes.quote: Clever men are good, but they are not the best.

quotes.quote: The best way to destroy an enemy is to make him a friend.

quotes.quote: Don't worry about people stealing an idea. If it's original, you will have to ram it down their throats.

quotes.quote: Nothing is particularly hard if you divide it into small jobs.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: Always forgive your enemies, but never forget their names.
quotes.author: Robert Kennedy

quotes.quote: When you're at the end of your rope, tie a knot and hold on

quotes.quote: Against the beautiful and the clever and the successful, one can wage a pitiless war, but not against the unattractive: then the millstone weighs on the breast.

quotes.quote: Arguing with a fool proves there are two.

quotes.quote: To be heroic is to be courageous enough to die for something; to be inspirational is to be crazy enough to live a little.

quotes.quote: This woman is beautiful and clever: but how much cleverer she would have become if she were not beautiful!

quotes.quote: What is sometimes thought to be clever is, significantly often, merely an advanced form of foolishness.

quotes.quote: I am so clever that sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying.

quotes.quote: A clever man commits no minor blunders.

quotes.quote: The desire to seem clever often keeps us from being so.

quotes.quote: It is a great act of cleverness to be able to conceal one's being clever.

quotes.quote: Clever is as clever does.

quotes.quote: Sometimes you have to be clever.

quotes.quote: Cleverness becomes a public nuisance.

quotes.quote: Trade your cleverness for bewilderment.

quotes.quote: Fools lie, clever men stick to the truth.

quotes.quote: Cleverly designed experiments are the key.

quotes.quote: Cleverness is a gift, kindness is a choice.

quotes.quote: Everybody is clever, just in their own ways.

quotes.quote: If you aren't cute, you may as well be clever.

quotes.quote: If they are just, they are better than clever.

quotes.quote: A clever girl always seem to know less than the man she happens to be talking to.

quotes.quote: When a wife laughs at her husband's jokes, it's not because they are clever, but because she is.

quotes.quote: Some women are so clever that you can't talk with them for ten minutes without beginning to realize how brilliant you are.

quotes.quote: Many woman is so clever that she manages to let no one suspect her of being half as foolish as she really is.

quotes.quote: It takes a clever girl to keep a man at arm's length without losing her grip on him.

quotes.quote: By the time the person is old enough to know better, he thinks he's clever enough to get away with it.

quotes.quote: Sometimes nothing is the cleverest thing you can say when you want to say something clever.

quotes.quote: Of all the clever wives, the cleverest is the one who never lets her husband suspect how clever she is.

quotes.quote: A clever girl flatters a man by asking the kind of questions he is able to answer.

quotes.quote: Every executive wishes he were as clever as he thinks his secretary thinks he is.

quotes.quote: Mere cleverness is not wisdom.

quotes.quote:
Clever's cunning
Intelligent's intelligence.
quotes.author: Ehsan Sehgal

quotes.quote: I hate the word clever, it seeks to demean.

quotes.quote: Shun the ways of clever men, when they prove that black is white.

quotes.quote: Because you are good and a very clever man, and to gainsay it there's a few people can.

quotes.quote: Wishes your guests to be clever, when he's asked to come and dine.

quotes.quote: Be good sweet maid, and let who will be clever; do noble things, not dream them all day long.

quotes.quote: If you're proud because of fortune or the clever things you do, then i'll play no second fiddle; I'm a prouder man than you.

quotes.quote: She is not reach or clever, but her speechless thrill me ever.

quotes.quote: The ragged cliff has thousand faces in a thousand hours.

quotes.quote: Hills tell old stories. Cliffs are poets with harps.

quotes.quote: You've got to jump off cliffs and build your wings on the way down.

quotes.quote: Dive today from the cliff of what you know into what you can't know.

quotes.quote: You can't jump off a cliff when you have already fallen off a bigger one.

quotes.quote: There's a cliff at the end point of a person's life; most us of peer over the edge of it, hanging on. That's why, when someone chooses to let go, it's so dramatically visible. The body will seem almost transparent. The eys will be looking at something the rest of us can't see.

quotes.quote: He who climbs a cliff may die on the cliff, so what? Always a risk-taker by nature, now I became one by intent.

quotes.quote: The waves hit the cliff with more intensity than the shore, because the ocean knows the cliff has that masculine intensity which won't complain about her feminine energy.

quotes.quote: Getting up any cliff is like a physics problem — you just got to hold on, try everything, and stick with it.

quotes.quote: Precipices are the routine routes of the unroutine men.

quotes.quote: We are on the precipice of being so ignorant that our democracy is threatened.

quotes.quote: The edge of a precipice... That is the place where man sits throughout his life!

quotes.quote: We run carelessly to the precipice, after we have put something before us to prevent us seeing it.

quotes.quote: It’s only on the brink that people find the will to change.  Only at the precipice do we evolve.

quotes.quote: When men have come to the edge of a precipice, it is the lover of life who has the spirit to leap backwards, and only the pessimist who continues to believe in progress.

quotes.quote: If we don't want temptation to follow us, we shouldn't act as if we are interested. No one ever fell over a precipice who never went near one.

quotes.quote: I live through risk. Without risk there is no art. You should always be on the edge of a cliff about to fall down and break your neck.

quotes.quote: I'm constantly jumping off cliffs and developing my wings on the way down. ... It's a gamble, a ... spiritual gamble. You are who you choose to be.

quotes.quote: On the cliffs of your wild cat charms I'm riding.

quotes.quote: You jump off a cliff and you assemble an airplane on the way down.

quotes.quote: There is an educational cliff we are walking over right this very second.

quotes.quote: Sometimes you just have to jump off the cliff without knowing where you will land.

quotes.quote: We have to continually be jumping off cliffs and developing our wings on the way down.

quotes.quote: We're at the top of the cliff and we can either fall off the edge or keep climbing.

quotes.quote: If you're falling off a cliff, you may as well try to fly. You have nothing to lose.

quotes.quote: Those who live in the best cliffs think they are better than us. That is always man's attitude when he has power.

quotes.quote: I've been living on the edge for so long, my friends call me Cliff.

quotes.quote: It’s too late to change your mind after you’ve jumped off the cliff.
quotes.author: Robert Jordan

quotes.quote: Always know you could be on the precipice of something great.

quotes.quote: He who would not fall off the precipice must not venture too near the edge.

quotes.quote: We are on the precipice of climate system tipping points beyond which there is no redemption.

quotes.quote: If you are at the edge of a precipice, your every step is vital!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: We are at the precipice of great transformation within our culture and government.
quotes.author: Zachary Quinto

quotes.quote: A precipice cannot challenge the bird!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: The edge of a precipice is a very merciless school; over there you either learn to be serious or you die foolishly!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: If people are constantly falling off a cliff, you could place ambulances under the cliff or build a fence on the top of the cliff. We are placing all too many ambulances under the cliff.

quotes.quote: I feel like I'm on the precipice - just seeing a better version of me coming out.
quotes.author: Sara Bareilles

quotes.quote: It is your human environment that makes climate.

quotes.quote: Climate is what we expect, weather is what we get.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: If the climate were a bank, they would already have saved it.
quotes.author: Hugo Chavez

quotes.quote: Climate is an angry beast and we are poking at it with sticks.

quotes.quote: Climate change is a huge problem, an almost insoluble problem.
quotes.author: Bill McKibben

quotes.quote: The climate is a common good, belonging to all and meant for all.
quotes.author: Pope Francis

quotes.quote: In the current climate, we live in a pessimistic and non-idealistic world.
quotes.author: Emilio Estevez

quotes.quote: The risk climate of modernity is thus unsettling for everyone: no one escapes.
quotes.author: Anthony Giddens

quotes.quote: The influence of mankind on climate is trivially true and numerically insignificant.
quotes.author: Richard Lindzen

quotes.quote: Climate change is obviously happening and there is obviously a man-made contribution.

quotes.quote: Climate change is, simply, the greatest collective challenge we face as a human family.
quotes.author: Ban Ki-moon

quotes.quote: We have to find climate-friendly ways of encouraging economic growth. The good news is we think they exist

quotes.quote: Tackling climate change is a collective endeavour, it means collective accountability and it's not too late
quotes.author: Christine Lagarde

quotes.quote: The only perfect climate is bed.
quotes.author: Frank Crowninshield

quotes.quote: Climate change is a global commons problem.
quotes.author: Ottmar Edenhofer

quotes.quote: In the end, climate change is a math problem.
quotes.author: Bill McKibben

quotes.quote: The changing climate is a threat to human rights.
quotes.author: Mary Robinson

quotes.quote: When it comes to climate, we can all make a big difference.
quotes.author: Al Gore

quotes.quote: Climate change constitutes a serious threat to global security.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: Climate is always evolving, and natural disaster have always existed.
quotes.author: Marco Rubio

quotes.quote: You cannot solve the climate crisis if you are putting people out of work.
quotes.author: Jill Stein

quotes.quote: In all climates, under all skies, man's happiness is always somewhere else.
quotes.author: Giacomo Leopardi

quotes.quote: In order to solve the climate crisis, we need to solve the democracy crisis.
quotes.author: Al Gore

quotes.quote: An increasing amount of climate research suggests a possibility of global cooling.
quotes.author: Walter E. Williams

quotes.quote: In reality, climate change is actually the biggest thing that's going on every single day.
quotes.author: Bill McKibben

quotes.quote: Climate change is not an environmental issue, but much more to do with security and economics.
quotes.author: Jonathon Porritt

quotes.quote: The impact of climate change is a tremendous risk to the security and well-being of our countries.
quotes.author: Nancy Pelosi

quotes.quote: Climate change is a complex problem with no central lever, and with unequal distribution of resources.
quotes.author: Seth Priebatsch

quotes.quote: Climate change is part of the normal order of things, and we know it was happening before humans came.

quotes.quote: Climate change is a fact. Its consequences, damages and costs are already being felt around the globe.
quotes.author: Heinz Fischer

quotes.quote: Self-evidently, dangerous climate change will not emerge from a normal scientific process of truth seeking.
quotes.author: Mike Hulme

quotes.quote: Climate change is a terrible problem, and it absolutely needs to be solved. It deserves to be a huge priority.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: The climate is changing. This year we have come to understand this when we faced events that resulted in fires.
quotes.author: Vladimir Putin

quotes.quote: Climate change is sometimes misunderstood as being about changes in the weather. In reality it is about changes in our very way of life.

quotes.quote: Unless we take action on climate change, future generations will be roasted, toasted, fried and grilled.

quotes.quote: There is no question that climate change is happening; the only arguable point is what part humans are playing in it.

quotes.quote: Climate change is no longer a doomsday prophecy, it's a reality.

quotes.quote: Climate change is the Everest of all problems, the thorniest challenge facing humankind.
quotes.author: Lewis Gordon Pugh

quotes.quote: Climate change respects no borders.
quotes.author: Margaret MacMillan

quotes.quote: Climate change, if unchecked, is an urgent threat to health, food supplies, biodiversity, and livelihoods across the globe.
quotes.author: John F. Kerry

quotes.quote: Climate change isn't something people get to choose to believe or not: it's happening.
quotes.author: Cary Kennedy

quotes.quote: When you think about climate change, that means that we won't have an Earth to be lonely on.
quotes.author: Jim James

quotes.quote: In the end, climate change is a math problem.
quotes.author: Bill McKibben

quotes.quote: The issue of climate change is one that we ignore at our own peril.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: Climate change is the mother of all hysterias of the Left.
quotes.author: Dennis Prager

quotes.quote: People working on climate change should prepare for catastrophic success.
quotes.author: David Titley

quotes.quote: Climate change is real and it is caused to a significant extent by human activity.
quotes.author: Julia Gillard

quotes.quote: Climate change is such a consequential crisis to everybody in the world.
quotes.author: Hillary Clinton

quotes.quote: No country can solve climate change alone, we have to take global measures.
quotes.author: Jose Mujica

quotes.quote: Human-caused climate change threatens almost every aspect of human existence.
quotes.author: Alan Lowenthal

quotes.quote: Climate change is the biggest threat to our chances of winning the fight against hunger.
quotes.author: Winnie Byanyima

quotes.quote: Climate change is, simply, the greatest collective challenge we face as a human family.
quotes.author: Ban Ki-moon

quotes.quote: Climate change isn't a distant threat. It's already changing the way we live.
quotes.author: Jeff Orlowski

quotes.quote: Climate change involves fundamental choices about how we want to live and what kind of world we want.
quotes.author: Dale Jamieson

quotes.quote: Climate change is probably the greatest long-term challenge facing the human race.
quotes.author: Tony Blair

quotes.quote: Climate change is a complex problem with no central lever, and with unequal distribution of resources.
quotes.author: Seth Priebatsch

quotes.quote: Climate change is part of the normal order of things, and we know it was happening before humans came.
quotes.author: Freeman Dyson

quotes.quote: Climate change is a fact. Its consequences, damages and costs are already being felt around the globe.
quotes.author: Heinz Fischer

quotes.quote: Tackling climate change is a collective endeavour, it means collective accountability and it's not too late.
quotes.author: Christine Lagarde

quotes.quote: The window of opportunity to avoid dangerous climate change is closing more quickly than previously thought.
quotes.author: David Miliband

quotes.quote: Climate change is a terrible problem, and it absolutely needs to be solved. It deserves to be a huge priority.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: By looking at climate change as a clean energy generation problem, we're setting ourselves up not to solve it.
quotes.author: Alex Steffen

quotes.quote: Global climate change needs global action now. The alarm bells ought to be ringing in every capital of the world.
quotes.author: John Gummer

quotes.quote: On climate change, we often don't fully appreciate that it is a problem. We think it is a problem waiting to happen.
quotes.author: Kofi Annan

quotes.quote: Fighting Climate Change calls for innovation, cooperation and will power to make the changes that the world needs.
quotes.author: Narendra Modi
