quotes.quote: If a cluttered desk is the sign of a cluttered mind, what is the significance of a clean desk?
quotes.author: Laurence J. Peter

quotes.quote: Clutter is not an attribute of information, clutter is a failure of design fix the design rather than stripping all the detail out of the map.
quotes.author: Edward Tufte

quotes.quote: Clutter is found in so many shapes and sizes. We can find it on our kitchen tables, under our beds, in our cars, and in our heads.
quotes.author: Katrina Mayer

quotes.quote: Clutter is symptomatic of delayed decision making.
quotes.author: Cynthia Kyriazis

quotes.quote: Creative clutter is better than idle neatness.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Clutter is the physical manifestation of unmade decisions fueled by procrastination.
quotes.author: Christina Scalise

quotes.quote: Clutter and mess show us that life is being lived.
quotes.author: Anne Lamott

quotes.quote: Clutter is the official language used by corporations to hide their mistakes.
quotes.author: William Zinsser

quotes.quote: The effectiveness of a leader is best judged by the actions of those he guides.
quotes.author: Bill Courtney

quotes.quote: Coaches have to watch for what they don't want to see and listen to what they don't want to hear.
quotes.author: John Madden

quotes.quote: Leaders should be reliable without being predictable. They should be consistent without being anticipated.
quotes.author: Mike Krzyzewski

quotes.quote: Don't tell me about your effort. Show me your results.
quotes.author: Tim Fargo

quotes.quote: Once leaders embrace the role of coach, they realize the weight of leadership is now balanced between themselves and their direct reports.
quotes.author: Kenneth H. Blanchard

quotes.quote: In all the research you do as a coach, studying other coaches and championship-type situations, you find that all those teams combined talent with great defense. You've got to stop other teams to win.
quotes.author: Pat Riley

quotes.quote: A life coach does for the rest of your life what a personal trainer does for your health and fitness.
quotes.author: Elaine Macdonald

quotes.quote: Great coaches are visionaries. Great coaches instill, nurture, and encourage vision, then model and motivate surrender to it.
quotes.author: Thomas G. Bandy

quotes.quote: Coaches are aware of how to ignite passion and motivate people. They have an energy that is contagious and know exactly how to get their team excited.
quotes.author: Brian Cagneey

quotes.quote: A great coach can lead you to a place where you don't need him any more.
quotes.author: Andre Agassi

quotes.quote: For a football coach, there's nothing that matches the pain of a team not playing up to its capabilities.
quotes.author: Joe Greene

quotes.quote: A coach's greatest asset is his sense of responsibility - the reliance placed on him by his players.
quotes.author: Knute Rockne

quotes.quote: A coach is someone who can give correction without causing resentment
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: No coach has ever won a game by what he knows; it's what his players know that counts.
quotes.author: Paul Bryant

quotes.quote: Great coaches are great humanitarians. They really care for the athlete as people first and athletes second. This is paramount in gaining respect.
quotes.author: Gordie Gillespie

quotes.quote: A coach once told me there are four factors that determine a players' performance: his tactical awareness, his physical condition, his technical ability and his mental strength.
quotes.author: Gary Neville

quotes.quote: As a coach you can influence the diet of your players. You can point out what is wrong.
quotes.author: Arsene Wenger

quotes.quote: The best coaches really care about people. They have a sincere interest in people.
quotes.author: Byron

quotes.quote: A coach is someone who tells you what you don't want to hear, who has you see what you don't want to see, so you can be who you have always known you could be.
quotes.author: Tom Landry

quotes.quote: Good coaching is about leadership and instilling respect in your players. Dictators lead through fear - good coaches do not.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: Everyone needs a coach. It doesn't matter whether you're a basketball player, a tennis player, a gymnast or a bridge player.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: Best coaches never tell their athletes that they are wrong.They rather focus on creating awareness.
quotes.author: Abhishek Ratna

quotes.quote: But as a coach I wanted to keep things from being too complicated.
quotes.author: Bob Cousy

quotes.quote: Successful coaches are visionaries. They have a picture of success set in their minds.
quotes.author: Gavin McGinnis

quotes.quote: Coach was going to make us do striders today, but I talked him out of it.
quotes.author: Amanda Smith

quotes.quote: As a coach, you need to cultivate an important character trait, which is your desire and passion to help and inspire others.
quotes.author: Lily Perkins

quotes.quote: Coaches can talk and talk and talk about something, but if you get it on tape and show it to them, it is so much more effective.
quotes.author: Larry Bird

quotes.quote: The coach should be the absolute boss, but he still should maintain an open mind.
quotes.author: Red Auerbach

quotes.quote: A good coach always coaches to a leader's potential, not his current level of performance. A good leadership coach will see the potential in you and inspire you accordingly.
quotes.author: Andy Stanley

quotes.quote: A leader or mentor gives credit to others when things go right, and accepts the blame when things go wrong.
quotes.author: Bill Courtney

quotes.quote: On good teams coaches hold players accountable, on great teams players hold players accountable.
quotes.author: Joe Dumars

quotes.quote: Great coaches do not tell people what to think. They point people in the right direction to find the answers. This self-restraint is one of the most difficult challenges of leadership.
quotes.author: Thomas G. Bandy

quotes.quote: A good coach improves your game. A great coach improves your life.
quotes.author: Michael Josephson

quotes.quote: A good coach can be a caring parent, a wise teacher, an exemplary pastor, a passionate friend or a devoted mentor. Keep in touch with all of them especially at the time they are needed.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: As a coach, your high standards of performance, attention to detail and - above all - how hard you work set the stage for how your players perform.
quotes.author: Don Shula

quotes.quote: College coaches measure success in championships. High School coaches measure success to titles. Youth coaches measure success in smiles.
quotes.author: Paul McAllister

quotes.quote: A coach helps and encourages others get results.
quotes.author: Catherine

quotes.quote: A Coach must never forget that he is a leader and not merely a person with authority.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: A coach needs to be able to capitalize on his knowledge of the needs, motivations, playing styles, and values of each member on the team. As a coach, you will use your knowledge of these people to meld them into a cohesive unit.
quotes.author: Ace McCloud

quotes.quote: I don't think a coach becomes the right coach until he wins a championship.
quotes.author: Kobe Bryant

quotes.quote: The coach who goes home and doesn't think about the game he just lost is bound to repeat his mistakes.
quotes.author: Keith Cooper

quotes.quote: My old coach used to say that if you were in it for the match, if you were in it for the trophies, you were in it for the wrong reasons.
quotes.author: John Irving

quotes.quote: The head coach tells us what to do, and we follow his orders
quotes.author: Peyton Manning

quotes.quote: A good Coach asks great questions to help you remove the obstacles in your mind and to get you back on track in life.
quotes.author: Farshad Asl

quotes.quote: Every coach should be recording games to watch...use your VCR.
quotes.author: Don Meyer

quotes.quote: Setting a goal is not the main thing. It is deciding how you will go about achieving it and staying with that plan.
quotes.author: Tom Landry

quotes.quote: The coach's job is to get the best players and get them to play together.
quotes.author: Bernard Ebbers

quotes.quote: The idea is not to block every shot. The idea is to make your opponent believe that you might block every shot.
quotes.author: Bill Russell

quotes.quote: A mentor or a coach is often a good source of tough love. This type of person will often keep pushing you to perform at your best, even when you think you can't get any better.
quotes.author: Ace McCloud

quotes.quote: A good coach passes on information quickly. They do not hold back information that affects my job.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Coaches are aware of how to ignite passion and motivate people. They have an energy that is contagious and know exactly how to get their team excited.
quotes.author: Brian Cagneey

quotes.quote: A coach is someone who tells you what you don't want to hear, who has you see what you don't want to see, so you can be who you have always known you could be.
quotes.author: Tom Landry

quotes.quote: The Coach does not play in the game, but the Coach helps the players identify areas to improve their game.
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.quote: Teachers spend most of their daytime hours with children. Teachers at every level, coaches, counselors, cafeteria workers and yes, custodians, spend their hours trying to make children's lives different, if not always better.
quotes.author: Susan Straight

quotes.quote: A mentor or a coach is often a good source of tough love. This type of person will often keep pushing you to perform at your best, even when you think you can't get any better.
quotes.author: Ace McCloud

quotes.quote: Coaches have to watch for what they don't want to see and listen to what they don't want to hear.
quotes.author: John Madden

quotes.quote: A lot of coaches make it harder than it should be. Some are too hard on themselves, obsessing about controlling everything, not trusting their assistants, worrying about time.
quotes.author: Jeff Fisher

quotes.quote: The one thing coaches cannot tolerate... is the individual who grows arrogant because he excelled at a lower level and believes he has nothing else to learn.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: As a coach, you need to cultivate an important character trait, which is your desire and passion to help and inspire others.
quotes.author: Lily Perkins

quotes.quote: Leaders empower individuals by building trust and coaching competence in their job roles and networking skills.
quotes.author: Kenneth H. Blanchard

quotes.quote: We push players beyond their limits and expectations every day. We ask them to take risks. Sometimes, as coaches, we have to remember to do that with our decisions, too.
quotes.author: Jeff Fisher

quotes.quote: Coaches will eventually notice a great attitude, and they respect that.
quotes.author: Heather O'Reilly

quotes.quote: People think that coaches are always right, but it's difficult to teach a runner how to run, because every runner is different. You have to have an understanding of how to assist what that runner has, so they know how to assist what you have without taking away your special ability, because you're not like anybody else.
quotes.author: Jim Brown

quotes.quote: Coaches do so much research about a referee because they believe refereeing is such a crucial part of the game that the result may hinge on what we say or do. They probably know more about me than I know myself!
quotes.author: Alan Lewis

quotes.quote: A good coach can change a game. A great coach can change a life.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: A coach needs to be able to capitalize on his knowledge of the needs, motivations, playing styles, and values of each member on the team. As a coach, you will use your knowledge of these people to meld them into a cohesive unit.
quotes.author: Ace McCloud

quotes.quote: A coach is someone who can give correction without causing resentment.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: Every leader is different. Every bench is different. Every business is different. So while the complexities change, the work of coaching stays the same keep your clients at the center of the work, push them to use their strengths more and to temper their weaknesses, and illuminate blind spots because these are what really get in the way
quotes.author: Stacy Feiner

quotes.quote: Coaches will do what they can but it doesn't necessarily bother me. You are an international referee for a reason. If things like that are going to ruffle your feathers, don't bother doing the job.
quotes.author: Alan Lewis

quotes.quote: Professional managers, coaches, and players have a right to question an umpire's decision if they do it in a professional manner. When they become personal, profane, or violent, they have crossed the line and must be dealt with accordingly.
quotes.author: Jim Evans

quotes.quote: Coaches don't sleep for a reason. They don't sleep because it's a danger zone every night. Very seldom do you ever get two or three days off... The lifestyle of coaching in the NBA is a tremendous challenge that gives you tremendous highs but also tremendous lows.
quotes.author: George Karl

quotes.quote: Coaches who have been players in the league, they get so attuned to playing how they were successful and who their coaches were.
quotes.author: Jerry West

quotes.quote: There's a saying in my business that there are two kinds of coaches - those who have been fired and those who haven't been fired yet. That's kind of like prostate cancer. Every man will have it if he lives long enough.
quotes.author: Bobby Bowden

quotes.quote: A coach is a leader who is followed willingly, without having to drag people along.
quotes.author: Brian Cagneey

quotes.quote: As coaches, any work you may do, it's been done long ago.
quotes.author: Dan Quinn

quotes.quote: A coach should never be afraid to ask questions of anyone he could learn from.
quotes.author: Bobby Knight

quotes.quote: Successful coaches are visionaries. They have a picture of success set in their minds.
quotes.author: Gavin McGinnis

quotes.quote: Professional coaches measure success in rings.Â  College coaches measure success in championships.Â  High School coaches measure success to titles. Youth coaches measure success in smiles.
quotes.author: Paul McAllister

quotes.quote: The test of a good coach is that when they leave, others will carry on successfully.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Coaches have to watch for what they don't want to see and listen to what they don't want to hear.
quotes.author: John Madden

quotes.quote: Very good coaches for ski jumpers stand at the top of the slope and watch the jumpers prepare, rather than standing at the bottom and watching them land.
quotes.author: Roland Joffe

quotes.quote: Coaches who let a championship team back off from becoming a dynasty are cowards.
quotes.author: Pat Riley

quotes.quote: As coaches say, it's about finding your role. We're coming together as a team.
quotes.author: Brock Osweiler

quotes.quote: Coaches know that a parent publicly scolding his kid after a race will not help the athlete perform better.
quotes.author: Don Kardong

quotes.quote: Coaches have got to be given rank within the university so that you can't fire a coach unless you go through an academic committee, just as you would with a professor. If coaches are to have any stability and security, they need to be treated like an English professor.
quotes.author: Joe Paterno

quotes.quote: A coach helps and encourages others get results.
quotes.author: Catherine

quotes.quote: What makes a good coach? Complete dedication.
quotes.author: George Halas

quotes.quote: A truly great coach does not tell people that they are a truly great coach.
quotes.author: Ellis Byrd

quotes.quote: Coaches in the office do not teach accountants how to balance ledger books, and they do not aim to teach secretaries how to use letter heads - no. Rather, they have a way of beginning a sort of informal conversation between them and the employees, where they get to appreciate the prevailing challenges.
quotes.author: I. Madison

quotes.quote: The best coaches really care about people. They have a sincere interest in people.
quotes.author: Byron

quotes.quote: As coaches, we usually have plenty of changes from one year to the next. Sometimes it seems like it's at one position. Sometimes it's across the board. But this is really a part of every year that we have in coaching in the NFL.
quotes.author: Josh McDaniels

quotes.quote: Coaches are an integral part of any manager's team, especially if they are good pinochle players.
quotes.author: Earl Weaver

quotes.quote: Coaches who can outline plays on a black board are a dime a dozen. The ones who win get inside their player and motivate.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: Coaches can teach you two things: confidence and technique.
quotes.author: Didier Drogba

quotes.quote: But as coaches, we need to get a little more fire and passion and be more demanding that our guys get the job done. I think players will respond to that, and we'll see.
quotes.author: Steve Spurrier

quotes.quote: Good human-relations skills have the ability to change people from managing others to leading others.
quotes.author: John Rampey

quotes.quote: A coach can play a number of roles - mentor, consultant, motivator, but one thing she (or he) is not a therapist. Coaching deals with the "how": how you can move on from where you are and make change. It's action-oriented, and concerned with the present and future, not the past.
quotes.author: Shape Magazine

quotes.quote: People always get confused. They talk about coaches. The reality is, these coaches and managers that everybody thinks are in so much control, they work for us. They're our employees.
quotes.author: Daniel Cormier

quotes.quote: A good coach will make his players see what they can be rather than what they are.
quotes.author: Ara Parasheghian

quotes.quote: Coach thinks I can play basketball and still get into college.
quotes.author: Mark Schwahn

quotes.quote: A coach who's a has-been doesn't coach champions; he just makes more has-beens.
quotes.author: Jessica Bendinger

quotes.quote: It's just like what Coach says before every game: Be not afraid of greatness, some are born great, some achieve greatness, and some have greatness thrust upon them. I think our best chance to be great here today, is to have you play.
quotes.author: Ewan Leslie

quotes.quote: Coach started paying more attention to Ben; you started paying more attention to Coach. You paid attention to him; Coach paid attention to Ben; Ben's stats kept improving. It's nice how that worked out, isn't it?
quotes.author: Dick Wolf

quotes.quote: The purpose of sports coaching is to improve the performance of an athlete or sports team.
quotes.author: Adam R. Nicholls

quotes.quote: It is important that coaches have an understanding regarding how a mental imagery intervention might help an athlete's performance.
quotes.author: Adam R. Nicholls

quotes.quote: As a coach you will fulfill a number of roles during your coaching practice. Your practice will include a range of styles, behaviours and interactions with participants.
quotes.author: Sarah McQuade

quotes.quote: Remember that, however knowledgeable and enthusiastic you are, the effectiveness of your coaching will depend on good planning and sound practice.
quotes.author: Sarah McQuade

quotes.quote: Coach is a label liberally applied to categories people who assist individuals or groups in enhancing their performance, fulfilling potential or the achievement of goals.
quotes.author: Routledge

quotes.quote: Sport can contribute positively to the development of individuals, not just physically but also socially and emotionally. This can only happen if sport is in the right hands--those of the informed, thinking and enlightened coach.
quotes.author: Phil Cabral

quotes.quote: Sports coaching develops people through improving their performance.
quotes.author: Phil Cabral

quotes.quote: Coaches can be many things to different people.
quotes.author: Phil Cabral

quotes.quote: More experienced and enlightened coaches recognize they also ave a responsibility towards social, emotional and physical needs and development of their performers.
quotes.author: Phil Cabral

quotes.quote: Coaches come from a variety of backgrounds. They possess a range of different qualities and experiences on which they develop their coaching skills and unique style of coaching.
quotes.author: Phil Cabral

quotes.quote: Coaches were not perceived to be part of a systematic process for improving performance. Coaching was something for a recreative performer.
quotes.author: John Lyle

quotes.quote: Typically, adventure sports coaches are well informed and practiced with respect to the technical aspects of their disciplines but are comparatively naive about coaching adventure sports as a discipline.
quotes.author: Routledge

quotes.quote: The coach should be knowledgeable of the technical and tactical requirements of their sport, and be able to provide effective and accurate demonstration.
quotes.author: Paul E. Robinson

quotes.quote: A further skill that the coach needs to develop is the ability to observe, monitor and accurately assess performance in training and competition.
quotes.author: Paul E. Robinson

quotes.quote: The coach is required to conduct sessions in a safe environment, and they should be aware of all health and safety considerations.
quotes.author: Paul E. Robinson

quotes.quote: If the coach can get into good habits in the early stages of their career, it will facilitate their development.
quotes.author: Paul E. Robinson

quotes.quote: The sport coach needs to understand how to integrate all these pressures into practice in a matter that allows athletes to perform at their best during competition.
quotes.author: Routledge

quotes.quote: It is clear that coaches and significant others play an important role at every stage.
quotes.author: Routledge

quotes.quote: Coaches are playing an increasingly important and diverse role in sport and the community.
quotes.author: Routledge

quotes.quote: Coaches are also engaging with a broader range of participants who place significantly greater demands on them.
quotes.author: Routledge

quotes.quote: We know that great coaches often analyse themselves to seek better ways to coach.
quotes.author: Lynn Kidman

quotes.quote: Being a successful coach is not measured by a win-loss record, but by how athletes learn and how successful their sporting experiences are.
quotes.author: Lynn Kidman

quotes.quote: Coaching is about striving to contribute to the success of each athlete.
quotes.author: Lynn Kidman

quotes.quote: As coaches we can have a dramatic influence on the development and lives of those we coach.
quotes.author: Lynn Kidman

quotes.quote: Becoming a great coach is an ongoing process. Coaches abilities are diverse and complex and each coach is at a different development level.
quotes.author: Lynn Kidman

quotes.quote: Managing staff and performers in a competition environment can place significant demands on the coach, and it is vital that the coach displays a confident approach at all times.
quotes.author: Anita Navin

quotes.quote: As players, we put our trust in coaches at a very early age. They teach us the game and they help us through school. They give us advice on life. Sometimes, they even hold our dreams in their hands.
quotes.author: Dick Wolf

quotes.quote: I am the coach. I'm the coach and I'm the point guard, I'm the two forwards, the center, and I'm the other guard. I'm the entire organization.
quotes.author: Timothy Dowling

quotes.quote: And now, the player coach of the Toon Squad, at six foot six from North Carolina, His Royal Airness: Michael Jordan!
quotes.author: Leo Benvenuti

quotes.quote: Coach said to fake right and break left / Watch out for the pick and keep an eye on defense / Gotta run the give and go and take the ball to the hole / And don't be afraid to shoot the outside 'J' / Just keep your head in the game / Just keep ya head in the game.
quotes.author: Peter Barsocchini

quotes.quote: Kiddo, simply put, Deceit is an inner coach that acts with the one intention of self-preservation.
quotes.author: Joan S.

quotes.quote: All relationships need to be managed, and everybody needs a little coaching. And just like in baseball, every manager has a different style.
quotes.author: Betsy Thomas

quotes.quote: In sports, coaches and managers help players navigate the game. In life, your friends and family fill that role; because, when it comes down to it, in the heat of the moment, managing one's self is never as easy as it sounds.
quotes.author: Betsy Thomas

quotes.quote: Wait. Who's your 'ma'am?' Who are you calling 'ma'am?' I'm your coach, don't you get it? A coach is sacred and divine. You've shown disrespect to a woman and a coach!
quotes.author: Linan Peng

quotes.quote: Every ex-player turned coach says that they prefer coaching over playing. Why would they all say that?
quotes.author: David E. Kelley

quotes.quote: I will be your coach, your captain, your quarterback.
quotes.author: Al Ruddy

quotes.quote: All coaching is, is taking a player where he can't take himself.
quotes.author: Bill Mccartney

quotes.quote: To be successful in coaching you have to treat your team like a family. The leader needs backing from everyone.
quotes.author: Morgan Wootten

quotes.quote: Selecting the right person for the right job is the largest part of coaching.
quotes.author: Phil Crosby

quotes.quote: Coaching is nothing more than eliminating mistakes before you get fired.
quotes.author: Lou Holtz

quotes.quote: I learned this about coaching: You don't have to explain victory and you can't explain defeat.
quotes.author: Darrell Royal

quotes.quote: Coaching helps you take stock of where you are now in all aspects of your life, and how that compares to where you would like to be.
quotes.author: Elaine Macdonald

quotes.quote: The better the coaching has become, the worse the game has become.
quotes.author: Scotty Bowman

quotes.quote: Coaching really is an individual philosophy.
quotes.author: Mark Messier

quotes.quote: Coaching is a profession of love. You can't coach people unless you love them.
quotes.author: Eddie Robinson

quotes.quote: The purpose of training is to tighten up the slack, toughen the body, and polish the spirit.
quotes.author: Morihei Ueshiba

quotes.quote: It's all to do with the training: you can do a lot if you're properly trained.
quotes.author: Queen Elizabeth

quotes.quote: The best training program in the world is absolutely worthless without the will to execute it properly, consistently, and with intensity.
quotes.author: John Romaniello

quotes.quote: Training gives us an outlet for suppressed energies created by stress and thus tones the spirit just as exercise conditions the body.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.quote: An individual step in character training is to put responsibility on the individual.
quotes.author: Sir Robert Baden-Powell

quotes.quote: The art of teaching is the art of assisting discovery.
quotes.author: Mark Van Doren

quotes.quote: Training is all-encompassing and should be related to everything a unit does, or can have happen to it.
quotes.author: Arthur Collins

quotes.quote: Training is such a vital part of preparation for a game, you really do train to play. It tops up your ability, like sharpening a carving knife. You can get away with not doing it for a while, as long as you have reached a certain standard of fitness.
quotes.author: Graeme Le Saux

quotes.quote: Coaching is an action, not a title and actions result in successes!
quotes.author: Byron & Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Coaching doesn't start with X's and O's. It starts with believing that players win games and coaches win players.
quotes.author: Bill Courtney

quotes.quote: Coaching is unlocking a person's potential to maximize their own performance. It is helping them to learn rather than teaching them.
quotes.author: Timothy Gallwey

quotes.quote: Good coaching may be defined as the development of character, personality and habits of players, plus the teaching of fundamentals and team play.
quotes.author: Clair Bee

quotes.quote: Does coaching work? Yes. Good coaches provide a truly important service. They tell you the truth when no one else will.
quotes.author: Jack Welch

quotes.quote: By not providing coaching to people after providing them with behaviorally-based skill training, we set them up for failure.
quotes.author: Thomas Crane

quotes.quote: Coaching is the most important servant leadership element in helping people accomplish their goals.
quotes.author: Bill Hybels

quotes.quote: Coaching is effective self-expression in the coach/client relationship so that you catalyze your clients' manifestation of their own desired outcomes.
quotes.author: Patrick Williams

quotes.quote: Coaching isn't an addition to a leader's job, it's an integral part of it.
quotes.author: George S. Odiorne

quotes.quote: Coaching is helping people grow without telling them what to do.
quotes.author: Tony Stoltzfus

quotes.quote: Coaching is not a natural way of life. Your victories and losses are too clear cut.
quotes.author: Tommy Prothro

quotes.quote: Coaching is people management- getting people to do what you want them to do and like doing it
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Coaching does not permit democracy.
quotes.author: Jeff Brown

quotes.quote: [Coaching is] helping people discover what they could not discover on their own, so they can become what they want to become.
quotes.author: Aubrey Malphurs

quotes.quote: Coaching isn't a great mystery. It's Just hard work, determination, and inspiration at the right moment.
quotes.author: Bob Zuppke

quotes.quote: By instructing students how to learn, unlearn and relearn, a powerful new dimension can be added to education.
quotes.author: Alvin Toffler

quotes.quote: The interesting thing about coaching is that you have to trouble the comfortable, and comfort the troubled
quotes.author: Ric Charlesworth

quotes.quote: Coaching doesn't make sick people well...it helps healthy people become extra-ordinary.
quotes.author: Thomas Leonard

quotes.quote: Coaching is the art and practice of guiding a person or group from where they are toward the greater competence and fulfillment that they desire.
quotes.author: Gary Collins

quotes.quote: Coaching is not how much you know. It's how much you can get players to do.
quotes.author: Bum Phillips

quotes.quote: Coaching is unlocking a person's potential to maximize their own performance. It is helping them to learn rather than teaching them.
quotes.author: John Whitmore

quotes.quote: The key to coaching is not what you do, but the way you do it. The intangibles, the motivational parts of the game are the most important facets of it
quotes.author: Rick Pitino

quotes.quote: It doesn't matter where you coach, it matters why you coach.
quotes.author: Don Meyer

quotes.quote: Good coaching is about leadership and instilling respect in your players. Dictators lead through fear--good coaches do not.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: My coaching philosophy? Determine your players talents and give them every weapon to get the most from those talents.
quotes.author: Don Shula

quotes.quote: The goal of coaching is not in fixing what is broken, but in discovering new talents and new ways to use old talents that lead to far greater effectiveness.
quotes.author: Elizabeth And Gifford Pinchot

quotes.quote: The single most important thing in coaching is turning out educated kids who are ready for society.
quotes.author: Allen Newell

quotes.quote: We know the principles of coaching. The art is knowing when to apply them.
quotes.author: James Counsilman

quotes.quote: Coaching is like being a king. It prepares you for nothing.
quotes.author: Herb Brooks

quotes.quote: I define coaching as launching the salesperson on a voyage of discovery by asking questions.
quotes.author: Chris Lytle

quotes.quote: It's all about training smart.
quotes.author: Tyson Gay

quotes.quote: The only side effect of too much training is that you get into better shape. There is nothing wrong with that.
quotes.author: Mark Spitz

quotes.quote: Good coaching is good teaching and nothing else.
quotes.author: Pat Conroy

quotes.quote: Do not let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: Coaching done well may be the most effective intervention designed for human performance.
quotes.author: Atul Gawande

quotes.quote: The coaching process is unique in how it accomplishes leadership development. The coach works not by providing answers per se but by asking questions through which the leader gains new insights and takes new actions.
quotes.author: Aubrey Malphurs

quotes.quote: All I know is, I don't want to stop coaching, and I don't want to stop winning, so we're gonna break the record unless I die.
quotes.author: Bear Bryant

quotes.quote: A great way to test the conditioning of your team is the two-mile run.
quotes.author: Bobby Knight

quotes.quote: To be as good as it can be, a team has to buy into what you as the coach are doing. They have to feel you're a part of them and they're a part of you.
quotes.author: Bobby Knight

quotes.quote: Coaching is one thing and one thing only. It is creating an environment so the player has an opportunity to be successful That is your job as a coach. When you teach him to do that, get out of his way.
quotes.author: Chip Kelly

quotes.quote: Coaching is like flying an airplane, there is going to be a lot of turbulence, but your job is to land the plane safely.
quotes.author: Chuck Daly

quotes.quote: Coaching sets the pace to get the best out of others while giving the best of yourself.
quotes.author: David Cottrell

quotes.quote: The metaphor ( coaching) with sports is meant quite seriously the coach stands back , observes the performance, and provides guidance. The coach applauds strengths, identifies weaknesses, points up principles, offers guiding and often inspiring imagery, and decides what kind of practice to emphasize.
quotes.author: David Perkins

quotes.quote: With good coaching, proper motivation and the right club structure with organic growth, you can achieve an awful lot in football.
quotes.author: Gary Neville

quotes.quote: Coaching is about finding a system that works for your players. There are some underlying principles which are applied in any coaching situation but it's about picking the lock to get this group of players to play the best volleyball they're capable of playing for a long period of time.
quotes.author: Hugh McCutcheon

quotes.quote: The meaning of volleyball, is to give meaning to volleyball, as the meaning of coaching is to give meaning to coaching.
quotes.author: John Kessel

quotes.quote: Coaching is something that takes place only when learning does. No matter what you are doing in your practices, if your players are not learning something significant, you're really not coaching. If a player fails in a game, the coach may have failed in practice.
quotes.author: John Kessel

quotes.quote: When you're a coach you've got to go up the ladder, you've got to be ready to travel. That's the nature of coaching
quotes.author: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar

quotes.quote: The secret is to work less as individuals and more as a team. As a coach, I play not my eleven best, but my best eleven.
quotes.author: Knute Rockne

quotes.quote: You have to have a passion for your work. How can we expect people to be passionate if you, as their coach, does not have a passion? Coaching has to be something that gives you passion and energy.
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.quote:
Coaching is about helping young people have a chance
to succeed. There is no more awesome responsibility
than that. One of the greatest honors a person can have
is being called Coach.
quotes.author: Lou Holtz

quotes.quote: To get the best coaching outcomes, always have your 1-on-1's on your employee's turf not yours. In your office the truth hides.
quotes.author: Marcus Buckingham

quotes.quote: I don't look at myself as a basketball coach. I look at myself as a leader who happens to coach basketball.
quotes.author: Mike Krzyzewski

quotes.quote: College coaches measure success in championships. High School coaches measure success to titles. Youth coaches measure success in smiles.
quotes.author: Paul McAllister

quotes.quote: Coaching is salesmanship. Coaching is winning players over and convincing them they have to play together. It takes a team conviction to play together to make things work.
quotes.author: Phil Jackson

quotes.quote: I think the most important thing about coaching is that you have to have a sense of confidence about what you're doing. You have to be a salesman and you have to get your players, particularly your leaders, to believe in what you're trying to accomplish on the basketball floor.
quotes.author: Phil Jackson

quotes.quote: As the field of coaching finds its way to becoming a mature discipline, James Flaherty's dedicated field research, study, and sound articulation offers a definitive ground and a sensibility of genuine care. At the core this book offers a way of thinking about human beings that makes action and practice central to learning. This is a no-nonsense, generous, pragmatic book that belongs on the shelf every coach, novice or veteran.
quotes.author: Richard Strozzi-Heckler

quotes.quote: Don't judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds that you plant.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: The further I get away from coaching, the more I know I made the right decision. You almost forget how wonderful family life is.
quotes.author: Tony Dungy

quotes.quote: The decline of the aperitif may well be one of the most depressing phenomena of our time.
quotes.author: Luis Buñuel

quotes.quote: Never trust any complicated cocktail that remains perfectly clear until the last ingredient goes in, and then immediately clouds.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: A cocktail will never be better than its cheapest ingredient.
quotes.author: David A. Embury

quotes.quote: The cocktail party has a simple function in modern society. Its basic purpose is to pay off social debts.
quotes.author: Hal Boyle

quotes.quote: A cocktail party is a place where you talk with a person you do not know about a subject you have no interest in.
quotes.author: Lin Yutang

quotes.quote: It's never too early for a cocktail.
quotes.author: Noël Coward

quotes.quote: Festive cocktails mean color, lots of color.
quotes.author: Danny Meyer

quotes.quote: Cocktails are society's most enduring invention!
quotes.author: Elsa Maxwell

quotes.quote: A cocktail done right can really show your guests that you care.
quotes.author: Danny Meyer

quotes.quote: The really important things are said over cocktails and are never done.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: There must be some good in the cocktail party to account for its immense vogue among otherwise sane people.
quotes.author: E. W. Howe

quotes.quote: A holiday cocktail party is where some stranger will learn more about you in an hour than your spouse has learned in a lifetime.
quotes.author: Unknown Author

quotes.quote: Most cocktails containing liquor are made today with gin and ingenuity. In brief, take an ample supply of the former and use your imagination. For the benefit of a minority, it is courteous to serve chilled fruit juice in addition to cocktails made with liquor.
quotes.author: Irma S. Rombauer

quotes.quote: Being codependent means that when you die, someone else's life passes before your eyes.
quotes.author: Barbara Johnson

quotes.quote: I learned again and again in my life, until you get your own act together, you’re not ready for Big Love. What you’re ready for is one of those codependent relationships where you desperately need a partner.
quotes.author: Bruce H. Lipton

quotes.quote: What's a codependent? The answer's easy. They're some of the most loving, caring people I know.
quotes.author: Melody Beattie

quotes.quote: Even if the most important person in your world rejects you, you are still real, and you are still okay.
quotes.author: Melody Beattie

quotes.quote: When a codependent is drowning, somebody else's life flashes before his eyes.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: A codependent person is one who has let another person's behavior affect him or her, and who is obsessed with controlling that person's behavior.
quotes.author: Melody Beattie

quotes.quote: Addiction is just a little hiding place where sensitive people can go so we don't have to be touched by love or pain.
quotes.author: Glennon Doyle Melton

quotes.quote: An over-indulgence of anything, even something as pure as water, can intoxicate.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: Addiction is the dominant form of a culture that suffers from a superficial spectacle and celebrity connectivity at its center. It's a form of spiritual emptiness.
quotes.author: Cornel West

quotes.quote: Codependents are reactionaries. They overreact. They under-react. But rarely do they act. They react to the problems, pains, lives, and behaviors of others. They react to their own problems, pains, and behaviors.
quotes.author: Melody Beattie

quotes.quote: People use drugs, legal and illegal, because their lives are intolerably painful or dull. They hate their work and find no rest in their leisure. They are estranged from their families and their neighbors. It should tell us something that in healthy societies drug use is celebrative, convivial, and occasional, whereas among us it is lonely, shameful, and addictive. We need drugs, apparently, because we have lost each other.
quotes.author: Wendell Berry

quotes.quote: Addiction begins with the hope that something â€˜out there' can instantly fill up the emptiness inside.
quotes.author: Jean Kilbourne

quotes.quote: It is one thing to know about your dysfunctional habits but quite another to change them.
quotes.author: David W. Earle

quotes.quote: In all codependent relationships, the rescuer needs the victim as much as the victim needs the rescuer.
quotes.author: Barbara De Angelis

quotes.quote: Codependency is about normal behaviors taken too far. It's about crossing lines.
quotes.author: Melody Beattie

quotes.quote: There's always something in it for the person who is allowing to be taken advantage of.
quotes.author: P.A. Speers

quotes.quote: But codependency is inappropriate, over-the-top loyalty, caring and supportiveness.
quotes.author: David Stafford

quotes.quote: Addiction is a relationship, a pathological relationship in which obsession replaces people.
quotes.author: Patrick Carnes

quotes.quote: If we are to live together in peace, we must come to know each other better.
quotes.author: Lyndon B Johnson

quotes.quote: Peace cannot be kept by force, it can only be kept by understanding.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Either men will learn to live like brothers, or they will die like beasts.
quotes.author: Max Lerner

quotes.quote: Share our similarities, celebrate our differences.
quotes.author: M Scott Peck

quotes.quote: Poetry and beauty are always making peace. When you read something beautiful you find coexistence; it breaks walls down.
quotes.author: Mahmoud Darwish

quotes.quote: What fascinates me about London is its multi-ethnicity, the coexistence of cultures and religions, but I do not see myself living here for very long. It's too big, too much stress, too much of a metropolis.
quotes.author: Alvaro Morata

quotes.quote: We're all inseparably part of each other. We all coexist in each other.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Seeds of Peace exists in the real world. It exists among people who've been taught to hate each other, and it's finding some basis for them to coexist with one another.
quotes.author: John Wallach

quotes.quote: Everyone has a right to peaceful coexistence, the basic personal freedoms, the alleviation of suffering, and the opportunity to lead a productive life.
quotes.author: Jimmy Carter

quotes.quote: If civilization is to survive, we must cultivate the science of human relationships - the ability of all peoples, of all kinds, to live together, in the same world at peace.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Coexistence and personal peace are at the heart of global peace and harmony.
quotes.author: Widad Akrawi

quotes.quote: God has given us many faiths but only one world in which to co-exist. May your work help all of us to cherish our commonalities and feel enlarged by our differences.
quotes.author: Jonathan Sacks

quotes.quote: Life is the coexistence of all opposite values. Joy and sorrow, pleasure and pain, up and down, hot and cold, here and there, light and darkness, birth and death. All experience is by contrast, and one would be meaningless without the other.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Peaceful coexistence cannot be limited to the powerful countries if we want to ensure world peace.
quotes.author: Che Guevara

quotes.quote: All creatures must learn to coexist. That's why the brown bear and the field mouse can share their lives in harmony. Of course, they can't mate or the mice would explode.
quotes.author: Betty White

quotes.quote: Today, peace means the ascent from simple coexistence to cooperation and common creativity among countries and nations.
quotes.author: Mikhail Gorbachev

quotes.quote: Though we may be genetically wired for temporary happiness, we've also been gifted with the ability to recognize within ourselves a more profound and lasting sense of confidence, peace, and well-being. Among sentient beings, human beings appear to stand alone in their ability to recognize the necessity to forge a bond between reason, emotion, and their instinct to survive, and in doing so create a universe-not only for themselves and the human generations that follow, but also for all creatures who feel pain, fear and suffering-in which we are all able to coexist contentedly and peaceably.
quotes.author: Yongey Mingyur Rinpoche

quotes.quote: There is a constant and intimate contact among the things that coexist and co-evolve in the universe - a sharing of bonds and messages that makes reality into a stupendous network of interaction and communication.
quotes.author: Ervin Laszlo

quotes.quote: Fear of God and love for God coexist happily in the heart of people who are rightly related to Him.
quotes.author: Max Anders

quotes.quote: I think sometimes when children grow up, their parents grow up. Mine grew up with me. We coexist. I don't try to change them anymore, and I don't think they try to change me. We agree to disagree.
quotes.author: Katy Perry

quotes.quote: North Eurasia is one of the best examples of religious tolerance and peaceful coexistence of Islam and Christianity. This is a rare thing in today's world, even in its most liberal parts.
quotes.author: Nursultan Nazarbayev

quotes.quote: The book is here to stay. What we're doing is symbolic of the peaceful coexistence of the book and the computer.
quotes.author: Vartan Gregorian

quotes.quote: Humankind continues to face the threat of nuclear annihilation. Today's hesitation leads to tomorrow's destruction. The fates of all of us are bound together here on earth. There can be no survival for any without peaceful coexistence for all.
quotes.author: Takeshi Araki

quotes.quote: We must persist in settling international disputes by peaceful means, with a view to promoting harmonious coexistence for different countries.
quotes.author: Hu Jintao

quotes.quote: It's not a confrontation between different nations, different cultures or different religions, ... We recommend dialogue between civilizations, coexistence and cooperation.
quotes.author: Tang Jiaxuan

quotes.quote: The Holy Father reiterates his firm and absolute disapproval of such actions that offend God, violate the fundamental right to life and undermine peaceful coexistence.
quotes.author: Pope John Paul II

quotes.quote: Our secular constitution has enabled people of all world views to coexist in harmony, undivided by sectarian strife.
quotes.author: Jesse Ventura

quotes.quote: Anger cannot coexist with inner peace, which is the principal characteristic of happiness.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: I learned that realism can come in all shapes and sizes. The world is big enough for different values to coexist.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: The present and the past coexist, but the past shouldn't be in flashback.
quotes.author: Alain Resnais

quotes.quote: You're trying to get the lyrics and melody to coexist. And sometimes you're trying to fit a square peg into a round hole.
quotes.author: Andrew Bird

quotes.quote: Righteous wrath is no less noble than love, since both coexist in God.
quotes.author: John Macarthur

quotes.quote: In the hearts of men lies both good and evil. The two coexist. Some men become good, and others become evil. It is the way of this world. ’d never done before. Growth and comfort do not coexist.
quotes.author: Ginni Rometty

quotes.quote: Both human and nature can coexist it just requires little creativity from our side.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The morning cup of coffee has an exhilaration about it which the cheering influence of the afternoon or evening cup of tea cannot be expected to reproduce.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.

quotes.quote: I believe humans get a lot done, not because we're smart, but because we have thumbs so we can make coffee.
quotes.author: Flash Rosenberg

quotes.quote: It is inhumane, in my opinion, to force people who genuinely have a medical need for coffee to wait in line behind people who apparently view it as some kind of recreational activity.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: Coffee: the favorite drink of the civilized world.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: As soon as coffee is in your stomach, there is a general commotion. Ideas begin to move...similes arise, the paper is covered. Coffee is your ally and writing ceases to be a struggle.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: Even bad coffee is better than no coffee at all.
quotes.author: David Lynch

quotes.quote: The powers of a man's mind are directly proportioned to the quantity of coffee he drinks.
quotes.author: James Mackintosh

quotes.quote: Decaffeinated coffee is the devil's blend.
quotes.author: Unknown Author

quotes.quote: We want to do a lot of stuff; we're not in great shape. We didn't get a good night's sleep. We're a little depressed. Coffee solves all these problems in one delightful little cup.
quotes.author: Jerry Seinfeld

quotes.quote: Among the numerous luxuries of the table...coffee may be considered as one of the most valuable. It excites cheerfulness without intoxication; and the pleasing flow of spirits which it occasions...is never followed by sadness, languor or debility.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Way too much coffee. But if it weren't for the coffee, I'd have no identifiable personality whatsoever.
quotes.author: David Letterman

quotes.quote: A cup of coffee - real coffee - home-browned, home ground, home made, that comes to you dark as a hazel-eye, but changes to a golden bronze as you temper it with cream that never cheated, but was real cream from its birth, thick, tenderly yellow, perfectly sweet, neither lumpy nor frothing on the Java: such a cup of coffee is a match for twenty blue devils and will exorcise them all.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: Coffee was only a way of stealing time that should by rights belong to your slightly older self.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: Coffee, according to the women of Denmark, is to the body what the Word of the Lord is to the soul.
quotes.author: Isak Dinesen

quotes.quote: After all, coffee is bitter, a flavor from the forbidden and dangerous realm.
quotes.author: Diane Ackerman

quotes.quote: I like coffee because it gives me the illusion that I might be awake.
quotes.author: Lewis Black

quotes.quote: Should I kill myself, or have a cup of coffee?
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: I never laugh until I've had my coffee
quotes.author: Clark Gable

quotes.quote: No one can understand the truth until he drinks of coffee's frothy goodness.
quotes.author: Sheik Abd-al-Kadir

quotes.quote: A morning without coffee is like sleep.
quotes.author: Unknown Author

quotes.quote: Once you wake up and smell the coffee, it's hard to go back to sleep.
quotes.author: Fran Drescher

quotes.quote: Coffee is the best thing to douse the sunrise with.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: There's nothing sweeter than a cup of bitter coffee.
quotes.author: Rian Aditia

quotes.quote: As long as there was coffee in the world, how bad could things be?
quotes.author: Cassandra Clare

quotes.quote: Come on, don't you ever stop and smell the coffee?
quotes.author: Justina Chen

quotes.quote: Coffee first. Schemes later.
quotes.author: Leanna Renee Hieber

quotes.quote: To me, the smell of fresh-made coffee is one of the greatest inventions.
quotes.author: Hugh Jackman

quotes.quote: Coffee and love are best when they are hot.
quotes.author: German Proverb

quotes.quote: A cup of gourmet coffee shared with a friend is happiness tasted and time well spent.
quotes.author: Unknown Author

quotes.quote: What goes best with a cup of coffee? Another cup.
quotes.author: Henry Rollins

quotes.quote: Caffeine and sugar, the two basic food groups.
quotes.author: Laurell K. Hamilton

quotes.quote: It’s amazing how the world begins to change through the eyes of a cup of coffee.
quotes.author: Donna A. Favors

quotes.quote: The powers of a man’s mind are directly proportional to the quantity of coffee he drinks.
quotes.author: Sir James MacKintosh

quotes.quote: Without my morning coffee, I’m just like a dried-up piece of goat.
quotes.author: J.S. Bach

quotes.quote: I'd rather take coffee than compliments just now.
quotes.author: Louisa May Alcott

quotes.quote: Coffee is a beverage that puts one to sleep when not drank.
quotes.author: Alphonse Allais

quotes.quote: I never drink coffee at lunch. I find it keeps me awake for the afternoon.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: I have measured out my life with coffee spoons.
quotes.author: T.S. Eliot

quotes.quote: Good communication is just as stimulating as black coffee, and just as hard to sleep after.
quotes.author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quotes.quote: If this is coffee, please bring me some tea; but if this is tea, please bring me some coffee.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: A mathematician is a device for turning coffee into theorems.
quotes.author: Alfred Renyi

quotes.quote: He was my cream, and I was his coffee - And when you poured us together, it was something.
quotes.author: Josephine Baker

quotes.quote: Like everyone else who makes the mistake of getting older, I begin each day with coffee and obituaries.
quotes.author: Bill Cosby

quotes.quote: I wake up some mornings and sit and have my coffee and look out at my beautiful garden, and I go, ’Remember how good this is. Because you can lose it.
quotes.author: Jim Carrey

quotes.quote: Our culture runs on coffee and gasoline, the first often tasting like the second.
quotes.author: Edward Abbey

quotes.quote: Good communication is as stimulating as black coffee, and just as hard.
quotes.author: Anne Spencer

quotes.quote: Do you know how helpless you feel if you have a full cup of coffee in your hand and you start to sneeze?
quotes.author: Jean Kerr

quotes.quote: Cigarettes and coffee: an alcoholic's best friend!
quotes.author: Gerard Way

quotes.quote: Tobacco, coffee, alcohol, hashish, prussic acid, strychnine, are weak dilutions. The surest poison is time.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: When I wake up in the morning, I just can't get started until I've had that first, piping hot pot of coffee. Oh, I've tried other enemas.
quotes.author: Emo Phillips

quotes.quote: I put instant coffee in a microwave oven and almost went back in time.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: Oh, I can't stop drinking the coffee. I stop drinking the coffee, I stop doing the standing, walking, and words putting into sentence doing.
quotes.author: Amy Sherman-Palladino

quotes.quote: And coffee. Milk and coffee, oh my God! What a drink! It's milk and coffee, mixed together!
quotes.author: Dean Parisot

quotes.quote:
But coffee already tastes like coffee. Like, a lot.
No, it's not the flavor of coffee, it's to flavor your coffee. You put it in your coffee for a burst of authentic flavor.
quotes.author: Brent Butt

quotes.quote: We're gonna sit around our bonfire of coffee and cigarettes, and you're gonna share your story. But - we wait, until the coffee is poured.
quotes.author: Paul Thomas Anderson

quotes.quote: I don't care, you gotta do it right. Look... crease it nice and smooth. Put some love into your coffee.
quotes.author: Danny MAlin

quotes.quote: I don't drink coffee either. It's a drug. It messes with your brain.
quotes.author: Paul Mendelson

quotes.quote: Instant coffee: is just old beans that have been cremated.
quotes.author: Jennifer Saunders

quotes.quote:
You're sure drinkin' a lot of coffee.
Well, at your age. Well, you know that doctor told you to cut down on your coffee drinkin'
quotes.author: Richard Carr

quotes.quote: Who doesn't drink coffee? I mean, it's just - It's just coffee! You have with for breakfast, or when you're sitting in a cafe pretending to write a novel - it's not a drink! It's a hug!
quotes.author: Michelle Lovretta

quotes.quote: Incredibly, it is. I mean, I wouldn't possibly drink the same coffee that you drink just in case yours spilled, that would be pathetic.
quotes.author: Peter Chiarelli

quotes.quote: Staring at the walls, think I know what I see / Anger and coffee, feeling mean / Drinking black coffee, black coffee, drinking black coffee, staring at the wall
quotes.author: Ike Turner

quotes.quote: I'll drink coffee 'till I die / Don't pour me water just fill up my cup / You know it takes a lot just to keep me up
quotes.author: Emmett Grogan

quotes.quote: Instead she brought me a cup of chicory / I got those Java blues / Coffee's got me / Java blues / Oh coffee, coffee, coffee
quotes.author: Emmett Grogan

quotes.quote: I got a spit of black coffee, oh how good it tastes / I said a dime is all it costs in the States / For a cup of black coffee, how good it tastes
quotes.author: Ike Turner

quotes.quote: Make it warm and make it sweet / Just the way my life has been / Give me coffee, coffee, coffee / Coffee, coffee
quotes.author: Tom T Hall

quotes.quote: Some men drink alcohol / Some men drink juices from the vine / But as for me I'm very simple / Give me coffee every time
quotes.author: Tom T Hall

quotes.quote: Coffee time, my dreamy friend, it's coffee time / Let's sing this silly little rhyme / And have a cup of coffee
quotes.author: Arthur Freed

quotes.quote: Greetin' time, the music box is beatin' time / It's good old-fashioned meetin' time / We're in the pink, so come and clink / And let's drink a cup of coffee
quotes.author: Arthur Freed

quotes.quote: Way down among Brazilians / Coffee beans grow by the billions / So they've got to find those extra cups to fill / They've got an awful lot of coffee in Brazil
quotes.author: Bob Hilliard

quotes.quote: Gotta serve it to me, hot / Just like I like my coffee / It’s keepin’ me from sleepin’ on my job
quotes.author: Koshah E Daniels

quotes.quote: I need it in the mornin’, early crack of dawn and / Gets me goin’, so keep it flowin’ / And make no mistake, no debate, need that coffee break
quotes.author: Koshah E Daniels

quotes.quote: I love coffee, I love tea / I love the java jive and it loves me / Coffee and tea and the jiving and me
quotes.author: Milton Drake

quotes.quote: You know that I'm not keen for a bean / Unless it is a cheery coffee bean.
quotes.author: Milton Drake

quotes.quote: I'm tryin' to cut down on my caffeine consumption, / So when I get up, I just have one cup of coffee, / And I like to have another cup of coffee with my breakfast
quotes.author: Salvatore P Cerna

quotes.quote: Mysterious and dark / One more cup of coffee for the road / One more cup of coffee 'fore I go / To the valley below
quotes.author: Bob Dylan

quotes.quote: Let's get some coffee, let me show what this thing's about / Let me show how you the one I sing about / And the coffee makes me wanna scream and shout / It makes me energetic
quotes.author: Josiah Davis

quotes.quote: Coffee, I'm thankin' You for making me move / I'm awfully sure I would not be alive without You
quotes.author: Josiah Davis

quotes.quote:
Coffee is nice / But it's better with spice / Coffee and toast / Are the best breakfast for most
Coffee, what a bean / It’s never been seen
quotes.author: Robert Curran

quotes.quote: Coffees a stimulant / And makes my ears ring / More rings in my ears I don't need / Just more coffee my belly I’ll feed
quotes.author: Robert Curran

quotes.quote: Two shoots from off a coffee-tree / He carried with him o'er the sea. / Each little tender coffee slip / He waters daily in the ship
quotes.author: Charles Lamb

quotes.quote: Whene'er I fragrant coffee drink, / I on the generous Frenchman think, / Whose noble perseverance bore / The tree to Martinico's shore
quotes.author: Charles Lamb

quotes.quote: Coffee can fill your heart with glee.
quotes.author: Mario William Vitale

quotes.quote: We press our lips to the enameled rim of the cups / and know this grease that floats / over the coffee will one day stop our hearts.
quotes.author: Raymond Carver

quotes.quote: Coffee is a good source of potassium, contains appreciable amounts of magnesium and may contribute significantly of manganese intake.
quotes.author: R.J. Clarke

quotes.quote: People love coffee of its two-fold effect--the pleasurable sensation and the increased efficiency it produces.
quotes.author: William Harrison Ukers

quotes.quote: Coffee is universal in its appeal. All nations do it homage. It has become recognized as a human necessity.
quotes.author: William Harrison Ukers

quotes.quote: Coffee has an important place in the rational dietary of all civilized people of earth. It is a democratic beverage.
quotes.author: William Harrison Ukers

quotes.quote: Coffee is the world's second most traded commodity, after oil, Commodities are goods that are bought and sold on world markets.
quotes.author: Adrianna Morganelli

quotes.quote: No 'food drink' has ever encountered so much opposition as coffee.
quotes.author: William Harrison Ukers

quotes.quote: Coffee is something more than a beverage. It is one of the world's greatest adjutant foods.
quotes.author: William Harrison Ukers

quotes.quote: Men and women drink coffee because it adds to their sense of well-being. It not only smells good and tastes good to all mankind, heathen or civilized, but all respond to its wonderful stimulating properties.
quotes.author: William Harrison Ukers

quotes.quote: The chief factors in coffee goodness are the caffeine content and the caffeol.
quotes.author: William Harrison Ukers

quotes.quote: The caffeol supplies the flavor and the aroma-- that indescribable Oriental fragrance that wooes us through the nostrils, forming one of the principal elements that make up the lure of coffee.
quotes.author: William Harrison Ukers

quotes.quote: Life all good things in life, the drinking of coffee may be abused.
quotes.author: William Harrison Ukers

quotes.quote: Coffee is, perhaps, less often abused than wrongly accused. It all depends. A little more tolerance!
quotes.author: William Harrison Ukers

quotes.quote: One of our contemporary attackers of the national beverage bewails the fact that no palatable hot drink has been found to take the place of coffee.
quotes.author: William Harrison Ukers

quotes.quote: Good coffee, carefully roasted and properly brewed, produces a natural beverage that, for tonic effect, can not be surpassed, even by its rivals.
quotes.author: William Harrison Ukers

quotes.quote: The festive drink / Coffee is our gold / Nectar of all men
quotes.author: William Harrison Ukers

quotes.quote: Coffee, which makes the politician wise. Its aroma is the pleasantest in all nature.
quotes.author: William Harrison Ukers

quotes.quote: A brief account of the cultivation of the coffee plant in the Old World and its introduction into the New--A romantic coffee adventure.
quotes.author: William Harrison Ukers

quotes.quote: Ever since coffee was first consumed in the West, towards the middle of the seventeenth century, specific local habits and traditions have developed and overlapped, entailing great difference in coffee consumption.
quotes.author: Andrea Illy

quotes.quote: Socializing and comfort are two aspects particularly associated with coffee consumption.
quotes.author: Andrea Illy

quotes.quote: Coffee has been an object of fascination and passion, and a mirror for how we see the human body and nature.
quotes.author: Adriana Farah

quotes.quote: In the modern world, coffee has become a familiar part of everyday life.
quotes.author: Adriana Farah

quotes.quote: Coffee is a source of and medium for the stimulant caffeine, the most widely consumed psychoactive drug in the world.
quotes.author: Adriana Farah

quotes.quote: Diverse social, economic, and scientific factors have affected the historical development of coffee science.
quotes.author: Adriana Farah

quotes.quote: Coffee is the drink of Japanese 'modernity' as well as of 'democracy' as both developed over the past 130 years.
quotes.author: Merry White

quotes.quote: This coffee falls into your stomach, and straightway there is a general commotion. Ideas begin to move like the battalions of the Grand Army on the battlefield, and the battle takes place.. Similes arise, the paper is covered with ink; for the struggle commences and is concluded with torrents of black water, just a battle with powder.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: Coffee was initially used for spiritual purposes. Muslim dervishes in Yemen grew the shrub in their plots of land, at first making wine from the pulp of the fermented berries.
quotes.author: Paul Chrystal

quotes.quote: Coffee makes people feel less drowsy and more alert because it contains a chemical called caffeine.
quotes.author: Adrianna Morganelli

quotes.quote: Life is full of luck, like getting dealt a good hand, or simply by being in the right place at the right time. Some people get luck handed to them, a second chance, a save. It can happen heroically, or by a simple coincidence , but there are those who don't get luck on a shiny platter, who end up in the wrong place at the wrong time, who don't get saved.
quotes.author: Jessica Sorensen

quotes.quote: Do you think the universe fights for souls to be together? Some things are too strange and strong to be coincidences.
quotes.author: Emery Allen

quotes.quote: Coincidences mean you're on the right path
quotes.author: Simon Van Booy

quotes.quote: Coincidences are spiritual puns.
quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Life is a gift of God, of the God of Coincidence
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: The world is so unpredictable. Things happen suddenly, unexpectedly. We want to feel we are in control of our own existence. In some ways we are, in some ways we're not. We are ruled by the forces of chance and coincidence.
quotes.author: Paul Auster

quotes.quote: Every single moment is a coincidence.
quotes.author: Douglas Coupland

quotes.quote: Coincidence is the word we use when we can't see the levers and pulleys.
quotes.author: Emma Bull

quotes.quote: Life is like a game of cards. The hand you are dealt is determinism; the way you play it is free will.
quotes.author: Jawaharlal Nehru

quotes.quote: Coincidence is God's way of remaining Unknown Author.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: There is always room for coincidence.
quotes.author: Alva Noto

quotes.quote: When you live your life with an appreciation of coincidences and their meanings, you connect with the underlying field of infinite possibilities
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: All mystical experience is coincidence; and vice versa, of course.
quotes.author: Tom Stoppard

quotes.quote: We do not create our destiny; we participate in its unfolding. Synchronicityworks as a catalyst toward the working out of that destiny.
quotes.author: David Richo

quotes.quote: If there were no such thing as coincidence, there would be no such word.
quotes.author: Heron Carvic

quotes.quote: Consciousness itself is an infinite regress. This explains coincidences
quotes.author: Robert Anton Wilson

quotes.quote: Once is happenstance. Twice is coincidence. Three times, it's enemy action.
quotes.author: Ian Fleming

quotes.quote: The human mind delights in finding pattern so much so that we often mistake coincidence or forced analogy for profound meaning. No other habit of thought lies so deeply within the soul of a small creature trying to make sense of a complex world not constructed for it.
quotes.author: Stephen Jay Gould

quotes.quote: It is no mere coincidence that there is both an historic and a present relationship between community (people assisting each other) and a poverty of power due to financial recession.
quotes.author: Bill Mollison

quotes.quote: coincidence may be described as the chance encounter of two unrelated causal chains which miraculously, it seems merge into a significant event.
quotes.author: Arthur Koestler

quotes.quote: Coincidence, if traced far enough back, becomes inevitable.
quotes.author: Hineu

quotes.quote: Coincidence is God's way of remaining Unknown Author.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: In mathematics, two angles that are said to coincide fit together perfectly. The word coincidence does not describe luck or mistakes. It describes that which fits together perfectly.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: Quality isn't the result of coincidence.
quotes.author: Rick Helders

quotes.quote: That's too coincidental to be a coincidence.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: Coming early is not as good as coming just at the right moment.
quotes.author: Unknown Author

quotes.quote: The worst possible turn can not be programmed. It is caused by coincidence.
quotes.author: Friedrich Durrenmatt

quotes.quote: Coincidence is a pimp and a cardsharper in ordinary fiction but a marvelous artist in the patterns of facts recollected by a non-o rdinary memorist.
quotes.author: Vladimir Nabokov

quotes.quote: Only what is thought, said, or done at a certain rare coincidence is good.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Coincidence is the word we use when we can't see the levers and pulleys.
quotes.author: Emma Bull

quotes.quote: Happiness is always a coincidence.
quotes.author: Jose Bergamin

quotes.quote: Coincidence is logical.
quotes.author: Johan Cruijff

quotes.quote: The universe is always speaking to us... sending us little messages, causing coincidences and serendipities,reminding us to stop, to look around, to believe in something else, something more.
quotes.author: Nancy Thayer

quotes.quote: Coincidence is a messenger sent by truth.
quotes.author: Jacqueline Winspear

quotes.quote: Is not all this an extraordinary concatenation of coincidence? Pelorat said, If you list it like that? List it any way you please, said Trevize. I don't believe in extraordinary concatenations of coincidence.
quotes.author: Isaac Asimov

quotes.quote: Coincidence is a wonderful thing.
quotes.author: Humphrey Lyttelton

quotes.quote: Third, consider the insistency of an idea. The insistency of a past idea with reference to the present is a quantity which is less, the further back that past idea is, and rises to infinity as the past idea is brought up into coincidence with the present.
quotes.author: Charles Sanders Peirce

quotes.quote: I am still hopeful. A falcon, Time. But the coincidence is probably accidental.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: Coincidences are the scars of fate.
quotes.author: Carlos Ruiz Zafon

quotes.quote: Coincidences are a true paradox. . . on the one hand they seem to be the source of our greatest irrationalities--seeing causal connections when science tells us they aren't there. On the other hand, some of our greatest feats of scientific discovery depend on coincidences.
quotes.author: Josh Tenenbaum

quotes.quote: When you live your life with an appreciation of coincidences and their meanings, you connect with the underlying field of infinite possibilities.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Without realizing it, the individual composes his life according to the laws of beauty even in times of greatest distress. It is wrong then, to chide the novel for being fascinated by mysterious coincidences, but it is right to chide people for being blind to such coincidences in their daily lives. For they thereby deprive their lives of a dimension of beauty
quotes.author: Milan Kundera

quotes.quote: It can hardly be a coincidence that no language on Earth has ever produced the phrase, 'as pretty as an airport.' Airports are ugly. Some are very ugly. Some attain a degree of ugliness that can only be the result of a special effort.
quotes.author: Douglas Adams

quotes.quote: I truly believe we can either see the connections, celebrate them, and express gratitude for our blessings, or we can see life as a string of coincidences that have no meaning or connection.For me, I'm going to believe in miracles, celebrate life, rejoice in the views of eternity and hope my choices will create a positive ripple effect in the lives of others. This is my choice.
quotes.author: Mike Ericksen

quotes.quote: We got into that situation, just by coincidence, to be the last people out.
quotes.author: Mark Dawson

quotes.quote: The concept of randomness and coincidence will be obsolete when people can finally define a formulation of patterned interaction between all things within the universe.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: It is an extraordinary coincidence, you start to think there is more to it, but nothing has been found yet. If it happens again, we would have to look deeper into it.
quotes.author: Alan Thompson

quotes.quote: It's a coincidence of ideal conditions.
quotes.author: Christopher W. Landsea

quotes.quote: Coincidence may be described as the chance encounter of two unrelated causal chains which
quotes.author: Arthur Koestler

quotes.quote: It is such a complex matter we live within, it is impossible to track logic and decision making really, so therefore each choice can actually only be seen as coincidence.
quotes.author: Alva Noto

quotes.quote: If, however, we aspire to see things as they really are, we would do well to correct the natural impulse to presume a lack of coincidence.
quotes.author: Julian Baggini

quotes.quote: if there were no coincidence, it would be the greatest coincidence of all.
quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: It is no coincidence that in no known language does the phrase 'As pretty as an airport' appear.
quotes.author: Douglas Adams

quotes.quote: Human beings have a tendency not to believe in coincidence. Our ability to manipulate and predict the world depends on us being able to spot patterns of causation.
quotes.author: Julian Baggini

quotes.quote: I think there must be rules of some sort because the wholesale rearrangement of plants and nature is too universal an art to be happenstance.
quotes.author: David P. Morgan

quotes.quote: Every honorable action has its proper time and season, or rather it is this property or observance which distinguishes an honourable action from its opposite.
quotes.author: Agesilaus

quotes.quote: These things never happened, but are always.
quotes.author: Sallustius

quotes.quote: It was the best of times, it was the worst of times.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: If, of all words of tongue and pen, / The saddest are, 'It might have been,' / More sad are these we daily see: / 'It is, but hadn't ought to be.'
quotes.author: Bret Harte

quotes.quote: Many a time a man cannot be such as he would be if circumstances do not admit of it.
quotes.author: Terence

quotes.quote: When men are easy in their circumstances, they are naturally enemies to innovations.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.quote: Our first mistake is the belief that the circumstance gives the joy which we give to the circumstance.
quotes.author: Emerson

quotes.quote: Ask not that events should happen as you will, but let you will be that events should happen as they do, and you shall have peace.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: Men are the sports of circumstances when the circumstances seem the sport of men.
quotes.author: Byron

quotes.quote: He who waits until circumstances completely favor his undertaking will never accomplish anything.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: The people who get on in this world are the people who get up and look for the circumstances they want, and, if they can find them, make them.
quotes.author: Shaw

quotes.quote: There is no such thing as coincidence in this world. The only thing is hitsuzen. Hitsuzen...A naturally foreordained event. A state in which all other outcomes are impossible.
quotes.author: Clamp

quotes.quote: Chance. Stupid, dumb, blind chance. Just a part of the strange mechanism of the world, with its fits and coughs and starts and random collisions.
quotes.author: Lauren Oliver

quotes.quote: Yes, you see, there’s no such thing as coincidence. There are no accidents in life. Everything that happens is the result of a calculated move that leads us to where we are.
quotes.author: J.M. Darhower

quotes.quote: The probability of a certain set of circumstances coming together in a meaningful (or tragic) way is so low that it simply cannot be considered mere coincidence.
quotes.author: V.C. King

quotes.quote: When we're interested in something, everything around us appears to refer to it (the mystics call these phenomena 'signs', the sceptics 'coincidence', and psychologists 'concentrated focus', although I've yet to find out what term historians would use).
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Coincidence doesn't happen a third time.
quotes.author: Osamu Tezuka

quotes.quote: For an old spy and codebreaker like myself, nothing in the world happens by coincidence.
quotes.author: Malcolm Nance

quotes.quote: I have always believed that there is no such thing as coincidence, and I have always believed in destiny.
quotes.author: Adnan Sami

quotes.quote: Coincidence is a recognized element in 'real-life.' All of us have anecdotes about those times when, by the merest coincidence, we avoided some disaster or stumbled onto some wonderful experience.
quotes.author: Jane Lindskold

quotes.quote: The things that come to us easily, our propensities, are carried on a deep subconscious level into our next life. There are no coincidences.
quotes.author: Raquel Cepeda

quotes.quote: Everything in life has a pattern and a coincidence is simply the moment when the pattern becomes briefly visible.
quotes.author: Anthony Horowitz
