quotes.quote: Some people say coincidences are meaningful. That it’s the universe trying to tell you something.
quotes.author: Laurelyn Paige

quotes.quote: Any coincidence is worth noticing. You can throw it away later if it is only a coincidence.
quotes.author: Agatha Christie

quotes.quote: In the magical universe, there are no coincidences and there are no accidents. nothing happens unless someone wills it to happen
quotes.author: William S. Burroughs

quotes.quote: Coca-Cola remains emblematic of the best and worst of America and Western civilization. The history of Coca-Cola is the often funny story of a group of men obsessed with putting a trivial soft drink 'within an arm's reach of desire.' But at the same time, it is a microcosm of American history. Coca-Cola grew up with the country, shaping and shaped by the times. The drink not only helped to alter consumption patterns, but attitudes toward leisure, work, advertising, sex, family life, and patriotism.
quotes.author: Mark Pendergrast

quotes.quote: This original version of Coca-Cola contained a small amount of coca extract and therefore a trace of cocaine. (It was eliminated early in the twentieth century, though other extracts derived from coca leaves remain part of the drink to this day.) Its creation was not the accidental concoction of an amateur experimenting in his garden, but the deliberate and painstaking culmination of months of work by an experienced maker of quack remedies.
quotes.author: Tom Standage

quotes.quote: Coca-Cola is the only business in the world where no matter which country or town or village you are in, if someone asks what do you do, and you say you work for Coca-Cola, you never have to answer the question, 'What is that?'
quotes.author: Muhtar Kent

quotes.quote: The only way that I could figure they could improve upon Coca-Cola, one of life's most delightful elixirs, which studies prove will heal the sick and occasionally raise the dead, is to put bourbon in it.
quotes.author: Lewis Grizzard

quotes.quote: Coca-Cola is little more than sugar, some flavoring, and lots of (carbonated) water. It is largely indistinguishable from innumerable other brands of cola, yet people around the world seem to think that Coca-Cola is something and they are eager to ask for it by name and even to pay a premium for it.
quotes.author: George Ritzer

quotes.quote: There was no starting point for the rebellion, but I could mark an arbitrary one: that a grown-up was someone who, first and foremost, could drink a Coke at whim.
quotes.author: Teju Cole

quotes.quote: There are now more obese people in the United States than there are overweight people. I think it's safe to say that after all these years, Diet Coke is a complete failure.
quotes.author: Jay Leno

quotes.quote: Coca-Cola emerged from this turbulent, inventive, noisy, neurotic new America. It began as a 'nerve tonic' like many others marketed to capitalize on the dislocations and worries of the day. After surviving an early history rife with conflict and controversy, this lowly nickel soft drink became so much a part of national life that by 1938 it was called 'the sublimated essence of America'.
quotes.author: Mark Pendergrast

quotes.quote: I don't need to know how they make Coca-Cola. I think it tastes just fine not knowing what the ingredients are. I think there are some things that should be kept secret.
quotes.author: Colin Hanks

quotes.quote: If you are at Coca-Cola, the creative challenge is one of maintaining - rather than creating - a tremendous level of consumption for your products.
quotes.author: John Kao

quotes.quote: Coca-Cola can get really fresh output because it is getting people who are outside the traditional model and they are combining ideas in very novel ways.
quotes.author: John Kao

quotes.quote: The Coke bottle is a masterpiece of scientific, functional planning. In simpler terms, I would describe the bottle as well thought out, logical, sparing of material and pleasant to look at.
quotes.author: Raymond Loewy

quotes.quote: Coke is great from a can, still good from a bottle, yet hard to get just right from the fountain. But oh, when they do get it right, it tastes good enough to be an eighth wonder of the world.
quotes.author: Alecia Whitaker

quotes.quote: Diet Coke does not contain nasty chemicals. It contains lovely and delicious carbonation, caffeine, and aspartame. What's unnatural about that?
quotes.author: Meg Cabot

quotes.quote: Coca-Cola should always be within an arm's reach of desire.
quotes.author: Robert W. Woodruff

quotes.quote: More than Coca-Cola, the dollar is surely the United States' signature export.
quotes.author: Barry Eichengreen

quotes.quote: I guess there are some things in life where you may never hear an explanation. It's like the guy who hides his secret for Coca-Cola. He just won't share it.
quotes.author: Steve Swanson

quotes.quote: Life is like pouring water into a Coca-Cola bottle; if you're the least bit scared you can't do it.
quotes.author: Olive Ann Burns

quotes.quote: I'd rather see you drink a glass of wine than a glass of milk. So many people drink Coca-Cola and all these soft drinks with sugar. Some of these drinks have 8 or 9 teaspoons of sugar in them What's the good of living if you can't have the things that give a little enjoyment?
quotes.author: Jack Lalanne

quotes.quote: Coke is trying to address all these different niches of unmet needs people have and give them different drinks for every occasion. Some might work, some might not. It takes a long time for new drinks to catch on.
quotes.author: Walter Todd

quotes.quote: Happiness is like coke: something you get as a by-product in the process of making something else.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: The thing is, if you follow whatever meal you have with Coke, it eats up the other things. It helps with the digestion of it.
quotes.author: Lennon Parham

quotes.quote: A cold heart is my protection mechanism. I don't really feel anything for anyone.
quotes.author: Emmanuel Jal

quotes.quote: He was not an ill-disposed young man, unless to be rather cold hearted, and rather selfish, is to be ill-disposed
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: I shut myself off to make life bearable. I'm like a damn machine sometimes. Unfeeling. Uncaring. Emotionless.
quotes.author: Monica Murphy

quotes.quote: No matter how cold this world gets, please don't lose touch of morality and allow it to turn your heart cold.
quotes.author: Edmond Mbiaka

quotes.quote: I shall have peace, as leafy trees are peaceful when rain bends down the bough; And I shall be more silent and cold hearted than you are now.
quotes.author: Sara Teasdale

quotes.quote: Sentimentality is the respect the cold-hearted pay to feeling.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: I've learned the best way to prevent your heart from getting broken, is to act like you don't have one.
quotes.author: Nishan Panwar

quotes.quote: Perhaps only those people who are capable of real togetherness have that look of being alone in the world.
quotes.author: DH Lawrence

quotes.quote: It's hard for me to characterise myself. I think I'm balanced. Some people might say I'm cold-hearted.
quotes.author: Beny Steinmetz

quotes.quote: Nobody should have to choose between a cold heart and a dead heart.
quotes.author: Nenia Campbell

quotes.quote: Sometimes I wish I would just disappear into thin air, leave the pain and the misery of this cold hearted world,I wonder who would miss me if anyone would even show a little sympathy to my family, probably no one I was just a little no one anyways.
quotes.author: kashmir foley

quotes.quote: There comes a time where you must become cold and separate the ones who are tearing you down.
quotes.author: Travis Martin

quotes.quote: You have to have a somewhat cold heart to be a writer.
quotes.author: Susanna Kaysen

quotes.quote: She was cold by nature, self-love predominating over passion; rather than being virtuous, she preferred to have her pleasures all to herself.
quotes.author: Emile Zola

quotes.quote: I'm almost never serious, and I'm always too serious. Too deep, too shallow. Too sensitive, too cold hearted. I'm like a collection of paradoxes.
quotes.author: Ferdinand de Saussure

quotes.quote: There was a kind of cold-hearted selfishness on both sides, which mutually attracted them; and they sympathized with each other in an insipid propriety of demeanor, and a general want of understanding.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: We cannot selectively numb emotions, when we numb the painful emotions, we also numb the positive emotions.
quotes.author: Brené Brown

quotes.quote: A deep sense of love and belonging is an irreducible need of all people. We are biologically, cognitively, physically, and spiritually wired to love, to be loved, and to belong. When those needs are not met, we don't function as we were meant to. We break. We fall apart. We numb. We ache. We hurt others. We get sick.
quotes.author: Brené Brown

quotes.quote: How could you be so cold as a winter wind when it breezes yo'.
quotes.author: Kanye West

quotes.quote: There's been an accident, they said, / 'Your servant's cut in half; he's dead!'/ 'Indeed.' said Mr. Jones, 'and please, / send me the half that's got my keys.'
quotes.author: Harry Graham

quotes.quote: Judicial decrees may not change the heart, but they can restrain the heartless.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King

quotes.quote: The attack of the dam was a callous and inhuman act of destruction.
quotes.author: The Hunger Games; Mockingjay

quotes.quote: We hope that, after this callous confession, Scotland yard will now take action.
quotes.author: Punch (or the London Charivari)

quotes.quote: Romney lost in part because he allowed his campaign and personality to be defined as extreme and callous.
quotes.author: Justin Green

quotes.quote: She was so callous that she didn't shed a tear when her husband died.
quotes.author: Mary Embree

quotes.quote: Emotion, whether of ridicule, anger, or sorrow, whether raised at a puppet show, a funeral, or a battle, is your grandest of levelers. —The man who would be always superior should be always apathetic.
quotes.author: Bulwer

quotes.quote: Without dark clouds in our lives, we would never know the joy of sunshine. We can become callous and unteachable if we do not learn from pain.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: How do I get there?? / In the midst of a moral wilderness. / Where backbiting is permitted.. / and callous thinking is okayed... / The harder I pray, The stronger the kick to the face.. / Loving god is seen as a weakness. / a vulnerability at best.
quotes.author: Tania Thonpson-Spencer

quotes.quote: trust me on this one cause I ain't done / all of life isn't necessarily simple and fun / we got cold hearted people living in the middle playing second fiddle.
quotes.author: Mario William Vitale

quotes.quote: i know your nights are cold now / you so numb that you can't even feel / what is to it to let it go waste / counting back all of those years/tomorrow they seem to all disappear.
quotes.author: Danny Morales

quotes.quote: You have never loved me as I love you--never--never! Yours is not a passionate heart--your heart does not burn in a flame! You are, upon the whole, a sort of fay, or sprite-- not a woman!
quotes.author: Thomas Hardy

quotes.quote: Spring can still be felt / even if you lay under the bed / Frozen heart can melt / in coldness when wintry love misled.
quotes.author: Munia Khan

quotes.quote: A cold heart is its own worst punishment.
quotes.author: Frank McAdam

quotes.quote: Hot heads and cold hearts never solved anything.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: I’m a cold-hearted bastard. I’m insular, I'm jaded, a workaholic, I'm ruthless and I'm self-serving. I don’t do forever, I rarely even do “I'll call you tomorrow”. And just because I'm here now it does not mean if you ask me to stay I will.
quotes.author: Ally Blake

quotes.quote: A person with a cold heart can only show their love by being cold.
quotes.author: Pure DragonWolf

quotes.quote: One who has a deaden conscience can never live within the confinements of the law.
quotes.author: Drexel Deal

quotes.quote: Cold hearts don't bleed. Still they pray for eternity, never seeing tomorrow.
quotes.author: Ja Rule

quotes.quote: Life sometimes reminds us that it is sometimes heartless by giving something or someone we really need to someone who does not need or even want them or it.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: No child is born with a really cold heart, and it is only in proportion as we lose that youthful heart that we lose the inner warmth in ourselves.
quotes.author: Lin Yutang

quotes.quote: I am someone who has a cold heart. If I am beside a great grief I throw barriers up so the loss cannot go too deep or too far. There is a wall instantly in place, and it will not fall.
quotes.author: Michael Ondaatje

quotes.quote: The proud, the cold untroubled heart of stone, that never mused on sorrow but its own. – Thomas Campbell
quotes.author: Thomas Campbell

quotes.quote: It is debatable which is causing us more harm - hot-headed ignorance or cold-hearted intellectualism.
quotes.author: Vance Havner

quotes.quote: The larger the state, the more callous it becomes... the colder its heart. It is also true that the bigger the corporation, the more callous its heart. But unlike the state, corporations have competition and have no police powers.
quotes.author: Dennis Prager

quotes.quote: Cold-hearted Elinor! Oh! Worse than cold-hearted! Ashamed of being otherwise.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: The Cold War began with the division of Europe. It can only end when Europe is whole.
quotes.author: George H. W. Bush

quotes.quote: What the Cold War did was provide a fairly clearly defined enemy and it's easy to organize around that.
quotes.author: Jeff Sharlet

quotes.quote: The Cold War has been over for a long time, and I'm not interested in having battles frankly that started before I was born.
quotes.author: President Obama

quotes.quote: The cold war was an aberration. Note how quickly the Europeans turned on America once 400 hostile divisions were no longer on their borders.Â
quotes.author: Bill Vaughan

quotes.quote: If it hadn't been for the Cold War, neither Russie nor America would have been sending people into space.
quotes.author: James Lovelock

quotes.quote: Since the end of the Cold War, hegemonism has become increasingly unpopular.
quotes.author: Li Peng

quotes.quote: The Cold War is over. The world has become much more complicated.
quotes.author: Vladimir Putin

quotes.quote: The Cold War was over long before it was officially declared dead.
quotes.author: John Le Carre

quotes.quote: As the Cold War melts into history, our first concern should be the preservation and extension of human rights and democracy.
quotes.author: Sam Brownback

quotes.quote: Do you know what we mean by Cold War? â€” War don't have no temperature.
quotes.author: Marlon James

quotes.quote: The cold war was the longest war in United States history. Because of the nuclear capabilities of our enemy it was the most dangerous conflict our country ever faced. Those that won this war did so in obscurity. Those that gave their lives in the cold war have never been properly honored.
quotes.author: Senator Harry Reid

quotes.quote: The Cold War was waged in a particularly brutal and cynical way in Africa, and Africa seemed powerless to do anything to stop it.
quotes.author: Ryszard Kapuscinski

quotes.quote: The Cold War is a psychological game, that is dangerous and counterproductive in the extreme - it does not lead to a benevolent understanding among states - just hatred and discord, in this case, will be sown.
quotes.author: Kristian Goldmund Aumann

quotes.quote: The Cold War was wildly expensive and consumed the entire globe.
quotes.author: David Remnick

quotes.quote: The Cold War had become a battlefield marked by doublespeak. Disguise, distortion, and deception were accepted as reality. Truth was promised in a serum.
quotes.author: Annie Jacobsen

quotes.quote: During the Cold War, West Berlin was a exclave - a tiny outpost of liberalism surrounded by people who want to crush it. It was like Austin, Texas.
quotes.author: Craig Ferguson

quotes.quote: I think that the Cold War was an exceptional and unnecessary piece of cruelty.
quotes.author: Jane Smiley

quotes.quote: The softest, sweetest part of the Cold War, the only truly interesting part, the war of ideas.
quotes.author: Ian McEwan

quotes.quote: The Cold War provided justification for a larger peacetime military, since we were never really at peace, or so the argument went.
quotes.author: Phil Klay

quotes.quote: The lesson of the Cold War is that against nuclear weapons, only nuclear weapons can hold the peace.
quotes.author: Chung Mong-joon

quotes.quote: The Cold War was a boring thing. Nobody gets better for it. Tremendous money is wasted. Our lives get more difficult. We look at each other as enemies. What's good in that? In any case, I will do anything in my power in order to stop another Cold War, with the U.S. or any other country in the world.
quotes.author: Dmitry Medvedev

quotes.quote: The only thing that kept the Cold War cold was the mutual deterrence afforded by nuclear weapons.
quotes.author: Chung Mong-joon

quotes.quote: The Cold War went on for so long that it bred a kind of worldwide military establishment. Even when budgets went down in the early and mid-nineties, it didn't really affect it.
quotes.author: Robert D. Kaplan

quotes.quote: The Cold War is over. And our focus has got to be on intelligence, increased manpower, fighting internationally targets.
quotes.author: Bernie Sanders

quotes.quote: The Cold War is over but Cold War thinking survives.
quotes.author: Joseph Rotblat

quotes.quote: The Cold War was really the great struggle of the 20th century and it shaped American political life from top to bottom.
quotes.author: Jeff Sharlet

quotes.quote: During the Cold War era, the issue was the containment of Soviet influence, and we tolerated many an authoritarian regime as long as they were useful to us in this respect.Â
quotes.author: Zalmay Khalilzad

quotes.quote: Although the shooting war is over, we are in the midst of a cold war which is getting warmer.
quotes.author: Bernard Baruch

quotes.quote: During the Cold War, we gathered information by listening to the Soviets, taking pictures of the Soviets, and we allowed our human intelligence to decline.
quotes.author: Bob Graham

quotes.quote: The Cold War may be "over" for the West. For the Soviets, it has entered a new, active and promising phase.
quotes.author: Anatoliy Golitsyn

quotes.quote: It was man who ended the Cold War in case you didn't notice. It wasn't weaponry, or technology, or armies or campaigns. It was just man. Not even Western man either, as it happened, but our sworn enemy in the East, who went into the streets, faced the bullets and the batons and said: we've had enough. It was their emperor, not ours, who had the nerve to mount the rostrum and declare he had no clothes. And the ideologies trailed after these impossible events like condemned prisoners, as ideologies do when they've had their day.
quotes.author: John Le Carre

quotes.quote: The Cold War had gotten so bad that there wasn't a story anymore.
quotes.author: Arthur Massolo

quotes.quote: During the Cold War, we lived in coded times when it wasn't easy and there were shades of grey and ambiguity.
quotes.author: John Le Carre

quotes.quote: The Cold War isn't thawing; it is burning with a deadly heat. Communism isn't sleeping; it is, as always, plotting, scheming, working, fighting.
quotes.author: Richard M. Nixon

quotes.quote: Here's my strategy on the Cold War: we win, they lose.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: What good is the warmth of summer, without the cold of winter to give it sweetness.
quotes.author: John Steinbeck

quotes.quote: Winter is the time for comfort, for good food and warmth, for the touch of a friendly hand and for a talk beside the fire: it is the time for home.
quotes.author: Edith Sitwell

quotes.quote: Cold! If the thermometer had been an inch longer we'd have frozen to death.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: In the cold dark days of the winter, dream about the flowers to get warmed up!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Man dies of cold, not of darkness.
quotes.author: Miguel de Unamuno

quotes.quote: Let me be the first to tell you, drinking alcohol is the worst thing to do in cold weather. Hot soup is the best because the process of digesting food helps to warm you up.
quotes.author: Morgan Freeman

quotes.quote: This weather is almost colder than my heart.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: In cold weather a good rule is to light your fire first before doing anything else. It is always more sensible to keep yourself warm rather than trying to thaw yourself out later.
quotes.author: Mors Kochanski

quotes.quote: The sun did not shine. It was too wet to play. So we sat in the house. All that cold, cold, wet day.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: The cold cut like a many bladed knife.
quotes.author: Israel Zangwill

quotes.quote: If you are cold at night, let the promise of my love cover you like a warm blanket.
quotes.author: Matthew White

quotes.quote: Love keeps the cold out better than a cloak.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: I like these cold, gray winter days. Days like these let you savor a bad mood.
quotes.author: Bill Watterson

quotes.quote: It was so cold I almost got married.
quotes.author: Shelly Winters

quotes.quote: It is only when the cold season comes that we know the pine and cypress to be evergreens.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverbs

quotes.quote: In a very cold night, even houses want to have houses of their own to enter inside them and feel warm!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Shut the door not that it lets in the cold but that it lets out the coziness.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Winter must be cold for those with no warm memories.
quotes.author: Anne Bradstreet

quotes.quote: It was so cold today that I saw a dog chasing a cat, and the dog was walking.
quotes.author: Mickey Rivers

quotes.quote: It was so cold that the Statue of Liberty put the torch INSIDE her dress.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Nothing burns like the cold.
quotes.author: George R.R. Martin

quotes.quote: I like the cold weather. It means you get work done.
quotes.author: Noam Chomsky

quotes.quote: One thing about cold weather: it brings out the statistician in everyone.
quotes.author: Paul Theroux

quotes.quote: Three feet of ice does not result from one day of cold weather.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverbs

quotes.quote: The cold never bothered me anyway.
quotes.author: Elsa

quotes.quote: Warm weather fosters growth: cold weather destroys it. Thus a man with an unsympathetic temperament has a scant joy: but a man with a warm and friendly heart overflowing blessings, and his beneficence will extend to posterity.
quotes.author: Hung Tzu-Ch'Eng

quotes.quote: Scarves, mittens, and hats are a great way to express your personality in the cold weather.
quotes.author: Brad Goreski

quotes.quote: If the world is cold, make it your business to build fires.
quotes.author: Horace Traubel

quotes.quote: It is so cold out there, my head nearly fell off.
quotes.author: Mark Mckinney

quotes.quote: Who knows how long the cold weather will last
quotes.author: Joe Williams

quotes.quote: Dear soul, begin this wintry month with your God. Let the cold snow and piercing wind remind you He keeps His covenant with you day and night.
quotes.author: Jim Reimann

quotes.quote: Winter in the soul can be an uncomfortable season as well.
quotes.author: Jim Reimann

quotes.quote: He scatters the frost like ashes' over the once green meadows of our joy and 'hurls down his hail like pebbles', freezing the streams of our delight.
quotes.author: Psalm 147:16-17

quotes.quote: Winter is a season that sparkles with magic and transforms our ordinary world into a glittering kingdom
quotes.author: Abi Elphinstone

quotes.quote: The rain was turning rapidly into snow. A bit too rapidly.
quotes.author: Abi Elphinstone

quotes.quote: I wouldn't like to return to those harsh cold days of my childhood.
quotes.author: Sheila Brook

quotes.quote: The playground was an exciting place but it could be a litttle dangerous during icy weather or after snow had fallen.
quotes.author: Sheila Brook

quotes.quote: Winter had set in before the leaf had fallen from the last oaks; already there had been a fortnight or more of severe cold, with hardly any snow.
quotes.author: Mary Augusta Ward

quotes.quote: The mountain was covered with snow which looked bluish in color.Tiny silver stars that seemed to be nestled in the blue-colored snow sparkled in the cold night air.
quotes.author: Marsha V. Poulin

quotes.quote: The first cold shower / even the monkey seems to want / a little coat of straw
quotes.author: Matsuo Basho

quotes.quote: Winter brings colder temperatues and snow to many regions. Snow makes everything very quiet and alters the landscape.
quotes.author: Beth Eaglescliffe

quotes.quote: During blizzards everything about the railroad was melodramatic.
quotes.author: Sinclair Lewis

quotes.quote: Let's drink the liquid of amber so bright / Let's rink the liquid with foam snowy white / Let's drink the liquid that brings all good cheer / Oh, where is the drink like old-fashioned beer?
quotes.author: Nineteenth-century toast

quotes.quote: With hoary frost He strews the ground / His hail descends with dreadful sounds / His icy bands the rivers hold / And terrors arms his wintry cold...His steady counsels change the face / Of the declining year / He bids the sun cut short his race / And wintry days appear.
quotes.author: Psalm 147

quotes.quote: The rains of autumn have now fairly yielded to the frosts of winter: our long season of cold weather has set in..
quotes.author: Philip Henry Gosse

quotes.quote: And skies their wintry sterness wear.
quotes.author: Philip Henry Gosse

quotes.quote: Yet winter is not altogether cheerless; by searching we may yet find a few subjects worthy of investigation,and capable of affording amusement and instruction to the mind; nature is never barren of lessons of wisdom, to him who possesses a mind willing to receive them.
quotes.author: Philip Henry Gosse

quotes.quote: The wintry weather is becoming with us a somewhat serious matter. We have still, as we have had for a long time, a considerable depth of snow, covering everything and preventing all ground work.
quotes.author: Robert Hogg

quotes.quote: I have been wandering in the cold, wintry winds of this life, enduring with sorrow its frosts, not knowing where to turn, or whether to direct my footsteps to find shelter.
quotes.author: J.M.Usher

quotes.quote: It is now winter, dead winter. Desolation and silence reign in the fields. No singing of birds is heard, no humming of insects.The streams murmur no longer, they are locked up with frost
quotes.author: J.M.Usher

quotes.quote: Yes, the cold wintry winds, the snow and frosts, the cares and anxieties of this life, are all sent to life to teach us to loosen our grasp upon things in this world and to draw us near to him.
quotes.author: J.M.Usher

quotes.quote: No snowflake in an avalanche ever feels responsible.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Cold is first of all experience, a sensation acquired and intensified by an absence of sensation, the benumbing of freezing itself anesthetizing.
quotes.author: Donald Anderson, Aritha van Herk

quotes.quote: In seed time learn, in harvest teach, in winter enjoy.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: Advice is like the snow. The softer it falls, the longer it dwells upon and the deeper it sinks into the mind.
quotes.author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quotes.quote: To appreciate the beauty of a snowflake it is necessary to stand out in the cold.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Winter is on my head, but eternal spring is in my heart.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Being soaked alone is cold. Being soaked with your best friend is an adventure.
quotes.author: Emily Wing Smith

quotes.quote: The heart can get really cold if all you've known is winter.
quotes.author: Benjamin Alire Saenz

quotes.quote: I always find that the best collaborations are when you work with people that know what they're doing, and you leave them alone to do it.
quotes.author: Twyla Tharp

quotes.quote: Collaboration is important not just because it's a better way to learn. The spirit of collaboration is penetrating every institution and all of our lives. So learning to collaborate is part of equipping yourself for effectiveness, problem solving, innovation and life long learning in an ever changing networked economy.
quotes.author: Don Tapscott

quotes.quote: Collaboration is the way to go. It's very timely and fun to do.
quotes.author: Estelle Fanta Swaray

quotes.quote: It is the long history of humankind and animal kind, too those who learned to collaborate and improvise most effectively have prevailed.
quotes.author: Charles Darwin

quotes.quote: It's always a good collaboration between the actor and the writer and the director to try stuff out, during the process.
quotes.author: Mark Consuelos

quotes.quote: Human beings, joined in collaboration with the gifts of grace, are responsible for the planet and its future.
quotes.author: William F. Schulz

quotes.quote: Collaboration sometimes causes conflict, and sometimes it's easy, but the bringing together of great minds only adds.
quotes.author: Cary Fukunaga

quotes.quote: Art is a collaboration between God and the artist, and the less the artist does the better.
quotes.author: Andre Gide

quotes.quote: Collaboration is much like a birth. The song that springs forth resembles each one of us to a degree, but it's the kind of thing that would never be born from just one of us sitting down with a guitar.
quotes.author: Grant-Lee Phillips

quotes.quote: Collaboration begins with mutual understanding and respect.
quotes.author: Astronaut Ron Garan

quotes.quote: Collaboration is the essence of life. The wind, bees and flowers work together, to spread the pollen. Mindfulness gives us the opportunity to work with the cosmic collaboration.
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: Collaboration is no longer painful or precious.
quotes.author: Vince Clarke

quotes.quote: Collaboration is the best way to work. It's only way to work, really. Everyone's there because they have a set of skills to offer across the board.
quotes.author: Antony Starr

quotes.quote: Most of the collaborations of technology were done by teams. Collaboration is key to creativity.
quotes.author: Walter Isaacson

quotes.quote: A successful collaboration is all about trust and respect. If you show people trust they will perform better.
quotes.author: Oh Land

quotes.quote: If everyone is moving forward together, then success takes care of itself.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: I think it is in collaboration that the nature of art is revealed.
quotes.author: Steve Lacy

quotes.quote: The best teamwork comes from men who are working independently toward one goal in unison.
quotes.author: James Cash Penney

quotes.quote: The beauty of collaboration between older and younger generations is that we combine strength with wisdom a surefire way to accomplish more for the glory of God.
quotes.author: Brett Harris

quotes.quote: In a collaboration, each author will do 75% of the work.
quotes.author: Larry Niven

quotes.quote: Collaboration is key, it takes innovation and creativity to the next room.
quotes.author: Shawn Lukas

quotes.quote: I believe in collaboration. I think that is the most entertaining and effective way to write for me, personally.
quotes.author: Jonah Hill

quotes.quote: The fun for me in collaboration is, one, working with other people just makes you smarter; that's proven.
quotes.author: Lin-Manuel Miranda

quotes.quote: Unity is strength when there is teamwork and collaboration, wonderful things can be achieved.
quotes.author: Mattie Stepanek

quotes.quote: Cooperation and collaboration among nations and countries can help in the process of development of promoting welfare as well as bringing peace and stability.
quotes.author: Mahmoud Ahmadinejad

quotes.quote: Sometimes the best way to get other people to give up their egos is for you to give up yours first.
quotes.author: Jane Ripley

quotes.quote: Working together precedes winning together collaboration is multiplication.
quotes.author: John C Maxwell

quotes.quote: Every collaboration helps you grow.
quotes.author: Brian Eno

quotes.quote: Collaboration has no hierarchy. The sun collaborates with soil to bring the flowers on the earth.
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: Collaboration allows teachers to capture each other's fund of collective intelligence.
quotes.author: Mike Schmoker

quotes.quote: Collaboration is a nice change of pace from the often solitary nature of the writer's craft.
quotes.author: Edward M Lerner

quotes.quote: Collaboration is vital to sustain what we call profound or really deep change, because without it, organizations are just overwhelmed by the forces of the status quo.
quotes.author: Peter Senge

quotes.quote: Wake up with one mind, my friends, and kindle the fire, you many who share the same nest. make your thoughts harmonious; stretch them across the loom; make a ship whose oars will carry us across.
quotes.author: Rig Veda

quotes.quote: He who would do great things should not attempt them alone.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: When a blind man carries a lame man, both go forward.
quotes.author: Swedish Saying

quotes.quote: One hand cannot clap.
quotes.author: Jamaican Saying

quotes.quote: It is in all things that are pure and social we can be as separate as the fingers, yet one as the hand in all things essential to mutual progress.
quotes.author: Booker T. Washington

quotes.quote: It has not been given to one man to have everything in perfection. You have a part to play; I in my humble way, another; here is one who plays a little part; there, another. Perfection is the combination of all these parts.
quotes.author: Vivekananda

quotes.quote: We are members of a vast cosmic orchestra in which each living instrument is essential to the complementary and harmonious playing of the whole.
quotes.author: J. Allen Boone

quotes.quote: The way a team plays as a whole determines its success. You may have the greatest bunch of individual stars in the world, but if they don't play together, the club won't be worth a dime.
quotes.author: Babe Ruth

quotes.quote: If you want to make peace with your enemy, you have to work with your enemy. Then he becomes your partner.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: We got each other. We got our hearts and our brains and our hands, and if we work together we can do it, we can change the world.
quotes.author: Bill Strickland

quotes.quote: People collaborate precisely because they don't know how to—or can't— deal effectively with the challenges they face as individuals. In that respect, collaboration becomes a necessary technique to master the unknown.
quotes.author: Michael Schrage

quotes.quote: I wanted to collaborate because, you know, I get lonely.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: Every sin is the result of a collaboration.
quotes.author: Stephen Crane

quotes.quote: Life is collaboration. Where I think art can be sort of misguided is that it propagates this idea of itself as a solo love affair—one person, one idea, no one else involved.
quotes.author: Virgil Abloh

quotes.quote: 'AblTwo heads are better than one' is something I firmly believe in.
quotes.author: Virgil Abloh

quotes.quote: None of us is as smart as all of us.
quotes.author: Ken Blanchard

quotes.quote: Individual commitment to a group effort--that is what makes teamwork, a company work, a society work, a civilization work.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: Finding good players is easy. Getting them to play as a team is another story.
quotes.author: Casey Stengel

quotes.quote: Great things in business are never done by one person. They're done by a team of people.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Remember, teamwork begins by building trust. And the only way to do that is to overcome our need for invulnerability.
quotes.author: Patrick Lencioni

quotes.quote: There is no such thing as a self-made man. You will reach your goals only with the help of others.
quotes.author: George Shinn

quotes.quote: No matter how brilliant your mind or strategy, if you're playing a solo game, you'll always lose out to a team.
quotes.author: Reid Hoffman

quotes.quote: Teamwork is the secret that makes common people achieve uncommon results.
quotes.author: Ifeanyi Onuoha

quotes.quote: It is literally true that you can succeed best and quickest by helping others to succeed.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: People achieve more as a result of working with others than against them.
quotes.author: Dr. Allan Fromme

quotes.quote: Many of us are more capable than some of us, but none of us is as capable as all of us.
quotes.author: Tom Wilson

quotes.quote: Many ideas grow better when transplanted into another mind than the one where they sprang up.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.quote: None of us, including me, ever do great things. But we can all do small things, with great love, and together we can do something wonderful.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: Individually, we are one drop. Together, we are an ocean.
quotes.author: Ryunosuke Satoro

quotes.quote: No matter how brilliant your mind or strategy, if you’re playing a solo game, you’ll always lose out to a team.
quotes.author: Reid Hoffman

quotes.quote: In the grand collage that is Dada, past and future are equally usable.
quotes.author: Andrei Codrescu

quotes.quote: Rapid-collage prevents any elevating movement toward a fixed goal. To 'be nowhere' is to let oneself be.
quotes.author: Joshua L. Goldberg

quotes.quote: Collage is like a hall of mirrors. Every direction you look, you see something different and visually stimulating.
quotes.author: Nita Leland

quotes.quote: Now the culture is made of old things, it's a collage. Art made out of art is not art. You're supposed to make art out of life.
quotes.author: Fran Lebowitz

quotes.quote: Collage is a demonstration of the many becoming the one, with the one never fully resolved because of the many that continue to impinge upon it.
quotes.author: Donald Kuspit

quotes.quote: Anyone who's ever put a stamp on an envelope or a note on their refrigerator knows what it's like to make a collage. There's no esoteric technique.
quotes.author: Elliott Hundley

quotes.quote: I'm not interested in collage as the refuge of the composition-ally disabled. I'm interested in collage as (to be honest) an evolution beyond narrative.
quotes.author: David Shields

quotes.quote: Collage is the noble conquest of the irrational, the coupling of two realities, irreconcilable in appearance, upon a plane which apparently does not suit them.
quotes.author: Max Ernst

quotes.quote: Collage has been one of the most relevant forms of art making. It's resonant because it is made of the stuff that we see every day. It's familiar. It reflects our reality.
quotes.author: Elliott Hundley

quotes.quote: Whether you're aware of it or not, any kind of collage idea becomes a part of how you see the world once you incorporate media and internet and video games and all these things.
quotes.author: Beck

quotes.quote: Collage is a supersensitive and scrupulously accurate instrument, similar to a seismograph, which is able to record the exact amount of the possibility of human happiness at any period.
quotes.author: Max Ernst

quotes.quote: The photo collage is a way to travel that must be used with skill and precision if we are to arrive... The collage as a flexible hieroglyph language of juxtaposition: A collage makes a statement.
quotes.author: William S. Burroughs

quotes.quote: We are a collage of our interests, our influences, our inspirations, all the fragmentary impressions we've collected by being alive and awake to the world. Who we are is simply a finely-curated catalogue of those.
quotes.author: Maria Popova

quotes.quote: Popular culture isn't a freeze-frame; it is images zapping by in rapid-fire succession, which is why collage is such an effective way of representing contemporary life. The blur between images creates a kind of motion in the mind.
quotes.author: James Rosenquist

quotes.quote: Collage is more than just an art style. Collage is all about bringing different elements together. Once you form a sensibility about connection, how different elements relate to each other, you deepen your understanding of yourself and others.
quotes.author: Bryan Collier

quotes.quote: Collage is the twentieth century's greatest innovation.
quotes.author: Robert Motherwell

quotes.quote: Sometimes a collage element I hit upon can inspire the entire drawing.
quotes.author: Laura Owens

quotes.quote: A dream collage is pictures of your goals. It is like your future photo album.
quotes.author: Bo Bennett

quotes.quote: For a painter as abstract as myself, the collages offer a way of incorporating bits of the everyday world into pictures.
quotes.author: Robert Motherwell

quotes.quote: Everything I write, I believe instinctively, is to some extent collage. Meaning, ultimately, is a matter of adjacent data.
quotes.author: David Shields

quotes.quote: We occupy a space of our own creation-a collage compounded by bits and pieces of actuality arranged into a design determined by our internal perceptions, our hopes, our fears, our memories, and our anticipations.
quotes.author: Willard Gaylin

quotes.quote: The beauty of the collage technique is that you're using sounds that have never met and were never supposed to meet. You introduce them to each other, at first they're a bit shy, clumsy, staring at their shoes. But you can sense there's something there. So you cut and paste a little bit and by the end of the song you can spot them in the corner, holding hands.
quotes.author: Jens Lekman

quotes.quote: Collage-making, for me, is basically an act of painting, allowing me to indulge in an appetite for immediacy.
quotes.author: Abe Ajay

quotes.quote: If direction is a look, montage is a heartbeat. To foresee is the characteristic of both; but what one seeks to foresee in space, the other seeks in time.
quotes.author: Jean-Luc Godard

quotes.quote: The person who says freedom must have collateral damage is either trying to make a buck or has been duped by someone making a buck on them. This is the primary justification for any group or person engaged in the sale of weapons and killing machines.
quotes.author: Nicholas Colin McLaughlin

quotes.quote: The people who did the collateralized mortgage obligations, sold them to pension funds, then sold them short, then bought credit default swap insurance on them, are just amazing. They are a law unto themselves.
quotes.author: Ben Stein

quotes.quote: When everything you love has been stolen from you, sometimes all you have left is revenge.Sometimes, the innocent get hurt. But one by one, the guilty will pay. Nothing ever goes exactly as you expect. And mistakes are life and death. Collateral damage is inescapable
quotes.author: Emily Thorne

quotes.quote: The Act of God designation on all insurance policies... means roughly that you cannot be insured for the accidents that are most likely to happen to you. If your ox kicks a hole in your neighbor's Maserati, however, indemnity is instantaneous.
quotes.author: ALAN COREN

quotes.quote: People at war with themselves will always cause collateral damage in the lives of those around them.
quotes.author: John Mark Green

quotes.quote: Asymmetrical warfare is a euphemism for terrorism, just like collateral damage is a euphemism for killing innocent civilians.
quotes.author: Alan Dershowitz

quotes.quote: The human mind, in taking us down the path of technocracy, has become the adversary of life itself and collaterally the adversary of the human soul.
quotes.author: Konrad Lorenz

quotes.quote: Repose not trust in testing another's degree of honesty at the risk of one's loss in matters big, unless collateralized.
quotes.author: Firoozeh Dumas

quotes.quote: Dreams offer too little collateral.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: All that happens is that the destruction of human beings - unless they're Americans - is called collateral damage.
quotes.author: Harold Pinter

quotes.quote: In the multitude of counsellors there is safety. He that is surety for a stranger shall smart for it.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: A preoccupied family: they none of them threw themselves into the interests of the rest, but each ploughed his or her own furrow. Their thoughts, their little passions and hopes and desires, all ran along separate lines. Family life is like thisâ€”animated, but collateral.
quotes.author: Rose Macaulay

quotes.quote: Wars breed unfairness, just as they breed collateral damage.
quotes.author: Lawrence Kudlow

quotes.quote: Life is a right, not collateral or casual.
quotes.author: Suheir Hammad

quotes.quote: We ought never to trust to chance but when we cannot find a better surety.
quotes.author: Norman Macdonald

quotes.quote: A worried man could borrow a lot of trouble with practically no collateral.
quotes.author: Helen Nielsen

quotes.quote: Faith is the collateral of heaven. It is what you use to trade with in heaven.
quotes.author: Phil Pringle

quotes.quote: Collateral learning in the way of formation of enduring attitudes, of likes and dislikes, may be and often is much more important than the spelling lesson or lesson in geography or history that is learned.
quotes.author: John Dewey

quotes.quote: The business conduct of the disciples of wise men is truthful and faithful.... He does not allow himself to be made a surety or a guarantor and does not accept the power of attorney.... He lends money and is gracious. He shall not take away business from his fellow man.
quotes.author: Maimonides

quotes.quote: Free will always result in collateral damage.
quotes.author: J. Lincoln Fenn

quotes.quote: We are all collateral damage for someone's beautiful ideology, all of us inanimate in the face of the onslaught.
quotes.author: Benjamin Alire Sáenz

quotes.quote: A man without debts is a man without anything to live for. Debt is collateral for life. It provides you with obligations to others, gives you duty, gives you purpose: the purpose to protect those possessions which you would not otherwise have without your debt. Debt is the most responsible way to elevate your social position.
quotes.author: Bauvard

quotes.quote: When lending people money, be sure their character exceeds their collateral.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quotes.quote: Live within your means, never be in debt, and by husbanding your money you can always lay it out well. But when you get in debt you become a slave. Therefore I say to you never involve yourself in debt, and become no man's surety.
quotes.author: Andrew Jackson

quotes.quote: He who is surety is never sure himself. Take advice, and never be security for more than you are quite willing to lose. Remember the word of the wise man: He that is surety for a stranger shall smart for it, and he that hateth suretyship is sure.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.quote: Love is not a skill to be mastered; out of love the world came into being; love is a greater power we can't afford to buy; but yet we can afford to sacrifice it as collateral damage to the undeserving evils of this world.
quotes.author: Wayne Chirisa

quotes.quote: If in order to kill the enemy you have to kill an innocent, don't take the shot. Don't create more enemies than you take out by some immoral act.
quotes.author: James Mattis

quotes.quote: Age is not the enemy. Neither is the passage of time. It is the collateral damage ... that creates a problem for us.
quotes.author: John Koessler

quotes.quote: One must choose between obscurity with efficiency, and fame with its inevitable collateral of bluff.
quotes.author: William McFee

quotes.quote: Ruined land was accepted as the collateral damage of progress.
quotes.author: Robin Wall Kimmerer

quotes.quote: A college degree is the key to realizing the American dream, well worth the financial sacrifice because it is supposed to open the door to a world of opportunity.
quotes.author: Dan Rather

quotes.quote: When we make college more affordable, we make the American dream more achievable.
quotes.author: William J. Clinton

quotes.quote: It is virtually impossible to compete in today's global economy without a college degree.
quotes.author: Bobby Scott

quotes.quote: By making college unaffordable and student loans unbearable, we risk deterring our best and brightest from pursuing higher education and securing a good-paying job.
quotes.author: Mark Pocan

quotes.quote: You didn't need a college degree to become one of the people who knew what was really going on. If you paid attention, you could pick things up on your own.
quotes.author: Jeannette Walls

quotes.quote: College is fun as long as you don't die.
quotes.author: Tsugumi Ohba

quotes.quote: College is a refuge from hasty judgment.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: For college seniors there should be a week of being allowed to cry. Just break down and cry because you are scared and don't know what's next.
quotes.author: Bill Cosby

quotes.quote: I'm going to college. I don't care if it ruins my career. I'd rather be smart than a movie star.
quotes.author: Natalie Portman

quotes.quote: College is the reward for surviving high school. Most people have great fun stories from college and nightmare stories from high school.
quotes.author: Judd Apatow

quotes.quote: Every year, many, many stupid people graduate from college. And if they can do it, so can you.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: No period of my life has been one of such unmixed happiness as the four years which have been spent within college walls.
quotes.author: Horatio Alger

quotes.quote: I think, especially when you're in college, each book that you're reading tends to tell you who you are.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Eugenides

quotes.quote: I went to college because I didn't have anywhere else to go and it was a fabulous hang. And while I was there I was exposed to this world that I didn't know was possible.
quotes.author: Tom Hanks

quotes.quote: College campuses were once a hotbed of political activity.
quotes.author: Tom Ford

quotes.quote: College isn't the place to go for ideas.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: College has given me the confidence I need to fail.
quotes.author: Jarod Kintz

quotes.quote: If the college you visit has a bookstore filled with t-shirts rather than books, find another college.
quotes.author: R. Albert Mohler Jr.

quotes.quote: The things taught in schools and colleges are not an education, but the means to an education.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: College is the best time of your life. When else are your parents going to spend several thousand dollars a year just for you to go to a strange town and get drunk every night?
quotes.author: David Wood

quotes.quote: A college education shows a man how little other people know.
quotes.author: Thomas Chandler Haliburton

quotes.quote: College is a place to keep warm between high school and an early marriage.
quotes.author: George Gobel

quotes.quote: College is like a fountain of knowledge - and the students are there to drink
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: One of the great mind destroyers of college education is the belief that if it's very complex, it's very profound.
quotes.author: Dennis Prager

quotes.quote: Our colleges ought to have lit up in us a lasting relish for he better kind of man, a loss of appetite for mediocrities.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: What school, college, or lecture bring men depends on what men bring to carry it home in.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: One of the benefits of a college education is to show the boy its little avail.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Colleges don't make fools, they only develop them.
quotes.author: George Lorimer

quotes.quote: Colleges are places where pebbles are polished and diamonds are dimmed.
quotes.author: R.S. Ingersoll

quotes.quote: The aim of a college education is to teach you to know a good man when you see one.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: So if a college education is indispensable, the challenge as I see it is how to make it more accessible.
quotes.author: Gordon Gee

quotes.quote: College ain't so much where you been as how you talk when you get back.
quotes.author: Ossie Davis

quotes.quote: A college education should equip one to entertain three things: a friend, an idea and oneself.
quotes.author: Thomas Ehrlich

quotes.quote: I accidentally forgot to graduate from college.
quotes.author: Anne Lamott

quotes.quote: The college graduate is presented with a sheepskin to cover his intellectual nakedness.
quotes.author: Robert M. Hutchins

quotes.quote: College isn't in everyone's hearts. I am living proof, though, that school doesn't mess up your plans. It gives you more experiences to write about.
quotes.author: J. Cole

quotes.quote: The aim of the college, for the individual student, is to eliminate the need in his life for the college; the task is to help him become a self-educating man.
quotes.author: C. Wright Mills

quotes.quote: A college boy cannot successfully go through life by graduating in football, baseball, or highballs, for the responsibilities of life are not ball-bearing.
quotes.author: William H. Murray

quotes.quote: A college degree is not a sign that one is a finished product but an indication a person is prepared for life.
quotes.author: Reverend Edward A. Malloy

quotes.quote: By making college unaffordable and student loans unbearable, we risk deterring our best and brightest from pursuing higher education and securing a good paying job.
quotes.author: Mark Pocan

quotes.quote: Colleges are like old age homes, except for the fact that more people die in colleges.
quotes.author: Bob Dylan

quotes.quote: The aim of the college, for the individual student, is to eliminate the need in his life for the college; the task is to help him become a self-educating man.
quotes.author: George Horace Lorime

quotes.quote: I think a college education is important no matter what you do in life.
quotes.author: Phil Mickelson

quotes.quote: College inspired me to think differently. It's like no other time in your life.
quotes.author: Larisa Oleynik

quotes.quote: That's what college is for - getting as many bad decisions as possible out of the way before you're forced into the real world. I keep a checklist of 'em on the wall in my room.
quotes.author: Jeph Jacques

quotes.quote: Fathers send their sons to college either because they went to college or because they didn't.
quotes.author: L. L. Henderson

quotes.quote: The chief value in going to college is that it's the only way to learn it really doesn't matter.
quotes.author: George Edwin Howes

quotes.quote: Never get married in college; it's hard to get a start if a prospective employer finds you've already made one mistake.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Don't ever dare to take your college as a matter of course - because, like democracy and freedom, many people you'll never know have broken their hearts to get it for you.
quotes.author: Alice Duer Miller

quotes.quote: It is not my wish to lounge about the college and fatten on a fellowship all my days. I am always trying to look upon a college life as a medium not an end.
quotes.author: Thomas Edward Brown

quotes.quote: It is one of the blessings of old friends that you can afford to be stupid with them.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Friends are as companions on a journey, who ought to aid each other to persevere in the road to a happier life.
quotes.author: Pythagoras

quotes.quote: The fellowship of true friends who can hear you out, share your joys, help carry your burdens, and correctly counsel you is priceless.
quotes.author: Ezra Taft Benson

quotes.quote: In prosperity, our friends know us; in adversity, we know our friends.
quotes.author: John Churton Collins

quotes.quote: Wherever we are, it is our friends that make our world.
quotes.author: Henry Drummond

quotes.quote: I cannot even imagine where I would be today were it not for that handful of friends who have given me a heart full of joy. Let's face it, friends make life a lot more fun.
quotes.author: Charles R. Swindoll

quotes.quote: Friends show their love in times of trouble, not in happiness.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: Friends are born, not made.
quotes.author: Henry Adams

quotes.quote: So long as the memory of certain beloved friends lives in my heart, I shall say that life is good.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Friends are the siblings God never gave us.
quotes.author: Mencius

quotes.quote: Close friends contribute to our personal growth. They also contribute to our personal pleasure, making the music sound sweeter, the wine taste richer, the laughter ring louder because they are there.
quotes.author: Judith Viorst

quotes.quote: To be with old friends is very warming and comforting.
quotes.author: Ian Ziering

quotes.quote: True friends stab you in the front.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Friends... they cherish one another's hopes. They are kind to one another's dreams.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Our friends interpret the world and ourselves to us, if we take them tenderly and truly.
quotes.author: Amos Bronson Alcott

quotes.quote: Champagne for my real friends and real pain for my sham friends.
quotes.author: Tom Waits

quotes.quote: The biggest hurdle is figuring out who your friends are. Your real friends.
quotes.author: Eleanor Mondale

quotes.quote: The sincere friends of this world are as ship lights in the stormiest of nights.
quotes.author: Giotto di Bondone

quotes.quote: It's the friends you can call up at 4 a.m. that matter.
quotes.author: Marlene Dietrich

quotes.quote: Have friends. 'Tis a second existence.
quotes.author: Baltasar Gracian

quotes.quote: When you choose your friends, don't be short-changed by choosing personality over character.
quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: Friends are the sunshine of life.
quotes.author: John Hay

quotes.quote: Good friends don't have to visit each other every day.
quotes.author: Juan Manuel Santos

quotes.quote: Friends are thieves of time.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: The best way to keep your friends is not to give them away.
quotes.author: Wilson Mizner

quotes.quote: Even between the best of friends, mistakes and misunderstandings can happen.
quotes.author: Avigdor Lieberman

quotes.quote: Friends confront each other sometimes, and sometimes the friendship lasts, and sometimes it doesn't.
quotes.author: Brooke Elliott

quotes.quote: One's friends are that part of the human race with which one can be human.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.quote: Live so that your friends can defend you but never have to.
quotes.author: Arnold H. Glasow

quotes.quote: Friends are the most important part of your life. Treasure the tears, treasure the laughter, but most importantly, treasure the memories.
quotes.author: Dave Brenner

quotes.quote: At the shrine of friendship never say die, let the wine of friendship never run dry.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Ever since college, I make friends. They get married. I lose friends.
quotes.author: Barry Sheils

quotes.quote: If ever there is tomorrow when we're not together... there is something you must always remember. You are braver than you believe, stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think. But the most important thing is, even if we're apart... I'll always be with you.
quotes.author: A. A. Milne

quotes.quote: The glory of friendship is not the outstretched hand, not the kindly smile, nor the joy of companionship; it is the spiritual inspiration that comes to one when you discover that someone else believes in you and is willing to trust you with a friendship.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: A true friend is someone who thinks that you are a good egg even though he knows that you are slightly cracked.
quotes.author: Bernard Meltzer

quotes.quote: As long as we don't die, this is going to be one hell of a story.
quotes.author: John Green (Paper Towns)

quotes.quote: By now, Kate has released her hair and lost her shoes. My tie is off, the top two buttons of my shirt open. Our appearance could make things feel friendly - intimate - like an all-night study session in college. If we weren't trying to rip each other's thraots open, of course.
quotes.author: Emma Chase

quotes.quote: Finishing A Good Book Is Like Leaving A Good Friend.
quotes.author: Leonard Feather

quotes.quote: A friend is someone who will bail you out of jail. A best friend is the one sitting next to you saying "Boy was that fun."
quotes.author: Joy Loverde

quotes.quote: A good friend is a connection to life - a tie to the past, a road to the future, the key to sanity in a totally insane world.
quotes.author: Priyanka Bagade

quotes.quote: The best things in life are free. And it is important never to lose sight of that. So look around you. Wherever you see friendship, loyalty, laughter, and love...there is your treasure.
quotes.author: Neale Donald Walsch

quotes.quote: With my friends, the sad truth is that our best “best friend” days are behind us. In college, we used to be able to meet each other in the common area of our off-campus housing, excited about our evening ahead, which consisted of someone making an enormous tureen of pasta and drinking wine from a box while we took turns regaling each other with details of our terrible love lives.
quotes.author: Mindy Kaling

quotes.quote: Fate chooses your relations, you choose your friends.
quotes.author: Jacques Delille

quotes.quote: Let us be grateful to people who make us happy, they are the charming gardeners who make our souls blossom.
quotes.author: Marcel Proust

quotes.quote: Friends are those rare people who ask how we are and then wait to hear the answer.
quotes.author: Ed Cunningham

quotes.quote: Friendship is certainly the finest balm for the pangs of disappointed love.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: What time do you need to get ready for college boy?” I looked at my watch. “I probably should leave soon. Do you think it’s strange that he’s taking me?” Levi shook his head. “I would find it odd if anybody didn’t want to take you anywhere you wanted to go.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Eulberg

quotes.quote: Friendship is the only cement that will ever hold the world together.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Count your garden by the flowers, never by the leaves that fall. Count your days by golden hours, don't remember clouds at all. Count your nights by stars, not shadows, count your life by smiles, not tears. And with joy on every birthday, count your age by friends, not years.
quotes.author: Ramashish Yadav

quotes.quote: Don't be dismayed at goodbyes, a farewell is necessary before you can meet again and meeting again, after moments or lifetimes, is certain for those who are friends
quotes.author: GS.Subbu

quotes.quote: Here's to the nights that turned into mornings, and the friends who turned into family.
quotes.author: Dr.Punit Sethi

quotes.quote: As we grow up, we realize it becomes less important to have more friends and more important to have real ones.
quotes.author: Neetu Khatri Kajal

quotes.quote: Friends and good manners will carry you where money won't go.
quotes.author: Margaret Walker

quotes.quote: When you ask God for a gift, Be thankful if he sends, Not diamonds, pearls or riches, but the love of real true friends.
quotes.author: Helen Steiner Rice

quotes.quote: Being honest may not get you a lot of friends but it’ll always get you the right ones.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: One measure of friendship consists not in the number of things friends can discuss, but in the number of things they need no longer mention.
quotes.author: Dapo Omojola

quotes.quote: Friendship is delicate as a glass, once broken it can be fixed but there will always be cracks.
quotes.author: Dapo Omojola

quotes.quote: A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: I would rather walk with a friend in the dark, than alone in the light.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Friends don't spy; true friendship is about privacy too.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: A messy house is a must - it separates your true friends from other friends. Real friends are there to visit you not your house!
quotes.author: Jennifer Wilson

quotes.quote: You can pick your friends, and you can pick your nose, but you can't pick youre friend's nose.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: A friend is someone who can see the truth and pain in you even when you are fooling everyone else.
quotes.author: G. Kleiser

quotes.quote: Faint heart never won true friend. O my friend, may it come to pass, once, that when you are my friend I may be yours.
quotes.author: Wilson C. McWilliams

quotes.quote: And so the twins had remained virgins. Julia and Valentina watched all of their high school and college friends disappear one by one into the adult world of sex, until they were the only people they knew who lingered in the world of the uninitiated. "What was it like?" they asked each friend. The answers were vague. Sex was a private joke: you had to be there.
quotes.author: Audrey Niffenegger

quotes.quote: In everyone's life, at some time, our inner fire goes out. It is then burst into flame by an encounter with another human being. We should all be thankful for those people who rekindle the inner spirit.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: I wasn't aware that was how I felt, either, until it was out. And now that I've said it like that, I'm not exactly sure it is how I feel. But this isn't a piece of paper I can crumple up and throw away. they aren't words I can cross out to start over. Now they're out, and I know they'll hang here, between us, maybe forever.
quotes.author: Terra Elan McVoy

quotes.quote: There is no possession more valuable than a good and faithful friend.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: You and I will meet again, When we're least expecting it, One day in some far off place, I will recognize your face, I won't say goodbye my friend, For you and I will meet again.
quotes.author: Tom Petty

quotes.quote: It's strange how teachers can go off to college for all those years to learn to become teachers, but some of them never learn the easy stuff. Like making kids laugh. And making sure they know that you love them.
quotes.author: Matthew Dicks

quotes.quote: Friendship marks a life even more deeply than love. Love risks degenerating into obsession, friendship is never anything but sharing.
quotes.author: Elie Wiesel

quotes.quote: Make new friends, but keep the old; Those are silver, these are gold. New-made friendships, like new wine, Age will mellow and refine. Friendships that have stood the test - Time and change - are surely best; Brow may wrinkle, hair grow gray, Friendship never knows decay. For 'mid old friends, tried and true, Once more we our youth renew. But old friends, alas! may die, New friends must their place supply. Cherish friendship in your breast- New is good, but old is best; Make new friends, but keep the old; Those are silver, these are gold.
quotes.author: Joseph Parry

quotes.quote: The only way to have a friend is to be one.
quotes.author: V. K. Subramanian

quotes.quote: In the End, we will remember not the words of our enemies but the silence of our friends.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: You have four years to be irresponsible here. Relax. Work is for people with jobs. You’ll never remember class time, but you’ll remember time you wasted hanging out with your friends. So, stay out late. Go out on a Tuesday with your friends when you have a paper due Wednesday. Spend money you don’t have. Drink ’til sunrise. The work never ends, but college does.
quotes.author: Tom Petty

quotes.quote: College is the best time of your life. When else are your parents going to spend several thousand dollars a year just for you to go to a strange town and get drunk every night?
quotes.author: Tom Petty

quotes.quote: True Friends and New Friends Best friends are like diamonds, precious and rare. False friends are like leaves, found everywhere.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Life was meant for good friends and great adventures.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Nobody really likes us except for us.
quotes.author: Drake

quotes.quote: This is what I like about photographs. They're proof that once, even if just for a heartbeat, everything was perfect.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: Colombia's varied terrain is fertile ground for outdoor adventures to dive, climb, raft, trek, and soar.
quotes.author: Lonely Planet

quotes.quote: O, Columbia the gem of the ocean. The home of the brave and the free. The shrine of each patriot's devotion. A world offers homage to thee.
quotes.author: David T. Shaw

quotes.quote: Fly, swift winged fame, the news proclaim. From shore to shore let cannons roar. and joyful voices shout Columbia's name. Shout Columbia's name.
quotes.author: Daniel George

quotes.quote: Columbia, child of Britain,— noblest child! / I praise the growing lustre of thy worth,/ And fain would see thy great heart reconciled / To love a mother of so blest a birth:/ For we are one, Columbia! still the same / In lineage, language, laws, and ancient fame,/ The natural nobility of earth.
quotes.author: Martin Farquhar Tupper

quotes.quote: We live again, Columbia! yea once more / Unto a thousand generations live,/ The mother in the child; to all the West / Through thee shall we earth's choicest blessings give,/ Even as our Orient world in us is blessed.
quotes.author: Martin Farquhar Tupper

quotes.quote: But I felt as though I still didn't know the Columbia,— where it goes when it's out of sight; who benefits from its power and size; why we think we can pollute the carotid artery of this land; and what we have done to preserve the river's soul after two hundred years of use and abuse.
quotes.author: John Roskelley

quotes.quote: Colombians have no restrictions on coffee drinking for children— I remember as a young child drinking a cup of cafe con leche (coffee with milk) with eggs and fruit as breakfast before going to school.
quotes.author: Patricia McCausland-Gallo

quotes.quote: Rich and intense, yet soft and mild, perfection is reached in every grain of Colombian coffee.
quotes.author: Patricia McCausland-Gallo

quotes.quote: Corn and cacao beans are staples throughout the basic Colombian diet.
quotes.author: Patricia McCausland-Gallo

quotes.quote: Colombia is a country of celebration and queens. We have festivities for almost every occasion you can think of, both religious and not.
quotes.author: Patricia McCausland-Gallo

quotes.quote: Colombian Spanish is often touted as being the most 'neutral' version of the language in the world.
quotes.author: Peter Low

quotes.quote: Although Colombians are very kind and always willing to help, there are a lot of limitations when it comes to communication in a different language.
quotes.author: Mariana Velez

quotes.quote: Colombia's heritage has made it one of the world's most linguistically diverse nations and a variety of ethnicities are represented in the country.
quotes.author: David Robbins

quotes.quote: Although Colombia is known for its violence and corruption, it remains one of the most beautiful places in the world and possesses a beauty that is not subject to the will or violence of man.
quotes.author: David Robbins

quotes.quote: Colombia is so different to what I know, and every aspect of the country is different to England, and I loved it. I loved the culture and the food, and the coffee was amazing. The place that we were was stunning, and it really was quite an amazing experience to film out there.
quotes.author: Tom Holland

quotes.quote: Colombia is not how people think it is. We used to eat fish every Sunday at the beach. In the town where I grew up, people did not tell lies.
quotes.author: Shakira

quotes.quote: Well, in Colombia everybody's very voluptuous, and you're supposed to be. You don't want to be skinny when all of your cousins are mermaids. You grow up thinking that's how beauty is.
quotes.author: Sofia Vergara

quotes.quote: Anybody who lives in Colombia knows that if you don't have any money - I tell you what - you don't have many options.
quotes.author: Diane Guerrero

quotes.quote: In Colombia, where I was born and raised, women like my mother considered their appearance and personal grooming a matter of principle. There was never an occasion where she didn't show up looking picture-perfect.
quotes.author: Nina Garcia

quotes.quote: For decades, Colombia has been accused of being the world's principal provider of cocaine. If this comes to an end, it would be a dramatic change for our country - which has been suffering more than any other from the consequences of drug-trafficking.
quotes.author: Juan Manuel Santos

quotes.quote: No one can feel as the owner of the country and no one can feel excluded from the right of property. We must all suffer Colombia.
quotes.author: Alvaro Uribe

quotes.quote: Colombia is in a risky position. They've got a peace process that's going nowhere, and a drug production problem that's skyrocketing.
quotes.author: Barry McCaffrey

quotes.quote: In Colombia, education is sometimes considered a luxury, not a human right. And it's not a priority in the agendas of many leaders.
quotes.author: Shakira

quotes.quote: The Colombian economy is very strong. We have one of the highest rates of growth in Latin America.
quotes.author: Juan Manuel Santos

quotes.quote: Colombian humor is very black, very sarcastic.
quotes.author: Barbet Schroeder

quotes.quote: In Colombia, we have a lot of passion.
quotes.author: Maluma

quotes.quote: The Colombians are good-tempered people. They are used to waiting for buses that are late, used to riding buses and trains that do not arrive.
quotes.author: Paul Theroux

quotes.quote: Colonialism. The enforced spread of the rule of reason. But who is going to spread it among the colonizers?
quotes.author: Anthony Burgess

quotes.quote: Colonialism is the massive fog that has clouded our imaginations regarding who we could be, excised our memories of who we once were, and numbed our understanding of our current existence.
quotes.author: Waziyatawin

quotes.quote: We in the West must bear in mind that the poor countries are poor primarily because we have exploited them through political or economic colonialism.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: Colonialism deprives you of your self-esteem and to get it back you have to fight to redress the balance.
quotes.author: Imran Khan

quotes.quote: To campaign against colonialism is like barking up a tree that has already been cut down.
quotes.author: Andrew Cohen

quotes.quote: The worst thing that colonialism did was to cloud our view of our past.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: The native must realize that colonialism never gives anything away for nothing.
quotes.author: Frantz Fanon

quotes.quote: Colonialism is known in its primitive form, that is to say, by the permanent settling of repressive foreign powers, with an army, services, policies. This phase has known cruel colonial occupations which have lasted 300 years in Indonesia.
quotes.author: Ahmed Ben Bella

quotes.quote: The only way to resist colonialism is through education.
quotes.author: Tariq Ramadan

quotes.quote: Colonialism has a bad reputation in the modern context, but Colonial Africa was a far better place for both black and white before the colonists gave up.
quotes.author: Jeff Cooper

quotes.quote: The brutal history of colonialism is one in which white people literally stole land and people for their own gain and material wealth.
quotes.author: Patrisse Cullors

quotes.quote: Colonialism is the cousin of slavery.
quotes.author: Chadwick Boseman

quotes.quote: We would consider it our moral duty to lend all support to the ending of colonialism and imperialism so that people everywhere are free to mould their own destiny.
quotes.author: Lal Bahadur Shastri

quotes.quote: I would say colonialism is a wonderful thing. It spread civilization to Africa. Before it they had no written language, no wheel as we know it, no schools, no hospitals, not even normal clothing.
quotes.author: Ian Smith

quotes.quote: These wars appear also to have given its death blow to colonialism and to imperialism in its colonial form, under which weaker peoples were treated as possessions to be economically exploited. At least we hope that such colonialism is on the way out.
quotes.author: Emily Greene Baich

quotes.quote: And so I'm saying that, yes, colonialism was terrible, and I describe it as a legacy of wars, but we ought to be moving away from that by now.
quotes.author: Wangari Maathai

quotes.quote: Colonialism bred an innate arrogance, but when you undertake that sort of imperial adventure, that arrogance gives way to a feeling of accommodativeness. You take pride in your openness.
quotes.author: Wole Soyinka

quotes.quote: Color is my day-long obsession, joy and torment.
quotes.author: Claude Monet

quotes.quote: Color in certain places has the great value of making the outlines and structural planes seem more energetic.
quotes.author: Antoni Gaudi

quotes.quote: All the other colors are just colors, but purple seems to have a soul — when you look at it, it's looking back at you.
quotes.author: Uniek Swain

quotes.quote: Mere color, unspoiled by meaning, and unallied with definite form, can speak to the soul in a thousand different ways.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Color should be used to depict the three major emotions in a man's life—anticipation, realization and retrospection.
quotes.author: Ernest Lawson

quotes.quote: Color is only beautiful when it means something.
quotes.author: Robert Henri

quotes.quote: Color does not add a pleasant quality to design - it reinforces it.
quotes.author: Pierre Bonnard

quotes.quote: Coloring outside the lines is a fine art.
quotes.author: Kim Nance

quotes.quote: Colors are the smiles of nature.
quotes.author: Leigh Hunt

quotes.quote: I think the names of colors are at the edge, between where language fails and where it's at its most powerful.
quotes.author: A.S. Byatt

quotes.quote: Each color lives by its mysterious life.
quotes.author: Wassily Kandinsky

quotes.quote: All colours will agree in the dark.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: A dominant colour possesses tremendous power in making a painting unique.
quotes.author: Mary Bassi

quotes.quote: Color... thinks by itself, independently of the object it clothes.
quotes.author: Charles Baudelaire
