quotes.quote: Colour is a creative element, not a trimming.
quotes.author: Piet Zwart

quotes.quote: Color is an intense experience on its own.
quotes.author: Jim Hodges

quotes.quote: Colors express the main psychic functions of man.
quotes.author: Carl Gustav Jung

quotes.quote: Good colour really means good taste; and 'powerful' colour means a reserve, to give a climax its full force, and not 'red, white, and blue all over.
quotes.author: John F. Carlson

quotes.quote: It almost always happens that true, but exaggerated, coloring is more agreeable than absolute coloring.
quotes.author: Michel Eugene Chevreul

quotes.quote: Colour is, on the evidence of language alone, very bound up with the feelings.
quotes.author: Marion Milner

quotes.quote: Colour is as variable and evanescent in the form of pigment as in visible nature.
quotes.author: Walter J. Phillips

quotes.quote: Color is the language of the poets. It is astonishingly lovely. To speak it is a privilege.
quotes.author: Keith Crown

quotes.quote: Colors speak all languages.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.quote: Colours are brighter when the mind is open.
quotes.author: Adriana Alarcon

quotes.quote: A color is as strong as the impression it creates.
quotes.author: Ivan Albright

quotes.quote: Color is the fruit of life.
quotes.author: Guillaume Apollinaire

quotes.quote: Color, rather than shape, is more closely related to emotion.
quotes.author: David Katz

quotes.quote: Color is a matter of taste and of sensitivity.
quotes.author: Edouard Manet

quotes.quote: Not only can color, which is under fixed laws, be taught like music, but it is easier to learn than drawing, whose elaborate principles cannot be taught.
quotes.author: Eugene Delacroix

quotes.quote: Color is born of the interpenetration of light and dark.
quotes.author: Sam Francis

quotes.quote: Color is an act of God that neither confers privileges nor imposes a handicap. A man's skin is like the day: day is neither clear or dark. There is nothing more to it until external agencies come in and invest it with special meaning and importance.
quotes.author: Peter Abrahams

quotes.quote: To demand that color in color films should be 'natural' is to misunderstand all that is involved.
quotes.author: Carl Th. Dreyer

quotes.quote: Directors want color that is an emphasis factor, the way color is in life, and to catch the poetry of the essential gray in life.
quotes.author: Elia Kazan

quotes.quote: Color is basically immobile, and yet it must move. Color is wrong for a film that tries to be as subjective as mine...the only way to use color is subjectively.
quotes.author: Federico Fellini

quotes.quote: The color was a character of its own.
quotes.author: William Goldberg

quotes.quote: The landscape was bleak and bereft of color...like a painting in grisaille with its many tints of gray.
quotes.author: Barbara Taylor Bradford

quotes.quote: In our life, there is a single color, as on an artist's palette, which provides the meaning of life and art. It is the color of love.
quotes.author: Marc Chagall

quotes.quote: Color is visually musical, being both rythic and lyrical. It sets the tempo of a design through the blending of a multitude of hues.
quotes.author: Joen Wolfrom

quotes.quote: Like beautiful melodies and poignant words, color draws from the deep emotions within us.
quotes.author: Joen Wolfrom

quotes.quote: Each color has its own beauty and individuality, which you may accept or reject.
quotes.author: Joen Wolfrom

quotes.quote: In art, color is used as a visual language. It is the communication link between creator and viewer.
quotes.author: Joen Wolfrom

quotes.quote: In the grand scheme of nature, blue is a major player in the background of our world, but is rarely exhibited in the living landscape.
quotes.author: Johannes Itten

quotes.quote: Color is life: for a world without colors appears to us as dead.
quotes.author: Johannes Itten

quotes.quote: Colors are the children of the light, and light is their mother.
quotes.author: Johannes Itten

quotes.quote: Color effects are in the eye of the beholder.
quotes.author: Johannes Itten

quotes.quote: Color is a power which directly influences the soul.
quotes.author: Wassily Kandinsky

quotes.quote: I am a believer that color affects people's moods.
quotes.author: Lilly Pulitzer

quotes.quote: I found I could say things with color and shapes that I couldn't say any other way
quotes.author: Georgia O'Keeffe

quotes.quote: The best color in the whole world is the one that looks good on you
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: Life is a train of moods like a string of beads and as we pass through them they prove to be many-colored lenses which paint the world their own hue, and each shows only what lies in its focus
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The purest and most thoughtful minds are those which love color the most.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.quote: I don't fancy colors of the face, I'm always attracted to colors of the brain.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: Let me, O let me bathe my soul in colours; let me swallow the sunset and drink the rainbow.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: Life is a sea of vibrant color. Jump in.
quotes.author: A.D. Posey

quotes.quote: People are like M&Ms. They come in a variety of colors, they're hard on the outside, and full of obscene yumminess on the inside.
quotes.author: Michael Makai

quotes.quote: She knew then that white was more than a color: It was a cold, pale shade of understanding that seems to take all of your hope away.
quotes.author: Vannetta Chapman

quotes.quote: Colours are nature gone wild.
quotes.author: Raheel Farooq

quotes.quote: Sunrise paints the sky with pinks and the sunset with peaches. Cool to warm. So is the progression from childhood to old age.
quotes.author: Vera Nazarian

quotes.quote: Whatever you choose for your stationery is your favorite color because it's where you pour your heart out.
quotes.author: Mary E. Pearson

quotes.quote: Red was ruby, green was fluorescent, yellow was simply incandescent. Color was life. Color was everything. Color, you see, was the universal sign of magic.
quotes.author: Tahereh Mafi

quotes.quote: Fishing along the Arkansas River is some of the best in Colorado, and there are raft trips available through local companies.
quotes.author: Lee Mckinny

quotes.quote: When people think 'Colorado', many of the images that pop into their minds are of majestic mountains, forests, rivers, canyons, and other natural features.
quotes.author: Nancy S. Greif

quotes.quote: Each year, millions of skiers come to Colorado to experience its superb emergency medical facilities.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: You don't need missionaries in Colorado; you got Colorado.
quotes.author: Trey Parker

quotes.quote: Do what we will, the Colorado will one day find an unimpeded way to the sea.
quotes.author: Donald Worster

quotes.quote: Colorado is an oasis, an otherworldly mountain place.
quotes.author: Brandi Carlile

quotes.quote: As state and federal lawmakers debate the country's energy policies and Colorado's role in the ever-expanding energy economy, let's hope they remember that unnecessary regulations stifle growth while doing nothing for public safety or health.
quotes.author: Bob Beauprez

quotes.quote: Colorado's majestic landscapes are one of our most valuable assets, and it's important that we work to preserve these treasures.
quotes.author: Michael Bennet

quotes.quote: Colorado has always been a good place to find what you're made of.
quotes.author: John Hickenlooper

quotes.quote: Colorado is a state that people like to be themselves and solve their own problems.
quotes.author: John Hickenlooper

quotes.quote: Colorado does not shut down. Colorado does not quit. Colorado does not break.
quotes.author: John Hickenlooper

quotes.quote: One day the Constitution of Colorado is the highest law of the state. The next day it’s waste paper.
quotes.author: Robert F. Williams

quotes.quote: With more residents and tourism activity in Colorado, the 'Great Outdoors' is becoming a little crowded.
quotes.author: Nancy S. Greif

quotes.quote: White-water rafting, canoeing, and kayaking are very popular in Colorado.
quotes.author: Nancy S. Greif

quotes.quote: If you don't want your neighbors livestock grazing on your land, Colorado law puts the burden for financing and constructing the fence on you, the neighbor— that's what it means when you hear the expression 'Colorado is an open range state'.
quotes.author: Nancy S. Greif

quotes.quote: If you live in rural Colorado, sooner or later you will probably need to know that local governments have very direct power over your land and how you use it.
quotes.author: Nancy S. Greif

quotes.quote: The Colorado plateau is a strange, harsh, but wonderful country, indeed.
quotes.author: Donald L. Baars

quotes.quote: Yet, if one leaves the main towns and thoroughfares and ventures a few miles into the 'back country,' a fairyland of untold beauty unfolds in almost any directions
quotes.author: Donald L. Baars

quotes.quote: The colorado plateau with its magnificent deep canyons and towering peaks has not been an environment particularly hospitable to man. It is a land of extremes: flat-topped plateaus and mesas or vertical-walled canyons; ice-draped peaks or desert sands; unbearable heat or arctic blizzards; great aridity or thundering rapids.
quotes.author: Donald L. Baars

quotes.quote: In early spring, the upper levels of the atmosphere are cold, and warmer air at the surface will create very unstable conditions in the skies over Colorado.
quotes.author: Mike Nelson

quotes.quote: The Eastern plains of Colorado and southern Wyoming are among the hail capitals of the world, thanks in part to the higher elevation that puts the area closer to the chilly air aloft, and to the mountains in the west, which will help inspire the development of thunderstorms that rumble onto the plains.
quotes.author: Mike Nelson

quotes.quote: Only a stone's throw from downtown Denver, is an easy walk through time that leads past dinosaur tracks, bones, ripple marks, and other traces of Colorado's vanished life and ancient environments.
quotes.author: Ralph Lee Hopkins

quotes.quote: Colorado boasts a wonderful variety of colorful and interesting birds that are an important part of state's outdoor heritage.
quotes.author: Mary Taylor Gray

quotes.quote: Some of the most beautiful and colorful parts of Colorado are found in the clouds above.
quotes.author: Mike Nelson

quotes.quote: Colorado sits on the western edge of 'tornado alley,' the Great Plains, which hold the dubious honor of having more tornadoes than any other place on the planet.
quotes.author: Mike Nelson

quotes.quote: A crystal clear Colorado sky opens above us, a blue so deep it makes you dizzy. The occasional bright white wispy cloud dances across the firmament, punctuating the deep blue vault of heaven stretching over this paradise.
quotes.author: Neil Hanson

quotes.quote: Whenever I've met with businesses that want to locate in Colorado, the state's infrastructure for moving people and products is a top concern.
quotes.author: John Hickenlooper

quotes.quote: We lived in Colorado, and my parents were outdoorsy mountain people. My father would always say, 'Go out and don't come back until you have something to show me.' Which meant he wanted me to come back with a scraped knee or an injury. When I went out to play, I felt like I'd better get hurt.
quotes.author: Jessica Biel

quotes.quote: As long as there's land available, single-family homes will be built, and Colorado residents will always go for a single-family over a condo.
quotes.author: Gary Bauer

quotes.quote: Colorado is an oasis, an otherworldly mountain place. I've played so many shows in Colorado that I think I'm the Colorado house band.
quotes.author: Brandi Carlile

quotes.quote: Color is the overpowering of black; white the final victory over black.
quotes.author: Dejan Stojanovic

quotes.quote: Color is like music. The palette is an instrument that can be orchestrated to build form.
quotes.author: John French Sloan

quotes.quote: Fall colors are funny. They're so bright and intense and beautiful. It's like nature is trying to fill you up with color, to saturate you so you can stockpile it before winter turns everything muted and dreary.
quotes.author: Siobhan Vivian

quotes.quote: Colour creates, enhances, changes, reveals and establishes the mood of the painting.
quotes.author: Kiff Holland

quotes.quote: Colour is, on the evidence of language alone, very bound up with the feelings.
quotes.author: Joanna Field

quotes.quote: Color in certain places has the great value of making the outlines and structural planes seem more energetic.
quotes.author: Antonio Gaudi

quotes.quote: Color is simply energy, energy made visible. Colors stimulate or inhibit the functioning of different parts of our body. Treatment with the appropriate color can restore balance and normal functioning.
quotes.author: Laurie Buchanan

quotes.quote: Mere color, unspoiled by meaning, and unallied with definite form, can speak to the soul in a thousand different ways.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Colors are forces, radiant energies that affect us positively or negatively, whether we are aware of it or not.
quotes.author: Johannes Itten

quotes.quote: Color provokes a psychic vibration. Color hides a power still unknown but real, which acts on every part of the human body.
quotes.author: Wassily Kandinsky

quotes.quote: Colors answer feeling in man; shapes answer thought; and motion answers will.
quotes.author: John Sterling

quotes.quote: Color is determined by amount, application and placement.
quotes.author: Charles Emerson

quotes.quote:
Red was ruby, green was fluorescent, yellow was simply incandescent. Color was life. Color was everything.
Color, you see, was the universal sign of magic.
quotes.author: Tahereh Mafi

quotes.quote: Color is the essence of painting, which the subject always killed.
quotes.author: Kazimir Malevich

quotes.quote: All colors are the friends of their neighbors and the lovers of their opposites.
quotes.author: Marc Chagall

quotes.quote: There is a logic of colors, and it is with this alone, and not with the logic of the brain, that the painter should conform.
quotes.author: Paul Cezanne

quotes.quote: Colors express the main psychic functions of man.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: The sound of colors is so definite that it would be hard to find anyone who would express bright yellow with base notes, or dark lake with the treble.
quotes.author: Wassily Kandinsky

quotes.quote: Colors are the smiles of Nature. When they are extremely smiling, and break forth into other beauty besides, they are her laughs.
quotes.author: Leigh Hunt

quotes.quote: The colour of fear is never dark or black; it has the colour of thunderbolt; usually white, but can appear in different hues depending on how the fear travels through to get inside your heart.
quotes.author: Munia Khan

quotes.quote: Color is a plastic means of creating intervals color harmonics produced by special relationships, or tensions. We differentiate now between formal tensions and color tensions, just as we differentiate in music between counterpoint and harmony.
quotes.author: Hans Hofmann

quotes.quote: Color is only beautiful when it means something.
quotes.author: Robert Henri

quotes.quote: Colors close together on the color wheel are analogous and will make a calm room. Colors that are farther apart are complementary and add drama.
quotes.author: David Bromstad

quotes.quote: A color strategy is like a recipe for harmony a set of color relationships that are proven to work well and can be used as a formula for building our color composition.
quotes.author: Mitchell Albala

quotes.quote: Color, rather than shape, is more closely related to emotion.
quotes.author: David Katz

quotes.quote: Colors must fit together as pieces in a puzzle or cogs in a wheel.
quotes.author: Hans Hofmann

quotes.quote: A color is as strong as the impression it creates.
quotes.author: Ivan Albright

quotes.quote: Colour is as variable and evanescent in the form of pigment as in visible nature.
quotes.author: Walter J. Phillips

quotes.quote: Colors are light's suffering and joy .
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Color in a picture is like enthusiasm in life.
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.quote: Color does not add a pleasant quality to design it reinforces it.
quotes.author: Pierre Bonnard

quotes.quote: Green is the prime color of the world, and that from which its loveliness arises.
quotes.author: Pedro Calderon de la Barca

quotes.quote: Some colors are very difficult to render, and you must compensate to get the color you want on the screen.
quotes.author: Claude Chabrol

quotes.quote: Color is something we see with our eyes, but love is something we see with our heart.
quotes.author: Joan Walsh Anglund

quotes.quote: Colour could give rise to sensations which would interfere with our conception of space.
quotes.author: Georges Braque

quotes.quote: Colors, like features, follow the changes of the emotions.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: Colours are brighter when the mind is open.
quotes.author: Adriana Alarcon

quotes.quote: A colour is luminous if it is a little bit lighter and a hell of a lot brighter than the colour beside it. Use any colour as long as the value is right
quotes.author: John Leonard

quotes.quote: Even when your life is full of color, you still need to be reminded that things come in black and white.
quotes.author: Anthony T. Hincks

quotes.quote: Good colour really means good taste; and powerful colour means a reserve, to give a climax its full force, and not red, white, and blue all over.
quotes.author: John F. Carlson

quotes.quote: Colours are the deeds of light, its deeds and sufferings.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Color, like everything else concerning visual expression, usually boils down to a gift, an innate sensibility and sensitivity. Ultimately, artists develop their own palette and color sense.
quotes.author: Scott Kahn

quotes.quote: Colour should be used to depict the three major emotions in a man's life anticipation, realization and retrospection.
quotes.author: Ernest Lawson

quotes.quote: Colors produce a spiritual vibration, the impression they create is important only as a step towards this vibration.
quotes.author: Wassily Kandinsky

quotes.quote: Purer colors have in themselves, independently of the objects they serve to express, a significant action on the feelings of those who look at them.
quotes.author: Henri Matisse

quotes.quote: Colors are vibrating light energies, each color ray produces a sound that affects matter.
quotes.author: Jacqueline Ripstein

quotes.quote: Color is all. When color is right, form is right. Color is everything, color is vibration like music; everything is vibration.
quotes.author: Marc Chagall

quotes.quote: We colour the world, Not with the darkness of our pasts, But with the rainbow of our hope.
quotes.author: Jenim Dibie

quotes.quote: Color helps to express light, not the physical phenomenon, but the only light that really exists, that in the artist's brain.
quotes.author: Henri Matisse

quotes.quote: When the color goes out of your soul, you are left with an empty heart.
quotes.author: Anthony T. Hincks

quotes.quote: Most people are the 8 color boxes, but what you’re really looking for are the 64 color boxes with the sharpeners on the back. I fancy myself to be a 64 color box, though I’ve got a few missing. It’s okay though, because I’ve got some more vibrant colors like periwinkle at my disposal... I mean there are so many different colors of life, of feeling, of articulation. So when I meet someone who’s an 8 color type… I’m like, hey girl, Magenta! and she’s like, oh, you mean purple! and she goes off on her purple thing, and I’m like, no I want Magenta!
quotes.author: John Mayer

quotes.quote: Without black, no color has any depth. But if you mix black with everything, suddenly there’s shadow – no, not just shadow, but fullness. You’ve got to be willing to mix black into your palette if you want to create something that’s real.
quotes.author: Amy Grant

quotes.quote: Color is my day-long obsession, joy and torment.
quotes.author: Claude Monet

quotes.quote: Life is about using the whole box of crayons.
quotes.author: RuPaul

quotes.quote: The greatest masterpieces were once only pigments on a palette.
quotes.author: Henry S. Haskins

quotes.quote: Color! What a deep and mysterious language, the language of dreams.
quotes.author: Paul Gauguin

quotes.quote: If one could only catch that true color of nature—the very thought of it drives me mad.
quotes.author: Andrew Wyeth

quotes.quote: The best color in the whole world is the one that looks good on you.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: There's a reason we don't see the world in black and white.
quotes.author: Celerie Kemble

quotes.quote: We are united by the reality that all colors and all cultures are distinct and individual.
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.quote: We lie if we say we do not see color and culture and difference. We should not want to be the same as others, and we should not want others to be the same as us... Rather, we ought to glory and shine in all of our differences, flaunting them fabulously for all to see! It is never conformity that we need! What we need is to burst out into all these beautiful colors!
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.quote: Your attitude is like a box of crayons that color your world. Constantly color your picture gray, and your picture will always be bleak. Try adding some bright colors to the picture by including humor, and your picture begins to lighten up.
quotes.author: Allen Klein

quotes.quote: Nature always wears the colors of the spirit.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Black and white are the colors of photography. To me they symbolize the alternatives of hope and despair to which mankind is forever subjected.
quotes.author: Robert Frank

quotes.quote: I'm in love with red. I think it's such a passionate color. Every flag of every country pretty much has red in it. It's power, there's no fence sitting with red. Either you love it or you don't. I think it's blood and strength and life. I do love red. I love all colors. Great shades of blue, you find them in nature. They're all magic.
quotes.author: Bryan Batt

quotes.quote: One day I decided that I was beautiful, and so I carried out my life as if I was a beautiful girl. I wear colors that I really like, I wear makeup that makes me feel pretty, and it really helps. It doesn't have anything to do with how the world perceives you. What matters is what you see.
quotes.author: Gabourey Sidibe

quotes.quote: And all the colors I am inside have not been invented yet.
quotes.author: Shel Silverstein

quotes.quote: Let me, O let me bathe my soul in colors; let me swallow the sunset and drink the rainbow.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: I found I could say things with color and shapes that I couldn't say any other way... things I had no words for.
quotes.author: Georgia O'Keeffe

quotes.quote: Color is an act of God that neither confers privileges nor imposes a handicap. A man's skin is like the day: day is neither clear or dark. There is nothing more to it until external agencies come in and invest it with special meaning and importance.
quotes.author: Peter Abrahams

quotes.quote: We must learn how to oppose the racist fixation on people of color as the primary perpetrators of violence yet fiercely challenge the real violence that men of color inflict on women.
quotes.author: Angela Davis

quotes.quote: Clouds come floating into my life, no longer to carry or usher storm, but to add color to my sunset sky.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.quote: The courage to imagine the otherwise is our greatest resource, adding color and suspense to all our life.
quotes.author: Daniel Boorstin

quotes.quote: Those leaves there: if they were the only thing in sight, they'd have one color - their own. But the shade and reflection of everything around - the sky, the earth, the water - give them more than their own color. That's why when you paint from nature, don't fix your eye on any one spot.
quotes.author: Camille Pissarro

quotes.quote: I can't color enough, I would color all day every day If I had my way, I would use every crayon in my box.
quotes.author: Samantha Jones

quotes.quote: Colors are what / Keep me alive / Colors are what / To hold in my head / Colors are where my / My old meets new / Colors are where / My brain finds blue.
quotes.author: Joseph Goddard and Alexis Benjamin Taylor

quotes.quote: Have you seen her dressed in blue? / See the sky in front of you / And her face is like a sail / Speck of white so fair and pale / Have you seen a lady fairer? / She comes in colors ev'rywhere; / She combs her hair / She's like a rainbow / Coming, colors in the air / Oh, everywhere.
quotes.author: Keith Richards and Mick Jagger

quotes.quote: What is pink? a rose is pink / By a fountain's brink. / What is red? a poppy's red / In its barley bed. / What is blue? the sky is blue / Where the clouds float thro' / What is white? a swan is white / Sailing in the light. / What is yellow? pears are yellow, / Rich and ripe and mellow. / What is green? the grass is green, / With small flowers between. / What is violet? clouds are violet / In the summer twilight. / What is orange? Why, an orange, / Just an orange!
quotes.author: Christina Georgina Rossetti

quotes.quote: Red is the color of blood, and I will seek it: / I have sought it in the grass. / It is the color of steep sun seen through eyelids.
quotes.author: Conrad Potter Aiken

quotes.quote: You can never judge a paint hue by the liquid color in the paint pot. You must apply it to the wall, wait for the paint to dry, then decide.
quotes.author: Dorothy Draper

quotes.quote: A comedy isn't about being funny a comedy is about characters who dare to know that they may choose a happy ending after all.
quotes.author: Gary D. Schmidt

quotes.quote: Comedy is so hard to do, so it was very cool to do dead pan humor.
quotes.author: Brittany Daniel

quotes.quote: Great comedy calls large matters into question.
quotes.author: Penelope Gilliatt

quotes.quote: Comedy is really not like any other art form in that it's very specialized and varied in it's content, but generic in it's title.
quotes.author: Joe Rogan

quotes.quote: Without comedy as a defense mechanism I wouldn't be able to survive.
quotes.author: Garry Shandling

quotes.quote: Comedy is a necessity to get through life with the fewest scars. Humor is the best antidote to help relieve all struggles.
quotes.author: Suzy Kassem

quotes.quote: First you forget names, then you forget faces. Next you forget to pull your zipper up and finally, you forget to pull it down.
quotes.author: George Burns

quotes.quote: Comedy has to be done en clair. You can't blunt the edge of wit or the point of satire with obscurity. Try to imagine a famous witty saying that is not immediately clear.
quotes.author: James Thurber

quotes.quote: Comedy is an escape, not from truth but from despair; a narrow escape into faith.
quotes.author: Christopher Fry

quotes.quote: Comedy is so fun. I don't know how these people can make movies and work on them for four months and they're these sob stories. I don't know how emotionally you get through that.
quotes.author: Colleen Haskell

quotes.quote: Comedy is defiance. It's a snort of contempt in the face of fear and anxiety. And it's the laughter that allows hope to creep back on the inhale.
quotes.author: Will Durst

quotes.quote: It seems that two of the most basic forms of comedy are jokes and stories. And, of course, they are not mutually exclusive.
quotes.author: Demetri Martin

quotes.quote: Every book is a children's book if the kid can read!
quotes.author: Mitch Hedberg

quotes.quote: If you want to make an audience laugh, you dress a man up like an old lady and push her down the stairs. If you want to make comedy writers laugh, you push an actual old lady down the stairs.
quotes.author: Tina Fey

quotes.quote: I was trying to daydream, but my mind kept wandering.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: Comedy is incredibly hard. You have to be loose. You have to be not afraid to fail.
quotes.author: Bill Hader

quotes.quote: In comedy laughter settles all arguments.
quotes.author: Robert McKee

quotes.quote: Comedy is acting out optimism.
quotes.author: Robin Williams

quotes.quote: The world is a tragedy to those who feel, but a comedy to those who think.
quotes.author: Horace Walpole

quotes.quote: Just because nobody complains doesn't mean all parachutes are perfect.
quotes.author: Benny Hill

quotes.quote: Comedy is much more difficult than tragedy and a much better training, I think. It's much easier to make people cry than to make them laugh.
quotes.author: Vivien Leigh

quotes.quote: Comedy is underrepresented in every actor's life, because it's so bloody difficult to write.
quotes.author: Michael Caine

quotes.quote: With comedy, you have no place to go but more comedy, so you're never off the hook.
quotes.author: Steve Martin

quotes.quote: The reason most comedies don't win awards is that the filmmakers put the comedy first. This means you have to create a story around the jokes.
quotes.author: Paul Feig

quotes.quote: Comedy is a wonderful device for distance that allows us to look at what we're talking about with some degree of distance and hopefully with a bit more perspective and honesty. With many exceptions, a movie with no jokes is far less appealing to me.
quotes.author: Alexander Payne

quotes.quote: Comedy has to be based on truth. You take the truth and you put a little curlicue at the end.
quotes.author: Sid Caesar

quotes.quote: Even in comedies, you've got to feel safe for things to just happen in a way that is natural and free, and recognizable as human.
quotes.author: Richard Gere

quotes.quote: Tragedy is when I cut my finger. Comedy is when you fall into an open sewer and die.
quotes.author: Mel Brooks

quotes.quote: Comedy was one of those genres that while appearing quite jolly was actually highly dangerous.
quotes.author: Jasper Fforde

quotes.quote: The best comedy is always played straight down the middle.
quotes.author: Tom Hiddleston

quotes.quote: Comedy is created when someone is trying very earnestly to do what he feels is the right thing to do at that moment.
quotes.author: Madeline Kahn

quotes.quote: Comedy is the ultimate truth. Jazz is hitting the notes that that no one else would hit, and comedy is saying words that no one else would say.
quotes.author: Tommy Chong

quotes.quote: Comedy is simply a funny way of being serious.
quotes.author: Peter Ustinov

quotes.quote: Comedy is the art of making people laugh without making them puke.
quotes.author: Steve Martin

quotes.quote: The duty of comedy is to correct men by amusing them.
quotes.author: Moliere

quotes.quote: One of the interesting things about comedy is it's tension release, and nothing creates tension faster than anger.
quotes.author: Lewis Black

quotes.quote: Why is Cloud 9 so amazing? What is wrong with Cloud 8? That joke came off the top of my head, and the top of my head ain't funny!
quotes.author: Mitch Hedberg

quotes.quote: Comedy is much more challenging, because you have to have the same level of belief but you have to make people laugh, and that's definitely a challenge.
quotes.author: Jenna Elfman

quotes.quote: Most comedy is based on getting a laugh at somebody else's expense. And I find that that's just a form of bullying in a major way. So I want to be an example that you can be funny and be kind, and make people laugh without hurting somebody else's feelings.
quotes.author: Ellen DeGeneres

quotes.quote: Comedy always works best when it is mean spirited.
quotes.author: John Cleese

quotes.quote: Comedy naturally wears itself out destroys the very food on which it lives; and by constantly and successfully exposing the follies and weaknesses of mankind to ridicule, in the end leaves itself nothing worth laughing at.
quotes.author: William Hazlitt

quotes.quote: Because it's uncensored cable, I think we'll be able to do the kind of sketch comedy that really hasn't been seen before. We can actually finish jokes.
quotes.author: Aries Spears

quotes.quote: Nothing gives you confidence like being a member of a small, weirdly specific, hard to find demographic.
quotes.author: Mindy Kaling

quotes.quote: To me, comedy is just twisting reality. It's commenting or observing or twisting life.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I think being successful in comedy is being funny and making jokes - anything beyond that is the icing on the cake.
quotes.author: Jimmy Carr

quotes.quote: Make no mistake about why these babies are here they are here to replace us.
quotes.author: Jerry Seinfeld

quotes.quote: Life doesn't make any sense, and we all pretend it does. Comedy's job is to point out that it doesn't make sense, and that it doesn't make much difference anyway.
quotes.author: Eric Idle

quotes.quote: Today you are You, that is truer than true. There is no one alive who is Youer than You.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: Comedy is difficult for an actor. But I think I have a good sense of humor and manage to make people laugh and make them happy.
quotes.author: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan

quotes.quote: Comedy is very controlling you are making people laugh.
quotes.author: Gilda Radner

quotes.quote: Through humor, we see in what seems rational, the irrational; in what seems important, the unimportant. It also heightens our sense of survival and preserves our sanity.
quotes.author: Charlie Chaplin

quotes.quote: Comedy is a fulfillment, accomplishment, overcoming. It is victory over odds, a triumph of good over evil.
quotes.author: Frank Capra

quotes.quote: Comedy is a complete surrender of one's defenses.
quotes.author: Frank Capra

quotes.quote: A comedy, for me, has the quality of being a little dessert, a diversion...The real meat and potatoes are serious films.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: With comedy, you can buy yourself out of the problems of life and diffuse them. In tragedy, you must confront them and it is painful.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: It's okay to have them laugh at you, but they have to laugh with you, too.
quotes.author: George S. Kaufman

quotes.quote: A half-laugh is worse than none at all.
quotes.author: Anita Loos

quotes.quote: Comedy is the most serious study in the world. I start out to find my characters in real life.
quotes.author: Charlie Chaplin

quotes.quote: Love! Comedians must be loved to get laughs.
quotes.author: Frank Capra

quotes.quote: Comedy is a tragedy - plus time.
quotes.author: Carol Burnett

quotes.quote: Comedy films are unlike other films; What's important in a comedy is the content of the shot, not the shot itself.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: Comedy is like bass fishing. Everyone's an expert. The fish is smarter than all of them, and the flashiest, shiniest lures never work.
quotes.author: Cameron Crowe

quotes.quote: When you do comedy, you're not sitting at the grown-up's table, you're sitting at the children's table.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: My comedy is an observance of life. And so to start observing it too seriously would be the end of it.
quotes.author: Gilda Radner

quotes.quote: The difference between tragedy and comedy: Tragedy is something awful happening to somebody else, while comedy is something awful happening to somebody else.
quotes.author: Aaron Allston

quotes.quote: Comedy is a tool of togetherness. It's a way of putting your arm around someone, pointing at something, and saying, 'Isn't it funny that we do that?' It's a way of reaching out.
quotes.author: Kate McKinnon

quotes.quote: Do you know what the key to comedy is? Timing.
quotes.author: Winston Marshall

quotes.quote: Comedy can be a cathartic way to deal with personal trauma.
quotes.author: Robin Williams

quotes.quote: Comedy is a tragedy that happens to other people.
quotes.author: Angela Carter

quotes.quote: Comedy is a surprise, so if you're intending to make somebody laugh and they don't laugh, that's funny.
quotes.author: Norm MacDonald

quotes.quote: Comedy, we may say, is society protecting itself - with a smile.
quotes.author: J.B. Priestley

quotes.quote: Comedy just pokes at problems, rarely confronts them squarely. Drama is like a plate of meat and potatoes, comedy is rather the dessert, a bit like meringue.
quotes.author: Allen

quotes.quote: Comedy keeps the heart sweet.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: The funniest thing about comedy is that you never know why people laugh. I know what makes them laugh but trying to get your hands on the why of it is like trying to pick an eel out of a tub of water.
quotes.author: Fields

quotes.quote: Comedy deflates the sense precisely so that the underlying lubricity and malice may bubble to the surface.
quotes.author: Goodman

quotes.quote: As the purpose of comedy is to correct the vices of men, I see no reason why anyone should be exempt.
quotes.author: Moliere

quotes.quote: The astronomer will believe that the most erratic comet will yet accomplish its journey and revisit our sphere; but we give up those for lost who have not wandered one-half the distance from the centre of light and life.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.quote: How bright and beautiful a comet is as it flies past our planet—provided it does fly past it.
quotes.author: Isaac Asimov

quotes.quote: Once in a cycle the comet Doubles its lonesome track. Enriched with the tears of a thousand years, Aeschylus wanders back.
quotes.author: John G. Neihardt

quotes.quote: The tail of a comet can extend millions of miles into space, always in the opposite direction of the sun, blown by the solar breeze. A comet's tail is the closest thing to nothing that anything can be. I love that. The closest thing to nothing.
quotes.author: Kelly Easton

quotes.quote: The movement of comets is part of the ordinary works of nature which, without regard to the happiness or misery of mankind, are transported from one part of the heavens to another by virtue of the general laws of motion.
quotes.author: Pierre Bayle

quotes.quote: The tail of the comet slashed the dawn and in the red light of the rising sun, for a brief instant, it seemed as if the comet was bleeding across the sky.
quotes.author: Kathryn Lasky

quotes.quote: Aristotle's opinion... that comets were nothing else than sublunary vapors or airy meteors... prevailed so far amongst the Greeks, that this sublimest part of astronomy lay altogether neglected; since none could think it worthwhile to observe, and to give an account of the wandering and uncertain paths of vapours floating in the Ether.
quotes.author: Edmond Halley

quotes.quote: Like a blazing comet, I've traversed infinite nights, interstellar spaces of the imagination, voluptuousness and fear.
quotes.author: Antonio Tabucchi

quotes.quote: This most beautiful system of the sun, planets, and comets could only proceed from the counsel and dominion of an intelligent and powerful Being.
quotes.author: Sir Isaac Newton

quotes.quote: Who vagrant transitory comets sees, Wonders because they’re rare; but a new star Whose motion with the firmament agrees, Is miracle; for there no new things are.
quotes.author: John Donne

quotes.quote: Comets importing change of times and states, Brandish your crystal tresses in the sky And with them scourge the bad revolting stars.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: There has always been the same amount of light in the world. The new and missing stars, the comets and eclipses, do not affect the general illumination, for only our glasses appreciate them.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: When we see comets up in the sky they're really spectacular. But unless you get close to a comet, you can't really figure out what's going on.
quotes.author: Joseph Ververka

quotes.quote: Time, tide, and comets waited for no man.
quotes.author: Neal Stephenson

quotes.quote: For The Path Of Comets/ Is The Path Of Poets: They Burn Without Warming,/ Pick Without Cultivating. They Are: An Explosion, A Breaking In.
quotes.author: Marina Tsvetaeva

quotes.quote: Comets are like cats: they have tails, and they do precisely what they want.
quotes.author: David H. Levy

quotes.quote: Cosmic systems intertwine, astral bodies drip like wine, all of nature ebbs and flows. Comets shoot across the sky, can't explain the reasons why, this is how creation goes.
quotes.author: Madonna

quotes.quote: We affect one another quite enough merely by existing. Whenever the stars cross, or is it comets? Fragments pass briefly from one orbit to another. On rare occasions there is total collision, but most often the two simply continue without incident, neither losing more than a particle to the other, in passing.
quotes.author: Gore Vidal

quotes.quote: You are heaven's Halley's comet; we have one shot at seeing you shine.
quotes.author: Max Lucado

quotes.quote: Comets are far more than intellectual interest. These things affect us, and may have even enabled us[to exist].
quotes.author: Don Yeomans

quotes.quote: A comet is sublimated fire assimilated to the nature of one of the seven planets.
quotes.author: Robert Grosseteste

quotes.quote: The motions of the Comets are exceeding regular, are govern’d by the same laws with the motions of the Planets,… with very eccentric motions through all parts of the heavens indifferently.
quotes.author: Sir Isaac Newton

quotes.quote: For most of the history of our species we were helpless to understand how nature works. We took every storm, drought, illness and comet personally. We created myths and spirits in an attempt to explain the patterns of nature.
quotes.author: Ann Druyan

quotes.quote: If parents are the fixed stars in the child's universe, the vaguely understood, distant but constant celestial spheres, siblings are the dazzling, sometimes scorching comets whizzing nearby.
quotes.author: Alison Gopnik

quotes.quote: It's ridiculous that our solar system, not to mention the universe outside of that, is extraordinarily well organized, to the point where we can predict 70 years away when a comet is coming.
quotes.author: Benjamin Carson

quotes.quote: In the year 1456... a Comet was seen passing Retrograde between the Earth and the sun... Hence I dare venture to foretell, that it will return again in the year 1758.
quotes.author: Edmond Halley

quotes.quote: This is no time for ease and comfort. It is time to dare and endure.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Minds, like bodies, will often fall into a pimpled, ill-conditioned state from mere excess of comfort.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: The lust for comfort, that stealthy thing that enters the house as a guest, and then becomes a host, and then a master.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: Words of comfort, skillfully administered, are the oldest therapy known to man.
quotes.author: Louis Nizer

quotes.quote: We find comfort among those who agree with us - growth among those who don't.
quotes.author: Frank A. Clark

quotes.quote: If you look for truth, you may find comfort in the end; if you look for comfort you will not get either comfort or truth.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: It makes me feel good to have some comforting effect on someone that needs comfort.
quotes.author: Juliana Hatfield

quotes.quote: Comfort is no test of truth. Truth is often far from being comfortable.
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: Comfort is your biggest trap and coming out of comfort zone your biggest challenge.
quotes.author: Manoj Arora

quotes.quote: Comfort is a powerful sedative.
quotes.author: Samantha Garman

quotes.quote: People need to rediscover the ability to find comfort amidst discomfort. It is only while enduring discomfort that we find solutions.
quotes.author: Hanno Langenhoven

quotes.quote: Of all created comforts, God is the lender; you are the borrower, not the owner.
quotes.author: Samuel Rutherford

quotes.quote: The world offers you comfort. But you were not made for comfort. You were made for greatness.
quotes.author: Pope Benedict XVI

quotes.quote: God does not comfort us to make us comfortable, but to make us comforters.
quotes.author: John Henry Jowett

quotes.quote: ... one may live in a big house and yet have no comfort.
quotes.author: Agatha Christie

quotes.quote: I'm not at all contemptuous of comforts, but they have their place and it is not first.
quotes.author: E.F. Schumacherm

quotes.quote: Move out of your comfort zone. You can only grow if you are willing to feel awkward and uncomfortable when you try something new.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: There is nothing like staying at home for real comfort.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: We act as though comfort and luxury were the chief requirements of life. All that we need to make us happy is something to be enthusiastic about.
quotes.author: Charles Kingsley

quotes.quote: Cure sometimes, treat often, comfort always.
quotes.author: Hippocrates

quotes.quote: Anything that disturbs your comfort factor is good for you.
quotes.author: Tony La Russa

quotes.quote: Getting to a place of comfort can be uncomfortable.
quotes.author: Marcus Samuelsson

quotes.quote: Increase of material comforts, it may be generally laid down, does not in any way whatsoever conduce to moral growth.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Comfort and prosperity have never enriched the world as much as adversity has.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Your comfort zone is not a place that you want to remain in. Dare, discover, be all that you can be.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: The ultimate measure of a man is not where he stands in moments of comfort and convenience, but where he stands at times of challenge and controversy.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: To the degree we're not living our dreams, our comfort zone has more control of us than we have over ourselves.
quotes.author: Peter McWilliams

quotes.quote: Nobody ever died of discomfort, yet living in the name of comfort has killed more ideas, more opportunities, more actions, and more growth than everything else combined. Comfort kills
quotes.author: T. Harv Eker

quotes.quote: We cannot become what we want to be by remaining what we are.
quotes.author: Max Depree

quotes.quote: If you remain in your comfort zone you will not go any further.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: The superior man thinks always of virtue; the common man thinks of comfort.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Comfort the afflicted, and afflict the comfortable.
quotes.author: Finley Peter Dunne

quotes.quote: Life begin at the end of your Comfort Zone. So if you`re feeling uncomfortable right now, know that the change taking place in your life is a begining, not an ending.
quotes.author: Neale Donald Walsch

quotes.quote: Comfort zones are plush lined coffins. When you stay in your plush lined coffins, you die.
quotes.author: Stan Dale

quotes.quote: You can't comfort the afflicted with afflicting the comfortable.
quotes.author: Princess Diana

quotes.quote: Life begins at the end of your comfort zone.
quotes.author: Neale Donald Walsch

quotes.quote: Comfort zones are most often expanded through discomfort.
quotes.author: Peter McWilliams

quotes.quote: Physical comfort has nothing to do with any other comfort.
quotes.author: Jerzy Kosinski

quotes.quote: Growth and comfort do not coexist.
quotes.author: Ginni Rometty

quotes.quote: If we're growing, we're always going to be out of our comfort zone.
quotes.author: John Maxwell

quotes.quote: Life loses its meaning when we get stuck up in comfort zone.
quotes.author: M.K. Soni

quotes.quote: There is no feeling more comforting and consoling than knowing you are right next to the one you love.
quotes.author: Anthony Brandt

quotes.quote: To be scared is sensible, to be comfortable is suicidal.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: May a thread of comfort be woven through your difficult days.
quotes.author: Mary Anne Radmacher

quotes.quote: Food is the most primitive form of comfort.
quotes.author: Sheila Graham

quotes.quote: Most of the luxuries, and many of the so-called comforts of life, are not only not indispensable, but positive hindrances to the elevation of mankind. With respect to luxuries and comforts, the wisest have even lived a more simple and meagre life than the poor.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: In no direction that we turn do we find ease or comfort. If we are honest and if we have the will to win we find only danger, hard work and iron resolution.
quotes.author: Wendell Wilkie

quotes.quote: Comfort is the enemy of achievement.
quotes.author: Farrah Gray

quotes.quote: Too often we enjoy the comfort of opinion without the discomfort of thought.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: (God) comforteth us in all our tribulation, that we may be able to comfort them which are in any trouble, by the comfort wherewith we ourselves are comforted of God.
quotes.author: Bible

quotes.quote: In a world filled with hate, we must still dare to hope. In a world filled with anger, we must still dare to comfort. In a world filled with despair, we must still dare to dream. And in a world filled with distrust, we must still dare to believe.
quotes.author: Michael Jackson

quotes.quote: The greatest comfort in this life is having a close relationship with God.
quotes.author: David O. McKay

quotes.quote: Life is not a matter of place, things or comfort. Rather, it concerns the basic human rights of family, country, justice and human dignity.
quotes.author: Imelda Marcos

quotes.quote: The creative is the place where no one else has never been. You have to leave the city of your comfort and go into the wilderness of your intuition. What you'll discover will be wonderful. What you'll discover will be yourself.
quotes.author: Alan Alda

quotes.quote: Thy love is Singular when all thy delight is in Jesus Christ, and thou dost find joy and comfort in no other thing.
quotes.author: Richard Rolle

quotes.quote: A dream is your creative vision for your life in the future. You must break out of your current comfort zone and become comfortable with the unfamiliar and the unknown.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: Now, God be praised, that to believing souls gives light in darkness, comfort in despair.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: I tore myself away from the safe comfort of certainties through my love for truth and truth rewarded me.
quotes.author: Simone De Beauvoir

quotes.quote: The unhappy derive comfort from the misfortunes of others.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: I always felt that the great high privilege, relief and comfort of friendship was that one had to explain nothing.
quotes.author: Katherine Mansfield

quotes.quote: Greed, like the love of comfort, is a kind of fear.
quotes.author: Cyril Connolly

quotes.quote: Time makes fools of us all. Our only comfort is that greater shall come after us.
quotes.author: Eric Temple Bell

quotes.quote: Consider any individual at any period of his life, and you will always find him preoccupied with fresh plans to increase his comfort and wealth.
quotes.author: Alexis de Tocqueville

quotes.quote: If we're growing, we're always going to be outside out of our comfort zone.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: An easy-going husband is the one indispensable comfort of life.
quotes.author: Ouida

quotes.quote: Art should comfort the disturbed and disturb the comfortable.
quotes.author: Banksy

quotes.quote: Comfort in expressing your emotions will allow you to share the best of yourself with others, but not being able to control your emotions will reveal your worst.
quotes.author: Bryant H. McGill

quotes.quote: Comfort zones are overrated. They make you lazy.
quotes.author: Melina Marchetta

quotes.quote: Comfort is the only thing our civilization can give us.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Cats are connoisseurs of comfort.
quotes.author: James Herriot

quotes.quote: Never does one feel oneself so utterly helpless as in trying to speak comfort for great bereavement.
quotes.author: Jane Welsh Carlyle

quotes.quote: When one is too old for love, one finds great comfort in good dinners.
quotes.author: Zora Neale Hurston

quotes.quote: I've never any pity for conceited people, because I think they carry their comfort about with them.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: To reach any significant goal, you must leave your comfort zone.
quotes.author: Hyrum W. Smith

quotes.quote: Courage and comfort, all shall yet go well
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: The purpose of life is not to maintain personal comfort; it's to grow the soul.
quotes.author: Christina Baldwin

quotes.quote: Yo can choose courage, or you can choose comfort, but you cannot choose both.
quotes.author: Brene Brown

quotes.quote: Comfort makes you weaker. We need some variability, some stressors. Not too much, but just enough.
quotes.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

quotes.quote: It is such a comfort to drop the tangles of life into God's hands and leave them there.
quotes.author: Lettie Cowman

quotes.quote: It's a great comfort to have an artistic sister.
quotes.author: Louisa May Alcott

quotes.quote: Rapport equals trust plus comfort.
quotes.author: Neil Strauss

quotes.quote: It brings comfort to have companions in whatever happens.
quotes.author: Saint John Chrysostom

quotes.quote: The further you get away from yourself, the more challenging it is. Not to be in your comfort zone is great fun.
quotes.author: Benedict Cumberbatch

quotes.quote: There is a comfort zone of knowing where things are going and having characters in place, but the action gets more and more dramatic and is very challenging to describe.
quotes.author: Jerry B. Jenkins

quotes.quote: Comfort controls us. Fear scares us. To grow you have to overcome fear and go out of your comfort zone to be what you always wanted to be.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: Blossoming out through one's comfort zone should be well meaning so as to achieve newer levels of excellence.
quotes.author: Priyavrat Thareja

quotes.quote: Life begins at the end of your comfort zone.
quotes.author: Neale Donald Walsch

quotes.quote: To the degree we're not living our dreams, our comfort zone has more control of us than we have over ourselves.
quotes.author: Peter McWilliams

quotes.quote: People tend to play in their comfort zone, so the best things are achieved in a state of surprise, actually.
quotes.author: Brian Eno

quotes.quote: When you go out of your comfort zone and it works there's nothing more satisfying.
quotes.author: Kristen Wiig

quotes.quote: To change a team you must change their comfort zone.
quotes.author: Doug Collins

quotes.quote: Your comfort zone is not a place that you want to remain in. Dare, discover, be all that you can be.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: A dream is your creative vision for your life in the future. You must break out of your current comfort zone and become comfortable with the unfamiliar and the unknown.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: It's good for me to do things outside my comfort zone and push myself.
quotes.author: Zoe Sugg

quotes.quote: Life always begins with one step outside of your comfort zone.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: I love going out of my comfort zone-I live to go out of my comfort zone. Obviously, you have quieter years than others-you don't go jumping out of a plane every day.
quotes.author: Natalie Dormer

quotes.quote: Each one of us has a comfort zone. The problem comes when we are unwilling to leave it.Always remember that, every time you step out of your comfort zone, you step into God's comfort zone.
quotes.author: Bill Courtney

quotes.quote: Nothing profound ever happens in your life when you remain in your comfort zone.
quotes.author: Bill Courtney

quotes.quote: As you move outside of your comfort zone, what was once the unknown and frightening becomes your new normal.
quotes.author: Robin S. Sharma

quotes.quote: Comfort zones are plush lined coffins. When you stay in your plush lined coffins, you die.
quotes.author: Stan Dale

quotes.quote: Your comfort zone is a place where you keep yourself in a self-illusion and nothing can grow there but your potentiality can grow only when you can think and grow out of that zone.
quotes.author: Rashedur Ryan Rahman

quotes.quote: Life begin at the end of your Comfort Zone. So if you`re feeling uncomfortable right now, know that the change taking place in your life is a begining, not an ending.
quotes.author: Neale Donald Walsch

quotes.quote: To succeed in life, we must stay within our strength zone but continually move outside our comfort zone.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: Coming out of your comfort zone is tough in the beginning, chaotic in the middle, and awesome in the endâ€¦because in the end, it shows you a whole new world.
quotes.author: Manoj Arora

quotes.quote: The only thing that is stopping you from where you are to where you want to go is your comfort zone.
quotes.author: Dhaval Gaudier

quotes.quote: If you want to be excellent at something, you must move away from your comfort zone, overcome doubt, setbacks and failure. Never give up. Keep plugging away and being persistent. One day, success will be yours.
quotes.author: Mark F. LaMoure

quotes.quote: Comfort zones are overrated. They make you lazy.
quotes.author: Melina Marchetta

quotes.quote: Move out of your comfort zone. You can only grow if you are willing to feel awkward and uncomfortable when you try something new.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: The best things in life are often waiting for you at the exit ramp of your comfort zone.
quotes.author: Karen Salmansohn

quotes.quote: Comedians tend to find a comfort zone and stay there and do lamer versions of themselves for the rest of their career.
quotes.author: Chris Rock

quotes.quote: Step outside of your comfort zone and go beyond the boundaries that you and others have set for yourself.
quotes.author: Julius Veal

quotes.quote: Risk, then, is not just part of life. It is life. The place between your comfort zone and your dream is where life takes place. It's the high-anxiety zone, but it's also where you discover who you are.
quotes.author: Nick Vujicic

quotes.quote: Better to step out of your comfort zone, enjoy new experiences & not know what's coming your way, than stick to routines & be bored with the same end results.
quotes.author: April Mae Monterrosa

quotes.quote: My comfort zone is like a little bubble around me, and I've pushed it in different directions and made it bigger and bigger until these objectives that seemed totally crazy eventually fall within the realm of the possible.
quotes.author: Alex Honnold

quotes.quote: Comfort zone has the most comfortable bed in life where dreams become alive in your mind but never become a reality because you never get up from bed to make it happen.
quotes.author: Oscar Bimpong

quotes.quote: We have to be honest about what we want and take risks rather than lie to ourselves and make excuses to stay in our comfort zone.
quotes.author: Ray Bennett

quotes.quote: The comfort zone is the great enemy of courage and confidence.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: People are so ready to cut you down if you take a risk and leave your comfort zone.
quotes.author: Annabelle Wallis

quotes.quote: Zone into your comfort zone, and, then zone into where you want to be. Be all that you can be.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Comfort is your biggest trap and coming out of comfort zone your biggest challenge.
quotes.author: Manoj Arora

quotes.quote: The desire to live within our comfort zone and to be in control all the time is a denier of a fulfilling life that excites. Let go.
quotes.author: Assegid Habtewold

quotes.quote: If you put yourself in a position where you have to stretch outside your comfort zone, then you are forced to expand your consciousness.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: The comfort zone is a psychological state in which one feels familiar, safe, at ease, and secure. You never change your life until you step out of your comfort zone; change begins at the end of your comfort zone.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: You should not remain in your comfort zone; if you want to make it big, you must challenge yourself, get out of your comfort zone, and succeed in doing well outside of your comfort areas.
quotes.author: Rohit Sharma

quotes.quote: In the long run, our comfort zone becomes our uncomfortable zone.
quotes.author: Charles F. Glassman

quotes.quote: Comfort zones are most often expanded through discomfort.
quotes.author: Peter McWilliams

quotes.quote: Sometimes we have to step out of our comfort zones. We have to break the rules. And we have to discover the sensuality of fear. We need to face it, challenge it, dance with it.
quotes.author: Kyra Davis

quotes.quote: The stage is my comfort zone, and playing live is what I've always wanted to do. It's why I want to do two hundred dates a year. I wouldn't feel that way if I were nervous onstage.
quotes.author: Hunter Hayes

quotes.quote: The comfort zone is always the most desirable place to be. But in settling for comfort, there is a price to pay and it comes in the death of ambition, of hope, of youth and the death of self.
quotes.author: Simon Barnes

quotes.quote: Each one of us has a comfort zone. The problem comes when we are unwilling to leave it.
quotes.author: Bill Courtney

quotes.quote: To get better you have to step out of your comfort zone. You can't do the same things you've always done & improve.
quotes.author: Jordan Burroughs

quotes.quote: The comfort zone takes our greatest aspirations and turns them into excuses for not bothering to aspire.
quotes.author: Peter McWilliams

quotes.quote: Be brave enough to travel the unknown path, and learn what you are capable of.
quotes.author: Rachel Wolchin

quotes.quote: I believe that the most important single thing, beyond discipline and creativity, is daring to dare.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Life shrinks or expands in proportion to one's courage.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.quote: What would happen if you reprogrammed yourself to find security in unfamiliarity?... By consistently pushing yourself beyond your comfort zone, you'll notice your comfort zone expanding and your fear zone diminishing.
quotes.author: Keith Boykin

quotes.quote: Somebody once said, 'Everything you want in the world is just right outside your comfort zone.' Everything you could possibly want.
quotes.author: Jennifer Aniston

quotes.quote: I keep on making what I can't do yet in order to learn to be able to do it.
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.quote: There's some quality you get when you're not totally comfortable. When you're not doing what you're used to, you could completely fall on your face. You could completely blow it.
quotes.author: Beck

quotes.quote: Keep looking for new trouble.
quotes.author: George Clooney

quotes.quote: Growth and comfort do not coexist.
quotes.author: Ginny Rometti

quotes.quote: We must remember: There is no easy way.
quotes.author: Ryan Holiday

quotes.quote: When we become fixed in our perceptions we lose our ability to fly.
quotes.author: Mingyur Rinpoche

quotes.quote: If we're growing, we're always going to be out of our comfort zone.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: The place between your comfort zone and your dream is where life takes place.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Every failure is preparing you. Don't be so afraid of failure that you don't get out of your comfort zone. You will learn more through failure than you will through success. You'll learn more in the difficult times than you will in the good times.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: Fearless is living in spite of those things that scare you to death.
quotes.author: Taylor Swift

quotes.quote: If I didn't or missed my chance then let me clarify, / you are my comfort zone... it's true / the best way for me to relax / from all of the stressors in my life / is to drift away in my thoughts... of you.
quotes.author: Melissa Valeria Greer

quotes.quote: Sometimes it is good to be in uncomfortable situations because it is in finding our way out of such difficulties that we learn valuable lessons.
quotes.author: Idowu Koyenikan

quotes.quote: Fear and anxiety many times indicate that we are moving in a positive direction, out of the safe confines of our comfort zone, and in the direction of our true purpose.
quotes.author: Charles F. Glassman

quotes.quote: You have to be uncomfortable in order to be successful, in some ways. If you stay in your comfort zone! You would never do the things that you need to do.
quotes.author: Lights Poxlietner

quotes.quote: If you opt for a safe life, you will never know what it's like to win.
quotes.author: Richard Branson

quotes.quote: Don't let fear make your decisions for you.
quotes.author: Annette White

quotes.quote: You can choose courage or you can choose comfort. You cannot have both.
quotes.author: Brene Brown

quotes.quote: The best way to come out of our comfort zone is, not to create one.
quotes.author: Sukant Ratnakar

quotes.quote: The hardest thing to do is leaving your comfort zone. But you have to let go of the life you're familiar with and take the risk to live the life you dream about.
quotes.author: T. Arigo

quotes.quote: Before anything great is really achieved, your comfort zone must be disturbed.
quotes.author: Ray Lewis

quotes.quote: Resistance to change is very much governed by your comfort zone. Just because something is comfortable does not for a moment mean it’s what you want, or even good for you for that matter.
quotes.author: Robin H-C

quotes.quote: The comfort zone is the great enemy to creativity; moving beyond it necessitates intuition, which in turn configures new perspectives and conquers fears.
quotes.author: Dan Stevens

quotes.quote: Each time you try something for the first time you will grow-a little piece of the fear of the unknown is removed and replaced with a sense of empowerment.
quotes.author: Annette White

quotes.quote: Whenever you feel uncomfortable, instead of retreating back into your old comfort zone, pat yourself on the back and say, 'I must be growing,' and continue moving forward.
quotes.author: T. Harv Eker

quotes.quote: Inaction breeds doubt and fear. Action breeds confidence and courage. If you want to conquer fear, do not sit home and think about it. Go out and get busy.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: Being comfortable isn't the way to learn to expand your abilities.
quotes.author: Thomas Wellnowski

quotes.quote: Beauty is about being comfortable in your own skin. It's about knowing and accepting who you are.
quotes.author: Ellen DeGeneres

quotes.quote: Comfort is a stance of avoidance rather than the pursuit of excellence.
quotes.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quotes.quote: A comfortable, convenient life is not a real life - the more comfortable, the less alive. The most comfortable life is in the grave.
quotes.author: Rajneesh

quotes.quote: When we are comfortable and inattentive, we run the risk of committing grave injustices absentmindedly.
quotes.author: Chinua Achebe

quotes.quote: Don't get too comfortable with who you are at any given time - you may miss the opportunity to become who you want to be.
quotes.author: Jon Bon Jovi

quotes.quote: You have to be comfortable in the uncomfortableness.
quotes.author: A J Mclean

quotes.quote: When we are comfortable, we remain relaxed, however, when we see trouble coming, we take our active position
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: Humans are designed to seek comfort and order, and so if they have comfort and order, they tend to plant themselves, even if their comfort isn't all that comfortable. And even if they secretly want for something better.
quotes.author: Donald Miller

quotes.quote: Its important to be comfortable with uncertainty.
quotes.author: Xiaolu Guo

quotes.quote: Being comfortable with who you are is the ultimate threat.
quotes.author: Sean Beaudoin

quotes.quote: Don't get too comfortable with who you are at any given time--- you may miss the opportunity to become who you want to be.
quotes.author: Jon Bon Jovi

quotes.quote: A comfortable old age is the reward of a well-spent youth. Instead of its bringing sad and melancholy prospects of decay, it would give us hopes of eternal youth in a better world.
quotes.author: Maurice Chevalier

quotes.quote: Finding joy is probably tantamount to finding yourself and being comfortable in your own skin.
quotes.author: Morgan Freeman

quotes.quote: Comfort is no test of truth. Truth is often far from being comfortable.
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: Just be comfortable in your own skin. And that's how you can be the sexiest woman that you can possibly be.
quotes.author: Princess Tatiana of Greece and Denmark

quotes.quote: To be happy, it first takes being comfortable being in your own shoes. The rest can work up from there.
quotes.author: Sophia Bush

quotes.quote: Be comfortable; be you. What's most important is to understand what suits your body type and personality. Stick to that, and you can't go wrong!
quotes.author: Sonakshi Sinha

quotes.quote: A man cannot be comfortable without his own approval.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: When you become comfortable with uncertainty, infinite possibilities open up in your life.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: Life begins at the end of your comfort zone.
quotes.author: Neale Donald Walsch

quotes.quote: Comfort is not a goal that I seek, rather it is a place that I hide.
quotes.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quotes.quote: If you want to feel more comfortable and happy, work on making the people around you more comfortable and happy.
quotes.author: Kathy Freston

quotes.quote: We must become more comfortable with probability and uncertainty.
quotes.author: Nate Silver

quotes.quote: If you're comfortable in your own skin, you will feel beautiful - and look beautiful to others, too.
quotes.author: Adriana Lima

quotes.quote: Are you comfortable? That's good. But there is somewhere at least someone is uncomfortable! And this should somehow make you uncomfortable too! The world can be a better place only through this way, through thinking others!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Comfort is the enemy of achievement.Â
quotes.author: Farrah Gray

quotes.quote: The moment will arrive when you are comfortable with who you are, and what you areâ€“ bald or old or fat or poor, successful or struggling- when you don't feel the need to apologize for anything or to deny anything. To be comfortable in your own skin is the beginning of strength.
quotes.author: Charles B. Handy

quotes.quote: The more you seek the uncomfortable, the more you will become comfortable.
quotes.author: Conor McGregor

quotes.quote: Never feel comfortable where you're now, get stuck, complacent, and stagnate in one spot; be always relevant, dynamic, and multi gifted.
quotes.author: Assegid Habtewold

quotes.quote: When you're comfortable in your own skin, you look beautiful, regardless of any flaws.
quotes.author: Emily Deschanel

quotes.quote: Growth and comfort do not coexist.
quotes.author: Ginni Rometty

quotes.quote: Your comfort zone is not a place that you want to remain in. Dare, discover, be all that you can be.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: When you are comfortable in your own skin, you can be at peace anywhere.
quotes.author: Antsy McClain

quotes.quote: One way to get comfort is to plead the promise of God in prayer, show Him His handwriting; God is tender of His Word.
quotes.author: Thomas Manton

quotes.quote: A man cannot be made comfortable without his own approval.
quotes.author: Barbara Walters

quotes.quote: If you get comfortable, that's how you fall off.
quotes.author: G-Eazy

quotes.quote: God cares most not about making us comfortable, but about teaching us to hate our transgressions and to grow up spiritually to love him.
quotes.author: Joni Eareckson Tada

quotes.quote:
For a Comfortable Journey of Life,
Just Reduce the Luggage of Desires.
quotes.author: Ednan Ali

quotes.quote: Move out of your comfort zone. You can only grow if you are willing to feel awkward and uncomfortable when you try something new.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: When we get too comfortable, we stop dreaming.
quotes.author: Joyce Rachelle

quotes.quote: God is not sitting in heaven thinking about how to make you comfortable. Your comfort might actually be his least concern.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: The starting point of discovering who you are, your gifts, your talents, your dreams, is being comfortable with yourself. Spend time alone. Write in a journal. Take long walks in the woods.
quotes.author: Robin Sharma

quotes.quote: We cannot become what we want to be by remaining what we are.
quotes.author: Max Depree

quotes.quote: When you're comfortable, you're not necessarily inclined to care about things that are contributing to your comfort. It's difficult.
quotes.author: Alex Ebert

quotes.quote: Luxury must be comfortable, otherwise it is not luxury.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: Spiritual security means you are fully alive and comfortable in your life as it is, without expecting anything.
quotes.author: Dainin Katagiri

quotes.quote: I would rather be uncomfortable with the truth than to be lied to in comfort. That's just my nature.
quotes.author: Jesse Ventura

quotes.quote: Elegance and comfort are not incompatible, and whoever maintains the contrary simply doesn't know what he's talking about.
quotes.author: Salvatore Ferragamo

quotes.quote: Man is least himself when he talks in his own person. Give him a mask, and he will tell you the truth.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: The worst loneliness is not to be comfortable with yourself.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: One sits more comfortably on a colour that one likes.
quotes.author: Verner Panton

quotes.quote: You can't comfort the afflicted with afflicting the comfortable.
quotes.author: Princess Diana

quotes.quote: You can never be comfortable with your success, you've got to be paranoid you're going to lose it.
quotes.author: Lou Gerstner

quotes.quote: Get comfortable with being uncomfortable.
quotes.author: Jillian Michaels

quotes.quote: Your smile will give you a positive countenance that will make people feel comfortable around you.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: I can't really explain what it's like to be in love, but I feel like it's being comfortable. It's almost like having a best friend. It's a beautiful thing.
quotes.author: Ashton Irwin

quotes.quote: I believe in comforting the afflicted and afflicting the comfortable.
quotes.author: Halford Luccock

quotes.quote: The most important actions are never comfortable.
quotes.author: Timothy Ferriss

quotes.quote: I'm not comfortable holidaying in other people's poverty.
quotes.author: Beth Orton

quotes.quote: Teachers need to be comfortable talking about feelings.
quotes.author: Daniel Goleman

quotes.quote: God comforts the disturbed and disturbs the comfortable.
quotes.author: Shane Claiborne

quotes.quote: One sits uncomfortably on a too comfortable cushion.
quotes.author: Lillian Hellman

quotes.quote: Better a cruel truth than a comfortable delusion.
quotes.author: Edward Abbey

quotes.quote: Get comfortable with being alone. It will empower you.
quotes.author: Jonathan Tropper

quotes.quote: Being young is beautiful, but being old is comfortable.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: Mentally strong people are comfortable in their own skin.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: The thrill of coming home has never changed.
quotes.author: Guy Pearce

quotes.quote: It's nice to have some continuity you can come back to. I feel that in coming home, coming back to London.
quotes.author: Felicity Jones

quotes.quote: This is my idea of heaven, coming home and watching the news.
quotes.author: Rita Moreno

quotes.quote: Coming home to my family afterward makes the work richer, easier and more fun.
quotes.author: Edie Falco

quotes.quote: I am travelling half the year around the world, every year, so coming home is one of the most beautiful things.
quotes.author: Andre Rieu

quotes.quote: There's just no place like Scotland when the sun is out. I just love coming home.
quotes.author: Ashley Jensen

quotes.quote: There's nothing like coming home here, having the day off or morning off and going surfing. In Orlando I don't know what I would do.
quotes.author: Corbin Bernsen

quotes.quote: The thing about coming back to the Bay Area, it's like coming home for me.
quotes.author: Richard Serra

quotes.quote: There's been a lot of coming home in the early mornings after funny nights out, having bizarre sandwiches in bed.
quotes.author: Neneh Cherry

quotes.quote: There's nothing half so pleasant as coming home again.
quotes.author: Margaret Elizabeth Sangster

quotes.quote: It's a funny thing coming home. Nothing changes. Everything looks the same, feels the same, even smells the same. You realize what's changed, is you.
quotes.author: Eric Roth

quotes.quote: I love coming home, especially with a victory.
quotes.author: Dominic James

quotes.quote: It has been a long time. I am so glad to be coming back home.
quotes.author: Wang Zhizhi

quotes.quote: Maybe that's the best part of going away for a vacation-coming home again.
quotes.author: Madeleine L'Engle

quotes.quote: Coming home seemed to have started the healing process. No longer vivid and garish, the memories seemed to be covered in gossemer, fading behind a curtain of time and forgiveness.
quotes.author: Karen Fowler

quotes.quote: He was very, very excited about the idea of coming home and being with his wife and the baby.
quotes.author: Judy Taylor

quotes.quote: It's great he's coming home.
quotes.author: Glenn Howard

quotes.quote: I love coming home to my own home and husband and everything we have.
quotes.author: Allyson Darnell

quotes.quote: It is dismal coming home, when there is nobody to welcome one!
quotes.author: Ann Radcliffe

quotes.quote: Coming home from very lonely places, all of us go a little mad: whether from great personal success, or just an all-night drive, we are the sole survivors of a world no one else has ever seen.
quotes.author: John Le Carre

quotes.quote: Just keep coming home to yourself, you are the one who you've been waiting for.
quotes.author: Byron Katie

quotes.quote: It's very important to know that we packed it right because it is a safety issue for coming home.
quotes.author: Linda M. Godwin

quotes.quote: Coming into the place of Soul-awareness is coming home.
quotes.author: Ram Dass

quotes.quote: Going home must be like going to render an account.
quotes.author: Joseph Conrad

quotes.quote: Going home and spending time with your family and your real friends keeps you grounded.
