quotes.author: Jennifer Ellison

quotes.quote: The prospect of going home is very appealing.
quotes.author: David Ginola

quotes.quote: Not going home is already like death.
quotes.author: E. Catherine Tobler

quotes.quote: It feels great to be home, great to be back as a part of the community.
quotes.author: Brian Jordan

quotes.quote: I love coming home to somebody, I love being in a relationship.
quotes.author: Daniel Radcliffe

quotes.quote: I try to make my bed every day for mental health. Coming home to an unmade bed or a room with clothes all over will depress me.
quotes.author: David Alan Grier

quotes.quote: I kind of love coming home and being with family and feeling comfortable and knowing where I come from; I kind of like it.
quotes.author: Michael Angarano

quotes.quote: For me, going to London is like coming home. In fact, I've often entertained the idea of ending my days there.
quotes.author: Elaine Stritch

quotes.quote: When you live on the road, going home is a place to escape and just be with your family to unwind.
quotes.author: Jonathan Davis

quotes.quote: I'm happy going home early and working out and just being a mother and being a wife.
quotes.author: Kim Alexis

quotes.quote: I've had a splendid time and I feel that it marks an epoch in my life. But the best of it all was the coming home.
quotes.author: L. M. Montgomery

quotes.quote: When you've found the right one - when you see him, when you're with him - you'll feel like you're coming home.
quotes.author: Phyllis Reynolds Naylor

quotes.quote: Any time that we have time to take off, we love being home.
quotes.author: Mary-Kate Olsen

quotes.quote: There is nothing like staying at home for real comfort.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: Seek home for rest, for home is best.
quotes.author: Thomas Tusser

quotes.quote: You never know what events are going to transpire to get you home.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.quote: When I go home, its an easy way to be grounded. You learn to realize what truly matters.
quotes.author: Tony Stewart

quotes.quote: A man travels the world over in search of what he needs and returns home to find it.
quotes.author: George Moore

quotes.quote: You leave home to seek your fortune and, when you get it, you go home and share it with your family.
quotes.author: Anita Baker

quotes.quote: My only concern was to get home after a hard day's work.
quotes.author: Rosa Parks

quotes.quote: We have invented a new human right here - the right to return home after a war.
quotes.author: Paddy Ashdown

quotes.quote: Men dream more about coming home than about leaving.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: There are a thousand ways to kneel and kiss the ground; there are a thousand ways to go home again.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: But there is room now in my heart for more memories, carved by a letting go that I could find only by coming home to a place I'd never been.
quotes.author: Karen White

quotes.quote: It's risky in a marriage for a man to come home too late, but it can sometimes pose an even greater risk if he comes home too early.
quotes.author: Marcel Achard

quotes.quote: I always feel that when I come to Edinburgh, in many ways I am coming home.
quotes.author: Alan Rickman

quotes.quote: I don't know anybody who has so many places to go home to .
quotes.author: Tony Longo

quotes.quote: At every party, there are two kinds of people — those who want to go home and those who don't. The trouble is, they are usually married to each other
quotes.author: Ann Landers

quotes.quote: Home is where you come to when you have nothing better to do.
quotes.author: Margaret Thatcher

quotes.quote: What's the good of a home if you're never in it.
quotes.author: George Grossmith

quotes.quote: Now, at last, this sad, glittering century has an image worthy of it; a wandering, wondering girl, a silly Sloane turned secular saint, coming home in her coffin to RAF Northolt like the good soldier she was.
quotes.author: Julie Burchill

quotes.quote: Husband can't understand why wife ever complains about anything when she has his coming home in the evening to look forward to.
quotes.author: Kenneth B. Alley

quotes.quote: One road leads home and a thousand roads lead into the wilderness.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Historically, many immigrants, refugees, and exiles have been unable to return home. Yet, surprisingly in recent times, many people find they can return home again and they are doing so— to visit, to live temporarily, or to re establish a long term residence.
quotes.author: Lynellyn D. Long

quotes.quote: Throughout the world, immigrants and refugees are choosing to go home again and expanding their own resources to re-establish themselves in a former home even after having left many years earlier.
quotes.author: Lynellyn D. Long

quotes.quote: I'm coming home, I'm coming home / Tell the world I'm coming home / Let the rain wash away / All the pain of yesterday / I know my kingdom awaits / And they've forgiven my mistakes / I'm coming home, I'm coming home / Tell the world that I'm coming.
quotes.author: Shawn Carter

quotes.quote: Now I'm feeling something (yes I am) / Where I was missing something (yes I am) / I love coming home to you, baby / You know I'm coming home to you.
quotes.author: Mahid Al Maskati

quotes.quote: It's a long and lonely highway. / When you're traveling all alone. / I was on my way to nowhere. / But now I'm coming home. / I'm coming home.
quotes.author: Will Jennings

quotes.quote: I'm in the sky tonight / There I can keep by your side / Watching the wide world riot and hiding out / I'll be coming home next year.
quotes.author: Taylor Hawkins

quotes.quote: Oh, it's home again, and home again, America for me! / Our hearts are turning home again and there we long to be, / In our beautiful big country beyond the ocean bars, / Where the air is full of sunlight and the flag is full of stars.
quotes.author: Henry Van Dyke

quotes.quote: And so it seems like welcoming a friend-- / An old, old friend, upon his coming home / From some far country--coming home to spend / Long, loitering days with me.
quotes.author: James Whitcomb Riley

quotes.quote: Oh, it is good afar to roam, / And seek adventure in strange lands; / Yet oh, so good the coming home, / The velvet love of little hands.
quotes.author: Robert William Service

quotes.quote: I have always liked coming home and sharing what has happened that day with my loved ones. I like comparing notes. I know other people do, too. I think there is a human instinct to tell stories, no matter who you are or where you live.
quotes.author: Sarah Kay

quotes.quote: I love coming home, sleeping in my own bed, seeing my own family and friends again. It feels like a big comfort for me.
quotes.author: Amybeth Mcnulty

quotes.quote: At the end of the day, coming home to that one person that you know has your back, there's no better feeling.
quotes.author: Jonathan Scott

quotes.quote: Coming home to my family afterward makes the work richer, easier, and more fun.
quotes.author: Edie Falco

quotes.quote: Now I see that the journey was never meant to lead to some new and improved version of me; that it has always been about coming home to who I already am.
quotes.author: Katrina Kenison

quotes.quote: When you finally go back to your old home, you find it wasn't the old home you missed but your childhood.
quotes.author: Sam Ewing

quotes.quote: Well, it was a million tiny little things that, when you added them all up, they meant we were supposed to be together... and I knew it. I knew it the very first time I touched her. It was like coming home... only to no home, I'd ever known... I was just taking her hand to help her out of a car and I knew. It was like... magic.
quotes.author: Nora Ephron

quotes.quote: It’s a funny thing coming home. Nothing changes. Everything looks the same, feels the same, even smells the same. You realized what’s changed is you.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: I hate leaving home. I love what I do, but I'd love to go home every night.
quotes.author: Charlie Watts

quotes.quote: Let the wife make the husband glad to come home, and let him make her sorry to see him leave.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: No matter who you are or where you are, instinct tells you to go home.
quotes.author: Laura Marney

quotes.quote: I believe that all of our lives we're looking for home and if we're really lucky, we find it in someone’s loving arms. I think that’s what life is – coming home.
quotes.author: Anita Krizzan

quotes.quote: Youth is the best time to be rich; and the best time to be poor.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: They say that age is all in your mind. The trick is keeping it from creeping down into your body.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: It's all that the young can do for the old, to shock them and keep them up to date.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Until you're grown-up they send you to reform school. After you're grown-up they send you to the penitentiary.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: People are looking to have more meaning in their lives. It is a sign the technology community is coming of age.
quotes.author: John Doerr

quotes.quote: The best way to live your life is to go to the other side of the rainbow young, but at a very old age.
quotes.author: Craig D. Slovak

quotes.quote: As the fruit ripens, so does the man mature, after many rains, suns and blows.
quotes.author: Jose de las Luz y Caballero

quotes.quote: Age is a question of mind over matter. If you don't mind, it doesn't matter.
quotes.author: Leroy "Satchel" Paige

quotes.quote: The difference between men and boys is the price of their toys.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Time is a funny thing. You can go through it and meddle with it, but nothing can stay permanent. So even if everything so far had not happened, time would still have managed to find a way to make all this happen.
quotes.author: Erica Sehyun Song

quotes.quote: If you don't know where you're going, you'll end up somewhere else.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: We are always the same age inside.
quotes.author: Gertrude Stein

quotes.quote: Planning your own coming-of-age experience may wither you prematurely, but just think of it this way. If you can get through this, childbirth should be a breeze.
quotes.author: Mimi Pond

quotes.quote: Everyone's always scared for someone else's generation.
quotes.author: Holly Bourne

quotes.quote: Youth is a circumstance you can't do anything about. The trick is to grow up without getting old.
quotes.author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quotes.quote: A child becomes an adult when he realizes that he has a right not only to be right but also to be wrong.
quotes.author: Thomas Szasz

quotes.quote: A young man's ambition is to get along in the world and make a place for himselfâ€“half your life goes that way, till you're 45 or 50. Then, if you're lucky, you make terms with life, you get released.
quotes.author: Robert Penn Warren

quotes.quote: The mark of the immature man is that he wants to die nobly for a cause, while the mark of the mature man is that he wants to live humbly for one.
quotes.author: J.D. Salinger

quotes.quote: It's a tough world to find yourself in, but an even tougher one to be yourself in.
quotes.author: Chris Colfer

quotes.quote: Every age can be enchanting, provided you live within it.
quotes.author: Brigitte Bardot

quotes.quote: Forty is the old age of youth; fifty the youth of old age.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: When you become a teenager, you step onto a bridge. You may already be on it. The opposite shore is adulthood. Childhood lies behind. The bridge is made of wood. As you cross, it burns behind you.
quotes.author: GAIL CARSON LEVINE

quotes.quote: With adulthood comes responsibility.
quotes.author: Mary Lydon Simonsen

quotes.quote: You're a grown-up, and you get to decide what behaviors affect you for five minutes versus what behaviors change you as a person.
quotes.author: Kelly Williams Brown

quotes.quote: For some people, the transition to adulthood happens almost overnight.
quotes.author: Sean Dietrich

quotes.quote: The secret of a good old age is simply an honorable pact with solitude.
quotes.author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

quotes.quote: Youth was the time for happiness, its only season; young people, leading a lazy, carefree life, partially occupied by scarcely absorbing studies, were able to devote themselves unlimitedly to the liberated exultation of their bodies.
quotes.author: Michel Houellebecq

quotes.quote: Aging is not just decay, you know. It’s growth. It’s more than the negative that you’re going to die, it’s also the positive that you understand you’re going to die, and that you live a better life because of it.
quotes.author: Mitch Albom

quotes.quote: Embrace aging.
quotes.author: Mitch Albom

quotes.quote: But if we are truly happy inside, then age brings with it a maturity, a depth, and a power that only magnifies our radiance.
quotes.author: David Deida

quotes.quote: We should have taken our chances back then, when we were young and beautiful and didn't even know it.
quotes.author: Lois McMaster Bujold

quotes.quote: The maturing of a woman who has continued to grow is a beautiful thing to behold.
quotes.author: Naomi Wolf

quotes.quote: a life can change in a tenth of a second or sometimes it can take 70 years.
quotes.author: Charles Bukowski

quotes.quote: Adult isn't a noun; it's a verb. It's the act of making correctly those small decisions that fill our day. It is something that you can practice and that can be done in concrete steps.
quotes.author: Kelly Williams Brown

quotes.quote: And in the last decade what had seemed normal and irreversible aging decline has, in fact, been reversed with changes in diet, exercise, lifestyle, and environment.
quotes.author: Betty Friedan

quotes.quote: We seem just now to live in a period of human history when both the rate and/or manifestations of aging are undergoing marked and rapid changes.
quotes.author: Betty Friedan

quotes.quote: My coming of age was in the '70s. A lot of people look back on it as a grim decade, but I look back on it as a liberating time.
quotes.author: Boy George

quotes.quote: The nicest thing about coming of age is that I can do whatever I like.
quotes.author: Cilla Black

quotes.quote: There's something unique about coming of age in 2015 with the way the world is.
quotes.author: Max Joseph

quotes.quote: There is a time for everything - a time for being born and a time for coming of age. There is a time for death, too.
quotes.author: Barbara Bel Geddes

quotes.quote: There is a time for everything - a time for being born and a time for coming of age. There is a time for death, too.
quotes.author: Barbara Bel Geddes

quotes.quote: I would definitely write to the kid that I was before, to embrace the moment. I think that often times when you're coming of age or growing up you look forward and you work really hard instead of sitting back and relaxing and enjoying the moment.
quotes.author: Sean Mackin

quotes.quote: These are the pieces of my youth, the small secrets and the not-so-great expectations that defined my coming of age.
quotes.author: Tablo

quotes.quote: Women were also urged to work on a mysterious quality called 'fascination.' Coming of age in the 1920's was a competitive business.
quotes.author: Susan Cain

quotes.quote: The coming-of-age story has sort of become a joke. It's something to capitalize on, and that is painful because when you are coming of age - when you are going through something like that - the genre is so meaningful.
quotes.author: Mae Whitman

quotes.quote: In my coming-of-age time, there was no internet, no social networking, nothing. It was just show after show, hoping one day somebody would notice you.
quotes.author: Madonna Ciccone

quotes.quote: Planning your own coming-of-age experience may wither you prematurely, but just think of it this way: If you can get through this, childbirth should be a breeze.
quotes.author: Mimi Pond

quotes.quote: The convention of the coming-of-age story and the love story were literally abandoned - because they had to be - and a new kind of coming-of-age and love story emerged that required a different kind of telling the story.
quotes.author: Lidia Yuknavitch

quotes.quote: With age comes wisdom, but sometimes age comes alone.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Age is an issue of mind over matter. If you don't mind it, it doesn't matter.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: WittyÂ remarksÂ are all very well when spoken at a proper time: when out of place they are offensive.
quotes.author: Phaedrus

quotes.quote: FamousÂ remarksÂ are very seldom quoted correctly.
quotes.author: Simeon Strunsky

quotes.quote: AÂ remarkÂ generally hurts in proportion to its truth.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: It's very easy to listen to oneÂ commentÂ and make a snap judgment.
quotes.author: Heather Dubrow

quotes.quote: Everyone makes their own comments. That's how rumors get started.
quotes.author: Venus Williams

quotes.quote: Genuinely goodÂ remarksÂ surprise their author as well as his audience.
quotes.author: Joseph Joubert

quotes.quote: The proper use ofÂ comments is to compensate for our failure to express ourself in code.
quotes.author: Robert Cecil Martin

quotes.quote: There are remarks that sow and remarks that reap.
quotes.author: Ludwig Wittgenstein

quotes.quote: RemarksÂ are not literature.
quotes.author: Gertrude Stein

quotes.quote: MostÂ remarksÂ that are worth making are commonplaceÂ remarks. The things that makes them worth saying is that we really mean them.
quotes.author: Robert Staughton Lynd

quotes.quote: ObsoleteÂ comments are worse than noÂ comments.
quotes.author: Douglas Crockford

quotes.quote: NoÂ comment is aÂ comment.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: Comments are free but facts are sacred.
quotes.author: C. P. Scott

quotes.quote: Never make negative comments or spread rumors about anyone. It depreciates their reputation and yours.
quotes.author: Brian Koslow

quotes.quote: One often makes aÂ remarkÂ and only later sees how true it is.
quotes.author: Ludwig Wittgenstein

quotes.quote: CriticalÂ remarksÂ are only made by people who love you.
quotes.author: Federico Mayor

quotes.quote: A beautiful verse, an aptÂ remark, or a well-turned phrase, appropriately quoted, is always effective and charming.
quotes.author: Marie de Vichy-Chamrond

quotes.quote: Commitment is what transforms a promise into reality.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Commitment leads to action. Action brings your dream closer.
quotes.author: Marcia Wieder

quotes.quote: It was character that got us out of bed, commitment that moved us into action, and discipline that enabled us to follow through.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Commitment means that it is possible for a man to yield the nerve center of his consent to a purpose or cause, a movement or an ideal, which may be more important to him than whether he lives or dies.
quotes.author: Howard Thurman

quotes.quote: A man who won't die for something is not fit to live.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: Any activity becomes creative when the doer cares about doing it right, or doing it better.
quotes.author: John Updike

quotes.quote: Anyone can dabble, but once you've made that commitment, your blood has that particular thing in it, and it's very hard for people to stop you.
quotes.author: Bill Cosby

quotes.quote: Commitment unlocks the doors of imagination, allows vision, and gives us the right stuff to turn our dreams into reality
quotes.author: James Womack

quotes.quote: Stay committed to your decisions, but stay flexible in your approach.
quotes.author: Tom Robbins

quotes.quote: An ounce of performance is worth pounds of promises.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: Unless commitment is made, there are only promises and hopes; but no plans.
quotes.author: Peter F. Drucker

quotes.quote: The quality of a person's life is in direct proportion to their commitment to excellence, regardless of their chosen field of endeavor.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: We have to recognise that there cannot be relationships unless there is commitment, unless there is loyalty, unless there is love, patience, persistence.
quotes.author: Cornel West

quotes.quote: If you build the guts to do something, anything, then you better save enough to face the consequences.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: Freedom is not the absence of commitments, but the ability to choose - and commit myself to - what is best for me.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: There are a hundred valid reasons why something can't be done, but only one reason, Commitment, why it can.
quotes.author: Jonathan Lockwood Huie

quotes.quote: You need to make a commitment, and once you make it, then life will give you some answers.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Never give up, for that is just the place and time that the tide will turn.
quotes.author: Harriet Beecher Stowe

quotes.quote: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: The relationship between commitment and doubt is by no means an antagonistic one. Commitment is healthiest when it is not without doubt but in spite of doubt.
quotes.author: Rollo May

quotes.quote: If you make the unconditional commitment to reach your most important goals, if the strength of your decision is sufficient, you will find the way and the power to achieve your goals.
quotes.author: Robert Conklin

quotes.quote: If your energy is as boundless as your ambition, total commitment may be a way of life you should seriously consider.
quotes.author: Joyce Brothers

quotes.quote: It takes a deep commitment to change and an even deeper commitment to grow.
quotes.author: Ralph Ellison

quotes.quote: The only limit to your impact is your imagination and commitment.
quotes.author: Anthony Robbins

quotes.quote: He who is most slow in making a promise is the most faithful in performance of it.
quotes.author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

quotes.quote: There's a difference between interest and commitment. When you're interested in doing something, you do it only when circumstance permit. When you're committed to something, you accept no excuses, only results.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Commitment turns a promise into reality with words that speak boldly of your intentions and actions that speak louder than words.
quotes.author: Steve Brunkhorst

quotes.quote: The best way to predict the future is to invent it.
quotes.author: Alan Kay

quotes.quote: Only one who devotes himself to a cause with his whole strength and soul can be a true master. For this reason mastery demands all of a person.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: A promise must never be broken.
quotes.author: Alexander Hamilton

quotes.quote: You can do anything you decide to do. You can act to change and control your life; and the procedure, the process, is its own reward.
quotes.author: Amelia Earhart

quotes.quote: The men who have succeeded are men who have chosen one line and stuck to it.
quotes.author: Andrew Carnegie

quotes.quote: There's a difference between knowing the path and walking the path.
quotes.author: Morpheus, The Matrix

quotes.quote: Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed people can change the world. Indeed, it is the only thing that ever has.
quotes.author: Margaret Mead

quotes.quote: Commitment is the enemy of resistance, for it is the serious promise to press on, to get up, no matter how many times you are knocked down.
quotes.author: David McNally

quotes.quote: You always have two choices: your commitment versus your fear.
quotes.author: Sammy Davis, Jr.

quotes.quote: Encourage your people to be committed to a project rather than just be involved in it.
quotes.author: Richard Pratt

quotes.quote: The successful person makes a habit of doing what the failing person doesn't like to do.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.quote: Genius is 1% inspiration and 99% perspiration. Accordingly a genius is often merely a talented person who has done all of his or her homework.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.quote: In the realm of ideas, everything depends on enthusiasm - in the real world all rests on perseverance.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Long shots do come in and hard work, dedication and perseverance will overcome almost any prejudice and open almost any door.
quotes.author: John H. Johnson

quotes.quote: Resolve that whatever you do, you will bring the whole man to it; that you will fling the whole weight of your being into it.
quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.quote: The loftiest edifices need the deepest foundations.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.quote: Never let a day pass that you will have cause to say, I will do better tomorrow.
quotes.author: Brigham Young

quotes.quote: The probability that we may fail in struggle ought not to deter us from the support of a cause we believe to be just.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: The successful person has the habit of doing the things failures don't like to do. They don't like doing them either necessarily. But their disliking is subordinated to the strength of their purpose.
quotes.author: E. M. Gray

quotes.quote: There are only two options regarding commitment. You're either in or out. There's no such thing as a life in-between.
quotes.author: Pat Riley

quotes.quote: There's no scarcity of opportunity to make a living at what you love. There is only a scarcity of resolve to make it happen.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: The most powerful weapon on earth is the human soul on fire.
quotes.author: Ferdinand Foch

quotes.quote: Man is not committed in detail by his biological constitution to any particular variety of behavior.
quotes.author: Ruth Benedict

quotes.quote: There is hardly a mistake which in the course of our lives we have committed, but some proverb, had we known and attended to its lesson, might have saved us from it.
quotes.author: Richard Chenevix Trench

quotes.quote: It takes a deep commitment to change and an even deeper commitment to grow.
quotes.author: Ralph Ellison

quotes.quote: We must be fully committed, but we must also be aware at the same time that we might possibly be wrong. People who claim to be absolutely convinced that their stand is the only right one... is a dead giveaway of unconscious doubt. Commitment is healthiest when it is not without doubt, but in spite of doubt.
quotes.author: Rollo May

quotes.quote: He who truly believes that which prompts him to an action has looked upon the action to lust after it, he has committed it already in his heart.
quotes.author: William Kingdon Clifford

quotes.quote: You have to be committed or you fall behind, lose out.
quotes.author: Crystal Gayle

quotes.quote: Commitment to an idea that has the power to transform you personally in any way is a vision worth nurturing. The bottom line is,you need to remain committed to a vision long enough to see it vome to fruition.
quotes.author: Caroline Myss

quotes.quote: If you love something and if you're committed and diligent â€“ the things happen!
quotes.author: Lauryn Hill

quotes.quote: More faults are often committed while we are trying to oblige than while we are giving offense.
quotes.author: Tacitus

quotes.quote: The only limit to your impact is your imagination and commitment.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: To reach levels of success you've never reached before, you must be committed at a level you've never been committed at before.
quotes.author: Hal Elrod

quotes.quote: After a while, if you're committed, you start to believe in the things in which you're praying. It's just cognitive dissonance. You can't live a completely religious life and not start to have it sink in.
quotes.author: A. J. Jacobs

quotes.quote: Success in business isn't about being right; it's about being committed.
quotes.author: Mike Michalowicz

quotes.quote: Your man wants to know that there's nothing you wouldn't do for him - if that's your committed relationship.
quotes.author: Karrine Steffans

quotes.quote: It's hard to stay committed when our heart isn't in it.
quotes.author: Deborah Day

quotes.quote: Stay committed in your decisions, but stay flexible in your approach.
quotes.author: Tom Robbins

quotes.quote: We are not committed to this or that. We are committed to the nothing in-between, whether we know it or not.
quotes.author: John Cage

quotes.quote: The moment that you impose your will on another person or animal, that's when we are allowed to say you have committed an ethical breach.
quotes.author: Moby

quotes.quote: You can be committed to somebody because of ego: 'I said I was going to be with this joker for the rest of my life, so I'm just going to do it.' Or you can be committed because you have a deeply rooted connection.
quotes.author: Jada Pinkett Smith

quotes.quote: When you're committed to something, you accept no excuses, only results.
quotes.author: Kenneth H. Blanchard

quotes.quote: You are committed to what you confess.
quotes.author: Edwin Louis Cole

quotes.quote: One can be committed to conformity or one can be committed to truth, but not both.
quotes.author: George H. Smith

quotes.quote: A leader's job is to develop committed followers. Bad leaders destroy their followers' sense of commitment.
quotes.author: Dean Smith

quotes.quote: There's always a way - if you're committed.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: People don't really know whether they are committed to something until they face adversity.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: To act is to be committed, and to be committed is to be in danger.
quotes.author: James A. Baldwin

quotes.quote: Many great actions are committed in small struggles.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: When you are fundamentally committed to something that is right, you just decide to go down fighting. Period.
quotes.author: Cornel West

quotes.quote: Success tends to bless those who are most committed to giving it the most attention.
quotes.author: Grant Cardone

quotes.quote: Anyone can quit, but it takes a strong, committed person not to quit when times are tough.
quotes.author: Pat Summitt

quotes.quote: You have to be very committed and find happiness in the work that you do.
quotes.author: Zoe Saldana

quotes.quote: Many who are committed to reason and science have turned against religion altogether and treat it with fear and contempt.
quotes.author: Allen W. Wood

quotes.quote: The way you can recognize to what you are committed to is by your actual results. What you have gotten in life is a direct result (good or bad) to what you have been committed to.
quotes.author: John Phillips

quotes.quote: If you're in a committed relationship, then you don't want to pursue anything.
quotes.author: Andrew W.K.

quotes.quote: Little movements of communities of ordinary radicals are committed to doing small things with great love.
quotes.author: Shane Claiborne

quotes.quote: Knowledge is a commodity to be shared. For knowledge to pay dividends, it should not remain the monopoly of the selected few.
quotes.author: Moutasem Algharati

quotes.quote: Commodities such as gold and silver have a world market that transcends national borders, politics, religions, and race. A person may not like someone else's religion, but he'll accept his gold.
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.quote: We abuse land because we regard it as a commodity belonging to us. When we see land as a community to which we belong, we may begin to use it with love and respect.
quotes.author: Aldo Leopold

quotes.quote: Common sense is one of the most unused commodities available to man.
quotes.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quotes.quote: The price of a commodity will never go to zero. When you invest in commodities futures, you're not buying a piece of paper that says you own an intangible piece of company that can go bankrupt.
quotes.author: Jim Rogers

quotes.quote: A commodity appears at first sight an extremely obvious, trivial thing. But its analysis brings out that it is a very strange thing, abounding in metaphysical subtleties and theological niceties
quotes.author: Karl Marx

quotes.quote: Truth, meanwhile, was a weapon that even a damaged fist could still grasp and wield. It was a remarkably versatile commodity; it could be traded, or help serve an end, or produce a profit
quotes.author: Mark Allen Smith

quotes.quote: A wise man does not waste so good a commodity as lying for naught.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Economy is the basis of society. When the economy is stable, society develops. The ideal economy combines the spiritual and the material, and the best commodities to trade in are sincerity and love.
quotes.author: Morihei Ueshiba

quotes.quote: Truth is commodity in political consumption.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: Today the order of life allows no room for the ego to draw spiritual or intellectual conclusions. The thought which leads to knowledge is neutralized and used as a mere qualification on specific labor markets and to heighten to commodity value of the personality.
quotes.author: Theodor Adorno

quotes.quote: Mystery is a commodity for society that willing to buy it.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: The brain is a commodity used to fertilize ideas.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Low price is a great way to sell a commodity. That's not marketing though, that's efficiency.
quotes.author: Seth Godin

quotes.quote: Teaching may be compared to selling commodities. No one can sell unless somebody buys.
quotes.author: John Dewey

quotes.quote: What I've learned is that the most precious commodity you can have in a relationship is honesty, good or bad.
quotes.author: Michael Ealy

quotes.quote: Public humiliation is a commodity and shame is an industry.
quotes.author: Monica Lewinsky

quotes.quote: When a nation is over-reliant on one or two commodities like oil or precious minerals, corrupt government ministers and their dodgy associates hoard profits and taxes instead of properly allocating them to schools and hospitals.
quotes.author: Bono

quotes.quote: The object of the law of value is to elucidate the actual exchange relations of commodities.
quotes.author: Fatih Birol

quotes.quote: The Nordic countries are leading the way on women's equality, recognizing women as equal citizens rather than commodities for sale.
quotes.author: Johanna Siguroardottir

quotes.quote: Let's embrace productive capitalism, not casino capitalism, by restoring transparency and true competition in the commodities markets.
quotes.author: Maria Cantwell

quotes.quote: Marriage is the commodification of affection, copulation, and, reproduction.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: The object of the law of value is to elucidate the actual exchange relations of commodities.
quotes.author: Rudolf Hilferding

quotes.quote: The truth is precious commodity, not everyone will possess her.
quotes.author: TemitOpe Ibrahim

quotes.quote: Knowledge is not simply another commodity. On the contrary. Knowledge is never used up. It increases by diffusion and grows by dispersion.
quotes.author: Daniel J. Boorstin

quotes.quote: Quality, quality, quality: never waver from it, even when you don't see how you can afford to keep it up. When you compromise, you become a commodity and then you die
quotes.author: Gary Hirshberg

quotes.quote: Bitcoin isn't tied to any commodity - besides trust.
quotes.author: Paul Ford

quotes.quote: Competence is no longer a scarce commodity.
quotes.author: Seth Godin

quotes.quote: Authenticity is your most precious commodity as a leader.
quotes.author: Marcus Buckingham

quotes.quote: Fear is the most valuable commodity in the universe.
quotes.author: Max Brooks

quotes.quote: It is common sense to take a method and try it. If it fails, admit it frankly and try another, but above all try something.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Common sense is calculation applied to life.
quotes.author: Henri Fr_d_ric Amiel

quotes.quote: Common sense is in spite of, not as the result of education.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Common sense is the ability to see things as they are without prejudice and do things as they ought to be done without influence of any kind.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.quote: Common sense is an instinct given to man and enough of it is genius. Smartness is measured by the level of common sense one has, not by how much educated or knowledgeable he is.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.quote: Common sense in an uncommon degree is what the world calls wisdom.
quotes.author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quotes.quote: Common sense and nature will do a lot to make the pilgrimage of life not too difficult.
quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: Common sense hides shame.
quotes.author: Gaelic Proverb

quotes.quote: Common sense is genius dressed in its working clothes.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Common sense is the collection of prejudices acquired by age eighteen.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Believe nothing, no matter where you read it, or who said it, no matter if I have said it, unless it agrees with your own reason and your own common sense.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: It is a thousand times better to have common sense without education than to have education without common sense.
quotes.author: Robert Green

quotes.quote: Common sense is strengthened by joy.
quotes.author: Rebbe Nachman Of Breslov

quotes.quote: Common sense is the knack of seeing things as they are, and doing things as they ought to be done.
quotes.author: Harriet Beecher Stowe

quotes.quote: The philosophy of one century is the common sense of the next.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: Common sense is the foundation of all authorities, of the laws themselves, and of their construction.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: Common sense and a sense of humor are the same thing, moving atdifferent speeds. A sense of humor is just common sense, dancing.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: Common sense, alas in spite of our educational institutions, is a rare commodity.
quotes.author: Christian Nestell Bovee

quotes.quote: Common sense is instinct. Enough of it is genius.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Common sense is that which judges the things given to it by other senses.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: A handful of common sense is worth a bushel of learning.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: When unsure how to solve a problem, use your common sense.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Nothing is more fairly distributed than common sense; no one thinks he needs more of it than he already had.
quotes.author: Descartes

quotes.quote: No one tests the depth of a river with both feet.
quotes.author: Ashanti Proverb

quotes.quote: Stupid is forever, ignorance can be fixed.
quotes.author: Don Wood

quotes.quote: Everybody gets so much information all day long that they lose their common sense.
quotes.author: Gertrude Stein

quotes.quote: Nothing astonishes men so much as common sense and plain dealing.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: One pound of learning requires ten pounds of common sense to apply it.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: He who does not have common sense at age thirty will never have it.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: The voice of the Lord is the voice of common sense, which is shared by all that is.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.quote: Because you can't argue with all the fools in the world. It's easier to let them have their way, then trick them when they're not paying attention.
quotes.author: Christopher Paolini

quotes.quote: Common sense is compelled to make its way without the enthusiasm of anyone.
quotes.author: Ed Howe

quotes.quote: Faith is believing in things when common sense tells you not to.
quotes.author: George Seaton

quotes.quote: Nice people with common sense do not make interesting characters. They only make good former spouses.
quotes.author: Isabel Allende

quotes.quote: Philosophy is common sense with big words.
quotes.author: James Madison

quotes.quote: In any war, the first casualty is common sense, and the second is free and open discussion.
quotes.author: James Reston

quotes.quote: Vanity can easily overtake wisdom. It usually overtakes common sense.
quotes.author: Julian Casablancas

quotes.quote: Nowadays most people die of a sort of creeping common sense and discover when it is too late that the only things one never regrets are one's mistakes.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Success is not a matter of mastering subtle, sophisticated theory but rather of embracing common sense with uncommon levels of discipline and persistence.
quotes.author: Patrick Lencioni

quotes.quote: Society is always taken by surprise at any new example of common sense.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Nothing astonishes men so much as common sense and plain dealing.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Learning to let go should be learned before learning to get. Life should be touched, not strangled. You’ve got to relax, let it happen at times, and at others move forward with it.
quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

quotes.quote: Common sense is the most widely shared commodity in the world, for every man is convinced that he is well supplied with it.
quotes.author: Rene Descartes

quotes.quote: Common sense is the most fairly distributed thing in the world, for each one thinks he is so well-endowed with it that even those who are hardest to satisfy in all other matters are not in the habit of desiring more of it than they already have.
quotes.author: Rene Descartes

quotes.quote: It is a thousand times better to have common sense without education than to have education without common sense.
quotes.author: Robert Green Ingersoll

quotes.quote: If a man has common sense, he has all the sense there is.
quotes.author: Sam Rayburn

quotes.quote: The most confused you will ever get is when you try to convince your heart and spirit of something your mind knows is a lie.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: The three great essentials to achieve anything worthwhile are, first, hard work second, stick-to-itiveness third common sense.
quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.quote: The truth, in the long run, is only common sense clarified.
quotes.author: Thomas H. Huxley

quotes.quote: Common sense would suggest that having ability, like being smart, inspires confidence. It does, but only while the going is easy. The deciding factor in life is how you handle setbacks and challenges. People with a growth mindset welcome setbacks with open arms.
quotes.author: Travis Bradberry

quotes.quote: The cradle rocks above an abyss, and common sense tells us that our existence is but a brief crack of light between two eternities of darkness.
quotes.author: Vladimir Nabokov

quotes.quote: The genius of a good leader is to leave behind him a situation which common sense, without the grace of genius, can deal with successfully.
quotes.author: Walter Lippmann

quotes.quote: Common sense ain't common.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: Better to shun the bait than struggle in the snare.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: Wise men speak because they have something to say; Fools because they have to say something.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: The single biggest problem in communication is the illusion that it has taken place.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: To effectively communicate, we must realize that we are all different in the way we perceive the world and use this understanding as a guide to our communication with others.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: You can talk with someone for years, everyday, and still, it won't mean as much as what you can have when you sit in front of someone, not saying a word, yet you feel that person with your heart, you feel like you have known the person for forever.... connections are made with the heart, not the tongue.
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.quote: The most important thing in communication is hearing what isn't being said. The art of reading between the lines is a life long quest of the wise.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: Be silent, or say something better than silence
quotes.author: Pythagoras

quotes.quote: Good communication is as stimulating as black coffee, and just as hard to sleep after.
quotes.author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quotes.quote: Communication is the solvent of all problems and is the foundation for personal development.
quotes.author: Peter Shepherd

quotes.quote: A good listener is not only popular everywhere, but after a while he knows something.
quotes.author: Wilson Mizner

quotes.quote: The most important thing in communication is hearing what isn't said.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: Who you are is speaking so loudly that I can't hear what you're saying.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Half the world is composed of people who have something to say and can't, and the other half who have nothing to say and keep on saying it.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: The tongue is the only instrument that gets sharper with use.
quotes.author: Washington Irving

quotes.quote: The right word may be effective, but no word was ever as effective as a rightly timed pause.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Don't use words too big for the subject. Don't say infinitely when you mean very; otherwise you'll have no word left when you want to talk about something really infinite.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: When the trust account is high, communication is easy, instant, and effective.
quotes.author: Stephen R. Covey

quotes.quote: Precision of communication is important, more important than ever, in our era of hair trigger balances, when a false or misunderstood word may create as much disaster as a sudden thoughtless act.
quotes.author: James Thurber

quotes.quote: If you have nothing to say, say nothing.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: You can have brilliant ideas, but if you can't get them across, your ideas won't get you anywhere.
quotes.author: Lee Iacocca

quotes.quote: Communicate unto the other person that which you would want him to communicate unto you if your positions were reversed.
quotes.author: Aaron Goldman

quotes.quote: Many can argue - not many converse.
quotes.author: A. Bronson Alcott

quotes.quote: We never listen when we are eager to speak.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: Nothing lowers the level of conversation more than raising the voice.
quotes.author: Stanley Horowitz

quotes.quote: Talk sense to a fool and he calls you foolish.
quotes.author: Euripedes

quotes.quote: Think like a wise man but communicate in the language of the people.
quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

quotes.quote: We have two ears and one mouth so that we can listen twice as much as we speak.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: Write to be understood, speak to be heard, read to grow
quotes.author: Lawrence Clark Powell

quotes.quote: Communication works for those who work at it.
quotes.author: John Powell

quotes.quote: The two words 'information' and 'communication' are often used interchangeably, but they signify quite different things. Information is giving out; communication is getting through.
quotes.author: Sydney J. Harris

quotes.quote: There is no pleasure to me without communication: there is not so much as a sprightly thought comes into my mind that it does not grieve me to have produced alone, and that I have no one to tell it to
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: You never know when a moment and a few sincere words can have an impact on a life
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: I speak to everyone in the same way, whether he is the garbage man or the president of the university.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Be sincere; be brief; be seated.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: For effective communication think about how your speech is perceived than in what you are actually saying.
quotes.author: Byron Rivers

quotes.quote: We take communication for granted because we do it so frequently, but it's actually a complex process.
quotes.author: Joseph Sommerville

quotes.quote: Effective communication is 20% what you know and 80% how you feel about what you know.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Communication is a skill that you can learn. It's like riding a bicycle or typing. If you're willing to work at it, you can rapidly improve the quality of every part of your life.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: To have much learning, to be skillful in handicraft, well-trained in discipline, and to be of good speech -- this is the greatest blessing.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: I cannot speak well enough to be unintelligible.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: Communication - the human connection - is the key to personal and career success.
quotes.author: Paul J. Meyer

quotes.quote: In the last analysis, what we are communicates far more eloquently than anything we say or do.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: Communication leads to community, that is, to understanding, intimacy and mutual valuing
quotes.author: Rollo May

quotes.quote: The art of communication is the language of leadership.
quotes.author: James Humes

quotes.quote: Communication - the human connection--is the key to personal and career success.
quotes.author: Paul J. Meyer

quotes.quote: Think first. Talk less. Start today.
quotes.author: Charles Swindoll

quotes.quote: Your ability to communicate is an important tool in your pursuit of your goals, whether it is with your family, your co-workers or your clients and customers.
quotes.author: Lee Brown

quotes.quote: Happiness comes when your work and words are of benefit to yourself and others.
quotes.author: Jack Kornfield

quotes.quote: When we speak, in gestures or signs, we fashion a real object in the world; the gesture is seen, the words and the song are heard. The arts are simply a kind of writing, which, in one way or another, fixes words or gestures, and gives body to the invisible.
quotes.author: Alain

quotes.quote: If you can talk about it, why paint it?
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: Communication is the soul of management: analysis and solid decisions translated into clear messages that influence people to act and feel good about their performance.
quotes.author: Dianna Booher

quotes.quote: Communication makes the top three in many list today. The most important in happy marriages. The most essential element in raising well-adjusted teens. The most vital skill in job-interviewing success. The greatest problem voiced by political parties in gaining support for their candidate.
quotes.author: Dianna Booher

quotes.quote: Communication is the core of leadership: clear messages that inspire people to act.
quotes.author: Dianna Booher

quotes.quote: Communication skills in our everyday lives and relationships create the difference between misery and defeat or success.
quotes.author: Dianna Booher

quotes.quote: Small talk means having a little loose change in your pocket. Like quarters at a pay phone, dimes at a gum dispenser, or dollars at a toll booth. It'll come in handy when you least expect it. When it comes to small talk, know when to jiggle it, spend it, or save it.
quotes.author: Dianna Booher

quotes.quote: Communication breakdown / See us standing on the other side / Communication breakdown / Our heads up high - united for the fight
quotes.author: Arvid Zemke

quotes.quote: Communication is the key to life / Communication is the key to love / Communication is the key to us
quotes.author: Dallas Austin

quotes.quote: Affinity and communication / That is reality / Understanding is the first thing / It means so much to me
quotes.author: Van Morrison

quotes.quote: Communication is hard to establish / When things like a state of mind get in the way
quotes.author: Allan Joseph Mccarthy

quotes.quote: Communication is more than just words / communication is architecture / Because of course it is quite obvious that a house which would be built without that / Will that desire to communicate, would not look the way your house looks today
quotes.author: Nora Patterson

quotes.quote: Communication is a skill you must acquire / it will help you through your life, it is essential
quotes.author: Cathal Joseph Smyth

quotes.quote: Communication is the key to our happiness / If we just talk about it / Maybe we can make some sense
quotes.author: Alfred C. Antoine

quotes.quote: Communication is never simple / Especially when it's you that's on the receiving end / As memories start to fade
quotes.author: Victoria Hesketh

quotes.quote: Communication is the transfer of emotion.
quotes.author: Seth Godin

quotes.quote: Communication goes beyond the words we choose.
quotes.author: Tony Jeary

quotes.quote: Communication is so much better when people are vulnerable.
quotes.author: A. J. McLean

quotes.quote: Good communication is the bridge between confusion and clarity.
quotes.author: Nat Turner

quotes.quote: Silence is a form of communication, too. Sometimes less is more.
quotes.author: Pat Summitt

quotes.quote: Communication must become total and conscious before we can stop it.
quotes.author: William S. Burroughs

quotes.quote: Communication is about being effective, not always about being proper.
quotes.author: Bo Bennett

quotes.quote: If you think communication is all talking, you haven't been listening.
quotes.author: Ashleigh Brilliant

quotes.quote: True communication is communion- the realization of oneness, which is love.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: Communication is at the very core of our society. That's what makes us human.
quotes.author: Jan Koum

quotes.quote: My belief is that communication is the best way to create strong relationships.
quotes.author: Jada Pinkett Smith

quotes.quote: Never mind your intentions. Communication is about what others hear with your words.
quotes.author: Dianna Booher

quotes.quote: Communication is mutual feeling with someone, not a didactic process of information.
quotes.author: Robert Creeley

quotes.quote: Communication is something so simple and difficult that we can never put it in simple words.
quotes.author: T.S. Mathews

quotes.quote: Understanding comes through communication, and through communication we find the way to peace.
quotes.author: Ralph C. Smedley

quotes.quote: Honest communication is built on truth and integrity and upon respect of the one for the other.
quotes.author: Benjamin E. Mays

quotes.quote: Art is a technique of communication. The image is the most complete technique of all communication.
quotes.author: Claes Oldenburg

quotes.quote: For faithful Catholics, communion is not just a nice ritual: It is the body and blood of Jesus Christ, and the ultimate sign of our willingness to be incorporated into the church.
quotes.author: Maggie Gallagher

quotes.quote: As temples of the Holy Spirit. we should have communion with the Holy Spirit. The work of any believer is not only the work of a human individual, but is actually the work of the Holy Spirit.
quotes.author: Pope Shenouda III of Alexandria

quotes.quote: In life eternal, there is perfect joy and light, without pain or torture, and there is communion with God Himself and His angels.
quotes.author: Jan Hus

quotes.quote: The Christian who walks with the Lord and keeps constant communion with Him will see many reason for rejoicing and thanksgiving all day long.
quotes.author: Warren Wiersbe

quotes.quote: Living communion with God in which He is real, alive, fresh, and present to your soul energizes a God-centered life.
quotes.author: Colin S. Smith

quotes.quote: If someone knows from experience that daily Communion increases fervor without lessening reverence, then let him go every day. But if someone finds that reverence is lessened and devotion not much increased, then let him sometimes abstain, so as to draw near afterwards with better dispositions.
quotes.author: St. Thomas Aquinas

quotes.quote: When we have been to Holy Communion, the balm of love envelops the soul as the flower envelops the bee.
quotes.author: John Vianney

quotes.quote: Communion is as necessary for us to sustain our Christian vitality, as the vision of God is necessary to the angels, to maintain their life of glory.
quotes.author: Peter Julian Eymard

quotes.quote: All the good that is in me is due to Holy Communion. I owe everything to it. I feel this holy fire has transformed me completely.
quotes.author: St. Faustina

quotes.quote: May we have communion with God in the secret of our hearts, and find Him to be to us as a little sanctuary.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.quote: We cannot have communion with Christ till we are in union with Him; and we cannot have communion with the Church till we are in vital union with it.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.quote: We have communion with Christ in His thoughts, views, and purposes; for His thoughts are our thoughts according to our capacity and sanctity. Believers take the same view of matters as Jesus does; that which pleases Him pleases them, and that which grieves His grieves them also.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.quote: God does not change; he is Love, ever and always. In himself, he is communion, unity in Trinity, and all his words and works are directed to communion.
quotes.author: Pope Benedict XVI

quotes.quote: In this world of ours, every believer must be a spark of light, a center of love, a vivifying ferment for the mass; and it will be that all the more as, in the depths of his being, he lives in communion with God.
quotes.author: Pope John XXIII

quotes.quote: Often the work of the Lord itself may be a temptation to keep us from that communion with Him which is so essential to the benefit of our own souls.
quotes.author: George Muller

quotes.quote: Baptism is not only a sacrament of our union with Christ; it is also a sacrament of our communion as the body of Christ.
quotes.author: Michael Horton

quotes.quote: From faith, hope, and love, the virtues of religion referring to God, there arises a double act which bears on the spiritual communion exercised between God and us; the hearing of the word and prayer.
quotes.author: William Ames

quotes.quote: In the Eucharist a communion takes place that corresponds to the union of man and woman in marriage. Just as they become 'one flesh', so in Communion we all become 'one spirit', one person, with Christ.
quotes.author: Pope Benedict XVI

quotes.quote: In the Eucharist we can find all the dimensions of communion: God communicates himself to us, we enter into communion with him, the participants of the sacrament enter into communion with one another, and creation as a whole enters through man into communion with God. All this takes place in Christ and the Spirit, who brings the last days into history and offers to the world a foretaste of the Kingdom.
quotes.author: John D. Zizioulas

quotes.quote: Your worship is proportional to your communion with God and how you are free with Him.
quotes.author: Dr Paul Gitwaza

quotes.quote: Holy Communion is offered to all, as surely as the living Jesus Christ is for all, as surely as all of us are not divided in him, but belong together as brothers and sisters, all of us poor sinners, all of us rich through his mercy. Amen.
quotes.author: Karl Barth

quotes.quote: Holy Communion is the shortest and safest way to heaven.
quotes.author: Pope Pius X

quotes.quote: One of the most admirable effects of Holy Communion is to preserve the soul from sin, and to help those who fall through weakness to rise again. It is much more profitable, then, to approach this divine Sacrament with love, respect, and confidence, than to remain away through an excess of fear and scrupulosity.
quotes.author: Ignatius of Loyola

quotes.quote: Love tends to union with the object loved. Now Jesus Christ loves a soul that is in a state of grace with immense love; He ardently desires to unite Himself with it. That is what Holy Communion does
quotes.author: St. Alphonsus Ligouri

quotes.quote: All Christian power springs from communion with God, and from the indwelling of divine grace.
quotes.author: John Aughey

quotes.quote: I agree with you that the communion with the invisible saints must be more of a dream than a reality. But we have a right to dream dreams, if they are not contradicted by the evident laws of God’s word, or God’s world.
quotes.author: Maltbie Babcock

quotes.quote: We should look to the Sacrament for a special revelation of Christ and His truth. The purpose of the communion service is to afford us an opportunity to take into our spiritual natures something from the outside.
quotes.author: Rev. Chas. A. Savage

quotes.quote: Especially in acts of sacramental communion with his Lord does the Christian gather up and consecrate the powers of his life-long communion with heaven. Then it is that he has most vivid impressions of the nearness of God to his soul, a most comfortable assurance of strength for his need.
quotes.author: Mackarness

quotes.quote: The Lord’s Supper may be made more profitable for us if we emphasize it as a bond of brotherhood. A communion with Christ, it is also a communion with each other, and not only among the few gathered within the walls of a single sanctuary; it is the fellowship of the ages. In the name of our common Christ, 'encompassed by so great a cloud of witnesses,' we sit with them in heavenly places whenever we come to the Communion Table of our Lord.
quotes.author: Rev. Chas. A. Savage

quotes.quote: The principal means of acquiring an ardent love of Christ are mental prayer, Communion, mortification, retirement.
quotes.author: Alphonsus Liguori

quotes.quote: Often the work of the Lord itself may be a temptation to keep us from that communion with Him which is so essential to the benefit of our own souls.
quotes.author: George Muller

quotes.quote: Communion is strength; solitude is weakness. Alone, the fine old beech yields to the blast and lies prone on the meadow. In the forest, supporting each other, the trees laugh at the hurricane. The sheep of Jesus flock together. The social element is the genius of Christianity.
quotes.author: Charles Haddon Spurgeon

quotes.quote: Holy Communion assures me that I will win the victory; and so it is. I fear the day when I do not receive Holy Communion. The bread of the Strong gives me all the strength I need to carry on my mission and to do whatever the Lord asks of me.
quotes.author: St. Faustina

quotes.quote: Whenever we receive Communion, we must do so in humility and brokenness before God. We must rejoice and be grateful and thankful for our salvation.
quotes.author: Michael Youssef

quotes.quote: Making really good Communions often is the best way to make sure you will die happy and save your soul.
quotes.author: Don Bosco

quotes.quote: Christianity is not about going to church on Sunday. It's a communion with God every single day.
quotes.author: Henry

quotes.quote: Only through love can we obtain communion with God.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: Jesus didn't say, 'Blessed are those who care for the poor.' He said, 'Blessed are we where we are poor, where we are broken.' It is there that God loves us deeply and pulls us into deeper communion with himself.
quotes.author: Henri Nouwen

quotes.quote: On the one hand, faith is a profoundly personal contact with God, which touches me in my innermost being and places me in front of the living God in absolute immediacy in such a way that I can speak with Him, love Him, and enter into communion with Him.
quotes.author: Pope Benedict XVI

quotes.quote: I welcome the role that people of faith play in building Britain's future - and the Catholic communion in particular is to be congratulated for so often being the conscience of our country, for helping 'the least of these' even when bearing witness to the truth is hard or unpopular.
quotes.author: Gordon Brown

quotes.quote: The Mass is the re-enactment of the cross’s mighty onslaught upon human differences: the breaking down of the wall of partition. We participate in common, as in one family, in the holy Eucharistic offering. We are united with one another through our union with Jesus Christ in Communion.
quotes.author: John LaFarge S.J.

quotes.quote: Prayer is simply a constant communion with Christ.
quotes.author: Jared Brock

quotes.quote: All love craves unity. As the highest peak of love in the human order is the unity of husband and wife in the flesh, so the highest unity in the Divine order is the unity of the soul and Christ in communion.
quotes.author: Fulton J. Sheen

quotes.quote: We who have turned our lives over to Christ need to know how very much he longs to eat with us, to commune with us. He desires a perpetual Eucharistic feast in the inner sanctuary of the heart.
quotes.author: Richard J. Foster

quotes.quote: God, in giving us what we pray for because we pray, and in refusing to give what we fail to ask for, deals with us as a loving father. He cultivates that living sympathy and communion between our hearts and His own which is necessary to our happiness and growth in grace.
quotes.author: C. E. Babb

quotes.quote: Following Jesus in faith is to walk with him in the communion of the Church. You cannot follow Jesus alone.
quotes.author: Pope Benedict XVI

quotes.quote: The body and the soul join in doing the work of the soul, ie. praying, meditating, praising and coming in communion with God.
quotes.author: Pope Shenouda III of Alexandria

quotes.quote: To build communism it is necessary, simultaneous with the new material foundations, to build the new man and woman.
quotes.author: Che Guevara

quotes.quote: Communism is trying to take the world by force. But God will take the world by love.
quotes.author: Sun Myung Moon

quotes.quote: Communism is the death of the soul. It is the organization of total conformity in short, of tyranny and it is committed to making tyranny universal.
quotes.author: Adlai E. Stevenson

quotes.quote: Communism deprives no man of the ability to appropriate the fruits of his labour. The only thing it deprives him of is the ability to enslave others by means of such appropriations.
quotes.author: Karl Marx

quotes.quote: Communism has been the greatest and bloodiest illusion that humanity ever bore.
quotes.author: Gianfranco Fini

quotes.quote: Communism is one of the options that can improve people's lives.
quotes.author: Tom Hayden

quotes.quote: Communism is a form of government under which every citizen at election time enjoys the privilege of voting yes.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Communism teaches and seeks two objectives: unrelenting class warfare and the complete eradication of private ownership.
quotes.author: Pope Pius XI

quotes.quote: Communism is the opiate of the intellectuals with no cure except as a guillotine might be called a cure for dandruff.
quotes.author: Clare Boothe Luce

quotes.quote: Communism has never come to power in a country that was not disrupted by war or corruption, or both.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: Communism is evil. its driving force are the deadly sins of envy and hatred.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: Communism was something so hideous that you had to be an exceptional conformist or a fool not to see the evil around you.
quotes.author: Donald Tusk

quotes.quote: Communism is a form of society where the less people have to eat, the more they have to swallow.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Communism is a monopolistic system, economically and politically.
quotes.author: Lech Walesa

quotes.quote: Communism introduced into the world a substitute for true religion. It is a counterfeit of the gospel plan.
quotes.author: Ezra Taft Benson

quotes.quote: Under capitalism, man exploits man. under communism, its just the opposite.
quotes.author: John Kenneth Galbraith

quotes.quote: The principle of communism is the enrichment of the idle at the expense of the provident; it is plunder legalized.
quotes.author: Mary Trimmer

quotes.quote: A communist is like a crocodile: when it opens its mouth you cannot tell whether it is trying to smile or preparing to eat you up.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Communism is the opiate of the people.
quotes.author: Will Durant

quotes.quote: Communism needs democracy like the human body needs oxygen.
quotes.author: Leon Trotsky

quotes.quote: The theory of Communism may be summed up in one sentence: Abolish all private property.
quotes.author: Karl Marx

quotes.quote: Communism doesn't work because people like to own stuff.
quotes.author: Frank Zappa

quotes.quote: Communism possesses a language which every people can understand its elements are hunger, envy, and death.
quotes.author: Heinrich Heine

quotes.quote: The ultimate weakness of Communism is that it robs man of that quality which makes him man.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: Communism is not love. Communism is a hammer which we use to crush the enemy.
quotes.author: Mao Zedong

quotes.quote: Communism is like one big phone company.
quotes.author: Lenny Bruce

quotes.quote: Communism is like prohibition, it is a good idea, but it won't work.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: Communism is a cow of many; well milked and badly fed.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Communism was overthrown by life, by thought, by dignity.
quotes.author: Vaclav Havel

quotes.quote: Communism is fascism with a human face.
quotes.author: Susan Sontag

quotes.quote: Communism is the riddle of history solved, and it knows itself to be this solution.
quotes.author: Karl Marx

quotes.quote: Communism is a hateful thing, and a menace to peace and organized government.
quotes.author: Grover Cleveland

quotes.quote: Communism is in conflict with human nature.
quotes.author: Ernest Renan

quotes.quote: Communism is the corruption of a dream of justice.
quotes.author: Adlai Stevenson II

quotes.quote: Communism is not always equality; but it is more so than property is. In communism inequality springs from placing mediocrity on a level with excellence.
quotes.author: Pierre-Joseph Proudhon

quotes.quote: Communism is the flower of idleness.
quotes.author: George Ticknor

quotes.quote: We got the kingdom so we have to make way / We take it from the bottom to the top baby / And now the whole community can live greatly.
quotes.author: Dave Kelly

quotes.quote: Cafe society / A sip of community / Cafe society / Misery loves company / Hey, it's a way to start the day.
quotes.author: Bruce Cockburn

quotes.quote: Have respect with your community / We are all each other's family / We've come together and have unity / Let's have pride with humility.
quotes.author: Steve Ryan

quotes.quote: Cause they never talk peace in the black community / All we know is violence, do the job in silence / Walk the city streets like a rat pack of tyrants.
quotes.author: Tupac Amaru Shakur

quotes.quote: Because in the end, a community of friends / —let you rise and then stand tall.
quotes.author: Kurt Philip Behm

quotes.quote: There is a community of the spirit. / Join it, and feel the delight / of walking in the noisy street / and being the noise. / Drink all your passion, / and be a disgrace. / Close both eyes / to see with the other eye.
quotes.author: Mewlana Jalaluddin Rumi

quotes.quote: A community of hands to help- / Thus the dream becomes not one man’s dream alone, / But a community dream.
quotes.author: Langston Hughes

quotes.quote: With community; comes friendship.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: As our planet grows smaller each and every day / Everyone affecting everyone in every way / We're all citizens of the world community / All here together and we're searching for unity.
quotes.author: Adam Horovitz

quotes.quote: We can only believe / In community of forward eyes / Community / Of beautiful minds
quotes.author: Rebecca Foon

quotes.quote: It's time to stop disrespecting our women / It's time for us to come home and raise our children / It's time for us, to really mold our communities / It's time for us, not to get hooked up in religion / But to get hooked up in relationship, with God.
quotes.author: Christopher Brian Bridges

quotes.quote: There's a promise in the heart of every good dream / It's a call to action, not to fantasy / The end of a dream, the start of what's real / Let it be unity, let it be community.
quotes.author: Adam Clayton

quotes.quote: Now I know the reason we must excel / Cause if we don't we'll end up in the cell / Move on be strong with unity / Cause that's the only way to build communities.
quotes.author: Jimi C. Dright

quotes.quote: Community is like a big family.
quotes.author: Zygmunt Bauman

quotes.quote: Community is where humility and glory touch.
quotes.author: Henri Nouwen

quotes.quote: If you support the community, they will support you.
quotes.author: Jerry Greenfield

quotes.quote: By prayer, community is created as well as expressed.
quotes.author: Henri Nouwen

quotes.quote: If we want a beloved community, we must stand for justice, have recognition for difference without attaching difference to privilege.
quotes.author: Bell Hooks

quotes.quote: A community that is engaged and working together can be a powerful force.
quotes.author: Idowu Koyenikan

quotes.quote: Community is gathering around a fire and listening to someone tell a story.
quotes.author: Bill Maher

quotes.quote: Community living is about having the same rights and choices as everyone else.
quotes.author: Ari Ne'eman

quotes.quote: A community is easily divided when their perception of the same thing is different.
quotes.author: Steven Biko

quotes.quote: Every successful individual knows that his or her achievement depends on a community of persons working together.
quotes.author: Paul Ryan

quotes.quote: I measure the progress of a community by the degree of progress which women have achieved.
quotes.author: B. R. Ambedkar

quotes.quote: No man is an island, entire of itself; every man is a piece of the continent, a part of the main.
quotes.author: John Donne

quotes.quote: I know there is strength in the differences between us. I know there is comfort, where we overlap.
quotes.author: Ani DiFranco

quotes.quote: Community is a sign that love is possible in a materialistic world where people so often either ignore or fight each other. It is a sign that we don't need a lot of money to be happy--in fact, the opposite.
quotes.author: Jean Vanier

quotes.quote: To build community requires vigilant awareness of the work we must continually do to undermine all the socialization that leads us to behave in ways that perpetuate domination.
quotes.author: Bell Hooks

quotes.quote: Every person is defined by the communities she belongs to.
quotes.author: Orson Scott Card

quotes.quote: We can never get a re-creation of community and heal our society without giving our citizens a sense of belonging.
quotes.author: Patch Adams

quotes.quote: A community is a group of people who have come together, and they work and they live to try and improve the standard of living and quality of life - and I don't mean money.
quotes.author: William Baldwin

quotes.quote: It is vain to talk of the interest of the community, without understanding what is the interest of the individual.
quotes.author: Jeremy Bentham

quotes.quote: No part of the human community can live entirely on its own planet, with its own laws of motion and cut off from the rest of humanity.
quotes.author: Hugo Chavez

quotes.quote: We were born to unite with our fellow men, and to join in community with the human race.
quotes.author: Cicero

quotes.quote: We cannot live only for ourselves. A thousand fibers connect us with our fellow men.
quotes.author: Herman Melville

quotes.quote: Our true destiny...is a world built from the bottom up by competent citizens living in solid communities, engaged in and by their places.
quotes.author: David W. Orr

quotes.quote: It is not more bigness that should be our goal. We must attempt, rather, to bring people back to...the warmth of community, to the worth of individual effort and responsibility...and of individuals working together as a community, to better their lives and their children's future.
quotes.author: Robert F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: We have all known the long loneliness and we have learned that the only solution is love and that love comes with community.
quotes.author: Dorothy Day

quotes.quote: When I am with a group of human beings committed to hanging in there through both the agony and the joy of community, I have a dim sense that I am participating in a phenomenon for which there is only one word...."glory."
quotes.author: M. Scott Peck

quotes.quote: The golden way is to be friends with the world and to regard the whole human family as one.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: The community of living is the carriage of the Lord.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: The real community of man, in the midst of all the self-contraditory simulacra of community, is the community of those who seek the truth, of potential knowers... of all men to the extent that they know.
quotes.author: Allan Bloom

quotes.quote: Without a sense of caring, there can be no sense of community.
quotes.author: Anthony D'Angelo

quotes.quote: In communities where men build ships for their own sons to fish or fight from, quality is never a problem
quotes.author: J. A. Dever

quotes.quote: Community cannot long feed on itself, it can only flourish with the coming of others from beyond: their unknown and undiscovered sisters and brothers.
quotes.author: Howard Thurman

quotes.quote: A community is like a ship; everyone ought to be prepared to take the helm.
quotes.author: Henrik Ibsen

quotes.quote: A community is democratic only when the humblest and weakest person can enjoy the highest civil, economic, and social rights that the biggest and most powerful possess.
quotes.author: A. Philip Randolph

quotes.quote: A community needs a soul if it is to become a true home for human beings. You, the people must git it this soul.
quotes.author: Pope John Paul II

quotes.quote: There is no finer investment for any community than putting milk into babies.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Some people think they are in community, but they are only in proximity. True community requires commitment and openness. It is a willingness to extend yourself to encounter and know the other.
quotes.author: David Spangler

quotes.quote: We know that where community exists in confers upon its members identity, a sense of belonging, and a measure of security. . . . Communities are the ground-level generatorsand preservers of values and ethical systems.
quotes.author: John Gardner
