quotes.quote: You will never scar on your own psyche if you achieve success through harmonious cooperation with others. That is something you can't say about fortunes acquired through conflict and unfair competition
quotes.author: W.Clement Stone

quotes.quote: We try to understand what other people are doing, even if their apparent mission is so distant that it is not obvious competition.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: Competition makes you better, always, always makes you better, even if the competitor wins.
quotes.author: Carlos Slim

quotes.quote: If all your competitors are banding together to sort of attack you, that's a good compliment, I think. A very sincere compliment.
quotes.author: Elon Musk

quotes.quote: The Miss Universe contest taught me how to compete. And competing among women is very different from competing among men. Women are fierce competitors.
quotes.author: Irene Saez

quotes.quote: Competition speeds the race, sharpens the wit, and challenges pride.
quotes.author: Alfred Henry

quotes.quote: For the winner, competition is a celebration, for the losers, a revelation.
quotes.author: Alfred Henry

quotes.quote: Without fairness, competition can turn friends into villains.
quotes.author: Alfred Henry

quotes.quote: Competition is for athletes, not artists.
quotes.author: Alfred Henry

quotes.quote: Winner and loser / Not against each other / One half of another / Complementary nature / Compete to make it whole
quotes.author: K.V. Srikanth

quotes.quote: Sporting competition is deft ambition. / You may lose at the meet or thrive if you beat. / You may have a derring-do or have a set-to. / You may run a fast race or drop in disgrace.
quotes.author: Wallace Dean LaBenne

quotes.quote: Competition whose motive is merely to compete, to drive some other fellow out, never carries very far. The competitor to be feared is one who never bothers about you at all but goes on making his own business better all the time.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: As humans, we have evolved to compete; it is in our genes, and we love to watch a competition.
quotes.author: Peter Dimandis

quotes.quote: As soon as I hear the word 'competition' I get serious and start doing everything that I can do.
quotes.author: Maureen McCormick

quotes.quote: It's good to have high-quality competition; it helps drive research forward at a faster pace.
quotes.author: Shuji Nakamura

quotes.quote: I looked at my competitors and I thought that, If they could do it, I could do it. And if they are popular and doing well, I could compete with them.
quotes.author: Tommy Hilfiger

quotes.quote: The idea of competition, particularly in a creative atmosphere, is always there; if you don't acknowledge that, you are doing yourself and the process a disservice.
quotes.author: Jake Gyllenhaal

quotes.quote: To collaborative team members, completing one another is more important than competing with one another.
quotes.author: John Maxwell

quotes.quote: The only person you should compete with is the person you were yesterday.
quotes.author: Prem Jagyasi

quotes.quote: Competition gives me energy. It keeps me focused.
quotes.author: Conor McGregor

quotes.quote: When you compete against everyone else, no one wants to help you. But when you compete against yourself, everyone wants to help you.
quotes.author: Simon Sinek

quotes.quote: If you don't have a competitive advantage, don't compete.
quotes.author: Jack Welch

quotes.quote: The struggles we endure today will be the ‘good old days’ we laugh about tomorrow.
quotes.author: Aaron Lauritsen

quotes.quote: The ability to learn faster than your competitors may be only sustainable competitive advantage.
quotes.author: Arie de Geus

quotes.quote: Without the spur of competition we'd loaf out our life.
quotes.author: Arnold Glasow

quotes.quote: Whether it's Google or Apple or free software, we've got some fantastic competitors and it keeps us on our toes.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: Competition helps people figure it out.
quotes.author: Brian Mcbride

quotes.quote: Companies aren’t families. They’re battlefields in a civil war.
quotes.author: Charles Duhigg

quotes.quote: Winning and losing are both very temporary things. Having done one or the other, you move ahead. Gloating over a victory or sulking over a loss is a good way to stand still.
quotes.author: Chuck Knox

quotes.quote: Show class, have pride, and display character. If you do, winning takes care of itself.
quotes.author: Coach Paul “Bear” Bryant

quotes.quote: The will to win, the desire to succeed, the urge to reach your full potential… these are the keys that will unlock the door to personal excellence.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: If you want to find the real competition, just look in the mirror. After awhile you'll see your rivals scrambling for second place.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: Together, we form a necessary paradox; not a senseless contradiction.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: The only race you have to run is with yourself.
quotes.author: Dahi Tamara Koch

quotes.quote: Creativity may well be the last legal unfair competitive advantage we can take to run over the competition.
quotes.author: Dave Trott

quotes.quote: Don’t let mental blocks control you. Set yourself free. Confront your fear and turn the mental blocks into building blocks.
quotes.author: Dr Roopleen

quotes.quote: Some people don't like competition because it makes them work harder, better.
quotes.author: Drew Carey

quotes.quote: Companies that solely focus on competition will ultimately. Those that focus on value creation will thrive.
quotes.author: Edward de Bono

quotes.quote: Companies that solely focus on competition will ultimately. Those that focus on value creation will thrive.
quotes.author: Edward de Bono

quotes.quote: There are victories of the soul and spirit. Sometimes, even if you lose, you win.
quotes.author: Elie Wiesel

quotes.quote: I may win and I may lose, but I will never be defeated.
quotes.author: Emmitt Smith

quotes.quote: There is a tendency among some businesses to criticize and belittle their competitors. This is a bad procedure. Praise them. Learn from them. There are times when you can co-operate with them to their advantage and to yours! Speak well of them and they will speak well of you. You can't destroy good ideas. Take advantage of them.
quotes.author: George Matthew Adams

quotes.quote: It's nice to have valid competition; it pushes you to do better.
quotes.author: Gianni Versace

quotes.quote: With competition everyone has to try harder.
quotes.author: Harold H. Greene

quotes.quote: Of all human powers operating on the affairs of mankind, none is greater than that of competition.
quotes.author: Henry Clay

quotes.quote: Competition whose motive is merely to compete, to drive some other fellow out, never carries very far. The competitor to be feared is one who never bothers about you at all, but goes on making his own business better all the time.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: Live daringly, boldly, fearlessly. Taste the relish to be found in competition - in having put forth the best within you.
quotes.author: Henry Kaiser

quotes.quote: Number one, cash is king; number two, communicate; number three, buy or bury the competition.
quotes.author: Jack Welch

quotes.quote: Don't knock your competitors. By boosting others you will boost yourself. A little competition is a good thing and severe competition is a blessing. Thank God for competition.
quotes.author: Jacob Kindleberger

quotes.quote: If we can keep our competitors focused on us while we stay focused on the customer, ultimately we'll turn out all right.
quotes.author: Jeff Bezos

quotes.quote: Friendships born on the field of athletic strife are the real gold of competition; awards become corroded, friends gather no dust.
quotes.author: Jesse Owens

quotes.quote: If you're not gonna go all the way, why go at all?
quotes.author: Joe Namath

quotes.quote: If you're not making mistakes, you're not taking risks, and that means you're not going anywhere. The key is to make mistakes faster than the competition, so you have more chances to learn and win.
quotes.author: John W. Holt

quotes.quote: Success is peace of mind which is a direct result of self-satisfaction in knowing you made the effort to become the best that you are capable of becoming.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: When I go out on the ice, I just think about my skating; I forget it is a competition.
quotes.author: Katarina Witt

quotes.quote: Being properly prepared is one of the biggest assets in business and in athletic competition.
quotes.author: Keeth Smart

quotes.quote: It was then I realized winning isn’t always finishing first. Sometimes winning is just finishing.
quotes.author: Manuel Diotte

quotes.quote: You are never a loser until you quit trying.
quotes.author: Mike Ditka

quotes.quote: When you don't make moves and when you don't climb up the ladder, everybody loves you because you're not competition.
quotes.author: Nicki Minaj

quotes.quote: Think like a queen. A queen is not afraid to fail. Failure is another steppingstone to greatness.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: An artist is somebody who enters into competition with God.
quotes.author: Patti Smith

quotes.quote: Capitalism and competition are opposites; Capitalism is premised on the accumulation of capital, but under perfect competition, all profits get competed away.
quotes.author: Peter Thiel

quotes.quote: Let me not pray to be sheltered from dangers, but to be fearless in facing them.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.quote: Move fast. Speed is one of your main advantages over large competitors.
quotes.author: Sam Altman

quotes.quote: Instead of playing to win, I was playing not to lose. It reminds me of the story I once heard about two friends being chased by a bear, when one turned to the other and said, "I just realized that I don't need to outrun the bear; I only need to outrun you.
quotes.author: Sean Covey

quotes.quote: Cruel people offer pity when they no longer feel threatened. However, kind people offer compassion and understanding regardless.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: A deceitful man will go as far as to trample all over a woman’s reputation and spirit, in order to prove to his ex-love that he was faithful. The irony, is he is still in love with his ex and the new woman in his life doesn’t even realize it.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: Believing that your competition is stronger and better than you pushes you to better yourselves.
quotes.author: Simon Sinek

quotes.quote: Opportunity doesn't make appointments, you have to be ready when it arrives.
quotes.author: Tim Fargo

quotes.quote: Jealousy is love in competition.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: Since I became a novelist I have discovered that I am biased. Either I think a new novel is worse than mine and I don’t like it, or I suspect it is better than my novels and I don’t like it.
quotes.author: Umberto Eco

quotes.quote: The early bird gets the worm, but the second mouse gets the cheese.
quotes.author: Willie Nelson

quotes.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Competition has been shown to be useful up to a certain point and no further, but cooperation, which is the thing we must strive for today, begins where competition leaves off.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Competition is always a good thing. It forces us to do our best. A monopoly renders people complacent and satisfied with mediocrity.
quotes.author: Nancy Pearcey

quotes.quote: I have been up against tough competition all my life. I wouldn't know how to get along without it.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: The ultimate victory in competition is derived from the inner satisfaction of knowing that you have done your best and that you have gotten the most out of what you had to give.
quotes.author: Howard Cosell

quotes.quote: You have competition every day because you set such high standards for yourself that you have to go out every day and live up to that.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.quote: I'm not in competition with anybody but myself. My goal is to beat my last performance.
quotes.author: Celine Dion

quotes.quote: Never compete with someone who has nothing to lose.
quotes.author: Baltasar Gracian

quotes.quote: Real learning comes about when the competitive spirit has ceased.
quotes.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quotes.quote: Insecure people only eclipse your sun because they're jealous of your daylight and tired of their dark, starless nights.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: Anyone who imagines they can work alone winds up surrounded by nothing but rivals, without companions. The fact is, no one ascends alone.
quotes.author: Lance Armstrong

quotes.quote: Anytime you find someone more successful than you are, especially when you're both engaged in the same business - you know they're doing something that you aren't.
quotes.author: Malcolm X

quotes.quote: There are two kinds of people, those who do the work and those who take the credit. Try to be in the first group; there is less competition there.
quotes.author: Indira Gandhi

quotes.quote: Competition brings out the best in products and the worst in people.
quotes.author: David Sarnoff

quotes.quote: A merchant who approaches business with the idea of serving the public well has nothing to fear from the competition.
quotes.author: James Cash Penney

quotes.quote: No matter what the competition is, I try to find a goal that day and better that goal.
quotes.author: Bonnie Blair

quotes.quote: The healthiest competition occurs when average people win by putting above average effort.
quotes.author: Colin Powell

quotes.quote: Competition is not only the basis of protection to the consumer, but is the incentive to progress.
quotes.author: Herbert Hoover

quotes.quote: All you have to do is play better than the other guy and things go well. If you don't play better than the other players then somebody takes your place.
quotes.author: Bill Parcels

quotes.quote: The only competition worthy of a wise man is with himself.
quotes.author: Washington Allston

quotes.quote: When a man can do better than everyone else in the same walk, he does not make any very painful exertions to outdo himself. The progress of improvement ceases nearly at the point where competition ends.
quotes.author: William Hazlitt

quotes.quote: Competition is a rude yet effective motivation.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: Competition is the spice of sports; but if you make spice the whole meal you'll be sick.
quotes.author: George Leonard

quotes.quote: Focus on competition has always been a formula for mediocrity.
quotes.author: Daniel Burrus

quotes.quote: You have no control over what the other guy does. You only have control over what you do.
quotes.author: A. J. Kitt

quotes.quote: If you're able to be yourself, then you have no competition. All you have to do is get closer and closer to that essence.
quotes.author: Barbara Cook

quotes.quote: When we are in competition with ourselves, and match our todays against our yesterdays, we derive encouragement from past misfortunes and blemishes. Moreover, the competition with ourselves leaves unimpaired our benevolence toward our fellow men.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: A horse never runs so fast as when he has other horses to catch up and outpace.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.quote: Becoming number one is easier than remaining number one.
quotes.author: Bill Bradley

quotes.quote: Competition is a process or variety of habitual behavior that grows out of a habit of mind.
quotes.author: Willard Beecher

quotes.quote: Every man in the world is better than someone else and not as good someone else.
quotes.author: William Saroyan

quotes.quote: For when the One Great Scorer comes to mark against your name, He writes -- not that you won or lost -- but how you played the Game.
quotes.author: Grantland Rice

quotes.quote: You find that you have peace of mind and can enjoy yourself, get more sleep, and rest when you know that it was a one hundred percent effort that you gave - win or lose.
quotes.author: Gordie Howe

quotes.quote: Champions do not become champions when they win the event, but in the hours, weeks, months and years they spend preparing for it. The victorious performance itself is merely the demonstration of their championship character.
quotes.author: T. Alan Armstrong

quotes.quote: Winning is important to me, but what brings me real joy is the experience of being fully engaged in whatever I'm doing.
quotes.author: Phil Jackson

quotes.quote: You must do everything possible to put yourself in a position to win. But if you consider second or third a failure, I feel sorry for you.
quotes.author: Joe Falcon

quotes.quote: Winners compare their achievements with their goals, while losers compare their achievements with those of other people.
quotes.author: Nido Qubein

quotes.quote: It's hard to beat a person who never gives up.
quotes.author: Babe Ruth

quotes.quote: Somebody will always break your records. It is how you live that counts.
quotes.author: Earl Campbell

quotes.quote: It's not necessarily the amount of time you spend at practice that counts; it's what you put into the practice.
quotes.author: Eric Lindros

quotes.quote: The harder the conflict, the more glorious the triumph.
quotes.author: Thomas Paine

quotes.quote: I don't care how good you play, you can find somebody who can beat you, and I don't care how bad you play, you can find somebody you can beat.
quotes.author: Harvey Penick

quotes.quote: There is nothing noble in being superior to some other person. The true nobility is in being superior to your previous self.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: The Law of Win/Win says, Let's not do it your way or my way; let's do it the best way.
quotes.author: Greg Anderson

quotes.quote: Success is a journey not a destination. The doing is usually more important than the outcome. Not everyone can be Number 1.
quotes.author: Arthur Ashe

quotes.quote: Thank God for competition. When our competitors upset our plans or outdo our designs, they open infinite possibilities of our own work to us.
quotes.author: Gil Atkinson

quotes.quote: Competition is what keeps me playing the psychological warfare of matching skill against skill and wit against wit.
quotes.author: Lou Brock

quotes.quote: How you respond to the challenge in the second half will determine what you become after the game, whether you are a winner or a loser.
quotes.author: Lou Holtz

quotes.quote: No wise combatant underestimates their antagonist.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Our life is not really a mutual helpfulness; but rather, it's fair competition cloaked under due laws of war; it's a mutual hostility.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: Man is a gaming animal. He must always be trying to get the better in something or other.
quotes.author: Charles Lamb

quotes.quote: Familiarity breeds complacency.
quotes.author: Rick Warren

quotes.quote: Conceit is the most contemptible and one of the most odious qualities in the world. It is vanity driven from all other shifts, and forced to appeal to itself for admiration.
quotes.author: William Hazlitt

quotes.quote: Do not be afraid to make decisions; do not be afraid to make mistakes.
quotes.author: Carly Fiorina

quotes.quote: We cannot be complacent with playing good but not winning games.
quotes.author: Marty Schottenheimer

quotes.quote: It is nice to be around people who think differently than you. They challenge your ideas and keep you from being complacent.
quotes.author: Tucker Carlson

quotes.quote: You can never get complacent because a loss is always around the corner.
quotes.author: Venus Williams

quotes.quote: Conceit is the finest armour a man can wear.
quotes.author: Jerome K. Jerome

quotes.quote: A complacent player is a lazy player, and a lazy player is a loser.
quotes.author: Darryl Sutter

quotes.quote: A complacent satisfaction with present knowledge is the chief bar to the pursuit of knowledge.
quotes.author: B. H. Liddell Hart

quotes.quote: Change before you have to.
quotes.author: Jack Welch

quotes.quote: Competition is always a good thing. It forces us to do our best. A monopoly renders people complacent and satisfied with mediocrity.
quotes.author: Nancy Pearcey

quotes.quote: We shall have no better conditions in the future if we are satisfied with all those which we have at present.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.quote: We can all get complacent. Especially when it comes to a job.
quotes.author: John Rampton

quotes.quote: Our civilization survives in the complacency of cowardly or malignant minds, a sacrifice to the vanity of aging adolescents.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: Conceit is bragging about yourself. Confidence means you believe you can get the job done.
quotes.author: Johnny Unitas

quotes.quote: Complacency doesn't make sense for a guy trying to redefine normal.
quotes.author: John Fairclough

quotes.quote: Complacent ignorance is the most lethal sickness of the soul.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Complacency is the enemy of study.
quotes.author: Mao Zedong

quotes.quote: Complacency is a continuous struggle that we all have to fight.
quotes.author: Jack Nicklaus

quotes.quote: If we sit by and become complacent and put our heads in the sand, we're complicit.
quotes.author: Shelley Morrison

quotes.quote: The complacent, the self-indulgent, the soft societies are about to be swept away with the debris of history.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: Complacency is the enemy of study. We cannot really learn anything until we rid ourselves of complacency.
quotes.author: Mao Tse-Tung

quotes.quote: We have a normal. As you move outside of your comfort zone, what was once the unknown and frightening becomes your new normal.
quotes.author: Robin Sharma

quotes.quote: A wise man knows; learn from others, never get complacent and know where the classic old dangers come from.
quotes.author: Bear Grylls

quotes.quote: Success breeds complacency. Complacency breeds failure. Only the paranoid survive.
quotes.author: Andy Grove

quotes.quote: Complacency is a sword of two edges. One edge kills hard earned successes while the other end stops future glories. Complacency is a murderer and a barrier!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Conceit is to nature what paint is to beauty; it is not only needless, but impairs what it would improve.
quotes.author: Alexander Pope

quotes.quote: Complacency delivered us into the hands of evil greedy men like Cheney.
quotes.author: Sonia Rumzi

quotes.quote: Don't let your special character and values, the secret that you know and no one else does, the truth, don't let that get swallowed up by the great chewing complacency.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: Complacency happens almost without notice. Check and renew your heart daily.
quotes.author: Jim George

quotes.quote: You need to have a redesign because familiarity breeds a kind of complacency.
quotes.author: Timothy White

quotes.quote: Conceit is an insuperable obstacle to all progress.
quotes.author: Ellen Terry

quotes.quote: Conceit causes more conversation than wit.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: If it ain't broke, don't fix it is the slogan of the complacent, the arrogant or the scared. It's an excuse for inaction, a call to non-arms.
quotes.author: Colin Powell

quotes.quote: In this new, hyper competitive age, none of us, none of us can afford to be complacent.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: Are we like late Rome, infatuated with past glories, ruled by a complacent, greedy elite, and hopelessly powerless to respond to changing conditions?
quotes.author: Camille Paglia

quotes.quote: History and experience tell us that moral progress comes not in comfortable and complacent times, but out of trial and confusion.
quotes.author: Gerald R. Ford

quotes.quote: When you compete with Wal-Mart, even if you think you've found a niche don't ever become complacent.
quotes.author: Michael Bergdahl

quotes.quote: When a great team loses through complacency, it will constantly search for new and more intricate explanations to explain away defeat.
quotes.author: Pat Riley

quotes.quote: If I was more complacent and I let things slide, my life would be easier, but you all wouldn't be as entertained. My misery is your pleasure.
quotes.author: Kanye West

quotes.quote: A healthy loyalty is not passive and complacent, but active and critical.
quotes.author: Harold Laski

quotes.quote: We must not overlook the role that extremists play. They are the gadflies that keep society from being too complacent, or self satisfied, they are, if sound the spearhead of progress.
quotes.author: Abraham Flexner

quotes.quote: Don't be over complacent or too feverish, take a middle path.
quotes.author: The Code

quotes.quote: Fight the tendency to become complacent and do one kind of music. That is the death of a musician.
quotes.author: Georg Solti

quotes.quote: Faith is not complacent; faith is action. You don’t have faith and wait. When you have faith, you move.
quotes.author: Betty Eadie

quotes.quote: The future is itself a story, and predictions are stories we tell to amaze ourselves, to give hope to the desperate, to jolt the complacent.
quotes.author: David Remnick

quotes.quote: There's still so much more to do. I can't sit back and be complacent, and none of us should be. I get around now in a wheelchair, but I get around.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Taylor

quotes.quote: Rebels and dissidents challenge the complacent belief in a just world, and they are usually denigrated for their efforts.
quotes.author: Carol Tavris

quotes.quote: So much of marriage was implicit and nonverbal. Had I gotten so complacent I'd forgotten to communicate?
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: It was going to be so much fun dragging his complacent sexual views out of the ordinary and into the extraordinary.
quotes.author: Keri Arthur

quotes.quote: For what is the self complacent man but a slave to his own self-praise.
quotes.author: Saint Augustine

quotes.quote: Complacency is the last hurdle standing between any team and its potential greatness.
quotes.author: Pat Riley

quotes.quote: Complacency is the forerunner of mediocrity. You can never work too hard on attitude, effort and technique.
quotes.author: Don Meyer

quotes.quote: Of all the things a leader should fear, complacency heads the list.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: Complacency is the deadly enemy of spiritual progress. The contented soul is the stagnant soul.
quotes.author: Aiden Wilson Tozer

quotes.quote: Don't let your success of today lay you into complacency for tomorrow. For that is the worst form of failure.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.quote: Complacency is a state of mind that exists only in retrospective: it has to be shattered before being ascertained.
quotes.author: Vladimir Nabokov

quotes.quote: If you have time to whine and complain about something then you have the time to do something about it.
quotes.author: Anthony J. D'Angelo

quotes.quote: Untold suffering seldom is.
quotes.author: Franklin P. Jones

quotes.quote: Do not listen to those who weep and complain, for their disease is contagious.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.quote: Sweat silently. Let's have no squawking about a little expenditure of energy.
quotes.author: Martin H. Fischer

quotes.quote: The tendency to whining and complaining may be taken as the surest sign symptom of little souls and inferior intellects.
quotes.author: Lord Jeffrey

quotes.quote: Be grateful for what you have and stop complaining - it bores everybody else, does you no good, and doesn't solve any problems.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: You don't make progress by standing on the sidelines, whimpering and complaining. You make progress by implementing ideas.
quotes.author: Shirley Chisholm

quotes.quote: Complaining not only ruins everybody else's day, it ruins the complainer's day, too. The more we complain, the more unhappy we get.
quotes.author: Dennis Prager

quotes.quote: Complaining is an insult to God.
quotes.author: Monica Johnson

quotes.quote: In our society, the sound of men complaining is like nails on a chalkboard.
quotes.author: Warren Farrell

quotes.quote: It is only imperfection that complains of what is imperfect. The more perfect we are the more gentle and quiet we become towards the defects of others.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.quote: Excuses are only for those people who are unwilling to find the solution, who find greater solace in the loudness of their complaints rather than in the action they are taking to implement the actions that carry them steadily forward to their achievement.
quotes.author: Bryon Pulsifer

quotes.quote: If you have the time to whine and complain about something then you have the time to do something about it.
quotes.author: Anthony J. D'Angelo

quotes.quote: Now, 10 years later, the person who talked and complained is still talking and complaining and still remains in the same position. The person who took the initiative and found solutions has been promoted several times.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: When a person finds themselves predisposed to complaining about how little they are regarded by others, let them reflect how little they have contributed to the happiness of others.
quotes.author: Unkown

quotes.quote: The pessimist complains about the wind; the optimist expects it to change; the realist adjusts the sails.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.quote: Had we not faults of our own, we should take less pleasure in complaining of others.
quotes.author: Francois Fenelon

quotes.quote: It is better to light one small candle than to curse the darkness.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: I think there's an anxiety in life where we automatically tend to look to the next thing or we're complaining about the past. Worrying is not going to make it happen or not happen.
quotes.author: Sherilyn Fenn

quotes.quote: A pessimist is somebody who complains about the noise when opportunity knocks.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Constant complaint is the poorest sort of pay for all the comforts we enjoy.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Depend upon it that if a man talks of his misfortunes there is something in them that is not disagreeable to him.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: I find it unusual that it is more socially acceptable to complain about what you have than it is to ask for what you want.
quotes.author: Phil Lout

quotes.quote: I think a compliment ought to always precede a complaint, where one is possible, because it softens resentment and insures for the complaint a courteous and gentle reception.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: It is a general popular error to suppose the loudest complainers for the public to be the most anxious for its welfare.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: The squeaking wheel doesn't always get the grease. Sometimes it gets replaced.
quotes.author: Unkown

quotes.quote: When any anxiety or gloom of the mind takes hold of you, make it a rule not to publish it by complaining; but exert yourselves to hide it, and by endeavoring to hide it you drive it away.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: I believe in grumbling; it is the politest form of fighting known.
quotes.author: Edgar Watson Howe

quotes.quote: The usual fortune of complaint is to excite contempt more than pity.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Noise proves nothing, Often a hen who has laid an egg cackles as if she had laid an asteroid.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: I hate to complain... No one is without difficulties, whether in high or low life, and every person knows best where their own shoe pinches.
quotes.author: Abigail Adams

quotes.quote: We can choose to complain about the world or not. When we go to the quiet place in our hearts where our Spirit lives and we train ourselves to listen to that Voice, our mistakes and disgruntles become less and less.
quotes.author: Jeanne Aisthorpe-Smith

quotes.quote: The very fact that you are a complainer, shows that you deserve your lot.
quotes.author: James Allen

quotes.quote: If you don't like something, change it. If you can't change it, change your attitude. Don't complain.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: You can overcome anything if you don't bellyache.
quotes.author: Bernard Baruch

quotes.quote: Say and do something positive that will help the situation; it doesn't take any brains to complain.
quotes.author: Robert A. Cook

quotes.quote: Don't complain about the snow on your neighbor's roof when your own doorstep is unclean.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Instead of complaining that the rosebush is full of thorns, be happy that the thorn bush has roses.
quotes.author: German Proverb

quotes.quote: I personally believe we developed language because of our deep inner need to complain.
quotes.author: Jane Wagner

quotes.quote: I will not be as those who spend the day in complaining of headache, and the night in drinking the wine that gives it.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: While you are complaining about the little problems in your life, somebody is actually fighting for theirs.
quotes.author: Jon Morrow

quotes.quote: Let no corrupting talk come out of your mouths, but only such as is good for building up, as fits the occasion, that it may give grace to those who hear.
quotes.author: Ephesians 4:29

quotes.quote: Do not grumble against one another, brothers, so that you may not be judged; behold, the Judge is standing at the door.
quotes.author: James 5:9

quotes.quote: Give thanks in all circumstances; for this is the will of God in Christ Jesus for you.
quotes.author: 1 Thessalonians 5:18

quotes.quote: Do all things without grumbling or questioning, that you may be blameless and innocent, children of God without blemish in the midst of a crooked and twisted generation, among whom you shine as lights in the world, holding fast to the word of life, so that in the day of Christ I may be proud that I did not run in vain or labor in vain.
quotes.author: Philippians 2:14-16

quotes.quote: When you feel dog tired at night, it may be because you've growled all day long.
quotes.author: Unkown

quotes.quote: What you're supposed to do when you don't like a thing is change it. If you can't change it, change the way you think about it. Don't complain.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: One's life must seem extremely flat with nothing whatever to grumble at!
quotes.author: W.S. Gilbert

quotes.quote: If you can quit, quit. If you can't quit, stop complaining - this is what you chose.
quotes.author: J.A. Konrath

quotes.quote: People that pay for things never complain. It's the guy you give something to that you can't please.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: Complaining is a state of mind and involves trying to change/control everyone else's mind except yours.
quotes.author: Bill Able

quotes.quote: Complaining is always non-contentment with what is.
quotes.author: Bill Able

quotes.quote: Complaining always involves trying to change what happened instead of changing how you look at what happened.
quotes.author: Bill Able

quotes.quote: We do not wisely when we vent complaints and censure.—We cry out for a little pain when we do but smile for a great deal of contentment.
quotes.author: Feltham

quotes.quote: I will chide no brother in the world but myself, against whom I know most faults.
quotes.author: Shakespeare

quotes.quote: I have always despised the whining yelp of a complaint, and the cowardly feeble resolve.
quotes.author: Burns

quotes.quote: Murmur at nothing: if our ills are irreparable, it is ungrateful; if remediless, it is vain.
quotes.author: Colton

quotes.quote: Everyone must see daily instances of people who complain from a mere habit of complaining; and make their friends uneasy, and strangers merry, by murmuring at evils that do not exist, and repining at grievances which they do not really feel.
quotes.author: Graves

quotes.quote: The problem is, the more we complain, the unhappier we become.
quotes.author: Lucy Lane

quotes.quote: If you spend your days whining and moaning, you'll always find plenty of things to complain about.
quotes.author: Lucy Lane

quotes.quote: He that complains or murmurs is not perfect, nor is he even a good Christian.
quotes.author: St. John of the Cross

quotes.quote: My days of whining and complaining about others have come to an end. Nothing is easier than fault-finding. All it will do is discolor my personality so that none will want to associate with me. That was my old life. No more.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.quote: He that's content has enough. He that complains hath too much.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Husband can't understand why wife ever complains about anything when she has his coming home in the evening to look forward to.
quotes.author: Kenneth B. Alley

quotes.quote: He enjoyed poor health for a long time but he is now complaining of feeling better.
quotes.author: Kenneth B. Alley

quotes.quote: I was brought up in the great tradition of the late nineteenth century; that a writer never complains, never explains, and never disdains.
quotes.author: James Michener

quotes.quote: Cruel, behold my heavy ending, / See what you wrought by your disdaining. / Causeless I die, love still attending / Your hopeless pity of my complaining.
quotes.author: John Wilbye

quotes.quote: When you complain, you make yourself a victim. Leave the situation, change the situation, or accept it. All else is madness.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: Complaining is finding faults. Wisdom is finding solutions.
quotes.author: Ajahn Brahm

quotes.quote: Complaining does not work as a strategy. We all have finite time and energy. Any time we spend whining is unlikely to help us achieve our goals. And it won't make us happier.
quotes.author: Randy Pausch

quotes.quote: I would always be a better hater of things and institutions than a lover of them.
quotes.author: Pat Conroy

quotes.quote: The tendency to whining and complaining may be taken as the surest sign symptom of little souls and inferior intellects.
quotes.author: Francis Jeffrey

quotes.quote: I wish that everyone that's complaining about how things are here would shut their mouth for a little bit, go around the world and see how it is everywhere else.
quotes.author: Tim Kennedy

quotes.quote: Complaining is a dangerous business. It can damage or even destroy your relationship with God, your relationships with other people, and even your relationship with yourself.
quotes.author: Joyce Mayer

quotes.quote: If the situation could be rectified by complaining, today the world would have been a very beautiful place.
quotes.author: Nitin Namdeo

quotes.quote: Man spends his life in reasoning on the past, in complaining of the present, in fearing future.
quotes.author: Antoine Rivarol

quotes.quote: It is the idle man, not the great worker, who is always complaining that he has no time or opportunity.
quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.quote: Many of our choices have led to the predicaments we are presently complaining about.
quotes.author: Monica Johnson

quotes.quote: I'm perfectly happy complaining because it's cathartic, and I'm perfectly happy arguing with people on the Internet because arguing is my favorite pastime - not programming.
quotes.author: Linus Torvalds

quotes.quote: Most of the time he who complains about others is himself at fault.
quotes.author: Elif Shafak

quotes.quote: ControllingÂ complexityÂ is the essence of computer programming.
quotes.author: Brian Kernighan

quotes.quote: ComplexityÂ is the enemy of execution.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: The complexity of things - the things within things - just seems to be endless. I mean nothing is easy, nothing is simple.
quotes.author: Alice Munro

quotes.quote: The easiest way to cope withÂ complexityÂ is not having it.
quotes.author: Carlos Gershenson

quotes.quote: IfÂ complexityÂ doesn't beat you, paradox will.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: ComplexityÂ begets ambiguity, which yields in all ways to prejudice and avarice. Complication does not so much defeat men as arm them with fancy.
quotes.author: R. Scott Bakker

quotes.quote: ComplexityÂ excites the mind, and order rewards it. In the garden, one finds both, including vanishingly small orders too complex to spot, and orders so vast the mind struggles to embrace them.
quotes.author: Diane Ackerman

quotes.quote: There is a point ofÂ complexityÂ beyond which a business is no longer manageable.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: TheÂ complexityÂ of the situation of having a war going on around you and what that delivers to you is that you have to figure out which side to take.
quotes.author: Jamie Bell

quotes.quote: In an age of sophistic over-complexity, simplicity can be useful.
quotes.author: William Krystol

quotes.quote: The complexity of a system is no guarantee of its accuracy.
quotes.author: John Jordan

quotes.quote: Do not be alarmed by simplification,Â complexityÂ is often a device for claiming sophistication, or for evading simple truths.
quotes.author: John Kenneth Galbraith

quotes.quote: Out of intense complexities, intense simplicities emerge.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Complexity â€“ limits competition.
quotes.author: Seth Klarman

quotes.quote: ComplexityÂ means distracted effort. Simplicity means focused effort.
quotes.author: Edward de Bono

quotes.quote: Dealing with complexity is an inefficient and unnecessary waste of time, attention and mental energy. There is never any justification for things being complex when they could be simple.
quotes.author: Edward de Bono

quotes.quote: Reduce theÂ complexityÂ of life by eliminating the needless wants of life, and the labors of life reduce themselves.
quotes.author: Edwin Way Teale

quotes.quote: ComplexityÂ is not a cause of confusion. It is a result of it.
quotes.author: Jeff Hawkins

quotes.quote: ComplexityÂ is the enemy of clarity.
quotes.author: Andy Stanley

quotes.quote: ComplexityÂ creates a maze between you and success. Simplicity ensures a clear line of sight.
quotes.author: Lee J. Colan

quotes.quote: Both science and art have to do with orderedÂ complexity.
quotes.author: Lancelot Law Whyte

quotes.quote: ComplexityÂ that works is built up out of modules that work perfectly, layered one over the other.
quotes.author: Kevin Kelly

quotes.quote: ComplexityÂ and intelligence grow from simplicity, not from greaterÂ complexity.
quotes.author: Brian Eno

quotes.quote: WithoutÂ complexity, there's no intensity.
quotes.author: Alexandra Adornetto

quotes.quote: ComplexityÂ creates confusion, simplicity focus.
quotes.author: Edward de Bono

quotes.quote: ComplexityÂ serves nothing but our ego. Be able to say what you do in a way that people can understand.
quotes.author: Chris Brogan

quotes.quote: TheÂ complexityÂ of human relationships is never simple to follow; it is like intricate lacework, but lacework made of steel.
quotes.author: Mignon G. Eberhart

quotes.quote: ComplexityÂ has nothing to do with intelligence, simplicity does.
quotes.author: Lawrence Bossidy

quotes.quote: Simplicity takes time, patience & practice.Â ComplexityÂ offers too many excuses for failure.
quotes.author: Dean Cavanagh

quotes.quote: The complexity of the world is so overwhelming and so present to everyone.
quotes.author: Susan Choi

quotes.quote: Out ofÂ complexity, find simplicity.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The complexity of the human life becomes double each year.Â
quotes.author: Ramesh Kumar Jha

quotes.quote: OurÂ complexityÂ is much more likely to lead us astray than any simplicity we may follow.
quotes.author: Roger Kimball

quotes.quote: ComplexityÂ assertions have to be part of the interface.
quotes.author: Alexander Stepanov

quotes.quote: You cannot reduce theÂ complexityÂ of a given task beyond a certain point. Once you've reached that point, you can only shift the burden around.
quotes.author: Larry Tesler

quotes.quote: The right amount ofÂ complexityÂ is what creates the optimal simplicity.
quotes.author: David Allen

quotes.quote: ComplexityÂ is acceptable as long as it is intelligible and necessary. We want to avoid needless complications.
quotes.author: Donald A. Norman

quotes.quote: ComplexityÂ is your enemy. Any fool can make something complicated. It is hard to keep things simple.
quotes.author: Richard Branson

quotes.quote: InÂ complexity, it is only simplicity that can be interesting.
quotes.author: Steven Weinberg

quotes.quote: The complex develops out of the simple.Â
quotes.author: Colin Wilson

quotes.quote: Failing to grapple withÂ complexityÂ actually turns out to be a pretty bad life strategy.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: ComplexityÂ is one of the great problems in environmental design.
quotes.author: Christopher Alexander

quotes.quote: HumanÂ complexityÂ can be conquered with calmness.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Complexity is the main enemy of security.Â
quotes.author: Niels Ferguson

quotes.quote: ComplexityÂ can be a trap. You can have a ball developing a phrase, inverting it, playing it in different keys and times and all. But it's really more introspective than communicative. Like a crossword puzzle compared to a poem.
quotes.author: Paul Desmond

quotes.quote: The love ofÂ complexityÂ without reductionism makes art; the love ofÂ complexityÂ with reductionism makes science.
quotes.author: E. O. Wilson

quotes.quote: Why are we so complicated in something so pure and simplistic that would mean me should leave our ego out.
quotes.author: Adrianne Wellman

quotes.quote: We just have to accept the fact that some people are going to stay in our hearts even if they don't stay in our lives.
quotes.author: Ronald Oliver

quotes.quote: Love involves a peculiar unfathomable combination of understanding and misunderstanding.
quotes.author: Diane Arbus

quotes.quote: The more I loved her, the more I hated her. And the more she loved me, the more I harmed myself.
quotes.author: Marvin Gaye

quotes.quote: You are at once both the quiet and the confusion of my heart.
quotes.author: Franz Kafka

quotes.quote: It hurts to love someone and not be loved in return, but what is the most painful is to love someone and never find the courage to let the person know how you feel.
quotes.author: Gary Zukav

quotes.quote: Trying to make someone fall in love with you is about as pointless as trying to control who you fall in love with.
quotes.author: Johnny Depp

quotes.quote: The course of true love never did run smooth.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: She might say she love me, she don't love me like she say she love me.
quotes.author: Drake

quotes.quote: Love is like a rumor,Everyone talks about it,But no one truly knows.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: They just have a complicated picture of what love is or what they think it is and cannot let go of the photo.
quotes.author: Steve Rowland

quotes.quote: Love isn't complicated, people are.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: You never loose by loving...you always loose by holding back.
quotes.author: Loline U Paradero

quotes.quote: Every time I start to ignore you and act as if I don't care, there you go again showing up and messing up my mind.
quotes.author: Xuan Ta

quotes.quote: No one ever loved anyone the way that person wanted to be loved.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: But surely for everything you have to love you have to pay some price.
quotes.author: Agatha Christie

quotes.quote: It's like half of me really wants to be with you and the other half just wants to be over you.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The game of love is complicated, but love is not complicated.
quotes.author: Marty Rubin

quotes.quote: Love is the easiest thing there is. It's the layers of doubt, fear, and expectation that make it complicated.
quotes.author: Luanne Rice

quotes.quote: It's scary being loved. Because life is complicated and all too often it throws you off balance by sending you the right person at the wrong time.
quotes.author: Guillaume Musso

quotes.quote: Love took a lot of different forms and sometimes what appeared to be love wasn't really love at all, was just infatuation in disguise.
quotes.author: Larry Brown

quotes.quote: Love is like quicksilver in the hand. Leave the fingers open and it stays. Clutch it, and it darts away.
quotes.author: Dorothy Parker

quotes.quote: All love shifts and changes. I don't know if you can be wholeheartedly in love all the time.
quotes.author: Julie Andrews

quotes.quote: It is difficult to know at what moment love begins; it is less difficult to know it has begun.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: Follow love and it will flee, flee love and it will follow.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: The heart has reasons that reason does not understand.
quotes.author: Jacques Benigne Bossuel

quotes.quote: Love can change a person the way a parent can change a baby: awkwardly, and often with a great deal of mess.
quotes.author: Lemony Snicket

quotes.quote: Love is the hardest habit to break, and the most difficult to satisfy.
quotes.author: Drew Barrymore

quotes.quote: One's first love is always perfect until one meets one's second love.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Aston

quotes.quote: Loving you is complicated.
quotes.author: Kendrick Lamar

quotes.quote: It's complicated - love. It's so unique every time, with every person. And when the real thing comes along, I guess we just have to hope we see it.
quotes.author: Agnes Nixon

quotes.quote: Love is weird. Love is strange, and that's what makes it love.
quotes.author: Dan Fogelman

quotes.quote: Such a complicated love / Make me wonder / What's the point in crying / Passed the point of trying / I'm afraid that there's no saving us
quotes.author: Antonio Rayo Gibo

quotes.quote: Make me wonder / What's the use of all this? / What else can we call this / Such a complicated love
quotes.author: Antonio Rayo Gibo

quotes.quote: Love is complicated (love) love is complicated / So what you waited for love don't live here / No more I've done all I can do but love you just don't
quotes.author: Le'andria Johnson

quotes.quote: Always knew we will never part but we both know love / Don't come easy that's why love is complicated love / Is complicated (oh) I really want to know why love is so
quotes.author: Le'andria Johnson

quotes.quote: You know its so complicated / First you love then you hate it / Someones laughing, someones crying / Someones living, someones dying / Somebody always loses / And we still play the game
quotes.author: Miranda Lambert

quotes.quote: Tear it up, break it down / Put my heart on your sleeve / And wear it all over town / I know your a player / But you don't play by the rules / And I'm just another / In a long line of fools / Yeah, its so complicated
quotes.author: Miranda Lambert

quotes.quote: Sometimes it don't seem right but who the hell am I to say / Sitting back here trying to figure out love's complicated game / Love's complicated game
quotes.author: Brookes & Johnstone

quotes.quote: Nothing lasts forever / Nothing stays the same / We could make each other crazy / We could figure out a change / Love's complicated game
quotes.author: Brookes & Johnstone

quotes.quote: Complicated, complicated / Love's a complicated game to play / But as complicated as love can be today / I love you baby anyway
quotes.author: Adam Cohen

quotes.quote: Devastated, devastated / Overtaken by your love and swept away / So as complicated and overrated as love can be today / I love you baby anyway
quotes.author: Adam Cohen

quotes.quote: I wish we could go back / To love less complicated / I wish we could go back / Ready to prove our love when they said we couldn't make it, no
quotes.author: Scott Storch

quotes.quote: What is love? / But a kiss on a rainy day / A smile that won't go away / A safe place to run / What is love? / But a complicated simple truth
quotes.author: George Morton

quotes.quote: You paint my body like a rose / A depth of beauty in repose / A complicated love you chose / Where love will land nobody knows / Nobody knows
quotes.author: Kathryn Crutchfield

quotes.quote: Stay tonight / Don't come morning, don't come light / They may be lies, say it, say that we'll be alright / If we stay tonight / My hands are shaking / This is a complicated love with me
quotes.author: Sara Bareilles

quotes.quote: Is it me? Am I so complicated? / Is it me? Or is love over-rated? / Is it me? 'Cause I don't quite understand / Why it never turns out how I thought I planned it
quotes.author: Anthony Dent

quotes.quote: Don't matter what you say / Don't matter what you do / I only wanna do bad things to you / So good, that you can't explain it / What can I say, it's complicated
quotes.author: Camila Cabello

quotes.quote: Am I out of my head? / Am I out of my mind? / If you only knew the bad things I like / Don't think that I can explain it / What can I say, it's complicated
quotes.author: Camila Cabello

quotes.quote: Cause if you're alone, if you're alone / How can I save you? / I find a way to make your love more complicated / What if I could change, if I could change if you could save me? / So find a way to miss a thousand times
quotes.author: James Mcmorrow

quotes.quote: I'm broken in all these ways / Please, love, just give me patience / I'm broken in all these ways / Please, love, just give me patience (yeah) / Love is complicated
quotes.author: Jacob Wilkinson-Smith

quotes.quote: One could say it's complicated, love / Like nothing they've seen before / Or simply that it is a thought we share / Forever it must be ignored
quotes.author: Angel L Olsen

quotes.quote: I don't know what I've seen / Well I feel so complicated and / Our love is kinda jaded / Well I'm coming through the doggy door again woo / Well there ain't no sense in coming home
quotes.author: Mark Mcgrath

quotes.quote: You pretended like we were friends / I was blinded by sentiment / You complicated what love should be / And I could swear that you're using me
quotes.author: Fonzi Thornton

quotes.quote: Maybe there's a reason for the feelings I'm receiving / That I can't comprehend at all / It's our mess and yes I guess we don't need to address / That complicated love never folds
quotes.author: Jamie Lawson

quotes.quote: Love is that condition in which the happiness of another person is essential to your own.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: After all, what is happiness? Love, they tell me. But love doesn't bring and never has brought happiness. On the the contrary, it's a constant state of anxiety, a battlefield; it's sleepless nights, asking ourselves all the time of we're doing the right thing. Real love is composed of ecstasy and agony.
quotes.author: Paolo Coelho

quotes.quote: I will not try to convince you to love me, to respect me, to commit to me. I deserve better than that; I am better than that.. Goodbye.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Love is short, forgetting is so long.
quotes.author: Pablo Neruda

quotes.quote: A woman's happiness is in throwing everything away to live for love.
quotes.author: Ai Yazawa

quotes.quote: Have you ever been in love? Horrible isn't it? It makes you so vulnerable. It opens your chest and it opens up your heart and it means that someone can get inside you and mess you up.
quotes.author: Neil Gaiman

quotes.quote: You don't love someone because they're perfect, you love them in spite of the fact that they're not.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: The cure for love is marriage and the cure for marriage is love again.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Love can sometimes be magic. But magician sometimes..just bean illusion.
quotes.author: Javan

quotes.quote: If you wished to be loved, show more of your faults than your virtues.
quotes.author: Edward G. Bulwer-Lytton

quotes.quote: Love that is not madness is not love.
quotes.author: Pedro Calderon de la Barca

quotes.quote: Love is an emotion experienced by the many and enjoyed by the few.
quotes.author: George Jean Nathan

quotes.quote: You should know that true love doesn't care about distance. It doesn't care about obstacles either. What is meant to be will always be!
quotes.author: Beck Martin

quotes.quote: To love and be loved demands your best.
quotes.author: John A. Andrews

quotes.quote: When you disagree with the ones you love, stick to the current issue. Do not bring back old arguments.
quotes.author: Vincenzo Berghella

quotes.quote: Consider that great love relationship and life goals are risky: if you lose, cherish the lesson anyway.
quotes.author: Vincenzo Berghella

quotes.quote: Love between people almost always has its complications. Because people are complicated.
quotes.author: Richard Templar

quotes.quote: Love can be tried and tested and stretched to its limit. Sometimes we love the wrong person. We can love too much, or not enough.
quotes.author: Richard Templar

quotes.quote: Love is often involved in our highest highs and our deepest lows.
quotes.author: Richard Templar

quotes.quote: Every faulty love or marriage relationship is aggressively hurtful, and devastating to the individuals involved and to the society in which they live. Understanding the ethics of relationships is more profitable. A real love and marriage relationship is a wonderful and sweet union.
quotes.author: Felix O. Jeremiah

quotes.quote: The roots of all goodness lie in the soil of appreciation for goodness.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: He that does good, having the unlimited power to do evil, deserves praise not only for the good which he performs, but for the evil which he forbears.
quotes.author: Sir Walter Scott

quotes.quote: Nature didn't need an operation to be beautiful. It just was.
quotes.author: Scott Westerfeld

quotes.quote: Life is an opportunity, benefit from it. Life is beauty, admire it. Life is a dream, realize it. Life is a challenge, meet it. Life is a duty, complete it. Life is a game, play it. Life is a promise, fulfill it. Life is sorrow, overcome it. Life is a song, sing it. Life is a struggle, accept it. Life is a tragedy, confront it. Life is an adventure, dare it. Life is luck, make it. Life is too precious, do not destroy it. Life is life, fight for it.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: Make it a habit to tell people thank you. To express your appreciation, sincerely and without the expectation of anything in return. Truly appreciate those around you, and you'll soon find many others around you. Truly appreciate life, and you'll find that you have more of it.
quotes.author: Ralph Marston

quotes.quote: No duty is more urgent than that of returning thanks.
quotes.author: James Allen

quotes.quote: Dwell on the beauty of life. Watch the stars, and see yourself running with them.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: I don't care how much money you have, free stuff is always a good thing.
quotes.author: Queen Latifah

quotes.quote: Too often we underestimate the power of a touch, a smile, a kind word, a listening ear, an honest compliment, or the smallest act of caring, all of which have the potential to turn a life around.
quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.quote: Life holds so many simple blessings, each day bringing its own individual wonder.
quotes.author: John McLeod

quotes.quote: To make a man perfectly happy tell him he works too hard, that he spends too much money, that he is ''misunderstood'' or that he is ''different''; none of this is necessarily complimentary, but it will flatter him infinitely more that merely telling him that he is brilliant, or noble, or wise, or good.
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.quote: What really flatters a man is that you think him worth flattering.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: The best things in life are free - and $19.95.
quotes.author: Billy Mays

quotes.quote: Be thankful for what you have; you'll end up having more. If you concentrate on what you don't have, you will never, ever have enough.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Other men it is said have seen angels, but I have seen thee and thou art enough.
quotes.author: George Moore

quotes.quote: Appreciation is a wonderful thing: It makes what is excellent in others belong to us as well.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Forget injuries, never forget kindnesses.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: If you admire somebody, you should go ahead and tell them. People never get the flowers while they can still smell them.
quotes.author: Kanye West

quotes.quote: There is no effect more disproportionate to its cause than the happiness bestowed by a small compliment.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: A lot has been said about politicians; some of it complimentary, but most of it accurate.
quotes.author: Eric Idle

quotes.quote: Sweet is the scene where genial friendship plays the pleasing game of interchanging praise.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.

quotes.quote: Words really flattering are not those which we prepare but those which escape us unthinkingly.
quotes.author: Ninon de L'Enclos

quotes.quote: If you do not appreciate every day of your life, who said that the days and years will be an asset for the future?
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: The best things in life are free. The second-best things are very, very expensive.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: Some people grumble that roses have thorns; I am grateful that thorns have roses.
quotes.author: Alphonse Karr

quotes.quote: We can only be said to be alive in those moments when our hearts are conscious of our treasures.
quotes.author: Thornton Wilder

quotes.quote: When I admire the wonder of a sunset or the beauty of the moon, my soul expands in worship of the Creator.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: When you arise in the morning, think of what a precious privilege it is to be aliveâ€”to breathe, to think, to enjoy, to loveâ€”then make that day count!
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: She was beautiful, but not like those girls in the magazines. She was beautiful, for the way she thought. She was beautiful, for the sparkle in her eyes when she talked about something she loved. She was beautiful, for her ability to make other people smile, even if she was sad. No, she wasn't beautiful for something as temporary as her looks. She was beautiful, deep down to her soul. She is beautiful.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: You have to love yourself or you'll never be able to accept compliments from anyone.
quotes.author: Dean Wareham

quotes.quote: The most sincere compliment we can pay is attention.
quotes.author: Walter Inglis Anderson

quotes.quote: Compliments and criticism are all ultimately based on some form of projection.
quotes.author: Billy Corgan

quotes.quote: No compliment can be eloquent, except as an expression of indifference.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: To pay compliments to the one we love is the first method of caressing, a demi-audacity venturing. A compliment is something like a kiss through a veil.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: The best compliment to a mother is to appreciate her little one.
quotes.author: Anne Bronte

quotes.quote: The best advice is often the compliments received, and they are often about an associate who did something exceptional. I tell my teams that it's the random acts of kindness, the unexpected, that people remember most.
quotes.author: Barry Sternlicht

quotes.quote: Compliments cost nothing, yet many pay dear for them.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: An occasional compliment is necessary to keep up one's self-respect.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: The best compliment to a child or a friend is the feeling you give him that he has been set free to make his own inquiries, to come to conclusions that are right for him, whether or not they coincide with your own.
quotes.author: Alistair Cooke

quotes.quote: Everybody likes a compliment.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Compliments land as soft and gentle on my ears as a butterfly.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: If you can't get a compliment any other way, pay yourself one.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: A compliment is something like a kiss through a veil.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Complimenting someone in an exaggerated way is known as flattery, and flattery will generally get you anything you want.
quotes.author: Lemony Snicket

quotes.quote: The finest compliment you can pay a man is that his word was as good as gold.
quotes.author: Evel Knievel

quotes.quote: Compliments aren't really a journalistic angle.
quotes.author: Sydney Pollack

quotes.quote: The young compliment their greatness on the number of their friends; the old, on the confidence of them.
quotes.author: Norm MacDonald

quotes.quote: No compliment is ever sufficient and every insult, of course, is true.
quotes.author: Jesse Eisenberg

quotes.quote: If people did not compliment one another there would be little society.
quotes.author: Marquis De Vauvenargues

quotes.quote: Compliment people. Magnify their strengths, not their weaknesses.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.quote: A compliment is verbal sunshine
quotes.author: Atharva Veda

quotes.quote: It's still a compliment when you're backed by younger and older, but it's actually unexpected. It's surprising, but for me it's in fact the most beautiful compliment.
quotes.author: Stromae

quotes.quote: Compliment others on the virtues they have; and they're not half as pleased as being complimented for the ones they don't have.
quotes.author: Malcolm Forbes

quotes.quote: It's good to receive compliments, and it's even better to give them.
quotes.author: Jason Harvey

quotes.quote: If your compliments are making women feel uncomfortable, scared, anxious, annoyed or harassed, you're probably not doing them right.
quotes.author: Laura Bates

quotes.quote: A sincere compliment is always grateful to a lady, so long as you don't try to knock her down with it.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: A compliment is usually accompanied with a bow, as if to beg pardon for paying it.
quotes.author: A.W. Hare

quotes.quote: If you have enough people sitting around telling you you're wonderful, then you start believing you're fabulous, then someone tells you you stink and you believe that too.
quotes.author: Angelina Jolie

quotes.quote: Nothing is more effective than sincere, accurate praise, and nothing is more lame than a cookie-cutter compliment.
quotes.author: Bill Walsh

quotes.quote: You yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe, deserve your love and affection.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: There are only three things women need in life food, water, and compliments.
quotes.author: Chris Rock

quotes.quote: If you want to win friends, make it a point to remember them. If you remember my name, you pay me a subtle compliment; you indicate that I have made an impression on you. Remember my name and you add to my feeling of importance.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: A woman will doubt everything you say except it be compliments to herself
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Remember always that you not only have the right to be an individual, you have an obligation to be one.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: If only you could sense how important you are to the lives of those you meet how important you can be to people you may never even dream of. There is something of yourself that you leave at every meeting with another person.
quotes.author: Fred Rogers

quotes.quote: To be trusted is a greater compliment than being loved.
quotes.author: George Macdonald

quotes.quote: Being taken for granted can be a compliment. It means that you've become a comfortable, trusted element in another person's life.
quotes.author: Joyce Brothers

quotes.quote: Your talent is God's gift to you. What you do with it is your gift back to God.
quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.quote: Too often we underestimate the power of a touch, a smile, a kind word, a listening ear, an honest compliment, or the smallest act of caring, all of which have the potential to turn a life around.
quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.quote: Do not offer a compliment and ask a favor at the same time. A compliment that is charged for is not valuable.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: We are prepared for insults, but compliments leave us baffled.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: Pay with compliments and you will always be wealthy.
quotes.author: Michael Dolan

quotes.quote: Women are never disarmed by compliments. Men always are. That is the difference between the sexes.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Ah, nowadays we are all of us so hard up, that the only pleasant things to pay are compliments. They're the only things we can pay.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: It is a great mistake for men to give up paying compliments, for when they give up saying what is charming, they give up thinking what is charming.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Sincerity is the highest compliment you can pay.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Never praise a sister to a sister in the hope of your compliments reaching the proper ears
quotes.author: Rudyard Kipling

quotes.quote: Hunger is never delicate; they who are seldom gorged to the full with praise may be safely fed with gross compliments, for the appetite must be satisfied before it is disgusted.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Get not your friends by bare compliments, but by giving them sensible tokens of your love.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: When envoys are sent with compliments in their mouths, it is a sign that the enemy wishes for a truce.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: Because of your smile, you make life more beautiful.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: The past cannot be changed. The future is yet in your power.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A compliment is something like a kiss through a veil.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: The highest compliment that you can pay me is to say that I work hard every day, that I never dog it.
quotes.author: Wayne Gretzky

quotes.quote: Next to a sincere compliment, I think I like a well-deserved and honest rebuke
quotes.author: William Feather

quotes.quote: Everybody knows how to utter a complaint, but few can express a graceful compliment.
quotes.author: William Feather

quotes.quote: You are very powerful, provided you know how powerful you are.
quotes.author: Yogi Bhajan

quotes.quote: Remember always that the composer's pen is still mightier than the bow of the violinist; in you lie all the possibilities of the creation of beauty.
quotes.author: John Philip Sousa

quotes.quote: Composers shouldn't think too much - it interferes with their plagiarism.
quotes.author: Howard Dietz

quotes.quote: It doesn't necessarily mean at all that the composer plays his own works best.
quotes.author: Leo Ornstein

quotes.quote: The composer opens the cage door for arithmetic, the draftsman gives geometry its freedom.
quotes.author: Jean Cocteau

quotes.quote: Competitions are for horses, not artists.
quotes.author: Bela Bartok

quotes.quote: Composers love to write for symphony orchestras because the symphony is the Rolls Royce of musical instruments.
quotes.author: David Del Tredici

quotes.quote: The composers could no longer direct all performances in person, and so the responsibility of interpreting their works in the spirit in which they had been conceived was placed upon conductors.
quotes.author: Anton Seidl

quotes.quote: Composers are not all good conductors.
quotes.author: Anton Seidl

quotes.quote: A composer is a guy who goes around forcing his will on unsuspecting air molecules, often with the assistance of unsuspecting musicians.
quotes.author: Frank Zappa

quotes.quote: Any composer who is gloriously conscious that he is a composer must believe that he receives his inspiration from a source higher than himself.
quotes.author: John Philip Sousa

quotes.quote: If you're a composer, there's never a moment you're not working.
quotes.author: Ellen Taaffe Zwilich

quotes.quote: The further the music develops, the more complex the apparatus used by the composer to express his thoughts becomes.
quotes.author: Gustav Mahler

quotes.quote: A composer's job involves the decoration of fragments of time.
quotes.author: Frank Zappa

quotes.quote: Every composer's music reflects in its subject-matter and in its style the source of the money the composer is living on while writing the music.
quotes.author: Virgil Thomson

quotes.quote: Many, many composers have only found their way to a certain form, through familiarizing themselves with texts.
quotes.author: Dietrich Fischer-Dieskau

quotes.quote: A composer is not only an architect but also an inventor, and he should not build houses in which he cannot live.
quotes.author: Igor Stravinsky

quotes.quote: The greatest composer does not sit down to work because he is inspired, but becomes inspired because he is working.
quotes.author: Ernest Newman

quotes.quote: Composers should write tunes that chauffeurs and errand boys can whistle.
quotes.author: Thomas Beecham

quotes.quote: Composers are always going back to the past.
quotes.author: Anne Dudley

quotes.quote: A good composer does not imitate; he steals.
quotes.author: Igor Stravinsky

quotes.quote: Every composer knows the anguish and despair occasioned by forgetting ideas which one had no time to write down.
quotes.author: Hector Berlioz

quotes.quote: The old idea of a composer suddenly having a terrific idea and sitting up all night to write it is nonsense. Nighttime is for sleeping.
quotes.author: Benjamin Britten

quotes.quote: A composer knows that music is written by human beings for human beings and that music is a continuation of life, not something separated from it.
quotes.author: Hanns Eisler

quotes.quote: Composers often think in terms of music and not of an instrument itself.
quotes.author: Michala Petri

quotes.quote: God is the composer; you are the song.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Many composers today don't know what the human throat is.
quotes.author: Elisabeth Schwarzkopf

quotes.quote: A good composer is slowly discovered and a bad composer is slowly found out.
quotes.author: Ernest Newman

quotes.quote: The real composer thinks about his work the whole time; he is not always conscious of this, but he is aware of it later when he suddenly knows what he will do.
quotes.author: Igor Stravinsky

quotes.quote: If a composer could say what he had to say in words he would not bother trying to say it in music.
quotes.author: Gustav Mahler

quotes.quote: Composers are the only people who can hear good music above bad sounds.
quotes.author: John Philip Sousa

quotes.quote: If the composer withholds more than we anticipate, we experience a delicious falling sensation; we feel we have been torn from a stable point on the musical ladder and thrust into the void.
quotes.author: Levi Strauss

quotes.quote: Don't compromise yourself. You are all you've got.
quotes.author: Janis Joplin

quotes.quote: Be careful not to compromise what you want most for what you want now.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: All compromise is based on give and take, but there can be no give and take on fundamentals. Any compromise on mere fundamentals is a surrender. For it is all give and no take.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: A compromise is the art of dividing a cake in such a way that everyone believes he has the biggest piece.
quotes.author: Ludwig Erhard

quotes.quote: If you set out to be liked, you would be prepared to compromise on anything at any time, and you would achieve nothing.
quotes.author: Margaret Thatcher

quotes.quote: Compromise is a stalling between two fools.
quotes.author: Stephen Fry

quotes.quote: Compromise means to go just a little bit below what you know is right. It's just a little bit, but it's the little foxes that spoil the vine.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.quote: Compromise is what binds people together. Compromise is sharing and conciliatory, it is loving and kind and unselfish.
quotes.author: Ali Harris

quotes.quote: The 'morality of compromise' sounds contradictory. Compromise is usually a sign of weakness, or an admission of defeat. Strong men don't compromise, it is said, and principles should never be compromised.
quotes.author: Andrew Carnegie

quotes.quote: Compromise cannot be allowed in cases where the exact truth is ascertainable.
quotes.author: Arthur Lynch

quotes.quote: Compromise makes a good umbrella, but a poor roof.
quotes.author: James Russell Lowell

quotes.quote: Compromise, if not the spice of life, is its solidity. It is what makes nations great and marriages happy.
quotes.author: Phyllis McGinley

quotes.quote: Many things are worse than defeat,and compromise with evil is one of them.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Compromise is but the sacrifice of one right or good in the hope of retaining another -- too often ending in the loss of both.
quotes.author: Tryon Edwards

quotes.quote: Compromise is usually bad. It should be a last resort. If two departments or divisions have a problem they can't solve and it comes up to you, listen to both sides and then pick one or the other. This places solid accountability on the winner to make it work. Condition your people to avoid compromise.
quotes.author: Robert Townsend

quotes.quote: Compromise is the best and cheapest lawyer.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: A good compromise is when both parties are dissatisfied.
quotes.author: Larry David

quotes.quote: The compromise will always be more expensive than either of the suggestions it is compromising.
quotes.author: Arthur Bloch

quotes.quote: Compromise is a word found only in the vocabulary of those who have no will to fight—the lazy, the cunning, the cowardly—for they consider themselves defeated before they start.
quotes.author: St Josemaria Escriva

quotes.quote: If you limit your choices only to what seems possible or reasonable, you disconnect yourself from what you truly want, and all that is left is a compromise.
quotes.author: Robert Fritz

quotes.quote: Compromise, while at times morally necessary or at least justifiable, is more often only the first permission for a person (or society) to begin a long downhill descent.
quotes.author: Dennis Prager

quotes.quote: Let us never negotiate out of fear. But let us never fear to negotiate.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: Compromise is like the middle of the road; always safer to walk on than the edges.
quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quotes.quote: Compromise is not about losing. It is about deciding that the other person has just as much right to be happy with the end result as you do.
quotes.author: Donna Martini
