quotes.quote: Some people never learn the art of compromise. Everything is either black or white. They do not recognize, or will not concede, that the equally important color gray is a mixture or black and white.
quotes.author: Waite Phillips

quotes.quote: Most men either compromise or drop their greatest talents and start running after, what they perceive to be, a more reasonable success, and somewhere in between they end up with a discontented settlement. Safety is indeed stability, but it is not progression.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: Compromise used to mean that half a loaf was better than no bread. Among modern statesmen it really seems to mean that half a loaf; is better than a whole loaf.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Life is full of compromises, and whether or not you're willing to negotiate.
quotes.author: Julianne Moore

quotes.quote: Living is a compromise, between doing what you want and doing what other people want.
quotes.author: John Updike

quotes.quote: Learn the wisdom of compromise, for it is better to bend a little than to break.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: When you have to start compromising yourself or your morals for the people around you, it's probably time to change the people around you.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: A computer will do what you tell it to do, but that may be much different from what you had in mind.
quotes.author: Joseph Weizenbaum

quotes.quote: Computers are like air conditioners. They work fine until you start opening windows.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The spread of computers and the Internet will put jobs in two categories. People who tell computers what to do, and people who are told by computers what to do.
quotes.author: Marc Andreessen

quotes.quote: There are 10 types of people in this world: those who understand binary and those who don't.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Right now, computers, which are supposed to be our servant, are oppressing us.
quotes.author: Jef Raskin

quotes.quote: Computers were a kind of magery in themselves, or might as well be to people who didn't understand them, they were every bit as inscrutable.
quotes.author: Orson Scott Card

quotes.quote: Computers themselves, and software yet to be developed, will revolutionize the way we learn.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Computers are quiet and clean and totally distracting because the Internet is there, lying in wait for a moment of weakness to pounce on your creativity and progress.
quotes.author: Arlaina Tibensky

quotes.quote: It's not computer literacy that we should be working on, but sort of human-literacy. Computers have to become human-literate.
quotes.author: Nicholas P. Negroponte

quotes.quote: Computers are hierarchical. We have a desktop and hierarchical files which have to mean everything.
quotes.author: Ted Nelson

quotes.quote: The similarities between humans and computers are more numerous than the differences.
quotes.author: P.A. Scott

quotes.quote: The computer takes up where psychoanalysis left off. It takes the ideas of a decentered self and makes it more concrete by modeling mind as a multiprocessing machine.
quotes.author: Sherry Turkle

quotes.quote: Computers are finite machines; when given the same input, they always produce the same output.
quotes.author: Greg Perry

quotes.quote: Computer science really involves the same mindset, particularly artificial intelligence.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: It's hardware that makes a machine fast. It's software that makes a fast machine slow.
quotes.author: Craig Bruce

quotes.quote: Computers no longer interface with humans they interact, and the interaction will become steadily deeper, more subtle, and more crucial to our collective sanity and ultimate survival.
quotes.author: Alan Cooper

quotes.quote: The computer was born to solve problems that did not exist before.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: Computers have lots of memory but no imagination.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Computer system analysis is like child-rearing; you can do grievous damage, but you cannot ensure success.
quotes.author: Tom DeMarco

quotes.quote: The real danger is not that computers will begin to think like men, but that men will begin to think like computers.
quotes.author: Sydney J. Harris

quotes.quote: If you don't know anything about computers, just remember that they are machines that do exactly what you tell them but often surprise you in the result.
quotes.author: Richard Dawkins

quotes.quote: The attention span of a computer is only as long as its power cord.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: It is only when they go wrong that machines remind you how powerful they are.
quotes.author: Clive James

quotes.quote: The basis of computer work is predicated on the idea that only the brain makes decisions and only the index finger does the work.
quotes.author: Brian Eno

quotes.quote: The best computer is a man, and it's the only one that can be mass-produced by unskilled labor.
quotes.author: Wernher von Braun

quotes.quote: Our first computers were born not out of greed or ego, but in the revolutionary spirit of helping common people rise above the most powerful institutions.
quotes.author: Steve Wozniak

quotes.quote: A computer lets you make more mistakes faster than any invention in human history with the possible exceptions of handguns and tequila.
quotes.author: Mitch Ratcliffe

quotes.quote: Computers are composed of nothing more than logic gates stretched out to the horizon in a vast numerical irrigation system.
quotes.author: Stan Augarten

quotes.quote: Computers make it easier to do a lot of things, but most of the things they make it easier to do don't need to be done.
quotes.author: Andy Rooney

quotes.quote: Computers are incredibly fast, accurate and stupid. Human beings are incredibly slow, inaccurate and brilliant. Together they are powerful beyond imagination.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Computers can figure out all kinds of problems, except the things in this world that just don't add up.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: The new world will be a place of answers and no questions, because the only questions left will be answered by computers, because only computers will know what to ask.
quotes.author: James Cameron

quotes.quote: Computers are heaven-sent when they work and hell-spawn when they don't. There's just not much middle ground when it comes to technology.
quotes.author: Dani Harper

quotes.quote: Computers are magnificent tools for the realization of our dreams, but no machine can replace the human spark of spirit, compassion, love, and understanding.
quotes.author: Louis V. Gerstner, Jr.

quotes.quote: To err is human, to really foul things up requires a computer.
quotes.author: Bill Vaughan

quotes.quote: The computer will not make a good manager out of a bad manager. It makes a good manager better faster and a bad manager worse faster.
quotes.author: Edward M. Esber

quotes.quote: Computers are famous for being able to do complicated things starting from simple programs.
quotes.author: Seth Lloyd

quotes.quote: The computer brings out the uptight perfectionist in us- we start editing ideas before we have them.
quotes.author: Austin Kleon

quotes.quote: All sorts of computer errors are now turning up. You'd be surprised to know the number of doctors who claim they are treating pregnant men.
quotes.author: Isaac Asimov

quotes.quote: A computer is almost human except that it does not blame its mistakes on another computer.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: It was one thing to use computers as a tool, quite another to let them do your thinking for you.
quotes.author: Tom Clancy

quotes.quote: Computers are great tools, but they need to be applied to the physical world.
quotes.author: Tony Fadell

quotes.quote: Computers do the calculating to allow people to transform the world.
quotes.author: Conrad Wolfram

quotes.quote: Computer assisted proofs are getting better and better and computers will play a bigger and bigger role in the future.
quotes.author: Enrico Bombieri

quotes.quote: As a rule, software systems do not work well until they have been used, and have failed repeatedly, in real applications.
quotes.author: Dave Parnas

quotes.quote: The computer is incredibly fast, accurate, and stupid. Man is unbelievably slow, inaccurate, and brilliant. The marriage of the two is a force beyond calculation.
quotes.author: Leo Cherne

quotes.quote: Computers are like old testament gods; lots of rules and no mercy.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: Computers creating art is an upsetting concept mostly because of what it means about humans.
quotes.author: Jonny Lee Miller

quotes.quote: Bad economics teaches that computers can design markets. Good economics teaches that markets can design computers.
quotes.author: Jakub Bozydar Wisniewski

quotes.quote: Our computers have become windows through which we can gaze upon a world that is virtually without horizons or boundaries.
quotes.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quotes.quote: Computers can be made to direct the performance of any machine.
quotes.author: Frank Herbert

quotes.quote: There is nothing the computer can do that the human mind cannot do.
quotes.author: Vasudev Vasanthi

quotes.quote: There is no limit. The computer merely takes a finite amount of data and performs a finite amount of operations.
quotes.author: Vasudev Vasanthi

quotes.quote: Computer science is no more about computers than astronomy is about telescopes.
quotes.author: Bradley Miller

quotes.quote: Computers help us communicate quickly and efficiently with others throughout the world.
quotes.author: Bradley Miller

quotes.quote: The computer which has altered our lives almost as much as the automobile and may ultimately surpass it in influence.
quotes.author: Bradley Miller

quotes.quote: Computers come in all shapes and sizes. Some are small and inexpensive. Some are huge and very expensive.
quotes.author: Gerald S. Snyder

quotes.quote: Our first computers were born not out of greed or ego, but in the revolutionary spirit of helping common people rise above the most powerful institutions.
quotes.author: David A. Price

quotes.quote: We build our computers the way we build our cities—over time, without a plan.
quotes.author: Ellen Ullman

quotes.quote: Computers are simultaneously celebrated as a more optimal choice for making social decisions.
quotes.author: Dale Hample

quotes.quote: Computers have no idea what goes on outside of them except what humans tell them.
quotes.author: Ellen Ullman

quotes.quote: Computer represents deliberate mock-up or artificial imitation of human intellectual activity.
quotes.author: Marcello Barbieri

quotes.quote: Magical boxes called computers which are apparently able to transform any kind of information to a binary code of zeros and ones.
quotes.author: Freya Schiwy

quotes.quote: Remember, when you connect with another computer, you're connecting to every computer that computer has connected to.
quotes.author: Dennis Miller

quotes.quote: The computer brings out the uptight perfectionist in us- we start editing ideas before we have them.
quotes.author: Austin Kleon

quotes.quote: Computer does so ingeniously mimic human intelligence that it may significantly shake our confidence in the uses of the mind.
quotes.author: Theodore Roszak

quotes.quote: I do not fear computers. I fear the lack of them.
quotes.author: David Webber

quotes.quote: Computers don't lie, but liars can compute.
quotes.author: Terry Hayes

quotes.quote: Computers are quiet and clean and totally distracting because the Internet is there, lying in wait for a moment of weakness to pounce on your creativity and progress.
quotes.author: Arlaina Tibensky

quotes.quote: Computer is a link to the outside world.
quotes.author: Arlaina Tibensky

quotes.quote: It was one thing to use computers as a tool, quite another to let them do your thinking for you.
quotes.author: Daniel Ventre

quotes.quote: A computer does not smell, if a book is new, it smells great.
quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

quotes.quote: You cannot hold a computer in your hand like you can a book.
quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

quotes.quote: The computer is incredibly fast, accurate, and stupid.
quotes.author: Steven L. Mandell

quotes.quote: Computer Science is the only discipline in which we view adding a new wing to a building as being maintenance.
quotes.author: Jim Horning

quotes.quote: When people think about computer science, they imagine people with pocket protectors and thick glasses who code all night.
quotes.author: Marissa Mayer

quotes.quote: Computer Science: A study akin to numerology and astrology, but lacking the precision of the former and the success of the latter.
quotes.author: Stan Kelly-Bootle

quotes.quote: As you study computer science you develop this wonderful mental acumen, particularly with relational databases, systems analysis, and artificial intelligence.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: People think that computer science is the art of geniuses but the actual reality is the opposite, just many people doing things that build on eachother, like a wall of mini stones.art of geniuses but the actual reality is the opposite, just many people doing things that build on eachother, like a wall of mini stones.
quotes.author: Donald Knuth

quotes.quote: Computer Science is embarrassed by the computer.
quotes.author: Alan Perlis

quotes.quote: Theoretical Computer Science is just as useless as everything we mathematicians do.
quotes.author: Jennifer Tour Chayes

quotes.quote: The first law of computer science: Every problem is solved by yet another indirection.
quotes.author: Bjarne Stroustrup

quotes.quote: Computer science really involves the same mindset, particularly artificial intelligence.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: Computer science is one of the worst things that ever happened to either computers or to science.
quotes.author: Neil Gershenfeld

quotes.quote: Most papers in computer science describe how their author learned what someone else already knew.
quotes.author: Peter Landin

quotes.quote: The goal of Computer Science is to build something that will last at least until we've finished building it.
quotes.author: William C. Brown

quotes.quote: In computer science, we stand on each other's feet.
quotes.author: Brian Reid

quotes.quote: Computer science is fascinating. As you study computer science, you will find that you develop your mind. It is literally like doing Buddhist exercises all day long.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: Computer science is the most misunderstood field there is. You are being paid to solve puzzles. For a person who has practiced meditation in past lives, that is the way your mind works.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: There's a good part of Computer Science that's like magic. Unfortunately there's a bad part of Computer Science that's like religion
quotes.author: Hal Abelson

quotes.quote: Computer science education cannot make anybody an expert programmer any more than studying brushes and pigment can make somebody an expert painter.
quotes.author: Eric S. Raymond

quotes.quote: Computer Science is a science of abstraction - creating the right model for a problem and devising the appropriate mechanizable techniques to solve it.
quotes.author: Alfred Aho

quotes.quote: Computer science needs to be part of the core curriculum - like algebra, biology, physics, or chemistry. We need all schools to teach it, not just 10%.
quotes.author: Brad Feld

quotes.quote: Why is computer science a good field for women? For one thing, that's where the jobs are, and for another, the pay is better than for many jobs, and finally, it's easier to combine career and family.
quotes.author: Madeleine M. Kunin

quotes.quote: I think everyone should get a little exposure to computer science because it really forces you to think in a slightly different way, and it's a skill that you can apply in life in general, whether you end up in computer science or not.
quotes.author: Tony Hsieh

quotes.quote: Computer science is not as old as physics; it lags by a couple of hundred years. However, this does not mean that there is significantly less on the computer scientist's plate than on the physicist's: younger it may be, but it has had a far more intense upbringing!
quotes.author: Richard P Feynman

quotes.quote: Computer science is the operating system for all innovation.
quotes.author: Steve Ballmer

quotes.quote: All problems in Computer Science can be solved by another level of indirection.
quotes.author: Butler Lampson

quotes.quote: Computer science doesn't know how to build complex systems that work reliably. This has been a well-understood problem since the very beginning of programmable computers.
quotes.author: Matt Blaze

quotes.quote: Friendship is made fast by interwoven benefits.
quotes.author: Philip Sidney

quotes.quote: In comradeship is danger countered best.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: People will help each other because there is a sense of camaraderie that springs up, which is a survival tactic. You help them because you know you might need their help later. And that is incredibly reassuring.
quotes.author: Amanda Ripley

quotes.quote: Beautiful is a person whose outside and inside world are in great concord, camaraderie and joint concert.
quotes.author: Anuj

quotes.quote: A good friend is a connection to life - a tie to the past, a road to the future, the key to sanity in a totally insane world.
quotes.author: Lois Wyse

quotes.quote: Men often compete with one another until the day they die. Comradeship consists of rubbing shoulders jocularly with a competitor.
quotes.author: Edward Hoagland

quotes.quote: Children change a lot in terms of personality. Camaraderie that you feel with somebody might not be there a year later.
quotes.author: Mara Wilson

quotes.quote: People who work together will win, whether it be against complex football defenses, or the problems of modern society.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: Men of thought seldom work well together, whereas between men of action there is usually an easy camaraderie.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: Friendship is always a sweet responsibility, never an opportunity.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: The only way to have a friend is to be one.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Like every art form, there are jealousies and angers and competitiveness in magic. But there's camaraderie among magicians, whether you perform it for a living or you're an enthusiast.
quotes.author: Ricky Jay

quotes.quote: You can't substitute material things for love or for gentleness or for tenderness or for a sense of comradeship. Money is not a substitute for tenderness, and power is not a substitute for tenderness.
quotes.author: Mitch Albom

quotes.quote: Emancipated women found out that the honesty, generosity, and camaraderie of men was a lie.
quotes.author: Shulamith Firestone

quotes.quote: There really is a camaraderie among chefs and a willingness to help out whenever we can.
quotes.author: Rocco DiSpirito

quotes.quote: Friendship flourishes at the fountain of forgiveness.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.quote: Men can, of course, be stirred into life by being dressed up in uniforms and made to blare out chants of war. It must be confessed that this is one way for men to break bread with comrades and to find what they are seeking, which is a sense of something universal, of self-fulfillment. But of this bread men die.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: We developed a firm, practical feeling of solidarity, which grew, on the battlefield, into the best thing that the war produced - comradeship in arms.
quotes.author: Erich Maria Remarque

quotes.quote: A true friend doesn't have guts; they beat you up and later plead with you to beat them back.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote:
Brotherhood is not just a Bible word.
Out of comradeship can come and will come the happy life for all.
quotes.author: Heywood Broun

quotes.quote: A trusty comrade is always of use; and a chronicler still more so.
quotes.author: Arthur Conan Doyle

quotes.quote: There is a sort of camaraderie that rarely exists except between men who have fought the same enemies and know the same women.
quotes.author: Patrick Rothfuss

quotes.quote: Ultimately, it's a sense of camaraderie and friendship with local people that is core to my journeys.
quotes.author: Tim Cope

quotes.quote: Friendship always benefits; love sometimes injures.
quotes.author: Seneca The Younger

quotes.quote: Alone we can do so little; together we can do so much.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Friendship doubles your joys, and divides your sorrows.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: It is difficult to love someone who loves you, but easy to hate someone who loves you, and love someone who hates you.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: Teamwork is so important that it is virtually impossible for you to reach the heights of your capabilities or make the money that you want without becoming very good at it.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: What's in a life without Camaraderie? For setting sail on a ship with a band of merry brothers by your side is much more gratifying than drifting aimlessly on a boat lost alone at sea.
quotes.author: Saim .A. Cheeda

quotes.quote: Talent wins games, but teamwork and intelligence wins championships.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.quote: Certainly when, you know, you put a lot of creative people together, there's ego and tension and all that stuff comes into play. But on the flip side, there's a lot of camaraderie and closeness.
quotes.author: Darren Star

quotes.quote: The achievements of an organization are the results of the combined effort of each individual.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: CamaraderieÂ ends when crime begins.
quotes.author: Simon Wiesenthal

quotes.quote: The morale and the camaraderie that we had for one another earlier in the year is starting to come under duress because of all the losses. Some of the guys are feeling the pressure now from the last year when they were not successful.
quotes.author: Bill Russell

quotes.quote:
Intellectual comradeship requires that you think your
thoughts through to the place where you can make the complex seem simple, the obscure quite clear.
quotes.author: David Seabury

quotes.quote: Once we are bound together to our brothers by a common good that is outside us, then we can breathe. Experience teaches us that love is not to gaze at one another but to gaze in the same direction. There is no comradeship except through unity on the same rope, climbing towards the same peak.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: Friendship requires great communication.
quotes.author: Saint Francis De Sales

quotes.quote: They walked arm in arm, occupying the whole width of the street and taking in every Musketeer they met, so that in the end it became a triumphal march. The heart of D’Artagnan swam in delirium; he marched between Athos and Porthos, pressing them tenderly.
quotes.author: Alexandre Dumas

quotes.quote: If I miss anything about the sport, it's the camaraderie of old teammates.
quotes.author: Bo Jackson

quotes.quote: All they expect from you is your best effort. These Marines think that they are special. They are very well trained, very close knit, and they don't like outsiders. If you want their respect, you will have to earn it.
quotes.author: Bruce H. Norton

quotes.quote: Camaraderie doesn't happen by accident; developing a strong sense of trust, accountability, and togetherness around team goals requires intentional effort.
quotes.author: Don Yaeger

quotes.quote: The marathon is a charismatic event. It has everything. It has drama, competition, camaraderie & heroism
quotes.author: Fred Lebow

quotes.quote: Golf is 20 percent mechanics and technique. The other 80 percent is philosophy, humor, tragedy, romance, melodrama, companionship, camaraderie, cussedness and conversation.
quotes.author: Grantland Rice

quotes.quote: The Games are just a nice, positive way to build friendships, camaraderie and, of course, self-esteem. Plus, the Games are a great opportunity for people to participate in sports who normally wouldn't.
quotes.author: Greg Louganis

quotes.quote: He who is ready to despair in solitary peril, plucks up a heart in the presence of another. In a plurality of comrades is much countenance and consolation.
quotes.author: Herman Melville

quotes.quote: It is an absolute human certainty that no one can know his own beauty or perceive a sense of his own worth until it has been reflected back to him in the mirror of another loving, caring human being.
quotes.author: John Joseph Powell

quotes.quote: Sometimes it’s just surreal out there, while you’re running a marathon. People just standing out in the cold, even the rain, cheering for you, blasting music for you. It’s an awesome show of camaraderie and community.
quotes.author: John Roberts

quotes.quote: All of them had a restlessness in common.
quotes.author: John Steinbeck

quotes.quote: Sports are such a great teacher. I think of everything they've taught me camaraderie, humility, how to resolve differences.
quotes.author: Kobe Bryant

quotes.quote: When creatively passionate people get together to start a company, the energy and camaraderie is really pretty stimulating.
quotes.author: Lee Clow

quotes.quote: It was enough just to sit there without words.
quotes.author: Louise Erdrich

quotes.quote: What a group we were. A pregnant girl in love, a kindly shoemaker, an orphan boy, a blind girl, and a giantess who complained that everyone was in her way when she herself took up the most room. And me, a lonely girl who missed her family and begged for a second chance.
quotes.author: Ruta Sepetys

quotes.quote: Eyes shining, mouths open, triumphant, they savored the right of domination. They were lifted up: were friends.
quotes.author: William Golding

quotes.quote: Concentration and mental toughness are the margins of victory
quotes.author: Bill Russell

quotes.quote: Concentration can be cultivated. One can learn to exercise will power, discipline one's body and train one's mind.
quotes.author: Anil Ambani

quotes.quote: Concentration can be difficult to obtain, but once one has a firm hold on it, then it can be difficult to let go.
quotes.author: Lauren Lola

quotes.quote: The power to concentrate was the most important thing. Living without this power would be like opening one's eyes without seeing anything.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: Concentration is the key to economic results. No other principles of effectiveness is violated as constantly today as the basic principle of concentration.
quotes.author: Peter F. Drucker

quotes.quote: Focus on remedies, not faults.
quotes.author: Jack Nicklaus

quotes.quote: Concentration is the key to success in anything in life. You need concentration to carry on a conversation, to raise children, to stay positive, to be able to communicate effectively, to succeed academically, to meditate, to succeed in business, to become good at sports, to achieve the goals you set for yourself, and the list can go on and on.
quotes.author: Gudjon Bergmann

quotes.quote: Focus on the journey, not the destination. Joy is found not in finishing an activity but in doing it.
quotes.author: Greg Anderson

quotes.quote: Concentration and mental toughness are the margins of victory.
quotes.author: Bill Russell

quotes.quote: Concentration is the doorway through which the meditative state becomes available.
quotes.author: Gudjon Bergmann

quotes.quote: Concentration is the key to results. No other principles of effectiveness is violated as constantly today as the basic principle of concentration.
quotes.author: Peter F. Drucker

quotes.quote: The ability to concentrate and to use time well is everything.
quotes.author: Lee Iacocca

quotes.quote: To be concentrated means to live fully in the present.
quotes.author: Erich Fromm

quotes.quote: Discipline and concentration are a matter of being interested.
quotes.author: Tom Kite

quotes.quote: Concentration is the factor that causes the great discrepancy between men and the results they achieve the difference in their power of calling together all the rays of their ability and concentrating on one point.
quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.quote: Concentration is the secret of strength
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Concentration is the ability to think about absolutely nothing when it is absolutely necessary.
quotes.author: Ray Knight

quotes.quote: To be able to concentrate for a considerable time is essential to difficult achievement.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Concentration is the secret of strength in politics, in war, in trade, in short in all management of human affairs.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Concentration is a fine antidote to anxiety.
quotes.author: Jack Nicklaus

quotes.quote: Concentration is a form of exclusion, and where there is exclusion, there is a thinker who excludes.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: Concentrated attention is the collection of units of power on a chosen point of intention.
quotes.author: James Arthur Ray

quotes.quote: Concentrate on the here and now. The future can take care of itself.
quotes.author: Christopher G. Nuttall

quotes.quote: The focus and the concentration and the attention to detail that flying takes is a kind of meditation. I find it restful and engaging, and other things slip away.
quotes.author: Harrison Ford

quotes.quote: Concentration is the creation of the instrument; meditation is the right use of it; contemplation transcends it.
quotes.author: Christmas Humphreys

quotes.quote: When you fully focus your mind, concentrate on what matters, power of concentration you make others attracted to you.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: Focus is a matter of deciding what things you're not going to do.
quotes.author: John Carmack

quotes.quote: Concentrate all your thoughts upon the work at hand. The sun's rays do not burn until brought to a focus.
quotes.author: Alexander Graham Bell

quotes.quote: Concentration comes out of a combination of confidence and hunger.
quotes.author: Arnold Palmer

quotes.quote: Concentration is a cornerstone of mindfulness practice. Your mindfulness will only be as robust as the capacity of your mind to be calm and stable. Without calmness, the mirror of mindfulness will have an agitated and choppy surface and will not be able to reflect things with any accuracy.
quotes.author: Jon Kabat Zinn

quotes.quote: Concentration is my motto first honesty, then industry, then concentration.
quotes.author: Andrew Carnegie

quotes.quote: The secret of concentration is the secret of self-discovery. You reach inside yourself to discover your personal resources, and what it takes to match them to the challenge.
quotes.author: Arnold Palmer

quotes.quote: You must stay focused on the end result to achieve your goals.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Concentration is a powerful force, it is the mark of seriousness that attracts certain energies to complete your half done work.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: Concentration of wealth yields concentration of political power. And concentration of political power gives rise to legislation that increases and accelerates the cycle.
quotes.author: Noam Chomsky

quotes.quote: Concentration is my motto - first honesty, then industry, then concentration.
quotes.author: Andrew Carnegie

quotes.quote: Concentration, itself, is nothing but a matter of control of the attention! Learn to fix your attention on a given subject, at will, for whatever length of time you choose, and you will have learned the secret passage way to power and plenty! This is concentration!
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: Concentrate, play your game, and don't be afraid to win.
quotes.author: Louisa May Alcott

quotes.quote: Concentration of the mind is in a way common to both Knowledge and Yoga. Yoga aims at union of the individual with the universal, the Reality. This Reality cannot be new. It must exist even now, and it does exist.
quotes.author: Ramana Maharshi

quotes.quote: Just relax. Stuff comes in time. It's the concentration that you have to exert.
quotes.author: Wynton Marsalis

quotes.quote: To imagine something, to closely focus one's thoughts upon it, has the potential to bring that 'something' into being.
quotes.author: Malidoma Some

quotes.quote: You should concentrate on the heights which you are determined to reach, not look back into the depths to which you once fell.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King

quotes.quote: You must see your goals clearly and specifically before you can set out for them. Hold them in your mind until they become second nature.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: There's nothing mysterious about success. It's the ability to stay mentally locked in.
quotes.author: Montel Williams

quotes.quote: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
quotes.author: Siddhartha Gautama Buddha

quotes.quote: A proof tells us where to concentrate our doubts.
quotes.author: Morris Kline

quotes.quote: You get what you concentrate upon. There is no main rule.
quotes.author: Jane Roberts

quotes.quote: Focus on what you can do not on what you cannot do.
quotes.author: I.C. Robledo

quotes.quote: Distinguish between real needs and artificial wants and control the latter.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: The earlier you learn that you should focus on what you have, and not obsess about what you don't have, the happier you'll be.
quotes.author: I.C. Robledo

quotes.quote: Nothing can add more power to your life than concentrating all your energies on a limited set of targets.
quotes.author: Nido Qubei

quotes.quote: You don't concentrate on risks. You concentrate on results. No risk us too great to prevent the necessary job from getting done.
quotes.author: Charles Yeager

quotes.quote: It is those how concentrate on but one thing at a time who advance in this world.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.quote: We aim above the mark to hit the mark.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: I never could have done what I have done without the habits of punctuality, order, and diligence, without the determination to concentrate myself on one subject at a time.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: There are two ways to look at life and the world. We can see the good or the bad, the beautiful or the ugly. Both are there, and what we focus on and choose to see is what brings us feelings of joy or feelings of despair.
quotes.author: Lloyd Newell

quotes.quote: Most people have no idea of the giant capacity we can immediately command when we focus all of our resources on mastering a single area of our lives.
quotes.author: Anthony Robbins

quotes.quote: The successful warrior is the average man, with laser like focus.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: If you focus on results, you will never change. If you focus on change, you will get results.
quotes.author: Jack Dixon

quotes.quote: Do not let what you can't do interfere with what you can do.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: Keep your mind on the things you want and off the things you don't want.
quotes.author: Hannah Whitall Smith

quotes.quote: Visualize this thing you want. See it, feel it, believe in it. Make your mental blueprint and begin.
quotes.author: Robert Collier

quotes.quote: When you develop a game plan to get what you want, you will develop a belief that you can get it.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: To be successful, your personal plan must focus on what you want, not what you have.
quotes.author: Nido Qubein

quotes.quote: Focus on where you want to go, not where you're currently are.
quotes.author: Thomas J. Vilord

quotes.quote: The only thing you have to fear is not giving one hundred percent.
quotes.author: Thomas J. Vilord

quotes.quote: Life is short. Focus from this day forward on making a difference.
quotes.author: Thomas J. Vilord

quotes.quote: Our thoughts determine our responses to life.
quotes.author: John Taylor Wood

quotes.quote: We are not victims of the world. To the extent that we control our thought, we control the world.
quotes.author: John Taylor Wood

quotes.quote: As soon as you concern yourself with the 'good' and 'bad' of your fellows, you create an opening in your heart for maliciousness to enter. Testing, competing with, and criticizing others weaken and defeat you.
quotes.author: Morihei Ueshiba

quotes.quote: A lion doesn't concern itself with the opinion of sheep.
quotes.author: George R. R. Martin

quotes.quote: Concern should drive us into action and not into a depression. No man is free who cannot control himself.
quotes.author: Pythagoras

quotes.quote: A sense of concern for others gives our lives meaning; it is the root of all human happiness.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Concern yourself more with accepting responsibility than with assigning blame. Let the possibilities inspire you more than the obstacles discourage you
quotes.author: Ralph Marston

quotes.quote: Conduct is three-fourths of our life and its largest concern.
quotes.author: Matthew Arnold

quotes.quote: Self-concern without other-concern is like a tributary that has no outward flow to the ocean.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: Concern for man and his fate must always form the chief interest of all technical endeavors. Never forget this in the midst of your diagrams and equations.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: It is your concern when your neighbor's wall is on fire.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: An individual has not started living until he can rise above the narrow confines of his individualistic concerns to the broader concerns of humanity.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: The moment a little boy is concerned with which is a jay and which is a sparrow, he can no longer see the birds or hear them sing.
quotes.author: Eric Berne

quotes.quote: True love is not so much a matter of romance as it is a matter of anxious concern for the well-being of one's companion.
quotes.author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quotes.quote: We should all be concerned about the future because we will have to spend the rest of our lives there.
quotes.author: Charles F. Kettering

quotes.quote: Be more concerned with your character than your reputation, because your character is what you really are, while your reputation is merely what others think you are.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: Compassion is not weakness, and concern for the unfortunate is not socialism.
quotes.author: Hubert H. Humphrey

quotes.quote: Concerning great things one should either be silent or speak loftily.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Pity may represent little more than the impersonal concern which prompts the mailing of a check, but true sympathy is the personal concern which demands the giving of one's soul.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: All concerns of men go wrong when they wish to cure evil with evil.
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.quote: The great thought, the great concern, the great anxiety of men is to restrict, as much as possible, the limits of their own responsibility.
quotes.author: Giosue Borsi

quotes.quote: Our concern for the loss of our friends is not always from a sense of their worth, but rather of our own need of them and that we have lost some who had a good opinion of us.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: Any concern too small to be turned into a prayer is too small to be made into a burden.
quotes.author: Corrie ten Boom

quotes.quote: A fundamental concern for others in our individual and community lives would go a long way in making the world the better place we so passionately dreamt of.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: The world will find out that part of your character which concerns it: that which especially concerns yourself, it will leave for you to discover.
quotes.author: Arthur Helps

quotes.quote: Where consciousness is concerned, the appearance is the reality.
quotes.author: John Searle

quotes.quote: Where nature is concerned, familiarity breeds love and knowledge, not contempt.
quotes.author: Stewart Udall

quotes.quote: Man's greatest concern is to know how he shall properly fill his place in the universe and correctly understand what he must be in order to be a man.
quotes.author: Immanuel Kant

quotes.quote: The sage has no concern for himself, but makes the concerns of others his own.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.quote: Concern yourself not with what you tried and failed in, but with what it is still possible for you to do.
quotes.author: Pope John XXIII

quotes.quote: Everyone's a millionaire where promises are concerned.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: It is not possible for minds degraded by a host of trivial concerns to ever rise to anything great.
quotes.author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

quotes.quote: A man's concern, even his despair, over the worthwhileness of life is an existential distress but by no means a mental disease.
quotes.author: Viktor Frankl

quotes.quote: A concert is not a live rendition of our album. It's a theatrical event.
quotes.author: Freddie Mercury

quotes.quote: We can succeed only by concert. It is not, 'Can any of us imagine better,' but, 'Can we all do better?'
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: A concert is always like a feast day to me.
quotes.author: James Taylor

quotes.quote: An artist, in giving a concert, should not demand an entrance fee but should ask the public to pay, just before leaving as much as they like. From the sum he would be able to judge what the world thinks of him — and we would have fewer mediocre concerts.
quotes.author: Kit Coleman

quotes.quote: How times and seasons are in concert! Spring is suggestive of morning, summer of noon, autumn of evening, and winter of night.
quotes.author: Henry James Slack

quotes.quote: In reading, a lonely quiet concert is given to our minds; all our mental faculties will be present in this symphonic exaltation.
quotes.author: Stephane Mallarme

quotes.quote: Heaven answers with us the same purpose that the tuning-fork does with musicians. Our affections, the whole orchestra of them, are apt to get below the concert-pitch; and we take heaven to tune our hearts by.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: 'Concert' doesn’t mean standing up like a target in front of thousands of strangers. It means coming together. It means harmony.
quotes.author: Gayle Forman

quotes.quote: Diplomacy without arms is like a concert without a score.
quotes.author: Frederick The Great

quotes.quote: All my concerts had no sounds in them; they were completely silent. People had to make up their own music in their minds!
quotes.author: Yoko Ono

quotes.quote: Parents and children seldom act in concert: each child endeavors to appropriate the esteem or fondness of the parents, and the parents, with yet less temptation, betray each other to their children.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: It is hard to mesmerize ourselves, to whip our own top; but through sympathy we are capable of energy and endurance. Concert fires people to a certain fury of performance they can rarely reach alone.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: It takes generosity to discover the whole through others. If you realize you are only a violin, you can open yourself up to the world by playing your role in the concert.
quotes.author: Jacques Yves Cousteau

quotes.quote: Ultimate truth, if there be such a thing, demands the concert of many voices.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: My mother was the concert master of the symphony. Absurdity and eccentricity were not criticized.
quotes.author: Martin Short

quotes.quote: We are each a concert reverberating with our whole lives and reflecting and amplifying the world around us.
quotes.author: Natalie Goldberg

quotes.quote: In the concert of nature it is hard to keep in tune with oneself if one is out of tune with everything else.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.quote: Independent of others and in concert with others, your main task in life is to do what you can best do and become what you can potentially be.
quotes.author: Erich Fromm

quotes.quote: Complete strangers can stand silent next to each other in an elevator and not even look each other in the eye. But at a concert, those same strangers could find themselves dancing and singing together like best friends. That's the power of music.
quotes.author: LZ Granderson

quotes.quote: We shall fight for a universal dominion of right by such a concert of free peoples as shall bring peace and safety to all nations and make the world itself at last free.
quotes.author: Woodrow Wilson

quotes.quote: If the audience walks out of a concert thinking, What a wonderful experience, then we have done our job.
quotes.author: Emanuel Ax

quotes.quote: The great problem of the concert hall is that the shoebox is the ideal shape for acoustics but that no architect worth their names wants to build a shoebox.
quotes.author: Rem Koolhaas

quotes.quote: It was like being in the eye of a hurricane. You'd wake up in a concert and think, Wow, how did I get here?
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: The voice of flattery affects us after it has ceased, just as after a concert men find some agreeable air ringing in their ears to the exclusion of all serious business.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: The concert is a polite form of self induced torture.
quotes.author: Henry Miller

quotes.quote: Only in a concert situation do I have access to people directly to preach to them, and I don't believe that the bigger your platform is, the more people will pay attention.
quotes.author: Larry Norman

quotes.quote: A concert is a concert is a concert is a concert. An album is an album is an album is an album. Musically, both have nothing in common.
quotes.author: Klaus Schulze

quotes.quote: Communication is a continual balancing act, juggling the conflicting needs for intimacy and independence. To survive in the world, we have to act in concert with others, but to survive as ourselves, rather than simply as cogs in a wheel, we have to act alone.
quotes.author: Deborah Tannen

quotes.quote: I really feel that a concert is a place where you can bring up topics, and you can actually discuss them and feel them and have a great time.
quotes.author: Ann Wilson

quotes.quote: Working together in concert more smoothly not only helps us move more quickly; it changes the nature of what we can undertake. When we have the confidence that we can orchestrate the group effort required to realize them, we dare bigger dreams.
quotes.author: Justin Rosenstein

quotes.quote: Hasty conclusions lead to speedy repentance.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: The conclusion does not belong to the artist.
quotes.author: Emile Zola

quotes.quote: Conclusion means death. Confusion means possibility.
quotes.author: Jaggi Vasudev

quotes.quote: The conclusions of passion are the only reliable ones.
quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: A conclusion is the place where you got tired thinking.
quotes.author: Martin H. Fischer

quotes.quote: If you jump to conclusions, you make terrible landings.
quotes.author: Terry McMillan

quotes.quote: Jumping to conclusions is often the only exercise some people get, and is always easier than finding the patience to discover the truth.
quotes.author: Karen White

quotes.quote: Jumping to conclusions rarely gets us anywhere we want to be.
quotes.author: Angel Scott

quotes.quote: Conclusions are ignorance arrested on the path to less ignorance.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.quote: I am forced to the conclusion that modern medicine does not know it all.
quotes.author: Jennifer Worth

quotes.quote: I have come to the conclusion that it is better to be silent than to speak.
quotes.author: Vaslav Nijinsky

quotes.quote: It is presumptuous to draw conclusions about a person from what one has heard.
quotes.author: Jude Morgan

quotes.quote: If a conclusion is not poetically balanced, it cannot be scientifically true.
quotes.author: Isaac Asimov

quotes.quote: Jumping to conclusions is a safer sport in the world of our imagination than it is in reality.
quotes.author: Daniel Kahneman

quotes.quote: You cannot reach a correct conclusion if you begin with an incorrect assumption.
quotes.author: Herbert W. Armstrong

quotes.quote: The only way some of us exercise our minds is by jumping to conclusions.
quotes.author: Cullen Hightower

quotes.quote: I have come to the conclusion that silence and time are the most precious commodities.
quotes.author: Eloisa James

quotes.quote: I came to the conclusion that unrealized hopes, even small ones, were always wrenching.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: The only possible conclusion the social sciences can draw is: some do, some don't.
quotes.author: Ernest Rutherford

quotes.quote: The dominance of conclusions over arguments is most pronounced where emotions are involved.
quotes.author: Daniel Kahneman

quotes.quote: I have come to the conclusion, after many years of sometimes sad experience, that you cannot come to any conclusion at all.
quotes.author: Vita Sackville-West

quotes.quote: False conclusions which have been reasoned out are infinitely worse than blind impulse.
quotes.author: Horace Mann

quotes.quote: I have come to the conclusion that politics are too serious a matter to be left to the politicians.
quotes.author: Charles De Gaulle

quotes.quote: I've come to the conclusion that life is for the taking and just too short to dwell on the negative.
quotes.author: Dolores O'Riordan

quotes.quote: Perhaps the logical conclusion of everyone looking the same is everyone thinking the same.
quotes.author: Scott Westerfeld

quotes.quote: If you come to the conclusion that there is no conclusion, well, that's a conclusion, too.
quotes.author: Jens Lekman

quotes.quote: I have come to the conclusion that it is attitude that determines how you handle and survive life.
quotes.author: Sara Henderson

quotes.quote: Leaving people to jumped conclusions is sometimes simpler than explaining a complicated truth
quotes.author: Gayle Forman

quotes.quote: The usual false conclusions of mankind are these: a thing exists, therefore it has a right to exist.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Any conclusion you reach about yourself has to be an unseen limitation because there's always more to see.
quotes.author: Guy Finley

quotes.quote: Your ideas need not have anything to do with reality. Making conclusions is a sure way of not enhancing our perception.
quotes.author: Jaggi Vasudev

quotes.quote: Always be suspicious of conclusions that reinforce uncritical hope and follow comforting traditions of Western thought.
quotes.author: Stephen Jay Gould

quotes.quote: I've come to the conclusion that everybody should marry, including me.
quotes.author: Anna May Wong

quotes.quote: Conclusions are not always pleasant.
quotes.author: James W. Loewen

quotes.quote: I have come to the conclusion that the most important element in human life is faith.
quotes.author: Rose Kennedy

quotes.quote: Jumping to conclusions, may be an indication of Borderline Personality Disorder ... I thought you should know.
quotes.author: Emma Paul

quotes.quote: Those who jump to conclusions may go wrong.
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.quote: Conclusion: better to be a thinking monk than a postmodern thinker.
quotes.author: Muriel Barbery

quotes.quote: I have come to the conclusion that none of us in our generation feels as guilty about sin as we should or as our forefathers did.
quotes.author: Francis Schaeffer

quotes.quote: Conclusions arrived at through reasoning have very little or no influence in altering the course of our lives.
quotes.author: Carlos Castaneda

quotes.quote: The logical conclusion to a compassionate and respectful relationship to sentient animals is that we stop eating them.
quotes.author: Jonathan Balcombe

quotes.quote: When someone says his conclusions are objective, he means that they are based on prejudices which many other people share.
quotes.author: Celia Green

quotes.quote: In conclusion, there is no conclusion. Things will go on as they always have, getting weirder all the time.
quotes.author: Robert Anton Wilson

quotes.quote: There is no greater mistake than the hasty conclusion that opinions are worthless because they are badly argued.
quotes.author: Thomas Huxley

quotes.quote: The conclusion of design flows naturally from the data; we should not shrink from it; we should embrace it and build on it.
quotes.author: Michael Behe

quotes.quote: A metaphysical conclusion is either a false conclusion or a concealed experimental conclusion.
quotes.author: Hermann von Helmholtz

quotes.quote: The world is just as concrete, ornery, vile, and sublimely wonderful as before, only now I better understand my relation to it and it to me.
quotes.author: Ralph Ellison

quotes.quote: We speak of concrete and not abstract painting because nothing is more concrete, more real than a line, a color, a surface.
quotes.author: Theo van Doesburg

quotes.quote: A house must be built on solid foundations if it is to last. The same principle applies to man, otherwise he too will sink back into the soft ground and becomes swallowed up by the world of illusion.
quotes.author: Sai Baba

quotes.quote: It is in the process of making something that the creator contacts a concrete reality outside his subjective life and moves into the realm of the transcendent.
quotes.author: Joseph C. Zinker

quotes.quote: When we begin to build walls of prejudice, hatred, pride, and self-indulgence around ourselves, we are more surely imprisoned than any prisoner behind concrete walls and iron bars.
quotes.author: Mother Angelica

quotes.quote: Concrete is heavy; iron is hard but the grass will prevail.
quotes.author: Edward Abbey

quotes.quote: The road is a word, conceived elsewhere and laid across the country in the wound prepared for it: a word made concrete and thrust among us.
quotes.author: Wendell Berry

quotes.quote: The beauty of the picture is an abiding concrete of the painter's vision.
quotes.author: Hartley Coleridge

quotes.quote: A city is a crazy concrete jungle whose people at the end of each day somehow make a small step ahead against terrible odds.
quotes.author: Herb Caen

quotes.quote: If there is a construction or a pathway in the spirit to be made, it is the way of godliness.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: Your dreams are like the cement. If you water it with actions, it becomes a hard concrete mass. But if you leave it exposed and unwatered, the air will easily blow it away
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: You can't build a great building on a weak foundation. You must have a solid foundation if you're going to have a strong superstructure.
quotes.author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quotes.quote: Build a solid courage behind what you believe you can do. Your dreams may drift and fall, but when your courage is strong and still, you can't shift; you'll lift your dreams again!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: People have separated from each other with walls of concrete that blocked the roads to connection and love. and Nature has been defeated in the name of development.
quotes.author: Yasunari Kawabata

quotes.quote: Any foundation you build, if trust is part of that foundation, whatever you're building, whatever you're creating is gonna have a rock-solid foundation.
quotes.author: Steve Tisch

quotes.quote: Concrete you can mold, you can press it into after all, you haven't any straight lines in your body. Why should we have straight lines in our architecture? You'd be surprised when you go into a room that has no straight line how marvelous it is that you can feel the walls talking back to you, as it were.
quotes.author: Philip Johnson

quotes.quote: Some minds are like concrete, all mixed up and permanently set.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Concrete is, essentially, the colour of bad weather.
quotes.author: William Hamilton

quotes.quote: There is no reason to design buildings that are more basic and rectilinear, because with concrete you can cover almost any space.
quotes.author: Oscar Niemeyer

quotes.quote: The concrete is a combination of abstractions not an arbitrary or subjective combination but one that corresponds to the laws of the movement of a given phenomenon.
quotes.author: Leon Trotsky

quotes.quote: Your dreams are like cement. If you water it with actions, it becomes a hard concrete mass.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Concrete poets continue to turn out beautiful things, but to me they're more visual than oral, and they almost really belong on the wall rather than in a book. I haven't the least idea of where poetry is going.
quotes.author: James Laughlin

quotes.quote: Your dreams are like the cement. If you water it with actions, it becomes a hard concrete mass. But if you leave it exposed and unwatered, the air will easily blow it away!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Every great building once begun as a building plan. That means, sitting in that building plan on the table is a mighty structure not yet seen. It is the same with dreams.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Concrete is momentarily unformed matter seeking its natural completion, filling in the last corners of its allowed space, finding a form. It is possibility rendered material, hope in an industrial-strength mixer.
quotes.author: Mark Kingwell

quotes.quote: Some minds are like concrete, thoroughly mixed and permanently set.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Concreteness transports us into a story like nothing else. It's the key that unlocks the door of the reader's imagination.
quotes.author: Kim Kautzer

quotes.quote: Everything abstract is ultimately part of the concrete. Everything inanimate finally serves the living. That is why every activity dealing in abstraction stands in ultimate service to a living whole.
quotes.author: Edith Stein

quotes.quote: The practical man demands an appearance of reality at least. Always dealing in the concrete, he regards mathematical terms not as symbols or thought but as images of reality. A system acceptable to the mathematician because of its inner consistency may appear to the practical man to be full of contradictions because of the incomplete manner in which it represents reality.
quotes.author: Tobias Dantzig

quotes.quote: Where knowledge and wisdom truly reside, there can be no space for arrogance and condescension.
quotes.author: Aditi Malhotra

quotes.quote: Better to be despised, then, than to be ignored; or damned with condescending praise.
quotes.author: Joyce Carol Oates

quotes.quote: There are no ugly questions except those clothed in condescension.
quotes.author: John Steinbeck

quotes.quote: The minute you think you have the right to belittle others because you think you're better than them is the same minute you've proven your worse.
quotes.author: Joanne Crisner Alcayaga

quotes.quote: Being condescending is an unintelligent way to make yourself feel superior.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: No matter how educated, talented, rich or cool you believe you are, how you treat people ultimately tell all.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Don't allow someone who talks to you in a snobby, condescending, rude manner get you or intimidate you. That is a sign of an insecure person trying to appear superior to you. Arrogance amd condescension is always a sign of weakness.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Condescension is insecurity's self-defense.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Don't be condescending to unkilled labor. Try it for a half a day first.
quotes.author: Brooks Atkinson

quotes.quote: When people are hurting, what they really need is someone who is fully there for them - not someone who is condescending or officious. The only way for you to be there for them is by facing your fear or anger, whatever feelings cause you to shut down.
quotes.author: Pema Chodron

quotes.quote: The worst mistake you can make with children is to talk to them in a condescending, patronising way and think that you can teach them something. You have to understand that it is you who will be learning from them. You have to get into their world and see things from their perspective.
quotes.author: Magnus Scheving

quotes.quote: But really it's condescending and patronizing not to make fun of someone because they're old or stupid or crippled or morbidly obese. Banged up people don't want your pity. They just want to be treated like everyone else. Mockery, when done without prejudice or discretion, can be a form of respect. It's the closest we'll ever come to true equality.
quotes.author: Paul Neilan

quotes.quote: If a condescending joke is truly funny, make yourself the subject- you will increase the number of people laughing by at least one.
quotes.author: joe harsel

quotes.quote: You ever talk about a movie with someone that read the book? They're always so condescending. 'Ah, the book was much better than the movie.' Oh really? What I enjoyed about the movie: no reading.
quotes.author: Jim Gaffigan

quotes.quote: A patronizing disposition always has it's meaner side.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: We are a society that treats people with disabilities with condescension and pity, not dignity and respect.
quotes.author: Stella Young

quotes.quote: Your pompous attitude and condescending comments have convinced me that you are very smart and important, Said no one ever.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The arrogant are wise in their own eyes, but the wise will recognize their lies.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Just because you look down on everyone doesn't mean they're looking up to you.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The less you respond to rude, critical, argumentative people. The more peaceful your life will become.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: Be of the same mind one toward another. Mind not high things, but condescend to men of low estate. Be not wise in your own conceits.
quotes.author: Bible Quote

quotes.quote: If you do it in peer-level approach, rather than a condescending control approach, you'll have much more success.
quotes.author: Danah Boyd

quotes.quote: Go force your condescending man-logic on the next house. you can go now.
quotes.author: Lisa McMann

quotes.quote: Don't care who the student is, teachers should never be condescending. That should be the first rule in the teacher handbook.
quotes.author: Colleen Hoover

quotes.quote: If 'other people have experiences incorrectly' is annoying to you, think how unbearable it must be to have a condescending stranger tell you they hate the way you're experiencing your life at just the moment you've found something you want to remember.
quotes.author: Randall Munroe

quotes.quote: Nothing on earth hurts my soul deeper than conditional love.
quotes.author: Brooke Bida

quotes.quote: Love between two adults is always conditional. You can fall out of love because you are able to fall in love.
quotes.author: Bryan Cranston

quotes.quote: A man who loves others based solely on how they make him feel, or what they do for him, is really not loving others at all - but loving only himself.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: What is conditional love? Conditional love is an oxymoron. Conditional love is an imposter of love. Conditional love is something other than love, because you cannot conditionalize the un-conditional.
quotes.author: Donald L. Hicks

quotes.quote: In order to survive our youth, many of us became sensitized to which conditions we had to play to, to receive attention. No wonder we mistook this attention for love. We thought love came in finite quantities—it had to be competed for among siblings, or it had to be paid for with exacting dues.
quotes.author: Maureen Brady

quotes.quote: The greatest gift that you can give to others is the gift of unconditional love and acceptance.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: If we have built on the fragile cornerstones of human wisdom, pride, and conditional love, things may look good for a while, but a weak foundation causes collapse when storms hit.
quotes.author: Charles Stanley

quotes.quote: The ultimate lesson all of us have to learn is unconditional love, which includes not only others but ourselves as well.
quotes.author: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross

quotes.quote: If it is conditional, it is not love
quotes.author: Jaggi Vasudev

quotes.quote: We mistakenly assume that if our partners love us they will react and behave in certain ways – the ways we react and behave when we love someone.
quotes.author: John Gray

quotes.quote: Conditional love is love that is turned off and on....Some parents only show their love after a child has done something that pleases them. 'I love you, honey, for cleaning your room!' Children who think they need to earn love become people pleasers, or perfectionists. Those who are raised on conditional love never really feel loved.
quotes.author: Louise Hart

quotes.quote: Intense love does not measure, it just gives.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: A conditional love is nothing but an infatuation, sexuality. Unconditional is the only way love can be. Wherever a condition comes in, love disappears. It cannot live in bondage, and a condition gives it an imprisonment. Love can only live like the vast sky. Love knows no boundaries.
quotes.author: Rajneesh

quotes.quote: If my love is without sacrifice, it is selfish. Such a love is barter, for there is exchange of love and devotion in return for something. It is conditional love.
quotes.author: Sadhu Vaswani

quotes.quote: That was the problem with love. It never happened on your terms, it happened on theirs.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: The only way love can last a lifetime is if it’s unconditional.
quotes.author: Stephen Kendrick

quotes.quote: The real test of love is loving those who we feel are the hardest ones to love.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: Unconditional Love has conditions.
quotes.author: Goitsemang Mvula

quotes.quote: It is a healthy approach not to expect persons to turn out precisely how you would have wished.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: I believe that unarmed truth and unconditional love will have the final word in reality. This is why right, temporarily defeated, is stronger than evil triumphant.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King

quotes.quote: Many a woman would not be in a relationship with or married to her man, if he earned half of what he earns; and many a man would not be in a relationship with or married to his woman, if he earned twice as much as he earns.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: It is the lies he's telling her - as he has been, Nassun understands suddenly, her whole life - that really break her heart. He's said that he loves her, after all, but that obviously isn't true. He cannot love an orogene, and that is what she is. He cannot be an orogene's father, and that is why he constantly demands she be something other than what she is.
quotes.author: N.K. Jemisin

quotes.quote: Believe in yourself! Have faith in your abilities! Without a humble but reasonable confidence in your own powers you cannot be successful or happy.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: When you have confidence, you can have a lot of fun. And when you have fun, you can do amazing things.
quotes.author: Joe Namath

quotes.quote: With confidence, you have won before you have started.
quotes.author: Marcus Garvey

quotes.quote: If you have no confidence in self, you are twice defeated in the race of life.
quotes.author: Marcus Garvey

quotes.quote: You just have to be yourself and go full with confidence and be courageous.
quotes.author: Gabby Douglas

quotes.quote: Confidence... thrives on honesty, on honor, on the sacredness of obligations, on faithful protection and on unselfish performance. Without them it cannot live.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The way to develop self-confidence is to do the thing you fear and get a record of successful experiences behind you.
quotes.author: William Jennings Bryan

quotes.quote: Always be yourself and have faith in yourself. Do not go out and look for a successful personality and try to duplicate it.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: You wouldn't worry so much about what others think of you if you realized how seldom they do.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Low self-confidence isn't a life sentence. Self-confidence can be learned, practiced, and mastered--just like any other skill. Once you master it, everything in your life will change for the better.
quotes.author: Barrie Davenport

quotes.quote: Once we believe in ourselves, we can risk curiosity, wonder, spontaneous delight, or any experience that reveals the human spirit.
quotes.author: E.E. Cummings

quotes.quote: Trust yourself. Create the kind of self that you will be happy to live with all your life. Make the most of yourself by fanning the tiny, inner sparks of possibility into flames of achievement.
quotes.author: Golda Meir

quotes.quote: It is confidence in our bodies, minds, and spirits that allows us to keep looking for new adventures.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Confidence comes not from always being right but from not fearing to be wrong.
quotes.author: Peter T. Mcintyre

quotes.quote: Trust yourself. You know more than you think you do.
quotes.author: Dr. Benjamin Spock

quotes.quote: Confidence is a habit that can be developed by acting as if you already had the confidence you desire to have.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Always remember you are braver than you believe, stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think.
quotes.author: Christopher Robin

quotes.quote: No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: If you're presenting yourself with confidence, you can pull off pretty much anything.
quotes.author: Katy Perry

quotes.quote: As soon as you trust yourself, you will know how to live.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Confidence is the sexiest attribute a woman can have. If you feel good, you'll look good.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: If you love yourself, it will all work out.
quotes.author: Britney Spears

quotes.quote: You must expect great things of yourself before you can do them.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.quote: I have an everyday religion that works for me. Love yourself first, and everything else falls into line.
quotes.author: Lucille Ball

quotes.quote: A flower does not think of competing with the flower next to it. It just blooms.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: If you believe in yourself enough and know what you want, you're gonna make it happen.
quotes.author: Mariah Carey

quotes.quote: Confidence is silent. Insecurities are loud.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: Just believe in yourself. Even if you don't, pretend that you do and, at some point, you will.
quotes.author: Venus Williams

quotes.quote: Self confidence is the best outfit. Rock it and own it.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: It's not who you are that holds you back, it's who you think you're not.
quotes.author: Hanoch McCarty

quotes.quote: Make the most of yourself, for that is all there is of you.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: It is not the mountain we conquer but ourselves.
quotes.author: Edmund Hillary

quotes.quote: Without a humble but reasonable confidence in your own powers you cannot be successful or happy.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: Confidence is preparation. Everything else is beyond your control.
quotes.author: Richard Kline

quotes.quote: Think like a queen. A queen is not afraid to fail. Failure is another stepping stone to greatness.
quotes.author: Oprah

quotes.quote: Why should I care what other people think of me? I am who I am. And who I wanna be.
quotes.author: Avril Lavigne

quotes.quote: Sooner or later, those who win are those who think they can.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: I am, indeed, a king, because I know how to rule myself.
quotes.author: Pietro Aretino

quotes.quote: Confidence, like art, never comes from having all the answers; it comes from being open to all the questions.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: You have to have confidence in your ability, and then be tough enough to follow through.
quotes.author: Rosalynn Carter

quotes.quote: With confidence, you can reach truly amazing heights; without confidence, even the simplest accomplishments are beyond your grasp.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: There is nothing more attractive than confidence, once you see your own beauty, so will everyone else.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: Confidence is not achieved overnight. It can be achieved by learning from mistakes, it can be achieved by learning from experience.
quotes.author: Dr Anil Kr Sinha

quotes.quote: A ship is safe in harbor, but that's not what ships are for.
quotes.author: William Shedd

quotes.quote: They can do all because they think they can.
quotes.author: Vergil

quotes.quote: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
quotes.author: Henry S. Haskins

quotes.quote: Confidence is something you acquire in yourself by believing in self ability with courage and conviction.
quotes.author: Anil Sinha

quotes.quote: Confidence is going after Moby Dick in a rowboat and taking the tartar sauce with you.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: He who is not everyday conquering some fear has not learned the secret of life.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: She stood in the storm, and when the wind did not blow her away, she adjusted her sails.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Edwards

quotes.quote: Anything's possible if you've got enough nerve.
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling

quotes.quote: You cannot swim for new horizons until you have the courage to lose sight of the shore.
quotes.author: William Faulkner

quotes.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The hardest step she ever took was to blindly trust in who she was.
quotes.author: Atticus

quotes.quote: Nothing builds self-esteem and self-confidence like accomplishment.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: What a man thinks of himself, that it is which determines, or rather indicates, his fate.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: All you need in this life and confidence, and then success is sure.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: We know what we are but not what we may be.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Self-trust is the first secret of success.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: A person's worth in this world is estimated according to the value they put on themselves.
quotes.author: Jean De La Bruyere

quotes.quote: Low self-esteem is like driving through life with your hand-break on.
quotes.author: Dr. Maxwell Maltz

quotes.quote: They are the weakest, however strong, who have no faith in themselves or their own powers.
quotes.author: Christian Bovee

quotes.quote: Self-esteem isn't everything; it's just that there's nothing without it.
quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

quotes.quote: Great spirits have often overcome violent opposition from mediocre minds.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: I have great faith in fools; self-confidence my friends call it.
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.quote: Your chances of success in any undertaking can always be measured by your belief in yourself.
quotes.author: Robert Collier

quotes.quote: Confidence is directness and courage in meeting the facts of life.
quotes.author: John Dewey

quotes.quote: As is our confidence, so is our capacity.
quotes.author: William Hazlitt

quotes.quote: Men die of fright and live of confidence.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: You've got to take the initiative and play your game. In a decisive set, confidence is the difference.
quotes.author: Chris Evert

quotes.quote: If you do not believe in yourself, do not blame others for lacking faith in you.
quotes.author: Brendan Francis

quotes.quote: The pleasure that arises from inward serenity is due to the confidence that one has in one's own inner truth.
quotes.author: Yi Jung

quotes.quote: Confidence is that feeling by which the mind embarks on great and honorable courses with a sure hope and trust in itself.
quotes.author: Cicero

quotes.quote: Who has self-confidence will lead the rest.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: To these success gives heart: they can because they think they can.
quotes.author: Virgil

quotes.quote: Confidence imparts a wonderful inspiration to its possessor.
quotes.author: John Milton

quotes.quote: The confidence which we have in ourselves gives birth to much of that which we have in others.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: You must act as if it is impossible to fail.
quotes.author: Ashanti Saying

quotes.quote: Lack of confidence is not the result of difficulty; the difficulty comes from a lack of confidence.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Confidence in the natural world is self-reliance, in the spiritual world, it is God-reliance.
quotes.author: Oswald Chambers

quotes.quote: If you wait until you're really sure, you'll never take off the training wheels.
quotes.author: Cynthia Copeland Lewis

quotes.quote: Women who are confident in their abilities are more likely to succeed than those who lack confidence, even though the latter may be much more competent and talented, and industrious.
quotes.author: Joyce Brothers

quotes.quote: There's no better makeup than self-confidence.
quotes.author: Shakira

quotes.quote: If you can't get people to listen to you any other way, tell them it's confidential.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: Confidentiality is a delicate bargain of trust.
quotes.author: Martin Uzochukwu Ugwu

quotes.quote: Confidentiality is a virtue of the loyal, just as loyalty is the virtue of faithfulness.
quotes.author: Edwin Louis Cole

quotes.quote: The closer and more confidential our relationship with someone, the less we are entitled to ask about what we are not voluntarily told.
quotes.author: Louis Kronenberger

quotes.quote: Caution is the confidential agent of selfishness.
quotes.author: Woodrow Wilson

quotes.quote: In Washington, a confidential assistant is someone who, if you don't want to know something, you go and ask him and he won't tell you.
quotes.author: Andy Rooney
