quotes.quote: No one is above the law and I will also say that deliberate leaking of confidential government information should not and can not be tolerated.
quotes.author: Nick Minchin

quotes.quote: It doesn't surprise me that agencies that have the most confidential information ... are having to face the greatest challenge.
quotes.author: Pat Gleason

quotes.quote: In almost every profession - whether it's law or journalism, finance or medicine or academia or running a small business - people rely on confidential communications to do their jobs. We count on the space of trust that confidentiality provides. When someone breaches that trust, we are all worse off for it.
quotes.author: Hillary Clinton

quotes.quote: Confidentiality is a critical task to follow, which is very difficult to handle by everyone.
quotes.author: Prerna Mishra

quotes.quote: Of what use are all the codes in the world, if by means of confidential reports, if for trifling reasons, if through anonymous traitors any honest citizen may be exiled or banished without a hearing, without a trial?
quotes.author: Jose Rizal

quotes.quote: Keep the problems of clients and prospects confidential. Divulge information only with their consent.
quotes.author: Arthur Nielsen

quotes.quote: Personal & Confidential. Letters so marked should be. When the contents are only printed matter, though, the mini-frauder succeeds in sowing ill will & ire.
quotes.author: Malcolm Forbes

quotes.quote: Don’t confuse 'strict confidentiality' with 'keeping employees in the dark.' Private is useful. Secretive is deceptive.
quotes.author: Stacey Feiner

quotes.quote: The office of the lawyer, however poorly filled, is too delicate, personal and confidential to be occupied by a corporation.
quotes.author: Robert Jacks

quotes.quote: Just because a meeting is held in closed session doesn't render it confidential. You can hold a meeting in closed session but you can't make people not talk.
quotes.author: Maria Everett

quotes.quote: One common puzzle for the security-minded is how to work with confidential data on the road. Sometimes you can't bring your laptop, or don't want to. But working on somebody else's machine exposes you to malware and leaves behind all kinds of electronic trails.
quotes.author: Barton Gellman

quotes.quote: Work hard and take risks. Try it before you confirm it is difficult!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: In the case of news, we should always wait for the sacrament of confirmation.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Remember you are the perfect reflector of your mind.
quotes.author: Richmond Akhigbe

quotes.quote: Develop an affirmation today, and start getting instant confirmation in all works of like.
quotes.author: Richmond Akhigbe

quotes.quote: I was living for one thing only, and that was to confirm my own lack of feeling.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: I don't believe one reads to escape reality. A person reads to confirm a reality he knows is there, but which he has not experienced.
quotes.author: Lawrence Durrell

quotes.quote: Faith is a knowledge within the heart, beyond the reach of proof.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: For those who believe, no proof is necessary. For those who don't believe, no proof is possible.
quotes.author: Stuart Chase

quotes.quote: Confirmations may come in many forms and at any time.
quotes.author: Aleksandra Layland

quotes.quote: Don't ask the mind to confirm what is beyond the mind. Direct experience is the only valid confirmation.
quotes.author: Sri Nisargadatta Maharaj

quotes.quote: Once we make our decision, all things will come to us. Auspicious signs are not a superstition, but a confirmation. They are a response.
quotes.author: Deng Ming-Dao

quotes.quote: There is nothing more deceptive than an obvious fact.
quotes.author: Arthur Conan Doyle

quotes.quote: There is no formula. There are only confirmations to formulas which one has already discovered oneself.
quotes.author: Ernst Haas

quotes.quote: The man of science has learned to believe in justification, not by faith, but by verification.
quotes.author: Thomas Henry Huxley

quotes.quote: Cover this confirmation process with prayer. When they make it harder for us to pray, we just pray harder.
quotes.author: Zell Miller

quotes.quote: First impression matters but consistent impression is where the proof is.
quotes.author: Aniekee Tochukwu Ezekiel

quotes.quote: People almost invariably arrive at their beliefs not on the basis of proof but on the basis of what they find attractive.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: Confirmation bias is the most effective way to go on living a lie.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: When we ask for advice, we're really looking for confirmation of what our soul already knows.
quotes.author: Suzanne Giesemann

quotes.quote: Never believe all that you hear. Always verify the original source of information.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: The most confused you will ever get is when you try to convince your heart and spirit of something your mind knows is a lie.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: Many a good newspaper story has been ruined by over verification.
quotes.author: James Gordon Bennett

quotes.quote: Experimental confirmation of a prediction is merely a measurement. An experiment disproving a prediction is a discovery.
quotes.author: Enrico Fermi

quotes.quote: It is wrong always, everywhere, and for everyone, to believe anything upon insufficient evidence.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: If you value your words, people will not ask you to make any promises.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: If you never try, you'll never know. You are what you manifest.
quotes.author: Germany Kent

quotes.quote: The fact that an opinion has been widely held is no evidence whatever that it is not utterly absurd.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Exploitation, mutilation, mutations, confirmation to the evils of the world.
quotes.author: Stevie Wonder

quotes.quote: If our ideas are not evolving with verifiable evidence, they are not reliable ideas.
quotes.author: Carmine Savastano

quotes.quote: In natural science the principles of truth ought to be confirmed by observation.
quotes.author: Carl Linnaeus

quotes.quote: I'm telling you this for one reason and one reason only: No matter how sure you are of someone's love, it's always nice to hear it.
quotes.author: Mike Gayle

quotes.quote: If you are different, or you have minimum possibilities, you can still succeed. I am living proof of that.
quotes.author: Zlatan Ibrahimovic

quotes.quote: Peace is not absence of conflict, it is the ability to handle conflict by peaceful means.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: Man must evolve for all human conflict a method which rejects revenge, aggression and retaliation. The foundation of such a method is love.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: Conflict is drama, and how people deal with conflict shows you the kind of people they are.
quotes.author: Stephen Moyer

quotes.quote: Whoever fights monsters should see to it that in the process he does not become a monster. And if you gaze long enough into an abyss, the abyss will gaze back into you.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: There's not one person in this crowd who's gonna agree with everything I say. Not one.
quotes.author: Howard Dean

quotes.quote: Where there is power, there is resistance.
quotes.author: Michel Foucault

quotes.quote: An eye for an eye will only make the whole world blind.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: All war is a symptom of man's failure as a thinking animal.
quotes.author: John Steinbeck

quotes.quote: Your perspective on life comes from the cage you were held captive in.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: To live is to war with trolls.
quotes.author: Henrik Ibsen

quotes.quote: Do not think of knocking out another person's brains because he differs in opinion from you. It would be as rational to knock yourself on the head because you differ from yourself ten years ago.
quotes.author: Horace Mann

quotes.quote: Two conflicting forces cannot exist in one human heart. When doubt reigns, faith cannot abide. Where hatred rules, love is crowded out. Where selfishness rules, there love cannot dwell. When worry is present, trust cannot crowd its way in.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: A soft answer turns away wrath, but a harsh word stirs up anger.
quotes.author: Prov.15:1

quotes.quote: It takes two to keep the Marriage Vow. It takes two to have Agreement. It takes two to resolve conflict. Bottom line? Both of you need to want to work it out.
quotes.author: Tabitha M.

quotes.quote: Difference of religion breeds more quarrels than difference of politics.
quotes.author: Wendell Phillips

quotes.quote: The truth is that our finest moments are most likely to occur when we are feeling deeply uncomfortable, unhappy, or unfulfilled. For it is only in such moments, propelled by our discomfort, that we are likely to step out of our ruts and start searching for different ways or truer answers.
quotes.author: M. Scott Peck

quotes.quote: It's time for us to turn to each other, not on each other.
quotes.author: Jesse Jackson

quotes.quote: I never make the mistake of arguing with people for whose opinions I have no respect.
quotes.author: Edward Gibbon

quotes.quote: I don't believe in war as a solution to any kind of conflict, nor do I believe in heroism on the battlefield because I have never seen any.
quotes.author: Thor Heyerdahl

quotes.quote: Change means movement. Movement means friction. Only in the frictionless vacuum of a nonexistent abstract world can movement or change occur without that abrasive friction of conflict.
quotes.author: Saul Alinsky

quotes.quote: Any problem, big or small, within a family, always seems to start with bad communication. Someone isn't listening.
quotes.author: Emma Thompson

quotes.quote: No matter how thin you slice it, there will always be two sides.
quotes.author: Baruch Spinoza

quotes.quote: Pick battles big enough to matter, small enough to win.
quotes.author: Jonathan Kozel

quotes.quote: Whenever two good people argue over principles, they are both right.
quotes.author: Marie Ebner-Eschenbach

quotes.quote: The harder the conflict, the more glorious the triumph. What we obtain too cheap, we esteem too lightly; it is dearness only that gives everything its value. I love the man that can smile in trouble, that can gather strength from distress and grow brave by reflection. 'Tis the business of little minds to shrink; but he whose heart is firm, and whose conscience approves his conduct, will pursue his principles unto death.
quotes.author: Thomas Paine

quotes.quote: Whenever you're in conflict with someone, there is one factor that can make the difference between damaging your relationship and deepening it. That factor is attitude
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: Conflict is the gadfly of thought. It stirs us to observation and memory. It instigates to invention. It shocks us out of sheeplike passivity, and sets us at noting and contriving.
quotes.author: John Dewey

quotes.quote: The greatest conflicts are not between two people but between one person and himself.
quotes.author: Garth Brooks

quotes.quote: Conflict is inevitable, but combat is optional.
quotes.author: Max Lucade

quotes.quote: The difference between a boss and a leader: a boss says, 'Go!' -a leader says, 'Let's go!'.
quotes.author: E. M. Kelly

quotes.quote: So there are five ways of knowing who will win. Those who know when to fight and when not to fight are victorious. Those who discern when to use many or few troops are victorious. Those whose upper and lower ranks have the same desire are victorious.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: Conflict is the beginning of consciousness
quotes.author: M. Esther Harding

quotes.quote: We must not, in trying to think about how we can make a big difference, ignore the small daily differences we can make which, over time, add up to big differences that we often cannot foresee.
quotes.author: Marian Wright Edelman

quotes.quote: Conflict builds character. Crisis defines it.
quotes.author: Steven V. Thulon

quotes.quote: Conflicts may be the sources of defeat, lost life and a limitation of our potentiality but they may also lead to greater depth of living and the birth of more far-reaching unities, which flourish in the tensions that engender them
quotes.author: Karl Jaspers

quotes.quote: Only by pride comes contention; but, with the well-advised is wisdom.
quotes.author: Proverbs 13:10

quotes.quote: You can't comfort the afflicted with afflicting the comfortable
quotes.author: Princess Diana

quotes.quote: We cannot really think in one way and act in another
quotes.author: Thomas Troward

quotes.quote: What rights are those that dare not resist for them?What rights are those that dare not resist for them?
quotes.author: Alfred Tennyson

quotes.quote: It is the eternal struggle between these two principles -- right and wrong. They are the two principles that have stood face to face from the beginning of time and will ever continue to struggle. It is the same spirit that says, ''You work and toil and earn bread, and I'll eat it.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Instead of suppressing conflicts, specific channels could be created to make this conflict explicit, and specific methods could be set up by which the conflict is resolved.
quotes.author: Albert Low

quotes.quote: If we cannot end our differences at least we can make the world safe for diversity.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: If passion drives you, let reason hold the reins.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: I have fought a good fight. I have finished my course, I have kept the faith.
quotes.author: 2 Timothy 4:7

quotes.quote: All speech is vain and empty unless it be accompanied by action.
quotes.author: Demosthenes

quotes.quote: Those who wish to cause religious conflict are small in number but often manage to dominate the headline.
quotes.author: Tony Blair

quotes.quote: Society cannot share a common communication system so long as it is split into warring factions.
quotes.author: Bertolt Brecht

quotes.quote: I can never decide whether my dreams are the result of my thoughts, or my thoughts the result of my dreams.
quotes.author: D. H. Lawrence

quotes.quote: The greatest conflicts are not between two people but between one person and himself.
quotes.author: Garth Brooks

quotes.quote: Never in the field of human conflicts was so much owed by so many to so few.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: A long dispute means that both parties are wrong.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Behind every argument is someone's ignorance.
quotes.author: Louise D. Brandeis

quotes.quote: An argument is an angry dispute in which two persons keep talking without throwing anything.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: If you think both sides in a dispute cannot win, just interview management and labor after a strike is settled.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: The man who does not think as you do is apt to be stubborn.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: When an arbitrator fails to settle a dispute, both sides regard him as more traitor than arbitrator.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Peace is not the absence of conflict, it is the ability to handle conflict by peaceful means.
quotes.author: Bathroom Readers' Institute

quotes.quote: All men have an instinct for conflict: at least, all healthy men.
quotes.author: Hilaire Belloc

quotes.quote: In a few decades, the relationship between the environment, resources and conflict may seem almost as obvious as the connection we see today between human rights, democracy and peace.
quotes.author: Wangari Maathai

quotes.quote: In the long term we can hope that religion will change the nature of man and reduce conflict. But history is not encouraging in this respect.
quotes.author: Richard M. Nixon

quotes.quote: Never in the field of human conflict was so much owed by so many to so few.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Analysis is not the only way to resolve inner conflicts.
quotes.author: Joseph Demakis

quotes.quote: Many men wavered, as they were riding into danger. They thought about their own deaths too much, or imagined injuries and pain that might never come. That was what excessive thinking could do, even to men who were moderately brave. Often, the men, once in a conflict, settled down and fought as well.
quotes.author: Larry McMurty

quotes.quote: Christ can rid you of inner conflict. Man without God is always torn between two urges.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: We don't have to be on the battlefields of the world to experience strife and conflict.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: For the Christian, peace is not simply the absence of conflict, or any other artificial state the world has to offer. Rather it is the deep, abiding peace only Jesus Christ brings to the heart.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Grumbling and gratitude are, for the child of God, in conflict. Be grateful and you won't grumble. Grumble and you won't be grateful.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Sometimes you have to have the difficult conversations. Trust, love, and respect are the key. If you have trust, love, and respect, positive conflict will lead to growth.
quotes.author: Jon Gordon

quotes.quote: God does not reside in a home where there are conflicts.
quotes.author: Dada Bhagwan

quotes.quote: Conflicts can be destroyed through understanding and intellect.
quotes.author: Dada Bhagwan

quotes.quote: When any conflict occurs, if you take time and calm down and then analyze the situation by thinking about it, you will experience inner clarification and understanding.
quotes.author: Dada Bhagwan

quotes.quote: If someone comes to fight with you and he shouts all kinds of abuse, you must maintain the awareness that you have to avoid conflict.
quotes.author: Dada Bhagwan

quotes.quote: True understanding exists when there remain no difference with anyone.
quotes.author: Dada Bhagwan

quotes.quote: Others see conflict as an obstacle to be conquered quickly and completely.
quotes.author: Ken Sande

quotes.quote: Like everyone else, we are prone to develop the total self-absorption that is the root of conflict.
quotes.author: Ken Sande

quotes.quote: Working toward peaceful solutions isn't out natural human response.
quotes.author: Ken Sande

quotes.quote: Some people see conflict as a hazard that threatens to sweep them off their feet and leave them bruised and hurting, so they react by making every attempt to escape the situation.
quotes.author: Ken Sande

quotes.quote: Peacemakers see conflict as an opportunity to solve problems in a way that not only benefits everyone involved but also honors God.
quotes.author: Ken Sande

quotes.quote: Trouble will always find you, but it's how you respond that will dictate how long you stay in it.
quotes.author: Darlene Bennett

quotes.quote: It is better to be humble and happy than to be arrogant and lonely.
quotes.author: Darlene Bennett

quotes.quote: Being a peacemaker is true humility.
quotes.author: Darlene Bennett

quotes.quote: The discussion needed to resolve conflict expands people's awareness of the situation.
quotes.author: Jarmel Bell MSE

quotes.quote: If conflict is no handled effectively, the results can be damaging.
quotes.author: Jarmel Bell MSE

quotes.quote: In resolving conflict, look for motives, sometimes different people will see the same situation in a different light.
quotes.author: Jarmel Bell MSE

quotes.quote: Whether it is an argument with a significant other or a boardroom full of colleagues, facing conflict is a great way to learn more about others.
quotes.author: Liggy Webb

quotes.quote: If you pay attention, you will learn not only about their particular points of view, but also about the way they choose to argue.
quotes.author: Liggy Webb

quotes.quote: If you pay close attention, you can pick up a lot of information about others when you actively engage in conflict.
quotes.author: Liggy Webb

quotes.quote: Don't argue. Never deign to deny. Meet insults with laughter.
quotes.author: Leigh Bardugo

quotes.quote: The less you say, the more weight your words will carry.
quotes.author: Leigh Bardugo

quotes.quote: Arguments cannot be answered by personal abuse; there is no logic in slander, and falsehood, in the long run, defeats itself.
quotes.author: Robert Green Ingersoll

quotes.quote: Truth carries with it confrontation. Truth demands confrontation; loving confrontation, but confrontation nevertheless.
quotes.author: Francis Schaeffer

quotes.quote: Confrontation is better than insinuation.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: Confront somebody with an issue before it becomes a conflict. Confrontation is not all bad.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: Confront them with annihilation, and they will then survive; plunge them into a deadly situation, and they will then live. When people fall into danger, they are then able to strive for victory.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: Confront your inadequacies and push your personal boundaries: It's the surest way to grow, improve and expand the scope of your influence.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: The most effective way to ensure the value of the future is to confront the present courageously and constructively.
quotes.author: Rollo May

quotes.quote: Confront your fears, list them, get to know them, and only then will you be able to put them aside and move ahead.
quotes.author: Jerry Gillies

quotes.quote: Confrontation simply means meeting the truth head-on.
quotes.author: Mike Krzyzewski

quotes.quote: All confrontation is based on deception.
quotes.author: Paul Watson

quotes.quote: Confrontation is better than assumptions.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: Confronting and undermining the narratives and ideas of extremism must therefore be one of our key tasks. To do this, we must retain the courage of our convictions in the face of extremism.
quotes.author: Jonas Gahr Store

quotes.quote: Confront the dark parts of yourself, and work to banish them with illumination and forgiveness. Your willingness to wrestle with your demons will cause your angels to sing.
quotes.author: August Wilson

quotes.quote: Direct confrontation, direct conversation is real respect. And it's amazing how many people get that.
quotes.author: Penn Jillette

quotes.quote: In a confrontation with the politics of power, the soft center has always melted away.
quotes.author: Lord Hailsham

quotes.quote: Let us move from the era of confrontation to the era of negotiation.
quotes.author: Richard M. Nixon

quotes.quote: Confrontation is not a dirty word. Sometimes it's the best kind of journalism as long you don't confront people just for the sake of a confrontation.
quotes.author: Don Hewitt

quotes.quote: Confrontation was the stuff of daily life.
quotes.author: T.J. Stiles

quotes.quote: One of the hardest challenges posed by the modern world is how to deal with abundance. It's even harder to confront because admitting that it's a problem seems spoiled.
quotes.author: Naomi Alderman

quotes.quote: To confront a person with their own shadow is to show them their own light.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: Whatever confronts your faith can be a test but if it stands to oppose the content of your personality and the validity of your convictions then it's threat.
quotes.author: Kingsley Opuwari Manuel

quotes.quote: In the confrontation between the stream and the rock, the stream always wins. Not through strength, but through persistence.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quotes.quote: Friends confront each other sometimes, and sometimes the friendship lasts, and sometimes it doesn't.
quotes.author: Brooke Elliott

quotes.quote: The bigger confrontation is the one an individual has with itself.
quotes.author: Asghar Farhadi

quotes.quote: If we become too scared to confront the chief problems of our time, there is no hope of ever solving them.
quotes.author: Jim Demint

quotes.quote: Life is full of confusion. Confusion of love, passion, and romance. Confusion of family and friends. Confusion with life itself. What path we take, what turns we make. How we roll our dice.
quotes.author: Matthew Underwood

quotes.quote: In the confusion we stay with each other, happy to be together, speaking without uttering a single word.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.quote: Don't be afraid to be confused. Try to remain permanently confused. Anything is possible. Stay open, forever, so open it hurts, and then open up some more, until the day you die, world without end, amen.
quotes.author: George Saunders

quotes.quote: The confusion is not my invention. We cannot listen to a conversation for five minutes without being aware of the confusion. It is all around us and our only chance now is to let it in. The only chance of renovation is to open our eyes and see the mess. It is not a mess you can make sense of.
quotes.author: Samuel Beckett

quotes.quote: The logic of a madman is a sane man's confusion.
quotes.author: Joe R. Lansdale

quotes.quote: I pretty much try to stay in a constant state of confusion just because of the expression it leaves on my face.
quotes.author: Johnny Depp

quotes.quote: We often confuse what we wish for with what is.
quotes.author: Neil Gaiman

quotes.quote: If you're not confused, you're not paying attention.
quotes.author: Tom Peters

quotes.quote: Sometimes I'm confused by what I think is really obvious. But what I think is really obvious obviously isn't obvious?
quotes.author: Michael Stipe

quotes.quote: Confusion is a word we have invented for an order which is not yet understood
quotes.author: Henry Miller

quotes.quote: Confusion is the welcome mat at the door of creativity.
quotes.author: Michael J. Gelb

quotes.quote: The mere attempt to examine my own confusion would consume volumes.
quotes.author: James Agee

quotes.quote: Confusion of goals and perfection of means seems, in my opinion, to characterize our age.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: If confusion leads to knowledge, then I must be a genius.
quotes.author: Larry Leissner

quotes.quote: He who knows he is a fool is not the biggest fool; He who knows he is confused is not in the worst confusion.
quotes.author: Chuang Tzu

quotes.quote: I'm not confused, I'm just well mixed
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: In the greatest confusion there is still an open channel to the soul. It may be difficult to find because by midlife it is overgrown, and some of the wildest thickets that surround it grow out of what we describe as our education. But the channel is always there, and it is our business to keep it open, to have access to the deepest part of ourselves.
quotes.author: Saul Bellow

quotes.quote: In the theater of confusion, knowing the location of the exits is what counts.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: If you can't convince them; confuse them.
quotes.author: Harry S. Truman

quotes.quote: Confusion is a chicken with shattered eyes.
quotes.author: Thai Proverb

quotes.quote: I had nothing to offer anybody except my own confusion.
quotes.author: Jack Kerouac

quotes.quote: Today, if you are not confused, you are just not thinking clearly.
quotes.author: U. Peter

quotes.quote: People everywhere confuse what they read in newspapers with news.
quotes.author: A. J. Liebling

quotes.quote: Confusion is an often too subtle sign of paranoia.
quotes.author: Anne Austin

quotes.quote: Try to find your deepest issue in every confusion, and abide by that.
quotes.author: D. H. Lawrence

quotes.quote: Injecting some confusion stabilizes the system.
quotes.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

quotes.quote: If I look confused it's because I'm thinking.
quotes.author: Samuel Goldwyn

quotes.quote: Anyone who isn't confused here doesn't really understand what's going on.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Confusion is always the most honest response.
quotes.author: Marty Indik

quotes.quote: Willingness to change is a strength, even if it means plunging part of the company into total confusion for a while.
quotes.author: Jack Welch

quotes.quote: For every problem or confusion and for every desire or ambition there is an available force waiting for your call.
quotes.author: Vernon Howard

quotes.quote: Confusion heard his voice, and wild uproar Stood ruled, stood vast infinitude confined; Till at his second bidding darkness fled, Light shone, and order from disorder sprung.
quotes.author: John Milton

quotes.quote: Much unhappiness has come into the world because of bewilderment and things left unsaid.
quotes.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

quotes.quote: The most confused you will ever get is when you try to convince your heart and spirit of something your mind knows is a lie.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: What is important is to spread confusion, not eliminate it.
quotes.author: Salvador Dalí

quotes.quote: Confusion is a luxury which only the very, very young can possibly afford and you are not that young anymore.
quotes.author: James Baldwin

quotes.quote: Confusion is the main cause of worry.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: Confusion is not an ignoble condition.
quotes.author: Brian Friel

quotes.quote: Conclusion means death. Confusion means possibility.
quotes.author: Jaggi Vasudev

quotes.quote: We all go through doubt. It's hard. Those difficult moments are what build your character.
quotes.author: Joe Rogan

quotes.quote: Confusion is uncertainty. Confusion is stupidity. Confusion is insecurity. When you think of uncertainty, stupidity and insecurity, think of confusion and you'll have it down pat.
quotes.author: L. Ron Hubbard

quotes.quote: There are two types of thoughts in each one of us. One comes from the personality and the other from the universe or God. The thoughts coming from God are more simple and the ones of the personality more complicated. Any confusion is based on ignorance.
quotes.author: Samael Aun Weor

quotes.quote: In a world where order is chaos, where wise men are viewed as fools and where fools are ruling the world and viewed as wise men, there is a need to create a real new world order. A new world order where the mental confusion will disappear, where peace and love will prevail and where the Human Rights will be really fully respected.
quotes.author: Raël

quotes.quote: You reach for information from your secondary system—your feelings—and they're doing a kind of roller coaster ride around from joy to humiliation and back, settling on a general feeling of confusion.
quotes.author: Sarah Tomley

quotes.quote: There are storms in your own life; storms of temptation, confusion, and difficulty... An uneasy conscience says, "Stop before it is too late!"
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: We are living in a topsy-turvy world, where all is confusion. But you may be sure that it is confusion with a plan—Satan's plan!
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Man is a rebel, and a rebel is naturally in confusion.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: God speaks to those who are prepared in their hearts to listen. Discern the voice from heaven above the noisy din of earth's confusion.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Where there is confusion is where peace can arise. When confusion is penetrated with understanding, what remains is peace.
quotes.author: Josh Bartok

quotes.quote: Life being all inclusion and confusion, and art being all discrimination and selection.
quotes.author: Henry James

quotes.quote: Unusable and contradictory thoughts filled Quinn's mind with almost physical duress as though his poor head were a golf ball which, slashed open, shows its severed rubber filaments snapping and racing about in confusion.
quotes.author: Thomas McGuane

quotes.quote: Listening to The Weasel [unpleasant person] was like having a dirty hand paw through your personal belongings, leaving them in confusion; and so soiled that after the first look you were disgusted and tempted to throw them away, for they had changed.
quotes.author: Ann Petry

quotes.quote: With ruin upon ruin, rout on rout, / Confusion worse confounded.
quotes.author: John Milton

quotes.quote: Night comes at last, and some hours of restlessness and confusion brings me again to a day of solitude. What shall exclude the black dog from a habitation like this?
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: It is true that the voice of God, having once fully penetrated the heart, becomes strong as the tempest and loud as the thunder, but before reaching the heart it is as weak as a light breath which scarcely agitates the air. It shrinks from noise, and is silent amid agitation.
quotes.author: St. Ignatius Loyola

quotes.quote: Ruin seize thee, ruthless King! / Confusion on thy banners wait.
quotes.author: Thomas Gray

quotes.quote: Shame and confusion! all is on the rout: / Fear frames disorder, and disorder wounds / Where it should guard.
quotes.author: (Young Clifford) William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Confusion now hath made his masterpiece.
quotes.author: (Macduff) William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: When envy breeds unkind division: / There comes the ruin, there begins confusion.
quotes.author: (Exeter) William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: That as soon as a party has gained its general point, each member becomes intent upon his particular interest; which, thwarting others, breaks that party into divisions and occasions more confusion.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: But the being which is thus revealed to me is its being-for-others. That this confusion may lead to absurdities can be clearly seen in connection with the famous problem of "inverted vision."
quotes.author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quotes.quote: The single most surprising new element in America's national conversation is the prominence and intensity of constant fear. Moreover, there is an uncharacteristic and persistent confusion about the sources of that fear; we seem to be having unusual difficult distinguishing between illusory and legitimate ones.
quotes.author: Al Gore

quotes.quote: Acting is a form of confusion.
quotes.author: Tallulah Bankhead

quotes.quote: O, nothing is more alluring than a levee from a couch in some confusion.
quotes.author: William Congreve

quotes.quote: Should the whole frame of nature round him break, / In ruin and confusion hurled, / He, unconcerned, would hear the mighty crack, / And stand secure amidst a falling world.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.quote: Wherever I turned my view, there was perplexity to be disentangled, and confusion to be regulated.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Do not doubt your own basic goodness. In spite of all confusion and fear, you are born with a heart that knows what is just, loving, and beautiful.
quotes.author: Jack Kornfield

quotes.quote: In the noisy confusion of life keep peace with your soul. With all its sham, drudgery and broken dreams, it is still a beautiful world. Be careful. Strive to be happy.
quotes.author: Max Ehrmann

quotes.quote: I have a theory about girls. The more you run after them, the more they will run away from you. But if you run away from them they will be confused and will run after you to find out the reason for their confusion. And we have to take advantage of such a confusion of a confused girl!
quotes.author: Aman Mathur

quotes.quote: Just a little something I like to say when I'm confused so that I'm not alone in my confusion. See? It works.
quotes.author: Roman

quotes.quote: I don't expect congratulations for successful beginning, what I want is the applaud at successful ending.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: Success comes to those who deserve it. Congratulations!
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Wishing you both the happily ever after you deserve. Congratulations on your wedding day!
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Congratulations... Footprints on the sands of time are not made by sitting down.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote:
Congratulations!
Today is your day.
You're off to great places.
You're off and away!
quotes.author: Dr Seuss

quotes.quote:
If you're reading this...
Congratulations, you're alive.
If that's not something to smile about,
then I don't know what is.
quotes.author: Chad Sugg

quotes.quote: Congratulations on the start of something beautiful ! Much love, health and happiness to you on this happy occasion.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Congratulations on your new job! May God's guidance and wisdom be with you in all your endeavors.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: May today's success be the beginning of tomorrow's achievements. Congratulations!
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Congratulations to a beautiful couple. Wishing you a wonderful journey as you build your new life together.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Your perseverance and your sure belief in your ability has led you to success. Congratulations!
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Congratulations! I knew that if someone could do it, then it must be you. Well done my friend!
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Well done and congratulations! The fruit of your labor is sweet, and I must say you deserve it.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Curious that we spend more time congratulating people who have succeeded than encouraging people who have not.
quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quotes.quote: When congratulations are in order, I like to wait until they're out of order to offer a high five or enthusiastic pat on the back.
quotes.author: Jarod Kintz

quotes.quote: Congratulations is the civility of envy.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: The biggest bore of all is he who is overflowing with congratulations.
quotes.author: Thomas Hood

quotes.quote: Congratulations, you have a sense of humor. And to those who didn't: Go stick your head in the mud.
quotes.author: Jesse Ventura

quotes.quote: If you woke up breathing, congratulations! You have another chance.
quotes.author: Andrea Boydston

quotes.quote: We have a problem. 'Congratulations.' But it's a tough problem. 'Then double congratulations.'
quotes.author: W.Clement Stone

quotes.quote: Congratulations on your promotion! Before you go, would you like to take this knife out of my back? You'll probably need it again.
quotes.author: Lawrence Dorfman

quotes.quote: Congratulations to both of you, and let's get on with the grandchildren.
quotes.author: Dianne Warner

quotes.quote: I am delighted to add my voice to the chorus of well wishers.
quotes.author: Madeleine Turner

quotes.quote: I congratulate you on this happy and memorable occasion.
quotes.author: Madeleine Turner

quotes.quote: I could not let such a memorable occasion pass without sending you my heartfelt congratulations.
quotes.author: Madeleine Turner

quotes.quote: To a person whose life has been an inspiration and whose accomplishments have been outstanding.
quotes.author: Madeleine Turner

quotes.quote: Congratulations, all our dreams can come true. If we but have the strength and tenacity to pursue them.
quotes.author: Jennifer Rahel Conover

quotes.quote: Compliments of congratulation are always kindly taken, and cost one nothing but pen, ink, and paper.
quotes.author: Chesterfield

quotes.quote: It is time for us all to stand and cheer for the doer. the achiever--the one who recognizes the challenge and does something about it.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: I replied congratulations with kind thank yous.. For the most part I kept my mouth shut and worked hard.
quotes.author: Erin N. Harrison

quotes.quote: The moment was to have several rounds of heartiest congratulations and best wishes all around; with tears of celestial happiness rolling down the cheeks.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: These were the same hands that perpetually entwined with his in applause and congratulations; everytime he emerged humanitarianly triumphant; amongst a pack of asphyxiating worldly wild wolves,
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: Congratulations for a scene like this! / The olden times are here—these shall be olden / When, years to come, remembering present bliss / We sigh for past Papyrian dinners golden.
quotes.author: John Boyle O'Reilly

quotes.quote: We ain't supposed to be here, never thought we'd see it / Now we livin' proof, tell the world to believe it / Congratulations, thank God we made it.
quotes.author: Kevin Michael Erondu

quotes.quote: I dreamed it all ever since I was young / They said I wouldn't be nothing / Now they always say, 'congratulations' / Worked so hard, forgot how to vacation.
quotes.author: Adam King Feeney

quotes.quote: Congratulations to someone / Someone who's happy with you / I guess he did the right things / I was wise enough to do.
quotes.author: Al Frische

quotes.quote: I thought you'd love me forever / Somehow it just couldn't be / Congratulations to someone / But I wish that someone was me.
quotes.author: Al Frische

quotes.quote: Congratulations, now you are free / You have earned your degree / Yeah, you've graduated / This is your last separation from me.
quotes.author: Antonina Armato

quotes.quote: Congratulations on your achievement. With every accomplishment, there is an end. With every end there is always a new beginning. Life continually moves from a beginning... to an end...to a new beginning.
quotes.author: Viola Ruelke Gommer

quotes.quote: Congratulations. I knew the record would stand until it was broken.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: The biggest reward for a thing well done is to have done it.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Allow me to offer my congratulations on the truly admirable skill you have shown in keeping clear of the mark. Not to have hit once in so many trials, argues the most splendid talents for missing.
quotes.author: Thomas de Quincey

quotes.quote: The news of the discovery spread fast all over the country, and inquisitive enquiries mingled with congratulations from this moment became the daily programme.
quotes.author: Howard Carter

quotes.quote: You're wiser than your last mistake. Congratulations!
quotes.author: Chinonye J. Chidolue

quotes.quote: Congratulations dear on the start of something best and beautiful!
quotes.author: C.V. Holk

quotes.quote: When someone says, 'I recognize you,' I'll say, 'Congratulations on having a TV.' It's a little joke.
quotes.author: William Belli

quotes.quote: I was overwhelmed by so many interviewers and then messages of congratulations. So many congratulation messages. I feel this shows the authority and the greatness of the Nobel Prize.
quotes.author: Isamu Akasaki

quotes.quote: To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: If the day and the night are such that you greet them with joy, and life emits a fragrance like flowers and sweet-scented herbs, is more elastic, more starry, more immortal -- that is your success. All nature is your congratulation . . .
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Congratulations on holding the line this year, ... We appreciate the efforts your department has had to make to stay under budget.
quotes.author: Alan Thompson

quotes.quote: Connection starves suspicion.
quotes.author: Fawn Weaver

quotes.quote: Connection gives purpose and meaning to our lives.
quotes.author: Brene Brown

quotes.quote: A hidden connection is stronger than an obvious one.
quotes.author: Heraclitus

quotes.quote: Understanding and connection can transcend conflict.
quotes.author: Marshall B. Rosenberg

quotes.quote: We hunger for connection but take pride in being distant.
quotes.author: Turcois Ominek

quotes.quote: Connection with yourself only comes in moments of silence.
quotes.author: Bryant McGill

quotes.quote: More connections to more devices means more vulnerabilities.
quotes.author: Marc Goodman

quotes.quote: Connections are made slowly, sometimes they grow underground.
quotes.author: Marge Piercy

quotes.quote: No connection can ever be broken if love holds tight at both ends.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: The only thing you can lose is ... your connection to who-you-are.
quotes.author: Esther Hicks

quotes.quote: Human connections are deeply nurtured in the field of shared story.
quotes.author: Jean Houston

quotes.quote: Connection and connectedness are other words for community and communion.
quotes.author: Parker J. Palmer

quotes.quote: The loss of a beloved connection awakens an interest in Heaven before unfelt.
quotes.author: Christian Nestell Bovee

quotes.quote: The ultimate connection is when you are connected to the creator of the universe.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: With our divine connection we are always in touch with the solutions we are seeking.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: When people go within and connect with themselves, they realize they are connected to the universe and they are connected to all living things.
quotes.author: Armand DiMele

quotes.quote: Only through our connectedness to others can we really know and enhance self. And only through working on the self can we begin to enhance our connectedness to others.
quotes.author: Harriet Goldhor Lerner

quotes.quote: One must always maintain one's connection to the past and yet ceaselessly pull away from it.
quotes.author: Gaston Bachelard

quotes.quote: Our connection with our intuitive self is ever present and always a part of ourselves.
quotes.author: James Van Praagh

quotes.quote: Soul connections are not often found and are worth every bit of fight left in you to keep.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: Mankind is connected in ways it does not understand - even in dreams.
quotes.author: Mitch Albom

quotes.quote: Make connections; let rip; and dance where you can.
quotes.author: Annie Dillard

quotes.quote: Frequently consider the connection of all things in the universe.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Bid for connection: Each of our daily interactions with another person.
quotes.author: John M. Gottman

quotes.quote: Cherish your human connections - your relationships with friends and family.
quotes.author: Barbara Bush

quotes.quote: Your connections with other people are important, our connection to the earth.
quotes.author: Tom Ford

quotes.quote: All is connected... no one thing can change by itself.
quotes.author: Paul Hawken

quotes.quote: Connection and position lead to success.
quotes.author: Jacqueline Job

quotes.quote: Curiosity will conquer fear even more than bravery will.
quotes.author: James Stephens

quotes.quote: It is better to conquer yourself than to win a thousand battles. Then the victory is yours. It cannot be taken from you, not by angels or by demons, heaven or hell.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: It is not the mountain we conquer but ourselves.
quotes.author: Edmund Hillary

quotes.quote: If you do not conquer self, you will be conquered by self.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: Energy and persistence conquer all things.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: To fight and conquer in all our battles is not supreme excellence; supreme excellence consists in breaking the enemy's resistance without fighting.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: For a man to conquer himself is the first and noblest of all victories.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: There is little that can withstand a man who can conquer himself.
quotes.author: Louis XIV

quotes.quote: It is not enough to conquer; one must learn to seduce.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: To conquer fear is the beginning of wisdom.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: In order to conquer, what we need is to dare, still to dare, and always to dare.
quotes.author: Georges Jacques Danton

quotes.quote: The first and greatest victory is to conquer yourself; to be conquered by yourself is of all things most shameful and vile.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: We view ourselves on the eve of battle. We are nerved for the conquest and must conquer or perish. It is vain to look for present aid: None is at hand. We must now act or abandon all hope!
quotes.author: Sam Houston

quotes.quote: The will to conquer is the first condition of victory.
quotes.author: Ferdinand Foch

quotes.quote: You can conquer almost any fear if you will only make up your mind to do so. For remember, fear doesn't exist anywhere except in the mind.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: It's our own small voice within that is our oppressor; it says we are not worthy and not powerful enough. Our limited beliefs are the real foes we need to fight and conquer.
quotes.author: Yehuda Berg

quotes.quote: The way you conquer fear is to feel it all the way, and then you'll find out that there's nothing there - it's just emotion.
quotes.author: Nick Nolte

quotes.quote: The first duty of man is to conquer fear; he must get rid of it, he cannot act till then.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: If you want to conquer fear, don't sit home and think about it. Go out and get busy.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: Give a girl the right shoes, and she can conquer the world.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: Think not that humility is weakness; it shall supply the marrow of strength to thy bones. Stoop and conquer; bow thyself and become invincible.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.quote: They can conquer who believe they can.
quotes.author: Virgil

quotes.quote: We all have challenges. We have to face them, embrace them, defy them, and conquer them.
quotes.author: Victoria Arlen

quotes.quote: Don't be afraid to give your best to what seemingly are small jobs. Every time you conquer one it makes you that much stronger. If you do the little jobs well, the big ones will tend to take care of themselves.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: In the past, the greatest weapon the white man has had has been his ability to divide and conquer. If I take my hand and slap you, you don't even feel it. It might sting you because these digits are separated. But all I have to do to put you back in your place is bring those digits together.
quotes.author: Malcolm X

quotes.quote: It is one thing to mortify curiosity, another to conquer it.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: Conquer we shall, but, we must first contend! It's not the fight that crowns us, but the end.
quotes.author: Robert Herrick

quotes.quote: A man who has been the indisputable favorite of his mother keeps for life the feeling of a conqueror.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: The capacity of any conqueror is more likely than not to be an illusion produced by the incapacity of his adversary.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: The conqueror is regarded with awe; the wise man commands our respect; but it is only the benevolent man that wins our affection.
quotes.author: William Dean Howells

quotes.quote: Conquerors never, never conquer a nation to bring freedom. They brought control.
quotes.author: Ernst Zundel

quotes.quote: Excellent conquerors do not engage.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.quote: There are not fifty ways of fighting, there is only one: to be the conqueror.
quotes.author: Andre Malraux

quotes.quote: Love is the great conqueror of lust.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: To conquer, we must destroy our enemies. We must not only die gallantly; we must kill devastatingly. The faster and more effectively you kill, the longer you will live to enjoy the priceless fame of conquerors.
quotes.author: George S. Patton Jr.

quotes.quote: Modern conquerors can kill, but do not seem to be able to create. Artists know how to create but cannot really kill. Murderers are only very exceptionally found among artists.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: If conquerors be regarded as the engine-drivers of History, then the conquerors of thought are perhaps the pointsmen who, less conspicuous to the traveler's eye, determine the direction of the journey.
quotes.author: Arthur Koestler

quotes.quote: Any conqueror in human history has always been ultimately someone who exists purely for the expansion of their own ego, through amounting more.
quotes.author: Scott Derrickson

quotes.quote: The inactivity of a conqueror betrays the loss of strength and blood.
quotes.author: Edward Gibbon

quotes.quote: A man may conquer a million men in battle but one who conquers himself is, indeed, the greatest of conquerors.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: History would be boring without conquerors, bloodthirsty warlords and saviors.
quotes.author: Miltiades Varvounis

quotes.quote: It is the right of war for conquerors to treat those whom they have conquered according to their pleasure.
quotes.author: Julius Caesar

quotes.quote: The greatest conqueror wins without struggle.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: The truth comes as conqueror only because we have lost the art of receiving it as guest.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.quote: Vengeful conquerors burn books as if the enemy's souls reside there, too.
quotes.author: James Gleick

quotes.quote: Never be a victim of life; be its conqueror.
quotes.author: Mike Norton

quotes.quote: Conquerors fight their own battles.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: The conqueror is always a lover of peace; he would prefer to take over our country unopposed.
quotes.author: Carl von Clausewitz

quotes.quote: They were conquerors, and for that you want only brute force--nothing to boast of, when you have it, since your strength is just an accident arising from the weakness of others.
quotes.author: Joseph Conrad

quotes.quote: No man is such a conqueror, as the one that has defeated himself.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: The conqueror writes history, they came, they conquered and they write. You don't expect the people who came to invade us to tell the truth about us.
quotes.author: Miriam Makeba

quotes.quote: The man who masters his own soul will forever be called conqueror of conquerors.
quotes.author: Plautus

quotes.quote: Life yields only to the conqueror. Never accept what can be gained by giving in. You will be living off stolen goods, and your muscles will atrophy.
quotes.author: Dag Hammarskjold

quotes.quote: The man who has grit enough to bring about the afforestation or the irrigation of a country is not less worthy of honor than its conqueror.
quotes.author: J. Arthur Thomson

quotes.quote: Death makes no conquest of this conqueror: For now he lives in fame, though not in life.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Thank you, Lord, that You are the Conqueror and that You want to make us more than conquerors.
quotes.author: Corrie ten Boom

quotes.quote: Kill one man and you're a murderer, kill a million and you're a conqueror.
quotes.author: Jean Rostand

quotes.quote: A clear conscience is the sure sign of a bad memory.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Never do anything against conscience even if the state demands it.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Conscience is the inner voice that warns us that someone might be looking.
quotes.author: H L Mencken

quotes.quote: Conscience is a great ledger book in which all our offences are written and registered, and which time reveals to the sense and feeling of the offender.
quotes.author: Robert Burton

quotes.quote: Fear nothing but your conscience.
quotes.author: Suzy Kassem

quotes.quote: There is no witness so terrible and no accuser so powerful as conscience which dwells within us.
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.quote: Reason often makes mistakes, but conscience never does.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.quote: Conscience defined by the elders, passed on to the next generations.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: Conscience was chiefly fear of society, or fear of oneself.
quotes.author: D. H. Lawrence

quotes.quote: Your conscience is the measure of the honesty of your selfishness. Listen to it carefully.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: The conscience is the sacred haven of the liberty of man.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: Conscience is the window of our spirit, evil is the curtain.
quotes.author: Douglas Horton

quotes.quote: What a man calls his conscience is merely the mental action that follows a sentimental reaction after too much wine or love.
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.quote: Conscience is a man's compass.
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.quote: A quiet conscience makes one strong!
quotes.author: Anne Frank

quotes.quote: Conscience is thoroughly well-bred and soon leaves off talking to those who do not wish to hear it.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.quote: Character is doing what you don't want to do but know you should do.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.quote: Conscience, the organ of feeling which dominates us and of the opinions which rule us, is presumptuous in the strong, timid in the weak and unfortunate, uneasy in the undecided.
quotes.author: Luc De Clapiers

quotes.quote: Conscience has no more to do with gallantry than it has with politics.
quotes.author: Richard Brinsley Sheridan

quotes.quote: A conscience without God is like a court without a judge.
quotes.author: Alphonse De Lamartine

quotes.quote: Conscience is the mirror of our souls, which represents the errors of our lives in their full shape.
quotes.author: George Bancroft

quotes.quote: Conscience is thus explained only as the voice of God in the soul.
quotes.author: Peter Kreeft

quotes.quote: Conscience is the light by which we interpret the will of God in our own lives.
quotes.author: Thomas Merton

quotes.quote: It is neither right nor safe to go against my conscience.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: Conscience is not white, black or brown. Conscience is human. It is beyond race it is beyond religion, it is beyond all sectarianism.
quotes.author: Abhijit Naskar

quotes.quote: Conscience is the voice of the soul; the passions of the body.
quotes.author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

quotes.quote: Conscience is the internal perception of the rejection of a particular wish operating within us.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: Conscience is that peculiar faculty of the soul which may be called the religious instinct.
quotes.author: Samuel Smiles

quotes.quote: Freedom of conscience entails more dangers than authority and despotism.
quotes.author: Michel Foucault

quotes.quote: No guilt is forgotten so long as the conscience still knows of it.
quotes.author: Stefan Zweig

quotes.quote: Consciences keep silence more often than they should, that's why laws were created.
quotes.author: Jose Saramago

quotes.quote: Conscience is the perfect interpreter of life.
quotes.author: Karl Barth

quotes.quote: Conscience is our unerring judge until we finally stifle it.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: Conscience does make cowards of us all, and thus the native hue of resolution is sicklied o'er with the pale cast of thought.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Conscience is harder than our enemies, knows more, accuses with more nicety.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: From a cleansed conscience emerges a changed life.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Conscience is a coward, and those faults it has not strength enough to prevent it seldom has justice enough to accuse.
quotes.author: Oliver Goldsmith

quotes.quote: The bite of conscience is indecent.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: A bad conscience is easier to cope with than a bad reputation.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Conscience can be silenced through an incessant disobedience
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: Conscience that isn't hitched up to common sense is a mighty dangerous thing.
quotes.author: Margaret Deland

quotes.quote: A good conscience is a continual feast.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: Conscience is like a pet: If you spoil it by too much attention it'll start yipping at the most inopportune times.
quotes.author: Connie Brockway

quotes.quote: Conscience is no more than the dead speaking to us.
quotes.author: Jim Carroll

quotes.quote: A conscience is what hurts when all your other parts feel so good.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Conscience is a mother-in-law whose visit never ends.
quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

quotes.quote: Conscience is our wisest counselor and teacher, our most faithful and most patient friend.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Conscience is an exact recorder, that writes every man's history; an inward witness, that will sooner or later speak the whole truth; an impartial judge, whose sentence will acquit or condemn.
quotes.author: John Thornton

quotes.quote: A conscience is that still small voice that people won't listen to.
quotes.author: Carlo Collodi

quotes.quote: Conscience in most men, is but the anticipation of the opinions of others.
quotes.author: Jeremy Taylor

quotes.quote: Clear conscience sleeps through thunder.
quotes.author: Jamaican Wisdom

quotes.quote: A clear conscience is a soft mat.
quotes.author: Swahili Wisdom

quotes.quote: Whenever conflict arises between material and spiritual values, the conscience plays an important role, and anyone who suffers from a guilty conscience is never free from this problem until he makes peace with his conscience.
quotes.author: Haile Selassie

quotes.quote: Cowardice asks the question, 'Is it safe?' Expediency asks the question, 'Is it politic?' Vanity asks the question, 'Is it popular?' But conscience asks the question, 'Is it right?'.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King

quotes.quote: Truth is a peacemaker and a healer. It makes it possible for us to negotiate the world with a clear conscience and a pure heart.
quotes.author: Roderick Terry

quotes.quote: We have a moral obligation to be honest with those around us.
quotes.author: Roderick Terry

quotes.quote: There has to be a guard at the gate, when you manifest yourself wholly... That vessel is integrity, conscience and character. That guard of integrity usually gets killed, or fired. It's your conscience.
quotes.author: Lauryn Hill

quotes.quote: There comes a time when a moral man can't obey a law which his conscience tells him is unjust.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King

quotes.quote: It is important to see that there are times when a man-made law is out of harmony with the moral law of the universe.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King

quotes.quote: It is easy to do right out of fear, but it is better to do right because right is right.
quotes.author: Louis Farrakham

quotes.quote: The imperative is to define what is right and do it.
quotes.author: Barbara Jordan

quotes.quote: A truly moral imagination that by its very nature and outlook is imbued with a profound respect for other people's lives.
quotes.author: Thomas Glave

quotes.quote: I learned to raise my eye to the high moral ground, and to stake my future on it.
quotes.author: Arthur Ashe

quotes.quote: The depraved maligns the depraved, and thinks that he himself, though conscious of the guilt, has escaped, as if consciousness were not a sufficient condemnation.
quotes.author: Cyprian

quotes.quote: Guilt never decays.
quotes.author: Sotho Wisdom

quotes.quote: If they are uttering insults and don't mean you, and yet you reply, you have condemned yourself.
quotes.author: Tshi Wisdom

quotes.quote: To those who are conscious of themselves there can be no incrimination from without, it must be from within. When a man's conscience convicts him then there is no appeal.
quotes.author: Marcus Garvey

quotes.quote: One who condones evils is just as guilty as the one who perpetrates it.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King

quotes.quote: I have no creative use for guilt, yours or my own.
quotes.author: Audre Lorde

quotes.quote: Guilt is only another way of avoiding informed action, of buying time out of the pressing need to make clear choices.
quotes.author: Audre Lorde

quotes.quote: The best advice when called out for something that you've done or have failed to do: Swallow your pride, own up to it, take the medicine, pick up what's left and move on as best you can.
quotes.author: Colbert King

quotes.quote: My conscience is more trouble and bother to me than anything else I started with.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: The voice of conscience has a difficult time making connections with the ears.
quotes.author: Ed Howe

quotes.quote: Conscience originated when the elderly father surrounded his wives and tools with a pious taboo against his son's desires.
quotes.author: Freud

quotes.quote: Conscience is a mother-in-law whose visit never ends.
quotes.author: Mencken

quotes.quote: Conscience is what makes a boy tell his mother before his sister does.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Conscience is the playback of the still, small voice that warned you not to do it in the first place.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: In every person's conscience there is a policeman who is usually off duty.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: The reason conscience has a small, still voice is that it's often a small, still conscience.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: More people would listen to their conscience if they could tell it what to say.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Every judgement of conscience, be it right or wrong, be it about things evil in themselves or morally indifferent is obligatory.
quotes.author: Steven Mason

quotes.quote: Justice is a temporary thing that must at last come to an end; but the conscience is eternal and will never die.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King

quotes.quote: Lives are changed by a moment's listening to conscience, by a single and quiet inclination of the mind.
quotes.author: George Albert Smith

quotes.quote: The right of conscience and private judgement is unalienable, and it is truly the interest of all mankind to unite themselves into one.
quotes.author: Steven Mason

quotes.quote: The most effective action both resorts to power and engages conscience.
quotes.author: Barbara Deming

quotes.quote: Liberty is the condition of duty, the guardian of conscience. It grows as conscience grows. The domains of both grow together.
quotes.author: Steven Mason

quotes.quote: Freedom of conscience is individual in its nature; it does not have a public component on its own.
quotes.author: Steven Mason

quotes.quote: We will not, on the altar of money, mortgage our conscience, mortgage our faith, mortgage our salvation.
quotes.author: Peter Akinola

quotes.quote: Whoever has witnessed another's ideal becomes his inexorable judge and as it were his evil conscience.
quotes.author: Friedrich Willhelm Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Anxiety is the beginning of conscience, which is the parent of the soul but is not compatible with innocence.
quotes.author: Angela Carter

quotes.quote: No problem can be solved from the same level of consciousness that created it.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Consciousness was upon him before he could get out of the way.
quotes.author: Kingsley Amis

quotes.quote: Consciousness itself is an infinite regress. This explains coincidences.
quotes.author: Robert Anton Wilson

quotes.quote: The only way to give finality to the world is to give it consciousness.
quotes.author: Miguel de Unamuno

quotes.quote: Consciousness is the stone that creates the waves in a sea of nothing.
quotes.author: Richard Gerber

quotes.quote: Through consciousness, our minds have the power to change our planet and ourselves. It is time we heed the wisdom of the ancient indigenous people and channel our consciousness and spirit to tend the garden and not destroy it.
quotes.author: Bruce Lipton

quotes.quote: Analysis brings no curative powers in its train; it merely makes us conscious of the existence of an evil, which, oddly enough, is consciousness.
quotes.author: Henry Miller

quotes.quote: Consciousness is the greatest movie-maker in the whole world.
quotes.author: Mooji

quotes.quote: Consciousness is not mind; it is the ground of all being, the ground of both matter and mind. Matter and mind are both possibilities of consciousness.
quotes.author: Amit Goswami

quotes.quote: The real history of consciousness starts with one's first lie.
quotes.author: Joseph Brodsky

quotes.quote: Consciousness is only possible through change; change is only possible through movement.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: The ultimate gift of conscious life is a sense of the mystery that encompasses it.
quotes.author: Lewis Mumford

quotes.quote: There is no birth of consciousness without pain.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: Without consciousness and intelligence, the universe would lack meaning.
quotes.author: Clifford D. Simak

quotes.quote: Consciousness is either inexplicable illusion, or else revelation.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Without consciousness the mind-body problem would be much less interesting. With consciousness it seems hopeless.
quotes.author: Thomas Nagel

quotes.quote: The history of the world is none other than the progress of the consciousness of freedom.
quotes.author: Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel

quotes.quote: The key to growth is the introduction of higher dimensions of consciousness into our awareness.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Consciousness is not in the body; the body is in consciousness. And you are that consciousness.
quotes.author: Dan Millman

quotes.quote: Do not look for approval except for the consciousness of doing your best.
quotes.author: Andrew Carnegie

quotes.quote: Meditation is realizing and expanding your inner beauty in every direction.
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: What drains your spirit drains your body. What fuels your spirit fuels your body.
quotes.author: Caroline Myss

quotes.quote: When you change the way you look at things, the things you look at change.
quotes.author: Wayne W. Dyer

quotes.quote: Never give a conscious meaning to your unconscious acts!
quotes.author: Ramana Pemmaraju

quotes.quote: Consciousness is what makes the mind-body problem really intractable.
quotes.author: Thomas Nagel

quotes.quote: Consciousness is an end in itself. We torture ourselves getting somewhere, and when we get there it is nowhere, for there is nowhere to get to.
quotes.author: David Herbert Lawrence

quotes.quote: Mind is consciousness which has put on limitations. You are originally unlimited and perfect. Later you take on limitations and become the mind.
quotes.author: Ramana Maharshi

quotes.quote: There is no life without consciousness; there is no consciousness without life.
quotes.author: Annie Besant

quotes.quote: It is the inner life that is to spark the change in consciousness that will permit us to advance.
quotes.author: Wayne Teasdale

quotes.quote: My experience is what I agree to attend to.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: Life before consciousness was like blank paper, so be it.
quotes.author: Santosh Kalwar

quotes.quote: He who experiences the unity of life sees his own self in all beings, and all being in his own self, and looks on everything with an impartial eye.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: Changing mass consciousness is an individual responsibility.
quotes.author: Dennis Weaver

quotes.quote: Consciousness is the perception of what passes in man's own mind.
quotes.author: John Locke

quotes.quote: Without thoughts the mind cannot exist only consciousness.
quotes.author: Avis J. Williams

quotes.quote: The consciousness of knowing how to make oneself useful, how to help mankind in many ways, fills the soul with noble confidence, almost religious dignity.
quotes.author: Maria Montessori

quotes.quote: Consciousness will not always solve the problem, but it may make the suffering meaningful.
quotes.author: Marion Woodman

quotes.quote: Waking consciousness is dreaming, but dreaming constrained by external reality.
quotes.author: Oliver Sacks

quotes.quote: Control of consciousness determines the quality of life.
quotes.author: Mihaly Csikszentmihalyi

quotes.quote: Consciousness is the creative element in the universe. Without it, nothing would appear.
quotes.author: Fred Alan Wolf

quotes.quote: Conflict is the beginning of consciousness.
quotes.author: M. Esther Harding

quotes.quote: The great mystery of our consciousness is beyond our grasp.
quotes.author: William Shatner

quotes.quote: Consciousness is much more than the thorn, it is the dagger in the flesh.
quotes.author: Emile M. Cioran

quotes.quote: The intellect has little to do on the road to discovery. There comes a leap in consciousness, call it intuition or what you will, the solution comes to you and you don't know how or why.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The bite of conscience is indecent.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: The human consciousness is really homogeneous. There is no complete forgetting, even in death.
quotes.author: D. H. Lawrence

quotes.quote: You get there by realizing you are already there.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: It's from our sufferings that we form our consciousness.
quotes.author: Lisa Bonet

quotes.quote: To be conscious of being, you need to reclaim consciousness from the mind. This is one of the most essential tasks on your spiritual journey.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: Consciousness is the glory of creation.
quotes.author: James Broughton

quotes.quote: A guilty conscience needs no accuser.
quotes.author: English Proverb<

quotes.quote: A horse may run quickly but it cannot escape its tail.
quotes.author: Russian proverb (on conscience)

quotes.quote: A tree falls the way it leans.
quotes.author: Walloon (on rewards and consequences)

quotes.quote: Bad gains are true losses.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Conscience makes cowards of us all.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Depend on others and you will go hungry.
quotes.author: Nepalese (on self-reliance)

quotes.quote: Depend on your walking stick; not on other people.
quotes.author: Japanese (on self-reliance)

quotes.quote: Empty sacks will never stand upright.
quotes.author: Italian Proverb

quotes.quote: Everyone gets their just deserts.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: He that goes aborrowing, goes asorrowing.
quotes.author: R. Taverner

quotes.quote: He that lies down with the dogs riseth with fleas.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: Hurry is good only for catching flies.
quotes.author: Russian (on the conduct of life)

quotes.quote: It's no use closing the barn door after the horse is gone.
quotes.author: John Heywood

quotes.quote: Let the punishment fit the crime.
quotes.author: W. S. Gilbert

quotes.quote: Liars often set their own traps.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: Little leaks sink the ship.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Medicine left in the container can't help.
quotes.author: Yoruba (West African)

quotes.quote: Mess with the bull and one usually gets the horns.
quotes.author: Latin American saying

quotes.quote: No sleep, no dreams.
quotes.author: Korean (on rewards and consequences)

quotes.quote: One who steals has no right to complain if he is robbed.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: The creditor hath a better memory than the debtor.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The eagle was killed with an arrow made with its own feathers.
quotes.author: Armenian (on paradox)

quotes.quote: The fat is in the fire.
quotes.author: John Heywood

quotes.quote: The frog enjoys itself in water but not in hot water.
quotes.author: African proverb Wolof Tribe

quotes.quote: The proof is in the pudding.
quotes.author: Miguel de Cervantes

quotes.quote: What breaks in a moment may take years to mend.
quotes.author: Swedish Proverb

quotes.quote: What you give is what you get.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: You can't buy an inch of time with an inch of gold.
quotes.author: Chinese (on time and timeliness)

quotes.quote: What we think or what we believe is, in the end, of little consequence.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.quote: The only thing of consequence is what we do.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.quote: Happiness is not a reward - it is a consequence.
quotes.author: Robert Green Ingersoll

quotes.quote: Suffering is not punishment - it is a result.
quotes.author: Robert Green Ingersoll

quotes.quote: A legal action that results in no damages is an example of a cause without an effect.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: With man, every effect has its causes; with woman, its because.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Cause and effect can be puzzling: for example, cold feet are often the result of burnt fingers.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Many men owe their success to their wives; others owe their wives to their success.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Half the trouble in the world is cause by loose thinkers, and the other half by tight drivers.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: The little trouble in the world that is not due to love is due to friendship.
quotes.author: Ed Howe

quotes.quote: Hate is the consequence of fear; we fear something before we hate it.
quotes.author: M.P. Singh

quotes.quote: We are all formed of frailty and error; let us pardon reciprocally each other's folly.
quotes.author: M.P. Singh

quotes.quote: While we are free to choose our actions, we are not free to choose the consequences of our actions.
quotes.author: M.P. Singh

quotes.quote: If you focus on results, you will never change. If you focus on change, you will get results.
quotes.author: Jack Dixon

quotes.quote: What we call results are beginnings.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: You may never know what results come of your action, but if you do nothing there will be not result.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Good things take time, as they should. We shouldn't expect good things to happen overnight.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Swarr

quotes.quote: Optimism does allow the competitor to feel empowered to create the result they desired and learn from results that are not exactly what was envisioned.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Swarr

quotes.quote: Results come in proportion to enthusiasm applied.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Swarr

quotes.quote: There's a difference between interest and commitment. When you're committed to something, you accept no excuses, only results.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Swarr

quotes.quote: Don't expect fast results if you want good results.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Swarr

quotes.quote: A human being fashions his consequences as surely as he fashions his goods or his dwelling his goods or his dwelling. Nothing that he says, thinks or does is without consequences.
quotes.author: Norman Cousins

quotes.quote: All progress is precarious, and the solution of one problem brings us face to face with another problem.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King

quotes.quote: Always do our best. What you plant now, you will harvest later.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.quote: Never underestimate the power of human stupidity.
quotes.author: Robert Anson Heinlein

quotes.quote: Earth provides enough to satisfy every man's needs, but not every man's greed.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi
