quotes.quote: A contemplative life has more the appearance of a life of piety than any other; but it is the divine plan to bring faith into activity and exercise.
quotes.author: Lord David Cecil

quotes.quote: For contemplation is both the highest form of activity since the intellect is the highest thing in us, and the objects that it apprehends are the highest things that can be known, and also it is the most continuous, because we are more capable of continuous contemplation than we are of any practical activity.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Contemplate the good things in your life and be grateful for them.
quotes.author: Rebecca Pidgeon

quotes.quote: Contemplation and wisdom are highest achievements and man is not totally at home with them.
quotes.author: Gabriel Marcel

quotes.quote: The contemplation of consciousness which is the contemplation of no-thing whatsoever is endlessly fascinating. It's like staring at a candle in a dark night you find yourself mesmerized by something that is unchanging yet infinitely compelling. You feel drawn into something you don't understand rationally but that your heart or soul grasps completely. You are drawn into it, and as you are drawn into it, the only thing you experience as real is the eternal or timeless nature of Being itself. You find yourself in a state of rapture, because the deepest part of yourself has been released from your ego's endless fears and concerns, and drawn out of the time process altogether.
quotes.author: Andrew Cohen

quotes.quote: The contemplation of beauty in nature, in art, in literature, in human character, diffuses through our being a soothing and subtle joy, by which the heart's anxious and aching cares are softly smiled away.
quotes.author: Edwin Percy Whipple

quotes.quote: The contemplation of truth and beauty is the proper object for which we were created, which calls forth the most intense desires of the soul, and of which it never tires.
quotes.author: William Hazlitt

quotes.quote: He who is contented is rich.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Be content with what you have; rejoice in the way things are. When you realize there is nothing lacking, the whole world belongs to you.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: At some point, you gotta let go, and sit still, and allow contentment to come to you.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quotes.quote: To know when you have enough is to be rich beyond measure.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Do not spoil what you have by desiring what you have not; remember that what you now have was once among the things you only hoped for.
quotes.author: Epicurus

quotes.quote: Contentment consist not in adding more fuel, but in taking away some fire.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: Discontentment makes rich people poor while contentment makes poor people rich.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Contentment gives a crown, where fortune hath denied it.
quotes.author: John Ford

quotes.quote: Contentment has the ability to squeeze out of every situation all the good there is to get.
quotes.author: Shantidasa

quotes.quote: When we cannot find contentment in ourselves,it is useless to seek it elsewhere.
quotes.author: Francois La Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: Contentment, and indeed usefulness, comes as the infallible result of great acceptances, great humilities of not trying to make ourselves this or that, but of surrendering ourselves to the fullness of life of letting life flow through us.
quotes.author: David Grayson

quotes.quote: The key to contentment is to consider. Consider who you are and be satisfied with that. Consider what you have and be satisfied with that. Consider what God's doing and be satisfied with that. You will be amazed at how much more comfortable you'll feel with yourself. Finally, consider this: If contentment cannot be found within yourself, you'll never find it.
quotes.author: Luci Swindoll

quotes.quote: The secret of contentment is the realization that life is a gift, not a right.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Neither circumstances nor surroundings can bring contentment. Only by fitting ourselves to meet conditions as they are, calmly and courageously, may we hope to reconcile ourselves to our position and conditions of life.
quotes.author: Fred Van Amburgh

quotes.quote: A harvest of peace grows from seeds of contentment.
quotes.author: Indian Proverbs

quotes.quote: He who knows that enough is enough will always have enough.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Man falls from the pursuit of the ideal of plan living and high thinking the moment he wants to multiply his daily wants. Man's happiness really lies in contentment.
quotes.author: Mohandas Gandhi

quotes.quote: Contentment is the greatest form of wealth.
quotes.author: Acharya N_G_Rjuna

quotes.quote: There is no end of craving. Hence contentment alone is the best way to happiness. Therefore, acquire contentment.
quotes.author: Swami Sivananda

quotes.quote: He is rich who is content with the least; for contentment is the wealth of nature.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: Contentment is a pearl of great price, and whoever procures it at the expense of ten thousand desires makes a wise and a happy purchase.
quotes.author: John Balguy

quotes.quote: Contentment is a kind of moral laziness; if there wasn't anything but contentment in his world, man wouldn't be any more of a success than an angleworm is.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.quote: Contentment ... has an internal quietness of heart that gladly submits to God in all circumstances.
quotes.author: Joni Eareckson Tada

quotes.quote: A good life with contentment is itself a great wealth. For we brought nothing with us into this world, and we can take nothing out of it. So if we have enough of what we need, let us be content with that.
quotes.author: Saint Timothy

quotes.quote: Contentment is for cows; a challenging purpose is for people.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: Contentment is just the realization that God has already provided for me today all that I need for my present peace and happiness.
quotes.author: Nancy Leigh Demoss

quotes.quote: Fortify yourself with contentment, for this is an impregnable fortress.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: The secret of contentment is knowing how to enjoy what you have, and to be able to lose all desire for things beyond your reach.
quotes.author: Lin Yutang

quotes.quote: He who is not contented with what he has, would not be contented with what he would like to have.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: The wise man contents himself with what he has, until such time as he invents something better.
quotes.author: Jose Saramago

quotes.quote: Contentment is accepting what God has given us, and, by His strength, making the most of it.
quotes.author: C. J. Jackson

quotes.quote: Contentment is never the outcome of fulfillment, of achievement, or of the possession of things; it is not born of action or inaction. It comes with the fullness of what is, not in the alteration of it.
quotes.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quotes.quote: Contentment is not about getting what you want. Contentment is about wanting what you've got.
quotes.author: Ken Clark

quotes.quote: Content hangs not so high but that a man on the ground may reach it.
quotes.author: Eliza Cook

quotes.quote: My motto is: Contented with little, yet wishing for more.
quotes.author: Charles Lamb

quotes.quote: A contented mind is the greatest blessing a man can enjoy in this world.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.quote: The contented man can be happy with what appears to be useless.
quotes.author: Hung Ko

quotes.quote: It is right to be contented with what we have, but never with what we are.
quotes.author: James Mackintosh

quotes.quote: It is not our circumstances that create our discontent or contentment. It is us.
quotes.author: Vivian Greene

quotes.quote: Be content with your lot; one cannot be first in everything.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: A man who is contented with what he has done will never become famous for what he will do.
quotes.author: Fred Estabrook

quotes.quote: If you are content, you have enough to live comfortably.
quotes.author: Plautus

quotes.quote: True contentment is a real, even an active virtue - not only affirmative but creative. It is the power of getting out of any situation all there is in it.
quotes.author: G. K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: To be content with little is hard; to be content with much, impossible.
quotes.author: Marie Ebner-Eschenbach

quotes.quote: Contentment has been worn as a crown by no end of sleepy heads.
quotes.author: Henry S. Haskins

quotes.quote: Contentment: The smother of invention.
quotes.author: Ethel Watts Mumford

quotes.quote: A contented mind is the best source for trouble.
quotes.author: Plautus

quotes.quote: Progress is not created by contented people.
quotes.author: Frank Tyger

quotes.quote: Ultimately, contentment is more a shift in attitude than a change in circumstances.
quotes.author: Linda Dillow

quotes.quote: To feel that one has a place in life solves half the problems of contentment.
quotes.author: George Woodberry

quotes.quote: I have learned to manage with whatever I have. I know how to live modestly, and I know how to live luxuriously, too: in every way now I have mastered the secret of all conditions: full stomach and empty stomach. plenty and poverty.
quotes.author: Philippians 4:11-12

quotes.quote: The rarest feeling that ever lights the human face is the contentment of a loving soul.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: He who is not contented with little will never be satisfied with much.
quotes.author: Thomas Benton Brooks

quotes.quote: Those who face that which is actually before them, unburdened by the past undistracted by the future, these are they who live, who make the best use of their lives; these are those who have found the secret of contentment.
quotes.author: Alban Goodier

quotes.quote: The children of Israel did not find in the manna all the sweetness and strength they might have found in it; not because the manna did not contain them, but because they longed for meat.
quotes.author: St. John of the Cross

quotes.quote: A contented mind is a continual feast.
quotes.author: Roman Proverb

quotes.quote: Better is a little with contentment than much with contention.
quotes.author: Poor Richard

quotes.quote: He is blessed who knows how to be satisfied; he is poor who does not feel content.
quotes.author: Japanese Proverb

quotes.quote: He is well-constituted who grieves not for what he has not, and rejoices for what he has.
quotes.author: Italian Proverb

quotes.quote: Contentment is natural wealth; luxury is artificial poverty.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: Contentment is the soil in which true joy grows.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: The utmost we can hope for in this world is contentment; if we aim at anything higher, we shall meet with nothing but grief and disappointment.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.quote: Contentment makes poor men rich; discontent makes rich men poor.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Contentment doesn't come from doing what we like to do, but from liking what we must do.
quotes.author: Wilfred Peterson

quotes.quote: Preserve everything in a pure, still heart, and be thankful for every pulse and every breath.
quotes.author: Konrad Von Gesner

quotes.quote: If you have a contented mind, you have to enjoy life with.
quotes.author: Plautus

quotes.quote: It is necessary to the contentment of man that he be mentally faithful to himself.
quotes.author: Thomas Paine

quotes.quote: The noblest mind the best contentment has.
quotes.author: Edmund Spenser

quotes.quote: Content will ever dwell but in a meek and quiet soul.
quotes.author: Izaak Walton

quotes.quote: To be content with little is difficult; to be content with much, impossible.
quotes.author: Old Proverb

quotes.quote: Content is wealth, the riches of the mind; / And happy he who can that treasure find.
quotes.author: John Dryden

quotes.quote: For not that, which men covet most, is best, / Nor that thing worst, which men do most refuse; / But fittest is, that all contented rest, / With that they hold: each half is a fortune in his breast.
quotes.author: Edmund Spenser

quotes.quote: A mind content, both Crown and Kingdom has.
quotes.author: Robert Greene

quotes.quote: We only see in a lifetime a dozen faces marked with the peace of a contented spirit.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: Content is the true riches, for without it there is no satisfying.
quotes.author: Martin Tupper

quotes.quote: If we fasten our attention on what we have, rather than on what we lack, very little wealth is sufficient.
quotes.author: Francis Johnson

quotes.quote: A happy life consists in tranquility of mind.
quotes.author: Cicero

quotes.quote: Since we cannot get what we like, let us like what we can get.
quotes.author: Spanish Proverb

quotes.quote: Desire upon desire causes the greatest sorrow; contentment, the greatest happiness.
quotes.author: Sanskrit

quotes.quote: Contentment is the realization of how much I already have.
quotes.author: Dave Grant

quotes.quote: The world we have created is a product of our thinking; it cannot be changed without changing our thinking.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: If I had one hour to save the world, I would spend fifty-five minutes defining the problem and only five minutes finding the solution.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: A corporation is a living organism; it has to continue to shed its skin. Methods have to change. Focus has to change. Values have to change. The sum total of those changes is transformation.
quotes.author: Andrew Grove

quotes.quote: The journey is never ending. There’s always gonna be growth, improvement, adversity; you just gotta take it all in and do what’s right, continue to grow, continue to live in the moment.
quotes.author: Antonio Brown

quotes.quote: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but habit.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Improvement begins with I.
quotes.author: Arnold H. Glasow

quotes.quote: The only way of finding the limits of the possible is by going beyond them into the impossible.
quotes.author: Arthur C. Clarke

quotes.quote: Watch the little things; a small leak will sink a great ship.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: The first rule of any technology used in a business is that automation applied to an efficient operation will magnify the efficiency. The second is that automation applied to an inefficient operation will magnify the inefficiency.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: Continuous improvement is not about the things you do well — that’s work. Continuous improvement is about removing the things that get in the way of your work. The headaches, the things that slow you down, that’s what continuous improvement is all about.
quotes.author: Bruce Hamilton

quotes.quote: I fear not the man who has practiced 10,000 kicks once, but I fear the man who has practiced one kick 10,000 times.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: It may be hard for an egg to turn into a bird: it would be a jolly sight harder for it to learn to fly while remaining an egg.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: It is not the strongest of the species that survives, nor the most intelligent that survives, but the one most responsive to change.
quotes.author: Charles Darwin

quotes.quote: To give so much time to the improvement of yourself that you have no time to criticize others. Live in the faith that the whole world is on your side as long as you are true to the best that is in you.
quotes.author: Christian D Larson

quotes.quote: Most of the important things in the world have been accomplished by people who have kept on trying when there seemed to be no hope at all.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: Some people don’t like change, but you need to embrace change if the alternative is disaster.
quotes.author: Elon Musk

quotes.quote: I think it’s very important to have a feedback loop, where you’re constantly thinking about what you’ve done and how you could be doing it better.
quotes.author: Elon Musk

quotes.quote: You shouldn’t do things differently just because they’re different. They need to be… better.
quotes.author: Elon Musk

quotes.quote: First say to yourself what you would be; and then do what you have to do.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: I cannot say whether things will get better if we change; what I can say is they must change if they are to get better.
quotes.author: Georg C. Lichtenberg

quotes.quote: If you think of standardization as the best that you know today, but which is to be improved tomorrow; you get somewhere.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: If you always do what you’ve always done, you’ll always get what you’ve always got.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: The man who will use his skill and constructive imagination to see how much he can give for a dollar, instead of how little he can give for a dollar, is bound to succeed.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: The common question that gets asked in business is, ‘why?’ That’s a good question, but an equally valid question is, ‘why not?
quotes.author: Jeff Bezos

quotes.quote: One of the only ways to get out of a tight box is to invent your way out.
quotes.author: Jeff Bezos

quotes.quote: Without a Standard, there is no logical basis for decision making or taking action.
quotes.author: Joseph M. Juran

quotes.quote: The Hacker Way is an approach to building that involves continuous improvement and iteration. Hackers believe that something can always be better, and that nothing is ever complete.
quotes.author: Mark Zuckerberg

quotes.quote: Change does not roll in on the wheels of inevitability, but comes through continuous struggle.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King

quotes.quote: It is impossible to improve any process until it is standardized. If the process is shifting from here to there, then any improvement will just be one more variation that is occasionally used and mostly ignored. One must standardize, and thus stabilize the process, before continuous improvement can be made.
quotes.author: Masaaki Imai

quotes.quote: There is nothing so useless as doing efficiently that which should not be done at all.
quotes.author: Peter F. Drucker

quotes.quote: Quality is free. It’s not a gift, but it’s free. The ‘unquality’ things are what cost money.
quotes.author: Phil Crosby

quotes.quote: The range of what we think and do is limited by what we fail to notice. And because we fail to notice that we fail to notice there is little we can do to change until we notice how failing to notice shapes our thoughts and deeds.
quotes.author: R. D. Laing

quotes.quote: The most dangerous kind of waste is the waste we do not recognize.
quotes.author: Shigeo Shingo

quotes.quote: I have a great respect for incremental improvement, and I’ve done that sort of thing in my life, but I’ve always been attracted to the more revolutionary changes. I don’t know why. Because they’re harder. They’re much more stressful emotionally. And you usually go through a period where everybody tells you that you’ve completely failed.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Be a yardstick of quality. Some people aren’t used to an environment where excellence is expected.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Costs do not exist to be calculated. Costs exist to be reduced.
quotes.author: Taiichi Ohno

quotes.quote: All we are doing is looking at the timeline, from the moment the customer gives us an order to the point when we collect the cash. And we are reducing the time line by reducing the non-value adding wastes.
quotes.author: Taiichi Ohno

quotes.quote: Something is wrong if workers do not look around each day, find things that are tedious or boring, and then rewrite the procedures. Even last month’s manual should be out of date.
quotes.author: Taiichi Ohno

quotes.quote: When you are out observing on the gemba, do something to help them. If you do, people will come to expect that you can help them and will look forward to seeing you again on the gemba.
quotes.author: Taiichi Ohno

quotes.quote: Almost all quality improvement comes via simplification of design, manufacturing, layout, processes, and procedures.
quotes.author: Tom Peters

quotes.quote: Excellent firms don’t believe in excellence – only in constant improvement and constant change.
quotes.author: Tom Peters

quotes.quote: Even perfection has room for improvement.
quotes.author: Ty Warner

quotes.quote: Never to be satisfied with how things are. To succeed in this world, you have to change all the time.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A bad system will beat a good person every time.
quotes.author: W. Edwards Deming

quotes.quote: It is not necessary to change. Survival is not mandatory.
quotes.author: W. Edwards Deming

quotes.quote: Eighty-five percent of the reasons for failure are deficiencies in the systems and process rather than the employee. The role of management is to change the process rather than badgering individuals to do better.
quotes.author: W. Edwards Deming

quotes.quote: It’s better to hang out with people better than you. Pick out associates whose behavior is better than yours and you’ll drift in that direction.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: The business schools reward difficult complex behavior more than simple behavior, but simple behavior is more effective.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: Quality is never an accident; it is always the result of high intention, sincere effort, intelligent direction and skillful execution; it represents the wise choice of many alternatives.
quotes.author: William A. Foster

quotes.quote: Learning is not compulsory; it's voluntary. Improvement is not compulsory; it's voluntary. But to survive, we must learn.
quotes.author: W Edwards Deming

quotes.quote: Do the best you can until you know better. Then when you know better, do better.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Passion for knowledge, motivation for continuous learning.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Persistence, perseverance, and continuous improvement are the ingredients for forming a successful person.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: Great things are done by a series of small things brought together.
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gough

quotes.quote: There is always room for improvement.
quotes.author: Rich Gunnell

quotes.quote: Man cannot really improve himself without improving others.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: If you know you can do better then do better.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: When you reach the top, keep ascending, otherwise you start descending.
quotes.author: Lincoln Patz

quotes.quote: Perfection is not attainable. But if we chase perfection, we can catch excellence.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: Practice the philosophy of continuous improvement. Get a little bit better every single day.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Continuous improvement is better than delayed perfection.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Continuous improvement requires systematic evaluation. Continuous improvement requires unfiltered evaluation.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Do not be afraid of improving slowly. Be afraid of standing still.
quotes.author: Leo Babauta

quotes.quote: It's the little things you do that make the big things happen.
quotes.author: Mike Dooley

quotes.quote: Continuous improvement is the only cultural value that could unify an organization as large and diverse as ours.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The widespread availability of information is the only basis for effective day-to-day problem solving, which abets continuous improvement programs.
quotes.author: Tom Peters

quotes.quote: He who stops being better stops being good.
quotes.author: Oliver Cromwell

quotes.quote: There is always one more thing to learn.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Improve quality, you automatically improve productivity.
quotes.author: W Edwards Deming

quotes.quote: It's not about money or connections, it's the willingness to out work and outlearn everyon. And if it fails, you learn from what happened and do a better job next time.
quotes.author: Mark Cuban

quotes.quote: Excellence is not a destination, it is a continuous journey that never ends.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: If you define the problem correctly, you almost have the solution.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Improvement usually means doing something that we have never done before.
quotes.author: Shigeo Shingo

quotes.quote: Without change there is no innovation, creativity, or incentive for improvement. Those who initiate change will have a better opportunity to manage the change that is inevitable.
quotes.author: William Pollard

quotes.quote: Never neglect an opportunity for improvement.
quotes.author: William Jones

quotes.quote: Without continual growth and progress, such words as improvement, achievement, and success have no meaning.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: There is only one corner of the universe you can be certain of improving, and that's your own self.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: Attempt the impossible in order to improve your work.
quotes.author: Bette Davis

quotes.quote: It is important to foster individuality, for only the individual can produce the new ideas.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: If you do not know how to ask the right question, you discover nothing.
quotes.author: W.E. Deming

quotes.quote: The greatest performance improvement of all is when a system goes from not-working to working.
quotes.author: John Ousterhout

quotes.quote: The improvement of understanding is for two ends: first, our own increase of knowledge; secondly, to enable us to deliver that knowledge to others.
quotes.author: John Locke

quotes.quote: Anticipate the difficult by managing the easy.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: One percent improvement in 1,000 things is better than 1,000% improvement in one thing.
quotes.author: Tom Peters

quotes.quote: The self is not something ready-made, but something in continuous formation through choice of action.
quotes.author: John Dewey

quotes.quote: We cannot solve our problems with the same thinking we used when we created them.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Change equals self improvement. Push yourself to places you haven't been before.
quotes.author: Pat Summitt

quotes.quote: Strive for continuous improvement, instead of perfection.
quotes.author: Kim Collins

quotes.quote: The thing is, continuity of strategic direction and continuous improvement in how you do things are absolutely consistent with each other. In fact, they're mutually reinforcing.
quotes.author: Michael Porter

quotes.quote: Unless you try to do something beyond you have already mastered, you will never grow.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Continual improvement is an unending journey.
quotes.author: Lloyd Dobens

quotes.quote: We cannot become what we want to be by remaining what we are.
quotes.author: Max Depree

quotes.quote: If you're not getting better, you're getting worse.
quotes.author: Pat Riley

quotes.quote: There's no limit possible to the expansion of each one of us.
quotes.author: Charles Schwab

quotes.quote: There is no exercise better for the improvement of our world than reaching down on a daily basis to lift someone up.
quotes.author: Melchor Lim

quotes.quote: Self knowledge is the beginning of self improvement.
quotes.author: Baltasar Gracian

quotes.quote: To improve is to change; to be perfect is to change often.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: People never improve unless they look to some standard or example higher or better than themselves.
quotes.author: Tryon Edwards

quotes.quote: Don't demand perfection. But insist on continuous improvement.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: To deny one's own experiences is to put a lie into the lips of one's own life. It is no less than a denial of the soul.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: The worst lies are the lies we tell ourselves. We live in denial of what we do, even what we think. We do this because we're afraid.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: The thing about denial is that it doesn't feel like denial when it's going on.
quotes.author: Georgina Kleege

quotes.quote: A good addiction is a contradiction in terms. Anything people can't give up or must have is not healthy, no matter what the activity
quotes.author: Jody Dean

quotes.quote: Is a denial of this world, a severance from reality, an abdication, a means of redemption from, not for, life.
quotes.author: Isaac Leib Peretz

quotes.quote: Though the contradictions of war seem sudden and simultaneous, history stalks before it strikes. Something tolerated soon becomes something good.
quotes.author: Anne Michaels

quotes.quote: It would be a contradiction in terms if the oppressors not only defended but actually implemented a liberating education.
quotes.author: Paulo Freire

quotes.quote: Contradictions do not exist. Whenever you think you are facing a contradiction, check your premises. You will find that one of them is wrong.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: Contradictions do not perplex the logician. They arise because there are more rules to an open game than can be known.
quotes.author: Donald Kingsbury

quotes.quote: Denial is the inevitable consequence of those who are presented with disastrous scenarios without being offered an avenue for success. That is why we need to maintain a hopeful attitude.
quotes.author: Ashavan

quotes.quote: People with a style of denial and blaming are definitely on the list of unsafe people to avoid.
quotes.author: Henry Cloud

quotes.quote: The contradictions are what make human behavior so maddening and yet so fascinating, all at the same time.
quotes.author: Joan D. Vinge

quotes.quote: Denial is a common tactic that substitutes deliberate ignorance for thoughtful planning.
quotes.author: CHARLES TREMPER

quotes.quote: The contradictions the mind comes up against, these are the only realities, the criterion of the real. There is no contradiction in what is imaginary. Contradiction is the test of necessity.
quotes.author: Simone Weil

quotes.quote: When a contradiction is impossible to resolve except by a lie, then we know that it is really a door.
quotes.author: Simone Weil

quotes.quote: Confidence turns into pride only when you are in denial of your mistakes.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: Denial is the way people handle what they cannot handle.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: The denial of suffering is, in fact a better definition of illness than its acceptance.
quotes.author: M Scott Peck

quotes.quote: It is a denial of the divinity within us to doubt our potential and our possibilities.
quotes.author: James E. Faust

quotes.quote: Courage is almost a contradiction in terms. It means a strong desire to live taking the form of a readiness to die.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Contradiction is the essence of the universe.
quotes.author: Fernando Pessoa

quotes.quote: Denial of one appetite sharpens the others.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: He hoped and prayed that there wasn't an afterlife. Then he realized there was a contradiction involved here and merely hoped that there wasn't an afterlife.
quotes.author: Douglas Adams

quotes.quote: Denial, perhaps, is a necessary human mechanism to cope with the heartaches of life.
quotes.author: Richard Paul Evans

quotes.quote: Denial of childhood and denial of freedom are the biggest sins which humankind has been committing and perpetuating for ages.
quotes.author: Kailash Satyarthi

quotes.quote: Contradiction is a bad sign of truth; several things which are certain are contradicted; several things which are false pass without contradiction. Contradiction is not a sign of falsity, nor the want of contradiction a sign of truth
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: Denial exists when three beliefs intersect:1. It cannot happen. 2. It cannot happen to you.3. It cannot happen to you now.
quotes.author: Johnnie Dent Jr.

quotes.quote: Denial is a very powerful thing.
quotes.author: Jane Velez-Mitchell

quotes.quote: Denial can be beautiful But only when you're a fantastic liar.
quotes.author: Kim Holden

quotes.quote: Denial can be a pathology or a survival mechanism - and sometimes it's both.
quotes.author: Jane Fonda

quotes.quote: Contradiction is not a sign of falsity, nor the lack of contradiction a sign of truth.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: Denial is a useful defense mechanism until it's not.
quotes.author: Rosalind Kaplan

quotes.quote: Denial. It's the only thing that keeps most of us from losing our sanity.
quotes.author: Heena Rathore P.

quotes.quote: Denial helps us to pace our feelings of grief. There is a grace in denial. It is nature's way of letting in only as much as we can handle.
quotes.author: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross

quotes.quote: To live in perpetual darkness allows one to see things more clearly, if that is not a contradiction in terms. It has allowed me to look into men’s souls more deeply, to see them for what they are and not what they present to the world. It has been a most illuminating experience.
quotes.author: Peter Darman

quotes.quote: It's a most distressing affliction to have a sentimental heart and a skeptical mind.
quotes.author: Naguib Mahfouz

quotes.quote: What I claim is to live to the full the contradiction of my time, which may well make sarcasm the condition of truth.
quotes.author: Roland Barthes

quotes.quote: He who permits himself to tell a lie once, finds it much easier to do it a second and third time, till at length it becomes habitual, he tells lies without attending to it, and truths without the world's believing him.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: It's better to keep your mouth shut and appear stupid than to open it and remove all doubt.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: We are stubborn on vision. We are flexible on details.
quotes.author: Jeff Bezos

quotes.quote: In studying any complex process in which there are two or more contradictions, we must devote every effort to finding its principal contradiction. Once this principal contradiction is grasped, all problems can be readily solved.
quotes.author: Mao Tsetung

quotes.quote: No serious person is without contradictions. The test lies in the willingness or ability to recognize and confront them.
quotes.author: Christopher Hitchens

quotes.quote: A powerful idea communicates some of its power to the man who contradicts it.
quotes.author: Marcel Proust

quotes.quote: Contraries (are) poles of a unity.
quotes.author: Hermann Hesse

quotes.quote: We must not contradict, but instruct him that contradicts us; for a madman is not cured by another running mad also.
quotes.author: Antisthenes

quotes.quote: We take contradiction more easily than is supposed, if not violently given, even though it is well founded.
quotes.author: Jean Paul Richter

quotes.quote: Assertion is not argument; to contradict the statement of an opponent is not proof that you are correct.
quotes.author: Ralph Johnson

quotes.quote: In formal logic, a contradiction is a signal of defeat: but in the evolution of real knowledge it marks the first step in progress toward a victory.
quotes.author: Alfred North Whitehead

quotes.quote: Nothing is demonstrable, unless the contrary implies a contradiction. Nothing, that is distinctly conceivable, implies a contradiction. Whatever we conceive as existent, we can also conceive as non-existent. There is no being, therefore, whose non-existence implies a contradiction. Consequently there is no being, whose existence is demonstrable.
quotes.author: David Hume

quotes.quote: The tragic and the comic are the same in as much as both are contradiction, but the tragic is suffering contradiction, and the comic is painless contradiction.
quotes.author: Søren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: The discoveries made in the infinitely small world of particle physics indicate randomness and chance, and I do not find it any more difficult to live with the paradox of a universe of randomness and chance and a universe of pattern and purpose than I do with light as a wave and light as a particle. Living with contradiction is nothing new to the human being.
quotes.author: Madeleine L'Engle

quotes.quote: One must live in the middle of contradiction because if all contradiction were eliminated at once life would collapse. There are simply no answers to some of the great pressing questions. You continue to live them out, making your life a worthy expression of a leaning into the light.
quotes.author: Barry Lopez

quotes.quote: Until we lose ourselves there is no hope of finding ourselves.
quotes.author: Henry Miller

quotes.quote: Is it not our weakness that makes our strength?
quotes.author: Lin Yutang

quotes.quote: Life is a tragedy full of joy.
quotes.author: Bernard Malamud

quotes.quote: If the brain were so simple we could understand it, we would be so simple we couldn't.
quotes.author: Lyall Watson

quotes.quote: The most selfish thing we can do is to be unselfish because it frees us.
quotes.author: Dean Ornish

quotes.quote: My existence is caught up and inextricably bound up with yours ... A solitary human being is a contradiction in terms.
quotes.author: Desmond Tutu

quotes.quote: When two texts, or two assertions, perhaps two ideas, are in contradiction, be ready to reconcile them rather than cancel one by the other; regard them as two different facets, or two successive stages, of the same reality, a reality convincingly human just because it is complex.
quotes.author: Marguerite Yourcenar

quotes.quote: Becoming is the essence of everything that lives. The actual is both a springboard and barrier to the possible. Fixtures are the enemies of life, which is always in flux. We are all fated, however, to generate this contradiction and live it through in ourselves.
quotes.author: Karlfried Durckheim

quotes.quote: There seems to be a philosophic contradiction between being busy and being wise. Those who are wise won't be busy, and those who are too busy can't be wise. The wisest man therefore is he who loafs most gracefully.
quotes.author: Lin Yutang

quotes.quote: We cannot avoid using power, cannot escape the compulsion to afflict the world, so let us, cautious in diction and mighty in contradiction, love powerfully.
quotes.author: Martin Buber

quotes.quote: If there were no contradiction and no struggle, there would be no world, no process, no life, and there would be nothing at all.
quotes.author: Mao Zedong

quotes.quote: Nothing which implies contradiction falls under the omnipotence of God.
quotes.author: Thomas Aquinas

quotes.quote: There can be no happiness as long as the things we do are different from the things we believe. Human beings cannot stand that contradiction inside.
quotes.author: Fr. George Ehusani

quotes.quote: The rose and thorn and sorrow and gladness are linked together.
quotes.author: Saadi Shirazi

quotes.quote: I’m passionate about animals and I hunt too. It’s like I save and I kill. I’m a walking, talking contradiction. I’m all about preserving the environment but I’m racing cars on the weekend. I tell everyone I’m a gun-loving hippy.
quotes.author: Paul Walker

quotes.quote: Becoming is not a contradiction of being but the epiphany of being.
quotes.author: Amanda Coomaraswamy

quotes.quote: It was the best of times, it was the worst of times, it was the age of wisdom, it was the age of foolishness, it was the epoch of belief, it was the epoch of incredulity, it was the season of light, it was the season of darkness, it was the spring of hope, it was the winter of despair.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: While men represent powerful activity as assertion and aggression, women in contrast portray acts of nurturance as acts of strength.
quotes.author: Carol Gilligan

quotes.quote: It is old age, rather than death, that is to be contrasted with life. Old age is life's parody, whereas death transforms life into a destiny: in a way it preserves it by giving it the absolute dimension. Death does away with time.
quotes.author: Simone De Beauvoir

quotes.quote: Never to suffer would never to have been blessed.
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.quote: The ego represents what we call reason and sanity, in contrast to the id which contains the passions.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: Truth, like light is dazzling. By contrast, untruth is a beautiful sunset that enhances everything.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: What a distressing contrast there is between the radiant intelligence of the child and the feeble mentality of the average adult.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: Perspective gives us the ability to accurately contrast the large with the small, and the important with the less important. Without it we are lost in a world where all ideas, news, and information look the same. We cannot differentiate, we cannot prioritize, and we cannot make good choices.
quotes.author: John Sununu

quotes.quote: In contrast to revenge, which is the natural, automatic reaction to transgression and which, because of the irreversibility of the action process can be expected and even calculated, the act of forgiving can never be predicted; it is the only reaction that acts in an unexpected way and thus retains, though being a reaction, something of the original character of action.
quotes.author: Hannah Arendt

quotes.quote: A true revolution of values will soon look uneasily on the glaring contrast of poverty and wealth.
quotes.author: Lloyd Banks

quotes.quote: There are dark shadows on the earth, but its lights are stronger in the contrast.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: As a means of contrast with the sublime, the grotesque is, in our view, the richest source that nature can offer.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: What good is the warmth of summer, without the cold of winter to give it sweetness? You only truly, deeply appreciate and are grateful for something when you compare and contrast it to something worse.
quotes.author: John Steinbeck

quotes.quote: Contrast increases the splendor of beauty, but it disturbs its influence; it adds to its attractiveness, but diminishes its power.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.quote: The pains of life serve, by contrast, to multiply enjoyment; they constitute the foil which sets off and heightens the flashing brightness of the gem.
quotes.author: Eliza Cook

quotes.quote: Somebody who thinks logically is a nice contrast to the real world.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Happiness ain't a thing in itself --it's only a contrast with something that ain't pleasant. And so, as soon as the novelty is over and the force of the contrast dulled, it ain't happiness any longer, and you have to get something fresh.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Optimism is wide-open in contrast to pessimism's closed heart.
quotes.author: Kathleen A. Brehony

quotes.quote: The problem with certainty is that it is static; it can do little but endlessly reassert itself. Uncertainty, by contrast, is full of unknowns, possibilities, and risks.
quotes.author: Stephen Batchelor

quotes.quote: It is by disease that health is pleasant; by evil that good is pleasant; by hunger, satiety; by weariness, rest.
quotes.author: Heraclitus

quotes.quote: Wisdom is known only by contrasting it with folly; by shadow only we perceive that all visible objects are not flat. Yet Philanthropos would abolish evil!
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: If you want the beautiful moments to shine, you have to contrast that with dark and gruesome moments. That's the way life is.
quotes.author: Tony DiTerlizzi

quotes.quote: Perhaps without the lows, the highs could not be reached.
quotes.author: Stephenie Meyer

quotes.quote: Humour is essentially a comforter, reconciling us to things as they are in contrast to things as they might be.
quotes.author: Stephen Leacock

quotes.quote: There is no quality in this world that is not what it is merely by contrast. Nothing exists in itself.
quotes.author: Herman Melville

quotes.quote: The attraction of variety, contrast, is always invigorating. Nature does not for long allow a sameness of beauty to prevail.
quotes.author: Virginia Garland

quotes.quote: Sublime upon sublime scarcely presents a contrast, and we need a little rest from everything, even the beautiful.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: We do not live an equal life, but one of contrasts and patchwork; now a little joy, then a sorrow, now a sin, then a generous or brave action.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Marriage, in contrast to the flu, starts with a fever and ends with the chills.
quotes.author: Georg Christoph Lichtenberg

quotes.quote: To laugh continually is to never laugh at all. For it takes the periodic sound of sorrow from which to distinguish the sound of joy.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: The contrast which exists between the abstemious man and the drunkard is this--the former governs his affairs, but the affairs of the latter govern him.
quotes.author: William Scott Downey

quotes.quote: Philosophy is concerned with that which is, in contrast with that which seems to be. Its aim is to reveal the reality which underlies appearance.
quotes.author: John Grier Hibben

quotes.quote: Nature hath meal and bran, contempt and grace.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: You couldn't have strength without weakness, you couldn't have light without dark, you couldn't have love without loss
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: Success is not a function of the size of your title but the richness of your contribution.
quotes.author: Robin S. Sharma

quotes.quote: The best contribution one can make to humanity is to improve oneself.
quotes.author: Frank Herbert

quotes.quote: The single biggest contribution you can make is to step into your greatness. Let your own unique magnificence blossom.
quotes.author: Jane Lee Logan

quotes.quote: Every person has a longing to be significant; to make a contribution; to be a part of something noble and purposeful.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: There are so many men and women who hold no distinctive positions but whose contribution towards the development of society has been enormous.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: Life is not accumulation, it is about contribution.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: When you cease to make a contribution, you begin to die.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Take the time today to understand your contribution to any bad event you've just been through.
quotes.author: Karen Salmansohn

quotes.quote: People should be conscious of the large contribution made by anything that gets people together easily in the reduction of loneliness and emotional well-being.
quotes.author: Daniel Kahneman

quotes.quote: The practice of forgiveness is our most important contribution to the healing of the world.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: You look out there and there's people that, their day is changed because of your contribution to it.
quotes.author: Brad Paisley

quotes.quote: Your sole contribution to the sum of things is yourself.
quotes.author: Frank Crane

quotes.quote: Each of us is a unique strand in the intricate web of life and here to make a contribution.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Every thought, every word, and every action that adds to the positive and the wholesome is a contribution to peace. Each and every one of us is capable of making such a contribution.
quotes.author: Aung San Suu Kyi

quotes.quote: When everybody contributes a change to what he or she notices, it is then we will change our world.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: The smallest of contributions made collectively makes the biggest difference.
quotes.author: Shahenshah Hafeez Khan

quotes.quote: You’re happiest while you’re making the greatest contribution.
quotes.author: Robert F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: It is not position but contribution that makes a leader.
quotes.author: Apoorve Dubey

quotes.quote: Replace your pursuit of success with the pursuit of contribution.
quotes.author: Peter F. Drucker

quotes.quote: Great ambition and conquest without contribution is without significance. What will your contribution be?
quotes.author: ATGW

quotes.quote: You have brilliance in you, your contribution is valuable, and the art you create is precious. Only you can do, and you must
quotes.author: Seth Godin

quotes.quote: It’s the ultimate luxury to combine passion and contribution. It’s also a very clear path to happiness.
quotes.author: Sheryl Sandberg

quotes.quote: Every contribution counts. Everyone can make a difference. Just start with yourself.”
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Only those who have learned the power of sincere and selfless contribution experience life’s deepest joy: true fulfillment.
quotes.author: Tony Robinson

quotes.quote: It is not what we get but who we become, and what we contribute that gives meaning to our lives.
quotes.author: Tony Robinson

quotes.quote: You can retire from a job, but don't ever retire from making extremely meaningful contributions in life.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: The idea is to try to give all the information to help others to judge the value of your contribution; not just the information that leads to judgment in one particular direction or another.
quotes.author: Richard P. Feynman

quotes.quote: It takes a lot of people to make a winning team. Everybody's contribution is important.
quotes.author: Gary David Goldberg

quotes.quote: In order to go all the way, you need everyone's contribution.
quotes.author: Andrea Pirlo

quotes.quote: Every individual in the world has a unique contribution.
quotes.author: Jack Kornfield

quotes.quote: For a control freak, love and the desire to control others are synonymous. Once they lose control over the object of their desire, hostility takes over in full force.
quotes.author: Natalya Vorobyova

quotes.quote: I'm a control freak. If you're going to slap my name on something, I would like to control it.
quotes.author: Anthony Bourdain

quotes.quote: Being a control freak is a weakness, not a strength. If you can't allow others to shine, you're exhibiting signs of narcissism and showing a lack of self-confidence. It is isolation through ego.
quotes.author: Stewart Stafford

quotes.quote: Controllers, abusers and manipulative people don't question themselves. They don't ask if the problem is them. They always say the problem is someone else.
quotes.author: Darlene Ouimet

quotes.quote: Im not a control freak, I just happen to be a higly-driven, focused, motivated, extraordinary and inspiring leader, and yes, you may take time out to listen to my advice, and no, you may not do things your way.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: When you see someone who needs power and control and will not stop until they get it, you're actually seeing someone who is deeply afraid of life. Fearful people can only have things their way.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: When a person attempts to control someone else's life, it only reflects the lack of control they have on their own.
quotes.author: Daniel Chiciac

quotes.quote: If you knew your potential to feel good, you would ask no one to be different so that you can feel good. You would free yourself of all of that cumbersome impossibility of needing to control the world, or control your mate, or control your child. You are the only one who creates your reality. For no one else can think for you, no one else can do it. It is only you, every bit of it you.
quotes.author: Esther Hicks

quotes.quote: The apotheosis of the controlling mind is monstrous and terrifying.
quotes.author: Stewart Stafford

quotes.quote: You can be a control freak only when you have weak people around you.
quotes.author: Ronald Perelman

quotes.quote: Being a control freak makes us tense, stressed out, and unpleasant to be with.
quotes.author: Judith Orloff

quotes.quote: A controlling person isn't trying to be helpful.Their over-inflated ego tells them they are smarter & know better that we do.They're wrong.
quotes.author: Shannon Thomas

quotes.quote: Nothing wrong with being a control freak if you are controlling YOUR words, actions, and behaviors.
quotes.author: Videli Hoefle

quotes.quote: Funny how the people who desperately want to change you are the least likely to change anything about themselves.
quotes.author: Kushand Wizdom

quotes.quote: If you have control over yourself, you have no desire to control others.
quotes.author: Miya Yamanouchi

quotes.quote: Individuals suffer because they want to control others, but they can barely control themselves.
quotes.author: galaxies vibes

quotes.quote: I learned that when you try to control everything, you enjoy nothing.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Sometimes artists are control freaks and it's certainly important to have a vision, but within that vision you need to allow freedom and personality—or you might as well hire robots.
quotes.author: Oh Land

quotes.quote: Controlling people often demean or criticize others as a means of building themselves up and appearing superior and in control. In fact, a controlling person is easy to spot from the constant monologue about how rotten, stupid, evil, ridiculous, annoying, etc. Everyone else is (presumably they're never any of these things).
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: I don't know if its what you're going for, but entitlement mentality with a a superiority complex mixed with control freak tenancies is not a good look for you, dear. You might want to get that looked at.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: I'm a control freak with regards to certain aspects. I think you just have to be when you're making stuff in the world. You have to have a clear idea what you want.
quotes.author: Jenny Lewis

quotes.quote: I'm a control freak and love to participate in the design of every single aspect of life.
quotes.author: Drew Barrymore

quotes.quote: It's not like I let people do things for me, so I guess you can call me a control freak, or you can call me passionate.
quotes.author: Courteney Cox

quotes.quote: I'm basically a control freak. It's not because I want to be. I'm not at all into the power play that's involved in it.
quotes.author: George Michael

quotes.quote: I'm not really a control freak, but... can I show the right way to do that?
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Stop trying to control the uncontrollable.
quotes.author: Frank Sonnenberg

quotes.quote: It's ok to be successful in your own way, no matter what control freaks say.
quotes.author: Kelly L. Miller

quotes.quote: Guys are control freaks and hate when other people know what's best for them.
quotes.author: Simone Elkeles

quotes.quote: Arguments of convenience lack integrity and inevitably trip you up.
quotes.author: Donald Rumsfeld

quotes.quote: Memory has many conveniences, and, among others, that of foreseeing things as they have afterwards happened.
quotes.author: Letitia Elizabeth Landon

quotes.quote: The idea behind fast food is great - people want convenience.
quotes.author: Kimbal Musk

quotes.quote: It is function of government to invent philosophies to explain the demands of its own convenience.
quotes.author: Murray Kempton

quotes.quote: If it is solely an evolutionary convenience, there is really no such thing as good or evil.
quotes.author: Richard Dawkins

quotes.quote: Young people are just as attracted to the truth as they are convenience and expediency.
quotes.author: Pope Francis

quotes.quote: The vision is that people should have the ultimate in convenience. Being able to get the things they care about on the appropriate device.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: Always remember that market quotations are there for convenience, either to be taken advantage of or to be ignored.
quotes.author: Benjamin Graham

quotes.quote: It is dainty to be sick if you have leisure and convenience for it.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Thought is so cunning, so clever, that it distorts everything for its own convenience.
quotes.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quotes.quote: The convenience of timekeeping is greatly overrated; and the people who practice it so faithfully that they lose the capacity for appreciating the fixed and the static and the spatially related experiences cut themselves off from a good part of reality.
quotes.author: Lewis Mumford

quotes.quote: The technologies of convenience are making our sphere of exploration and experience smaller.
quotes.author: Robert Englund

quotes.quote: A faith of convenience is a hollow faith.
quotes.author: Father Mulcahy

quotes.quote: The reason for having diplomatic relations is not to confer a compliment, but to secure a convenience. [On diplomatic recognition of the People's Republic of China]
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: No real surrender involves convenience.
quotes.author: Swami Premodaya

quotes.quote: We seek neither convenience nor ease, but to live at the edge of possibility.
quotes.author: Jane Kirkpatrick

quotes.quote: Convenience is not an acceptable foundational value for society. It's a disease.
quotes.author: Cameron DÃ­az

quotes.quote: The marriage of convenience has this to recommend it: we are better judges of convenience than we are of love.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: Our waking life's desire to shape the world to our convenience invites all manner of paradox and difficulty.
quotes.author: Cormac Mccarthy

quotes.quote: There is no reason that the universe should be designed for our convenience.
quotes.author: John D. Barrow

quotes.quote: Habits and customs are a convenience devised for the support of timid natures who dare not allow their souls free play.
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.quote: The success of family welfare depends on giving women complete freedom with their lives. The need of the hour is that people should plan their families as per their convenience and get the bare minimum health facilities.
quotes.author: Atal Bihari Vajpayee

quotes.quote: Thank goodness modern convenience is a thing of the remote future.
quotes.author: Walt Kelly

quotes.quote: The 'control of nature' is a phrase conceived in arrogance, born of the Neanderthal age of biology and philosophy, when it was supposed that nature exists for the convenience of man.
quotes.author: Rachel Carson

quotes.quote: True piety for the universe but no time for religions made for man's convenience.
quotes.author: Baruch Spinoza

quotes.quote: The world will always choose convenience over reality. It's easier to hate, blame, and fear than it is to understand. No one wants the truth; they want entertainment.
quotes.author: Chris Colfer

quotes.quote: Sacrifice is a step beyond convenience.
quotes.author: Bill Johnson

quotes.quote: To what fortuitous occurrence do we not owe every pleasure and convenience of our lives.
quotes.author: Oliver Goldsmith

quotes.quote: Each one writes history according to his convenience.
quotes.author: Jose Rizal

quotes.quote: Let us agree that we are marrying so we can go on quarrelling in the greatest possible comfort and convenience.
quotes.author: Patrice Kindl

quotes.quote: Every convenience brings its own inconveniences along with it.
quotes.author: PROVERBS

quotes.quote: Speech is for the convenience of those who are hard of hearing; but there are many fine things which we cannot say if we have to shout.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Your work should be an act of love, not a marriage of convenience.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: People today are too concerned about saving time and having convenience.
quotes.author: Sheila Watt-Cloutier

quotes.quote: Unfortunately, the world has not been designed for the convenience of mathematicians.
quotes.author: Benoit Mandelbrot

quotes.quote: One good conversation can shift the direction of change forever.
quotes.author: Linda Lambert

quotes.quote: It was impossible to get a conversation going, everybody was talking too much.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: Good conversation is as stimulating as black coffee, and just as hard to sleep after.
quotes.author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quotes.quote: Nothing compares to a beautiful conversation with a beautiful mind.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Be brave enough to start a conversation that matters.
quotes.author: Margaret Wheatley

quotes.quote: Conversation about the weather is the last refuge of the unimaginative.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Conversation should touch everything, but should concentrate itself on nothing.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Whether in conversation we generally agree or disagree with others is largely a matter of habit: the one tendency makes as much sense as the other.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: The real art of conversation is not only to say the right thing at the right place but to leave unsaid the wrong thing at the tempting moment.
quotes.author: Dorothy Nevill

quotes.quote: The primary use of conversation is to satisfy the impulse to talk.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.quote: Conversation isn't about proving a point; true conversation is about going on a journey with the people you are speaking with.
quotes.author: Ricky Maye

quotes.quote: In conversation avoid the extremes of forwardness and reserve.
quotes.author: John Byrom

quotes.quote: Conversation is a meeting of minds with different memories and habits. When minds meet, they don't just exchange facts: they transform them, reshape them, draw different implications from them, engage in new trains of thought. Conversation doesn't just reshuffle the cards: it creates new cards.
quotes.author: Theodore Zeldin

quotes.quote: The conversation between your fingers and someone else's skin. This is the most important discussion you can ever have.
quotes.author: Iain Thomas

quotes.quote: Conversation is a catalyst for innovation.
quotes.author: John Seely Brown

quotes.quote: Good conversational debate is an end in itself, and talking for the love of conversation is what makes us human.
quotes.author: Bryce Courtenay

quotes.quote: One way to prevent conversation from being boring is to say the wrong thing .
quotes.author: Frank Sheed

quotes.quote: Conversation is king. Content is just something to talk about.
quotes.author: Cory Doctorow

quotes.quote: The happiest conversation is that of which nothing is distinctly remembered, but a general effect of pleasing impression.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Conversation, like certain portions of the anatomy, always runs more smoothly when lubricated.
quotes.author: Marquis De Sade

quotes.quote: Conversation is good you might not agree with everyone, but at least it gives you a chance to contemplate someone else's ideas.
quotes.author: Brandi Chastain

quotes.quote: Good conversation is the equivalent of shared emotion.
quotes.author: Marty Rubin

quotes.quote: Most conversations are simply monologues delivered in the presence of a witness.
quotes.author: Margaret Millar

quotes.quote: Every good conversation starts with good listening.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: A conversation is so much more than words: a conversation is eyes, smiles, and the silence between word.
quotes.author: Annika Thor

quotes.quote: Conversation means being able to disagree and still continue the discussion.
quotes.author: Dwight Macdonald

quotes.quote: The first ingredient in conversation is truth, the next good sense, the third good humor, and the fourth wit.
quotes.author: William Temple

quotes.quote: Conversation enriches the understanding, but solitude is the school of genius.
quotes.author: Edward Gibbon

quotes.quote: The true spirit of conversation consists in building on another man's observation, not overturning it.
quotes.author: Edward Bulwer-Lytton

quotes.quote: Deep conversations with the right people are priceless.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: A real conversation always contains an invitation. You are inviting another person to reveal herself or himself to you, to tell you who they are or what they want.
quotes.author: David Whyte

quotes.quote: Conversation doesn't have to lead to consensus about anything especially not values; it's enough that it helps people get used to one another
quotes.author: Kwame Anthony Appiah

quotes.quote: Silence is one of the great arts of conversation.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: A conversation is a dialogue, not a monologue. That's why there are so few good conversations: due to scarcity, two intelligent talkers seldom meet.
quotes.author: Truman Capote

quotes.quote: Conversation is much like a tennis game except that in tennis you try to put the ball in the most difficult position for the one who must hit it while in conversation you must try to put it where it will be easy to hit.
quotes.author: Margery Wilson

quotes.quote: A man's character may be learned from the adjectives which he habitually uses in conversation.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: In conversation, humor is worth more than wit and easiness more than knowledge.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: The best kind of conversation is that which may be called thinking aloud.
quotes.author: William Hazlitt

quotes.quote: Conversation succeeds conversation, Until there's nothing left to talk about Except truth, the perennial monologue, And no talker to dispute it but itself.
quotes.author: Laura Riding

quotes.quote: You can discover more about a person in an hour of play than in a year of conversation.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Let the conversation flow at its own pace, don't try to rush it or control it. You need to let go and be part of the conversation.
quotes.author: Max Weiss

quotes.quote: Conversation should be pleasant without scurrility, witty without affectation, free without indecency, learned without conceitedness, novel without falsehood.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: The great gift of conversation lies less in displaying it ourselves than in drawing it out of others. He who leaves your company pleased with himself and his own cleverness is perfectly well pleased with you.
quotes.author: Jean de la Bruyère

quotes.quote: Conversation is a game of circles. In conversation we pluck up the termini which bound the common of silence in every side.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The art of conversation, or the qualification for a good companion is a certain self-control, which now holds the subject, now lets it go, with a respect for the emergencies of the moment.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Conversation is an art which a man has all mankind for his competitors, for it is that which all are practising everyday while they live.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Put any company of people together with freedom for conversation, and a rapid self-distribution takes place into sets and pairs...All conversation is a magnetic experiment.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Conversation, like lettuce, requires a good deal of oil to avoid friction and keep the company snooth.Charles Dudley Warner
quotes.author: Charles Dudley Warner

quotes.quote: Conversation should flow, like waters after summer showers, not as if raised by mere mechanic powers.
quotes.author: William Cowper

quotes.quote: The conversation was just like clockwork. It recurred regularly, except that there was no need to wind anything up.
quotes.author: Walter de la Mare

quotes.quote: Good talk is like good scenery— continuous yet constantly varying, and full of the charm of novelty and surprise.
quotes.author: Randolph Bourne

quotes.quote: Good talk is like an impromptu piece of acting where each should represent himself to greatest advantage.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: From time to time, talk becomes effective, conquering like war, widening like boundaries of knowledge like an exploration.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: Good conversation, like any game, calls for equals in strength.
quotes.author: Jacques Barzun

quotes.quote: Natural talk like plowing, should turn up a large surface of life, rather than dig mines.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: It is not what we learn in conversation that enriches us. It is the elation that comes of swift contact with tingling currents of thought.
quotes.author: Agnes Repplier

quotes.quote: Ideal conversation must be an exchange of thought, and not, as many of those who worry most about their shortcomings believe, an eloquent exhibition of wit or oratory.
quotes.author: Emily Post

quotes.quote: One of the best rules of conversation is, never to say a thing which any of the company can reasonably wish had been left unsaid.
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

quotes.quote: When people talk to us about others they are usually dull. When they talk to us about themselves, they are nearly always interesting.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Conversation would be vastly improved by the constant use of simple words: I do not know.
quotes.author: Andre Maurois

quotes.quote: The art of conversation is not knowing what you ought to say, but what one ought not to say.
quotes.author: F.L. Lucas

quotes.quote: A single conversation across a table with a wise man is better than ten year's study of books.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: A gossip is one who talks to you about others; a bore is one who talks to you about himself; and a brilliant conversationalist is one who talks to you about yourself.
quotes.author: Lisa Kirk

quotes.quote: Conversation is an exchange of thoughts that leave all parties to it a grain wiser.
quotes.author: Alfred Whitney Griswold

quotes.quote: The reading of good books is like a conversation with the best men of past centuries— in fact like a prepared conversation, in which they reveal only the best of their thoughts.
quotes.author: Rene Descartes

quotes.quote: I believe that words are strong, that they can overwhelm what we fear when fear seems more awful than life is good.
quotes.author: Andrew Solomon

quotes.quote: Conversation, like certain portions of the anatomy, always runs more smoothly when lubricated.
quotes.author: Doug Wright

quotes.quote: The art of conversation is the art of hearing as well as of being heard.
quotes.author: William Hazlitt

quotes.quote: The best argument against democracy is a five-minute conversation with the average voter.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Life is a conversation. Make it a good one.
quotes.author: Glennon Doyle Melton

quotes.quote: Women have simple tastes. They get pleasure out of the conversation of children in arms and men in love.
quotes.author: H.L. Mencken

quotes.quote: I never desire to converse with a man who has written more than he has read.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: The best lack all conviction, while the worst are full of passionate intensity.
quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

quotes.quote: It takes but one person, one moment, one conviction, to start a ripple of change.
quotes.author: Donna Brazile

quotes.quote: If you stay true to your principles, you have confidence, conviction, purpose, values - in other words, you have a future.
quotes.author: Mike Klepper

quotes.quote: Convictions in our ideas is dangerous not only because it leaves us vulnerable to false positives, but also because it stops us from generating the requisite variety to reach our creative potential.
quotes.author: Adam Grant

quotes.quote: Convictions are the mainsprings of action, the driving powers of life. What a man lives are his convictions.
quotes.author: Francis C. Kelley

quotes.quote: Conviction affects all substances in the vicinity.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: A strong conviction that something must be done is the parent of many bad measures.
quotes.author: Daniel Webster

quotes.quote: A leader has the vision and conviction that a dream can be achieved. He inspires the power and energy to get it done.
quotes.author: Ralph Nader

quotes.quote: Our firmest convictions are apt to be the most suspect; they mark our limitations and our bounds. Life is a petty thing unless it is moved by the indomitable urge to extend its boundaries.
quotes.author: Jose Ortega Y Gasset

quotes.quote: Convictions are variable; to be always consistent is to be sometimes dishonest.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: With the power of conviction, there is no sacrifice.
quotes.author: Pat Benatar

quotes.quote: When your only regret is if anyone thinks you regret anything - that is the definition of conviction.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: The ethic of conviction and the ethic of responsibility are not opposites. They are complementary to one another.
quotes.author: Max Weber

quotes.quote: To rely upon conviction, devotion, and other excellent spiritual qualities; that is not to be taken seriously in politics.
quotes.author: Vladimir Lenin

quotes.quote: Convictions are more dangerous enemies of truth than lies.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: The sure conviction that we could if we wanted to is the reason so many good minds are idle.
quotes.author: Georg Christoph Lichtenberg

quotes.quote: In the age-old contest between popularity and principle, only those willing to lose for their convictions are deserving of posterity's approval.
quotes.author: Gerald R. Ford

quotes.quote: Conviction brings a silent, indefinable beauty into faces made of the commonest human clay; the devout worshiper at any shrine reflects something of its golden glow, even as the glory of a noble love shines like a sort of light from a woman's face.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: Constant repetition carries conviction.
quotes.author: Robert Collier

quotes.quote: Conviction is the conscience of the mind.
quotes.author: Nicolas Chamfort

quotes.quote: Conviction without experience makes for harshness.
quotes.author: Flannery O'Connor

quotes.quote: A man of conviction is often more to be desired than a man of experience.
quotes.author: Curt Siodmak

quotes.quote: Never let your goals or convictions get in the way of living your life. It's not about who dies with more, it's about who lived the most.
quotes.author: Teresa R. Funke

quotes.quote: It's the repetition of affirmations that leads to belief. And once that belief becomes a deep conviction, things begin to happen.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: Conviction is worthless unless it is converted into conduct.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: We have always held to the hope, the belief, the conviction that there is a better life, a better world, beyond the horizon.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The greatest happiness of life is the conviction that we are loved; loved for ourselves, or rather, loved in spite of ourselves.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Yet none of these things gave him confidence. All they gave him was egotism, which is less the conviction of one's worth than the desire for that conviction.
quotes.author: Jetta Carleton

quotes.quote: Ninety percent of selling is conviction, and 10 per cent is persuasion.
quotes.author: Shiv Khera

quotes.quote: The secret of success is conviction and persistence.
quotes.author: Maharishi Mahesh Yogi

quotes.quote: We led with our conviction rather than rational, because rational said it was impossible.
quotes.author: Daniel Ek

quotes.quote: The word "conviction" means to expose.
quotes.author: Johnny Hunt

quotes.quote: Mix a conviction with a man and something happens.
quotes.author: Powell Clayton

quotes.quote: Men never do evil so completely and cheerfully as when they do it from religious conviction.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: Be thou incapable of change in that which is right, and men will rely upon you. Establish unto thyself principles of action, and see that thou ever act according to them. First, know that thy principles are just, and then be thou inflexible in the path of them.
quotes.author: Khemetic Saying

quotes.quote: Every conviction was a whim at birth.
quotes.author: Heywood Broun

quotes.quote: It is a blessed thing that in every age some one has had the individuality enough and courage enough to stand by his own conviction.
quotes.author: Robert Ingersoll

quotes.quote: We have to live today by what truth we can get today and be ready tomorrow to call it falsehood.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: A very popular error — having the courage of one's convictions: Rather, it is a matter of having the courage for an attack upon one's conviction.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: The most fatal illusion is the settled point of view. Since life is growth and motion, a fixed point of view kills anybody who has one.
quotes.author: Brooks Atkinson

quotes.quote: Mix a conviction with a man and something happens.
quotes.author: Adam Clayton Powell Jr.

quotes.quote: The hallmark of courage in our age of conformity is the capacity to stand on one's convictions— not obstinately or defiantly, nor as a gesture of retaliation, but simply because these are what one believes.
quotes.author: Rollo May

quotes.quote: The man who stands for nothing will fall for anything.
quotes.author: Malcolm X

quotes.quote: It is always easier to fight for one's principles than to live up to them.
quotes.author: Alfred F. Adler

quotes.quote: One must not make even principles to set that one cannot alter them.
quotes.author: Hazrat Khan

quotes.quote: It is easier to produce ten volumes of philosophical writings than to put one principle into practice.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: There's a difference between opinion and conviction. My opinion is something that is true for me personally; my conviction is something that is true for everybody— in my opinion.
quotes.author: Sylvia Cordwood

quotes.quote: He that is not open to conviction is not qualified for discussion.
quotes.author: Richard Whately

quotes.quote: Now, faith is the assurance of things hoped for, the conviction of things not seen.
quotes.author: Hebrews 11:1

quotes.quote: When comfort and ease and pleasure are put ahead of duty and conviction, progress is always set back.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Convictions...the deeper you went, the filmier the convictions got, until they were like an underwater picture, shifting, dreamy, out of focus.
quotes.author: Wilfrid Sheed

quotes.quote: The conviction that I am loved and loving affect me like a military bracing.
quotes.author: John Cheever

quotes.quote: The final test of a leader is that he leaves behind him in other menOxford Dictionary of Modern Quotations the conviction and the will to carry on.
quotes.author: Walter Lippmann

quotes.quote: That man is going to disappear has been, heretofore, my firm conviction. But now I've changed my mind: he must disappear.
