quotes.author: E.M. Cioran

quotes.quote: You must have powerful religious dispositions in order to utter with conviction the word being; you must believe simply to say about an object or about someone that it or he is.
quotes.author: E.M. Cioran

quotes.quote: Honest conviction is my courage, the Constitution is my guide.
quotes.author: Andrew Johnson

quotes.quote: We can gain no lasting peace if we approach it with suspicion and mistrust, or with fear. We can gain it only if we proceed with the understanding, the confidence, and the courage which flow from conviction
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: I want to see what people are like under pressure. I want to see if they just fold or if they have firm conviction, belief, and pride in what they did.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Every man, wherever he goes, is encompassed by a cloud of comforting convictions, which move with him like flies on a summer day.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Be who you are. It's easy to feel like you have to blend in, but it takes courage to live your life with conviction and embrace the person that you are.
quotes.author: Halima Aden

quotes.quote: If you don't love what you do, you won't do it with much conviction or passion.
quotes.author: Mia Hamm

quotes.quote: A 'No' uttered from the deepest conviction is better than a 'Yes' merely uttered to please, or worse, to avoid trouble.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Ninety percent of selling is conviction, and 10 percent is persuasion.
quotes.author: Shiv Khera

quotes.quote: A strong conviction that something must be done is the parent of many bad measures.
quotes.author: Daniel Webster

quotes.quote: What good is having all of the cookies when you can't eat anymore?
quotes.author: Anthony T. Hincks

quotes.quote: Cookies are the sweetest little bit of comfort food. They are very bite sized and personal.
quotes.author: Sandra Lee

quotes.quote: A balanced diet is a cookie in each hand.
quotes.author: Barbara Johnson

quotes.quote: One of the best things in life- warm chocolate chip cookies.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Baking cookies is comforting, and cookies are the sweetest little bit of comfort food. They are very bite-sized and personal.
quotes.author: Sandra Lee

quotes.quote: Fortune cookies are a good idea. If the message is positive, it can make your day a little better.
quotes.author: Yao Ming

quotes.quote: People have got to learn: if they don't have cookies in the cookie jar, they can't eat cookies.
quotes.author: Suze Orman

quotes.quote: The pleasure lies not in the cookies, but in the pattern the crumbs make when the cookies crumble.
quotes.author: Michael Korda

quotes.quote: A cookie a day keeps the sadness away. An entire jar of cookies a day brings it back.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Think what a better world it would be if we all, the whole world, had cookies and milk about three o'clock every afternoon and then lay down on our blankets for a nap.
quotes.author: Barbara Jordan

quotes.quote: If you can't change the world with chocolate chip cookies, how can you change the world?
quotes.author: Pat Murphy

quotes.quote: In the cookie of life, friends are the chocolate chips.
quotes.author: Salman Rushdie

quotes.quote: Cookies are happy, because that is their job. Making those you know, and don't know happy. They tell people you care.
quotes.author: Brent M. Jones

quotes.quote: Cookies are made of butter and love.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Whatever their true beginnings, fortune cookies are one of the few contemporary manifestations of 'wisdom writing,' the ancient forerunner of the aphorism.
quotes.author: James Geary

quotes.quote: I was dramatically shaped by my aunts and grandmother because they convinced me there was always a cookie available.
quotes.author: Newt Gingrich

quotes.quote: I was not a classic mother. But my kids were never palmed off to boarding school. So I didn't bake cookies. You can buy cookies but you can't buy love.
quotes.author: Raquel Welch

quotes.quote: Taking pictures is like tiptoeing into the kitchen late at night and stealing Oreo cookies.
quotes.author: Diane Arbus

quotes.quote: Grandmothers can always be counted on to produce sweets, cookies, and candies that seem to taste nicer from her than from anyone else.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Faye

quotes.quote: I could have stayed home and baked cookies and had teas. But what I decided was to fulfill my profession, which I entered before my husband was in public life.
quotes.author: Hillary Rodham Clinton

quotes.quote: My mother has taught me many lessons: Nothing is as it appears. There are no calories in a broken cookie. When in doubt, throw it out. A stuffed animal is easier to care for than a baby. You can never own too many pairs of shoes...Never trust anyone with a secret— except your mother.
quotes.author: Irene Zahava

quotes.quote: I was excited to be hosting one lovely, late spring day and planned everything to a tee— lemon bars with lime icing, mini cupcakes with icing that looked like lace, and my favorite black and white cookies; chocolate on one side and vanilla on the other.
quotes.author: Becca Anderson

quotes.quote: It is funny how I knew those cookies were going to save the night, I guess I just didn't know whose.
quotes.author: Becca Anderson

quotes.quote: How could they be mad at me when they are being served stunningly beautiful cookies on napkins that reminded them they are fabulous?
quotes.author: Becca Anderson

quotes.quote: They're the cookies we smelled as kids, the ones we first learned to make as teenagers and the ones we may have burned in college when we learned that combining baking and drinking presents certain challenges.
quotes.author: Rebecca Firth

quotes.quote: Opening the door upon arriving home from school to the heavenly aroma of freshly baked cookies leaves an indelible print in one's mind.
quotes.author: Jean Pare

quotes.quote: Ice box cookies that are made one day and baked the next are always enjoyed. Drop cookies such as Hermits and Chocolate Nuggets are great for lunch and snack.
quotes.author: Jean Pare

quotes.quote: When company's coming— any age or any size of crowd— be ready for the onslaught with a full cookie jar.
quotes.author: Jean Pare

quotes.quote: The general definition of cookie— 'a small flat or slightly raised cake' — is an inadequate and even misleading, given the fact that America's favorite dessert has assumed so many incarnations, so many sizes, and shapes and flavors.
quotes.author: Martha Stewart

quotes.quote: We all love to have them in our bags all the time so with a bag of coffee, it is like a treat to yourself.
quotes.author: Ted Alling

quotes.quote: You so not have to depend on any junk food if you have these cookies in your bag all the time. They are light to consume and you will be able to control your unnecessary hunger
quotes.author: Ted Alling

quotes.quote: There's nothing more reassuring to kids than a plate of their favorite chocolate chip, oatmeal, or peanut butter cookies.
quotes.author: Lauren Chattman

quotes.quote: While many cookies aspire to play supporting roles— a buttery sable alongside panna cotta or a crispr tuile with ice cream— a sandwich cookie offers a complete experience..
quotes.author: Mindy Segal

quotes.quote: Cookies are known around the world as biscuits, keks, teacakes and biscotti, and everyone has a favorite.
quotes.author: Jean Pare

quotes.quote: No matter how bad your day is, when you start talking about cookies or cakes or pies, or you bring someone cookies, there's just not bad news. The worst news is, 'Hey, there's sugar in that.'
quotes.author: Christina Tosi

quotes.quote: Today, me will live in the moment, unless it is unpleasant. In which case me will eat a cookie.
quotes.author: Cookie Monster

quotes.quote: I think cookies are sort of the unsung sweet, you know? They're incredibly popular. But everybody thinks of cakes and pies and fancier desserts before they think cookies. A plate of cookies is a great way to end dinner and really nice to share at the holidays.
quotes.author: Bobby Flay

quotes.quote: My grannies would both bake things like shortbreads and cookies. I think whenever I smell those kinds of things it really takes me back to my childhood.
quotes.author: Curtis Stone

quotes.quote: Just be willing to pay the price. If you know you want to eat more cake or more cookies, be willing to work out a little bit more.
quotes.author: Hersche Walker

quotes.quote: Everyone is kneaded out of the same dough but not baked in the same oven.
quotes.author: Yiddish Proverb

quotes.quote: The pleasure lies not in the cookies, but in the pattern the crumbs make when the cookies crumble.
quotes.author: Michael Korda

quotes.quote: I am a picky eater. By that I mean, I love to pick the raisins out of oatmeal raisin cookies, the chips out of chocolate chip cookies, the white side off of black and white cookies, and the vanilla center out of Oreos.
quotes.author: Dylan Lauren

quotes.quote: People think of fortune cookies as being Chinese, but in essence, they are fundamentally American.
quotes.author: Jennifer Lee

quotes.quote: Christmas cookies can't help but be retro - they are memory first, sugar-flour-egg-redhot-gumdrop-sparkle reality second.
quotes.author: Dana Goodyear

quotes.quote: What my mother believed about cooking is that if you worked hard and prospered, someone else would do it for you.
quotes.author: Nora Ephron

quotes.quote: Cooking today is a young man's game, I don't give a bollocks what anyone says.
quotes.author: Gordon Ramsay

quotes.quote: I'm just someone who likes cooking and for whom sharing food is a form of expression.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: The only real stumbling block is fear of failure. In cooking you’ve got to have a what-the-hell attitude.
quotes.author: Julia Child

quotes.quote: No one who cooks, cooks alone. Even at her most solitary, a cook in the kitchen is surrounded by generations of cooks past, the advice and menus of cooks present, the wisdom of cookbook writers.
quotes.author: Laurie Colwin

quotes.quote: I think preparing food and feeding people brings nourishment not only to our bodies but to our spirits. Feeding people is a way of loving them, in the same way that feeding ourselves is a way of honoring our own createdness and fragility.
quotes.author: Shauna Niequist

quotes.quote: The most remarkable thing about my mother is that for thirty years she served the family nothing but leftovers. The original meal has never been found.
quotes.author: Calvin Trillin

quotes.quote: In France, cooking is a serious art form and a national sport.
quotes.author: Julia Child

quotes.quote: Cooking is like snow skiing: If you don't fall at least 10 times, then you're not skiing hard enough.
quotes.author: Guy Fieri

quotes.quote: Cooking is like love. It should be entered into with abandon or not at all.
quotes.author: Harriet Van Horne

quotes.quote: If cooking becomes an art form rather than a means of providing a reasonable diet, then something is clearly wrong.
quotes.author: Tom Jaine

quotes.quote: Cooking is actually quite aggressive and controlling and sometimes, yes, there is an element of force-feeding going on.
quotes.author: Nigella Lawson

quotes.quote: The greatest dishes are very simple.
quotes.author: Auguste Escoffier

quotes.quote: Cooking with kids is not just about ingredients, recipes, and cooking. It's about harnessing imagination, empowerment, and creativity.
quotes.author: Guy Fieri

quotes.quote: Cooking is like painting or writing a song. Just as there are only so many notes or colors, there are only so many flavors - it's how you combine them that sets you apart.
quotes.author: Wolfgang Puck

quotes.quote: Cooking is not difficult. Everyone has taste, even if they don't realize it. Even if you're not a great chef, there's nothing to stop you understanding the difference between what tastes good and what doesn't.
quotes.author: Gerard Depardieu

quotes.quote: Cooking is about passion, so it may look slightly temperamental in a way that it's too assertive to the naked eye.
quotes.author: Gordon Ramsay

quotes.quote: Instead of going out to dinner, buy good food. Cooking at home shows such affection. In a bad economy, it's more important to make yourself feel good.
quotes.author: Ina Garten

quotes.quote: You don't come into cooking to get rich.
quotes.author: Gordon Ramsay

quotes.quote: Cooking is at once one of the simplest and most gratifying of the arts, but to cook well one must love and respect food.
quotes.author: Craig Claiborne

quotes.quote: If you think well, you cook well.
quotes.author: Ferran Adria

quotes.quote: I approach cooking from a science angle because I need to understand how things work. If I understand the egg, I can scramble it better. It's a simple as that.
quotes.author: Alton Brown

quotes.quote: All cooking is a matter of time. In general, the more time the better.
quotes.author: John Erskine

quotes.quote: I don't like gourmet cooking or this cooking or that cooking. I like good cooking.
quotes.author: James Beard

quotes.quote: Once you understand the foundations of cooking - whatever kind you like, whether it's French or Italian or Japanese - you really don't need a cookbook anymore.
quotes.author: Thomas Keller

quotes.quote: If you're not the one cooking, stay out of the way and compliment the chef.
quotes.author: Michael Strahan

quotes.quote: The smells of slow cooking spread around the house and impart a unique warmth matched only by the flavour of the food.
quotes.author: Yotam Ottolenghi

quotes.quote: Cooking requires confident guesswork and improvisation-- experimentation and substitution, dealing with failure and uncertainty in a creative way.
quotes.author: Paul Theroux

quotes.quote: Cooking is an observation-based process that you can't do if you're so completely focused on a recipe.
quotes.author: Alton Brown

quotes.quote: Cooking demands attention, patience, and above all, a respect for the gifts of the earth. It is a form of worship, a way of giving thanks.
quotes.author: Judith B. Jones

quotes.quote: In cooking, as in all the arts, simplicity is the sign of perfection.
quotes.author: Curnonsky

quotes.quote: Great cooking favors the prepared hands.
quotes.author: Jacques Pepin

quotes.quote: Cooking is like making love, you do it well, or you do not do it at all.
quotes.author: Harriet Van Horne

quotes.quote: Cooking is at once child's play and adult joy. And cooking done with care is an act of love.
quotes.author: Craig Claiborne

quotes.quote: Cooking is one failure after another, and that's how you finally learn.
quotes.author: Julia Child

quotes.quote: I read recipes the same way I read science fiction. I get to the end and say to myself "well, that's not going to happen.
quotes.author: Rita Rudner

quotes.quote: Oh, I adore to cook. It makes me feel so mindless in a worthwhile way.
quotes.author: Truman Capote

quotes.quote: My two rules of cooking: keep it fresh and keep it simple.
quotes.author: Michael Isabella

quotes.quote: Cooking is revolution and creation.
quotes.author: Simone De Beauvoir

quotes.quote: Cooking is the most succulent of human pleasures.
quotes.author: Sylvia Townsend Warner

quotes.quote: The most indespensible ingredient of all good home cooking: love for those you are cooking for.
quotes.author: Sophia Loren

quotes.quote: Approach love and cooking with reckless abandon.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown

quotes.quote: When you hear bacon cooking....that sizzling sound isn't the fat cooking....that's applause.
quotes.author: Jim Gaffigan

quotes.quote: Working in the kitchen is my soul and my life, and I love it. I'm not there because people expect to see me; I am there because I want to be.
quotes.author: Heinz Beck

quotes.quote: The person who makes the food—his physique, his food, his soul—is unique. It is like fingerprints or handwriting.
quotes.author: Musa Dağdeviren

quotes.quote: You have to be yourself when you are creating and cooking. You do what you need to do and you do it to the best of your ability.
quotes.author: Leah Chase

quotes.quote: My definition of man is a cooking animal. The beasts have memory, judgement, and the faculties and passions of our minds in a certain degree; but no beast is a cook... Man alone can dress a good dish; and every man whatever is more or less a cook, in seasoning what he himself eats.
quotes.author: James Boswell

quotes.quote: Cookery is become an art, a noble science; cooks are gentlemen.
quotes.author: Robert Burton

quotes.quote: There are people who claim to be instinctive cooks, who never follow recipes or weigh anything at all. All I can say is they're not very fussy about what they eat. For me, cooking is an exact art and not some casual game.
quotes.author: Delia Smith

quotes.quote: A good cook is like a sorceress who dispenses happiness.
quotes.author: Elisa Schiaparelli

quotes.quote: To the old saying that man built the house but woman made of it a "home" might be added the modern supplement that woman accepted cooking as a chore but man has made of it a recreation.
quotes.author: Emily Post

quotes.quote: When it comes to cooking, five years ago I felt guilty "just adding water." Now I want to bang the tube against the countertop and have a five-course meal pop out. If it comes with plastic silverware and a plate that self-destructs, all the better.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: When men reach their sixties and retire, they go to pieces. Women go right on cooking.
quotes.author: Gail Sheehy

quotes.quote: Non-cooks think it's silly to invest two hours' work in two minutes' enjoyment; but if cooking is evanescent, so is the ballet.
quotes.author: Julia Child

quotes.quote: I was 32 when I started cooking; up until then, I just ate.
quotes.author: Julia Child

quotes.quote: Food imaginatively and lovingly prepared, and eaten in good company, warms the being.
quotes.author: Marjorie Kinnan Rawlings

quotes.quote: A good cook is not necessarily a good woman with an even temper. Some allowance should be made for the artistic temperament.... Do not be unreasonable and suddenly announce at 7 o'clock that there will be three extra people for dinner. Cooks are only human beings and cannot work miracles.
quotes.author: Marcel Boulestin

quotes.quote: Some people make too much of a business of cooking. Properly managed, cooking is the simplest of work, but nowhere is an efficiency expert so needed as in the kitchen. There is nothing I hate more than to see a woman, hot, tired, and untidy from cooking a dinner I am supposed to eat. It takes all the pleasure out of the meal.
quotes.author: G.F. Scotson-Clark

quotes.quote: The fact is that it takes more than ingredients and technique to cook a good meal. A good cook puts something of himself into the preparation—he cooks with enjoyment, anticipation, spontaneity, and he is willing to experiment.
quotes.author: Pearl Bailey

quotes.quote: When I come home to my kitchen, I realize it is there that I can best satisfy the eccentricities of my own palate.
quotes.author: James Beard

quotes.quote: I feel a recipe is only a theme, which an intelligent cook can play each time with a variation.
quotes.author: Madame Jehane Benoit

quotes.quote: Cookery is not chemistry. It is an art. It requires instinct and taste rather than exact measurements.
quotes.author: Marcel Boulestin

quotes.quote: The discovery of a new dish does more for human happiness than the discovery of a new star.
quotes.author: Anthelme Brillat-Savarin

quotes.quote: Poultry is for the cook what canvas is for the painter.
quotes.author: Anthelme Brillat-Savarin

quotes.quote: Tomatoes and oregano make it Italian; wine and tarragon make it French. Sour cream makes it Russian; lemon and cinnamon make it Greek. Soy sauce makes it Chinese; garlic makes it good.
quotes.author: Alice May Brock

quotes.quote: I don't even butter my bread. I consider that cooking.
quotes.author: Katherine Cebrian

quotes.quote: Sour, sweet, bitter, pungent—all must be tasted.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: Life is too short to stuff a mushroom.
quotes.author: Shirley Conran

quotes.quote: Salt is the policeman of taste: it keeps the various flavors of a dish in order, and restrains the stronger from tyrannizing over the weaker.
quotes.author: Malcolm De Chazal

quotes.quote: It does not matter whether one paints a picture, writes a poem, or carves a statue, simplicity is the mark of a master-hand. Don't run away with the idea that it is easy to cook simply. It requires a long apprenticeship.
quotes.author: Elsie de Wolfe

quotes.quote: If you like good food, cook it yourself.
quotes.author: Li Liweng

quotes.quote: The fat in meat, fish, ducks and chicken must be kept in the meat and not allowed to run out, else the flavor is all in the juices.
quotes.author: Yuan Mei

quotes.quote: From morning till night, sounds drift from the kitchen, most of them familiar and comforting.... On days when warmth is the most important need of the human heart, the kitchen is the place you can find it; it dries the wet sock, it cools the hot little brain.
quotes.author: E.B. White

quotes.quote: Cooking is about creating something delicious for someone else.
quotes.author: Ayumi Komura

quotes.quote: Cooking is one of the greatest gifts you can give to those you love.
quotes.author: Ina Garten

quotes.quote: Cooking is an art, but you eat it too.
quotes.author: Marcella Hazan

quotes.quote: Cooking is simply a huge and often very fun puzzle of piecing together techniques with different ingredients. Once you know your basics, the world is your oyster (or your clam, your chicken thigh, block of tofu—whatever makes you happy).
quotes.author: Julia Turshen

quotes.quote: Good food is always a trouble and its preparation should be regarded as a labour of love.
quotes.author: Elizabeth David

quotes.quote: The cooking of the Mediterranean shores, endowed with all the natural resources, the colour and flavour of the South, is a blend of tradition and brilliant improvisation. The Latin genius flashes from the kitchen pans.
quotes.author: Elizabeth David

quotes.quote: Cooking for people is an enormously significant expression of generosity and soulfulness, and entertaining is a way to be both generous and creative. You're sharing your life with people. Of course, it's also an expression of your own need for approval and applause. Nothing wrong with that.
quotes.author: Ted Allen

quotes.quote: The cool thing is that now that people have made this evolution where cooking is cool, people are doing it on weekends, they're doing their own challenges. It's back to cooking. And it's real cooking.
quotes.author: Emeril Lagasse

quotes.quote: You can pretty much make fish soup out of anything, but it always tastes better if you include fish.
quotes.author: Sten Sture Skaldeman

quotes.quote: A comedian I heard recently suggested that the best way to get a man to cook for you is to get him to associate cooking with danger. [...] If cooking involves fire or large knives or a whole fish—preferably all three—he's there.
quotes.author: Sydney Biddle Barrows

quotes.quote: I believe that precision in cooking is not about who can construct the most meticulously perfect recipe, but who can master their skill and techniques so well that they can apply them to more or less anything with great results.
quotes.author: Magnus Nilsson

quotes.quote: The tradition of Italian cooking is that of the matriarch. This is the cooking of grandma. She didn't waste time thinking too much about the celery. She got the best celery she could and then she dealt with it.
quotes.author: Mario Batali

quotes.quote: When baking, follow directions. When cooking, go by your own taste.
quotes.author: Laiko Bahrs

quotes.quote: In large states public education will always be mediocre, for the same reason that in large kitchens the cooking is usually bad.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Cooking for some is joy, for others a way to relax after a hectic day at work, and for a few, it’s purely a means to an end. Whatever your feelings are about cooking, it is so rewarding to see friends and family enjoy your food.
quotes.author: Chetna Makan

quotes.quote: One of the most meditative times of my day is when I'm cooking.
quotes.author: Gabrielle Bernstein

quotes.quote: Cooking is the art of adjustment.
quotes.author: Jacques Pepin

quotes.quote: For me, cooking is an expression of the land where you are and the culture of that place.
quotes.author: Alex Atala

quotes.quote: Like eating your own cooking, / do you favor what you write / Do the words digest completely, / —the stove again to light / As you walk that final mile, / in those shabby cobblers shoes / Will you then embrace at last, / —what was never yours to lose
quotes.author: Kurt Philip Behm

quotes.quote: Keep a cool head and maintain a low profile. Never take the lead - but aim to do something big.
quotes.author: Deng Xiaoping

quotes.quote: Let your soul stand cool and composed before a million universes.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.quote: The challenge is to stay cool enough to handle the pressure in the moment so that you can succeed in the future.
quotes.author: Jurgen Klopp

quotes.quote: Keep cool; anger is not an argument.
quotes.author: Daniel Webster

quotes.quote: Any fool can do something cool and look cool, but it takes skill to make something uncool cool again.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: I wear my cool on the inside; that's why my hands are always so cold.
quotes.author: Dia Reeves

quotes.quote: Secrets...are the very root of cool.
quotes.author: William Gibson

quotes.quote: It’s cool when fashion recycles itself, it’s not cool when sustainable living does because it means there was (and is as I write) a period of absolute and possibly irreversible destruction.
quotes.author: Cameron Conaway

quotes.quote: That which is cool is driven by the soul.
quotes.author: A.D. Posey

quotes.quote: True courage is cool and calm. The bravest of men have the least of a brutal, bullying insolence, and in the very time of danger are found the most serene and free.
quotes.author: Lord Shaftesbury

quotes.quote: One cool judgment is worth a thousand hasty counsels. The thing to do is to supply light and not heat.
quotes.author: Woodrow Wilson

quotes.quote: Keep cool and you command everybody.
quotes.author: Louis Antoine de Saint-Just

quotes.quote: We believe it is bad or dangerous to be carried away by our emotions. We admire the person who is cool, who acts without feeling.
quotes.author: Alexander Lowen

quotes.quote: Good words cool more than cold water.
quotes.author: John Ray

quotes.quote: Those who think it is not cool to be kind are cold hearted.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Nothing gives one person so much advantage over another as to remain always cool and unruffled under all circumstances.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: He who is passionate and hasty is generally honest. It is your cool, dissembling hypocrite of whom you should beware.
quotes.author: Johann Kaspar Lavater

quotes.quote: To be cool is to believe. To stay cool is to have the sweet fragments of serenity rock your wig away.
quotes.author: Lord Buckley

quotes.quote: For some, life is about "being Cool" while for others its about "being Hot". While there is room for both, we must avoid "being Lukewarm".
quotes.author: Vijay Samuel Benjamin

quotes.quote: The downright fanatic is nearer to the heart of things than the cool and slippery disputant.
quotes.author: Edwin Hubbell Chapin

quotes.quote: Summer bachelors, like summer breezes, are never as cool as they pretend to be.
quotes.author: Nora Ephron

quotes.quote: Nothing does reason more right, than the coolness of those that offer it: For Truth often suffers more by the heat of its defenders, than from the arguments of its opposers.
quotes.author: William Penn

quotes.quote: The one cool thing with getting older is that you can actively choose to just be an eccentric.
quotes.author: Greg Behrendt

quotes.quote: Self control refers to controlling one's emotions and feelings and not losing one's cool even in the worst of situations.
quotes.author: Brian Adams

quotes.quote: Now there is so much expertise and brainpower it's hard to be at the cutting edge of what's cool and not do something that's totally geeky.
quotes.author: Darren Aronofsky

quotes.quote: What good is the warmth of summer, without the cold of winter to give it sweetness.
quotes.author: John Steinbeck

quotes.quote: Winter must be cold for those with no warm memories.
quotes.author: Deborah Kerr

quotes.quote: In union there is strength.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: He that does good to another does good also to himself.
quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quotes.quote: No man is an island, entire of itself; every man is a piece of the continent.
quotes.author: John Donne

quotes.quote: The path to greatness is along with others.
quotes.author: Baltasar Gracian y Morales

quotes.quote: You can't stay in your corner of the forest waiting for others to come to you. You have to go to them sometimes.
quotes.author: A. A. Milne

quotes.quote: Most great learning happens in groups. Collaboration is the stuff of growth.
quotes.author: Sir Ken Robinson Ph.D.

quotes.quote: Alone we can do so little. Together we can do so much.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: In the long history of humankind (and animal kind, too) those who learned to collaborate and improvise most effectively have prevailed.
quotes.author: Charles Darwin

quotes.quote: Many hands make light work.
quotes.author: John Heywood

quotes.quote: Sticks in a bundle are unbreakable
quotes.author: Kenyan Proverb

quotes.quote: We may have all come on different ships, but we're in the same boat now.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: If we do not hang together, we will all hang separately.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Now join your hands, and with your hands your hearts.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: In walking, the will and the muscles are so accustomed to working together and performing their task with so little expenditure of force that the intellect is left comparatively free.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.quote: Let everyone sweep in front of his own door, and the whole world will be clean.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Not in numbers but in unity that our great strength lies.
quotes.author: Thomas Paine

quotes.quote: All things come out of the one, and the one out of all things.
quotes.author: Heraclitus

quotes.quote: He who cannot help may hinder.
quotes.author: German Proverb

quotes.quote: Victory is much more meaningful when it comes not just from one person, but from the joint achievements of many.
quotes.author: Howard Schultz

quotes.quote: A willing helper does not wait until he is asked.
quotes.author: Danish Proverb

quotes.quote: When two people meet, there are really six people present. There is each man as he sees himself, each man as he wants to be seen, and each man as he really is.
quotes.author: Michael De Saintamo

quotes.quote: So powerful is the light of unity that it can illuminate the whole earth.
quotes.author: Bahaullah

quotes.quote: Coming together is a beginning, staying together is progress, and working together is success.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: The achievements of an organization are the results of the combined effort of each individual.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: The strength of the team is each individual member. The strength of each member is the team.
quotes.author: Phil Jackson

quotes.quote: People working together in a strong community with a shared goal and a common purpose can make the impossible possible.
quotes.author: Tom Vilsack

quotes.quote: The only thing that will redeem mankind is cooperation.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Only when all contribute their firewood can they build up a strong fire.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: Cooperation and conflict are two sides of the same coin; both arise out of man's relationship with his fellows. The larger the group, the greater the possibility of development through cooperation, and the greater the possibility of conflict.
quotes.author: Julius Nyerere

quotes.quote: Cooperation is willing collaboration by free individuals in a collective effort that creates more value than it expends.
quotes.author: James Raymond Lucas

quotes.quote: Take the trouble to stop and think of the other person's feelings, his viewpoints, his desires and needs. Think more of what the other fellow wants, and how he must feel.
quotes.author: Maxwell Maltz

quotes.quote: Either men will learn to live like brothers, or they will die like beasts.
quotes.author: Max Lerner

quotes.quote: Union gives strength.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: The meeting of two personalities is like the contact of two chemical substances. If there is any reaction, both are transformed.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: People who work together will win, whether it be against complex football defenses, or the problems of modern society.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: Always try to do something for the other fellow and you will be agreeably surprised how things come your way -- how many pleasing things are done for you.
quotes.author: Claude M. Bristol

quotes.quote: Behold how good and how pleasant it is for brethren to dwell together in unity.
quotes.author: Bible

quotes.quote: Each of us is here for a brief sojourn; for what purpose he knows not, though he senses it. But without deeper reflection one knows from daily life that one exists for other people.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Everything in the world we want to do or get done, we must do with and through people.
quotes.author: Earl Nightingale

quotes.quote: God does notice us, and He watches over us. But it is usually through another person that he meets our needs.
quotes.author: Spencer W. Kimball

quotes.quote: Our lives are like islands in the sea, or like trees in the forest. The maple and the pine may whisper to each other with their leaves ... But the trees also commingle their roots in the darkness underground, and the islands also hang together through the ocean's bottom.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: No matter what accomplishments you achieve, somebody helps you.
quotes.author: Althea Gibson

quotes.quote: We are here to awaken from our illusion of separateness.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: When we begin to believe that there is greater joy in working with and for others, rather than just for ourselves, then our society will truly become a place of celebration.
quotes.author: Jean Vanier

quotes.quote: You don't get harmony when everybody sings the same note.
quotes.author: Doug Floyd

quotes.quote: Every kind of peaceful cooperation among men is primarily based on mutual trust and only secondarily on institutions such as courts of justice and police
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Let's face it. In most of life we really are interdependent. We need each other. Staunch independence is an illusion, but heavy dependence isn't healthy, either. The only position of long-term strength is interdependence: win/win.
quotes.author: Greg Anderson

quotes.quote: The world basically and fundamentally is constituted on the basis of harmony. Everything works in co-operation with something else.
quotes.author: Preston Bradley

quotes.quote: Doing things for others always pays dividends
quotes.author: Claude M. Bristol

quotes.quote: No man has come to true greatness who has not felt that his life belongs to his race, and that which God gives to him, He gives him for mankind.
quotes.author: Phillips Brooks

quotes.quote: Non-cooperation with evil as much a duty as is cooperation with good.
quotes.author: Gandhi

quotes.quote: We are born for cooperation, as are the feet, the hands, the eyelids, and the upper and lower jaws.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Getting along with others is the essence of getting ahead, success being linked with cooperation.
quotes.author: William Feather

quotes.quote: Cooperation is not a sentiment—it is an economic necessity.
quotes.author: Charles Steinmetz

quotes.quote: Save possibly in education effects, cooperation can produce no general results that competition will not produce.
quotes.author: Henry George

quotes.quote: We would rather have one man working with us than working for us.
quotes.author: F.W. Woolworth

quotes.quote: If you don't believe in cooperation, watch what happens to a wagon when one wheel comes off.
quotes.author: American Proverb

quotes.quote: A single arrow is easily broken, but not ten in a bundle.
quotes.author: Japanese Proverb

quotes.quote: When spider webs unite, they can tie up a lion.
quotes.author: African Proverb

quotes.quote: Government and cooperation are in all things the laws of life; anarchy and competition the laws of death.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.quote: With one hand I do not even tie a knot.
quotes.author: John Taylor Wood

quotes.quote: God gives food, but does he cook it and put it in the mouth?
quotes.author: John Taylor Wood

quotes.quote: You cannot clap with one hand alone.
quotes.author: John Taylor Wood

quotes.quote: No more the swindler singly seeks his prey; / To hunt in couples is the modern way / A rascal, from the public to purloin, / An honest man to hide away the coin.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: When we all work together we will get the job done / When we all are united we can work as one / When we all work together we will / Get the job done.
quotes.author: James Wright

quotes.quote: If you lift just a little, I'll pull down from the middle / Combine my dedication with your cooperation / Remove all hesitation with one slight levitation / If you lift just a little, I'll pull down from the middle.
quotes.author: Billy Sheehan

quotes.quote: Tryin' hard to weigh up the situation / But without my mind's full cooperation / How can I have something to believe in / When I don't even listen to the mouth the words are leaving.
quotes.author: China Drum

quotes.quote: Together ordinary people can achieve extraordinary results.
quotes.author: Becka Schoettle

quotes.quote: Cooperation is the thorough conviction that nobody can get there unless everybody gets there.
quotes.author: Virginia Burden

quotes.quote: Nothing truly valuable can be achieved except by the unselfish cooperation of many individuals.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Cooperation doesn't mean agreement, it means working together to advance the greater good.
quotes.author: Simon Sinek

quotes.quote: A hundred thousand men, coming one after another, cannot move a Ton weight; but the united strength of 50 would transport it with ease.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: Life is not a game of Solitaire; people depend on one another. When one does well, others are lifted. When one stumbles, others also are impacted. There are no one-man teams--either by definition or natural law. Success is a cooperative effort; it’s dependent upon those who stand beside you.
quotes.author: Jon M. Huntsman Sr.

quotes.quote: The most effective form of creation is an act of cooperation, not force.
quotes.author: Bryant McGill

quotes.quote: Without trust, there's no cooperation. And without cooperation, there's no progress. History stops.
quotes.author: Rick Yancey

quotes.quote: There is immense power when a group of people with similar interests gets together to work toward the same goals.
quotes.author: Idowu Koyenikan

quotes.quote: An individual can't create anything itself. All of our dreams come true with the cooperation and co-creation of other souls.
quotes.author: Hina Hashmi

quotes.quote: We all do better when we work together. Our differences do matter, but our common humanity matters more.
quotes.author: Bill Clinton

quotes.quote: A choir is made up of many voices, including yours and mine. If one by one all go silent then all that will be left are the soloists. Don't let a loud few determine the nature of the sound. It makes for poor harmony and diminishes the song.
quotes.author: Vera Nazarian

quotes.quote: People working together can overcome many obstacles, often within themselves, and by doing so can make the world a better place.
quotes.author: Mo Mowlam

quotes.quote: Make a positive difference in your children's lives. Act and speak about your co-parent with respect and integrity.
quotes.author: Allison Pescosolido

quotes.quote: Kids need parents, not a part-time visitor with a checkbook.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: To be in your children's memories tomorrow, you have to be in their lives today.
quotes.author: Barbara Johnson

quotes.quote: If you bungle raising your children, I don't think whatever else you do matters very much.
quotes.author: Jacqueline Kennedy Onassis

quotes.quote: Don't worry that children never listen to you; worry that they are always watching you.
quotes.author: Robert Fulghum

quotes.quote: It is easier to build strong children than to repair broken men.
quotes.author: Frederick Douglass

quotes.quote: A family portrait is only complete with love to fill it's frame.
quotes.author: Wes Fesler

quotes.quote: I don't think children's inner feelings have changed. They still want a mother and father in the very same house; they want places to play.
quotes.author: Beverly Cleary

quotes.quote: The best security blanket a child can have is parents who respect each other.
quotes.author: Jane Blaustone

quotes.quote: At the end of the day, the most overwhelming key to child's success is the positive involvement of the parents.
quotes.author: Jane D. Hull

quotes.quote: Your children need your presence more than your presents.
quotes.author: Jesse Jackson

quotes.quote: Remember you are not managing an inconvenience. You are raising a human being.
quotes.author: Kittie Frantz

quotes.quote: Co-parenting. It's not a competition between two homes. It's a collaboration of parents doing what is best for the kids.
quotes.author: Heather Hetchler

quotes.quote: This is probably one of the most difficult challenges any parent could face, learning to love the other parent enough to make the children first.
quotes.author: Iyanila Vanzant

quotes.quote: I'm very fortunate because we're committed to co-parenting our children together.
quotes.author: Elle Macpherson

quotes.quote: There is no such thing as a perfect parent. So just be a real one.
quotes.author: Sue Atkins

quotes.quote: Think of it as an important business project; you don't always love the person that you're working with, but you work together to get the project done. Co-parents need to adopt this same business model when co-parenting their children.
quotes.author: Kela Price

quotes.quote: Co-parenting is not asking permission. It's about discussing your child's needs and wants and deciding what's best.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Every one of us is a minor tragedy. Most of us learn to cope.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Bear

quotes.quote: To overcome difficulties is to experience the full delight of existence.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.quote: It is not a daily increase, but a daily decrease. Hack away at the inessentials.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: When we long for life without difficulties, remind us that oaks grow strong in contrary winds and diamonds are made under pressure.
quotes.author: Peter Marshall

quotes.quote: The greatest weapon against stress is our ability to choose one thought over another.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: Take rest; a field that has rested gives a bountiful crop.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.quote: One of life's best coping mechanisms is to know the difference between an inconvenience and a problem.
quotes.author: Robert Fulghum

quotes.quote: Your ability to generate power is directly proportional to your ability to relax.
quotes.author: David Allen

quotes.quote: Two words will help you cope when you run low on hope: accept and trust.
quotes.author: Charles R. Swindoll

quotes.quote: It is what it is. Isn't that how these things always go? They are what they are. We just get to cope.
quotes.author: Mira Grant

quotes.quote: If you're going through hell, keep going.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: You do learn how to cope from those who are coping.
quotes.author: Matthew Desmond

quotes.quote: Pain moves us forward, changing us into something else, something we need to be.
quotes.author: Michelle Moran

quotes.quote: We can easily manage if we will only take, each day, the burden appointed to it. But the load will be too heavy for us if we carry yesterday's burden over again today, and then add the burden of the morrow before we are required to bear it.
quotes.author: John Newton

quotes.quote: Not everything that happens in your life has to hit you like a hurricane.
quotes.author: Joyce Rachelle

quotes.quote: In times like these it is good to remember that there have always been times like these.
quotes.author: Paul Harvey

quotes.quote: Think first of the action that is right to take, think later about coping with one's fears.
quotes.author: Barbara Deming

quotes.quote: Routine is part of coping.
quotes.author: Lorene Scafaria

quotes.quote: You never really know what's coming. A small wave, or maybe a big one. All you can really do is hope that when it comes, you can surf over it, instead of drown in its monstrosity.
quotes.author: Alysha Speer

quotes.quote: There are limits to coping, set by ones mind and heart.
quotes.author: Rayne Lopez

quotes.quote: Coping with the demands of everyday life would be exceedingly trying if one could arrive at solutions to problems only by actually performing possible options and suffering the consequences.
quotes.author: Albert Bandura

quotes.quote: We have two strategies for coping; the way of avoidance or the way of attention.
quotes.author: Marilyn Ferguson

quotes.quote: Problems are not the problem; coping is the problem.
quotes.author: Virginia Satir

quotes.quote: Somehow our devils are never quite what we expect when we meet them face to face.
quotes.author: Nelson DeMille

quotes.quote: Coping with injuries is always difficult for athletes because all we want to do is, basically, to have our best performances unhindered.
quotes.author: Ashton Eaton

quotes.quote: We're all broken in one way or another, some just hold the pieces together better.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: On some dimension or other, every event in life can be causing only one of two things: either it is good for you, or it is bringing up what you need to look at in order to create good for you. Evolution is win-win life is self-correcting.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Do not anticipate trouble or worry about what may never happen. Keep in the sunlight.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Facing it, always facing it, that's the way to get through. Face it.
quotes.author: Joseph Conrad

quotes.quote: When life's problems seem overwhelming, look around and see what other people are coping with. You may consider yourself fortunate.
quotes.author: Ann Landers

quotes.quote: Gallows humor is part of our coping mechanism. It's part of our grief process. If we don't know what else to do, we laugh. That's a very real thing.
quotes.author: James Roday

quotes.quote: Leaving things behind and starting again is a way of coping with difficulties. I learnt very early in my life that I was able to leave a place and still remain myself.
quotes.author: Rachel Cusk

quotes.quote: I fix myself, even when it causes great pain to do so, because I know that I cannot fix the way the world sees me.
quotes.author: Tressie McMillan Cottom

quotes.quote: Honor the pain briefly, give it the deference it deserves, tell it you love it, then it will let you go.
quotes.author: A. D. Aliwat

quotes.quote: Grieving is not a race, nor is it a predictable experience - it is as unique as each and every one of us. Therefore by creating your own path you will find your own way through.
quotes.author: Corrie Sirota

quotes.quote: Sometimes you can learn, even from a bad experience. By coping you become stronger. The pain does not go away, but it becomes manageable.
quotes.author: Somaly Mam

quotes.quote: One day I looked at something in myself that I had been avoiding because it was too painful. Yet once I did, I had an unexpected surprise. Rather than self-hatred, I was flooded with compassion for myself because I realized the pain necessary to develop that coping mechanism to begin with.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: Humor helps us get through life with a modicum of grace. It offers one of the few benign ways of coping with the absurdity of it all.
quotes.author: Diane Keaton

quotes.quote: We must embrace pain and burn it as fuel for our journey.
quotes.author: Kenji Miyazawa

quotes.quote: When you are sorrowful look again in your heart, and you shall see that in truth you are weeping for that which has been your delight.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: After loss there is always gain. While our beloved seems irreplaceable, we are always blessed with a season of warmth, renewal and regeneration. And, just as the flowers do in spring, we bloom with beauty and grace—defying the harshness of the wintery days which we longed to pass. Be assured that the intensity of grief lessens with time, encouragement, faith and hope.
quotes.author: C. Cherie Hardy

quotes.quote: There is sacredness in tears. They are not the mark of weakness, but of power. They speak more eloquently than ten thousand tongues. They are the messengers of overwhelming grief, of deep contrition, and of unspeakable love.
quotes.author: Washington Irving

quotes.quote: Find a place inside where there's joy, and the joy will burn out the pain.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: Anyone can hide. Facing up to things, working through them, that's what makes you strong.
quotes.author: Sarah Dessen

quotes.quote: Anything that's human is mentionable, and anything that is mentionable can be more manageable. When we talk about our feelings, they become less overwhelming, less upsetting, and less scary. The people we trust with that important talk can help us know that we are not alone.
quotes.author: Fred Rogers

quotes.quote: As you work through your grief, you may have times when you simply need to get your mind off of what you're going through because you have done everything you can do about it; there is nothing else you can do except wait for the full healing to come.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.quote: A feeling of pleasure or solace can be so hard to find when you are in the depths of your grief. Sometimes it's the little things that help get you through the day. You may think your comforts sound ridiculous to others, but there is nothing ridiculous about finding one little thing to help you feel good in the midst of pain and sorrow.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Berrien

quotes.quote: I think the best coping strategies are the healthy coping strategies that have worked for us before, so exercising, talking to people we're close to, working. I think working is actually very healthy for most people to have some place to go and to feel productive and just distract ourselves from our own thoughts.
quotes.author: Barbara Rothbaum

quotes.quote: People go through challenging moments of losing people and of having their life threatened from illness and real grief. But they get through it. And that's the testament to the human spirit—we are fragile, but we also are divine.
quotes.author: Sheryl Crow

quotes.quote: You cannot prevent the birds of sorrow from flying over your head, but you can prevent them from building nests in your hair.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: Life is full of misery, loneliness, and suffering—and it's all over much too soon.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: Life is easier than you'd think; all that is necessary is to accept the impossible, do without the indispensable, and bear the intolerable.
quotes.author: Kathleen Thompson Norris

quotes.quote: If you can't laugh when things go bad—laugh and put on a little carnival—then you're either dead or wishing you were.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: It's not the load that breaks you down, it's the way you carry it.
quotes.author: Lou Holtz

quotes.quote: Obsessing over something that has jarred your world is called coping.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: As a coping strategy, worrying is highly over-rated.
quotes.author: Ranal Currie

quotes.quote: Take me 'round the world and back again / As I'm searching for my soul out there / Oh, there's something that I'm wondering / Where I'm going when my story ends / Doesn't even matter anyway, no / Focused and I'm coping with the pain / Only getting older by the day, yeah, we're / Only getting older.
quotes.author: Khalid Donnel Robinson; Jamil Chammas; Jeremy Malvin

quotes.quote: It's guilt and frustration, it's everything between / The silence and the absence hitting home / Peripheral glances and the chasing of a sound / I never knew I'd miss until it's gone / So ask me how I'm coping, and I'll smile and tell you: "I'm just fine."
quotes.author: Winston McCall; Jeff Ling; Luke Kilpatrick; Jia O'Connor; Ben Gordon

quotes.quote: If you ignore grief and push it down, you can live and you can even function, but you will live a very narrow emotional life because you are using so much emotional energy to cope. Everything in your psyche will be squashed down, and that means small things can trigger a much bigger kind of effect. The fact is, you have to do the work of grieving. You have to let it run its course. Pain is the agent of change; pain is what allows you to change, it’s what enables you to reach a new reality.
quotes.author: Julia Samuel

quotes.quote: You have to have time when you grieve, and time when you have a break from the grief. You can create circumstances where you grieve, and circumstances where you move on.
quotes.author: Julia Samuel

quotes.quote: People copy people they look up to, and good products inspire copycats.
quotes.author: Innocent Mwatsikesimbe

quotes.quote: If you copy then it is not self-expression.
quotes.author: Michael Schenker

quotes.quote: You should learn from your competitor, but never copy. Copy and you die.
quotes.author: Jack Ma

quotes.quote: When people are free to do as they please, they usually imitate each other.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: Do your own thing. Others own their own thing. If you copy too much, you'll find yourself in late night cocktail lounge cover band limbo.
quotes.author: Kurt Cobain

quotes.quote: Success is dangerous. One begins to copy oneself, and to copy oneself is more dangerous than to copy others. It leads to sterility.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: In everything truth surpasses the imitation and copy.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: Parrots mimic their owners. Their owners consider that a sign of intelligence.
quotes.author: Marty Rubin

quotes.quote: In my mind, there are too many copycat web products out there that are doing the same thing.
quotes.author: Daymond John

quotes.quote: A copycat is like a poor amateur. Just another rip off.
quotes.author: Knisztina

quotes.quote: To copy others is necessary, but to copy oneself is pathetic.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: Switch my hair, they gon' copy her. Switch my gear, they gon' copy her. Look at how they stare, just a copier. Roger that. Did you copy that? copycat.
quotes.author: Nicki Minaj

quotes.quote: You can't copy anybody and end with anything. If you copy, it means you're working without any real feeling.
quotes.author: Billie Holiday

quotes.quote: Don't Copy What Someone Is Doing, Copy What God Wants You To Do.
quotes.author: Cyc Jouzy

quotes.quote: Creativity vs. inspiration: inspiration makes a copy, creativity makes something completely new.
quotes.author: Hannah Garrison

quotes.quote: The one and only, you can't clone me, got a lot of haters and a lot of homiesâ€¦ some friends and some phony.
quotes.author: Mike Jones

quotes.quote: Imitation is not just the sincerest form of flattery - it's the sincerest form of learning.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: On the inside, the copycats of the ruffians are more delicate than the copycats of prudes.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: Anybody who is imitating somebody else, no matter who it us, is heading in the wrong direction. It is impossible to become like somebody else. Your only hope is to become more fully yourself.
quotes.author: Jon Kabat-Zinn

quotes.quote: There's no harm being a copycat. If someone else is doing a good job, copy. It's free.
quotes.author: Uday Kotak

quotes.quote: People are going to copy your product if you build great stuff. Just because Yahoo has a search box doesn't make it Google.
quotes.author: Evan Spiegel

quotes.quote: As long as you're being a copycat, you will never be the best copycat.
quotes.author: Eric Thomas

quotes.quote: Generally, you are held to a sound and that becomes your sound. That gets branded as your sound, and all the copycats start with it because the labels are looking for that sound.
quotes.author: Randy Bachman

quotes.quote: Stay true to yourself. An original is worth more than a copy.
quotes.author: Suzy Kassem

quotes.quote: Without authenticity, we are only a poor imitation of someone else.
quotes.author: Tom Hayes

quotes.quote: Great, a copycat. Nothing better than one freak mimicking a bunch of other freaks.
quotes.author: Sherri Cooper-Landsman

quotes.quote: They had an accident and they never noticed anyway / A lack of originality couldn't focus on the day / So much for the radio everybody sounds the same / Everybody wears the same clothes now and everybody plays the game / Copycat, copycat, copycat
quotes.author: Noel Anthony Hogan

quotes.quote: Copy copy copy everyone else / I've got a great idea / I will change things on my own / I see my vision very clear / Wouldn't wanna be another clone / So much for the radio, the radio is sad / Sad, sad, sad
quotes.author: Noel Anthony Hogan

quotes.quote: I spent my whole life trying to fit into a lane / But I'm so over it / I watched my friends fall out of love and go insane / Bid on life and lose the game / I saw them quit / I never wanna be like that / A suit and tie copycat / I never was into that
quotes.author: David Rublin

quotes.quote: I spent so long with my head buried in the sand / My future needs a rewrite / So I'll send a postcard from wherever I may land / I ain't got no master plan and that's alright / I never wanna be like that / A suit and tie copycat / I never was into that
quotes.author: David Rublin

quotes.quote: Don't stretch the small thing, copycats are finnicky / Without skills, they master the art of mimicry / But I go line for line on the whole page / Your unspotted life on the mic is old age
quotes.author: Corey Woods

quotes.quote: Full stop, don't copy, just cop me properly / Everybody same policy, universal equality / Responsibility, polity, to survive economically / Some people do it comically, fruits of freedom, equality
quotes.author: Jerry Duplessis

quotes.quote: Souls searching or controlling and robbery, cold lack of camaraderie / Clones, copycats bother me, mine, own, blind cats, follow me / Honesty, honesty, honestly, all these jokes are common-league / Puppets with no autonomy, yup it's Fugees entirely
quotes.author: Jerry Duplessis

quotes.quote: Some people are nothin' but clones / Some people have styles of their own / Some people are copycats / These people can't get the mic back
quotes.author: Lenton Tereill Hutton

quotes.quote: Copying someone else is easy but uninspiring, and people will see right through it because it won' be authentically you.
quotes.author: Aymee C. Buckhannon

quotes.quote: Mirroring someone's words and behavior is a primordial instinct. It quickly makes people think that you are part of the 'clan'.
quotes.author: Tony Bennis

quotes.quote: If you are looking for a way to manipulate people, mirroring can work wonders 'Imitation is the best form of flattery.'
quotes.author: Tony Bennis

quotes.quote: You can only imitate what you understand; but in other cases, you understand something precisely because you imitate it.
quotes.author: Werner Stegmaier

quotes.quote: Imitating someone is an attempt to repeat his or her behavior under one's own conditions when such behavior seems likely to succeed. If the attempt proves successful, the repetition is continued and the relevant behavior becomes your own routine.
quotes.author: Werner Stegmaier

quotes.quote: Perhaps the most obvious and most common way to learn is by imitating someone, by saying or doing something as another directs.
quotes.author: Jack R. Fraenkel

quotes.quote: I could not fathom the slavery of being a copycat. Be yourself, be your own responsibility.
quotes.author: Nida Bejosano Goudeaux

quotes.quote: The beauty is that through disappointment you can gain clarity, and with clarity comes conviction and true originality.
quotes.author: Conan O'Brien

quotes.quote: Books serve to show a man that those original thoughts of his aren't very new after all.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Anymore, no one's mind is their own.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: Always be a first rate version of yourself, instead of a second rate version of somebody else.
quotes.author: Judy Garland

quotes.quote: Copying one person is stealing. Copying ten is research.
quotes.author: Chet Atkins

quotes.quote: Implementing best practice is copying yesterday; innovation is inventing tomorrow.
quotes.author: Paul Sloane

quotes.quote: There are three types of biomimicry one is copying form and shape, another is copying a process, like photosynthesis in a leaf, and the third is mimicking at an ecosystem's level, like building a nature-inspired city.
quotes.author: Janine Benyus

quotes.quote: Copying is a part of flatter-ism. But being original is better than being a sequel.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: To copy a virtue in another is more copying than it is virtue. Try to learn what that virtue is based upon.
quotes.author: Idries Shah

quotes.quote: Perhaps one of the most essential exercises in learning to paint is the copying of master works in the museums.
quotes.author: Igor Babailov

quotes.quote: Copying opens your eyes to new possibilities, and new techniques but trying to fob it off as your own is quite another matter.
quotes.author: Louise Bunn

quotes.quote: Copies are just that, copies not the real thing. If one sets standards low enough, they are easily reached.
quotes.author: Shari Jones

quotes.quote: Copying has been a time-honored means of learning how to do anything.
quotes.author: Gabriella Morrison

quotes.quote: Copying is an art in itself, demanding the greatest technical ability, especially in watercolour. However well done, the copy invariably lacks that nascent, ineffable, but definite quality, provided by the furious enthusiasm with which an original is created, an essential spontaneity that defies reproduction.
quotes.author: Walter J. Phillips

quotes.quote: It is all very well to copy what one sees, but it is far better to draw what one now only sees in one's memory. That is a transformation in which imagination collaborates with memory.
quotes.author: Edgar Degas

quotes.quote: A meticulous virtual copy of the human brain would enable basic research on brain cells and circuits or computer-based drug trials.
quotes.author: Henry Markram

quotes.quote: Copying or cloning is not valid because it misses the whole point of art making.
quotes.author: Odette Nicholson

quotes.quote: There must be a certain amount of imitation, copying, in outward technique, but when there is inward, psychological imitation surely we cease to be creative.
quotes.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quotes.quote: Children imitate their parents, employees their managers.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: The great idea is the one that is either saleable or is worthy of imitation.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: Copying isn't particularly creative work. Being inspired by someone else's idea to produce something new and different is creative work.
quotes.author: Shia LaBeouf

quotes.quote: Copy is a direct conversation with the consumer.
quotes.author: Shirley Polykoff

quotes.quote: Copying is about reverse-engineering.
quotes.author: Austin Kleon

quotes.quote: To copy beauty forfeits all pretense to fame; to copy faults is want of sense
quotes.author: Charles Churchill

quotes.quote: Copying is the highest form of flattery.
quotes.author: Tito Sotto

quotes.quote: Every effort has been made to locate copyright holders and, if any material has been used without proper permission, the editor would appreciate being notified so that proper credit can be given in future editions.
quotes.author: John Marks Templeton

quotes.quote: The primary purpose of copyright, then, is not to enrich authors; rather, it is to promote the progress of science and useful arts— that is, human knowledge.
quotes.author: Stephen Fishman

quotes.quote: Copyright is a legal device that provides the creator of a work of art or literature, or a work that conveys information or ideas, the right to control how the work is used.
quotes.author: Stephen Fishman

quotes.quote: A copyright is a type of property— it belongs to its owner (usually the author) , and the courts can be asked to intervene if anyone uses it without permission.
quotes.author: Stephen Fishman

quotes.quote: Copyright lasts for the life of the work's creator (its author) plus 70 years.
quotes.author: Attorney Richard Stim

quotes.quote: Copyright does not protect ideas or facts; it protects only the unique way in which ideas or facts are expressed.
quotes.author: Attorney Richard Stim

quotes.quote: The term copyright is a highly descriptive term: the right to make copies.
quotes.author: Marshall A. Leaffer

quotes.quote: Copyright licensing is used to make works available to the public for free.
quotes.author: Stephen M. McJohn

quotes.quote: Copyright should be about policy, not property.
quotes.author: Siva Vaidhyanathan

quotes.quote: Ideas cannot be copyrighted.
quotes.author: Jack Reznicki

quotes.quote: Copying is shorthand for the infringing of any of the copyright owner's exclusive rights as described in the Copyright Act.
quotes.author: Howard Suber

quotes.quote: I think art is the only thing that's spiritual in the world. And I refuse to forced to believe in other people's interpretations of God. I don't think anybody should be. No one person can own the copyright to what God means.
quotes.author: Marilyn Manson

quotes.quote: I have always found it interesting... that there are people who regard copyright infringement as a form of flattery.
quotes.author: Tom Lehrer

quotes.quote: Actually, attorneys say, copying a purchased CD for even one friend violates the federal copyright code most of the time.
quotes.author: Charles Duhigg

quotes.quote: God holds the copyright, as the sole author of life.
quotes.author: Gift Gugu Mona

quotes.quote: A true poet writes from the language and experiences of their own heart, not those of others.
quotes.author: Suzy Kassem

quotes.quote: A brainy person does not abuse copyright; instead they respect it and uphold it.
quotes.author: Maximillian Degenerez

quotes.quote: Traditional copyright has been that you can't make a full copy of somebody's work without their permission.
quotes.author: Patricia Schroeder

quotes.quote: Copyrights have not expired, and will not expire, so long as Congress is free to be bought to extend them again.
quotes.author: Lawrence Lessig

quotes.quote: Now that copyrights can be just about a century long, the inability to know what is protected and what is not protected becomes a huge and obvious burden on the creative process.
quotes.author: Lawrence Lessig

quotes.quote: The copy price of the future is the copyright.
quotes.author: Mathias Dopfner

quotes.quote: Copyright protects corporate monopoly rights over culture and provides much of the profits to media conglomeratesm encouraging the wholesale privatization of our common culture.
quotes.author: Robert Waterman McChesney

quotes.quote: The idea of copyright did not exist in ancient times, when authors frequently copied other authors at length in works of non-fiction. This practice was useful, and is the only way many authors' works have survived even in part.
quotes.author: Richard Stallman

quotes.quote: If you don't move to protect copyright, if you don't move to protect our children, it's not going to sit well.
quotes.author: Barbara Boxer

quotes.quote: The copyright bargain: a balance between protection for the artist and rights for the consumer.
quotes.author: Robin Gross

quotes.quote: Corn is the only food you hold like corn.
quotes.author: Dana Gould

quotes.quote: Corn is cleaned with wind, and the Soul with chastening
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: A light wind swept over the corn, and all nature laughed in the sunshine.
quotes.author: Anne Bronte

quotes.quote: Most corn is combine harvested, which means it's picked and shelled in the field but that's rough on the corn because the husk is more likely to be scratched or cracked.
quotes.author: Ken Kercheval

quotes.quote: Corn is a necessary, silver is only a superfluity.
quotes.author: Adam Smith

quotes.quote: Corn is an efficient way to get energy calories off the land and soybeans are an efficient way of getting protein off the land, so we've designed a food system that produces a lot of cheap corn and soybeans resulting in a lot of cheap fast food.
quotes.author: Michael Pollan

quotes.quote: The Corn boiled or roasted is still a Corn. one went through the hot waters the other through the Fire. Still The blessed Word
quotes.author: Mary Tornyenyor

quotes.quote: Corn syrup and added fats have been outed as major ingredients in fast food, but they hide out in packaged foods too, even presumed-innocent ones like crackers.
quotes.author: Barbara Kingsolver

quotes.quote: The price of corn will naturally rise with the difficulty of producing the last portions of it.
quotes.author: David Ricardo

quotes.quote: The goldenrod is yellow, The corn is turning brown, The trees in apple orchards With fruit are bending down.
quotes.author: Helen Hunt Jackson

quotes.quote: If your corn has a herbicide-tolerant gene, it means you can pray your herbicides and kill the weeds; you won't kill your corn.
quotes.author: Jeremy Rifkin

quotes.quote: Corn can add inches in a single day; if you listened, you could hear it grow.
quotes.author: Laura Ruby

quotes.quote: Corn is a greedy crop, as farmers will tell you.
quotes.author: Michael Pollan

quotes.quote: Corn is the hero of its own story, and though we humans played a crucial supporting role in its rise to world domination, it would be wrong to suggest we have been calling the shots, or acting always in our own best interests. Indeed, there is every reason to believe that corn has succeeded in domesticating us.
quotes.author: Michael Pollan

quotes.quote: This corn will teach to you, should you peel away the husk, and be willing to open your ears.
quotes.author: Anthony Liccione

quotes.quote: There is no real wealth but the labor of man. Were the mountains of gold and the valleys of silver, the world would not be one grain of corn richer; not one comfort would be added to the human race.
quotes.author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quotes.quote: Farming looks mighty easy when your plow is a pencil, and you're a thousand miles from a corn field.
quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quotes.quote: The earth bringeth forth fruit of herself; first the blade, then the ear, after that the full corn in the ear.
quotes.author: The Holy Bible (Matthew 4:28)

quotes.quote: Never thrust your own sickle into another's corn.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: The gods sent not / Corn for the rich men only.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: The corn was orient and immortal wheat, which never should be reaped, nor was ever sown. I thought it had stood from everlasting to everlasting.
quotes.author: Thomas Traherne

quotes.quote: Corn, which is the staff of life.
quotes.author: Edward Winslow

quotes.quote: Up from the meadows rich with corn / Clear in the cool September morn.
quotes.author: John Greenleaf Whittier

quotes.quote: I believe in the forest, and in the meadow, and in the night in which the corn grows.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Raise less corn and more hell!
quotes.author: Mary Ellen Lease

quotes.quote: The corn is as high as an elephant’s eye, / An’ it looks like it's climbin’ clear up to the sky.
quotes.author: Oscar Hammerstein II

quotes.quote: Lovely! See the cloud, the cloud appear! / Lovely! See the rain, the rain draw near! / Who spoke? / It was the little corn ear / High on the tip of the stalk.
quotes.author: Zuni Song

quotes.quote: Growing up in Kansas and Iowa, one of the best-paying jobs for kids my age was also the worst job imaginable: detasseling corn. You reach up to the top of a six-foot-tall corn plant and pull off the top 'tassel' part of the corn and drop it on the ground. This was the kind of manual labor young men did on the hottest days of the summer, so they would concentrate on personal responsibility and integrity rather than hang out at the billiards saloon, chewing tobacco and flirting with pool hall girls.
quotes.author: Steve Doocy

quotes.quote: Corn is something discovered by Indians, distributed by farmers, distilled by moonshiners, and dispensed by comedians.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: A fog from the sea brings corn to the mills.
quotes.author: English Proverb

quotes.quote: The best place to have a com is on the bottom of your foot: nobody can step on it but you.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Corn is estimated out West by the foot, down South by the gallon, and on television by the hour.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: A corn on the ear is worth two on the foot.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: In Kentucky the com is full of kernels, and the colonels are full of corn.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Every month / somewhere in the world / a crop of corn / comes ripe. / Every day / somewhere in the world / Selu sings of survival.
quotes.author: Marilou Awiakta

quotes.quote: Once viewed as a gift of the gods, corn has slipped under a cloud, a victim of modernity’s prodigal and detached ways.
quotes.author: Anthony Boutard

quotes.quote: Hell hath no fury like a woman’s corn.
quotes.author: Franklin P. Adams

quotes.quote: You know that orange juice you have every morning? You know what's in that? Corn. And you know what's in the maple syrup you put on your pancakes? You know what makes it taste so good? Corn. And when you're good and help with the trash, you know what makes the big, green bags biodegradable?
quotes.author: Mark Whitacre

quotes.quote: Sir, corn is the injuns gift to the new world, and the corn flake is my gift to the entire world.
quotes.author: Dr. John Harvey Kellogg

quotes.quote: Creamed corn, I brought it from home. I don't like the corn they have here, it's too crunchy.
quotes.author: Adam West

quotes.quote: Up in Indiana where the tall corn grows / I do a little thinkin' bout a girl named Rose / Hair blonde as hay and long as a rope / Up in Indiana where the tall corn grows
quotes.author: Lyle Lovett

quotes.quote: The cotton was high and the corn was growing fine / But that was another place and another time
quotes.author: Tony Joe White

quotes.quote: He planted his corn in the month of June / And by July it was up to his eyes / Come September, came a big frost / And all the young man's corn was lost
quotes.author: Alison Maria Krauss; Barry Bales; Daniel John Tyminski

quotes.quote: When the corn's all cut and the bright stalks shine / Like the burnished spears of a field of gold; / When the field-mice rich on the nubbins dine, / And the frost comes white and the wind blows cold; / Then it's heigh-ho! fellows and hi-diddle-diddle, / For the time is ripe for the corn-stalk fiddle.
quotes.author: Paul Laurence Dunbar

quotes.quote: There was a high majestic fooling / Day before yesterday in the yellow corn.
quotes.author: Carl Sandburg

quotes.quote: Some of the ears are bursting. / A white juice works inside. / Cornsilk creeps in the end and dangles in the wind. / Always--I never knew it any other way-- / The wind and the corn talk things over together. / And the rain and the corn and the sun and the corn / Talk things over together.
quotes.author: Carl Sandburg

quotes.quote: Some of the ears are bursting. / A white juice works inside. / Cornsilk creeps in the end and dangles in the wind. / Always--I never knew it any other way-- / The wind and the corn talk things over together. / And the rain and the corn and the sun and the corn / Talk things over together.
quotes.author: Carl Sandburg

quotes.quote: Heap high the farmer’s wintry hoard! / Heap high the golden corn! / No richer gift has Autumn poured / From out her lavish horn!
quotes.author: John Greenleaf Whittier

quotes.quote: The corn, the corn, the beautiful corn, / Rising wonderful, morn by morn: / First, scarce as high as a fairy's wand, / Then, just in reach of a child's wee hand; / Then growing, growing, tall, brave, and strong: / With the voice of new harvests in its song; / While in fond scorn / The lark out-carols the whispering corn.
quotes.author: Dinah Maria Mulock Craik

quotes.quote: There is a June when Corn is cut / And Roses in the Seed — / A Summer briefer than the first / But tenderer indeed
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.quote: How beautiful are the corn rows, / Stretching to the morning sun, / Stretching to the evening sun. / Very beautiful, the long rows of corn.
quotes.author: Amy Lowell

quotes.quote: How beautiful is the white corn, / I husk it, / I grind it. / Very beautiful, my white corn.
quotes.author: Amy Lowell

quotes.quote: How beautiful is the red corn, / I gather it and make fine meal, / I am glad doing this. / Very beautiful, my red corn.
quotes.author: Amy Lowell

quotes.quote: How beautiful is the black corn, / I give it to my father, / To my mother, / I give it to my child. / Very beautiful, the black corn.
quotes.author: Amy Lowell

quotes.quote: How beautiful is the mottled corn, / Like the sky with little clouds, / I eat it looking at the sky. / Very beautiful, my mottled corn.
quotes.author: Amy Lowell

quotes.quote: It is time for us to turn a corner and come together, put our differences behind us and focus on the future.
quotes.author: Christine Gregoire

quotes.quote: Corners are very important in life, because you can't see what is hidden beyond the corner! Those who are good at guessing what is hidden easily triumph on the path of life.
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Still round the corner there may wait, A new road or a secret gate.
quotes.author: J. R. R. Tolkien

quotes.quote: Choose your corner, pick away at it carefully, intensely and to the best of your ability and that way you might change the world.
