quotes.author: Charles Eames

quotes.quote: You never know what's coming round the corner. There's only one thing coming round the corner - more corners.
quotes.author: Bradley Walsh

quotes.quote: There is no corner too quiet, or too far away, for a woman to make sorrow in it.
quotes.author: Amelia Barr

quotes.quote: Every corner and room of a house will carry memories, make these the most pleasurable times you shared with your family.
quotes.author: Anthony Liccione

quotes.quote: Every man has a rainy corner of his life whence comes foul weather which follows him.
quotes.author: Jean Paul

quotes.quote: There's only one corner of the universe you can be certain of improving, and that's your own self.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: If you leave the smallest corner of your head vacant for a moment, other people's opinions will rush in from all quarters.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: You can't stay in your corner of the forest waiting for others to come to you. You have to go to them sometimes.
quotes.author: A. A. Milne

quotes.quote: Around every corner, always protect the engine that powers you.
quotes.author: Dwayne Johnson

quotes.quote: Your victory is right around the corner. Never give up.
quotes.author: Nicki Minaj

quotes.quote: Sometimes you're going to be shoved into a corner, and even though it's against your principles, against the way that you like to play the game, you're going to have to protect your own players.
quotes.author: Vernon Law

quotes.quote: You never know what's around the corner. It could be everything. Or it could be nothing. You keep putting one foot in front of the other, and then one day you look back and you've climbed a mountain.
quotes.author: Tom Hiddleston

quotes.quote: But the moment you turn a corner you see another straight stretch ahead and there comes some further challenge to your ambition.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.quote: It is better to go into a corner slow and come out fast, than to go in fast and come out dead.
quotes.author: Stirling Moss

quotes.quote: You just never know what's around the next corner in life or business or anything.
quotes.author: Paul Brown

quotes.quote: Make an empty space in any corner of your mind, and creativity will instantly fill it.
quotes.author: Dee Hock

quotes.quote: At any street corner the feeling of absurdity can strike any man in the face.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: You can never get complacent because a loss is always around the corner.
quotes.author: Venus Williams

quotes.quote: No one has a corner on success. It is his who pays the price.
quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.quote: You can never be sure what is around the corner.
quotes.author: Ole Gunnar Solskjaer

quotes.quote: The world is full of unused corners.
quotes.author: Brenna Yovanoff

quotes.quote: Never cut corners, or accept anything that's second-rate.
quotes.author: Bruce Oldfield

quotes.quote: If you have to, take a break, go to your corner, get some sleep but don't ever give up. You will get there.
quotes.author: Colin Cunningham

quotes.quote: All the beautiful corners of the world are the greatest mind and body healers!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Successful organizations make habits of things others don't like to do, or don't find time to do.
quotes.author: Don House

quotes.quote: Corporate culture is the only sustainable competitive advantage that is completely within the control of the entrepreneur. Develop a strong corporate culture first and foremost.
quotes.author: David Cummings

quotes.quote: Corporations no longer try to fit square pegs into round holes; they just fit them into square cubicles.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: The corporate world has the resources to improve the world. It's where people live and work.
quotes.author: Douglas Conant

quotes.quote: Just tasking a team to be creative won't get you to be innovative. It's having a corporate climate that gives people the space to experiment and take risks. Only then can you truly sustain it.
quotes.author: Steve Brown

quotes.quote: In the corporate world, if you have analysts, due diligence, and no horse sense, you've just described hell.
quotes.author: Charlie Munger

quotes.quote: Corporations do not pay taxes, they collect them, passing the burden to consumers as a cost of production. And corporate taxation is a feast of rent-seeking - a cornucopia of credits, exemptions and other subsidies conferred by the political class on favored, and grateful, corporations.
quotes.author: George Will

quotes.quote: By working faithfully eight hours a day you may eventually get to be boss and work twelve hours a day.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: Corporate culture matters. How management chooses to treat its people impacts everything - for better or for worse.
quotes.author: Simon Sinek

quotes.quote: You would be surprised at how many corporations "none of your business" applies to!
quotes.author: Steven Magee

quotes.quote: Large corporations welcome innovation and individualism in the same way the dinosaurs welcomed large meteors.
quotes.author: Scott Adams

quotes.quote: All corporatism - even when practised in societies where hard work, enterprise and cooperation are as highly valued as in Korea - encourages inflexibility, discourages individual accountability, and risks magnifying errors by concealing them.
quotes.author: Margaret Thatcher

quotes.quote: The real competitive advantage in any business is one word only, which is â€œpeopleâ€.
quotes.author: Kamil Toume

quotes.quote: The silent workers get lost in the endless darkness of the corporate world.
quotes.author: Abhishek Ratna

quotes.quote: The successful man is the one who finds out what is the matter with his business before his competitors do.
quotes.author: Roy L. Smith

quotes.quote: Corporations cannot commit treason, nor be outlawed, nor excommunicate, for they have no souls.
quotes.author: Edward Coke

quotes.quote: I think as a company, if you can get those two things right â€” having a clear direction on what you are trying to do and bringing in great people who can execute on the stuff â€” then you can do pretty well.
quotes.author: Mark Zuckerberg

quotes.quote: In the corporate world, sometimes things aren't exactly black and white when it comes to accounting procedures.
quotes.author: George W. Bush

quotes.quote: Corporate greed, corporate bullying cannot be tolerated - it's time for a global rule of law to guarantee fair trade, rights, minimum wages on which people can live with dignity, and safe and secure work.
quotes.author: Sharan Burrow

quotes.quote: Corporations are people, my friend ... of course they are. Everything corporations earn ultimately goes to the people. Where do you think it goes? Whose pockets? Whose pockets? People's pockets. Human beings my friend.
quotes.author: Mitt Romney

quotes.quote: It takes more than capital to swing business. You've got to have the A. I. D. degree to get by â€” Advertising, Initiative, and Dynamics.
quotes.author: Ren Mulford Jr.

quotes.quote: A corporation, essentially, is a pile of money to which a number of persons have sold their moral allegiance.
quotes.author: Wendell Berry

quotes.quote: I believe the vulpine greed of the corporate world is cut from the very same cloth as the tyrant of history.
quotes.author: Adam Nevill

quotes.quote: Companies may never come up with a better office communication program than a lunch break.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: An organization's ability to learn, and translate that learning into action rapidly, is the ultimate competitive advantage.
quotes.author: Jack Welch

quotes.quote: That corporations are the creatures of the Crown must be universally admitted.
quotes.author: Lord Kenyon

quotes.quote: It is unfortunate we can't buy many business executives for what they are worth and sell them for what they think they are worth.
quotes.author: Malcolm Forbes

quotes.quote: Corporation: An ingenious device for obtaining profit without individual responsibility.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: The corporate world is appallingly bad at capitalizing on the strengths of its people.
quotes.author: Marcus Buckingham

quotes.quote: Corporation: a miniature totalitarian state governed by a hierarchy of unelected officials who take a dim view of individualism, free speech, equality and eggheads. The backbone of all Western democracies.
quotes.author: Rick Bayan

quotes.quote: In the business world, everyone is paid in two coins: cash and experience. Take the experience first; the cash will come later.
quotes.author: Harold Geneen

quotes.quote: A sour corporate culture can actually make an entire society unhappy. This means that a strong corporate culture can have a positive impact on a society.
quotes.author: Simon Sinek

quotes.quote: Money is truthful. If a man speaks of his honor, make him pay cash.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: Corruption is authority plus monopoly minus transparency.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Corruption is just another form of tyranny.
quotes.author: Joe Biden

quotes.quote: If corruption had already taken root, then good seeds must be preserved.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: Each of us is born with a share of purity, predestined to be corrupted by our commerce with mankind.
quotes.author: Emil Cioran

quotes.quote: Corruption is worse than prostitution. The latter might endanger the morals of an individual, the former invariably endangers the morals of the entire country.
quotes.author: Karl Kraus

quotes.quote: The corruption of the positively wicked is often less sad and fatal to society than the irregularities of a virtuous man who yields and falls.
quotes.author: Joseph Francis Edward Desmarais

quotes.quote: The corruption of people is to behave in an inhuman way.
quotes.author: Alan Bullock

quotes.quote: Corruption is simply crime without conscience.
quotes.author: George Richard Marek

quotes.quote: The corruption of every government begins nearly always with that of principles.
quotes.author: Charles de Montesquieu

quotes.quote: Corruption, the greatest single bane of our society today.
quotes.author: Olusegun Obasanjo

quotes.quote: The first sign of corruption in a society that is still alive is that the end justifies the means.
quotes.author: Georges Bernanos

quotes.quote: Corruption is the enemy of development, and of good governance. It must be got rid of. Both the government and the people at large must come together to achieve this national objective.
quotes.author: Pratibha Patil

quotes.quote: Money, not morality, is the principle commerce of civilized nations.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: The corruption of the best things gives rise to the worst.
quotes.author: David Hume

quotes.quote: Corruption is a cancer that steals from the poor, eats away at governance and moral fibre and destroys trust.
quotes.author: Robert Zoellick

quotes.quote: Corruption ultimately guilts the corrupt, and it hardens the innocent who suffer as a result of it. It isn't the young who corrupt the old, rather it's the inverse. The aim of the old should be to ensure that the young grow up incorruptible.
quotes.author: Justin K. McFarlane Beau

quotes.quote: Power does not corrupt. Fear corrupts perhaps the fear of a loss of power.
quotes.author: John Steinbeck

quotes.quote: Power does not corrupt men; fools, however, if they get into a position of power, corrupt power.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Corruption has its own motivations, and one has to thoroughly study that phenomenon and eliminate the foundations that allow corruption to exist.
quotes.author: Eduard Shevardnadze

quotes.quote: Corruption is nature's way of restoring our faith in democracy.
quotes.author: Peter Ustinov

quotes.quote: Corruption is a tree, whose branches are of an immeasurable length: they spread ev'rywhere; and the dew that drops from thence hath infected some chairs and stools of authority.
quotes.author: Francis Beaumont

quotes.quote: The corruption of the age is made up by the particular contribution of every individual man; some contribute treachery, others injustice, atheism, tyranny, avarice, cruelty, according to their power.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: Corruption is like a ball of snow, once it's set a rolling it must increase.
quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.quote: Corruption, the most infallible symptom of constitutional liberty.
quotes.author: Edward Gibbon

quotes.quote: Corruption wins not more than honesty.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: The world will not be destroyed by those who do evil, but by those who watch them without doing anything.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Corruption is government intrusion into market efficiencies in the form of regulations.
quotes.author: Milton Friedman

quotes.quote: Corruption is man's inheritance.
quotes.author: Anacletus

quotes.quote: Those who fight corruption should be clean themselves.
quotes.author: Vladimir Putin

quotes.quote: Corruption never has been compulsory; when the cities lie at the monster's feet there are left the mountains.
quotes.author: Robinson Jeffers

quotes.quote: One must beware of ministers who can do nothing without money, and those who want to do everything with money.
quotes.author: Indira Gandhi

quotes.quote: There is something in corruption which, like a jaundiced eye, transfers the color of itself to the object it looks upon, and sees everything stained and impure.
quotes.author: Thomas Paine

quotes.quote: Corruption and hypocrisy ought not to be inevitable products of democracy, as they undoubtedly are today.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Beauty is power; a smile is its sword.
quotes.author: John Ray

quotes.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Nearly always when actors are approached by the beauticians, they try to avoid the dabs that the beauticians put on their faces. They dodge them.
quotes.author: Quentin Crisp

quotes.quote: A thing of beauty is a joy forever: its loveliness increases; it will never pass into nothingness.
quotes.author: John Keats

quotes.quote: A smile is the best makeup any girl can wear.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The most beautiful makeup of a woman is passion. But cosmetics are easier to buy.
quotes.author: Yves Saint-Laurent

quotes.quote: Inner beauty is great, but a little mascara never hurts.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Time may be a great healer, but it's also a lousy beautician.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: There are no better cosmetics than a severe temperance and purity, modesty and humility, a gracious temper and calmness of spirit; and there is no true beauty without the signatures of these graces in the very countenance.
quotes.author: Arthur Helps

quotes.quote: Wearing cosmetics that were tested on animals makes you ugly on the inside
quotes.author: Ricky Gervais

quotes.quote: Cosmetics is a boon to every woman, but a girl's best beauty aid is still a near-sighted man.
quotes.author: Yoko Ono

quotes.quote: Like a therapist hairdressers are in a position of trust. We are transforming not just how a person looks but how they feel.
quotes.author: Tabatha Coffey

quotes.quote: Let the beauty of what you love be what you do.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Tears can ruin the handiwork of the best beautician.
quotes.author: Anurag Shourie

quotes.quote: Beauty follows a bell curve, meaning there are a small number of exceptionally beautiful people, and a small number of exceptionally unattractive people.
quotes.author: T. H. Russo

quotes.quote: Beauty is how you feel inside, and it reflects in your eyes. It is not something physical.
quotes.author: Sophia Loren

quotes.quote: Nothing makes a woman more beautiful than the belief that she is beautiful.
quotes.author: Sophia Loren

quotes.quote: It is said that no star is a heroine to her makeup artist.
quotes.author: Richard Corliss

quotes.quote: Everything has beauty, but not everyone sees it.
quotes.author: Confucious

quotes.quote: The cosmetics industry has much to answer for. It's a multi-million- pound confidence trick based on giving women endless hope, courtesy of overpriced little pots.
quotes.author: Joan Collins

quotes.quote: In the factory we make cosmetics; in the drugstore we sell hope.
quotes.author: Charles Revson

quotes.quote: The best thing is to look natural, but it takes makeup to look natural.
quotes.author: Calvin Klein

quotes.quote: The beauty myth is always actually prescribing behaviour and not appearance.
quotes.author: Naomi Wolf

quotes.quote: For beautiful eyes, look for the good in others; for beautiful lips, speak only words of kindness; and for poise, walk with the knowledge that you are never alone.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: Sometimes a good feeling from inside is worth much more than a beautician.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: Dwell on the beauty of life. Watch the stars, and see yourself running with them.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Whether you are sixteen or over sixty, remember, understatement is the rule of a fine makeup artist.
quotes.author: Helena Rubinstein

quotes.quote: If you are talking about beauty, books are cheaper than cosmetics.
quotes.author: Svaradiva

quotes.quote: Beauty is when you can appreciate yourself. When you love yourself, that's when you're most beautiful.
quotes.author: Zoe Kravitz

quotes.quote: Cosmetics is the science of a woman's cosmos.
quotes.author: Karl Kraus

quotes.quote: A women's greatest asset is her beauty.
quotes.author: Alex Comfort

quotes.quote: Whenever you are creating beauty around you, you are restoring your own soul.
quotes.author: Alice Walker

quotes.quote: Think of all the beauty still left around you and be happy.
quotes.author: Anne Frank

quotes.quote: A woman whose smile is open and whose expression is glad has a kind of beauty no matter what she wears.
quotes.author: Anne Roiphe

quotes.quote: The beauty of a woman is not in a facial mode but the true beauty in a woman is reflected in her soul. It is the caring that she lovingly gives the passion that she shows. The beauty of a woman grows with the passing years.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: Beauty in things exists in the mind which contemplates them.
quotes.author: David Hume

quotes.quote: Beauty of whatever kind, in its supreme development, invariably excites the sensitive soul to tears.
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.quote: No matter how plain a woman may be, if truth and honesty are written across her face, she will be beautiful.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: People are like stained - glass windows. They sparkle and shine when the sun is out, but when the darkness sets in, their true beauty is revealed only if there is a light from within.
quotes.author: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross

quotes.quote: Put on some lipstick and pull yourself together.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Taylor

quotes.quote: A witty woman is a treasure; a witty beauty is a power.
quotes.author: George Meredith

quotes.quote: Beauty, to me, is about being comfortable in your own skin. That, or a kick-ass red lipstick.
quotes.author: Gwyneth Paltrow

quotes.quote: Things are beautiful if you love them.
quotes.author: Jean Anouilh

quotes.quote: The human body is the best work of art.
quotes.author: Jess C. Scott

quotes.quote: When you do something noble and beautiful and nobody noticed, do not be sad. For the sun every morning is a beautiful spectacle and yet most of the audience still sleeps.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: There is no definition of beauty, but when you can see someone's spirit coming through, something unexplainable, that's beautiful to me.
quotes.author: Liv Tyler

quotes.quote: Love of beauty is taste. The creation of beauty is art.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: For beauty being the best of all we know Sums up the unsearchable and secret aims Of nature.
quotes.author: ROBERT BRIDGES

quotes.quote: Beauty is not who you are on the outside, it is the wisdom and time you gave away to save another struggling soul like you.
quotes.author: Shannon Alder

quotes.quote: To be beautiful means to be yourself. You don’t need to be accepted by others. you need to accept yourself.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: Integrity reveals beauty.
quotes.author: Thomas Leonard

quotes.quote: If you retain nothing else, always remember the most important Rule of Beauty, which is: ‘Who cares?
quotes.author: Tina Fey

quotes.quote: To love beauty is to see light.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Cosmic reveries separate us from project reveries. They situate us in a world and not in a society. The cosmic reverie possesses a sort of stability or tranquility. It helps us escape time. It is a state.
quotes.author: Gaston Bachelard

quotes.quote: A time will come when men will stretch out their eyes. They should see planets like our Earth.
quotes.author: Christopher Wren

quotes.quote: In our time this search (for extraterrestrial life) will eventually change our laws, our religions, our philosophies, our arts, our recreations, as well as our sciences. Space, the mirror, waits for life to come look for itself there.
quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

quotes.quote: Cosmic religiousness is the strongest and most noble driving force of scientific research.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: You are a cosmic flower. Om chanting is the process of opening the psychic petals of that flower.
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: The fancy that extraterrestrial life is by definition of a higher order than our own is one that soothes all children, and many writers.
quotes.author: Joan Didion

quotes.quote: Our thoughts are like roots which reach out in every direction into the cosmic ocean of formless energy, and these thought-roots set in motion vibrations like themselves and attract the affinities of our desires and ambitions.
quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.quote: It is a remarkable illustration of the ranging power of the human intellect that a principle first detected in connection with the clumsy puffing of the early steam engines should be found to apply to the whole world, and possibly, even to the whole cosmic universe.
quotes.author: Alfred Ubbelohde

quotes.quote: A Cosmic Ordering beginning makes a wealthy ending.
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: Those who see the cosmic perspective as a depressing outlook, they really need to reassess how they think about the world. Because when I look up in the universe, I know I'm small but I'm also big. I'm big because I'm connected to the universe, and the universe is connected to me.
quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quotes.quote: You are a cosmic traveler; your body is temporary, but its essence is eternal.
quotes.author: Dave Zebian

quotes.quote: But when the world is, indeed, in chaos, then an affirmation of cosmos becomes essential.
quotes.author: Madeleine L'Engle

quotes.quote: Cosmic energy enters the body through the medulla and then passes to the cerebrum, in which it is stored or concentrated.
quotes.author: Paramahansa Yogananda

quotes.quote: On a cosmic scale, our life is insignificant, yet this brief period when we appear in the world is the time in which all meaningful questions arise.
quotes.author: Paul Ricoeur

quotes.quote: Every one of us is, in the cosmic perspective, precious. If a human disagrees with you, let him live. In a hundred billion galaxies, you will not find another.
quotes.author: Carl Sagan

quotes.quote: Everything is determined by forces over which we have no control. It is determined for the insect as well as the star. Human beings, vegetables, or cosmic dustâ€”we all dance to a mysterious tune, intoned in the distance by an invisible piper.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The cosmic perspective not only embraces our genetic kinship with all life on Earth but also values our chemical kinship with any yet to be discovered life in the universe, as well as our atomic kinship with the universe itself.
quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quotes.quote: There is a very large chunk of our population who firmly believe in extraterrestrials.
quotes.author: Jeri Ryan

quotes.quote: A cosmic war is like a ritual drama in which participants act out on Earth a battle they believe is actually taking place in the heavens.
quotes.author: Reza Aslan

quotes.quote: A cosmic mystery of immense proportions, once seemingly on the verge of solution, has deepened and left astronomers and astrophysicists more baffled than ever. The crux ... is that the vast majority of the mass of the universe seems to be missing.
quotes.author: William J. Broad

quotes.quote: Learn to access the cosmic trust. Life will be easy.
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: Cosmos is God, who whispered the syllable of life.
quotes.author: Dejan Stojanovic

quotes.quote: The Cosmos is all that is or was or ever will be. Our feeblest contemplations of the Cosmos stir us there is a tingling in the spine, a catch in the voice, a faint sensation, as if a distant memory, of falling from a height. We know we are approaching the greatest of mysteries.
quotes.author: Carl Sagan

quotes.quote: Cosmic humor, especially about your own predicament, is an important part of your journey.
quotes.author: Ram Dass

quotes.quote: Humans are not the end result of predictable evolutionary progress, but rather a fortuitous cosmic afterthought, a tiny little twig on the enormously arborescent bush of life, which if replanted from seed, would almost surely not grow this twig again.
quotes.author: Stephen Jay Gould

quotes.quote: The Earth is a very small stage in a vast cosmic arena.
quotes.author: Carl Sagan

quotes.quote: The cosmic believer needs the energy of the universe to survive spiritually.
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: In this vast cosmic orchestra, peace is the music of every heart. Our glory lies in understanding, listening and honoring that music.
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: The beauty of a living thing is not the atoms that go into it, but the way those atoms are put together.
quotes.author: Carl Sagan

quotes.quote: The cosmos is a complex amalgamation of sounds. One of the key sounds through which you can experience the cosmic nature of creation is Shambho.
quotes.author: Jaggi Vasudev

quotes.quote: Scientists say earth dwellers should have little fear of rogue stars zooming into the path of the sun, as they say our star, which resides in the cosmic backwaters of the Milky Way, will likely burn out long before any star comes floating by.
quotes.author: Nick Belardes

quotes.quote: We are utterly connected to the greater cosmic machinery. This is very natural. It is also very weird.
quotes.author: Brad Listi

quotes.quote: The beginnings of cosmic religious feeling already appear at an early stage of development, e.g., in many of the Psalms of David and in some of the Prophets.
quotes.author: Einstein

quotes.quote: Yet, as we live life to enjoy it or 'make' it, we lose awareness that the great cosmic purpose of development calls us to tune in to that eternal purpose.
quotes.author: Alfred Henry

quotes.quote: One's worth is humanity's worth in the cosmic perspective and perception.
quotes.author: Alfred Henry

quotes.quote: We are happy when we are growing. It is this primal law of all nature and the universe in the conscious mind.
quotes.author: J.B. Yeats

quotes.quote: A cosmic philosophy is not constructed to fit a man; a cosmic philosophy is constructed to fit a cosmos. A man can no more possess a private religion than he can possess a private sun and moon.
quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: We, together, vibrate as one in harmony with man and with the cosmos.
quotes.author: Jean Toomer

quotes.quote: Everything in the universe is connected, everything is osmosis. You cannot separate any part from the whole, interdependence rules the cosmic order.
quotes.author: Taisen Deshimaru

quotes.quote: As is the human body, so is the cosmic body. As is the human mind. so is the cosmic mind. As is the macrocosm, so is the macrocosm. As is the atom, so is the universe
quotes.author: Upanishads

quotes.quote: Constantly regard the universe as a single living being, having one substance and one soul; observe how all creation relates to the cosmic consciousness of this one living being.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: The more we realize our minuteness and our impotence in the face of cosmic forces, the more amazing becomes what human beings have achieved.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Each day of human life contains joy and anger, pain and pleasure, darkness and light, growth and decay. Each moment is etched with nature's grand design, do not try to deny or oppose the cosmic order of things.
quotes.author: Morihei Ueshiba

quotes.quote: We are members of a vast cosmic orchestra in which each living instrument is essential to the complementary and harmonious playing of the whole.
quotes.author: J. Allen Boone

quotes.quote: The animus is meant to be cosmic. It is a function which should widen out the spiritual or mental possibilities into infinite space, as it were, into the infinity of the collective mind. In as much as the animus is expanding into the great conscious cosmos, he is really in his own element—there he belongs, that is his home.
quotes.author: C.G. Jung

quotes.quote: The universe is full of magical things to be manifested with Cosmic Ordering.
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: I pass and I stay like the Universe.
quotes.author: Alberto Caeiro

quotes.quote: We seem to inhabit a universe made up of a small number of elements-particles-bits that swirl in chaotic clouds, occasionally clustering together in geometrically logical temporary configurations.
quotes.author: Timothy Leary

quotes.quote: Spiders create cobweb swings on the feather star / Angels fashion cosmic strings on the Steel Guitar
quotes.author: Wallace Dean LaBenne

quotes.quote: The ground we walk on, the plants and creatures, the clouds above constantly dissolving into new formations - each gift of nature possessing its own radiant energy, bound together by cosmic harmony.
quotes.author: Ruth Bernhard

quotes.quote: We are the representatives of the cosmos; we are an example of what hydrogen atoms can do, given 15 billion years of cosmic evolution.
quotes.author: Carl Sagan

quotes.quote: Because there is no cosmic point to the life that each of us perceives on this distant bit of dust at the galaxy's edge... there is all the more reason for us to maintain in proper balance what we have here. Because there is nothing else. Nothing. This is it. And quite enough, all in all.
quotes.author: Gore Vidal

quotes.quote: According to the scientific naturalist version of cosmic history, nature is a permanently closed system of material effects that can never be influenced by something from outside - like God, for example.
quotes.author: Phillip E. Johnson

quotes.quote: We are travelers on a cosmic journey, stardust, swirling and dancing in the eddies and whirlpools of infinity. Life is eternal. We have stopped for a moment to encounter each other, to meet, to love, to share. This is a precious moment. It is a little parenthesis in eternity.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: There comes a time when all the cosmic tumblers have clicked into place - and the universe opens itself up for a few seconds to show you what's possible.
quotes.author: Ray Kinsella

quotes.quote: The ground we walk on, the plants and creatures, the clouds above constantly dissolving into new formations - each gift of nature possessing its own radiant energy, bound together by cosmic harmony.
quotes.author: Ruth Bernhard

quotes.quote: Through no divine design or cosmic plan, we have inherited the mantle of life's caretaker on the earth, the only home we have ever known.
quotes.author: Michael Shermer

quotes.quote: For our hope in the future is cosmic, forging human history into eternity.
quotes.author: David Paul Kirkpatrick

quotes.quote: Costa Rica remains peacefully and firmly committed to the well- being and safety of our population. We promote a model of development based upon harmony with nature; solidarity and social inclusion; economic and trade opening; development of our human resources, and innovation.
quotes.author: Laura Chinchilla

quotes.quote: Peace consists, very largely, in the fact of desiring it with all one's soul. The inhabitants of my small country, Costa Rica, have realized those words by Erasmus. Mine is an unarmed people, whose children have never seen a fighter or a tank or a warship.
quotes.author: Oscar Arias

quotes.quote: During the 41 years that have elapsed since Costa Rica abolished its army, our fundamental freedoms have never been threatened, nor do we know a shameful history or repession.
quotes.author: Óscar Arias

quotes.quote: When I visited Costa Rica earlier this year, I saw how a country can develop successfully without an army, to become a stable democracy committed to peace and the protection of the natural environment. This confirmed my belief that my vision of Tibet in the future is a realistic plan, not merely a dream.
quotes.author: Tenzin Gyatso

quotes.quote: Costa Rica seduced the young solo traveler me in the mid-1990s with visions of tropical beaches, smoking volcanoes, abundant wildlife and friendly locals.
quotes.author: Wendy Yanagihara

quotes.quote: Costa Rica believes in building bridges, in looking for solutions to problems, and not clinging to positions.
quotes.author: Óscar Arias

quotes.quote: The Costa Rican government is prioritizing laying fiber optic over paving roads. Costa Rica is trying to become one of the Internet societies. This is happening throughout the world.
quotes.author: Reed Hastings

quotes.quote: The Costa Rica experience shows that with dedicated resources, creative institutions, and a sound legal framework, deforestation can be reversed and forest cover expanded.
quotes.author: Bruno Stagno Ugarte

quotes.quote: I think it is very important to conserve and protect the natural world. I've just come back from Costa Rica and they are really big on eco tourism. They have lots of reserves, and they are really into protecting wildlife. I visited a reserve called Cabo Blanco. You walk into the reserve and there are capucine monkeys swinging from the trees and sloths. I am big into nature, and seeing animals in their natural habitats. I love it.
quotes.author: Colin Morgan

quotes.quote: I want to thank the pioneering women who years ago opened the doors of politics in Costa Rica. My government will be open to all Costa Ricans of good faith.
quotes.author: Laura Chinchilla

quotes.quote: The bird watching in Costa Rica was awesome and we just started, ... The birds there are gorgeous. It was a great experience.
quotes.author: Howard Schwartz

quotes.quote: We need to basically educate Costa Ricans that they shouldn't cut down the rain forest and should use shadow coffee, which is grown underneath the trees.
quotes.author: Vic Reeves

quotes.quote: Costa Rica is more than a vacation destination; it is an interactive sensory experience.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Dramatic volcanoes, misty cloud forest, and deep river valleys make Costa Rica an ideal destination for the adventure minded.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Costa Rica is more than a vacation destination; it is an interactive sensory experience.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The taxi ride to Monteverde Costa Rica is worth the trip alone. One single lane of rocky road stretches over desolate mountain farmlands littered with cows. My favorite trips are the ones that make you feel like the only person that has ever traveled this path.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Playa Samara was my favorite beach we visited on our Costa Rican trip. The sunsets had to be one of the most colorful displays I have seen in the sky.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Costa Rica, with its tourist-based economy and lack of a national army, has focused on keeping safe its beaches, parks and other public draws. It is one if the safest countries in Central America based on the number of homicides.
quotes.author: Laura Chinchilla

quotes.quote: A palace cannot make you rich but a cottage in the woods can!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: A cottage will hold as much happiness as would stock a palace.
quotes.author: Hamilton Wright Mabie

quotes.quote: In a simple and a peaceful cottage with a beautiful view, you will not be dreaming about the palaces or the heaven, because you already have a perfect thing!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: A hidden wooden cottage is much safer than a solid fortress standing in an obvious place on the hill!.
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Cottage is the palace of humble man!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: There is room in the smallest cottage for a happy loving pair.
quotes.author: Friedrich Schiller

quotes.quote: If you have good neighbours, you can bear living in a bad cottage; if you have bad neighbours, you can't bear living even in a good palace!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: The palace is not safe when the cottage is not happy.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: It's harder for a leader to be born in a palace than to be born in a cabin.
quotes.author: Woodrow Wilson

quotes.quote: There are elements of intrinsic beauty in the simplification of a house built on the log cabin idea.
quotes.author: Gustav Stickley

quotes.quote: The two-storey cottage had four rooms on each floor. A parlor and a kitchen with a gigantic fireplace occupied the first floor along with the servant's bedroom. The upstairs had two large bedrooms and two small rooms.
quotes.author: Abigail Adams

quotes.quote: In one respect old cottages are like old ballads; we have no idea who their authors were. They belong to the countryside, and seem just to have grown there, tinged and coloured by all the local influences of soil and climate.
quotes.author: Stewart Dick

quotes.quote: There is nothing obtrusive about old cottages. They do not dominate the landscape, but are content to be part of it, and to pass unnoticed unless one looks specially for their homely beauties.
quotes.author: Stewart Dick

quotes.quote: Old cottage prefers to nestle snugly in shady valleys. The trees grow closely about it in an intimate, familiar way, and at a little distance only the wreath of curling smoke tells of its presence.
quotes.author: Stewart Dick

quotes.quote: Don't praise a cottage in which you haven't slept yet.
quotes.author: African Proverb

quotes.quote: The distinction of cottages and cabins is a narrow one. However, in the cluster of very individual cottages, each displays evidence of cottage traditions.
quotes.author: Ann Zimmerman

quotes.quote: Industry which dignifies the artist, lifts the swain. And the straw cottage to a palace returns.
quotes.author: John Dyer

quotes.quote: Say the word 'cottage' and it evokes a modest, charmingly imperfect, whimsical home tucked among raucously blooming flowers.
quotes.author: Ann Zimmerman

quotes.quote: The cottage home has been with us for a very long time, but the idea of the cottage has changed dramatically over the centuries— from the humble hovel of the peasant farmer to the modest but enchanting family home or getaway of today.
quotes.author: Jim Tolpin

quotes.quote: At the cottage, doing without television or telephone, 'the family coddled inside this shell closes in on itself, indulging in lots of family storytelling at night that you don't have time for at home.'
quotes.author: Greg Halseth

quotes.quote: When held by the same family for a considerable period of time, the cottage may also come to represent the family, to become 'the home, the gathering place, to which the far-flung family returns each year, to renew contacts and once again experience the fundamental satisfactions of being a family.'
quotes.author: Greg Halseth

quotes.quote: The cottage represents a family seat, a place of belonging and identity...a symbol for the family.
quotes.author: Greg Halseth

quotes.quote: Yet it does house a structured life, for cottage culture has its own traditions and institutions. Like any culture, it has rituals, mythology, codes, traditions, taboos, folklore, totems common to most everyone who holidays at a vacation house.
quotes.author: Greg Halseth

quotes.quote: Ask children to draw a picture of a house and they invariably draw a cottage. That's because the cottage form evokes the ancient storybook dreams of home that we all share.
quotes.author: Jim Tolpin

quotes.quote: A magical, almost mysterious, place that holds us closely within its lovely boundaries, warming and soothing our work-and world-weary souls.
quotes.author: Jim Tolpin

quotes.quote: What seems to be constant is the idea of the cottage as a calm retreat, the place to go to get away from it all— be it a beach cottage overlooking the ocean, a mountain hide-away, a pastoral retreat nestled in the woods or field, or even a thoughtfully built cottage in town.
quotes.author: Jim Tolpin

quotes.quote: In a simple and a peaceful cottage with a beautiful view, you will not be dreaming about the palaces or the heaven, because you already have a perfect thing!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat Ildan

quotes.quote: A palace cannot make you rich but a cottage in the woods can! We become rich only through simpleness and modestness!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat Ildan

quotes.quote: I would rather be poor in a cottage full of books than a king without the desire to read.
quotes.author: Thomas Babington Macaulay

quotes.quote: Self-serving biases and self-centered agendas are cotton jammed in the ears of our conscience. Even if truth shouts, we can’t hear it.
quotes.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quotes.quote: The first time I saw my father-in-law's cotton, I thought of the Original Sin, gardening being the root of the South's downfall.
quotes.author: Michael Lee West

quotes.quote: The white men of the South had better make up their minds that the blacks will remain in the South just as long as corn will tassel and cotton will bloom into whiteness.
quotes.author: Timothy Thomas Fortune

quotes.quote: You dare not make war upon cotton! No power on earth dares make war upon it. Cotton is king.
quotes.author: James H. Hammond

quotes.quote: Abundance will make cotton pull a stone.
quotes.author: Hausan Proverb

quotes.quote: Fire and cotton cannot live in the same place.
quotes.author: Hausan Proverb

quotes.quote: A girl with cotton stockings never sees a mouse.
quotes.author: American Proverb

quotes.quote: Cotton is King; or, the economical relations of slavery.
quotes.author: David Christy

quotes.quote: My parents wanted so much more for my brother... and I. No way we were going to pick cotton. We moved to Harlem where African Americans were progressive.
quotes.author: Evelyn Cunningham

quotes.quote: I am a woman who came from the cotton fields of the South. I was promoted from there to the washtub. Then I was promoted to the cook kitchen, and from there I promoted myself into the business of manufacturing hair goods and preparation.
quotes.author: Madame C.J. Walker

quotes.quote: Machine politics and the spoils system are as much an enemy of a proper and efficient government system of civil service as the boll weevil is of the cotton crop.
quotes.author: William Howard Taft

quotes.quote: Summer time an' the livin' is easy, / Fish are jumpin' an' the cotton is high.
quotes.author: Du Bose Heyward and Ira Gershwin

quotes.quote: Take away time is money, and what is left of England? take away cotton is king, and what is left of America?
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Black people in America, lo these many years, have dug potatoes and toted cotton and lifted bale and sunk the canals and laid the railroad track linking the Atlantic and the Pacific. Indeed, black people helped build America's power and glory.
quotes.author: Vernon Jordan

quotes.quote: [It is] an insatiable farmer who plants cotton on a farm by the stream.
quotes.author: Yoruba Proverb

quotes.quote: Only those whose livelihood depends on Jegede call him a silk-cotton tree.
quotes.author: Yoruba Proverb

quotes.quote: The silk-cotton tree is the father; the person one finds at the hut is the lord.
quotes.author: Yoruba Proverb

quotes.quote: Cotton is what one should plant, not brass; cotton is what one should plant, not beads; as for brass and beads, neither goes with one to the grave; on the day one dies, only cloth accompanies one.
quotes.author: Yoruba Proverb

quotes.quote: I am, somehow, less interested in the weight and convolutions of Einstein’s brain than in the near certainty that people of equal talent have lived and died in cotton fields and sweatshops.
quotes.author: Stephen Jay Gould

quotes.quote: If the assignment calls for a science diorama, just slap some glue on some cotton balls and BANG! The effects of cumulonimbus clouds on sheep, snowmen and... cotton balls. But if you're out of cotton balls, real chunks of the King of Town's beard make a great substitute.
quotes.author: Strong Bad

quotes.quote: Okay, clouds are not made out of cotton candy, bunnies do not talk, and trees do not hug you when you are sad. These are lines you shouldn't be teaching to your children.
quotes.author: Victor Baxter

quotes.quote: We were walkin' in high cotton, / Old times there are not forgotten, / Those fertile fields are never far away, / We were walkin' in high cotton, / Old time there are not forgotten, / Leavin' home was the hardest thing we ever faced.
quotes.author: Scott Anders and Roger Murrah

quotes.quote: My family grew cotton / Cotton was all we knew / Butter came from butterbeans / And it all went in a stew / We lived off our victory garden / And the neighbours did so too / Some years the dust was so ruthless / The cotton was all we grew / When there's no more cane on the grasses / And the oil is gone in the gulf / When the wells are dry on the flatlands / Cotton's all we got / Then the wind will feed the powerlines / Where once it was dust that blew / All along the Chisholm trail / Cotton's all we knew.
quotes.author: Nanci Griffith

quotes.quote: A field of cotton-- / as if the moon / had flowered.
quotes.author: Matsuo Basho

quotes.quote: Boll-weevil's coming, and the winter's cold, / Made cotton-stalks look rusty, seasons old, / And cotton, scarce as any southern snow, / Was vanishing; the branch, so pinched and slow, / Failed in its function as the autumn rake; / Drouth fighting soil had caused the soil to take / All water from the streams; dead birds were found / In wells a hundred feet below the ground-- / Such was the season when the flower bloomed. / Old folks were startled, and it soon assumed / Significance. Superstition saw / Something it had never seen before: / Brown eyes that loved without a trace of fear, / Beauty so sudden for that time of year.
quotes.author: Jean Toomer

quotes.quote: Cotton can take dry weather pretty good and it can take wet weather pretty good. But it has a difficult time going from really, really dry to really, really wet. So the rains we did get were very timely.
quotes.author: Bill Robertson

quotes.quote: Cotton is infected by a range of diseases which can affect the quality of the fibre and seed, as well as the yield and cost of production of the cotton crop.
quotes.author: A.A.Bell

quotes.quote: Cotton is almost pure cellulose, with softness and breathability that have made it the world 's most popular natural fibre.
quotes.author: Herodotus

quotes.quote: Like the cotton-carder who combs tangled cotton into a long bundle of fibre, you take all my knotted fragments and comb them into light.
quotes.author: Kamand Kojouri

quotes.quote: Cotton candy is the most amazing form of caramelization ever invented by man.
quotes.author: Jose Andres

quotes.quote: Giant silk cotton trees grow out of very tiny seeds.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Heaps of good cotton stocks get chopped up from association with the weeds.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Cotton was a force of nature. There's a poetry to it, hoeing and growing cotton.
quotes.author: B. B. King

quotes.quote: Let there be worse cotton and better men.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Hands that picked cotton can now pick the mayor.
quotes.author: Charles Evers

quotes.quote: A pair of brilliantly cut cotton trousers can be more beautiful than a gorgeous silk gown.
quotes.author: Yohji Yamamoto

quotes.quote: Just because you want to wear organic cotton doesn't mean you have to spend an arm and a leg.
quotes.author: Ashlan Gorse Cousteau

quotes.quote: Sometimes, just the act of venting is helpful. Counseling provides a safe haven for precisely that kind of free-ranging release: You can say things in the therapist's office, with the therapist present, that would be incendiary or hurtful in your living room.
quotes.author: Laura Wasser

quotes.quote: It is not fair to ask of others what you are not willing to do yourself.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: There came a time when the risk to remain tight in the bud was more painful than the risk it took to blossom.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.quote: You can't think your way to a new way of acting, you must act your way to a new way of thinking.
quotes.author: David Schnarch

quotes.quote: Rainbows are people whose lives are bright, shining examples for others.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Be an informed advocate and support.
quotes.author: Asa Don Brown

quotes.quote: When we are no longer able to change a situation, we are challenged to change ourselves.
quotes.author: Viktor Frankl

quotes.quote: You must do the thing that you think you cannot do.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: And the trouble is, if you don't risk anything, you risk even more.
quotes.author: Erica Jong

quotes.quote: The best way to predict your future is to create it.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: We can choose to throw stones, to stumble on them, to climb over them, or to build with them.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.quote: We cannot change the cards we are dealt, just how we play the hand.
quotes.author: Randy Pausch

quotes.quote: If you allow yourself to be the person you are then everything will come into rhythm.
quotes.author: John O'Donohue

quotes.quote: Until you make the unconscious conscious, it will direct your life and you will call it fate.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: It's not what happens to you, but how you react to it that matters.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: You can't be right by doing wrong; you can't be wrong by doing right.
quotes.author: Thomas S. Monson

quotes.quote: You don't have to control your thoughts. You just have to stop letting them control you.
quotes.author: Dan Millman

quotes.quote: The important thing is this: to be able, at any moment, to sacrifice what we are for what we could become.
quotes.author: Charles Dubois

quotes.quote: In any given moment, we have two options: to step forward into growth or to step back into safety.
quotes.author: Abraham Maslow

quotes.quote: Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter and those who mind don't matter.
quotes.author: Seuss

quotes.quote: There is no greater agony than bearing an untold story inside you.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Don't let mental blocks control you. Set yourself free. Confront your fear and turn the mental blocks into building blocks.
quotes.author: Roopleen

quotes.quote: We are sent into the world to live to the full everything that awakens within us and everything that comes toward us.
quotes.author: John O'Donohue

quotes.quote: Life does not put things in front of you that you are unable to handle.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Real happiness provides you the confidence that you never thought was obtainable.
quotes.author: Asa Don Brown

quotes.quote: Whatever you fight, you strengthen, and what you resist, persists.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: If it is a first offense, you ground them and have a talk. The second offense would call for counseling.
quotes.author: Alan Thicke

quotes.quote: You have brains in your head. You have feet in your shoes. You can steer yourself any direction you choose.
quotes.author: Seuss

quotes.quote: The secret to change is to focus all of your energy, not on fighting the old, but on building the new.
quotes.author: Dan Millman

quotes.quote: It's easy to feel equal to wanting. It's rare to feel equal to having.
quotes.author: Helen Humphreys

quotes.quote: The most effective way to do it, is to do it.
quotes.author: Amelia Earhart

quotes.quote: The difference between perseverance and obstinancy is that one often comes from a strong will, and the other from a strong won't.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: When we talk about our feelings, they become less overwhelming, less upsetting, and less scary.
quotes.author: Fred Rogers

quotes.quote: Preaching is personal counseling on a group basis.
quotes.author: Harry Emerson Fosdick

quotes.quote: If it's free, it's advice. If you pay for it, it's counseling. If you can use either one, it's a miracle.
quotes.author: Jack Adams

quotes.quote: Biblical counseling is listening to a person long enough until you hear a violation of scripture.
quotes.author: Henry R Brandt

quotes.quote: The fish in the water that is thirsty needs serious professional counseling.
quotes.author: Kabir

quotes.quote: Counseling has to do with intuition, with work on oneself, with the quietness of one's mind and the openness of one's heart.
quotes.author: Ram Dass

quotes.quote: I love to keep busy. But I never forget it's the countdown that made it all possible.
quotes.author: Casey Kasem

quotes.quote: You staying home all alone on New Year's Eve? Unthinkable. Take my advice ... the countdown should be shared with someone, or it's just another set of numbers passing you by.
quotes.author: E.A. Bucchianeri

quotes.quote: Our lives have a countdown clock that we can't see. Mine reminds me to only do work that matters.
quotes.author: Donald Miller

quotes.quote: The feeling I have reminds me of New Year’s Eve, when the countdown is coming and I’m not quite sure whether to grab my camera or just live in the moment. Usually I grab the camera and later regret it when the picture doesn’t turn out. Then I feel enormously let down and think to myself that the night would have been more fun if it didn’t mean quite so much, if I weren’t forced to analyze where I’ve been and where I’m going.
quotes.author: Emily Giffin

quotes.quote: Live each day as if it were a gift. And, actually, it is.
quotes.author: Nina Lesowitz

quotes.quote: While knowledge helps us understand how limited our time is, wisdom comes from embracing the finite. I encourage you to celebrate every birthday like a teen counting down the days to their inevitable independence. Celebrate like someone who just turned old enough to legally have a drink. Celebrate like somebody who gets to start collecting social security this year. Just celebrate. Life is too short, dammit!
quotes.author: James Scheibli

quotes.quote: Then the Chinese whisper of a countdown spreads across the crowd, first to be lit by a century's morning, mad to say they were there and then when the moment came, wild for the starlight that passes for meaning.
quotes.author: Simon Armitage

quotes.quote: 30 years old isn’t my countdown but every day is the countdown of my life— forever is too short, there are too many things I want to do, I’m being too greedy again.
quotes.author: Yixing

quotes.quote: Every tick of the clock... is life counting down!
quotes.author: Funbi Fred-Addo

quotes.quote: Lost time Is never found again.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: No, no, no. The countdown is for me. Withholding the precise deadline, I'm gonna apply the emotional pressure more evenly where possible. Please give me an explicit verbal indication of your anxiety levels. I can't always read them from your behavior.
quotes.author: Eurus Holmes

quotes.quote: Is the Armageddon / Finally here at last / You may see the mushroom / But you won't hear the blast / Don't need a self made prophet / Don't need a holy war / Don't need another D-day / To even up the score / I'm cursed with living on a goldmine / The doomsday clock was built by mankind / No place to run / Countdown's begun
quotes.author: Ozzy Osbourne

quotes.quote: Countdown, counting down for me / All roads are leading to your town / And it's some place I've never been / Countdown, counting down for me / Please don't seduce me with your smile / Because I'm only human / Countdown to you
quotes.author: Mark McKernan

quotes.quote: I'm waiting on the countdown / Sitting in the shade / Things about to turn around / How the madness fades / Oh, I've been waiting on the countdown / Things about to turn around / And now I'm out of the lost and found / Just waiting on the countdown / Time slips away / Oh, this feeling lingers / Right here I'm going to stay / I've been waiting on the countdown / Things about to turn around / And now I'm out of the lost and found / Just waiting on the countdown / So I'm sitting in the shade / Under the dreaming tree / Now the madness fades / Right here I'm going to be / Oh, I've been waiting on the countdown / Things about to turn around / And now I'm out of the lost and found / Just waiting on the countdown
quotes.author: Lindsey Buckingham

quotes.quote: Countdown's dawn / And we'll sway along with the band / Just one more dance / May all your dreams come true / And it could be the time of your life / Everything's gonna turn out alright / It'll be okay, in every way makin' it better / It's New Year's Day / New Year's Day
quotes.author: Guy Chambers

quotes.quote: Ne'er ask the hour -- what is it to us / How Time deals out his treasures? / The golden moments lent us thus / Are not his coin, but Pleasure's. / If counting them o'er could add to their blisses, / I'd number each glorious second: / But moments of joy are, like Lesbia's kisses, / Too quick and sweet to be reckon'd. / Then fill the cup -- what is it to us / How time his circle measures? / The fairy hours we call up thus / Obey no wand but Pleasure's.
quotes.author: Thomas Moore

quotes.quote: I miss the old you / where did my lover go / did I lose you in the mist of our love growing into something beautiful / a lifetime of endless love and forgiveness / where did we go wrong / did we mistreat our hearts out of love / I miss you everyday / so close to me but millions of galaxies away / I'm counting down the days when we reconnect our souls and create an eternal bond together / till then I will miss the old you my lover
quotes.author: Lady Diana

quotes.quote: The night too quickly passes / And we are growing old, / So let us fill our glasses / And toast the Days of Gold; / When finds of wondrous treasure / Set all the South ablaze, / And you and I were faithful mates / All through the roaring days!
quotes.author: Henry Lawson

quotes.quote: I count the days until I see you, dear, / But the days only. / I dare not reckon up the nights and hours / I shall be lonely. / But when at last I meet you, dearest heart, / How can it cheer me? / Desire has power to turn me into stone, / When you come near me. / I give my heart the lie against my will, / Seem not to see you, / Glance aside quickly if I meet your eye, / Love you and flee you.
quotes.author: Lesbia Harford

quotes.quote: Your life is not a countdown to your death, but a stepping stone for the lives that will live after you. Squander today, and you will find yourself useless tomorrow.
quotes.author: A.J. Darkholme

quotes.quote: Twelve down, like a hundred thousand left to go.
quotes.author: Pittacus Lore

quotes.quote: When does money run out of time? The countdown begins when investable assets pose too much risk for too little return; when lenders desert credit markets for other alternatives such as cash or real assets.
quotes.author: Bill Gross

quotes.quote: We know story collections end when they end, as well â€“ the pages serving as a countdown â€“ but nevertheless the standard story anthology hews closer to what makes being human so hard: it reminds you with each story how quickly everything we are, everything we call our lives can change, can be upended, can disappear. Never to return.
quotes.author: Junot Diaz

quotes.quote: Time was meaningless, except each moment was a countdown to the end.
quotes.author: Lisa Henry

quotes.quote: I'm still a farm boy at heart. If I hadn't suffered from asthma as a child, I would be a farmer today.
quotes.author: Jim Davis

quotes.quote: I'm a country boy at heart. I love it when you've got your boots on and you're standing in three inches of cow muck.
quotes.author: Alastair Cook

quotes.quote: You have to understand, now, I'm a momma's boy. I'm from the south. My way of being raised is totally different than the big city life. I truly was a country boy.
quotes.author: Terry Bradshaw

quotes.quote: I am a country boy and proud of it.
quotes.author: Lionel Richie

quotes.quote: Being an old farm boy myself, chickens coming home to roost never did make me sad; they've always made me glad.
quotes.author: Malcolm X

quotes.quote: In the beginning, I tried to be a more cosmopolitan writer, but I realized that I was a country boy, and I had to deal with things I knew about and where I came from.
quotes.author: Ernest Gaines

quotes.quote: Myself, I'm just a simple country boy who spent time on the streets and developed a style of writing and rapping and a cool sound that people seem to enjoy.
quotes.author: Big Smo

quotes.quote: I'm a country boy. I hate New York. But that's where things happen, so I use it as a base for stories, I know enough about it. But I have to keep going back there.
quotes.author: Mickey Spillane

quotes.quote: I see myself as half country boy and half city boy, so I need both to balance me out. I couldn't spend all of my time in either place.
quotes.author: Johnny Iuzzini

quotes.quote: I was a typical farm boy. I liked the farm. I enjoyed the things that you do on a farm, go down to the drainage ditch and fish, and look at the crawfish and pick a little cotton.
quotes.author: Sam Donaldson

quotes.quote: You sure look good, sittin' in my right seat / Buckle up, and I'll take you through the five speeds / Wind it up, or I can slow it way down / In the woods or right uptown / I'm a country boy, I've got a four-wheel drive
quotes.author: Allan Jackson

quotes.quote: Well life on the farm is kinda laid back / Ain't much an old country boy like me can't hack / It's early to rise, early in the sack / Thank god I'm a country boy
quotes.author: John Martin Sommers

quotes.quote: Well a simple kinda life never did me no harm / A raisin' me a family and workin' on a farm / My days are all filled with an easy country charm / Thank god I'm a country boy
quotes.author: John Martin Sommers

quotes.quote: Well I got me a fine wife I got me a fiddle / When the sun's comin' up I got cakes on the griddle / Life ain't nothin' but a funy funny riddle / Thank god I'm a country boy
quotes.author: John Martin Sommers

quotes.quote: Country boy, ain't got no shoes / Country boy, ain't got no blues / Well, you work all day / While you're wantin' to play / In the sun and the sand / With a face that's tan.
quotes.author: Johnny Cash

quotes.quote: Country boy, ain't got no ills / Country boy, don't owe no bills / You get a wiggly worm / And then you watch him squirm.
quotes.author: Johnny Cash

quotes.quote: Bob liked to ride a donkey and, you know, go to the fields with Mary's Grandfather and things like that; because, he's a country boy, you know.
quotes.author: Kevin Macdonald

quotes.quote: It was an improbable romance. He was a country boy. She was from the city. She had the world at her feet, while he didn't have two dimes to rub together.
quotes.author: Jeremy Leven

quotes.quote: Gilbert Burton was a country boy who had just come to the big city to make a fortune. He was willing to start at the bottom, and that's just what he did.
quotes.author: Jack Roche

quotes.quote: I better have my lawyer take a look at these. I'm just a simple country boy. There's all kinds of big words in here I can't even pronounce. Hell, you might be takin' me to the cleaners for all I know.
quotes.author: Douglas J. Eboch

quotes.quote: In town or country, however pleasant it may be to be running about and playing, it is necessary still to go to school; and whether in town or country, school furnishes some of the most strong and marked days of a lad's life.
quotes.author: William Howitt

quotes.quote: A clever country lad never wants employment.
quotes.author: William Howitt

quotes.quote: Progress of a country boy in horsemanship by riding sticks, boughs, turnstiles, asses, cows, horses, etc.
quotes.author: William Howitt

quotes.quote: From New Zealand pubs to Iowa farms, Country Boys provides compelling evidence that rural masculinity matters.
quotes.author: Carolyn Sachs

quotes.quote: Country Boys contributes to the exciting scholarly field of masculinity studies and to studies of rural places.
quotes.author: Carolyn Sachs

quotes.quote: Between the colonial period and 1925, the average American boy was a farm boy.
quotes.author: Priscilla Ferguson Clement

quotes.quote: Nineteenth-century, urban, middle-class children increasingly turned their attention to school and to play, farm boys remained integral to their families economic survival well into the twentieth century.
quotes.author: Priscilla Ferguson Clement

quotes.quote: To be a farm boy was to be a worker, first and foremost.
quotes.author: Priscilla Ferguson Clement

quotes.quote: Beyond work, farm boys often achieved only a limited schooling and had to entertain themselves with the resources of the land surrounding them.
quotes.author: Priscilla Ferguson Clement

quotes.quote: All farm children began work at an early age, and in their first 6 or 7 years, boys and girls of ten did the same tasks.
quotes.author: Priscilla Ferguson Clement

quotes.quote: I'm a country boy, so I really appreciate the country. I love fishing, so I fish between takes on set. During lunch, I go for a fish.
quotes.author: Travis Fimmel

quotes.quote: I don't like crying. I'm a country boy, and we're the product of our upbringing. As a boy, I was told that men don't cry.
quotes.author: Andrea Bocelli

quotes.quote: True cowboys Are The ones who aren't afraid to get dirty.
quotes.author: Lane Frost

quotes.quote: I am just an old country boy in a big town trying to get along. I have been eating pretty regular and the reason I have been is because I have stayed an old country boy.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: I'm a country boy who hasn't really been exposed to city living, and it throws me.
quotes.author: Randy Moss

quotes.quote: I'm a country boy. I grew up kicking around the woods, riding dirt bikes, playing football, climbing rocks and all that good stuff, so that's always been fun.
quotes.author: Taylor Kinney

quotes.quote: You can't take the New York out of the girl. It's like a little country girl coming to the big city.
quotes.author: Randee Heller

quotes.quote: I'm a country girl. I have to be in nature, so my daughter is exposed to it a lot.
quotes.author: Salma Hayek

quotes.quote: I grew up in Nashville, born and raised. I'm a country girl, and I love country music. I had a dream I was going to be the first black female country music star, but then that wasn't the case.
quotes.author: Adrienne C. Moore

quotes.quote: I like sundresses with cowboy boots, little shorts with big wedge heels and a big piece of turquoise. I also love classic, Old Hollywood romantic styles. I'm 'country girl meets city girl' circa 1930.
quotes.author: Kirsten Prout

quotes.quote: I grew up like a lot of country boys and girls do - amongst the pine trees, dirt roads, farms, mules and people who were real.
quotes.author: Josh Turner

quotes.quote: I don't give any merit to criticism. 'Country Girls (Shake it for Me),' I can see where people view that as sexist, but I just view that as having fun.
quotes.author: Luke Bryan

quotes.quote: I am fortunate: my parents told me the world was my oyster, when they could have said I wouldn't make it for a lot of reasons - rural, girl, small African country. So, no regrets.
quotes.author: Dambisa Moyo

quotes.quote: I suffered from some delusion that I wanted to be an English country girl, a Sloane Ranger donning the old Hunter boots and Barbour jacket to slosh around in mud with the Range Rover.
quotes.author: Christine McVie

quotes.quote: As a farm girl, even when I was quite young, I had my 'farm chores' - but I had time also to be alone, to explore the fields, woods and creek side. And to read.
quotes.author: Joyce Carol Oates

quotes.quote: I'm a simple, country, small-town girl at heart. I try and stick to the values that I learned as a child, and I lead my life as such.
quotes.author: Tori Bowie

quotes.quote: I might have been born a country girl, but I'll take the city every time.
quotes.author: Bruce Lansbury

quotes.quote: Too bad you didn't notice the sleeve gun, but after all, you're just a little country girl from San Francisco.
quotes.author: Richard O'Connor

quotes.quote: Mummy, maybe a trip to the outback will help me get over this little... phase I'm going through. And you never know, I might meet some lovely country girl.
quotes.author: Stephan Elliott

quotes.quote: And we know a cow when we see one. Don't underestimate us farm girls.
quotes.author: Steve Antin

quotes.quote: She wears loafer shoes, a dungaree / Red jacket shirt if you please / My boogie woogie, boogie woogie, boogie woogie country girl / Well, I mean what I mean, my boogie woogie country girl
quotes.author: Doc Pomus

quotes.quote: On Saturday night she comes to town / She plays the jukebox, let her hair hung down / My boogie woogie, boogie woogie, boogie woogie country girl / Well, I mean what I mean, my boogie woogie country girl / Let 'em roll
quotes.author: Doc Pomus

quotes.quote: Yeah, swing it man, I like a good rockin' band / Yeah, we need to knock a-knockin' / And I love to rock a-rockin / Yeah, my boogie, boogie woogie country girl
quotes.author: Doc Pomus

quotes.quote: I was born a country girl I will die a country girl / My world is made of blue skies and sunshine green fields and butterflies
quotes.author: Alan Hawkshaw

quotes.quote: I'm so glad I'm a country girl / Birds sing good morning country girl I sleep to the sounds of a whippoorwill
quotes.author: Alan Hawkshaw

quotes.quote: My day is made with puppies and kittens meadows and daisies / I'm so glad I'm a country girl
quotes.author: Alan Hawkshaw

quotes.quote: Growing up on a farm gave me a wealth of knowledge and experience that would be hard to gain in any other way.
quotes.author: Wanda Joyce Yohn

quotes.quote: There was always a sense of work and reward. A work ethic developed on the farm is never dimmed.
quotes.author: Wanda Joyce Yohn

quotes.quote: Being the farm girl that I am, one who loves farm-fresh eggs, I include tips on preserving and cooking with fresh eggs in every chapter.
quotes.author: Ann Accetta-Scott

quotes.quote: Being half Asian, I grew up consuming fermented foods, and I have watched my mother ferment items such as various types of kimchi and blue crab throughout my childhood.
quotes.author: Ann Accetta-Scott

quotes.quote: Research shows that women farmers often have less access than men farmers do to information, technology, inputs, land and markets.
quotes.author: Barbara Herz

quotes.quote: The country girl is an important figure in the broad field of Australian popular drama.
quotes.author: Catherine Driscoll

quotes.quote: In Australian television drama, 'the country girl' has been a remarkably consistent character, but she is not singular.
quotes.author: Catherine Driscoll

quotes.quote: Like the modern idea of the country, the modern idea of girlhood differs from that which preceded it.
quotes.author: Catherine Driscoll

quotes.quote: In a Korean drama the country girl is likely to marry a millionaire or become a pop star in the city.
quotes.author: Catherine Driscoll

quotes.quote: The country girl is a figure for a sense of distance from modernity that is proper to modernity itself.
quotes.author: Catherine Driscoll

quotes.quote: Although no one believes me, I have always been a country girl and still have a country girl's values
quotes.author: Ava Gardner

quotes.quote: Puttin' on a cowboy hat & a pair of boots doesn't make you country; Like puttin' on a ball gown & glass heels won't make me Cinderella.
quotes.author: Kellie Elmore

quotes.quote: Talkin, true blue, out in the woods, down home, country girl.
quotes.author: Jason Aldean

quotes.quote: If you can find a nice pretty country girl that can cook and carries her bible, now there's a woman.
quotes.author: Phil Robertson

quotes.quote: Better to be strong than pretty and useless.
quotes.author: Lilith Saintcrow

quotes.quote: A country girl can talk her way out of a ticket.
quotes.author: Kellie Pickler

quotes.quote: City life is no life for a country man; for such a man that life is a kind of damnation in itself.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: The whole race of scribblers flies from the town and yearns for country life.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: One gets, sensitive about losing mornings after getting a little used to them with living in a country. Each one of these endlessly varied daybreaks is an opera but once performed.
quotes.author: Nathaniel Parker Willis

quotes.quote: City people make most of the fuss about the charms of country life.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: Being in the country is like being in a dream, one doesn't quite know who one is. There is an anonymity to it all, that strange human creature that is me, one among all.
quotes.author: Meia Geddes

quotes.quote: I live not in myself, but I become Portion of that around me; and to me High mountains are a feeling, but the hum Of human cities torture.
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.quote: There is a vast deal of make-believe in the carefully nurtured sentiment for country life, and the barefoot boy, and the mountain girl.
quotes.author: Agnes Repplier

quotes.quote: Warm familiar scents drift softly from the oven, and imprint forever upon our hearts that this is home and that we are loved.
quotes.author: Arlene Stafford-Wilson

quotes.quote: The city, no matter how small, is corrupt and unrepentant, while the sun shines brighter in the country, making people more wholesome.
quotes.author: Lori Lansens

quotes.quote: Cow dung and horse dung, as muck goes, are relatively agreeable. You can even become nostalgic about them. They smell of fermented grain, and on the far side of their smell there is hay and grass.
quotes.author: John Berger

quotes.quote: Country life has its advantages, he used to say. You sit on the veranda drinking tea and your ducklings swim on the pond, and everything smells good and there are gooseberries.
quotes.author: Anton Chekhov

quotes.quote: The milking machines sounded tranquilizing, and there was the collegiality of seventy animal spirits thriving, warming the barn with cud-chewing, nose-snuffling, and sisterly mammalhood.
quotes.author: Edward Hoagland

quotes.quote: The country is lyric, the town dramatic. When mingled, they make the most perfect musical drama.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: God made the country, and man made the town.
quotes.author: William Cowper

quotes.quote: The city reveals the moral ends of being, and sets the awful problem of life. The country soothes us, refreshes us, lifts us up with religious suggestion.
quotes.author: Edwin Hubbel Chapin

quotes.quote: Not by human dwellings not in crowded cities alone, are the sights and sounds of life. The wildest places of the earth are full of them.
quotes.author: Solomon Northup

quotes.quote: What she did was to open our eyes to details of country life such as teaching us names of wild flowers and getting us to draw and paint and learn poetry.
quotes.author: Laurie Lee

quotes.quote: If country life be healthful to the body, it is no less so to the mind.
quotes.author: Giovanni Ruffini

quotes.quote: Throw your dreams into space like a kite, and you do not know what it will bring back, a new life, a new friend, a new love, a new country.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.quote: And it never failed that during the dry years the people forgot about the rich years, and during the wet years they lost all memory of the dry years. It was always that way.
quotes.author: John Steinbeck

quotes.quote: Sir, when you have seen one green field, you have seen all green fields. Let us walk down Cheapside.
quotes.author: Johnson

quotes.quote: The country life is to be preferred, for there we see the works of God; but in cities little else but the works of men. And the one makes a better subject for contemplation than the other.
quotes.author: William Penn

quotes.quote: I consider it the best part of an education to have been born and brought up in the country.
quotes.author: Amos Bronson Alcott

quotes.quote: Anybody can be good in the country. There are no temptations there.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Country things are the necessary root of our life and that remains true even of a rootless and tragically urban civilization. To live permanently away from the country is a form of slow death.
quotes.author: Esther Meynell

quotes.quote: Scenes must be beautiful which daily view'd. Please daily, and whose novelty survives .Long knowledge and the scrutiny of years.
quotes.author: William Cowper

quotes.quote: A contrast between country and city, as fundamental ways of life, reaches back into classical times.
quotes.author: Raymond Williams

quotes.quote: The country habit has me by the heart.
quotes.author: Vita Sackville West

quotes.quote: I lived in solitude in the country and noticed how the monotony of a quiet life stimulates the creative mind.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: This pure air braces the listless nerves, and warms the blood: I feel in freedom here.
quotes.author: Joanna Baillie

quotes.quote: There is virtue in country houses, in gardens and orchards, in fields, streams, and groves, in rustic recreations and plain manners, that neither cities nor universities enjoy.
quotes.author: Amos Bronson Alcott

quotes.quote: Knowledge and power in the city; peace and decency in the country.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: He who marries a wife reared on the land marries strength and purity and compassion.
quotes.author: Beecher

quotes.quote: Far from the gay cities, and the ways of men.
quotes.author: Homer

quotes.quote: We need only to close our eyes and we are back on the Third Line, walking up the lane, through the yard and entering the bright, warm kitchen. We are home again.
quotes.author: Arlene Stafford-Wilson

quotes.quote: There is nothing good to be had in the country, or, if there be, they will not let you have it.
quotes.author: William Hazlitt
