quotes.quote: Men are taught virtue and a love of independence by living in the country.
quotes.author: Menander

quotes.quote: In cities no one is quiet but many are lonely; in the country, people are quiet but few are lonely.
quotes.author: Geoffrey F. Fisher

quotes.quote: Nor rural sights alone, but rural sounds, exhilirate the spirit, and restore the tone of languid nature.
quotes.author: William Cowper

quotes.quote: I think the jokes would have been a bit broader and a bit more obvious in terms of the day-to-day of country life.
quotes.author: Simon Pegg

quotes.quote: Nothing ages a woman like living in the country.
quotes.author: Sidonie-Gabrielle Colette

quotes.quote: I suppose the pleasure of country life lies really in the eternally renewed evidences of the determination to live.
quotes.author: Vita Sackville-West

quotes.quote: Once wealth and beauty are gone, there is always rural life.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: People have a tendency to see country life through rose-colored glasses.
quotes.author: PJ Harvey

quotes.quote: The country is laid out in a haphazard, sloppy fashion, offensive to the tidy, organized mind.
quotes.author: Alan Brien

quotes.quote: Country acquaintances are charming only in the country and only in the summer. In the city in winter they lose half of their appeal.
quotes.author: Anton Chekhov

quotes.quote: No, in country money, the country scale of gain, The requisite lift of spirit has never been found.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: The old brown hen and the old blue sky, Between the two we live and die The broken cartwheel on the hill.
quotes.author: Wallace Stevens

quotes.quote: In isolated or country places no man's life is safe.
quotes.author: John White Geary

quotes.quote: True country music is honesty, sincerity, and real life to the hilt.
quotes.author: Garth Brooks

quotes.quote: To preserve the lives of citizens, is the greatest virtue in the father of his country.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: In the country, without any interference from the law, the agricultural life favors the permanence of families.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Improving the quality of life for people of this country is perhaps the most important duty of Government.
quotes.author: John Prescott

quotes.quote: In this republican country, amid the fluctuating waves of our social life, somebody is always at the drowning point.
quotes.author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quotes.quote: This race and this country and this life produced me, he said. I shall express myself as I am.
quotes.author: James Joyce

quotes.quote: Culture of life is really important for a country to have if it's going to be a hospitable society.
quotes.author: George W. Bush

quotes.quote: Developed country is one that allows all its citizens to enjoy a free and healthy life in a safe environment.
quotes.author: Kofi Annan

quotes.quote: At a moment that comes rarely in the life of a country. It is a time when destiny is ours to hold.
quotes.author: Paul Martin

quotes.quote: A first walk in any new country is one of the things which make life on this planet worth being grateful for.
quotes.author: Charles William Beebe

quotes.quote: There is nothing more beautiful than cheerfulness in an old face, and among country people it is always a sign of a well regulated life.
quotes.author: Richter

quotes.quote: There is always inequality in life. Some men are killed in a war and some men are wounded and some men never leave the country. Life is unfair.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: I hate the countrie's dirt and manners, yet I love the silence. I embrace the wit. A courtship, flowing here in full tide. But loathe the expense, the vanity and pride. No place each way is happy.
quotes.author: William Habington

quotes.quote: I travel not to go anywhere, but to go. I travel for travel's sake. The great affair is to move.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: Certainly, travel is more than the seeing of sights; it is a change that goes on, deep and permanent, in the ideas of living.
quotes.author: Mary Ritter Beard

quotes.quote: All of us we should do everything we can to make sure this country lives up to our children's expectations.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: English country life is more like Chekhov than The Archers or Thomas Hardy or even the Updike ethic with which it is sometimes compared.
quotes.author: Jane Gardam

quotes.quote: There is a city myth that country life was isolated and lonely. The truth is that farmers and their families then had a richer social life than they have now. They enjoyed a society organic, satisfying and whole, not mixed and thinned with the life of town, city and nation as it now is.
quotes.author: Rose Wilder Lane

quotes.quote: The manner of the country makes the usage of life there, and the land will not be lived in except in its own fashion.
quotes.author: Mary Austin

quotes.quote: Them Injuns. Takin the country off em. In good times it must've been a fine life they had, huntin and fishin or driftin down the country on the trail of the buffalo. I ain't sure what we'll do to the country will be any better.
quotes.author: Louis L'Amour

quotes.quote: In the country one sees only nature's fair works, and one's soul is not saddened by the cruel struggle for mere existence that goes on in the crowded city.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Of the whole sum of human life no small part is that which consists of a man's relations to his country, and his feelings concerning it.
quotes.author: Gladstone

quotes.quote: Here is your country. Cherish these natural wonders, cherish the natural resources, cherish the history and romance as a sacred heritage, for your children and your children's children. Do not let selfish men or greedy interests skin your country of its beauty, its riches or its romance.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The love of one's country is a splendid thing. But why should love stop at the border?
quotes.author: Pablo Casals

quotes.quote: Patriotism is a thing of the heart. A man is a patriot if his heart beats true to his country.
quotes.author: Charles Edward Jefferson

quotes.quote: Patriotism is love of country. But you can't love your country without loving your countrymen and countrywomen. We don't always have to agree, but we must empower each other, we must find the common ground, we must build bridges across our differences to pursue the common good.
quotes.author: Cory Booker

quotes.quote: My dear, my native soil! For whom my warmest wish to heav'n is sent, long may thy hardy sons of rustic toil be blest with health, and peace, and sweet content!
quotes.author: Robert Burns

quotes.quote: Loyalty to country always. Loyalty to government, when it deserves it.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: What a strange development of patriotism that turns a thinking being into a loyal machine!
quotes.author: Emma Goldman

quotes.quote: Patriotism is not the same as nationalism, because love of country is not the same as worship of country.
quotes.author: John Chandler

quotes.quote: Patriots always talk of dying for their country but never of killing for their country.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: They wrote in the old days that it is sweet and fitting to die for one's country. But in modern war, there is nothing sweet nor fitting in your dying. You will die like a dog for no good reason.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: There ought to be system of manners in every nation which a well-formed mind would be disposed to relish. To make us love our country, our country ought to be lovely.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: True patriotism hates injustice in its own land more than anywhere else.
quotes.author: Clarence Darrow

quotes.quote: I can't but say it is an awkward sight to see one's native land receding through the growing waters; it unmans one quite, especially when life is rather new.
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.quote: I am an American; free born and free bred, where I acknowledge no man as my superior, except for his own worth, or as my inferior, except for his own demerit.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Our country is not the only thing to which we owe our allegiance. It is also owed to justice and to humanity. Patriotism consists not in waving the flag, but in striving that our country shall be righteous as well as strong.
quotes.author: James Bryce

quotes.quote: Patriotism is your conviction that this country is superior to all other countries because you were born in it.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Patriotism is a salt against rottenness, a glorious spur to high endeavour; it recovers the half-obliterated virtue of loyalty, calls every man to service, and ennobles great and small alike.
quotes.author: Percy Dearmer

quotes.quote: I like to see a man proud of the place in which he lives. I like to see a man live so that his place will be proud of him.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: The patriot volunteer, fighting for country and his rights, makes the most reliable soldier on earth.
quotes.author: Stonewall Jackson

quotes.quote: It is not always the same thing to be a good man and a good citizen.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: If we love our country, we should also love our countrymen.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: It is the love of country that has lighted and that keeps glowing the holy fire of patriotism.
quotes.author: J. Horace Mcfarland

quotes.quote: It is sweet to serve one's country by deeds, and it is not absurd to serve her by words.
quotes.author: Sallust

quotes.quote: Patriotism is when love of your own people comes first; nationalism, when hate for people other than your own comes first.
quotes.author: Charles De Gaulle

quotes.quote: Our country is wherever we are well off.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: How often we fail to realize our good fortune in living in a country where happiness is more than a lack of tragedy.
quotes.author: Paul Sweeney

quotes.quote: The essence of patriotism is the sacrifice of personal interest to public welfare.
quotes.author: William H. Burnham

quotes.quote: A patriot must always be ready to defend his country against his government.
quotes.author: Edward Abbey

quotes.quote: To be really cosmopolitan a man must be at home even in his own country.
quotes.author: Thomas Wentworth Higginson

quotes.quote: Fighting corruption is not just good governance. It's self-defense. It's patriotism.
quotes.author: Joe Biden

quotes.quote: A uniform does not make a soldier. A soldier is someone who is willing to stand up and fight for what he believes in. Be it his God, his country or his friends. And it does not matter if you are black, white, red, yellow, male, female, straight or gay. We all bleed the same.
quotes.author: Art Edler Brown

quotes.quote: I love my country. I'd kill for it and I'd die for it. It's in my nature.
quotes.author: Hadi Hajaig

quotes.quote: Patriotism is a virtue of the vicious.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: You'd lay your life down for this country / Lay it down for fools like me / I know, I know, I know you would / You'd make the ultimate sacrifice / Lose yourself on a throw of the dice
quotes.author: Charles Stobo Reid

quotes.quote: And the line he comes from stretches back / In an unbroken chain other countries lack / In the farthest corners of the world / Where he's watched our banners being unfurled / He's won and lost and battled on / Whether his cause was right or wrong
quotes.author: Charles Stobo Reid

quotes.quote: No more war, it's not gonna happen / Not while there's men / willing to fight in them / No more war, it's not gonna happen / Not while there's patriotism
quotes.author: Charles Stobo Reid

quotes.quote: Patriotism means having a strong love for and pride in your country.People have strong feelings for their country because it is where they live.
quotes.author: John LaMachia

quotes.quote: Patriotism is also a desire to support your country by making lawas and show respect for their country.
quotes.author: John LaMachia

quotes.quote: Patriots also honor their country by setting a good example for others to follow.
quotes.author: John LaMachia

quotes.quote: Religious patriotism attaches man to his country by a sacred tie. He must love it as he loves his religion, and obey it as he obeys his God.
quotes.author: Maurizio Viroli

quotes.quote: Patriotism in the republican sense of love of common liberty that makes men generous, capable of seeing their private and particular interests as part of the common goodm, and willing to fight vigorously for their republic.
quotes.author: Maurizio Viroli

quotes.quote: Both the moral obligation and love of country have, however, their limits which are defined by the very nature of the love.
quotes.author: Maurizio Viroli

quotes.quote: When love of country fades, virtue remains, but it becomes brute force, courage, and resolution; it becomes a virtue that no longer sustains liberty but destroys it.
quotes.author: Maurizio Viroli

quotes.quote: The weakening of patriotism wan then the cause of the loss of liberty and also of the decay of morals.
quotes.author: Maurizio Viroli

quotes.quote: Patriotism is unquestionably a high moral virtue, and to call a person patriot - better still, a true patriot - is the greatest of compliments.
quotes.author: John Kleinig

quotes.quote: The morality of patriotism is intimately connected with controversies concerning such topics as character and motivation, human nature, citizenship, the role of the state, political identity and obligation, and the basic structure of morality.
quotes.author: John Kleinig

quotes.quote: Patriotism is not free-floating - one does not start off as patriotic and then look for a country.
quotes.author: John Kleinig

quotes.quote: The person who wishes that there was a country about which he could feel patriotic is not patriotic, even though he would like to be.
quotes.author: John Kleinig

quotes.quote: Some see patriotism as a virtue, or a moral requirement, or even as the moral requirement, the fount and bedrock of all morality.
quotes.author: Library of Congress

quotes.quote: Patriotism, then, is love of one's country, identification with it, and special concern for its well-being and that of compatriots.
quotes.author: Library of Congress

quotes.quote: Patriotism is the last refuge of the scoundrel.
quotes.author: Dr. Johnson Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: Patriotism involves a special concern for one's country, but that this concern need not to be unconstrained, nor exclusive and aggressive.
quotes.author: Library of Congress

quotes.quote: True patriots believe that what enables a free society to remain strong is a set of traditional virtues and values.
quotes.author: Eric Liu

quotes.quote: Patriotism involves anb endorsement of some aspect of your country that you take to be central, distinctive, and enduring.
quotes.author: Simon Keller

quotes.quote: A patriot may salute the flag, sing the national anthem, wear national dress, cook national dish, and cheer for her country's sporting teams.
quotes.author: Simon Keller

quotes.quote: A patriot may choose to give up professional opportunities overseas in order to stay in her country, she may lie or cheat to protect her country, and she may kill or die for her country, all as expressions of patriotism.
quotes.author: Simon Keller

quotes.quote: There are no particular acts that are necessary for patriotism.
quotes.author: Simon Keller

quotes.quote: Patriotism is not a trivial matter. Patriotism is not a mere indulgence.
quotes.author: Simon Keller

quotes.quote: Patriotism is not for those who represent wealth and power.
quotes.author: Emma Goldman

quotes.quote: Each country has its own flag. People fly the flags of their own country to show their patriotism. They are proud of their country.
quotes.author: Pam Scheunemann

quotes.quote: Promise me that you'll give faith a fighting chance, and when you get the choice to sit it out or dance, I hope you dance.
quotes.author: Lee Ann Womack

quotes.quote: Holding you here like a rose in the dark. I make this promise to you from my heart. You won't be lonely now.
quotes.author: Billy Ray Cyrus

quotes.quote: True country music is honesty, sincerity, and real life to the hilt.
quotes.author: Garth Brooks

quotes.quote: I'll be there anytime you need me by your side, to drive away every teardrop that you cried.
quotes.author: Freddy Fender

quotes.quote: Yeah and she's my kinda crazy The little games she plays Lord they'll never get old She's too cute to get on my last nerve The way she throws her little fits Pokin' out her lip and bitin' mine when we kiss There ain't a fight that she can't win That's my baby And she's my kinda crazy.
quotes.author: Brantley Gilbert

quotes.quote: She gets on you under your skin like a tattoo she'll always be there!
quotes.author: Jason Aldean

quotes.quote:
If there's no direction and you can't see
Let your heart draw a map in the stars and go where it leads.
quotes.author: Alisan Porter

quotes.quote: I know there's nothing that I wouldn't do Go to the ends of the earth for you To make you feel my love.
quotes.author: Garth Brooks

quotes.quote: Country music is still your grandpa's music, but it's also your daughter's music. It's getting bigger and better all the time and I'm glad to be a part of it.
quotes.author: Shania Twain

quotes.quote: Call it fate, destiny, call it luck you ended up with me But some things are meant to be Coincidence, circumstance Or something bigger thats just out of our hands But some things are meant to be.
quotes.author: Sammy Kershaw

quotes.quote: I'm more afraid of being nothing than I am of being hurt.
quotes.author: Cole Trickle

quotes.quote: The best way to get over a man is to get under a new one.
quotes.author: Ryan Turner

quotes.quote: When I look into your eyes I still get weak And when Im this close to you I just cant speak And its hard to keep my hands to myself When I know I could never love anybody else.
quotes.author: Gary Allan

quotes.quote: So I made a promise to myself to say each day how much she means to me, and avoid that circumstance where there's no second chance to tell her how I feel.
quotes.author: Garth Brooks

quotes.quote: All the things I didn't mean to say I didn't mean to do There were things you didn't need to say You didn't need to.
quotes.author: Frank Ocean

quotes.quote: A friend is always good to have, but a lover's kiss is better than angels raining down on me.
quotes.author: Dave Matthews

quotes.quote: It's not what you take when you leave this world behind you. It's what you leave behind you when you go.
quotes.author: Randy Travis

quotes.quote: When women go wrong, men go right after them.
quotes.author: Lady Lou

quotes.quote: Here I am This is all of me I'm not hiding I'm standing tall for all to see.
quotes.author: Alexandria

quotes.quote: Finally content with a past I regret, I've found you find strength in your moments of weakness.
quotes.author: Rascal Flatts

quotes.quote: Birds don't just fly, they fall down and get up Nobody learns without getting it wrong.
quotes.author: Shakira

quotes.quote: From here to eternity, I'm asking you to share your life with me. Now and forever I guarantee, I'll always stay by your side.
quotes.author: Michael Peterson

quotes.quote:
Well I know when you're around cause I know the sound
I know the sound of your heart.
quotes.author: The 1975

quotes.quote: Her little ring is a little thing, but its all I could afford Now she's mine, all mine till the day I die, and I never wanted nothin' more.
quotes.author: Kenny Chesney

quotes.quote: Life's a dance you learn as you go, sometimes you lead sometimes you follow, don't worry about what you don't know.
quotes.author: John Michael Montgomery

quotes.quote: When you're gone, the pieces of my heart are missing you. When you're gone, the face I came to know is missing too. When you're gone, the words I need to hear to always get me through the day and make it okay. I miss you.
quotes.author: Avril Lavigne

quotes.quote: Country music is the people's music. It just speaks about real life and about truth and it tells things how they really are.
quotes.author: Faith Hill quotes

quotes.quote: I really do have love to give, I just don't know where to put it.
quotes.author: Donnie Smith

quotes.quote: Saved two months, bought a little diamond. Tonight's the night, feels like perfect timin'. Down on one knee on momma's front steps, man I'm gonna die if she really says yes.
quotes.author: Kenny Chesney

quotes.quote: You got to know when to hold 'em, know when to fold 'em, Know when to walk away and know when to run.
quotes.author: Kenny Rogers

quotes.quote: I take it not only a day at a time, but a moment at a time, and keep it at that pace. If you can be happy right now, then you'll always be happy, because it's always in the now.
quotes.author: Willie Nelson

quotes.quote: I want to hate you, I'm mad as hell, oh but a part of me still loves you, and hopes and prays to God you're doing well.
quotes.author: Jana Kramer

quotes.quote: If I hold you any closer, I'll be in back of you.
quotes.author: Dr. Hugo Hackenbush

quotes.quote: Love is like a dying ember, and only memories remain. And through the ages, I'll remember blue eyes crying in the rain.
quotes.author: Willie Nelson

quotes.quote: I was captured by the songs as much as the singer. They grabbed my heart. The reality of Country Music moved me. Even when I was a kid, I liked the sad songsâ€¦ songs that talked about true life. I recognized this music as a simple plea. It beckoned me.
quotes.author: Harlan Howard

quotes.quote: I wanna know everything about you, and wanna go down every road youve been. Where your hopes and dreams and wishes live. Where you keep the rest of your life hid. I wanna know the girl behind that pretty stare. Take me there.
quotes.author: Luke Bryan

quotes.quote: Take a look around. I'm the sunshine in your hair. I'm the shadow on the ground. I'm the whisper in the wind. I'm your imaginary friend.
quotes.author: Lonestar

quotes.quote: A heart can be broken but it keeps beating just the same.
quotes.author: Ninny Threadgoode

quotes.quote: One out of two ain't gonna make it Those are the odds these days And in a world of statistics He's left tryin' to survive Till every other Friday at five.
quotes.author: Trace Adkins

quotes.quote: He said I'll love you 'til I die. She told him you'll forget in time. As the years went slowly by, she still preyed upon his mind.
quotes.author: George Jones

quotes.quote: She don't know how much I need her She don't know I'd fall apart Without her kiss without her touch Without her faithful lovin' arms.
quotes.author: Andy Griggs

quotes.quote: In your heart--I can still hear a beat for every time you kiss me. And when we're apart, I know how much you miss me I can feel your love for me in your heart.
quotes.author: Shania Twain

quotes.quote: If there's no direction and you can't see Let your heart draw a map in the stars and go where it leads.
quotes.author: Alisan Porter

quotes.quote: I want to be there when you wake up, be more than just your friend, baby there's no mistaking, you're the love I want to be in.
quotes.author: Jason Aldean

quotes.quote: And I knew, nothing I could say or do Could come close to thankin' you for your love And I could try for the rest of my life But that wouldn't be half enough
quotes.author: Lorrie Morgan

quotes.quote: Once you replace negative thoughts with positive ones, you'll start having positive results
quotes.author: Willie Nelson

quotes.quote: When you get where you're goin Don't forget turn back around Help the next one in line.
quotes.author: Tim McGraw

quotes.quote: With Country Music, you have one hit and those people love you forever.
quotes.author: Kenny Rogers

quotes.quote: I'll follow you out of the dark. I tried my way but I keep falling apart.
quotes.author: Papa Roach

quotes.quote: Don't know how you do it. I love the way I lose it, every time. What's even better is knowing that forever you're all mine.
quotes.author: Rascal Flatts

quotes.quote: We're poor, we've got too many kids, it stinks to high heaven. This'll inspire one hell of a country song.
quotes.author: Seth MacFarlane

quotes.quote: You gotta listen to the words. Country music comes from the heart.
quotes.author: Seth MacFarlane

quotes.quote: Today, Nashville, TN is the capitol of country music which grew out of traditional music from Scotland, Ireland and Africa
quotes.author: Greg MacGillivray

quotes.quote: On behalf of the Captain and the entire flight crew, I'd like to welcome y'all to Nashville, Tennessee, the country music capital of the world.
quotes.author: Peter S. Fischer

quotes.quote: Ferlin Husky's 'Why Do I Put Up With You?' Man, you just gotta love country music. I mean, it's just so raw with honesty and passion.
quotes.author: Joshua Brand

quotes.quote: We couldn't be happier. We got 3 sold out shows, we got the hottest 2 acts of country music coming around in a long time, and Texas never seen anything like this.
quotes.author: Shana Feste

quotes.quote: Now there's a saying in Nashville that says 'It all begins with a song.' And there's another quote by the legendary songwriter Harlan Howard. He said, 'Country music is simply three chords and the truth.'
quotes.author: Curt Casassa

quotes.quote: The sheer volume of love songs in country music shows just how important matters of the heart are to country stars. The harder they fall, the better the story, and like most things in life, love's always adapting.
quotes.author: Christopher Parton

quotes.quote: For country folks like Luke Bryan, the best bar scene in the world is a cooler on a tailgate and an old patch of dirt.
quotes.author: Christopher Parton

quotes.quote: Held each spring on the sun-kissed beach of Fort Lauderdale, Florida, the Tortuga Music Festival is a giant, three-day beach party that draws thousands of fans and some of the biggest names in country music.
quotes.author: Christopher Parton

quotes.quote: My kind of country is the clear, pure, old-fashioned kind, emotional and gutsy and also sentimental.
quotes.author: Reba McEntire

quotes.quote: The songs tell about real human problems - love and the pain of heartbreak and loss - in a way that shows you that the singer is no stranger to pain, and is tough enough to suffer and survive.
quotes.author: Reba McEntire

quotes.quote: Country music was the most segregated kind of music in America, where even whites played jazz and even blacks sang in the opera.
quotes.author: Viet Thanh Nguyen

quotes.quote: I think country music, blues music, folk music, rock music, you name it, I think it's all intertwined.
quotes.author: Dayton Duncan

quotes.quote: Country music came into being as a genre of music in the early 1920's when record companies began seeking new audiences to sell recordings to.
quotes.author: Michael McCall

quotes.quote: Music can be sold like a commodity, but it is never merely consumed, and it is appreciated in an entirely different way than a simple disposable commodity.
quotes.author: Michael McCall

quotes.quote: As musicians and fans grew accustomed to the idea of hillbilly music, they began ascribing to the music its own traditions and codes.
quotes.author: Michael McCall

quotes.quote: Country music, according to a brochure published by the Country Music Foundation of Nashville, Tennessee, 'is the commercial extension of Anglo-American folk song.
quotes.author: Wayne W. Daniel

quotes.quote: The history of country music is enriched with many interesting and colorful characters. Although the male singers have received more attention, women artists have made formidable contributions in every style from the genre's inception.
quotes.author: David Dicaire

quotes.quote: Some of the pioneers of country music were the people of the Appalachian mountains who had been playing their brand of folk songs for hundreds of years.
quotes.author: David Dicaire

quotes.quote: Oh where did I go wrong / I'm living my life like a country song / Oh will I get it back / I'm living like I'm in a Willie Nelson track.
quotes.author: Christine Connolly

quotes.quote: It's bad, so sad, I ended up losing everything I had / Love left town and my whole worlds gone / Living my life like a country song
quotes.author: Christine Connolly

quotes.quote: My alarm clock is a radio / 95.5 gets me ready to go / I'm heading to my job, drinking coffee strong / And I'm doing it to country songs
quotes.author: Paul Overstreet

quotes.quote: Around oh, 5:30 my buddies and I / Hit the watering hole 'cause our whistles are dry / Drinking beer, shooting pool, man you can't go wrong / Doing it to country songs
quotes.author: Paul Overstreet

quotes.quote: Let me just say for the sake of conversation / If it's hard to think as reincarnation / But don't you go crying for me when I'm gone / Told them I'm gonna come back as a country song
quotes.author: Terry Mcbride

quotes.quote: I don't have to save me, Heaven and me / Watching neon lights for eternity! / So go ahead and put it on my headstone / Yeah, I'm gonna come back as a country song
quotes.author: Terry Mcbride

quotes.quote: I'll be playing all night in every hunky town bar / In the middle of a fiddle and a steel guitar / I'm hoping when the good Lord calls me home / I'm gonna come back as a country song
quotes.author: Terry Mcbride

quotes.quote: My truth gets told some / Whether it's right or wrong / I stay up all night / Done it my whole life / Sometimes you gotta write / A country song
quotes.author: Jimmy Robbins

quotes.quote: But I wanna write a country song / When nothings gentle on my mind / And I'm needing something strong / And I'm almost out of wine
quotes.author: Jimmy Robbins

quotes.quote: Freaky Friday, things ain't going my way / Everything is gone, my life is a country song .
quotes.author: Claus Norreen

quotes.quote: I'ma love you like an old country song / All night long, headlight slow dance, over the moon / Slide in like a steel, steal a kiss, keep it real down home / Like a grand ole Nashville tune, gonna put it on you
quotes.author: Bryan Simpson

quotes.quote: But every time I hear the jukebox / the tears fall like rain / They ought to put warning labels on those sad country songs
quotes.author: Kim Williams

quotes.quote: Harmful and to your heart, when your left all alone / And if you're drinking you'll start thinking of the love that went wrong / They ought to put warning labels on those sad country songs
quotes.author: Kim Williams

quotes.quote: I feel at home in the country / And it makes me feel like I'm happy / And my hands touch the sky / And I feel more alive than I've ever known
quotes.author: Andy Gibb

quotes.quote: And I do all I can, come what may / With the night on our side we can dance to the light of the morning / With a sweet country song just to help things along
quotes.author: Andy Gibb

quotes.quote: I think country music is popular - has been popular and will always be popular because I think a lot of real people singing about a lot of real stuff about real people. And it's simple enough for people to understand it. And we kind of roll with the punches.
quotes.author: Dolly Parton

quotes.quote: If you talk bad about country music, it's like saying bad things about my momma. Them's fighting words.
quotes.author: Dolly Parton

quotes.quote: I'm pretty sure in my older years, I'll be doing old-time flavored folk-mountain music.
quotes.author: Dolly Parton

quotes.quote: Kitty Wells was the first and only Queen of Country Music, no matter what they call the rest of us. She was a great inspiration to me as well as every other female singer in the country music business.
quotes.author: Dolly Parton

quotes.quote: Most country songs, certainly all the stuff I've written, are stories driven by characters.
quotes.author: Dolly Parton

quotes.quote: Of emotions, of love, of breakup, of love and hate and death and dying, mama, apple pie, and the whole thing. It covers a lot of territory, country music does.
quotes.author: Johnny Cash

quotes.quote: My definition of country music is really pretty simple. It's when someone sings about their life and what they know, from an authentic place.
quotes.author: Taylor Swift

quotes.quote: I think the first thing you should know is that nobody in country music 'made it' the same way. It's all different. There's no blueprint for success, and sometimes you just have to work at it.
quotes.author: Taylor Swift

quotes.quote: More than any other art form I know of in America, country music speaks of the true relationship between the American male and the American female... Terrible and impossible.
quotes.author: Sam Shepard

quotes.quote: Sometimes I am two people. Johnny is the nice one. Cash causes all the trouble. They fight.
quotes.author: Johnny Cash

quotes.quote: Every couple has ups and downs, every couple argues, and that's the thing – you're a couple, and couples can't function without trust.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: Each moment of a happy lover's hour is worth an age of dull and common life.
quotes.author: Aphra Behn

quotes.quote: I believe that two people are connected at the heart, and it doesn't matter what you do, or who you are or where you live; there are no boundaries or barriers if two people are destined to be together.
quotes.author: Julia Roberts

quotes.quote: A man is already halfway in love with any woman who listens to him.
quotes.author: Brendan Francis

quotes.quote: There are days when you need someone who just wants to be your sunshine and not the air you breathe.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: ... See there's this place in me where your fingerprints still rest, your kisses still linger, and your whispers softly echo. It's the place where a part of you will forever be a part of me.
quotes.author: Gretchen Kemp

quotes.quote: Maybe you don't need the whole world to love you. You know? Maybe you just need one person.
quotes.author: Kermit The Frog

quotes.quote: We were given: Two hands to hold. Two legs to walk. Two eyes to see. Two ears to listen. But why only one heart? Because the other was given to someone else. For us to find.
quotes.author: Lauren Child

quotes.quote: Having someone wonder where you are when you don't come home at night is a very old human need.
quotes.author: Margaret Mead

quotes.quote: When you realize you want to spend the rest of your life with somebody, you want the rest of your life to start as soon as possible.
quotes.author: When Harry Met Sally

quotes.quote: Two souls with but a single thought, Two hearts that beat as one.
quotes.author: Friedrich Halm

quotes.quote: In all the world, there is no heart for me like yours. In all the world, there is no love for you like mine.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Now join your hands, and with your hands your hearts.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Your words are my food, your breath my wine. You are everything to me.
quotes.author: Sarah Bernhardt

quotes.quote: I would rather share one lifetime with you than face all the ages of this world alone.
quotes.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quotes.quote: We may have started as individuals, but now we are as one.
quotes.author: Bryon Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Love one another and you will be happy. It's as simple and as difficult as that.
quotes.author: Micheal Leunig

quotes.quote: A soulmate is the one person whose love is powerful enough to motivate you to meet your soul, to do the emotional work of self-discovery, of awakening.
quotes.author: Kenny Loggins

quotes.quote: Whatever our souls are made of, his and mine are the same.
quotes.author: Emily Bronte

quotes.quote: Soul mate: two little words, one big concept. A belief that someone, somewhere, is holding the key to your heart.
quotes.author: Carrie Bradshaw

quotes.quote: The meeting of two personalities is like the contact of two chemical substances: if there is any reaction, both are transformed.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: Remember, we all stumble, every one of us. That's why it's a comfort to go hand in hand.
quotes.author: Emily Kimbrough

quotes.quote: The first duty of love is to listen.
quotes.author: Paul Tillich

quotes.quote: Relationships are stronger when you're best friends first, and a couple second.
quotes.author: Unkown

quotes.quote: The compatibility of a couple and the quality of a relationship lies in the way they handle their arguments and differences..
quotes.author: Nishan Panwar

quotes.quote: Staying together when things get tough will only make you a stronger couple.
quotes.author: Unkown

quotes.quote: If you have respect and consideration for one another, you'll make it.
quotes.author: Mary Durso

quotes.quote: It's a wonderful thing, as time goes by, to be with someone who looks into your face, when you've gotten old, and still sees what you think you look like.
quotes.author: The Bachelor (Movie)

quotes.quote: I wonder how many people don't get the one they want, but end up with the one they're supposed to be with.
quotes.author: Fannie Flagg

quotes.quote: I'm oxygen and he's dying to breathe.
quotes.author: Tahereh Mafi

quotes.quote: Slaves in the United States were not permitted to marry, so couples would unite by the practice of jumping over a broom handle, which stood for the jump from single to married life.
quotes.author: Alicia Alvrez

quotes.quote: A recent long-range study has found that whereas, because of prejudice, gay and lesbian couples face more external stressors on their relationships, they actually have better communication skills than heterosexual couples and use fewer hostile tactics during fights.
quotes.author: Alicia Alvrez

quotes.quote: In the Middle Ages, couples used to get married in the bathtub because water signified purity. The couple and their attendants would stand in a tub filled with water.
quotes.author: Alicia Alvrez

quotes.quote: Marriage is the most serious long-term contract a couple will make in their lifetime.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: The path of true love isn't smooth, / the ruffled feathers sex can soothe / ruffle again— for couples never spend / all their lives in bed again.
quotes.author: Gavin Ewart

quotes.quote: Two couples living together and walking openly together openly for a week...it was like a week in a bell jar.
quotes.author: Joanne Kates

quotes.quote: When you see a married couple coming down the street, the one who is two or three steps ahead is the one that's mad.
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.quote: A deaf husband and a blind wife will make the best couple.
quotes.author: French Proverb

quotes.quote: In Eastern traditions, a groom would eat honey on his wedding day, and couples would drink mead, a honey wine, for a month after they married.
quotes.author: K.C. Jones

quotes.quote: When couples do things together, they learn what the other one likes, dislikes, prefers, requires, and enjoys.
quotes.author: Betty Thomas

quotes.quote: When couples stay together they will learn what the other's personality and thought processes are, and eventually could finish each other's sentences due to their familiarity with each other.
quotes.author: Betty Thomas

quotes.quote: Being in an intimate relationship can be one of the keenest human joys and one of the greatest sorces of pain.
quotes.author: Matthew McKay

quotes.quote: Sure we played a stunning couple / But I never liked the part / It ain't pretty, it ain't subtle / What happens to the heart.
quotes.author: Leonard Cohen

quotes.quote: Happy loving couples make it look so easy / Happy loving couples always talk so kind / Until the time that I can do my dancing with a partner / Those happy couples ain't no friends of mine.
quotes.author: David Ian Jackson

quotes.quote: When you realize you want to spend the rest of your life with somebody, you want the rest of your life to start as soon as possible.
quotes.author: Billy Crystal

quotes.quote: In my opinion, the best thing you can do is find someone who loves you for exactly what you are. Good mood, bad mood, ugly, pretty, handsome, what have you.
quotes.author: J.K. Simmons

quotes.quote: We should meet in another life, we should meet in air, me and you.
quotes.author: Sylvia Plath

quotes.quote: A great marriage is not when the 'perfect couple' comes together. It is when an imperfect couple learns to enjoy their differences.
quotes.author: Dave Meurer

quotes.quote: On the left side of a strong woman, stands a strong man; he is strengthened by her character.
quotes.author: Ellen J. Barrier

quotes.quote: 'We fit, you and I,' he whispered looking into that haunting gaze. 'Two broken pieces making a whole.'
quotes.author: Nalini Singh

quotes.quote: Even before we met and long after we're both gone, my heart lives inside of yours. I'm forever and ever in love with you.
quotes.author: Crystal Woods

quotes.quote: ...we can say we love each other if my life is better because you're in it and your life is better because I'm in it.
quotes.author: Chris Crutcher

quotes.quote: Theirs was a private language, not shared with the rest of the world, and so exempt from censure, sheer burlesque.
quotes.author: Stewart O'Nan

quotes.quote: The thing about loving someone is that yelling at them only feels good while you're doing it -- as soon as they're gone, all you want to do is take it all back.
quotes.author: Laura Barnholdt

quotes.quote: Watching them, she realized they made so much sense together. Every look, every touch, was a reassurance, almost electric as if they were shocking each other with every contact.
quotes.author: Sarah Addison Allen

quotes.quote: Love does not consist of gazing at each other, but in looking outward together in the same direction.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint Exupery

quotes.quote: People are weird. When we find someone with a weirdness that is compatible with ours, we team up and call it love.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: There is no more lovely, friendly, and charming relationship, communion, or company than a good marriage.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: A man's got to do what a man's got to do.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A turtle travels only when it sticks its neck out.
quotes.author: Korean (on journeys)

quotes.quote: Courage is not the absence of fear; it is the conquest of it.
quotes.author: William Danforth

quotes.quote: Courage is the complement of fear.
quotes.author: Lazarus Long

quotes.quote: Cowards die many times before their death.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Don't be led around by the nose.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Faint heart never won fair lady.
quotes.author: W. S. Gilbert

quotes.quote: Fear makes the wolf bigger than he is.
quotes.author: German Proverb

quotes.quote: Fear the person who fears you.
quotes.author: Middle Eastern (on courage and fear)

quotes.quote: Given a challenge, rise to the occasion.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Have the courage of your convictions.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Heroism consists of hanging on one minute longer.
quotes.author: Norwegian (on courage and fear)

quotes.quote: If you are afraid of something, you give it power over you.
quotes.author: Moroccan (on courage and fear)

quotes.quote: It is easy to be brave from a distance.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: Keep a stiff upper lip.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Keep your chin up.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Like a fish, one should look for holes in the net.
quotes.author: Samoan (on freedom and slavery)

quotes.quote: One with the courage to laugh is master of the world.
quotes.author: Italian (on courage and fear)

quotes.quote: Our fears always outnumber our dangers.
quotes.author: Latin (on courage and fear)

quotes.quote: The blind person is not afraid of ghosts.
quotes.author: Burmese (on courage and fear)

quotes.quote: The brave person regards dying as going home.
quotes.author: Chinese (on courage and fear)

quotes.quote: The longest journey begins with the first step.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The person afraid of bad luck will never know good.
quotes.author: Russian (on luck)

quotes.quote: What cannot be cured must be endured.
quotes.author: Edmund Spenser

quotes.quote: With a stout heart, a mouse can lift an elephant.
quotes.author: Tibetan (on attitude)

quotes.quote: Worry often gives a small thing a big shadow.
quotes.author: Swedish (on courage and fear)

quotes.quote: Courage is the hallmark of spirituality. Courage comes when you love yourself for who you are.
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: The opposite for courage is not cowardice, it is conformity. Even a dead fish can go with the flow.
quotes.author: Jim Hightower

quotes.quote: Courage doesn’t mean you don’t get afraid. Courage means you don’t let fear stop you.
quotes.author: Bethany Hamilton

quotes.quote: Courage doesn’t mean you don’t get afraid. Courage means you don’t let fear stop you.
quotes.author: Bethany Hamilton

quotes.quote: My definition of courage is never letting anyone define you.
quotes.author: Jenna Jameson

quotes.quote: Courage is on display every day, and only the courageous wring the most out of life.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Courage is very important. Like a muscle, it is strengthened by use.
quotes.author: Ruth Gordon

quotes.quote: Courage originally meant ‘To speak one’s mind by telling all one’s heart.’
quotes.author: Brene Brown

quotes.quote: Courage is not the absence of fear or despair; it is the capacity to continue on despite them, no matter how great or overwhelming they become.
quotes.author: Robert Fanney

quotes.quote: Courage is rightly esteemed the first of human qualities . . . because it is the quality which guarantees all others.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: courage is doing what you’re afraid to do. There can be no courage unless you're scared. Eddie Rickenbacker
quotes.author: Eddie Rickenbacker

quotes.quote: Courage is going from failure to failure without losing enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: All happiness depends on courage and work.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: Courage is not simply one of the virtues but the form of every virtue at the testing point, which means at the point of highest reality.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Vulnerability sounds like truth and feels like courage. Truth and courage aren’t always comfortable, but they’re never weakness.
quotes.author: Brene Brown

quotes.quote: Self-control is the chief element in self-respect, and self-respect is the chief element in courage.
quotes.author: Thucydides

quotes.quote: Courage doesn’t happen when you have all the answers. It happens when you are ready to face the questions you have been avoiding your whole life
quotes.author: Shannon L. Adler

quotes.quote: Courage isn’t having the strength to go on – it is going on when you don’t have strength
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: Life is mostly froth and bubble, Two things stand like stone. Kindness in another’s trouble, Courage in your own.
quotes.author: Adam Lindsay Gordon

quotes.quote: Courage is the first of human qualities because it is the quality which guarantees the others.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: The courage to imagine the otherwise is our greatest resource, adding color and suspense to all our life.
quotes.author: Daniel J. Boorstin

quotes.quote: Courage is not the absence of fear, but the triumph over it. The brave man is not he who does not feel afraid, but he who conquers that fear.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: People with courage and character always seem sinister to the rest.
quotes.author: Hermann Hesse

quotes.quote: Courage is not something that you already have that makes you brave when the tough times start. Courage is what you earn when you’ve been through the tough times and you discover they aren’t so tough after all.
quotes.author: Malcolm Gladwell

quotes.quote: Conscience is the root of all true courage; if a man would be brave let him obey his conscience.
quotes.author: James Freeman Clarke

quotes.quote: It is only necessary to have courage, for strength without self-confidence is useless.
quotes.author: Giacamo Casanova

quotes.quote: With enough courage, you can do without a reputation.
quotes.author: Margaret Mitchell

quotes.quote: Courage is contagious. When a brave man takes a stand, the spines of others are often stiffened.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: How few there are who have courage enough to own their faults, or resolution enough to mend them
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Courage is a heart word. The root of the word courage is cor – the Latin word for heart. In one of its earliest forms, the word courage meant ‘To speak one’s mind by telling all one’s heart.’
quotes.author: Brene Brown

quotes.quote: True courage is not the brutal force of vulgar heroes, but the firm resolve of virtue and reason.
quotes.author: Alfred North Whitehead

quotes.quote: Every man has his own courage, and is betrayed because he seeks in himself the courage of other persons.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Courage consists not in hazarding without fear; but being resolutely minded in a just cause.
quotes.author: Plutarch

quotes.quote: Courage is almost a contradiction in terms. It means a strong desire to live taking the form of readiness to die
quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Courage is risking the known for the unknown, the familiar for the unfamiliar.
quotes.author: Osho

quotes.quote: Courage is being scared to death… and saddling up anyway.
quotes.author: John Wayne

quotes.quote: All you need is the plan, the road map, and the courage to press on to your destination.
quotes.author: Earl Nightingale

quotes.quote: Courage doesn’t always roar. Sometimes courage is the little voice at the end of the day that says I’ll try again tomorrow.
quotes.author: Mary Anne Radmacher

quotes.quote: It is courage, courage, courage, that raises the blood of life to crimson splendor. Live bravely and present a brave front to adversity.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: Have enough courage to trust love one more time and always one more time.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: The most courageous act is still to think for yourself. Aloud.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: Courage is what it takes to stand up and speak; courage is also what it takes to sit down and listen.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Have the courage to follow your heart and intuition. They somehow already know what you truly want to become.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Fear is a reaction. Courage is a decision.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: It takes a lot of courage to show your dreams to someone else.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: Keep your fears to yourself, but share your courage with others.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: Courage is not the absence of fear, but rather the assessment that something else is more important than fear.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: God grant me the courage not to give up what I think is right even though I think it is hopeless.
quotes.author: Chester W. Nimitz

quotes.quote: It takes a great deal of courage to stand alone even if you believe in something very strongly
quotes.author: Reginald Rose

quotes.quote: Courage is the commitment to begin without any guarantee of success.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Courage starts with showing up and letting ourselves be seen.
quotes.author: Brene Brown

quotes.quote: The strongest people find the courage and caring to help others, even if they are going through their own storm.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: Fear is a reaction. Courage is a decision.
quotes.author: E.E. Cummings

quotes.quote: There is a higher court than courts of justice and that is the court of conscience. It supercedes all other courts.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: The court generally moves in small steps rather than in one giant step.
quotes.author: Ruth Bader Ginsburg

quotes.quote: The court is like a palace of marble; it's composed of people very hard and very polished.
quotes.author: Jean De La Bruyere

quotes.quote: A court is an assembly of noble and distinguished beggars.
quotes.author: Charles Maurice de Talleyrand

quotes.quote: The court makes an amazing amount of decisions that ought to be made by the people.
quotes.author: Antonin Scalia

quotes.quote: It is always possible for the court to overreach its proper bounds and perhaps declare a lot of laws unconstitutional and frustrate the will of the majority in a way that it ought not be frustrated.
quotes.author: William Rehnquist

quotes.quote: The court's decision will constitute a message in the area of freedom of expression.
quotes.author: Camiel Eurlings

quotes.quote: Courts have paid a lot of deference to post-secondary institutions if they've done their work properly.
quotes.author: Richard Harris

quotes.quote: A court is like a scene, people want to see attractive people.
quotes.author: Anna Kournikova

quotes.quote: Court a place where they dispense with justice.
quotes.author: Arthur Cheney Train

quotes.quote: The courts are truly the least dangerous of the three branches of our government.
quotes.author: William Weld

quotes.quote: The court is really the keeper of the conscience, and the conscience is the Constitution.
quotes.author: William O. Douglas

quotes.quote: Courts are places where the ending is written first and all that precedes is simply vaudeville.
quotes.author: Charles Bukowski

quotes.quote: Courts of law, and all the paraphernalia and folly of law cannot be found in a rational state of society.
quotes.author: Robert Owen

quotes.quote: Courts of equity make their decrees so as to arrive at the justice of the case without violating the rules of law.
quotes.author: Sherrilyn Kenyon

quotes.quote: It takes a long time to learn that a courtroom is the last place in the world for learning the truth.
quotes.author: Alice Koller

quotes.quote: The decisions of law courts should never be printed: in the long run, they form a counter authority to the law.
quotes.author: Denis Diderot

quotes.quote: The courts are an easy scapegoat because at a time when everything has to boiled down to easy slogans, we speak in subtleties.
quotes.author: Rose Bird

quotes.quote: The court's recent understanding of religion as a private matter for individuals has plainly become malnourished and impoverished.
quotes.author: Stephen V Monsma

quotes.quote: The court's recent decisions have made life more difficult for the democratic institutions that perform the day- to-day work of our nation.
quotes.author: Mike DeWine

quotes.quote: The Court is perhaps one of the last citadels of jealously preserved individualism. For the most part, we function as nine, small independent law firms.
quotes.author: Colin Powell

quotes.quote: This Court is forever adding new stories to the temples of constitutional law, and the temples have a way of collapsing when one story too many is added.
quotes.author: Robert H. Jackson

quotes.quote: The law courts must appear as a threatening gesture toward secret vice. The bank must declare: here your money is secure and well looked after by honest people.
quotes.author: Adolf Loos

quotes.quote: The Courts must declare the sense of the law; and if they should be disposed to exercise will instead of judgement; the consequences would be the substitution of their pleasure for that of the legislative body.
quotes.author: Alexander Hamilton

quotes.quote: The courts of this country should not be the places where resolution of disputes begins. They should be the places where the disputes end after alternative methods of resolving disputes have been considered and tried.
quotes.author: Sandra Day O'Connor

quotes.quote: The Court stands against any winds that blow as havens of refuge for those who might otherwise suffer because they are helpless, weak, outnumbered, or because they are nonconforming victims of prejudice or public excitement.
quotes.author: Hugo Black

quotes.quote: The ultimate court of appeal is observation and experiment not authority.
quotes.author: Thomas Henry Huxley

quotes.quote: Courtesy should be a continuous action, not something to be turned on and off like a faucet.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Nothing is ever lost by courtesy. It is the cheapest of the pleasures costs nothing and conveys much. It pleases him who gives and him who receives, and thus, like mercy, it is twice blessed.
quotes.author: Erastus Wiman

quotes.quote: Courtesies of a small and trivial character are the ones which strike deepest in the grateful and appreciating heart.
quotes.author: Henry Clay

quotes.quote: Lack of courtesy is an extreme form of disrespect.
quotes.author: Khaleel Datay

quotes.quote: There is no outward sign of true courtesy that does not rest on a deep moral foundation.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: He who sows courtesy reaps friendship.
quotes.author: Saint Basil

quotes.quote: Politeness is the art of choosing among your thoughts.
quotes.author: Madame De Stael

quotes.quote: Good manners have much to do with the emotions. To make them ring true, one must feel them, not merely exhibit them.
quotes.author: Amy Vanderbilt

quotes.quote: Courtesy is a silver lining around the dark clouds of civilization; it is the best part of refinement and in many ways, an art of heroic beauty in the vast gallery of man's cruelty and baseness.
quotes.author: Bryant H. McGill

quotes.quote: The greater person is one of courtesy.
quotes.author: Lord Alfred Tennyson

quotes.quote: Good manners are just a way of showing other people that we have respect for them.
quotes.author: Bill Kelly

quotes.quote: Courtesy and kindness cultivate confidence with good Netiquette. Doing things right makes you feel good.
quotes.author: David Chiles

quotes.quote: Courtesy is a small act but it packs a mighty wallop.
quotes.author: Lewis Carroll

quotes.quote: There can be no defence like elaborate courtesy.
quotes.author: Lucas

quotes.quote: No one is more insufferable than he who lacks basic courtesy.
quotes.author: Bryant McGill

quotes.quote: To succeed in the world it is not enough to be stupid, you must also be well-mannered.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Courtesy is sometimes imperceptible, but its absence turns out to be poignant.
quotes.author: Julita Davies

quotes.quote: It is better to have too much courtesy than too little, provided you are not equally courteous to all, for that would be injustice.
quotes.author: Baltasar Gracian

quotes.quote: Good manners without sincerity are like a beautiful dead lady.
quotes.author: Yukteswar Giri

quotes.quote: Good manners are ageless, priceless and classless.
quotes.author: Diana Mather

quotes.quote: Courtesy is simply doing unto others what you would like them to do unto you.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Courtesy is a lady's armor.
quotes.author: Sophie Turner

quotes.quote: A good manners will open doors that the best education cannot.
quotes.author: Clarence Thomas

quotes.quote: Good manners and soft words have brought many a difficult thing to pass.
quotes.author: John Vanbrugh

quotes.quote: No one is too big to be courteous, but some are too little.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Courtesy costs nothing, but buys everything.
quotes.author: Hazrat Ali Ibn Abu-Talib A.S

quotes.quote: Courtesy dictates that we offer fellow wizards the opportunity of denying us entry.
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling

quotes.quote: Courtesy is as much a mark of a gentleman as courage.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: There is a kind of courtesy in skepticism. It would be an offense against polite conventions to press our doubts too far.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.quote: Courtesy and good humor are often found with little real worth.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: A man's own good breeding is the best security against other people's ill manners.
quotes.author: Lord Chesterfield

quotes.quote: Courtesy is the one coin you can never have too much of or be stingy with.
quotes.author: John Wanamaker

quotes.quote: There is a courtesy of the heart it is allied to love. From its springs the purest courtesy in the outward behavior.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: An excess of courtesy is discourtesy.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Courtesy is only a thin veneer on the general selfishness.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: True politeness consists in being easy one's self, and in making every one about one as easy as one can.
quotes.author: Alexander Pope

quotes.quote: To be humble to superiors is duty, to equals courtesy, to inferiors nobleness.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: The small courtesies sweeten life the greater ennoble it.
quotes.author: Christian Nestell Bovee

quotes.quote: When music and courtesy are better understood and appreciated, there will be no war.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: If a man be gracious and courteous to strangers, it shows he is a citizen of the world.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: Be calm in arguing for fierceness makes error a fault, and truth discourtesy.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: Be courteous to all, but intimate with few, and let those few be well tried before you give them your confidence.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: I have always felt that if a man gives you a solid gold key to his door he is entitled to the courtesy of a visit.
quotes.author: Hedy Lamarr

quotes.quote: Intelligence and courtesy not always are combined often in a wooden house a golden room we find.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: Clothes and manners do not make the man but when he is made, they greatly improve his appearance.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: It is impossible to practice parliamentary politics without having patience, decency, politeness and courtesy.
quotes.author: Khaleda Zia

quotes.quote: Courtesy while you're thinking what to say. It saves time.
quotes.author: Lewis Carroll

quotes.quote: When restraint and courtesy are added to strength, the latter becomes irresistible.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: For nothing is more commendable, nothing more becoming in a preeminently great man than courtesy and forbearance.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: Every human being is entitled to courtesy and consideration. Constructive criticism is not only to be expected but sought.
quotes.author: Margaret Chase Smith

quotes.quote: life is a gift, and i try to respond with grace and courtesy
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Courtesy is a science of the highest importance. It is opening a door that we may derive instruction from the example of others, and at the same time enabling us to benefit them by our example, if there be anything in our character worthy of imitation.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: The knowledge of courtesy and good manners is a very necessary study. It is like grace and beauty, that which begets liking and an inclination to love one another at the first sight.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: The habit of attending to small things and of appreciating small courtesies is one of the important marks of a good person.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: Don't flatter yourself that friendship authorizes you to say disagreeable things to your intimates. The nearer you come into relation with a person, the more necessary do tact and courtesy become.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.quote: He who sows courtesy reaps friendship, and he who plants kindness gathers love
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: Life is short, but there is always time for courtesy.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The first point of courtesy must always be truth.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Little kindness and courtesies are so important. In relationships, the little things are the big things.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: Courtesy is the due of man to man; not of suit-of-clothes to suit-of-clothes.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: All doors open to courtesy
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: Really big people are, above everything else, courteous, considerate and generous - not just to some people in some circumstances - but to everyone all the time.
quotes.author: Thomas J. Watson

quotes.quote: There are only two or three human stories, and they go on repeating themselves as fiercely as if they had never happened before.
quotes.author: Willa Cather

quotes.quote: Six essential qualities that are the key to success. Sincerity, personal integrity, humility, courtesy, wisdom, charity.
quotes.author: William C. Menninger

quotes.quote: Courting is an activity when a man and a woman flaunt their virtues. Dating is an activity where life exposes the other's vices.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: When you are courting a nice girl an hour seems like a second.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Courting is for those who have not declared their love for one another. I have already told you what is in my heart.
quotes.author: Julie Garwood

quotes.quote: I don't think courting and dating is a liability. I actually think it can be a blessing.
quotes.author: Rebecca St. James

quotes.quote: I am about courting a girl I have had but little acquaintance with. How shall I come to a knowledge of her faults, and whether she has the virtues I imagine she has? Answer. Commend her among her female acquaintances.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: If there was more courting in marriage, there'd be fewer marriages in court. Date your mate. Today.
quotes.author: Rick Warren

quotes.quote: Fighting battles is like courting girls: those who make the most pretensions and are boldest usually win.
quotes.author: Rutherford B. Hayes

quotes.quote: Courting is the art of growing like mould on the one you want.
quotes.author: Steven Erikson

quotes.quote: When a woman dislikes the man who is courting her, she parries him cleverly, like a willow in the wind.
quotes.author: Eji Yoshikawa

quotes.quote: Courting someone is completely different than dating Its a state of mind. Its all in the level of respect you are looking for and willing to give.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A non-writing writer is a monster courting insanity.
quotes.author: Franz Kafka

quotes.quote: He who least likes courting favour, ought also least to think of resenting neglect; to feel wounded at being refused a distinction can only arise from an overweening appetite to have it.
quotes.author: Plutarch

quotes.quote: Give her books, where other people did all the running around and courting; it was far easier to read about such matters than to experience them herself.
quotes.author: Sophie Dash

quotes.quote: I'm not courting death; I've far too many books left to read.
quotes.author: Alison Sinclair

quotes.quote: So much of courtship is the unspoken.
quotes.author: Megan Mccafferty

quotes.quote: Courtship brings out the best. Marriage brings out the rest.
quotes.author: Cullen Hightower

quotes.quote: Courtship is to marriage, as a very witty prologue to a very dull play.
quotes.author: William Congreve

quotes.quote: The only thing a whirlwind courtship does is blow dust in everyone's eyes.
quotes.author: Jilly Cooper

quotes.quote: This is courtship all the world over - the man all tongue; the woman all ears.
quotes.author: Emily Murphy

quotes.quote: Courtship is driven by hormones; marriage is sustained by humility and self-sacrifice
quotes.author: Ron Brackin

quotes.quote: You must not contrast too strongly the hours of courtship with the years of possession.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: Courtship is the time for sowing those seeds which will grow up ten years into domestic hatred.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Courtship consists in a number of quiet attentions, not so pointed as to alarm, nor so vague as not to be understood.
quotes.author: Laurence Sterne

quotes.quote: If most of your courtship attempts have succeeded, you must be a very attractive and charming person who has been aiming too low.
quotes.author: Geoffrey Miller

quotes.quote: Every man in the time of courtship and in the first entrance of marriage, puts on a behavior like my correspondent's holiday suit.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.quote: Courtship is exciting and romantic because it thrives on the edge of disaster. It co-exists with the threat that, at any moment, it could fall apart and be lost forever.
quotes.author: Karen Scalf Linamen

quotes.quote: It's true that romance novels do detail the courtship phase of a relationship. We usually write 'And they lived happily ever after' before our heroine starts snoring or our hero starts tossing his socks over the hamper.
quotes.author: Teresa Medeiros

quotes.quote: Courtship is romantic. Marriage ... is an act of will," said Pippa, taking a sip of water. "I mean, I adore Herb. But the marriage functions because we will it to. If you leave love to hold everything together, you can forget it.
quotes.author: Rebecca Miller

quotes.quote: To dance with a man is to concentrate a twelvemonth's regulation fire upon him in the fragment of an hour. To pass to courtship without acquaintance, to pass to marriage without courtship, is a skipping of terms reserved for those alone who tread this royal road.
quotes.author: Thomas Hardy

quotes.quote: There is too little courtship in the world. ... For courtship means a wish to stand well in the other person's eyes, and, what is more, a readiness to be pleased with the other's ways; a sense on each side of having had the better of the bargain; an undercurrent of surprise and thankfulness at one's good luck.
quotes.author: Vernon Lee

quotes.quote: No serious courtship or engagement or marriage is worth the name if we do not fully invest all that we have in it and in so doing trust ourselves totally to the one we love. You cannot succeed in love if you keep one foot out on the bank for safety's sake. The very nature of the endeavor requires that you hold on to each other as tightly as you can and jump in the pool together.
quotes.author: Jeffrey R. Holland

quotes.quote: Human courtship has some wild extremes. At one end of the spectrum, there is harassment, pestering, blackmail, and an abuse of institutional power, which its targets rightly fear and loathe. At the other end is love, which as Nietzsche said, is beyond good and evil and always deserves our respect and compassion even when it is doomed or destructive. In the wide middle of the spectrum are all the ambiguous and tragi-comic goings-on of our species.
quotes.author: Catherine Wilson

quotes.quote: With extramarital courtship, the deception was prolonged where it had been ephemeral, necessary where it had been frivolous, conspiratorial where it had been lonely.
quotes.author: Mary Mccarthy

quotes.quote: There is too little courtship in the world.
quotes.author: Vernon Lee

quotes.quote: Courtship is a commitment - it's a promise not to play games with another person's heart.
quotes.author: Joshua Harris

quotes.quote: During courtship, guarding each other's purity and refraining from intimacy are the acts of lovemaking.
quotes.author: Joshua Harris

quotes.quote: The loss of courtship in modern days - like, people don't court anybody anymore. There's no beauty about it.
quotes.author: Sofia Vassilieva

quotes.quote: Reverence to a woman in courtship is less to be dispensed with, as, generally, there is but little of it shown afterwards.
quotes.author: Samuel Richardson

quotes.quote: Take modern courtships! They resulted in the same thing as under George the Second, but took longer to reach it, owing to the motor-cycle and the standing lunch.
quotes.author: John Galsworthy

quotes.quote: A lot of people head into courtship looking for fireworks. Don't pass up a chance by dumping someone after a first date because you don't feel the fireworks. The fireworks can happen at any time and be maintained.
quotes.author: Helen Fisher

quotes.quote: Of course, a lot of courtship and dating is about sexual attraction. If you're an attractive person, you have that sort of interest from people, whether you cater to it or not, but when you get older, that's not really the leading thing anymore.
quotes.author: Patricia Arquette

quotes.quote: Friendship is the only cement that will ever hold the cousins together.
quotes.author: Woodrow Wilson

quotes.quote: Cousins by blood - friends by choice.
quotes.author: Darlene Shaw

quotes.quote: In my cousin, I find a second self.
quotes.author: Isabel Norton

quotes.quote: No matter how you feel about your extended family or family gatherings you will be attending. This is because now the ultimate reason for attending family gatherings is for your children to have the time of their lives with their cousins. Little kids love their cousins. I'm not being cute or exaggerating here. Cousins are like celebrities for little kids. If little kids had a People magazine, cousins would be on the cover. Cousins are the barometers of how fun a family get-together will be. Are the cousins going to be there? Fun!
quotes.author: Jim Gaffigan

quotes.quote: A cousin is a little bit of childhood that can never be lost.
quotes.author: Marion C. Garretty

quotes.quote: Cousins are those childhood playmates who grow up to be forever friends.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Cousins are people that are ready made friends, you have laughs with them and remember good times from a young age, you have fights with them but you always know you love each other, they are a better thing than brothers and sisters and friends cause there all pieced together as one.
quotes.author: Courtney Cox

quotes.quote: Cousins are those rare people who ask how we are and then wait to hear the answer.
quotes.author: Ed Cunningham

quotes.quote: Every man sees in his relatives, and especially in his cousins,a series of grotesque caricatures of himself.
quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

quotes.quote: At Christmas, Cousins are the presents under the tree.
quotes.author: Karen Decourcey

quotes.quote: Cousin to cousin we'll always be, Special friends from the same family tree.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Cousins by chance, friends by choice.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: I always call my cousin because we're so close. We're almost like sisters, and we're also close because our moms are sisters.
quotes.author: Britney Spears

quotes.quote: Cousins are Cool to see, Impossible to Forget and True to your heart.
quotes.author: Leo Farno

quotes.quote: A near neighbour is better than a distant cousin.
quotes.author: Italian Proverb

quotes.quote: A real cousin (or friend) is someone who walks in when the rest of the world walks out.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: Within our family there was no such thing as a person who did not matter. Second cousins thrice removed mattered.
quotes.author: Shirley Abbott

quotes.quote: Cousins are many. Best friends are few. What a rare delight to find both in you.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: If you're lucky, a cousin is there from the beginning.
quotes.author: Susan Bolch

quotes.quote: Cousins are friends that will love you forever.
quotes.author: Constance Richards

quotes.quote: Cousins are Sisters you never had.
quotes.author: Reah Glowstorl

quotes.quote: Win, lose or draw, you're all my cousins and I love you.
quotes.author: Chill Wills

quotes.quote: Cousins are not those we do not know but instead part of a family that also provide support and comfort.
quotes.author: Byron Pulsifer

quotes.quote: I may argue with my brother, but I fight beside my brother against my cousin, and with my cousin against a stranger.
quotes.author: Old Arab adage

quotes.quote: Friends are forever, cousins are for life!
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Born as a cousin, made as a friend.
quotes.author: Byron Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Nobody will understand the craziness of your family better than your cousins
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A cousin is a ready-made friend for life.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: We are wild and fierce. We do not wait for invitations.
quotes.author: Shutta Crum

quotes.quote: The night before the cousins came, I couldn't sleep.
quotes.author: Katie Yamasaki

quotes.quote: A lot of people would rather tour sewers than visit their cousins.
quotes.author: Jane Howard

quotes.quote: Most people have relatives, but whether you'd want them is another matter--apart from mothers,that is, everyone likes mum.
quotes.author: Srtephen Arnott

quotes.quote: One loyal friend is worth ten thousand relatives.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: Man without relatives is man without trouble.
quotes.author: Charlie Chan

quotes.quote: When our relatives are at at home, we have to think of their good points or it would be impossible to endure them. But when they are away, we console ourselves for their absence by dwelling on their vices.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Many relatives make many quarrels.
quotes.author: Oyekan Owomoyela

quotes.quote: Distant relatives are the best kind; the further, the better.
quotes.author: Kin Hubbard

quotes.quote: The rich never have to seek out their relatives.
quotes.author: Jon R. Stone

quotes.quote: Your soul to God, your body to dust, your land to your relatives, 'tis written thus.
quotes.author: Jon R. Stone

quotes.quote: The hatred of relatives is the most violent. The hatred of those closest to us is the most bitter.
quotes.author: Jon R. Stone

quotes.quote: Every individual has a vast network of living cousins, most of them unaware of each other's relationship and existence. The key to understanding this complex relationship lies in determining the distant grandparents we share.
quotes.author: Lois Horowitz

quotes.quote: As in many families, relatives sometimes follow different paths through life. And my sisters and I , never did get to know these eleder cousins, aunts and uncles.
quotes.author: Lois Horowitz

quotes.quote: The more distant the cousin relationship, the more distant the grandparents those cousins share, the distance being in the number of generations and years that separate them.
quotes.author: Lois Horowitz

quotes.quote: Pedigree collapse is caused by cousins marrying cousins-- intentional mating between close cousins and random mating between distant ones who don't even know thet're related.
quotes.author: Alex Shoumatoff

quotes.quote: The American myth of cousin marriage is a case in point. It perpetuates the idea that procreation between first cousins carries an intolerble biological hazard for offspring.
quotes.author: Martin Ottenheimer

quotes.quote: Relatives prohibited from marrying vary from society to society without any conformity to biological distance.
quotes.author: Martin Ottenheimer

quotes.quote: We've had cloning in the south for years. It's called cousins.
quotes.author: Robin Williams
