quotes.quote: The bond that links your true family is not one of blood, but of respect and joy in each other's life.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: My cousins are shareholders of my soul..
quotes.author: Saswat Padhy

quotes.quote: Your most expensive advice is the free advice you receive from your financially struggling friends and relatives.
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.quote: Success is a relative term. It brings so many relatives.
quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

quotes.quote: Never judge someone by their relatives.
quotes.author: Charles Martin

quotes.quote: Every million I gain an enemy or a cousin. And people's feelings have changed ever since I became somethin.
quotes.author: Drake

quotes.quote: Sacred cows make the tastiest hamburger.
quotes.author: Abbie Hoffman

quotes.quote: Sacred cows make very poor gladiators.
quotes.author: Nikki Giovanni

quotes.quote: The cow is nothing but a machine which makes grass fit for us people to eat.
quotes.author: John McNulty

quotes.quote: Keep a cow, and then the milk won't have to be watered but once.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.quote: If cows and horses had hands and could draw, cows would draw gods that look like cows and horses would draw gods that look like horses.
quotes.author: Xenophanes

quotes.quote: Cow protection means protection of the weak, the helpless, the dumb and the deaf.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: The cow knows not what her tail is worth till she has lost it.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: A cow's heaven is a flower's idea of hell.
quotes.author: Oliver Gaspirtz

quotes.quote: Mother cow is in many ways better than the mother who gave us birth.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: You should never hesitate to trade your cow for a handful of magic beans.
quotes.author: Tom Robbins

quotes.quote: The cow's point of view deserves more literary attention.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: Even a cow creates ambiguous signifiers. The moo of mystery.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: You can only milk a cow so long, then you're left holding the pail.
quotes.author: Hank Aaron

quotes.quote: The cow is of the bovine ilk; one end is moo, the other milk.
quotes.author: Ogden Nash

quotes.quote: We need to respect the fact that cows are herbivores, and that does not mean feeding them corn and chicken manure.
quotes.author: Joel Salatin

quotes.quote: Cows are amongst the gentlest of breathing creatures; none show more passionate tenderness to their young when deprived of them; and, in short, I am not ashamed to profess a deep love for these quiet creatures.
quotes.author: Thomas de Quincey

quotes.quote: A cow is a very good animal in the field, but we turn her out of a garden.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: A dead cow or sheep lying in a pasture is recognized as carrion. The same sort of a carcass dressed and hung up in a butcher's stall passes as food.
quotes.author: John Harvey Kellogg

quotes.quote: To give your sheep or cow a large, spacious meadow is the way to control him.
quotes.author: Shunryu Suzuki

quotes.quote: Every sacred cow in the business has to do with economics.
quotes.author: Gena Rowlands

quotes.quote: If a cow laughed, would milk come out her nose?
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: Cow protection is the gift of Hinduism to the world.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: The cow is the purest type of sub-human life.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Mother cow is as useful dead as when she is alive.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Cows scream louder than carrots.
quotes.author: Alan Watts

quotes.quote: The cow to me is a sermon on pity.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: You cannot be a hero without being a coward.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Cowards do not count in battle; they are there, but not in it.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: A dog barks when his master is attacked. I would be a coward if I saw that God's truth is attacked and yet would remain silent.
quotes.author: John Calvin

quotes.quote: Faint heart never won fair lady.
quotes.author: Miguel de Cervantes

quotes.quote: He was just a coward and that was the worst luck any many could have.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: The coward fears the prick of Fate, not he who dares all, becoming himself the dreaded one.
quotes.author: Elise Pumpelly Cabot

quotes.quote: For cowards the road of desertion should be left open; they will carry over to the enemy nothing, but their fears.
quotes.author: Christian Nestell Bovee

quotes.quote: It's when you run away that you're most liable to stumble.
quotes.author: Casey Robinson

quotes.quote: Any coward can fight a battle when he's sure of winning; but give me the man who has pluck to fight when he's sure of losing.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: A coward is much more exposed to quarrels than a man of spirit.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: A coward boasting of his courage may deceive strangers, but he is a laughing-stock to those who know him.
quotes.author: Phaedrus

quotes.quote: Cowardice rightly understood begins with selfishness and ends with shame.
quotes.author: Jose Rizal

quotes.quote: The coward only threatens when he is safe.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: There is always a philosophy for lack of courage.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: The worst cowards, banded together, have their power.
quotes.author: Homer

quotes.quote: That man is not truly brave who is afraid either to seem or to be, when it suits him, a coward.
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.quote: The coward's weapon, poison.
quotes.author: John Fletcher

quotes.quote: Haters and bullies are always cowards, you know. They like to pick on little guys.
quotes.author: Scylar Tyberius

quotes.quote: There never was found a man who had courage to acknowledge himself a coward.
quotes.author: Joseph R Bartlett

quotes.quote: It is better to be the widow of a hero than the wife of a coward.
quotes.author: Dolores Ibarruri

quotes.quote: A coward is a hero with a wife, kids, and a mortgage.
quotes.author: Marvin Kitman

quotes.quote: Apathy adds up, in the long run, to cowardice.
quotes.author: Rollo May

quotes.quote: Cowardice, as distinguished from panic, is almost always simply a lack of ability to suspend the functioning of the imagination.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: A coward is one who in a perilous emergency thinks with his legs.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: If you build the guts to do something, anything, then you better save enough to face the consequences.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: A coward talks to everyone but you.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: It is the coward who fawns upon those above him. It is the coward who is insolent whenever he dares be so.
quotes.author: Junius

quotes.quote: I'm really a peaceful sort of coward.
quotes.author: L.A. Meyer

quotes.quote: Chirp of coward shouted in crowd, dare to speak but not to be known.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: A cowardly cur barks more fiercely than it bites.
quotes.author: Quintus Curtius Rufus

quotes.quote: Fear has its use but cowardice has none.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: To know what is right and not do it is the worst cowardice.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: A coward may cover the ground with his words but when the time comes to fight he runs away.
quotes.author: Chinua Achebe

quotes.quote: The coward calls himself cautious, the miser thrifty.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: It was always himself that the coward abandoned first. After this all other betrayals came easily.
quotes.author: Cormac Mccarthy

quotes.quote: Nearly every man is a coward, if confronted by the proper terror.
quotes.author: Edgar Watson Howe

quotes.quote: I'm a hero with coward's legs.
quotes.author: Spike Milligan

quotes.quote: Staying silent is like a slow growing cancer to the soul and a trait of a true coward. There is nothing intelligent about not standing up for yourself. You may not win every battle. However, everyone will at least know what you stood for you.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: A coward's courage is in his tongue.
quotes.author: Burke

quotes.quote: None but a coward dares to boast that he has never known fear.
quotes.author: Ferdinand Foch

quotes.quote: Coward: One who, in a perilous emergency, thinks with his legs.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: Cowards die many times before their deaths. The valiant never taste of death but once.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: A coward: a man or woman who is unsatisfied by his condition and believes he was destined to accept it that way.
quotes.author: Bangambiki Habyarimana

quotes.quote: I'd like to see one person just one who would own up to having been a coward.
quotes.author: Edith Piaf

quotes.quote: There is but one coward on earth, and that is the coward that dare not know.
quotes.author: W.E.B. Du Bois

quotes.quote: A coward is incapable of exhibiting love; it is the prerogative of the brave.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Cowards can never be moral.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Cowards dare others to do what they themselves do not dare to do.
quotes.author: Ana Monnar

quotes.quote: A man that flies from his fear may find that he has only taken a short cut to meet it.
quotes.author: J. R. R. Tolkien

quotes.quote: Some cowboys have to much tumbleweed in their blood to settle down.
quotes.author: Ken Alstad

quotes.quote: If you think bull riding' isn't intense, come sit on his back and try on my saddle. This aint for tenderfoots.
quotes.author: Clancy Jean Driscoll

quotes.quote: No hour of life is wasted that is spent in the saddle.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: No man should have cowboys boots in his wardrobe. That's fair enough, isn't it? Unless you're a cowboy, of course.
quotes.author: Paul Weller

quotes.quote: Ride E'm Cowboy, don't let them throw ya down.. You can't make no money if ya hit the ground, Ride E'm Cowboy, don't let them throw ya down, You're the toughest Cowboy in town.
quotes.author: Juice Newton

quotes.quote: A good cowman knows how to lie to the tax collector and the cattle buyer.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: When my time comes, just skin me and put me up there on Trigger, just as though nothing had ever changed.
quotes.author: Roy Rogers

quotes.quote: Cowboys need nothin' more than a hat, horse, and the will to ride.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: We have a sense that we should be like the mythical cowboy... able to take on and conquer anything and live in the world without the need for other people.
quotes.author: Morrie Schwartz

quotes.quote: Any cowboy can carry a tune. The trouble comes when he tries to unload it.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: It doesn't matter if a Cowboy lives in the mountains or in the flats, as long as it's warm and there is a place to lay his hat.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: When I grew up, I only had two dreams. One was to be a cowboy and another was to be in the military. I grew up extremely patriotic and riding horses.
quotes.author: Chris Kyle

quotes.quote: Cowboys work hard, play well, love soft, and are a hell of alot better than any other boy I've ever seen.
quotes.author: Olivia Flannery

quotes.quote: Now you are thinking like a thief. Fewer guns and more exits. We'll cure your cowboy ways yet.
quotes.author: Richard Kadrey

quotes.quote: There is no better place to heal a broken heart than on the back of a horse.
quotes.author: Missy Lyons

quotes.quote: The cowboy must never shoot first, hit a smaller man or take unfair advantage.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Cowboys are gentlemen who treat women with respect and work hard. They use their manners more than any other man would and ride horse and bulls like their is no tomorrow.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: A decent cowboy does not take what belongs to someone else and if he does he deserves to be strung up and left for the flies and coyotes.
quotes.author: Judge Roy Bean

quotes.quote: The horse is a mirror to your soul. And sometimes you might not like what you see in the mirror.
quotes.author: Buck Brannaman

quotes.quote: First buy a cowboy hat and boots. Then you're on your way to being a Texan.
quotes.author: James A. Michener

quotes.quote: Ain't nuthin' like ridin' a fine horse in new country.
quotes.author: Agustus MacCrae

quotes.quote: A true cowboy knows love, pain and shame but never cares about fame.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: When you're young and you fall off a horse, you may break something. When you're my age, you splatter.
quotes.author: Roy Rogers

quotes.quote: Where the leather is scarred, there is a great story to tell.
quotes.author: Jimmy Tart

quotes.quote: Let him ride a horse. He's a cowboy ain't he.
quotes.author: Nathanael West

quotes.quote: You can tell a true cowboy by the type of horse that he rides.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Learn this well, the last ride is never the last ride. And the end is not the end.
quotes.author: Richard Rowland

quotes.quote: Cowboys don't go around breaking hearts.
quotes.author: Missy Lyons

quotes.quote: The only good reason to ride a bull is to meet a nurse.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: I took to the life of a cowboy like a horse takes to oats.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: A cowboy is a man with guts and a horse.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: True cowboys are the ones who aren't afraid to get dirty.
quotes.author: Lane Frost

quotes.quote: Real cowboys never run, they just ride away.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Cowboys they are all so tough on the outside, but so sweet and soft on the inside.
quotes.author: Amber

quotes.quote: It ain't the clothes that make the cowgirl, it's the attitude and heart.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Boots, chaps and cowboy hats. Nothing else matters.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: It's a lot like nuts and bolts-if the rider's nuts, the horse bolts!
quotes.author: Nicholas Evans

quotes.quote: I took to the life of a cowboy like a horse takes to oats.
quotes.author: Clinton McCoy

quotes.quote: The essential joy of being with horses is that it brings us in contact with the rare elements of grace, beauty, spirit and fire.
quotes.author: Shannon Ralls Lemon

quotes.quote: Horses and life, it’s all the same to me.
quotes.author: Buck Brannaman

quotes.quote: There is something about riding on a prancing horse that makes you feel like something, even when you aint worth a thing
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: A cowboy is defined by the work that he does. Any man lays claim to that name if he lives on a ranch and works--drives, brands, castrates, or nutures--a cattleman's herd.
quotes.author: Blake Allmendinger

quotes.quote: The cowboy no doubt can be regarded as a proud rider, skilled, observant, alert, resourceful, unyielding, daring, punctilious in a code peculiar to his occupation, and faithful to his trust.
quotes.author: Charles W. Harris, Buck Rainey

quotes.quote: The cowboy has been called America's folk hero.
quotes.author: Charles W. Harris, Buck Rainey

quotes.quote: That the cowboy is one of the most romantic figures in American history is uncontested.
quotes.author: Charles W. Harris, Buck Rainey

quotes.quote: Like the bears, the cowboy seemed to hibernate in the winter, and our only glimpse of him or the West was invariably in a summer setting.
quotes.author: Charles W. Harris, Buck Rainey

quotes.quote: Cowboys come in many different shapes and sizes but all cowboys must be able to ride horses.
quotes.author: Meg Clibbon

quotes.quote: The cowboys can rest and look at the distant mountains, the fish in the creek and the setting sun.
quotes.author: Meg Clibbon

quotes.quote: Cowboy films often show cowboys who are handsome, clean shaven, young and fair skinned. In real life cowboys were often quite old. They were covered in dust and had little time to wash or shave. Usually their horses were more handsome than they were.
quotes.author: Meg Clibbon

quotes.quote: The cowboy remains an excellent model of popular history-- authoritative yet acccessible.
quotes.author: Philip Ashton Rollins

quotes.quote: The cowboy was far more than a theatric character. He was an affirmative, constructive factor in the social and political development of the United States.
quotes.author: Philip Ashton Rollins

quotes.quote: The cowboy I know is a working man. He is defined by his work, which should not be confused with the term 'job'.
quotes.author: John R. Erickson

quotes.quote: Cowboy work is more than a job; it is a life-style and a medium of expression.
quotes.author: John R. Erickson

quotes.quote: Remove the cowboy from his working environment and you have someone else, someone who resembles a cowboy in outward appearance but who, to one degree or another, is an imposter.
quotes.author: John R. Erickson

quotes.quote: Since he lives where he work, andsince he deals with animals instead of machines, the cowboy is never really off work .
quotes.author: John R. Erickson

quotes.quote: The cowboy life attracts special type of individual who can shift for himself and endure isolation, and one who thrives on physical hardship, a certain amount of danger, and low wages.
quotes.author: John R. Erickson

quotes.quote: The cowboy doesn't have to punch a time clock, drive through snarls of traffic every morning, shave, wear a tie, or participate in office rituals to gain advancement.When he gets tired of the scenery, or if the boss crowds him too close, he packs his few possessions in a pick up and horse trailer, and moves on to another ranch.
quotes.author: John R. Erickson

quotes.quote: The cowboy is a common laborer with heroic tendencies and a sense of humor.
quotes.author: John R. Erickson

quotes.quote: A good old rodeo never hurt anyone.
quotes.author: Taylor Kitsch

quotes.quote: Inside every cowboy there’s a lady who’d love to slip out.
quotes.author: Willie Nelson

quotes.quote: If your were out west about a hundred years ago, you might heard a cowboy yelling--ti yi yippy yay!- as he rode across the plains.
quotes.author: Lucille Recht Penner

quotes.quote: Cowboy lived on a cattle ranches. A ranch had a house for the rancher and his family, barns for animals, and a bunkhouse where the cowboys slept.
quotes.author: Lucille Recht Penner

quotes.quote: What was it like to be a cowboy-- to ride thousands of miles across the prairie.. to sleep under the stars at night.. to face storms and cattle rustlers and spampedes?Come take a ride with some cowboys and learn all about their exicting lives in the old west!
quotes.author: Lucille Recht Penner

quotes.quote: I thought being a cowboy would be a terribly romantic thing to do. But it wasn't. I shoveled a lot of stalls.
quotes.author: Bob Weir

quotes.quote: There's a big difference between me and a real, legitimate working hand, or a world-champion rodeo cowboy. I play 'em, and I aspire to be like that, but those guys are tough.
quotes.author: Luke Perry

quotes.quote: If you're going to wear a cowboy hat, you're going to have to go all the way. You should have livestock around you, settle all of your disputes with a pistol, and ride a horse absolutely everywhere.
quotes.author: Tom Segura

quotes.quote: In a lot of places in the United States and certainly even more places around the world, the image of the cowboy has become, for some people, a negative one. The word 'cowboy' implies a strong, stubborn individual whose individualism depends on pulling down other people's individualism.
quotes.author: Viggo Mortensen

quotes.quote: Every coach has his own style of play, but when you spend your whole life as a Cowboy, you have to be influenced by what we did
quotes.author: Tom Landry

quotes.quote: Cowboys don't get married, unless they stop being cowboys.
quotes.author: David Goodman

quotes.quote: Kid, cowboying is something you do when you can't do nothing else.
quotes.author: Dick Richards,Eric Bercovici

quotes.quote: A cowboy would rather throw a bull than eat beans with his knife.
quotes.author: Charles Dorian

quotes.quote: These cowboys follow the rodeos from town to town in an effort to win some prize money and, incidentally, to break a few bones. Some of them win prize money.
quotes.author: Charles Dorian

quotes.quote: They use to tell me, ride 'em cowboy don't let 'em throw you down / You can't make no money if you hit the ground / They say, ride 'em cowboy don't let 'em throw you down / You're the toughest cowboy in town.
quotes.author: Paul Davis

quotes.quote: The cowboy and the lady, as different as could be / But it seemed so right that rainy night in Tennessee.
quotes.author: Bobby Goldsboro

quotes.quote: I think I'd rather be a cowboy, I think I'd rather ride the range. / I think I'd rather be a cowboy than to lay me down in love and lady's chains.
quotes.author: John Denver

quotes.quote: Rodeo ain't no ordinary life / But a cowboy ain't no ordinary man
quotes.author: Tracy Byrd

quotes.quote: Driving all night too many miles to go / Pedal tot he metal listenin' to the radio / I got three days to get from Cheyenne to San Antone / That's the life of a cowboy ridin' the rodeo
quotes.author: Kostas Lazarides,Vince Gill

quotes.quote: Ride cowboy ride hold on for your life / Eight seconds is a long long time when you're sitting on dynamite.
quotes.author: Kostas Lazarides,Vince Gill

quotes.quote: Now if you think the grass is greener on the far side of the hill, / All you cowboys: take it easy, there's no grass there at all.
quotes.author: Chris De Burgh

quotes.quote: That's cowboy logic, every cowboy's got it / He's got a simple solution to just about anything
quotes.author: Chik Rains.Don Cook

quotes.quote: Now a cowboy's got a set of rules that he lives by day to day / If you ask for his advice, he'll more than likely say / If it's a fence, mend it, if it's a dollar bill, spend it.
quotes.author: Chik Rains.Don Cook

quotes.quote: Cowboys they don't ever understand this thing between a woman and a man / Until they find the one they always lose
quotes.author: Jack Clement

quotes.quote: When a horse wants to run, there ain't no sense in closing the gate / You can have your space, cowboy.
quotes.author: Kacey Musgraves, Luke Laird, Shane McAnally

quotes.quote: I'd like to be a cowboy an' ride a fiery hoss / Way out into the big an' boundless west; / I'd kill the bears an' catamounts an' wolves I come across, / An' I'd pluck the bal' head eagle from his nest! / With my pistols at my side
quotes.author: Eugene Field

quotes.quote: A Cowboy never says goodbye, / it’s not in his nature.
quotes.author: Kurt Philip Behm

quotes.quote: Spending that many hours in the saddle gave a man plenty of time to think. That's why so many cowboys fancied themselves Philosophers.
quotes.author: Charles Marion Russell

quotes.quote: I just fell in love with the cowboy way of life.
quotes.author: Donald Cerrone

quotes.quote: I feel like I'm going to be with the Cowboys the rest of my career, definitely. I love it.
quotes.author: Tony Romo

quotes.quote: Everyone has a first love, and mine was the western. When I was a child and dreamed of the movies, it was always as a cowboy on a white horse.
quotes.author: Franco Nero

quotes.quote: I always wanted to play a cowboy. I just didn't get to do it the way I thought I would.
quotes.author: Laurence Fishburne

quotes.quote: I'd like to live on horseback and just be a cowboy.
quotes.author: Paul Walker

quotes.quote: Every coach has his own style of play, but when you spend your whole life as a Cowboy, you have to be influenced by what we did.
quotes.author: Tom Landry

quotes.quote: I was feeling real good and real manly. Until a real cowboy walked by and told me I had my hat on backwards. So much for my career as a cowboy.
quotes.author: Michael Biehn

quotes.quote: They gave me the chaps and hat and everything. I looked like a real cowboy. I walked around the rodeo and thought, I am a real cowboy and thought everyone thought I was a real cowboy.
quotes.author: Michael Biehn

quotes.quote: I grew up in southeastern Oklahoma on a working cattle ranch, and it was always very romantic to me: The West, the cowboy, the Western way of life.
quotes.author: Reba McEntire

quotes.quote: When I grew up, I only had two dreams. One was to be a cowboy and another was to be in the military. I grew up extremely patriotic and riding horses.
quotes.author: Chris Kyle

quotes.quote: I just wanted to play a cowboy for a long time.
quotes.author: Daniel Craig

quotes.quote: I'm a neurotic fiction writer who'd like to be a cowboy.
quotes.author: Thomas McGuane

quotes.quote: I'm a neurotic fiction writer who'd like to be a cowboy.
quotes.author: Thomas McGuane

quotes.quote: If I could just make Westerns for the rest of my life, that's all I would do. It's my favorite movie to make. There's something about being a cowboy.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Dean Morgan

quotes.quote: I was a fan of westerns growing up. Every boy wanted to ride a horse and be a cowboy.
quotes.author: Lee Byung-hun

quotes.quote: People in Texas wear cowboy hats; they're good at keeping the sun off your neck and face.
quotes.author: Taylor Sheridan

quotes.quote: I like to wear cowboy gear once in a while. Whenever the occasion comes. In the ring, we used to wear a poncho and the hat.
quotes.author: Mikey Garcia

quotes.quote: The first picture of me that I know of was me in the crib wearing a pair of cowboy boots.
quotes.author: Marty Stuart

quotes.quote: It's been a childhood dream of mine to be a Cowboy, honestly.
quotes.author: Matt Cassel

quotes.quote: I grew up playing cowboy, and I still have all my Johnny West toys from when I was a kid. I have my actual toys from when I was five.
quotes.author: W. Earl Brown

quotes.quote: I think I was probably a cowboy in a past life.
quotes.author: Gin Wigmore

quotes.quote: I think I was probably a cowboy in a past life.
quotes.author: Gin Wigmore

quotes.quote: I think I was probably a cowboy in a past life.
quotes.author: Gin Wigmore

quotes.quote: A Cowboy never says goodbye, the wind his closest friend A Cowboy never says goodbye -- his heart to only lend.
quotes.author: Kurt Philip Behm

quotes.quote: A scant twenty years, grieved a century or more Poetically perfect, in spirit and lore A man and his horse alone on the range.
quotes.author: Kurt Philip Behm

quotes.quote: Undercover cowboy Workin undercovers all over town Just another plowboy tryin' to cover a lot of ground
quotes.author: Clint Black

quotes.quote: The cowboy lifts the doggie from its bed of sin Its mother's frozen, lost to winter's harm The dogie lifted high and dry above the saddle
quotes.author: Sons of the San Joaquin

quotes.quote: We're cowboys, cowboys forever And we'll stand together as long as we live and breathe We're cowboys, cowboys forever We've always been, it's what always be cowboys forever
quotes.author: Garth Brooks

quotes.quote: to canyons where rivers run below still movin' down that highway Lookin' for a place to go, Cause I'm a Neon Cowboy and I'm a ridin' the horse	to canyons where rivers run below still movin' down that highway Lookin' for a place to go, Cause I'm a Neon Cowboy and I'm a ridin' the horse
quotes.author: The Bellamy Brothers

quotes.quote: She put the boy back in cowboy And I was just a red-necked wanna be She put the boy back in cowboy That southern woman made a new man out of me
quotes.author: Jon Bon Jovi

quotes.quote: Cowboy, cowboy, in the big town I'm a cowboy in the big town I'm looking for my pony A mans best friend is his pony
quotes.author: The Sugarcubes

quotes.quote: Lonesome Cowboy Bill Rides the rodeo Lonesome Cowboy Bill You got to see him yodel "Ay -hee-ho!"
quotes.author: The Velvet Underground

quotes.quote: Well now cowboys love the ladies they like beans and sour dough Good horses and hot black coffee and camp fires burnin' low You know we love that cowboy music but I'll bet you didn't know That even cowboys like just a little rock and roll
quotes.author: Charlie Daniels

quotes.quote: Just about the worst gun battle I've ever had in the western plains When me and a bunch of cowboys Run on in
quotes.author: Jesse James

quotes.quote: Cowboys they are ladies men all right they'll love 'em up and talk 'em up all night but they're lonely when there's nothing else to do And that's what makes the cowboys sing the blues
quotes.author: Waylon Jennings

quotes.quote: In cowboy town, yeah cowboy town That's were I'm from Cowboy town we wear our boots to dinner drive our trucks to church
quotes.author: Brooks & Dunn

quotes.quote: There is no better place to heal a broken heart than on the back of a horse.
quotes.author: Missy Lyons

quotes.quote: A cowboy is a man with guts and a horse.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: Cowboys work hard, play well, love soft, and are a hell of alot better than any other boy I've ever seen.
quotes.author: Olivia Flannery

quotes.quote: No man should have cowboys boots in his wardrobe. That's fair enough, isn't it? Unless you're a cowboy, of course.
quotes.author: Paul Weller

quotes.quote: If it is a horse ride it, if it is a fence fix it, if she is a lady treat her like a queen.
quotes.author: James

quotes.quote: Cowboy is a breed tougher than nails and strong as steel.
quotes.author: HannahCheyenne

quotes.quote: A cowboy's hands are as strong as steel as tough as leather put soft enough to touch a hummingbirds wing and the skin of a woman and not disturb the beauty of either.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Cowboys don't go around breaking hearts.
quotes.author: Missy Lyons

quotes.quote: True Cowboys Are The Ones Who Aren't Afraid To Get Dirty.
quotes.author: Lane Frost

quotes.quote: The best way to describe a cowboy Is mud, blood, guts, and glory.
quotes.author: RedneckCowboy777

quotes.quote: In every cowboys life he gets himself a god horse a good woman and a good loop!
quotes.author: Kim

quotes.quote: Take time to appreciate employees and they will reciprocate in a thousand ways
quotes.author: Bob Nelson

quotes.quote: Treat employees like partners, and they act like partners.
quotes.author: Fred Allen

quotes.quote: The employees who share innovative ideas may also be the folks who have some hidden talents that would help incorporate their suggestions.
quotes.author: Harvey Mackay

quotes.quote: Public employees should have the right to bargain for better wages and working conditions, just like all employees do.
quotes.author: Robert Reich

quotes.quote: In a lot of work places, you work at a lot of jobs and people work more with their colleagues than with their family.
quotes.author: Russell Hornsby

quotes.quote: A lot of my colleagues have been people with broad interests in economics, not just narrowly focused interests.
quotes.author: Lars Peter Hansen

quotes.quote: Spending more time with my colleagues outside the Capitol helps build bipartisan relationships.
quotes.author: Erik Paulsen

quotes.quote: My dearest colleagues seem to become metamorphosed into snarling beasts if I as much as glance at them, even if my glance is a complimentary one.
quotes.author: Harry Ellis Dickson

quotes.quote: Sharing information with employees makes them feel invested.
quotes.author: Glen Mazzara

quotes.quote: If you fulfill the wishes of your employees, the employees will fulfill your visions.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: Appreciate everything your associates do for the business.
quotes.author: Sam Walton

quotes.quote: When you have that respect from your teammates, it makes it a lot more comfortable.
quotes.author: LeBron James

quotes.quote: Mature workers are less impulsive, less reactive, more creative and more centered.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: I don't see any of my colleagues as rivals. I don't think our generation needs to do that. We are a chilled out lot, and we should all be happy.
quotes.author: Shahid Kapoor

quotes.quote: Colleagues will malign you if you're a moderately successful journalist.
quotes.author: Robert Fisk

quotes.quote: Younger workers should have more freedom to build their retirement nest egg.
quotes.author: Gresham Barrett

quotes.quote: Workers must participate in progress to enjoy their work and take pride in its product.
quotes.author: George W. Romney

quotes.quote: It's better to hang out with people better than you. Pick out associates whose behavior is better than yours and you'll drift in that direction.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: Share your profits with all your associates, and treat them as partners. In turn, they will treat you as a partner, and together you will all perform beyond your wildest expectations.
quotes.author: Sam Walton

quotes.quote: I've never had a teammate competing with me my whole life.
quotes.author: Shawn Johnson

quotes.quote: We are far more liable to catch the vices than the virtues of our associates.
quotes.author: Denis Diderot

quotes.quote: When employees are happy, they are your very best ambassadors.
quotes.author: James Sinegal

quotes.quote: Once employees feel challenged, invigorated and productive, their efforts will naturally translate into profit and growth for the organisation.
quotes.author: Ricardo Semler

quotes.quote: It is rare to find a business partner who is selfless. If you are lucky it happens once in a lifetime.
quotes.author: Michael Eisner

quotes.quote: The most important quality in a partner is a sense of humour.
quotes.author: Clare Balding

quotes.quote: In choosing a partner, always pick the optimist.
quotes.author: Tony Lema

quotes.quote: All workers want is a fair shake.
quotes.author: James P. Hoffa

quotes.quote: An employee's motivation is a direct result of the sum of interactions with his or her manager.
quotes.author: Bob Nelson

quotes.quote: A productive employee who is kept busy working at his or her job is far more likely to be happy at that job and less likely to look for employment elsewhere.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: An employee who's one of hundreds, rather than one of a few, is unlikely to feel personally responsible for helping the organization adapt and change.
quotes.author: Gary Hamel

quotes.quote: A part-time worker is fully employed, half the time. In other words, they are part-time unemployees.
quotes.author: Jarod Kintz

quotes.quote: Most employees don't really want to be highly-paid; they just want to earn more than their peers, and, more importantly, more than their neighbours.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: I'm not the smartest fellow in the world, but I can sure pick smart colleagues.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: At every stage of my career I have had interesting and cordial colleagues, some of whom are close friends.
quotes.author: Daniel Nathans

quotes.quote: My peers and colleagues inspire me.
quotes.author: Robin Chase

quotes.quote: A trusty comrade is always of use; and a chronicler still more so.
quotes.author: Arthur Conan Doyle

quotes.quote: If the workers see themselves faced with defeat through starvation, they will prefer to go down fighting rather than fainting and whether or not we leaders agree.
quotes.author: Ernest Bevin

quotes.quote: I'm an incredibly hard worker, I'm incredibly tenacious, and I'm incredibly detail-oriented.
quotes.author: David Brock

quotes.quote: If you want creative workers, give them enough time to play.
quotes.author: John Cleese

quotes.quote: American workers are first rate.
quotes.author: Christopher Dodd

quotes.quote: My co-workers expect me to be late and temperamental.
quotes.author: Eva Gabor

quotes.quote: None of us is as smart as all of us.
quotes.author: Kenneth H. Blanchard

quotes.quote: The wisest mind has something yet to learn.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.quote: Friends and acquaintances are the surest passport to fortune.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.quote: I have a million acquaintances but just two or three true friends. I can't hide anything from them.
quotes.author: Ian Somerhalder

quotes.quote: We need two kinds of acquaintances, one to complain to, while to the others we boast.
quotes.author: Logan Pearsall Smith

quotes.quote: I have a lot of acquaintances, a few are buddies
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: An acquaintance is someone we know well enough to borrow from, but not well enough to lend to.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: When you invite people to share in your miracle, you create future allies during rough weather.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: We may have many acquaintances, but we can have but few friends; this made Aristotle say that he that hath many friends hath none.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: I respect fidelity to colleagues even though they are fit for the hangman.
quotes.author: Harold Laski

quotes.quote: Oh, is there an app to help you get along with your coworker? There should be.
quotes.author: Quinn Perkins

quotes.quote: You will never make a good leader unless you have learned to follow. On those initial journeys when you are asked to pull your oar while another leads, learn what it takes to be a team player. Learn how to get along with others. Learn what loyalty and honesty are all about.
quotes.author: Dr. Robert Ballard

quotes.quote: Associate yourself with people of good quality, for it is better to be alone than in bad company.
quotes.author: Booker T. Washington

quotes.quote: I do not deny that many appear to have succeeded in a material way by cutting corners and by manipulating associates, both in their professional and in their personal lives. But material success is possible in this world and far more satisfying when it comes without exploiting others.
quotes.author: Alan Greenspan

quotes.quote: Winning promotion through Pull is a thing we all hate—in other people. Co-workers dislike the beneficiary of Pull (The Pullee) and usually express that dislike in comments on his incompetence.
quotes.author: Raymond Hull

quotes.quote: Not a soul dropped in to see me in my little cubicle in the office for days on end. I finally solved the problem by scratching my name off the door and replacing it with the legend 'Gents’ Room.'
quotes.author: Dorothy Parker

quotes.quote: There is no pain greater than losing a loved one except for running into a co-worker outside of work.
quotes.author: Mike Drucker

quotes.quote: Yesterday a co-worker's email to the whole company began with this accidental declaration: "Hell to all"
quotes.author: Tara Cunningham

quotes.quote: I like to lightheartedly tell my coworkers, "Don't even talk to me until I've had my coffee!" And then I never get coffee.
quotes.author: Julia Johns

quotes.quote: Just had to show a coworker where the secret stash of binder clips are. I'm now a black market office supply dealer.
quotes.author: Maria Walker

quotes.quote: Establish and maintain good working relationships with co-workers. You don't have to be friends, but you do have to be friendly.
quotes.author: Judy Smith

quotes.quote: If I had an office job, I'd probably be doing the exact same thing I'm doing on television: hanging out by the water cooler and talking to co-workers about their relationships.
quotes.author: Tracy McMillan

quotes.quote: In any situation, it is good to be aware of even your co-workers, and if you are uncomfortable or concerned about a colleague's behavior, report it to a supervisor.
quotes.author: Kimberly Guilfoyle

quotes.quote: I don't see any of my colleagues as rivals. I don't think our generation needs to do that. We are a chilled out lot, and we should all be happy.
quotes.author: Shahid Kapoor

quotes.quote: Coming together is beginning, staying together is progress, and working together is success.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: There is no such thing as a self-made man. You will reach your goals only with the help of others.
quotes.author: George Shinn

quotes.quote: It is amazing what you can accomplish if you do not care who gets the credit.
quotes.author: Harry Truman

quotes.quote: When I speak with people who love their jobs and have vital friendships at work, they always talk about how their workgroup is like a family.
quotes.author: Tom Rath

quotes.quote: It’s a very special thing when you go and get to work with your best friend every day.
quotes.author: Nick Frost

quotes.quote: I always say I’m not going to work; I’m going to play with my friends.
quotes.author: Brian Tyree Henry

quotes.quote: I have no desire to go to work and not work with my friends.
quotes.author: Xavier Woods

quotes.quote: When you’re working with your friends, it doesn’t feel like it’s work.
quotes.author: Ken Jeong

quotes.quote: Do I have a special someone? Well, yeah, of course. A bunch of ’em. My employees.
quotes.author: Michael Scott

quotes.quote: The people you work with are just, when you get down to it, your very best friends.
quotes.author: Michael Scott

quotes.quote: I once worked with a guy for three years and never learned his name. Best friend I ever had. We still never talk sometimes.
quotes.author: Ron Swanson

quotes.quote: Positive culture comes from being mindful, and respecting your coworkers, and being empathetic.
quotes.author: Biz Stone

quotes.quote: "Sometimes we see things as being black or white. Perhaps you have two categories of coworkers in your mind - the good ones and the bad ones. Or, maybe you look at each project as either a success or a failure. Recognize the shades of gray, rather than putting things in terms of all good or all bad.
quotes.author: Amy Morin

quotes.quote: If you're not making use of even the most routine assignment to learn something, realize that many of your colleagues and coworkers are.
quotes.author: Adena Friedman

quotes.quote: There are many ways to deal with annoying coworkers, but obviously the most effective way is to picture them as rappers. Picturing your coworkers as rappers makes you laugh and provides a helpful nickname that can be used when talking about them behind their backs.
quotes.author: Sarah Cooper

quotes.quote: Motivation comes from working on things we care about. It also comes from working with people we care about.
quotes.author: Sheryl Sandberg

quotes.quote: People are more likely to remember the great social interaction they had with a colleague than the great meeting they both attended.
quotes.author: Ron Garan

quotes.quote: Each [co-worker] works his or her way, not your way. And each is entitled to work in his or her way. What matters is whether they perform and what their values are. As far as how they perform--each is likely to do it differently. The first secret to effectiveness is to understand the people you work with and depend on so that you can make use of their strengths, their ways of working, and their values. Working relationships are as much based on the people as they are on the work.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: Get Comfortable being uncomfortable
quotes.author: Jillian Michaels

quotes.quote: Find what makes you feel comfortable. The confidence you wear your clothes in is what's really going to shine.
quotes.author: Hayley Hasselhoff

quotes.quote: Fear only the warm embrace of passive stupidity.
quotes.author: Guy P. Harrison

quotes.quote: Being comfortable isn't the way to learn to expand your abilities.
quotes.author: Thomas Perry

quotes.quote: Don't get too comfortable with who you are at any given time - you may miss the opportunity to become who you want to be.
quotes.author: Jon Bon Jovi

quotes.quote: Just be comfortable with who you are.
quotes.author: Chris Pratt

quotes.quote: Be warm, be pure, be amorous, but be chaste.
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.quote: There's some quality you get when you're not totally comfortable. When you're not doing what you're used to, you could completely fall on your face. You could completely blow it.
quotes.author: Beck

quotes.quote: You can't just be in one thing and be comfortable in that one thing. You have to understand multiple things and how they all connect.
quotes.author: Maria Rodale

quotes.quote: If youre comfortable with who you are, it shows in your walk.
quotes.author: Dawn Olivieri

quotes.quote: It's uncomfortable to resist the urge to settle.
quotes.author: Seth Godin

quotes.quote: When you're comfortable, you're not necessarily inclined to care about things that are contributing to your comfort. It's difficult.
quotes.author: Alex Ebert

quotes.quote: Comfortable means gradually more and more flattened down, more and more blunt - less and less sharp and biting into you.
quotes.author: Anne Carson

quotes.quote: The more you seek the uncomfortable, the more you will become comfortable.
quotes.author: Conor McGregor

quotes.quote: You have to be comfortable in the uncomfortableness.
quotes.author: A. J. McLean

quotes.quote: Its important to be comfortable with uncertainty.
quotes.author: Xiaolu Guo

quotes.quote: If you're comfortable in your own skin, you will feel beautiful - and look beautiful to others, too.
quotes.author: Adriana Lima

quotes.quote: As you warm the climate, you basically raise the speed limit on hurricanes.
quotes.author: Kerry Emanuel

quotes.quote: There are risks and costs to action. But they are far less than the long range risks of comfortable inaction.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: There's nothing wrong with a woman being comfortable, confident.
quotes.author: Selena Gomez

quotes.quote: If we really feel like we're comfortable in our own skins now, we have a longer period of time to live out that kind of third or fourth act of our life.
quotes.author: Anna Quindlen

quotes.quote: One sits more comfortably on a colour that one likes.
quotes.author: Verner Panton

quotes.quote: You can't comfort the afflicted with afflicting the comfortable.
quotes.author: Princess Diana

quotes.quote: You can't control how other people see you or think of you. But you have to be comfortable with that.
quotes.author: Helen Mirren

quotes.quote: Just be comfortable in your own skin. And that's how you can be the sexiest woman that you can possibly be.
quotes.author: Princess Tatiana of Greece and Denmark

quotes.quote: We must become more comfortable with probability and uncertainty.
quotes.author: Nate Silver

quotes.quote: There's nothing as cozy as a piece of candy and a book.
quotes.author: Betty MacDonald

quotes.quote: Get comfortable with being alone. It will empower you.
quotes.author: Jonathan Tropper

quotes.quote: Being cozy makes me feel capable of getting through to the next moment, to help another, to accomplish something important—even to love.
quotes.author: Isabel Gillies

quotes.quote: I think cozy is a deeper beat, derived from a parent, a friend, a teacher, or your own good instincts.
quotes.author: Isabel Gillies

quotes.quote: Comfortable people enjoy the inestimable blessing of having comfortable servants.
quotes.author: M.B.H

quotes.quote: Easy to smile when life is rosy, / Everything settled and you are cozy, / "Smile" when everything goes wrong, / Boost up your confidence to go on!
quotes.author: Rama Mittal

quotes.quote: My room is like a box of summertime, / So cozy warm, close curtained fold on fold, / But somewhere out there in this winter clime / My heart is wailing in the bitter cold.
quotes.author: Jerry Jax

quotes.quote: And like a little birdling lie / Secure within thy cozy nest / Upon my loving mother breast, / And slumber to my lullaby.
quotes.author: Eugene Field

quotes.quote: I know it is damp and cold outside, / But inside I am so cozy and warm, / I could sit and watch it for hours, / Because it has such an elegant charm.
quotes.author: Judy Browning

quotes.quote: What people say about the price / Of flattering words I'm muffled up in which / As if they're cozy and soft cashmere.
quotes.author: Den Khaustov

quotes.quote: I want to cuddle up and cozy down with you / Nestle up against your skin, do anything that we want to / Makin' love, hugs and touch / And steal some kisses, too.
quotes.author: Dolly Parton

quotes.quote: Tell me what’s on your mind / Let me learn more of you / And I'll let you know me / While we get cozy.
quotes.author: Nia Anthony

quotes.quote: No need for makeup on your face / No need for clothes no need for shoes / whenever you're inside this space / I just want you comfortable / Cozy in my arms.
quotes.author: Winston Ward

quotes.quote: I want to / stay curled and cosied / and chocolated....forever / in my mother’s arms.
quotes.author: Sanober Khan

quotes.quote: I admire your dedication to literature. I think if I could live in your thoughts...your mind would seem a cosy place.
quotes.author: Caroline George

quotes.quote: The perfect antidote to dark, cold and creepy is light, warm, and cozy.
quotes.author: Candice Olson

quotes.quote: What is a cozy home? Where you enter and you feel the radiance of your divine self.
quotes.author: Harbhajan Singh Yogi

quotes.quote: We all enjoy being comfy, but my comfy - you know, I love a nice, cozy cashmere sweater and spandex, sure.
quotes.author: Olivia Palermo

quotes.quote: It's OK to pursue speculative ideas because we don't want to be too cozy and safe and assume that we know everything about life in the universe. However, we have to be rigorous and careful and honest and logical, and scientifically meticulous when we speculate.
quotes.author: David Greenspoon

quotes.quote: It's true that I'm not cozy. I'm more reserved.
quotes.author: Coleen Atwood

quotes.quote: Having her favorite breakfast always made her feel cozy like a warm blanket was being wrapped around her.
quotes.author: Jessica Haight

quotes.quote: The greatest investment and greatest fair deal and enterprise is family, cozy homes. A cozy home is based on cozy people. Cozy people are not brought and imported, they are made from the time of birth to the time of infinity.
quotes.author: Harbhajan Singh Yogi

quotes.quote: I literally could not feel more cozy right now if I were actually inside a marshmallow.
quotes.author: Alice Clayton

quotes.quote: Of any stopping place in life, it is good to ask whether it will be a good place from which to go on as well as a good place to remain.
quotes.author: Mary Catherine Bateson

quotes.quote: Here I am, where I ought to be. A writer must have a place where he or she feels this, a place to love and be irritated with.
quotes.author: Louise Erdrich

quotes.quote: You can't really say what is beautiful about a place, but the image of the place will remain vividly with you.
quotes.author: Tadao Ando

quotes.quote: Like those crabs which dress themselves with seaweed, we wear belief and custom.
quotes.author: Cyril Connolly

quotes.quote: A pound of Alaskan king crab legs and buffalo shrimp = happy Travie.
quotes.author: Travie McCoy

quotes.quote: The crab that walks too far falls into the pot.
quotes.author: Haitian Proverb

quotes.quote: In Baltimore, soft crabs are always fried (or broiled) in the altogether, with maybe a small jock-strap of bacon added.
quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

quotes.quote: Have you ever watched a crab on the shore crawling backward in search of the Atlantic Ocean, and missing? That's the way the mind of man operates.
quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

quotes.quote: What is the pattern that connects the crab to the lobster and the primrose to the orchid, and all of them to me, and me to you?
quotes.author: Gregory Bateson

quotes.quote: Currently, the green crab is viewed only as a pest species. The crab tends to eat what we eat. It's incredibly tough. And generally speaking, its presence in the water means fewer clams and lobsters. So, we'd like to turn around these negatives and make them into a positive.
quotes.author: Bill Walton

quotes.quote: Walk straight, my son - as the old crab said to the young crab.
quotes.author: Irish Proverb

quotes.quote: There is a saying in Baltimore that crabs may be prepared in fifty ways and that all of them are good.
quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

quotes.quote: As the sea-crab swimmeth always against the stream, so doth wit always against wisdom.
quotes.author: Pythagoras

quotes.quote: Stretch an unwavering tenacity when facing bad to worse attitudes.
quotes.author: Angelica Hopes

quotes.quote: People have a crab mentality, man. They're walking sideways.
quotes.author: Cody Wilson

quotes.quote: The best way to eat crabs, as everyone knows, is off newspaper at a large table with a large number of people.
quotes.author: Laurie Colwin

quotes.quote: You cannot teach a crab to walk straight.
quotes.author: Aristophanes

quotes.quote: The highest treason a crab can commit is to make a leap for the rim of the bucket.
quotes.author: Steven Pressfield

quotes.quote: There are three species of creatures who when they seem coming are going, when they seem going they come: diplomats, women, and crabs.
quotes.author: John Hay

quotes.quote: Worse, I have to admit to feeling the jealousy of one crab for another that has managed to climb out of the barrel.
quotes.author: Richard Russo

quotes.quote: Crab meat is surprisingly sweet in its purest form, which is why it is often pepped up with zippy chilli and lifted with citrus.
quotes.author: Rachel Khoo

quotes.quote: If a D.C. event doesn't have crab cakes, it's low-rent and you need to flee.
quotes.author: Tony Hale

quotes.quote: Oysters open completely when the moon is full; and when the crab sees one it throws a piece of stone or seaweed into it and the oyster cannot close again so that it serves the crab for meat. Such is the fate of him who opens his mouth too much and thereby puts himself at the mercy of the listener.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: Through searching out origins, one becomes a crab. The historian looks backwards, and finally he also believes backwards.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: A country without a patent office and good patent laws is just a crab, and can't travel any way but sideways and backways.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: There are souls which, crab-like, crawl continually toward darkness, going back in life rather than advancing in it, using what experience they have to increase their deformity, growing worse without ceasing, and becoming steeped more and more thoroughly in an intensifying wickedness.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Some versions of crab cakes are mostly crabmeat lightly bound with egg, but I'm a firm believer that a crab cake should contain bread crumbs.
quotes.author: Tom Douglas

quotes.quote: It is because of self-importance, why crab does not have a head.
quotes.author: Jamaican Saying

quotes.quote: An unwilling crab never gets fat.
quotes.author: Jamaican Saying

quotes.quote: A little crab hole spoils a big race horse.
quotes.author: Jamaican Saying

quotes.quote: If you put your ears close to the roots of a mango tree, you will hear crabs coughing.
quotes.author: Jamaican Saying

quotes.quote: A crab does not beget a bird.
quotes.author: African Proverb

quotes.quote: A lame crab walks straight.
quotes.author: Afghani Proverb

quotes.quote: Remove the claws of even a boiled crab.
quotes.author: Korean Proverb

quotes.quote: Our last deed, like the young of the land crab, wends its way to the sea of cause and effect as soon as born, and makes a drop there to eternity.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: The crab's daughter does not bear a bird.
quotes.author: West Africa Proverb

quotes.quote: He who builds on the favours of the great, advances towards fortune mounted on a crab.
quotes.author: German Proverb

quotes.quote: Big sisters are the crab grass in the lawn of life.
quotes.author: Charles M. Schulz

quotes.quote: Do not be the proverbial crab in a bucket and make war with those around you! Work together and grow! Love! Live Life!
quotes.author: Marvin Gaye

quotes.quote: In truth we are partners of the fish, the crab, the grasses that grow beyond our sight. Upon their survival hangs our own.
quotes.author: Jacques-Yves Cousteau

quotes.quote: Don’t be part of a bucket of crabs. Be the crab that gets out.
quotes.author: Leigh Alexandra

quotes.quote: Matter of fact, the only thing a crab is good for is holding back other crabs. A crab don't want to see another crab make it.
quotes.author: Lord Rufus Crabmiser

quotes.quote: Crab is like, "If I'm gonna die, we all gonna die." I admire that.
quotes.author: Lord Rufus Crabmiser

quotes.quote: A crab cannot hold in a lobster's shell.
quotes.author: Jamaican Saying

quotes.quote: Glistening golden sands of the beach, / A lunch box for venomous crabs, / Stormy waves dispatching sheets of salt, / With metallic clangs on crab shell, / Prompting elaborate spread of noxious tentacles, / Temporary dislocating the gallant brown spider, / Into well spun cocoons of slippery mud.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: I could see nothing behind that child's eye. / I have seen eyes in the street / Trying to peer through lighted shutters, / And a crab one afternoon in a pool, / An old crab with barnacles on his back, / Gripped the end of a stick which I held him.
quotes.author: T. S. Eliot

quotes.quote: Idleness makes people feeble and peevish. Work makes them stalwart and prone to anger.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: The worst families are those in which the members never really speak their minds to one another; they maintain an atmosphere of unreality, and every one always lives in an atmosphere of suppressed ill-feeling. It is the same with nations.
quotes.author: Walter Bagehot

quotes.quote: Man delights not me.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Righteous indignation: your own wrath as opposed to the shocking bad temper of others.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: If your day is full of little mean, dark thoughts, is it any wonder you feel crabby? Maybe it's because you let your mind run wild like a dog putting its nose into garbage everywhere.
quotes.author: Barbara De Angelis

quotes.quote: There is nobody so irritating as somebody with less intelligence and more sense than we have.
quotes.author: Don Herold

quotes.quote: There is always a secret irritation about a laugh into which we cannot join.
quotes.author: Agnes Repplier

quotes.quote: If you are irritated by every rub, how will your mirror be polished?
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: It is very important to understand why those annoying people annoy you and then figure out where that fits into your world.
quotes.author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quotes.quote: When the going gets tough, the tough refuse to talk about it and insist on running away to stew in their own crabby insecurities.
quotes.author: Darynda Jones

quotes.quote: The continuance and frequent fits of anger produce in the soul a propensity to be angry; which oftentimes ends in choler, bitterness, and moronity, when the mid becomes ulcerated, peevish, and querulous, and is wounded by the least occurrence.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: People say that if you're still angry at 52, you're not an angry young man, just a grumpy old git.
quotes.author: Paul Weller

quotes.quote: When you don't manage your life well, you become angry and frustrated as things don't go as intended, and our bad mood is a sign showing we were not able to resolve the conflict.
quotes.author: Jorge Bucay

quotes.quote: The best of men have ever loved repose: They hate to mingle in the filthy fray; Where the soul sours, and gradual rancour grows, Imbitter'd more from peevish day to day.
quotes.author: James Thomson

quotes.quote: There is no more irritating fellow than the man who tries to settle an argument about communism, or justice, or liberty, by quoting from Webster.
quotes.author: Mortimer Adler

quotes.quote: Worried about being a dull fellow? You might develop your talent for being irritating.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: But hard bitten cynicism leaves one feeling peevish, and too much of it can do lasting damage to your heart.
quotes.author: Julie Powell

quotes.quote: I'm old enough and cranky enough now that if someone tried to tell me what to do, I'd tell them where to put it.
quotes.author: Dolly Parton

quotes.quote: Feeling irritated, restless, afraid, and hopeless is a reminder to listen more carefully.
quotes.author: Pema Chodron

quotes.quote: Nothing is as peevish and pedantic as men's judgements of one another.
quotes.author: Desiderius Erasmus

quotes.quote: Prejudice is like a hair across your cheek. You can't see it, you can't find it with your fingers, but you keep brushing at it because the feel of it is irritating.
quotes.author: Marian Anderson

quotes.quote: Irritation is a great source of energy and creativity.
quotes.author: Anita Roddick

quotes.quote: I will stop being so irritable when people stop being so irritating.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: We must interpret a bad temper as a sign of inferiority.
quotes.author: Alfred Adler

quotes.quote: Nothing helps a bad mood like spreading it around.
quotes.author: Bill Watterson

quotes.quote: Nothing is as irritating as the fellow who chats pleasantly while he's overcharging you.
quotes.author: Kin Hubbard

quotes.quote: The crabby little girls of today are the crabby old women of tomorrow!
quotes.author: Charles M. Schulz

quotes.quote: Art never responds to the wish to make it democratic; it is not for everybody; it is only for those who are willing to undergo the effort needed to understand it.
quotes.author: Flannery O'Connor

quotes.quote: Craft against craft makes no living.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: Work done by you with unconditional love and pure devotion goes straight in the category of divine and immortal craft.
quotes.author: Seema Brain Openers

quotes.quote: When you make music or write or create, it's really your job to have mind-blowing, irresponsible, condomless sex with whatever idea it is you're writing about at the time.
quotes.author: Lady Gaga

quotes.quote: For the artisan, craft is an end in itself. For you, the artist, craft is the vehicle for expressing your vision. Craft is the visible edge of art.
quotes.author: David Bayles

quotes.quote: It is not enough to know your craft you have to have feeling. Science is all very well, but for us imagination is worth far more.
quotes.author: Edouard Manet

quotes.quote: Craft is a trick you make up to let you write the poem.
quotes.author: Anne Sexton

quotes.quote: Art without heart is craft.
quotes.author: Eric Gibbons

quotes.quote: Craft can get you through ninety percent of a piece, but it's art that carries you at the end.
quotes.author: Stephen Graham Jones

quotes.quote: There are two men inside the artist, the poet and the craftsman. One is born a poet. One becomes a craftsman.
quotes.author: Emile Zola

quotes.quote: Writing is a craft, being an author is work, and having readers and a following is a gift.
quotes.author: Michael J. Kannengieser

quotes.quote: Art that submits to orthodoxy, to even the soundest doctrines, but lacks imagination and deep self-expression is lost leaving only the craftsmanship.
quotes.author: Andre Gide

quotes.quote: The craft or art of writing is the clumsy attempt to find symbols for the wordlessness.
quotes.author: John Steinbeck

quotes.quote: In crafting ther eare no mistakes just unique creations.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The Craft was what it was. People who respond to that movie respond to it really strongly.
quotes.author: Robin Tunney

quotes.quote: The moment a man begins to talk about technique that's proof that he is fresh out of ideas.
quotes.author: Raymond Chandler

quotes.quote: The craft of painting has virtually disappeared. There is hardly anyone left who really possesses it. For evidence one has only to look at the painters of this century.
quotes.author: Balthus

quotes.quote: Crafts make us feel rooted, give us a sense of belonging and connect us with our history. Our ancestors used to create these crafts out of necessity, and now we do them for fun, to make money and to express ourselves.
quotes.author: Phyllis George

quotes.quote: The only thing you have then to believe in is your craft.
quotes.author: Frank Langella

quotes.quote: The best craftsmanship always leaves holes and gaps, so that something that is not in the poem can creep, crawl, flash or thunder in
quotes.author: Dylan Thomas

quotes.quote: You should put time into learning your craft. It seems like people want success so quickly, way before they're ready.
quotes.author: Lucinda Williams

quotes.quote: Without craftsmanship, inspiration is a mere reed shaken in the wind.
quotes.author: Johannes Brahms

quotes.quote: The Crafts which require the most Time intraining or most Ingenuityand Industry must necessarily be the best paid.
quotes.author: Richard Cantillon

quotes.quote: We are all apprentices in a craft where no one ever becomes a master.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: Well you can't teach the poetry, but you can teach the craft.
quotes.author: David Hockney

quotes.quote: Your craft is comprehensive if it represents you.
quotes.author: Unarine Ramaru

quotes.quote: You want to be a bit compulsive in your art or craft or whatever you do.
quotes.author: Steve Martin

quotes.quote: Craft can be practiced by anyone, regardless of the skill or artistry that has come to be demanded by those who preach craft. Like a good meal, a good Crafternoon shouldn't need much - a few quality ingredients, a couple of good friends, and a little bit of creativity.
quotes.author: Maura Madden

quotes.quote: If you're lucky as you get older, you respect the craft and it becomes a skill.
quotes.author: Frank Langella

quotes.quote: If you learn the craft, you can make a movie and get by with tricks.
quotes.author: D. B. Sweeney

quotes.quote: If you're any good at all, you know you can be better.
quotes.author: Lindsay Buckingham

quotes.quote: The craft of the novelist does lie first of all in story-telling.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Bowen

quotes.quote: A craft can only have meaning when it serves a spiritual way.
quotes.author: Titus Burckhardt

quotes.quote: Whatever your craft is, be a master of it. Being half assed at something, people will eventually see through.
quotes.author: Kid Rock

quotes.quote: The life so short, the craft so long to learn.
quotes.author: Hippocrates

quotes.quote: Craft is part of the creative process.
quotes.author: Gavin Bryars

quotes.quote: Craft is everything.
quotes.author: Omari Hardwick

quotes.quote: You either create something and you keep it a secret and you die with it, or you can benefit the craft.
quotes.author: Vidal Sassoon

quotes.quote: Our craft is all we have. So, we should keep it challenging and exciting. Else, there's no actual growth.
quotes.author: Jacqueline Fernandez

quotes.quote: Before undertaking his craft, the artisan first sharpens his tools.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: No one masters his craft the first day.
quotes.author: Roman Proverb

quotes.quote: He who is of the craft can discourse about it.
quotes.author: Italian Proverb

quotes.quote: I did not begin with craft, I began with strong feelings and worked toward craft.
quotes.author: Dorothy Allison

quotes.quote: Art stands on the shoulders of craft, which means that to get to the art, you must master the craft. If you want to write, practice writing.
quotes.author: Ann Patchett

quotes.quote: A screenplay is a piece of carpentry, and except in the case of Ingmar Bergman, it's not an art, it's a craft. And you want to be as good as you can at your craft.
quotes.author: William Goldman

quotes.quote: With practice, the craft will come almost of itself, in spite of you, and all the more easily if you think of something besides technique.
quotes.author: Paul Gauguin

quotes.quote: The only craft and technique you have legitimate access to is the craft and technique you forgot, that has dissolved itself into the unconscious ...because you have learned it so well you have forgotten it.
quotes.author: Robert Olen Butler

quotes.quote: The objects are a medium of communication between people who live profoundly different lives but who can respond to the symbols, textures, and forms that express distinct cultural traditions.
quotes.author: June C. Nash

quotes.quote: There may be an element of art in craft or an element of craft in art.
quotes.author: Malcolm McCollough

quotes.quote: Craft is certainly an application of skill, and it may yet involve the skilled hand.
quotes.author: Malcolm McCollough

quotes.quote: Being made by human hands, the craft is made for human hands: we can not only see it but caress it with our fingers.
quotes.author: Malcolm McCollough

quotes.quote: Craft remains skilled work applied toward practical ends. It is indescribable talent with describable aims. It is habitual skilled practice with particular tools, materials, or media, for the purpose of making increasingly well-executed artifacts.
quotes.author: Malcolm McCollough

quotes.quote: Craft is certainly an application of skill, and it may yet involve the skilled hand.
quotes.author: Malcolm McCollough

quotes.quote: Crafts, in all their variety, are considered suitable markers of cultural identity.
quotes.author: Graburn

quotes.quote: A work of utility might also be a work of art if we cared to make it so.
quotes.author: William Morris

quotes.quote: Words have to be crafted, not sprayed. They need to be fitted together with infinite care.
quotes.author: Norman Cousins

quotes.quote: Work your craft; until it becomes an art form.
quotes.author: Johnnie Dent, Jr.

quotes.quote: He who works with his hands is a laborer. / He who works with his hands and his head is a craftsman. / He who works with his hands and his head and his heart is an artist.
quotes.author: Francis of Assisi

quotes.quote: Craft makes our homes more human.
quotes.author: Ilse Crawford

quotes.quote: There is something deeply satisfying in shaping something with your hands. Proper artificing is like a song made solid. It is an act of creation.
quotes.author: Patrick Rothfuss

quotes.quote: Art is not a handicraft, it is the transmission of feeling the artist has experienced.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: Life is a craft no one masters. But we will see an abundance of amazing colors, beautiful views, and stunning insights along the way.
quotes.author: Ricky Maye

quotes.quote: Crafting your work beats being told what to do.
quotes.author: Richie Norton

quotes.quote: Hands can cook, hands can create, hands can kill. There is no better tool than our hands.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: The art and craft of early childhood teaching are in making decisions about fun, play, and work. And it is this crafting that distinguishes the professional from the babysitter, parent, or childminder.
quotes.author: Susan Grieshaber and Felicity McArdle

quotes.quote: No. Not yet. A craftsman only. But I dream to be an artist. I pray that someday if I work with enough care if I am very very lucky, I will make a weapon that is a work of art. Call me an artist then, and I will answer.
quotes.author: William Goldman

quotes.quote: ...the making of stories is only one part of my craft -mainly, I'm a heart whisperer...
quotes.author: John Geddes

quotes.quote: Be a craftsman in speech that thou mayest be strong, for the strength of one is the tongue, and speech is mightier than all fighting
quotes.author: Ptahhotep

quotes.quote: A poet should be so crafty with words that he is envied even for his pains.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: A person with his good writing can make some earning, but if he seems to be enjoying luxury living then probably it's time for all to see the intention of the people behind his promotion.
quotes.author: Anuj Somany

quotes.quote: That crafty kindness which inveigles me to sacrifice principle is the serpent in the grass deadly to the incautious wayfarer.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.quote: Clever is when one is crafty enough to mistake your imagination for intelligence. Smart is when one assumes they are too educated to notice the difference.
quotes.author: Kerry E. Wagner

quotes.quote: The crafty person is always in danger; and when they think they walk in the dark, all their pretenses are transparent.
quotes.author: John Tillotson

quotes.quote: Humans are pretty crafty but will fold quickly in severe cold.
quotes.author: Henry Rollins

quotes.quote: Facts can be turned into art if one is artful enough.
quotes.author: Paul Simon

quotes.quote: The art of using deceit and cunning grow continually weaker and less effective to the user.
quotes.author: John Tillotson

quotes.quote: Cunning grows in deceit at seeing itself discovered, and tries to deceive with truth itself.
quotes.author: Balthasar Gracian

quotes.quote: Cunning is the art of concealing our own defects, and discovering other people's weaknesses.
quotes.author: William Hazlitt

quotes.quote: Cunning is only the mimic of discretion, and may pass upon weak men in the same manner as vivacity is often mistaken for wit, and gravity for wisdom.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.quote: Cunning is natural to mankind. It is the sense of our weakness, and an attempt to effect by concealment what we cannot do openly and by force.
quotes.author: William Hazlitt

quotes.quote: A cunning mind emphatically delights in its own cunning, and is the ready prey of cunning.
quotes.author: Anna Jameson

quotes.quote: The weak in courage is strong in cunning.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: The most effectual way to be deceived is to believe oneself more cunning than one's neighbors.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: Righteous indignation: your own wrath as opposed to the shocking bad temper of others.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Bad temper is its, own scourge. Few things are more bitter than to feel bitter. A man's venom poisons himself more than his victim.
quotes.author: Charles Buxton

quotes.quote: A pleasant smile is the password to welcome and friendshipâ€”from your superior, your equal or your inferior in rank. No one likes a grouch or a crepehanger, or wants him around if they can help it.
quotes.author: C.A. Morse

quotes.quote: That's one of the peculiar things about bad moods - we often fool ourselves and create misery by telling ourselves things that simply are not true.
quotes.author: David D. Burns

quotes.quote: When you are thwarted, it is your own attitude that is out of order.
quotes.author: Meister Eckhart

quotes.quote: A fretful temper will divide the closest knot that may be tied, by ceaseless sharp corrosion; a temper passionate and fierce may suddenly your joys disperse at one immense explosion.
quotes.author: William Cowper

quotes.quote: Bad temper is its own safety valve. He who can bark does not bite.
quotes.author: Agatha Christie

quotes.quote: Grouchy is a typical habit of the victims.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: It takes 73 muscles to frown and only 14 to smile. No wonder grouchy people are always tired.
quotes.author: Suzanne Woods Fisher

quotes.quote: Men are all right for friends, but as soon as you marry them they turn into cranky old fathers, even the wild ones.
quotes.author: Willa Cather

quotes.quote: Those people who think they know everything are a great annoyance to those of us who do.
quotes.author: Isaac Asimov

quotes.quote: It is only our bad temper that we put down to being tired or worried or hungry; we put our good temper down to ourselves.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: When you see anyone complaining of such and such a person's ill-nature and bad temper, know that the complainant is bad-tempered, forasmuch as he speaks ill of that bad-tempered person, because he alone is good-tempered who is quietly forbearing towards the bad-tempered and ill-natured.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Crankiness is a human attribute that, when people walk in the door of Xerox, they remain human. The best way to get the best out of people is to not force them to be something other than they naturally are. Now what do they have to be? They have to be respectful. You can't be ridiculously disrespectful.
quotes.author: Ursula Burns

quotes.quote: The growth of wisdom may be gauged accurately by the decline of ill temper.
quotes.author: Friedrich Wilhelm Nietzsche

quotes.quote: A perverse temper and fretful disposition will make any state of life whatsoever unhappy.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: If someone decides they're not going to be happy, it's not your problem. You don't have to spend your time and energy trying to cheer up someone who has already decided to stay in a bad mood. Believe it or not, you can actually hurt people by playing into their self-pity.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.quote: The bad mood fairy comes to annoy you only when you are actually in a good position, but don't yet realise it!
quotes.author: Jonathan Cainer

quotes.quote: An object may seem static to you and to me, but every bit of it is in continuous movement, shaking, shivering, and rotating.
quotes.author: Girdhar Joshi

quotes.quote: The worst-tempered people I've ever met were people who know they were wrong.
quotes.author: Wilson Mizner

quotes.quote: If you feel irritated or threatened by others' beliefs, it's a sign that you're experiencing crisis of confidence.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: Any woman who diets all the time can't help but be grouchy. Nobody can be amusing or entertaining on a diet.
quotes.author: Zsa Zsa Gabor

quotes.quote: Crankiness is at the essence of all comedy. My wife and I were discussing the different types of cranky. There's entertaining cranky, annoying cranky, angry cranky.
quotes.author: Jerry Seinfeld

quotes.quote: Mortals must do what they are here to do creatively or they will become cranky.
quotes.author: Tom Shales

quotes.quote: Fretfulness of temper will generally characterize those who are negligent of order
quotes.author: Hugh Blair

quotes.quote: It is a bad temper of mind that takes delight in opposition.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Good moods're as fragile as eggs...Bad moods're as fragile as bricks.
quotes.author: David Mitchell

quotes.quote: If chocolate were a mandatory part of breakfast, people wouldn't be so grouchy in the morning.
quotes.author: Joanne Fluke

quotes.quote: Smash the control images. Smash the control machine.
quotes.author: William S. Burroughs

quotes.quote: Life is rapid, art is slow, occasion coy, practice fallacious, and judgment partial.
quotes.author: Henry Fuseli

quotes.quote: We crash into each other just so we can feel something.
quotes.author: Paul Haggis

quotes.quote: We will not have any more crashes in our time.
quotes.author: John Maynard Keynes

quotes.quote: Smashing heads does not open minds.
quotes.author: Deborah

quotes.quote: It is wise to direct your anger towards problems - not people; to focus your energies on answers - not excuses.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.quote: We have so much time and so little to do. Strike that, reverse it.
quotes.author: Roald Dahl

quotes.quote: You can't take a crash course in serenity.
quotes.author: Shirley MacLaine

quotes.quote: You never know what's gonna be a hit.
quotes.author: Juicy J
