quotes.quote: So rapid is the flight of dreams upon the wings of imagination.
quotes.author: Alexandre Dumas

quotes.quote: If people concentrated on the really important things in life, there'd be a shortage of fishing poles.
quotes.author: Doug Larson

quotes.quote: You take a crash, you get back up and next time you succeed and that's a great feeling.
quotes.author: Shaun White

quotes.quote: Hit them where they ain't.
quotes.author: Willie Keeler

quotes.quote: To never see a fool you lock yourself in your room and smash the looking-glass.
quotes.author: Carl Sandburg

quotes.quote: Each of us is born with a box of matches inside us but we can't strike them all by ourselves
quotes.author: Laura Esquivel

quotes.quote: Hit hard, hit fast, hit often!
quotes.author: Halsey

quotes.quote: A crash really occurs when you suddenly have a violent downturn in the market that then heralds a long bull market.
quotes.author: Ron Chernow

quotes.quote: It is hard to smash a computer when you're laughing.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: To hit bottom is to fall from grace.
quotes.author: Douglas Horton

quotes.quote: Everyone has a colorful life. You just have to get out your crayons.
quotes.author: Benay Nordby

quotes.quote: Green is the prime color of the world, and that from which its loveliness arises.
quotes.author: Pedro Calderon de la Barca

quotes.quote: Art is your personal diary where you may color your thoughts and emotions on a page.
quotes.author: Sara

quotes.quote: Give crayons. Adults are disturbingly impoverished of these magical dream sticks.
quotes.author: Dr. SunWolf

quotes.quote: Beauty without colour seems somehow to belong to another world.
quotes.author: Murasaki Shikibu

quotes.quote: Artists are just children who refuse to put down their crayons.
quotes.author: Al Hirschfeld

quotes.quote: We could learn a lot from crayons; some are sharp, some are pretty, some are dull, while others bright, some have weird names, but they all have learned to live together in the same box.
quotes.author: Robert Fulghum

quotes.quote: Never invest in any idea you can't illustrate with a crayon.
quotes.author: Peter Lynch

quotes.quote: Pink is not just a color, it's an attitude
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Colour could give rise to sensations which would interfere with our conception of space.
quotes.author: Georges Braque

quotes.quote: History written in pencil is easily erased, but crayon is forever.
quotes.author: Emilie Autumn

quotes.quote: Color affects us. Everyone should have a paintbox and a large box of crayons.
quotes.author: Dr. SunWolf

quotes.quote: Colour is, on the evidence of language alone, very bound up with the feelings.
quotes.author: Marion Milner

quotes.quote: Broken crayons still colour the same
quotes.author: Trent Shelton

quotes.quote: Red is passion-lit, orange is flowerageous, yellow is suntastic, pink is lipsensual, green is lifebursting, blue is skyful, purple is berrydancing, gray is cloudrainy.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: Coloring outside the lines is a fine art.
quotes.author: Kim Nance

quotes.quote: Stop counting crayons, just draw pictures.
quotes.author: Mark Scharenbroich

quotes.quote: An artist spends himself like the crayon in his hand, till he is all gone.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Colour is a creative element, not a trimming.
quotes.author: Piet Zwart

quotes.quote: If you were a crayon, what color would you most like to make out with?
quotes.author: Hank Green

quotes.quote: All the other colors are just colors, but purple seems to have a soul â€” when you look at it, it's looking back at you.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: Color is my day-long obsession, joy and torment.
quotes.author: Claude Monet

quotes.quote: Your attitude is like a box of crayons that color your world. Constantly color your picture gray, and your picture will always be bleak. Try adding some bright colors to the picture by including humor, and your picture begins to lighten up.
quotes.author: Allen Klein

quotes.quote: A box of new crayons! Now they're all pointy, lined up in order, bright and perfect. Soon they'll be a bunch of ground down, rounded, indistinguishable stumps, missing their wrappers and smudged with other colors. Sometimes life seems unbearably tragic.
quotes.author: Bill Watterson

quotes.quote: Our attitudes are the crayons that color our world.
quotes.author: Allen Klein

quotes.quote: No things could seem further apart than the doubt of grey and the decision of scarlet. Yet grey and red can mingle, as they do in the morning clouds.
quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Color... thinks by itself, independently of the object it clothes.
quotes.author: Charles Baudelaire

quotes.quote: A box of crayons and a big sheet of paper provides a more expressive medium for kids than computerized paint programs.
quotes.author: Clifford Stoll

quotes.quote: I come from a family where gravy is considered a beverage.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: My family is really boring. They have a coffee table book called 'Pictures We Took Just to Use Up the Rest of the Film.'
quotes.author: Penelope Lombard

quotes.quote: If minutes were kept of a family gathering, they would show that "Members not Present"and "Subjects Discussed" were one and the same.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: Families are like fudge... mostly sweet with a few nuts.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: If you don't believe in ghosts, you've never been to a family reunion.
quotes.author: Ashleigh Brilliant

quotes.quote: If you ever start feeling like you have the goofiest, craziest, most dysfunctional family in the world, all you have to do is go to a state fair. Because five minutes at the fair, you'll be going, 'you know, we're alright. We are dang near royalty.
quotes.author: Jeff Foxworthy

quotes.quote: Like all the best families, we have our share of eccentricities, of impetuous and wayward youngsters and of family disagreements
quotes.author: Elizabeth II

quotes.quote: My uncle's dying wish - he wanted me on his lap. He was in the electric chair.
quotes.author: Rodney Dangerfield

quotes.quote: Humans are not proud of their ancestors, and rarely invite them round to dinner.
quotes.author: Douglas Adams

quotes.quote: Being crazy isn't enough.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: Where to look if you've lost your mind?
quotes.author: Bernard Malamud

quotes.quote: Some are born mad, some achieve madness, and some have madness thrust upon 'em.
quotes.author: Emilie Autumn

quotes.quote: Crazy is a relative term in my family!
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: It's hard to give up the self-esteem connected to being codependent and appearing 'right,' which is probably survival behavior learned from growing up in a crazy family. It feels like you will actually disappear.
quotes.author: Melody Beattie

quotes.quote: Ask anyone and they'll most likely say their family is crazy, and if they don't say their family is crazy, their friends are crazy. That's because everyone is crazy after taking the mask off. People are most themselves when not really trying to fit in, when either alone or around those already closest to them, and that is crazy.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: No one wants to rattle the cage of a "crazy" person whose family tends to snap.
quotes.author: Nicole Gulla

quotes.quote: Insanity runs in my family. It practically gallops.
quotes.author: Cary Grant

quotes.quote: Insanity - a perfectly rational adjustment to an insane world.
quotes.author: R. D. Laing

quotes.quote: Insanity is knowing that what you're doing is completely idiotic, but still, somehow, you just can't stop it.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Wurtzel

quotes.quote: I grew up with six brothers. That's how I learned to dance -waiting for the bathroom.
quotes.author: Bob Hope

quotes.quote: I wish to thank my parents for making it all possible...and I wish to thank my children for making it necessary.
quotes.author: Victor Borge

quotes.quote: The greatest thing in family life is to take a hint when a hint is intended- and not to take a hint when a hint is not intended.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: Family: A social unit where the father is concerned with parking space, the children with outer space, and the mother with closet space.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: In some families, 'please' is described as the magic word. In our house, however, it was 'sorry'.
quotes.author: Margaret Laurence

quotes.quote: Some family trees bear an enormous crop of nuts.
quotes.author: Wayne H.

quotes.quote: Insanity does not run in my family. Rather, it strolls through, taking its time, getting to know everyone personally.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: We are all born crazy. Some of us remain that way.
quotes.author: Samuel Beckett

quotes.quote: Every family has that one crazy person in it. If you're missing one I seem to have a few extras.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A crazy person has the ability to make a sane person crazy.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Never judge someone by their relatives.
quotes.author: Charles Martin

quotes.quote: No, it's never on the day you leave That you remember Christmas Eve And all the things you miss about her crazy family
quotes.author: John Mayer

quotes.quote: Looks like my crazy family Is down one crazy daughter cause I'm shipwrecked in a desert that Once was underwent just Looking for a swift turn of phrase Some colors to fly As I float by In the parade
quotes.author: Ani DiFranco

quotes.quote: I wonder how I got here, I wonder what I'll be. The saddest little twig On this crazy family tree. I feel like I'm a loser, With nothing left to loose.
quotes.author: The Simpsons

quotes.quote: Memories up flames,- it's crazy And the family ties have all been broke Try to filter out the pain it's endless We blew away the only hope we had So many friends have departed I can only guess where they have gone So many things that were started Will they ever be done?
quotes.author: John Tabacco

quotes.quote: I need a family to drive me crazy Call me out when I'm low and lazy It won't be perfect, but we'll be fine 'Cause I've got your back, and you've got mine You got mine
quotes.author: Goo Goo Dolls

quotes.quote: When you drive you can catch me in your rear view Laughing having fun and smiling Kicking it with bass getting crazy straight relying For my family, know that I loved ya
quotes.author: Kottonmouth Kings

quotes.quote: You don't choose em, you can't lose em We all have a song to sing Some are crazy, some are amazing All got a little bit of everything Family, sons and daughters Family like a photograph
quotes.author: Drew Holcomb & the Neighbors

quotes.quote: I explain to my patients that abused children often find it hard to disentangle themselves from their dysfunctional families, whereas children grow away from good, loving parents with far less conflict. After all, isn't that the task of a good parent, to enable the child to leave home?
quotes.author: Irvin Yalom

quotes.quote: How ironic that our family should be a safe haven. Our parents and siblings are supposed to love us, accept us, and care for us. They should protect us and support us. Sometimes, our home is where we find the deepest heartaches.
quotes.author: Dana Arcuri

quotes.quote: Our family was stuck in a cosmic hamster wheel of toxic love, making the same mistakes, saying the same words, being hurt in the same ways generation after generation. I didn’t want to keep playing a role in this tragedy of errors.
quotes.author: Yamile Saied Mendez

quotes.quote: family Had a rough landing No one's hurt badly I'm difficult at times But my friends understand me I act crazy But they act the same Pulled me back from
quotes.author: Swollen Members

quotes.quote: Oh you crazy mother Heyo, listen, took my freedom, my honor, my pride To provide for my family I tried Gots to prepare, cause listen We's here for the ride
quotes.author: Stephen Marley

quotes.quote: You're thinking that I'm crazy I see through all them see your visions I'm fried up with the premonitions Black suits Long faces Sad words Slow singing at the side of your grave Now tell me how were you mislead so easily When you was raised better by your family
quotes.author: Prince Mydas

quotes.quote: to a family of four and so that makes me one-fourth of a dysfunctional home I had a father who only stayed to see me grown when I turned twelve he was gone
quotes.author: Ras Kass

quotes.quote: You and me, we'll always be tight Family every single day and night Even when you start acting like a fool You know I'm loving every single thing you do
quotes.author: Tory Lanez

quotes.quote: Another shorty that won't make it to the family will If I don't make it, can't take it, hope the family will They ain't crazy they don't know how insanity feel
quotes.author: Curtis Mayfield

quotes.quote: A family is a social system and if that system is dysfunctional, the ramifications for the children growing up within it are grave. In what is known as generational drug addiction, the adult children of drug addicts and alcoholics are quietly suffering all over the world. By the time the children have grown up, dysfunction has been deeply ingrained in mind, body and brain.
quotes.author: Christopher Dines

quotes.quote: Perhaps nothing so accurately characterizes dysfunctional families as denial.
quotes.author: John Bradshaw

quotes.quote: Many of the habits of dysfunctional families use are not from the lack of love but are the result of fear. Knowing the love-limiting habits and behaviors of dysfunctional families is a wonderful beginning to lower the fear, allowing us to be real, allowing us all to learn how to love better.
quotes.author: David Earle

quotes.quote: Families living in dysfunction seldom have healthy boundaries. Dysfunctional families have trouble knowing where they stop and others begin.
quotes.author: David Earle

quotes.quote: Since children from dysfunctional families are so good at judging others, they also judge themselves finding themselves unacceptable when compared to others, always assuming they are second best, not enough. This is a painful realization so often they hide behind righteous arrogance.
quotes.author: David Earle

quotes.quote: Our parents were our first gods. If parents are loving, nurturing, and kind, this becomes the child’s definition of the creator. If parents were controlling, angry, and manipulative, then this becomes their definition.
quotes.author: David Earle

quotes.quote: Lots of people in my own family were crazy, so I felt a special closeness with them and wanted to learn how to help them.
quotes.author: Edward M. Hallowell

quotes.quote: There was a lot that needed saving in my crazy family, but I'm proud of the whole lot. We didn't know what we were doing much of the time, we made stupid plans if we planned at all, we stumbled into situations we didn't expect, we blew fortunes we could have made, and we often failed to deliver on the potential we were born with.
quotes.author: Edward M. Hallowell

quotes.quote: Sometimes, my family becomes the strangest family on Earth.
quotes.author: Students Of Pierce Middle School

quotes.quote: My friends and I are crazy. That's the only thing that keeps us sane.
quotes.author: Matt Schucker

quotes.quote: The statistics on sanity are that one out of every four Americans is suffering from some form of mental illness. Think of your three best friends. If they're okay, then it's you.
quotes.author: Rita Mae Brown

quotes.quote: You'll look a lot less crazy if you can get your friend to do it with you.
quotes.author: Unkown

quotes.quote: Most of us don't need a psychiatric therapist as much as a friend to be silly with.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: Friendship is born at that moment when one person says to another, 'What! You too? I thought I was the only one!
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: A large proportion of my best friends are a little bit crazy...I try to be cautious with my friends who are too sane. Depression is itself destructive, and it breeds destructive impulses: I am easily disappointed in people who don't get it
quotes.author: Andrew Solomon

quotes.quote: Tis the privilege of friendship to talk nonsense, and have her nonsense respected.
quotes.author: Charles Lamb

quotes.quote: A true friend is someone who thinks that you are a good egg even though he knows that you are slightly cracked.
quotes.author: Bernard Meltzer

quotes.quote: Best friends...they know how crazy you are and still choose to be seen with you in public.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: An old friend will help you move. A good friend will help you move a dead body.
quotes.author: Jim Hayes

quotes.quote: You don't have to be crazy to be my friend but it sure helps!
quotes.author: Unkown

quotes.quote: If you have crazy friends, you have everything.
quotes.author: Unkown

quotes.quote: Behind every successful woman is a best friend giving her crazy ideas.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: You will never realize how weird your friends are until you start to describe them to someone else.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: We are best friends. Always remember that when you fall, I'll pick you up, after I finish laughing.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A loyal friend laughs at your jokes when they're not so good, and sympathizes with your problems when they're not so bad.
quotes.author: Arnold H. Glasgow

quotes.quote: As the old saying goes, laughter truly is the best medicine, and giggling with your gal pals can heal almost anything.
quotes.author: Becca Anderson

quotes.quote: If I killed somebody, I have zero doubt that if I called my best friend and was like,'Hey grab a shovel,' she wouldn't even ask a question.
quotes.author: Mila Kunis

quotes.quote: True friends don't judge each other, they judge other people together.
quotes.author: Emilie Saint-Genis

quotes.quote: Crazy friends are the ones that go through the rain with you.
quotes.author: R. Luke Thompson

quotes.quote: We all need a crazy friend that is willing to stand up for us when we are down on ourselves. We also need to be a crazy friend for someone else in their time of need.
quotes.author: R. Luke Thompson

quotes.quote: The Bible tells us to forgive our enemies; not our friends.
quotes.author: Margot Asquith

quotes.quote: Whenever a friend succeeds, a little something in me dies.
quotes.author: Gore Vidal

quotes.quote: He's the kind of man who picks his friends—to pieces.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: There is no spectacle more agreeable than to observe an old friend fall from a rooftop.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Afterall, one can't complain. I have my friends. Somebody spoke to me only yesterday.
quotes.author: Eeyore

quotes.quote: He has not an enemy in the world, and none of his friends like him.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: The lion and the calf shall lie down together, but the calf won't get much sleep.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: I'm fortunate to have kind and funny friends who've been by my side through all the crazy ups and downs of trying to get published (and, hello life), and if they weren't keeping me sane and making me laugh, I don't know that I could have written this book.
quotes.author: Jennifer Hillier

quotes.quote: I don't trust him. We're friends.
quotes.author: Bertolt Brecht

quotes.quote: I get my exercise acting as a pallbearer to my friends who exercise.
quotes.author: Chancey Depew

quotes.quote: There is nothing like puking with somebody to make you into old friends.
quotes.author: Sylvia Path

quotes.quote: You can always tell a real friend: when you've made a fool of yourself he doesn't feel you've done a permanent job.
quotes.author: Lawrence J. Peter

quotes.quote: One good reason to only maintain a small circle of friends is that three out of four murders are committed by people who know the victim.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: When you're in jail, a good friend will be trying to bail you out. A best friend will be in the cell next to you saying, ‘Damn, that was fun.'
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.quote: A friend never defends a husband who gets his wife an electric skillet for her birthday.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: It is one of the blessings of old friends that you can afford to be stupid with them.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: One sure way to lose another woman’s friendship is to try to improve her flower arrangements.
quotes.author: Marcelene Cox

quotes.quote: We know our friends by their defects rather than by their merits.
quotes.author: William Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: Men kick friendship around like a football and it doesn't seem to crack. Women treat it like glass and it falls to pieces.
quotes.author: Ann Lindbergh

quotes.quote: I have no trouble with my enemies. I can take care of my enemies all right. But my damn friends – they're the ones that keep me walking the floor nights!
quotes.author: Warren G. Harding

quotes.quote: It is more fun to talk with someone who doesn't use long, difficult words but rather short, easy words like ‘What about lunch?’
quotes.author: A.A. Milne

quotes.quote: What sane person could live in this world and not be crazy?
quotes.author: Ursula K. Leguin

quotes.quote: Some people like my advice so much that they frame it upon the wall instead of using it.
quotes.author: Gordon R. Dickson

quotes.quote: I never set out to be weird. It was always the other people who called me weird.
quotes.author: Frank Zappa

quotes.quote: We are all born mad. Some remain so.
quotes.author: Samuel Beckett

quotes.quote: Great wits are sure to madness near allied; And thin partitions do their bonds divide.
quotes.author: John Dryden

quotes.quote: Dreaming permits each and every one of us to be quietly and safely insane every night of the week.
quotes.author: William Dement

quotes.quote: A question that sometimes drives me hazy: am I or are the others crazy?
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Taking crazy things seriously is a serious waste of time.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: Sane is boring.
quotes.author: R.A. Salvatore

quotes.quote: Crazy people don't sit around wondering if they're nuts.
quotes.author: Jake Gyllenhaal

quotes.quote: I like crazy people, especially those who don't see the risk.
quotes.author: John Lydon

quotes.quote: Maybe women get to a certain age and they no longer have a filter; they're considered crazy people or something.
quotes.author: Michaela Watkins

quotes.quote: If you want plenty of experience in dealing with difficult people, then have kids.
quotes.author: Bo Bennett

quotes.quote: The problem with some people is that when they aren't drunk, they're sober.
quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

quotes.quote: Don't expect to see positive changes in your life if you surround yourself with negative people.
quotes.author: Zahid Abas

quotes.quote: Here's to the crazy ones, the misfits, the rebels, the troublemakers, the round pegs in the square holes... the ones who see things differently -- they're not fond of rules... they push the human race forward, and while some may see them as the crazy ones, we see genius, because the ones who are crazy enough to think that they can change the world, are the ones who do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Dogbert: Reality is always controlled by the people who are most insane.
quotes.author: Scott Adams

quotes.quote: The object of life is not to be on the side of the majority, but to escape finding oneself in the ranks of the insane.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: All are lunatics, but he who can analyze his delusions is called a philosopher.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: Some may never live, but the crazy never die
quotes.author: Hunter S. Thompson

quotes.quote: If you're going to be crazy, you have to get paid for it or else you're going to be locked up.
quotes.author: Hunter S. Thompson

quotes.quote: Of course I'm crazy, but that doesn't mean I'm wrong.
quotes.author: Robert Anton Wilson

quotes.quote: Religion makes themcrazy. Not a woman I ever met wasn't crazy with religion.
quotes.author: Orson Scott

quotes.quote: Never argue with a fool; onlookers may not be able to tell the difference.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: People that have had genuine abduction experiences that I've met that seem very genuine to me, but they're just confused about why it happened. I've met a lot of people like which I regard as being very genuine... but there's a lot of crazy people out there
quotes.author: Dave Davies

quotes.quote: The country makes me more paranoid, you know? I think the crazy people out there are little crazier.
quotes.author: Jean-Michel Basquiat

quotes.quote: Everybody is pathological to a certain degree... the more so the elevated his standing... only myth and cliche have that a person must be either sane or crazy.
quotes.author: Paul Julius M_bius

quotes.quote: When you are pursuing your dreams, they will call you crazy because they are lazy.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Crazy people are not crazy if one accepts their reasoning.
quotes.author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

quotes.quote: I think 'crazy' is a compliment. I think you make money with people who are crazy.
quotes.author: Fred Wilson

quotes.quote: The creation of something new is not accomplished by the intellect but by the play instinct acting from inner necessity. The creative mind plays with the objects it loves.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: The monotony and solitude of a quiet life stimulates the creative mind.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Being inexhaustible, life and nature are a constant stimulus for a creative mind.
quotes.author: Hans Hofmann

quotes.quote: The uncreative mind can spot wrong answers, but it takes a very creative mind to spot wrong questions.
quotes.author: Antony Jay

quotes.quote: To think creatively, we must be able to look afresh at what we normally take for granted.
quotes.author: George Kneller

quotes.quote: Creative minds have always been known to survive any kind of bad training.
quotes.author: Anna Freud

quotes.quote: The mind is the most capricious of insects — flitting, fluttering.
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.quote: But it seems an irony of creation that man's mind knows how to handle things the better the farther removed they are from the center of his existence. Thus we are cleverest where knowledge matters least....
quotes.author: Hermann Weyl

quotes.quote: A creative person is someone who imagines what other people cannot. Their value to us lies in expanding our own possibilities. Walls fall. We break out.
quotes.author: Jeanette Winterson

quotes.quote: Creative minds are uneven, and the best of fabrics have their dull spots.
quotes.author: H.P. Lovecraft

quotes.quote: My mind is a raging torrent, flooded with rivulets of thought cascading into a waterfall of creative alternatives.
quotes.author: Mel Brooks

quotes.quote: Give your mind a job to do, or else it will find a job to do, and you might not like the job it invents.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quotes.quote: Creative minds don't follow rules, they follow will.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: If a picture is worth a thousand words, then the imagination is worth a thousand pictures.
quotes.author: J.E.B. Spredemann

quotes.quote: The truly creative mind in any field is no more than this: a human creature born abnormally, inhumanly sensitive. To him, a touch is a blow, a sound is a noise, a misfortune is a tragedy, a joy is an ecstasy, a friend is a lover, a lover is a god, and failure is death. Add to this cruelly delicate organism the overpowering necessity to create, create, create - so that without the creating of music or poetry or books or buildings or something of meaning, his very breath is cut off from him. He must create, must pour out creation. By some strange, unknown, inward urgency he is not really alive unless he is creating.
quotes.author: Pearl Buck

quotes.quote: The mark of the creative mind is that it defies a part of what it has learned.
quotes.author: Ludwig Von Mises

quotes.quote: It is perhaps typical of very creative minds that they hit very large nails not quite on the head.
quotes.author: Marshall McLuhan

quotes.quote: The truly creative mind in any field is no more than this: A human creature born abnormally, inhumanly sensitive.
quotes.author: Pearl S. Buck

quotes.quote: In our willingness to step into the unknown, we surrender ourselves to the creative mind that orchestrates the dance of the universe.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: The creative mind doesn't have to have the whole pattern-it can have just a little piece and be able to envision the whole picture in completion.
quotes.author: Arthur Fry

quotes.quote: All prosperity begins in the mind and is dependent only on the full use of our creative imagination.
quotes.author: Ruth Ross

quotes.quote: When the creative mind is unleashed and understands its true nature, it's unlimited. There's nothing you cannot do.
quotes.author: Byron Katie

quotes.quote: The way of a creative mind is always positive, it always asserts; it does not know the doubts which are so characteristic of the scientific mind.
quotes.author: Naum Gabo

quotes.quote: The creative mind is as delicately balanced as the needle trembling in a compass; the presence of antagonistic metal deflects it instantly.
quotes.author: Grace S. Richmond

quotes.quote: Being a creative mind, you have to examine who you are every day.
quotes.author: Riccardo Tisci

quotes.quote: The possibilities of creative effort connected with the subconscious mind are stupendous and imponderable. They inspire one with awe.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: The creative mind is the playful mind. Philosophy is the play and dance of ideas.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: It isn't a hunch but the subconscious mind, which is the creative mind, at work. That is the mind which makes artists do things without their knowing how they came to do them. Perhaps with me it was the cumulative effect of a lot of little things individually insignificant but collectively powerful.
quotes.author: Jesse Livermore

quotes.quote: When you have a creative mind it doesn't stop going.
quotes.author: Alison Moyet

quotes.quote: Creative minds are rarely tidy.
quotes.author: John William Gardner

quotes.quote: To think outside of the box you must be outside of the box.
quotes.author: Alfreda Doyle

quotes.quote: The intellect has little to do on the road to discovery. There comes a leap in consciousness, call it intuition or what you will, and the solution comes to you and you don't know how or why.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Beauty is a primeval phenomenon, which itself never makes its appearance, but the reflection of which is visible in a thousand different utterances of the creative mind, and is as various as nature herself.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: When you see a thing clearly in your mind, your creative 'success mechanism' within you takes over and does the job much better than you could do it by conscious effort or 'willpower'.
quotes.author: Maxwell Maltz

quotes.quote: You can think about red. You can think about pink. You can think up a horse. Oh, the THINKS you can think!
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: Creative people are 50% ego and 50% insecurity.
quotes.author: Lee Clow

quotes.quote: Habitually creative people are prepared to be lucky.
quotes.author: E. B. White

quotes.quote: Creative people are often found either disagreeable or intimidating by mediocrities.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: The most creative people are motivated by the grandest of problems that are presented before them.
quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quotes.quote: What makes creative people tingle are interesting problems, the chance to impress their friends, and caffeine.
quotes.author: Alex Steffen

quotes.quote: As creative people, we should be really conscious of being of service in our work, being as generous as we can.
quotes.author: Jami Attenberg

quotes.quote: Creative people should always be striving, they should always be hungry, they should be looking for the next place to go.
quotes.author: Mel Brooks

quotes.quote: When you ask creative people how they did something, they feel a little guilty because they didn't really do it, they just saw something.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: If there is one word that makes creative people different from others, it is the word complexity. Instead of being an individual, they are a multitude.
quotes.author: Mihaly Csikszentmihalyi

quotes.quote: Truly creative people care a little about what they have done, and a lot about what they are doing. Their driving focus is the life force that surges in them now.
quotes.author: Alan Cohen

quotes.quote: There is a notion that creative people are absent-minded, reckless, heedless of social customs and obligations. It is, hopefully, true for they are in another world altogether.
quotes.author: Mary Oliver

quotes.quote: The hallmark of creative people is their mental flexibility... Sometimes they are open and probing, at others they're playful and off-the-wall. At still other times, they're critical and faultfinding. And finally they're doggedly persistent in striving to reach their goals.
quotes.author: Roger Von Oech

quotes.quote: All creative people want to do the unexpected.
quotes.author: Hedy Lamarr

quotes.quote: With creative people, truly new horizons open up.
quotes.author: Dietrich Fischer-Dieskau

quotes.quote: Creative people have to be fed from the divine source.
quotes.author: Dag Hammarskjold

quotes.quote: Creative people see Prometheus in a mirror, never Pandora.
quotes.author: David Brin

quotes.quote: Everything that creative people think and do is from the heart.
quotes.author: Deepika Padukone

quotes.quote: Creative people are notoriously the slowest to adopt new technology.
quotes.author: Robert Rodriguez

quotes.quote: Creative people neither like to be possessive nor like to be possessed.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: All creative people hate mathematics. It's the most uncreative subject you can study.
quotes.author: Alec Issigonis

quotes.quote: Creative people tend to pass the responsibility for getting down to brass tacks to others.
quotes.author: Theodore Levitt

quotes.quote: Unfortunately, creative people are at their most creative when writing their autobiographies.
quotes.author: Steven Pinker

quotes.quote: Creative people are curious, flexible, and independent with a tremendous spirit and a love of play.
quotes.author: Henri Matisse

quotes.quote: Creative people must entertain lots of silly ideas in order to receive the occasional strokes of genius.
quotes.author: Marshall Cook

quotes.quote: Only when creative people take ownership of cosmic discovery will society accept science as the cultural activity that it is.
quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quotes.quote: To creative people, the compendium of the white man's dialect are unfashionable, because their creations are more than what the tongue could say.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: Creative people do not belong in the university because the process is antithetical to the analytical process so necessary for proper scholarship.
quotes.author: Rita Mae Brown

quotes.quote: Creative people are all there, totally immersed, fascinated and absorbed in the present, in the current situation, in the here-now, with the matter-in-hand.
quotes.author: Abraham Maslow

quotes.quote: The most creative people have learned to tolerate the slight discomfort of indecision for much longer and so, just because they put in more pondering time, their solutions are more creative.
quotes.author: John Cleese

quotes.quote: It is the function of creative people to perceive relations between thoughts, or things, or forms of expressions that seem utterly different, and to be able to connect the seemingly unconnected.
quotes.author: William Plomer

quotes.quote: The truly creative people tend to be outliers.
quotes.author: Nolan Bushnell

quotes.quote: If the rules of creativity are the norm for a company, creative people will be the norm.
quotes.author: Jim Gilmore

quotes.quote: Creative people need strong encouragement.
quotes.author: Fennel Hudson

quotes.quote: Creative people need time to just sit around and do nothing.
quotes.author: Austin Kleon

quotes.quote: The most creative people have this childlike facility to play.
quotes.author: John Cleese

quotes.quote: All too often, when creative people pick out someone else's creative work as an inspiration, what they end up with is very, very far from the original.
quotes.author: Samuel R. Delany

quotes.quote: There is something special when creative people get together.
quotes.author: Joy Mangano

quotes.quote: A good book praises itself.
quotes.author: German (on books and writers)

quotes.quote: A good spectator also creates.
quotes.author: Swiss (on art and creativity)

quotes.quote: A goose quill is more dangerous than a lion's claw.
quotes.author: English (on books and writers)

quotes.quote: A library is a repository of medicine for the mind.
quotes.author: Greek (on books and writers)

quotes.quote: A picture is a poem without words.
quotes.author: Latin (on art and creativity)

quotes.quote: A picture's worth a thousand words.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A thousand artisans, a thousand plans.
quotes.author: Chinese (on art and creativity)

quotes.quote: All the world's a stage.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Even the best song becomes tiresome if heard too often.
quotes.author: Korean (on art and creativity)

quotes.quote: Even the best writer has to erase.
quotes.author: Spanish (on books and writers)

quotes.quote: Every age has its book.
quotes.author: Arabic (on books and writers)

quotes.quote: Every picture tells a story.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Great ideas are the fuel of progress.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Great minds think alike.
quotes.author: Punch

quotes.quote: If you believe everything you read, better not read.
quotes.author: Japanese (on books and writers)

quotes.quote: Imagination is more important than knowledge.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Imitation is the sincerest form of flattery.
quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.quote: Mediocrity knows nothing higher than itself but talent instantly recognizes genius.
quotes.author: Sir Arthur Conan Doyle

quotes.quote: Men willingly believe what they wish.
quotes.author: Julius Caesar

quotes.quote: Our brightest blazes are commonly kindled by unexpected sparks.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Our deeds determine us as much as we determine our deeds.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: Quality, not quantity.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The sight of books removes sorrows from the heart.
quotes.author: Moroccan (on books and writers)

quotes.quote: Creativity is just connecting things. When you ask creative people how they did something, they feel a little guilty because they didn't really do it, they just saw something. It seemed obvious to them after a while. That's because they were able to connect experiences they've had and synthesize new things.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Creativity involves breaking out of established patterns in order to look at things in a different way.
quotes.author: Edward de Bono

quotes.quote: Creativity is the key to success in the future, and primary education is where teachers can bring creativity in children at that level.
quotes.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quotes.quote: Creative thinking - in terms of idea creativity - is not a mystical talent. It is a skill that can be practised and nurtured.
quotes.author: Edward de Bono

quotes.quote: Creativity is more than just being different. Anybody can plan weird; that's easy. What's hard is to be as simple as Bach. Making the simple, awesomely simple, that's creativity
quotes.author: Charles Mingus

quotes.quote: Creativity comes from a conflict of ideas
quotes.author: Donatella Versace

quotes.quote: Don't think. Thinking is the enemy of creativity. It's self-conscious, and anything self-conscious is lousy. You can't try to do things. You simply must do things
quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

quotes.quote: When we engage in what we are naturally suited to do, our work takes on the quality of play and it is play that stimulates creativity.
quotes.author: Linda Naiman

quotes.quote: The creative is the place where no one else has ever been. You have to leave the city of your comfort and go into the wilderness of your intuition. What you'll discover will be wonderful. What you'll discover is yourself.
quotes.author: Alan Alda

quotes.quote: The truly creative person is one who can think crazy; such a person knows full well that many of his great ideas will prove to be worthless. The creative person is flexible; he is able to change as the situation changes, to break habits, to face indecision and changes in conditions without undue stress. He is not threatened by the unexpected as rigid, inflexible people are.
quotes.author: Frank Goble

quotes.quote: The creative person wants to be a know-it-all. He wants to know about all kinds of things-ancient history, nineteenth century mathematics, current manufacturing techniques, hog futures. Because he never knows when these ideas might come together to form a new idea. It may happen six minutes later, or six months, or six years. But he has faith that it will happen.
quotes.author: Carl Ally

quotes.quote: Creativity is inventing, experimenting, growing, taking risks, breaking rules, making mistakes, and having fun.
quotes.author: Mary Lou Cook

quotes.quote: Creativity is seeing something that doesn't exist already. You need to find out how you can bring it into being and that way be a playmate with God.
quotes.author: Michele Shea

quotes.quote: The creative person is willing to live with ambiguity. He doesn't need problems solved immediately and can afford to wait for the right ideas
quotes.author: Abe Tannenbaum

quotes.quote: Conditions for creativity are to be puzzled; to concentrate; to accept conflict and tension; to be born everyday; to feel a sense of self.
quotes.author: Erich Fromm

quotes.quote: It seems to be one of the paradoxes of creativity that in order to think originally, we must familiarize ourselves with the ideas of others.
quotes.author: George Kneller

quotes.quote: You can't use up creativity. The more you use, the more you have.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: To live a creative life, we must lose our fear of being wrong.
quotes.author: Joseph Chilton Pierce

quotes.quote: Creative activity could be described as a type of learning process where teacher and pupil are located in the same individual.
quotes.author: Arthur Koestler

quotes.quote: The things we fear most in organizations - fluctuations, disturbances, imbalances - are the primary sources of creativity.
quotes.author: Margaret J. Wheatley

quotes.quote: The uncreative mind can spot wrong answers, but it takes a very creative mind to spot wrong questions.
quotes.author: Anthony Jay

quotes.quote: Creativity comes from trust. Trust your instincts. And never hope more than you work.
quotes.author: Rita Mae Brown

quotes.quote: Creativity can be described as letting go of certainties.
quotes.author: Gail Sheehy

quotes.quote: Human life is inherently creative. It's why we all have different resumes. It's why human culture is so interesting and diverse and dynamic.
quotes.author: Ken Robinson

quotes.quote: For creativity to flourish [requires] the embrace of loss, the oldest and most constant of human experiences.
quotes.author: Julie Burstein

quotes.quote: Creative works may indeed be kind of like property, but it's property that we're all building on.
quotes.author: Kirby Ferguson

quotes.quote: The chief enemy of creativity is 'good' sense.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: The secret to creativity is knowing how to hide your sources.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: I came to believe that creativity is God's will for us, and that we can practice creativity like any other spiritual practice— a day at a time.
quotes.author: Julia Cameron

quotes.quote: Kids are not self-conscious. and once we are actually in the flow of our creativity, neither are we.
quotes.author: Julia Cameron

quotes.quote: Only those who are able to relax can create, and then ideas reach the mind like lightning.
quotes.author: Cicero

quotes.quote: We must forget what is behind. If we cease to originate, we are lost. We can only keep what we have, by new activity
quotes.author: Channing

quotes.quote: The great creative individual...is capable of more wisdom and virtue than collective man ever can be.
quotes.author: John Stuart Mill

quotes.quote: It is better to fail in originality than to succeed in imitation.
quotes.author: Herman Melville

quotes.quote: To invent, you need a good imagination and a pile of junk.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.quote: Do a common thing in an uncommon way.
quotes.author: Booker T. Washington

quotes.quote: The creation of something new is not accomplished by the intellect but by the play instinct acting from inner necessity. The creative mind plays with the objects it loves.
quotes.author: Jung

quotes.quote: To create is to think more efficiently.
quotes.author: Reverdy

quotes.quote: Discovery consists of seeing what everybody else has seen and thinking what nobody has thought.
quotes.author: Albert Szent-Gyorgyi

quotes.quote: All men are creative but few are artists.
quotes.author: Paul Goodman

quotes.quote: Creativity is essentially a lonely art. An even lonelier struggle. To some a blessing. To others a curse. It is in reality the ability to reach inside yourself and drag forth from your very soul an idea.
quotes.author: Lou Dorfsman

quotes.quote: Curiosity is the key to creativity.
quotes.author: Akio Morito

quotes.quote: Creativity consists largely of rearranging what we know in order to find out what we do not know...Hence, to think creatively, we must be able to look afresh at what we normally take for granted.
quotes.author: George Kneller

quotes.quote: A creative person is someone who imagines what other people cannot. Their value to us lies in expanding our own possibilities. Walls fall. We break out. Art releases what was lost.
quotes.author: Jeanette Winterson

quotes.quote: Creativity can solve almost any problem. The creative act, the defeat of habit by originality, overcomes everything.
quotes.author: George Lois

quotes.quote: Perhaps someday we shall know how to heighten creativity. Until then, one of the best things we can do for creative men and women is to stand out of their light.
quotes.author: Gardner

quotes.quote: Creativity requires the courage to let go of certainties.
quotes.author: Erich Fromm

quotes.quote: The idea is there, locked inside. All you have to do is remove the excess stone.
quotes.author: Michaelangelo

quotes.quote: Creativity is discontent translated into arts.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: One of the advantages of being disorderly is that one is constantly making exciting discoveries.
quotes.author: A.A. Milne

quotes.quote: Confidence in non-sense is a requirement for the creative process.
quotes.author: M.C. Escher

quotes.quote: Ah, good taste! What a dreadful thing! Taste is the enemy of creativity.
quotes.author: Picasso

quotes.quote: Create, and be true to yourself, and depend only on your own good taste.
quotes.author: Duke Ellington

quotes.quote: Creativity arises out of the tension between spontaneity and limitations, the latter forcing spontaneity into the various forms which are essential to the work of art or poem.
quotes.author: Rollo May

quotes.quote: Americans worship creativity the way they worship physical beauty as a way of enjoying elitism without guilt: God did it.
quotes.author: Florence King

quotes.quote: To me, the creativity begins not when I sit down to write, but back when I'm envisioning the book and what kind of situations I can insinuate myself into.
quotes.author: Ted Conover

quotes.quote: We do not even own our intellect, our creativity, or our skills. We have received them as a gift and grace.
quotes.author: Satish Kumar

quotes.quote: You can't use up creativity. The more you use, the more you have.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: It is tension between creativity and skepticism that has produced the stunning and unexpected findings of science.
quotes.author: Carl Sagan

quotes.quote: Anyone can make the simple complicated. Creativity is making the complicated simple.
quotes.author: Charles Mingus

quotes.quote: Creativity is both a gift and a learned talent that is nurtured over years.
quotes.author: Nick Belardes

quotes.quote: Credibility is a basic survival tool.
quotes.author: Rebecca Solnit

quotes.quote: All credibility, all good conscience, all evidence of truth come only from the senses.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: As you become more successful, the gender barrier disappears. The credibility challenges you have during your growing up years starts disappearing when you start demonstrating success.
quotes.author: Kiran Mazumdar-Shaw

quotes.quote: A statement is persuasive and credible either because it is directly self-evident or because it appears to be proved from other statements that are so.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Credibility comes from results. Everything else is just marketing.
quotes.author: Richie Norton

quotes.quote: Lack of credibility slays your character.
quotes.author: Bernard Kelvin Clive

quotes.quote: The credibility of the teller is the ultimate test of the truth of a proposition.
quotes.author: Neil Postman

quotes.quote: Accuracy builds credibility.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: To gain credibility, you must consistently demonstrate three things: Initiative: You have to get up to go up. Sacrifice: You have to give up to go up. Maturity: You have to grow up to go up. If you show the way, people will want to follow you. The higher you go, the greater the number of people who will be willing to travel with you.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: Credibility is a leader's currency. With it, he or she is solvent; without it, he or she is bankrupt.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: The more you are willing to accept responsibility for your actions, the more credibility you will have.
quotes.author: Brian Koslow

quotes.quote: Credibility is like virginity. Once you lose it, you can never get it back.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: For every credibility gap, there is a gullibility gap.
quotes.author: Richard Clopton

quotes.quote: Governing today means giving acceptable signs of credibility. It is like advertising and it is the same effect that is achieved commitment to a scenario.
quotes.author: Jean Baudrillard

quotes.quote: Credibility lasts about two cycles of bad material, and then you'll probably never get it back. If you let people down, that's really hard to come back from harder than climbing from nothing to something, even.
quotes.author: Louis C.K.

quotes.quote: A flourishing, morally credible media is a vital component in the maintenance of genuinely public talk, argument about common good.
quotes.author: Rowan Williams

quotes.quote: Constantly there's a credibility issue; you're judged on how you look. If you look good' people assume you aren't credible. It's a battle you'll always fight if you're on TV and a female.
quotes.author: Lisa Guerrero

quotes.quote: Having a credible existence in the private sector frees people to be able to be better public servants. You're less concerned with toeing the party line and more concerned with doing what is right.
quotes.author: Walker Stapleton

quotes.quote: A highly credible leader under promises and over delivers.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: A credible witness to truth and to the values of the Gospel is urgently needed.
quotes.author: Pope Francis

quotes.quote: Without credible communication, and a lot of it, the hearts and minds of others are never captured.
quotes.author: John P. Kotter

quotes.quote: To be persuasive we must be believable; to be believable we must be credible; credible we must be truthful.
quotes.author: Edward R. Murrow

quotes.quote: Being attractive and being credible can and do go together.
quotes.author: Lisa Guerrero

quotes.quote: Everything in a story should be credible.
quotes.author: Rex Stout

quotes.quote: Credibility is lost when there are big discrepancies between what leaders say and what they do. Increasing credibility requires openness. Hidden agendas will destroy trust.
quotes.author: Judith M. Bardwick

quotes.quote: The credibility of any item in finance is inversely proportionate to the amount of publicity it receives.
quotes.author: Michael Scott

quotes.quote: Credibility is someone else's idea of what I should be doing.
quotes.author: Paul Stanley

quotes.quote: Somehow credibility comes into play if you do things that are too familiar.
quotes.author: Rickie Lee Jones

quotes.quote: You have to build up a credibility before the support comes to you.
quotes.author: Frank Gehry

quotes.quote: American credibility in the war on terrorism depends on a strong stand against all terrorist acts, whether committed by foe or friend.
quotes.author: Arlen Specter

quotes.quote: For every credibility gap there is a gullibility gap.
quotes.author: Richard Cobden

quotes.quote: Build your credibility so you won't have to say the same thing twice before someone believes it.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: PROPHECY, n. The art and practice of selling one's credibility for future delivery.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: Don't steamroll your way into a conversation before establishing any relational credibility.
quotes.author: Bill Hybels

quotes.quote: In the end, you make your reputation and you have your success based upon credibility and being able to provide people who are really hungry for information what they want.
quotes.author: Brit Hume

quotes.quote: Credibility is to be good. You must be good. That's all I ever wanted to be good at what I did.
quotes.author: Cheryl Cole

quotes.quote: If you tell people what you are going to do, and you suggest it's going to be successful, you need to be successful. Because once you create those expectations and you don't fulfill them, when you already have a significant credibility problem, it just further degrades your credibility.
quotes.author: Chris Lehane

quotes.quote: Our willingness to openly reveal our feelings in our argument nearly always builds our credibility.
quotes.author: Gerry Spence

quotes.quote: Don't confuse visibility with credibility.
quotes.author: Harvey Mackay

quotes.quote: It's hard to know now who, if anyone, in the media has any credibility.
quotes.author: Howard Fineman

quotes.quote: Leaders strengthen credibility by demonstrating that they are not in it for themselves, instead they have the interests of the institution, department, or team and its constituents at heart. Being a servant may not be what many leaders had in mind when they chose to take responsibility for the vision and direction of their organization or team - but serving others is the most glorious and rewarding of all leadership tasks.
quotes.author: James M. Kouzes

quotes.quote: Diligent follow-up and follow-through will set you apart from the crowd and communicate excellence.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: I don't know how anybody can say that who looks at what's happening to our young people and what's happening to our country, all because of guns. The NRA is putting themselves in a position where people will no longer trust them. They've been trusted in the past, but now their credibility is on the line.
quotes.author: Joycelyn Elders

quotes.quote: I have, I think, afforded every opportunity that could be reasonably expected, to judge of my credibility.
quotes.author: Maria Monk

quotes.quote: Lying damages others. Lying subtly permits us to destroy ourselves as we are caught in the snare and shatter our own self-image and credibility. Freedom from deceit and lying improves self and gives all of us peace of mind.
quotes.author: Marvin J. Ashton

quotes.quote: Inconsistency on the part of pastors and the faithful between what they say and what they do, between word and manner of life, is undermining the church's credibility.
quotes.author: Pope Francis

quotes.quote: Each person assesses each other person's credibility on different dimensions, because people are strong and weak in different things.
quotes.author: Ray Dalio

quotes.quote: You have to suspend disbelief a little bit to buy into your situation and to the story and to how the character will react. You have to tweak your credibility a little bit, is basically what it comes down to.
quotes.author: Richard Dean Anderson

quotes.quote: The most essential quality for leadership is not perfection but credibility. People must be able to trust you.
quotes.author: Rick Warren

quotes.quote: Leadership is learned, earned, and discerned. You develop it. It's based on trust and credibility. Others see it in you. You can't demand it.
quotes.author: Rick Warren

quotes.quote: Consultants have credibility because they are not dumb enough to work at your company.
quotes.author: Scott Adams

quotes.quote: The process of building trust is an interesting one, but it begins with yourself, with what I call self trust, and with your own credibility, your own trustworthiness. If you think about it, it's hard to establish trust with others if you can't trust yourself.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: Every exaggeration of the truth once detected by others destroys our credibility and makes all that we do and say suspect.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: In our own lives, having a mind-set of expecting to win increases our odds of winning. It helps us get better results. And better results help us increase our credibility and self-confidence, which leads to more positive self-expectancy, and more winning - and the upward cycle continues. It becomes a self-fulfilling prophecy.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: We must reflect a holistic view of the leader, in three dimensions, character, substance and style. Character consists of the qualities that win trust whereas substance consists of the qualities that earn us credibility; style is the dimension of execution - getting others to get things done.
quotes.author: Suzanne Bates

quotes.quote: If you can engage the influencer’s passions, and work with them to craft a compelling logical appeal, then you can leverage the credibility of the influencer to actually sway hearts and minds.
quotes.author: Tom Webster

quotes.quote: It is the characteristic of the most stringent censorships that they give credibility to the opinions they attack.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: If you don't know,say so. It's a simple statement that enhances credibility.
quotes.author: W. Brett Wilson

quotes.quote: It is amazing what you can accomplish if you do not care who gets the credit.
quotes.author: Harry S Truman

quotes.quote: Never call an accountant a credit to his profession; a good accountant is a debit to his profession.
quotes.author: Charles Lyell

quotes.quote: There is more credit and satisfaction in being a first-rate truck driver than a tenth-rate executive.
quotes.author: B. C. Forbes

quotes.quote: The more credit you give away, the more will come back to you. The more you help others, the more they will want to help you.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Remember that credit is money.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: When you have wit of your own, it's a pleasure to credit other people for theirs.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: Credit is a system whereby a person who can't pay, gets another person who can't pay, to guarantee that he can pay.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: Credit of time in your life is limited.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: If you don't take good care of your credit, then your credit won't take good care of you.
quotes.author: Tyler Gregory

quotes.quote: Wife credit is like a piece of fish. As soon as you get it, it starts to go bad.
quotes.author: King of Queens

quotes.quote: You can take no credit for beauty at sixteen. But if you are beautiful at sixty, it will be your soul's own doing.
quotes.author: Marie Stopes

quotes.quote: Creditor. One of a tribe of savages dwelling beyond the Financial Straits and dreaded for their desolating incursions.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: The creditor hath a better memory than the debtor.
quotes.author: James Howell

quotes.quote: No man's credit is ever as good as his money.
quotes.author: Edgar Watson Howe

quotes.quote: People give us credit only for what we ourselves believe.
quotes.author: Karl Gutzkow

quotes.quote: Credit is like a looking-glass, which when once sullied by a breath, may be wiped clear again; but if once cracked can never be repaired.
quotes.author: Maurice Switzer

quotes.quote: The credit of advancing science has always been due to individuals and never to the age.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Credit is a system whereby a person who can't pay gets another person who can't pay to guarantee that he can pay.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: Private credit is wealth; public honor is security; the feather that adorns the royal bird supports its flight; strip him of his plumage, and you fix him to the earth.
quotes.author: Junius

quotes.quote: Public credit is suspicion asleep.
quotes.author: Thomas Paine

quotes.quote: Credit is a matter so subtle in its essence, that, as it may be obtained almost without reason, so, without reason, may it be made to melt away.
quotes.author: Anthony Trollope

quotes.quote: Credit is the only enduring testimonial to man's confidence in man.
quotes.author: James Blish

quotes.quote: Giving credit where credit is due is a very rewarding habit to form. Its rewards are inestimable.
quotes.author: Loretta Young

quotes.quote: Credit is a system whereby a person who can not pay gets another person who can not pay to guarantee that he can pay.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: There is more credit and satisfaction in being a first rate truck driver than a tenth rate executive.
quotes.author: B. C. Forbes

quotes.quote: One must credit an hypothesis with all that has had to be discovered in order to demolish it.
quotes.author: Jean Rostand

quotes.quote: Credit card interest payments are the dumbest money of all.
quotes.author: Hill Harper

quotes.quote: Credit is a young man's capital.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Give credit where credit is due.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Credit leads a man into temptation. Cash down is the only thing that will deliver him from evil.
quotes.author: Solomon Northup

quotes.quote: Credit buying is much like being drunk. The buzz happens immediately and gives you a lift. The hangover comes the day after.
quotes.author: Joyce Brothers

quotes.quote: You can ruin your credit in one seemingly responsible afternoon, but rebuilding it takes years.
quotes.author: Sophia Amoruso

quotes.quote: Credit is something that should be given to others. If you are in a position to give credit to yourself, then you do not need it.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: No man will make a great leader who wants to do it all himself or get all the credit for doing it.
quotes.author: Andrew Carnegie

quotes.quote: The most important thing for a young man is to establish a credit a reputation, character.
quotes.author: John D. Rockefeller

quotes.quote: A pig on a credit makes a good winter but a bad spring.
quotes.author: Portuguese Proverb

quotes.quote: Better to sell cheap than for credit.
quotes.author: Hausan Proverb

quotes.quote: Credit lost is like a broken mirror.
quotes.author: Italian Proverb

quotes.quote: A pig bought on credit grunts all year long.
quotes.author: Spanish Proverb

quotes.quote: Creditors have better memories than debtors.
quotes.author: Poor Richard

quotes.quote: He that has lost his credit is dead to the world.
quotes.author: German Proverb

quotes.quote: Everything is sold on credit anyhow. Even the most experienced can't tell by looking at a car how many payments are still to be made on it.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: Credit buying is much like being drunk. The buzz happens immediately...the hangover comes the day after.
quotes.author: Dr. Joyce Brothers

quotes.quote: Credit is like chastity, they can both stand temptation better than suspicion.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.quote: Debts are like children; the smaller they are the more noise they make.
quotes.author: Spanish Proverb

quotes.quote: The first step in debt is like the first step in falsehood, involving the necessity of going on in the same course, debt following debt, as lie follows lie.
quotes.author: Samuel S. Smiles

quotes.quote: It's borrowing like anticipating one's income and making the future bear the expenses of the past.
quotes.author: John Russell Bartlett

quotes.quote: No man's credit is as good as his money.
quotes.author: Edward Watson Howe

quotes.quote: Cash at hand is better than a credit to a rich customer.
quotes.author: Korean Proverb

quotes.quote: Eight hundred dollars in ready money is worth more than a thousand dollars of credit.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: Debt is a trap, especially student debt, which is enormous, far larger than credit card debt. It's a trap for the rest of your life because the laws are designed so that you can't get out of it. If a business, say, gets in too much debt, it can declare bankruptcy, but individuals can almost never be relieved of student debt through bankruptcy.
quotes.author: Noam Chomsky

quotes.quote: Credit cards are like snakes: Handle 'em long enough, and one will bite you.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Warren

quotes.quote: Some people are just stuck in their ways and have been brainwashed into believing that credit cards and debt are an unavoidable part of life.
quotes.author: Dave Ramsey

quotes.quote: Money is a terrible master but an excellent servant.
quotes.author: P.T. Barnum

quotes.quote: Beware of little expenses; a small leak will sink a great ship.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: To contract new debts is not the way to pay old ones.
quotes.author: George Washington Carver

quotes.quote: When prosperity comes, do not use all of it.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Too many people spend money they haven't earned, to buy things they don't want, to impress people that they don't like.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: The one who hugs a debt also shakes hand with danger.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: What we have eaten in advance in recent decades in the paper credit binge, we will have to starve for in coming decades.
quotes.author: Roland Baader

quotes.quote: When you pay cash for everything, your credit score becomes irrelevant.
quotes.author: Steven Magee

quotes.quote: A man with debt soon becomes a man with disturbance.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: A man under debt not only loses the peace but also the people.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: An honest man is a debtless man, he doesn't owe anyone anything.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: Yes is like credit, No is like cash.
quotes.author: C.J. Langenhoven

quotes.quote: Creepy people do the things that decent people want to do, but have decided are not a great idea.
quotes.author: Mike Birbiglia

quotes.quote: Nothing is more frightening than a fear you cannot name.
quotes.author: Cornelia Funke

quotes.quote: It sounds creepy, but I always liked the idea of disappearing then becoming something new. That of course was before I disappeared.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Hand

quotes.quote: How frightening, that one person could mean so much, so many things.
quotes.author: Colleen McCullough

quotes.quote: There's nothing quite as frightening as someone who knows they are right.
quotes.author: Michael Faraday

quotes.quote: The really frightening thing about middle age is that you know you'll grow out of it.
quotes.author: Doris Day

quotes.quote: The frightening thing is that, to enter hell, all one has to do is nothing.
quotes.author: Jared C. Wilson

quotes.quote: The most frightening thing in the world is to discover the abnormal in that which is closest to us.
quotes.author: Kobo Abe

quotes.quote: The truly frightening flaw in humanity is our capacity for cruelty – we all have it.
quotes.author: Gillian Flynn

quotes.quote: Only one thing is more frightening than speaking your truth, and that is not speaking.
quotes.author: Naomi Wolf

quotes.quote: It's frightening when things you love appear suddenly changed from what you have always known.
quotes.author: Barbara Kingsolver

quotes.quote: The most terrifying things in the universe came from human minds.
quotes.author: Frank Herbert

quotes.quote: There is nothing more frightening than the faces of people whom one does not know but who seem to know one, and be amused by one.
quotes.author: Rebecca West

quotes.quote: The only way to avoid all frightening choices is to leave society and become a hermit, and that is a frightening choice.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: It is frightening when a woman finally realizes that there is no answer to the question 'who am I' except the voice inside herself.
quotes.author: Betty Friedan

quotes.quote: What a frightening thing is the human, a mass of gauges and dials and registers, and we can only read a few and those perhaps not accurately.
quotes.author: John Steinbeck

quotes.quote: There is nothing frightening about an eternal dreamless sleep. Surely it is better than eternal torment in Hell and eternal boredom in Heaven.
quotes.author: Isaac Asimov

quotes.quote: How sad. How frightening. To be filled with so much hate that you could not even rejoice in the healing of a child...How did anyone ever come to that point?
quotes.author: Stephenie Meyer

quotes.quote: The most terrifying fact about the universe is not that it is hostile but that it is indifferent.
quotes.author: Stanley Kubrick

quotes.quote: One of the most frightening things, I think, is the capacity for retroactive searching, so you can go back in time and trace who someone is in contact with and where they've been.
quotes.author: Laura Poitras

quotes.quote: The most terrifying thing is sometimes not what we see, but rather what we are forced to imagine.
quotes.author: Félix J. Palma

quotes.quote: It's terrifying to see someone inside of whom a vital spring seems to have been broken. It's particularly terrifying to see him in your mirror.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: And the most terrifying question of all may be just how much horror the human mind can stand and still maintain a wakeful, staring, unrelenting sanity.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: In every creepy movie ever made, the barn is the prime nesting ground for the things you don't know you're looking for and always regret finding.
quotes.author: Rick Yancey

quotes.quote: The creepy thing about battle is you always feel alone.
quotes.author: Samuel Fuller

quotes.quote: It's a frightening world to be alone in.
quotes.author: Jhonen Vasquez

quotes.quote: There's nothing frightening in the dark if you just face it
quotes.author: L. J. Smith

quotes.quote: It's frightening how much things change in seventy-one years.
quotes.author: Aimee Carter

quotes.quote: Is there anything more frightening than people?
quotes.author: Svetlana Alexievich

quotes.quote: The irony is, nothing is more frightening than being frightened.
quotes.author: Neel Burton

quotes.quote: Nothing is more frightening than a monster that cares about his health, cause you know he'll be around for a while.
quotes.author: Geoff Ramsey

quotes.quote: Frightening things happen in solitude.
quotes.author: Michael Finkel

quotes.quote: There's something frightening about finding a woman who would take your heart.
quotes.author: Jim Harrison

quotes.quote: It's frightening, the way life speeds up. When you're at school, time can't go fast enough.
quotes.author: Bruce Forsyth

quotes.quote: It's frightening to wake up one morning and discover that while you were asleep you went out of style.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: If you put frightening things into a picture, then they can't harm you. In fact, you end becoming quite fond of them.
quotes.author: Paula Rego

quotes.quote: How frightening it is to have reached the height of human accomplishment in art that must forever borrow from life's abundance.
quotes.author: Franz Grillparzer

quotes.quote: The very damaging, frightening part of postpartum is the lack of perspective and the lack of priority and understanding what is really important.
quotes.author: Brooke Shields

quotes.quote: Regardless of how hard, challenging, frightening, or difficult an experience may seem, everything is just as it needs to be in order for us to heal, grow, and learn.
quotes.author: Iyanla Vanzant

quotes.quote: It's frightening to think that you mark your children merely by being yourself. It seems unfair. You can't assume the responsibility for everything you do — or don't do.
quotes.author: Richard Brinsley Sheridan

quotes.quote: It is terrifying to think of what a commodity art has become.
quotes.author: Audrey Flack

quotes.quote: It's terrifying to be the lead. There's a moment of excitement, and then pure terror.
quotes.author: Vera Farmiga

quotes.quote: There is nothing more terrifying than the absoluteness of one who believes he's right.
quotes.author: Libba Bray

quotes.quote: Terrifying, that the loss of intimacy with one person results in the freezing over of the world, and the loss of oneself.
quotes.author: James Baldwin

quotes.quote: A sailing ship is no democracy; you don't caucus a crew as to where you'll go anymore than you inquire when they'd like to shorten sail.
quotes.author: Sterling Hayden

quotes.quote: A family ship will never sink until it is abandoned by its crew.
quotes.author: Wes Fesler

quotes.quote: When a crew and a captain understand each other to the core, it takes a gale, and more than a gale, to put their ship ashore.
quotes.author: Rudyard Kipling

quotes.quote: What mattered more than how hard a man rowed was how well everything he did in the boat harmonized with what the other fellows were doing. And a man could't harmonize with his crew-mates unless he opened his heart to them. He had to care about his crew.
quotes.author: Daniel James Brown

quotes.quote: Papa was right, after all. A ship's crew was like a family, and together we had done what we never could have managed alone.
quotes.author: Heather Vogel Frederick

quotes.quote: Change yourself and watch how your crew quickly changes.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: There are no passengers on spaceship earth. We are all crew.
quotes.author: Marshall McLuhan

quotes.quote: You're only as strong as your weakest link so you've got to make sure everybody in your crew is on point.
quotes.author: Joey Badass

quotes.quote: No member of a crew is praised for the rugged individuality of his rowing.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Leadership is a two-way street, loyalty up and loyalty down. Respect for one's superiors; care for one's crew.
quotes.author: Grace Hopper

quotes.quote: Life without a defined purpose is similar to a boat without a crew in the middle of the ocean.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: You never compete with the people in your crew; you have your own team. Competition is only with those people whose film is releasing alongside on Friday and never with one's own team.
quotes.author: Emraan Hashmi

quotes.quote: Great things in business are never done by one person. They're done by a team of people.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: A frightened captain makes a frightened crew.
quotes.author: Lister Sinclair

quotes.quote: It’s scary to have a 30-foot wave chasing you. If you are steering, you don’t look back. The crew looks back for you, and you watch their faces. When they look straight up, then get ready!
quotes.author: Magnus Olsson

quotes.quote: You don't inspire your team by showing them how amazing you are. You inspire them by showing them how amazing they are.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: You have to be happy with your own company before you try to accompany someone else.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The only way to get a good crew is to marry one.
quotes.author: Eric Hiscock

quotes.quote: I work hard. The staff and crew see how much energy I put into this project, and it makes them step up.
quotes.author: Wanda Sykes

quotes.quote: Now I remembered a captain's honor and his only duty: to bring his crew back alive.
quotes.author: Carsten Jensen

quotes.quote: That's the first rule of command; be consistent! You can be sadistic, you can be lazy, you can be stupid, but if you're consistent the crew will still let you sit in when they play dominoes.
quotes.author: James Alan Gardner

quotes.quote: Good company is important, it helps to cultivate good qualities.
quotes.author: Sri Sathya Sai Baba

quotes.quote: If you help them (the crew) create good memories, they'll forget all the bad stuff
quotes.author: Geoff Dyer

quotes.quote: Calm sailing doesn’t come from calm waters, it comes from having a good navigator; a good crew and a good vessel.
quotes.author: Anthony T. Hincks

quotes.quote: No cricket team in the world depends on one or two players. The team always plays to win.
quotes.author: Virat Kohli

quotes.quote: Cricket is a team game. If you want fame for yourself, go play an individual game.
quotes.author: Gautam Gambhir

quotes.quote: Cricket is basically baseball on valium.
quotes.author: Robin Williams

quotes.quote: The era of playing aggressive cricket and to have the mid-on up is gone. You now try to read the mindset of a batsman.
quotes.author: Mahendra Singh Dhoni

quotes.quote: A cricket ground is a flat piece of earth with some buildings around it.
quotes.author: Richie Benaud

quotes.quote: It cricket requires one to assume such indecent postures.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: The Test cricket we've played over the last few weeks has been of a very high standard.
quotes.author: Ricky Ponting

quotes.quote: Cricket to us was more than play, It was a worship in the summer sun.
quotes.author: Edmund Blunden

quotes.quote: Cricket is an international game which is played by a diverse range of cultures and communities. Respect for each other is a key component of the game and racist comments have no place in cricket.
quotes.author: Malcolm Speed

quotes.quote: Cricket is an art. Like all arts it has a technical foundation. To enjoy it does not require technical knowledge, but analysis that is not technically based is mere impressionism.
quotes.author: C.L.R. James
