quotes.quote: Cricket is about a lot more than playing by the rules, Mistry. It's a gentleman's game. Don't you ever forget that.
quotes.author: Ken Doyle

quotes.quote: A good cricketer never loses his nerve. He just bats on!
quotes.author: Anthony T. Hincks

quotes.quote: In cricket, you have a sense of sport as it should be played by people who respect each other. They fought fiercely but they were friends.
quotes.author: Peter Kellne

quotes.quote: Cricket needs brightening up a bit. My solution is to let the players drink at the beginning of the game, not after. It always works in our picnic matches
quotes.author: Paul Hogan

quotes.quote: Cricket is full of theorists who can ruin your game in no time.
quotes.author: Ian Botham

quotes.quote: One-day cricket is an exhibition. Test cricket is an examination.
quotes.author: Henry Blofeld

quotes.quote: Cricket now is definitely a professional sport.
quotes.author: Glenn McGrath

quotes.quote: Cricket is battle and service and sport and art
quotes.author: Douglas Jardine

quotes.quote: One day cricket is like fast food. No one wants to cook.
quotes.author: Viv Richards

quotes.quote: Cricket is not illegal, for it is a manly game.
quotes.author: Queen Anne

quotes.quote: Baseball and cricket are beautiful and highly stylized medieval war substitutes, chess made flesh, a mixture of proud chivalry and base in both senses greed.
quotes.author: John Fowles

quotes.quote: Cricket more than any other game is inclined towards sentimentalism and cant.
quotes.author: Neville Cardus

quotes.quote: Cricket is a pressure game, and when it comes to an India-Pakistan match the pressure is doubled.
quotes.author: Imran Khan

quotes.quote: Cricket a game which the English, not being a spiritual people, have invented in order to give themselves some conception of eternity.
quotes.author: Benjamin Mancroft

quotes.quote: Cricket is a most precarious profession; it is called a team game but, in fact, no one is so lonely as a batsman facing a bowler supported by ten fieldsmen and observed by two umpires to ensure that his error does not go unpunished.
quotes.author: John Arlott

quotes.quote: Test cricket is bloody hard work, especially when you've got Sachin batting with what looks like a three metre wide bat.
quotes.author: Michael Hussey

quotes.quote: When you play test cricket, you don't give the Englishmen an inch. Play it tough, all the way. Grind them into the dust.
quotes.author: Donald Bradman

quotes.quote: Only cricket can make a moment like this so confusing and messed up. Common sense please.
quotes.author: Dave Forrest

quotes.quote: The cricket's gone, we only hear machines In erg and atom they exact their pay. And life is largely lived on silver screens.
quotes.author: David McCord

quotes.quote: A true batsman should in most of his strokes tell the truth about himself.
quotes.author: Neville Cardus

quotes.quote: In the game of cricket it has always been customary to accord more adulation to batsman than to bowlers.
quotes.author: I.A.R. Peebles

quotes.quote: It's a round ball and a round bat, and you got to hit it square.
quotes.author: Pete Rose

quotes.quote: Chekhov and cricket - great similarity you know. Same sense of shape and pattern, form and design. Each done with that superbly satisfying art which conceals art. The same passion for the beautifully inconclusive.
quotes.author: Terence Rattigan

quotes.quote: Cricket is a fundamental part of the capitalist conspiracy.
quotes.author: Julian Mitchell

quotes.quote: Cricket? Nobody understands cricket! You gotta know what a crumpet is to understand cricket!
quotes.author: Kevin Eastman

quotes.quote: Cricket is not something you like, Detective Sergeant. Cricket is a religion.
quotes.author: Simon Block

quotes.quote: To the casual observer cricket can appear complex and at times, well, just plain bizarre. What other sport is there which involves people dressing all in white and then throwing themselves around a muddy, grassy field? But those in the know treasure the game as simply the supreme test of brains and brawn.
quotes.author: Julian Knight

quotes.quote: Cricket is played by both men and women, though the men's game grabs the lion's share of the headlines.
quotes.author: Julian Knight

quotes.quote: Cricket can be a complex game and even some cricketers have difficulty grasping some aspects.
quotes.author: Julian Knight

quotes.quote: Millions of people around the globe follow cricket. For many, cricket is the number one sport, offering a unique blend of physical strength, lightning reflexes, huge skill and tactics galore.
quotes.author: Julian Knight

quotes.quote: Many cricket watchers suggest that there has never been a more exciting time to be a cricket fan.
quotes.author: Julian Knight

quotes.quote: Cricket as an example of the American melting pot in action for the last century is now on the cusp of change.
quotes.author: P. David Sentance

quotes.quote: Cricket was an America's bat and ball game for 140 years before baseball became established.
quotes.author: P. David Sentance

quotes.quote: Cricket is inherently a black man's sport.
quotes.author: Dr. Mtutuzeli Nyoka

quotes.quote: Test cricket is the oldest format of cricket. It is considered to be the most difficult format of cricket for the players.
quotes.author: HowExpert

quotes.quote: Cricket was a vital element in Anglo-Saxon culture.
quotes.author: Manchester University Press

quotes.quote: The story of imperial cricket is really about the colonial quest for identity in the face if the colonizers' search for authority.
quotes.author: Manchester University Press

quotes.quote: Cricket became a powerful symbolic and representational force for the Victorians who believed that it embodied all that was noble in the Anglo-Saxon character.
quotes.author: Manchester University Press

quotes.quote: It is difficult to underestimate the importance of cricket in Victorian life. It was a ritual as well as recreation, a spiritual as well as sporting experience.
quotes.author: Manchester University Press

quotes.quote: Cricket produced its own literature whose social impact went far beyond the details of the game, with cricket language becoming moral code.
quotes.author: Manchester University Press

quotes.quote: To win any game of crickets a team must score more runs than the opposition. That's the simple part.
quotes.author: Luke Sellers

quotes.quote: The bat is the main tool of your trade, so choosing the right one is really important. Cricket bats are made from willow, and the quality of the bat depend on the quality of wood used.
quotes.author: Luke Sellers

quotes.quote: While playing cricket, if someone says you are a good batsman/good bowler/good fielder/good keeper, you will accept is willingly.
quotes.author: Abhiram

quotes.quote: Cricket is a relatively leisurely outdoor game played in a circular ground, where the interaction between the bat and the ball takes place in a 22-yard hard surface called the pitch.
quotes.author: Hemanta Saikia

quotes.quote: Cricket became a substantial gambling sport in England.
quotes.author: Hemanta Saikia

quotes.quote: Cricket is a team, and in every cricket match, an enormous amount of statistics is generated in terms of player, team, game, and season.
quotes.author: Hemanta Saikia

quotes.quote: Although versatility, adaptability and the ability to perform under pressure are all valuable assets, players with a strong foundation of core cricket skills have a better chance of success in all forms of the game.
quotes.author: Frank Pyke

quotes.quote: Each sport has its great ones; cricket seems to have them in abundance. And when we talk of cricket's heroes, we talk not just of runs and wickets, but--much more significantly.
quotes.author: Geoff Armstrong

quotes.quote: Cricket--a sport with passionate fans across several continents-- was a natural fit.
quotes.author: Geoff Armstrong

quotes.quote: If a man possesses any good qualities, cricket will most surely develop them. It is a game which calls constantly for little acts of courtesy and self-denial, and no one who plays it can help feeling the better for its influence.
quotes.author: Cassell's Saturday Journal

quotes.quote: In truth, a number of the players really resented some of the young black cricketers being promoted.
quotes.author: Tatenda Taibu

quotes.quote: Sport for me, and specifically cricket these days, is the avenue I've found to provide personal meaning and purpose, without it defining me.
quotes.author: Ellyse Perry

quotes.quote: Only crime and the criminal, it is true, confront us with the perplexity of radical evil; but only the hypocrite is really rotten to the core.
quotes.author: Hannah Arendt

quotes.quote: A good act does not wash out the bad, nor a bad act the good. Each should have its own reward.
quotes.author: George R.R. Martin

quotes.quote: Crime is to man as fleas are to dog, the likelihood of its presence increases as the quality of one's personal circumstances decreases.
quotes.author: Jerome P. Crabb

quotes.quote: Almost all crime is due to the repressed desire for aesthetic expression.
quotes.author: Evelyn Waugh

quotes.quote: A crime which is the crime of many none avenge.
quotes.author: Lucan

quotes.quote: This crime against humanity must never be forgotten.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: Rape is a more heinous crime than murder since the rape victim dies throughout the period she lives.
quotes.author: Amit Abraham

quotes.quote: To have once been a criminal is no disgrace. To remain a criminal is the disgrace.
quotes.author: Malcolm X

quotes.quote: A crime is a crime irrespective of the birth marks of the criminal.
quotes.author: Narendra Modi

quotes.quote: There are crimes that, like frost on flowers, in one single night destroy character and reputation.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: Little crimes breed big crimes. You smile at little crimes and then big crimes blow your head off.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: There are crimes which become innocent, and even glorious, through their splendor, number, and excess: Hence it is, that public theft is called Address, and to seize on Provinces unjustly, to make Conquests.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: Crime against the individual is the equivalent of crime against humanity.
quotes.author: Mahmoud Ahmadinejad

quotes.quote: A person is born with feelings of envy and hate. If he gives way to them, they will lead him to violence and crime, and any sense of loyalty and good faith will be abandoned.
quotes.author: Xun Zi

quotes.quote: Crime is the price society pays for abandoning character.
quotes.author: James Q. Wilson

quotes.quote: There are crimes of passion and crimes of logic. The boundary between them is not clearly defined.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: There is not a crime, there is not a dodge, there is not a trick, there is not a swindle, there is not a vice which does not live by secrecy.
quotes.author: Joseph Pulitzer

quotes.quote: Commit a crime and the world is made of glass. Commit a crime, and it seems as if a coat of snow fell on the ground, such as reveals in the woods the track of every partridge and fox and squirrel and mole.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: A crime is born in the gap between the morality of society and that of the individual.
quotes.author: Håkan Nesser

quotes.quote: But from each crime are born bullets that will one day seek out in you where the heart lies.
quotes.author: Pablo Neruda

quotes.quote: It was crime at its purest, in which empathy, that most fundamental aspect of human morality, evaporated and another being became only a target for untamed fantasy.
quotes.author: Scott Turow

quotes.quote: It is a crime against the State to be powerful enough to commit one.
quotes.author: Pierre Corneille

quotes.quote: Crime and bad lives are the measure of a State's failure, all crime in the end is the crime of the community.
quotes.author: H. G. Wells

quotes.quote: Crime has always been a regrettably consistent element of the human experience.
quotes.author: Mark Frost

quotes.quote: When a man is denied the right to live the life he believes in, he has no choice but to become an outlaw.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: Crimes lead one into another; they who are capable of being forgers are capable of being incendiaries.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: No crime can ever be defended on rational grounds.
quotes.author: Livy

quotes.quote: A crime against god is a demonstrated impossibility.
quotes.author: Robert Green Ingersoll

quotes.quote: Crime succeeds by sudden despatch; honest counsels gain vigor by delay.
quotes.author: Tacitus

quotes.quote: Crime is a fact of the human species, a fact of that specieas alone, but it is above all the secret aspect, impenetrable and hidden. Crime hides, and by far the most terrifying things are those which elude us.
quotes.author: Georges Bataille

quotes.quote: Some people steal to stay alive, and some steal to feel alive. Simple as that.
quotes.author: V.E. Schwab

quotes.quote: Crime is terribly revealing. Try and vary your methods as you will, your tastes, your habits, your attitude of mind, and your soul is revealed by your actions.
quotes.author: Agatha Christie

quotes.quote: When crimes begin to pile up they become invisible. When sufferings become unendurable the cries are no longer heard. The cries, too, fall like rain in summer.
quotes.author: Bertolt Brecht

quotes.quote: Our crime against criminals lies in the fact that we treat them like rascals.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: A crime persevered in a thousand centuries ceases to be a crime, and becomes a virtue. This is the law of custom, and custom supersedes all other forms of law.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Punishment is not for revenge, but to lessen crime and reform the criminal.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Fry

quotes.quote: All crime is a kind of disease and should be treated as such.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: All issues of crime are better addressed at the state level.
quotes.author: Rand Paul

quotes.quote: Violence is a crime against humanity, for it destroys the very fabric of society.
quotes.author: Pope John Paul II

quotes.quote: Crime is naught but misdirected energy.
quotes.author: Emma Goldman

quotes.quote: Every crime will bring remorse to the man who committed it.
quotes.author: Juvenal

quotes.quote: Crimes of which a people is ashamed constitute its real history. The same is true of man.
quotes.author: Jean Genet

quotes.quote: Crime takes the pulse of a culture. It tells us the truth about us as a species.
quotes.author: Andrew Vachss

quotes.quote: The easiest way to steal a man's wallet is to tell him you're going to steal his watch.
quotes.author: Kaz Brekker

quotes.quote: Crime has no color. Crime has no type. Crime has no gender. The reason why crime doesn't end. It is being categorized to certain individuals that people who really commit it, get away with it, right under our noses.
quotes.author: De philosopher DJ Kyos

quotes.quote: Crime is only the retail department of what, in wholesale, we call penal law.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Crime is as much a condition as an intention.
quotes.author: Lewis F. Korns

quotes.quote: Some explanations of a crime are not explanations: they're part of the crime.
quotes.author: Olavo De Carvalho

quotes.quote: Crime is a fact of the human species, a fact of that species alone, but it is above all the secret aspect, impenetrable and hidden. Crime hides, and by far the most terrifying things are those which elude us.
quotes.author: Georges Bataille

quotes.quote: Crime is a logical extension of the sort of behaviour that is often considered perfectly respectable in legitimate business.
quotes.author: Robert Rice

quotes.quote: Leaving someone in ignorance is also a crime.
quotes.author: Jo-Anne M. Wemmers

quotes.quote: Strictly speaking, a crime is an act forbidden by the law of the land, and one which is considered sufficiently serious to warant providing penalties for its commission.
quotes.author: Clarence Darrow

quotes.quote: An increase of crime, as show by statistics, may mean that the records are kept more completely than in former times.
quotes.author: Clarence Darrow

quotes.quote: When the violator is convicted. It has no necessary reference to the general moral condition of man.
quotes.author: Clarence Darrow

quotes.quote: We should always bear in mind that crime can never mean anything except the violation of law.
quotes.author: Clarence Darrow

quotes.quote: So long as the ordinary ideal of punishment prevails, a crime must consist of an act coupled with an intent to do the thing.
quotes.author: Clarence Darrow

quotes.quote: A generic crime habitat fosters many types of crime.
quotes.author: Marcus Felson

quotes.quote: Generic crime habitat develops along the edges between two neighborhoods.
quotes.author: Marcus Felson

quotes.quote: Numerous abandoned sites produce a thick crime habitat, encouraging crime to diversify and spread.
quotes.author: Marcus Felson

quotes.quote: Crime is pathological when it begins to drive our legitimate activities.
quotes.author: Marcus Felson

quotes.quote: A healthy community is not crime-free, but it manages and conatains crime, adjusting to it and preventing it from gaining the upper hand.
quotes.author: Marcus Felson

quotes.quote: When a violent criminal strikes, it is human nature to seek solace in a reason a justification, an explanation. Something logical and tangible that we can grasp.
quotes.author: Eric Brach

quotes.quote: There often are no signs, no obvious indicators that separate the pleasant neighbor from the sadistic murderer.
quotes.author: Eric Brach

quotes.quote: Criminals do not die by the hands of the law: they die by the hands of other men.
quotes.author: Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: It takes all sorts of people to make the underworld.
quotes.author: Don Marquis

quotes.quote: The way of the transgressor is hard-for the police to find out.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Crime doesn't pay, but only if you get caught.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: It takes two to make a criminal: one individual and one society.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Crimes will continue to be committed as long as those who do them aren't.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: The battle against crime should begin in the high chair so as not to end in the electric chair.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: The doctrine that the cure for the evils of democracy is more democracy is like saying that the cure of crime is more crime.
quotes.author: Mencken

quotes.quote: Behind every big fortune, there's a crime.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: Crime does not pay, as well as politics.
quotes.author: Alfred E. Newman

quotes.quote: Make crime pay. Become a lawyer.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: Inside every hardened criminal beats the heart of a ten year old boy.
quotes.author: Bart Simpson

quotes.quote: The Americans are certainly great hero worshippers, and always take heroes from the criminal classes.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Growing old is like being increasingly penalized for a crime you haven't committed.
quotes.author: Pierre Teilhard de Chardin

quotes.quote: If crime went down 100%, it would still be 50 times higher than it should be.
quotes.author: John Bowman

quotes.quote: Shoplifting is a victimless crime. Like punching someone in the dark.
quotes.author: Nelson Muntz

quotes.quote: If it is committed in the name of God or country, there is no crime so heinous that the public will not forgive it.
quotes.author: Bathroom Readers' Institute

quotes.quote: The offender never pardons.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: The criminal justice system, like any system designed by human beings, clearly has its flaws.
quotes.author: Ben Whishaw

quotes.quote: A criminal mind needs consideration rather than the criminal itself. In truth, there are more criminals than those who committed a crime.
quotes.author: Harshit Walia

quotes.quote: Our crime against criminals lies in the fact that we treat them like rascals.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: The offender, who repents, is not yet lost.
quotes.author: Democritus

quotes.quote: Criminals should be punished, not fed pastries.
quotes.author: Lemony Snicket

quotes.quote: There is no crime in anyone's blood any more than there is goodness in the blood of others. Criminals are not born. They are made by hunger, want and injustice.
quotes.author: Khuswant Singh

quotes.quote: Every society has the criminals it deserves.
quotes.author: Emma Goldman

quotes.quote: Every criminal has a good mind conquered by the devil.
quotes.author: Munia Khan

quotes.quote: Both villains and heroes need to have a steadfast belief in themselves.
quotes.author: Jack Gleeson

quotes.quote: Only crime and the criminal, it is true, confront us with the perplexity of radical evil; but only the hypocrite is really rotten to the core.
quotes.author: Hannah Arendt

quotes.quote: Villains are meant to be hated.
quotes.author: Johanna Lindsey

quotes.quote: To destroy an offender cannot benefit society so much as to redeem him.
quotes.author: L. Frank Baum

quotes.quote: We're not lawbreakers, we're law-abiding, and intend to stay that way.
quotes.author: Panayiotis Zavos

quotes.quote: Life is nothing but a competition to be the criminal rather than the victim.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Law without reason is criminal.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: A criminal always returns home.
quotes.author: Ljupka Cvetanovaetanova

quotes.quote: When a judge departs from the letter of the law he becomes a lawbreaker.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: All criminals turn preachers under the gallows.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: When it comes to crisis communications, if you always focus on building a relationship with your customers, fans and followers, you will always find yourself communicating in the right direction.
quotes.author: Melissa Agnes

quotes.quote: The secret of crisis management is not good vs. bad, it's preventing the bad from getting worse.
quotes.author: Andy Gilman

quotes.quote: The financial crisis should not become an excuse to raise taxes, which would only undermine the economic growth required to regain our strength.
quotes.author: George W. Bush

quotes.quote: The financial crisis revealed important weaknesses in many areas of our financial system.
quotes.author: Jerome Powell

quotes.quote: When you're in a crisis of, you know, tremendous proportions, it's beyond any human capability to control, you just make the best decisions you can, and you just hope that your intuition is correct.
quotes.author: Rudy Giuliani

quotes.quote: Crisis is what suppressed pain looks like; it always comes to the surface. It shakes you into reflection and healing.
quotes.author: Bryant McGill

quotes.quote: In a time of crisis, the peoples of the world must rush to get to know each other.
quotes.author: Jose Marti

quotes.quote: Times of crisis, of disruption or constructive change, are not only predictable, but desirable. They mean growth. Taking a new step, uttering a new word, is what people fear most.
quotes.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

quotes.quote: In times of crisis human beings don't have it in them to be rational.
quotes.author: Larry McMurtry

quotes.quote: In times of crisis, it is of utmost importance to keep one's head.
quotes.author: Marie Antoinette

quotes.quote: In times of crisis, people reach for meaning. Meaning is strength. Our survival may depend on our seeking and finding it.
quotes.author: Viktor E. Frankl

quotes.quote: In time of crisis people want to know that you care, more than they care what you know
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: When you have a time of crisis what happens depends on what ideas are floating around, and what ideas have been developed, and thought through, and are made effective.
quotes.author: Milton Friedman

quotes.quote: In a time of crisis we all have the potential to morph up to a new level and do things we never thought possible.
quotes.author: Stuart Wilde

quotes.quote: A time of crisis is not just a time of anxiety and worry. It gives a chance, an opportunity, to choose well or to choose badly.
quotes.author: Desmond Tutu

quotes.quote: It is in times of crisis that good leaders emerge.
quotes.author: Rudolph W. Giuliani

quotes.quote: When you face a crisis, you know who your true friends are.
quotes.author: Magic Johnson

quotes.quote: The environmental crisis is a global problem, and only global action will resolve it.
quotes.author: Barry Commoner

quotes.quote: At every crisis in one's life, it is absolute salvation to have some sympathetic friend to whom you can think aloud without restraint or misgiving.
quotes.author: Woodrow Wilson

quotes.quote: There is a crisis that is not political an epidemic of loneliness, of sadness and we're completely unequal to dealing with it.
quotes.author: Richard Flanagan

quotes.quote: In times of crisis, it's wonderful what the imagination will do.
quotes.author: Ruskin Bond

quotes.quote: Persons in whom a crisis takes place pass the night preceding the paroxysm uncomfortably, but the succeeding night generally more comfortably.
quotes.author: Hippocrates

quotes.quote: A crisis is an opportunity riding the dangerous wind.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Deep within every crisis is an opportunity for something beautiful.
quotes.author: Kate McGahan

quotes.quote: At critical moments the veil between the little-self and the deep self thins and a meaningful self-adjustment becomes possible. If a person does not become paralyzed with fear or frozen in hatred, the wise self hidden within will rise to the occasion
quotes.author: Michael Meade

quotes.quote: Even in crisis, people need entertainment.
quotes.author: Kenneth Eade

quotes.quote: The struggle you're in today is developing the strength you need tomorrow.
quotes.author: Robert Tew

quotes.quote: Treat this crisis as practice for the next crisis.
quotes.author: John Parenti

quotes.quote: A crisis is a terrible thing to waste.
quotes.author: Paul Romer

quotes.quote: At first sign of crisis, the ignorant don't panic because they don't know what's going on, and then later they panic precisely because they don't know what's going on.
quotes.author: Jarod Kintz

quotes.quote: We all have times when life feels hard; when we're frustrated and tired and just want to hide away. If that is you right now, don't worry â€“ every caterpillar has to rest to become a butterfly and you'll soon find your wings again. In the meantime, let your Angels wrap you in theirs. You are so loved.
quotes.author: Anna Taylor

quotes.quote: Sooner or later comes a crisis in our affairs, and how we meet it determines our future happiness and success. Since the beginning of time, every form of life has been called upon to meet such crisis.
quotes.author: Robert Collier

quotes.quote: The wise man does not expose himself needlessly to danger, since there are few things for which he cares sufficiently; but he is willing, in great crises, to give even his life -- knowing that under certain conditions it is not worthwhile to live.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: When written in Chinese, the word crisis is composed of two characters -- one represents danger, and the other represents opportunity.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: A crisis is an opportunity.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: There are no problems, only opportunities.
quotes.author: Geoffrey Parish

quotes.quote: For it is your business. when the wall next door catches fire.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: Swimming for his life, a man does not see much of the country through which the river winds.
quotes.author: W.E. Gladstone

quotes.quote: As someone pointed out recently, if you can keep your head when all about you is losing theirs, it's just possible you haven't grasped the situation.
quotes.author: Jean Kerr

quotes.quote: You never want a serious crisis to go to waste.
quotes.author: Rahm Emanuel

quotes.quote: When disasters strikes and all hope is gone, get down on your knees and pray for Shackleton.
quotes.author: Apsley Cherry-Garrard

quotes.quote: As I said before, this crisis is all artificial. It has no foundation in facts. It was not argued up, as the saying is, and, cannot, therefore, be argued down. Let it alone and it will go down of itself.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Each emergency whether natural or man-made will require different disaster plans for the family, each individual, and with each member having responsibilities.
quotes.author: Nancy Hopkins Reily

quotes.quote: God is perfectly sufficient for every exigency, great or small, and we only want to trust Him to know what He is.
quotes.author: Charles Henry Mackintosh

quotes.quote: When the snake is in the house, one need not discuss the matter at length.
quotes.author: African Proverb

quotes.quote: We should never despair, our Situation before has been unpromising and has changed for the better, so I trust, it will again. If new difficulties arise, we must only put forth New Exertions and proportion our efforts to the exigency of the times.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: These things never happened, but are always.
quotes.author: Sallustius

quotes.quote: My nature is subdued / To what it works in, like the dyer's hand.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: The time is out of joint; O cursed spite, / That ever I was born to set it right.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: It was the best of times, it was the worst of times.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: Anyone who isn't confused doesn't really understand the situation.
quotes.author: Ed Murrow

quotes.quote: You can just choose to think and feel differently about the situation. The situation hasn't changed; all that has changed is your response about how you are choosing to feel.
quotes.author: James A. Murphy

quotes.quote: It's a good game when you're winning / They don't see you in the rain / When you're crisis are pain / Do I find a new beginning.
quotes.author: Andrew Scott

quotes.quote: Any kind of crisis can be good. It wakes you up.
quotes.author: Ryan Reynolds

quotes.quote: Crises and deadlocks when they occur have at least this advantage, that they force us to think.
quotes.author: Jawaharlal Nehru

quotes.quote: Faced with crisis, the man of character falls back on himself. He imposes his own stamp of action, takes responsibility for it, makes it his own.
quotes.author: Charles De Gaulle

quotes.quote: In a crisis, don't hide behind anything or anybody. They're going to find you anyway.
quotes.author: Bear Bryant

quotes.quote: In every crisis, doubt or confusion, take the higher path - the path of compassion, courage, understanding, and love.
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: Seeds of faith are always within us; sometimes it takes a crisis to nourish and encourage their growth.
quotes.author: Susan L. Taylor

quotes.quote: Any idiot can face a crisis - it's day-to-day living that wears you out.
quotes.author: Anton Chekov

quotes.quote: There's always an opportunity with crisis. Just as it forces an individual to look inside himself, it forces a company to reexamine its policies and practices.
quotes.author: Judy Smith

quotes.quote: Perhaps crisis forces commonality of purpose on one another.
quotes.author: Michelle Dean

quotes.quote: I really do think that any deep crisis is an opportunity to make your life extraordinary in some way.
quotes.author: Martha Beck

quotes.quote: Crises are part of life. Everybody has to face them, and it doesn't make any difference what the crisis is.
quotes.author: Jack Nicklaus

quotes.quote: If there was one life skill everyone on the planet needed, it was the ability to think with critical objectivity
quotes.author: Josh Lanyon

quotes.quote: The essence of the independent mind lies not in what it thinks, but in how it thinks.
quotes.author: Christopher Hitchens

quotes.quote: The purpose of critical thinking is rethinking: that is, reviewing, evaluating, and revising thought.
quotes.author: Jon Stratton

quotes.quote: Critical thinking relies on content, because you can't navigate masses of information if you have nothing to navigate to.
quotes.author: Kathy Hirsh-Pasek

quotes.quote: We seem to have trouble with critical thinking. And our political system doesn't help.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: Most people do not have a problem with you thinking for yourself, as long as your conclusions are the same as or at least compatible with their beliefs.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: The insecure leader will interpret critical thinking as critiscism.
quotes.author: Andy Stanley

quotes.quote: Critical Thinking has the potential to be a deeply creative process.
quotes.author: Pearl Zhu

quotes.quote: You have a brain and mind of your own. Use it, and reach your own decisions.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: Thinking is the hardest work there is, which is probably the reason so few engage in it.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: We put too much of a premium on presenting and not enough on substance and critical thinking.
quotes.author: Susan Cain

quotes.quote: No problem can withstand the assault of sustained thinking.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Negative thinking creates clouds at critical decision times.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: Ignorance is always ready to admire itself. Procure yourself critical friends.
quotes.author: Nicolas Boileau

quotes.quote: For students, the evolution-creation discussion can be a useful exercise, for it can help develop their critical thinking skills.
quotes.author: Ken Ham

quotes.quote: All of the common core standards stuff about critical reading and critical thinking and so on can only be positive.
quotes.author: James W. Loewen

quotes.quote: Do not indoctrinate your children. Teach them how to think for themselves, how to evaluate evidence, and how to disagree with you.
quotes.author: Richard Dawkins

quotes.quote: Believe what you like, but don't believe everything you read without questioning it.
quotes.author: Pauline Baynes

quotes.quote: It's sort of a mental attitude about critical thinking and curiosity. It's about mindset of looking at the world in a playful and curious and creative way.
quotes.author: Adam Savage

quotes.quote: You need to answer questions on where, when and what to do
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: Simply disabling specific critical thinking skills is all that is necessary for the god virus to take control of a person.
quotes.author: Darrel Ray

quotes.quote: The most fundamental attack on freedom is the attack on critical thinking skills.
quotes.author: Travis Nichols

quotes.quote: To some people critical thinking means you mustn't be critical of them only others
quotes.author: Rassool Jibraeel Snyman

quotes.quote: There is nothing more Islamic than critical thinking.
quotes.author: Tariq Ramadan

quotes.quote: Instead of complaining, discover ways, tactics and tricks on how to reach out to people
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: Losing your job releases you to think effectively and make rational decisions
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: The ability to reflect is associated with critical thinking and reasoning ability. And the capacity to be alone is one of the highest levels of development. It's important to know how to self-soothe and be confident of other people's love even when they're not there in front of you.
quotes.author: Laurie Helgoe

quotes.quote: Nothing is more conductive to peace of mind than not having any opinions at all.
quotes.author: Georg Christoph Lichtenberg

quotes.quote: Critical thinking is to a liberal education as faith is to religion. ... the converse was true also - faith is to a liberal education as critical thinking is to religion, irrelevant and even damaging.
quotes.author: Jane Smiley

quotes.quote: It is the mark of an educated mind to be able to entertain a thought without accepting it.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Critical thinking is what leads to the next breakthroughs in any area.
quotes.author: Roberta Michnick Golinkoff

quotes.quote: It is especially important to encourage unorthodox thinking when the situation is critical
quotes.author: Boris Yeltsin

quotes.quote: Too often we give children answers to remember rather than problems to solve.
quotes.author: Roger Lewin

quotes.quote: Learn to use your brain power. Critical thinking is the key to creative problem solving in business.
quotes.author: Richard Branson

quotes.quote: What I'm looking for in my interaction is critical thinking on the part of the person pitching to me.
quotes.author: Brad Feld

quotes.quote: Discourse and critical thinking are essential tools when it comes to securing progress in a democratic society. But in the end, unity and engaged participation are what make it happen.
quotes.author: Aberjhani

quotes.quote: To learn that it's easier to be told by others what to think and believe than it is to think for yourself.
quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quotes.quote: In unanimity there may well be either cowardice or uncritical thinking.
quotes.author: Donald Rumsfeld

quotes.quote: Keeping an open mind is a virtue, but not so open that your brains fall out.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Thinking isn't to agree or disagree-that's voting.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: Where all men think alike, no man thinks very much.
quotes.author: Walter Lippmann

quotes.quote: There is no expedient to which a man will not go to avoid the labor of thinking.
quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.quote: Life has taught me to think, but thinking has not taught me to live.
quotes.author: Alexander Herzen

quotes.quote: A man thinks as well through his legs and arms as his brain.
quotes.author: Thoreau

quotes.quote: Our is an age which is proud of machines that think, and suspicious of the men who try to.
quotes.author: Howard Mumford Jones

quotes.quote: There are two ways to slide easily through life: to believe everything or to doubt everything; both ways save us from thinking.
quotes.author: Alfred Korzybski

quotes.quote: Thinking is more interesting than knowing, but less interesting than looking.
quotes.author: Goethe

quotes.quote: Life always gives you plenty to think about, but seldom enough to think with.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: The more we think of some people, the less we think of them.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: For every man who is always telling you what he thinks, there is another who is always telling you what others think.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: For every man who is always telling you what he thinks, there is another who is always telling you what others think.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Many a man who thinks he is thinking, is merely digesting yesterday's newspaper.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Your way of thinking starts with individual thoughts, whether good, bad or ugly.
quotes.author: John A. Andrews

quotes.quote: I refused to let small thinking chart my course in life.
quotes.author: John A. Andrews

quotes.quote: If we think with a mindset of giving, we entertain abundance, and if we think with an attitude of withholding, we invite lack. As the source gives to the stream so ought the stream to impart to the ocean.
quotes.author: John A. Andrews

quotes.quote: Critical thinking involves first discovering the who, what, when, and how of things.
quotes.author: Bell Hooks

quotes.quote: Critical thinkers are clear as to the purpose at hand and the question at issue.
quotes.author: Bell Hooks

quotes.quote: Critical thinking is an interactive process, one that demands participation on the part of teacher and students alike.
quotes.author: Bell Hooks

quotes.quote: Keeping an open mind is an essential requirement of critical thinking.
quotes.author: Bell Hooks

quotes.quote: Critical thinking requires us to use our imagination, seeing things from perspectives other than our own and envisioning the likely consequences of our position.
quotes.author: Bell Hooks

quotes.quote: We all use thinking skills everyday to help us learn, make decisions, and solve problems.
quotes.author: Ellie Weiler

quotes.quote: Critical thinking skills are the foundation for all other types of learning.
quotes.author: Ellie Weiler

quotes.quote: Unlike current events, thinking skills never change.
quotes.author: Ellie Weiler

quotes.quote: Once thinking skills are mastered, students are able to tackle new challenges with the ability to think them through and discover solutions.
quotes.author: Ellie Weiler

quotes.quote: Critical thinking is essential as a tool of inquiry.
quotes.author: Aveyard

quotes.quote: Critical thinking is a liberating force in education and a powerful resource in one's personal and civic life.
quotes.author: Aveyard

quotes.quote: While not synonymous with good thinking, critical thinking is a pervasive and self-rectifying human phenomenon.
quotes.author: Aveyard

quotes.quote: Critical thinkers are able to look for flaws in argument and resist claims that have no support.
quotes.author: Aveyard

quotes.quote: Critical thinkers are more likely to engage in productive and positive activity due to their continual questioning of their knowledge, assumptions and perspectives.
quotes.author: Aveyard

quotes.quote: A man convinced against his will is of the same opinion still.
quotes.author: Laurence J. Peter

quotes.quote: Don't call the alligator, big mouth until you have crossed the river.
quotes.author: Belizean (on criticism)

quotes.quote: Don't judge anyone unless you've walked in their moccasins one moon.
quotes.author: Native American Proverb

quotes.quote: Don't judge of men's wealth or piety by their Sunday appearances.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: It is easier to criticize than to do better.
quotes.author: Swiss (on criticism)

quotes.quote: Sticks and stones may break my bones, but names can never hurt me.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The bad plowman quarrels with his ox.
quotes.author: Korean (on criticism)

quotes.quote: The human tongue is more poisonous than a bee's sting.
quotes.author: Vietnamese (on criticism)

quotes.quote: The pen is mightier than the sword.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The rattan basket criticizes the palm
quotes.author: Filipino (on criticism)

quotes.quote: The worst enemy you have is right in your head.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: When strict with oneself, one rarely fails.
quotes.author: Confucious

quotes.quote: Worthless people blame their karma.
quotes.author: Burmese (on criticism)

quotes.quote: You'll never do anything behind you that won't come up in front of you.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Criticism may not be agreeable, but it is necessary. It fulfils the same function as pain in the human body. It calls attention to an unhealthy state of things.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Criticism, like rain, should be gentle enough to nourish a man's growth without destroying his roots.
quotes.author: Frank A. Clark

quotes.quote: There is no defense against criticism except obscurity.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.quote: I much prefer the sharpest criticism of a single intelligent man to the thoughtless approval of the masses.
quotes.author: Johannes Kepler

quotes.quote: The final proof of greatness lies in being able to endure criticism without resentment.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: The trouble with most of us is that we would rather be ruined by praise than saved by criticism.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: Don't criticize what you can't understand.
quotes.author: Bob Dylan

quotes.quote: To avoid criticism say nothing, do nothing, be nothing.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: He has a right to criticize, who has a heart to help.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Let me never fall into the vulgar mistake of dreaming that I am persecuted whenever I am contradicted.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: People ask you for criticism, but they only want praise.
quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: Before you go and criticize the younger generation, just remember who raised them.
quotes.author: Unknown Author

quotes.quote: When we judge or criticize another person, it says nothing about that person; it merely says something about our own need to be critical.
quotes.author: Unknown Author

quotes.quote: Criticism is an indirect form of self-boasting.
quotes.author: Emmet Fox

quotes.quote: Any fool can criticize, condemn, and complain but it takes character and self control to be understanding and forgiving.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: How much easier it is to be critical than to be correct.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: Asking a working writer what he thinks about critics is like asking a lamppost how it feels about dogs.
quotes.author: Christopher Hampton

quotes.quote: Criticism is the disapproval of people, not for having faults, but having faults different from your own.
quotes.author: Unknown Author

quotes.quote: Do what you feel in your heart to be right - for you'll be criticized anyway. You'll be damned if you do, and damned if you don't.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Honest criticism is hard to take, particularly from a relative, a friend, an acquaintance, or a stranger.
quotes.author: Franklin P. Jones

quotes.quote: If it's very painful for you to criticize your friends - you're safe in doing it. But if you take the slightest pleasure in it, that's the time to hold your tongue.
quotes.author: Alice Miller

quotes.quote: Persecution is the first law of society because it is always easier to suppress criticism than to meet it.
quotes.author: Howard Mumford Jones

quotes.quote: Nothing is complete and thus nothing is exempt from criticism.
quotes.author: James Luther Adams

quotes.quote: A successful person is one who can lay a firm foundation with the bricks that others throw at him or her.
quotes.author: David Brinkley

quotes.quote: The pleasure we feel in criticizing robs us from being moved by very beautiful things.
quotes.author: Jean De La Bruyere

quotes.quote: If criticism had any power to harm, the skunk would be extinct by now.
quotes.author: Fred Allen

quotes.quote: The man who cannot endure to have his errors and shortcomings brought to the surface and made known, but tries to hide them, is unfit to walk the highway of truth.
quotes.author: James Allen

quotes.quote: Do not seek praise. Seek criticism.
quotes.author: Paul Arden

quotes.quote: Sandwich every bit of criticism between two layers of praise.
quotes.author: Mary Kay Ash

quotes.quote: Criticism should be a casual conversation.
quotes.author: W.H Auden

quotes.quote: Remember that all is opinion.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: The critic has to educate the public; the artist has to educate the critic.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: A sneer is the weapon of the weak.
quotes.author: James Russell Lowell

quotes.quote: Any jackass can kick a barn down, but it takes a carpenter to build it.
quotes.author: Sam Rayburn

quotes.quote: Do not use a hatchet to remove a fly from your friend's forehead.
quotes.author: Unknown Author

quotes.quote: The dread of criticism is the death of genius.
quotes.author: William Gilmore Simms

quotes.quote: Criticism is the science of literature: a systematic and progressive comprehension of it.
quotes.author: Northrop Frye

quotes.quote: Criticism can talk, and all the arts are dumb.
quotes.author: Northrop Frye

quotes.quote: We have criticism simply because the directed experience of literature is never adequate.
quotes.author: Northrop Frye

quotes.quote: Criticism and literature are related as a theory to practice, and the function of criticism is to explain the social function and relevance of literature.
quotes.author: Northrop Frye

quotes.quote: Criticism, in order to point beyond itself, needs to be actively iconoclastic about itself.
quotes.author: Northrop Frye

quotes.quote: Criticism is the primary act of human awareness: it expresses detachment without separation.
quotes.author: Northrop Frye

quotes.quote: If you had to write a criticism of a picture every day, you'd get awfully sick and tired of trying to figure out what to say about it.
quotes.author: Howard Hawks

quotes.quote: To many people, dramatic criticism must seem like an attempt to tattoo soap bubbles.
quotes.author: James Mason Brown

quotes.quote: The fetus that is afraid of criticism is never born.
quotes.author: Burundi Saying

quotes.quote: So much thought about everything appears in the form of literary criticism.
quotes.author: Iris Murdoch

quotes.quote: Whatever they criticize you for, intensify it.
quotes.author: Jean Cocteau

quotes.quote: Criticism comes easier than craftsmanship.
quotes.author: Zeuxis

quotes.quote: Of all the cants which are canted in this canting world, though the cant of hypocrites may be the worst, the cant of criticism is the most tormenting.
quotes.author: Laurence Sterne

quotes.quote: Of all the preposterous assumptions of humanity over humanity, nothing exceeds most of the criticisms made on the habits of the poor by the well-housed, well-warmed, and well-fed.
quotes.author: Herman Melville

quotes.quote: To criticize is to appreciate, to appropriate, to take intellectual possession, to establish and find in relation with the criticized thing, and to make it one's own.
quotes.author: H. James

quotes.quote: When I decided to go into politics I weighed the costs. I would get criticism. But I went ahead. so when virulent criticism came I wasn't surprised. I was better able to handle it.
quotes.author: Herbert Hoover

quotes.quote: Difficulties, opposition, criticism— these things are meant to be overcome, and there is a special joy in facing them and in coming out on top. It is only when there is nothing but praise that life loses its charm and I begin to wonder what I should do about it.
quotes.author: Vijaya Lakshmi Pandit

quotes.quote: Find the grain of truth in criticism—chew it and swallow it.
quotes.author: Don Sutton

quotes.quote: Any fool can criticize, and many of them do.
quotes.author: Archbishop C. Garbett

quotes.quote: A critic is a legless man who teaches running.
quotes.author: Channing Pollock

quotes.quote: To escape criticism—do nothing, say nothing, be nothing.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Analysis kills spontaneity. The grain once ground into flour springs and germinates no more
quotes.author: Henry Frederic Amiel

quotes.quote: A critic is a man who knows the way but can't drive the car.
quotes.author: Kenneth Tynan

quotes.quote: The factor in human life provocative of a noble discontent is the gradual emergence of a sense of criticism, founded upon appreciation of beauty. and of intellectual distinction, and of beauty.
quotes.author: Alfred North Whitehead

quotes.quote: Animals are such agreeable friends—they ask no questions, they pass no criticisms.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: Those who are lifting the world upward and onward are those who encourage more than criticize.
quotes.author: ELizabeth Harrison

quotes.quote: If the end brings me out all right, what is said against me won't amount to anything. If the end brings me out wrong, then ten angels swearing I was right would make no difference.
quotes.author: Lincoln

quotes.quote: That is what the highest criticism really is, the record of one's own soul. It is more fascinating than history, as it is concerned simply with oneself. It is more delightful than philosophy, as its subject is concrete and not abstract, real and not vague. It is the only civilized form of autobiography.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: I am sorry to think that you do not get a man's most effective criticism until you provoke him. Severe truth is expressed with some bitterness.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Criticism is a study by which men grow important and formidable at a very small expense. He whom nature has made weak, and idleness keeps ignorant, may yet support his vanity by the name of a critic.
quotes.author: Johnson

quotes.quote: They feed the crocodile in the hope that he will eat them last.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: The crocodile doesn't harm the bird that cleans his teeth for him. He eats the others but not that one.
quotes.author: Linda Hogan

quotes.quote: Crocodiles are easy. They try to kill and eat you. People are harder. Sometimes they pretend to be your friend first.
quotes.author: Steve Irwin

quotes.quote: The crocodile cannot turn its head. Like all science, it must always go forward with all-devouring jaws.
quotes.author: Pyotr Kapitsa

quotes.quote: It is the wisdom of the crocodiles, that shed tears when they would devour.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: It is only safe to mock a crocodile when you have crossed the river.
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.quote: Alligators and crocodiles are some of the most aggressive creatures on the planet - they'll take down a boat if you come up to their nest.
quotes.author: Jack Hanna

quotes.quote: The fallen of the baboon into the river is the risen of the joy of the crocodile. Though the crocodile becomes happy, it conceals its joy until it deploys all its necessary deft and strength to take captive of the Baboon.
quotes.author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quotes.quote: Working with crocodiles is always amazing because they're beautiful. They're modern day dinosaurs, which is really cool.
quotes.author: Bindi Irwin

quotes.quote: The crocodiles that frighten from crossing the rivers of our destinies are easily drowned with personal confidence but not team courage. It means you owe it to yourself to defeat your own crocodiles and cross over to the other side!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: The crocodile must want to be a crocodile for reasons of the crocodile.
quotes.author: Louis Kahn

quotes.quote: Crocodiles are really bold, and they do come up on land.
quotes.author: Linda Kozlowski

quotes.quote: To worship a crocodile is better to worship yourself.
quotes.author: Peter Kreeft

quotes.quote: Alligator: The crocodile of America, superior in every detail to the crocodile of the effete monarchies of the Old World.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: Take the crocodile, for example, my favorite animal. There are 23 species. Seventeen of those species are rare or endangered. They're on the way out, no matter what anyone does or says, you know.
quotes.author: Steve Irwin

quotes.quote: Statistically there's only one crocodile-related human fatality per year in the whole of Australia.
quotes.author: Steve Irwin

quotes.quote: Crooks aren't the worst people, just the stupidest. The fleas of the world.
quotes.author: Orson Welles

quotes.quote: What's a crook, only a businessman without a shop.
quotes.author: Brendan Behan

quotes.quote: Very well then, better a sane crook than a mad puritan.
quotes.author: F.Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: I don't know why we'd need so many more prisons when the crooks seem so happy in the Senate.
quotes.author: Jack Layton

quotes.quote: A silver-tongued charlatan and a half-wit society are made for each other! When these two come together in an election, a great disaster happens: Charlatan comes to power!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: The charlatan is always the pioneer... The quack of yesterday is the professor of tomorrow.
quotes.author: Sir Arthur Conan Doyle

quotes.quote: The Robbed that smiles, steals something from the thief.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Thieves respect property. They merely wish the property to become their property that they may more perfectly respect it.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Every time a thief steals, he steals from his own peace, from his own honor! No man is as poor as a rich thief!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: We hang the petty thieves and appoint the great ones to public office.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: The cheaper the crook, the gaudier the patter.
quotes.author: Dashiell Hammet

quotes.quote: A charlatan makes obscure what is clear; a thinker makes clear what is obscure.
quotes.author: Hugh Kingsmill

quotes.quote: We've had crooks from the beginning of time...It's always very interesting and troubling why good people do bad things.
quotes.author: Henry Paulson

quotes.quote: You can't get rich in politics unless you're a crook.
quotes.author: Harry S Truman

quotes.quote: I know many crooks and they never preach, but I don't know anyone who preaches that isn't a crook also.
quotes.author: Indro Montanelli

quotes.quote: Crooks are early adopters.
quotes.author: Craig Newmark

quotes.quote: A thief is a thief, whether he steals a diamond or a cucumber.
quotes.author: Indian Proverb

quotes.quote: The more laws and order are made prominent, the more thieves and robbers there will be.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: A thief, though rich, will continue to steal, but an honest man, though poor, will ever seek to pay his debts.
quotes.author: John Andreas Widtsoe

quotes.quote: The big thieves hang the little ones.
quotes.author: Czech Proverb

quotes.quote: It is not easy to steal where the landlord is a thief.
quotes.author: Irish Sayings

quotes.quote: One bush, they say can never hide two thieves
quotes.author: Aristophanes

quotes.quote: Those crooks exhibit the epidermis of pachyderms. But I am prepared to fight them. I have cultivated intestinal fortitude.
quotes.author: Miriam Santiago

quotes.quote: A crook is a crook, and there's something healthy about his frankness in the matter. But any guy who pretends he is enforcing the law and steals on his authority is a swell snake. The worst type of these punks is the big politician. You can only get a little of his time because he spends so much time covering up that no one will know that he is a thief. A hard-working crook will-and can-get those birds by the dozen, but right down in his heart he won't depend on them-hates the sight of them.
quotes.author: Al Capone

quotes.quote: The real culprits are those who created a system that makes it dangerous to work and safe to loaf.
quotes.author: Thomas Sowell

quotes.quote: Every time we try to plug a hole in the system, the crooks are finding a way to beat the system.
quotes.author: Steve Camp

quotes.quote: An artist who conforms to conventional ideas is nothing but a mere charlatan.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: Fraud is the ready minister of injustice.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: If you carry your cross joyfully, it will carry you.
quotes.author: Thomas a Kempis

quotes.quote: It is much easier to wear a cross than to bear a cross.
quotes.author: Leonard Ravenhill

quotes.quote: Look at the cross and you will know what one soul means to Jesus.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: Without the cross we have a meaningless and powerless Christianity.
quotes.author: Michael Catt

quotes.quote: The cross is the only ladder high enough to touch Heaven's threshold.
quotes.author: George Dana Boardman Pepper

quotes.quote: Only on the cross do you have a totally holy God and a totally loving God.
quotes.author: Timothy Keller

quotes.quote: The cross is where God forgave his children without lowering his standards.
quotes.author: Max Lucado

quotes.quote: The Cross is the Word through which God has responded to evil in the world.
quotes.author: Pope Francis

quotes.quote: The cross is the place where, and the means by which, God loved us to the uttermost.
quotes.author: N. T. Wright

quotes.quote: The cross is God's way of taking away all of our accusations, excuses, and arguments.
quotes.author: Rob Bell

quotes.quote: The cross is proof of both the immense love of God and the profound wickedness of sin.
quotes.author: John F. Macarthur Jr.

quotes.quote: For those who live by faith, the cross is a treasure more valuable than gold and precious stones.
quotes.author: Basil Moreau

quotes.quote: The cross means there is no shipwreck without hope; there is no dark without dawn; nor storm without haven.
quotes.author: Pope John Paul II

quotes.quote: The cross is the surest, truest and deepest window on the very heart and character of the living and loving God.
quotes.author: N. T. Wright

quotes.quote: The cross alone is our theology.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: The cross is the ladder to heaven.
quotes.author: Thomas Draxe

quotes.quote: The cross cannot be defeated for it is defeat.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Bear the Cross cheerfully and it will bear you.
quotes.author: Thomas a Kempis

quotes.quote: While the world changes, the cross stands firm.
quotes.author: Bruno of Cologne

quotes.quote: The cross is steady while the world is turning.
quotes.author: Bruno of Cologne

quotes.quote: The cross is the gift God gives to his friends.
quotes.author: Philip Neri

quotes.quote: All crosses are easier to carry when we keep moving.
quotes.author: Neal A. Maxwell

quotes.quote: The cross is God taking on flesh and blood and saying, Me too.
quotes.author: Rob Bell

quotes.quote: Taking up my cross means a life voluntarily surrendered to God.
quotes.author: Arthur Pink

quotes.quote: The cross grants us position, the Holy Spirit gives us experience.
quotes.author: Watchman Nee

quotes.quote: The Cross is the way to Paradise, but only when it is borne willingly.
quotes.author: Paul of the Cross

quotes.quote: The cross of Christ is the true ground and chief cause of Christian hope.
quotes.author: Pope Leo I

quotes.quote: The Cross will be for us as it was for Christ: proof of the greatest love.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: Whoever does not seek the cross of Christ doesn't seek the glory of Christ.
quotes.author: John of the Cross

quotes.quote: A cross without offense to the world is a cross without power in the world.
quotes.author: Steven J Lawson

quotes.quote: The cross is a precious treasure to be kept secret, lest we be robbed of it.
quotes.author: Margaret Mary Alacoque

quotes.quote: Usually one gets a heavier cross when one attempts to get rid of an old one.
quotes.author: Edith Stein

quotes.quote: Apart from the cross, there is no other ladder by which we may get to heaven.
quotes.author: Rose of Lima

quotes.quote: Out of the cross comes the resurrection. Out of weakness comes real strength.
quotes.author: Timothy Keller

quotes.quote: The cross means suffering. Suffering's meaning is to be learned through the cross.
quotes.author: Elisabeth Elliot

quotes.quote: Jesus' Cross shows the full force of evil, but also the full power of God's mercy.
quotes.author: Pope Francis

quotes.quote: There is no cross, big or small, in our life which the Lord does not share with us.
quotes.author: Pope Francis

quotes.quote: The cross of Jesus Christ represents the intersection of God's love and God's holiness.
quotes.author: Robert Jeffress

quotes.quote: We need men of the cross, with the message of the cross, bearing the marks of the cross.
quotes.author: Vance Havner

quotes.quote: Go to the cross of Christ, all you that want to be delivered from the power of selfishness.
quotes.author: J. C. Ryle

quotes.quote: The Cross is not responsible for God's love; rather it was His love that conceived the Cross.
quotes.author: Aiden Wilson Tozer

quotes.quote: The Cross is the central event in time and eternity, and the answer to all the problems of both.
quotes.author: Oswald Chambers

quotes.quote: The cross shows us the seriousness of our sin-but it also shows us the immeasurable love of God.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Because of the Cross, God can be both just towards sin and yet mercifully justifying to sinners.
quotes.author: Timothy Keller

quotes.quote: To believe Christ's cross to be a friend, as he himself is a friend, is also a special act of faith.
quotes.author: Samuel Rutherford

quotes.quote: The cross is offensive because it directly confronts the evils which dominate so much of this world.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: The way of the Cross is not easy, yet it is the tuneful, the rhythmic, the beautiful, the lovely way.
quotes.author: Edgar Cayce

quotes.quote: The Cross of Christ is the crux of history. Without the Cross, history cannot be defined or corrected.
quotes.author: Ravi Zacharias

quotes.quote: The cross reminds us that there is no true love without suffering, there is no gift of life without pain.
quotes.author: Pope Benedict XVI

quotes.quote: The cross stands high above the opinions of men and to that cross all opinions must come at last for judgment.
quotes.author: A.W. Tozer

quotes.quote: The freedom of Cross Country is so primitive. It's woman vs. nature.
quotes.author: Lynn Jennings

quotes.quote: Cross Country is like poker. You have to be holding five good cards all the time.
quotes.author: Rollie Geiger

quotes.quote: Cross country skiing is great if you live in a small country.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: Running cross country is the closest man will ever get to flying.
quotes.author: Joseph Vanderstel

quotes.quote: I love running cross country....On a track, I feel like a hamster.
quotes.author: Robin Williams

quotes.quote: Cross Country: No half times, no time outs, no substitutions. It must be the only true sport.
quotes.author: Chuck Norris

quotes.quote: You know you are a cross country runner when your shoes have more mileage than your car.
quotes.author: Wilbert Gilbry

quotes.quote: Cross country is a mental sport and we're all insane.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: As cross-country skiers, we tend to be a bit fanatical, because it's our own energy that makes you go.
quotes.author: Dean Glaze

quotes.quote: Every step you take is one step closer to the finish line.
quotes.author: Clyde Tubick

quotes.quote: Only those who will risk going too far can possibly find out how far one can go.
quotes.author: T. S. Eliot

quotes.quote: If you run, you are a runner. It doesn't matter how fast or how far. It doesn't matter if today is your first day or if you've been running for twenty years. There is no test to pass, no license to earn, no membership card to get. You just run.
quotes.author: John Bingham

quotes.quote: Cross country was something that started off as a punishment from my father for low grades. I guess he didn't realize it would take off so well. It gave me something to do with my free time and it taught me to be accountable.
quotes.author: A.J. Ellison

quotes.quote: Sports do not build character. They reveal it.
quotes.author: Heywood Broun

quotes.quote: You can't put a limit on anything. The more you dream, the farther you get.
quotes.author: Michael Phelps

quotes.quote: If you want to tell something to an athlete, say it quickly and give no alternatives. This is a game of winning and losing. It is senseless to explain and explain.
quotes.author: Paavo Nurmi

quotes.quote: Every athlete has doubts. Elite runners in particular are insecure people. You need someone to affirm that what you are doing is right.
quotes.author: Lynn Jennings

quotes.quote: A runner's creed: I will win; if I cannot win, I shall be second; if I cannot be second, I shall be third; if I cannot place at all, I shall still do my best.
quotes.author: Ken Doherty

quotes.quote: When you put yourself on the line in a race and expose yourself to the unknown, you learn things about yourself that are very exciting.
quotes.author: Doris Brown Heritage

quotes.quote: Cycling is unique. No other sport lets you go like that where there's only the bike left to hold you up. If you ran as hard, you'd fall over. Your legs wouldn't support you.
quotes.author: Steve Johnson

quotes.quote: Running cross country is the closest man will ever get to flying.
quotes.author: Joseph Vanderstel

quotes.quote: You know you run cross country when you are freakishly good at estimating distances.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Sports are a microcosm of society.
quotes.author: Billie Jean King

quotes.quote: Once you have tasted flight, you will forever walk the earth with your eyes turned skyward, for there you have been, and there you will always long to return.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: I found I could also be good in cross country. I don't think my running style has anything to do with it. If you have speed and your body feels good, you can do any distance.
quotes.author: Catherine Ndereba

quotes.quote: Running taught me valuable lessons. In cross-country competition, training counted more than intrinsic ability, and I could compensate for a lack of natural aptitude with diligence and discipline. I applied this in everything I did.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: That's one thing you learn in sports. You don't give up; you fight to the finish.
quotes.author: Louis Zamperini

quotes.quote: If I miss anything about the sport, it's the camaraderie of old teammates.
quotes.author: Bo Jackson

quotes.quote: The miracle isn't that I finished. The miracle is that I had the courage to start.
quotes.author: John Bingham

quotes.quote: The start of a World Cross Country event is like riding a horse in the middle of a buffalo stampede. It's a thrill if you keep up, but one slip and you're nothing but hoof prints.
quotes.author: Ed Eyestone

quotes.quote: Cross country embodies risk, just like life.
quotes.author: Nick Steele

quotes.quote: I learned from cross country that the people with the most excuses were usually not among the elite. It they happened to luck up, they were never in the top 10, or the extraordinary. They also did not have the highest quality of life.
quotes.author: Nick Steele

quotes.quote: Cross country taught me my own temporary weakness; excuses are temporary if you choose to let go of them.
quotes.author: Nick Steele

quotes.quote: Cross country will test your will, your courage, and ultimately your discipline.
quotes.author: Nick Steele

quotes.quote: What I learned from cross country is that one person can influence a team. If this one person persists in pushing the team, even when they do not feel like working particularly hard, he can infect them with his tenacity.
quotes.author: Nick Steele

quotes.quote: My cross-country shoes have more miles than your car.
quotes.author: Hal Higdon

quotes.quote: Cross-country runners do it in the woods.
quotes.author: Hal Higdon

quotes.quote: I really like cross-country. You're one with the mud.
quotes.author: Lynn Jennings

quotes.quote: I loved cross country right from the start. I loved the open territory and going the distance.
quotes.author: Bill Rodgers

quotes.quote: In a world of give and take, give what it takes. There is no bench in cross-country.
quotes.author: Hal Higdon

quotes.quote: Cross-country is my first great love in running. Like anyone's first love, I remember it with great sentimentality.
quotes.author: Hal Higdon

quotes.quote: In the beginning of cross-country travel by car, the thing that was almost as common as cars driving cross-country was cross-country road memoirs.
quotes.author: Hal Higdon

quotes.quote: To cross the country on foot is, by definition, extraordinary.
quotes.author: Rickey Gates

quotes.quote: I prayed for cross country to go away.
quotes.author: Eileen Heisler

quotes.quote: The most exciting sport in France, however, is cross country bicycle racing.
quotes.author: James A. FitzPatrick

quotes.quote: I think you should take the bike on a cross-country trip. It's something you've always wanted to do.
quotes.author: Andrew W. Marlowe

quotes.quote:
Cross country feelin', lots of time, lives get to living.
Cross country feeling, I gotta love to take and to give.
Gotta move to get that cross country feeling.
quotes.author: White Heat

quotes.quote: She wants to ride, a horse cross country. She wants to feel, wind brush against her skin.
quotes.author: Anita Cochran

quotes.quote: Been cross country a time or two and look at it now, it's just like new.
quotes.author: Wynonna Judd

quotes.quote: She be cross country, givin' all that she got. A thousand a pop, I'm pullin' Bentleys off the lot.
quotes.author: UGK

quotes.quote: Cross country track, greyhound bus ride.
quotes.author: Snoop Dog

quotes.quote: Crosswords, cross birds, I cross country with a couple those.
quotes.author: Pusha T

quotes.quote: The most exciting sport in France, however, is cross country bicycle racing.
quotes.author: James A. FitzPatrick

quotes.quote: I'm wasted on cross-country! We Dwarves are natural sprinters, very dangerous over short distances.
quotes.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quotes.quote: Not just running! Something that needs endurance! Something that needs stamina! Like, long-distance running! Cross-country running!
quotes.author: Jim Jacobs

quotes.quote: I think you should take the bike on a cross-country trip. It's something you've always wanted to do.
quotes.author: Nathan Fillion

quotes.quote: Cross-country I can handle. But downhill it was total terror all the way. I have a feeling I gonna regret this tomorrow.
quotes.author: Peter S. Fischer

quotes.quote: I'm traveling cross-country taking Polaroid pictures of people walking other people's dogs. It's pretty hard to tell, but I didn't become an artist because it was easy.
quotes.author: Seth MacFarlane

quotes.quote: Cross country runners sacrifice activities to study and run. In the process, hidden sources of strength, creativity and confidence are discovered which are applied to everything else in their lives.
quotes.author: Jeff Galloway

quotes.quote: It was commonly known, even back in the 50's that over half of the cross-country team members were among the best students and leaders in school organizations.
quotes.author: Jeff Galloway

quotes.quote: The most common reason why cross-country runners don't achieve their goal is that they get injured.
quotes.author: Jeff Galloway

quotes.quote: Pushing too hard, too soon is the most common cause of cross-country injuries.
quotes.author: Jeff Galloway

quotes.quote: During the days off, cross training can provide other benefits, while the body is improving.
quotes.author: Jeff Galloway

quotes.quote: Cross-country competitions, which originated in english schools in the 19th century, are unique from other running sports and that they take place on open-air courses covered natural torrent such as forest areas and grass covered fields.
quotes.author: Skye Arthur-Banning

quotes.quote: Cross-country was introduced into the summer olympic games in 1912 with sweden taking the gold medal.
quotes.author: Skye Arthur-Banning

quotes.quote: Harvard was the first college to introduce cross-country as a training event for track and field in 1880.
quotes.author: Skye Arthur-Banning

quotes.quote: Today the world cross country championships is the highest regarded international competition in cross country running.
quotes.author: Skye Arthur-Banning

quotes.quote: Cross-country runners are judged both as individuals and as a team.
quotes.author: Skye Arthur-Banning

quotes.quote: Cross-country also called ski touring, nordic skiing, or skinny skiing takes you where you want to go.
quotes.author: Jules Older

quotes.quote: In my junior year in 1957, the cross-country runners were issued canvas shoes with thin, hard soles that had no cushioning, no lateral support, and almost no heel-they were what a later generation call minimalist.
quotes.author: Ed Ayres

quotes.quote: It's more like a cross-country run. It's a perfectly normal course of action for a man to alter his future plans, as he gets older and wiser.
quotes.author: Romeo Marrishaw

quotes.quote: Success is not a 100-yard dash. It's more like a cross-country run.
quotes.author: Romeo Marrishaw

quotes.quote: Consistency doesn't mean you run every day no matter what.
quotes.author: Meb Keflezighi

quotes.quote: Consistency is about running frequently enough that it's a regular part of your life.
quotes.author: Meb Keflezighi

quotes.quote: Variety will improve your running even if you have no racing plans.
quotes.author: Meb Keflezighi

quotes.quote: Small bits of faster running once a week, or once every 2 weeks, will add a fun challenge and improve your running form.
quotes.author: Meb Keflezighi

quotes.quote: Just like we all have different fingerprints, we all come to running as unique athletes.
quotes.author: Meb Keflezighi

quotes.quote: In cross country, a runner doesn't rely solely on his or her own motivation.
quotes.author: Pat Tyson

quotes.quote: A team of runners can share the emotional, spiritual, and inspirational load.
quotes.author: Pat Tyson

quotes.quote: In cross country, the number of athletes who come out for the team is paramount.
quotes.author: Pat Tyson

quotes.quote: Cross country should be as inclusive as possible.
quotes.author: Pat Tyson

quotes.quote: For some students, cross country is a way to manage weight.
quotes.author: Pat Tyson

quotes.quote: Only you can decide where running sits on our list of priorities.
quotes.author: Matt Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: Fear of injuries is a more legitimate reason to avoid running more.
quotes.author: Matt Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: The faster you run, the more your muscles rely on carbohydrate.
quotes.author: Matt Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: Carbohydrate in both forms, glycogen and glucose is one of two major energy sources for running.
quotes.author: Matt Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: There is no time to think about how much I hurt; there is only time to run.
quotes.author: Ben Logsdon

quotes.quote: In many ways, a race is analogous to life itself. Once it is over, it cannot be re-created. All that is left are impressions in the heart, and in the mind.
quotes.author: Chris Lear

quotes.quote: Embrace the mud. The dirt. The grit.
quotes.author: Nike

quotes.quote: The footing was really atrocious. I loved it. I really like cross country; you’re one with the mud.
quotes.author: Lynn Jennings

quotes.quote: The start of a World Cross Country event is like riding a horse in the middle of a buffalo stampede. It’s a thrill if you keep up, but one slip and you’re nothing but hoof prints.
quotes.author: Ed Eyestone

quotes.quote: All runners burn some cards when running at their marathon or half marathon pace.
quotes.author: Matt Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: I love controlling a race, chewing up an opponent. Let’s get down and dirty. Let’s fight it out. It’s raw, animalistic, with no one to rely on but yourself. There’s no better feeling than that.
quotes.author: Adam Goucher

quotes.quote: Number one is just to gain a passion for running. To love the morning, to love the trail, to love the pace on the track. And if some kid gets really good at it, that’s cool too.
quotes.author: Pat Tyson

quotes.quote: Champions do not become champions when they win the event, but in the hours, weeks, months and years they spend preparing for it. The victorious performance itself is merely the demonstration of their championship character.
quotes.author: Alan Armstrong
