quotes.quote: Running is the greatest metaphor for life, because you get out of it what you put into it.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: The man who can drive himself further once the effort gets painful is the man who will win.
quotes.author: Roger Bannister

quotes.quote: A lot of people run a race to see who is fastest. I run to see who has the most guts, who can punish himself into exhausting pace, and then at the end, punish himself even more.
quotes.author: Steve Prefontaine

quotes.quote: The five S's of sports training are: stamina, speed, strength, skill, and spirit; but the greatest of these is spirit.
quotes.author: Ken Doherty

quotes.quote: Ability is what you're capable of doing. Motivation determines what you do. Attitude determines how well you do it.
quotes.author: Lou Holtz

quotes.quote: It doesn't matter whether you are a lion or a gazelle. When the sun comes up, you better be running.
quotes.author: Abe Gubegna

quotes.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: The long run is what puts the tiger in the cat.
quotes.author: Bill Squires

quotes.quote: The body does not want you to do this. As you run, it tells you to stop but the mind must be strong. You always go too far for your body. You must handle the pain with strategy...It is not age; it is not diet. It is the will to succeed.
quotes.author: Jacqueline Gareau

quotes.quote: If you want to become the best runner you can be, start now. Don't spend the rest of your life wondering if you can do it.
quotes.author: Priscilla Welch

quotes.quote: Sweat cleanses from the inside. It comes from places a shower will never reach.
quotes.author: George A. Sheehan

quotes.quote: To give anything less than your best is to sacrifice the gift.
quotes.author: Steve Prefontaine

quotes.quote: The will to win means nothing without the will to prepare.
quotes.author: Juma Ikangaa

quotes.quote: My whole feeling in terms of racing is that you have to be very bold. You sometimes have to be aggressive and gamble.
quotes.author: Bill Rodgers

quotes.quote: There's no such thing as bad weather, just soft people.
quotes.author: Bill Bowerman

quotes.quote: A race is a work of art that people can look at and be affected in as many ways they're capable of understanding.
quotes.author: Steve Prefontaine

quotes.quote: Every strike brings me closer to the next home run.
quotes.author: Babe Ruth

quotes.quote: I run because it's my passion, and not just a sport.
quotes.author: Sasha Azevedo

quotes.quote: Those who say that I will lose and am finished will have to run over my body to beat me.
quotes.author: Said Aouita

quotes.quote: People who say it cannot be done should not interrupt those who are doing it.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Stadiums are for spectators. We runners have Nature, and that is much better.
quotes.author: Juha Vaatainen

quotes.quote: Good things come slow, especially in distance running.
quotes.author: Bill Dellinger

quotes.quote: In golf, as in life, you get out of it what you put into it.
quotes.author: Sam Snead

quotes.quote: Sunshine is delicious, rain is refreshing, wind braces us up, snow is exhilarating; there is really no such thing as bad weather, only different kinds of good weather.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.quote: The marathon can humble you.
quotes.author: Bill Rodgers

quotes.quote: A lot of people don't realize that about 98 percent of the running I put in is anything but glamorous: 2 percent joyful participation, 98 percent dedication! It's a tough formula. Getting out in the forest in the biting cold and the flattening heat, and putting in kilometer after kilometer.
quotes.author: Robert de Castella

quotes.quote: It hurts up to a point and then it doesn't get any worse.
quotes.author: Ann Trason

quotes.quote: Mind is everything. Muscle - pieces of rubber. All that I am, I am because of my mind.
quotes.author: Paavo Nurmi

quotes.quote: Art is nothing more than the shadow of humanity.
quotes.author: Henry James

quotes.quote: My motto is: feel the fear and do it anyway.
quotes.author: Tamara Mellon

quotes.quote: Who runs in circles never gets far.
quotes.author: Thornton W. Burgess

quotes.quote: I prefer running without shoes. My toes didn't get cold. Besides, if I'm in front from the start, no one can step on them.
quotes.author: Michelle Dekkers

quotes.quote: School cross country runs started because the rugby pitches were flooded. There was an alternative: extra studying. This meant there were plenty of runners on sports afternoons.
quotes.author: Gordon Pirie

quotes.quote: It doesn't matter whether you come in first, in the middle of the pack, or last. You can say, 'I have finished.' There is a lot of satisfaction in that.
quotes.author: Fred Lebow

quotes.quote: Big occasions and races which have been eagerly anticipated almost to the point of dread, are where great deeds can be accomplished.
quotes.author: Jack Lovelock

quotes.quote: Everyone in life is looking for a certain rush. Racing is where I get mine.
quotes.author: John Trautmann

quotes.quote: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out.
quotes.author: Robert Collier

quotes.quote: One thing about racing is that it hurts. You better accept that from the beginning or you’re not going anywhere.
quotes.author: Bob Kennedy

quotes.quote: It’s at the borders of pain and suffering that the men are separated from the boys.
quotes.author: Emil Zatopek

quotes.quote: You can’t flirt with the track, you must marry it.
quotes.author: Bill Easton

quotes.quote: To be great, one does not have to be mad, but definitely it helps.
quotes.author: Percy Cerutty

quotes.quote: We must wake up to the fact that athletics is not, nor ever can be perfected; there will always be more to learn.
quotes.author: Arthur “GreatHeart” Newton

quotes.quote: When you are standing at a crossroads in your life, realizethat the greatest block that you can put in front of your Self is the ideathat there is a right choice.
quotes.author: Story Waters

quotes.quote: Every day is a crossroads. Every day is a chance to change your life and our world for the better.
quotes.author: Hillary Clinton

quotes.quote: You will only know the road, until you have travel on it.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: There comes a time in the life of every nation when it stands at the crossroads of history and must choose which way to go.
quotes.author: Lal Bahadur Shastri

quotes.quote: One of the hardest decisions you'll ever face in life is choosing whether to walk away or try harder.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The decisions we make at crossroads in life don't just impact us. They can impact generations to come.
quotes.author: Lynette Kittle

quotes.quote: Everybody has that point in their life where you hit a crossroads and you've had a bunch of bad days and there's different ways you can deal with it and the way I dealt with it was I just turned completely to music.
quotes.author: Taylor Swift

quotes.quote: The highway of grace will get you somewhere a whole lot faster then the freeway of spite.
quotes.author: Aaron Lauritsen

quotes.quote: There comes a time when you have to choose between turning the page and closing the book.
quotes.author: Josh Jameson

quotes.quote: You are now at a crossroads. Forget your past. Who are you now? Who have you decided you really are now? Don't think about who you have been. Who are you now? Who have you decided to become? Make this decision consciously. Make it carefully. Make it powerfully. Then act upon it.
quotes.author: Anthony Robbins

quotes.quote: Life presents us with moments of decisionâ€”crossroads where we either choose a new direction and move on, or cling to what we already have and be miserable.
quotes.author: Mary Buchan

quotes.quote: Be entirely tolerant or not at all; follow the good path or the evil one. To stand at the crossroads requires more strength than you possess.
quotes.author: Heinrich Heine

quotes.quote: The intersection of religion and world politics has often been a bloody crossroads.
quotes.author: Elliott Abrams

quotes.quote: At every crossroads on the path that leads to the future, tradition has placed 10,000 men to guard the past.
quotes.author: Maurice Maeterlinck

quotes.quote: Everyone feels depressed, angry or frustrated at times; it's a crossroads not a dead end.
quotes.author: Sam Owen

quotes.quote: Our world is at the crossroads. We have a choice, right and wrong.
quotes.author: LL Cool J

quotes.quote: You either live the life that is easy or you live the life that is difficult, but appreciate it more.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: Indecision is the reluctance or inability to pass a judgment on an issue under consideration. Indecision means you have come to crossroads and you cannot make your mind.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: There are moments in our lives when we find ourselves at a crossroad, afraid, confused, without a road map. The choices we make in those moments can define the rest of our days. Of course when faced with the unknown, most of us prefer to turn around and go back.
quotes.author: Lucas Scott

quotes.quote: When you feel life at crossroads, you need higher perspective view.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: We humans have come to a crossroads in our history: we can either destroy the world or create a good future.
quotes.author: Sakyong Mipham

quotes.quote: There will be a time where we must choose between what is easy and what is right.
quotes.author: J.K Rowling

quotes.quote: We stand at a crossroads. One path leads to despair, the other to destruction. Let's hope we make the right choice.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: At some point, you just gotta forgive the past, your happiness hinges on it.
quotes.author: Aaron Lauritsen

quotes.quote: Dark times lie ahead of us and there will be a time when we must choose between what is easy and what is right.
quotes.author: Albus Dumbledore

quotes.quote: Each day is a new beginning. You can start fresh, anticipating what today will bring. Or you can just settle for yesterday's doubts, fears, or worries. Which road will you take? Do you take the path to the clear present or the the shadows of the past?
quotes.author: Eve Evangelista

quotes.quote: Burning bridges behind you is understandable. It's the bridges before us that we burn, not realizing we may need to cross, that brings regret.
quotes.author: Anthony Liccione

quotes.quote: Sometimes you have to stop thinking so much and just go where your heart takes you.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: We're at the crossroads, where we need to win to stay alive.
quotes.author: Randy Johnson

quotes.quote: There are crossroads in life were choosing the direction to pursue is critical.
quotes.author: Steven Redhead

quotes.quote: There are two ways to go when you hit that crossroads in your life: There is the bad way, when you sort of give up, and then there is the really hard way, when you fight back. I went the hard way and came out of it okay. Now, I'm sitting here and doing great.
quotes.author: Matthew Perry

quotes.quote: We are at a crossroads in human history. Never before has there been a moment so simultaneously perilous and promising. We are the first species to have taken evolution into our own hands.
quotes.author: Carl Sagan

quotes.quote: Life lessons are not journeys traveled in straight lines but are crossroadsformed years and miles apart.
quotes.author: Gina Greenlee

quotes.quote: Man is born as a seed; he can become a flower, he may not. It all depends on you, what you do with yourself; it all depends on you whether you grow or you don't. It is your choice- and each moment the choice has to be faced; each moment you are on the crossroads.
quotes.author: Rajneesh

quotes.quote: In our eyes the roads are endless. Two are crossroads of the shadow.
quotes.author: Federico Garcia Lorca

quotes.quote: To survive the Borderlands you must live sin fronteras be a crossroads.
quotes.author: Gloria Anzaldua

quotes.quote: Demons wait at crossroads attempting to influence our decisions.
quotes.author: April Smith

quotes.quote: More than any other time in history, mankind faces a crossroads. One path leads to despair and utter hopelessness. The other, to total extinction. Let us pray we have the wisdom to choose correctly.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: I think there are crossroads in our lives when we make grand, sweeping decisions without even realizing it.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: Life lessons are not journeys traveled in straight lines but are crossroads formed years and miles apart.
quotes.author: Gina Greenlee

quotes.quote: You may be at a crossroads in your life. You may have issues to deal with; people you need to forgive. You can go one of the two ways. You can ignore what you now know to be true and keep burying that bitterness in your life, pushing it deeper and allowing it to poison and contaminate you and those around you. Or you can make a much better choice by getting it out in the open and asking God to help you to totally forgive and let it all go.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: Stand at the crossroads if you will, but if you'll not choose, I'll move on without you
quotes.author: Jacqueline Carey

quotes.quote: He that has a choice has trouble.
quotes.author: Dutch Proverb

quotes.quote: Sometimes a man and a woman reach a crossroads and linger there, reluctant to take either way, knowing the wrong choice will mean the endâ€¦ and knowing there's so much worth saving.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: We have to get used to the idea that at the most important crossroads in our life there are no signs.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: Sometimes our wants or needs have nothing to do with being ungrateful and everything to do with making a mistake.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: When you're on the crossroads and gone down the wrong path in life, there's no harm in turning around and walking the other way.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: At each point in our lives, we are at a crossroads. We are the fruit of our past and we are the architects of our future... If you want to know your past, look at your present circumstances. If you want to know your future, look at what is in your mind.
quotes.author: Matthieu Ricard

quotes.quote: And having once chosen, never to seek to return to the crossroads of that decision-for even if one chooses wrongly, the choice cannot be unmade.
quotes.author: Jacqueline Carey

quotes.quote: We all have our own road to walk. Whether rocky, curving, straight or smooth, what good is a lonely road? It's when we run and intersect with other roads that defines our road. When road meets road do we get direction, and choices to cross into another life.
quotes.author: Anthony Liccione

quotes.quote: We're at the crossroads. Down one road is a European centralized bureaucratic socialist welfare system in which politicians and bureaucrats define the future. Down the other road is a proud, solid, reaffirmation of American exceptionalism.
quotes.author: Newt Gingrich

quotes.quote: When the early Europeans first met Africans, at the crossroads of history, it was a respectful meeting and the Africans were not slaves. Their nations were old before Europe was born.
quotes.author: John Henrik Clarke

quotes.quote: More than any other time in history, mankind faces a crossroads. One path leads to despair and utter hopelessness. The other, to total extinction. Let us pray we have the wisdom to choose correctly.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: I know there is no straight road in this world Only a giant labyrinth Of intersecting crossroads
quotes.author: Federico Garcia Lorca

quotes.quote: Adversity is a crossroads that makes a person choose one of two paths: character or compromise. Every time he chooses character, he becomes stronger, even if that choice brings negative consequences.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: May we muster courage at the crossroads, courage for the conflicts, courage to say, "no," courage to say, "yes," for courage counts.
quotes.author: Thomas S. Monson

quotes.quote: The writer operates at a peculiar crossroads where time and place and eternity somehow meet. His problem is to find that location.
quotes.author: Flannery O'Connor

quotes.quote: We, humans, have come to a crossroads in our history: we can either destroy the world or create a good future
quotes.author: Sakyong Mipham

quotes.quote: Not often, but every once in a while, God brings us to a major turning point — a great crossroads in our life.
quotes.author: Oswald Chambers

quotes.quote: The crossroads of trade are the meeting place of ideas, the attrition ground of rival customs and beliefs; diversities beget conflict, comparison, thought; superstitions cancel one another, and reason begins.
quotes.author: Will Durant

quotes.quote: And the crow once called the raven black.
quotes.author: George R.R. Martin

quotes.quote: If you have to eat crow, eat it while it's young and tender.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: The crow bewailes the sheepe, and then eates it.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: Crows will fight over a dead man's flesh and kill each other for his eyes.
quotes.author: George R.R. Martin

quotes.quote: The crow commands, the captive must obey.
quotes.author: George R.R. Martin

quotes.quote: A Crow is known wherever he is met by his beautiful white dress, and his tall and elegant figure; the greater part of the men being six feet high.
quotes.author: George Catlin

quotes.quote: The wing of the Falcon brings to the king, the wing if the crow brings him to the cemetery.
quotes.author: Muhammad Iqbal

quotes.quote: We heap up around us things that we do not need as the crow makes piles of glittering pebbles.
quotes.author: Laura Ingalls Wilder

quotes.quote: If the crow had been satisfied to eat his prey in silence, he would have had more meat and less quarreling and envy.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: There is a bird who by his coat, And by the hoarseness of his note, Might be supposed a crow.
quotes.author: William Cowper

quotes.quote: Crows are incredibly smart. They can be taught five things on the drop.
quotes.author: Robbie Coltraine

quotes.quote: Crows squawked raucously in the trees. It sounded like they were tearing something apart, something they didn't even want, just for the fun of destroying it.
quotes.author: Janet Fitch

quotes.quote: The crow wished everything was black, the Owl, that everything was white.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: When a crow says an intelligent thing, chickens may laugh at it. This is the laughing of the sand castles at the powerful waves!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote:
The crow does not hide its prey, but calls for others to share it;
So wealth will be with those of a like disposition.
quotes.author: Thiruvalluvar

quotes.quote: As the crow flies a popular and picturesque expression to denote a straight line.
quotes.author: William Henry Maule

quotes.quote: It is better to listen to a crow that lives in trees than to a learned man who lives only in ideas.
quotes.author: Kate Horsley

quotes.quote: If men had wings and bore black feathers, Few of them would be clever enough to be crows.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: The eagle never lost so much time as when he submitted to learn from the crow.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: In many traditions, crows are messengers and close attention is paid to their actions.
quotes.author: Robert Moss

quotes.quote: The world is a nest of crows; some caw in praise, some caw in derision. But men should be above the reach of praise and blame.
quotes.author: Sathya Sai Baba

quotes.quote: I will make thee think thy swan a crow.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: If you wish to upset the law that all crows are black, you mustn't seek to show that no crows are, it is enough if you prove one single crow to be white.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: Maybe all crows were just creepy.
quotes.author: Kami Garcia

quotes.quote: How much can a crown be worth, when a crow can dine upon a king?
quotes.author: George R. R. Martin

quotes.quote: Don't seem to he on the lookout for crows, else you'll set other people watching.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: In order to disprove the assertion that all crows are black, one white crow is sufficient.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: Crows pick out the eyes of the dead, when the dead have no longer need of them, but flatterers mar the soul of the living, and her eyes they blind.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: The black crow thinketh her own birds white.
quotes.author: Gavin Douglas

quotes.quote: Nothing is unreal as long as you can imagine like a crow.
quotes.author: Munia Khan

quotes.quote: A crow, who had flown away with a cheese from a dairy window, sate perched on a tree looking down at a great big frog in a pool underneath him.
quotes.author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quotes.quote: The crows maintain that a single crow could destroy the heavens. There is no doubt of that, but it proves nothing against the heavens, for heaven simply means: the impossibility of crows.
quotes.author: Franz Kafka

quotes.quote: Crows are not always available to give warning.
quotes.author: Carlos Castaneda

quotes.quote: To shoot at crows is powder flung away.
quotes.author: John Gay

quotes.quote: Angels and crows passed each other, one leaving, the other coming.
quotes.author: Jerry Spinelli

quotes.quote: It is better to fall among crows than flatterers, for those devour only the dead. These the living.
quotes.author: Antisthenes

quotes.quote: The person who follows the crowd will usually go no further than the crowd.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Walking into the crowd was like sinking into a stew - you became an ingredient, you took on a certain flavour.
quotes.author: Margaret Atwood

quotes.quote: The mob is the mother of tyrants.
quotes.author: Laertius Diogenes

quotes.quote: The intelligence of that creature known as a crowd is the square root of the number of people in it.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: A crowd has the collective wisdom of individual ignorance.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: Those who follow the crowd usually get lost in it.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Following the crowd is cool if you want to go where the crowd is going. Never fear being the odd one out in order to achieve your own goals.
quotes.author: Rolsey

quotes.quote: Don’t follow the crowd, let the crowd follow you.
quotes.author: Margaret Thatcher

quotes.quote: Whenever you enter the crowds, keep your own personality, keep your own behaviour, keep your own mind; stay as yourself!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: The crowd, in fact, is composed of individuals; it must therefore be in every man's power to become what he is, an individual. From becoming an individual no one, no one at all, is excluded, except he who excludes himself by becoming a crowd.
quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: The mob rushes in where individuals fear to tread.
quotes.author: B.F Skinner

quotes.quote: The crowd has a way of being right.
quotes.author: Louis Auchincloss

quotes.quote: There is never a crowd on the leading edge.
quotes.author: Esther Hicks

quotes.quote: Inside a crowd, you have no right to complain about the crowdedness, because you are already a part of it!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: A crowd exists so long as it has an unattained goal.
quotes.author: Elias Canetti

quotes.quote: The crowd is the same everywhere, in all periods and cultures; it remains essentially the same among men of the most diverse origin, education and language.
quotes.author: Elias Canetti

quotes.quote: A crowd is not company, and faces are but a gallery of pictures.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: When you stand in the crowd you stand like the cloud baseless. But when you stand out of the crowd you're outstanding like the proud limitless. Stand out to be outstanding.
quotes.author: Emmanuel Aghado

quotes.quote: The man who follows a crowd will never be followed by a crowd.
quotes.author: R.S Donnell

quotes.quote: To rise above the crowd, you must discipline yourself unceasingly to the strict demand and realities of your ambition.
quotes.author: Arturo Sandoval

quotes.quote: The only certain about following the crowd is that you will all get there together.
quotes.author: Mychal Wynn

quotes.quote: Society! It's a crowd thing!
quotes.author: Anthony T. Hincks

quotes.quote: Crowds speak in heroes.
quotes.author: Gerald Stanley Lee

quotes.quote: Every crowd has a silver lining.
quotes.author: P. T. Barnum

quotes.quote: My crown is called content, a crown that seldom kings enjoy.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Old age: the crown of life, our play's last act.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: A crown is merely a hat that lets the rain in.
quotes.author: Frederick The Great

quotes.quote: A sorrow's crown of sorrow is remembering happier times.
quotes.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quotes.quote: The crown of life is neither happiness nor annihilation; it is understanding.
quotes.author: Winifred Holtby

quotes.quote: Give way to your opponent; thus will you gain the crown of victory.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.quote: A crown, if it hurts us, is not worth wearing.
quotes.author: Pearl Bailey

quotes.quote: Uneasy lies the head that craves the crown.
quotes.author: Howard Koch

quotes.quote: If every fool wore a crown, we should all be kings.
quotes.author: Welsh Proverb

quotes.quote: Compassion crowns the soul with its truest victory.
quotes.author: Aberjhani

quotes.quote: Crowns do queer things to the heads beneath them.
quotes.author: George R.R. Martin

quotes.quote: Any man worth his salt has by the time he is forty-five accumulated a crown of thorns, and the problem is to learn to wear it over one ear.
quotes.author: Christopher Morley

quotes.quote: To gain a crown by fighting is great, to reject it divine.
quotes.author: Friedrich von Schiller

quotes.quote: A crown, golden in show is but a wreath of thorns.
quotes.author: John Milton

quotes.quote: Popularity is the crown of laurel which the world puts on bad art. Whatever is popular is wrong.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: By common consent gray hairs are a crown of glory the only object of respect that can never excite envy.
quotes.author: George Bancroft

quotes.quote: To be a king and wear a crown is a thing more glorious to them that see it than it is pleasant to them that bear it.
quotes.author: Elizabeth I

quotes.quote: To wear the crown of peace, you must wear the crown of thorns.
quotes.author: Gordon Lightfoot

quotes.quote: A crown is more discomfort than adornment. If you have learned that, you have already learned much.
quotes.author: Lloyd Alexander

quotes.quote: He that has no cross will have no crown.
quotes.author: Francis Quarles

quotes.quote: A good woman is worth, if she were sold, the fairest crown that's made of purest gold.
quotes.author: John Wodroephe

quotes.quote: Many commit the same crimes with a very different result. One bears a cross for his crime; another a crown.
quotes.author: Juvenal

quotes.quote: No pain, no palm; no thorns, no throne; no gall, no glory; no cross, no crown.
quotes.author: William Penn

quotes.quote: Wear a crown of flowers on your head, let its roots reach your heart.
quotes.author: Kabir

quotes.quote: Idleness is the beginning of all vice, the crown of all virtues.
quotes.author: Franz Kafka

quotes.quote: A crown is a pitiless master, harsher than the staff of a pig-keeper; while a staff bears up, a crown weighs down, beyond the strength of any man to wear it lightly.
quotes.author: Lloyd Alexander

quotes.quote: If there be no enemy there’s no fight. If no fight, no victory and if no victory there is no crown.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: A chaplet of leaves crowns the victor.
quotes.author: Virgil

quotes.quote: He who has put a good finish to his undertaking is said to have placed a golden crown to the whole.
quotes.author: Eustachius

quotes.quote: Integrity of life is fame's best friend, which nobly, beyond death, shall crown in the end.
quotes.author: John Webster

quotes.quote: As a king can wear a crown, a crown can also weary a king.
quotes.author: Anthony Liccione

quotes.quote: Being made in the image of God, man was the crown of creation.
quotes.author: Walter Lang

quotes.quote: Though triumphs were to generals only due, crowns were reserved to grace the soldiers too.
quotes.author: Alexander Pope

quotes.quote: I ask not for any crown / But that which all may win; / Nor try to conquer any world / Except the one within.
quotes.author: Louisa May Alcott

quotes.quote: Some of the most beautiful things worth having in your life come wrapped in a crown of thorns.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: A king that would not feel his crown too heavy for him, must wear it every day; but if he think it too light, he knoweth not of what metal it is made.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: The strongest poison ever known came from Caesar's laurel crown.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: This crown to crown the laughing man, this rose-wreath crown: I myself have set this crown upon my head, I myself have pronounced my laughter holy.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Every noble crown is, and on Earth will forever be, a crown of thorns.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: For dogs we kings should have lions, and for cats, tigers. The great benefits a crown.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Behaving like a princess is work. It's not just about looking beautiful or wearing a crown. It's more about how you are inside.
quotes.author: Dame Julie Andrews

quotes.quote: A King and Queen cannot support a crown with eyes looking down. Their universe expands as far as you can see.
quotes.author: T. F. Hodge

quotes.quote: A crown of roses is also a crown of thorns.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: A crown is no cure for a headache.
quotes.author: American Proverb

quotes.quote: The crown is, according to the saying, the 'fountain of honour'; but the treasury is the spring of business.
quotes.author: Walter Bagehot

quotes.quote: America! America! / God shed His grace on thee / And crown thy good with brotherhood / From sea to shining sea!.
quotes.author: Katherine Lee Bates

quotes.quote: I will cling to the old rugged cross, / And exchange it some day for a crown.
quotes.author: George Bennard

quotes.quote: You shall not press down upon the brow of labour this crown of thorns, you shall not crucify mankind upon a cross of gold.
quotes.author: William Jennings Bryan

quotes.quote: No crown carries such royalty with it as doth humility; no monument gives such glory as an unsullied name; no worldly gain can equal that which comes from observing God's laws.
quotes.author: Eleazar of Worms

quotes.quote: There are no crown-wearers in Heaven who were not cross-bearers here below.
quotes.author: Charles Haddon Spurgeon

quotes.quote: Let grace be the beginning, grace the consummation, grace the crown.
quotes.author: The Venerable Bede

quotes.quote: The wicked have a never-dying worm and the godly a never-fading crown.
quotes.author: Thomas Watson

quotes.quote: My crown is in my heart, not on my head; / Not deck'd with diamonds and Indian stones, / Nor to be seen: my crown is call'd content; A crown it is that seldom kings enjoy.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare (King Henry VI)

quotes.quote: I will not wear a crown of gold where my Master wore a crown of thorns.
quotes.author: Godfrey de Buillon

quotes.quote: It is criminal to steal a purse, daring to steal a fortune, a mark of greatness to steal a crown. The blame diminishes as the guilt increases.
quotes.author: Friedrich von Schiller

quotes.quote: If you put on a crown, somebody will try to take your head.
quotes.author: Lazlo Ferran

quotes.quote: The slave begins by demanding justice and ends by wanting to wear a crown. He must dominate in his turn.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: The Muse in the tower, / whose debt you enthrone / Those jewels that you borrow, / —her crown still on loan.
quotes.author: Kurt Philip Behm

quotes.quote: America / Bright freedom's crown / Bought with patriots blood for thee. / May thy song abound / And forever resound / Across all the lands and the seas.
quotes.author: Timothy Ivan Brumley

quotes.quote: My sister this morning / When you walked out that door / Surely the sun couldn't have been shining / When you forgot your crown / Have you forgotten / Who you really are / A queen in every right / Don't forget your crown.
quotes.author: Chelsea Blues

quotes.quote: I wear the crown of shade / These people know my name / This crown hides all my shame / My soul no longer pains / I am not ashamed / I am the queen of shade.
quotes.author: Bjorn Duphot

quotes.quote: Crowning a clown won't make him a king.
quotes.author: American Proverb

quotes.quote: Crown Him with many crowns, / The Lamb upon His throne; / Hark! how the heavenly anthem drowns / All music but its own. / Awake my soul, and sing / Of Him who died for thee; / And hail Him as thy matchless King / Through all eternity.
quotes.author: Matthew Bridges

quotes.quote: Kindness is the beginning of cruelty.
quotes.author: Frank Herbert

quotes.quote: Cruelty is the law pervading all nature and society; and we can't get out of it if we would.
quotes.author: Thomas Hardy

quotes.quote: When we think of cruelty, we must try to remember the stupidity, the envy, the frustration from which it has arisen.
quotes.author: Edith Sitwell

quotes.quote: Cruelty is easy, cheap and rampant.
quotes.author: Brene Brown

quotes.quote: The only thing worse than cruelty is delegated cruelty.
quotes.author: Matthew Scully

quotes.quote: The worst cruelty that can be inflicted on a human being is isolation.
quotes.author: Sukarno

quotes.quote: Deliberate cruelty is unforgivable.
quotes.author: Tennessee Williams

quotes.quote: If anything should take place behind closed doors, it was cruelty and betrayal.
quotes.author: Edward St. Aubyn

quotes.quote: Cruelty is a tyrant that's always attended with fear.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: Cruelty signifies rigor, implacable intention and decision, irreversible and absolute determination.
quotes.author: Antonin Artaud

quotes.quote: Cruelty is softened by fear, not pity.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: Cruelty, like every other vice, requires no motive outside of itself; it only requires opportunity.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: Cruelty is the first attribute of the devil.
quotes.author: Nani

quotes.quote: War is cruelty. There is no use trying to reform it. The crueler it is, the sooner it will be over.
quotes.author: William Tecumseh Sherman

quotes.quote: All the cruelty and torment of which the world is full is in fact merely the necessary result of the totality of the forms under which the will to live is objectified.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.quote: In great hearts the cruelty of life gives birth to good.
quotes.author: Vastly Grossman

quotes.quote: Cruelty, very far from being a vice, is the first sentiment Nature injects in us all.
quotes.author: Marquis De Sade

quotes.quote: Cruelty is the surest sign of stupidity.
quotes.author: Marty Rubin

quotes.quote: Cruelty is a part of nature, at least of human nature, but it is the one thing that seems unnatural to us.
quotes.author: Robinson Jeffers

quotes.quote: Cruelty is all out of ignorance. If you knew what was in store for you, you wouldn't hurt anybody, because whatever you do comes back much more forceful than you send it out.
quotes.author: Willie Nelson

quotes.quote: Is cruelty still cruel if it is necessary? Is cruelty still cruel if it is part of a lie?
quotes.author: Johnny Rich

quotes.quote: Cruelty and fear shake hands together. An unfulfilled vocation drains the color from a man's entire existence.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: Cruelty is contagious in uncivilized communities.
quotes.author: Harriet Ann Jacobs

quotes.quote: Cruelty is not something you can just sugar coat with a smile, with laughter, with a hug or with an act of kindness. It is a diabolical behaviour that will keep popping up behind that smile, behind that laughter, behind that hug and behind that act of kindness. 'A man who is kind benefits himself, but a cruel man hurts himself.' (Proverbs 11:17)
quotes.author: Euginia Herlihy

quotes.quote: It is cruelty to the innocent not to punish the guilty.
quotes.author: Robinson Jeffers

quotes.quote: Cruelty is, perhaps, the worst kid of sin. Intellectual cruelty is certainly the worst kind of cruelty.
quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Cruelty would be delicious if one could only find some sort of cruelty that didn't really hurt.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: There's a certain edge about cruelty. If you're honest about it, most people wince, but say it had to be said.
quotes.author: Pete Waterman

quotes.quote: Probably human cruelty is fixed and eternal. Only styles change.
quotes.author: Martin Amis

quotes.quote: Lack of courage leads to cruelty.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Cruelty is a language that the blind can see, the deaf can hear, and the heart feels forever.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: There is no honor in cruelty.
quotes.author: Jocelyn Murray

quotes.quote: Cruelty towards others is always also cruelty towards ourselves.
quotes.author: Paul Tillich

quotes.quote: Cruelty might be very human, and it might be cultural, but it's not acceptable.
quotes.author: Jodie Foster

quotes.quote: Cruelty constitutes the greatest moral distance at which an intelligent creature can be removed from a God of forbearance and mercy.
quotes.author: Eliza Cook

quotes.quote: Cruelty ever proceeds from a vile mind, and often from a cowardly heart.
quotes.author: Lodovico Ariosto

quotes.quote: Cruelty to men and to the lower animals as well, which would have passed unnoticed a century ago, now shocks the sensibilities and is regarded as wicked and degrading.
quotes.author: Elihu Root

quotes.quote: Cruelty must be whitewashed by a moral excuse, and pretense of reluctance.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: The cruelty itself is motivated by something deeper: the wish to know the secret of things and of life.
quotes.author: Erich Fromm

quotes.quote: All cruelty springs from weakness.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Cruelty is fed, not weakened, by tears.
quotes.author: Tacitus

quotes.quote: Cruelty is the highest pleasure to the cruel man; it is his love.
quotes.author: Walter Savage Landor

quotes.quote: Cruelty is not a literary value.
quotes.author: Salman Rushdie

quotes.quote: Cruelty practiced as a matter of social principle or public policy, and presented to the community as a means to a higher goal is the most obscene and decadent phenomenon of any civilization.
quotes.author: Vernon Howard

quotes.quote: Cruelty is one fashion statement we can all do without.
quotes.author: Rue McClanahan

quotes.quote: War is cruelty, and none can make it gentle.
quotes.author: Gilbert Parker

quotes.quote: Cruelty is lack of courage.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Is the capacity for cruelty inherent in all of us?
quotes.author: Soledad O'Brien

quotes.quote: Cruelty and wrong are not the greatest forces in the world. There is nothing eternal in them. Only love is eternal.
quotes.author: Elisabeth Elliot

quotes.quote: The cruelty of men had infected the land, and sea only swept in sharp waves to the shores.
quotes.author: Gayendra Abeywardane

quotes.quote: I would not enter on my list of friends the man who needlessly sets foot upon a worm.
quotes.author: Cowper

quotes.quote: Man's inhumanity to man, makes countless thousands mourn.
quotes.author: Burns

quotes.quote: One of the ill effects of cruelty is that it makes the bystanders cruel.
quotes.author: Buxton

quotes.quote: Detested sport, that owes its pleasure to another's pain.
quotes.author: Cowper

quotes.quote: Boys throw stones at frogs for fun, but the frogs don't die for 'fun' but in sober earnest.
quotes.author: Bion

quotes.quote: The wish to hurt, the momentary intoxication with pain, is the loophole through which the pervert climbs into the minds of ordinary men.
quotes.author: Jacob Bronowski

quotes.quote: Strike him so that he can feel that he is dying.
quotes.author: Caligula

quotes.quote: Being cruel to be kind is just ordinary cruelty with an excuse made for it. And it is right that it should be more resented, as it is.
quotes.author: Ivy Compton-Burnett

quotes.quote: Cruel men believe in a cruel God and use their belief to excuse their cruelty,
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: The healthy man does not torture others—generally, it is the tortured who turn into torturers.
quotes.author: Carl Gustav Jung

quotes.quote: All cruel people describe themselves as paragons of frankness.
quotes.author: Tennessee Williams

quotes.quote: There is cruelty in divorce. There is cruelty in forced or unfortunate marriage.
quotes.author: Anne Roiphe

quotes.quote: Cruelty towards others is always also cruelty towards ourselves.
quotes.author: Paul Tillich

quotes.quote: Cruelty...argues not only a depravedness of nature but also a meanness of courage and imbecility of mind.
quotes.author: Sir William Temple

quotes.quote: The infliction of cruelty with a good conscience is a delight to moralists. That is why they invented hell.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: I am afraid that women appreciate cruelty, downright cruelty, more than anything else. They have wonderfully primitive instincts. We have emancipated them, but they remain slaves looking for their masters, all the same. They love being dominated.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: A hurtful act is a transference to others of the degradation which we bear in ourselves.
quotes.author: Simone Weil

quotes.quote: Evil begins when you begin to treat people as things.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: I think cruelty is just loneliness disguised as bitterness.
quotes.author: Tom Hiddleston

quotes.quote: Unlimited power in the hands of limited people always leads to cruelty.
quotes.author: Aleksandr Solzhenitsyn

quotes.quote: Killing animals to make a fashion statement = a sickening + cold-blooded vanity.
quotes.author: Jess C. Scott

quotes.quote: In great hearts, the cruelty of life gives birth to good.
quotes.author: Vasily Grossman

quotes.quote: The weakest ones are the wickedest cruel / When the strongest ones in gentleness rule.
quotes.author: Ana Claudia Antunes

quotes.quote: The truth doesn't have to do with cruelty, the truth has to do with mercy.
quotes.author: Ken Kesey

quotes.quote: To punish the oppressors of humanity is clemency; to forgive them is cruelty.
quotes.author: Maximikien Robespierre

quotes.quote: We have to be aware of our fragilities as human beings - when we see cruelty, to understand that in certain conditions, we could be cruel, too.
quotes.author: Ingrid Betancourt

quotes.quote: A bigger business is like a cruise ship: There are lots of amenities and you can go a lot further, but it's harder to turn quickly.
quotes.author: Tony Hsieh

quotes.quote: All journeys have secret destinations of which the traveller is unaware.
quotes.author: Martin Buber

quotes.quote: The goal is not to sail the boat, but rather to help the boat sail herself.
quotes.author: John Rousmaniere

quotes.quote: The journey, not the arrival matters.
quotes.author: T.S. Eliot

quotes.quote: Any fool can carry on, but a wise man knows how to shorten sail in time.
quotes.author: Joseph Conrad

quotes.quote: Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things you didn't do than by the ones you did do. So throw off the bowlines, sail away from the safe harbour. Catch the winds in your sails. Explore. Dream. Discover.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: He that will not sail till all dangers are over must never put to sea.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: The greatest thing in this world is not so much where we stand as in what direction we are moving.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Attitude is the difference between ordeal and adventure
quotes.author: Bob Bitchin

quotes.quote: At sea, I learned how little a person needs, not how much.
quotes.author: Robin Lee Graham

quotes.quote: For my part, I travel not to go anywhere, but to go. I travel for travel's sake. The great affair is to move.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: The pessimist complains about the wind; the optimist expects it to change; the realist adjusts the sails.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.quote: Land was created to provide a place for boats to visit.
quotes.author: Brooks Atkinson

quotes.quote: The Cruise missiles do not frighten anyone. We are catching them like fish in a river. I mean here that over the past two days, we managed to shoot down 196 missiles before they hit their target.
quotes.author: Mohammed Saeed al-Sahaf

quotes.quote: A ship in port is safe, but that's not what ships are built for.
quotes.author: Grace Hopper

quotes.quote: Sailing is just the bottom line, like adding up the score in bridge. My real interest is in the tremendous game of life.
quotes.author: Dennis Conner

quotes.quote: Oh, it was easy to see why people had whirlwind shipboard romances, for it was a temporary journey into fantasy, where dreams could come true if only for the duration of the cruise.
quotes.author: Patricia Hagan

quotes.quote: Without patience, a sailor I would never be.
quotes.author: Lee Allred

quotes.quote: It isn't that life ashore is distasteful to me. But life at sea is better.
quotes.author: Sir Francis Drake

quotes.quote: Super Cruise will follow the lanes of the road, follow the speed you set, and you can be hands-off driving on an expressway.
quotes.author: Mary Barra

quotes.quote: There is nothing more enticing, disenchanting, and enslaving than the life at sea.
quotes.author: Joseph Conrad

quotes.quote: She watched the gap between ship and shore grow to a huge gulf. Perhaps this was a little like dying, the departed no longer visible to the others, yet both still existed, only in different worlds.
quotes.author: Susan Wiggs

quotes.quote: One doesn’t discover new lands without consenting to lose sight, for a very long time, of the shore.
quotes.author: André Gide

quotes.quote: Wherever you go becomes a part of you somehow.
quotes.author: Anita Desai

quotes.quote: In life, it’s not where you go, it’s who you travel with.
quotes.author: Charles M. Schulz

quotes.quote: To move, to breathe, to fly, to float, To gain all while you give, To roam the roads of lands remote, To travel is to live.
quotes.author: Hans Christian Andersen

quotes.quote: We wander for distraction, but we travel for fulfillment.
quotes.author: Hilaire Belloc

quotes.quote: The cure for anything is saltwater, sweat, tears, or the sea.
quotes.author: Isak Dinesen

quotes.quote: The sea, once it casts its spell, holds one in its net of wonder forever.
quotes.author: Jacques Cousteau

quotes.quote: The days pass happily with me wherever my ship sails.
quotes.author: Joshua Slocum

quotes.quote: The real voyage of discovery consists not in seeking new landscapes, but in having new eyes.
quotes.author: Marcel Proust

quotes.quote: Travel is fatal to prejudice, bigotry, and narrow-mindedness.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: A mind that is stretched by a new experience can never go back to its old dimensions.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.quote: We travel, initially, to lose ourselves, and we travel, next to find ourselves.
quotes.author: Pico Iyer

quotes.quote: Stuff your eyes with wonder, live as if you’d drop dead in ten seconds. See the world. It’s more fantastic than any dream made or paid for in factories.
quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

quotes.quote: Why do we love the sea? It is because it has some potent power to make us think things we like to think.
quotes.author: Robert Henri

quotes.quote: We travel for romance, we travel for architecture, and we travel to be lost.
quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

quotes.quote: Ships at a distance have every man’s wish on board.
quotes.author: Zora Neale Hurston

quotes.quote: Life is either a daring adventure or nothing at all.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Once the travel bug bites there is no known antitode, and I know that I shall be happily infected until the end of my life.
quotes.author: Michael Palin

quotes.quote: We are tied to the ocean, and when we go back to the sea, whether it is to sail or to watch, we are going back from whence we came.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched, they must be felt with the heart.
quotes.author: Hellen Keller

quotes.quote: It’s out there at sea that you are really yourself.
quotes.author: Vito Dumas

quotes.quote: We live in a wonderful world that is full of beauty, charm and adventure. There is no end to the adventures we can have if only we seek them with our eyes open.
quotes.author: Jawaharial Nehru

quotes.quote: Old and young, we are all on our last cruise.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: Live in the sunshine, swim the sea, drink the wild air.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: There is no unhappiness like the misery of sighting land again after a cheerful, careless voyage.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Teenage crush is like flu. If you find a remedy for it, it lasts for a couple of days. If you don't, it still lasts for a couple of days.
quotes.author: Raheel Farooq

quotes.quote: Some crushes just never went away. They built, instead, into something permanent, obsessive and all consuming.
quotes.author: Maya Banks

quotes.quote: Infatuation is like a drug that gives you the best high yet gives you the worst headache after.
quotes.author: Luke Blaise Pereira

quotes.quote: The mark of a true crush... is that you fall in love first and grope for reasons afterward.
quotes.author: Shana Alexander

quotes.quote: I know I am but summer to your heart, and not the full four seasons of the year.
quotes.author: Edna St. Vincent Millay

quotes.quote: Infatuation is the language of a beautiful eye upon a sensitive heart.
quotes.author: Joseph Bartlett

quotes.quote: To be your friend was all I ever wanted; to be your lover was all I ever dreamed.
quotes.author: Valerie Lombardo

quotes.quote: If I had a single flower for every time I think of you, I could walk forever in my garden.
quotes.author: Claudia Adrienne Grandi

quotes.quote: There's always one teacher you have a crush on. For me it's my wife's aerobics instructor.
quotes.author: Brian Kiley

quotes.quote: It takes a minute to have a crush on someone, an hour to like someone, a day to love someone...but it takes a lifetime to forget someone.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: I used to write things for friends. There was this girl I had a crush on, and she had a teacher she didn't like at school. I had a real crush on her, so almost every day I would write her a little short story where she would kill him in a different way.
quotes.author: Stephen Colbert

quotes.quote: A subway crush is simply someone you most likely will never talk to or even meet, but will stare at adoringly from afar. It's a crush in the simplest, most intense sense of the word.
quotes.author: Jason Gordon

quotes.quote: It's just that I don't want to be somebody's crush. If somebody likes me, I want them to like the real me, not what they think I am. And I don't want them to carry it around inside. I want them to show me, so I can feel it too.
quotes.author: Stephen Chbosky

quotes.quote: Just thinking about you brings a smile to face, a twinkle to my eye, and a skipped beat to my heart.
quotes.author: Ash Sweeney

quotes.quote: You get crushes on people. You have to see them every day in that week. They're a fantastic person, and it could be a man or a woman.
quotes.author: Jennifer Saunders

quotes.quote: Sometimes I just can't ignore the way I feel when I see you smile.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: It's nice to have a crush on someone. It feels like you're alive, you know?
quotes.author: Scarlett Johansson

quotes.quote: Your eyes make me shy.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.quote: I don't remember having a crush on a boy when I was a girl. I don't even remember my first kiss.
quotes.author: Maureen O'Hara

quotes.quote: What she had realised was that love was that moment when your heart was about to burst.
quotes.author: Steig Larsson

quotes.quote: And when you love someone you don't always see them realistically.
quotes.author: P. C. Cast

quotes.quote: Admiration is a very short-lived passion, that immediately decays upon growing familiar with its object.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.quote: My insides still turn over when he looks at me that certain way.
quotes.author: Judy Blume

quotes.quote: Even without a kiss, this moment is perfect, and you wouldn't trade it for anything.
quotes.author: Jill Santopolo

quotes.quote: Nothing takes the taste out of peanut butter quite like unrequited love.
quotes.author: Charles M. Schulz

quotes.quote: Some people are so much sunshine to the square inch.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.quote: I think about you constantly, whether it's with my mind or my heart.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: Let us be grateful to people who make us happy, they are the charming gardeners who make our souls blossom.
quotes.author: Marcel Proust

quotes.quote: When I find myself thinking of you, it is all the good memories that we had that bring a smile to my face.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: I like her because she smiles at me and means it.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: Because of your smile, you make life more beautiful.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: Isn't it funny how just one little phone call or text can make your bad day suddenly wonderful !
quotes.author: Nishan Panwar

quotes.quote: She gave me a smile I could feel in my hip pocket.
quotes.author: Raymond Chandler

quotes.quote: Often, when a girl has a crush on a boy, her friend will dare her to speak to him or ask for a pencil, or better yet, let him know that she has a crush. Pretty risky stuff... It happens thousands of times a day in the lives of teenagers everywhere. Putting yourself out there. Daring to expose your true feelings.
quotes.author: Jazz Jennings

quotes.quote: I got a crush on you; I hope you feel the way that I do: I get a rush when I’m with you; Oh, I got a crush on you.
quotes.author: Mandy Moore

quotes.quote: I have a crush on your mind. I fell for your personality. Your looks are just a bonus.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: Crushes are so awful. I wonder if they suck worse for the crush-er or the crush-ee. I consider my three years of watching Josh from afar. Yeah, definitely the crush-er.
quotes.author: Stephanie Perkins

quotes.quote: When you have crush you become nothing but a poet.
quotes.author: Sikhwetha maanda stanley

quotes.quote: Cause I’m trying and trying to walk away, but I know this crush ain’t goin’ away.
quotes.author: David Archuleta

quotes.quote: The world crushes the dust under its feet, but the seeker after truth should so humble himself that even dust could crush him.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: It's difficult when old friends grow apart, it still totally crushes my heart.
quotes.author: Arlene De’Sha Jennings

quotes.quote: One single feather crushes the whole swarm.
quotes.author: Walter Savage Landor

quotes.quote: Your brute-force crushes a legion, but a soul it can never reach.
quotes.author: John Boyle O'Reilly

quotes.quote: Everyday's gray grief crushes you.
quotes.author: Georg Trakl

quotes.quote: Heavy hearts, like heavy clouds in the sky, are best relieved by the letting of a little water.
quotes.author: Antoine Rivarol

quotes.quote: The soul would have no rainbow had the eyes no tears.
quotes.author: John Vance Cheney

quotes.quote: Heaven knows we need never be ashamed of our tears, for they are rain upon the blinding dust of earth, overlying our hard hearts.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: You know that a good, long session of weeping can often make you feel better, even if your circumstances have not changed one bit.
quotes.author: Lemony Snicket

quotes.quote: The sorrow which has no vent in tears may make other organs weep.
quotes.author: Henry Maudsley

quotes.quote: Let your tears come. Let them water your soul.
quotes.author: Eileen Mayhew

quotes.quote: Tearless grief bleeds inwardly.
quotes.author: Christian Nevell Bovee

quotes.quote: It is such a secret place, the land of tears.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: My body needs laughter as much as it needs tears. Both are cleansers of stress.
quotes.author: Mahogany SilverRain

quotes.quote: Tears are God's gift to us. Our holy water. They heal us as they flow.
quotes.author: Rita Schiano

quotes.quote: Crying is all right in its way while it lasts. But you have to stop sooner or later, and then you still have to decide what to do.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Do not apologize for crying. Without this emotion, we are only robots.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quotes.quote: To weep is to make less the depth of grief.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Crying is cleansing. There's a reason for tears, happiness or sadness.
quotes.author: Dionne Warwick

quotes.quote: Crying over what's gone won't find the present.
quotes.author: Edwin Louis Cole

quotes.quote: If you haven't cried, your eyes can't be beautiful.
quotes.author: Sophia Loren

quotes.quote: Invisible tears are the hardest to wipe away. Just let it out, my friend.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: Laugh till you weep. Weep till there's nothing left but to laugh at your weeping. In the end it's all one.
quotes.author: Frederick Buechner

quotes.quote: The tears of the world are a constant quality. For each one who begins to weep, somewhere else another stops. The same is true of the laugh.
quotes.author: Samuel Beckett

quotes.quote: Crying is the refuge of plain women but the ruin of pretty ones.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: It opens the lungs, washes the countenance, exercises the eyes, and softens down the temper; so cry away.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: There are people who laugh to show their fine teeth; and there are those who cry to show their good hearts.
quotes.author: Joseph Roux

quotes.quote: I wept not, so to stone within I grew.
quotes.author: Dante Alighieri

quotes.quote: Tears are the silent language of grief.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Tears are the summer showers to the soul.
quotes.author: Alfred Austin

quotes.quote: What soap is for the body, tears are for the soul.
quotes.author: Jewish Proverb

quotes.quote: Sometimes, crying is the only way your eyes speak when your mouth can't explain how broken your heart is.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: When you are sorrowful look again in your heart, and you shall see that in truth you are weeping for that which has been your delight.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: Laughter and tears are both responses to frustration and exhaustion. I myself prefer to laugh, since there is less cleaning up to do afterward.
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.quote: Tearless grief bleeds inwardly.
quotes.author: Christian Nevell Bovee

quotes.quote: Time engraves our faces with all the tears we have not shed.
quotes.author: Natalie Clifford Barney

quotes.quote: Tears are the safety valve of the heart when too much pressure is laid on it.
quotes.author: Albert Smith

quotes.quote: Crying is right at hand in the smothering dark, closed inside someone else, when you see how everything you can ever accomplish will end up as trash.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: Crying is never a symbol of weakness. For the time we are born, it has always been a sign that we are alive....
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I like the snot to run a little, the tears to accumulate a bit before reaching for the handkerchief. Then I know I'm really crying. Crying just isn't crying unless it's messy.
quotes.author: D.H. Mondfleur

quotes.quote: Those who do not know how to weep with their whole heart don't know how to laugh either.
quotes.author: Golda Meir

quotes.quote: Don't cry when the sun is gone, because the tears won't let you see the stars.
quotes.author: Violeta Parra

quotes.quote: Shining through tears, like April suns in showers, that labor to overcome the cloud that loads em.
quotes.author: Thomas Otway

quotes.quote: There is a certain pleasure in weeping.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.quote: Laughter through tears is my favorite emotion.
quotes.author: Steel Magnolias

quotes.quote: More grievous than tears is the sight of them.
quotes.author: Antonio Porchia

quotes.quote: I heard the teardrop hit my pillow before I even knew I was crying.
quotes.author: Amborella Oltre

quotes.quote: Promises are like crying babies in a theater, they should be carried out at once.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: It's no good crying over spilt milk, because all the forces of the universe were bent on spilling it.
quotes.author: William Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: Life is an onion and one peels it crying.
quotes.author: French Proverb

quotes.quote: Have a good cry, wash out your heart. If you keep it inside it'll tear you apart. Sometimes you lose, but you're gonna win if you just hang in.
quotes.author: Dr. Hook

quotes.quote: He does not weep who does not see.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: I was smiling yesterday,I am smiling today and I will smile tomorrow.Simply because life is too short to cry for anything.
quotes.author: Santosh Kalwar

quotes.quote: Cry. Forgive. Learn. Move on. Let your tears water the seeds of your future happiness.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: When pain brings you down, don't be silly, don't close your eyes and cry, you just might be in the best position to see the sun shine.
quotes.author: Alanis Morissette

quotes.quote: When we are born, we cry that we are come to this great stage of fools.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: People can cry much easier than they can change.
quotes.author: James Baldwin

quotes.quote: You stay safe, You love. You survive. You laugh and cry and struggle and sometimes you fail and sometimes you succeed. You Push.
quotes.author: Carrie Ryan

quotes.quote: Never cry because you have mountains of problem in your hands to solve. Always smile because each problems will someday resolve.
quotes.author: Santosh Kalwar

quotes.quote: Whenever she felt like crying, she would instead become angry—at someone else or at herself—which meant that it was rare for her to shed tears.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: Sometimes, when you are worn down, day after day, relentlessly, with no reprieve for years piled on years, sometimes you lose everything but the ability to cry.
quotes.author: Leila Sales

quotes.quote: She didn't mind a little rain. At least no one would see her cry.
quotes.author: Lisi Harrison

quotes.quote: God gave us crying so other folks could see when we needed help, and help us.
quotes.author: Joshilyn Jackson

quotes.quote: If somebody hurts you, it's okay to cry a river, just remember to build a bridge and get over it.
quotes.author: Taylor Swift

quotes.quote: Watch a movie that makes you laugh or listen to a song that makes you cry. Embrace your emotions and be proud of what you feel.
quotes.author: Demi Lovato

quotes.quote: Life is an onion - you peel it year by year and sometimes cry.
quotes.author: Carl Sandburg

quotes.quote: At some point, I had to start laughing, because I was all wrung out from crying.
quotes.author: Julie Metz

quotes.quote: I can't cry if I tried. Because the crying is something special.
quotes.author: Kinoko Nasu

quotes.quote: That's why you're crying? Because you're happy? You're going to be crying for all your married life, then.
quotes.author: Peter Marshall

quotes.quote: Crying is the best thing in the world! A real man must cry really hard once in a lifetime!
quotes.author: Sulev Nõmmik

quotes.quote: It's like that phrase about smiling because it happened and not crying because it's over. Except you are crying, but out of happiness.
quotes.author: Jordan Fried

quotes.quote: Crying is a natural response to pain.
quotes.author: Jordan Roberts

quotes.quote: You can't spend the rest of your life crying. It annoys people in the movies.
quotes.author: Neil Simon

quotes.quote: Cinderella didn't cry in the story. But she would have in real life. I'm too happy not to cry. Too happy.
quotes.author: E. Phillips Oppenheim

quotes.quote: Crying? yes. Women live in a storm of tears. They must breathe with gills - for a man chokes in all that salt water.
quotes.author: Ingmar Bergman

quotes.quote: Sometimes things get so messed up, crying is the only thing you can do.
quotes.author: Joe Connelly

quotes.quote: Because nothing changes, no matter how much you cry or how sorry you feel for yourself.
quotes.author: Elly Brewer

quotes.quote: Ain't no crying in the club (hey, hey) / Let the beat carry away, your tears as they fall baby
quotes.author: Benjamin Joseph Levin

quotes.quote: Don't you go crying no tears / Take your feelings and hide them / Roll them up and ignite them
quotes.author: Tom Higgenson

quotes.quote: Now you're gonna cry about it like that's gonna solve anything? / You're gonna let this girl make you feel so low, so desperate
quotes.author: Tom Higgenson

quotes.quote: Since you said so long left me standing all alone alone and crying crying crying crying / It's hard to understand that the touch of your hand can start me crying / I thought that I was over you but it's true so true
quotes.author: Joe Melson

quotes.quote: Women cry more often. It's just true in a general sense. You an attribute it to emotions, culture, or simply to hormones.
quotes.author: Rita Chester

quotes.quote: Crying is a perfectly natural, healthy thing to do.
quotes.author: Andrée Nicole

quotes.quote: We usually cry in response to strong emotions either during times of sadness, joy, despair, or even anger.
quotes.author: Andrée Nicole

quotes.quote: However in the midst of theses tears, I later learned that they encouraged healing, and because of the fact that I was able to cry, I had gained remarkable strength and the ability to make the required steps to fully heal.
quotes.author: Andrée Nicole

quotes.quote: Do you believe that by holding in your tears creates more harm than good?
quotes.author: Andrée Nicole

quotes.quote: Just because you are not crying over a death of a loved one does not mean that is wrong. It is okay not to cry.
quotes.author: Gina Schampers

quotes.quote: We must also look into our feelings of grief and loss. When we accept that everything is constantly changing, when we accept the inevitability that people and animals die, we can deal with pain in a much better fashion.
quotes.author: Aaron Soltys

quotes.quote: Embrace your grief and your sadness felt towards those that have passed and remember them with love.
quotes.author: Aaron Soltys

quotes.quote: Replace your grief with love and appreciation. That is truly what any who have departed from our lives would wish for us.
quotes.author: Aaron Soltys

quotes.quote: You are more powerful than your circumstances. They don't define you. You do.
quotes.author: Jon Gordon

quotes.quote: The story you tell yourself defines the life you live and the actions you take. It's important to tell yourself a positive story.
quotes.author: Jon Gordon

quotes.quote: While fear and worry can weaken or harden you, love transforms you and the people and situations around you.
quotes.author: Jon Gordon

quotes.quote: You don't have to wait to feel positive enough for a smile to happen. You can generate a positive feeling by smiling. Your smile can be the source of your positivity, not the result of it. Smile more today.
quotes.author: Jon Gordon

quotes.quote: The moment we cry in a film is not when things are sad but when they turn out to be more beautiful than we expected them to be.
quotes.author: Alain De Botton

quotes.quote: I an see his pain, see it in the way he runs his fingers through his hair, over and over, and I understand what it costs him to hide it all.
quotes.author: Libba Bray

quotes.quote: Crying has been found to bring significant emotional relief.
quotes.author: John Preston

quotes.quote: Crying is a social signal that might elicit support from others.
quotes.author: John Preston

quotes.quote: Crying often leads to emotional relief for people with depression.
quotes.author: John Preston

quotes.quote: Crying is not a sign of weakness, and you can still get things done when you're crying.
quotes.author: John Preston

quotes.quote: You don't need a PhD to know many women cry when they're happy, when they're sad, when they're frustrated, when they're angry, when the sun shining, when it's not--well, you get the point.
quotes.author: Lois P. Frankel

quotes.quote: Don't substitute tears for anger. Women often cry because they've been taught being angry isn't ladylike or acceptable.
quotes.author: Lois P. Frankel

quotes.quote: Enigmatic - the quality of keeping silent and making people wonder if one is stupid rather than opening one's mouth and removing all doubt.
quotes.author: Mary Jo Putney

quotes.quote: Our minds are the most mysterious things about us.
quotes.author: Elsa Barker

quotes.quote: Stay curious! Life is simple but mysterious.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: When you make the obvious mysterious, then the mysterious becomes unavailable.
quotes.author: Walter Darby Bannard

quotes.quote: The mysterious is always attractive. People will always follow a vail.
quotes.author: Bede Jarrett

quotes.quote: A blue eye is a true eye; Mysterious is a dark one, Which flashes like a spark sun! A black eye is the best one.
quotes.author: William Rounseville Alger

quotes.quote: That mysterious independent variable of political calculation, Public Opinion.
quotes.author: Thomas Huxley

quotes.quote: Confusion is a luxury which only the very, very young can possibly afford and you are not that young anymore.
quotes.author: James Baldwin

quotes.quote: The more mysterious, the more imperfect: that which is mystically spoken is but half spoken.
quotes.author: Benjamin Whichcote

quotes.quote: Nothing is wholly obvious without becoming enigmatic. Reality itself is too obvious to be true
quotes.author: Jean Baudrillard

quotes.quote: Life's mysterious, strange, and full of wonders - and only a fool withdraws from it willingly and lets it pass him by.
quotes.author: Dean Koontz

quotes.quote: It is through this mysterious power that we too have our being, and we therefore yield to our neighbors, even to our animal neighbors, the same right as ourselves to inhabit this vast land.
quotes.author: Sitting Bull

quotes.quote: Happiness is a mysterious thing, to be found somewhere between too little and too much.
quotes.author: Ruskin Bond

quotes.quote: The most confused you will ever get is when you try to convince your heart and spirit of something your mind knows is a lie.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: Do act mysterious. It always keeps them coming back for more.
quotes.author: Carolyn Keene

quotes.quote: Trust is a confusing thing. It seems so simple, but when you try to pin it down, it can be so elusive.
quotes.author: Ze Frank

quotes.quote: No object is mysterious. The mystery is your eye.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Bowen

quotes.quote: There were mysterious questions, but a mysterious answer was a contradiction in terms.
quotes.author: Eliezer Yudkowsky

quotes.quote: Human beings are not seamless smooth creations, they have insoluble parts, and the closer you look the more mysterious they become.
quotes.author: Niall Williams

quotes.quote: The natural pattern of current astronomy is provided by the cryptic unity of nature itself (belief in which is the chief act of faith of the scientist).
quotes.author: Nigel Calder

quotes.quote: For mysterious things of faith, rely on the proponent, Heaven's authority.
quotes.author: John Dryden

quotes.quote: Be extremely subtle, even to the point of formlessness. Be extremely mysterious, even to the point of soundlessness. Thereby you can be the director of the opponent's fate.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: There is this mysterious energy that wants us to keep growing.
quotes.author: Michele Cassou

quotes.quote: Life has its enigmatic events, that can make it a mystery, or my misery. It all depends on how I view it.
quotes.author: Anthony Liccione

quotes.quote: Our minds are mysterious; our conscious brain is like a ship on a sea that is obscure to us.
quotes.author: Meghan O'Rourke

quotes.quote: Considering the sense of powerlessness that such a state of affairs would bring about, to have people floating in a pool of mysterious question marks seems like a minor sin.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: It's a very confusing era that we're in.
quotes.author: Clint Eastwood

quotes.quote: It's mysterious what attracts you to a person.
quotes.author: Jeff Goldblum

quotes.quote: What value does cryptocurrency actually add? No one's been able to answer that question for me.
quotes.author: Steve Eisman

quotes.quote: Cryptocurrency currencies take the concept of money, and they take it native into computers, where everything is settled with computers and doesn't require external institutions or trusted third parties to validate things.
quotes.author: Naval Ravikant

quotes.quote: The crypto currency community hasn't decided whether they want to be anarchist rebels or to replace the establishment.
quotes.author: Adi Shamir

quotes.quote: Bitcoin, in the short or even long term, may turn out be a good investment in the same way that anything that is rare can be considered valuable. Like baseball cards. Or a Picasso.
quotes.author: Andrew Ross Sorkin

quotes.quote: Bitcoin frees people from trying to operate in a modern market economy.
quotes.author: Timothy C. Draper

quotes.quote: Bitcoin is a technological tour de force.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: Right now Bitcoin feels like the Internet before the browser.
quotes.author: Wences Casares

quotes.quote: Bitcoin is the currency of resistance.
quotes.author: Max Keiser

quotes.quote: Bitcoin will do to banks what email did to the postal industry.
quotes.author: Rick Falkvinge

quotes.quote: Bitcoin is a remarkable cryptographic achievement and the ability to create something that is not duplicable in the digital world has the enormous value.
quotes.author: Eric Schmidt

quotes.quote: Bitcoin is not currency; it's the internet of money!
quotes.author: Andreas Antonopoulos

quotes.quote: Bitcoin is not a currency for a government; it is a global currency for the people.
quotes.author: Wences Casares

quotes.quote: Bitcoin is the beginning of something great: a currency without a government, something necessary and imperative.
quotes.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

quotes.quote: Bitcoins are not an investment. They are an investment fad that someday could be a real digital currency, but if they continue to behave as they have, they will instead be nothing.
quotes.author: Kurt Eichenwald

quotes.quote: At its core, bitcoin is a smart currency, designed by very forward-thinking engineers. It eliminates the need for banks, gets rid of credit card fees, currency exchange fees, money transfer fees, and reduces the need for lawyers in transitions all good things.
quotes.author: Peter Diamandis

quotes.quote: Bitcoin actually has the balance and incentives right, and that is why it is starting to take off.
quotes.author: Julian Assange

quotes.quote: Bitcoin might revolutionise more than money or economics. It could transform the role and nature of government
quotes.author: Leon Louw

quotes.quote: So bitcoin gives us an opportunity to reclaim the power of the people to say yes or no to what the government claims that it wants to do.
quotes.author: Stefan Molyneux

quotes.quote: BitCoin is actually an exploit against network complexity. Not financial networks, or computer networks, or social networks. Networks themselves.
quotes.author: Dan Kaminsky

quotes.quote: Bitcoin is a currency, bitcoin is a network, bitcoin is a technology and you can't separate these things. A consensus network that bases its value on the currency does not work without the currency.
quotes.author: Andreas Antonopoulos

quotes.quote: If the cryptocurrency market overall or a digital asset is solving a problem, it's going to drive some value.
quotes.author: Brad Garlinghouse

quotes.quote: Whenever the price of cryptocurrency is rallying, people start spending a lot more.
quotes.author: Erik Voorhees

quotes.quote: Bitcoin's got its issues. But it is not competing with perfection.
quotes.author: Dan Kaminsky

quotes.quote: Bitcoin isn’t tied to any commodity – besides trust.
quotes.author: Paul Ford

quotes.quote: For centuries, Cuba's greatest resource has been its people.
quotes.author: Pico Iyer

quotes.quote: Cuba may be the only place in the world where you can be yourself and more than yourself at the same time.
quotes.author: Pedro Juan Gutierrez

quotes.quote: In Cuba and specifically in Havana there's a sort of energy that turns every situation into something unexpected.
quotes.author: Fernando Perez

quotes.quote: Cuba has its own moral system and priorities. That's what keeps it going, the belief that the country can control its own destiny.
quotes.author: Assata Shakur

quotes.quote: I don't think that the reality of Cuba is perfect, but it doesn't cleave to the negativity, either, with which some people see it.
quotes.author: Fernando Perez

quotes.quote: The people in Cuba, they know what I stand for, and there's a lot of people in Cuba that stand for the same. But they can't say it.
quotes.author: Pitbull

quotes.quote: Being in Cuba has allowed me to live in a society that is not at war with itself. There is a sense of community. It's a given in Cuba that, if you fall down, the person next to you is going to help you get up.
quotes.author: Assata Shakur

quotes.quote: Cuba is like going to a whole other planet. It's so different but it's so similar to the United States, to Miami. It's like a doppelgaenger. It's the mirror image. And I have no doubt, that once Cuba becomes democratic, that it will be the favorite tourist destination for Americans.
quotes.author: Henry Louis Gates

quotes.quote: Cuba needs a dose of perestroika.
quotes.author: Carlos Fuentes

quotes.quote: In Cuba we use our champions to promote the sport.
quotes.author: Alberto Juantorena

quotes.quote: What most impressed me about Cuba was the optimism.
quotes.author: Assata Shakur
