quotes.quote: Living in Cuba made me unafraid of whatever could happen to me.
quotes.author: Brit Marling

quotes.quote: Cuba ought to be free and independent, and the government should be turned over to the Cuban people.
quotes.author: William McKinley

quotes.quote: It's amazing how everything here seems like it's in abundance. In Cuba, there is a shortage of everything.
quotes.author: Jose Contreras

quotes.quote: The notion that Cuba is the only country in the world where you can live without working must be erased forever.
quotes.author: Raul Castro

quotes.quote: Cuba is such a beautiful country, and everywhere you go, there's music and people dancing - especially in Havana.
quotes.author: Julia Sawalha

quotes.quote: It's true that in Cuba there are double standards, there's opportunism, and there is a lack of freedom in some ways.
quotes.author: Fernando Perez

quotes.quote: Cuba has become a symbol of courageous resistance to attack. Since 1959, Cuba has been under attack from the hemispheric superpower.
quotes.author: Noam Chomsky

quotes.quote: Cuba laments and expresses its profound sadness for the loss of so many innocent lives and expresses our absolute rejection of acts of terrorism, wherever they may come from.
quotes.author: Felipe Perez

quotes.quote: I trust Cuba as a principled country. Cuba's strength is that it has been steadfast in its commitment to the principles of liberation, freedom, of resistance to the kind of institutionalized terrorism that the United States government does every day.
quotes.author: Assata Shakur

quotes.quote: Communism in Cuba will collapse sooner or later because you can't control the free flow of information. Communism prevents organizations from developing by stopping the flow of information. The system is based on police and listening devices and triggers the worst characteristics in humans.
quotes.author: Lech Walesa

quotes.quote: I feel your love so real in my love, so true and strong especially when you put your arms around me. You make me always crave your cuddles.
quotes.author: Purity Hogan

quotes.quote: Come cuddle close in daddy's coat Beside the fire so bright, And hear about the fairy folk That wander in the night.
quotes.author: Robert Bird

quotes.quote: What is life, without your arms around me? What is life without the smell of you next to me? What is life without you by my side? Cuddle me, love me and promise never to ever live my side.
quotes.author: Jane Thomson

quotes.quote: I began to wonder why we cuddle some animals and put a fork in others.
quotes.author: Henry Spira

quotes.quote: Come, cuddle your head on my shoulder, dear, your head like the golden rod, and we will go sailing away from here to the beautiful Land of Nod.
quotes.author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox

quotes.quote: Cuddle up. Rain always stops. It always stops. It always does.
quotes.author: Ellen Gilchrist

quotes.quote: All I really wanted to do was cuddle back under the blankets, maybe with a certain stuffed toy penguin I knew. Yeah, hiding sounded good.
quotes.author: Laurell K Hamilton

quotes.quote: There's nothing else I would rather do, unless there was a profession that involved cuddling bunny rabbits and kittens all day for money.
quotes.author: Kat Dennings

quotes.quote: I've always loved the music...My favorite kind of music is Christmas music and the only thing I love better music is my wife and daughters. So, hanging out with my wife and daughters and cuddling them will be pretty cool.
quotes.author: Keith Getty

quotes.quote: Don't get me wrong, I like to cuddle. But there is such a fine line between cuddling and holding someone down so that they can't get away.
quotes.author: Dave Attell

quotes.quote: When I pick up one of my children and cuddle them, all the strain and stress of life temporarily disappears. There is nothing more wonderful than motherhood and no-one will ever love you as much as a small child.
quotes.author: Nicola Horlick

quotes.quote: He imagined them sitting somewhere, just enjoying each other's company, her head on his chest, his arm around her. And he realized how desperately lonely he had become.
quotes.author: Tim LaHaye

quotes.quote: My days, if they start in the morning with a cuddle from my son, are just so much more glorious than they were prior to that.
quotes.author: Russell Crowe

quotes.quote: I'm tired of going to an empty bedroom every night. I wish I had a girl I could cuddle with.
quotes.author: Harry Styles

quotes.quote: Cuddling was for great aunts and teddy bears. Cuddling gave him cramp.
quotes.author: David Nicholls

quotes.quote: I get really upset some days , and I really just wish I had someone there to cuddle.
quotes.author: Harry Styles

quotes.quote: I have to tell them that last night was a shameful train wreck filled with blind cuddly puppies.
quotes.author: Charlie Sheen

quotes.quote: Living cuddled in your life is one thing I would give my life for, having to be kissed by you every morning I would die for and without you; my life is not worth living.
quotes.author: James Clarke

quotes.quote: Love for me is innocence, honesty, compassion, trust, loyalty, a gentle summer breeze, sunshine, a great cuddle.
quotes.author: A. J. McLean

quotes.quote: All this cuddling and kissing on stage these days, well it's all right in football when someone scores a goal, but not when you're playing darts.
quotes.author: Eric Bristow

quotes.quote: I miss having someone to cuddle up and have an early night with. But I'm looking. Meanwhile, I'm having a few relationships that don't mean much.
quotes.author: Robbie Williams

quotes.quote: When it's cold & dark at night, and we're alone together, I long to take you in my arms, and cuddle you forever.
quotes.author: Giles Andreae

quotes.quote: Yeah, I treat all my heroines like children now. I pick them up, I cuddle them, I call them baby.
quotes.author: Shahrukh Khan

quotes.quote: What the world really needs is more love and less paperwork.
quotes.author: Pearl Bailey

quotes.quote: The baby I hold in my arms is a black baby. / I toil, and I cannot always cuddle him. / I place him on the ground at my feet.
quotes.author: Anita Scott Coleman

quotes.quote: Men don't like to cuddle. We only like it if it leads to, you know, lower cuddling.
quotes.author: Ray

quotes.quote: I can sit on her lap, though, and she tells me stories about when she was young and I can cuddle up with her. It sounds weird, but I like to snuggle into her and smell her and rub her arm in my face. She is cozy.
quotes.author: Patty

quotes.quote: Moms are always busy but never too busy to give you a quick cuddle.
quotes.author: Richard Exley

quotes.quote: He looks such a wooly cuddle and sounds smoother than a pint of Guinness going down a dry throat.
quotes.author: Clive James

quotes.quote: There is no wrong way to cuddle, but there are ways to make your cuddles more intimate and enjoyable.
quotes.author: Rob Grader

quotes.quote: Above all else, a cuddle must be comfortable for it to be comforting.
quotes.author: Rob Grader

quotes.quote: Once you are physically communicating with your partner through the cuddle, verbal communication will have even more of an impact.
quotes.author: Rob Grader

quotes.quote: Grandma's cuddles start with a hug, / And soon you're feeling safe and snug. / She pulls you in then tickles your chin, / And asks you how your day has been.
quotes.author: Sonica Ellis

quotes.quote: Within the simple act of an embrace, two people can be joined together in such an intense bond that words no longer serve a purpose. The cuddle says it all.
quotes.author: Rob Grader

quotes.quote: One of the magical things about cuddling is that anyone can do it. It is not limited by gender, age, sie, or acrobatic abilities.
quotes.author: Rob Grader

quotes.quote: Cuddle time can help your baby calm down after an upset or get ready for naps and beds. Make cuddling a frequent part of your daily routine.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Verdick

quotes.quote: ‘Cuddle and love me, cuddle and love me,’ / Crows the mouth of coral pink: / Oh, the bald head, and, oh, the sweet lips, / And, oh, the sleepy eyes that wink!
quotes.author: Christina Georgina Rossetti

quotes.quote: When I look into your eyes, / I see you're in love, / When we cuddle I feel safe, / And I don't feel like a waif.
quotes.author: Angelina Sabia

quotes.quote: Fight less, cuddle more. Demand less, serve more. Text less, talk more. Criticize less, compliment more. Stress less, laugh more. Worry less, pray more. With each new day, find new ways to love each other even more.
quotes.author: Dave Willis

quotes.quote: I read that when cats are cuddling and kneading you, and you think it’s cute, they're really just checking your vitals for weak spots.
quotes.author: Kandyse Mcclure

quotes.quote: Petting, scratching, and cuddling a dog could be as soothing to the mind and heart as deep meditation and almost as good for the soul as prayer.
quotes.author: Dean Koontz

quotes.quote: Being cuddly has nothing to do with size.
quotes.author: Brigitte Nielsen

quotes.quote: Memories keep us stay alive as they gently cuddle us along the squirming roads of our lives and even warn us sometimes of insidious pitfalls.
quotes.author: Erik Pevernagie

quotes.quote: When you miss your loved one, remember the beautiful moments you've had with them. And when your heart swells, cuddle your pillow and let your tears soothe the pain.
quotes.author: Anoir Ou-Chad

quotes.quote: All my friends are bums. We all gather around our camp-fire (in a can) and sing songs of togetherness as we cuddle, to preserve our warmth...
quotes.author: Will Advise

quotes.quote: I'm not a hugger. People make fun of me. It's something that I have a hard time with. If someone hugs me, I hold my breath. Snuggling, cuddling, hugging, crying - all that stuff makes me very uncomfortable.
quotes.author: Angelina Jolie

quotes.quote: It is wonderful to be in the country in a glasshouse because no matter what happens out there, you're nice and safe, you know, cuddled in your little bed, and there it is, raging storms, snowing - wonderful. -
quotes.author: Philip Johnson

quotes.quote: If models are made for modeling, thick girls are made for cuddling.
quotes.author: Andre Benjamin

quotes.quote: It's similar to the way you feel cuddling an infant or a kitten when you want to squeeze it so hard you'd kill it...
quotes.author: Zoe Heller

quotes.quote: Love for me is innocence, honesty, compassion, trust, loyalty, a gentle summer breeze, sunshine, a great cuddle.
quotes.author: AJ McLean

quotes.quote: End up blowing all of his wages for the week, all for a cuddle and a peck on the cheek
quotes.author: Ray Davies

quotes.quote: Our bodies are made to nurture and cuddle and all of those amazing things that come along with being a mom.
quotes.author: Alyssa Milano

quotes.quote: Anybody can make you enjoy the first bite of a dish, but only a real chef can make you enjoy the last.
quotes.author: Francois Minot

quotes.quote: One of the very nicest things about life is the way we must regularly stop whatever it is we are doing and devote our attention to eating.
quotes.author: Luciano Pavarotti

quotes.quote: A good kitchen should be sufficiently remote from the principal apartments of the house, that the members, visitors, or guests of the family, may not perceive the odour incident to cooking, or hear the noise of culinary operations.
quotes.author: Isabella Beeton

quotes.quote: Cooking is so popular today because it's the perfect mix of food and fun.
quotes.author: Emeril Lagasse

quotes.quote: Cooking is like love. It should be entered into with abandon or not at all.
quotes.author: Harriet Van Horne

quotes.quote: People want honest, flavourful food, not some show-off meal that takes days to prepare.
quotes.author: Ted Allen

quotes.quote: The preparation of good food is merely another expression of art, one of the joys of civilized living.
quotes.author: Dione Lucas

quotes.quote: The chef that grew up with the grandma who cooks tends to always beat the chef that went to the culinary institute. It's in the blood.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.quote: Cooking well doesn't mean cooking fancy.
quotes.author: Julia Child

quotes.quote: Ingredients are not sacred. The art of cuisine is sacred.
quotes.author: Tanith Tyrr

quotes.quote: Craving is a good thing.In matters of culinary art, craving creates wonders.
quotes.author: Andy Paula

quotes.quote: But the goal of the arts, culinary or otherwise, is not to increase our comfort. That is the goal of an easy chair.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Steingarten

quotes.quote: A culinary triumph: the ingenious use of food as an offensive weapon.
quotes.author: James Hamilton Paterson

quotes.quote: You cannot get an influence from the cuisine of a country if you don't understand it. You've got to study it.
quotes.author: Ferran Adria

quotes.quote: One cannot think well, love well, sleep well, if one has not dined well.
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.quote: At culinary school, none of the things we use to define ourselves outside that world - actor, producer, student - none of that matters. It's a magical art form.
quotes.author: Eric Christian Olsen

quotes.quote: After a good dinner one can forgive anybody, even one's own relatives.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Even just a few spices or ethnic condiments that you can keep in your pantry can turn your mundane dishes into a culinary masterpiece.
quotes.author: Marcus Samuelsson

quotes.quote: Cookery is a wholly unselfish art: All good cooks, like all great artists, must have an audience worth cooking for.
quotes.author: Andre Simon

quotes.quote: Cooking is like love, it should be entered into with abandon or not at all.
quotes.author: Harriet Van Horne

quotes.quote: A man who loves good food has a way of making it gravitate toward his kitchen.
quotes.author: Angelo Pellegrini

quotes.quote: When baking, follow directions. When cooking, go by your own taste.
quotes.author: Laiko Bahrs

quotes.quote: Part of the secret of success in life is to eat what you like and let the food fight it out inside.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: A good cook is like a sorceress who dispenses happiness.
quotes.author: Elsa Schiaparelli

quotes.quote: Culinary tradition is not always based on fact. Sometimes it's based on history, on habits that come out of a time when kitchens were fueled by charcoal.
quotes.author: Alton Brown

quotes.quote: Cooking is an art, but all art requires knowing something about the techniques and materials.
quotes.author: Nathan Myhrvold

quotes.quote: No one is born a great cook, one learns by doing.
quotes.author: Julia Child

quotes.quote: Great cooking is about being inspired by the simple things around you fresh markets, various spices. It doesn't necessarily have to look fancy.
quotes.author: G. Garvin

quotes.quote: Cooking demands attention, patience, and above all, a respect for the gifts of the earth. It is a form of worship, a way of giving thanks.
quotes.author: Judith B. Jones

quotes.quote: Cookery is not chemistry. It is an art. It requires instinct and taste rather than exact measurements.
quotes.author: Marcel Boulestin

quotes.quote: Secrets, especially with cooking, are best shared so that the cuisine lives on.
quotes.author: Bo Songvisava

quotes.quote: The kitchen's a laboratory, and everything that happens there has to do with science. It's biology, chemistry, physics. Yes, there's history. Yes, there's artistry. Yes, to all of that. But what happened there, what actually happens to the food is all science.
quotes.author: Alton Brown

quotes.quote: I approach cooking from a science angle because I need to understand how things work. If I understand the egg, I can scramble it better. It’s a simple as that.
quotes.author: Alton Brown

quotes.quote: Meals make the society, hold the fabric together in lots of ways that were charming and interesting and intoxicating to me. The perfect meal, or the best meals, occur in a context that frequently has very little to do with the food itself.
quotes.author: Anthony Bourdain

quotes.quote: Food is everything we are. It's an extension of nationalist feeling, ethnic feeling, your personal history, your province, your region, your tribe, your grandma. It's inseparable from those from the get go.
quotes.author: Anthony Bourdain

quotes.quote: Meals make the society, hold the fabric together in lots of ways that were charming and interesting and intoxicating to me. The perfect meal, or the best meals, occur in a context that frequently has very little to do with the food itself.
quotes.author: Anthony Bourdain

quotes.quote: Food is everything we are. It's an extension of nationalist feeling, ethnic feeling, your personal history, your province, your region, your tribe, your grandma. It's inseparable from those from the get-go.
quotes.author: Anthony Bourdain

quotes.quote: The way you make an omelet reveals your character.
quotes.author: Anthony Bourdain

quotes.quote: in the abstract art of cooking, ingredients trump appliances, passion supersedes expertise, creativity triumphs over technique, spontaneity inspires invention, and wine makes even the worst culinary disaster taste delicious.
quotes.author: Bob Blumer

quotes.quote: Cooking is at once child’s play and adult joy. And cooking done with care is an act of love.
quotes.author: Craig Claiborne

quotes.quote: Cooking is at once one of the simplest and most gratifying of the arts, but to cook well one must love and respect food.
quotes.author: Craig Claiborne

quotes.quote: Remember, it is never the knife's fault.
quotes.author: Daniel Boulud

quotes.quote: Cooking is not a mystery.
quotes.author: Edward Espe Brown

quotes.quote: Chefs don't make mistakes, they make new dishes.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Briggs

quotes.quote: There is not a good or a bad cuisine, just the one you like the best.
quotes.author: Ferran Adria

quotes.quote: To eat is a necessity, but to eat intelligently is an art.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: Cooking is not difficult. Everyone has taste, even if they don’t realize it. Even if you’re not a great chef, there’s nothing to stop you understanding the difference between what tastes good and what doesn’t.
quotes.author: Gerard Depardieu

quotes.quote: Invest in what’s real. Clean as you go. Drink while you cook. Make it fun. It doesn’t have to be complicated. It will be what it will be.
quotes.author: Gwyneth Paltrow

quotes.quote: I want them to bite into a cookie, and think of me, and smile. Food is love. Food has a power. I knew it in my mind, but now I know it in my heart.
quotes.author: Jael McHenry

quotes.quote: This is my advice to people. Learn how to cook, try new recipes, learn from your mistakes, be fearless, and above all have fun.
quotes.author: Julia Child

quotes.quote: The only real stumbling block is fear of failure. In cooking you’ve got to have a what-the-hell attitude.
quotes.author: Julia Child

quotes.quote: You don’t have to cook fancy or complicated masterpieces, just good food from fresh ingredients.
quotes.author: Julia Child

quotes.quote: No one who cooks, cooks alone. Even at her most solitary, a cook in the kitchen is surrounded by generations of cooks past, the advice and menus of cooks present, the wisdom of cookbook writers.
quotes.author: Laurie Colwin

quotes.quote: No rules. Don't be afraid to do whatever you want. Cooking doesn't have to have rules. I don't like it that way.
quotes.author: Masaharu Morimoto

quotes.quote: Great food needed more than chefs; it needed gourmet diners.
quotes.author: Nicole Mones

quotes.quote: Cooking requires confident guesswork and improvisation experimentation and substitution, dealing with failure and uncertainty in a creative way.
quotes.author: Paul Theroux

quotes.quote: Cooking is like painting or writing a song. Just as there are only so many notes or colors, there are only so many flavors it’s how you combine them that sets you apart.
quotes.author: Wolfgang Puck

quotes.quote: A recipe has no soul. You, as the cook, must bring soul to the recipe.
quotes.author: Thomas Keller

quotes.quote: I learned more from the one restaurant that didn't work than from all the ones that were successes.
quotes.author: Wolfgang Puck

quotes.quote: If you are a chef, no matter how good a chef you are, it’s not good cooking for yourself; the joy is in cooking for others. It’s the same with music.
quotes.author: Will.I.Am

quotes.quote: For me, cooking is an expression of the land where you are and the culture of that place.
quotes.author: Wolfgang Puck

quotes.quote: The cult of personality is the curse of modern communication. Why should we believe that the actor, the entertainer or the sportsperson, the well-born, rich (whether by talent or accident,) or just famous for being famous, have anything original, wise, or philosophical to say? Yet, smitten by celebrity, we hang upon their lips.
quotes.author: Anita Robinson

quotes.quote: Even small cults are a serious cost on the world economy, to victims, their families, employers, friends, and credit-card companies.
quotes.author: Keith Henson

quotes.quote: The new cult... unimportant and opinionated young men who fancy that they can invert Nature and the human passions.... The love of a man for a woman, of woman for man, is the axis whereon the universe revolves.
quotes.author: Cyril M. Drew

quotes.quote: A cult is a religion with no political power.
quotes.author: Tom Wolfe

quotes.quote: One person's religion is another person's cult.
quotes.author: Philip Seymour Hoffman

quotes.quote: The difference between a cult and an established religion is sometimes about one generation.
quotes.author: Scott McLemee

quotes.quote: What's a cult? It just means not enough people to make a minority.
quotes.author: Robert Altman

quotes.quote: Every family had its own peculiar cult, to which no stranger was ever admitted, and which alone could appease and satisfy the gods of that family. The cult was handed down from father to son, from generation to generation, and could not be lost without condemning the whole series of ancestors to eternal misery.
quotes.author: Helen Dendy Bosanquet

quotes.quote: The worship of the golden calf of old has found a new and heartless image in the cult of money and the dictatorship of an economy which is faceless and lacking any truly human goal.
quotes.author: Pope Francis

quotes.quote: The modern spirit is a hesitant one. Spontaneity has given way to cautious legalisms, and the age of heroes has been superseded by a cult of specialization. We have no more giants; only obedient ants.
quotes.author: Roger Lowenstein

quotes.quote: Despite the success cult, men are most deeply moved not by the reaching of the goal but by the grandness of the effort involved in getting there - or failing to get there.
quotes.author: Max Lerner

quotes.quote: Teaism is a cult founded on the adoration of the beautiful among the sordid facts of everyday existence.... It is essentially a worship of the Imperfect, as it is a tender attempt to accomplish something possible in this impossible thing we know as life.
quotes.author: Okakura Kakuzō

quotes.quote: Men who care passionately for women attach themselves at least as much to the temple and to the accessories of the cult as to their goddess herself.
quotes.author: Marguerite Yourcenar

quotes.quote: The cult of happiness turns into a huge concern which to my opinion is exactly contrary to what happiness should be: a paradise of enchantment.
quotes.author: Pascal Bruckner

quotes.quote: The cult of moral grayness is a revolt against moral values.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: A good cult delivers on its promises. A good cult nourishes the needs of its members, has transparency and integrity, and creates provisions for challenging its leadership openly. A good cult expands the freedoms and well-being of its members rather than limits them.
quotes.author: Philip Zimbardo

quotes.quote: If you want to fight a cult, you've got to form a cult.
quotes.author: Steve Almond

quotes.quote: The selfishness of an age that has devoted itself to the mere cult of pleasure has tainted the whole human race with an error that makes all our acts more or less lies against God.
quotes.author: Thomas Merton

quotes.quote: All culture must have arisen from cult.
quotes.author: Alan Moore

quotes.quote: Religious cult: The church down the street from yours.
quotes.author: Johnny Hart

quotes.quote: The believer in magic and miracles reflects on how to impose a law on nature--: and, in brief, the religious cult is the outcome of this reflection.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: The less reasonable a cult is, the more men seek to establish it by force.
quotes.author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

quotes.quote: When a cult grows up, it becomes a culture.
quotes.author: Jan Shipps

quotes.quote: A cult following is a nice way of saying very few people like you.
quotes.author: Martin Mull

quotes.quote: Cult leaders succeed in dominating their followers because they have mastered the cruel art of exploiting universal human dependency and attachment needs in others.
quotes.author: Daniel Shaw

quotes.quote: The only difference between a cult and a religion is the amount of real estate they own.
quotes.author: Frank Zappa

quotes.quote: Many cults start off with high ideals that get corrupted by leaders or their board of advisors who become power-hungry and dominate and control members' lives. No group with high ideals starts off as a 'cult'; they become one when their errant ways are exposed.
quotes.author: Philip Zimbardo

quotes.quote: Worship is the community's cult in its purest, most inward, most subjective form--a cult in which objectivity is, as it were, consumed and digested, while the objective content, now stripped of its objectivity, has become a possession of mind and feeling.
quotes.author: Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel

quotes.quote: Almost any sect, cult, or religion will legislate its creed into law if it acquires the political power to do so.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: The cult of art gives pride; one never has too much of it.
quotes.author: Gustave Flaubert

quotes.quote: Cult: simply an extension of the idea that everyone's supreme aim in life is self- fulfillment and happiness and that one is entitled to wreck marriage, children and certainly one's health and sanity in pursuit of this.
quotes.author: Stephen Spender

quotes.quote: Nationalism is our form of incest, is our idolatry, is our insanity. Patriotism is its cult.
quotes.author: Erich Fromm

quotes.quote: But the existence of a cult does not mean that images appropriate to it automatically follow.
quotes.author: Robert Hughes

quotes.quote: When a Guru points His finger towards the truth, His disciples try to look at the truth. But His crazy fans remain fixed to the finger and say, 'How glorious is this finger! How glorious must be the truth this glorious finger is pointing towards! I will look at the truth one day but right now let me sing glories of this finger.
quotes.author: Shunya

quotes.quote: Cults are very good at finding you when you’re at your lowest point, when you’re your most emotionally vulnerable. And when you’re at that point it’s astounding what can crawl into your heart and start to fester there.
quotes.author: Jonathan Sims

quotes.quote: People in a cult don't know they're in a cult. But everyone else can tell.
quotes.author: Oliver Markus Malloy

quotes.quote: We are given to the cult of personality; when things go badly we look to some messiah to save us. If by chance we think we have found one, it will not be long before we destroy him.
quotes.author: Konstantinos Karamanlis

quotes.quote: Cult recruiting methods based on dosing victims with the brain chemicals released during capture bonding would make cults even more of a problem than they are now.
quotes.author: Keith Henson

quotes.quote: The best method for preventing destructive cult involvement is preventative education. If students and the public at large are more aware of destructive groups beforehand they may better understand and resist their recruitment efforts.
quotes.author: Rick Ross

quotes.quote: Today in the west the word 'guru' has come to mean someone who leads a cult, someone who deprives others of their intellectual or spiritual freedom and rips them off financially.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: Whatever term you wish to use—mind control, thought reform, brainwashing—it is ultimately a process that disrupts an individual's ability to make independent decisions from within their own identity.
quotes.author: Steven Hassan

quotes.quote: Most religions begin as cults, as Christianity was considered a cult in first-century Rome. It took a few centuries and a superstitious leader in Constantine for it to become the state religion. Cults just need to exhibit a little more of that virtuous patience.
quotes.author: Jack Bowen

quotes.quote: To understand ungovernability, imagine a cult with a dictatorial leader. He takes his followers' money, tells them how to behave and frequently uses corporal punishment to keep them in line.
quotes.author: Allen Thornton

quotes.quote: In some cases cults manipulate people into breaking contact with their family and these people become slaves of the cult. In some tragic cases, cults have committed mass suicide.
quotes.author: Karl Ericson

quotes.quote: So many sick things have happened. These poisoners - they feel they have no way out, feel they are in a cul de sac. I am a fiction maker, Shoko Asahara [Aum's leader] is, too. If making a story is white magic, what Asahara did was black magic. But sometimes black magic attracts people. It is very strong.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: New self-improvement courses, or cults, or religions - take your pick - tend to be composed of a mixture of common sense, moral guidance, and lunacy.
quotes.author: Emily Yoffe

quotes.quote: Other dogs look at French Poodles and wonder if they are members of some strange religious cult.
quotes.author: Rita Rudner

quotes.quote: I was aware, in those early days of motherhood, that my behaviour was strange to the people who knew me well. It was as though I had been brainwashed, taken over by a cult religion. And yet this cult, motherhood, was not a place where I could actually live. Like any cult, it demanded a complete surrender of identity to belong to it.
quotes.author: Rachel Cusk

quotes.quote: A cult is hardcore - evil and good are the same and subjected only to perspective, and you must tell the difference by experience, not books. Do good through evil, and justify evil to get good.
quotes.author: Robin Sacredfire

quotes.quote: Here's an easy way to figure out if you're in a cult: If you're wondering whether you're in a cult, the answer is yes.
quotes.author: Stephen Colbert

quotes.quote: The cult of self has become an addiction—feeding off the ego of self-glorification. The word cult encompasses many movements and ideas, but simply put, it describes a culture of alternative beliefs, fads, and trends, and tampers with just enough truth to knock many off balance.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: There is a cult of ignorance in the United States, and there has always been. The strain of anti-intellectualism has been a constant thread winding its way through our political and cultural life, nurtured by the false notion that democracy means that 'my ignorance is just as good as your knowledge.
quotes.author: Isaac Asimov

quotes.quote: Killer cults do exist, and they all have one thing in common: invariably, they're headed by charismatic megalomaniacs.
quotes.author: Elle Greenaway

quotes.quote: Cult? Why is it that any belief system that strays from the norm is labeled a cult? That any leader that dares to speak a deeper truth is called a lunatic with a messiah complex, and his followers are just pawns.
quotes.author: Nina Van Horn

quotes.quote: The cult of evil meets / In the very dead of night, / Planning, plotting, scheming / To do things never right. / They want to rule the world / From their private hidey-hole, / They never show their faces / And evil is their only goal.
quotes.author: Phil Roberts

quotes.quote: Looks like you've joined a cult / Don't you think that you should have / Consulted me / Before setting a course of misery / As zeal inside you grows / Say goodbye to all that you know / About your life / As you're filleted with a spoken knife.
quotes.author: Brian Miller; Jaclyn Barker; Kirk Graff; Kyla Dupuis

quotes.quote: A nation's culture resides in the hearts and in the soul of its people.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: If you want to change the culture, you will have to start by changing the organization.
quotes.author: Mary Douglas

quotes.quote: Preservation of one's own culture does not require contempt or disrespect for other cultures.
quotes.author: Cesar Chavez

quotes.quote: Why is it that, as a culture, we are more comfortable seeing two men holding guns than holding hands?
quotes.author: Ernest Gaines

quotes.quote: Society or culture or whatever you might want to call it, has created us all solely and wholly for the purpose of maintaining its continuity and status quo.
quotes.author: U. G. Krishnamurti

quotes.quote: Culture is the arts elevated to a set of beliefs.
quotes.author: Thomas Wolfe

quotes.quote: No culture can live if it attempts to be exclusive.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: When a tradition gathers enough strength to go on for centuries, you don't just turn it off one day.
quotes.author: Chinua Achebe

quotes.quote: Youth culture now really looks back and embraces the past, but keeps it contemporary but not sticking to one particular style.
quotes.author: Alexander McQueen

quotes.quote: Pop culture is a reflection of social change, not a cause of social change.
quotes.author: John Podhoretz

quotes.quote: Culture is a way of coping with the world by defining it in detail.
quotes.author: Malcolm Bradbury

quotes.quote: Popular culture has become engorged, broadening and thickening until it's the only culture anyone notices.
quotes.author: P. J. O'Rourke

quotes.quote: Culture is not made up but something that evolves which is human.
quotes.author: Edward T. Hall

quotes.quote: If we are to preserve culture we must continue to create it.
quotes.author: Johan Huizinga

quotes.quote: Culture makes all men gentle.
quotes.author: Menander

quotes.quote: This is the culture you're raising your kids in. Don't be surprised if it blows up in your face.
quotes.author: Marilyn Manson

quotes.quote: Every culture has something to be ashamed of, but every culture also has the right to change, to challenge negative traditions, and create to new ones.
quotes.author: Ralph Nader

quotes.quote: The second fundamental feature of culture is that all culture has an element of striving.
quotes.author: Johan Huizinga

quotes.quote: The role of culture is that it's the form through which we as a society reflect on who we are, where we've been, where we hope to be.
quotes.author: Wendell Pierce

quotes.quote: Culture is the widening of the mind and of the spirit.
quotes.author: Jawaharlal Nehru

quotes.quote: If your culture doesn't like geeks, you are in real trouble.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: In every ancient culture, there are rituals to mortify the body as a way of understanding that the energy of the soul is indestructible.
quotes.author: Marina Abramovic

quotes.quote: To merely observe your culture without contributing to it seems very close to existing as a ghost.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: If you're doing something outside of dominant culture, there's not an easy place for you. You will have to do it yourself.
quotes.author: Ava Duvernay

quotes.quote: When you learn something from people, or from a culture, you accept it as a gift, and it is your lifelong commitment to preserve it and build on it.
quotes.author: Yo-Yo Ma

quotes.quote: Culture's worth huge, huge risks. Without culture we're all totalitarian beasts.
quotes.author: Norman Mailer

quotes.quote: Cultures grow on the vine of tradition.
quotes.author: Jonah Goldberg

quotes.quote: Tradition is the illusion of permanence.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: Tradition is a guide and not a jailer.
quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: Tradition does not mean that the living are dead, it means that the dead are living.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: I like the tradition of ordinary men in extraordinary circumstances and how they react to events which force them to be heroic in a way that is not in their natures.
quotes.author: Rob Lowe

quotes.quote: I just think that some version of the past in our culture is going to rise up and become dominant.
quotes.author: Peter Davison

quotes.quote: Tradition demands that we not speak poorly of the dead.
quotes.author: Daniel Barenboim

quotes.quote: Everything is arranged so that it be this way, this is what is called culture.
quotes.author: Jacques Derrida

quotes.quote: When a marriage culture fails, sexual desire no longer unites; instead it fragments.
quotes.author: Maggie Gallagher

quotes.quote: Everybody blames the culture without taking responsibility.
quotes.author: James Levine

quotes.quote: We are all part of a tradition, at least we depend on the past.
quotes.author: Klaus Schulze

quotes.quote: Tradition has made women cowardly.
quotes.author: Nance O'Neil

quotes.quote: Custom is the great guide to human life.
quotes.author: David Hume

quotes.quote: Habit is necessary; it is the habit of having habits, of turning a trail into a rut, that must be incessantly fought against if one is to remain alive.
quotes.author: Edith Wharton

quotes.quote: Traditions are the guideposts driven deep in our subconscious minds. The most powerful ones are those we can't even describe, aren't even aware of.
quotes.author: Ellen Goodman

quotes.quote: Tradition means giving votes to the most obscure of all classes, our ancestors. It is the democracy of the dead.
quotes.author: G. K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Tradition can, to be sure, participate in a creation, but it can no longer be creative itself.
quotes.author: Kenzo Tange

quotes.quote: All tradition is merely the past.
quotes.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quotes.quote: A love for tradition has never weakened a nation, indeed it has strengthened nations in their hour of peril.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Tradition simply means that we need to end what began well and continue what is worth continuing
quotes.author: Jose Bergamin

quotes.quote: Tradition is an important help to history, but its statements should be carefully scrutinized before we rely on them.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.quote: As soon as tradition has come to be recognized as tradition, it is dead.
quotes.author: Allan Bloom

quotes.quote: Building a great tradition is more rewarding than simply having one.
quotes.author: J.R. Slaughter

quotes.quote: Tradition is an explanation for acting without thinking.
quotes.author: Grace Mcgarvie

quotes.quote: Culture is such a thin veneer / Scratch it and the truth will come gushing out / And the truth will come bleeding out / Yeah it all will come crashing down / The truth will come
quotes.author: Paul J. Carney

quotes.quote: This is what my daddy told me / I wish he would hold me a little more than he did / But he taught me my culture / And how to live positive
quotes.author: Duncan Philip Bridgeman

quotes.quote: We don't know what it's for but / We've lived the southern strategy / You know it's never going to last / So keep it in the past
quotes.author: Jeremy Gara

quotes.quote:
forget how the culture / we come from divide us / forget how the culture / we come from divide us / this is the culture of
dusty old vinyl / this is the tribal record of love
quotes.author: Gabrielle Glaser

quotes.quote: In an immature society culture is an import; for a mature one it is a native manufacture which eventually becomes an export.
quotes.author: Northrop Frye

quotes.quote: Culture is born in leisure and an awareness of standards, and pioneer conditions tend to make energetic and uncritical work an end it itself, to preach a gospel of social unconsciousness, which lingers long after the pioneer conditions have disappeared.
quotes.author: Northrop Frye

quotes.quote: It is a sad fact about our culture that a poet can earn much more money writing or talking about his art than he can by practising it.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Knowles

quotes.quote: Culture is coded wisdom.
quotes.author: Wangari Maathai

quotes.quote: Culture means control over nature.
quotes.author: Johan Huizinga

quotes.quote: Culture opens the sense of beauty.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Modern culture is a tremendous force.
quotes.author: John Gresham Machen

quotes.quote: Company culture is a religion, not a sermon.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.quote: Culture is not a matter of a change of climate.
quotes.author: George Horace Lorimer

quotes.quote: The effectiveness of a new culture depends on the strength of the people behind the change and the strength of the pre-existing culture.
quotes.author: Steve Gruenert

quotes.quote: Cultures are virtual realities made of language.
quotes.author: Terence McKenna

quotes.quote: Culture does not make people. People make culture.
quotes.author: Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie

quotes.quote: Culture is a slingshot moved by the force of its past.
quotes.author: Barbara Kingsolver

quotes.quote: A culture disconnected from wild nature becomes insane.
quotes.author: Toby Hemenway

quotes.quote: The greatness of a culture can be found in its festivals.
quotes.author: Siddharth Katragadda

quotes.quote: The more cunning a man is, the less he suspects that he will be caught in a simple thing. The more cunning a man is, the simpler the trap he must be caught in.
quotes.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

quotes.quote: Cunning is the art of concealing our own defects, and discovering other people’s weaknesses.
quotes.author: William Hazlitt

quotes.quote: Cunning leads to knavery. It is but a step from one to the other, and that very slippery. Only lying makes the difference; add that to cunning, and it is knavery.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.quote: Cunning is a short blanket, if you pull it over your face, you expose your feet.
quotes.author: Austin O'Malley

quotes.quote: The cunning man steals a horse, the wise man lets him alone.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Cunning is seeing a hundred yards ahead—wisdom, fifty miles in advance.
quotes.author: Charles William Day

quotes.quote: One must be cunning and wicked in this world.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: Cunning grows in deceit at seeing itself discovered, and tries to deceive with truth itself.
quotes.author: Balthasar Gracian

quotes.quote: Learn well how to think right and then be your own shepherd, otherwise you shall be the unlucky sheep of all sorts of cunning shepherds!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Do not be held a cheat, even though it is impossible to live today without being one. Let your greatest cunning lie in covering up what looks like cunning.
quotes.author: Baltasar Gracian

quotes.quote: There is nothing so cunning as tangled deception. If you wish to seek out the truth, first uncover the lies that surround the illusion.
quotes.author: Virginia Alison

quotes.quote: Have courage, or cunning, when you deal with an enemy.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: Only the cunning needs excuses.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: The weak in courage is strong in cunning.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: Cunning is strength withheld.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The greatest cunning is to have none at all.
quotes.author: French Proverb

quotes.quote: Self-love is more cunning than the most cunning man in the world.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: Cunning is but the low mimic of wisdom.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Be neither silly, nor cunning, but wise.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Cunning differs from wisdom as twilight from open day.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Cunning is the mere ape of wisdom, and all hate its low tricks.
quotes.author: John Thornton

quotes.quote: The very cunning conceal their cunning; the indifferently shrewd boast of it.
quotes.author: Christian Nestell Bovee

quotes.quote: The greatest cunning is to have none at all.
quotes.author: Carl Sandburg

quotes.quote: It is important to realize that the cunning are not always vicious. The cunning often do good things, but for self-interested and utility-driven reasons.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Cornwall

quotes.quote: Cunning is the dwarf of wisdom.
quotes.author: W.R Alger

quotes.quote: A cunning man overreaches no one half as much as himself.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: Cunning is the intensest rendering of vulgarity, absolute and utter.
quotes.author: Ruskin

quotes.quote: Cunning is none of the best nor worst qualities. It floats between virtue and vice.
quotes.author: La Bruyère

quotes.quote: Cunning has little honor.
quotes.author: Danish Proverb

quotes.quote: Cunning surpasses strength.
quotes.author: German Proverb

quotes.quote: The usefulness of a cup is its emptiness.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: What goes best with a cup of coffee? Another cup.
quotes.author: Henry Rollins

quotes.quote: In order to taste my cup of water you must first empty your cup.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: Empty your cup so that it may be filled; become devoid to gain totality.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: The cup which my Saviour giveth me, can it be anything but a cup of salvation?
quotes.author: Alexander Maclaren

quotes.quote: A cup brimful of sweetness cannot spill even one drop of bitter water, no matter how suddenly jarred.
quotes.author: Amy Carmichael

quotes.quote: Fill the cup of happiness for others, and there will be enough overflowing to fill yours to the brim.
quotes.author: Rose Pastor Stokes

quotes.quote: When your cup is empty, you do not mourn what is gone. Because if you do, you will miss the opportunity to fill it again.
quotes.author: Sarah Addison Allen

quotes.quote: For you the cup isn't half full or half empty, you're always topping it up.
quotes.author: Rowena Cory Daniells

quotes.quote: The cup of innocence will always overflow with the liquid of experience.
quotes.author: Anthony T. Hincks

quotes.quote: You have to fill your cup. You then give away the overflowing, but you keep a cupful for yourself.
quotes.author: Wynonna Judd

quotes.quote: We are cups, constantly and quietly being filled. The trick is knowing how to tip ourselves over and let the beautiful stuff out.
quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

quotes.quote: The cup of Ireland's misery has been overflowing for centuries and is not yet half full.
quotes.author: Boyle Roche

quotes.quote: A flawless cup: how delicate and fine The flowing curve of every jewelled line! Look, turn it up or down, 'tis perfect still-- But holds no drop of life's heart-warming wine.
quotes.author: Henry Van Dyke

quotes.quote: Without a strong cup to carry the emotion, it is only a curiosity. Great art can come to us only in strong cups. Without emotion, there is nothing to carry.
quotes.author: Nadia Boulanger

quotes.quote: The cup of joy is heaviest when empty.
quotes.author: Margaret of Valois

quotes.quote: Our cup will truly run over only after we have sealed the character cracks.
quotes.author: John D. Rockefeller

quotes.quote: Every inordinate cup is unbless'd, and the ingredient is a devil.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: There comes a time when the cup of endurance runs over, and men are no longer willing to be plunged into the abyss of despair.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: It is because of its emptiness that the cup is useful.
quotes.author: Carole Wilkinson

quotes.quote: Lifting our cup means sharing our life so we can celebrate it. When we truly believe we are called to lay down our lives for our friends, we must dare to take the risk to let others know what we are living.
quotes.author: Henri J.M. Nouwen

quotes.quote: A cup of tea is a cup of peace.
quotes.author: Priyanka Priya

quotes.quote: A cup of tea would restore my normality.
quotes.author: Douglas Adams

quotes.quote: The cup of suffering is not the same size for everyone.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Life is like a cup of tea, the sugar is all at the bottom!
quotes.author: Julia Ward Howe

quotes.quote: A cup of tea at the ready and a jug of water will suffice just fine.
quotes.author: S.A. Tawks

quotes.quote: Nothing like a cup of tea to make a person feel better, man or woman.
quotes.author: Daphne du Maurier

quotes.quote: You can't get a cup of tea big enough or a book long enough to suit me.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Life is just one cup of coffee after another, and don't look for anything else.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Life is a cup of tea; the more heartily we drink the sooner we reach the dregs.
quotes.author: James M. Barrie

quotes.quote: The cup has to be left clean and empty for the divine liquor to be poured into it.
quotes.author: Sri Aurobindo

quotes.quote: A full cup of wine at the right time is worth more than all the kingdoms of this earth!
quotes.author: Gustav Mahler

quotes.quote: Life is like a cup of coffee or tea. No matter how bitter it may be, it is always enjoyable.
quotes.author: Jason Wong

quotes.quote: Like drinking a cup of tea, all the simple things in life are the real things that make us happy!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: A thoughtful cup of tea brought to your bedside each morning means more to me than the huge bouquet of flowers bought once a year.
quotes.author: Penny Jordan

quotes.quote: I know I'm not everybody's cup of tea. I'm just me.
quotes.author: Mel B

quotes.quote: The little cakes were iced in white, with golden yellow icing roses on top, and instead of ice cream there was sherbet that was a rainbow of colors in each dish.
quotes.author: Jane Louise Curry

quotes.quote: Desserts are the fairy tales of the kitchen a happily ever after to supper.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: When you hold a cupcake, sorrow disappears.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Cupcakes and muffins are like twin sisters, one of whom makes no effort to hide that she sleeps around.
quotes.author: SadaoTurner

quotes.quote: Cupcakes are the tattooed brunette chick of the baked goods world.
quotes.author: Dov Davidoff

quotes.quote: You can not buy happiness, but you can buy cupcakes. And certainly will be glad with them!
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Cupcakes when you want to watch your weight, but still feel the pride that comes with eating an entire cake.
quotes.author: Dana Gould

quotes.quote: By contrast, my method of eating a cupcake was quite straight forward step one: gobble it down one large bite at a time until there's nothing left. That's it.
quotes.author: Meg Donohue

quotes.quote: When you look at a cupcake, you've got to smile.
quotes.author: Anne Byrn

quotes.quote: Subsisting on a diet drawn from one food group isn't healthy or gratifying. Even eating cupcakes 24/7 eventually would get old!
quotes.author: Jenna McCarthy

quotes.quote: Some people. Some people like cupcakes exclusively, while myself, I say, There is naught nor ought there be nothing so exalted on the face of god's grey earth as that prince of foods. the muffin!
quotes.author: Frank Zappa

quotes.quote: Sometimes in the midst of all your boy drama, you just need a cupcake.
quotes.author: Susane Colasanti

quotes.quote: Writing is like baking cupcakes, you're trying to make something from the raw. Like with cupcakes it's flour and eggs and stuff, and with books it's ideas and words. The end result is the same though, you want people to eat them up.
quotes.author: Emma Shortt

quotes.quote: Cupcakes are sweet and even sweeter when shared.
quotes.author: Marie Williams Johnstone

quotes.quote: Hey! Don't laugh at me for that cupcake thing. I enjoy cupcakes, therefore everyone should enjoy cupcakes.
quotes.author: Ray Toro

quotes.quote: A cupcake is like a great pop song. The whole world in less than three minutes. And it's impossible to have a bad cupcake. In New York you walk everywhere. So I'm always looking, always on the eternal search for the perfect cupcake. I take them very seriously. It's like hunting and gathering for me.
quotes.author: Laurel Nakadate

quotes.quote: We have cupcakes and of course they're decorated with Halloween goodies and they have to eat the cupcake and then ride back out.
quotes.author: Sharon Shaw

quotes.quote: Balanced diet is to keep a cupcake in each hand.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: A homemade cupcake deserves a homemade icing.
quotes.author: Kim Knott

quotes.quote: The balance to life is kale cakes and cupcakes.
quotes.author: Joe

quotes.quote: Any cupcake consumed before 9AM is, technically, a muffin.
quotes.author: Brian P Cleary

quotes.quote: We do have a love fest at home. It's like, I'm making you a cupcake. Then it's like, Well, I made you a cake. And it's like, Well I made you a cake with a cupcake on top and candles.
quotes.author: Dianna Agron

quotes.quote: Hide it in a hiding place where no one ever goes Put it in your pantry with your cupcakes.
quotes.author: Paul Simon

quotes.quote: I bake my daughter cupcakes for her school. I'm very hands-on.
quotes.author: Greg Bryk

quotes.quote: Cupcake, you've been breaking my heart for as long as I've known you.
quotes.author: Janet Evanovich

quotes.quote: I'll never turn down a red velvet cupcake.
quotes.author: Shay Mitchell

quotes.quote: The cupcakes make people happy.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Compassion will cure more sins than condemnation.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: Nature performs the cure, the physician takes the fee.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: The greatest cure for love is still that time honoured medicine - love returned.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: In order to cure a feeling of malaise, you have to throw light on it.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: The easiest time to cure an illness is before it is accepted as a part of the self-image.
quotes.author: Jane Roberts

quotes.quote: There are no such things as incurable, there are only things for which man has not found a cure.
quotes.author: Bernard Baruch

quotes.quote: The cure for pain is in the pain. Good and bad are mixed. If you don't have both, you don't belong with us.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: As a cure for worrying, work is better than whiskey.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: A sure cure for seasickness is to sit under a tree.
quotes.author: Spike Milligan

quotes.quote: Prevention is better than cure.
quotes.author: Desiderius Erasmus

quotes.quote: Work could cure almost anything.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: Perspective is the cure for depression.
quotes.author: Bono

quotes.quote: The cure for grief is motion.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: The sovereign cure for worry is prayer.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: The true cure for self-righteousness is self-knowledge.
quotes.author: J. C. Ryle

quotes.quote: The greatest remedy for anger is delay.
quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quotes.quote: The cure to information overload is more information.
quotes.author: David Weinberger

quotes.quote: Distance is the only cure for certain diseases.
quotes.author: Zora Neale Hurston

quotes.quote: The cure for sorrow is to learn something.
quotes.author: Barbara Sher

quotes.quote: The cure for cynicism is simply to engage honestly.
quotes.author: Jeremy Paxman

quotes.quote: Medicines cure diseases, but only doctors can cure patients.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: The best cure for the body is a quiet mind.
quotes.author: Napoleon

quotes.quote: The only cure for anxiety is to get down on our knees.
quotes.author: R. C. Sproul

quotes.quote: A positive attitude does not cure cancer, any more than a negative one causes it.
quotes.author: Siddhartha Mukherjee

quotes.quote: We all labor against our own cure, for death is the cure of all diseases.
quotes.author: Thomas Browne

quotes.quote: The cure for advanced gullibility is to go to sleep and consider matters again the next day.
quotes.author: Isaac Asimov

quotes.quote: The place to cure most of the ills of society is in the homes of the people.
quotes.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quotes.quote: The cure for tender sensibilities is to make more of our objects and less of our selves.
quotes.author: Christian Nestell Bovee

quotes.quote: There is only one cure for grey hair. It was invented by a Frenchman. It is called the guillotine.
quotes.author: Wodehouse

quotes.quote: The best cure for insomnia is to get a lot of sleep.
quotes.author: W. C. Fields

quotes.quote: Optimism is a cure for many things.
quotes.author: Michael J. Fox

quotes.quote: The best cure for sadness is doing something.
quotes.author: Nancy E. Turner

quotes.quote: The cure might be worse than the problem.
quotes.author: Audrey Niffenegger

quotes.quote: You cannot cure sclerosis, but you can forget it.
quotes.author: Faina Ranevskaya

quotes.quote: We're not going to find a magic cure for cancer. We've got to prevent it.
quotes.author: Joel Fuhrman

quotes.quote: Yoga teaches us to cure what need not be endured and endure what cannot be cured.
quotes.author: Geeta Iyengar

quotes.quote: The best cure for hypochondria is to forget about your body and get interested in someone else's.
quotes.author: Goodman Ace

quotes.quote: Millions saw the apple fall, but Newton asked why.
quotes.author: Bernard Baruch

quotes.quote: Curiosity is a willing, a proud, and eager confession of ignorance.
quotes.author: S.Leonard Rubinstein

quotes.quote: The whole art of teaching is the only art of awakening the natural curiosity of young minds for the purpose of satisfying it afterwards; and curiosity itself can be vivid and wholesome only in proportion as the mind is contented and happy
quotes.author: Anatole France

quotes.quote: Curiosity in children, is but an appetite for knowledge. The great reason why children abandon themselves wholly to silly pursuits and trifle away their time insipidly is, because they find their curiosity balked, and their inquiries neglected.
quotes.author: John Locke

quotes.quote: Curiosity is the very basis of education and if you tell me that curiosity killed the cat, I say only the cat died nobly.
quotes.author: Arnold Edinborough

quotes.quote: There are no foolish questions, and no man becomes a fool until he has stopped asking questions.
quotes.author: Charles Proteus Steinmetz

quotes.quote: The cure for boredom is curiosity. There is no cure for curiosity.
quotes.author: Dorothy Parker

quotes.quote: Curiosity is as much the parent of attention, as attention is of memory.
quotes.author: Richard Whately

quotes.quote: A sense of curiosity is nature's original school of education.
quotes.author: Smiley Blanton

quotes.quote: Be less curious about people and more curious about ideas.
quotes.author: Marie Curie

quotes.quote: God spare me sclerosis of the curiosity, for the curiosity which craves to keep us informed about the small things no less than the large is the mainspring, the dynamo, the jet propulsion of all complete living.
quotes.author: John Mason Brown

quotes.quote: The important thing is not to stop questioning. Curiosity has its own reason for existing. One cannot help but be in awe when he contemplates the mysteries of eternity, of life, of the marvellous structure of reality.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: Curiosity about life in all of its aspects, I think, is still the secret of great creative people.
quotes.author: Leo Burnett

quotes.quote: Creatures whose mainspring is curiosity enjoy the accumulating of facts far more than the pausing at times to reflect on those facts.
quotes.author: Clarence Day

quotes.quote: I have no particular talent. I am merely inquisitive.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The first and simplest emotion which we discover in the human mind, is curiosity.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: Curiosity is the lust of the mind.
quotes.author: Thomas Hobbes

quotes.quote: It is a shameful thing to be weary of inquiry when what we search for is excellent.
quotes.author: Cicero

quotes.quote: Curiosity is one of the forms of feminine bravery.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: You can teach a student a lesson for a day; but if you can teach him to learn by creating curiosity, he will continue the learning process as long as he lives
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A single conversation with a wise man is better than ten years of study.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: All the world is a laboratory to the inquiring mind.
quotes.author: Martin H. Fischer

quotes.quote: Always walk through life as if you have something new to learn and you will.
quotes.author: Vernon Howard

quotes.quote: Curiosity is only vanity. Most frequently we wish not to know, but to talk. We would not take a sea voyage for the sole pleasure of seeing without hope of ever telling.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: Get over the idea that only children should spend their time in study. Be a student so long as you still have something to learn, and this will mean all your life.
quotes.author: Henry L. Doherty

quotes.quote: As children we all possess a natural uninhabited curiosity, a hunger for explanations, which seems to die slowly as we age--suppressed, I suppose by the need not to appear ignorant.
quotes.author: Mahlon Hoagland

quotes.quote: Childhood and genius have the same master-organ in common--inquisitiveness.
quotes.author: Edwin Bulwar-Lytton

quotes.quote: Curiosity ... endows the people who have it with a generosity in argument and a serenity in cheerful willingness to let life take the form it will.
quotes.author: Alistar Cooke

quotes.quote: Curiosity is one of those insatiable passions that grow by gratification.
quotes.author: Sarah Scott

quotes.quote: Curiosity is the wick in the candle of learning.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.quote: When curiosity is alive, we are attracted to many things; we discover many worlds.
quotes.author: Eric Booth

quotes.quote: Curiosity might be pictured as being made up of chains of small questions extending outwards, sometimes over huge distances, from a central hub composed of a few blunt, large questions.
quotes.author: Alain De Botton

quotes.quote: Let your curiosity be greater than your fear.
quotes.author: Pema Chodron

quotes.quote: I have always had a curious nature; I enjoy learning, but I dislike being taught.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: The open mode is a mood in which curiosity for its own sake can operate, because we're not under pressure to get a specific thing done properly. We can play.
quotes.author: John Cleese

quotes.quote: Curiosity is lying in wait for every secret.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: A person who is too nice an observer of the business of the crowd, like one who is too curious in observing the labor of bees, will often be stung for his curiosity.
quotes.author: Alexander Pope

quotes.quote: The alchemists in their search for gold discovered many other things of greater value.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.quote: Where the apple reddens never pry -- lest we lose our Edens, Eve and I.
quotes.author: Robert Browning

quotes.quote: It is a miracle that curiosity survives formal education.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Judge a man by his questions rather than by his answers.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Curiosity is one of the most permanent and certain characteristics of a vigorous intellect.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Mere curiosity adds wings to every step.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Curiosity will conquer fear even more than bravery will.
quotes.author: James Stephens

quotes.quote: I think, at a child's birth, if a mother could ask a fairy godmother to endow it with the most useful gift, that gift would be curiosity.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: There are two possible outcomes: If the result confirms the hypothesis, then you've made a measurement. If the result is contrary to the hypothesis, then you've made a discovery.
quotes.author: Enrico Fermi

quotes.quote: They know enough who know how to learn.
quotes.author: Henry Adams

quotes.quote: Between every two pines is a doorway to a new world.
quotes.author: John Muir

quotes.quote: Questions show the mind's range, and answers its subtlety.
quotes.author: Joseph Joubert

quotes.quote: Be very wary of any attempt, by anybody or anything, to limit the ultimate human right and duty to question and verify the truth.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The mind is not a vessel to be filled, but a fire to be kindled.
quotes.author: Plutarch

quotes.quote: Study hard what interests you the most in the most undisciplined, irreverent and original manner possible.
quotes.author: Richard Feynmann

quotes.quote: The public have an insatiable curiosity to know everything, except what is worth knowing.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Curiosity is one of the many masks of love.
quotes.author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

quotes.quote: Curiosity is gluttony. To see is to devour.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: There are no great limits to growth because there are no limits of human intelligence, imagination, and wonder.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: Those with less curiosity or ambition just mumble that God works in mysterious ways. I intend to catch him in the act.
quotes.author: Damien Echols

quotes.quote: She had an immense curiosity about life, and was constantly staring and wondering.
quotes.author: Henry James

quotes.quote: It's daring to be curious about the unknown, to dream big dreams, to live outside prescribed boxes, to take risks, and above all, daring to investigate the way we live until we discover the deepest treasured purpose of why we are here.
quotes.author: Luci Swindoll

quotes.quote: Satisfaction of one's curiosity is one of the greatest sources of happiness in life.
quotes.author: Linus Pauling

quotes.quote: Let go of certainty. The opposite isn't uncertainty. It's openness, curiosity and a willingness to embrace paradox, rather than choose sides. The ultimate challenge is to accept ourselves exactly as we are, but never stop trying to learn and grow.
quotes.author: Tony Schwartz

quotes.quote: A large volume of adventures may be grasped within this little span of life, by he who interests his heart in everything.
quotes.author: Laurence Sterne

quotes.quote: Around here, however, we don't look backwards for very long. We keep moving forward, opening up new doors and doing new things, because we're curious... and curiosity keeps leading us down new paths.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: Curiosity is the engine of achievement.
quotes.author: Ken Robinson

quotes.quote: I think I benefited from being equal parts ambitious and curious. And of the two, curiosity has served me best.
quotes.author: Michael J. Fox

quotes.quote: Curiosity is a call from knowledge.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: If facts are the seeds that later produce knowledge and wisdom, then the emotions and the impressions of the senses are the fertile soil in which the seeds must grow.
quotes.author: Rachel Carson

quotes.quote: Curiosity is often mistaken as love, since they both have the common elements of interest and passion.
quotes.author: Drishti Bablani

quotes.quote: Standing still is the fastest way of moving backwards in a rapidly changing world. Imagination is the highest kite one can fly.
quotes.author: Lauren Bacall

quotes.quote: I know quite certainly that I myself have no special talent; curiosity, obsession and dogged endurance, combined with self-criticism, have brought me to my ideas.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Curiosity is a kernel of the forbidden fruit which still sticketh in the throat of a natural man, sometimes to the clanger of his choking.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: There are different kinds of curiosity; one of interest, which causes us to learn that which would be useful to us; and the other of pride, which springs from a desire to know that of which others are ignorant.
quotes.author: François de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: The gratification of curiosity rather frees us from uneasiness, than confers pleasure. We are more pained by ignorance, than delighted by instruction. Curiosity is the thirst of the soul.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: I loathe that low vice, curiosity.
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.quote: Curiosity is looking over other people's affairs, and overlooking our own.
quotes.author: H. L. Wayland

quotes.quote: People are more inclined to ask curious questions, than to obtain necessary instruction.
quotes.author: Pasquier Quesnel

quotes.quote: Nothing is so difficult but that it may be found out by seeking.
quotes.author: Terence

quotes.quote: The over curious are not over wise.
quotes.author: Philip Massinger

quotes.quote: The fabled musk deer searches the world over for the source of the scent which comes from itself.
quotes.author: Ramakrishna

quotes.quote: Life was meant to be lived, and curiosity must be kept alive. One must never, for whatever reason, turn his back on life.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: None of us can afford to stop learning or to check our curiosity about new things, or to lose our humility in the face of new situations.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Curiosity is, in great and generous minds, the first passion and the last.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Do not let the weight of fear weigh down curiosity.
quotes.author: Peter Guber

quotes.quote: The important thing is to not stop questioning. Curiosity has its own reason for existing.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Without curiosity, my dear, there would be no wise men.
quotes.author: Fernand Lacaud

quotes.quote: Curiosity will conquer fear even more than bravery will.
quotes.author: James Stephens

quotes.quote: Curiosity is natural to the soul of man and interesting objects have a powerful influence on our affections.
quotes.author: Daniel Boone

quotes.quote: Your soul is infinitely creative. It is alive and expansive in nature. It is curious and playful, changing with the tides of time.
quotes.author: Debbie Ford

quotes.quote: Curiosity is one of the most permanent and certain characteristics of a vigorous intellect.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: The greatest virtue of man is perhaps curiosity.
quotes.author: Anatole France

quotes.quote: Curiosity is one of the great secrets of happiness.
quotes.author: Bryant H. McGill

quotes.quote: Curiosity is the direct incontinency of the spirit.
quotes.author: Jeremy Taylor

quotes.quote: The human capacity to be curious has always existed.
quotes.author: Patricia Cornwell

quotes.quote: The human being is a most curious creature. He thinks he has got one soul, and he has got dozens.
quotes.author: D. H. Lawrence

quotes.quote: Curious things, habits. People themselves never knew they had them.
quotes.author: Agatha Christie

quotes.quote: Be curious enough to keep an open mind to what's happening around you in society. You can look at yourself and the world at the same time.
quotes.author: Jochen Zeitz

quotes.quote: A curious mind is the most important attribute any man or woman can possess.
quotes.author: M. J. Rose

quotes.quote: Curiosity is the lust of the mind.
quotes.author: Thomas Hobbes

quotes.quote: Take all the courses in your curriculum. Do the research. Ask questions. Find someone doing what you are interested in! Be curious!
quotes.author: Katherine Johnson

quotes.quote: Curiosity is idle only to those who fail to realize that it may be a very rare and indispensable thing.
quotes.author: James Harvey Robinson

quotes.quote: Curious patients are more receptive to new ideas, and those who engage their health practitioners in a dialogue are much more likely to adhere to these recommendations.
quotes.author: Dean Ornish

quotes.quote: Curiosity is as much the parent of attention, as attention is of memory.
quotes.author: Richard Whately

quotes.quote: The important thing is not to stop questioning. Curiosity has its own reason for existing.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Be kind. It's worthwhile to make an effort to learn about other people and figure out what you might have in common with them. If you allow yourself to be somewhat curious - and if you get into the habit of doing that - it's the first step to being open minded and realizing that your points of view aren't totally opposite.
quotes.author: Viggo Mortensen

quotes.quote: Writers are nosy people; we are endlessly curious: we ask questions when we shouldn't - we peek around corners when we are least expected.
quotes.author: Ann Turner

quotes.quote: The curious task of economics is to demonstrate to men how little they really know about what they imagine they can design.
quotes.author: Friedrich August von Hayek

quotes.quote: When you're changing centuries, people get curious about the future.
quotes.author: Robert J. Sawyer

quotes.quote: There is no limit to what astrophysicists can do. We can be very curious.
quotes.author: John C. Mather

quotes.quote: Curiosity is one of the forms of feminine bravery.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: We keep moving forward, opening new doors, and doing new things, because we're curious and curiosity keeps leading us down new paths.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: When you're curious, you find lots of interesting things to do.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: No one is dumb who is curious. The people who don't ask questions remain clueless throughout their lives.
quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quotes.quote: Curiosity - the rover and the concept - is what science is all about: the quest to reveal the unknown.
quotes.author: Ahmed Zewail

quotes.quote: Be less curious about people and more curious about ideas.
quotes.author: Marie Curie

quotes.quote: Look up at the stars and not down at your feet. Try to make sense of what you see, and wonder about what makes the universe exist. Be curious.
quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

quotes.quote: You can't just give someone a creativity injection. You have to create an environment for curiosity and a way to encourage people and get the best out of them.
quotes.author: Ken Robinson

quotes.quote: At the heart of great leadership is a curious mind, heart, and spirit.
quotes.author: Chip Conley

quotes.quote: It is curious that physical courage should be so common in the world and moral courage so rare.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Curiosity is the wick in the candle of learning.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.quote: Research is formalized curiosity. It is poking and prying with a purpose.
quotes.author: Zora Neale Hurston

quotes.quote: Be curious, not judgmental.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.quote: Kids are naturally curious about what they don't know, or don't understand, or what is foreign to them. They only learn to be frightened of those differences when an adult influences them to behave that way and censors that natural curiosity.
quotes.author: Aimee Mullins

quotes.quote: Curiosity is lying in wait for every secret.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Curiosity is free-wheeling intelligence.
quotes.author: Alistair Cooke

quotes.quote: It's sort of a mental attitude about critical thinking and curiosity. It's about mindset of looking at the world in a playful and curious and creative way.
quotes.author: Adam Savage

quotes.quote: Curiosity killed the cat, but where human beings are concerned, the only thing a healthy curiosity can kill is ignorance.
quotes.author: Harry Lorayne

quotes.quote: Happiness comes from... some curious adjustment to life.
quotes.author: Hugh Walpole

quotes.quote: It is one of man's curious idiosyncrasies to create difficulties for the pleasure of resolving them.
quotes.author: Joseph de Maistre

quotes.quote: Curiosity endows the people who have it with a generosity in argument and a serenity in their own mode of life which springs from their cheerful willingness to let life take the form it will.
quotes.author: Alistair Cooke

quotes.quote: Curiosity is the one thing invincible in Nature.
quotes.author: Freya Stark

quotes.quote: It's curious how we act in moments of personal despair.
quotes.author: Lawrence Welk

quotes.quote: If you're curious, you'll probably be a good journalist because we follow our curiosity like cats.
quotes.author: Diane Sawyer

quotes.quote: Curiosity, n. An objectionable quality of the female mind. The desire to know whether or not a woman is cursed with curiosity is one of the most active and insatiable passions of the masculine soul.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: Many times when you're a tourist you can just stay on the surface and not really experience the place you're visiting, which will probably leave you disappointed. Everywhere has something interesting; it's just about being curious enough to find it and scratch where you have to scratch and stay longer and walk further.
quotes.author: Diego Luna

quotes.quote: Curiosity begins as an act of tearing to pieces or analysis.
quotes.author: Samuel Alexander

quotes.quote: Of the small gifts of heaven, /It seems to me a more than equal share / At birth was given / To girls with curly hair.
quotes.author: Phyllis McGinley

quotes.quote: Anybody who has curly hair knows you don't want it to be brushed out because it becomes a never-ending tangle.
quotes.author: Judy Davis

quotes.quote: Curly girl: It's more than just hair, it's an attitude.
quotes.author: Lorraine Massey

quotes.quote: Naturally curly hair is a curse, and don't ever let anyone tell you different.
quotes.author: Mary Ann Shaffer

quotes.quote: Ladies with curly hair / Have time to spare.
quotes.author: Phyllis McGinley

quotes.quote: I haven't come to you only to take, I haven't come to you empty handed. I bring you poetry as great as yours but in another tongue, I bring you black eyes and golden skin and curly hair.
quotes.author: Ahdaf Soueif

quotes.quote: Have you ever buried your nose in a mountain of curls, and just wanted to go to sleep forever?
quotes.author: Bo Goldman

quotes.quote: She had her back to them and was talking to Luke and Jocelyn, laughing, flinging her curly hair back. "Don't even think about it."
quotes.author: Cassandra Clare

quotes.quote: I was a big Guns N' Roses fan when I was seven. My friend who lived across the street had long dark curly hair and I had long blonde hair, so I'd dress up as Axl and she'd be Slash, and we'd rock out in front of the mirror singing 'Patience.'
quotes.author: Kirsten Dunst

quotes.quote: People always expect more of you when you have naturally curly hair!
quotes.author: Kyra Sundance
