quotes.quote: Curls are like a box of chocolates you never know which type you're going to get.
quotes.author: Lorraine Massey

quotes.quote: I was shy, but it came out in a big personality. My turning point was when I let my hair go naturally and I got contact lenses.
quotes.author: Tracee Ellis Ross

quotes.quote: Money is in some respects life's fire: it is a very excellent servant, but a terrible master.
quotes.author: P. T. Barnum

quotes.quote: It is a kind of spiritual snobbery that makes people think they can be happy without money.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: Banks do not create money for the public good. They are businesses owned by private shareholders. Their purpose is to make a profit.
quotes.author: John Rogers

quotes.quote: Currency trading is unnecessary, unproductive and totally immoral. It should be stopped.
quotes.author: Mahathir Mohamad

quotes.quote: Monetary inflation not only raises prices and destroys the value of the currency unit; it also acts as a giant system of expropriation.
quotes.author: Murray Rothbard

quotes.quote: A currency designed for long-term storage and investment doesn't do so well at encouraging transactions and exchange in the moment.
quotes.author: Douglas Rushkoff

quotes.quote: The only true currency in this bankrupt world is what you share with someone else when you're uncool.
quotes.author: Philip Seymour Hoffman

quotes.quote: Printing currency for foreigners to buy is the best racket a government can get into.
quotes.author: Lee Child

quotes.quote: Money is a strange business. People who haven't got it aim it strongly. People who have are full of troubles.
quotes.author: Ayrton Senna

quotes.quote: Our currency is what we are able to make.
quotes.author: Robert Genn

quotes.quote: The best way to destroy the capitalist system is to debauch the currency.
quotes.author: Vladimir Lenin

quotes.quote: The only currency still used as a store of value after 5000 years is gold.
quotes.author: Martin Truex Jr.

quotes.quote: For anything worth having one must pay the price; and the price is always work, patience, love, self-sacrifice - no paper currency, no promises to pay, but the gold of real service.
quotes.author: John Burroughs

quotes.quote: Don't matter how much money you got, there's only two kinds of people: there's saved people and there's lost people.
quotes.author: Bob Dylan

quotes.quote: The benefits from a world currency would be enormous.
quotes.author: Robert Mundell

quotes.quote: All currency is neurotic currency.
quotes.author: Norman O. Brown

quotes.quote: The amount of currency in circulation is not changing. The money supply is not changing in any significant way.
quotes.author: Ben Bernanke

quotes.quote: The true currency of life is time, not money, and we've all got a limited stock of that.
quotes.author: Robert Harris

quotes.quote: It's not so unusual to run out of someone else's currency.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Sachs

quotes.quote: Power: a currency that never went out of style.
quotes.author: Dan Simmons

quotes.quote: A disordered currency is one of the greatest political evils.
quotes.author: Daniel Webster

quotes.quote: Money and corruption are ruining the land, crooked politicians betray the working man, pocketing the profits and treating us like sheep, and we're tired of hearing promises that we know they'll never keep.
quotes.author: Ray Davies

quotes.quote: A weak currency is the sign of a weak economy, and a weak economy leads to a weak nation.
quotes.author: Ross Perot

quotes.quote: Get money when you don't need it, so you can use it when you need to.
quotes.author: J.R. Rim

quotes.quote: Ideas are the currency of the new economy.
quotes.author: Richard Florida

quotes.quote: The currency of universal values make brands innately sharable.
quotes.author: Simon Mainwaring

quotes.quote: Money is better than poverty, if only for financial reasons.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: The currency in the developer community is enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Erik Naggum

quotes.quote: The dollar is the reserve currency of the world.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: Currency warfare is the most destructive form of economic warfare.
quotes.author: Harry Dexter White

quotes.quote: If any dish deserves to be called global, it is curry. From Newfoundland to the Antarctic, from Beijing to Warsaw, there is scarcely a place where curries are not enjoyed.
quotes.author: Colleen Taylor Sen

quotes.quote: Curries are the fulcrum of the Indian meal.
quotes.author: Camellia Panjabi

quotes.quote: So for curry aficionados there is a real pleasure in discovering that you can make dishes yourself that you would otherwise be able to taste only by going to a restaurant that has a cook from that region who takes no shortcuts.
quotes.author: Camellia Panjabi

quotes.quote: I'm going to scream this from the mountain top, there's no such thing as 'a curry.' There's six kazillion different kinds of curry. When someone asks how to make chicken curry, I have to ask 'Which one?'
quotes.author: Aarti Sequeira

quotes.quote: Britain is no longer totally a white place where people ride horses, wear long frocks, and drink tea. The national dish is no longer fish and chips, it's curry.
quotes.author: Marianne Jean-Baptiste

quotes.quote: Have you ever bitten a red hot ice cube? That's curry.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: Giant pots of curry, dark and brooding as a sudden summer storm, where apples and onions and huge hunks of meat are simmered into submission over hours.
quotes.author: Matt Goulding

quotes.quote: Americans tend to think that korma is the curry of choice for the Caucasian, and it is if you’re a white guy with no balls
quotes.author: Karl Wiggins

quotes.quote: In her bottled up is a woman peppery as curry, a yam of a woman of butter and brass.
quotes.author: Marge Piercy

quotes.quote: The first meal my husband ever made me was a chicken curry. I have never tasted anything so delicious in my life.
quotes.author: Lesley Nicol

quotes.quote: Playwrights are like men who have been dining for a month in an Indian restaurant. After eating curry night after night, they deny the existence of asparagus.
quotes.author: Peter Ustinov

quotes.quote: Where life is colorful and varied, religion can be austere or unimportant. Where life is appallingly monotonous, religion must be emotional, dramatic and intense. Without the curry, boiled rice can be very dull.
quotes.author: C. Northcote Parkinson

quotes.quote: If you want to curry favor with a politician, give him credit for something someone else did.
quotes.author: James Abourezk

quotes.quote: Women are cursed, and men are the proof.
quotes.author: Roseanne Barr

quotes.quote: The curse of imagination is picturing the world as it should be.
quotes.author: Morley

quotes.quote: It is the curse of prosperity that it takes work away from us, and shuts that door to hope and health of spirit.
quotes.author: William Dean Howells

quotes.quote: It is the curse of the powerful to be blind to their own faults.
quotes.author: Robert Fanney

quotes.quote: It is the curse of humanity that it learns to tolerate even the most horrible situations by habituation.
quotes.author: Rudolph Virchow

quotes.quote: The curse of poverty has no justification in our age.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: Some of us cling to our curses if we haven't anything better to cling to!
quotes.author: Phyllis Bottome

quotes.quote: Curses are like processions. They return to the place from which they came.
quotes.author: Giovanni Ruffini

quotes.quote: Cursed is everyone who places his hope in changing the nature of man.
quotes.author: Saint Augustine

quotes.quote: Poverty makes you wise but it's a curse.
quotes.author: Bertolt Brecht

quotes.quote: Never curse a fall. The ground is where humility lives.
quotes.author: Yasmin Mogahed

quotes.quote: It is a curse, being blessed with so much to offer.
quotes.author: Gannicus

quotes.quote: This is the curse of our age, even the strangest aberrations are no cure for boredom.
quotes.author: Stendhal

quotes.quote: Unrequited love is the infinite curse of a lonely heart.
quotes.author: Christina Westover

quotes.quote: In our time, the curse is monetary illiteracy, just as inability to read plain print was the curse of earlier centuries.
quotes.author: Ezra Pound

quotes.quote: A great curse has fallen upon modern life with the discovery of the vastness of the word Education.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: The great curse of modern political life is incrementalism.
quotes.author: Paul Keating

quotes.quote: Curses are like young chickens, they always come home to roost.
quotes.author: Robert Southey

quotes.quote: Emotions are the curse of logic.
quotes.author: Frank Herbert

quotes.quote: The curse of modern times is, that almost everything does create controversy.
quotes.author: Horace Walpole

quotes.quote: Every blessing ignored becomes a curse.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: The curse is an incredible set of blue balls.
quotes.author: Gore Verbinski

quotes.quote: The curse of ignorance is that man without being good or evil is nevertheless satisfied with himself.
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.quote: Beauty was a curse to be borne, not a blessing.
quotes.author: Rebecca Johns

quotes.quote: Light a candle instead of cursing the darkness.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Selfishness is the greatest curse of the human race.
quotes.author: William E. Gladstone

quotes.quote: We shall dig our own grave if we do not purge ourselves of this curse of untouchability.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Cursed is the man who ceaselessly loves without fear - He will inevitably fall in love with the devil.
quotes.author: Victor L. Guerrero

quotes.quote: All things will be ambiguous, for this is the curse of wisdom.
quotes.author: Greg Bear

quotes.quote: The curse of the sun and the moon is fake. It doesn`t exist.
quotes.author: Elijah

quotes.quote: Alimony is the curse of the writing class.
quotes.author: Norman Mailer

quotes.quote: Love is, after all, a curse of suffering.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: A curse lies upon those that, when the truth suffers, have not a word to defend it.
quotes.author: Richard Sibbes

quotes.quote: The curse of an interesting life: there are either very good times or very bad times.
quotes.author: Alethea Kontis

quotes.quote: Commitment is a curse if it interferes with righteousness.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: The greatest curse that can befall a free people, is civil war.
quotes.author: Alexander H. Stephens

quotes.quote: The curse of the romantic is a greed for dreams, an intensity of expectation that, in the end, diminishes the reality.
quotes.author: Marya Mannes

quotes.quote: The curse of fatherhood is distance, and the good fathers spend their lives trying to overcome it.
quotes.author: Steve Farrar

quotes.quote: The curse of covetousness is that it destroys manhood by substituting money for character.
quotes.author: Lucy Larcom

quotes.quote: It is easier to light a match than it is to curse the darkness.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: It is not materialism that is the chief curse of the world, as pastors tech, but idealism.
quotes.author: Steven Mason

quotes.quote: Mankind's greatest gift, also its greatest curse, is that we have free choice. We can make our choices built from love or fear.
quotes.author: Elisabeth Kubler Ross

quotes.quote: Make your goals big and broad enough so that they never become answered prayers and boomerang to curse you.
quotes.author: Doug Copeland

quotes.quote: We are stripped bare by the curse of plenty.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: A man's moral conscience is the curse he had to accept from the gods in order to gain them the right to dream.
quotes.author: William Faulkner

quotes.quote: Personality has power to uplift, power to depress, power to curse, and power to bless.
quotes.author: Paul Harris

quotes.quote: An open foe may prove a curse, but a pretended friend is worse.
quotes.author: John Gay

quotes.quote: I still lover her, though I curse her in my sleep, so nearly one are love and hate, the two most powerful and devastating emotions that control man, nations, life.
quotes.author: Edgar Rice Burroghs

quotes.quote: Man's liberty ends, and it ought to end, when that liberty becomes the curse of its neighbors.
quotes.author: Frederic William Farrar

quotes.quote: Religion without morality is a superstition and a curse, and morality without religion is impossible.
quotes.author: Mark Hopkins

quotes.quote: Nature knows no pause in progress and development, and attaches her curse on all inaction.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Your mind, while blessed with permanent memory is cursed with lousy recall.
quotes.author: Steven Mason

quotes.quote: Many a man curses the rain that falls upon his head and knows not that it brings abundance to drive away the hunger.
quotes.author: Saint Basil

quotes.quote: Work is the curse of the drinking classes.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Can have but they fear it is the greatest curse, as if they knew well.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Books are the curse of the human race.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: The jealous bring down the curse they fear upon their own heads.
quotes.author: Dorothy Dix

quotes.quote: Creativity is essentially a lonely art. An even lonelier struggle. To some a blessing, To others a curse. It is in reality the ability to reach inside yourself and drag forth from your very soul an idea.
quotes.author: Lou Dorfsman

quotes.quote: Think nothing profitable to you which compels you to break a promise, to lose your self respect, to hate any person, to suspect, to curse, to act the hypocrite, to desire anything that requires walls and curtains about it.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Before the curse of statistics fell upon mankind. We lived a happy, innocent life, full of merriment and go and informed by fairly good judgment.
quotes.author: Hilaire Belloc

quotes.quote: Money may be a curse, but you can always find someone to take the curse off you.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: If music is the language of the soul, jazz must be the curse words.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Man is a conceited creature: when we're right we credit our judgement; when we're wrong we curse our luck.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Let us be grateful to Adam: he cut us out of the blessing of idleness and won for us the curse of labor.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Success is not built on success. It's built on failure. It's built on frustration. Sometimes its built on catastrophe.
quotes.author: Sumner Redstone

quotes.quote: When life throws you a curveball, hit it out of the park.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Baseball calls it a curve ball for a reason: you just don't know where some pitches will land. Your ace could get injured. Your golden glover could err. Your team could sit through a rain delay. Your manager could get ejected. Your bench must be broad and deep enough to overcome.
quotes.author: Christine Pelosi

quotes.quote: There will always be some curve balls in your life. Teach your children to thrive in that adversity.
quotes.author: Jeanne Moutoussamy-Ashe

quotes.quote: You can't control the curve balls life throws you, so you have to learn how to control yourself and change quickly to make sure the curve ball doesn't knock you out.
quotes.author: Mark Edwards

quotes.quote: A knuckleball is a curve ball that doesn't give a damn.
quotes.author: Jimmy Cannon

quotes.quote: Life keeps throwing me curve balls and I don't even own a bat. At least my dodging skills are improving.
quotes.author: Jayleigh Cape

quotes.quote: Carrots might be good for my eyes, but they won't straighten out the curveball.
quotes.author: Carl Furillo

quotes.quote: Life will always throw you curves, just keep fouling them off. The right pitch will come, but when it does, be prepared to run the bases.
quotes.author: Rick Maksian

quotes.quote: We may encounter many defeats but we must not be defeated.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Those curveballs are always coming-eventually, you learn to hit some of them.
quotes.author: Queen Latifah

quotes.quote: You never hit a good slider or curveball; you just try to go after the mistakes.
quotes.author: Aaron Judge

quotes.quote: Pain was life's curveball. Without it, we would never appreciate what it felt like to be loved.
quotes.author: S.L. Jennings

quotes.quote: Tough times never last, but tough people do.
quotes.author: Robert H. Schuller

quotes.quote: An artistic perspective will jab at you from a different angle; its logic comes like a pitcher with a curveball.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: Life throws some curveballs at you and you go where it takes you.
quotes.author: Sophia Bush

quotes.quote: If life gives you a curveball, then be the catcher and catch it.
quotes.author: Fiona Boyd

quotes.quote: Once you think you have everything figured out, and clear sailing is all you can see in your future, life throws you a curveball, and no matter how fast or slow it comes at you, you have to decide in a split second if you'll catch it or allow it destroy you.
quotes.author: H.J. Bellus

quotes.quote: Life has a funny way of creating it's own tests. It throws curve balls that make you do and think and feel things that are in direct conflict with what you had planned and don't allow you to operate in terms of black and white.
quotes.author: K.A. tucker

quotes.quote: Sometimes our biggest nightmare turns out to be our biggest gift. And it all comes down to our attitude. Life will throw us curve balls and disappointments, even heartbreak. But ultimately we can choose if we're going to be bitter or better for the experience.
quotes.author: Kathryn Orford

quotes.quote: Sometimes if you want to achieve something great, there will be curveballs. You just have to dodge them every once in a while.
quotes.author: Katy Perry

quotes.quote: I feel confident imposing change on myself. It's a lot more fun progressing than looking back. That's why I need to throw curveballs.
quotes.author: David Bowie

quotes.quote: A vase is begun; why, as the wheel goes round, does it turn out a pitcher?
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: Tom Lasorda's curveball had as much hang time as a Ray Gun punt.
quotes.author: Rocky Bridges

quotes.quote: Well, this year I'm told the team did well because one pitcher had a fine curveball. I understand that a curveball is thrown with a deliberate attempt to deceive. Surely that is not an ability we should want to foster at Harvard.
quotes.author: Charles William

quotes.quote: Jay Hook can write a book on why a curveball curves, but he can't show you.
quotes.author: Casey Stengel

quotes.quote: Chris Cannizaro calls for the curveball too much. He can't hit it, so he figures nobody else can.
quotes.author: Casey Stengel

quotes.quote: You're supposed to step into a curveball, not away from it.
quotes.author: Thomas Burt

quotes.quote: Good hitters say they can recognize the curveball when it gets a particular distance from home plate.
quotes.author: Frank Vizard

quotes.quote: The key to the curveball is to keep your hand behind the ball as long as possible, impart the spin with the wrist and not with the elbow, and make sure the thumb is relaxed.
quotes.author: Frank Vizard

quotes.quote: For years, many scientists believed that the curveball was an optical illusion,
quotes.author: Frank Vizard

quotes.quote: The origin of the curveball is shrouded in myth. No one knows for certain who first got a baseball to break.
quotes.author: Scott R. Singer

quotes.quote: He brings on a curveball the likes of which Bryce has never encountered, one that arcs so dramatically through the air that Bryce has no chance of hitting it.
quotes.author: Colby Sharma

quotes.quote: Baseball has to be a great game to survive the fools who run it.
quotes.author: Bill Terry

quotes.quote: Take nothing for granted in baseball.
quotes.author: Harry Pulliam

quotes.quote: Baseball is dull only to those with dull minds.
quotes.author: Red Smith

quotes.quote: I don't put any foreign substance on the baseball. Everything I use on it is from the good ol' USA.
quotes.author: George Frazier

quotes.quote: There are three types of baseball players; those who make it happen, those who watch it happen, and those who wonder what happens.
quotes.author: Tommy Lasorda

quotes.quote: Percentage baseball must be good. If it weren't, it wouldn't work so often.
quotes.author: Pinky Higgins

quotes.quote: What you've got to have in baseball is pitching, speed, and money.
quotes.author: Ted Turner

quotes.quote: To me, baseball is as honorable as any other business. It has to be, or it would not last out a season...Crookedness and baseball do not mix...
quotes.author: Charles A. Comiskey

quotes.quote: I don't think baseball could survive without all the statistical appurtenances involved in calculating pitching, hitting, and fielding percentages. Some people could do without the games as long as they got the box scores.
quotes.author: John M. Culkin

quotes.quote: Baseball is made up of very few big and dramatic moments, but rather it's a beautifully put-together pattern of countless little subtleties that finally add up to the big moment, and you have to be well-versed in the game to truly appreciate them.
quotes.author: Paul Richards

quotes.quote: Baseball gives every American boy a chance to excel, not just to be as good as someone else but to be better than someone else. That is the nature of man and the name of the game.
quotes.author: Ted Williams

quotes.quote: Baseball is the most unchanging thing in our society— an island of stability in an unstable world, an island of sanity in an insane world.
quotes.author: Bill Veeck

quotes.quote: More than any other American sport, baseball creates the magnetic, addictive illusion that it can almost be understood.
quotes.author: Thomas Boswell

quotes.quote: There are three things in my life which I really love. God, my family, and baseball. The only problem— once baseball season starts, I change the order around a bit.
quotes.author: Al Gallagher

quotes.quote: Baseball has been the most exciting and frustrating experience of my life. In movies, I never lost a fight. In baseball, I hardly ever won one.
quotes.author: Gene Autry

quotes.quote: Say this much for big league baseball, it is beyond any question the greatest conversation piece ever invented in America.
quotes.author: Bruce Catton

quotes.quote: Other sports are just sports; baseball is a love.
quotes.author: Bryant Gumbel

quotes.quote: You can't freeze the ball in this game. You have to play till the last man is out.
quotes.author: Joe McCarthy

quotes.quote: Magic lives in curves, not angles.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: She had more curves than a scenic railway.
quotes.author: P.G.Wodehouse

quotes.quote: The curves of your lips rewrite history.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: In life, as in art, the beautiful moves in curves.
quotes.author: Edward Bulwer-Lytton

quotes.quote: The curves of his smile become the waves in my ocean.
quotes.author: Stephanie Dray

quotes.quote: I feel very strongly that 'curves' are natural, womanly and real.
quotes.author: Kate Winslet

quotes.quote: Cultivate your curves - they may be dangerous but they won't be avoided.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: A woman is supposed to have curves like an old Bentley, not like some old bike.
quotes.author: Sebastian Horsley

quotes.quote: Owning your curves means being confident - actually being confident - in your own skin.
quotes.author: Meghan Trainor

quotes.quote: Everyone's curves fall in a different place. But you can't put something of mine on and not see curves.
quotes.author: L'Wren Scott

quotes.quote: What attracts me are free and sensual curves. The curves we find in mountains, in the waves of the sea, in the body of the woman we love.
quotes.author: Oscar Niemeyer

quotes.quote: When producers want to know what the public wants, they graph it as curves. When they want to tell the public what to get, they say it in curves.
quotes.author: Marshall McLuhan

quotes.quote: The curve of imagination, the curve of brilliance and the curve of sanity are identical curves or at least similar curves... The more imagination a person has, why, the more intelligence, the more knowingness he has and the saner he's going to be.
quotes.author: L. Ron Hubbard

quotes.quote: A figure with curves always offers a lot of interesting angles.
quotes.author: Wesley Ruggles

quotes.quote: It took me a while to accept that I'm not going to have the curves other girls get.
quotes.author: Shenae Grimes

quotes.quote: I love the idea of embracing your curves and loving yourself while expressing it through fashion.
quotes.author: Hayley Hasselhoff

quotes.quote: When he took time to help the man up the mountain, lo, he scaled it himself.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Saying thank you is more than good manners. It is good spirituality.
quotes.author: Alfred Painter

quotes.quote: Good customer service costs less than bad customer service.
quotes.author: Sally Gronow

quotes.quote: We see our customers as invited guests to a party, and we are the hosts. It's our job every day to make every important aspect of the customer experience a little bit better.
quotes.author: Jeff Bezos

quotes.quote: The appreciation of pleasure can be the anchor of humanity.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quotes.quote: Give thanks for a little and you will find a lot.
quotes.author: Hansa Proverb

quotes.quote: There is a spiritual aspect to our lives â€“Â when we give, we receive â€“Â when a business does something good for somebody, that somebody feels good about them!Â
quotes.author: Ben Cohen

quotes.quote: Unless you have 100% customer satisfaction, you must improve.
quotes.author: Horst Schulz

quotes.quote: If you want customers to buy from you, you need to listen to them so that you can know what their needs are and thus be better placed to show the customer how your product comes into place.

quotes.quote: The first step in exceeding your customer's expectations is to know those expectations.

quotes.quote: Choose to deliver amazing service to your customers. You'll stand out because they don't get it anywhere else.
quotes.author: Kevin Stirtz

quotes.quote: Make it a habit to tell people thank you. To express your appreciation, sincerely and without the expectation of anything in return. Truly appreciate those around you, and you'll soon find many others around you. Truly appreciate life, and you'll find that you have more of it.
quotes.author: Ralph Marston

quotes.quote: If you work just for money, you'll never make it, but if you love what you're doing and you always put the customer first, success will be yours.
quotes.author: Ray Kroc

quotes.quote: Every contact we have with a customer influences whether or not they'll come back. We have to be great every time or we'll lose them.

quotes.quote: Thank your customer for complaining and mean it. Most will never bother to complain. They'll just walk away.

quotes.quote: Appreciation is an art and a lifestyle and a source of happiness and fulfillment. It's called gratitude-an attitude of gratitude.

quotes.quote: Here is a powerful yet simple rule. Always give people more than they expect to get.
quotes.author: Nelson Boswell

quotes.quote: When one's expectations are reduced to zero, one really appreciates everything one does have.

quotes.quote: Make the customer the hero of your story.
quotes.author: Ann Handley

quotes.quote: Always cherish the simple things in life and people that treat you right! That is most important. Everything and Everyone else is simply insignificant.
quotes.author: Nishan Panwar

quotes.quote: Respect is appreciation of the separateness of the other person, of the ways in which he or she is unique.

quotes.quote: Good things are always appreciated, bad things deserve ignorance.
quotes.author: Ritesh Shrivastav

quotes.quote: The key is to set realistic customer expectations, and then not to just meet them, but to exceed them preferably in unexpected and helpful ways.

quotes.quote: Every company's greatest assets are its customers, because without customers there is no company.

quotes.quote: In the stage of life, characters come and go after their performance. If someone is gone, just smile and clap in appreciation for them, for what good they did and what lessons they taught.

quotes.quote: Appreciation is a wonderful thing: It makes what is excellent in others belong to us as well.

quotes.quote: To give real service you must add something which cannot be bought or measured with money, and that is sincerity and integrity.
quotes.author: Douglas Adams

quotes.quote: One of the greatest gifts you can give to anyone is the gift of attention.Â
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: As we express our gratitude, we must never forget that the highest appreciation is not to utter words, but to live by them.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: If you give appreciation to people, you win their goodwill.

quotes.quote: Great discoveries and improvements invariably involve the cooperation of many minds.
quotes.author: Alexander Graham Bell

quotes.quote: Gratitude is the appreciation of what is, of life, of existence, of anybody and anything, for just the way it is.

quotes.quote: Appreciation is wonderful feeling, don't overlook it. Appreciation is acknowledgement of ones merit and his achievement.

quotes.quote: Revolve your world around the customer and more customers will revolve around you.
quotes.author: Heather Williams

quotes.quote: Go beyond merely communicating to â€˜connecting' with people.
quotes.author: Jerry Bruckner

quotes.quote: There is a big difference between a satisfied customer and aÂ loyal customer.

quotes.quote: Customer satisfaction is worthless. Customer loyalty is priceless.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Gitomer

quotes.quote: Listening offers data. Hearing offers empathy and intelligence. Activity, action, and engagement steer perspective and encourage a sense of community and advocacy.
quotes.author: Brian Solis

quotes.quote: Spend a lot of time talking to customers face to face. You'd be amazed how many companies don't listen to their customers.
quotes.author: Ross Perot

quotes.quote: Any favor rendered without appreciation is like being dispossessed of your most priced asset.
quotes.author: Kemmy Nola

quotes.quote: The key is to set realistic customer expectations, and then not to just meet them, but to exceed them â€” preferably in unexpected and helpful ways.
quotes.author: Richard Branson

quotes.quote: Appreciate the things and people in your life while remaining independent of them. Give thanks for them, but realize that they do not complete you. Only you can complete you.

quotes.quote: Courteous treatment will make a customer a walking advertisement.
quotes.author: James Cash Penney

quotes.quote: Without appreciation for yourself, others and life itself there is no growth.
quotes.author: Rasheed Ogunlaru

quotes.quote: Let us be grateful to people who make us happy; they are the charming gardeners who make our souls blossom.

quotes.quote: A word of appreciation often can accomplish what nothing else could accomplish.

quotes.quote: Appreciation in any form at any time brightens anyone's existence.

quotes.quote: Thou shalt properly complain to the person giving service—the customer is always right.

quotes.author: B.H. Elvy

quotes.quote: Poor customer service is always due to the poor quality of the human providers of thet service.
quotes.author: B.H. Elvy

quotes.quote: Customer appreciation has its purpose the satisfying of all the buyer's need, practical, and emotional. There can be no more important task for the company.
quotes.author: B.H. Elvy

quotes.quote: Expressions of customer appreciation can be as individual and diverse as the people who make them.

quotes.quote: It can take the form of something simple, like a well-written letter of heartfelt thanks, or apply to an extravaganza of gifts, special events, and exclusive offers.

quotes.quote: The point of customer appreciation and special events is to show your gratitude to your customers and to bring your prospects closer to you and your company.

quotes.quote: When your consideration goes beyond the moment, it is appreciated, sometimes with surprise, but always with appreciation.
quotes.author: Maxine Kamin

quotes.quote: To earn the respect (and eventually love) of your customers, you first have to respect those customers. That is why Golden Rule behavior is embraced by most of the winning companies.

quotes.quote: To keep a customer demands as much skill as to win one.

quotes.quote: Courteous treatment will make a customer a walking advertisement.

quotes.quote: Biggest question: Isn't it really 'customer helping' rather than customer service? And wouldn't you deliver better service if you thought of it that way?

quotes.quote: If you make a sale, you can make a living. If you make an investment of time and good service in a customer, you can make a fortune.

quotes.quote: If you don't care, your customer never will.

quotes.quote: All of your customers are partners in your mission.

quotes.quote: Customers are like teeth. If you don't take care of them they go away one by one until there are none.

quotes.quote: The key is when a customer walks away, thinking ‘Wow, I love doing business with them, and I want to tell others about the experience.’

quotes.quote: Customer service is all about feelings. I am of the opinion that customer service is actually feelings management.

quotes.quote: A customer service apology is stronger with a personal touch.

quotes.quote: Quality in a service or product is not what you put into it. It is what the client or customer gets out of it.

quotes.quote: When people call our call center, our reps don't have scripts, and they don't try to up-sell. They are just judged on whether they go above and beyond for the customer and really deliver a kind of personal service and emotional connection with our customers.
quotes.author: Tony Hsieh

quotes.quote: Customers may forget what you said but they'll never forget how you made them feel.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: The key is to set realistic customer expectations, and then not to just meet them, but to exceed them â€” preferably in unexpected and helpful ways.
quotes.author: Richard Branson

quotes.quote: The customer experience is the next competitive battleground.
quotes.author: Jerry Gregoire

quotes.quote: Courteous treatment will make a customer a walking advertisement.
quotes.author: James Cash Penney

quotes.quote: Customer satisfaction is worthless. Customer loyalty is priceless.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Gitomer

quotes.quote: Quality is remembered long after the price is forgotten.
quotes.author: Gucci Family Slogan

quotes.quote: The single most important thing is to make people happy. If you are making people happy, as a side effect, they will be happy to open up their wallets and pay you.

quotes.quote: Always keep in mind the old retail adage: Customers remember the service a lot longer than they remember the price.

quotes.quote: If you take the approach of earning your customers' business every day and treating them well, they're less likely to try someone else.

quotes.quote: Customer service is an opportunity to exceed your customer's expectations.
quotes.author: John Jantsch

quotes.quote: A lot of people have fancy things to say about customer service, but it's just a day-in, day-out, ongoing, never-ending, persevering, compassionate kind of activity.
quotes.author: Christopher McCormick

quotes.quote: After each customer interaction, notice if you gave them a happy to see you kind of experience.
quotes.author: Marilyn Suttle

quotes.quote: The goal as a company is to have customer service that is not just the best but legendary.
quotes.author: Sam Walton

quotes.quote: To keep a customer demands as much skill as to win one.
quotes.author: American Proverb

quotes.quote: Your customers are responsible for your company's reason for existing.
quotes.author: Marilyn Suttle

quotes.quote: Make your customers comfortable and they will give you their lives.
quotes.author: Paul Orfalea

quotes.quote: Teach your employees how to build relationships with your customers.
quotes.author: Daniel C. Felsted

quotes.quote: Customer service is the new marketing.

quotes.quote: To give real service you must add something which cannot be bought or measured with money, and that is sincerity and integrity.
quotes.author: Don Alden Adams

quotes.quote: We see our customers as invited guests to a party, and we are the hosts. It's our job to make the customer experience a little bit better.
quotes.author: Jeff Bezos

quotes.quote: Every contact we have with a customer influences whether or not they'll come back. We have to be great every time or we'll lose them.

quotes.quote: Customer service is just a day in, day out ongoing, never ending, unremitting, persevering, compassionate, type of activity.

quotes.quote: Customer service isn't a department, it's a philosophy!

quotes.quote: Spend a lot of time talking to customers face to face. You'd be amazed how many companies don't listen to their customers.

quotes.quote: You'll never have a product or price advantage again. They can be easily duplicated, but a strong customer service culture can't be copied.

quotes.quote: Customer Service is everything and anything that touches a customer â€“ directly or indirectly. Customer service means servicing customers and it's so much more than just solving problems or addressing complaints. Customer service is part of a holistic customer experience that is capable of providing a critical competitive advantage in today's increasingly cluttered and commoditized marketplace.
quotes.author: Joseph Jaffe

quotes.quote: Loyal customers, they don't just come back, they don't simply recommend you, they insist that their friends do business with you.

quotes.quote: If you do build a great experience, customers tell each other about that. Word of mouth is very powerful.

quotes.quote: Your customer doesn't care how much you know until they know how much you care.

quotes.quote: News of bad customer service reaches more than twice as many ears as praise for a good service experience.

quotes.quote: Customer service is a voluntary act that demonstrates a genuine desire to satisfy, if not delight, a customer.

quotes.quote: Good service is good business.

quotes.quote: In the world of Internet customer service, it's important to remember your competitor is only one mouse click away.

quotes.quote: The only purpose of customer service, is to change feelings.

quotes.quote: Instead of selling to your customers, help them buy.

quotes.quote: Good customer service costs less than bad customer service.

quotes.quote: When a customer is upset, remember that you're dealing with a person, not a problem.

quotes.quote: You can't treat your people poorly and expect them to treat your customers well.

quotes.quote: Customer service is a lifestyle, not a performance you turn on when you arrive at work and off when you arrive at home.

quotes.quote: You are the company to the customer, so pay attention to what you do when in the presence of your customers.

quotes.quote: If people treated customers like their family, we would have a much worse customer service epidemic in this country. However, if people treated customers like a prospective date, we would have no issues at all.

quotes.quote: If you need more confidence when talking with an irate customer on the phone, stand up and at the very least, no matter what, you will be taller than your caller.

quotes.quote: People will buy anything that is 'one to a customer.'

quotes.quote: It's not what you pay a man, but what he costs you that counts.

quotes.quote: There is only one boss. The customer, and he can fire everybody in the company from the chairman on down, simply by spending his money somewhere else.

quotes.quote: What new technology does is create new opportunities to do a job that customers want done.
quotes.author: Tim O'Reilly

quotes.quote: In whose banks we deposit out notes Is a miser who always wants guineas for groats; He keeps all his customers still in arrears by lending them minutes and charging them years.

quotes.quote: Customer service reps are not machines; they are people who enjoy building relationships.
quotes.author: John R. DiJulius

quotes.quote: The purpose of business is to create and keep a customer.

quotes.quote: It is not the employer who pays the wages. Employers only handle the money. It is the customer who pays the wages.

quotes.quote: The thing that will make the biggest difference would be your attitude toward your customers.
quotes.author: M.Russel Ballard

quotes.quote: Any customer can have a car painted any colour that he wants so long as its is black.

quotes.quote: The purpose of a business is to get and keep a customer.

quotes.quote: A bargain is anything a customer thinks a store is losing money on.

quotes.quote: It is a highly competitive world, and every organization is under increasing pressure to offer its customers a better deal. Trouble lies in store for those that fail to do so.

quotes.quote: A customer is not just someone who buys something from you; both commercial and non-commercial organizations have customers.

quotes.quote: Every organization should ensure that it is in the business of meeting customer needs.

quotes.quote: Everyone working inside an organization also has internal customers whose needs also have to be met.
quotes.author: Institute of Leadership & Management

quotes.quote: A visit to hospital used to be a rather intimidating experience, but now that hospitals have become more customer-friendly, a great deal has changed.

quotes.quote: Measuring internal customer satisfaction is as equally important as measuring external.

quotes.quote: Expectations influence how customers view an organization or business and even how they view individual service representatives.
quotes.author: Maxine Kamin

quotes.quote: Some customers believe they cannot get the service they want from regular channels in an organization, but they find they can get good service from certain representatives.

quotes.quote: Events that occur before a customer gets to the environment also may determine satisfaction levels.
quotes.author: Maxine Kamin

quotes.quote: A customer in a very good state of mind may be more accepting to disappointments.
quotes.author: Maxine Kamin

quotes.quote: Customer who have unrealistic expectations or demands need a lot of assurance and empathy.
quotes.author: Maxine Kamin

quotes.quote: In many surveys of both consumer and business purchasing, service often ranks higher than price in people's priorities.

quotes.quote: Service can give a company 'competitive edge' and can offset other factors.

quotes.quote: From the point of view of customer service management, problems really are opportunities to keep hold of business for years to come.

quotes.quote: Customer service can be defined as the way in which an organization handles the interactions between itself and its customers.
quotes.author: Jenny Hayes

quotes.quote: Customer service is a major professional challenge because customer needs are frequently multi-variable, often inconsistent with each other and they do change over time.
quotes.author: Jenny Hayes

quotes.quote: There is no way that the quality of customer service can exceed the quality of the people who provide it.

quotes.quote: Improving the quality of your customers' experience requires your organization to create genuine relationships with both its internal and external customers.

quotes.quote: The customer experience comes in part from service, but in the larger sense it is everything created by any and all contact with your operation.
quotes.author: Shep Hyken

quotes.quote: There is no loyalty without confidence, and there is no confidence without consistency.
quotes.author: Shep Hyken

quotes.quote: Amazement is the result of a consistent sequence of Moments of Magic.. for both customer and the people who interact with our customers.
quotes.author: Shep Hyken

quotes.quote: Other than a dimple in a cute little chin, What's more adorable than a toothless grin?
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: When a wolf doesn't want to do something, they look really cute.
quotes.author: Michelle Paver

quotes.quote: If you ever feel so happy you land in jail, I'm your bail.
quotes.author: Cole Porter

quotes.quote: Dignity is an affectation, cute but eccentric, like learning French or collecting scarves.
quotes.author: Dave Eggers

quotes.quote: A life without cause is a life without effect.
quotes.author: Barbarella

quotes.quote: When grace is joined with wrinkles, it is adorable. There is an unspeakable dawn in happy old age.

quotes.quote: There are all sorts of cute puppy dogs, but it doesn't stop people from going out and buying Dobermans.

quotes.quote: If God had wanted us to be concerned for the plight of the toads, he would have made them cute and furry.

quotes.quote: Let your love be like the misty rains, coming softly, but flooding the river.
quotes.author: Malagasy Proverb

quotes.quote: Cute is one of those words people use when they know you're smart enough to realize "you've got so much personality" means "you're ugly.

quotes.quote: If a kid asks where rain comes from, I think a cute thing to tell him is God is crying. And if he asks why God is crying, another cute thing to tell him is Probably because of something you did.

quotes.quote: What the world really needs is more love and less paperwork.
quotes.author: Pearl Bailey

quotes.quote: Being small, cute is going to do nothing.
quotes.author: Sergio Marchionne

quotes.quote: Rule number one: Why is it that the one time a cute guy talks to you, you have a friend who's in crisis?
quotes.author: Candace Bushnell

quotes.quote: Cute is when a person's personality shines through their looks. Like in the way they walk, every time you see them you just want to run up and hug them.
quotes.author: Natalie Portman

quotes.quote: The only rule is don't be boring and dress cute wherever you go. Life is too short to blend in.
quotes.author: Paris Hilton

quotes.quote: Everything looks cute when it's small.
quotes.author: Cynthia Rowley

quotes.quote: Thin people are beautiful, but fat people are adorable.
quotes.author: Jackie Gleason

quotes.quote: Bulldogs are adorable, with faces like toads that have been sat on.
quotes.author: Sidonie-Gabrielle Colette

quotes.quote: Self-care is the non-negotiable. That's the thing that you have to do. And beauty is the thing that can be the benefit of the self-care. Beauty is not the point. Beauty is just a cute side-effect from self-care.

quotes.quote: I subscribe to the theory that Mankind never domesticated any animal. They came in from the cold and looked cute until they were fed.
quotes.author: David Beard

quotes.quote: I read that when cats are cuddling and kneading you, and you think it's cute, they're really just checking your vitals for weak spots.
quotes.author: Kandyse Mcclure

quotes.quote: I'm tired of all this nonsense about beauty being skin deep. That's deep enough. What do you want, an adorable pancreas?
