quotes.quote: What we may think is funny or cute may end up being powerfully hurtful.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: I don't get cute, I get drop-dead gorgeous.
quotes.author: Alyssa Edwards

quotes.quote: Little girls are cute and small only to adults. To one another they are not cute. They are life-sized.
quotes.author: Margaret Atwood

quotes.quote: If you aren't cute, you may as well be clever.
quotes.author: David Sedaris

quotes.quote: They say love's like a bus, and if you wait long enough another one will come along, but not in this place where the buses are slow and most of the cute ones are gay.
quotes.author: Daniel Handler

quotes.quote: When a guy tells me I'm cute, it's not something desirable. Cute is more like what you want your pet to be.
quotes.author: Natalie Portman

quotes.quote: I love you not only for what you are, but for what I am when I am with you.
quotes.author: Ray Croft

quotes.quote: I love you because the entire universe conspired to help me find you.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: I saw that you were perfect and I loved you. Then I saw that you were not perfect and I loved you even more.
quotes.author: Angelita Lim

quotes.quote: I find the best way to love someone is not to change them, but instead, help them reveal the greatest version of themselves.
quotes.author: Dr. Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: As we grow older together, as we continue to change with age, there is one thing that will never change. I will always keep falling in love with you.
quotes.author: Karen Clodfelder

quotes.quote: You are the source of my joy, the center of my world and the whole of my heart.
quotes.author: Hoang Chau

quotes.quote: I love you. I am who I am because of you. You are every reason, every hope, and every dream I've ever had, and no matter what happens to us in the future, everyday we are together is the greatest day of my life. I will always be yours.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: Come live with me, and be my love, and we will some new pleasures prove, of golden sands, and crystal brooks, with silken lines and silver hooks.
quotes.author: John Donne

quotes.quote: Being deeply loved by someone gives you the strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: If i had nothing but you, i would still have everything.
quotes.author: Samantha

quotes.quote: If I had a flower for every time I thought of you...I could walk through my garden forever.
quotes.author: Alfred Tennyson

quotes.quote: I love you and that's the beginning and end of everything.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: Every heart sings a song, incomplete, until another heart whispers back. Those who wish to sing always find a song. At the touch of a lover, everyone becomes a poet.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: I seem to have loved you in numberless forms, numberless times, in life after life, in age after age forever.
quotes.author: Rabinranath Tagore

quotes.quote: When in a relationship, a real man doesn't make his woman jealous of others, he makes others jealous of his woman.
quotes.author: Steve Marabol

quotes.quote: My love for you has no depth, its boundaries are ever-expanding. My love and my life with you will be a never-ending story.
quotes.author: Christina White

quotes.quote: If you live to be a hundred, I want to live to be a hundred minus one day so I never have to live without you.
quotes.author: A.A. Milne

quotes.quote: To love someone is nothing, to be loved by someone is something, but to be loved by the one you love is everything.
quotes.author: Bill Russell

quotes.quote: I would rather spend one lifetime with you, than face all the ages of this world alone.
quotes.author: J.K.K. Tolken

quotes.quote: To the world you may be one person, but to one person you are the world.
quotes.author: Bill Wilson

quotes.quote: I'd rather die tomorrow than live a hundred years without knowing you.
quotes.author: Pocahontas

quotes.quote: We were together. I forget the rest.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.quote: The best thing about me is you.
quotes.author: Shannon Crown

quotes.quote: Love is when the other person's happiness is more important than your own.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.

quotes.quote: I'll let you be in my dreams if I can be in yours.
quotes.author: Bob Dylan

quotes.quote: Familiar acts are beautiful through love.
quotes.author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quotes.quote: Lots of people want to ride with you in the limo, but what you want is someone who will take the bus with you when the limo breaks down.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Love is a two-way street constantly under construction.
quotes.author: Carroll Bryant

quotes.quote: If I know what love is, it is because of you.
quotes.author: Hermann Hesse

quotes.quote: The meeting of two personalities is like the contact of two chemical substances. If there is any reaction, both are transformed.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: For the two of us, home isn't a place. It is a person. And we are finally home.
quotes.author: Stephanie Perkins

quotes.quote: Whatever our souls are made of, his and mine are the same.
quotes.author: Emily Bronte

quotes.quote: For it was not into my ear you whispered, but into my heart. It was not my lips you kissed, but my soul.
quotes.author: Judy Garland

quotes.quote: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
quotes.author: Lao tzu

quotes.quote: I love you without knowing how, or when, or from where. I love you simply, without problems or pride: I love you in this way because I do not know any other way of loving but this, in which there is no I or you, so intimate that your hand upon my chest is my hand, so intimate that when I fall asleep your eyes close.
quotes.author: Pablo Neruda

quotes.quote: I fell in love with her when we were together, then fell deeper in love with her in the years we were apart.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: Two minds with but a single thought, two hearts that beat as one.
quotes.author: Jasper Fforde

quotes.quote: I am in you and you in me, mutual in divine love.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Life is a beauty to those who know how to treat it like a princess. Your attitude towards life will determine how far you will go. Stop cursing and saying that it is no good.
quotes.author: Nazarene Wallace

quotes.quote: You come into the world with nothing, and the purpose of your life is to make something out of nothing.
quotes.author: Henry Louis Mencken

quotes.quote: There are only two tragedies in life: one is not getting what one wants, and the other is getting it.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Life is the art of drawing without an eraser.
quotes.author: John W Gardner

quotes.quote: Half our life is spent trying to find something to do with the time we have rushed through life trying to save.
quotes.author: Will Smith

quotes.quote: Yesterday is history, tomorrow is a mystery, today is God's gift, that's why we call it the present.
quotes.author: Joan Rivers

quotes.quote: And in the end it is not the years in your life that count, It's the life in your years.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: The best portion of your life will be the small, nameless moments you spend smiling with someone who matters to you.
quotes.author: Ritu Ghatourey

quotes.quote: This life is like a rose and you are the beauty and fragrance. Without you, allit will be is a faded rose without any charm or a sense of smell.
quotes.author: Matt Cooper

quotes.quote: It is the sweet, simple things of life which are the real ones after all.
quotes.author: Laura Ingalls Wilder

quotes.quote: Life is worth living as long as there's a laugh in it.
quotes.author: L.M. Montgomery

quotes.quote: Life is like a cup of coffee or tea. No matter how bitter it may be, it is always enjoyable.
quotes.author: Jason Wong

quotes.quote: There's no fun in perfect life. So make a risk, Take a chance, Go where the wind takes you, Have Fun.
quotes.author: Jenny C

quotes.quote: Weekends don't count unless you spend them doing something completely pointless.
quotes.author: Bill Watterson

quotes.quote: Life is either a daring adventure or nothing. To keep our faces toward change and behave like free spirits in the presence of fate is strength undefeatable.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Nobody can go back and start a new beginning but anyone can start today and make a new ending.
quotes.author: Maria Robinson

quotes.quote: Life is like playing a violin in public and learning the instrument as one goes on.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.quote: When life is sweet, say thank you and celebrate. And when life is bitter, say thank you and grow.
quotes.author: Shauna Niequist

quotes.quote: It's a funny thing about life: if you refuse to accept anything but the best, you very often get it.
quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: Life without love is like a tree without blossoms or fruit.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: The most important thing in life is to learn how to give out love, and to let it come in.
quotes.author: Morrie Schwartz

quotes.quote: If you live to be a hundred, I want to live to be a hundred minus one day so I never have to live without you.
quotes.author: A.A. Milne

quotes.quote: Life is funny. Things change, people change, but you will always be you, so stay true to yourself and never sacrifice who you are for anyone.
quotes.author: Zayn Malik

quotes.quote: Life is like an onion: You peel it off one layer at a time, and sometimes you weep.
quotes.author: Carl Sandburg

quotes.quote: Life is so largely controlled by chance that its conduct can be but a perpetual improvisation.
quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: The truth is you don't know what is going to happen tomorrow. Life is a crazy ride, and nothing is guaranteed.
quotes.author: Eminem

quotes.quote: The quality, not the longevity, of one's life is what is important.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: Love is a two-way street constantly under construction.
quotes.author: Carroll Bryant

quotes.quote: In life, I have met many friends and people whom I have loved dearly. All this has been possible because of a life full of joy happiness and peace. Humor is another factor which helped me on my way in life.
quotes.author: Bob Lyres

quotes.quote: Man is immortal. Therefore he must die endlessly. For life is a creative idea. It can only find itself in changing forms.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.quote: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: Life is what happens to you while you're planning on doing something else.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: Whatever anybody says, the most important thing in life is to be happy.
quotes.author: Orhan Pamuk

quotes.quote: Life is a whim of several billion cells to be you for a while.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.quote: The cost of living is going up and the chance of living is going down.
quotes.author: Flip Wilson

quotes.quote: When one door closes, another opens, but we often look so long and so regretfully upon the closed door that we do not see the one which has opened for us.
quotes.author: Alexander Graham Bell

quotes.quote: Life is the game that must be played.
quotes.author: Edwin Arlington Robinson

quotes.quote: To succeed in life, you need three things. A wishbone, a backbone and a funny bone.
quotes.author: Reba McEntire

quotes.quote: Just living is not enough. One must have sunshine, freedom, and a little flower.
quotes.author: Hans Christian Andersen

quotes.quote: One of the oldest human needs is having someone to wonder where you are when you don't come home at night.
quotes.author: Margaret Mead

quotes.quote: Life is not having been told that the man has just waxed the floor.
quotes.author: Ogden Nash

quotes.quote: If people sat outside and looked at the stars each night, I'll bet they'd live a lot differently.
quotes.author: Bill Watterson

quotes.quote: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life. It goes on.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: All life is an experiment. The more experiments you make the better.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Win as if you were used to it, lose as if you enjoyed it for a change.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The person who knows how to laugh at himself will never ceased to be amused.
quotes.author: Shirley MacLaine

quotes.quote: If you don’t follow your heart, you might spend the rest of your life wishing you had.
quotes.author: Brigitte Nicole

quotes.quote: If you want to live a happy life, tie it to a goal. Not to people or things.
quotes.author: Albert Eistein

quotes.quote: The only rule is don't be boring and dress cute wherever you go. Life is too short to blend in.
quotes.author: Paris Hilton

quotes.quote: Life is too deep for words, so don't try to describe it, just live it.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Life isn't a matter of milestones, but of moments.
quotes.author: Rose Kennedy

quotes.quote: Never regret. If it's good, it's wonderful. If it's bad, it's experience.
quotes.author: Jean Plaidy

quotes.quote: Everyone is trying to accomplish something big, not realizing that life is made up of little things.
quotes.author: Frank A. Clark

quotes.quote: In life, unlike chess, the game continues after checkmate.
quotes.author: Isaac Asimov

quotes.quote: It is only when we no longer compulsively need someone that we can have a real relationship with them.
quotes.author: Anthony Storr

quotes.quote: I love my eyes when you look into them. I love my name when you say it. I love my heart when you touch it. I love my life when you are in it.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Treasure your relationships, not your possessions.
quotes.author: Anthony J D'Angelo

quotes.quote: A successful relationship requires falling in love multiple times, but always with the same person.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: The meeting of two personalities is like the contact of two chemical substances: if there is any reaction, both are transformed.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: The most exciting, challenging and significant relationship of all is the one you have with yourself.
quotes.author: Carrie Bradshaw

quotes.quote: I love the way you make me so happy, and the ways you show you care. I love the way you say, ''I love you'', and the way you are always there.
quotes.author: Crystal Jensen

quotes.quote: Being deeply moved by someone gives you the strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Do what you did in the beginning of the relationship and there won't be an end.
quotes.author: Anthony Robbins

quotes.quote: The reason it hurts so much to separate is because our hearts are connected.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: If you ever asked me the number of times you have crossed my mind, I would say only ONCE. You know why? You came and never left.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: When you're in a relationship and it's good, even if nothing else in your life is right, you feel like your whole world is complete.
quotes.author: Keith Sweat

quotes.quote: Men always want to be a woman's first love â€“ women like to be a man's last romance.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: No relationship is perfect, ever. There are always some ways you have to bend, to compromise, to give something up in order to gain something greater.
quotes.author: Sarah Dessen

quotes.quote: Even though there are plenty of fish in the sea, you are without a doubt the perfect fit for me.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: For the two of us, home isn't a place. It is a person. And we are finally home.
quotes.author: Stephanie Perkins

quotes.quote: Each relationship nurtures a strength or weakness within you.
quotes.author: Mike Murdock

quotes.quote: I would rather spend one lifetime with you than face all the ages of this world alone.
quotes.author: Lord of the Rings

quotes.quote: A woman knows the face of the man she loves as a sailor knows the open sea.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: It is the things in common that make relationships enjoyable, but it is the little differences that make them interesting.
quotes.author: Todd Ruthman

quotes.quote: Maybe you don't need the whole world to love you. Maybe you just need one person.
quotes.author: Kermit The Frog

quotes.quote: You're my reflection, all I see is you.
quotes.author: Justin Timberlake

quotes.quote: We fell in love. Mine became ours, minutes turned to hours, chocolates and flowers, you made me brave when life created a coward.
quotes.author: Raghib Clitso

quotes.quote: In relationships, the little things are the big things.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: Let's commit the perfect crime. I'll steal your heart and you steal mine.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The most important ingredient we put into any relationship is not what we say or what we do, but what we are.
quotes.author: Stephen R. Covey

quotes.quote: To know when to go away and when to come closer is the key to any lasting relationship.
quotes.author: Domenico Cieri Estrada

quotes.quote: I'd rather die tomorrow than live a hundred years without knowing you.
quotes.author: Pocahantas

quotes.quote: When I saw you, I was afraid to meet you. When I met you, I was afraid to kiss you. When I kissed you, I was afraid to love you. Now that I love you, I'm afraid to lose you.
quotes.author: Ritu Ghatourey

quotes.quote: I love the way we look together â€“ as sweet as sugar and as nice as ice.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A guy and a girl can be just friends, but at one point or another, they will fall for each other. Maybe temporarily, maybe at the wrong time, maybe too late, or maybe forever.
quotes.author: Dave Matthews

quotes.quote: Three things I want in a relationship: Eyes that won't cry, lips that won't lie, and love that won't die.
quotes.author: Wiz Khalifa

quotes.quote: We can improve our relationships with others by leaps and bounds if we become encouragers instead of critics.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.quote: Little kindness and courtesies are so important. In relationships, the little things are the big things.
quotes.author: Stephen R. Covey

quotes.quote: Once you find someone to share your ups and downs, downs are almost as good as ups.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: In the end there doesn't have to be anyone who understands you. There just has to be someone who wants to.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: It takes one person to forgive, it takes two people to be reunited.
quotes.author: Lewis B. Smedes

quotes.quote: If I could reach up and hold a star for every time you've made me smile. The entire sky would be in the palm of my hand.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: When in a relationship, a real man doesn't make his woman jealous of others, he makes others jealous of his woman.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: If you're in a relationship and you want to make it work, you have to be a little selfless at times.
quotes.author: Montel Williams

quotes.quote: A great relationship doesn't happen because of the love you had in the beginning, but how well you continue building love until the end.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: When you're in a relationship, you're always surrounded by a ring of circumstances... joined together by a wedding ring, or in a boxing ring.
quotes.author: Bob Seger

quotes.quote: The ultimate test of a relationship is to disagree but to hold hands.
quotes.author: Alexandra Penney

quotes.quote: A relationship is like a house. When a lightbulb burns out you do not go and buy a new house, you fix the light bulb.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: There are lots of people who can call you by your name but there is only one person who can make it sound so special.
quotes.author: Kim Jarabelo

quotes.quote: I don't have the money to buy you the world, But I am prepared to share that world with you.
quotes.author: Jeremy Legend

quotes.quote: Personal relationships are the fertile soil from which all advancement...all success... all achievement in real life grows.
quotes.author: Ben Stein

quotes.quote: Best relationship: Talk like best friends, play like children, argue like husband and wife, protect each other like brother and sister.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A relationship is like a rose. How long it lasts, no one knows.
quotes.author: Cella

quotes.quote: Having someone wonder where you are when you don't come home at night is a very old human need.
quotes.author: Margaret Mead

quotes.quote: I want to be in a relationship where you telling me you love me is just a ceremonious validation of what you already show me.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: When someone loves you, the way they talk about you is different. You feel safe and comfortable.
quotes.author: Jess C. Scott

quotes.quote: We have to recognize that there cannot be relationships unless there is commitment unless there is loyalty unless there is love, patience, persistence.
quotes.author: Cornel West

quotes.quote: Never make a person fall for you when you have no intention of catching them.
quotes.author: Perry Ritthaler

quotes.quote: You don't know what you do to me / You don't have a clue. / You have no idea what's it like to be me, / looking at you.
quotes.author: Perry Ritthaler

quotes.quote: If a relationship is based on 'What am I getting?' all is lost.
quotes.author: Ossie B. Davies

quotes.quote: Only in a relationship do you see the face of what is.
quotes.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quotes.quote: Relations are made by fate, friends by choice.
quotes.author: Jacques Delille

quotes.quote: Only in a relationship can you know yourself, not in abstraction, and certainly not in isolation.
quotes.author: Krishnamurti

quotes.quote: No relationship can provide everything needed for the complete experience of being yourself.
quotes.author: David Viscott

quotes.quote: Our relationship has been a series of misadventures.
quotes.author: Cary Grant

quotes.quote: Meaningful relationships between men and women don't last. You see there's a chemical in our bodies that makes it so that we all get on each other's nerves sooner or later.
quotes.author: Diane Keaton

quotes.quote: Any idiot can have a long-term relationship, all you have to do is smile a lot.
quotes.author: Josh Mostel

quotes.quote: A relationship, I think, is like a dead shark. You know, it has to constantly move forward or it dies, and I think what we got on our hands is a dead shark.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: I do find relationships to be kaleidoscopic and infinitely changing; no relationship is ever clear or safe, no matter how intrinsically wonderful it is and all that.
quotes.author: Rita Dove

quotes.quote: Humans relations just aren't fixed in their orbits like the planets— they're more like galaxies, changing all the time, exploding into the light for years, then dying away.
quotes.author: May Sarton

quotes.quote: She is eighteen years younger, a gap that incited him once but that, now he is seventy, separates them like a lake.
quotes.author: Tom Rachman

quotes.quote: To get the full value of joy, you must have someone to divide it with.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even heard but must be felt with the heart.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: We come to love not by finding a perfect person, but by learning to see an imperfect person perfectly.
quotes.author: Sam Keen

quotes.quote: The best love is the kind that awakens the soul and makes us reach for more, that plants a fire in our hearts and brings peace to our minds. And that’s what you've given me. That’s what I'd hoped to give you forever.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: Don't settle for a relationship that won't let you be yourself.
quotes.author: Oprah

quotes.quote: Everything that happens is nicer with you.
quotes.author: Sandol Stoddard

quotes.quote: Can't you see? Every step I have taken since I was that little girl on the bridge, was to bring me closer to you.
quotes.author: Arthur Golden

quotes.quote: Whatever our souls are made of, his and mine are the same.
quotes.author: Emily Bronte

quotes.quote: That's my sweetheart in there. Wherever she is, that's where my home is.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: For the two of us, home isn't a place. It is a person. And we are finally home.
quotes.author: Stephanie Perkins

quotes.quote: It doesn't matter if the guy is perfect or the girl is perfect, as long as they are perfect for each other.
quotes.author: Good Will Hunting

quotes.quote: Whatever you are, be a good one.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: A kitten is the delight of a household. All day long a comedy is played out by an incomparable actor.
quotes.author: Champfleury

quotes.quote: You don't really need to dress expensive clothes to look cute.
quotes.author: Christy Romano

quotes.quote: Wherever you go, go with all your heart.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: There’s nothing that can help you understand your beliefs more than trying to explain them to an inquisitive child.
quotes.author: Frank A. Clark

quotes.quote: Without music, life would be a mistake.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Life was not meant to be easy, my child. But take courage, it can be delightful.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: A strong woman looks a challenge in the eye and gives it a wink.
quotes.author: Gina Carey

quotes.quote: A real girl isn’t perfect and a perfect girl isn't real.
quotes.author: Harry Styles

quotes.quote: Walking with a friend in the dark is better than walking alone in the light.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Pearls are always appropriate.
quotes.author: Jackie Kennedy

quotes.quote: Cinderella never asked for a prince. She asked for a night off and a dress.
quotes.author: Kiera Cass

quotes.quote: Imperfection is beauty, madness is genius and it’s better to be absolutely ridiculous than absolutely boring.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: It is better to remain silent at the risk of being thought a fool, than to talk and remove all doubt of It.
quotes.author: Maurice Switzer

quotes.quote: I feel more human when I compare the cuteness of a lizard to a newborn child's sweetness. Both are God's creations filled with precious innocence.
quotes.author: Munia Khan

quotes.quote: The only rule is don't be boring and dress cute wherever you go. Life is too short to blend in.
quotes.author: Paris Hilton

quotes.quote:
A strange, warm feeling swirled in my chest, and for a brief moment, when I looked at
him, I saw safety.
quotes.author: Richelle Mead

quotes.quote: We were together. I forget the rest.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.quote: Life is funny. Things change, people change, but you will always be you, so stay true to yourself and never sacrifice who you are for anyone.
quotes.author: Zayn Malik

quotes.quote: Cute is when your personality shines through your looks. Like, when you see someone's personality in the way they walk and you just feel like hugging them every time you see them.
quotes.author: Natalie Portman

quotes.quote: Like most qualities, cuteness is delineated by what it isn't. Most people aren't cute at all, or if so they quickly outgrow their cuteness ... Elegance, grace, delicacy, beauty, and a lack of self-consciousness: a creature who knows he is cute soon isn't.
quotes.author: William S. Burroughs

quotes.quote: Cuteness and kindness are often inversely proportional in people.
quotes.author: Daria Snadowsky

quotes.quote: Fatherhood makes you cute. Women find bumbling fathers cute and attractive.
quotes.author: Jerry Seinfeld

quotes.quote: Other times, I look at my scars and see something else: a girl who was trying to cope with something horrible that she should never have had to live through at all. My scars show pain and suffering, but they also show my will to survive. They're part of my history that'll always be there.
quotes.author: Cheryl Rainfield

quotes.quote: I can feel the hurt. There's something good about it. Mostly it makes me stop remembering.
quotes.author: Albert Borris

quotes.quote: Hush little baby, Dont you cry, Dont cut your arms, Dont say goodbye. Put down that razor, Put down that light, It maybe hard but, You'll win this fight.
quotes.author: Emily Giffin

quotes.quote: Here in the bathroom with me are razor blades. Here is iodine to drink. Here are sleeping pills to swallow. You have a choice. Live or die. Every breath is a choice. Every minute is a choice. To be or not to be. Every time you dont throw yourself down the stairs, thats a choice. Every time you dont crash your car, you reenlist.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: Hurting yourself will never make the pain go away. And hurting others will never make you happy.
quotes.author: Francine Chiar

quotes.quote: No one should feel so low, to the point where they feel like they need to use suicide as a way out.
quotes.author: Samantha Slade

quotes.quote: She cuts herself. Never too deep, never enough to die. But enough to feel the pain. Enough to feel the scream inside.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Have you ever felt the need to slit your wrist, let all feelings of guilt and depression bleed out, then sew yourself up to be happy again?
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Real cutters don't cut for attention or for the pain, real cutters cut for the satisfaction of being in control something.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: ... [P]ain generated or sustained by the mind needs the body mainly in order to give suffering a location.
quotes.author: David Morris

quotes.quote: An unknown alphabet suggests itself with each new string of crimson beads. Her own personal language. Come to save her.
quotes.author: Charles Gatewood

quotes.quote: The day I'd first cut myself, a switch in my head had been flicked. Instead of feeling horror, I felt nothing, and although I no longer wanted to hurt myself, my episodes of self-harm still felt normal for me in a way. I'd sometimes forget it still shocked other people.
quotes.author: Ditto

quotes.quote: That paradox would begin to run my life: to know that what you are doing is hurting you, maybe killing you, and to be afraid of that fact but to cling to the idea that this will save you, it will, in the end, make things okay.
quotes.author: Marya Hornbacher

quotes.quote: This time the skin separates and she blinks her way back into the universe, watches the valley fold open, the blood seaming up along the cut and pressing out, blue to red in the air of this world, and as usual the pain springs her into the here and now.
quotes.author: Martha O'Connor

quotes.quote: I may not be in control of anything else, but I am in control of my body.
quotes.author: Karen Carpenter

quotes.quote: A pattern of raised crisscrossed scars, some old and white, others more recent in various shades of pink and red. Exposing the stress of the structure underneath its paint.
quotes.author: Amy Efaw

quotes.quote: I like the cuts-they comfort me-I can't lie.
quotes.author: Emma Forrest

quotes.quote: She can paint a pretty picture but this story has a twist. The paintbrush is a razor and the canvas is her wrist.
quotes.author: Amy Efaw

quotes.quote: Never feel this bad again. Never come back to this place, where only a knife will do. Live a gentle and kind life. Don't do things that make you want to hurt yourself.
quotes.author: Caitlin Moran

quotes.quote: Throughout it all, you are still, always, you: beautiful and bruised, known and unknowable.
quotes.author: Leila Sales

quotes.quote: Cutting myself was something beyond despair, something very extreme. It's about trying to get to something. The physical act is a metaphor of trying to access something that is frozen. Something between who you were and since the depression who you've moved to and there's this thick layer of ice and you can't get to yourself.
quotes.author: Nick Johnston

quotes.quote: These are the screams within. These these are the life streams bleeding from skin.
quotes.author: Patrick Jones

quotes.quote: We have all made attempts to take our lives, or to tell without words, some with a knife or a razor dividing the flesh, making the invisible somehow visible making themselves, and all they've been through, disappear.
quotes.author: Linda Katherine

quotes.quote: I don't want to die without any scars.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: She cuts herself never too deep, never enough to die. But enough to feel the pain. Enough to feel the scream inside.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Never let a cold lifeless piece of metal take away from your beautiful existence.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: You are beautiful. And you're worth more than harming yourself.
quotes.author: Demi Lovato

quotes.quote: Therapy is about every kids nightmare when people are telling you that you need to get help but all you really want is a hug.
quotes.author: Alex Gaskarth

quotes.quote: It's more important to keep yourself alive, there's nothing worth ever hurting yourself over.
quotes.author: Gerard Way

quotes.quote: How stubborn are the scars, when they won't fade away, or just a gentle reminder that now are better days.
quotes.author: A Prophecy

quotes.quote: People say things meant to rip you in half but you hold the power to not turn their words into a knife and cut yourself.
quotes.author: Rupi Kaur

quotes.quote: My hand no longer trembled out of fear, but out of anticipation. I knew I was addicted to the rush it provided, to the release it provided from the emotional mess I had become, but I didn’t care. It wasn’t drugs. It was just a few cuts on my arm.
quotes.author: S.M. Koz

quotes.quote: That’s when I wanted to cut. I cut to quiet the cacophony. I cut to end this abstracted agony, to reel myself back to one present and physical whole, whose blood was the proof of her tangibility.
quotes.author: Caroline Kettlewell

quotes.quote: Self-mutilation is a very different issue to suicide. It is a controlled pain personal to you, allowing you to live/exist to some degree.
quotes.author: Richy Edwards

quotes.quote: You don’t feel like you’re hurting yourself when you’re cutting. You feel like this is the only way to take care of yourself.
quotes.author: Marilee Strong

quotes.quote: Sometimes I even cut myself to see how much it bleeds It's like adrenaline, the pain is such a sudden rush for me.
quotes.author: Eminem

quotes.quote: I wish adults would spend less energy freaking out about the cutting itself and work harder to understand what drives kids to self-harm.
quotes.author: Laurie Halse Anderson

quotes.quote: 'This' pain I can see it but I can't feel it. It haunts me when I cut myself. I can see where the pain is coming from and watch it heal and I can easily care for it. 'This' pain doesn't have a specific place. It moves around and creeps into strange places.
quotes.author: Melanie

quotes.quote: In case you didn't know, dead people don't bleed. If you can bleed-see it, feel it-then you know you're alive. It's irrefutable, undeniable proof. Sometimes I just need a little reminder.
quotes.author: Amy Efaw

quotes.quote: I needed cutting now the way a diabetic needs insulin. It was a bulwark, steady and unyielding, I could throw up against the insidious, corrosive lapping of a whispering sea of uneasiness.
quotes.author: Caroline Kettlewell

quotes.quote: There were times I felt so anxious, almost like I was crawling out of my skin, that if I didn't do something physical to match the way I felt inside, I would explode. I cut myself to take my mind off that. I just didn't care what happened. I had no fear.
quotes.author: Demi Lovato

quotes.quote: My body is a journal in a way. It's like what sailors used to do, where every tattoo meant something, a specific time in your life when you make a mark on yourself, whether you do it yourself with a knife or with a professional tattoo artist.
quotes.author: Johnny Depp

quotes.quote: Self-harm - the world will come at you with knives anyway. You do not need to beat them to it.
quotes.author: Caitlin Moran

quotes.quote: For exactly the same reason, it is sometimes satisfying to cut yourself and bleed. On those gray [sic] days where eight in the morning looks no different from noon and nothing has happened and nothing is going to happen and you are washing a glass in the sink and it breaks - accidentally - and punctures your skin. And then there is this shocking red, the brightest thing in the day, so vibrant it buzzes, this blood of yours. That is okay sometimes because at least you know you're alive.
quotes.author: Augusten Burroughs

quotes.quote: Here’s the thing…all of us know what it feels like to hurt. We have times in our lives when we feel down, alone, not good enough, angry or anxious. Sometimes that pain comes from things happening around us, and sometimes it comes from the voices in our own heads. Finding a way to cope with those feelings isn’t always easy — and sometimes we find ways to feel better…that actually cause more pain. Like drinking too much, using unprescribed drugs and cutting or self-injury.
quotes.author: Courtney Knowles

quotes.quote: I pick up the magazines. I buy into the ideal. I believe that blond, flat girls have the secret. What is far more frightening than narcissism is the zeal for self-mutilation that is spreading, infecting the world.
quotes.author: Eve Ensler

quotes.quote: In a rush, it happens again, only this time it’s remembering what it’s like to cut, and cut hard. The way you have to dig the glass in, deeply, right away, to break the skin and then drag, and drag fiercely, to make a river worth drowning in.
quotes.author: Kathleen Glasgow

quotes.quote: They’ve locked down so tightly because of whatever’s going on in their lives that they feel they’re incapable of feeling anything at all. So they hurt themselves in order to feel something.
quotes.author: Dr. Steingard

quotes.quote: Each cut, each scar, each burn, a different mood or time.
quotes.author: Lee

quotes.quote: Many people interpret self-harm as a way of “acting out” or “looking for attention.” However, it’s important that we don’t stereotype—pain does not discriminate and people of all ages and backgrounds can be at risk for self-harm.
quotes.author: Hannah Kwawu

quotes.quote: Self-injury is a sign of distress not madness. We should be congratulated on having found a way of surviving.
quotes.author: Cory Anderson

quotes.quote: How will you know I am hurting, if you cannot see my pain? To wear it on my body tells what words cannot explain.
quotes.author: C. Blount

quotes.quote: I know what it's like to want to die. How it hurts to smile. How you try to fit in, but you can't. How you hurt yourself on the outside to try to kill the thing on the inside.
quotes.author: Susanna Kaysen

quotes.quote: I can't stop thinking about cutting myself up. Visual bruises can be covered with make-up, but down to the core, I'm all bruises.
quotes.author: Majandra Delfino

quotes.quote: I wear my self-harm scars proudly. They represent the battles through which I have gone, and I am proud because those battles I have won.
quotes.author: Aly

quotes.quote: Scars on our souls frequently lead to scars on the outside from self-inflicted wounds. Together we can empower one another and move toward healing.
quotes.author: Amy Tippins

quotes.quote: Told I talked too much, made too much noise. I took up a silent hobby – Bleeding.
quotes.author: S. Marie

quotes.quote: It’s kind of like letting out a sigh. I get a peaceful feeling and a kind of self-satisfaction at having hurt myself.
quotes.author: George Howe Colt

quotes.quote: A lot of people think that, but in reality, you cut for different reasons, like, it’s the only way you know to deal with intense insecurities, or anger at yourself. Or you’re so numb as a result of depression, you can’t feel anything — and this is one thing you can feel.
quotes.author: Blue

quotes.quote: It’s not about suicide. It’s something very different, a way of regulating emotion, of reducing emotional pain.
quotes.author: Dr. Barent Walsh

quotes.quote: We focus so much on our differences, and that is creating, I think, a lot of chaos and negativity and bullying in the world. And I think if everybody focused on what we all have in common - which is - we all want to be happy.
quotes.author: Ellen DeGeneres

quotes.quote: I realized that bullying never has to do with you. It's the bully who's insecure.
quotes.author: Shay Mitchell

quotes.quote: Children should be able to live a life free from bullying and harassment and it is time that we all took a stand against this.
quotes.author: Katherine Jenkins

quotes.quote: I would rather be a little nobody, then to be a evil somebody.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Bullying builds character like nuclear waste creates superheroes. It's a rare occurrence and often does much more damage than endowment.
quotes.author: Zack W. Van

quotes.quote: If they don't like you for being yourself, be yourself even more.
quotes.author: Taylor Swift

quotes.quote: People say sticks and stones may break your bones, but names can never hurt you, but that's not true. Words can hurt. They hurt me. Things were said to me that I still haven't forgotten.
quotes.author: Demi Lovato

quotes.quote: Victims of bullying spare themselves distress, by detachment; denying their ability to experience happiness
quotes.author: James Horace

quotes.quote: My pain may be the reason for somebody's laugh. But my laugh must never be the reason for somebody's pain
quotes.author: Charlie Chaplin

quotes.quote: You don't need anybody to tell you who you are or what you are. You are what you are!
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: He who knows others is wise. He who knows himself is enlightened.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: You will never reach higher ground if you are always pushing others down
quotes.author: Jeffrey Benjamin

quotes.quote: You can have no dominion greater or less than that over yourself
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: I think we ought to be able to alter the whole system--but not by bullying, not because one lot wants what the other has got.
quotes.author: D.H. Lawrence

quotes.quote: Somebody who is bullied and has a lot of coping skills, support in their family and in other friends, is probably more resilient than somebody who doesn't perceive others as being supportive or has low self-esteem, identity issues, or depressed mood.
quotes.author: Dr. Elizabeth Waterman

quotes.quote: I've realized that you become a bully if you are just watching someone get bullied and you don't say anything. Speak up!
quotes.author: Emma Roberts

quotes.quote: It's easy to be mean when you're Unknown Author. There's a lot of people who wouldn't have the cajones to say in person what they do online. But you can't listen to somebody you don't even know. Opinions of your friends and family matter, but you can't listen to somebody who is nobody to you.
quotes.author: Brendan Dooling

quotes.quote: It's tough, and sometimes you feel like you can't speak to someone about it. I just want to let teens know that it's okay to talk about it.
quotes.author: Cher Lloyd

quotes.quote: A lie can travel halfway around the world while the truth is putting on its shoes.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Watch your thoughts, they become words. Watch your words, they become actions. Watch your actions, they become habits. Watch your habits, they become character. Watch your character for it becomes your destiny.
quotes.author: Patrick Overton

quotes.quote: The world is a dangerous place, not because of those who do evil, but because of those who look on and do nothing.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Knowing what's right doesn't mean much unless you do what's right.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: If you are neutral in situations of injustice, you have chosen the side of the oppressor. If an elephant has its foot on the tail of a mouse, and you say that you are neutral, the mouse will not appreciate your neutrality.
quotes.author: Desmond Tutu

quotes.quote: Life is a ght, but not everyone's a ghter. Otherwise, bullies would be an endangered species.
quotes.author: Andrew Vachss

quotes.quote: Never do a wrong thing to make a friend--or to keep one.
quotes.author: Robert E. Lee

quotes.quote: One's dignity may be assaulted, vandalized and cruelly mocked, but it can never be taken away unless it is surrendered.
quotes.author: Michael J. Fox

quotes.quote: Often the right path is the one that may be hardest for you to follow. But the hard path is also the one that will make you grow as a human being.
quotes.author: Karen Mueller Coombs

quotes.quote: Perhaps it is only human nature to inflict suffering on anything that will endure suffering, whether by reason of its genuine humility, or indifference, or sheer helplessness.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: Cyber-bullying is poised to turn into the biggest online concern, already affecting up to 35% of all children
quotes.author: Dr Martyn Wild

quotes.quote: Unless and until our society recognizes cyber bullying for what it is, the suffering of thousands of silent victims will continue.
quotes.author: Anna Maria Chavez

quotes.quote: Cyber bullies can hide behind a mask of anonymity online and do not need direct physical access to their victims to do unimaginable harm.
quotes.author: Anna Maria Chavez

quotes.quote: Never stand in the way of letting God use people’s actions, in order to solve a greater issue in the world.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: Courage is fire, and bullying is smoke.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: Never be bullied into silence. Never allow yourself to be made a victim. Accept no one's definition of your life; define yourself.
quotes.author: Harvey Fierstein

quotes.quote: When people hurt you over and over, think of them like sand paper. They may scratch and hurt you a bit, but in the end, you end up polished and they end up useless.
quotes.author: Chris Colfer

quotes.quote: Never be bullied into silence. Never allow yourself to be made a victim.
quotes.author: Tim Field

quotes.quote: Sticks and stones may break your bones but words can hurt like hell.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: Bullies thrive wherever authority is weak.
quotes.author: Tim Field

quotes.quote: No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Nothing can prepare you for living or working with a sociopathic serial bully. It is the most devastating, draining, misunderstood, and ultimately futile experience imaginable.
quotes.author: Tim Field

quotes.quote: Always be a first-rate version of yourself, instead of a second-rate version of somebody else.
quotes.author: Judy Garland

quotes.quote: Be kind, for everyone you meet is fighting a battle you know nothing about.
quotes.author: Wendy Mass

quotes.quote: The test of courage comes when we are in the minority. The test of tolerance comes when we are in the majority.
quotes.author: Ralph Washington Sockman

quotes.quote: Most comedy is based on getting a laugh at somebody else's expense. And I find that that's just a form of bullying in a major way. So I want to be an example that you can be funny and be kind, and make people laugh without hurting somebody else's feelings.
quotes.author: Ellen DeGeneres

quotes.quote: If you let a bully intimidate you, he's going to do it again. You've got to stand up to these strong-arm tactics.
quotes.author: Charles Djou

quotes.quote: Injustice anywhere is a threat to justice everywhere.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King

quotes.quote: You have power over your mind - not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Those that know the least of others think the highest of themselves.
quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.quote: Bullying is killing our kids. Being different is killing our kids and the kids who are bullying are dying inside. We have to save our kids whether they are bullied or they are bullying. They are all in pain.
quotes.author: Cat Cora

quotes.quote: When a resolute young fellow steps up to the great bully, the world, and takes him boldly by the beard, he is often surprised to find it comes off in his hand, and that it was only tied on to scare away the timid adventurers.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Wrong is wrong even if everyone is doing it. Right is right even if no one is doing it.
quotes.author: St. Augustine

quotes.quote: There is no exercise better for the heart than reaching down and lifting people up
quotes.author: John Holmes

quotes.quote: Each of us deserves the freedom to pursue our own version of happiness. No one deserves to be bullied.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: People who love themselves, don’t hurt other people. The more we hate ourselves, the more we want others to suffer.
quotes.author: Dan Pearce

quotes.quote: Bullying is a horrible thing. It sticks with you forever. It poisons you. But only if you let it.
quotes.author: Heather Brewer

quotes.quote: Isn’t it kind of silly to think that tearing someone else down builds you up?
quotes.author: Sean Covey

quotes.quote: Life is a fight, but not everyone’s a fighter. Otherwise, bullies would be an endangered species.
quotes.author: Andrew Vachss

quotes.quote: No one heals himself by wounding another.
quotes.author: St. Ambrose

quotes.quote: What if the kid you bullied at school, grew up, and turned out to be the only surgeon who could save your life?
quotes.author: Lynette Mather

quotes.quote: Belief in yourself and your cycling goals is the ignition switch that gets you off the sofa and onto your bike.
quotes.author: Felicity Luckey

quotes.quote: It never gets easier; you just go faster.
quotes.author: Greg LeMond

quotes.quote: Ride as much or as little, or as long or as short as you feel. But ride.
quotes.author: Eddy Merckx

quotes.quote: You are likely to fall when you stop paddling your bicycle. Such is life. As long as you don't give up, you will never end up failing!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Cycling isn't a game, it's a sport. Tough, hard and unpitying, and it requires great sacrifices. One plays football, or tennis, or hockey. One doesn't play at cycling.
quotes.author: Jean de Gribaldy

quotes.quote: Your cycling goals should be out of reach but never out of sight.
quotes.author: Felicity Luckey

quotes.quote: When you ride hard on a mountain bike, sometimes you fall, otherwise you're not riding hard.
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: I think cycling has always had a tradition of being a bit dapper, especially back in the day.
quotes.author: David Millar

quotes.quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. In order to keep your balance, you must keep moving.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Good morale in cycling comes from good legs.
quotes.author: Sean Yates

quotes.quote: Cycling is the only way to free ourselves from the misery of the tube, the wall to wall buses that line oxford street, the hopelessness of even thinking about driving.
quotes.author: Deborah Moggach

quotes.quote: Cycling is a sport of amazing athletes. Its been a privilege and a honor for me to be in this sport and to have a chance to race at the highest level.
quotes.author: Robin Farina

quotes.quote: Think of bicycles as rideable art that can just about save the world.
quotes.author: Grant Petersen

quotes.quote: Cycling is so difficult when you have to and so easy when you want to.
quotes.author: Felicity Luckey

quotes.quote: I love cycling, but if I could find a way of building something above the streets for cyclists, that would be amazing. We need even more space.
quotes.author: Michelle Dockery

quotes.quote: On your path to cycling success, remember to have fun and enjoy the ride.
quotes.author: Felicity Luckey

quotes.quote: Crashing is part of cycling as crying is part of love.
quotes.author: Johan Museeuw

quotes.quote: Riding bicycles will not only benefit the individual doing it, but the world at large.
quotes.author: Udo E. Simonis

quotes.quote: Cycling as a whole is totally underestimated. Victoria Pendleton
quotes.author: Victoria Penead

quotes.quote: Life is like a ten speed bicycle. Most of us have gears we never use.
quotes.author: Charles M. Schulz

quotes.quote: Cycling also offers a sense of independence, of being able to get up and go wherever and whenever you want. That's invaluable.
quotes.author: Adrian Bell

quotes.quote: Cycling is not a sport it's a lifestyle.
quotes.author: Magnus Backstedt

quotes.quote: A mountain bike is like your buddy. A road bike is your lover.
quotes.author: Sean Coffey

quotes.quote: If you put off starting a cycling routine until the time is right, you'll never reach your cycling goals.
quotes.author: Felicity Luckey

quotes.quote: Nothing compares to the simple pleasure of riding a bike.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: The cycling helmet can save your life, but it doesn't look good and tends to ruin your hair.
quotes.author: Astro Teller

quotes.quote: Cycling is a joy and faster than many other modes of transport, depending on the time of day. It clears the head.
quotes.author: David Byrne

quotes.quote: A bicycle ride around the world begins with a single pedal stroke.
quotes.author: Scott Stoll

quotes.quote: Cycling is part of me, it's who I am. When you get injured, your whole identity is taken away from you, you're no longer yourself.
quotes.author: Magnus Backstedt

quotes.quote: Life may not be about your bike, but it sure can help you get through it.
quotes.author: Hallman

quotes.quote: Cycling to work is an important issue for business the more who do it, the more our communities will support it. Healthy and green, cycling is worthy of the support of every business in the land.
quotes.author: Digby Jones

quotes.quote: It is the unknown around the corner that turns my wheels.
quotes.author: Heinz Stucke

quotes.quote: Cycling is an activity which more and more young people are getting involved with, whether they are using their bikes to get to school or work, socially, or cycling as a sport. Cycling is cheap, it's quick, and it makes you look and feel great!
quotes.author: Adrian Bell

quotes.quote: Gliding down the bike path on a Saturday morning, you whip by somebody peddling in the opposite direction and give each other a nod. For a moment it's like "Hey, we're both doing the same thing. Let's be friends for a second.
quotes.author: Neil Pasricha

quotes.quote: It is by riding a bicycle that you learn the contours of a country best, since you have to sweat up the hills and coast down them.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: Cycling has encountered more enemies than any other form of exercise.
quotes.author: Louis Baudry de Saunier

quotes.quote: Cycling goals are attained not by strength but by perseverance.
quotes.author: Felicity Luckey

quotes.quote: Cycling is a sport of the open road and spectators are lining that road.
quotes.author: Lance Armstrong

quotes.quote: A bicycle ride is a flight from sadness.
quotes.author: James E. Starrs

quotes.quote: Cycling is unique. No other sport lets you go like that where there's only the bike left to hold you up. If you ran as hard, you'd fall over. Your legs wouldn't support you.
quotes.author: Steve Johnson

quotes.quote: Cycling goals are cycling dreams with deadlines.
quotes.author: Felicity Luckey

quotes.quote: Cycling can be lonely, but in a good way. It gives you a moment to breathe and think, and get away from what you're working on.
quotes.author: David Byrne

quotes.quote: Choosing a cycling goal and sticking to it changes everything.
quotes.author: Felicity Luckey

quotes.quote: It is by riding a bicycle that you learn the contours of a country best, since you have to sweat up the hills and coast down them. Thus you remember them as they actually are, while in a motor car only a high hill impresses you, and you have no such accurate remembrance of country you have driven through as you gain by riding a bicycle.
quotes.author: Hemmingway Ernest

quotes.quote: Life is like riding a bicycle: you don't fall off unless you stop pedaling.
quotes.author: Claude Pepper

quotes.quote: You know, bicycling isn't just a matter of balance,I said. it's a matter of faith. You can keep upright only by moving forward. You have to have your eyes on the goal, not the ground. I'm going to call that the bicyclist's philosophy of life.
quotes.author: Susan Vreeland

quotes.quote: Your bike is discovery; your bike is freedom. It doesn't matter where you are, when you're on the saddle, you're taken away.
quotes.author: Doug Donaldson

quotes.quote: Riding a bike is everything to a cyclist. The friendship and camaraderie you have with other cyclist to a cyclist, it was the be all and end all of your life.
quotes.author: Tommy Godwin

quotes.quote: Cycling is a very grueling sport, possibly one of the most physically challenging of all.
quotes.author: James Hopker

quotes.quote: There now exists an enormous amount of cycling-specific scientific information.
quotes.author: James Hopker

quotes.quote: There is a reasonable cast to be made that road race cycling is one of the most complex disciplines within the family of cycling events.
quotes.author: James Hopker

quotes.quote: When the spirits are low, when the day appears dark, when work becomes monotonous, when hope hardly seems worth having, just mount a bicycle and go out for a spin down the road, without thought on anything but the ride you are taking.
quotes.author: Sir Arthur Conan Doyle

quotes.quote: Even just cycling around your local park enjoying the scenery is a pleasant way to spend some time in the fresh air and great exercise.
quotes.author: Gail Moore

quotes.quote: I have always struggled to achieve excellence. One thing that cycling has taught me is that if you can achieve something without a struggle it’s not going to be satisfying.
quotes.author: Greg LeMond

quotes.quote: It's possible to find some bikes to consider in large sporting good chains; some of these stores will actually have a good selection of mid-range bikes to choose from.
quotes.author: Paul Molenberg

quotes.quote: Until mountain biking came along, the bike scene was ruled by a small elite cadre of people who seemed allergic to enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Jacquie Phelan

quotes.quote: Cyclists live with pain. If you can’t handle it you will win nothing.
quotes.author: Eddy Merckx

quotes.quote: Cycling exercises some of the same muscle groups as running, such as the quadriceps and shins, both of which don't develop as rapidly from workouts as sthe calf muscles and hamstrings.
quotes.author: Meera Lester

quotes.quote: There are three types of biking to try: road riding; mountain biking and stationary cycling.
quotes.author: Meera Lester

quotes.quote: Taking place on the road, road biking allows you to travel long distances with speed.
quotes.author: Meera Lester

quotes.quote: Although mountain biking is a lot of fun and challenging, its jarring nature makes falls risky.
quotes.author: Meera Lester

quotes.quote: With stationary cycling, you can work out indoors year-round regardless of inclement weather.
quotes.author: Meera Lester

quotes.quote: One thing that cycling has taught me is that if you can achieve something without a struggle. It's not going to be satisfying.
quotes.author: Greg LeMond

quotes.quote: Cycling has multiple health benefits, particularly as a form of moderate to vigorous physical activity.
quotes.author: The MIT Press

quotes.quote: Transportation cycling provides an excellent opportunity for individuals to incorporate physical activity into daily life.
quotes.author: The MIT Press

quotes.quote: Cycling for transportation is accessible and appealing to population groups that often have low levels of participation in sport and other forms of leisure-time physical activity.
quotes.author: The MIT Press

quotes.quote: Health benefits also flow from reduced car use, including improved air quality, reduced noise pollution, and reduced greenhouse gas emissions.
quotes.author: The MIT Press

quotes.quote: Cycling can make a substantial contribution to improved health through increased physical activity levels across diverse population groups.
quotes.author: The MIT Press

quotes.quote: The bicycle is a simple machine that enables personal movement more efficiently than walking and requires only muscles to power it.
quotes.author: Melissa Bopp

quotes.quote: Inventors have been experimenting with variations on two-wheeled, human-powered transportation since the start of the 19th century.
quotes.author: Melissa Bopp

quotes.quote: The earliest bicycles had no mechanical pedaling system and were called velocipedes.
quotes.author: Melissa Bopp

quotes.quote: The first true bicycles developed in the 1880s and 90s, featuring a chain-drive and two equal-sized wheels had to contend with the stereotype that bicycling was a dangerous sport suitable only for upper-class daredevils.
quotes.author: Melissa Bopp

quotes.quote: The history of the bicycle, like the history of any technology, has been intertwined with prevailing social issues, political movements, and cultural mores of the time.
quotes.author: Melissa Bopp

quotes.quote: If your need to travel is all about visiting a local market or neighbor, consider using your feet or your bike and enjoy the benefit of a little exercise at the same time.
quotes.author: Trish Riley

quotes.quote: An advantage of riding a bike is that you'll be able to reach your destination without tangling in traffic, plus you'll burn calories and give your cardiovascular system a workout.
quotes.author: Trish Riley

quotes.quote: If you choose to bike instead of drive, you will reduce water pollution, because bikes don't drip petroleum fluids.
quotes.author: Trish Riley

quotes.quote: The best trips by bike are filled with twists and turns and glorious sweeping curves.
quotes.author: Selene Yeager

quotes.quote: As the name implies, road bikes are specially constructed to ride on hard surfaces like pavement. They are traditionally built for speed.
quotes.author: Selene Yeager

quotes.quote: Remember, beneath every cynic there lies a romantic, and probably an injured one.
quotes.author: Glenn Beck

quotes.quote: The cynic, a parasite of civilization, lives by denying it, for the very reason that he is convinced that it will not fail.
quotes.author: Jose Ortega Y Gasset

quotes.quote: Cynicism is tough. A cynic's point of view is really pitiful. I derive pleasure out of a lot of things in life. As long as I'm fairly healthy, it's hard to stay dismal for very long.
quotes.author: Shawn Colvin

quotes.quote: For the cynic, art is defined through money. That, of course, is a very sad statement. But an artist is someone who does creative things.
quotes.author: Wolfgang Beltracchi

quotes.quote: Cynicism is an unpleasant way of saying the truth.
quotes.author: Lillian Hellman

quotes.quote: Cynicism masquerades as wisdom, but it is the farthest thing from it. Because cynics don't learn anything. Because cynicism is a self-imposed blindness, a rejection of the world because we are afraid it will hurt us or disappoint us.
quotes.author: Stephen Colbert

quotes.quote: Don't be a cynic and disconsolate preacher. Don't bewail and moan. Omit the negative propositions. Challenge us with incessant affirmatives.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The cynics are right nine times out of ten.
quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

quotes.quote: Never be a cynic, even a gentle one. Never help out a sneer, even at the devil.
quotes.author: Vachel Lindsay

quotes.quote: The most unrealistic person in the world is the cynic, not the dreamer.
quotes.author: Paul Hawken

quotes.quote: Perhaps no philosopher is more correct than the cynic. The happiness of the animal, that thorough cynic, is the living proof of cynicism.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: The cynic thinks that he is being practical and that the hopeful person is not. It is actually the other way around. Cynicism is paralyzing, while the naÃ¯ve person tries what the cynic says is impossible and sometimes succeeds.
quotes.author: Charles Eisenstein

quotes.quote: What is the use of straining after an amiable view of things, when a cynical view is most likely to be the true one?.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: A cynic is a kind of romantic who has aged.
quotes.author: John Updike

quotes.quote: If you're regularly willing to give a critique, but not willing to take one, you're not a leader, you're a cynic.
quotes.author: Ed Stetzer

quotes.quote: Cynic: an idealist whose rose-colored glasses have been removed, snapped in two and stomped into the ground, immediately improving his vision.
quotes.author: Rick Bayan

quotes.quote: It is cynicism, and not idealism, that is generally the mark of youthful immaturity, or rather it is the cynic who is generally the most foolish romantic.
quotes.author: Andrew Sarris

quotes.quote: Cynicism is not realistic and tough. It's unrealistic and kind of cowardly because it means you don't have to try. ---in Good Housekeeping
quotes.author: Peggy Noonan

quotes.quote: The cynic is his own worst enemy. It requires far less skill to run a wrecking company than it does to be an architect.
quotes.author: Uell Stanley Andersen

quotes.quote: Cynicism is easy. An optimist is a braver cynic.
quotes.author: Colum Mccann

quotes.quote: A cynic by experience, a romantic by inclination and now a hero by necessity.
quotes.author: David Gemmell

quotes.quote: The cynic is a coward. He foresees all barrenness so that barrenness can never surprise him.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.quote: A cynic can chill and dishearten with a single word.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: It takes a clever man to turn cynic and a wise man to be clever enough not to.
quotes.author: Fannie Hurst

quotes.quote: The cynic puts all human actions into two classes - openly bad and secretly bad.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: A cynic sees little to admire in the world, while the world sees even less to admire in him.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Inside every cynical person, there is a disappointed idealist.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: A cynic is a man who looks at the world with a monocle in his mind's eye.
quotes.author: Carolyn Wells

quotes.quote: Cynicism and skepticism are the crudest form of quasi-intellectualism... Let the cynic become cynical of his cynicism and the skeptic skeptical of his skepticism and join the battle.
quotes.author: R. C. Sproul

quotes.quote: A cynic is a man who, when he smells flowers, looks around for a coffin.
quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

quotes.quote: There is nothing so pitiful as a young cynic because he has gone from knowing nothing to believing nothing.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: No man in his heart is quite so cynical as a well-bred woman.
quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: Most cynics are really crushed romantics: they've been hurt, they're sensitive, and their cynicism is a shell that's protecting this tiny, dear part in them that's still alive.
quotes.author: Jeff Bridges

quotes.quote: Cynics regarded everybody as equally corrupt... Idealists regarded everybody as equally corrupt, except themselves.
quotes.author: Robert Anton Wilson

quotes.quote: "Cynic" is a word invented by optimists to put down realists.
quotes.author: Stefano Benni

quotes.quote: A cynic is just a man who found out when he was ten that there wasn't any Santa Claus, and he's still upset.
quotes.author: James Gould Cozzens

quotes.quote: The scholar without good breeding is a pedant; the philosopher, a cynic.
quotes.author: Lord Chesterfield

quotes.quote: In the philosophical dialect, a cynic takes an insult as a compliment since opposition is already his style.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: What is a cynic? A man who knows the price of everything and the value of nothing.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: The worst government is often the most moral. One composed of cynics is often very tolerant and humane. But when fanatics are on top there is no limit to oppression.
quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

quotes.quote: Cynic, n. A blackguard whose faulty vision sees things as they are not as they ought to be.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: A cynic should never marry an idealist. For the cynic, marriage represents the welcome end of romantic life, with all its agony and ecstasy. But for the idealist, it is only the beginning.
quotes.author: Julie Burchill

quotes.quote: A cynic might suggest as the motto of modern life this simple legendâ€” Just as good as the real.
quotes.author: Charles Dudley Warner

quotes.quote: Cynicism is reality with an alternate spelling.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: It is impossible to be a cynic if you live a good deal with young people. Fundamentally, every young person has a feeling that the future is going to hold something of value.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: It's hard to argue against cynics - they always sound smarter than optimists because they have so much evidence on their side.
quotes.author: Molly Ivins

quotes.quote: The cynic sees only cynicism, the depressive can taint creation with one glance.
quotes.author: Anna Funder
